atk-s0502a:28: Appeva nāma sādheyya, sabbalokassa sā hitaṃ.
atk-s0502a:37: Gāthānaṃ byañjanapadaṃ, yaṃ tattha na vibhāvitaṃ.
atk-s0502a:39: Kevalaṃ taṃ vibhāvetvā, sesaṃ tameva atthato;
atk-s0502a:46: Manasā ce paduṭṭhena, bhāsati vā karoti vā;
atk-s0502a:47: Tato naṃ dukkhamanveti, cakkaṃva vahato pada”nti. –
atk-s0502a:48: Ayaṃ dhammadesanā kattha bhāsitāti? Sāvatthiyaṃ. Kaṃ ārabbhāti? Cakkhupālattheraṃ.
atk-s0502a:49_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira mahāsuvaṇṇo nāma kuṭumbiko ahosi aḍḍho mahaddhano mahābhogo aputtako.
atk-s0502a:49_1: So ekadivasaṃ nhānatitthaṃ nhatvā natvā āgacchanto antarāmagge sampannapattasākhaṃ
atk-s0502a:49_2: ekaṃ vanappatiṃ disvā “ayaṃ mahesakkhāya devatāya pariggahito bhavissatī”ti tassa
atk-s0502a:49_3: heṭṭhābhāgaṃ sodhāpetvā pākāraparikkhepaṃ kārāpetvā vālukaṃ okirāpetvā dhajapaṭākaṃ
atk-s0502a:49_4: ussāpetvā vanappatiṃ alaṅkaritvā añjaliṃ karitvā “sace puttaṃ vā dhītaraṃ vā labheyyaṃ,
atk-s0502a:49_5: tumhākaṃ mahāsakkāraṃ karissāmī”ti patthanaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:50_0: Athassa na cirasseva bhariyāya kucchiyaṃ gabbho patiṭṭhāsi. Sā gabbhassa patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:50_1: ñatvā tassa ārocesi. So tassā gabbhassa parihāramadāsi. Sā dasamāsaccayena puttaṃ
atk-s0502a:50_2: vijāyi. Taṃ nāmaggahaṇadivase seṭṭhi attanā pālitaṃ vanappatiṃ nissāya laddhattā
atk-s0502a:50_3: tassa pāloti nāmaṃ akāsi. Sā aparabhāge aññampi puttaṃ labhi. Tassa cūḷapāloti nāmaṃ
atk-s0502a:50_4: katvā itarassa mahāpāloti nāmaṃ akāsi. Te vayappatte gharabandhanena bandhiṃsu. Aparabhāge
atk-s0502a:50_5: mātāpitaro kālamakaṃsu. Sabbampi vibhavaṃ itareyeva vicāriṃsu.
atk-s0502a:51_0: Tasmiṃ samaye satthā pavattitavaradhammacakko anupubbenāgantvā anāthapiṇḍikena mahāseṭṭhinā
atk-s0502a:51_1: catupaṇṇāsakoṭidhanaṃ vissajjetvā kārite jetavanamahāvihāre viharati mahājanaṃ saggamagge
atk-s0502a:51_2: ca mokkhamagge ca patiṭṭhāpayamāno. Tathāgato hi mātipakkhato asītiyā, pitipakkhato
atk-s0502a:51_3: asītiyāti dveasītiñātikulasahassehi kārite nigrodhamahāvihāre ekameva vassāvāsaṃ
atk-s0502a:51_4: vasi, anāthapiṇḍikena kārite jetavanamahāvihāre ekūnavīsativassāni, visākhāya sattavīsatikoṭidhanapariccāgena
atk-s0502a:51_5: kārite pubbārāme chabbassānīti dvinnaṃ kulānaṃ guṇamahattataṃ paṭicca sāvatthiṃ nissāya
atk-s0502a:51_6: pañcavīsativassāni vassāvāsaṃ vasi. Anāthapiṇḍikopi visākhāpi mahāupāsikā nibaddhaṃ
atk-s0502a:51_7: divasassa dve vāre tathāgatassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanti, gacchantā ca “daharasāmaṇerā
atk-s0502a:51_8: no hatthe olokessantī”ti tucchahatthā na gatapubbā. Purebhattaṃ gacchantā khādanīyabhojanīyādīni
atk-s0502a:51_9: gahetvāva gacchanti, pacchābhattaṃ gacchantā pañca bhesajjāni aṭṭha ca pānāni. Nivesanesu
atk-s0502a:51_10: pana tesaṃ dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ bhikkhusahassānaṃ niccaṃ paññattāsanāneva honti. Annapānabhesajjesu
atk-s0502a:51_11: yo yaṃ icchati, tassa taṃ yathicchitameva sampajjati. Tesu anāthapiṇḍikena ekadivasampi
atk-s0502a:51_12: satthā pañhaṃ na pucchitapubbo. So kira “tathāgato buddhasukhumālo khattiyasukhumālo,
atk-s0502a:51_13: ‘bahūpakāro me, gahapatī’ti mayhaṃ dhammaṃ desento kilameyyā”ti satthari adhimattasinehena
atk-s0502a:51_14: pañhaṃ na pucchati. Satthā pana tasmiṃ nisinnamatteyeva “ayaṃ seṭṭhi maṃ arakkhitabbaṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a:51_15: rakkhati. Ahañhi kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ
atk-s0502a:51_16: attano sīsaṃ chinditvā akkhīni uppāṭetvā hadayamaṃsaṃ uppāṭetvā pāṇasamaṃ puttadāraṃ
atk-s0502a:51_17: pariccajitvā pāramiyo pūrento paresaṃ dhammadesanatthameva pūresiṃ. Esa maṃ arakkhitabbaṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a:52_0: Tadā sāvatthiyaṃ satta manussakoṭiyo vasanti. Tesu satthu dhammakathaṃ sutvā pañcakoṭimattā
atk-s0502a:52_1: manussā ariyasāvakā jātā, dvekoṭimattā manussā puthujjanā. Tesu ariyasāvakānaṃ dveyeva
atk-s0502a:52_2: kiccāni ahesuṃ – purebhattaṃ dānaṃ denti, pacchābhattaṃ gandhamālādihatthā vatthabhesajjapānakādīni
atk-s0502a:52_3: gāhāpetvā dhammassavanatthāya gacchanti. Athekadivasaṃ mahāpālo ariyasāvake gandhamālādihatthe
atk-s0502a:52_4: vihāraṃ gacchante disvā “ayaṃ mahājano kuhiṃ gacchatī”ti pucchitvā “dhammassavanāyā”ti
atk-s0502a:52_5: sutvā “ahampi gamissāmī”ti gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā parisapariyante nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:53_0: Buddhā ca nāma dhammaṃ desentā saraṇasīlapabbajjādīnaṃ upanissayaṃ oloketvā ajjhāsayavasena
atk-s0502a:53_1: dhammaṃ desenti, tasmā taṃ divasaṃ satthā tassa upanissayaṃ oloketvā dhammaṃ desento
atk-s0502a:53_2: anupubbikathaṃ kathesi. Seyyathidaṃ – dānakathaṃ, sīlakathaṃ, saggakathaṃ, kāmānaṃ
atk-s0502a:53_3: ādīnavaṃ, okāraṃ saṃkilesaṃ, nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ pakāsesi. Taṃ sutvā mahāpālo kuṭumbiko
atk-s0502a:53_4: cintesi – “paralokaṃ gacchantaṃ puttadhītaro vā bhātaro vā bhogā vā nānugacchanti,
atk-s0502a:53_5: sarīrampi attanā saddhiṃ na gacchati, kiṃ me gharāvāsena pabbajissāmī”ti. So desanāpariyosāne
atk-s0502a:53_6: satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṃ yāci. Atha naṃ satthā – “atthi te koci āpucchitabbayuttako
atk-s0502a:53_7: ñātī”ti āha. “Kaniṭṭhabhātā me atthi, bhante”ti. “Tena hi taṃ āpucchāhī”ti. So “sādhū”ti
atk-s0502a:53_8: sampaṭicchitvā satthāraṃ vanditvā gehaṃ gantvā kaniṭṭhaṃ pakkosāpetvā – “tāta, yaṃ
atk-s0502a:53_9: mayhaṃ imasmiṃ gehe saviññāṇakampi aviññāṇakampi dhanaṃ kiñci atthi, sabbaṃ taṃ tava
atk-s0502a:53_10: bhāro, paṭipajjāhi na”nti. “Tumhe pana kiṃ karissathā”ti āha. “Ahaṃ satthu santike
atk-s0502a:53_11: pabbajissāmī”ti. “Kiṃ kathesi bhātika, tvaṃ me mātari matāya mātā viya, pitari mate
atk-s0502a:53_12: pitā viya laddho, gehe te mahāvibhavo, sakkā gehaṃ ajjhāvasanteheva puññāni kātuṃ,
atk-s0502a:53_13: mā evaṃ karitthā”ti. “Tāta, ahaṃ satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā gharāvāse vasituṃ na
atk-s0502a:53_14: sakkomi. Satthārā hi atisaṇhasukhumaṃ tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇo
atk-s0502a:53_15: dhammo desito, na sakkā so agāramajjhe vasantena pūretuṃ, pabbajissāmi, tātā”ti.
atk-s0502a:53_17: hi attano hatthapādāpi anassavā honti, na attano vase vattanti, kimaṅgaṃ pana ñātakā,
atk-s0502a:53_18: svāhaṃ tava kathaṃ na karomi, samaṇapaṭipattiṃyeva pūressāmi”.
atk-s0502a:55: Yassa so vihatatthāmo, kathaṃ dhammaṃ carissati”. –
atk-s0502a:56_0: Pabbajissāmevāhaṃ, tātāti tassa viravantasseva satthu santikaṃ gantvā pabbajjaṃ yācitvā
atk-s0502a:56_1: laddhapabbajjūpasampado ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ santike pañca vassāni vasitvā vuṭṭhavasso
atk-s0502a:56_2: pavāretvā satthāramupasaṅkamitvā vanditvā pucchi – “bhante, imasmiṃ sāsane kati dhurānī”ti?
atk-s0502a:56_3: “Ganthadhuraṃ, vipassanādhuranti dveyeva dhurāni bhikkhū”ti. “Katamaṃ pana, bhante,
atk-s0502a:56_4: ganthadhuraṃ, katamaṃ vipassanādhura”nti? “Attano paññānurūpena ekaṃ vā dve vā nikāye
atk-s0502a:56_5: sakalaṃ vā pana tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā tassa dhāraṇaṃ, kathanaṃ, vācananti
atk-s0502a:56_6: idaṃ ganthadhuraṃ nāma, sallahukavuttino pana pantasenāsanābhiratassa attabhāve khayavayaṃ
atk-s0502a:56_7: paṭṭhapetvā sātaccakiriyavasena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaggahaṇanti idaṃ vipassanādhuraṃ
atk-s0502a:56_8: nāmā”ti. “Bhante, ahaṃ mahallakakāle pabbajito ganthadhuraṃ pūretuṃ na sakkhissāmi,
atk-s0502a:56_9: vipassanādhuraṃ pana pūressāmi, kammaṭṭhānaṃ me kathethā”ti. Athassa satthā yāva
atk-s0502a:57_0: So satthāraṃ vanditvā attanā sahagāmino bhikkhū pariyesanto saṭṭhi bhikkhū labhitvā
atk-s0502a:57_1: tehi saddhiṃ nikkhamitvā vīsayojanasatamaggaṃ gantvā ekaṃ mahantaṃ paccantagāmaṃ
atk-s0502a:57_2: patvā tattha saparivāro piṇḍāya pāvisi. Manussā vattasampanne bhikkhū disvāva pasannacittā
atk-s0502a:57_3: āsanāni paññāpetvā nisīdāpetvā paṇītenāhārena parivisitvā, “bhante, kuhiṃ ayyā gacchantī”ti
atk-s0502a:57_4: pucchitvā “yathāphāsukaṭṭhānaṃ upāsakā”ti vutte paṇḍitā manussā “vassāvāsaṃ senāsanaṃ
atk-s0502a:57_5: pariyesanti bhadantā”ti ñatvā, “bhante, sace ayyā imaṃ temāsaṃ idha vaseyyuṃ, mayaṃ
atk-s0502a:57_6: saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya sīlāni gaṇheyyāmā”ti āhaṃsu. Tepi “mayaṃ imāni kulāni nissāya
atk-s0502a:58_0: Manussā tesaṃ paṭiññaṃ gahetvā vihāraṃ paṭijaggitvā rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānāni sampādetvā
atk-s0502a:58_1: adaṃsu. Te nibaddhaṃ tameva gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisanti. Atha ne eko vejjo upasaṅkamitvā,
atk-s0502a:58_2: “bhante, bahūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne aphāsukampi nāma hoti, tasmiṃ uppanne mayhaṃ katheyyātha,
atk-s0502a:58_3: bhesajjaṃ karissāmī”ti pavāresi. Thero vassūpanāyikadivase te bhikkhū āmantetvā pucchi,
atk-s0502a:58_4: “āvuso, imaṃ temāsaṃ katihi iriyāpathehi vītināmessathā”ti? “Catūhi, bhante”ti. “Kiṃ
atk-s0502a:58_5: panetaṃ, āvuso, patirūpaṃ, nanu appamattehi bhavitabbaṃ”? “Mayañhi dharamānakassa
atk-s0502a:58_6: buddhassa santikā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā āgatā, buddhā ca nāma na sakkā pamādena ārādhetuṃ,
atk-s0502a:58_7: kalyāṇajjhāsayena te vo ārādhetabbā. Pamattassa ca nāma cattāro apāyā sakagehasadisā,
atk-s0502a:58_8: appamattā hothāvuso”ti. “Kiṃ tumhe pana, bhante”ti? “Ahaṃ tīhi iriyāpathehi vītināmessāmi,
atk-s0502a:58_9: piṭṭhiṃ na pasāressāmi, āvuso”ti. “Sādhu, bhante, appamattā hothā”ti.
atk-s0502a:59_0: Atha therassa niddaṃ anokkamantassa paṭhamamāse atikkante majjhimamāse sampatte akkhirogo
atk-s0502a:59_1: uppajji. Chiddaghaṭato udakadhārā viya akkhīhi assudhārā paggharanti. So sabbarattiṃ
atk-s0502a:59_2: samaṇadhammaṃ katvā aruṇuggamane gabbhaṃ pavisitvā nisīdi. Bhikkhū bhikkhācāravelāya
atk-s0502a:59_3: therassa santikaṃ gantvā, “bhikkhācāravelā, bhante”ti āhaṃsu. “Tena hi, āvuso, gaṇhatha
atk-s0502a:59_4: pattacīvara”nti. Attano pattacīvaraṃ gāhāpetvā nikkhami. Bhikkhū tassa akkhīhi assūni
atk-s0502a:59_5: paggharante disvā, “kimetaṃ, bhante”ti pucchiṃsu. “Akkhīni me, āvuso, vātā vijjhantī”ti.
atk-s0502a:59_6: “Nanu, bhante, vejjena pavāritamhā, tassa kathemā”ti. “Sādhāvuso”ti te vejjassa kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:59_7: So telaṃ pacitvā pesesi. Thero nāsāya telaṃ āsiñcanto nisinnakova āsiñcitvā antogāmaṃ
atk-s0502a:59_8: pāvisi. Vejjo taṃ disvā āha – “bhante, ayyassa kira akkhīni vāto vijjhatī”ti? “Āma,
atk-s0502a:59_9: upāsakā”ti. “Bhante, mayā telaṃ pacitvā pesitaṃ, nāsāya vo telaṃ āsitta”nti? “Āma,
atk-s0502a:59_10: upāsakā”ti. “Idāni kīdisa”nti? “Rujjateva upāsakā”ti. Vejjo “mayā ekavāreneva vūpasamanasamatthaṃ
atk-s0502a:59_11: telaṃ pahitaṃ, kiṃ nu kho rogo na vūpasanto”ti cintetvā, “bhante, nisīditvā vo telaṃ
atk-s0502a:59_12: āsittaṃ, nipajjitvā”ti pucchi. Thero tuṇhī ahosi, punappunaṃ pucchiyamānopi na kathesi.
atk-s0502a:59_13: So “vihāraṃ gantvā therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ olokessāmī”ti cintetvā – “tena hi, bhante,
atk-s0502a:59_14: gacchathā”ti theraṃ vissajjetvā vihāraṃ gantvā therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ olokento caṅkamananisīdanaṭṭhānameva
atk-s0502a:59_15: disvā sayanaṭṭhānaṃ adisvā, “bhante, nisinnehi vo āsittaṃ, nipannehī”ti pucchi. Thero
atk-s0502a:59_16: tuṇhī ahosi. “Mā, bhante, evaṃ karittha, samaṇadhammo nāma sarīraṃ yāpentena sakkā
atk-s0502a:59_17: kātuṃ, nipajjitvā āsiñcathā”ti punappunaṃ yāci. “Gaccha tvaṃ tāvāvuso, mantetvā jānissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:59_18: vejjaṃ uyyojesi. Therassa ca tattha neva ñātī, na sālohitā atthi, tena saddhiṃ manteyya?
atk-s0502a:59_19: Karajakāyena pana saddhiṃ mantento “vadehi tāva, āvuso pālita, tvaṃ kiṃ akkhīni olokessasi,
atk-s0502a:59_20: udāhu buddhasāsanaṃ? Anamataggasmiñhi saṃsāravaṭṭe tava akkhikāṇassa gaṇanā nāma
atk-s0502a:59_21: natthi, anekāni pana buddhasatāni buddhasahassāni atītāni. Tesu te ekabuddhopi na
atk-s0502a:59_22: pariciṇṇo, idāni imaṃ antovassaṃ tayo māse na nipajjissāmīti temāsaṃ nibaddhavīriyaṃ
atk-s0502a:59_23: karissāmi. Tasmā te cakkhūni nassantu vā bhijjantu vā, buddhasāsanameva dhārehi,
atk-s0502a:59_24: mā cakkhūnī”ti bhūtakāyaṃ ovadanto imā gāthāyo abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:72_0: Evaṃ tīhi gāthāhi attano ovādaṃ datvā nisinnakova natthukammaṃ katvā gāmaṃ piṇḍāya
atk-s0502a:72_1: pāvisi. Vejjo taṃ disvā “kiṃ, bhante, natthukammaṃ kata”nti pucchi. “Āma, upāsakā”ti.
atk-s0502a:72_2: “Kīdisaṃ, bhante”ti? “Rujjateva upāsakā”ti. “Nisīditvā vo, bhante, natthukammaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0502a:72_3: nipajjitvā”ti. Thero tuṇhī ahosi, punappunaṃ pucchiyamānopi na kiñci kathesi. Atha
atk-s0502a:72_4: naṃ vejjo, “bhante, tumhe sappāyaṃ na karotha, ajjato paṭṭhāya ‘asukena me telaṃ
atk-s0502a:72_5: pakka’nti mā vadittha, ahampi ‘mayā vo telaṃ pakka’nti na vakkhāmī”ti āha. So vejjena
atk-s0502a:72_6: paccakkhāto vihāraṃ gantvā tvaṃ vejjenāpi paccakkhātosi, iriyāpathaṃ mā vissajji samaṇāti.
atk-s0502a:75_0: Imāya gāthāya attānaṃ ovaditvā samaṇadhammaṃ akāsi. Athassa majjhimayāme atikkante
atk-s0502a:75_1: apubbaṃ acarimaṃ akkhīni ceva kilesā ca bhijjiṃsu. So sukkhavipassako arahā hutvā
atk-s0502a:76_0: Bhikkhū bhikkhācāravelāya āgantvā “bhikkhācārakālo, bhante”ti āhaṃsu. “Kālo, āvuso”ti?
atk-s0502a:76_1: “Āma, bhante”ti. “Tena hi gacchathā”ti. “Kiṃ tumhe pana, bhante”ti? “Akkhīni me,
atk-s0502a:76_2: āvuso, parihīnānī”ti. Te tassa akkhīni oloketvā assupuṇṇanettā hutvā, “bhante, mā
atk-s0502a:76_3: cintayittha, mayaṃ vo paṭijaggissāmā”ti theraṃ samassāsetvā kattabbayuttakaṃ vattapaṭivattaṃ
atk-s0502a:76_4: katvā gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisiṃsu. Manussā theraṃ adisvā, “bhante, amhākaṃ ayyo kuhi”nti
atk-s0502a:76_5: pucchitvā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā yāguṃ pesetvā sayaṃ piṇḍapātamādāya gantvā theraṃ vanditvā
atk-s0502a:76_6: pādamūle parivattamānā roditvā, “bhante, mayaṃ vo paṭijaggissāma, tumhe mā cintayitthā”ti
atk-s0502a:77_0: Tato paṭṭhāya nibaddhaṃ yāgubhattaṃ vihārameva pesenti. Theropi itare saṭṭhi bhikkhū
atk-s0502a:77_1: nirantaraṃ ovadati. Te tassovāde ṭhatvā upakaṭṭhāya pavāraṇāya sabbeva saha paṭisambhidāhi
atk-s0502a:77_2: arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Te vuṭṭhavassā ca pana satthāraṃ daṭṭhukāmā hutvā theramāhaṃsu,
atk-s0502a:77_3: “bhante, satthāraṃ daṭṭhukāmamhā”ti. Thero tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā cintesi – “ahaṃ dubbalo,
atk-s0502a:77_4: antarāmagge ca amanussapariggahitā aṭavī atthi, mayi etehi saddhiṃ gacchante sabbe
atk-s0502a:77_5: kilamissanti, bhikkhampi labhituṃ na sakkhissanti, ime puretarameva pesessāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:77_6: Atha ne āha – “āvuso, tumhe purato gacchathā”ti. “Tumhe pana bhante”ti? “Ahaṃ dubbalo,
atk-s0502a:77_7: antarāmagge ca amanussapariggahitā aṭavī atthi, mayi tumhehi saddhiṃ gacchante sabbe
atk-s0502a:77_8: kilamissatha, tumhe purato gacchathā”ti. “Mā, bhante, evaṃ karittha, mayaṃ tumhehi
atk-s0502a:77_9: saddhiṃyeva gamissāmā”ti. “Mā vo, āvuso, evaṃ ruccittha, evaṃ sante mayhaṃ aphāsukaṃ
atk-s0502a:77_10: bhavissati, mayhaṃ kaniṭṭho pana tumhe disvā pucchissati, athassa mama cakkhūnaṃ
atk-s0502a:77_11: parihīnabhāvaṃ āroceyyātha, so mayhaṃ santikaṃ kañcideva pahiṇissati, tena saddhiṃ
atk-s0502a:77_12: āgacchissāmi, tumhe mama vacanena dasabalañca asītimahāthere ca vandathā”ti te uyyojesi.
atk-s0502a:78_0: Te theraṃ khamāpetvā antogāmaṃ pavisiṃsu. Manussā te disvā nisīdāpetvā bhikkhaṃ datvā
atk-s0502a:78_1: “kiṃ, bhante, ayyānaṃ gamanākāro paññāyatī”ti? “Āma, upāsakā, satthāraṃ daṭṭhukāmamhā”ti.
atk-s0502a:78_2: Te punappunaṃ yācitvā tesaṃ gamanachandameva ñatvā anugantvā paridevitvā nivattiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:78_3: Tepi anupubbena jetavanaṃ gantvā satthārañca asītimahāthere ca therassa vacanena
atk-s0502a:78_4: vanditvā punadivase yattha therassa kaniṭṭho vasati, taṃ vīthiṃ piṇḍāya pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:78_5: Kuṭumbiko te sañjānitvā nisīdāpetvā katapaṭisanthāro “bhātikatthero me, bhante, kuhi”nti
atk-s0502a:78_6: pucchi. Athassa te taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ. So taṃ sutvāva tesaṃ pādamūle parivattento
atk-s0502a:78_7: roditvā pucchi – “idāni, bhante, kiṃ kātabba”nti? “Thero ito kassaci āgamanaṃ paccāsīsati,
atk-s0502a:78_8: tassa gatakāle tena saddhiṃ āgamissatī”ti. “Ayaṃ me, bhante, bhāgineyyo pālito nāma,
atk-s0502a:78_9: etaṃ pesethā”ti. “Evaṃ pesetuṃ na sakkā, magge paripantho atthi, taṃ pabbājetvā pesetuṃ
atk-s0502a:78_10: vaṭṭatī”ti. “Evaṃ katvā pesetha, bhante”ti. Atha naṃ pabbājetvā aḍḍhamāsamattaṃ pattacīvaraggahaṇādīni
atk-s0502a:79_0: So anupubbena taṃ gāmaṃ patvā gāmadvāre ekaṃ mahallakaṃ disvā, “imaṃ gāmaṃ nissāya
atk-s0502a:79_1: koci āraññako vihāro atthī”ti pucchi. “Atthi, bhante”ti. “Ko nāma tattha vasatī”ti?
atk-s0502a:79_2: “Pālitatthero nāma, bhante”ti. “Maggaṃ me ācikkhathā”ti. “Kosi tvaṃ, bhante”ti? “Therassa
atk-s0502a:79_3: bhāgineyyomhī”ti. Atha naṃ gahetvā vihāraṃ nesi. So theraṃ vanditvā aḍḍhamāsamattaṃ
atk-s0502a:79_4: vattapaṭivattaṃ katvā theraṃ sammā paṭijaggitvā, “bhante, mātulakuṭumbiko me tumhākaṃ
atk-s0502a:79_5: āgamanaṃ paccāsīsati, etha, gacchāmā”ti āha. “Tena hi imaṃ me yaṭṭhikoṭiṃ gaṇhāhī”ti.
atk-s0502a:79_6: So yaṭṭhikoṭiṃ gahetvā therena saddhiṃ antogāmaṃ pāvisi. Manussā theraṃ nisīdāpetvā
atk-s0502a:79_7: “kiṃ, bhante, gamanākāro vo paññāyatī”ti pucchiṃsu. “Āma, upāsakā, gantvā satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:79_8: vandissāmī”ti. Te nānappakārena yācitvā alabhantā theraṃ uyyojetvā upaḍḍhapathaṃ
atk-s0502a:79_9: gantvā roditvā nivattiṃsu. Sāmaṇero theraṃ yaṭṭhikoṭiyā ādāya gacchanto antarāmagge
atk-s0502a:79_10: aṭaviyaṃ kaṭṭhanagaraṃ nāma therena upanissāya vuṭṭhapubbaṃ gāmaṃ sampāpuṇi, so gāmato
atk-s0502a:79_11: nikkhamitvā araññe gītaṃ gāyitvā dārūni uddharantiyā ekissā itthiyā gītasaddaṃ sutvā
atk-s0502a:79_12: sare nimittaṃ gaṇhi. Itthisaddo viya hi añño saddo purisānaṃ sakalasarīraṃ pharitvā
atk-s0502a:79_13: ṭhātuṃ samattho nāma natthi. Tenāha bhagavā –
atk-s0502a:80: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekasaddampi samanupassāmi, yaṃ evaṃ purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati, yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, itthisaddo”ti.
atk-s0502a:81_0: Sāmaṇero tattha nimittaṃ gahetvā yaṭṭhikoṭiṃ vissajjetvā “tiṭṭhatha tāva, bhante,
atk-s0502a:81_1: kiccaṃ me atthī”ti tassā santikaṃ gato. Sā taṃ disvā tuṇhī ahosi. So tāya saddhiṃ
atk-s0502a:81_2: sīlavipattiṃ pāpuṇi. Thero cintesi – “idāneva eko gītasaddo suyyittha. So ca kho
atk-s0502a:81_3: itthiyā saddo chijji, sāmaṇeropi cirāyati, so tāya saddhiṃ sīlavipattiṃ patto bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:81_4: Sopi attano kiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā āgantvā “gacchāma, bhante”ti āha. Atha naṃ thero pucchi
atk-s0502a:81_5: – “pāpojātosi sāmaṇerā”ti. So tuṇhī hutvā therena punappunaṃ puṭṭhopi na kiñci kathesi.
atk-s0502a:81_6: Atha naṃ thero āha – “tādisena pāpena mama yaṭṭhikoṭiggahaṇakiccaṃ natthī”ti. So
atk-s0502a:81_7: saṃvegappatto kāsāyāni apanetvā gihiniyāmena paridahitvā, “bhante, ahaṃ pubbe sāmaṇero,
atk-s0502a:81_8: idāni panamhi gihī jāto, pabbajantopi ca svāhaṃ na saddhāya pabbajito, maggaparipanthabhayena
atk-s0502a:81_9: pabbajito, etha gacchāmā”ti āha. “Āvuso, gihipāpopi samaṇapāpopi pāpoyeva, tvaṃ samaṇabhāve
atk-s0502a:81_10: ṭhatvāpi sīlamattaṃ pūretuṃ nāsakkhi, gihī hutvā kiṃ nāma kalyāṇaṃ karissasi, tādisena
atk-s0502a:81_11: pāpena mama yaṭṭhikoṭiggahaṇakiccaṃ natthī”ti āha. “Bhante, amanussupaddavo maggo,
atk-s0502a:81_12: tumhe ca andhā apariṇāyakā, kathaṃ idha vasissathā”ti? Atha naṃ thero, “āvuso, tvaṃ
atk-s0502a:81_13: mā evaṃ cintayi, idheva me nipajjitvā marantassāpi aparāparaṃ parivattantassāpi tayā
atk-s0502a:81_14: saddhiṃ gamanaṃ nāma natthī”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:83: Seyyamāno na gacchāmi, natthi bāle sahāyatā.
atk-s0502a:85: Marissāmi no gamissāmi, natthi bāle sahāyatā”ti.
atk-s0502a:86_0: Taṃ sutvā itaro saṃvegajāto “bhāriyaṃ vata me sāhasikaṃ ananucchavikaṃ kammaṃ kata”nti
atk-s0502a:86_1: bāhā paggayha kandanto vanasaṇḍaṃ pakkhanditvā tathā pakkantova ahosi. Therassāpi
atk-s0502a:86_4: uṇhākāraṃ dassesi. Sakko “ko nu kho maṃ ṭhānā cāvetukāmo”ti olokento dibbena cakkhunā
atk-s0502a:90: Dhammagaruko ayaṃ pālo, nisinno sāsane rato”ti.
atk-s0502a:91: Athassa etadahosi – “sacāhaṃ evarūpassa pāpagarahino dhammagarukassa ayyassa santikaṃ na gamissāmi, muddhā me sattadhā phaleyya, gamissāmi tassa santika”nti. Tato –
atk-s0502a:94_0: Upagantvā ca pana therassa avidūre padasaddamakāsi. Atha naṃ thero pucchi – “ko eso”ti?
atk-s0502a:94_2: āvuso”ti. “Ayyo pana, bhante, kuhiṃ gamissatī”ti? “Ahampi tattheva gamissāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:94_3: “Tena hi ekatova gacchāma, bhante”ti. “Ahaṃ, āvuso, dubbalo, mayā saddhiṃ gacchantassa
atk-s0502a:94_4: tava papañco bhavissatī”ti. “Mayhaṃ accāyikaṃ natthi, ahampi ayyena saddhiṃ gacchanto
atk-s0502a:94_5: dasasu puññakiriyavatthūsu ekaṃ labhissāmi, ekatova gacchāma, bhante”ti. Thero “eso
atk-s0502a:94_6: sappuriso bhavissatī”ti cintetvā – “tena hi saddhiṃ gamissāmi, yaṭṭhikoṭiṃ gaṇha
atk-s0502a:94_7: upāsakā”ti āha. Sakko tathā katvā pathaviṃ saṅkhipanto sāyanhasamaye jetavanaṃ sampāpesi.
atk-s0502a:94_8: Thero saṅkhapaṇavādisaddaṃ sutvā “kattheso saddo”ti pucchi. “Sāvatthiyaṃ, bhante”ti?
atk-s0502a:94_9: “Pubbe mayaṃ gamanakāle cirena gamimhā”ti. “Ahaṃ ujumaggaṃ jānāmi, bhante”ti. Tasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:94_10: khaṇe thero “nāyaṃ manusso, devatā bhavissatī”ti sallakkhesi.
atk-s0502a:97_0: So theraṃ netvā therassevatthāya kaniṭṭhakuṭumbikena kāritaṃ paṇṇasālaṃ netvā phalake
atk-s0502a:97_1: nisīdāpetvā piyasahāyakavaṇṇena tassa santikaṃ gantvā, “samma, cūḷapālā”ti pakkosi.
atk-s0502a:97_2: “Kiṃ, sammā”ti? “Therassāgatabhāvaṃ jānāsī”ti? “Na jānāmi, kiṃ pana thero āgato”ti?
atk-s0502a:97_3: “Āma, samma, idāni ahaṃ vihāraṃ gantvā theraṃ tayā kāritapaṇṇasālāya nisinnakaṃ disvā
atk-s0502a:97_4: āgatomhī”ti vatvā pakkāmi. Kuṭumbikopi vihāraṃ gantvā theraṃ disvā pādamūle parivattanto
atk-s0502a:97_5: roditvā “idaṃ disvā ahaṃ, bhante, tumhākaṃ pabbajituṃ nādāsi”ntiādīni vatvā dve dāsadārake
atk-s0502a:97_6: bhujisse katvā therassa santike pabbājetvā “antogāmato yāgubhattādīni āharitvā theraṃ
atk-s0502a:97_7: upaṭṭhahathā”ti paṭiyādesi. Sāmaṇerā vattapaṭivattaṃ katvā theraṃ upaṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:98_0: Athekadivasaṃ disāvāsino bhikkhū “satthāraṃ passissāmā”ti jetavanaṃ āgantvā tathāgataṃ
atk-s0502a:98_1: vanditvā asītimahāthere ca, vanditvā vihāracārikaṃ carantā cakkhupālattherassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:98_2: patvā “idampi passissāmā”ti sāyaṃ tadabhimukhā ahesuṃ. Tasmiṃ khaṇe mahāmegho uṭṭhahi.
atk-s0502a:98_3: Te “idāni atisāyanho, megho ca uṭṭhito, pātova gantvā passissāmā”ti nivattiṃsu. Devo
atk-s0502a:98_4: paṭhamayāmaṃ vassitvā majjhimayāme vigato. Thero āraddhavīriyo āciṇṇacaṅkamano, tasmā
atk-s0502a:98_5: pacchimayāme caṅkamanaṃ otari. Tadā ca pana navavuṭṭhāya bhūmiyā bahū indagopakā
atk-s0502a:98_6: uṭṭhahiṃsu. Te there caṅkamante yebhuyyena vipajjiṃsu. Antevāsikā therassa caṅkamanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:98_7: kālasseva na sammajjiṃsu. Itare bhikkhū “therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ passissāmā”ti āgantvā
atk-s0502a:98_8: caṅkamane matapāṇake disvā “ko imasmiṃ caṅkamatī”ti pucchiṃsu. “Amhākaṃ upajjhāyo,
atk-s0502a:98_9: bhante”ti. Te ujjhāyiṃsu “passathāvuso, samaṇassa kammaṃ, sacakkhukakāle nipajjitvā
atk-s0502a:98_10: niddāyanto kiñci akatvā idāni cakkhuvikalakāle ‘caṅkamāmī’ti ettake pāṇake māresi
atk-s0502a:99_0: Atha kho te gantvā tathāgatassa ārocesuṃ, “bhante, cakkhupālatthero ‘caṅkamāmī’ti
atk-s0502a:99_1: bahū pāṇake māresī”ti. “Kiṃ pana so tumhehi mārento diṭṭho”ti? “Na diṭṭho, bhante”ti.
atk-s0502a:99_2: “Yatheva tumhe taṃ na passatha, tatheva sopi te pāṇe na passati. Khīṇāsavānaṃ maraṇacetanā
atk-s0502a:99_3: nāma natthi, bhikkhave”ti. “Bhante, arahattassa upanissaye sati kasmā andho jāto”ti?
atk-s0502a:99_4: “Attano katakammavasena, bhikkhave”ti. “Kiṃ pana, bhante, tena kata”nti? Tena hi,
atk-s0502a:100_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ kāsiraññe rajjaṃ kārente eko vejjo gāmanigamesu caritvā vejjakammaṃ
atk-s0502a:100_1: karonto ekaṃ cakkhudubbalaṃ itthiṃ disvā pucchi – “kiṃ te aphāsuka”nti? “Akkhīhi
atk-s0502a:100_2: na passāmī”ti. “Bhesajjaṃ te karissāmī”ti? “Karohi, sāmī”ti. “Kiṃ me dassasī”ti?
atk-s0502a:100_3: “Sace me akkhīni pākatikāni kātuṃ sakkhissasi, ahaṃ te saddhiṃ puttadhītāhi dāsī
atk-s0502a:100_4: bhavissāmī”ti. So “sādhū”ti bhesajjaṃ saṃvidahi, ekabhesajjeneva akkhīni pākatikāni
atk-s0502a:100_5: ahesuṃ. Sā cintesi – “ahametassa saputtadhītā dāsī bhavissāmī”ti paṭijāniṃ, “na kho
atk-s0502a:100_6: pana maṃ saṇhena sammācārena samudācarissati, vañcessāmi na”nti. Sā vejjenāgantvā
atk-s0502a:100_7: “kīdisaṃ, bhadde”ti puṭṭhā “pubbe me akkhīni thokaṃ rujjiṃsu, idāni pana atirekataraṃ
atk-s0502a:100_8: rujjantī”ti āha. Vejjo “ayaṃ maṃ vañcetvā kiñci adātukāmā, na me etāya dinnāya bhatiyā
atk-s0502a:100_9: attho, idāneva naṃ andhaṃ karissāmī”ti cintetvā gehaṃ gantvā bhariyāya etamatthaṃ
atk-s0502a:100_10: ācikkhi. Sā tuṇhī ahosi. So ekaṃ bhesajjaṃ yojetvā tassā santikaṃ gantvā “bhadde,
atk-s0502a:100_11: imaṃ bhesajjaṃ añjehī”ti añjāpesi. Athassā dve akkhīni dīpasikhā viya vijjhāyiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:101_0: Bhikkhave, tadā mama puttena katakammaṃ pacchato pacchato anubandhi. Pāpakammañhi
atk-s0502a:101_1: nāmetaṃ dhuraṃ vahato balibaddassa padaṃ cakkaṃ viya anugacchatīti idaṃ vatthuṃ kathetvā
atk-s0502a:101_2: anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā patiṭṭhāpitamattikaṃ sāsanaṃ rājamuddāya lañchanto viya dhammarājā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:104: Manasā ce paduṭṭhena, bhāsati vā karoti vā;
atk-s0502a:105: Tato naṃ dukkhamanveti, cakkaṃva vahato pada”nti.
atk-s0502a:106_0: Tattha manoti kāmāvacarakusalādibhedaṃ sabbampi catubhūmikacittaṃ. Imasmiṃ pana pade
atk-s0502a:106_1: tadā tassa vejjassa uppannacittavasena niyamiyamānaṃ vavatthāpiyamānaṃ paricchijjiyamānaṃ
atk-s0502a:106_2: domanassasahagataṃ paṭighasampayuttacittameva labbhati. Pubbaṅgamāti tena paṭhamagāminā
atk-s0502a:106_3: hutvā samannāgatā. Dhammāti guṇadesanāpariyattinissattanijjīvavasena cattāro dhammā nāma. Tesu –
atk-s0502a:107: “Na hi dhammo adhammo ca, ubho samavipākino;
atk-s0502a:108: Adhammo nirayaṃ neti, dhammo pāpeti suggati”nti. –
atk-s0502a:109_0: Ayaṃ guṇadhammo nāma. “Dhammaṃ vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi ādikalyāṇa”nti ayaṃ desanādhammo
atk-s0502a:109_1: nāma. “Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacce kulaputtā dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇanti suttaṃ geyya”nti
atk-s0502a:109_2: ayaṃ pariyattidhammo nāma. “Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye dhammā honti, khandhā hontī”ti
atk-s0502a:109_3: ayaṃ nissattadhammo nāma, nijjīvadhammotipi eso eva. Tesu imasmiṃ ṭhāne nissattanijjīvadhammo
atk-s0502a:109_4: adhippeto. So atthato tayo arūpino khandhā vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandhoti.
atk-s0502a:109_5: Ete hi mano pubbaṅgamo etesanti manopubbaṅgamā nāma.
atk-s0502a:110_0: Kathaṃ panetehi saddhiṃ ekavatthuko ekārammaṇo apubbaṃ acarimaṃ ekakkhaṇe uppajjamāno
atk-s0502a:110_1: mano pubbaṅgamo nāma hotīti? Uppādapaccayaṭṭhena. Yathā hi bahūsu ekato gāmaghātādīni
atk-s0502a:110_2: kammāni karontesu “ko etesaṃ pubbaṅgamo”ti vutte yo nesaṃ paccayo hoti, yaṃ nissāya
atk-s0502a:110_3: te taṃ kammaṃ karonti, so datto vā mitto vā tesaṃ pubbaṅgamoti vuccati, evaṃsampadamidaṃ
atk-s0502a:110_4: veditabbaṃ. Iti uppādapaccayaṭṭhena mano pubbaṅgamo etesanti manopubbaṅgamā. Na hi
atk-s0502a:110_5: te mane anuppajjante uppajjituṃ sakkonti, mano pana ekaccesu cetasikesu anupajjantesupi
atk-s0502a:110_6: uppajjatiyeva. Adhipativasena pana mano seṭṭho etesanti manoseṭṭho. Yathā hi corādīnaṃ
atk-s0502a:110_7: corajeṭṭhakādayo adhipatino seṭṭhā. Tathā tesampi mano adhipati manova seṭṭhā. Yathā
atk-s0502a:110_8: pana dāruādīhi nipphannāni tāni tāni bhaṇḍāni dārumayādīni nāma honti, tathā tepi
atk-s0502a:111_0: Paduṭṭhenāti āgantukehi abhijjhādīhi dosehi paduṭṭhena. Pakatimano hi bhavaṅgacittaṃ,
atk-s0502a:111_1: taṃ apaduṭṭhaṃ. Yathā hi pasannaṃ udakaṃ āgantukehi nīlādīhi upakkiliṭṭhaṃ nīlodakādibhedaṃ
atk-s0502a:111_2: hoti, na ca navaṃ udakaṃ, nāpi purimaṃ pasannaudakameva, tathā tampi āgantukehi abhijjhādīhi
atk-s0502a:111_3: dosehi paduṭṭhaṃ hoti, na ca navaṃ cittaṃ, nāpi purimaṃ bhavaṅgacittameva, tenāha
atk-s0502a:111_4: bhagavā – “pabhassaramidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ, tañca kho āgantukehi upakkilesehi
atk-s0502a:111_5: upakkiliṭṭha”nti. Evaṃ manasā ce paduṭṭhena, bhāsati vā karoti vā so bhāsamāno catubbidhaṃ
atk-s0502a:111_6: vacīduccaritameva bhāsati, karonto tividhaṃ kāyaduccaritameva karoti, abhāsanto akaronto
atk-s0502a:111_7: tāya abhijjhādīhi paduṭṭhamānasatāya tividhaṃ manoduccaritaṃ pūreti. Evamassa dasa
atk-s0502a:112_0: Tato naṃ dukkhamanvetīti tato tividhaduccaritato taṃ puggalaṃ dukkhaṃ anveti, duccaritānubhāvena
atk-s0502a:112_1: catūsu apāyesu, manussesu vā tamattabhāvaṃ gacchantaṃ kāyavatthukampi itarampīti
atk-s0502a:112_2: iminā pariyāyena kāyikacetasikaṃ vipākadukkhaṃ anugacchati. Yathā kiṃ? Cakkaṃva vahato
atk-s0502a:112_3: padanti dhure yuttassa dhuraṃ vahato balibaddassa padaṃ cakkaṃ viya. Yathā hi so
atk-s0502a:112_4: ekampi divasaṃ dvepi pañcapi dasapi aḍḍhamāsampi māsampi vahanto cakkaṃ nivattetuṃ
atk-s0502a:112_5: jahituṃ na sakkoti, atha khvassa purato abhikkamantassa yugaṃ gīvaṃ bādhati, pacchato
atk-s0502a:112_6: paṭikkamantassa cakkaṃ ūrumaṃsaṃ paṭihanati. Imehi dvīhi ākārehi bādhantaṃ cakkaṃ
atk-s0502a:112_7: tassa padānupadikaṃ hoti; tatheva manasā paduṭṭhena tīṇi duccaritāni pūretvā ṭhitaṃ
atk-s0502a:112_8: puggalaṃ nirayādīsu tattha tattha gatagataṭṭhāne duccaritamūlakaṃ kāyikampi cetasikampi
atk-s0502a:113: Gāthāpariyosāne tiṃsasahassā bhikkhū saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Sampattaparibhāyapi desanā sātthikā saphalā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:116: 2. Manopubbaṅgamā dhammāti dutiyagāthāpi sāvatthiyaṃyeva maṭṭhakuṇḍaliṃ ārabbha bhāsitā.
atk-s0502a:117_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira adinnapubbako nāma brāhmaṇo ahosi. Tena kassaci kiñci na dinnapubbaṃ,
atk-s0502a:117_1: tena taṃ “adinnapubbako”tveva sañjāniṃsu. Tassa ekaputtako ahosi piyo manāpo. Athassa
atk-s0502a:117_2: pilandhanaṃ kāretukāmo “sace suvaṇṇakāre kāressāmi, bhattavetanaṃ dātabbaṃ bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0502a:117_3: sayameva suvaṇṇaṃ koṭṭetvā maṭṭhāni kuṇḍalāni katvā adāsi. Tenassa putto maṭṭhakuṇḍalītveva
atk-s0502a:117_4: paññāyittha. Tassa soḷasavassikakāle paṇḍurogo udapādi. Tassa mātā puttaṃ oloketvā,
atk-s0502a:117_5: “brāhmaṇa, puttassa te rogo uppanno, tikicchāpehi na”nti āha. “Bhoti sace vejjaṃ
atk-s0502a:117_6: ānessāmi, bhattavetanaṃ dātabbaṃ bhavissati; kiṃ tvaṃ mama dhanacchedaṃ na olokessasī”ti?
atk-s0502a:117_7: “Atha naṃ kiṃ karissasi, brāhmaṇā”ti? “Yathā me dhanacchedo na hoti, tathā karissāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:117_8: So vejjānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā “asukarogassa nāma tumhe kiṃ bhesajjaṃ karothā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a:117_9: Athassa te yaṃ vā taṃ vā rukkhatacādiṃ ācikkhanti. So tamāharitvā puttassa bhesajjaṃ
atk-s0502a:117_10: karoti. Taṃ karontassevassa rogo balavā ahosi, atekicchabhāvaṃ upāgami. Brāhmaṇo
atk-s0502a:117_11: tassa dubbalabhāvaṃ ñatvā ekaṃ vejjaṃ pakkosi. So taṃ oloketvāva “amhākaṃ ekaṃ kiccaṃ
atk-s0502a:117_12: atthi, aññaṃ vejjaṃ pakkositvā tikicchāpehī”ti taṃ pahāya nikkhami. Brāhmaṇo tassa
atk-s0502a:117_13: maraṇasamayaṃ ñatvā “imassa dassanatthāya āgatā antogehe sāpateyyaṃ passissanti,
atk-s0502a:117_14: bahi naṃ karissāmī”ti puttaṃ nīharitvā bahiāḷinde nipajjāpesi.
atk-s0502a:118_0: Taṃ divasaṃ bhagavā balavapaccūsasamaye mahākaruṇāsamāpattito vuṭṭhāya pubbabuddhesu
atk-s0502a:118_2: lokaṃ volokento dasasahassacakkavāḷesu ñāṇajālaṃ patthari. Maṭṭhakuṇḍalī bahiāḷinde
atk-s0502a:118_3: nipannākāreneva tassa anto paññāyi. Satthā taṃ disvā tassa antogehā nīharitvā tattha
atk-s0502a:118_4: nipajjāpitabhāvaṃ ñatvā “atthi nu kho mayhaṃ ettha gatapaccayena attho”ti upadhārento
atk-s0502a:118_5: idaṃ addasa – ayaṃ māṇavo mayi cittaṃ pasādetvā kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsadevaloke tiṃsayojanike
atk-s0502a:118_6: kanakavimāne nibbattissati, accharāsahassaparivāro bhavissati, brāhmaṇopi taṃ jhāpetvā
atk-s0502a:118_7: rodanto āḷāhane vicarissati. Devaputto tigāvutappamāṇaṃ saṭṭhisakaṭabhārālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0502a:118_8: accharāsahassaparivāraṃ attabhāvaṃ oloketvā “kena nu kho kammena mayā ayaṃ sirisampatti
atk-s0502a:118_9: laddhā”ti oloketvā mayi cittappasādena laddhabhāvaṃ ñatvā “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo dhanacchedabhayena
atk-s0502a:118_10: mama bhesajjamakatvā idāni āḷāhanaṃ gantvā rodati, vippakārappattaṃ naṃ karissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:118_11: pitari rodante maṭṭhakuṇḍalivaṇṇena āgantvā āḷāhanassāvidūre nipajjitvā rodissati.
atk-s0502a:118_12: Atha naṃ brāhmaṇo “kosi tva”nti pucchissati. “Ahaṃ te putto maṭṭhakuṇḍalī”ti ācikkhissati.
atk-s0502a:118_13: “Kuhiṃ nibbattosī”ti? “Tāvasiṃsabhavane”ti. “Kiṃ kammaṃ katvā”ti vutte mayi cittappasādena
atk-s0502a:118_14: nibbattabhāvaṃ ācikkhissati. Brāhmaṇo “tumhesu cittaṃ pasādetvā sagge nibbatto nāma
atk-s0502a:118_15: atthī”ti maṃ pucchissati. Athassāhaṃ “ettakāni satāni vā sahassāni vā satasahassāni
atk-s0502a:118_16: vāti na sakkā gaṇanā paricchinditu”nti vatvā dhammapade gāthaṃ bhāsissāmi. Gāthāpariyosāne
atk-s0502a:118_17: caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo bhavissati, maṭṭha kuṇḍalī sotāpanno
atk-s0502a:118_18: bhavissati. Tathā adinnapubbako brāhmaṇo. Iti imaṃ kulaputtaṃ nissāya mahādhammābhisamayo
atk-s0502a:118_19: bhavissatīti disvā punadivase katasarīrapaṭijaggano mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivuto sāvatthiṃ
atk-s0502a:118_20: piṇḍāya pavisitvā anupubbena brāhmaṇassa gehadvāraṃ gato.
atk-s0502a:119_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe maṭṭhakuṇḍalī antogehābhimukho nipanno hoti. Athassa satthā attano apassanabhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:119_1: ñatvā ekaṃ rasmiṃ vissajjesi. Māṇavo “kiṃ obhāso nāmeso”ti parivattetvā nipannova
atk-s0502a:119_2: satthāraṃ disvā, “andhabālapitaraṃ nissāya evarūpaṃ buddhaṃ upasaṅkamitvā kāyaveyyāvaṭikaṃ
atk-s0502a:119_3: vā kātuṃ dānaṃ vā dātuṃ dhammaṃ vā sotuṃ nālatthaṃ, idāni me hatthāpi anadhipateyyā,
atk-s0502a:119_4: aññaṃ kattabbaṃ natthī”ti manameva pasādesi. Satthā “alaṃ ettakena cittappasādena
atk-s0502a:119_5: imassā”ti pakkāmi. So tathāgate cakkhupathaṃ vijahanteyeva pasannamano kālaṃ katvā
atk-s0502a:119_6: suttappabuddho viya devaloke tiṃsayojanike kanakavimāne nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:120_0: Brāhmaṇopissa sarīraṃ jhāpetvā āḷāhane rodanaparāyaṇo ahosi, devasikaṃ āḷāhanaṃ gantvā
atk-s0502a:120_1: rodati – “kahaṃ ekaputtaka, kahaṃ ekaputtakā”ti. Devaputtopi attano sampattiṃ oloketvā,
atk-s0502a:120_2: “kena me kammena laddhā”ti upadhārento “satthari manopasādenā”ti ñatvā “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo
atk-s0502a:120_3: mama aphāsukakāle bhesajjamakāretvā idāni āḷāhanaṃ gantvā rodati, vippakārappattameva
atk-s0502a:120_4: naṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti maṭṭhakuṇḍalivaṇṇena āgantvā āḷāhanassāvidūre bāhā paggayha
atk-s0502a:120_5: rodanto aṭṭhāsi. Brāhmaṇo taṃ disvā “ahaṃ tāva puttasokena rodāmi, esa kimatthaṃ
atk-s0502a:120_6: rodati, pucchissāmi na”nti pucchanto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:135_0: Taṃ sutvā māṇavo “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo puttassa bhesajjamakatvā puttapatirūpakaṃ maṃ disvā
atk-s0502a:135_1: rodanto ‘suvaṇṇādimayaṃ rathacakkaṃ karomī’ti vadati, hotu niggaṇhissāmi na”nti cintetvā
atk-s0502a:135_2: “kīva mahantaṃ me cakkayugaṃ karissasī”ti vatvā “yāva mahantaṃ ākaṅkhasi, tāva mahantaṃ
atk-s0502a:135_3: karissāmī”ti vutte “candimasūriyehi me attho, te me dehī”ti yācanto āha –
atk-s0502a:146: “Kiṃ pana paññāyamānassatthāya rodanto bālo hoti, udāhu apaññāyamānassatthāyā”ti vatvā –
atk-s0502a:151: Taṃ sutvā brāhmaṇo “yuttaṃ esa vadatī”ti sallakkhetvā –
atk-s0502a:156: Vatvā tassa kathāya nissoko hutvā māṇavassa thutiṃ karonto imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:158: Vārinā viya osiñcaṃ, sabbaṃ nibbāpaye daraṃ.
atk-s0502a:162: Na socāmi na rodāmi, tava sutvāna māṇavā”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:165: Ko vā tvaṃ kassa vā putto, kathaṃ jānemu taṃ maya”nti. –
atk-s0502a:185: Tasmiṃ kathenteyeva brāhmaṇassa sakalasarīraṃ pītiyā paripūri. So taṃ pītiṃ pavedento –
atk-s0502a:199: Āha. So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:201: Karomi tuyhaṃ vacanaṃ, tvaṃsi ācariyo mama.
atk-s0502a:208: Atha naṃ devaputto, “brāhmaṇa, te gehe bahuṃ dhanaṃ atthi, satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā dānaṃ dehi, dhammaṃ suṇāhi, pañhaṃ pucchāhī”ti vatvā tattheva antaradhāyi.
atk-s0502a:209_0: Brāhmaṇopi gehaṃ gantvā brāhmaṇiṃ āmantetvā, “bhadde, ahaṃ ajja samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ nimantetvā
atk-s0502a:209_1: pañhaṃ pucchissāmi, sakkāraṃ karohī”ti vatvā vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ neva abhivādetvā
atk-s0502a:209_2: na paṭisanthāraṃ katvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito, “bho gotama, adhivāsehi ajjatanāya bhattaṃ
atk-s0502a:209_3: saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghenā”ti āha. Satthā adhivāsesi. So satthu adhivāsanaṃ viditvā
atk-s0502a:209_4: vegenāgantvā sake nivesane paṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyañca paṭiyādāpesi. Satthā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto
atk-s0502a:209_5: tassa gehaṃ gantvā paññattāsane nisīdi. Brāhmaṇo sakkaccaṃ parivisi, mahājano sannipati.
atk-s0502a:209_6: Micchādiṭṭhikena kira tathāgate nimantite dve janakāyā sannipatanti micchādiṭṭhikā
atk-s0502a:209_7: “ajja samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ pañhaṃ pucchanāya viheṭhiyamānaṃ passissāmā”ti sannipatanti,
atk-s0502a:209_8: sammādiṭṭhikā “ajja buddhavisayaṃ buddhalīḷaṃ passissāmā”ti sannipatanti. Atha kho
atk-s0502a:209_9: brāhmaṇo katabhattakiccaṃ tathāgatamupasaṅkamitvā nīcāsane nisinno pañhaṃ pucchi
atk-s0502a:209_10: – “bho gotama, tumhākaṃ dānaṃ adatvā pūjaṃ akatvā dhammaṃ asutvā uposathavāsaṃ avasitvā
atk-s0502a:209_11: kevalaṃ manopasādamatteneva sagge nibbattā nāma hontī”ti? “Brāhmaṇa, kasmā maṃ pucchasi,
atk-s0502a:209_12: nanu te puttena maṭṭhakuṇḍalinā mayi manaṃ pasādetvā attano sagge nibbattabhāvo kathito”ti?
atk-s0502a:209_13: “Kadā, bho gotamā”ti? Nanu tvaṃ ajja susānaṃ gantvā kandanto avidūre bāhā paggayha
atk-s0502a:209_14: kandantaṃ ekaṃ māṇavaṃ disvā “alaṅkato maṭṭhakuṇḍalī, māladhārī haricandanussado”ti
atk-s0502a:209_15: dvīhi janehi kathitakathaṃ pakāsento sabbaṃ maṭṭhakuṇḍalivatthuṃ kathesi. Tenevetaṃ
atk-s0502a:210_0: Taṃ kathetvā ca pana “na kho, brāhmaṇa, ekasataṃ vā na dvesataṃ, atha kho mayi manaṃ
atk-s0502a:210_1: pasādetvā sagge nibbattānaṃ gaṇanā nāma natthī”ti āha. Atha mahājano na nibbematiko
atk-s0502a:210_2: hoti, athassa anibbematikabhāvaṃ viditvā satthā “maṭṭhakuṇḍalidevaputto vimāneneva
atk-s0502a:210_3: saddhiṃ āgacchatū”ti adhiṭṭhāsi. So tigāvutappamāṇeneva dibbābharaṇapaṭimaṇḍitena
atk-s0502a:210_4: attabhāvena āgantvā vimānato oruyha satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ
atk-s0502a:210_5: satthā “tvaṃ imaṃ sampattiṃ kiṃ kammaṃ katvā paṭilabhī”ti pucchanto –
atk-s0502a:212: Obhāsentī disā sabbā, osadhī viya tārakā;
atk-s0502a:213: Pucchāmi taṃ deva mahānubhāva, manussabhūto kimakāsi puñña”nti. –
atk-s0502a:214_0: Gāthamāha. “Devaputto ayaṃ me, bhante, sampatti tumhesu cittaṃ pasādetvā laddhā”ti.
atk-s0502a:214_1: “Mayi cittaṃ pasādetvā laddhā te”ti? “Āma, bhante”ti. Mahājano devaputtaṃ oloketvā
atk-s0502a:214_2: “acchariyā vata, bho, buddhaguṇā, adinnapubbakabrāhmaṇassa nāma putto aññaṃ kiñci
atk-s0502a:214_3: puññaṃ akatvā satthari cittaṃ pasādetvā evarūpaṃ sampattiṃ paṭilabhī”ti tuṭṭhiṃ pavedesi.
atk-s0502a:215_0: Atha nesaṃ kusalākusalakammakaraṇe manova pubbaṅgamo, manova seṭṭho. Pasannena hi
atk-s0502a:215_1: manena kataṃ kammaṃ devalokaṃ manussalokaṃ gacchantaṃ puggalaṃ chāyāva na vijahatīti
atk-s0502a:215_2: idaṃ vatthuṃ kathetvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā patiṭṭhāpitamattikaṃ sāsanaṃ rājamuddāya
atk-s0502a:217: Manasā ce pasannena, bhāsati vā karoti vā;
atk-s0502a:219_0: Tattha kiñcāpi manoti avisesena sabbampi catubhūmikacittaṃ vuccati, imasmiṃ pana
atk-s0502a:219_1: pade niyamiyamānaṃ vavatthāpiyamānaṃ paricchijjiyamānaṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ kāmāvacarakusalacittaṃ
atk-s0502a:219_2: labbhati. Vatthuvasena panāhariyamānaṃ tatopi somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttacittameva
atk-s0502a:219_3: labbhati. Pubbaṅgamāti tena paṭhamagāminā hutvā samannāgatā. Dhammāti vedanādayo
atk-s0502a:219_4: tayo khandhā. Ete hi uppādapaccayaṭṭhena somanassasampayuttamano pubbaṅgamo etesanti
atk-s0502a:219_5: manopubbaṅgamā nāma. Yathā hi bahūsu ekato hutvā mahābhikkhusaṅghassa cīvaradānādīni
atk-s0502a:219_6: vā uḷārapūjādhammassavanādīni vā mālāgandhasakkārakaraṇādīni vā puññāni karontesu
atk-s0502a:219_7: “ko etesaṃ pubbaṅgamo”ti vutte yo tesaṃ paccayo hoti, yaṃ nissāya te tāni puññāni
atk-s0502a:219_8: karonti, so tisso vā phusso vā tesaṃ pubbaṅgamoti vuccati, evaṃsampadamidaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0502a:219_9: Iti uppādapaccayaṭṭhena mano pubbaṅgamo etesanti manopubbaṅgamā. Na hi te mane anuppajjante
atk-s0502a:219_10: uppajjituṃ sakkonti, mano pana ekaccesu cetasikesu anuppajjantesupi uppajjatiyeva.
atk-s0502a:219_11: Evaṃ adhipativasena pana mano seṭṭho etesanti manoseṭṭhā. Yathā hi gaṇādīnaṃ adhipati
atk-s0502a:219_12: puriso gaṇaseṭṭho seṇiseṭṭhoti vuccati, tathā tesampi manova seṭṭho. Yathā pana suvaṇṇādīhi
atk-s0502a:219_13: nipphāditāni bhaṇḍāni suvaṇṇamayādīni nāma honti, tathā etepi manato nipphannattā manomayā nāma.
atk-s0502a:220_0: Pasannenāti anabhijjhādīhi guṇehi pasannena. Bhāsati vā karoti vāti evarūpena manena
atk-s0502a:220_1: bhāsanto catubbidhaṃ vacīsucaritameva bhāsati, karonto tividhaṃ kāyasucaritameva
atk-s0502a:220_2: karoti, abhāsanto akaronto tāya anabhijjhādīhi pasannamānasatāya tividhaṃ manosucaritaṃ
atk-s0502a:220_3: pūreti. Evamassa dasa kusalakammapathā pāripūriṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0502a:221_0: Tato naṃ sukhamanvetīti tato tividhasucaritato naṃ puggalaṃ sukha manveti. Idha tebhūmikampi
atk-s0502a:221_1: kusalaṃ adhippetaṃ, tasmā tebhūmikasucaritānubhāvena sugatibhave nibbattaṃ puggalaṃ,
atk-s0502a:221_2: duggatiyaṃ vā sukhānubhavanaṭṭhāne ṭhitaṃ kāyavatthukampi itaravatthukampi avatthukampīti
atk-s0502a:221_3: kāyikacetasikaṃ vipākasukhaṃ anugacchati, na vijahatīti attho veditabbo. Yathā kiṃ?
atk-s0502a:221_4: Chāyāva anapāyinīti yathā hi chāyā nāma sarīrappaṭibaddhā sarīre gacchante gacchati,
atk-s0502a:221_5: tiṭṭhante tiṭṭhati, nisīdante nisīdati, na sakkoti, “saṇhena vā pharusena vā nivattāhī”ti
atk-s0502a:221_6: vatvā vā pothetvā vā nivattāpetuṃ. Kasmā? Sarīrappaṭibaddhattā. Evameva imesaṃ dasannaṃ
atk-s0502a:221_8: gatagataṭṭhāne anapāyinī chāyā viya hutvā na vijahatīti.
atk-s0502a:222_0: Gāthāpariyosāne caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi, maṭṭhakuṇḍalidevaputto
atk-s0502a:222_1: sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, tathā adinnapubbako brāhmaṇo. So tāvamahantaṃ vibhavaṃ
atk-s0502a:225: Akkocchi manti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto tissattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:226_0: So kirāyasmā tissatthero bhagavato pitucchāputto ahosi, mahallakakāle pabbajitvā
atk-s0502a:226_1: buddhānaṃ uppannalābhasakkāraṃ paribhuñjanto thūlasarīro ākoṭitapaccākoṭitehi cīvarehi
atk-s0502a:226_2: nivāsetvā yebhuyyena vihāramajjhe upaṭṭhānasālāyaṃ nisīdati. Tathāgataṃ dassanatthāya
atk-s0502a:226_3: āgatā āgantukabhikkhū taṃ disvā “eko mahāthero bhavissatī”ti saññāya tassa santikaṃ
atk-s0502a:226_4: gantvā vattaṃ āpucchanti, pādasambāhanādīni āpucchanti. So tuṇhī ahosi. Atha naṃ
atk-s0502a:226_5: eko daharabhikkhu “kativassā tumhe”ti pucchitvā “vassaṃ natthi, mahallakakāle pabbajitā
atk-s0502a:226_6: maya”nti vutte, “āvuso, dubbinīta, mahallaka, attano pamāṇaṃ na jānāsi, ettake mahāthere
atk-s0502a:226_7: disvā sāmīcikammamattampi na karosi, vatte āpucchiyamāne tuṇhī hosi, kukkuccamattampi
atk-s0502a:226_8: te natthī”ti accharaṃ pahari. So khattiyamānaṃ janetvā “tumhe kassa santikaṃ āgatā”ti
atk-s0502a:226_9: pucchitvā “satthu santika”nti vutte “maṃ pana ‘ko eso’ti sallakkhetha, mūlameva vo
atk-s0502a:226_10: chindissāmī”ti vatvā rudanto dukkhī dummano satthu santikaṃ agamāsi. Atha naṃ satthā
atk-s0502a:226_11: “kiṃ nu tvaṃ tissa dukkhī dummano assumukho rodamāno āgatosī”ti pucchi. Tepi bhikkhū
atk-s0502a:226_12: “esa gantvā kiñci āloḷaṃ kareyyā”ti teneva saddhiṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ
atk-s0502a:226_13: nisīdiṃsu. So satthārā pucchito “ime maṃ, bhante, bhikkhū akkosantī”ti āha. “Kahaṃ
atk-s0502a:226_14: pana tvaṃ nisinnosī”ti? “Vihāramajjhe upaṭṭhānasālāyaṃ, bhante”ti. “Ime te bhikkhū
atk-s0502a:226_15: āgacchantā diṭṭhā”ti? “Āma, diṭṭhā, bhante”ti. “Kiṃ uṭṭhāya te paccuggamanaṃ kata”nti?
atk-s0502a:226_17: “Vattaṃ vā pānīyaṃ vā āpucchita”nti. “Nāpucchitaṃ bhante”ti? “Āsanaṃ nīharitvā abhivādetvā
atk-s0502a:226_18: pādasambāhanaṃ kata”nti? “Na kataṃ, bhante”ti. “Tissa mahallakabhikkhūnaṃ sabbaṃ
atk-s0502a:226_19: etaṃ vattaṃ kātabbaṃ, etaṃ vattaṃ akarontena vihāramajjhe nisīdituṃ na vaṭṭati, taveva
atk-s0502a:226_20: doso, ete bhikkhū khamāpehī”ti? “Ete maṃ, bhante, akkosiṃsu, nāhaṃ ete khamāpemī”ti.
atk-s0502a:226_21: “Tissa mā evaṃ kari, taveva doso, khamāpehi ne”ti? “Na khamāpemi, bhante”ti. Atha
atk-s0502a:226_22: satthā “dubbaco esa, bhante”ti bhikkhūhi vutte “na, bhikkhave, idāneva dubbaco esa,
atk-s0502a:226_23: pubbepi esa dubbacoyevā”ti vatvā “idāni tāvassa, bhante, dubbacabhāvo amhehi ñāto,
atk-s0502a:226_24: atīte esa kiṃ akāsī”ti vutte “tena hi, bhikkhave, suṇāthā”ti vatvā atītamāhari.
atk-s0502a:227_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ bārāṇasiraññe rajjaṃ kārente devilo nāma tāpaso aṭṭha māse himavante
atk-s0502a:227_1: vasitvā loṇambilasevanatthāya cattāro māse nagaramupanissāya vasitukāmo himavantato
atk-s0502a:227_2: āgantvā nagaradvāre dārake disvā pucchi – “imaṃ nagaraṃ sampattapabbajitā kattha
atk-s0502a:227_3: vasantī”ti? “Kumbhakārasālāyaṃ, bhante”ti. Tāpaso kumbhakārasālaṃ gantvā dvāre ṭhatvā
atk-s0502a:227_4: “sace te bhaggava agaru, vaseyyāma ekarattiṃ sālāya”nti āha. Kumbhakāro “mayhaṃ rattiṃ
atk-s0502a:227_5: sālāyaṃ kiccaṃ natthi, mahatī sālā, yathāsukhaṃ vasatha, bhante”ti sālaṃ niyyādesi.
atk-s0502a:227_6: Tasmiṃ pavisitvā nisinne aparopi nārado nāma tāpaso himavantato āgantvā kumbhakāraṃ
atk-s0502a:227_7: ekarattivāsaṃ yāci. Kumbhakāro “paṭhamaṃ āgato iminā saddhiṃ ekato vasitukāmo bhaveyya
atk-s0502a:227_8: vā no vā, attānaṃ parimocessāmī”ti cintetvā “sace, bhante, paṭhamaṃ upagato rocessati,
atk-s0502a:227_9: tassa ruciyā vasathā”ti āha. So tamupasaṅkamitvā “sace te, ācariya agaru, mayañcettha
atk-s0502a:227_10: ekarattiṃ vaseyyāmā”ti yāci. “Mahatī sālā, pavisitvā ekamante vasāhī”ti vutte pavisitvā
atk-s0502a:227_11: puretaraṃ paviṭṭhassa devilassa aparabhāge nisīdi. Ubhopi sāraṇīyakathaṃ kathetvā nipajjiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:228_0: Sayanakāle nārado devilassa nipajjanaṭṭhānañca dvārañca sallakkhetvā nipajji. So
atk-s0502a:228_1: pana devilo nipajjamāno attano nipajjanaṭṭhāne anipajjitvā dvāramajjhe tiriyaṃ nipajji.
atk-s0502a:228_2: Nārado rattiṃ nikkhamanto tassa jaṭāsu akkami. “Ko maṃ akkamī”ti ca vutte, “ācariya,
atk-s0502a:228_3: aha”nti āha. “Kūṭajaṭila, araññato āgantvā mama jaṭāsu akkamasī”ti. “Ācariya, tumhākaṃ
atk-s0502a:228_4: idha nipannabhāvaṃ na jānāmi, khamatha me”ti vatvā tassa kandantasseva bahi nikkhami.
atk-s0502a:228_5: Itaro “ayaṃ pavisantopi maṃ akkameyyā”ti parivattetvā pādaṭṭhāne sīsaṃ katvā nipajji.
atk-s0502a:228_6: Nāradopi pavisanto “paṭhamaṃpāhaṃ ācariye aparajjhiṃ, idānissa pādapassena pavisissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:228_7: cintetvā āgacchanto gīvāya akkami. “Ko eso”ti ca vutte “ahaṃ, ācariyā”ti vatvā “kūṭajaṭila,
atk-s0502a:228_8: paṭhamaṃ mama jaṭāsu akkamitvā idāni gīvāya akkamasi, abhisapissāmi ta”nti vutte,
atk-s0502a:228_9: “ācariya, mayhaṃ doso natthi, ahaṃ tumhākaṃ evaṃ nipannabhāvaṃ na jānāmi, ‘paṭhamampi
atk-s0502a:228_10: me aparaddhaṃ, idāni pādapassena pavisissāmī’ti paviṭṭhomhi, khamatha me”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:228_11: “Kūṭajaṭila, abhisapissāmi ta”nti. “Mā evaṃ karittha ācariyā”ti. So tassa vacanaṃ anādiyitvā –
atk-s0502a:230: Pātodayante sūriye, muddhā te phalatu sattadhā”ti. –
atk-s0502a:231: Taṃ abhisapi eva. Nārado, “ācariya, mayhaṃ doso natthīti mama vadantasseva tumhe abhisapatha, yassa doso atthi, tassa muddhā phalatu, mā niddosassā”ti vatvā –
atk-s0502a:233: Pātodayante sūriye, muddhā te phalatu sattadhā”ti. –
atk-s0502a:234_0: Abhisapi. So pana mahānubhāvo atīte cattālīsa, anāgate cattālīsāti asītikappe anussarati.
atk-s0502a:234_1: Tasmā “kassa nu kho upari abhisapo patissatī”ti upadhārento “ācariyassā”ti ñatvā
atk-s0502a:234_2: tasmiṃ anukampaṃ paṭicca iddhibalena aruṇuggamanaṃ nivāreti.
atk-s0502a:235_0: Nāgarā aruṇe anuggacchante rājadvāraṃ gantvā, “deva, tayi rajjaṃ kārente aruṇo na
atk-s0502a:235_1: uṭṭhahati, aruṇaṃ no uṭṭhāpehī”ti kandiṃsu. Rājā attano kāyakammādīni olokento kiñci
atk-s0502a:235_2: ayuttaṃ adisvā “kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti cintetvā “pabbajitānaṃ vivādena bhavitabba”nti
atk-s0502a:235_3: parisaṅkamāno “kacci imasmiṃ nagare pabbajitā atthī”ti pucchi. “Hiyyo sāyaṃ kumbhakārasālāyaṃ
atk-s0502a:235_4: āgatā atthi devā”ti vutte taṃkhaṇaññeva rājā ukkāhi dhāriyamānāhi tattha gantvā nāradaṃ
atk-s0502a:237: Kena loko tamobhūto, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito”ti.
atk-s0502a:238_0: Nārado sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhitvā iminā kāraṇena ahaṃ iminā abhisapito, athāhaṃ
atk-s0502a:238_1: “mayhaṃ doso natthi, yassa doso atthi, tasseva upari abhisapo patatū”ti vatvā abhisapiṃ.
atk-s0502a:238_2: Abhisapitvā ca pana “kassa nu kho upari abhisapo patissatī”ti upadhārento “sūriyuggamanavelāya
atk-s0502a:238_3: ācariyassa muddhā sattadhā phalissatī”ti disvā etasmiṃ anukampaṃ paṭicca aruṇassa
atk-s0502a:238_4: uggamanaṃ na demīti. “Kathaṃ pana assa, bhante, antarāyo na bhaveyyā”ti. “Sace maṃ
atk-s0502a:238_5: khamāpeyya, na bhaveyyā”ti. “Tena hi khamāpehī”ti vutte “eso, mahārāja, maṃ jaṭāsu
atk-s0502a:238_6: ca gīvāya ca akkami, nāhaṃ etaṃ kūṭajaṭilaṃ khamāpemī”ti. “Khamāpehi, bhante, mā
atk-s0502a:238_7: evaṃ karitthā”ti. “Na khamāpemī”ti. “Muddhā te sattadhā phalissatī”ti vuttepi na
atk-s0502a:238_8: khamāpetiyeva. Atha naṃ rājā “na tvaṃ attano ruciyā khamāpessasī”ti hatthapādakucchigīvāsu
atk-s0502a:238_9: gāhāpetvā nāradassa pādamūle onamāpesi. Nāradopi “uṭṭhehi, ācariya, khamāmi te”ti
atk-s0502a:238_10: vatvā, “mahārāja, nāyaṃ yathāmanena khamāpeti, nagarassa avidūre eko saro atthi,
atk-s0502a:238_11: tattha naṃ sīse mattikāpiṇḍaṃ katvā galappamāṇe udake ṭhapāpehī”ti āha. Rājā tathā
atk-s0502a:238_12: kāresi. Nārado devilaṃ āmantetvā, “ācariya, mayā iddhiyā vissaṭṭhāya sūriyasantāpe
atk-s0502a:238_13: uṭṭhahante udake nimujjitvā aññena ṭhānena uttaritvā gaccheyyāsī”ti āha. “Tassa sūriyaraṃsīhi
atk-s0502a:238_14: saṃphuṭṭhamattova mattikāpiṇḍo sattadhā phali, so nimujjitvā aññena ṭhānena palāyī”ti.
atk-s0502a:239_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “tadā, bhikkhave, rājā ānando ahosi, devilo tisso,
atk-s0502a:239_1: nārado ahamevāti evaṃ tadāpesa dubbacoyevā”ti vatvā tissattheraṃ āmantetvā, “tissa,
atk-s0502a:239_2: bhikkhuno nāma ‘asukenāhaṃ akkuṭṭho, asukena pahaṭo, asukena jito, asuko kho me bhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0502a:239_3: ahāsī’ti cintentassa veraṃ nāma na vūpasammati, evaṃ pana anupanayhantasseva upasammatī”ti
atk-s0502a:241: “Akkocchi maṃ avadhi maṃ, ajini maṃ ahāsi me;
atk-s0502a:242: Ye ca taṃ upanayhanti, veraṃ tesaṃ na sammati.
atk-s0502a:244: “Akkocchi maṃ avadhi maṃ, ajini maṃ ahāsi me;
atk-s0502a:245: Ye ca taṃ nupanayhanti, veraṃ tesūpasammatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:246_0: Tattha akkocchīti akkosi. Avadhīti pahari. Ajinīti kūṭasakkhiotāraṇena vā vādapaṭivādena
atk-s0502a:246_1: vā karaṇuttariyakaraṇena vā ajesi. Ahāsi meti mama santakaṃ pattādīsu kiñcideva avahari.
atk-s0502a:246_2: Ye ca tanti ye keci devatā vā manussā vā gahaṭṭhā vā pabbajitā vā taṃ “akkocchi ma”ntiādivatthukaṃ
atk-s0502a:246_3: kodhaṃ sakaṭadhuraṃ viya naddhinā pūtimacchādīni viya ca kusādīhi punappunaṃ veṭhetvā
atk-s0502a:246_4: upanayhanti, tesaṃ sakiṃ uppannaṃ veraṃ na sammatīti vūpasammati. Ye ca taṃ nupanayhantīti
atk-s0502a:246_5: asatiyā amanasikāravasena vā kammapaccavekkhaṇādivasena vā ye taṃ akkosādivatthukaṃ
atk-s0502a:246_6: kodhaṃ tayāpi koci niddoso purimabhave akkuṭṭho bhavissati, pahaṭo bhavissati, kūṭasakkhiṃ
atk-s0502a:246_7: otāretvā jito bhavissati, kassaci te pasayha kiñci acchinnaṃ bhavissati, tasmā niddoso
atk-s0502a:246_8: hutvāpi akkosādīni pāpuṇāsīti evaṃ na upanayhanti. Tesu pamādena uppannampi veraṃ
atk-s0502a:246_9: iminā anupanayhanena nirindhano viya jātavedo vūpasammatīti.
atk-s0502a:247: Desanāpariyosāne satasahassabhikkhū sotāpattiphalādīni pāpuṇiṃsu. Dhammadesanā mahājanassa sātthikā ahosi. Dubbacopi subbacoyeva jātoti.
atk-s0502a:250: Na hi verenāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ vañjhitthiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:251_0: Eko kira kuṭumbikaputto pitari kālakate khette ca ghare ca sabbakammāni attanāva
atk-s0502a:251_1: karonto mātaraṃ paṭijaggi. Athassa mātā “kumārikaṃ te, tāta, ānessāmī”ti āha. “Amma,
atk-s0502a:251_2: mā evaṃ vadetha, ahaṃ yāvajīvaṃ tumhe paṭijaggissāmī”ti. “Tāta, khette ca ghare ca
atk-s0502a:251_3: kiccaṃ tvameva karosi, tena mayhaṃ cittasukhaṃ nāma na hoti, ānessāmī”ti. So punappunaṃ
atk-s0502a:251_4: paṭikkhipitvā tuṇhī ahosi. Sā ekaṃ kulaṃ gantukāmā gehā nikkhami. Atha naṃ putto
atk-s0502a:251_5: “kataraṃ kulaṃ gacchathā”ti pucchitvā “asukakulaṃ nāmā”ti vutte tattha gamanaṃ paṭisedhetvā
atk-s0502a:251_6: attano abhirucitaṃ kulaṃ ācikkhi. Sā tattha gantvā kumārikaṃ vāretvā divasaṃ vavatthapetvā
atk-s0502a:251_7: taṃ ānetvā tassa ghare akāsi. Sā vañjhā ahosi. Atha naṃ mātā, putta, tvaṃ attano
atk-s0502a:251_8: ruciyā kumārikaṃ āṇāpesi, sā idāni vañjhā jātā, aputtakañca nāma kulaṃ vinassati,
atk-s0502a:251_9: paveṇī na ghaṭīyati, tena aññaṃ te kumārikaṃ ānemīti. Tena “alaṃ, ammā”ti vuccamānāpi
atk-s0502a:251_10: punappunaṃ kathesi. Vañjhitthī taṃ kathaṃ sutvā “puttā nāma mātāpitūnaṃ vacanaṃ atikkamituṃ
atk-s0502a:251_11: na sakkonti, idāni aññaṃ vijāyiniṃ itthiṃ ānetvā maṃ dāsibhogena bhuñjissati. Yaṃnūnāhaṃ
atk-s0502a:251_12: sayameva ekaṃ kumārikaṃ āneyya”nti cintetvā ekaṃ kulaṃ gantvā tassatthāya kumārikaṃ
atk-s0502a:251_13: vāretvā “kiṃ nāmetaṃ, amma, vadesī”ti tehi paṭikkhittā “ahaṃ vañjhā, aputtakaṃ nāma
atk-s0502a:251_14: kulaṃ vinassati, tumhākaṃ pana dhītā puttaṃ vā dhītaraṃ vā labhitvā kuṭumbikassa
atk-s0502a:251_15: sāminī bhavissati, mayhaṃ sāmikassa naṃ dethā”ti yācitvā sampaṭicchāpetvā ānetvā
atk-s0502a:252_0: Athassā etadahosi – “sacāyaṃ puttaṃ vā dhītaraṃ vā labhissati, ayameva kuṭumbassa
atk-s0502a:252_1: sāminī bhavissati. Yathā dārakaṃ na labhati, tatheva naṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Atha naṃ
atk-s0502a:252_2: sā āha – “amma, yadā te kucchiyaṃ gabbho patiṭṭhāti, atha me āroceyyāsī”ti. Sā “sādhū”ti
atk-s0502a:252_3: paṭissuṇitvā gabbhe patiṭṭhite tassā ārocesi. Itarissā pana sā sayameva niccaṃ yāgubhattaṃ
atk-s0502a:252_4: deti, athassā āhāreneva saddhiṃ gabbhapātanabhesajjamadāsi, gabbho pati. Dutiyampi
atk-s0502a:252_5: gabbhe patiṭṭhite ārocesi, itarā dutiyampi tatheva pātesi. Atha naṃ paṭivissakitthiyo
atk-s0502a:252_6: pucchiṃsu – “kacci te sapatti antarāyaṃ karotī”ti? Sā tamatthaṃ ārocetvā “andhabāle,
atk-s0502a:252_7: kasmā evamakāsi, ayaṃ tava issariyabhayena gabbhassa pātanabhesajjaṃ yojetvā deti,
atk-s0502a:252_8: tena te gabbho patati, mā puna evamakatthā”ti vuttā tatiyavāre na kathesi. Atha sā
atk-s0502a:252_9: itarissā udaraṃ disvā “kasmā mayhaṃ gabbhassa patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ na kathesī”ti vatvā
atk-s0502a:252_10: “tvaṃ maṃ ānetvā vañcetvā dve vāre gabbhaṃ pātesi, kimatthaṃ tuyhaṃ kathemī”ti vutte
atk-s0502a:252_11: “naṭṭhā dānimhī”ti cintetvā tassā pamādaṃ olokentī pariṇate gabbhe okāsaṃ labhitvā
atk-s0502a:252_12: bhesajjaṃ yojetvā adāsi. Gabbho pariṇatattā patituṃ asakkonto tiriyaṃ nipati, kharā
atk-s0502a:252_13: vedanā uppajji, jīvitasaṃsayaṃ pāpuṇi. Sā “nāsitamhi tayā, tvameva maṃ ānetvā tvameva
atk-s0502a:252_14: tayopi vāre dārake nāsesi, idāni ahampi nassāmi, ito dāni cutā yakkhinī hutvā tava
atk-s0502a:252_15: dārake khādituṃ samatthā hutvā nibbatteyya”nti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā kālaṃ katvā
atk-s0502a:252_16: tasmiṃyeva gehe majjārī hutvā nibbatti. Itarampi sāmiko gahetvā “tayā me kulūpacchedo
atk-s0502a:252_17: kato”ti kapparajaṇṇukādīhi supothitaṃ pothesi. Sā tenevābādhena kālaṃ katvā tattheva
atk-s0502a:253_0: Kukkuṭī na cirasseva aṇḍāni vijāyi, majjārī āgantvā tāni aṇḍāni khādi. Dutiyampi
atk-s0502a:253_1: tatiyampi khādiyeva. Kukkuṭī cintesi – “tayo vāre mama aṇḍāni khāditvā idāni mampi
atk-s0502a:253_2: khāditukāmāsī”ti. “Ito cutā saputtakaṃ taṃ khādituṃ labheyya”nti patthanaṃ katvā
atk-s0502a:253_3: tato cutā araññe dīpinī hutvā nibbatti. Itarā migī hutvā nibbatti. Tassā vijātakāle
atk-s0502a:253_4: dīpinī āgantvā tayo vāre puttake khādi. Migī maraṇakāle “ayaṃ me tikkhattuṃ puttake
atk-s0502a:253_5: khāditvā idāni mampi khādissati, ito dāni cutā etaṃ saputtakaṃ khādituṃ labheyya”nti
atk-s0502a:253_6: patthanaṃ katvā ito cutā yakkhinī hutvā nibbatti. Dīpinīpi tatheva tato cutā sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0502a:253_7: kuladhītā hutvā nibbatti, sā vuddhippattā dvāragāmake patikulaṃ agamāsi, aparabhāge
atk-s0502a:253_8: ca puttaṃ vijāyi. Yakkhinīpi tassā piyasahāyikāvaṇṇena āgantvā “kuhiṃ me sahāyikā”ti
atk-s0502a:253_9: “antogabbhe vijātā”ti vutte “puttaṃ nu kho vijātā, udāhu dhītaranti passissāmi na”nti
atk-s0502a:253_10: gabbhaṃ pavisitvā passantī viya dārakaṃ gahetvā khāditvā gatā. Puna dutiyavārepi
atk-s0502a:253_11: tatheva khādi. Tatiyavāre itarā garubhārā hutvā sāmikaṃ āmantetvā, “sāmi, imasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:253_12: ṭhāne ekā yakkhinī mama dve putte khāditvā gatā, idāni mama kulagehaṃ gantvā vijāyissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:254_0: Tadā sā yakkhinī udakavāraṃ gatā hoti. Vessavaṇassa hi yakkhiniyo vārena anotattadahato
atk-s0502a:254_1: sīsaparamparāya udakamāharanti. Tā catumāsaccayenapi pañcamāsaccayenapi muccanti.
atk-s0502a:254_2: Aparā yakkhiniyo kilantakāyā jīvitakkhayampi pāpuṇanti. Sā pana udakavārato muttamattāva
atk-s0502a:254_3: vegena taṃ gharaṃ gantvā “kuhiṃ me sahāyikā”ti pucchi. “Kuhiṃ naṃ passissasi, tassā
atk-s0502a:254_4: imasmiṃ ṭhāne jātajātadārake yakkhinī āgantvā khādati, tasmā kulagehaṃ gatā”ti. Sā
atk-s0502a:254_5: “yattha vā tattha vā gacchatu, na me muccissatī”ti veravegasamussāhitamānasā nagarābhimukhī
atk-s0502a:254_6: pakkhandi. Itarāpi nāmaggahaṇadivase naṃ dārakaṃ nhāpetvā nāmaṃ katvā, “sāmi, idāni
atk-s0502a:254_7: sakagharaṃ gacchāmā”ti puttamādāya sāmikena saddhiṃ vihāramajjhe gatamaggena gacchantī
atk-s0502a:254_8: puttaṃ sāmikassa datvā vihārapokkharaṇiyā nhātvā sāmike nhāyante uttaritvā puttassa
atk-s0502a:254_9: thaññaṃ pāyamānā ṭhitā yakkhiniṃ āgacchantiṃ disvā sañjānitvā, “sāmi, vegena ehi,
atk-s0502a:254_10: ayaṃ sā yakkhinī, vegena ehi, ayaṃ sā yakkhinī”ti uccāsaddaṃ katvā yāva tassa āgamanaṃ
atk-s0502a:255_0: Tasmiṃ samaye satthā parisamajjhe dhammaṃ desesi. Sā puttaṃ tathāgatassa pādapiṭṭhe
atk-s0502a:255_1: nipajjāpetvā “tumhākaṃ mayā esa dinno, puttassa me jīvitaṃ dethā”ti āha. Dvārakoṭṭhake
atk-s0502a:255_2: adhivattho sumanadevo nāma yakkhiniyā anto pavisituṃ nādāsi. Satthā ānandattheraṃ
atk-s0502a:255_3: āmantetvā “gaccha, ānanda, taṃ yakkhiniṃ pakkosāhī”ti āha. Thero pakkosi. Itarā “ayaṃ,
atk-s0502a:255_4: bhante, āgacchatī”ti āha. Satthā “etu, mā saddamakāsī”ti vatvā taṃ āgantvā ṭhitaṃ
atk-s0502a:255_5: “kasmā evaṃ karosi, sace tumhe mādisassa buddhassa sammukhībhāvaṃ nāgamissatha, ahinakulānaṃ
atk-s0502a:255_6: viya acchaphandanānaṃ viya kākolūkānaṃ viya ca kappaṭṭhitikaṃ vo veraṃ abhavissa,
atk-s0502a:255_7: kasmā veraṃ paṭiveraṃ karotha. Verañhi averena upasammati, no verenā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:258: Averena ca sammanti, esa dhammo sanantano”ti.
atk-s0502a:259_0: Tattha na hi verenāti yathā hi kheḷasiṅghāṇikādīhi asucīhi makkhitaṃ ṭhānaṃ teheva
atk-s0502a:259_1: asucīhi dhovantā suddhaṃ niggandhaṃ kātuṃ na sakkonti, atha kho taṃ ṭhānaṃ bhiyyosomattāya
atk-s0502a:259_2: asuddhatarañceva duggandhatarañca hoti; evameva akkosantaṃ paccakkosanto paharantaṃ
atk-s0502a:259_3: paṭipaharanto verena veraṃ vūpasametuṃ na sakkoti, atha kho bhiyyo bhiyyo verameva
atk-s0502a:259_4: karoti. Iti verāni nāma verena kismiñci kāle na sammanti, atha kho vaḍḍhantiyeva.
atk-s0502a:259_5: Averena ca sammantīti yathā pana tāni kheḷādīni asucīni vippasannena udakena dhoviyamānāni
atk-s0502a:259_6: nassanti, taṃ ṭhānaṃ suddhaṃ hoti sugandhaṃ; evameva averena khantimettodakena yoniso
atk-s0502a:259_7: manasikārena paccavekkhaṇena verāni vūpasammanti paṭippassambhanti abhāvaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0502a:259_8: Esa dhammo sanantanoti esa averena verūpasamanasaṅkhāto porāṇako dhammo; sabbesaṃ
atk-s0502a:260: Gāthāpariyosāne yakkhinī sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. Sampattaparisāyapi dhammadesanā sātthikā ahosi.
atk-s0502a:261_0: Satthā taṃ itthiṃ āha – “etissā tava puttaṃ dehī”ti. “Bhāyāmi, bhante”ti. “Mā bhāyi,
atk-s0502a:261_1: natthi te etaṃ nissāya paripantho”ti āha. Sā tassā puttamadāsi. Sā taṃ cumbitvā āliṅgetvā
atk-s0502a:261_2: puna mātuyeva datvā rodituṃ ārabhi. Atha naṃ satthā “kimeta”nti pucchi. “Bhante,
atk-s0502a:261_3: ahaṃ pubbe yathā vā tathā vā jīvikaṃ kappentīpi kucchipūraṃ nālatthaṃ, idāni kathaṃ
atk-s0502a:261_4: jīvissāmī”ti. Atha naṃ satthā “mā cintayī”ti samassāsetvā taṃ itthimāha – “imaṃ netvā
atk-s0502a:261_5: attano gehe nivāsāpetvā aggayāgubhattehi paṭijaggāhī”ti. Sā taṃ netvā piṭṭhivaṃse
atk-s0502a:261_6: patiṭṭhāpetvā aggayāgubhattehi paṭijaggi, tassā vīhipaharaṇakāle musalaggena muddhaṃ
atk-s0502a:261_7: paharantaṃ viya upaṭṭhāsi. Sā sahāyikaṃ āmantetvā “imasmiṃ ṭhāne vasituṃ na sakkomi,
atk-s0502a:261_8: aññattha maṃ patiṭṭhāpehī”ti vatvā musalasālāya udakacāṭiyaṃ uddhane nibbakose saṅkārakūṭe
atk-s0502a:261_9: gāmadvāre cāti etesu ṭhānesu patiṭṭhāpitāpi idha me musalena sīsaṃ bhindantaṃ viya
atk-s0502a:261_10: upaṭṭhāti, idha dārakā ucchiṭṭhodakaṃ otārenti, idha sunakhā nipajjanti, idha dārakā
atk-s0502a:261_11: asuciṃ karonti, idha kacavaraṃ chaḍḍenti, idha gāmadārakā lakkhayoggaṃ karontīti
atk-s0502a:261_12: sabbāni tāni paṭikkhipi. Atha naṃ bahigāme vivittokāse patiṭṭhāpetvā tattha tassā
atk-s0502a:261_13: aggayāgubhattādīni haritvā paṭijaggi. Sā yakkhinī evaṃ cintesi – “ayaṃ me sahāyikā
atk-s0502a:261_14: idāni bahūpakārā, handāhaṃ kiñci paṭiguṇaṃ karomī”ti. Sā “imasmiṃ saṃvacchare subbuṭṭhikā
atk-s0502a:261_15: bhavissati, thalaṭṭhāne sassaṃ karohi, imasmiṃ saṃvacchare dubbuṭṭhikā bhavissati,
atk-s0502a:261_16: ninnaṭṭhāneyeva sassaṃ karohī”ti sahāyikāya āroceti. Sesajanehi katasassaṃ atiudakena
atk-s0502a:261_17: vā anodakena vā nassati, tassā ativiya sampajjati. Atha naṃ sesajanā, “amma, tayā
atk-s0502a:261_18: katasassaṃ neva accodakena, na anudakena nassati, subbuṭṭhidubbuṭṭhibhāvaṃ ñatvā
atk-s0502a:261_19: kammaṃ karosi, kiṃ nu kho eta”nti pucchiṃsu. “Amhākaṃ sahāyikā yakkhinī subbuṭṭhidubbuṭṭhibhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:261_20: ācikkhati, mayaṃ tassā vacanena thalesu ninnesu sassāni karoma, tena no sampajjati.
atk-s0502a:261_21: Kiṃ na passatha? Nibaddhaṃ amhākaṃ gehato yāgubhattādīni hariyamānāni, tāni etissā
atk-s0502a:261_22: harīyanti, tumhepi etissā aggayāgubhattādīni haratha, tumhākampi kammante olokessatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:261_23: Athassā sakalanagaravāsino sakkāraṃ kariṃsu. Sāpi tato paṭṭhāya sabbesaṃ kammante
atk-s0502a:261_24: olokentī lābhaggappattā ahosi mahāparivārā. Sā aparabhāge aṭṭha salākabhattāni paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a:264: Pare ca na vijānantīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kosambake bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:265_0: Kosambiyañhi ghositārāme pañcasatapañcasataparivārā dve bhikkhū vihariṃsu vinayadharo
atk-s0502a:265_1: ca dhammakathiko ca. Tesu dhammakathiko ekadivasaṃ sarīravalañjaṃ katvā udakakoṭṭhake
atk-s0502a:265_2: ācamanaudakāvasesaṃ bhājane ṭhapetvāva nikkhami. Pacchā vinayadharo tattha paviṭṭho
atk-s0502a:265_3: taṃ udakaṃ disvā nikkhamitvā itaraṃ pucchi, “āvuso, tayā udakaṃ ṭhapita”nti? “Āma,
atk-s0502a:265_4: āvuso”ti. “Kiṃ panettha āpattibhāvaṃ na jānāsī”ti? “Āma, na jānāmī”ti. “Hoti, āvuso,
atk-s0502a:265_5: ettha āpattī”ti. “Tena hi paṭikarissāmi na”nti. “Sace pana te, āvuso, asañcicca assatiyā
atk-s0502a:265_6: kataṃ, natthi āpattī”ti. So tassā āpattiyā anāpattidiṭṭhi ahosi. Vinayadharopi attano
atk-s0502a:265_7: nissitakānaṃ “ayaṃ dhammakathiko āpattiṃ āpajjamānopi na jānātī”ti ārocesi. Te tassa
atk-s0502a:265_8: nissitake disvā “tumhākaṃ upajjhāyo āpattiṃ āpajjitvāpi āpattibhāvaṃ na jānātī”ti
atk-s0502a:265_9: āhaṃsu. Te gantvā attano upajjhāyassa ārocesuṃ. So evamāha – “ayaṃ vinayadharo pubbe
atk-s0502a:265_10: anāpattīti vatvā idāni āpattīti vadati, musāvādī eso”ti. Te gantvā “tumhākaṃ upajjhāyo
atk-s0502a:265_11: musāvādī”ti āhaṃsu. Te evaṃ aññamaññaṃ kalahaṃ vaḍḍhayiṃsu. Kato vinayadharo okāsaṃ
atk-s0502a:265_12: labhitvā dhammakathikassa āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyakammamakāsi. Tato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0502a:265_13: tesaṃ paccayadāyakā upaṭṭhākāpi dve koṭṭhāsā ahesuṃ, ovādapaṭiggāhakā bhikkhuniyopi
atk-s0502a:265_14: ārakkhadevatāpi tāsaṃ sandiṭṭhasambhattā ākāsaṭṭhadevatāpīti yāva brahmalokā sabbepi
atk-s0502a:265_15: puthujjanā dve pakkhā ahesuṃ. Cātumahārājikaṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva akaniṭṭhabhāvanā pana
atk-s0502a:266_0: Atheko aññataro bhikkhu tathāgatamupasaṅkamitvā ukkhepakānaṃ vinayadharaantevāsikānaṃ
atk-s0502a:266_2: pana “adhammikeneva kammena ukkhitto”ti laddhiñca, ukkhepakehi vāriyamānānampi ca
atk-s0502a:266_3: tesaṃ taṃ anuparivāretvā vicaraṇabhāvañca ārocesi bhagavā “samaggā kira hontū”ti
atk-s0502a:266_4: dve vāre pesetvā “na icchanti, bhante, samaggā bhavitu”nti sutvā tatiyavāre “bhinno
atk-s0502a:266_5: bhikkhusaṅgho, bhinno bhikkhusaṅgho”ti tesaṃ santikaṃ gantvā ukkhepakānaṃ ukkhepane,
atk-s0502a:266_6: itaresañca āpattiyā adassane ādīnavaṃ kathetvā puna tesaṃ tattheva ekasīmāyaṃ uposathādīni
atk-s0502a:266_8: vattaṃ paññāpetvā “idānipi bhaṇḍanajātāva viharantī”ti sutvā tattha gantvā “alaṃ,
atk-s0502a:266_9: bhikkhave, mā bhaṇḍana”ntiādīni vatvā, “bhikkhave, bhaṇḍanakalahaviggahavivādā nāmete
atk-s0502a:266_10: anatthakārakā. Kalahaṃ nissāya hi laṭukikāpi sakuṇikā hatthināgaṃ jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpesī”ti
atk-s0502a:266_11: laṭukikajātakaṃ kathetvā, “bhikkhave, samaggā hotha, mā vivadatha. Vivādaṃ nissāya
atk-s0502a:266_12: hi anekasatasahassā vaṭṭakāpi jīvitakkhayaṃ pattā”ti vaṭṭakajātakaṃ kathesi. Evampi
atk-s0502a:266_13: tesu bhagavato vacanaṃ anādiyantesu aññatarena dhammavādinā tathāgatassa vihesaṃ
atk-s0502a:266_14: anicchantena “āgametu, bhante bhagavā, dhammasāmi, appossukko, bhante bhagavā, diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāramanuyutto
atk-s0502a:266_15: viharatu, mayameva tena bhaṇḍanena kalahena viggahena vivādena paññāyissāmā”ti vutte atītaṃ āhari –
atk-s0502a:267_0: Bhūtapubbaṃ, bhikkhave, bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatto nāma kāsirājā ahosi. Brahmadattena
atk-s0502a:267_1: dīghītissa kosalarañño rajjaṃ acchinditvā aññātakavesena vasantassa pituno māritabhāvañceva
atk-s0502a:267_2: dīghāvukumārena attano jīvite dinne tato paṭṭhāya tesaṃ samaggabhāvañca kathetvā
atk-s0502a:267_3: “tesañhi nāma, bhikkhave, rājūnaṃ ādinnadaṇḍānaṃ ādinnasatthānaṃ evarūpaṃ khantisoraccaṃ
atk-s0502a:267_4: bhavissati. Idha kho taṃ, bhikkhave, sobhetha, yaṃ tumhe evaṃ svākhāte dhammavinaye
atk-s0502a:267_5: pabbajitā samānā khamā ca bhaveyyātha soratā cā”ti ovaditvāpi neva te samagge kātuṃ
atk-s0502a:267_6: asakkhi. So tāya ākiṇṇavihāratāya ukkaṇṭhito “ahaṃ kho idāni ākiṇṇo dukkhaṃ viharāmi,
atk-s0502a:267_7: ime ca bhikkhū mama vacanaṃ na karonti. Yaṃnūnāhaṃ ekakova gaṇamhā vūpakaṭṭho vihareyya”nti
atk-s0502a:267_8: cintetvā kosambiyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā anapaloketvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ekakova attano pattacīvaramādāya
atk-s0502a:267_9: bālakaloṇakagāmaṃ gantvā tattha bhaguttherassa ekacārikavattaṃ kathetvā pācinavaṃsamigadāye
atk-s0502a:267_10: tiṇṇaṃ kulaputtānaṃ sāmaggiyānisaṃsaṃ kathetvā yena pālileyyakaṃ atthi, tadavasari.
atk-s0502a:267_11: Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā pālileyyakaṃ upanissāya rakkhitavanasaṇḍe bhaddasālamūle pālileyyakena
atk-s0502a:268_0: Kosambivāsinopi kho upāsakā vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ apassantā “kuhiṃ, bhante, satthā”ti
atk-s0502a:268_1: pucchitvā “pālileyyakavanasaṇḍaṃ gato”ti. “Kiṃ kāraṇā”ti? “Amhe samagge kātuṃ vāyami,
atk-s0502a:268_2: mayaṃ pana na samaggā ahumhā”ti. “Kiṃ, bhante, tumhe satthu santike pabbajitvā tasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:268_3: sāmaggiṃ karonte samaggā nāhuvatthā”ti? “Evamāvuso”ti. “Manussā ime satthu santike
atk-s0502a:268_4: pabbajitvā tasmiṃ sāmaggiṃ karontepi samaggā na jātā, mayaṃ ime nissāya satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:268_5: daṭṭhuṃ na labhimhā, imesaṃ neva āsanaṃ dassāma, na abhivādanādīni karissāmā”ti tato
atk-s0502a:268_6: paṭṭhāya tesaṃ sāmīcimattampi na kariṃsu. Te appāhāratāya sussamānā katipāheneva
atk-s0502a:268_7: ujukā hutvā aññamaññaṃ accayaṃ desetvā khamāpetvā “upāsakā mayaṃ samaggā jātā, tumhepi
atk-s0502a:268_8: no purimasadisā hothā”ti āhaṃsu. “Khamāpito pana vo, bhante, satthā”ti. “Na khamāpito,
atk-s0502a:268_9: āvuso”ti. “Tena hi satthāraṃ khamāpetha, satthu khamāpitakāle mayampi tumhākaṃ purimasadisā
atk-s0502a:268_10: bhavissāmā”ti. Te antovassabhāvena satthu santikaṃ gantuṃ avisahantā dukkhena taṃ
atk-s0502a:268_11: antovassaṃ vītināmesuṃ. Satthā pana tena hatthinā upaṭṭhiyamāno sukhaṃ vasi. Sopi
atk-s0502a:268_12: hi hatthināgo gaṇaṃ pahāya phāsuvihāratthāyeva taṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:269_0: Yathāha – “ahaṃ kho ākiṇṇo viharāmi hatthīhi hatthīnīhi hatthikalabhehi hatthicchāpehi,
atk-s0502a:269_1: chinnaggāni ceva tiṇāni khādāmi, obhaggobhaggañca me sākhābhaṅgaṃ khādanti, āvilāni
atk-s0502a:269_2: ca pānīyāni pivāmi, ogāhā cassa me uttiṇṇassa hatthiniyo kāyaṃ upanighaṃsantiyo gacchanti,
atk-s0502a:269_3: yaṃnūnāhaṃ ekova gaṇamhā vūpakaṭṭho vihareyya”nti. Atha kho so hatthināgo yūthā apakkamma
atk-s0502a:269_4: yena pālileyyakaṃ rakkhitavanasaṇḍaṃ bhaddasālamūlaṃ, yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami,
atk-s0502a:269_5: upasaṅkamitvā pana bhagavantaṃ vanditvā olokento aññaṃ kiñci adisvā bhaddasālamūlaṃ
atk-s0502a:269_6: pādeneva paharanto tacchetvā soṇḍāya sākhaṃ gahetvā sammajji. Tato paṭṭhāya soṇḍāya
atk-s0502a:269_7: ghaṭaṃ gahetvā pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhāpeti, uṇhodakena atthe sati uṇhodakaṃ
atk-s0502a:269_8: paṭiyādeti. Kathaṃ? Hatthena kaṭṭhāni ghaṃsitvā aggiṃ sampādeti, tattha dārūni pakkhipanto
atk-s0502a:269_9: aggiṃ jāletvā tattha pāsāṇe pakkhipitvā pacitvā dārudaṇḍakena pavaṭṭetvā paricchinnāya
atk-s0502a:269_10: khuddakasoṇḍikāya khipati, tato hatthaṃ otāretvā udakassa tattabhāvaṃ jānitvā gantvā
atk-s0502a:269_11: satthāraṃ vandati. Satthā “udakaṃ te tāpitaṃ pālileyyakā”ti vatvā tattha gantvā nhāyati.
atk-s0502a:269_12: Athassa nānāvidhāni phalāni āharitvā deti. Yadā pana satthā gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisati,
atk-s0502a:269_13: tadā satthu pattacīvaramādāya kumbhe patiṭṭhapetvā satthārā saddhiṃyeva gacchati.
atk-s0502a:269_14: Satthā gāmūpacāraṃ patvā “pālileyyaka ito paṭṭhāya tayā gantuṃ na sakkā, āhāra me
atk-s0502a:269_15: pattacīvara”nti āharāpetvā gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi. Sopi yāva satthu nikkhamanā tattheva
atk-s0502a:269_16: ṭhatvā āgamanakāle paccuggamanaṃ katvā purimanayeneva pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā vasanaṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a:269_17: otāretvā vattaṃ dassetvā sākhāya bījati, rattiṃ vāḷamigaparipanthanivāraṇatthaṃ mahantaṃ
atk-s0502a:269_18: daṇḍaṃ soṇḍāya gahetvā “satthāraṃ rakkhissāmī”ti yāva aruṇuggamanā vanasaṇḍassa antarantarena
atk-s0502a:269_19: vicarati, tato paṭṭhāyayeva kira so vanasaṇḍo pālileyyakarakkhitavanasaṇḍo nāma jāto.
atk-s0502a:269_20: Aruṇe uggate mukhodakadānaṃ ādiṃ katvā tenevūpāyena sabbavattāni karoti.
atk-s0502a:270_0: Atheko makkaṭo taṃ hatthiṃ uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya divase divase tathāgatassa ābhisamācārikaṃ
atk-s0502a:270_1: karontaṃ disvā “ahampi kiñcideva karissāmī”ti vicaranto ekadivasaṃ nimmakkhikaṃ daṇḍakamadhuṃ
atk-s0502a:270_2: disvā daṇḍakaṃ bhañjitvā daṇḍakeneva saddhiṃ madhupaṭalaṃ satthu santikaṃ āharitvā
atk-s0502a:270_3: kadalipattaṃ chinditvā tattha ṭhapetvā adāsi. Satthā gaṇhi. Makkaṭo “karissati nu
atk-s0502a:270_4: kho paribhogaṃ na karissatī”ti olokento gahetvā nisinnaṃ disvā “kiṃ nu kho”ti cintetvā
atk-s0502a:270_5: daṇḍakoṭiyaṃ gahetvā parivattetvā upadhārento aṇḍakāni disvā tāni saṇikaṃ apanetvā
atk-s0502a:270_6: puna adāsi. Satthā paribhogamakāsi. So tuṭṭhamānaso taṃ taṃ sākhaṃ gahetvā naccantova
atk-s0502a:270_7: aṭṭhāsi. Athassa gahitasākhāpi akkantasākhāpi bhijjiṃsu. So ekasmiṃ khāṇumatthake
atk-s0502a:270_8: patitvā niviṭṭhagatto satthari pasanneneva cittena kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane tiṃsayojanike
atk-s0502a:270_9: kanakavimāne nibbatti, accharāsahassaparivāro makkaṭadevaputto nāma ahosi.
atk-s0502a:271_0: Tathāgatassa tattha hatthināgena upaṭṭhiyamānassa vasanabhāvo sakalajambudīpe pākaṭo
atk-s0502a:271_1: ahosi. Sāvatthinagarato “anāthapiṇḍiko visākhā ca mahāupāsikā”tievamādīni mahākulāni
atk-s0502a:271_2: ānandattherassa sāsanaṃ pahiṇiṃsu “satthāraṃ no, bhante, dassethā”ti. Disāvāsinopi
atk-s0502a:271_3: pañcasatā bhikkhū vuṭṭhavassā ānandattheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā “cirassutā no, āvuso ānanda,
atk-s0502a:271_4: bhagavato sammukhā dhammī kathā, sādhu mayaṃ, āvuso ānanda, labheyyāma bhagavato
atk-s0502a:271_5: sammukhā dhammiṃ kathaṃ savanāyā”ti yāciṃsu. Thero te bhikkhū ādāya tattha gantvā
atk-s0502a:271_6: “temāsaṃ ekavihārino tathāgatassa santikaṃ ettakehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ upasaṅkamituṃ
atk-s0502a:271_7: ayutta”nti cintetvā te bhikkhū bahi ṭhapetvā ekakova satthāraṃ upasaṅkami. Pālileyyako
atk-s0502a:271_8: taṃ disvā daṇḍamādāya pakkhandi. Satthā oloketvā apehi “apehi pālileyyaka, mā nivārayi,
atk-s0502a:271_9: buddhupaṭṭhāko eso”ti āha. So tattheva daṇḍaṃ chaḍḍetvā pattacīvarapaṭiggahaṇaṃ āpucchi.
atk-s0502a:271_10: Thero nādāsi. Nāgo “sace uggahitavatto bhavissati, satthu nisīdanapāsāṇaphalake attano
atk-s0502a:271_11: parikkhāraṃ na ṭhapessatī”ti cintesi. Thero pattacīvaraṃ bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapesi. Vattasampannā
atk-s0502a:271_12: hi garūnaṃ āsane vā sayane vā attano parikkhāraṃ na ṭhapenti.
atk-s0502a:272_0: Thero satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Satthā “ānanda, ekova āgatosī”ti
atk-s0502a:272_1: pucchitvā pañcasatehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ āgatabhāvaṃ sutvā “kahaṃ panete”ti vatvā
atk-s0502a:272_2: “tumhākaṃ cittaṃ ajānanto bahi ṭhapetvā āgatomhī”ti vutte “pakkosāhi ne”ti āha. Thero
atk-s0502a:272_3: tathā akāsi. Te bhikkhū āgantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu. Satthā tehi
atk-s0502a:272_4: saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā tehi bhikkhūhi, “bhante bhagavā, hi buddhasukhumālo ceva
atk-s0502a:272_5: khattiyasukhumālo ca, tumhehi temāsaṃ ekakehi tiṭṭhantehi nisīdantehi ca dukkaraṃ
atk-s0502a:272_6: kataṃ, vattapaṭivattakārakopi mukhodakādidāyakopi nāhosi maññe”ti vutte, “bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a:272_7: pālileyyakahatthinā mama sabbakiccāni katāni. Evarūpañhi sahāyaṃ labhantena ekatova
atk-s0502a:272_8: vasituṃ yuttaṃ, alabhantassa ekacārikabhāvova seyyo”ti vatvā imā nāgavagge tisso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:283: Eko care na ca pāpāni kayirā,
atk-s0502a:285_0: Gāthāpariyosāne pañcasatāpi te bhikkhū arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu. Ānandattheropi anāthapiṇḍikādīhi
atk-s0502a:285_1: pesitasāsanaṃ ārocetvā, “bhante, anāthapiṇḍikappamukhā te pañca ariyasāvakakoṭiyo
atk-s0502a:285_2: tumhākaṃ āgamanaṃ paccāsīsantī”ti āha. Satthā “tena hi gaṇhāhi pattacīvara”nti pattacīvaraṃ
atk-s0502a:285_3: gāhāpetvā nikkhami. Nāgo gantvā gatamagge tiriyaṃ aṭṭhāsi. “Kiṃ karoti, bhante, nāgo”ti?
atk-s0502a:285_4: “Tumhākaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhaṃ dātuṃ paccāsīsati, dīgharattaṃ kho panāyaṃ mayhaṃ
atk-s0502a:285_5: upakārako, nāssa cittaṃ kopetuṃ vaṭṭati, nivattatha, bhikkhave”ti satthā bhikkhū
atk-s0502a:285_6: gahetvā nivatti. Hatthīpi vanasaṇḍaṃ pavisitvā panasakadaliphalādīni nānāphalāni
atk-s0502a:285_7: saṃharitvā rāsiṃ katvā punadivase bhikkhūnaṃ adāsi. Pañcasatā bhikkhū sabbāni khepetuṃ
atk-s0502a:285_8: nāsakkhiṃsu. Bhattakiccapariyosāne satthā pattacīvaraṃ gāhetvā nikkhami. Nāgo bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0502a:285_9: antarantarena gantvā satthu purato tiriyaṃ aṭṭhāsi. “Kiṃ karoti, bhante, nāgo”ti?
atk-s0502a:285_10: “Ayañhi bhikkhave, tumhe pesetvā maṃ nivattetukāmo”ti. Atha naṃ satthā “pālileyyaka,
atk-s0502a:285_11: idaṃ pana mama anivattagamanaṃ, tava iminā attabhāvena jhānaṃ vā vipassanaṃ vā maggaphalaṃ
atk-s0502a:285_12: vā natthi, tiṭṭha tva”nti āha. Taṃ sutvā nāgo mukhe soṇḍaṃ pakkhipitvā rodanto pacchato
atk-s0502a:285_13: pacchato agamāsi. So hi satthāraṃ nivattetuṃ labhanto teneva niyāmena yāvajīvaṃ paṭijaggeyya,
atk-s0502a:285_14: satthā pana taṃ gāmūpacāraṃ patvā “pālileyyaka ito paṭṭhāya tava abhūmi, manussāvāso
atk-s0502a:285_15: saparipantho, tiṭṭha tva”nti āha. So rodamāno tattheva ṭhatvā satthari cakkhupathaṃ
atk-s0502a:285_16: vijahante hadayena phalitena kālaṃ katvā satthari pasādena tāvatiṃsabhavane tiṃsayojanike
atk-s0502a:285_17: kanakavimāne accharāsahassamajjhe nibbatti, pālileyyakadevaputtoyevassa nāmaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0502a:286_0: Satthāpi anupubbena jetavanaṃ agamāsi. Kosambakā bhikkhū “satthā kira sāvatthiṃ āgato”ti
atk-s0502a:286_1: sutvā satthāraṃ khamāpetuṃ tattha agamaṃsu. Kosalarājā “te kira kosambakā bhaṇḍanakārakā
atk-s0502a:286_2: bhikkhū āgacchantī”ti sutvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā “ahaṃ, bhante, tesaṃ mama vijitaṃ
atk-s0502a:286_3: pavisituṃ na dassāmī”ti āha. “Mahārāja, sīlavantā ete bhikkhū, kevalaṃ aññamaññaṃ
atk-s0502a:286_4: vivādena mama vacanaṃ na gaṇhiṃsu, idāni maṃ khamāpetuṃ āgacchanti, āgacchantu mahārājā”ti.
atk-s0502a:286_5: Anāthapiṇḍikopi “ahaṃ, bhante, tesaṃ vihāraṃ pavisituṃ na dassāmī”ti vatvā tatheva
atk-s0502a:286_6: bhagavatā paṭikkhitto tuṇhī ahosi. Sāvatthiyaṃ anuppattānaṃ pana tesaṃ bhagavā ekamante
atk-s0502a:286_7: vivittaṃ kārāpetvā senāsanaṃ dāpesi. Aññe bhikkhū tehi saddhiṃ neva ekato nisīdanti,
atk-s0502a:286_8: na tiṭṭhanti, āgatāgatā satthāraṃ pucchanti – “katamete, bhante, bhaṇḍanakārakā kosambakā
atk-s0502a:286_9: bhikkhū”ti? Satthā “ete”ti dasseti. “Ete kira te, ete kira te”ti āgatāgatehi aṅgulikā
atk-s0502a:286_10: dassiyamānā lajjāya sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ asakkontā bhagavato pādamūle nipajjitvā bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0502a:286_11: khamāpesuṃ. Satthā “bhāriyaṃ vo, bhikkhave, kataṃ, tumhe hi nāma mādisassa buddhassa
atk-s0502a:286_12: santike pabbajitvā mayi sāmaggiṃ karonte mama vacanaṃ na karittha, porāṇakapaṇḍitāpi
atk-s0502a:286_13: vajjhappattānaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ ovādaṃ sutvā tesu jīvitā voropiyamānesupi taṃ anatikkamitvā
atk-s0502a:286_14: pacchā dvīsu raṭṭhesu rajjaṃ kārayiṃsū”ti vatvā punadeva kosambikajātakaṃ kathetvā
atk-s0502a:286_15: “evaṃ, bhikkhave, dīghāvukumāro mātāpitūsu jīvitā voropiyamānesupi tesaṃ ovādaṃ anatikkamitvā
atk-s0502a:286_16: pacchā brahmadattassa dhītaraṃ labhitvā dvīsu kāsikosalaraṭṭhesu rajjaṃ kāresi, tumhehi
atk-s0502a:286_17: pana mama vacanaṃ akarontehi bhāriyaṃ kata”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:289: Ye ca tattha vijānanti, tato sammanti medhagā”ti.
atk-s0502a:290_0: Tattha pareti paṇḍite ṭhapetvā tato aññe bhaṇḍanakārakā pare nāma. Te tattha saṅghamajjhe
atk-s0502a:290_1: kolāhalaṃ karontā “mayaṃ yamāmase uparamāma vinassāma satataṃ samitaṃ maccusantikaṃ
atk-s0502a:290_2: gacchāmā”ti na vijānanti. Ye ca tattha vijānantīti ye tattha paṇḍitā “mayaṃ maccusantikaṃ
atk-s0502a:290_3: gacchāmā”ti vijānanti. Tato sammanti medhagāti evañhi te jānantā yonisomanasikāraṃ
atk-s0502a:290_4: uppādetvā medhagānaṃ kalahānaṃ vūpasamāya paṭipajjanti. Atha nesaṃ tāya paṭipattiyā
atk-s0502a:290_5: te medhagā sammantīti. Atha vā pare cāti pubbe mayā “mā, bhikkhave, bhaṇḍana”ntiādīni
atk-s0502a:290_6: vatvā ovadiyamānāpi mama ovādassa apaṭiggahaṇena atikkamanena amāmakā pare nāma.
atk-s0502a:290_7: “Mayaṃ chandādivasena micchāgāhaṃ gahetvā ettha saṅghamajjhe yamāmase bhaṇḍanādīnaṃ
atk-s0502a:290_8: vuddhiyā vāyamāmā”ti na vijānanti. Idāni pana yoniso paccavekkhamānā tattha tumhākaṃ
atk-s0502a:290_9: antare ye ca paṇḍitapurisā “pubbe mayaṃ chandādivasena vāyamantā ayoniso paṭipannā”ti
atk-s0502a:290_10: vijānanti, tato tesaṃ santikā te paṇḍitapurise nissāya ime dāni kalahasaṅkhātā medhagā
atk-s0502a:294: Subhānupassinti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā setabyanagaraṃ upanissāya siṃsapāvane viharanto cūḷakāḷamahākāḷe ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:295_0: Setabyanagaravāsino hi cūḷakāḷo, majjhimakāḷo, mahākāḷoti tayo bhātaro kuṭumbikā.
atk-s0502a:295_1: Tesu jeṭṭhakaniṭṭhā disāsu vicaritvā pañcahi sakaṭasatehi bhaṇḍaṃ āharanti, majjhimakāḷo
atk-s0502a:295_2: ābhataṃ vikkiṇāti. Athekasmiṃ samaye te ubhopi bhātaro pañcahi sakaṭasatehi nānābhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0502a:295_3: gahetvā sāvatthiṃ gantvā sāvatthiyā ca jetavanassa ca antare sakaṭāni mocayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:295_4: Tesu mahākāḷo sāyanhasamaye mālāgandhādihatthe sāvatthivāsino ariyasāvake dhammassavanāya
atk-s0502a:295_5: gacchante disvā “kuhiṃ ime gacchantī”ti pucchitvā tamatthaṃ sutvā “ahampi gamissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:295_6: cintetvā kaniṭṭhaṃ āmantetvā, “tāta, tesu sakaṭesu appamatto hohi, ahaṃ dhammaṃ sotuṃ
atk-s0502a:295_7: gacchāmī”ti vatvā gantvā tathāgataṃ vanditvā parisapariyante nisīdi. Satthā taṃ disvā
atk-s0502a:295_8: tassa ajjhāsayavasena anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathento dukkhakkhandhasuttādivasena anekapariyāyena
atk-s0502a:295_9: kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ okāraṃ saṃkilesañca kathesi. Taṃ sutvā mahākāḷo “sabbaṃ kira pahāya
atk-s0502a:295_10: gantabbaṃ, paralokaṃ gacchantaṃ neva bhogā, na ñātakā ca anugacchanti, kiṃ me gharāvāsena
atk-s0502a:295_11: pabbajissāmī”ti cintetvā mahājane satthāraṃ vanditvā pakkante satthāraṃ pabbajjaṃ
atk-s0502a:295_12: yācitvā satthārā “natthi te koci apaloketabbo”ti vutte, “kaniṭṭho me, bhante, atthī”ti
atk-s0502a:295_13: vatvā tena hi “apalokehi na”nti vutte, “sādhu, bhante”ti vatvā gantvā kaniṭṭhaṃ pakkosāpetvā,
atk-s0502a:295_14: “tāta, imaṃ sabbaṃ sāpateyyaṃ paṭipajjāhī”ti āha. “Tumhe pana kiṃ karissatha bhātikā”ti?
atk-s0502a:295_15: “Ahaṃ satthu santike pabbajissāmī”ti. So taṃ nānappakārehi yācitvā nivattetuṃ asakkonto
atk-s0502a:295_16: “sādhu, sāmi, yathā ajjhāsayaṃ karothā”ti āha. Mahākāḷo gantvā satthu santike pabbaji.
atk-s0502a:295_17: “Ahaṃ bhātikaṃ gahetvāva uppabbajissāmī”ti cūḷakāḷopi pabbaji. Aparabhāge mahākāḷo
atk-s0502a:295_18: upasampadaṃ labhitvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā sāsane dhurāni pucchitvā satthārā dvīsu
atk-s0502a:295_19: dhuresu kathitesu “ahaṃ, bhante, mahallakakāle pabbajitattā ganthadhuraṃ pūretuṃ
atk-s0502a:295_20: na sakkhissāmi, vipassanādhuraṃ pana pūressāmī”ti yāva arahattā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā
