atk-s0502a:295_21: sosānikadhutaṅgaṃ samādāya paṭhamayāmātikkante sabbesu niddaṃ okkantesu susānaṃ gantvā
atk-s0502a:296_0: Athekā susānagopikā kālī nāma chavaḍāhikā therassa ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ caṅkamitaṭṭhānañca
atk-s0502a:296_1: disvā “ko nu kho idhāgacchati, pariggaṇhissāmi na”nti pariggaṇhituṃ asakkontī ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0502a:296_2: susānakuṭikāyameva dīpaṃ jāletvā puttadhītaro ādāya gantvā ekamante nilīyamānā majjhimayāme
atk-s0502a:296_3: theraṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā gantvā vanditvā, “ayyo, no, bhante, imasmiṃ ṭhāne viharatī”ti
atk-s0502a:296_4: āha. “Āma, upāsike”ti. “Bhante, susāne viharantehi nāma vattaṃ uggaṇhituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:296_5: Thero “kiṃ pana mayaṃ tayā kathitavatte vattissāmā”ti avatvā “kiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati upāsike”ti
atk-s0502a:296_6: āha. “Bhante, sosānikehi nāma susāne vasanabhāvo susānagopakānañca vihāre mahātherassa
atk-s0502a:296_7: ca gāmabhojakassa ca kathetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. “Thero kiṃ kāraṇā”ti? “Katakammā corā dhanasāmikehi
atk-s0502a:296_8: padānupadaṃ anubaddhā susāne bhaṇḍakaṃ chaḍḍetvā palāyanti, atha manussā sosānikānaṃ
atk-s0502a:296_9: paripanthaṃ karonti, etesaṃ pana kathite ‘mayaṃ imassa bhaddantassa ettakaṃ nāma
atk-s0502a:296_10: kālaṃ ettha vasanabhāvaṃ jānāma, acoro eso’ti upaddavaṃ nivārenti. Tasmā etesaṃ kathetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:297_0: “Thero aññaṃ kiṃ kātabba”nti? “Bhante, susāne vasantena nāma ayyena macchamaṃsatilapiṭṭhatelaguḷādīni
atk-s0502a:297_1: vajjetabbāni, divā na niddāyitabbaṃ, kusītena na bhavitabbaṃ, āraddhavīriyena bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0502a:297_2: asaṭhena amāyāvinā hutvā kalyāṇajjhāsayena bhavitabbaṃ, sāyaṃ sabbesu suttesu vihārato
atk-s0502a:297_3: āgantabbaṃ, paccūsakāle sabbesu anuṭṭhitesuyeva vihāraṃ gantabbaṃ. Sace, bhante,
atk-s0502a:297_4: ayyo imasmiṃ ṭhāne evaṃ viharanto pabbajitakiccaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetuṃ sakkhissati,
atk-s0502a:297_5: sace matasarīraṃ ānetvā chaḍḍenti, ahaṃ kambalakūṭāgāraṃ āropetvā gandhamālādīhi
atk-s0502a:297_6: sakkāraṃ katvā sarīrakiccaṃ karissāmi. No ce sakkhissati, citakaṃ āropetvā aggiṃ
atk-s0502a:297_7: jāletvā saṅkunā ākaḍḍhitvā bahi khipitvā pharasunā koṭṭetvā khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ chinditvā
atk-s0502a:297_8: aggimhi pakkhipitvā jhāpessāmī”ti āha. Atha naṃ thero “sādhu bhadde, ekaṃ pana rūpārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:297_9: disvā mayhaṃ katheyyāsī”ti āha. Sā “sādhū”ti paccassosi. Thero yathājjhāsayena susāne
atk-s0502a:297_10: samaṇadhammaṃ karoti. Cūḷakāḷatthero pana uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya gharāvāsaṃ cinteti,
atk-s0502a:297_11: puttadāraṃ anussarati. “Bhātiko me atibhāriyaṃ kammaṃ karotī”ti cinteti.
atk-s0502a:298_0: Athekā kuladhītā taṃmuhuttasamuṭṭhitena byādhinā sāyanhasamaye amilātā akilantā kālamakāsi.
atk-s0502a:298_1: Tamenaṃ ñātakādayo dārutelādīhi saddhiṃ sāyaṃ susānaṃ netvā susānagopikāya “imaṃ
atk-s0502a:298_2: jhāpehī”ti bhatiṃ datvā niyyādetvā pakkamiṃsu. Sā tassā pārutavatthaṃ apanetvā taṃmuhuttamataṃ
atk-s0502a:298_3: pīṇitapīṇitaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ sarīraṃ disvā, “imaṃ ayyassa dassetuṃ patirūpaṃ ārammaṇa”nti
atk-s0502a:298_4: cintetvā gantvā theraṃ vanditvā, “bhante, evarūpaṃ nāma ārammaṇaṃ atthi, oloketha
atk-s0502a:298_5: ayyā”ti āha. Thero “sādhū”ti vatvā pārupanaṃ nīharāpetvā pādatalato yāva kesaggā
atk-s0502a:298_6: oloketvā “atipīṇitametaṃ rūpaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ aggimhi naṃ pakkhipitvā mahājālāhi gahitamattakāle
atk-s0502a:298_7: mayhaṃ āroceyyāsī”ti vatvā sakaṭṭhānameva gantvā nisīdi. Sā tathā katvā therassa
atk-s0502a:298_8: ārocesi. Thero gantvā olokesi. Jālāya pahaṭapahaṭaṭṭhānaṃ kabaragāviyā viya sarīravaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:298_9: ahosi, pādā namitvā olambiṃsu, hatthā paṭikuṭiṃsu, ūrunalāṭaṃ niccammaṃ ahosi. Thero
atk-s0502a:298_10: “idaṃ sarīraṃ idāneva olokentānaṃ apariyantakaraṃ hutvā idāneva khayaṃ pattaṃ vayaṃ
atk-s0502a:298_11: patta”nti rattiṭṭhānaṃ gantvā nisīditvā khayavayaṃ sampassamāno –
atk-s0502a:301: Gāthaṃ vatvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:302_0: Tasmiṃ arahattaṃ patte satthā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto cārikaṃ caramāno setabyaṃ gantvā
atk-s0502a:302_1: siṃsapāvanaṃ pāvisi. Cūḷakāḷassa bhariyāyo “satthā kira anuppatto siṃsapāvana”nti
atk-s0502a:302_2: sutvā “amhākaṃ sāmikaṃ gaṇhissāmā”ti pesetvā satthāraṃ nimantāpesuṃ. Buddhānaṃ pana
atk-s0502a:302_3: apariciṇṇaṭṭhāne āsanapaññattiṃ ācikkhantena ekena bhikkhunā paṭhamataraṃ gantuṃ
atk-s0502a:302_4: vaṭṭati. Buddhānañhi majjhimaṭṭhāne āsanaṃ paññāpetvā tassa dakkhiṇato sāriputtattherassa,
atk-s0502a:302_5: vāmato mahāmoggallānattherassa, tato paṭṭhāya ubhosu passesu bhikkhusaṅghassa āsanaṃ
atk-s0502a:302_6: paññāpetabbaṃ hoti. Tasmā mahākāḷatthero cīvarapārupanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā, “cūḷakāḷa,
atk-s0502a:302_7: tvaṃ purato gantvā āsanapaññattiṃ ācikkhā”ti cūḷakāḷaṃ pesesi. Tassa diṭṭhakālato
atk-s0502a:302_8: paṭṭhāya gehajanā tena saddhiṃ parihāsaṃ karontā nīcāsanāni saṅghattherassa koṭiyaṃ
atk-s0502a:302_9: attharanti, uccāsanāni saṅghanavakassa koṭiyaṃ. Itaro “mā evaṃ karotha, nīcāsanāni
atk-s0502a:302_10: upari mā paññāpetha, uccāsanāni upari paññāpetha, nīcāsanāni heṭṭhā”ti āha. Itthiyo
atk-s0502a:302_11: tassa vacanaṃ asuṇantiyo viya “tvaṃ kiṃ karonto vicarasi, kiṃ tava āsanāni paññāpetuṃ
atk-s0502a:302_12: na vaṭṭati, tvaṃ kaṃ āpucchitvā pabbajito, kena pabbajitosi, kasmā idhāgatosī”ti
atk-s0502a:302_13: vatvā nivāsanapārupanaṃ acchinditvā setakāni nivāsetvā sīse ca mālācumbuṭakaṃ ṭhapetvā,
atk-s0502a:302_14: “gaccha satthāraṃ ānehi, mayaṃ āsanāni paññāpessāmā”ti pahiṇiṃsu. Na ciraṃ bhikkhubhāve
atk-s0502a:302_15: ṭhatvā avassikova uppabbajitattā lajjituṃ na jānāti, tasmā so tena ākappena nirāsaṅkova
atk-s0502a:302_16: gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ādāya āgato. Bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0502a:302_17: pana bhattakiccāvasāne mahākāḷassa bhariyāyo “imāhi attano sāmiko gahito, mayampi
atk-s0502a:302_18: amhākaṃ sāmikaṃ gaṇhissāmā”ti cintetvā punadivase satthāraṃ nimantayiṃsu. Tadā pana
atk-s0502a:302_19: āsanapaññāpanatthaṃ añño bhikkhu agamāsi. Tā tasmiṃ khaṇe okāsaṃ alabhitvā buddhappamukhaṃ
atk-s0502a:302_20: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nisīdāpetvā bhikkhaṃ adaṃsu. Cūḷakāḷassa pana dve bhariyāyo, majjhimakāḷassa
atk-s0502a:302_21: catasso, mahākāḷassa pana aṭṭha. Bhikkhūpi bhattakiccaṃ kātukāmā nisīditvā bhattakiccamakaṃsu,
atk-s0502a:302_22: bahi gantukāmā uṭṭhāya agamaṃsu. Satthā pana nisīditvā bhattakiccaṃ kari. Tassa bhattakiccapariyosāne
atk-s0502a:302_23: tā itthiyo, “bhante, mahākāḷo amhākaṃ anumodanaṃ katvā āgacchissati, tumhe purato
atk-s0502a:302_24: gacchathā”ti vadiṃsu. Satthā “sādhū”ti vatvā purato agamāsi. Gāmadvāraṃ patvā bhikkhū
atk-s0502a:302_25: ujjhāyiṃsu “kiṃ nāmetaṃ satthārā kataṃ, ñatvā nu kho kataṃ, udāhu ajānitvā. Hiyyo
atk-s0502a:302_26: cūḷakāḷassa purato gatattā pabbajjantarāyo jāto, ajja aññassa purato gatattā antarāyo
atk-s0502a:302_27: nāhosi. Idāni mahākāḷaṃ ṭhapetvā āgato, sīlavā kho pana bhikkhu ācārasampanno, karissati
atk-s0502a:302_28: nu kho tassa pabbajjantarāya”nti. Satthā tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā nivattitvā ṭhito “kiṃ
atk-s0502a:302_29: kathetha, bhikkhave”ti pucchi. Te tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. “Kiṃ pana tumhe, bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a:302_30: cūḷakāḷaṃ viya mahākāḷaṃ sallakkhethā”ti? “Āma, bhante”. Tassa hi dve pajāpatiyo,
atk-s0502a:302_31: imassa aṭṭha. “Aṭṭhahi parikkhipitvā gahito kiṃ karissati, bhante”ti? Satthā “mā,
atk-s0502a:302_32: bhikkhave, evaṃ avacuttha, cūḷakāḷo uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya subhārammaṇabahulo viharati,
atk-s0502a:302_33: papāte ṭhito dubbalarukkhasadiso. Mayhaṃ pana putto mahākāḷo asubhānupassī viharati,
atk-s0502a:302_34: ghanaselapabbato viya acalo”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:306: Taṃ ve pasahati māro, vāto rukkhaṃva dubbalaṃ.
atk-s0502a:310: Taṃ ve nappasahatī māro, vāto selaṃva pabbata”nti.
atk-s0502a:311_0: Tattha subhānupassiṃ viharantanti sutaṃ anupassantaṃ, iṭṭhārammaṇe mānasaṃ vissajjetvā
atk-s0502a:311_1: viharantanti attho. Yo hi puggalo nimittaggāhaṃ anubyañjanaggāhaṃ gaṇhanto “nakhā
atk-s0502a:311_2: sobhanā”ti gaṇhāti, “aṅguliyo sobhanā”ti gaṇhāti, “hatthapādā, jaṅghā, ūru, kaṭi,
atk-s0502a:311_3: udaraṃ, thanā, gīvā, oṭṭhā, dantā, mukhaṃ, nāsā, akkhīni, kaṇṇā, bhamukā, nalāṭaṃ,
atk-s0502a:311_4: kesā, sobhanā”ti gaṇhāti, “kesā, lomā, nakhā, dantā, taco, sobhanā”ti gaṇhāti, vaṇṇo
atk-s0502a:311_5: subho, saṇṭhānaṃ subhanti, ayaṃ subhānupassī nāma. Evaṃ taṃ subhānupassiṃ viharantaṃ.
atk-s0502a:311_6: Indriyesūti cakkhādīsu chasu indriyesu. Asaṃvutanti cakkhudvārādīni arakkhantaṃ.
atk-s0502a:311_7: Pariyesanamattā paṭiggahaṇamattā paribhogamattāti imissā mattāya ajānanato bhojanamhi
atk-s0502a:311_8: cāmattaññuṃ. Apica paccavekkhaṇamattā vissajjanamattāti imissāpi mattāya ajānanato
atk-s0502a:311_9: amattaññuṃ, idaṃ bhojanaṃ dhammikaṃ, idaṃ adhammikantipi ajānantaṃ. Kāmacchandabyāpādavihiṃsāvitakkavasitāya
atk-s0502a:311_10: kusītaṃ. Hīnavīriyanti nibbīriyaṃ catūsu iriyāpathesu vīriyakaraṇarahitaṃ. Pasahatīti
atk-s0502a:311_11: abhibhavati ajjhottharati. Vāto rukkhaṃva dubbalanti balavavāto chinnapapāte jātaṃ
atk-s0502a:311_12: dubbalarukkhaṃ viya. Yathā hi so vāto tassa dubbalarukkhassa pupphaphalapallavādīnipi
atk-s0502a:311_13: pāteti, khuddakasākhāpi bhañjati, mahāsākhāpi bhañjati, samūlakampi taṃ rukkhaṃ uppāṭetvā
atk-s0502a:311_14: uddhaṃmūlaṃ adhosākhaṃ katvā gacchati, evameva evarūpaṃ puggalaṃ anto uppanno kilesamāro
atk-s0502a:311_15: pasahati, balavavāto dubbalarukkhassa pupphaphalapallavādipātanaṃ viya khuddānukhuddakāpattiāpajjanampi
atk-s0502a:311_16: karoti, khuddakasākhābhañjanaṃ viya nissaggiyādiāpattiāpajjanampi karoti, mahāsākhābhañjanaṃ
atk-s0502a:311_17: viya terasasaṅghādisesāpattiāpajjanampi karoti, uppāṭetvā uddhaṃ, mūlakaṃ heṭṭhāsākhaṃ
atk-s0502a:311_18: katvā pātanaṃ viya pārājikāpattiāpajjanampi karoti, svākkhātasāsanā nīharitvā katipāheneva
atk-s0502a:311_19: gihibhāvaṃ pāpetīti evaṃ evarūpaṃ puggalaṃ kilesamāro attano vase vattetīti attho.
atk-s0502a:312_0: Asubhānupassinti dasasu asubhesu aññataraṃ asubhaṃ passantaṃ paṭikūlamanasikāre yuttaṃ
atk-s0502a:312_1: kese asubhato passantaṃ lome nakhe dante tacaṃ vaṇṇaṃ saṇṭhānaṃ asubhato passantaṃ.
atk-s0502a:312_2: Indriyesūti chasu indriyesu. Susaṃvutanti nimittādiggāharahitaṃ pihitadvāraṃ. Amattaññutāpaṭikkhepena
atk-s0502a:312_3: bhojanamhi ca mattaññuṃ. Saddhanti kammassa ceva phalassa ca saddahanalakkhaṇāya
atk-s0502a:312_4: lokikāya saddhāya ceva tīsu vatthūsu aveccappasādasaṅkhātāya lokuttarasaddhāya ca
atk-s0502a:312_5: samannāgataṃ. Āraddhavīriyanti paggahitavīriyaṃ paripuṇṇavīriyaṃ. Taṃ veti evarūpaṃ
atk-s0502a:312_6: taṃ puggalaṃ yathā dubbalavāto saṇikaṃ paharanto ekagghanaṃ selaṃ cāletuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0502a:312_7: tathā abbhantare uppajjamānopi dubbalakilesamāro nappasahati, khobhetuṃ vā cāletuṃ
atk-s0502a:313_0: Tāpi kho tassa purāṇadutiyikāyo theraṃ parivāretvā “tvaṃ kaṃ āpucchitvā pabbajito,
atk-s0502a:313_1: idāni gihī bhavissasi na bhavissasī”tiādīni vatvā kāsāvaṃ nīharitukāmā ahesuṃ. Thero
atk-s0502a:313_2: tāsaṃ ākāraṃ sallakkhetvā nisinnāsanā vuṭṭhāya iddhiyā uppattitvā kūṭāgārakaṇṇikaṃ
atk-s0502a:313_3: dvidhā bhinditvā ākāsenāgantvā satthari gāthā pariyosāpenteyeva satthu suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:313_4: sarīraṃ abhitthavanto ākāsato otaritvā tathāgatassa pāde vandi.
atk-s0502a:317: Anikkasāvoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto rājagahe devadattassa kāsāvalābhaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:318_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye dve aggasāvakā pañcasate pañcasate attano attano parivāre ādāya
atk-s0502a:318_1: satthāraṃ āpucchitvā vanditvā jetavanato rājagahaṃ agamaṃsu. Rājagahavāsino dvepi
atk-s0502a:318_2: tayopi bahūpi ekato hutvā āgantukadānaṃ adaṃsu. Athekadivasaṃ āyasmā sāriputto anumodanaṃ
atk-s0502a:318_3: karonto “upāsakā eko sayaṃ dānaṃ deti, paraṃ na samādapeti, so nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a:318_4: bhogasampadaṃ labhati, no parivārasampadaṃ. Eko sayaṃ na deti, paraṃ samādapeti,
atk-s0502a:318_5: so nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne parivārasampadaṃ labhati, no bhogasampadaṃ. Eko sayampi
atk-s0502a:318_6: na deti, parampi na samādapeti, so nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne kañjikamattampi kucchipūraṃ
atk-s0502a:318_7: na labhati, anātho hoti nippaccayo. Eko sayampi deti, parampi samādapeti, so nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a:319_0: Tameko paṇḍitapuriso dhammaṃ sutvā “acchariyā vata bho, abbhutā vata bho dhammadesanā,
atk-s0502a:319_1: sukāraṇaṃ kathitaṃ, mayā imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ sampattīnaṃ nipphādakaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0502a:319_2: cintetvā – “bhante, sve mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti theraṃ nimantesi. “Kittakehi
atk-s0502a:319_3: te bhikkhūhi attho upāsakā”ti. “Kittakā pana vo, bhante, parivārā”ti? “Sahassamattā
atk-s0502a:319_4: upāsakā”ti. “Sabbehi saddhiṃyeva sve bhikkhaṃ gaṇhatha, bhante”ti. “Thero adhivāsesi”.
atk-s0502a:319_5: Upāsako nagaravīthiyaṃ caranto – “ammā, tātā, mayā bhikkhusahassaṃ nimantitaṃ, tumhe
atk-s0502a:319_6: kittakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhaṃ dātuṃ sakkhissatha, tumhe kittakāna”nti samādapesi.
atk-s0502a:319_7: Manussā attano attano pahonakaniyāmena – “mayaṃ dasannaṃ dassāma, mayaṃ vīsatiyā,
atk-s0502a:319_8: mayaṃ satassā”ti āhaṃsu. Upāsako – “tena hi ekasmiṃ ṭhāne samāgamaṃ katvā ekatova
atk-s0502a:319_9: parivisissāma, sabbe tilataṇḍulasappimadhuphāṇitādīni samāharathā”ti ekasmiṃ ṭhāne samāharāpesi.
atk-s0502a:320_0: Athassa eko kuṭumbiko satasahassagghanikaṃ gandhakāsāvavatthaṃ datvā – “sace te dānavattaṃ
atk-s0502a:320_1: nappahoti, idaṃ vissajjetvā yaṃ ūnaṃ, taṃ pūreyyāsi. Sace pahoti, yassicchasi, tassa
atk-s0502a:320_2: bhikkhuno dadeyyāsī”ti āha. Tadā tassa sabbaṃ dānavattaṃ pahosi, kiñci ūnaṃ nāma
atk-s0502a:320_3: nāhosi. So manusse pucchi – “idaṃ, ayyā, kāsāvaṃ ekena kuṭumbikena evaṃ nāma vatvā
atk-s0502a:320_4: dinnaṃ atirekaṃ jātaṃ, kassa naṃ demā”ti. Ekacce “sāriputtattherassā”ti āhaṃsu. Ekacce
atk-s0502a:320_5: “thero sassapākasamaye āgantvā gamanasīlo, devadatto amhākaṃ maṅgalāmaṅgalesu sahāyo
atk-s0502a:320_6: udakamaṇiko viya niccaṃ patiṭṭhito, tassa taṃ demā”ti āhaṃsu. Sambahulikāya kathāyapi
atk-s0502a:320_7: “devadattassa dātabba”nti vattāro bahutarā ahesuṃ, atha naṃ devadattassa adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:320_8: So taṃ chinditvā sibbitvā rajitvā nivāsetvā pārupitvā vicarati. Taṃ disvā manussā
atk-s0502a:320_9: “nayidaṃ devadattassa anucchavikaṃ, sāriputtattherassa anucchavikaṃ. Devadatto attano
atk-s0502a:320_10: ananucchavikaṃ nivāsetvā pārupitvā vicaratī”ti vadiṃsu. Atheko disāvāsiko bhikkhu
atk-s0502a:320_11: rājagahā sāvatthiṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā katapaṭisanthāro satthārā dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ
atk-s0502a:320_12: phāsuvihāraṃ pucchito ādito paṭṭhāya sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi. Satthā “na kho
atk-s0502a:320_13: bhikkhu idāneveso attano ananucchavikaṃ vatthaṃ dhāreti, pubbepi dhāresiyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari –
atk-s0502a:321_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bārāṇasivāsī eko hatthimārako hatthiṃ
atk-s0502a:321_1: māretvā māretvā dante ca nakhe ca antāni ca ghanamaṃsañca āharitvā vikkiṇanto jīvitaṃ
atk-s0502a:321_2: kappeti. Athekasmiṃ araññe anekasahassā hatthino gocaraṃ gahetvā gacchantā paccekabuddhe
atk-s0502a:321_3: disvā tato paṭṭhāya gacchamānā gamanāgamanakāle jaṇṇukehi nipatitvā vanditvā pakkamanti.
atk-s0502a:321_4: Ekadivasañhi hatthimārako taṃ kiriyaṃ disvā – “ahaṃ ime kicchena māremi, ime ca gamanāgamanakāle
atk-s0502a:321_5: paccekabuddhe vandanti, kiṃ nu kho disvā vandantī”ti cintento – “kāsāva”nti sallakkhetvā,
atk-s0502a:321_6: “mayāpi idāni kāsāvaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā ekassa paccekabuddhassa jātassaraṃ
atk-s0502a:321_7: oruyha nhāyantassa tīre ṭhapitesu kāsāvesu cīvaraṃ thenetvā tesaṃ hatthīnaṃ gamanāgamanamagge
atk-s0502a:321_8: sattiṃ gahetvā sasīsaṃ pārupitvā nisīdati. Hatthino taṃ disvā – “paccekabuddho”ti
atk-s0502a:321_9: saññāya vanditvā pakkamanti. So tesaṃ sabbapacchato gacchantaṃ sattiyā paharitvā
atk-s0502a:321_10: māretvā dantādīni gahetvā sesaṃ bhūmiyaṃ nikhaṇitvā gacchati. Aparabhāge bodhisatto
atk-s0502a:321_11: hatthiyoniyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā hatthijeṭṭhako yūthapati ahosi. Tadāpi so tatheva
atk-s0502a:321_12: karoti. Mahāpuriso attano parisāya parihāniṃ ñatvā, “kuhiṃ ime hatthī gatā, mandā
atk-s0502a:321_13: jātā”ti pucchitvā, “na jānāma, sāmī”ti vutte, “kuhiñci gacchantā maṃ anāpucchitvā
atk-s0502a:321_14: na gamissanti, paripanthena bhavitabba”nti vatvā, “ekasmiṃ ṭhāne kāsāvaṃ pārupitvā
atk-s0502a:321_15: nisinnassa santikā paripanthena bhavitabba”nti parisaṅkitvā, “taṃ pariggaṇhituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0502a:321_16: sabbe hatthī purato pesetvā sayaṃ pacchato vilambamāno āgacchati. So sesahatthīsu
atk-s0502a:321_17: vanditvā gatesu mahāpurisaṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā cīvaraṃ saṃharitvā sattiṃ vissajji.
atk-s0502a:321_18: Mahāpuriso satiṃ uppaṭṭhapetvā āgacchanto pacchato paṭikkamitvā sattiṃ vivajjesi.
atk-s0502a:321_19: Atha naṃ “iminā ime hatthī nāsitā”ti gaṇhituṃ pakkhandi. Itaro ekaṃ rukkhaṃ purato
atk-s0502a:321_20: katvā nilīyi. Atha “naṃ rukkhena saddhiṃ soṇḍāya parikkhipitvā gahetvā bhūmiyaṃ pothessāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:321_21: tena nīharitvā dassitaṃ kāsāvaṃ disvā – “sacāhaṃ imasmiṃ dubbhissāmi, anekasahassesu
atk-s0502a:321_22: me buddhapaccekabuddhakhīṇāsavesu lajjā nāma bhinnā bhavissatī”ti adhivāsetvā – “tayā
atk-s0502a:321_23: me ettakā ñātakā nāsitā”ti pucchi. “Āma, sāmī”ti. “Kasmā evaṃ bhāriyakammamakāsi,
atk-s0502a:321_24: attano ananucchavikaṃ vītarāgānaṃ anucchavikaṃ vatthaṃ paridahitvā evarūpaṃ kammaṃ
atk-s0502a:321_25: karontena bhāriyaṃ tayā kata”nti. Evañca pana vatvā uttaripi naṃ niggaṇhanto “anikkasāvo
atk-s0502a:321_26: kāsāvaṃ…pe… sa ve kāsāvamarahatī”ti gāthaṃ vatvā – “ayuttaṃ te kata”nti vatvā taṃ vissajjesi.
atk-s0502a:322_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā, “tadā hatthimārako devadatto ahosi, tassa niggāhako
atk-s0502a:322_1: hatthināgo ahamevā”ti jātakaṃ samodhānetvā, “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi devadatto
atk-s0502a:322_2: attano ananucchavikaṃ vatthaṃ dhāresiyevā”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:330_0: Tattha anikkasāvoti rāgādīhi kasāvehi sakasāvo. Paridahissatīti nivāsanapārupanaattharaṇavasena
atk-s0502a:330_1: paribhuñjissati. Paridhassatītipi pāṭho. Apeto damasaccenāti indriyadamena ceva paramatthasaccapakkhikena
atk-s0502a:330_2: vacīsaccena ca apeto, viyutto pariccatthoti attho. Na soti so evarūpo puggalo kāsāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:330_3: paridahituṃ nārahati. Vantakasāvassāti catūhi maggehi vantakasāvo chaḍḍitakasāvo
atk-s0502a:330_4: pahīnakasāvo assa. Sīlesūti catupārisuddhisīlesu. Susamāhitoti suṭṭhu samāhito suṭṭhito.
atk-s0502a:330_5: Upetoti indriyadamena ceva vuttappakārena ca saccena upagato. Sa veti so evarūpo
atk-s0502a:331: Gāthāpariyosāne so disāvāsiko bhikkhu sotāpanno ahosi, aññepi bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pāpuṇiṃsu. Desanā mahājanassa sātthikā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:334: Asāre sāramatinoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto aggasāvakehi niveditaṃ sañcayassa anāgamanaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:335_0: Tatrāyaṃ anupubbikathā – amhākañhi satthā ito kappasatasahassādhikānaṃ catunnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ
atk-s0502a:335_1: matthake amaravatiyā nāma nagare sumedho nāma brāhmaṇakumāro hutvā sabbasippesu nipphattiṃ
atk-s0502a:335_2: patvā mātāpitūnaṃ accayena anekakoṭisaṅkhyaṃ dhanaṃ pariccajitvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā
atk-s0502a:335_3: himavante vasanto jhānābhiññā nibbattetvā ākāsena gacchanto dīpaṅkaradasabalassa
atk-s0502a:335_4: sudassanavihārato rammavatīnagaraṃ pavisanatthāya maggaṃ sodhayamānaṃ janaṃ disvā
atk-s0502a:335_5: sayampi ekaṃ padesaṃ gahetvā maggaṃ sodheti. Tasmiṃ asodhiteyeva āgatassa satthuno
atk-s0502a:335_6: attānaṃ setuṃ katvā kalale ajinacammaṃ attharitvā “satthā sasāvakasaṅgho kalalaṃ
atk-s0502a:335_7: anakkamitvā maṃ akkamanto gacchatū”ti nipanno. Satthārā taṃ disvāva “buddhaṅkuro
atk-s0502a:335_8: esa, anāgate kappasatasahassādhikānaṃ catunnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ pariyosāne gotamo nāma
atk-s0502a:335_9: buddho bhavissatī”ti byākato. Tassa satthuno aparabhāge “koṇḍañño maṅgalo sumano
atk-s0502a:335_10: revato sobhito anomadassī padumo nārado padumuttaro sumedho sujāto piyadassī atthadassī
atk-s0502a:335_11: dhammadassī siddhattho tisso phusso vipassī sikhī vessabhū kakusandho koṇāgamano
atk-s0502a:335_12: kassapo”ti lokaṃ obhāsetvā uppannānaṃ imesampi tevīsatiyā buddhānaṃ santike laddhabyākaraṇo,
atk-s0502a:335_13: “dasa pāramiyo, dasa upapāramiyo, dasa paramatthapāramiyo”ti samattiṃsa pāramiyo
atk-s0502a:335_14: pūretvā vessantarattabhāve ṭhito pathavikampanāni mahādānāni datvā puttadāraṃ pariccajitvā
atk-s0502a:335_15: āyupariyosāne tusitapure nibbattitvā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā dasa sahassacakkavāḷadevatāhi sannipatitvā –
atk-s0502a:341_0: Pañca mahāvilokanāni viloketvā tato cuto sakyarājakule paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā dasamāsaccayena
atk-s0502a:341_1: mātukucchito vijāyi. Soḷasavassakāle tattha mahāsampattiyā parihariyamāno anukkamena
atk-s0502a:341_2: bhadrayobbanaṃ patvā tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ anucchavikesu tīsu pāsādesu devalokasiriṃ viya
atk-s0502a:341_3: rajjasiriṃ anubhavanto uyyānakīḷāya gamanasamaye anukkamena jiṇṇabyādhimatasaṅkhāte
atk-s0502a:341_4: tayo devadūte disvā sañjātasaṃvego nivattitvā catutthavāre pabbajitaṃ disvā, “sādhu
atk-s0502a:341_5: pabbajjā”ti pabbajjāya ruciṃ uppādetvā uyyānaṃ gantvā tattha divasaṃ khepetvā maṅgalapokkharaṇītīre
atk-s0502a:341_6: nisinno kappakavesaṃ gahetvā āgatena vissakammena devaputtena alaṅkatapaṭiyatto rāhulakumārassa
atk-s0502a:341_7: jātasāsanaṃ sutvā puttasinehassa balavabhāvaṃ ñatvā, “yāva idaṃ bandhanaṃ na vaḍḍhati,
atk-s0502a:341_8: tāvadeva naṃ chindissāmī”ti cintetvā sāyaṃ nagaraṃ pavisanto –
atk-s0502a:342: “Nibbutā nūna sā mātā, nibbuto nūna so pitā;
atk-s0502a:343: Nibbutā nūna sā nārī, yassāyaṃ īdiso patī”ti. –
atk-s0502a:344_0: Kisāgotamiyā nāma pitucchādhītāya bhāsitaṃ imaṃ gāthaṃ sutvā, “ahaṃ imāya nibbutapadaṃ
atk-s0502a:344_1: sāvito”ti muttāhāraṃ omuñcitvā tassā pesetvā attano bhavanaṃ pavisitvā sirisayane
atk-s0502a:344_2: nisinno niddopagatānaṃ nāṭakitthīnaṃ vippakāraṃ disvā nibbinnahadayo channaṃ uṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0502a:344_3: kaṇḍakaṃ āharāpetvā taṃ āruyha channasahāyo dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatāhi parivuto
atk-s0502a:344_4: mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā anomānadītīre pabbajitvā anukkamena rājagahaṃ gantvā
atk-s0502a:344_5: tattha piṇḍāya caritvā paṇḍavapabbatapabbhāre nisinno magadharaññā rajjena nimantiyamāno
atk-s0502a:344_6: taṃ paṭikkhipitvā sabbaññutaṃ patvā attano vijitaṃ āgamanatthāya tena gahitapaṭiñño
atk-s0502a:344_7: āḷārañca udakañca upasaṅkamitvā tesaṃ santike adhigatavisesaṃ analaṅkaritvā chabbassāni
atk-s0502a:344_8: mahāpadhānaṃ padahitvā visākhapuṇṇamadivase pātova sujātāya dinnapāyasaṃ paribhuñjitvā
atk-s0502a:344_9: nerañjarāya nadiyā suvaṇṇapātiṃ pavāhetvā nerañjarāya nadiyā tīre mahāvanasaṇḍe nānāsamāpattīhi
atk-s0502a:344_10: divasabhāgaṃ vītināmetvā sāyanhasamaye sottiyena dinnaṃ tiṇaṃ gahetvā kāḷena nāgarājena
atk-s0502a:344_11: abhitthutaguṇo bodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha tiṇāni santharitvā “na tāvimaṃ pallaṅkaṃ bhindissāmi,
atk-s0502a:344_12: yāva me anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ na muccissatī”ti paṭiññaṃ katvā puratthābhimukho
atk-s0502a:344_13: nisīditvā sūriye anatthaṅgamiteyeva mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ,
atk-s0502a:344_14: majjhimayāme cutūpapātañāṇaṃ patvā pacchimayāmāvasāne paccayākāre ñāṇaṃ otāretvā
atk-s0502a:344_16: sattasattāhaṃ bodhimaṇḍe vītināmetvā aṭṭhame sattāhe ajapālanigrodhamūle nisinno
atk-s0502a:344_18: sahampatibrahmunā āyācitadhammadesano buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ voloketvā brahmuno ajjhesanaṃ
atk-s0502a:344_19: adhivāsetvā, “kassa nu kho ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyya”nti olokento āḷārudakānaṃ
atk-s0502a:344_20: kālakatabhāvaṃ ñatvā pañcavaggiyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahūpakārataṃ anussaritvā uṭṭhāyāsanā
atk-s0502a:344_21: kāsipuraṃ gacchanto antarāmagge upakena saddhiṃ mantetvā āsāḷhipuṇṇamadivase isipatane
atk-s0502a:344_22: migadāye pañcavaggiyānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ patvā te ananucchavikena samudācārena samudācarante
atk-s0502a:344_23: saññāpetvā aññātakoṇḍaññappamukhe aṭṭhārasa brahmakoṭiyo amatapānaṃ pāyento dhammacakkaṃ
atk-s0502a:344_24: pavattetvā pavattitavaradhammacakko pañcamiyaṃ pakkhassa sabbepi te bhikkhū arahatte
atk-s0502a:344_25: patiṭṭhāpetvā taṃ divasameva yasakulaputtassa upanissayasampattiṃ disvā taṃ rattibhāge
atk-s0502a:344_26: nibbinditvā gehaṃ pahāya nikkhantaṃ disvā, “ehi yasā”ti pakkositvā tasmiṃyeva rattibhāge
atk-s0502a:344_27: sotāpattiphalaṃ pāpetvā punadivase arahattaṃ pāpetvā aparepi tassa sahāyake catupaṇṇāsa
atk-s0502a:345_0: Evaṃ loke ekasaṭṭhiyā arahantesu jātesu vuṭṭhavasso pavāretvā, “caratha, bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a:345_1: cārika”nti saṭṭhi bhikkhū disāsu pesetvā sayaṃ uruvelaṃ gacchanto antarāmagge kappāsikavanasaṇḍe
atk-s0502a:345_2: tiṃsa jane bhaddavaggiyakumāre vinesi. Tesu sabbapacchimako sotāpanno sabbuttamo
atk-s0502a:345_3: anāgāmī ahosi. Te sabbepi ehibhikkhubhāveneva pabbājetvā disāsu pesetvā sayaṃ uruvelaṃ
atk-s0502a:345_4: gantvā aḍḍhuḍḍhāni pāṭihāriyasahassāni dassetvā uruvelakassapādayo sahassajaṭilaparivāre
atk-s0502a:345_5: tebhātikajaṭile vinetvā ehibhikkhubhāveneva pabbājetvā gayāsīse nisīdāpetvā ādittapariyāyadesanāya
atk-s0502a:345_6: arahatte patiṭṭhāpetvā tena arahantasahassena parivuto “bimbisārarañño dinnaṃ paṭiññaṃ
atk-s0502a:345_7: mocessāmī”ti rājagahanagarūpacāre laṭṭhivanuyyānaṃ gantvā, “satthā kira āgato”ti
atk-s0502a:345_8: sutvā dvādasanahutehi brāhmaṇagahapatikehi saddhiṃ āgatassa rañño madhuradhammakathaṃ
atk-s0502a:345_9: kathento rājānaṃ ekādasahi nahutehi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpetvā ekanahutaṃ
atk-s0502a:345_10: saraṇesu patiṭṭhāpetvā punadivase sakkena devarājena māṇavakavaṇṇaṃ gahetvā abhitthutaguṇo
atk-s0502a:345_11: rājagahanagaraṃ pavisitvā rājanivesane katabhattakicco veḷuvanārāmaṃ paṭiggahetvā
atk-s0502a:345_12: tattheva vāsaṃ kappesi. Tattha naṃ sāriputtamoggallānā upasaṅkamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:346_0: Tatrāyaṃ anupubbikathā – anuppanneyeva hi buddhe rājagahato avidūre upatissagāmo
atk-s0502a:346_1: kolitagāmoti dve brāhmaṇagāmā ahesuṃ. Tesu upatissagāme sāriyā nāma brāhmaṇiyā gabbhassa
atk-s0502a:346_2: patiṭṭhitadivaseyeva kolitagāme moggaliyā nāma brāhmaṇiyāpi gabbho patiṭṭhāsi. Tāni
atk-s0502a:346_3: kira dvepi kulāni yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā ābaddhapaṭibaddhasahāyakāneva ahesuṃ,
atk-s0502a:346_4: tāsaṃ dvinnampi ekadivasameva gabbhaparihāraṃ adaṃsu. Tā ubhopi dasamāsacceyena putte
atk-s0502a:346_5: vijāyiṃsu. Nāmaggahaṇadivase sāriyā brāhmaṇiyā puttassa upatissagāmake jeṭṭhakulassa
atk-s0502a:346_6: puttattā upatissoti nāmaṃ kariṃsu, itarassa kolitagāme jeṭṭhakulassa puttattā kolitoti
atk-s0502a:346_7: nāmaṃ kariṃsu. Te ubhopi vuḍḍhimanvāya sabbasippānaṃ pāraṃ agamaṃsu. Upatissamāṇavassa
atk-s0502a:346_8: kīḷanatthāya nadiṃ vā uyyānaṃ vā gamanakāle pañca suvaṇṇasivikasatāni parivārāni
atk-s0502a:346_9: honti, kolitamāṇavassa pañca ājaññayuttarathasatāni. Dvepi janā pañcapañcamāṇavakasataparivārā
atk-s0502a:346_10: honti. Rājagahe ca anusaṃvaccharaṃ giraggasamajjo nāma ahosi. Tesaṃ dvinnampi ekaṭṭhāneyeva
atk-s0502a:346_11: mañcaṃ bandhanti. Dvepi ekato nisīditvā samajjaṃ passantā hasitabbaṭṭhāne hasanti,
atk-s0502a:346_12: saṃvegaṭṭhāne saṃvejenti, dāyaṃ dātuṃ yuttaṭṭhāne dāyaṃ denti. Tesaṃ imināva niyāmena
atk-s0502a:346_13: ekadivasaṃ samajjaṃ passantānaṃ paripākagatattā ñāṇassa purimadivasesu viya hasitabbaṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a:346_14: hāso vā saṃvegaṭṭhāne saṃvego vā dātuṃ yuttaṭṭhāne dānaṃ vā nāhosi. Dvepi pana janā
atk-s0502a:346_15: evaṃ cintayiṃsu – “kimettha oloketabbaṃ atthi, sabbepime appatte vassasate appaṇṇattikabhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:346_16: gamissanti, amhehi pana ekaṃ mokkhadhammaṃ pariyesituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0502a:346_17: nisīdiṃsu. Tato kolito upatissaṃ āha – “samma upatissa, na tvaṃ aññesu divasesu viya
atk-s0502a:346_18: haṭṭhapahaṭṭho, idāni anattamanadhātukosi, kiṃ te sallakkhita”nti? “Samma kolita,
atk-s0502a:346_19: etesaṃ volokane sāro natthi, niratthakametaṃ, attano mokkhadhammaṃ gavesituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0502a:346_20: idaṃ cintayanto nisinnomhi. Tvaṃ pana kasmā anattamanosīti? Sopi tatheva āha. Athassa
atk-s0502a:346_21: attanā saddhiṃ ekajjhāsayataṃ ñatvā upatisso āha – “amhākaṃ ubhinnampi sucintikaṃ,
atk-s0502a:346_22: mokkhadhammaṃ pana gavesantehi ekā pabbajjā laddhuṃ vaṭṭati. Kassa santike pabbajāmā”ti?
atk-s0502a:347_0: Tena kho pana samayena sañcayo nāma paribbājako rājagahe paṭivasati mahatiyā paribbājakaparisāya
atk-s0502a:347_1: saddhiṃ. Te “tassa santike pabbajissāmā”ti pañcamāṇavakasatāni “sivikāyo ca rathe
atk-s0502a:347_2: ca gahetvā gacchathā”ti uyyojetvā ekāya sivikāya ekena rathena gantvā sañcayassa
atk-s0502a:347_3: santike pabbajiṃsu. Tesaṃ pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya sañcayo atirekalābhaggayasaggappatto
atk-s0502a:347_4: ahosi. Te katipāheneva sabbaṃ sañcayassa samayaṃ parimadditvā, “ācariya, tumhākaṃ
atk-s0502a:347_5: jānanasamayo ettakova, udāhu uttarimpi atthī”ti pucchiṃsu. “Ettakova sabbaṃ tumhehi
atk-s0502a:347_6: ñāta”nti vutte cintayiṃsu – “evaṃ sati imassa santike brahmacariyavāso niratthako,
atk-s0502a:347_7: mayaṃ yaṃ mokkhadhammaṃ gavesituṃ nikkhantā, so imassa santike uppādetuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0502a:347_8: mahā kho pana jambudīpo, gāmanigamarājadhāniyo carantā addhā mokkhadhammadesakaṃ
atk-s0502a:347_9: kañci ācariyaṃ labhissāmā”ti. Tato paṭṭhāya, “yattha yattha paṇḍitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā
atk-s0502a:347_10: atthī”ti vadanti, tattha tattha gantvā sākacchaṃ karonti. Tehi puṭṭhaṃ pañhaṃ aññe
atk-s0502a:347_11: kathetuṃ na sakkonti, te pana tesaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjenti. Evaṃ sakalajambudīpaṃ pariggaṇhitvā
atk-s0502a:347_12: nivattitvā sakaṭṭhānameva āgantvā, “samma kolita, amhesu yo paṭhamaṃ amataṃ adhigacchati,
atk-s0502a:348_0: Evaṃ tesu katikaṃ katvā viharantesu satthā vuttānukkamena rājagahaṃ patvā veḷuvanaṃ
atk-s0502a:348_1: paṭiggahetvā veḷuvane viharati. Tadā “caratha, bhikkhave, cārikaṃ bahujanahitāyā”ti
atk-s0502a:348_2: ratanattayaguṇapakāsanatthaṃ uyyojitānaṃ ekasaṭṭhiyā arahantānaṃ antare pañcavaggiyānaṃ
atk-s0502a:348_3: abbhantaro assajitthero paṭinivattitvā rājagahaṃ āgato, punadivase pātova pattacīvaramādāya
atk-s0502a:348_4: rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi. Tasmiṃ samaye upatissaparibbājakopi pātova bhattakiccaṃ
atk-s0502a:348_5: katvā paribbājakārāmaṃ gacchanto theraṃ disvā cintesi – “mayā evarūpo pabbajito nāma
atk-s0502a:348_6: na diṭṭhapubboyeva, ye loke arahanto vā arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpannā, ayaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0502a:348_7: aññataro, yaṃnūnāhaṃ imaṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā puccheyyaṃ – ‘kaṃsi tvaṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0502a:348_8: uddissa pabbajito, ko vā te satthā, kassa vā tvaṃ dhammaṃ rocesī”’ti? Athassa etadahosi
atk-s0502a:348_9: – “akālo kho imaṃ bhikkhuṃ pañhaṃ pucchituṃ, antaragharaṃ paviṭṭho piṇḍāya carati,
atk-s0502a:348_10: yaṃnūnāhaṃ imaṃ bhikkhuṃ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandheyyaṃ, atthikehi upaññātaṃ magga”nti.
atk-s0502a:348_11: So theraṃ laddhapiṇḍapātaṃ aññataraṃ okāsaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā nisīditukāmatañcassa
atk-s0502a:348_12: ñatvā attano paribbājakapīṭhakaṃ paññāpetvā adāsi, so bhattakiccapariyosānepissa
atk-s0502a:349_0: Evaṃ ācariyavattaṃ katvā katabhattakiccena therena saddhiṃ madhurapaṭisanthāraṃ katvā
atk-s0502a:349_1: evamāha – “vippasannāni kho pana te, āvuso, indriyāni, parisuddho chavivaṇṇo pariyodāto,
atk-s0502a:349_2: kaṃsi tvaṃ, āvuso, uddissa pabbajito, ko vā te satthā, kassa vā tvaṃ dhammaṃ rocesī”ti
atk-s0502a:349_3: pucchi. Thero cintesi – “ime paribbājakā nāma sāsanassa paṭipakkhabhūtā, imassa sāsanassa
atk-s0502a:349_4: gambhīrataṃ dassessāmī”ti. Attano navakabhāvaṃ dassento āha – “ahaṃ kho, āvuso, navo
atk-s0502a:349_5: acirapabbajito, adhunāgato imaṃ dhammavinayaṃ, na tāvāhaṃ sakkhissāmi vitthārena
atk-s0502a:349_6: dhammaṃ desetu”nti. Paribbājako – “ahaṃ upatisso nāma, tvaṃ yathāsattiyā appaṃ vā
atk-s0502a:349_7: bahuṃ vā vada, etaṃ nayasatena nayasahassena paṭivijjhituṃ mayhaṃ bhāro”ti cintetvā āha –
atk-s0502a:350: “Appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā bhāsassu, atthaṃyeva me brūhi;
atk-s0502a:351: Attheneva me attho, kiṃ kāhasi byañjanaṃ bahu”nti. ;
atk-s0502a:352_0: Evaṃ vutte thero – “ye dhammā hetuppabhavā”ti gāthamāha. Paribbājako paṭhamapadadvayameva
atk-s0502a:352_1: sutvā sahassanayapaṭimaṇḍite sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, itaraṃ padadvayaṃ sotāpannakāle
atk-s0502a:352_2: niṭṭhāpesi. So sotāpanno hutvā uparivisese appavattante “bhavissati ettha kāraṇa”nti
atk-s0502a:352_3: sallakkhetvā theraṃ āha – “bhante, mā upari dhammadesanaṃ vaḍḍhayittha, ettakameva
atk-s0502a:352_4: hotu, kuhiṃ amhākaṃ satthā vasatī”ti? “Veḷuvane, āvuso”ti. “Tena hi, bhante, tumhe
atk-s0502a:352_5: purato yātha, mayhaṃ eko sahāyako atthi, amhehi ca aññamaññaṃ katikā katā ‘amhesu
atk-s0502a:352_6: yo amataṃ paṭhamaṃ adhigacchati, so itarassa ārocetū’ti. Ahaṃ taṃ paṭiññaṃ mocetvā
atk-s0502a:352_7: sahāyakaṃ gahetvā tumhākaṃ gatamaggeneva satthu santikaṃ āgamissāmīti pañcapatiṭṭhitena
atk-s0502a:352_8: therassa pādesu nipatitvā tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā theraṃ uyyojetvā paribbājakārāmābhimukho agamāsi”.
atk-s0502a:353_0: Atha kho kolitaparibbājako taṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā, “ajja mayhaṃ sahāyakassa
atk-s0502a:353_1: mukhavaṇṇo na aññadivasesu viya, addhā tena amataṃ adhigataṃ bhavissatī”ti amatādhigamaṃ
atk-s0502a:353_2: pucchi. Sopissa “āmāvuso, amataṃ adhigata”nti paṭijānitvā tameva gāthaṃ abhāsi. Gāthāpariyosāne
atk-s0502a:353_3: kolito sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahitvā āha – “kuhiṃ kira, samma, amhākaṃ satthā vasatī”ti?
atk-s0502a:353_4: “Veḷuvane kira, samma, evaṃ no ācariyena assajittherena kathita”nti. “Tena hi, samma,
atk-s0502a:353_5: āyāma, satthāraṃ passissāmā”ti. Sāriputtatthero ca nāmesa sadāpi ācariyapūjakova,
atk-s0502a:353_6: tasmā sahāyaṃ evamāha – “samma, amhehi adhigataṃ amataṃ amhākaṃ ācariyassa sañcayaparibbājakassāpi
atk-s0502a:353_7: kathessāma, bujjhamāno paṭivijjhissati, appaṭivijjhanto amhākaṃ saddahitvā satthu,
atk-s0502a:353_8: santikaṃ gamissati, buddhānaṃ desanaṃ sutvā maggaphalapaṭivedhaṃ karissatī”ti. Tato
atk-s0502a:354_0: Sañcayo te disvāva – “kiṃ, tātā, koci vo amatamaggadesako laddho”ti pucchi. “Āma,
atk-s0502a:354_1: ācariya, laddho, buddho loke uppanno, dhammo loke uppanno, saṅgho loke uppanno, tumhe
atk-s0502a:354_2: tucche asāre vicaratha, tasmā etha, satthu santikaṃ gamissāmā”ti. “Gacchatha tumhe,
atk-s0502a:354_3: nāhaṃ sakkhissāmī”ti. “Kiṃ kāraṇāhi”? “Ahaṃ mahājanassa ācariyo hutvā vicariṃ, vicarantassa
atk-s0502a:354_4: me antevāsikavāso cāṭiyā udañcanabhāvappatti viya hoti, na sakkhissāmahaṃ antevāsikavāsaṃ
atk-s0502a:354_5: vasitu”nti. “Mā evaṃ karittha, ācariyā”ti. “Hotu, tātā, gacchatha tumhe, nāhaṃ sakkhissāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:354_6: Ācariya, loke buddhassa uppannakālato paṭṭhāya mahājano gandhamālādihattho gantvā
atk-s0502a:354_7: tameva pūjessati, mayampi tattheva gamissāma. “Tumhe kiṃ karissathā”ti? “Tātā, kiṃ
atk-s0502a:354_8: nu kho imasmiṃ loke dandhā bahū, udāhu paṇḍitā”ti. “Dandhā, ācariya, bahū, paṇḍitā
atk-s0502a:354_9: ca nāma katipayā eva hontī”ti. “Tena hi, tātā, paṇḍitā paṇḍitassa samaṇassa gotamassa
atk-s0502a:354_10: santikaṃ gamissanti, dandhā dandhassa mama santikaṃ āgamissanti, gacchatha tumhe,
atk-s0502a:354_11: nāhaṃ gamissāmī”ti. Te “paññāyissatha tumhe, ācariyā”ti pakkamiṃsu. Tesu gacchantesu
atk-s0502a:354_12: sañcayassa parisā bhijji, tasmiṃ khaṇe ārāmo tuccho ahosi. So tucchaṃ ārāmaṃ disvā
atk-s0502a:354_13: uṇhaṃ lohitaṃ chaḍḍesi. Tehipi saddhiṃ gacchantesu pañcasu paribbājakasatesu sañcayassa
atk-s0502a:354_14: aḍḍhateyyasatāni nivattiṃsu, atha kho te attano antevāsikehi aḍḍhateyyehi paribbājakasatehi
atk-s0502a:355_0: Satthā catuparisamajjhe nisinno dhammaṃ desento te dūratova disvā bhikkhū āmantesi
atk-s0502a:355_1: – “ete, bhikkhave, dve sahāyakā āgacchanti kolito ca upatisso ca, etaṃ me sāvakayugaṃ
atk-s0502a:355_2: bhavissati aggaṃ bhaddayuga”nti. Te satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu, nisīditvā
atk-s0502a:355_3: ca pana bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ – “labheyyāma mayaṃ, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ,
atk-s0502a:355_4: labheyyāma upasampada”nti. “Etha, bhikkhavo”ti bhagavā avoca – “svākkhāto dhammo,
atk-s0502a:355_5: caratha brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti. Sabbepi iddhimayapattacīvaradharā
atk-s0502a:356_0: Atha nesaṃ parisāya caritavasena satthā dhammadesanaṃ vaḍḍhesi. Ṭhapetvā dve aggasāvake
atk-s0502a:356_1: avasesā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu, aggasāvakānaṃ pana uparimaggattayakiccaṃ na niṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:356_2: Kiṃ kāraṇā? Sāvakapāramiñāṇassa mahantatāya. Athāyasmā mahāmoggallāno pabbajitadivasato
atk-s0502a:356_3: sattame divase magadharaṭṭhe kallavālagāmakaṃ upanissāya viharanto thinamiddhe okkamante
atk-s0502a:356_4: satthārā saṃvejito thinamiddhaṃ vinodetvā tathāgatena dinnaṃ dhātukammaṭṭhānaṃ suṇantova
atk-s0502a:356_5: uparimaggattayakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā sāvakapāramiñāṇassa matthakaṃ patto. Sāriputtattheropi
atk-s0502a:356_6: pabbajitadivasato aḍḍhamāsaṃ atikkamitvā satthārā saddhiṃ tameva rājagahaṃ upanissāya
atk-s0502a:356_7: sūkarakhataleṇe viharanto attano bhāgineyyassa dīghanakhaparibbājakassa vedanāpariggahasuttante
atk-s0502a:356_8: desiyamāne suttānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā parassa vaḍḍhitabhattaṃ paribhuñjanto viya
atk-s0502a:356_9: sāvakapāramiñāṇassa matthakaṃ patto. Nanu cāyasmā mahāpañño, atha kasmā mahāmoggallānato
atk-s0502a:356_10: ciratarena sāvakapāramiñāṇaṃ pāpuṇīti? Parikammamahantatāya. Yathā hi duggatamanussā
atk-s0502a:356_11: yattha katthaci gantukāmā khippameva nikkhamanti, rājūnaṃ pana hatthivāhanakappanādiṃ
atk-s0502a:356_12: mahantaṃ parikammaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭati, evaṃsampadamidaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0502a:357_0: Taṃ divasaññeva pana satthā vaḍḍhamānakacchāyāya veḷuvane sāvakasannipātaṃ katvā
atk-s0502a:357_1: dvinnaṃ therānaṃ aggasāvakaṭṭhānaṃ datvā pātimokkhaṃ uddisi. Bhikkhū ujjhāyiṃsu –
atk-s0502a:357_2: “satthā mukholokanena bhikkhaṃ deti, aggasāvakaṭṭhānaṃ dadantena nāma paṭhamaṃ pabbajitānaṃ
atk-s0502a:357_3: pañcavaggiyānaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭati, ete anolokentena yasatherappamukhānaṃ pañcapaṇṇāsabhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0502a:357_4: dātuṃ vaṭṭati, ete anolokentena bhaddavaggiyānaṃ tiṃsajanānaṃ, ete anolokentena uruvelakassapādīnaṃ
atk-s0502a:357_5: tebhātikānaṃ, ete pana ettake mahāthere pahāya sabbapacchā pabbajitānaṃ aggasāvakaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:357_6: dadantena mukhaṃ oloketvā dinna”nti. Satthā, “kiṃ kathetha, bhikkhave”ti pucchitvā,
atk-s0502a:357_7: “idaṃ nāmā”ti vutte “nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, mukhaṃ oloketvā bhikkhaṃ demi, etesaṃ pana
atk-s0502a:357_8: attanā attanā patthitapatthitameva demi. Aññātakoṇḍañño hi ekasmiṃ sasse nava vāre
atk-s0502a:357_9: aggasassadānaṃ dadanto aggasāvakaṭṭhānaṃ patthetvā nādāsi, aggadhammaṃ pana arahattaṃ
atk-s0502a:357_10: sabbapaṭhamaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ patthetvā adāsī”ti. “Kadā pana bhagavā”ti? “Suṇissatha,
atk-s0502a:358_0: Bhikkhave, ito ekanavutikappe vipassī nāma bhagavā loke udapādi. Tadā mahākāḷo cūḷakāḷoti
atk-s0502a:358_1: dvebhātikā kuṭumbikā mahantaṃ sālikkhettaṃ vapāpesuṃ. Athekadivasaṃ cūḷakāḷo sālikkhettaṃ
atk-s0502a:358_2: gantvā ekaṃ sāligabbhaṃ phāletvā khādi, taṃ atimadhuraṃ ahosi. So buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0502a:358_3: saṅghassa sāligabbhadānaṃ dātukāmo hutvā jeṭṭhabhātikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “bhātika,
atk-s0502a:358_4: sāligabbhaṃ phāletvā buddhānaṃ anucchavikaṃ katvā pacāpetvā dānaṃ demā”ti āha. “Kiṃ
atk-s0502a:358_5: vadesi, tāta, sāligabbhaṃ phāletvā dānaṃ nāma neva atīte bhūtapubbaṃ, na anāgatepi
atk-s0502a:358_6: bhavissati, mā sassaṃ nāsayī”ti; vuttopi so punappunaṃ yāciyeva. Atha naṃ bhātā,
atk-s0502a:358_7: “tena hi sālikkhettaṃ dve koṭṭhāse katvā mama koṭṭhāsaṃ anāmasitvā attano koṭṭhāse
atk-s0502a:358_8: khette yaṃ icchasi, taṃ karohī”ti āha. So “sādhū”ti khettaṃ vibhajitvā bahū manusse
atk-s0502a:358_9: hatthakammaṃ yācitvā sāligabbhaṃ phāletvā nirudakena khīrena pacāpetvā sappimadhusakkharādīhi
atk-s0502a:358_10: yojetvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ datvā bhattakiccapariyosāne – “idaṃ,
atk-s0502a:358_11: bhante, mama aggadānaṃ aggadhammassa sabbapaṭhamaṃ paṭivedhāya saṃvattatū”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:359_0: So khettaṃ gantvā olokento sakalakkhettaṃ kaṇṇikabaddhehi viya sālisīsehi sañchannaṃ
atk-s0502a:359_1: disvā pañcavidhapītiṃ paṭilabhitvā, “lābhā vata me”ti cintetvā puthukakāle puthukaggaṃ
atk-s0502a:359_2: nāma adāsi, gāmavāsīhi saddhiṃ aggasassadānaṃ nāma adāsi, lāyane lāyanaggaṃ, veṇikaraṇe
atk-s0502a:359_3: veṇaggaṃ, kalāpādīsu kalāpaggaṃ, khalaggaṃ, khalabhaṇḍaggaṃ, koṭṭhagganti. Evaṃ ekasasse
atk-s0502a:359_4: nava vāre aggadānaṃ adāsi. Tassa sabbavāresu gahitagahitaṭṭhānaṃ paripūri, sassaṃ
atk-s0502a:359_5: atirekaṃ uṭṭhānasampannaṃ ahosi. Dhammo hi nāmesa attānaṃ rakkhantaṃ rakkhati. Tenāha bhagavā –
atk-s0502a:364_0: “Evamesa vipassīsammāsambuddhakāle aggadhammaṃ paṭhamaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ patthento nava
atk-s0502a:364_1: vāre aggadānāni adāsi. Ito satasahassakappamatthake pana haṃsavatīnagare padumuttarasambuddhakālepi
atk-s0502a:364_2: sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā tassa bhagavato pādamūle nipajjitvā aggadhammassa paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0502a:364_3: paṭivijjhanatthameva patthanaṃ ṭhapesi. Iti iminā patthitameva mayā dinnaṃ, nāhaṃ,
atk-s0502a:365_0: “Yasakulaputtappamukhā pañcapaññāsa janā kiṃ kammaṃ kariṃsu, bhante”ti? “Etepi ekassa
atk-s0502a:365_1: buddhassa santike arahattaṃ patthentā bahuṃ puññakammaṃ katvā aparabhāge anuppanne
atk-s0502a:365_2: buddhe sahāyakā hutvā vaggabandhanena puññāni karontā anāthamatasarīrāni paṭijaggantā
atk-s0502a:365_3: vicariṃsu. Te ekadivasaṃ sagabbhaṃ itthiṃ kālakataṃ disvā, ‘jhāpessāmā’ti susānaṃ
atk-s0502a:365_4: hariṃsu. Tesu pañca jane ‘tumhe jhāpethā’ti susāne ṭhapetvā sesā gāmaṃ paviṭṭhā.
atk-s0502a:365_5: Yasadārako taṃ matasarīraṃ sūlehi vijjhitvā parivattetvā parivattetvā jhāpento asubhasaññaṃ
atk-s0502a:365_6: paṭilabhi, itaresampi catunnaṃ janānaṃ – ‘passatha, bho, imaṃ sarīraṃ tattha tattha
atk-s0502a:365_7: viddhaṃsitacammaṃ, kabaragorūpaṃ viya asuciṃ duggandhaṃ paṭikūla’nti dassesi. Tepi
atk-s0502a:365_8: tattha asubhasaññaṃ paṭilabhiṃsu. Te pañcapi janā gāmaṃ gantvā sesasahāyakānaṃ kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:365_9: Yaso pana dārako gehaṃ gantvā mātāpitūnañca bhariyāya ca kathesi. Te sabbepi asubhaṃ
atk-s0502a:365_10: bhāvayiṃsu. Idametesaṃ pubbakammaṃ. Teneva yasassa itthāgāre susānasaññā uppajji,
atk-s0502a:365_11: tāya ca upanissayasampattiyā sabbesampi visesādhigamo nibbatti. Evaṃ imepi attanā
atk-s0502a:365_12: patthitameva labhiṃsu. Nāhaṃ mukhaṃ oloketvā dammī”ti.
atk-s0502a:366_0: “Bhaddavaggiyasahāyakā pana kiṃ kammaṃ kariṃsu, bhante”ti? “Etepi pubbabuddhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:366_1: santike arahattaṃ patthetvā puññāni katvā aparabhāge anuppanne buddhe tiṃsa dhuttā
atk-s0502a:366_2: hutvā tuṇḍilovādaṃ sutvā saṭṭhivassasahassāni pañca sīlāni rakkhiṃsu. Evaṃ imepi
atk-s0502a:366_3: attanā patthitameva labhiṃsu. Nāhaṃ mukhaṃ oloketvā dammī”ti.
atk-s0502a:367_0: “Uruvelakassapādayo pana kiṃ kammaṃ kariṃsu, bhante”ti? “Tepi arahattameva patthetvā
atk-s0502a:367_1: puññāni kariṃsu. Ito hi dvenavutikappe tisso phussoti dve buddhā uppajjiṃsu. Phussabuddhassa
atk-s0502a:367_2: mahindo nāma rājā pitā ahosi. Tasmiṃ pana sambodhiṃ patte rañño kaniṭṭhaputto paṭhamaaggasāvako
atk-s0502a:367_3: purohitaputto dutiyaaggasāvako ahosi. Rājā satthu santikaṃ gantvā – ‘jeṭṭhaputto
atk-s0502a:367_4: me buddho, kaniṭṭhaputto paṭhamaaggasāvako, purohitaputto dutiyaaggasāvako’ti te
atk-s0502a:367_5: oloketvā, ‘mameva buddho, mameva dhammo, mameva saṅgho, namo tassa bhagavato arahato
atk-s0502a:367_6: sammāsambuddhassā’ti tikkhattuṃ udānaṃ udānetvā satthu pādamūle nipajjitvā, ‘bhante,
atk-s0502a:367_7: idāni me navutivassasahassaparimāṇassa āyuno koṭiyaṃ nisīditvā niddāyanakālo viya
atk-s0502a:367_8: aññesaṃ gehadvāraṃ agantvā yāvāhaṃ jīvāmi, tāva me cattāro paccaye adhivāsethā’ti
atk-s0502a:367_9: paṭiññaṃ gahetvā nibaddhaṃ buddhupaṭṭhānaṃ karoti. Rañño pana aparepi tato puttā
atk-s0502a:367_10: ahesuṃ. Tesu jeṭṭhassa pañca yodhasatāni parivārāni, majjhimassa tīṇi, kaniṭṭhassa
atk-s0502a:367_11: dve. Te ‘mayampi bhātikaṃ bhojessāmā’ti pitaraṃ okāsaṃ yācitvā alabhamānā punappunaṃ
atk-s0502a:367_12: yācantāpi alabhitvā paccante kupite tassa vūpasamanatthāya pesitā paccantaṃ vūpasametvā
atk-s0502a:367_13: pitu santikaṃ āgamiṃsu. Atha ne pitā āliṅgitvā sīse cumbitvā, ‘varaṃ vo, tātā, dammī’ti āha.
atk-s0502a:368_0: “Te ‘sādhu devā’ti varaṃ gahitakaṃ katvā puna katipāhaccayena pitarā ‘gaṇhatha, tātā,
atk-s0502a:368_1: vara’nti vuttā, “deva, amhākaṃ aññena kenaci attho natthi, ito paṭṭhāya mayaṃ bhātikaṃ
atk-s0502a:368_2: bhojessāma, imaṃ no varaṃ dehī”ti āhaṃsu. ‘Na demi, tātā’ti. ‘Niccakālaṃ adento satta
atk-s0502a:368_3: saṃvaccharāni detha, devā’ti. ‘Na demi, tātā’ti. ‘Tena hi cha pañca cattāri tīṇi
atk-s0502a:368_4: dve ekaṃ saṃvaccharaṃ detha, devā’ti. ‘Na demi, tātā’ti. ‘Tena hi, deva, satta māse
atk-s0502a:368_5: dethā’ti. ‘Cha māse pañca māse cattāro māse tayo māse detha, devā’ti. ‘Na demi, tātā’ti.
atk-s0502a:368_6: ‘Hotu, deva, ekekassa no ekekaṃ māsaṃ katvā tayo māse dethā’ti. ‘Sādhu, tātā, tena
atk-s0502a:368_7: hi tayo māse bhojethā’ti āha. Te tuṭṭhā rājānaṃ vanditvā sakaṭṭhānameva gatā. Tesaṃ
atk-s0502a:368_8: pana tiṇṇampi ekova koṭṭhāgāriko, ekova āyuttako, tassa dvādasanahutā purisaparivārā.
atk-s0502a:368_9: Te te pakkosāpetvā, ‘mayaṃ imaṃ temāsaṃ dasa sīlāni gahetvā dve kāsāvāni nivāsetvā
atk-s0502a:368_10: satthārā sahavāsaṃ vasissāma, tumhe ettakaṃ nāma dānavattaṃ gahetvā devasikaṃ navutisahassānaṃ
atk-s0502a:368_11: bhikkhūnaṃ yodhasahassassa ca sabbaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ pavatteyyātha. Mayañhi ito
atk-s0502a:369_0: “Te tayopi janā parivārasahassaṃ gahetvā dasa sīlāni samādāya kāsāyavatthāni nivāsetvā
atk-s0502a:369_1: vihāreyeva vasiṃsu. Koṭṭhāgāriko ca āyuttako ca ekato hutvā tiṇṇaṃ bhātikānaṃ koṭṭhāgārehi
atk-s0502a:369_2: vārena vārena dānavattaṃ gahetvā dānaṃ denti, kammakārānaṃ pana puttā yāgubhattādīnaṃ
atk-s0502a:369_3: atthāya rodanti. Te tesaṃ bhikkhusaṅghe anāgateyeva yāgubhattādīni denti. Bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0502a:369_4: bhattakiccāvasāne kiñci atirekaṃ na bhūtapubbaṃ. Te ‘aparabhāge dārakānaṃ demā’ti
atk-s0502a:369_5: attanāpi gahetvā khādiṃsu. Manuññaṃ āhāraṃ disvā adhivāsetuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu. Te pana
atk-s0502a:369_6: caturāsītisahassā ahesuṃ. Te saṅghassa dinnadānavattaṃ khāditvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ
atk-s0502a:369_7: maraṇā pettivisaye nibbattiṃsu. Tebhātikā pana purisasahassena saddhiṃ kālaṃ katvā
atk-s0502a:369_8: devaloke nibbattitvā devalokā manussalokaṃ, manussalokā devalokaṃ saṃsarantā dvenavutikappe
atk-s0502a:369_9: khepesuṃ. ‘Evaṃ te tayo bhātaro arahattaṃ patthentā tadā kalyāṇakammaṃ kariṃsu. Te
atk-s0502a:369_10: attanā patthitameva labhiṃsu. Nāhaṃ mukhaṃ oloketvā dammī”’ti.
atk-s0502a:370_0: Tadā pana tesaṃ āyuttako bimbisāro rājā ahosi, koṭṭhāgāriko visākho upāsako. Tayo
atk-s0502a:370_1: rājakumārā tayo jaṭilā ahesuṃ. Tesaṃ kammakārā tadā petesu nibbattitvā sugatiduggativasena
atk-s0502a:370_2: saṃsarantā imasmiṃ kappe cattāri buddhantarāni petalokeyeva nibbattiṃsu. Te imasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:370_3: kappe sabbapaṭhamaṃ uppannaṃ cattālīsavassasahassāyukaṃ kakusandhaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā,
atk-s0502a:370_4: “amhākaṃ āhāraṃ labhanakālaṃ ācikkhathā”ti pucchiṃsu. So “mama tāva kāle na labhissatha,
atk-s0502a:370_5: mama pacchato mahāpathaviyā yojanamattaṃ abhiruḷhāya koṇāgamano nāma buddho uppajjissati,
atk-s0502a:370_6: taṃ puccheyyāthā”ti āha. Te tattakaṃ kālaṃ khepetvā tasmiṃ uppanne taṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:370_7: Sopi “mama kāle na labhissatha, mama pacchato mahāpathaviyā yojanamattaṃ abhiruḷhāya
atk-s0502a:370_8: kassapo nāma buddho uppajjissati, taṃ puccheyyāthā”ti āha. Te tattakaṃ kālaṃ khepetvā
atk-s0502a:370_9: tasmiṃ uppanne taṃ pucchiṃsu. Sopi “mama kāle na labhissatha, mama pana pacchato
atk-s0502a:370_10: mahāpathaviyā yojanamattaṃ abhiruḷhāya gotamo nāma buddho uppajjissati, tadā tumhākaṃ
atk-s0502a:370_11: ñātako bimbisāro nāma rājā bhavissati, so satthu dānaṃ datvā tumhākaṃ pattiṃ pāpessati,
atk-s0502a:370_12: tadā labhissathā”ti āha. Tesaṃ ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ svedivasasadisaṃ ahosi. Te tathāgate
atk-s0502a:370_13: uppanne bimbisāraraññā paṭhamadivasaṃ dāne dinne pattiṃ alabhitvā rattibhāge bheravasaddaṃ
atk-s0502a:370_14: katvā rañño attānaṃ dassayiṃsu. So punadivase veḷuvanaṃ gantvā tathāgatassa taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:371_0: Satthā, “mahārāja, ito dvenavutikappamatthake phussabuddhakāle ete tava ñātakā, bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0502a:371_1: dinnadānavattaṃ khāditvā petaloke nibbattitvā saṃsarantā kakusandhādayo buddhe pucchitvā
atk-s0502a:371_2: tehi idañcidañca vuttā ettakaṃ kālaṃ tava dānaṃ paccāsīsamānā hiyyo tayā dāne dinne
atk-s0502a:371_3: pattiṃ alabhamānā evamakaṃsū”ti āha. “Kiṃ pana, bhante, idānipi dinne labhissantī”ti?
atk-s0502a:371_4: “Āma, mahārājā”ti. Rājā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā punadivase mahādānaṃ
atk-s0502a:371_5: datvā, “bhante, ito tesaṃ petānaṃ dibbaannapānaṃ sampajjatū”ti pattiṃ adāsi, tesaṃ
atk-s0502a:371_6: tatheva nibbatti. Punadivase naggā hutvā attānaṃ dassesuṃ. Rājā “ajja, bhante, naggā
atk-s0502a:371_7: hutvā attānaṃ dassesu”nti ārocesi. “Vatthāni te na dinnāni, mahārājā”ti. Rājāpi punadivase
atk-s0502a:371_8: buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa cīvaradānaṃ datvā, “ito tesaṃ petānaṃ dibbavatthāni
atk-s0502a:371_9: hontū”ti pāpesi. Taṅkhaṇaññeva tesaṃ dibbavatthāni uppajjiṃsu. Te petattabhāvaṃ vijahitvā
atk-s0502a:371_10: dibbattabhāve saṇṭhahiṃsu. Satthā anumodanaṃ karonto “tirokuṭṭesu tiṭṭhantī”tiādinā
atk-s0502a:371_11: tirokuṭṭānumodanaṃ akāsi. Anumodanāvasāne caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo
atk-s0502a:371_12: ahosi. Iti satthā tebhātikajaṭilānaṃ vatthuṃ kathetvā imampi dhammadesanaṃ āhari.
atk-s0502a:372_0: Aggasāvakā pana, “bhante, kiṃ kariṃsū”ti? “Aggasāvakabhāvāya patthanaṃ kariṃsu”.
atk-s0502a:372_1: Ito kappasatasahassādhikassa hi kappānaṃ asaṅkhyeyyassa matthake sāriputto brāhmaṇamahāsālakule
atk-s0502a:372_2: nibbatti, nāmena saradamāṇavo nāma ahosi. Moggallāno gahapatimahāsālakule nibbatti,
atk-s0502a:372_3: nāmena sirivaḍḍhanakuṭumbiko nāma ahosi. Te ubhopi sahapaṃsukīḷakā sahāyakā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:372_4: Tesu saradamāṇavo pitu accayena kusalantakaṃ mahādhanaṃ paṭipajjitvā ekadivasaṃ rahogato
atk-s0502a:372_5: cintesi – “ahaṃ idhalokattabhāvameva jānāmi, no paralokattabhāvaṃ. Jātasattānañca
atk-s0502a:372_6: maraṇaṃ nāma dhuvaṃ, mayā ekaṃ pabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā mokkhadhammagavesanaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:372_7: So sahāyakaṃ upasaṅkamitvā āha – “samma sirivaḍḍhana, ahaṃ pabbajitvā mokkhadhammaṃ
atk-s0502a:372_8: gavesissāmi, tvaṃ mayā saddhiṃ pabbajituṃ sakkhissasi, na sakkhissasī”ti? “Na sakkhissāmi,
atk-s0502a:372_9: samma, tvaṃyeva pabbajāhī”ti. So cintesi – “paralokaṃ gacchanto sahāye vā ñātimitte
atk-s0502a:372_10: vā gahetvā gato nāma natthi, attanā kataṃ attanova hotī”ti. Tato ratanakoṭṭhāgāraṃ
atk-s0502a:372_11: vivarāpetvā kapaṇaddhikavaṇibbakayācakānaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā pabbatapādaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0502a:372_12: isipabbajjaṃ pabbaji. Tassa eko dve tayoti evaṃ anupabbajjaṃ pabbajitā catusattatisahassamattā
atk-s0502a:372_13: jaṭilā ahesuṃ. So pañca abhiññā, aṭṭha ca samāpattiyo nibbattetvā tesaṃ jaṭilānaṃ
atk-s0502a:372_14: kasiṇaparikammaṃ ācikkhi. Tepi sabbe pañca abhiññā aṭṭha ca samāpattiyo nibbattesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:373_0: Tena samayena anomadassī nāma sammāsambuddho loke udapādi. Nagaraṃ candavatī nāma
atk-s0502a:373_1: ahosi, pitā yasavā nāma khattiyo, mātā yasodharā nāma devī, bodhi ajjunarukkho, nisabho
atk-s0502a:373_2: ca anomo ca dve aggasāvakā, varuṇo nāma upaṭṭhāko, sundarā ca sumanā ca dve aggasāvikā
atk-s0502a:373_3: ahesuṃ. Āyu vassasatasahassaṃ ahosi, sarīraṃ aṭṭhapaññāsahatthubbedhaṃ, sarīrappabhā
atk-s0502a:373_4: dvādasayojanaṃ phari, bhikkhusatasahassaparivāro ahosi. So ekadivasaṃ paccūsakāle
atk-s0502a:373_5: mahākaruṇāsamāpattito vuṭṭhāya lokaṃ volokento saradatāpasaṃ disvā, “ajja mayhaṃ
atk-s0502a:373_6: saradatāpasassaṃ santikaṃ gatapaccayena dhammadesanā ca mahatī bhavissati, so ca
atk-s0502a:373_7: aggasāvakaṭṭhānaṃ patthessati, tassa sahāyako sirivaḍḍhanakuṭumbiko dutiyasāvakaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0502a:373_8: desanāpariyosāne cassa parivārā catusattatisahassamattā jaṭilā arahattaṃ pāpuṇissanti,
atk-s0502a:373_9: mayā tattha gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti attano pattacīvaramādāya aññaṃ kañci anāmantetvā sīho
atk-s0502a:373_10: viya ekacaro hutvā saradatāpasassa antevāsikesu phalāphalatthāya gatesu “buddhabhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:373_11: me jānātū”ti adhiṭṭhahitvā passantasseva saradatāpasassa ākāsato otaritvā pathaviyaṃ
atk-s0502a:373_12: patiṭṭhāsi. Saradatāpaso buddhānubhāvañceva sarīranipphattiñcassa disvā lakkhaṇamante
atk-s0502a:373_13: sammasitvā “imehi lakkhaṇehi samannāgato nāma agāramajjhe vasanto rājā hoti cakkavattī,
atk-s0502a:373_14: pabbajanto loke vivaṭṭacchado sabbaññubuddho hoti. Ayaṃ puriso nissaṃsayaṃ buddho”ti
atk-s0502a:373_15: jānitvā paccuggamanaṃ katvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā aggāsanaṃ paññāpetvā adāsi.
atk-s0502a:373_16: Nisīdi bhagavā paññatte aggāsane. Saradatāpasopi attano anucchavikaṃ āsanaṃ gahetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:374_0: Tasmiṃ samaye catusattatisahassajaṭilā paṇītapaṇītāni ojavantāni phalāphalāni gahetvā
atk-s0502a:374_1: ācariyassa santikaṃ sampattā buddhānañceva ācariyassa ca nisinnāsanaṃ oloketvā āhaṃsu
atk-s0502a:374_2: – “ācariya, mayaṃ ‘imasmiṃ loke tumhehi mahantataro natthī’ti vicarāma, ayaṃ pana
atk-s0502a:374_3: puriso tumhehi mahantataro maññe”ti? “Tātā, kiṃ vadetha, sāsapena saddhiṃ aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyojanasatasahassubbedhaṃ
atk-s0502a:374_4: sineruṃ samaṃ kātuṃ icchatha, sabbaññubuddhena saddhiṃ mamaṃ upamaṃ mā karittha puttakā”ti.
atk-s0502a:374_5: Atha te tāpasā, “sacāyaṃ ittarasatto abhavissa, amhākaṃ ācariyo na evarūpaṃ upamaṃ
atk-s0502a:374_6: āharissa, yāva mahā vatāyaṃ puriso”ti sabbeva pādesu nipatitvā sirasā vandiṃsu. Atha
atk-s0502a:374_7: ne ācariyo āha – “tātā, amhākaṃ buddhānaṃ anucchaviko deyyadhammo natthi, satthā
atk-s0502a:374_8: ca bhikkhācāravelāyaṃ idhāgato, mayaṃ yathāsatti yathābalaṃ deyyadhammaṃ dassāma,
atk-s0502a:374_9: tumhe yaṃ yaṃ paṇītaṃ phalāphalaṃ, taṃ taṃ āharathā”ti āharāpetvā hatthe dhovitvā
atk-s0502a:374_10: sayaṃ tathāgatassa patte patiṭṭhāpesi. Satthārā phalāphale paṭiggahitamatte devatā
atk-s0502a:374_11: dibbojaṃ pakkhipiṃsu. So tāpaso udakampi sayameva parissāvetvā adāsi. Tato bhattakiccaṃ
atk-s0502a:374_12: katvā nisinne satthari sabbe antevāsike pakkositvā satthu santike sāraṇīyakathaṃ
atk-s0502a:374_13: kathento nisīdi. Satthā “dve aggasāvakā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ āgacchantū”ti cintesi.
atk-s0502a:374_14: Te satthu cittaṃ ñatvā satasahassakhīṇāsavaparivārā āgantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:375_0: Tato saradatāpaso antevāsike āmantesi – “tātā, buddhānaṃ nisinnāsanampi nīcaṃ, samaṇasatasahassānampi
atk-s0502a:375_1: āsanaṃ natthi, ajja tumhehi uḷāraṃ buddhasakkāraṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati, pabbatapādato vaṇṇagandhasampannāni
atk-s0502a:375_2: pupphāni āharathā”ti. Kathanakālo papañco viya hoti, iddhimato pana iddhivisayo acinteyyoti
atk-s0502a:375_3: muhuttamatteneva te tāpasā vaṇṇagandhasampannāni pupphāni āharitvā buddhānaṃ yojanappamāṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:375_4: pupphāsanaṃ paññāpesuṃ. Ubhinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ tigāvutaṃ, sesabhikkhūnaṃ aḍḍhayojanikādibhedaṃ,
atk-s0502a:375_5: saṅghanavakassa usabhamattaṃ ahosi. “Kathaṃ ekasmiṃ assamapade tāva mahantāni āsanāni
atk-s0502a:375_6: paññattānī”ti na cintetabbaṃ. Iddhivisayo hesa. Evaṃ paññattesu āsanesu saradatāpaso
atk-s0502a:375_7: tathāgatassa purato añjaliṃ paggayha ṭhito, “bhante, mayhaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya
atk-s0502a:375_8: imaṃ pupphāsanaṃ abhiruhathā”ti āha. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0502a:382_0: Evaṃ nisinne satthari dve aggasāvakā sesabhikkhū ca attano attano pattāsane nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:382_1: Saradatāpaso mahantaṃ pupphacchattaṃ gahetvā tathāgatassa matthake dhārento aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:382_2: Satthā “jaṭilānaṃ ayaṃ sakkāro mahapphalo hotū”ti nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajji. Satthu
atk-s0502a:382_3: samāpattiṃ samāpannabhāvaṃ ñatvā dve aggasāvakāpi sesabhikkhūpi samāpattiṃ samāpajjiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:382_4: Tathāgate sattāhaṃ nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā nisinne antevāsikā bhikkhācārakāle
atk-s0502a:382_5: sampatte vanamūlaphalāphalaṃ paribhuñjitvā sesakāle buddhānaṃ añjaliṃ paggayha tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0502a:382_6: Saradatāpaso pana bhikkhācārampi agantvā pupphacchattaṃ dhārayamānova sattāhaṃ pītisukhena
atk-s0502a:382_7: vītināmesi. Satthā nirodhato vuṭṭhāya dakkhiṇapasse nisinnaṃ paṭhamaaggasāvakaṃ nisabhattheraṃ
atk-s0502a:382_8: āmantesi – “nisabha, sakkārakārakānaṃ tāpasānaṃ pupphāsanānumodanaṃ karohī”ti. Thero
atk-s0502a:382_9: cakkavattirañño santikā paṭiladdhamahālābho mahāyodho viya tuṭṭhamānaso sāvakapāramiñāṇe
atk-s0502a:382_10: ṭhatvā pupphāsanānumodanaṃ ārabhi. Tassa desanāvasāne dutiyasāvakaṃ āmantesi – “tvampi
atk-s0502a:382_11: bhikkhu dhammaṃ desehī”ti. Anomatthero tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ sammasitvā dhammaṃ
atk-s0502a:382_12: kathesi. Dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ desanāya ekassāpi abhisamayo nāhosi. Atha satthā aparimāṇe
atk-s0502a:382_13: buddhavisaye ṭhatvā dhammadesanaṃ ārabhi. Desanāpariyosāne ṭhapetvā saradatāpasaṃ
atk-s0502a:382_14: sabbepi catusattatisahassajaṭilā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu, satthā “etha, bhikkhavo”ti
atk-s0502a:382_15: hatthaṃ pasāresi. Tesaṃ tāvadeva kesamassūni antaradhāyiṃsu, aṭṭhaparikkhārā kāye paṭimukkāva ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:383_0: Saradatāpaso “kasmā arahattaṃ na patto”ti? Vikkhittacittattā. So kira buddhānaṃ dutiyāsane
atk-s0502a:383_1: nisīditvā sāvakapāramiñāṇe ṭhatvā dhammaṃ desayato aggasāvakassa dhammadesanaṃ sotuṃ
atk-s0502a:383_2: āraddhakālato paṭṭhāya, “aho vatāhampi anāgate uppajjanakabuddhassa sāsane iminā
atk-s0502a:383_3: sāvakena paṭiladdhadhuraṃ labheyya”nti cittaṃ uppādesi. So tena parivitakkena maggaphalapaṭivedhaṃ
atk-s0502a:383_4: kātuṃ nāsakkhi. Tathāgataṃ pana vanditvā sammukhe ṭhatvā āha – “bhante, tumhākaṃ
atk-s0502a:383_5: anantarāsane nisinno bhikkhu tumhākaṃ sāsane ko nāma hotī”ti? “Mayā pavattitaṃ dhammacakkaṃ
atk-s0502a:383_6: anupavattento sāvakapāramiñāṇassa koṭippatto soḷasa paññā paṭivijjhitvā ṭhito mayhaṃ
atk-s0502a:383_7: sāsane aggasāvako nisabho nāma eso”ti. “Bhante, yvāyaṃ mayā sattāhaṃ pupphacchattaṃ
atk-s0502a:383_8: dhārentena sakkāro kato, ahaṃ imassa phalena aññaṃ sakkattaṃ vā brahmattaṃ vā na
atk-s0502a:383_9: patthemi, anāgate pana ayaṃ nisabhatthero viya ekassa buddhassa aggasāvako bhaveyya”nti
atk-s0502a:383_10: patthanaṃ akāsinti. Satthā “samajjhissati nu kho imassa purisassa patthanā”ti anāgataṃsañāṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:383_11: pesetvā olokento kappasatasahassādhikaṃ ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ atikkamitvā samijjhanabhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:383_12: addasa. Disvāna saradatāpasaṃ āha – “na te ayaṃ patthanā moghā bhavissati, anāgate
atk-s0502a:383_13: pana kappasatasahassādhikaṃ ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ atikkamitvā gotamo nāma buddho uppajjissati,
atk-s0502a:383_14: tassa mātā mahāmāyā nāma devī bhavissati, pitā suddhodano nāma mahārājā, putto rāhulo
atk-s0502a:383_15: nāma, upaṭṭhāko ānando nāma, dutiyaaggasāvako moggallāno nāma, tvaṃ panassa paṭhamaaggasāvako
atk-s0502a:383_16: dhammasenāpati sāriputto nāma bhavissasī”ti. Evaṃ tāpasaṃ byākaritvā dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0502a:384_0: Saradatāpasopi antevāsikattherānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā sahāyakassa sirivaḍḍhanakuṭumbikassa
atk-s0502a:384_1: sāsanaṃ pesesi, “bhante, mama sahāyakassa vadetha, sahāyakena te saradatāpasena anomadassībuddhassa
atk-s0502a:384_2: pādamūle anāgate uppajjanakassa gotamabuddhassa sāsane paṭhamaaggasāvakaṭṭhānaṃ patthitaṃ,
atk-s0502a:384_3: tvaṃ dutiyaaggasāvakaṭṭhānaṃ patthehī”ti. Evañca pana vatvā therehi puretarameva
atk-s0502a:384_4: ekapassena gantvā sirivaḍḍhanassa nivesanadvāre aṭṭhāsi. Sirivaḍḍhano “cirassaṃ vata
atk-s0502a:384_5: me ayyo āgato”ti āsane nisīdāpetvā attanā nīcāsane nisinno, “antevāsikaparisā pana
atk-s0502a:384_6: vo, bhante, na paññāyatī”ti pucchi. “Āma, samma, amhākaṃ assamaṃ anomadassī buddho
atk-s0502a:384_7: āgato, mayaṃ tassa attano balena sakkāraṃ akarimhā, satthā sabbesaṃ dhammaṃ desesi,
atk-s0502a:384_8: desanāpariyosāne ṭhapetvā maṃ sesā arahattaṃ patvā pabbajiṃsu. Ahaṃ satthu paṭhamaaggasāvakaṃ
atk-s0502a:384_9: nisabhattheraṃ disvā anāgate uppajjanakassa gotamabuddhassa nāma sāsane paṭhamaaggasāvakaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:384_10: patthesiṃ, tvampi tassa sāsane dutiyaaggasāvakaṭṭhānaṃ patthehī”ti. “Mayhaṃ buddhehi
atk-s0502a:384_11: saddhiṃ paricayo natthi, bhante”ti. “Buddhehi saddhiṃ kathanaṃ mayhaṃ bhāro hotu,
atk-s0502a:385_0: Sirivaḍḍhano tassa vacanaṃ sutvā attano nivesanadvāre rājamānena aṭṭhakarīsamattaṃ
atk-s0502a:385_1: ṭhānaṃ samatalaṃ kāretvā vālukaṃ okirāpetvā lājapañcamānipupphāni vikirāpetvā nīluppalacchadanaṃ
atk-s0502a:385_2: maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā buddhāsanaṃ paññāpetvā sesabhikkhūnampi āsanāni paṭiyādetvā mahantaṃ
atk-s0502a:385_3: sakkārasammānaṃ sajjetvā buddhānaṃ nimantanatthāya saradatāpasassa saññaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a:385_4: Tāpaso buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ gahetvā tassa nivesanaṃ agamāsi. Sirivaḍḍhanopi
atk-s0502a:385_5: paccuggamanaṃ katvā tathāgatassa hatthato pattaṃ gahetvā maṇḍapaṃ pavesetvā paññattāsanesu
atk-s0502a:385_6: nisinnassa buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dakkhiṇodakaṃ datvā paṇītena bhojanena
atk-s0502a:385_7: parivisitvā bhattakiccapariyosāne buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ mahārahehi vatthehi
atk-s0502a:385_8: acchādetvā, “bhante, nāyaṃ ārabbho appamattakaṭṭhānatthāya, imināva niyāmena sattāhaṃ
atk-s0502a:385_9: anukampaṃ karothā”ti āha. Satthā adhivāsesi. So teneva niyāmena sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ
atk-s0502a:385_10: pavattetvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā añjaliṃ paggayha ṭhito āha – “bhante, mama sahāyo
atk-s0502a:385_11: saradatāpaso yassa satthussa paṭhamaaggasāvako bhaveyya”nti patthesi, ahampi “tasseva
atk-s0502a:386_0: Satthā anāgataṃ oloketvā tassa patthanāya samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā byākāsi – “tvaṃ
atk-s0502a:386_1: ito kappasatasahassādhikaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ atikkamitvā gotamabuddhassa dutiyaaggasāvako
atk-s0502a:386_2: bhavissasī”ti. Buddhānaṃ byākaraṇaṃ sutvā sirivaḍḍhano haṭṭhapahaṭṭho ahosi. Satthāpi
atk-s0502a:386_3: bhattānumodanaṃ katvā saparivāro vihārameva gato. “Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, mama puttehi
atk-s0502a:386_4: tadā patthitapatthanā. Te yathāpatthitameva labhiṃsu. Nāhaṃ mukhaṃ oloketvā demī”ti.
atk-s0502a:387_0: Evaṃ vutte dve aggasāvakā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā, “bhante, mayaṃ agāriyabhūtā samānā
atk-s0502a:387_1: giraggasamajjaṃ dassanāya gatā”ti yāva assajittherassa santikā sotāpattiphalapaṭivedhā
atk-s0502a:387_2: sabbaṃ paccuppannavatthuṃ kathetvā, “te mayaṃ, bhante, ācariyassa sañcayassa santikaṃ
atk-s0502a:387_3: gantvā taṃ tumhākaṃ pādamūle ānetukāmā tassa laddhiyā nissārabhāvaṃ kathetvā idhāgamane
atk-s0502a:387_4: ānisaṃsaṃ kathayimhā. So idāni mayhaṃ antevāsikavāso nāma cāṭiyā udañcanabhāvappattisadiso,
atk-s0502a:387_5: na sakkhissāmi antevāsivāsaṃ vasitu”nti vatvā, “ācariya, idāni mahājano gandhamālādihattho
atk-s0502a:387_6: gantvā satthārameva pūjessati, tumhe kathaṃ bhavissathā”ti vutte “kiṃ pana imasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:387_7: loke paṇḍitā bahū, udāhu dandhā”ti? “Dandhā”ti kathite “tena hi paṇḍitā paṇḍitassa
atk-s0502a:387_8: samaṇassa gotamassa santikaṃ gamissanti, dandhā dandhassa mama santikaṃ āgamissanti,
atk-s0502a:387_9: gacchatha tumhe”ti vatvā “āgantuṃ na icchi, bhante”ti. Taṃ sutvā satthā, “bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a:387_10: sañcayo attano micchādiṭṭhitāya asāraṃ sāroti, sārañca asāroti gaṇhi. Tumhe pana
atk-s0502a:387_11: attano paṇḍitatāya sārañca sārato, asārañca asārato ñatvā asāraṃ pahāya sārameva
atk-s0502a:394_0: Tattha asāre sāramatinoti cattāro paccayā, dasavatthukā micchādiṭṭhi, tassā upanissayabhūtā
atk-s0502a:394_1: dhammadesanāti ayaṃ asāro nāma, tasmiṃ sāradiṭṭhinoti attho. Sāre cāsāradassinoti
atk-s0502a:394_2: dasavatthukā sammādiṭṭhi, tassā upanissayabhūtā dhammadesanāti ayaṃ sāro nāma, tasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:394_3: “nāyaṃ sāro”ti asāradassino. Te sāranti te pana taṃ micchādiṭṭhiggahaṇaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0502a:394_4: ṭhitā kāmavitakkādīnaṃ vasena micchāsaṅkappagocarā hutvā sīlasāraṃ, samādhisāraṃ,
atk-s0502a:394_6: Sārañcāti tameva sīlasārādisāraṃ “sāro nāmāya”nti, vuttappakārañca asāraṃ “asāro
atk-s0502a:394_7: aya”nti ñatvā. Te sāranti te paṇḍitā evaṃ sammādassanaṃ gahetvā ṭhitā nekkhammasaṅkappādīnaṃ
atk-s0502a:394_8: vasena sammāsaṅkappagocarā hutvā taṃ vuttappakāraṃ sāraṃ adhigacchantīti.
atk-s0502a:395: Gāthāpariyosāne bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pāpuṇiṃsu. Sannipatitānaṃ sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:398: Yathā agāranti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto āyasmantaṃ nandaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:399_0: Satthā hi pavattitavaradhammacakko rājagahaṃ gantvā veḷuvane viharanto – “puttaṃ
atk-s0502a:399_1: me ānetvā dassethā”ti suddhodanamahārājena pesitānaṃ sahassasahassaparivārānaṃ dasannaṃ
atk-s0502a:399_2: dūtānaṃ sabbapacchato gantvā arahattappattena kāḷudāyittherena gamanakālaṃ ñatvā
atk-s0502a:399_3: maggavaṇṇaṃ vaṇṇetvā vīsatisahassakhīṇāsavaparivuto kapilapuraṃ nīto ñātisamāgame
atk-s0502a:399_4: pokkharavassaṃ atthuppattiṃ katvā vessantarajātakaṃ kathetvā punadivase piṇḍāya paviṭṭho,
atk-s0502a:399_6: gāthāya mahāpajāpatiṃ sotāpattiphale, rājānañca sakadāgāmiphale patiṭṭhāpesi. Bhattakiccāvasāne
atk-s0502a:399_7: pana rāhulamātuguṇakathaṃ nissāya candakinnarījātakaṃ kathetvā tato tatiyadivase
atk-s0502a:399_9: nandakumārassa hatthe pattaṃ datvā maṅgalaṃ vatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamanto nandakumārassa
atk-s0502a:399_10: hatthato pattaṃ na gaṇhi. Sopi tathāgatagāravena “pattaṃ vo, bhante, gaṇhathā”ti
atk-s0502a:399_11: vattuṃ nāsakkhi. Evaṃ pana cintesi – “sopānasīse pattaṃ gaṇhissatī”ti. Satthā tasmimpi
atk-s0502a:399_12: ṭhāne na gaṇhi. Itaro “sopānapādamūle gaṇhissatī”ti cintesi. Satthā tatthāpi na gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a:399_13: Itaro “rājaṅgaṇe gaṇhissatī”ti cintesi. Satthā tatthāpi na gaṇhi. Kumāro nivattitukāmo
atk-s0502a:399_14: aruciyā gacchanto satthugāravena “pattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vattuṃ na sakkoti. “Idha gaṇhissati,
atk-s0502a:400_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe aññā itthiyo taṃ disvā janapadakalyāṇiyā ācikkhiṃsu – “ayye, bhagavā
atk-s0502a:400_1: nandakumāraṃ gahetvā gato, tumhehi taṃ vinā karissatī”ti. Sā udakabindūhi paggharanteheva
atk-s0502a:400_2: aḍḍhullikhitehi kesehi vegena gantvā, “tuvaṭaṃ kho, ayyaputta, āgaccheyyāsī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:400_3: Taṃ tassā vacanaṃ tassa hadaye tiriyaṃ patitvā viya ṭhitaṃ. Satthāpissa hatthato
atk-s0502a:400_4: pattaṃ aggaṇhitvāva taṃ vihāraṃ netvā, “pabbajissasi nandā”tiāha. So buddhagāravena
atk-s0502a:400_5: “na pabbajissāmī”ti avatvā, “āma, pabbajissāmī”ti āha. Satthā “tena hi nandaṃ pabbājethā”ti
atk-s0502a:400_6: āha. Satthā kapilapuraṃ gantvā tatiyadivase nandaṃ pabbājesi.
atk-s0502a:401_0: Sattame divase rāhulamātā kumāraṃ alaṅkaritvā bhagavato santikaṃ pesesi – “passa,
atk-s0502a:401_1: tāta, etaṃ vīsatisahassasamaṇaparivutaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ brahmarūpivaṇṇaṃ samaṇaṃ, ayaṃ
atk-s0502a:401_2: te pitā, etassa mahantā nidhikumbhiyo ahesuṃ. Tyāssa nikkhamanato paṭṭhāya na passāma,
atk-s0502a:401_3: gaccha naṃ dāyajjaṃ yācassu – ‘ahaṃ, tāta, kumāro, abhisekaṃ patvā cakkavattī bhavissāmi,
atk-s0502a:401_4: dhanena me attho, dhanaṃ me dehi. Sāmiko hi putto pitusantakassā”’ti. Kumāro bhagavato
atk-s0502a:401_5: santikaṃ gantvāva pitusinehaṃ paṭilabhitvā haṭṭhacitto “sukhā te, samaṇa, chāyā”ti
atk-s0502a:401_6: vatvā aññampi bahuṃ attano anurūpaṃ vadanto aṭṭhāsi. Bhagavā katabhattakicco anumodanaṃ
atk-s0502a:401_7: katvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi. Kumāropi “dāyajjaṃ me, samaṇa, dehi, dāyajjaṃ me, samaṇa,
atk-s0502a:401_8: dehī”ti bhagavantaṃ anubandhi. Bhagavāpi kumāraṃ na nivattāpesi. Parijanopi bhagavatā
atk-s0502a:401_9: saddhiṃ gacchantaṃ nivattetuṃ nāsakkhi. Iti so bhagavatā saddhiṃ ārāmameva agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:402_0: Tato bhagavā cintesi – “yaṃ ayaṃ pitusantakaṃ dhanaṃ icchati, taṃ vaṭṭānugataṃ savighātaṃ,
atk-s0502a:402_1: handassa bodhitale paṭiladdhaṃ sattavidhaṃ ariyadhanaṃ demi, lokuttaradāyajjassa
atk-s0502a:402_2: naṃ sāmikaṃ karomī”ti. Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ āmantesi – “tena hi
atk-s0502a:402_3: tvaṃ, sāriputta, rāhulakumāraṃ pabbājehī”ti. Thero kumāraṃ pabbājesi. Pabbajite ca
atk-s0502a:402_4: pana kumāre rañño adhimattaṃ dukkhaṃ uppajji. Taṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto bhagavato
atk-s0502a:402_5: nivedetvā, “sādhu, bhante, ayyā, mātāpitūhi ananuññātaṃ puttaṃ na pabbājeyyu”nti
atk-s0502a:402_6: varaṃ yāci. Bhagavā tassa taṃ varaṃ datvā punekadivasaṃ rājanivesane katapātarāso
atk-s0502a:402_7: ekamantaṃ nisinnena raññā, “bhante, tumhākaṃ dukkarakārikakāle ekā devatā maṃ upasaṅkamitvā,
atk-s0502a:402_8: ‘putto te kālakato’ti āha. Ahaṃ tassā vacanaṃ asaddahanto ‘na mayhaṃ putto bodhiṃ
atk-s0502a:402_9: appatvā kālaṃ karotī’ti paṭikkhipi”nti vutte – “idāni kiṃ saddahissatha, pubbepi
atk-s0502a:402_10: aṭṭhikāni dassetvā, ‘putto te mato’ti vutte na saddahitvā”ti imissā atthuppattiyā
atk-s0502a:402_11: mahādhammapālajātakaṃ kathesi. Gāthāpariyosāne rājā anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhahi. Iti
atk-s0502a:402_12: bhagavā pitaraṃ tīsu phalesu patiṭṭhāpetvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto punadeva rājagahaṃ
atk-s0502a:402_13: gantvā tato anāthapiṇḍikena sāvatthiṃ āgamanatthāya gahitapaṭiñño niṭṭhite jetavane
atk-s0502a:403_0: Evaṃ satthari jetavane viharante āyasmā nando ukkaṇṭhitvā bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi
atk-s0502a:403_1: – “anabhirato ahaṃ, āvuso, brahmacariyaṃ carāmi, na sakkomi brahmacariyaṃ sandhāretuṃ,
atk-s0502a:403_2: sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattissāmī”ti. Bhagavā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā āyasmantaṃ nandaṃ
atk-s0502a:403_3: pakkosāpetvā etadavoca – “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, nanda, sambahulānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ evaṃ ārocesi
atk-s0502a:403_4: – ‘anabhirato, āvuso, brahmacariyaṃ carāmi, na sakkomi brahmacariyaṃ sandhāretuṃ,
atk-s0502a:403_5: sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattissāmī”’ti? “Evaṃ, bhante”ti. “Kissa pana tvaṃ, nanda,
atk-s0502a:403_6: anabhirato brahmacariyaṃ carasi, na sakkosi brahmacariyaṃ sandhāretuṃ, sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya
atk-s0502a:403_7: hīnāyāvattissasī”ti? “Sākiyānī maṃ, bhante, janapadakalyāṇī gharā nikkhamantassa
atk-s0502a:403_8: aḍḍhullikhitehi kesehi apaloketvā maṃ etadavoca – ‘tuvaṭaṃ kho, ayyaputta, āgaccheyyāsī’ti,
atk-s0502a:403_9: so kho ahaṃ, bhante, taṃ anussaramāno anabhirato brahmacariyaṃ carāmi, na sakkomi
atk-s0502a:404_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ nandaṃ bāhāyaṃ gahetvā iddhibalena tāvatiṃsadevalokaṃ
atk-s0502a:404_1: ānento antarāmagge ekasmiṃ jhāmakkhette jhāmakhāṇuke nisinnaṃ chinnakaṇṇanāsanaṅguṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0502a:404_2: ekaṃ paluṭṭhamakkaṭiṃ dassetvā tāvatiṃsabhavane sakkassa devarañño upaṭṭhānaṃ āgatāni
atk-s0502a:404_3: kakuṭapādāni pañca accharāsatāni dassesi. Kakuṭapādānīti rattavaṇṇatāya pārevatapādasadisapādāni.
atk-s0502a:404_4: Dassetvā ca panāha – “taṃ kiṃ maññasi, nanda, katamā nu kho abhirūpatarā vā dassanīyatarā
atk-s0502a:404_5: vā pāsādikatarā vā sākiyānī vā janapadakalyāṇī, imāni vā pañca accharāsatāni kakuṭapādānī”ti?
atk-s0502a:404_6: Taṃ sutvā āha – “seyyathāpi sā, bhante, chinnakaṇṇanāsanaṅguṭṭhā paluṭṭhamakkaṭī,
atk-s0502a:404_7: evameva kho, bhante, sākiyānī janapadakalyāṇī, imesaṃ pañcannaṃ accharāsatānaṃ upanidhāya
atk-s0502a:404_8: saṅkhyampi na upeti, kalampi na upeti, kalabhāgampi na upeti. Atha kho imāneva pañca
atk-s0502a:404_9: accharāsatāni abhirūpatarāni ceva dassanīyatarāni ca pāsādikatarāni cā”ti. “Abhirama,
atk-s0502a:404_10: nanda, abhirama, nanda, ahaṃ te pāṭibhogo pañcannaṃ accharāsatānaṃ paṭilābhāya kakuṭapādāna”nti.
atk-s0502a:404_11: “Sace me, bhante bhagavā, pāṭibhogo pañcannaṃ accharāsatānaṃ paṭilābhāya kakuṭapādānaṃ,
atk-s0502a:405_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ nandaṃ gahetvā tattha antarahito jetavaneyeva pāturahosi.
atk-s0502a:405_1: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū, “āyasmā kira nando bhagavato bhātā mātucchāputto accharānaṃ
atk-s0502a:405_2: hetu brahmacariyaṃ carati. Bhagavā kirassa pāṭibhogo pañcannaṃ accharāsatānaṃ paṭilābhāya
atk-s0502a:405_3: kakuṭapādāna”nti. Atha kho āyasmato nandassa sahāyakā bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ nandaṃ bhatakavādena
atk-s0502a:405_4: ca upakkitakavādena ca samudācaranti, “bhatako kirāyasmā nando, upakkitako kirāyasmā
atk-s0502a:405_5: nando, accharānaṃ hetu brahmacariyaṃ carati. Bhagavā kirassa pāṭibhogo pañcannaṃ
atk-s0502a:405_6: accharāsatānaṃ paṭilābhāya kakuṭapādāna”nti. Atha kho āyasmā nando sahāyakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0502a:405_7: bhatakavādena ca upakkitakavādena ca aṭṭiyamāno harāyamāno jigucchamāno eko vūpakaṭṭho
atk-s0502a:405_8: appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto na cirasseva yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva
atk-s0502a:405_9: agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṃ brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme
atk-s0502a:405_10: sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi, “khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ,
atk-s0502a:405_11: kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi. Aññataro ca kho panāyasmā nando arahataṃ ahosi.
atk-s0502a:406_0: Athekā devatā rattibhāge sakalaṃ jetavanaṃ obhāsetvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā
atk-s0502a:406_1: ārocesi – “āyasmā, bhante, nando bhagavato bhātā mātucchāputto āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ
atk-s0502a:406_2: cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja
atk-s0502a:406_3: viharatī”ti. Bhagavatopi kho ñāṇaṃ udapādi “nando āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ
atk-s0502a:406_4: paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:406_5: Sopāyasmā nando tassā rattiyā accayena bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā etadavoca
atk-s0502a:406_6: – “yaṃ me, bhante, bhagavā pāṭibhogo pañcannaṃ accharāsatānaṃ paṭilābhāya kakuṭapādānaṃ,
atk-s0502a:406_7: muñcāmahaṃ, bhante, bhagavantaṃ etasmā paṭissavā”ti. “Mayāpi kho te, nanda, cetasā
atk-s0502a:406_8: ceto paricca vidito ‘nando āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva
atk-s0502a:406_9: dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī’ti. Devatāpi me etamatthaṃ
atk-s0502a:406_10: ārocesi – ‘āyasmā, bhante, nando āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ
atk-s0502a:406_11: diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī’ti. Yadeva kho te,
atk-s0502a:406_12: nanda, anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuttaṃ, athāhaṃ mutto etasmā paṭissavā”ti. Atha
atk-s0502a:406_13: kho bhagavā etamatthaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi –
atk-s0502a:408: Mohakkhayaṃ anuppatto, sukhadukkhesu na vedhatī sa bhikkhū”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:409_0: Athekadivasaṃ bhikkhū taṃ āyasmantaṃ nandaṃ pucchiṃsu – “āvuso nanda, pubbe tvaṃ
atk-s0502a:409_1: ‘ukkaṇṭhitomī’ti vadesi, idāni te katha”nti? “Natthi me, āvuso, gihibhāvāya ālayo”ti.
atk-s0502a:409_2: Taṃ sutvā bhikkhū – “abhūtaṃ āyasmā nando katheti, aññaṃ byākaroti, atītadivasesu
atk-s0502a:409_3: ‘ukkaṇṭhitomhī’ti vatvā idāni ‘natthi me gihibhāvāya ālayo’ti kathetī”ti gantvā bhagavato
atk-s0502a:409_4: etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Bhagavā “bhikkhave, atītadivasesu nandassa attabhāvo ducchannagehasadiso
atk-s0502a:409_5: ahosi, idāni succhannagehasadiso jāto. Ayañhi dibbaccharānaṃ diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0502a:409_6: pabbajitakiccassa matthakaṃ pāpetuṃ vāyamanto taṃ kiccaṃ patto”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:415: Evaṃ subhāvitaṃ cittaṃ, rāgo na samativijjhatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:416_0: Tattha agāranti yaṃkiñci gehaṃ. Ducchannanti viraḷacchannaṃ chiddāvachiddaṃ. Samativijjhatīti
atk-s0502a:416_1: vassavuṭṭhi vinivijjhati. Abhāvitanti taṃ agāraṃ vuṭṭhi viya bhāvanāya rahitattā
atk-s0502a:416_2: abhāvitaṃ cittaṃ rāgo samati vijjhati. Na kevalaṃ rāgova, dosamohamānādayo sabbakilesā
atk-s0502a:416_3: tathārūpaṃ cittaṃ ativiya vijjhantiyeva. Subhāvitanti samathavipassanābhāvanāhi subhāvitaṃ.
atk-s0502a:416_4: Evarūpaṃ cittaṃ succhannaṃ gehaṃ vuṭṭhi viya rāgādayo kilesā ativijjhituṃ na sakkontīti.
atk-s0502a:417: Gāthāpariyosāne bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pāpuṇiṃsu. Mahājanassa desanā sātthikā ahosi.
atk-s0502a:418_0: Atha kho bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ, “āvuso, buddhā nāma acchariyā,
atk-s0502a:418_1: janapadakalyāṇiṃ nissāya ukkaṇṭhito nāmāyasmā nando satthārā devaccharā āmisaṃ katvā
atk-s0502a:418_2: vinīto”ti. Satthā āgantvā – “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti
atk-s0502a:418_3: pucchitvā, “imāya nāmā”ti vutte, “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepesa mayā mātugāmena
atk-s0502a:419_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bārāṇasivāsī kappaṭo nāma vāṇijo ahosi.
atk-s0502a:419_1: Tasseko gadrabho kumbhabhāraṃ vahati, ekadivasena satta yojanāni gacchati. So ekasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:419_2: samaye gadrabhabhārakehi saddhiṃ takkasilaṃ gantvā yāva bhaṇḍassa vissajjanaṃ, tāva
atk-s0502a:419_3: gadrabhaṃ carituṃ vissajjesi. Athassa so gadrabho parikhāpiṭṭhe caramāno ekaṃ gadrabhiṃ
atk-s0502a:419_4: disvā upasaṅkami. Sā tena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ karontī āha – “kuto āgatosī”ti? “Bārāṇasito”ti.
atk-s0502a:419_6: “Ettakaṃ bhāraṃ vahanto kati yojanāni gacchasī”ti? “Satta yojanānī”ti. “Gatagataṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a:419_7: te kāci pādaparikammapiṭṭhiparikammakarā atthī”ti? “Natthī”ti. “Evaṃ sante mahādukkhaṃ
atk-s0502a:419_8: nāma anubhosī”ti? “Kiñcāpi hi tiracchānagatānaṃ pādaparikammādikārakā nāma natthi,
atk-s0502a:419_9: kāmasaṃyojanaghaṭṭanatthāya pana evarūpaṃ kathaṃ kathesi”? So tassā kathāya ukkaṇṭhi.
atk-s0502a:419_10: Kappaṭopi bhaṇḍaṃ vissajjetvā tassa santikaṃ āgantvā – “ehi, tāta, gamissāmā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:419_11: “Gacchatha tumhe, nāhaṃ gamissāmī”ti. Atha naṃ punappunaṃ yācitvā, “anicchantaṃ paribhāsetvā
atk-s0502a:421: Sañchindissāmi te kāyaṃ, evaṃ jānāhi gadrabhā”ti.
atk-s0502a:422: Taṃ sutvā gadrabho “evaṃ sante ahampi te kattabbaṃ jānissāmī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:425: Dantaṃ te pātayissāmi, evaṃ jānāhi kappaṭā”ti.
atk-s0502a:426_0: Taṃ sutvā vāṇijo – “kena nu kho kāraṇena esa evaṃ vadatī”ti cintetvā, ito cito ca
atk-s0502a:426_1: olokento taṃ gadrabhiṃ disvā, “imāyesa evaṃ sikkhāpito bhavissati, ‘evarūpiṃ nāma
atk-s0502a:426_2: te gadrabhiṃ ānessāmī’ti mātugāmena naṃ palobhetvā nessāmī”ti imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:428: Bhariyaṃ te ānayissāmi, evaṃ jānāhi gadrabhā”ti.
atk-s0502a:429: Taṃ sutvā tuṭṭhacitto gadrabho imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:431: Bhariyaṃ me ānayissasi, evaṃ jānāhi kappaṭa;
atk-s0502a:433_0: Atha naṃ kappaṭo, “tena hi ehī”ti gahetvā sakaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi. So katipāhaccayena
atk-s0502a:433_1: naṃ āha – “nanu maṃ tumhe ‘bhariyaṃ te ānayissāmī’ti avocutthā”ti? “Āma, vuttaṃ,
atk-s0502a:433_2: nāhaṃ attano kathaṃ bhindissāmi, bhariyaṃ te ānessāmi, vetanaṃ pana tuyhaṃ ekakasseva
atk-s0502a:433_3: dassāmi, tuyhaṃ vetanaṃ dutiyassa pahotu vā mā vā, tvameva jāneyyāsi. Ubhinnaṃ pana
atk-s0502a:433_4: vo saṃvāsamanvāya puttā vijāyissanti, tehipi bahūhi saddhiṃ tuyhaṃ taṃ pahotu vā
atk-s0502a:433_5: mā vā, tvameva jāneyyāsī”ti. Gadrabho tasmiṃ kathenteyeva anapekkho ahosi.
atk-s0502a:434_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā, “tadā, bhikkhave, gadrabhī janapadakalyāṇī ahosi,
atk-s0502a:434_1: gadrabho nando, vāṇijo ahameva. Evaṃ pubbepesa mayā mātugāmena palobhetvā vinīto”ti
atk-s0502a:437: Idha socetīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto cundasūkarikaṃ nāma purisaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:438_0: So kira pañcapaṇṇāsa vassāni sūkare vadhitvā khādanto ca vikkiṇanto ca jīvikaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0502a:438_1: Chātakāle sakaṭena vīhiṃ ādāya janapadaṃ gantvā ekanāḷidvenāḷimattena gāmasūkarapotake
atk-s0502a:438_2: kiṇitvā sakaṭaṃ pūretvā āgantvā pacchānivesane vajaṃ viya ekaṃ ṭhānaṃ parikkhipitvā
atk-s0502a:438_3: tattheva tesaṃ nivāpaṃ ropetvā, tesu nānāgacche ca sarīramalañca khāditvā vaḍḍhitesu
atk-s0502a:438_4: yaṃ yaṃ māretukāmo hoti, taṃ taṃ āḷāne niccalaṃ bandhitvā sarīramaṃsassa uddhumāyitvā
atk-s0502a:438_5: bahalabhāvatthaṃ caturassamuggarena pothetvā, “bahalamaṃso jāto”ti ñatvā mukhaṃ vivaritvā
atk-s0502a:438_6: antare daṇḍakaṃ datvā lohathāliyā pakkuthitaṃ uṇhodakaṃ mukhe āsiñcati. Taṃ kucchiṃ
atk-s0502a:438_7: pavisitvā pakkuthitaṃ karīsaṃ ādāya adhobhāgena nikkhamati, yāva thokampi karīsaṃ
atk-s0502a:438_8: atthi, tāva āvilaṃ hutvā nikkhamati, suddhe udare acchaṃ anāvilaṃ hutvā nikkhamati.
atk-s0502a:438_9: Athassa avasesaṃ udakaṃ piṭṭhiyaṃ āsiñcati. Taṃ kāḷacammaṃ uppāṭetvā gacchati. Tato
atk-s0502a:438_10: tiṇukkāya lomāni jhāpetvā tikhiṇena asinā sīsaṃ chindati. Paggharaṇataṃ lohitaṃ bhājanena
atk-s0502a:438_11: paṭiggahetvā maṃsaṃ lohitena madditvā pacitvā puttadāramajjhe nisinno khāditvā sesaṃ
atk-s0502a:438_12: vikkiṇāti. Tassa imināva niyāmena jīvikaṃ kappentassa pañcapaṇṇāsa vassāni atikkantāni.
atk-s0502a:438_13: Tathāgate dhuravihāre vasante ekadivasampi pupphamuṭṭhimattena pūjā vā kaṭacchumattaṃ
atk-s0502a:438_14: bhikkhadānaṃ vā aññaṃ vā kiñci puññaṃ nāma nāhosi. Athassa sarīre rogo uppajji, jīvantasseva
atk-s0502a:438_15: avīcimahānirayasantāpo upaṭṭhahi. Avīcisantāpo nāma yojanasate ṭhatvā olokentassa
atk-s0502a:438_16: akkhīnaṃ bhijjanasamattho pariḷāho hoti. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-s0502a:441_0: Nāgasenattherena panassa pākatikaggisantāpato adhimattatāya ayaṃ upamā vuttā – “yathā,
atk-s0502a:441_1: mahārāja, kūṭāgāramatto pāsāṇopi nerayikaggimhi pakkhitto khaṇena vilayaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0502a:441_2: nibbattasattā panettha kammabalena mātukucchigatā viya na vilīyantī”ti. Tassa tasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:441_3: santāpe upaṭṭhite kammasarikkhako ākāro uppajji. Gehamajjheyeva sūkararavaṃ ravitvā
