atk-s0502a:441_4: jaṇṇukehi vicaranto puratthimavatthumpi pacchimavatthumpi gacchati. Athassa gehamānusakā
atk-s0502a:441_5: taṃ daḷhaṃ gahetvā mukhaṃ pidahanti. Kammavipāko nāma na sakkā kenaci paṭibāhituṃ.
atk-s0502a:441_6: So viravantova ito cito ca vicarati. Samantā sattasu gharesu manussā niddaṃ na labhanti.
atk-s0502a:441_7: Maraṇabhayena tajjitassa pana bahinikkhamanaṃ nivāretuṃ asakkonto sabbo gehajano
atk-s0502a:441_8: yathā antoṭhito bahi vicarituṃ na sakkoti, tathā gehadvārāni thaketvā bahigehaṃ parivāretvā
atk-s0502a:441_9: rakkhanto acchati. Itaro antogeheyeva nirayasantāpena viravanto ito cito ca vicarati.
atk-s0502a:441_10: Evaṃ sattadivasāni vicaritvā aṭṭhame divase kālaṃ katvā avīcimahāniraye nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:442_0: Bhikkhū tassa gharadvārena gacchantā taṃ saddaṃ sutvā, “sūkarasaddo”ti saññino hutvā
atk-s0502a:442_1: vihāraṃ gantvā satthu santike nisinnā evamāhaṃsu – “bhante, cundasūkaritassa gehadvāraṃ
atk-s0502a:442_2: pidahitvā sūkarānaṃ māriyamānānaṃ ajja sattamo divaso, gehe kāci maṅgalakiriyā bhavissati
atk-s0502a:442_3: maññe. Ettake nāma, bhante, sūkare mārentassa ekampi mettacittaṃ vā kāruññaṃ vā natthi,
atk-s0502a:442_4: na vata no evarūpo kakkhaḷo pharuso satto diṭṭhapubbo”ti. Satthā – “na, bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a:442_5: so ime sattadivase sūkare māreti, kammasarikkhakaṃ panassa vipākaṃ udapādi, jīvantasseva
atk-s0502a:442_6: avīcimahānirayasantāpo upaṭṭhāsi. So tena santāpena satta divasāni sūkararavaṃ ravanto
atk-s0502a:442_7: antonivesane vicaritvā ajja kālaṃ katvā avīcimhi nibbatto”ti vatvā, “bhante, idha
atk-s0502a:442_8: loke evaṃ socitvā puna gantvā socanaṭṭhāneyeva nibbatto”ti vutte, “āma, bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a:442_9: pamattā nāma gahaṭṭhā vā hontu pabbajitā vā, ubhayattha socantiyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:448_0: Tattha pāpakārīti nānappakārassa pāpakammassa kārako puggalo “akataṃ vata me kalyāṇaṃ,
atk-s0502a:448_1: kataṃ pāpa”nti ekaṃseneva maraṇasamaye idha socati, idamassa kammasocanaṃ. Vipākaṃ
atk-s0502a:448_2: anubhavanto pana pecca socati. Idamassa paraloke vipākasocanaṃ. Evaṃ so ubhayattha
atk-s0502a:448_3: socatiyeva. Teneva kāraṇena jīvamānoyeva so cundasūkarikopi socati. Disvā kammakiliṭṭhanti
atk-s0502a:448_4: attano kiliṭṭhakammaṃ passitvā nānappakārakaṃ vilapanto vihaññatīti.
atk-s0502a:449: Gāthāpariyosāne bahū sotāpannādayo ahesuṃ. Mahājanassa sātthikā dhammadesanā jātāti.
atk-s0502a:452: Idha modatīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto dhammikaupāsakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:453_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira pañcasatā dhammikaupāsakā nāma ahesuṃ. Tesu ekekassa pañca pañca
atk-s0502a:453_1: upāsakasatāni parivārā. Yo tesaṃ jeṭṭhako, tassa satta puttā satta dhītaro. Tesu
atk-s0502a:453_2: ekekassa ekekā salākayāgu salākabhattaṃ pakkhikabhattaṃ nimantanabhattaṃ uposathikabhattaṃ
atk-s0502a:453_3: āgantukabhattaṃ saṅghabhattaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ ahosi. Tepi sabbeva anujātaputtā nāma
atk-s0502a:453_4: ahesuṃ. Iti cuddasannaṃ puttānaṃ bhariyāya upāsakassāti soḷasa salākayāguādīni pavattanti.
atk-s0502a:453_5: Iti so saputtadāro sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo dānasaṃvibhāgarato ahosi. Athassa aparabhāge
atk-s0502a:453_6: rogo uppajji, āyusaṅkhāro parihāyi. So dhammaṃ sotukāmo “aṭṭha vā me soḷasa vā bhikkhū
atk-s0502a:453_7: pesethā”ti satthu santikaṃ pahiṇi. Satthā pesesi. Te gantvā tassa mañcaṃ parivāretvā
atk-s0502a:453_8: paññattesu āsanesu nisinnā. “Bhante, ayyānaṃ me dassanaṃ dullabhaṃ bhavissati, dubbalomhi,
atk-s0502a:453_9: ekaṃ me suttaṃ sajjhāyathā”ti vutte “kataraṃ suttaṃ sotukāmo upāsakā”ti? “Sabbabuddhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:453_10: avijahitaṃ satipaṭṭhānasutta”nti vutte – “ekāyano ayaṃ, bhikkhave, maggo sattānaṃ
atk-s0502a:453_11: visuddhiyā”ti suttantaṃ paṭṭhapesuṃ. Tasmiṃ khaṇe chahi devalokehi sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitā
atk-s0502a:453_12: sahassasindhavayuttā diyaḍḍhayojanasatikā cha rathā āgamiṃsu. Tesu ṭhitā devatā “amhākaṃ
atk-s0502a:453_13: devalokaṃ nessāma, amhākaṃ devalokaṃ nessāma, ambho mattikabhājanaṃ bhinditvā suvaṇṇabhājanaṃ
atk-s0502a:453_14: gaṇhanto viya amhākaṃ devaloke abhiramituṃ idha nibbattāhi, amhākaṃ devaloke abhiramituṃ
atk-s0502a:453_15: idha nibbattāhī”ti vadiṃsu. Upāsako dhammassavanantarāyaṃ anicchanto – “āgametha
atk-s0502a:453_16: āgamethā”ti āha. Bhikkhū “amhe vāretī”ti saññāya tuṇhī ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:454_0: Athassa puttadhītaro “amhākaṃ pitā pubbe dhammassavanena atitto ahosi, idāni pana
atk-s0502a:454_1: bhikkhū pakkosāpetvā sajjhāyaṃ kāretvā sayameva vāreti, maraṇassa abhāyanakasatto
atk-s0502a:454_2: nāma natthī”ti viraviṃsu. Bhikkhū “idāni anokāso”ti uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamiṃsu. Upāsako
atk-s0502a:454_3: thokaṃ vītināmetvā satiṃ paṭilabhitvā putte pucchi – “kasmā kandathā”ti? “Tāta, tumhe
atk-s0502a:454_4: bhikkhū pakkosāpetvā dhammaṃ suṇantā sayameva vārayittha, atha mayaṃ ‘maraṇassa abhāyanakasatto
atk-s0502a:454_5: nāma natthī’ti kandimhā”ti. “Ayyā pana kuhi”nti? “‘Anokāso’ti uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkantā,
atk-s0502a:454_6: tātā”ti. “Nāhaṃ, ayyehi saddhiṃ kathemī”ti vutte “atha kena saddhiṃ kathethā”ti.
atk-s0502a:454_7: “Chahi devalokehi devatā cha rathe alaṅkaritvā ādāya ākāse ṭhatvā ‘amhāhi devaloke
atk-s0502a:454_8: abhirama, amhākaṃ devaloke abhiramā’ti saddaṃ karonti, tāhi saddhiṃ kathemī”ti. “Kuhiṃ,
atk-s0502a:454_9: tāta, rathā, na mayaṃ passāmā”ti? “Atthi pana mayhaṃ ganthitāni pupphānī”ti? “Atthi,
atk-s0502a:454_11: tusitabhavanaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ, tātā”ti. “Tena hi ‘tusitabhavanato āgatarathe laggatū’ti
atk-s0502a:454_12: pupphadāmaṃ khipathā”ti. Te khipiṃsu. Taṃ rathadhure laggitvā ākāse olambi. Mahājano
atk-s0502a:454_13: tadeva passati, rathaṃ na passati. Upāsako “passathetaṃ pupphadāma”nti vatvā, “āma,
atk-s0502a:454_14: passāmā”ti vutte – “etaṃ tusitabhavanato āgatarathe olambati, ahaṃ tusitabhavanaṃ
atk-s0502a:454_15: gacchāmi, tumhe mā cintayittha, mama santike nibbattitukāmā hutvā mayā kataniyāmeneva
atk-s0502a:454_16: puññāni karothā”ti vatvā kālaṃ katvā rathe patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:455_1: accharāsahassaṃ parivāresi, pañcavīsatiyojanikaṃ kanakavimānaṃ pāturahosi. Tepi bhikkhū
atk-s0502a:455_2: vihāraṃ anuppatte satthā pucchi – “sutā, bhikkhave, upāsakena dhammadesanā”ti? “Āma,
atk-s0502a:455_3: bhante, antarāyeva pana ‘āgamethā’ti vāresi. Athassa puttadhītaro kandiṃsu. Mayaṃ
atk-s0502a:455_4: ‘idāni anokāso’ti uṭṭhāyāsanā nikkhantā”ti. “Na so, bhikkhave, tumhehi saddhiṃ kathesi,
atk-s0502a:455_5: chahi devalokehi devatā cha rathe alaṅkaritvā āharitvā taṃ upāsakaṃ pakkosiṃsu. So
atk-s0502a:455_6: dhammadesanāya antarāyaṃ anicchanto tāhi saddhiṃ kathesī”ti. “Evaṃ, bhante”ti. “Evaṃ,
atk-s0502a:455_8: idha ñātimajjhe modamāno vicaritvā idāneva gantvā puna modanaṭṭhāneyeva nibbatto”ti.
atk-s0502a:455_9: “Āma, bhikkhave, appamattā hi gahaṭṭhā vā pabbajitā vā sabbattha modantiyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:461_0: Tattha katapuññoti nānappakārassa kusalassa kārako puggalo “akataṃ vata me pāpaṃ,
atk-s0502a:461_1: kataṃ me kalyāṇa”nti idha kammamodanena, pecca vipākamodanena modati. Evaṃ ubhayattha
atk-s0502a:461_2: modati nāma. Kammavisuddhinti dhammikaupāsakopi attano kammavisuddhiṃ puññakammasampattiṃ
atk-s0502a:461_3: disvā kālakiriyato pubbe idhalokepi modati, kālaṃ katvā idāni paralokepi atimodatiyevāti.
atk-s0502a:462: Gāthāpariyosāne bahū sotāpannādayo ahesuṃ mahājanassa sātthikā dhammadesanā jātāti.
atk-s0502a:465: Idha tappatīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto devadattaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:466_0: Devadattassa vatthu pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya yāva pathavippavesanā devadattaṃ ārabbha
atk-s0502a:466_1: bhāsitāni sabbāni jātakāni vitthāretvā kathitaṃ. Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepo – satthari
atk-s0502a:466_2: anupiyaṃ nāma mallānaṃ nigamo atthi. Taṃ nissāya anupiyambavane viharanteyeva tathāgatassa
atk-s0502a:466_3: lakkhaṇapaṭiggahaṇadivaseyeva asītisahassehi ñātikulehi “rājā vā hotu, buddho vā,
atk-s0502a:466_4: khattiyaparivārova vicarissatī”ti asītisahassaputtā paṭiññātā. Tesu yebhuyyena pabbajitesu
atk-s0502a:466_5: bhaddiyaṃ nāma rājānaṃ, anuruddhaṃ, ānandaṃ, bhaguṃ, kimilaṃ, devadattanti ime cha
atk-s0502a:466_6: sakye apabbajante disvā, “mayaṃ attano putte pabbājema, ime cha sakyā na ñātakā maññe,
atk-s0502a:466_7: kasmā na pabbajantī”ti? Kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ. Atha kho mahānāmo sakyo anuruddhaṃ
atk-s0502a:466_8: upasaṅkamitvā, “tāta, amhākaṃ kulā pabbajito natthi, tvaṃ vā pabbaja, ahaṃ vā pabbajissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:466_9: āha. So pana sukhumālo hoti sampannabhogo, “natthī”ti vacanampi tena na sutapubbaṃ.
atk-s0502a:466_10: Ekadivasañhi tesu chasu khattiyesu guḷakīḷaṃ kīḷantesu anuruddho pūvena parājito
atk-s0502a:466_11: pūvatthāya pahiṇi, athassa mātā pūve sajjetvā pahiṇi. Te khāditvā puna kīḷiṃsu. Punappunaṃ
atk-s0502a:466_12: tasseva parājayo hoti. Mātā panassa pahite pahite tikkhattuṃ pūve pahiṇitvā catutthavāre
atk-s0502a:466_13: “pūvā natthī”ti pahiṇi. So “natthī”ti vacanassa asukapubbattā “esāpekā pūvavikati
atk-s0502a:466_14: bhavissatī”ti maññamāno “natthipūvaṃ me āharathā”ti pesesi. Mātā panassa “natthipūvaṃ
atk-s0502a:466_15: kira, ayye, dethā”ti vutte, “mama puttena ‘natthī’ti padaṃ na sutapubbaṃ, iminā pana
atk-s0502a:466_16: upāyena naṃ etamatthaṃ jānāpessāmī”ti tucchaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ aññāya suvaṇṇapātiyā paṭikujjitvā
atk-s0502a:466_17: pesesi. Nagarapariggāhikā devatā cintesuṃ – “anuruddhasakyena annabhārakāle attano
atk-s0502a:466_18: bhāgabhattaṃ upariṭṭhapaccekabuddhassa datvā “‘natthī’ti me vacanassa savanaṃ mā
atk-s0502a:466_19: hotu, bhojanuppattiṭṭhānajānanaṃ mā ‘hotū’ti patthanā katā, sacāyaṃ tucchapātiṃ passissati,
atk-s0502a:466_20: devasamāgamaṃ pavisituṃ na labhissāma, sīsampi no sattadhā phaleyyā”ti. Atha naṃ
atk-s0502a:466_21: pātiṃ dibbapūvehi puṇṇaṃ akaṃsu. Kassā guḷamaṇḍale ṭhapetvā ugghāṭitamattāya pūvagandho
atk-s0502a:466_22: sakalanagare chādetvā ṭhito. Pūvakhaṇḍaṃ mukhe ṭhapitamattameva sattarasaharaṇīsahassāni anuphari.
atk-s0502a:467_0: So cintesi – “nāhaṃ mātu piyo, ettakaṃ me kālaṃ imaṃ natthipūvaṃ nāma na paci, ito
atk-s0502a:467_1: paṭṭhāya aññaṃ pūvaṃ nāma na khādissāmī”ti, so gehaṃ gantvāva mātaraṃ pucchi – “amma,
atk-s0502a:467_2: tumhākaṃ ahaṃ piyo, appiyo”ti? “Tāta, ekakkhino akkhi viya ca hadayaṃ viya ca ativiya
atk-s0502a:467_3: piyo me ahosī”ti. “Atha kasmā ettakaṃ kālaṃ mayhaṃ natthi pūvaṃ na pacittha, ammā”ti?
atk-s0502a:467_4: Sā cūḷūpaṭṭhākaṃ pucchi – “atthi kiñci pātiyaṃ, tātā”ti? “Paripuṇṇā, ayye, pāti pūvehi,
atk-s0502a:467_5: evarūpā pūvā nāma me na diṭṭhapubbā”ti ārocesi. Sā cintesi – “mayhaṃ putto puññavā
atk-s0502a:467_6: katābhinīhāro bhavissati, devatāhi pātiṃ pūretvā pūvā pahitā bhavissantī”ti. “Atha
atk-s0502a:467_7: naṃ putto, amma, ito paṭṭhāyāhaṃ aññaṃ pūvaṃ nāma na khādissāmi, natthipūvameva paceyyāsī”ti.
atk-s0502a:467_8: Sāpissa tato paṭṭhāya “pūvaṃ khāditukāmomhī”ti vutte tucchapātimeva aññāya pātiyā
atk-s0502a:467_9: paṭikucchitvā pesesi. Yāva agāramajjhe vasi, tāvassa devatāva pūve pahiṇiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:468_0: So ettakampi ajānanto pabbajjaṃ nāma kiṃ jānissati? Tasmā “kā esā pabbajjā nāmā”ti
atk-s0502a:468_1: bhātaraṃ pucchitvā “ohāritakesamassunā kāsāyanivatthena kaṭṭhattharake vā bidalamañcake
atk-s0502a:468_2: vā nipajjitvā piṇḍāya carantena viharitabbaṃ. Esā pabbajjā nāmā”ti vutte, “bhātika,
atk-s0502a:468_3: ahaṃ sukhumālo. Nāhaṃ sakkhissāmi pabbajitu”nti āha. “Tena hi, tāta, kammantaṃ uggahetvā
atk-s0502a:468_4: gharāvāsaṃ vasa. Na hi sakkā amhesu ekena apabbajitu”nti. Atha naṃ “ko esa kammanto
atk-s0502a:468_5: nāmā”ti pucchi. “Bhattuṭṭhānaṭṭhānampi ajānanto kulaputto kammantaṃ nāma kiṃ jānissatī”ti?
atk-s0502a:468_6: Ekadivasañhi tiṇṇaṃ khattiyānaṃ kathā udapādi – “bhattaṃ nāma kuhiṃ uṭṭhahatī”ti?
atk-s0502a:468_7: Kimilo āha – “koṭṭhe uṭṭhahatī”ti. Atha naṃ bhaddiyo “tvaṃ bhattassa uṭṭhānaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:468_8: na jānāsi, bhattaṃ nāma ukkhaliyaṃ uṭṭhahatī”ti āha. Anuruddho “tumhe dvepi na jānātha,
atk-s0502a:468_9: bhattaṃ nāma ratanamakuḷāya suvaṇṇapātiyaṃ uṭṭhahatī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:469_0: Tesu kira ekadivasaṃ kimilo koṭṭhato vīhī otāriyamāne disvā, “ete koṭṭheyeva jātā”ti
atk-s0502a:469_1: saññī ahosi. Bhaddiyo ekadivasaṃ ukkhalito bhattaṃ vaḍḍhiyamānaṃ disvā “ukkhaliyaññeva
atk-s0502a:469_2: uppanna”nti saññī ahosi. Anuruddhena pana neva vīhī koṭṭentā, na bhattaṃ pacantā,
atk-s0502a:469_3: na vaḍḍhentā diṭṭhapubbā, vaḍḍhetvā pana purato ṭhapitameva passati. So bhuñjitukāmakāle
atk-s0502a:469_4: “bhattaṃ pātiyaṃ uṭṭhahatī”ti saññamakāsi. Evaṃ tayopi te bhattuṭṭhānaṭṭhānaṃ na
atk-s0502a:469_5: jānanti. Tenāyaṃ “ko esa kammanto nāmā”ti pucchitvā, “paṭhamaṃ khettaṃ kasāpetabba”ntiādikaṃ
atk-s0502a:469_6: saṃvacchare saṃvacchare kattabbaṃ kiccaṃ sutvā, “kadā kammantānaṃ anto paññāyissati,
atk-s0502a:469_7: kadā mayaṃ appossukkā bhoge bhuñjissāmā”ti vatvā kammantānaṃ apariyantatāya akkhātāya
atk-s0502a:469_8: “tena hi tvaññeva gharāvāsaṃ vasa, na mayhaṃ etenattho”ti mātaraṃ upasaṅkamitvā,
atk-s0502a:469_9: “anujānāhi maṃ, amma, pabbajissāmī”ti vatvā tāya nānappakārehi tikkhattuṃ paṭikkhipitvā,
atk-s0502a:469_10: “sace te sahāyako bhaddiyarājā pabbajissati, tena saddhiṃ pabbajāhī”ti vutte taṃ
atk-s0502a:469_11: upasaṅkamitvā, “mama kho, samma, pabbajjā tava paṭibaddhā”ti vatvā taṃ nānappakārehi
atk-s0502a:469_12: saññāpetvā sattame divase attanā saddhiṃ pabbajanatthāya paṭiññaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a:470_0: Tato bhaddiyo sakyarājā anuruddho ānando bhagu kimilo devadattoti ime cha khattiyā
atk-s0502a:470_1: upālikappakasattamā devā viya dibbasampattiṃ sattāhaṃ sampattiṃ anubhavitvā uyyānaṃ
atk-s0502a:470_2: gacchantā viya caturaṅginiyā senāya nikkhamitvā paravisayaṃ patvā rājāṇāya senaṃ
atk-s0502a:470_3: nivattāpetvā paravisayaṃ okkamiṃsu. Tattha cha khattiyā attano attano ābharaṇāni
atk-s0502a:470_4: omuñcitvā bhaṇḍikaṃ katvā, “handa bhaṇe, upāli, nivattassu, alaṃ te ettakaṃ jīvikāyā”ti
atk-s0502a:470_5: tassa adaṃsu. So tesaṃ pādamūle parivattitvā paridevitvā tesaṃ āṇaṃ atikkamituṃ asakkonto
atk-s0502a:470_6: uṭṭhāya taṃ gahetvā nivatti. Tesaṃ dvidhā jātakāle, vanaṃ ārodanappattaṃ viya pathavīkampamānākārappattā
atk-s0502a:470_7: viya ahosi. Upāli kappakopi thokaṃ gantvā nivattitvā “caṇḍā kho sākiyā, ‘iminā kumārā
atk-s0502a:470_8: nippātitā’ti ghāteyyumpi maṃ. Ime hi nāma sakyakumārā evarūpaṃ sampattiṃ pahāya imāni
atk-s0502a:470_9: anagghāni ābharaṇāni kheḷapiṇḍaṃ viya chaḍḍetvā pabbajissanti, kimaṅgaṃ panāha”nti
atk-s0502a:470_10: bhaṇḍikaṃ omuñcitvā tāni ābharaṇāni rukkhe laggetvā “atthikā gaṇhantū”ti vatvā tesaṃ
atk-s0502a:470_11: santikaṃ gantvā tehi “kasmā nivattosī”ti puṭṭho tamatthaṃ ārocesi. Atha naṃ te ādāya
atk-s0502a:470_12: satthu santikaṃ gantvā, “mayaṃ, bhante, sākiyā nāma mānanissitā, ayaṃ amhākaṃ dīgharattaṃ
atk-s0502a:470_13: paricārako, imaṃ paṭhamataraṃ pabbājetha, mayamassa abhivādanādīni karissāma, evaṃ
atk-s0502a:470_14: no māno nimmānāyissatī”ti vatvā taṃ paṭhamataraṃ pabbājetvā pacchā sayaṃ pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:470_15: Tesu āyasmā bhaddiyo teneva antaravassena tevijjo ahosi. Āyasmā anuruddho dibbacakkhuko
atk-s0502a:470_16: hutvā pacchā mahāvitakkasuttaṃ sutvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Āyasmā ānando sotāpattiphale
atk-s0502a:470_17: patiṭṭhahi. Bhagutthero ca kimilatthero ca aparabhāge vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ
atk-s0502a:471_0: Aparabhāge satthari kosambiyaṃ viharante sasāvakasaṅghassa tathāgatassa mahanto lābhasakkāro
atk-s0502a:471_1: nibbatti. Vatthabhesajjādihatthā manussā vihāraṃ pavisitvā “kuhiṃ satthā, kuhiṃ sāriputtatthero,
atk-s0502a:471_2: kuhiṃ mahāmoggallānatthero, kuhiṃ mahākassapatthero, kuhiṃ bhaddiyatthero, kuhiṃ
atk-s0502a:471_3: anuruddhatthero, kuhiṃ ānandatthero, kuhiṃ bhagutthero, kuhiṃ kimilatthero”ti asītimahāsāvakānaṃ
atk-s0502a:471_4: nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ olokentā vicaranti. “Devadattatthero kuhiṃ nisinno vā, ṭhito vā”ti
atk-s0502a:471_5: pucchanto nāma natthi. So cintesi – “ahampi etehi saddhiññeva pabbajito, etepi khattiyapabbajitā,
atk-s0502a:471_6: ahampi khattiyapabbajito, lābhasakkārahatthā manussā eteyeva pariyesanti, mama nāmaṃ
atk-s0502a:471_7: gahetāpi natthi. Kena nu kho saddhiṃ ekato hutvā kaṃ pasādetvā mama lābhasakkāraṃ
atk-s0502a:471_8: nibbatteyya”nti. Athassa etadahosi – “ayaṃ kho rājā bimbisāro paṭhamadassaneneva
atk-s0502a:471_9: ekādasahi nahutehi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhito, na sakkā etena saddhiṃ ekato
atk-s0502a:471_10: bhavituṃ, kosalaraññāpi saddhiṃ na sakkā bhavituṃ. Ayaṃ kho pana rañño putto ajātasattu
atk-s0502a:471_11: kumāro kassaci guṇadose na jānāti, etena saddhiṃ ekato bhavissāmī”ti. So kosambito
atk-s0502a:471_12: rājagahaṃ gantvā kumārakavaṇṇaṃ abhinimminitvā cattāro āsīvise catūsu hatthapādesu
atk-s0502a:471_13: ekaṃ gīvāya pilandhitvā ekaṃ sīse cumbaṭakaṃ katvā ekaṃ ekaṃsaṃ karitvā imāya ahimekhalāya
atk-s0502a:471_14: ākāsato oruyha ajātasattussa ucchaṅge nisīditvā tena bhītena “kosi tva”nti vutte
atk-s0502a:471_15: “ahaṃ devadatto”ti vatvā tassa bhayavinodanatthaṃ taṃ attabhāvaṃ paṭisaṃharitvā saṅghāṭipattacīvaradharo
atk-s0502a:471_16: purato ṭhatvā taṃ pasādetvā lābhasakkāraṃ nibbattesi. So lābhasakkārābhibhūto “ahaṃ
atk-s0502a:471_17: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pariharissāmī”ti pāpakaṃ cittaṃ uppādetvā saha cittuppādena iddhito
atk-s0502a:471_18: parihāyitvā satthāraṃ veḷuvanavihāre sarājikāya parisāya dhammaṃ desentaṃ vanditvā
atk-s0502a:471_19: uṭṭhāyāsanā añjaliṃ paggayha – “bhagavā, bhante, etarahi jiṇṇo vuḍḍho mahallako,
atk-s0502a:471_20: appossukko diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṃ anuyuñjatu, ahaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pariharissāmi,
atk-s0502a:471_21: niyyādetha me bhikkhusaṅgha”nti vatvā satthārā kheḷāsakavādena apasādetvā paṭikkhitto
atk-s0502a:471_22: anattamano imaṃ paṭhamaṃ tathāgate āghātaṃ bandhitvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:472_0: Athassa bhagavā rājagahe pakāsanīyakammaṃ kāresi. So “pariccatto dāni ahaṃ samaṇena
atk-s0502a:472_1: gotamena, idānissa anatthaṃ karissāmī”ti ajātasattuṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “pubbe kho, kumāra,
atk-s0502a:472_2: manussā dīghāyukā, etarahi appāyukā. Ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjati, yaṃ tvaṃ kumārova
atk-s0502a:472_3: samāno kālaṃ kareyyāsi, tena hi tvaṃ, kumāra, pitaraṃ hantvā rājā hohi, ahaṃ bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0502a:472_4: hantvā buddho bhavissāmī”ti vatvā tasmiṃ rajje patiṭṭhite tathāgatassa vadhāya purise
atk-s0502a:472_5: payojetvā tesu sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā nivattesu sayaṃ gijjhakūṭapabbataṃ abhiruhitvā,
atk-s0502a:472_6: “ahameva samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ jīvitā voropessāmī”ti silaṃ pavijjhitvā ruhiruppādakakammaṃ
atk-s0502a:472_7: katvā imināpi upāyena māretuṃ asakkonto puna nāḷāgiriṃ vissajjāpesi. Tasmiṃ āgacchante
atk-s0502a:472_8: ānandatthero attano jīvitaṃ satthu pariccajitvā purato aṭṭhāsi. Satthā nāgaṃ dametvā
atk-s0502a:472_9: nagarā nikkhamitvā vihāraṃ gantvā anekasahassehi upāsakehi abhihaṭaṃ mahādānaṃ paribhuñjitvā
atk-s0502a:472_10: tasmiṃ divase sannipatitānaṃ aṭṭhārasakoṭisaṅkhātānaṃ rājagahavāsīnaṃ anupubbiṃ kathaṃ
atk-s0502a:472_11: kathetvā caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamaye jāte “aho āyasmā ānando mahāguṇo,
atk-s0502a:472_12: tathārūpe nāma hatthināge āgacchante attano jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā satthu puratova
atk-s0502a:472_13: aṭṭhāsī”ti therassa guṇakathaṃ sutvā “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepesa mamatthāya
atk-s0502a:472_14: jīvitaṃ pariccajiyevā”ti vatvā bhikkhūhi yācito cūḷahaṃsa – mahāhaṃsa – kakkaṭakajātakāni
atk-s0502a:472_15: kathesi. Devadattassāpi kammaṃ neva pākaṭaṃ, tathā rañño mārāpitattā, na vadhakānaṃ
atk-s0502a:472_16: payojitattā na silāya paviddhattā pākaṭaṃ ahosi, yathā nāḷāgirihatthino vissajjitattā.
atk-s0502a:472_17: Tadā hi mahājano “rājāpi devadatteneva mārāpito, vadhakopi payojito, silāpi apaviddhā.
atk-s0502a:472_18: Idāni pana tena nāḷāgiri vissajjāpito, evarūpaṃ nāma pāpakaṃ gahetvā rājā vicaratī”ti kolāhalamakāsi.
atk-s0502a:473_0: Rājā mahājanassa kathaṃ sutvā pañca thālipākasatāni nīharāpetvā na puna tassūpaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:473_1: agamāsi, nāgarāpissa kulaṃ upagatassa bhikkhāmattampi na adaṃsu. So parihīnalābhasakkāro
atk-s0502a:473_2: kohaññena jīvitukāmo satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañca vatthūni yācitvā bhagavato “alaṃ,
atk-s0502a:473_3: devadatta, yo icchati, so āraññako hotū”ti paṭikkhitto kassāvuso, vacanaṃ sobhanaṃ,
atk-s0502a:473_4: kiṃ tathāgatassa udāhu mama, ahañhi ukkaṭṭhavasena evaṃ vadāmi, “sādhu, bhante, bhikkhū
atk-s0502a:473_5: yāvajīvaṃ āraññakā assu, piṇḍapātikā, paṃsukūlikā, rukkhamūlikā, macchamaṃsaṃ na
atk-s0502a:473_6: khādeyyu”nti. “Yo dukkhā muccitukāmo, so mayā saddhiṃ āgacchatū”ti vatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:473_7: Tassa vacanaṃ sutvā ekacce navakapabbajitā mandabuddhino “kalyāṇaṃ devadatto āha,
atk-s0502a:473_8: etena saddhiṃ vicarissāmā”ti tena saddhiṃ ekato ahesuṃ. Iti so pañcasatehi bhikkhūhi
atk-s0502a:473_9: saddhiṃ tehi pañcahi vatthūhi lūkhappasannaṃ janaṃ saññāpento kulesu viññāpetvā viññāpetvā
atk-s0502a:473_10: bhuñjanto saṅghabhedāya parakkami. So bhagavatā, “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, devadatta, saṅghabhedāya
atk-s0502a:473_11: parakkamasi cakkabhedāyā”ti puṭṭho “saccaṃ bhagavā”ti vatvā, “garuko kho, devadatta,
atk-s0502a:473_12: saṅghabhedo”tiādīhi ovaditopi satthu vacanaṃ anādiyitvā pakkanto āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ
atk-s0502a:473_13: rājagahe piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā, “ajjatagge dānāhaṃ, āvuso ānanda, aññatreva bhagavatā,
atk-s0502a:473_14: aññatra, bhikkhusaṅghā uposathaṃ karissāmi, saṅghakammaṃ karissāmī”ti āha. Thero
atk-s0502a:473_15: tamatthaṃ bhagavato ārocesi. Taṃ viditvā satthā uppannadhammasaṃvego hutvā, “devadatto
atk-s0502a:473_16: sadevakassa lokassa anatthanissitaṃ attano avīcimhi paccanakakammaṃ karotī”ti vitakketvā –
atk-s0502a:475: Yaṃ ve hitañca sādhuñca, taṃ ve paramadukkara”nti. –
atk-s0502a:476: Imaṃ gāthaṃ vatvā puna imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi –
atk-s0502a:479_0: Atha kho devadatto uposathadivase attano parisāya saddhiṃ ekamantaṃ nisīditvā, “yassimāni
atk-s0502a:479_1: pañca vatthūni khamanti, so salākaṃ gaṇhatū”ti vatvā pañcasatehi vajjiputtakehi navakehi
atk-s0502a:479_2: appakataññūhi salākāya gahitāya saṅghaṃ bhinditvā te bhikkhū ādāya gayāsīsaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:479_3: Tassa tattha gatabhāvaṃ sutvā satthā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ānayanatthāya dve aggasāvake
atk-s0502a:479_4: pesesi. Te tattha gantvā ādesanāpāṭihāriyānusāsaniyā ceva iddhipāṭihāriyānusāsaniyā
atk-s0502a:479_5: ca anusāsantā te amataṃ pāyetvā ādāya ākāsena āgamiṃsu. Kokālikopi kho “uṭṭhehi,
atk-s0502a:479_6: āvuso devadatta, nītā te bhikkhū sāriputtamoggallānehi, nanu tvaṃ mayā vutto ‘mā,
atk-s0502a:479_7: āvuso, sāriputtamoggallāne vissāsī’ti. Pāpicchā sāriputtamoggallānā, pāpikānaṃ icchānaṃ
atk-s0502a:479_8: vasaṃ gatā”ti vatvā jaṇṇukena hadayamajjhe pahari, tassa tattheva uṇhaṃ lohitaṃ mukhato
atk-s0502a:479_9: uggañchi. Āyasmantaṃ pana sāriputtaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaparivutaṃ ākāsena āgacchantaṃ disvā
atk-s0502a:479_10: bhikkhū āhaṃsu – “bhante, āyasmā sāriputto gamanakāle attadutiyo gato, idāni mahāparivāro
atk-s0502a:479_11: āgacchanto sobhatī”ti. Satthā “na, bhikkhave, idāneva sāriputto sobhati, pubbe tiracchānayoniyaṃ
atk-s0502a:479_12: nibbattakālepi mayhaṃ putto mama santikaṃ āgacchanto sobhiyevā”ti vatvā –
atk-s0502a:483_0: Idaṃ jātakaṃ kathesi. Puna bhikkhūhi, “bhante, devadatto kira dve aggasāvake ubhosu
atk-s0502a:483_1: passesu nisīdāpetvā ‘buddhalīḷāya dhammaṃ desessāmī’ti tumhākaṃ anukiriyaṃ karotī”ti
atk-s0502a:483_2: vutte, “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepesa mama anukiriyaṃ kātuṃ vāyami, na pana sakkhī”ti vatvā –
atk-s0502a:490: Ādinā jātakaṃ vatvā aparāparesupi divasesu tathānurūpameva kathaṃ ārabbha –
atk-s0502a:495: “Lasī ca te nipphalikā, matthako ca padālito;
atk-s0502a:496: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā, ajja kho tvaṃ virocasī”ti. –
atk-s0502a:497: Evamādīni jātakāni kathesi. Puna “akataññū devadatto”ti kathaṃ ārabbha –
atk-s0502a:499: Migarāja namo tyatthu, api kiñci labhāmase.
atk-s0502a:501: Dantantaragato santo, taṃ bahuṃ yampi jīvasī”ti. –
atk-s0502a:502: Ādīni jātakāni kathesi. Puna vadhāya parisakkanamassa ārabbha –
atk-s0502a:504: Aññaṃ sepaṇṇi gacchāmi, na me te ruccate phala”nti. –
atk-s0502a:505_0: Ādīni jātakāni kathesi. Punadivase “ubhato parihīno devadatto lābhasakkārato ca sāmaññato
atk-s0502a:505_1: cā”ti kathāsu pavattamānāsu “na, bhikkhave, idāneva devadatto parihīno, pubbepesa
atk-s0502a:506: “Akkhī bhinnā paṭo naṭṭho, sakhigehe ca bhaṇḍanaṃ;
atk-s0502a:507: Ubhato paduṭṭhā kammantā, udakamhi thalamhi cā”ti. –
atk-s0502a:508_0: Ādīni jātakāni kathesi. Evaṃ rājagahe viharantova devadattaṃ ārabbha bahūni jātakāni
atk-s0502a:508_1: kathetvā rājagahato sāvatthiṃ gantvā jetavane vihāre vāsaṃ kappesi. Devadattopi kho
atk-s0502a:508_2: nava māse gilāno pacchime kāle satthāraṃ daṭṭhukāmo hutvā attano sāvake āha – “ahaṃ
atk-s0502a:508_3: satthāraṃ daṭṭhukāmo, taṃ me dassethā”ti. “Tvaṃ samatthakāle satthārā saddhiṃ verī
atk-s0502a:508_4: hutvā acari, na mayaṃ tattha nessāmā”ti vutte, “mā maṃ nāsetha, mayā satthari āghāto
atk-s0502a:508_5: kato, satthu pana mayi kesaggamattopi āghāto natthi”. So hi bhagavā –
atk-s0502a:511_0: “Dassetha me bhagavanta”nti punappunaṃ yāci. Atha naṃ te mañcakenādāya nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:511_1: Tassa āgamanaṃ sutvā bhikkhū satthu ārocesuṃ – “bhante, devadatto kira tumhākaṃ dassanatthāya
atk-s0502a:511_2: āgacchatī”ti. “Na, bhikkhave, so tenattabhāvena maṃ passituṃ labhissatī”ti. Devadatto
atk-s0502a:511_3: kira pañcannaṃ vatthūnaṃ āyācitakālato paṭṭhāya puna buddhaṃ daṭṭhuṃ na labhati,
atk-s0502a:511_4: ayaṃ dhammatā. “Asukaṭṭhānañca asukaṭṭhānañca āgato, bhante”ti. “Yaṃ icchati, taṃ
atk-s0502a:511_5: karotu, na so maṃ passituṃ labhissatī”ti. “Bhante, ito yojanamattaṃ āgato, aḍḍhayojanaṃ,
atk-s0502a:511_6: gāvutaṃ, jetavanapokkharaṇīsamīpaṃ āgato, bhante”ti. “Sacepi antojetavanaṃ pavisati,
atk-s0502a:511_7: neva maṃ passituṃ labhissatī”ti. Devadattaṃ gahetvā āgatā jetavanapokkharaṇītīre
atk-s0502a:511_8: mañcaṃ otāretvā pokkharaṇiṃ nhāyituṃ otariṃsu. Devadattopi kho mañcato vuṭṭhāya ubho
atk-s0502a:511_9: pāde bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapetvā nisīdi. Pādā pathaviṃ pavisiṃsu. So anukkamena yāva gopphakā,
atk-s0502a:511_10: yāva jaṇṇukā, yāva kaṭito, yāva thanato, yāva gīvato pavisitvā hanukaṭṭhikassa bhūmiyaṃ paviṭṭhakāle –
atk-s0502a:516_0: Imaṃ gāthamāha. Idaṃ kira ṭhānaṃ disvā tathāgato devadattaṃ pabbājesi. Sace hi na
atk-s0502a:516_1: so pabbajissa, gihī hutvā kammañca bhāriyaṃ akarissa, āyatiṃ bhavanissaraṇapaccayaṃ
atk-s0502a:516_2: kātuṃ na sakkhissa, pabbajitvā ca pana kiñcāpi kammaṃ bhāriyaṃ karissati, āyatiṃ
atk-s0502a:516_3: bhavanissaraṇapaccayaṃ kātuṃ sakkhissatīti taṃ satthā pabbājesi. So hi ito satasahassakappamatthake
atk-s0502a:516_4: aṭṭhissaro nāma paccekabuddho bhavissati, so pathaviṃ pavisitvā avīcimhi nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:516_5: Niccale buddhe aparajjhabhāvena pana niccalova hutvā paccatūti yojanasatike anto
atk-s0502a:516_6: avīcimhi yojanasatubbedhamevassa sarīraṃ nibbatti. Sīsaṃ yāva kaṇṇasakkhalito upari
atk-s0502a:516_7: ayakapallaṃ pāvisi, pādā yāva gopphakā heṭṭhā ayapathaviyaṃ paviṭṭhā, mahātālakkhandhaparimāṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:516_8: ayasūlaṃ pacchimabhittito nikkhamitvā piṭṭhimajjhaṃ bhinditvā urena nikkhamitvā purimabhittiṃ
atk-s0502a:516_9: pāvisi, aparaṃ dakkhiṇabhittito nikkhamitvā dakkhiṇapassaṃ bhinditvā vāmapassena
atk-s0502a:516_10: nikkhamitvā uttarabhittiṃ pāvisi, aparaṃ upari kapallato nikkhamitvā matthakaṃ bhinditvā
atk-s0502a:516_11: adhobhāgena nikkhamitvā ayapathaviṃ pāvisi. Evaṃ so tattha niccalova pacci.
atk-s0502a:517_0: Bhikkhū “ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ devadatto āgacchanto satthāraṃ daṭṭhuṃ alabhitvāva pathaviṃ
atk-s0502a:517_1: paviṭṭho”ti kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ. Satthā “na, bhikkhave, devadatto idāneva mayi aparajjhitvā
atk-s0502a:517_2: pathaviṃ pāvisi, pubbepi paviṭṭhoyevā”ti vatvā hatthirājakāle maggamūḷhaṃ purisaṃ
atk-s0502a:517_3: samassāsetvā attano piṭṭhiṃ āropetvā khemantaṃ pāpitassa puna tikkhattuṃ āgantvā
atk-s0502a:517_4: aggaṭṭhāne majjhimaṭṭhāne mūlehi evaṃ dante chinditvā tatiyavāre mahāpurisassa cakkhupathaṃ
atk-s0502a:519: Sabbaṃ ce pathaviṃ dajjā, neva naṃ abhirādhaye”ti. –
atk-s0502a:520_0: Idaṃ jātakaṃ kathetvā punapi tatheva kathāya samuṭṭhitāya khantivādibhūte attani
atk-s0502a:520_1: aparajjhitvā kalāburājabhūtassa tassa pathaviṃ paviṭṭhabhāvaṃ dīpetuṃ khantivādijātakañca,
atk-s0502a:520_2: cūḷadhammapālabhūte attani aparajjhitvā mahāpatāparājabhūtassa tassa pathaviṃ paviṭṭhabhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:521_0: Pathaviṃ paviṭṭhe pana devadatte mahājano haṭṭhatuṭṭho dhajapaṭākakadaliyo ussāpetvā
atk-s0502a:521_1: puṇṇaghaṭe ṭhapetvā “lābhā vata no”ti mahantaṃ chaṇaṃ anubhoti. Tamatthaṃ bhagavato
atk-s0502a:521_2: ārocesuṃ. Bhagavā “na, bhikkhave, idāneva devadatte mate mahājano tussati, pubbepi
atk-s0502a:521_3: tussiyevā”ti vatvā sabbajanassa appiye caṇḍe pharuse bārāṇasiyaṃ piṅgalaraññe nāma
atk-s0502a:530_0: Idaṃ piṅgalajātakaṃ kathesi. Bhikkhū satthāraṃ pucchiṃsu – “idāni, bhante, devadatto
atk-s0502a:530_1: kuhiṃ nibbatto”ti? “Avīcimahāniraye, bhikkhave”ti. “Bhante, idha tappanto vicaritvā
atk-s0502a:530_2: puna gantvā tappanaṭṭhāneyeva nibbatto”ti. “Āma, bhikkhave, pabbajitā vā hontu gahaṭṭhā
atk-s0502a:530_3: vā, pamādavihārino ubhayattha tappantiyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:532: “Idha tappati pecca tappati, pāpakārī ubhayattha tappati;
atk-s0502a:533: Pāpaṃ me katanti tappati, bhiyyo tappati duggatiṃ gato”ti.
atk-s0502a:534_0: Tattha idha tappatīti idha kammatappanena domanassamattena tappati. Peccāti paraloke
atk-s0502a:534_1: pana vipākatappanena atidāruṇena apāyadukkhena tappati. Pāpakārīti nānappakārassa
atk-s0502a:534_2: pāpassa kattā. Ubhayatthāti iminā vuttappakārena tappanena ubhayattha tappati nāma.
atk-s0502a:534_3: Pāpaṃ meti so hi kammatappanena kappanto “pāpaṃ me kata”nti tappati. Taṃ appamattakaṃ
atk-s0502a:534_4: tappanaṃ, vipākatappanena pana tappanto bhiyyo tappati duggatiṃ gato atipharusena
atk-s0502a:535: Gāthāpariyosāne bahū sotāpannādayo ahesuṃ. Desanā mahājanassa sātthikā jātāti.
atk-s0502a:538: Idha nandatīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sumanādeviṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:539_0: Sāvatthiyañhi devasikaṃ anāthapiṇḍikassa gehe dve bhikkhūsahassāni bhuñjanti, tathā
atk-s0502a:539_1: visākhāya mahāupāsikāya. Sāvatthiyaṃ yo yo dānaṃ dātukāmo hoti, so so tesaṃ ubhinnaṃ
atk-s0502a:539_2: okāsaṃ labhitvāva karoti. Kiṃ kāraṇā? “Tumhākaṃ dānaggaṃ anāthapiṇḍiko vā visākhā
atk-s0502a:539_3: vā āgatā”ti pucchitvā, “nāgatā”ti vutte satasahassaṃ vissajjetvā katadānampi “kiṃ
atk-s0502a:539_4: dānaṃ nāmeta”nti garahanti. Ubhopi hi te bhikkhusaṅghassa ruciñca anucchavikakiccāni
atk-s0502a:539_5: ca ativiya jānanti, tesu vicārentesu bhikkhū cittarūpaṃ bhuñjanti. Tasmā sabbe dānaṃ
atk-s0502a:539_6: dātukāmā te gahetvāva gacchanti. Iti te attano attano ghare bhikkhū parivisituṃ na
atk-s0502a:539_7: labhanti. Tato visākhā, “ko nu kho mama ṭhāne ṭhatvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ parivisissatī”ti
atk-s0502a:539_8: upadhārentī puttassa dhītaraṃ disvā taṃ attano ṭhāne ṭhapesi. Sā tassā nivesane bhikkhusaṅghaṃ
atk-s0502a:539_9: parivisati. Anāthapiṇḍikopi mahāsubhaddaṃ nāma jeṭṭhadhītaraṃ ṭhapesi. Sā bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0502a:539_10: veyyāvaccaṃ karontī dhammaṃ suṇantī sotāpannā hutvā patikulaṃ agamāsi. Tato cūḷasubhaddaṃ
atk-s0502a:539_11: ṭhapesi. Sāpi tatheva karontī sotāpannā hutvā patikulaṃ gatā. Atha sumanadeviṃ nāma
atk-s0502a:539_12: kaniṭṭhadhītaraṃ ṭhapesi. Sā pana dhammaṃ sutvā sakadāgāmiphalaṃ patvā kumārikāva
atk-s0502a:539_13: hutvā tathārūpena aphāsukena āturā āhārupacchedaṃ katvā pitaraṃ daṭṭhukāmā hutvā
atk-s0502a:539_14: pakkosāpesi. So ekasmiṃ dānagge tassā sāsanaṃ sutvāva āgantvā, “kiṃ, amma sumane”ti
atk-s0502a:539_15: āha. Sāpi naṃ āha – “kiṃ, tāta kaniṭṭhabhātikā”ti? “Vilapasi ammā”ti? “Na vilapāmi,
atk-s0502a:539_16: kaniṭṭhabhātikā”ti. “Bhāyasi, ammā”ti? “Na bhāyāmi, kaniṭṭhabhātikā”ti. Ettakaṃ vatvāyeva
atk-s0502a:539_17: pana sā kālamakāsi. So sotāpannopi samāno seṭṭhidhītari uppannasokaṃ adhivāsetuṃ
atk-s0502a:539_18: asakkonto dhītu sarīrakiccaṃ kāretvā rodanto satthu santikaṃ gantvā, “kiṃ, gahapati,
atk-s0502a:539_19: dukkhī dummano assumukho rodamāno āgatosī”ti vutte, “dhītā me, bhante, sumanadevī
atk-s0502a:539_20: kālakatā”ti āha. “Atha kasmā socasi, nanu sabbesaṃ ekaṃsikaṃ maraṇa”nti? “Jānāmetaṃ,
atk-s0502a:539_21: bhante, evarūpā nāma me hiriottappasampannā dhītā, sā maraṇakāle satiṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetuṃ
atk-s0502a:539_22: asakkontī vilapamānā matā, tena me anappakaṃ domanassaṃ uppajjatī”ti. “Kiṃ pana tāya
atk-s0502a:539_23: kathitaṃ mahāseṭṭhī”ti? “Ahaṃ taṃ, bhante, ‘amma, sumane’ti āmantesiṃ. Atha maṃ āha
atk-s0502a:539_25: ‘Bhāyasi, ammā’ti? ‘Na bhāyāmi kaniṭṭhabhātikā’ti. Ettakaṃ vatvā kālamakāsī”ti. Atha
atk-s0502a:539_26: naṃ bhagavā āha – “na te mahāseṭṭhi dhītā vilapatī”ti. “Atha kasmā bhante evamāhā”ti?
atk-s0502a:539_27: “Kaniṭṭhattāyeva. Dhītā hi te, gahapati, maggaphalehi tayā mahallikā. Tvañhi sotāpanno,
atk-s0502a:539_28: dhītā pana te sakadāgāminī. Sā maggaphalehi tayā mahallikattā taṃ evamāhā”ti. “Evaṃ,
atk-s0502a:539_30: gahapatī”ti. “Bhante, mama dhītā idha ñātakānaṃ antare nandamānā vicaritvā ito gantvāpi
atk-s0502a:539_31: nandanaṭṭhāneyeva nibbattā”ti. Atha naṃ satthā “āma, gahapati, appamattā nāma gahaṭṭhā
atk-s0502a:539_32: vā pabbajitā vā idha loke ca paraloke ca nandantiyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:541: “Idha nandati pecca nandati, katapuñño ubhayattha nandati;
atk-s0502a:542: Puññaṃ me katanti nandati, bhiyyo nandati suggatiṃ gato”ti.
atk-s0502a:543_0: Tattha idhāti idha loke kammanandanena nandati. Peccāti paraloke vipākanandanena
atk-s0502a:543_1: nandati. Katapuññoti nānappakārassa puññassa kattā. Ubhayatthāti idha “kataṃ me kusalaṃ,
atk-s0502a:543_2: akataṃ me pāpa”nti nandati, parattha vipākaṃ anubhavanto nandati. Puññaṃ meti idha
atk-s0502a:543_3: nandanto pana “puññaṃ me kata”nti somanassamatteneva kammanandanaṃ upādāya nandati.
atk-s0502a:543_4: Bhiyyoti vipākanandanena pana sugatiṃ gato sattapaññāsavassakoṭiyo saṭṭhivassasatasahassāni
atk-s0502a:544: Gāthāpariyosāne bahū sotāpannādayo ahesuṃ. Mahājanassa sātthikā dhammadesanā jātāti.
atk-s0502a:547: Bahumpi ceti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto dve sahāyake ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:548_0: Sāvatthivāsino hi dve kulaputtā sahāyakā vihāraṃ gantvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā
atk-s0502a:548_1: kāme pahāya sāsane uraṃ datvā pabbajitvā pañca vassāni ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ santike
atk-s0502a:548_2: vasitvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā sāsane dhuraṃ pucchitvā vipassanādhurañca ganthadhurañca
atk-s0502a:548_3: vitthārato sutvā eko tāva “ahaṃ, bhante, mahallakakāle pabbajito na sakkhissāmi ganthadhuraṃ
atk-s0502a:548_4: pūretuṃ, vipassanādhuraṃ pana pūressāmī”ti yāva arahattā vipassanādhuraṃ kathāpetvā
atk-s0502a:548_5: ghaṭento vāyamanto saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Itaro pana “ahaṃ ganthadhuraṃ
atk-s0502a:548_6: pūressāmī”ti anukkamena tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā gatagataṭṭhāne dhammaṃ
atk-s0502a:548_7: katheti, sarabhaññaṃ bhaṇati, pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ dhammaṃ vācento vicarati.
atk-s0502a:548_8: Aṭṭhārasannaṃ mahāgaṇānaṃ ācariyo ahosi. Bhikkhū satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0502a:548_9: itarassa therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā tassa ovāde ṭhatvā arahattaṃ patvā theraṃ
atk-s0502a:548_10: vanditvā, “satthāraṃ daṭṭhukāmamhā”ti vadanti. Thero “gacchatha, āvuso, mama vacanena
atk-s0502a:548_11: satthāraṃ vanditvā asīti mahāthere vandatha, sahāyakattherampi me ‘amhākaṃ ācariyo
atk-s0502a:548_12: tumhe vandatī’ti vadathā”ti peseti. Te bhikkhū vihāraṃ gantvā satthārañceva asīti
atk-s0502a:548_13: mahāthere ca vanditvā ganthikattherassa santikaṃ gantvā, “bhante, amhākaṃ ācariyo
atk-s0502a:548_14: tumhe vandatī”ti vadanti. Itarena ca “ko nāma so”ti vutte, “tumhākaṃ sahāyakabhikkhu,
atk-s0502a:548_15: bhante”ti vadanti. Evaṃ there punappunaṃ sāsanaṃ pahiṇante so bhikkhu thokaṃ kālaṃ
atk-s0502a:548_16: sahitvā aparabhāge sahituṃ asakkonto “amhākaṃ ācariyo tumhe vandatī”ti vutte, “ko
atk-s0502a:548_17: eso”ti vatvā “tumhākaṃ sahāyakabhikkhū”ti vutte, “kiṃ pana tumhehi tassa santike
atk-s0502a:548_18: uggahitaṃ, kiṃ dīghanikāyādīsu aññataro nikāyo, kiṃ tīsu piṭakesu ekaṃ piṭaka”nti
atk-s0502a:548_19: vatvā “catuppadikampi gāthaṃ na jānāti, paṃsukūlaṃ gahetvā pabbajitakāleyeva araññaṃ
atk-s0502a:548_20: paviṭṭho, bahū vata antevāsike labhi, tassa āgatakāle mayā pañhaṃ pucchituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintesi.
atk-s0502a:549_0: Atha aparabhāge thero satthāraṃ daṭṭhuṃ āgato. Sahāyakassa therassa santike pattacīvaraṃ
atk-s0502a:549_1: ṭhapetvā gantvā satthārañceva asīti mahāthere ca vanditvā sahāyakassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:549_2: paccāgami. Athassa so vattaṃ kāretvā samappamāṇaṃ āsanaṃ gahetvā, “pañhaṃ pucchissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:549_3: nisīdi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe satthā “esa evarūpaṃ mama puttaṃ viheṭhetvā niraye nibbatteyyā”ti
atk-s0502a:549_4: tasmiṃ anukampāya vihāracārikaṃ caranto viya tesaṃ nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā paññattavarabuddhāsane
atk-s0502a:549_5: nisīdi. Tattha tattha nisīdantā hi bhikkhū buddhāsanaṃ paññāpetvāva nisīdanti. Tena
atk-s0502a:549_6: satthā pakatipaññatteyeva āsane nisīdi. Nisajja kho pana ganthikabhikkhuṃ paṭhamajjhāne
atk-s0502a:549_7: pañhaṃ pucchitvā tasmiṃ akathite dutiyajjhānaṃ ādiṃ katvā aṭṭhasupi samāpattīsu rūpārūpesu
atk-s0502a:549_8: ca pañhaṃ pucchi. Ganthikatthero ekampi kathetuṃ nāsakkhi. Itaro taṃ sabbaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0502a:549_9: Atha naṃ sotāpattimagge pañhaṃ pucchi. Ganthikatthero kathetuṃ nāsakkhi. Tato khīṇāsavattheraṃ
atk-s0502a:549_10: pucchi. Thero kathesi. Satthā “sādhu sādhu, bhikkhū”ti abhinanditvā sesamaggesupi
atk-s0502a:549_11: paṭipāṭiyā pañhaṃ pucchi. Ganthiko ekampi kathetuṃ nāsakkhi, khīṇāsavo pucchitaṃ
atk-s0502a:549_12: pucchitaṃ kathesi. Satthā catūsupi ṭhānesu tassa sādhukāraṃ adāsi. Taṃ sutvā bhummadeve
atk-s0502a:549_13: ādiṃ katvā yāva brahmalokā sabbā devatā ceva nāgasupaṇṇā ca sādhukāraṃ adaṃsu. Taṃ
atk-s0502a:549_14: sādhukāraṃ sutvā tassa antevāsikā ceva saddhivihārino ca satthāraṃ ujjhāyiṃsu – “kiṃ
atk-s0502a:549_15: nāmetaṃ satthārā kataṃ, kiñci ajānantassa mahallakattherassa catūsu ṭhānesu sādhukāraṃ
atk-s0502a:549_16: adāsi, amhākaṃ panācariyassa sabbapariyattidharassa pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ pāmokkhassa
atk-s0502a:549_17: pasaṃsāmattampi na karī”ti. Atha ne satthā “kiṃ nāmetaṃ, bhikkhave, kathethā”ti pucchitvā
atk-s0502a:549_18: tasmiṃ atthe ārocite, “bhikkhave, tumhākaṃ ācariyo mama sāsane bhatiyā gāvo rakkhaṇasadiso,
atk-s0502a:549_19: mayhaṃ pana putto yathāruciyā pañca gorase paribhuñjanakasāmisadiso”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:562_0: Tattha saṃhitanti tepiṭakassa buddhavacanassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Taṃ ācariye upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0502a:562_1: uggaṇhitvā bahumpi paresaṃ bhāsamāno vācento taṃ dhammaṃ sutvā yaṃ kārakena puggalena
atk-s0502a:562_2: kattabbaṃ, takkaro na hoti. Kukkuṭassa pakkhapaharaṇamattampi aniccādivasena yonisomanasikāraṃ
atk-s0502a:562_3: nappavatteti. Eso yathā nāma divasaṃ bhatiyā gāvo rakkhanto gopo pātova niravasesaṃ
atk-s0502a:562_4: sampaṭicchitvā sāyaṃ gahetvā sāmikānaṃ niyyādetvā divasabhatimattaṃ gaṇhāti, yathāruciyā
atk-s0502a:562_5: pana pañca gorase paribhuñjituṃ na labhati, evameva kevalaṃ antevāsikānaṃ santikā
atk-s0502a:562_6: vattapaṭivattakaraṇamattassa bhāgī hoti, sāmaññassa pana bhāgī na hoti. Yathā pana
atk-s0502a:562_7: gopālakena niyyāditānaṃ gunnaṃ gorasaṃ sāmikāva paribhuñjanti, tathā tena kathitaṃ
atk-s0502a:562_8: dhammaṃ sutvā kārakapuggalā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjitvā keci paṭhamajjhānādīni pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0502a:562_9: keci vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā maggaphalāni pāpuṇanti, goṇasāmikā gorasasseva sāmaññassa bhāgino honti.
atk-s0502a:563_0: Iti satthā sīlasampannassa bahussutassa pamādavihārino aniccādivasena yonisomanasikāre
atk-s0502a:563_1: pamattassa bhikkhuno vasena paṭhamaṃ gāthaṃ kathesi, na dussīlassa. Dutiyagāthā pana
atk-s0502a:563_2: appassutassapi yonisomanasikāre kammaṃ karontassa kārakapuggalassa vasena kathitā.
atk-s0502a:564_0: Tattha appampī ceti thokaṃ ekavaggadvivaggamattampi. Dhammassa hoti anudhammacārīti
atk-s0502a:564_1: atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya navalokuttaradhammassa anurūpaṃ dhammaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipadāsaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0502a:564_3: “ajja ajjevā”ti paṭivedhaṃ ākaṅkhanto vicarati. So imāya sammāpaṭipattiyā rāgañca
atk-s0502a:564_4: dosañca pahāya mohaṃ sammā hetunā nayena parijānitabbe dhamme parijānanto tadaṅgavikkhambhanasamucchedapaṭippassaddhinissaraṇavimuttīnaṃ
atk-s0502a:564_5: vasena suvimuttacitto, anupādiyāno idha vā huraṃ vāti idhalokaparalokapariyāpannā
atk-s0502a:564_6: vā ajjhattikabāhirā vā khandhāyatanadhātuyo catūhi upādānehi anupādiyanto mahākhīṇāsavo
atk-s0502a:564_7: maggasaṅkhātassa sāmaññassa vasena āgatassa phalasāmaññassa ceva pañcaasekkhadhammakkhandhassa
atk-s0502a:564_8: ca bhāgavā hotīti ratanakūṭena viya agārassa arahattena desanāya kūṭaṃ gaṇhīti.
atk-s0502a:565: Gāthāpariyosāne bahū sotāpannādayo ahesuṃ. Desanā mahājanassa sātthikā jātāti.
atk-s0502a:571_0: Appamādo amatapadanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā kosambiṃ upanissāya ghositārāme viharanto
atk-s0502a:571_1: sāmāvatippamukhānaṃ pañcannaṃ itthisatānaṃ, māgaṇḍiyappamukhānañca etissā pañcannaṃ
atk-s0502a:572_0: Tatrāyaṃ anupubbikathā – atīte allakapparaṭṭhe allakapparājā nāma, veṭhadīpakaraṭṭhe
atk-s0502a:572_1: veṭhadīpakarājā nāmāti ime dve daharakālato paṭṭhāya sahāyakā hutvā ekācariyakule
atk-s0502a:572_2: sippaṃ uggaṇhitvā attano attano pitūnaṃ accayena chattaṃ ussāpetvā āyāmena dasadasayojanike
atk-s0502a:572_3: raṭṭhe rājāno ahesuṃ. Te kālena kālaṃ samāgantvā ekato tiṭṭhantā nisīdantā nipajjantā
atk-s0502a:572_4: mahājanaṃ jāyamānañca jīyamānañca mīyamānañca disvā “paralokaṃ gacchantaṃ anugacchanto
atk-s0502a:572_5: nāma natthi, antamaso attano sarīrampi nānugacchati, sabbaṃ pahāya gantabbaṃ, kiṃ
atk-s0502a:572_6: no gharāvāsena, pabbajissāmā”ti mantetvā rajjāni puttadārānaṃ niyyādetvā isipabbajjaṃ
atk-s0502a:572_7: pabbajitvā himavantappadese vasantā mantayiṃsu – “mayaṃ rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitā,
atk-s0502a:572_8: na jīvituṃ asakkontā. Te mayaṃ ekaṭṭhāne vasantā apabbajitasadisāyeva homa, tasmā
atk-s0502a:572_9: visuṃ vasissāma. Tvaṃ etasmiṃ pabbate vasa, ahaṃ imasmiṃ pabbate vasissāmi. Anvaḍḍhamāsaṃ
atk-s0502a:572_10: pana uposathadivase ekato bhavissāmā”ti. Atha kho nesaṃ etadahosi – “evampi no gaṇasaṅgaṇikāva
atk-s0502a:572_11: bhavissati, tvaṃ pana tava pabbate aggiṃ jāleyyāsi, ahaṃ mama pabbate aggiṃ jālessāmi,
atk-s0502a:572_12: tāya saññāya atthibhāvaṃ jānissāmā”ti. Te tathā kariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:573_0: Atha aparabhāge veṭhadīpakatāpaso kālaṃ katvā mahesakkho devarājā hutvā nibbatto.
atk-s0502a:573_1: Tato aḍḍhamāse sampatte aggiṃ adisvāva itaro “sahāyako me kālakato”ti aññāsi. Itaropi
atk-s0502a:573_2: nibbattakkhaṇeyeva attano devasiriṃ oloketvā kammaṃ upadhārento nikkhamanato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0502a:573_3: attano tapacariyaṃ disvā “gantvā mama sahāyakaṃ passissāmī”ti taṃ attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā
atk-s0502a:573_4: maggikapuriso viya tassa santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ so
atk-s0502a:573_5: āha – “kuto āgatosī”ti? “Maggikapuriso ahaṃ, bhante, dūratova āgatomhi. Kiṃ pana,
atk-s0502a:573_6: bhante, ayyo imasmiṃ ṭhāne ekakova vasati, aññopi koci atthī”ti? “Atthi me eko sahāyako”ti.
atk-s0502a:573_7: “Kuhiṃ so”ti? “Etasmiṃ pabbate vasati, uposathadivase pana aggiṃ na jāleti, mato
atk-s0502a:573_9: nibbattosī”ti? “Devaloke mahesakkho devarājā hutvā nibbattosmi, bhante, ‘ayyaṃ passissāmī’ti
atk-s0502a:573_10: puna āgatomhi. Api nu kho ayyānaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne vasantānaṃ koci upaddavo atthī”ti?
atk-s0502a:573_11: “Āma, āvuso, hatthī nissāya kilamāmī”ti. “Kiṃ vo, bhante, hatthī karontī”ti? “Sammajjanaṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a:573_12: laṇḍaṃ pātenti, pādehi bhūmiyaṃ paharitvā paṃsuṃ uddharanti, svāhaṃ laṇḍaṃ chaḍḍento
atk-s0502a:573_13: paṃsuṃ samaṃ karonto kilamāmī”ti. “Kiṃ pana tesaṃ anāgamanaṃ icchathā”ti? “Āmāvuso”ti.
atk-s0502a:573_14: “Tena hi tesaṃ anāgamanaṃ karissāmī”ti tāpasassa hatthikantavīṇañceva hatthikantamantañca
atk-s0502a:573_15: adāsi. Dadanto ca pana vīṇāya tisso tantiyo dassetvā tayo mante uggaṇhāpetvā “imaṃ
atk-s0502a:573_16: tantiṃ paharitvā imasmiṃ mante vutte nivattitvā oloketumpi asakkontā hatthī palāyanti,
atk-s0502a:573_17: imaṃ tantiṃ paharitvā imasmiṃ mante vutte nivattitvā pacchato olokentā olokentā palāyanti,
atk-s0502a:573_18: imaṃ tantiṃ paharitvā imasmiṃ mante vutte hatthiyūthapati piṭṭhiṃ upanāmento āgacchatī”ti
atk-s0502a:573_19: ācikkhitvā, “yaṃ vo ruccati, taṃ kareyyāthā”ti vatvā tāpasaṃ vanditvā pakkāmi. Tāpaso
atk-s0502a:573_20: palāyanamantaṃ vatvā palāyanatantiṃ paharitvā hatthī palāpetvā vasi.
atk-s0502a:574_0: Tasmiṃ samaye kosambiyaṃ pūrantappo nāma rājā hoti. So ekadivasaṃ gabbhiniyā deviyā
atk-s0502a:574_1: saddhiṃ bālasūriyatapaṃ tappamāno abbhokāsatale nisīdi. Devī rañño pārupanaṃ satasahassagghanikaṃ
atk-s0502a:574_2: rattakambalaṃ pārupitvā nisinnā raññā saddhiṃ samullapamānā rañño aṅgulito satasahassagghanikaṃ
atk-s0502a:574_3: rājamuddikaṃ nīharitvā attano aṅguliyaṃ pilandhi. Tasmiṃ samaye hatthiliṅgasakuṇo
atk-s0502a:574_4: ākāsena gacchanto dūrato rattakambalapārupanaṃ deviṃ disvā “maṃsapesī”ti saññāya
atk-s0502a:574_5: pakkhe vissajjetvā otari. Rājā tassa otaraṇasaddena bhīto uṭṭhāya antonivesanaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:574_6: Devī garugabbhatāya ceva bhīrukajātikatāya ca vegena gantuṃ nāsakkhi. Atha naṃ so
atk-s0502a:574_7: sakuṇo ajjhappatto nakhapañjare nisīdāpetvā ākāsaṃ pakkhandi. Te kira sakuṇā pañcannaṃ
atk-s0502a:574_8: hatthīnaṃ balaṃ dhārenti. Tasmā ākāsena netvā yathārucitaṭṭhāne nisīditvā maṃsaṃ
atk-s0502a:574_9: khādanti. Sāpi tena nīyamānā maraṇabhayabhītā cintesi – “sacāhaṃ viravissāmi, manussasaddo
atk-s0502a:574_10: nāma tiracchānagatānaṃ ubbejanīyo, taṃ sutvā maṃ chaḍḍessati. Evaṃ sante saha gabbhena
atk-s0502a:574_11: jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇissāmi, yasmiṃ pana ṭhāne nisīditvā maṃ khādituṃ ārabhissati,
atk-s0502a:574_12: tatra naṃ saddaṃ katvā palāpessāmī”ti. Sā attano paṇḍitatāya adhivāsesi.
atk-s0502a:575_0: Tadā ca himavantapadese thokaṃ vaḍḍhitvā maṇḍapākārena ṭhito eko mahānigrodho hoti.
atk-s0502a:575_1: So sakuṇo migarūpādīni tattha netvā khādati, tasmā tampi tattheva netvā viṭapabbhantare
atk-s0502a:575_2: ṭhapetvā āgatamaggaṃ olokesi. Āgatamaggolokanaṃ kira tesaṃ dhammatā. Tasmiṃ khaṇe
atk-s0502a:575_3: devī, “idāni imaṃ palāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā ubho hatthe ukkhipitvā pāṇisaddañceva
atk-s0502a:575_4: mukhasaddañca katvā taṃ palāpesi. Athassā sūriyatthaṅgamanakāle gabbhe kammajavātā
atk-s0502a:575_5: caliṃsu. Sabbadisāsu gajjanto mahāmegho uṭṭhahi. Sukhedhitāya rājamahesiyā “mā bhāyi,
atk-s0502a:575_6: ayye”ti vacanamattampi alabhamānāya dukkhaparetāya sabbarattiṃ niddā nāma nāhosi.
atk-s0502a:575_7: Vibhātāya pana rattiyā valāhakavigamo ca aruṇuggamanañca tassā gabbhavuṭṭhānañca
atk-s0502a:575_8: ekakkhaṇeyeva ahosi. Sā meghautuñca pabbatautuñca aruṇautuñca gahetvā jātattā puttassa
atk-s0502a:576_0: Allakappatāpasassapi kho tato avidūre vasanaṭṭhānaṃ hoti. So pakatiyāva vassadivase
atk-s0502a:576_1: sītabhayena phalāphalatthāya vanaṃ na pavisati, taṃ rukkhamūlaṃ gantvā sakuṇehi khāditamaṃsānaṃ
atk-s0502a:576_2: aṭṭhiṃ āharitvā koṭṭetvā rasaṃ katvā pivati. Tasmā taṃ divasaṃ “aṭṭhiṃ āharissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:576_3: tattha gantvā rukkhamūle aṭṭhiṃ pariyesento upari dārakasaddaṃ sutvā ullokento deviṃ
atk-s0502a:576_6: “Ahampi khattiyoyevā”ti. “Tena hi khattiyamāyaṃ kathehī”ti. So khattiyamāyaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0502a:576_7: “Tena hi āruyha puttaṃ me otārehī”ti. So ekena passena abhiruhanamaggaṃ katvā abhiruhitvā
atk-s0502a:576_8: dārakaṃ gaṇhi. “Mā maṃ hatthena chupī”ti ca vutte taṃ achupitvāva dārakaṃ otāresi.
atk-s0502a:576_9: Devīpi otari. Atha naṃ assamapadaṃ netvā sīlabhedaṃ akatvāva anukampāya paṭijaggi,
atk-s0502a:576_10: nimmakkhikamadhuṃ āharitvā sayaṃjātasāliṃ āharitvā yāguṃ pacitvā adāsi. Evaṃ tasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:576_11: paṭijaggante sā aparabhāge cintesi – “ahaṃ neva āgatamaggaṃ jānāmi, na gamanamaggaṃ
atk-s0502a:576_12: jānāmi, imināpi me saddhiṃ vissāsamattampi natthi. Sace panāyaṃ amhe pahāya katthaci
atk-s0502a:576_13: gamissati, ubhopi idheva maraṇaṃ pāpuṇissāma, yaṃkiñci katvā imassa sīlaṃ bhinditvā
atk-s0502a:576_14: yathā maṃ na muñcati, tathā taṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Atha naṃ dunnivatthaduppārutadassanena
atk-s0502a:576_15: palobhetvā sīlavināsaṃ pāpesi. Tato paṭṭhāya dvepi samaggavāsaṃ vasiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:577_0: Athekadivasaṃ tāpaso nakkhattayogaṃ ullokento pūrantappassa nakkhattamilāyanaṃ disvā
atk-s0502a:577_1: “bhadde kosambiyaṃ pūrantapparājā mato”ti āha. “Kasmā, ayya, evaṃ vadesi? Kiṃ te
atk-s0502a:577_2: tena saddhiṃ āghāto atthī”ti? “Natthi, bhadde, nakkhattamilāyanamassa disvā evaṃ
atk-s0502a:577_3: vadāmī”ti, sā parodi. Atha naṃ “kasmā rodasī”ti pucchitvā tāya tassa attano sāmikabhāve
atk-s0502a:577_4: akkhāte āha – “mā, bhadde, rodi, jātassa nāma niyato maccū”ti. “Jānāmi, ayyā”ti vutte
atk-s0502a:577_5: “atha kasmā rodasī”ti? “Putto me kulasantakassa rajjassa anucchaviko, ‘sace tatra
atk-s0502a:577_6: abhavissa, setacchattaṃ ussāpayissa. Idāni mahājāniko vata jāto’ti sokena rodāmi,
atk-s0502a:577_7: ayyā”ti. “Hotu, bhadde, mā cintayi, sacassa rajjaṃ patthesi, ahamassa rajjalabhanākāraṃ
atk-s0502a:577_8: karissāmī”ti. Athassa hatthikantavīṇañceva hatthikantamante ca adāsi. Tadā anekāni
atk-s0502a:577_9: hatthisahassāni āgantvā vaṭarukkhamūle nisīdanti. Atha naṃ āha – “hatthīsu anāgatesuyeva
atk-s0502a:577_10: rukkhaṃ abhiruhitvā tesu āgatesu imaṃ mantaṃ vatvā imaṃ tantiṃ pahara, sabbe nivattitvā
atk-s0502a:577_11: oloketumpi asakkontā palāyissanti, atha otaritvā āgaccheyyāsī”ti. So tathā katvā
atk-s0502a:577_12: āgantvā taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi. Atha naṃ dutiyadivase āha – “ajja imaṃ mantaṃ vatvā
atk-s0502a:577_13: imaṃ tantiṃ pahareyyāsi, sabbe nivattitvā olokentā palāyissantī”ti. Tadāpi tathā
atk-s0502a:577_14: katvā āgantvā ārocesi. Atha naṃ tatiyadivase āha – “ajja imaṃ mantaṃ vatvā imaṃ tantiṃ
atk-s0502a:577_15: pahareyyāsi, yūthapati piṭṭhiṃ upanāmento āgamissatī”ti. Tadāpi tathā katvā ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:578_0: Athassa mātaraṃ āmantetvā, “bhadde, puttassa te sāsanaṃ vadehi, ettova gantvā rājā
atk-s0502a:578_1: bhavissatī”ti āha. Sā puttaṃ āmantetvā, “tāta, tvaṃ kosambiyaṃ pūrantapparañño putto,
atk-s0502a:578_2: maṃ sagabbhaṃ hatthiliṅgasakuṇo ānesī”ti vatvā senāpatiādīnaṃ nāmāni ācikkhitvā “asaddahantānaṃ
atk-s0502a:578_3: imaṃ pitu pārupanakambalañceva pilandhanamuddikañca dasseyyāsī”ti vatvā uyyojesi.
atk-s0502a:578_4: Kumāro tāpasaṃ “idāni kiṃ karomī”ti āha. “Rukkhassa heṭṭhimasākhāya nisīditvā imaṃ
atk-s0502a:578_5: mantaṃ vatvā imaṃ tantiṃ pahara, jeṭṭhakahatthī te piṭṭhiṃ upanāpetvā upasaṅkamissati,
atk-s0502a:578_6: tassa piṭṭhiyaṃ nisinnova raṭṭhaṃ gantvā rajjaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti. So mātāpitaro vanditvā
atk-s0502a:578_7: tathā katvā āgatassa hatthino piṭṭhiyaṃ nisīditvā kaṇṇe mantayi – “ahaṃ kosambiyaṃ
atk-s0502a:578_8: pūrantapparañño putto, pettikaṃ me rajjaṃ gaṇhitvā dehi sāmī”ti. So taṃ sutvā “anekāni
atk-s0502a:578_9: hatthisahassāni sannipatantū”ti hatthiravaṃ ravi, anekāni hatthisahassāni sannipatiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:578_10: Puna “jiṇṇā hatthī paṭikkamantū”ti hatthiravaṃ ravi, jiṇṇā hatthī paṭikkamiṃsu. Puna
atk-s0502a:578_11: “atitaruṇā hatthī nivattantū”ti hatthiravaṃ ravi, tepi nivattiṃsu. So anekehi yūthahatthisahasseheva
atk-s0502a:578_12: parivuto paccantagāmaṃ patvā “ahaṃ rañño putto, sampattiṃ patthayamānā mayā saddhiṃ
atk-s0502a:578_13: āgacchantū”ti āha. “Tato paṭṭhāya manussānaṃ saṅgahaṃ karonto gantvā nagaraṃ parivāretvā
atk-s0502a:578_14: ‘yuddhaṃ vā me detu, rajjaṃ vā”’ti sāsanaṃ pesesi. Nāgarā āhaṃsu – “mayaṃ dvepi na
atk-s0502a:578_15: dassāma. Amhākañhi devī garugabbhā hatthiliṅgasakuṇena nītā, tassā atthibhāvaṃ vā
atk-s0502a:578_16: natthibhāvaṃ vā mayaṃ na jānāma. Yāva tassā pavattiṃ na suṇāma. Tāva neva yuddhaṃ
atk-s0502a:578_17: dassāma, na rajja”nti. Tadā kira taṃ paveṇirajjaṃ ahosi. Tato kumāro “ahaṃ tassā
atk-s0502a:578_18: putto”ti vatvā senāpatiādīnaṃ nāmāni kathetvā tathāpi asaddahantānaṃ kambalañca muddikañca
atk-s0502a:578_19: dassesi. Te kambalañca muddikañca sañjānitvā nikkaṅkhā hutvā dvāraṃ vivaritvā taṃ
atk-s0502a:578_20: rajje abhisiñciṃsu. Ayaṃ tāva utenassa uppatti.
atk-s0502a:579_0: Allakapparaṭṭhe pana dubbhikkhe jīvituṃ asakkonto eko kotuhaliko nāma manusso kāpiṃ
atk-s0502a:579_1: nāma taruṇaputtañca kāḷiṃ nāma bhariyañca ādāya “kosambiṃ gantvā jīvissāmī”ti pātheyyaṃ
atk-s0502a:579_2: gahetvā nikkhami. “Ahivātarogena mahājane marante disvā nikkhamī”tipi vadantiyeva.
atk-s0502a:579_3: Te gacchantā pātheyye parikkhīṇe khudābhibhūtā dārakaṃ vahituṃ nāsakkhiṃsu. Atha
atk-s0502a:579_4: sāmiko pajāpatiṃ āha – “bhadde, mayaṃ jīvantā puna puttaṃ labhissāma, chaḍḍetvā naṃ
atk-s0502a:579_5: gacchāmā”ti. Mātu hadayaṃ nāma mudukaṃ hoti. Tasmā sā āha – “nāhaṃ jīvantameva puttaṃ
atk-s0502a:579_6: chaḍḍetuṃ sakkhissāmī”ti. “Atha kiṃ karomā”ti? “Vārena naṃ vahāmā”ti. Mātā attano
atk-s0502a:579_7: vāre pupphadāmaṃ viya naṃ ukkhipitvā ure nipajjāpetvā aṅkena vahitvā pituno deti.
atk-s0502a:579_8: Tassa taṃ gahetvā gamanakāle chātakatopi balavatarā vedanā uppajji. So punappunaṃ
atk-s0502a:579_9: āha – “bhadde, mayaṃ jīvantā puttaṃ labhissāma, chaḍḍema na”nti. Sāpi punappunaṃ
atk-s0502a:579_10: paṭikkhipitvā paṭivacanaṃ nādāsi. Dārako vārena parivattiyamāno kilanto pitu hatthe
atk-s0502a:579_11: niddāyi. So tassa niddāyanabhāvaṃ ñatvā mātaraṃ purato katvā ekassa gacchassa heṭṭhā
atk-s0502a:579_12: paṇṇasanthare taṃ nipajjāpetvā pāyāsi. Mātā nivattitvā olokentī puttaṃ adisvā, “sāmi,
atk-s0502a:579_13: kuhiṃ me putto”ti pucchi. “Ekassa me gacchassa heṭṭhā nipajjāpito”ti. “Sāmi, mā maṃ
atk-s0502a:579_14: nāsayi, puttaṃ vinā jīvituṃ na sakkhissāmi, ānehi me putta”nti uraṃ paharitvā paridevi.
atk-s0502a:579_15: Atha naṃ nivattitvā ānesi. Puttopi antarāmagge mato hoti. Iti so ettake ṭhāne puttaṃ
atk-s0502a:579_16: chaḍḍetvā tassa nissandena bhavantare satta vāre chaḍḍito. “Pāpakammaṃ nāmetaṃ appaka”nti na avamaññitabbaṃ.
atk-s0502a:580_0: Te gacchantā ekaṃ gopālakulaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Taṃ divasañca gopālakassa dhenumaṅgalaṃ
atk-s0502a:580_1: hoti. Gopālakassa gehe nibaddhaṃ eko paccekabuddho bhuñjati. So taṃ bhojetvā maṅgalamakāsi.
atk-s0502a:580_2: Bahu pāyāso paṭiyatto hoti. Gopālako te āgate disvā, “kuto āgatatthā”ti pucchitvā
atk-s0502a:580_3: sabbaṃ pavattiṃ sutvā mudujātiko kulaputto tesu anukampaṃ katvā bahukena sappinā
atk-s0502a:580_4: pāyāsaṃ dāpesi. Bhariyā “sāmi, tayi jīvante ahampi jīvāmi nāma, dīgharattaṃ ūnodarosi,
atk-s0502a:580_5: yāvadatthaṃ bhuñjāhī”ti sappiñca dadhiñca tadabhimukhaññeva katvā attanā mandasappinā
atk-s0502a:580_6: thokameva bhuñji. Itaro bahuṃ bhuñjitvā sattaṭṭhadivase chātatāya āhārataṇhaṃ chindituṃ
atk-s0502a:580_7: nāsakkhi. Gopālako tesaṃ pāyāsaṃ dāpetvā sayaṃ bhuñjituṃ ārabhi. Kotuhaliko taṃ olokento
atk-s0502a:580_8: nisīditvā heṭṭhāpīṭhe nipannāya sunakhiyā gopālakena vaḍḍhetvā diyyamānaṃ pāyāsapiṇḍaṃ
atk-s0502a:580_9: disvā “puññā vatāyaṃ sunakhī, nibaddhaṃ evarūpaṃ bhojanaṃ labhatī”ti cintesi. So
atk-s0502a:580_10: rattibhāge taṃ pāyāsaṃ jīrāpetuṃ asakkonto kālaṃ katvā tassā sunakhiyā kucchimhi nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:581_0: Athassa bhariyā sarīrakiccaṃ katvā tasmiṃyeva gehe bhatiṃ katvā taṇḍulanāḷiṃ labhitvā
atk-s0502a:581_1: pacitvā paccekabuddhassa patte patiṭṭhāpetvā, “dāsassa vo pāpuṇātū”ti vatvā cintesi
atk-s0502a:581_2: – “mayā idheva vasituṃ vaṭṭati, nibaddhaṃ, ayyo, idhāgacchati, deyyadhammo hotu vā,
atk-s0502a:581_3: mā vā, devasikaṃ vandantī veyyāvaccaṃ karontī cittaṃ pasādentī bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavissāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:581_4: Sā tattheva bhatiṃ karontī vasi. Sāpi sunakhī chaṭṭhe vā sattame vā māse ekameva
atk-s0502a:581_5: kukkuraṃ vijāyi. Gopālako tassa ekadhenuyā khīraṃ dāpesi. So na cirasseva vaḍḍhi.
atk-s0502a:581_6: Athassa paccekabuddho bhuñjanto nibaddhaṃ ekaṃ bhattapiṇḍaṃ deti. So bhattapiṇḍaṃ
atk-s0502a:581_7: nissāya paccekabuddhe sinehamakāsi. Gopālakopi nibaddhaṃ dve vāre paccekabuddhassupaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:581_8: yāti. Gacchantopi antarāmagge vāḷamigaṭṭhāne daṇḍena gacche ca bhūmiñca paharitvā
atk-s0502a:581_9: “susū”ti tikkhattuṃ saddaṃ katvā vāḷamige palāpeti. Sunakhopi tena saddhiṃ gacchati.
atk-s0502a:582_0: So ekadivasaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ āha – “bhante, yadā me okāso na bhavissati, tadā imaṃ
atk-s0502a:582_1: sunakhaṃ pesessāmi, tena saññāṇena āgaccheyyāthā”ti. Tato paṭṭhāya anokāsadivase,
atk-s0502a:582_2: “gaccha, tāta, ayyaṃ ānehī”ti sunakhaṃ pesesi. So ekavacaneneva pakkhanditvā sāmikassa
atk-s0502a:582_3: gacchapothanabhūmipothanaṭṭhāne tikkhattuṃ bhussitvā tena saddena vāḷamigānaṃ palātabhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:582_4: ñatvā pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā nisinnassa paccekabuddhassa
atk-s0502a:582_5: vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā paṇṇasāladvāre tikkhattuṃ bhussitvā attano āgatabhāvaṃ jānāpetvā
atk-s0502a:582_6: ekamante nipajjati, paccekabuddhe velaṃ sallakkhetvā nikkhante bhussanto purato gacchati.
atk-s0502a:582_7: Antarantarā paccekabuddho taṃ vīmaṃsanto aññaṃ maggaṃ paṭipajjati. Athassa purato
atk-s0502a:582_8: tiriyaṃ ṭhatvā bhussitvā itaramaggameva naṃ āropeti. Athekadivasaṃ aññaṃ maggaṃ paṭipajjitvā
atk-s0502a:582_9: tena purato tiriyaṃ ṭhatvā vāriyamānopi anivattitvā sunakhaṃ pādena paharitvā pāyāsi.
atk-s0502a:582_10: Sunakho tassa anivattanabhāvaṃ ñatvā nivāsanakaṇṇe ḍaṃsitvā ākaḍḍhanto itaramaggameva
atk-s0502a:582_11: naṃ āropesi. Evaṃ so tasmiṃ balavasinehaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0502a:583_0: Tato aparabhāge paccekabuddhassa cīvaraṃ jīri. Athassa gopālako cīvaravatthāni adāsi.
atk-s0502a:583_1: Tamenaṃ paccekabuddho āha – “āvuso, cīvaraṃ nāma ekakena kātuṃ dukkaraṃ, phāsukaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:583_2: gantvā kāressāmī”ti. “Idheva, bhante, karothā”ti. “Na sakkā, āvuso”ti. “Tena hi,
atk-s0502a:583_3: bhante, mā ciraṃ bahi vasitthā”ti. Sunakho tesaṃ kathaṃ suṇantova aṭṭhāsi, paccekabuddhopi
atk-s0502a:583_4: “tiṭṭha, upāsakā”ti gopālakaṃ nivattāpetvā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā gandhamādanābhimukho
atk-s0502a:583_5: pāyāsi. Sunakhassa taṃ ākāsena gacchantaṃ disvā bhukkaritvā ṭhitassa tasmiṃ cakkhupathaṃ
atk-s0502a:583_6: vijahante hadayaṃ phalitvā mato. Tiracchānā kira nāmete ujujātikā honti akuṭilā.
atk-s0502a:583_7: Manussā pana aññaṃ hadayena cintenti, aññaṃ mukhena kathenti. Tenevāha – “gahanañhetaṃ,
atk-s0502a:583_8: bhante, yadidaṃ manussā, uttānakañhetaṃ, bhante, yadidaṃ pasavo”ti.
atk-s0502a:584_0: Iti so tāya ujucittatāya akuṭilatāya kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbatto accharāsahassaparivuto
atk-s0502a:584_1: mahāsampattiṃ anubhosi. Tassa kaṇṇamūle mantayantassa saddo soḷasayojanaṭṭhānaṃ pharati,
atk-s0502a:584_2: pakatikathāsaddo pana sakalaṃ dasayojanasahassaṃ devanagaraṃ chādeti. Tenevassa “ghosakadevaputto”ti
atk-s0502a:584_3: nāmaṃ ahosi. “Kissa panesa nissando”ti. Paccekabuddhe pemena bhukkaraṇassa nissando.
atk-s0502a:584_4: So tattha na ciraṃ ṭhatvā cavi. Devalokato hi devaputtā āyukkhayena puññakkhayena
atk-s0502a:585_0: Tattha yena bahuṃ puññakammaṃ kataṃ hoti, so devaloke uppajjitvā yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā
atk-s0502a:585_1: uparūpari nibbattati. Evaṃ āyukkhayena cavati nāma. Yena parittaṃ puññaṃ kataṃ hoti,
atk-s0502a:585_2: tassa rājakoṭṭhāgāre pakkhittaṃ ticatunāḷimattaṃ dhaññaṃ viya antarāva taṃ puññaṃkhīyati,
atk-s0502a:585_3: antarāva kālaṃ karoti. Evaṃ puññakkhayena cavati nāma. Aparopi kāmaguṇe paribhuñjamāno
atk-s0502a:585_4: satisammosena āhāraṃ aparibhuñjitvā kilantakāyo kālaṃ karoti. Evaṃ āhārakkhayena
atk-s0502a:585_5: cavati nāma. Aparopi parassa sampattiṃ asahanto kujjhitvā kālaṃ karoti. Evaṃ kopena cavati nāma.
atk-s0502a:586_0: Ayaṃ pana kāmaguṇe paribhuñjanto muṭṭhassati hutvā āhārakkhayena cavi, cavitvā ca
atk-s0502a:586_1: pana kosambiyaṃ nagarasobhiniyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Sāpi jātadivase “kiṃ
atk-s0502a:586_2: eta”nti dāsiṃ pucchitvā, “putto, ayye”ti vutte – “handa, je, imaṃ dārakaṃ kattarasuppe
atk-s0502a:586_3: āropetvā saṅkārakūṭe chaḍḍehī”ti chaḍḍāpesi. Nagarasobhiniyo hi dhītaraṃ paṭijagganti,
atk-s0502a:586_4: na puttaṃ. Dhītarā hi tāsaṃ paveṇī ghaṭīyati. Dārakaṃ kākāpi sunakhāpi parivāretvā
atk-s0502a:586_5: nisīdiṃsu. Paccekabuddhe sinehappabhavassa bhukkaraṇassa nissandena ekopi upagantuṃ
atk-s0502a:586_6: na visahi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe eko manusso bahi nikkhanto taṃ kākasunakhasannipātaṃ disvā,
atk-s0502a:586_7: “kiṃ nu kho eta”nti gantvā dārakaṃ disvā puttasinehaṃ paṭilabhitvā “putto me laddho”ti
atk-s0502a:586_8: gehaṃ nesi. Tadā kosambakaseṭṭhi rājakulaṃ gacchanto rājanivesanato āgacchantaṃ purohitaṃ
atk-s0502a:586_9: disvā, “kiṃ, ācariya, ajja te tithikaraṇanakkhattayogo olokito”ti pucchi. “Āma, mahāseṭṭhi,
atk-s0502a:586_10: amhākaṃ kiṃ aññaṃ kiccanti? Janapadassa kiṃ bhavissatī”ti? “Aññaṃ natthi, imasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:586_11: pana nagare ajja jātadārako jeṭṭhakaseṭṭhi bhavissatī”ti. Tadā seṭṭhino bhariyā garugabbhā
atk-s0502a:586_12: hoti. Tasmā so sīghaṃ gehaṃ purisaṃ pesesi – “gaccha bhaṇe, jānāhi naṃ vijātā vā,
atk-s0502a:586_13: no vā”ti. “Na vijāyatī”ti sutvā rājānaṃ disvāva vegena gehaṃ gantvā kāḷiṃ nāma dāsiṃ
atk-s0502a:586_14: pakkositvā sahassaṃ datvā, “gaccha je, imasmiṃ nagare upadhāretvā sahassaṃ datvā
atk-s0502a:586_15: ajja jātadārakaṃ gaṇhitvā ehī”ti. Sā upadhārentī taṃ gehaṃ gantvā dārakaṃ disvā,
atk-s0502a:586_16: “ayaṃ dārako kadā jāto”ti gahapatāniṃ pucchitvā “ajja jāto”ti vutte, “imaṃ mayhaṃ
atk-s0502a:586_17: dehī”ti ekakahāpaṇaṃ ādiṃ katvā mūlaṃ vaḍḍhentī sahassaṃ datvā taṃ ānetvā seṭṭhino
atk-s0502a:586_18: dassesi. Seṭṭhi “sace me dhītā vijāyissati, tāya naṃ saddhiṃ nivesetvā seṭṭhiṭṭhānassa
atk-s0502a:586_19: sāmikaṃ karissāmi. Sace me putto vijāyissati, māressāmi na”nti cintetvā taṃ gehe kāresi.
atk-s0502a:587_0: Athassa bhariyā katipāhaccayena puttaṃ vijāyi. Seṭṭhi “imasmiṃ asati mama puttova
atk-s0502a:587_1: seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ labhissati, idāneva taṃ māretuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā kāḷiṃ āmantetvā,
atk-s0502a:587_2: “gaccha, je, vajato gunnaṃ nikkhamanavelāya vajadvāramajjhe imaṃ tiriyaṃ nipajjāpehi,
atk-s0502a:587_3: gāviyo naṃ madditvā māressanti, madditāmadditabhāvaṃ panassa ñatvā ehī”ti āha. Sā
atk-s0502a:587_4: gantvā gopālakena vajadvāre vivaṭamatteyeva taṃ tathā nipajjāpesi. Gogaṇajeṭṭhako
atk-s0502a:587_5: usabho aññasmiṃ kāle sabbapacchā nikkhamantopi taṃ divasaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ nikkhamitvā
atk-s0502a:587_6: dārakaṃ catunnaṃ pādānaṃ antare katvā aṭṭhāsi. Anekasatagāviyo usabhassa dve passāni
atk-s0502a:587_7: ghaṃsantiyo nikkhamiṃsu. Gopālakopi “ayaṃ usabho pubbe sabbapacchā nikkhamati, ajja
atk-s0502a:587_8: pana sabbapaṭhamaṃ nikkhamitvā vajadvāramajjhe niccalova ṭhito, kiṃ nu kho eta”nti
atk-s0502a:587_9: cintetvā gantvā tassa heṭṭhā nipannaṃ dārakaṃ disvā puttasinehaṃ paṭilabhitvā, “putto
atk-s0502a:588_0: Kāḷī gantvā seṭṭhinā pucchitā tamatthaṃ ārocetvā, “gaccha, naṃ puna sahassaṃ datvā
atk-s0502a:588_1: ānehī”ti vuttā sahassaṃ datvā puna ānetvā adāsi. Atha naṃ āha – “amma, kāḷi imasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:588_2: nagare pañca sakaṭasatāni paccūsakāle uṭṭhāya vāṇijjāya gacchanti, tvaṃ imaṃ netvā
atk-s0502a:588_3: cakkamagge nipajjāpehi, goṇā vā naṃ maddissanti, cakkā vā chindissanti, pavattiṃ
atk-s0502a:588_4: cassa ñatvāva āgaccheyyāsī”ti. Sā taṃ netvā cakkamagge nipajjāpesi. Tadā sākaṭikajeṭṭhako
atk-s0502a:588_5: purato ahosi. Athassa goṇā taṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā dhuraṃ chaḍḍesuṃ, punappunaṃ āropetvā
atk-s0502a:588_6: pājiyamānāpi purato na gacchiṃsu. Evaṃ tassa tehi saddhiṃ vāyamantasseva aruṇaṃ uṭṭhahi.
atk-s0502a:588_7: So “kiṃ nāmetaṃ goṇā kariṃsū”ti maggaṃ olokento dārakaṃ disvā, “bhāriyaṃ vata me
atk-s0502a:588_8: kamma”nti cintetvā, “putto me laddho”ti tuṭṭhamānaso taṃ gehaṃ nesi.
atk-s0502a:589_0: Kāḷī gantvā seṭṭhinā pucchitā taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhitvā, “gaccha, naṃ puna sahassaṃ
atk-s0502a:589_1: datvā ānehī”ti vuttā tathā akāsi. Atha naṃ so āha – “idāni naṃ āmakasusānaṃ netvā
atk-s0502a:589_2: gacchantare nipajjāpehi, tattha sunakhādīhi vā khādito, amanussehi vā pahaṭo marissati,
atk-s0502a:589_3: mātāmatabhāvañcassa jānitvāva āgaccheyyāsī”ti. Sā taṃ netvā tattha nipajjāpetvā ekamante
atk-s0502a:589_4: aṭṭhāsi. Taṃ sunakho vā kāko vā amanusso vā upasaṅkamituṃ nāsakkhi. “Nanu cassa neva
atk-s0502a:589_5: mātā na pitā na bhātikādīsu koci rakkhitā nāma atthi, ko taṃ rakkhatī”ti? Sunakhakāle
atk-s0502a:589_6: paccekabuddhe sinehena pavattitabhukkaraṇamattameva taṃ rakkhati. Atheko ajapālako
atk-s0502a:589_7: anekasahassā ajā gocaraṃ nento susānapassena gacchati. Ekā ajā paṇṇāni khādamānā
atk-s0502a:589_8: gacchantaraṃ paviṭṭhā dārakaṃ disvā jaṇṇukehi ṭhatvā dārakassa thanaṃ adāsi, ajapālakena
atk-s0502a:589_9: “he he”ti sadde katepi na nikkhami. So “yaṭṭhiyā naṃ paharitvā nīharissāmī”ti gacchantaraṃ
atk-s0502a:589_10: paviṭṭho jaṇṇukehi ṭhatvā dārakaṃ khīraṃ pāyantiṃ ajiṃ disvā dārake puttasinehaṃ
atk-s0502a:590_0: Kāḷī gantvā seṭṭhinā pucchitā taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhitvā, “gaccha, taṃ puna sahassaṃ
atk-s0502a:590_1: datvā ānehī”ti vuttā tathā akāsi. Atha naṃ āha – “amma kāḷi, imaṃ ādāya corapapātapabbataṃ
atk-s0502a:590_2: abhiruhitvā papāte khipa, pabbatakucchiyaṃ paṭihaññamāno khaṇḍākhaṇḍiko hutvā bhūmiyaṃ
atk-s0502a:590_3: patissati, matāmatabhāvañcassa ñatvāva āgaccheyyāsī”ti. Sā taṃ tattha netvā pabbatamatthake
atk-s0502a:590_4: ṭhatvā khipi. Taṃ kho pana pabbatakucchiṃ nissāya mahāveḷugumbo pabbatānusāreneva
atk-s0502a:590_5: vaḍḍhi, tassa matthakaṃ ghanajāto jiñjukagumbo avatthari. Dārako patanto kojavake
atk-s0502a:590_6: viya tasmiṃ pati. Taṃ divasañca naḷakārajeṭṭhakassa veḷubali patto hoti. So puttena
atk-s0502a:590_7: saddhiṃ gantvā taṃ veḷugumbaṃ chindituṃ ārabhi. Tasmiṃ calante dārako saddamakāsi.
atk-s0502a:590_8: So “dārakasaddo viyā”ti ekena passena abhiruhitvā taṃ disvā, “putto me laddho”ti
atk-s0502a:591_0: Kāḷī seṭṭhissa santikaṃ gantvā tena pucchitā taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhitvā, “gaccha, naṃ
atk-s0502a:591_1: puna sahassaṃ datvā ānehī”ti vuttā tathā akāsi. Seṭṭhino idañcidañca karontasseva
atk-s0502a:591_2: dārako vaḍḍhito “ghosako”tvevassa nāmaṃ ahosi. So seṭṭhino akkhimhi kaṇṭako viya
atk-s0502a:591_3: khāyi, ujukaṃ taṃ oloketumpi na visati. Athassa māraṇūpāyaṃ cintento attano sahāyakassa
atk-s0502a:591_4: kumbhakārassa santikaṃ gantvā, “kadā tvaṃ āvāpaṃ ālimpessasī”ti pucchitvā – “sve”ti
atk-s0502a:591_5: vutte, “tena hi idaṃ sahassaṃ gahetvā mama ekaṃ kammaṃ karohī”ti āha. “Kiṃ, sāmī”ti?
atk-s0502a:591_6: “Eko me avajātaputto atthi, taṃ tava santikaṃ pesessāmi, atha naṃ gahetvā gabbhaṃ
atk-s0502a:591_7: pavesetvā tikhiṇāya vāsiyā khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ chinditvā cāṭiyaṃ pakkhipitvā āvāpe paceyyāsi,
atk-s0502a:591_8: idaṃ te sahassaṃ saccakārasadisaṃ. Uttariṃ pana te kattabbayuttakaṃ pacchā karissāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:591_9: Kumbhakāro “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchi. Seṭṭhi punadivase ghosakaṃ pakkositvā, “hiyyo mayā
atk-s0502a:591_10: kumbhakāro ekaṃ kammaṃ āṇatto, ehi, tvaṃ tassa santikaṃ gantvā evaṃ vadehi – ‘hiyyo
atk-s0502a:591_11: kira me pitarā āṇattaṃ kammaṃ nipphādehī”’ti pahiṇi. So “sādhū”ti agamāsi. Taṃ tattha
atk-s0502a:591_12: gacchantaṃ itaro seṭṭhino putto dārakehi saddhiṃ guḷaṃ kīḷanto disvā taṃ pakkositvā,
atk-s0502a:591_13: “kuhiṃ gacchasi bhātikā”ti pucchitvā “pitu sāsanaṃ gahetvā kumbhakārassa santika”nti
atk-s0502a:591_14: vutte “ahaṃ tattha gamissāmi. Ime maṃ dārakā bahuṃ lakkhaṃ jiniṃsu, taṃ me paṭijinitvā
atk-s0502a:591_15: dehī”ti āha. “Ahaṃ pitu bhāyāmī”ti. “Mā bhāyi, bhātika, ahaṃ taṃ sāsanaṃ harissāmi.
atk-s0502a:591_16: Bahūhi jito, yāvāhaṃ āgacchāmi, tāva me lakkhaṃ paṭijinā”ti.
atk-s0502a:592_0: Ghosako kira guḷakīḷāya cheko, tena naṃ evaṃ nibandhi. Sopi taṃ “tena hi gantvā kumbhakāraṃ
atk-s0502a:592_1: vadehi – ‘pitarā kira me hiyyo ekaṃ kammaṃ āṇattaṃ, taṃ nipphādehī”’ti vatvā uyyojesi.
atk-s0502a:592_2: So tassa santikaṃ gantvā tathā avaca. Atha naṃ kumbhakāro seṭṭhinā vuttaniyāmeneva
atk-s0502a:592_3: māretvā āvāpe khipi. Ghosakopi divasabhāgaṃ kīḷitvā sāyanhasamaye gehaṃ gantvā “kiṃ,
atk-s0502a:592_4: tāta, na gatosī”ti vutte attano agatakāraṇañca kaniṭṭhassa gatakāraṇañca ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:592_5: Taṃ sutvā seṭṭhi “ahaṃ dhī”ti mahāviravaṃ viravitvā sakalasarīre pakkuthitalohito
atk-s0502a:592_6: viya hutvā, “ambho, kumbhakāra, mā maṃ nāsayi, mā maṃ nāsayī”ti bāhā paggayha kandanto
atk-s0502a:592_7: tassa santikaṃ agamāsi. Kumbhakāro taṃ tathā āgacchantaṃ disvā, “sāmi, mā saddaṃ
atk-s0502a:592_8: kari, kammaṃ te nipphanna”nti āha. So pabbatena viya mahantena sokena avatthaṭo hutvā
atk-s0502a:592_9: anappakaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedesi. Yathā taṃ appaduṭṭhassa padussamāno. Tenāha bhagavā –
atk-s0502a:601_0: Evaṃ santepi puna naṃ seṭṭhi ujukaṃ oloketuṃ na sakkoti. “Kinti naṃ māreyya”nti cintento,
atk-s0502a:601_1: “mama gāmasate āyuttakassa santikaṃ pesetvā māressāmī”ti upāyaṃ disvā, “ayaṃ me avajātaputto,
atk-s0502a:601_2: imaṃ māretvā vaccakūpe khipatu, evaṃ kate ahaṃ mātulassa kattabbayuttakaṃ pacchā
atk-s0502a:601_3: jānissāmī”ti tassa paṇṇaṃ likhitvā, “tāta ghosaka, amhākaṃ gāmasate āyuttako atthi,
atk-s0502a:601_4: imaṃ paṇṇaṃ haritvā tassa dehī”ti vatvā paṇṇaṃ tassa dussante bandhi. So pana akkharasamayaṃ
atk-s0502a:601_5: na jānāti. Daharakālato paṭṭhāya hi naṃ mārāpentova seṭṭhi māretuṃ nāsakkhi, kiṃ
atk-s0502a:601_6: akkharasamayaṃ sikkhāpessati? Iti so attano mārāpanapaṇṇameva dussante bandhitvā
atk-s0502a:601_7: nikkhamanto āha – “pātheyyaṃ me, tāta, natthī”ti. “Pātheyyena te kammaṃ natthi, antarāmagge
atk-s0502a:601_8: ‘asukagāme nāma mamasahāyako seṭṭhi atthi, tassa ghare pātarāsaṃ katvā purato gacchāhī”’ti.
atk-s0502a:601_9: So “sādhū”ti pitaraṃ vanditvā nikkhanto taṃ gāmaṃ patvā seṭṭhissa gharaṃ pucchitvā
atk-s0502a:601_10: gantvā seṭṭhijāyaṃ passi. “Tvaṃ kuto āgatosī”ti ca vutte, “antonagarato”ti āha. “Kassa
atk-s0502a:601_11: puttosī”ti? “Tumhākaṃ sahāyakaseṭṭhino, ammā”ti. “Tvaṃsi ghosako nāmā”ti? “Āma, ammā”ti.
atk-s0502a:601_12: Tassā saha dassaneneva tasmiṃ puttasineho uppajji. Seṭṭhino panekā dhītā atthi pannarasasoḷasavassuddesikā
atk-s0502a:601_13: abhirūpā pāsādikā, taṃ rakkhituṃ ekameva pesanakārikaṃ dāsiṃ datvā sattabhūmikassa
atk-s0502a:601_14: pāsādassa uparimatale sirigabbhe vasāpenti. Seṭṭhidhītā tasmiṃ khaṇe taṃ dāsiṃ antarāpaṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:601_15: pesesi. Atha naṃ seṭṭhijāyā disvā, “kuhiṃ gacchasī”ti pucchitvā, “ayyadhītāya pesanenā”ti
atk-s0502a:601_16: vutte “ito tāva ehi, tiṭṭhatu pesanaṃ, puttassa me pīṭhakaṃ attharitvā pāde dhovitvā
atk-s0502a:601_17: telaṃ makkhitvā sayanaṃ attharitvā dehi, pacchā pesanaṃ karissasī”ti āha. Sā tathā akāsi.
atk-s0502a:602_0: Atha naṃ cirenāgataṃ seṭṭhidhītā santajjesi. Atha naṃ sā āha – “mā me kujjhi, seṭṭhiputto
atk-s0502a:602_1: ghosako āgato, tassa idañcidañca katvā tattha gantvā āgatāmhī”ti. Seṭṭhidhītāya “seṭṭhiputto
atk-s0502a:602_2: ghosako”ti nāmaṃ sutvāva pemaṃ chaviyādīni chinditvā aṭṭhimiñjaṃ āhacca ṭhitaṃ. Kotuhalakālasmiñhi
atk-s0502a:602_3: sā tassa pajāpatī hutvā nāḷikodanaṃ paccekabuddhassa adāsi, tassānubhāvenāgantvā
atk-s0502a:602_4: imasmiṃ seṭṭhikule nibbattā. Iti taṃ so pubbasineho avattharitvā gaṇhi. Tenāha bhagavā –
atk-s0502a:604: Evaṃ taṃ jāyate pemaṃ, uppalaṃva yathodake”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:605_0: Atha naṃ pucchi – “kuhiṃ so, ammā”ti? “Sayane nipanno niddāyatī”ti. “Atthi panassa
atk-s0502a:605_1: hatthe kiñcī”ti? “Dussante paṇṇaṃ atthī”ti. Sā “kiṃ paṇṇaṃ nu kho eta”nti tasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:605_2: niddāyante mātāpitūnaṃ aññavihitatāya apassantānaṃ otaritvā samīpaṃ gantvā taṃ paṇṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:605_3: mocetvā ādāya attano gabbhaṃ pavisitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya vātapānaṃ vivaritvā akkharasamaye
atk-s0502a:605_4: kusalatāya paṇṇaṃ vācetvā, “aho vata bālo, attano maraṇapaṇṇaṃ dussante bandhitvā
atk-s0502a:605_5: vicarati, sace mayā na diṭṭhaṃ assa, natthissa jīvita”nti taṃ paṇṇaṃ phāletvā seṭṭhissa
atk-s0502a:605_6: vacanena aparaṃ paṇṇaṃ likhi – “ayaṃ mama putto ghosako nāma, gāmasatato paṇṇākāraṃ
atk-s0502a:605_7: āharāpetvā imassa janapadaseṭṭhino dhītarā saddhiṃ maṅgalaṃ katvā attano vasanagāmassa
atk-s0502a:605_8: majjhe dvibhūmakaṃ gehaṃ kāretvā pākāraparikkhepena ceva purisaguttiyā ca susaṃvihitārakkhaṃ
atk-s0502a:605_9: karotu, mayhañca ‘idañcidañca mayā kata’nti sāsanaṃ pesetu, evaṃ kate ahaṃ mātulassa
atk-s0502a:605_10: kattabbayuttakaṃ pacchā jānissāmī”ti, likhitvā ca pana saṅgharitvā otaritvā dussanteyevassa bandhi.
atk-s0502a:606_0: So divasabhāgaṃ niddāyitvā uṭṭhāya bhuñjitvā pakkāmi. Punadivase pātova taṃ gāmaṃ
atk-s0502a:606_1: gantvā āyuttakaṃ gāmakiccaṃ karontaṃyeva passi. So taṃ disvā, “kiṃ, tātā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a:606_2: “Pitarā me tumhākaṃ paṇṇaṃ pesita”nti. “Kiṃ paṇṇaṃ, tāta, āharā”ti paṇṇaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0502a:606_3: vācetvā tuṭṭhamānaso “passatha, bho, mama sāmino mayi sinehaṃ katvā jeṭṭhaputtassa
atk-s0502a:606_4: me maṅgalaṃ karotū”ti mama santikaṃ pahiṇi. “Sīghaṃ dāruādīni āharathā”ti gahapatike
atk-s0502a:606_5: vatvā gāmamajjhe vuttapakāraṃ gehaṃ kārāpetvā gāmasatato paṇṇākāraṃ āharāpetvā janapadaseṭṭhino
atk-s0502a:606_6: santikā dhītaraṃ ānetvā maṅgalaṃ katvā seṭṭhissa sāsanaṃ pahiṇi “idañcidañca mayā kata”nti.
atk-s0502a:607_0: Taṃ sutvā seṭṭhino “yaṃ kāremi, taṃ na hoti; yaṃ na kāremi, tadeva hotī”ti mahantaṃ
atk-s0502a:607_1: domanassaṃ uppajji. Puttasokena saddhiṃ so soko ekato hutvā kucchiḍāhaṃ uppādetvā
atk-s0502a:607_2: atisāraṃ janesi. Seṭṭhidhītāpi “sace koci seṭṭhino santikā āgacchati, mama akathetvā
atk-s0502a:607_3: seṭṭhiputtassa paṭhamataraṃ mā kathayitthā”ti jane āṇāpesi. Seṭṭhipi kho “dāni taṃ
atk-s0502a:607_4: duṭṭhaputtaṃ mama sāpateyyassa sāmikaṃ na karissāmī”ti cintetvā ekaṃ āyuttakaṃ āha
atk-s0502a:607_5: – “mātula, puttaṃ me daṭṭhukāmomhi, ekaṃ pādamūlikaṃ pesetvā mama puttaṃ pakkosāpehī”ti.
atk-s0502a:607_6: So “sādhū”ti vatvā paṇṇaṃ datvā ekaṃ purisaṃ pesesi. Seṭṭhidhītāpi tassa āgantvā
atk-s0502a:607_7: dvāre ṭhitabhāvaṃ sutvā taṃ pakkosāpetvā, “kiṃ, tātā”ti pucchi. So āha – “seṭṭhi
atk-s0502a:607_8: gilāno, puttaṃ passituṃ pakkosāpesi, ayye”ti. “Kiṃ, tāta, balavā, dubbalo”ti? “Balavā
atk-s0502a:607_9: tāva, āhāraṃ bhuñjatiyeva, ayye”ti. Sā seṭṭhiputtaṃ ajānāpetvāva tassa nivesanañca
atk-s0502a:607_10: paribbayañca dāpetvā “mayā pesitakāle gamissasi, acchassu tāvā”ti āha. Seṭṭhi puna
atk-s0502a:607_11: āyuttakaṃ avaca, “kiṃ, mātula, na te mama puttassa santikaṃ pahita”nti? “Pahitaṃ,
atk-s0502a:607_12: sāmi, gatapuriso na tāva etī”ti. “Tena hi puna aparaṃ pesehī”ti. So pesesi. Seṭṭhidhītā
atk-s0502a:607_13: tasmimpi tatheva paṭipajji. Atha seṭṭhino rogo balavā jāto, ekaṃ bhājanaṃ pavisati,
atk-s0502a:607_14: ekaṃ nikkhamati. Puna seṭṭhi āyuttakaṃ pucchi – “kiṃ, mātula, na te mama puttassa
atk-s0502a:607_15: santikaṃ pahita”nti? “Pahitaṃ, sāmi, gatapuriso na tāva etī”ti. “Tena hi puna aparaṃ
atk-s0502a:607_16: pesehī”ti. So pesesi. Seṭṭhidhītā tatiyavāre āgatampi taṃ pavattiṃ pucchi. So “bāḷhagilāno,
atk-s0502a:607_17: ayye, seṭṭhi āhāraṃ pacchinditvā maccuparāyaṇo jāto, ekaṃ bhājanaṃ nikkhamati, ekaṃ
atk-s0502a:607_18: pavisatī”ti āha. Seṭṭhidhītā “idāni gantuṃ kālo”ti seṭṭhiputtassa “pitā te kira gilāno”ti
atk-s0502a:607_19: ārocetvā “kiṃ vadesi bhadde”ti vutte “aphāsukamassa, sāmī”ti āha. “Idāni kiṃ kātabba”nti.
atk-s0502a:607_20: Sāmi? “Gāmasatato vuṭṭhānakapaṇṇākāraṃ ādāya gantvā passissāma na”nti. So “sādhū”ti
atk-s0502a:608_0: Atha naṃ sā “pitā te dubbalo, ettakaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā gacchantānaṃ papañco bhavissati,
atk-s0502a:608_1: etaṃ nivattāpehī”ti vatvā taṃ sabbaṃ attano kulagehaṃ pesetvā puna taṃ āha – “sāmi,
atk-s0502a:608_2: tvaṃ attano pitu pādapasse tiṭṭheyyāsi, ahaṃ ussīsakapasse ṭhassāmī”ti. Gehaṃ pavisamānāyeva
atk-s0502a:608_3: ca “gehassa purato ca pacchato ca ārakkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti attano purise āṇāpesi. Paviṭṭhakāle
atk-s0502a:608_4: pana seṭṭhiputto pitu pādapasse aṭṭhāsi, itarā ussīsakapasse.
atk-s0502a:609_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe seṭṭhi uttānako nipanno hoti. Āyuttako pana tassa pāde parimajjanto
atk-s0502a:609_1: “putto te, sāmi, āgato”ti āha. “Kuhiṃ so”ti? “Esa pādamūle ṭhito”ti. Atha naṃ disvā
atk-s0502a:609_2: āyakammikaṃ pakkosāpetvā, “mama gehe kittakaṃ dhana”nti pucchi. “Sāmi, dhanasseva
atk-s0502a:609_4: ayañca ayañca paricchedo”ti vutte, “ahaṃ ettakaṃ dhanaṃ mama puttassa ghosakassa
atk-s0502a:609_5: na demī”ti vattukāmo “demī”ti āha. Taṃ sutvā seṭṭhidhītā “ayaṃ puna kathento aññaṃ
atk-s0502a:609_6: kiñci katheyyā”ti cintetvā sokāturā viya kese vikiritvā rodamānā “kiṃ nāmetaṃ, tāta,
atk-s0502a:609_7: vadetha, idampi nāma vo vacanaṃ suṇoma, alakkhikā vatamhā”ti vatvā matthakena naṃ
atk-s0502a:609_8: uramajjhe paharantī patitvā yathā puna vattuṃ na sakkoti, tathāssa uramajjhe matthakena
atk-s0502a:609_9: ghaṃsentī ārodanaṃ dassesi. Seṭṭhi taṃkhaṇaññeva kālamakāsi. “Seṭṭhi mato”ti gantvā
atk-s0502a:609_10: utenassa rañño ārocayiṃsu. Rājā tassa sarīrakiccaṃ kārāpetvā, “atthi panassa putto
atk-s0502a:609_11: vā dhītā vā”ti pucchi. “Atthi, deva, ghosako nāma tassa putto, sabbaṃ sāpateyyaṃ
atk-s0502a:610_0: Rājā aparabhāge seṭṭhiputtaṃ pakkosāpesi. Tasmiñca divase devo vassi. Rājaṅgaṇe tattha
atk-s0502a:610_1: tattha udakaṃ saṇṭhāti. Seṭṭhiputto “rājānaṃ passissāmī”ti pāyāsi. Rājā vātapānaṃ
atk-s0502a:610_2: vivaritvā taṃ āgacchantaṃ olokento rājaṅgaṇe udakaṃ laṅghitvā āgacchantaṃ disvā āgantvā
atk-s0502a:610_3: vanditvā ṭhitaṃ “tvaṃ ghosako nāma, tātā”ti pucchitvā “āma, devā”ti vutte “pitā me
atk-s0502a:610_4: matoti mā soci, tava pettikaṃ seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ tuyhameva dassāmī”ti taṃ samassāsetvā
atk-s0502a:610_5: “gaccha, tātā”ti uyyojesi. Rājā gacchantañca naṃ olokentova aṭṭhāsi. So āgamanakāle
atk-s0502a:610_6: laṅghitaṃ udakaṃ gamanakāle otaritvā saṇikaṃ agamāsi. Atha naṃ rājā tatova pakkosāpetvā,
atk-s0502a:610_7: “kiṃ nu kho, tāta, tvaṃ mama santikaṃ āgacchanto udakaṃ laṅghitvā āgamma gacchanto
atk-s0502a:610_8: otaritvā saṇikaṃ gacchasī”ti pucchi. “Āma, deva, ahaṃ tasmiṃ khaṇe kumārako, kīḷanakālo
atk-s0502a:610_9: nāma, so idāni pana me devena ṭhānantaraṃ paṭissutaṃ. Tasmā yathā pure acaritvā idāni
atk-s0502a:610_10: sannisinnena hutvā carituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Taṃ sutvā rājā “dhitimāyaṃ puriso, idānevassa
atk-s0502a:610_11: ṭhānantaraṃ dassāmī”ti pitarā bhuttaṃ bhogaṃ datvā sabbasatena seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a:611_0: So rathe ṭhatvā nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ akāsi. Olokitolokitaṭṭhānaṃ kampati. Seṭṭhidhītā
atk-s0502a:611_1: kāḷidāsiyā saddhiṃ mantayamānā nisinnā “amma kāḷi, puttassa te ettikā sampatti maṃ
atk-s0502a:611_2: nissāya uppannā”ti āha. “Kiṃ kāraṇā, ammā”ti? “Ayañhi attano maraṇapaṇṇaṃ dussante
atk-s0502a:611_3: bandhitvā amhākaṃ gharaṃ āgato, athassa mayā taṃ paṇṇaṃ phāletvā mayā saddhiṃ maṅgalakaraṇatthāya
atk-s0502a:611_4: aññaṃ paṇṇaṃ likhitvā ettakaṃ kālaṃ tattha ārakkho kato”ti. “Amma, tvaṃ ettakaṃ passasi,
atk-s0502a:611_5: imaṃ pana seṭṭhi daharakālato paṭṭhāya māretukāmo māretuṃ nāsakkhi, kevalaṃ imaṃ
atk-s0502a:611_6: nissāya bahuṃ dhanaṃ khīyī”ti. “Amma, atibhāriyaṃ vata seṭṭhinā kata”nti. Nagaraṃ
atk-s0502a:611_7: padakkhiṇaṃ katvā gehaṃ pavisantaṃ pana naṃ disvā, “ayaṃ ettikā sampatti maṃ nissāya
atk-s0502a:611_8: uppannā”ti hasitaṃ akāsi. Atha naṃ seṭṭhiputto disvā, “kiṃ kāraṇā hasī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a:611_9: “Ekaṃ kāraṇaṃ nissāyā”ti. “Kathehi na”nti? “Sā na kathesi”. So “sace na kathessasi,
atk-s0502a:611_10: dvidhā taṃ chindissāmī”ti tajjetvā asiṃ nikkaḍḍhi. Sā “ayaṃ ettikā sampatti tayā
atk-s0502a:611_11: maṃ nissāya laddhāti cintetvā hasita”nti āha. “Yadi mama pitarā attano santakaṃ mayhaṃ
atk-s0502a:611_12: niyyāditaṃ, tvaṃ ettha kiṃ hosī”ti? So kira ettakaṃ kālaṃ kiñci na jānāti, tenassā
atk-s0502a:611_13: vacanaṃ na saddahi. Athassa sā “tumhākaṃ pitarā maraṇapaṇṇaṃ datvā pesitā, tumhe
atk-s0502a:611_14: mayā idañcidañca katvā rakkhitā”ti sabbaṃ kathesi. “Tvaṃ abhūtaṃ kathesī”ti asaddahanto
atk-s0502a:611_15: “mātaraṃ kāḷiṃ pucchissāmī”ti cintetvā “evaṃ kira, ammā”ti. “Āma, tāta, daharakālato
atk-s0502a:611_16: paṭṭhāya taṃ māretukāmo māretuṃ asakkonto taṃ nissāya bahuṃ dhanaṃ khīyi, sattasu
atk-s0502a:611_17: ṭhānesu tvaṃ maraṇato mutto, idāni bhogagāmato āgamma sabbasatena saddhiṃ seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:611_18: patto”ti. So taṃ sutvā “bhāriyaṃ vata kammaṃ, evarūpā kho pana maraṇā muttassa mama
atk-s0502a:611_19: pamādajīvitaṃ jīvituṃ ayuttaṃ, appamatto bhavissāmī”ti cintetvā devasikaṃ sahassaṃ
atk-s0502a:611_20: vissajjetvā addhikakapaṇādīnaṃ dānaṃ paṭṭhapesi. Mitto nāmassa kuṭumbiko dānabyāvaṭo
atk-s0502a:612_0: Tasmiṃ pana kāle bhaddavatīnagare bhaddavatiyaseṭṭhi nāma ghosakaseṭṭhino adiṭṭhapubbasahāyako
atk-s0502a:612_1: ahosi. Bhaddavatīnagarato āgatānaṃ vāṇijānaṃ santike ghosakaseṭṭhi bhaddavatiyaseṭṭhino
atk-s0502a:612_2: sampattiñca vayappadesañca sutvā tena saddhiṃ sahāyakabhāvaṃ icchanto paṇṇākāraṃ
atk-s0502a:612_3: pesesi. Bhaddavatiyaseṭṭhipi kosambito āgatānaṃ vāṇijānaṃ santike ghosakaseṭṭhino
atk-s0502a:612_4: sampattiñca vayappadesañca sutvā tena saddhiṃ sahāyakabhāvaṃ icchanto paṇṇākāraṃ
atk-s0502a:612_5: pesesi. Evaṃ te aññamaññaṃ adiṭṭhapubbasahāyakā hutvā vasiṃsu. Aparabhāge bhaddavatiyaseṭṭhino
atk-s0502a:612_6: gehe ahivātarogo patito. Tasmiṃ patite paṭhamaṃ makkhikā maranti, tato anukkameneva
atk-s0502a:612_7: kīṭā mūsikā kukkuṭā sūkarā gāvo dāsī dāsā sabbapacchā gharamānusakāpi maranti. Tesu
