atk-s0502a:744_6: – “jīvaka, cūḷapanthakassa pattaṃ gaṇhāhi, ayaṃ te anumodanaṃ karissatī”ti. Jīvako
atk-s0502a:744_7: tathā akāsi. Thero sīhanādaṃ nadanto taruṇasīho viya tīhi piṭakehi saṅkhobhetvā anumodanamakāsi.
atk-s0502a:744_8: Satthā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto vihāraṃ gantvā bhikkhūhi vatte dassite gandhakuṭippamukhe
atk-s0502a:744_9: ṭhatvā bhikkhusaṅghassa sugatovādaṃ datvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ uyyojetvā
atk-s0502a:744_10: surabhigandhavāsitaṃ gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā dakkhiṇena passena sīhaseyyaṃ upagato.
atk-s0502a:744_11: Atha sāyanhasamaye bhikkhū ito cito ca samosaritvā rattakambalasāṇiyā parikkhittā
atk-s0502a:744_12: viya nisīditvā satthu guṇakathaṃ ārabhiṃsu, “āvuso, mahāpanthako cūḷapanthakassa
atk-s0502a:744_13: ajjhāsayaṃ ajānanto catūhi māsehi ekaṃ gāthaṃ uggaṇhāpetuṃ na sakkoti, ‘dandho aya’nti
atk-s0502a:744_14: vihārā nikkaḍḍhi, sammāsambuddho pana attano anuttaradhammarājatāya ekasmiṃyevassa
atk-s0502a:744_15: antarabhatte saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ adāsi, tīṇi piṭakāni saha paṭisambhidāhiyeva
atk-s0502a:744_16: āgatāni, aho buddhānaṃ balaṃ nāma mahanta”nti.
atk-s0502a:745_0: Atha bhagavā dhammasabhāyaṃ imaṃ kathāpavattiṃ ñatvā, “ajja mayā gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0502a:745_1: buddhaseyyāya uṭṭhāya surattadupaṭṭaṃ nivāsetvā vijjulataṃ viya kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā
atk-s0502a:745_2: rattakambalasadisaṃ sugatamahācīvaraṃ pārupitvā surabhigandhakuṭito nikkhamma mattavaravāraṇasīhavijambhitavilāsena
atk-s0502a:745_3: anantāya buddhalīḷāya dhammasabhaṃ gantvā alaṅkatamaṇḍalamāḷamajjhe supaññattavarabuddhāsanaṃ
atk-s0502a:745_4: abhiruyha chabbaṇṇabuddharaṃsiyo vissajjento aṇṇavakucchiṃ khobhayamāno yugandharamatthake
atk-s0502a:745_5: bālasūriyo viya āsanamajjhe nisīdi. Sammāsambuddhe pana āgatamatte bhikkhusaṅgho
atk-s0502a:745_6: kathaṃ pacchinditvā tuṇhī ahosi. Satthā mudukena mettacittena parisaṃ oloketvā, “ayaṃ
atk-s0502a:745_7: parisā ativiya sobhati, ekassapi hatthakukkuccaṃ vā pādakukkuccaṃ vā ukkāsitasaddo
atk-s0502a:745_8: vā khipitasaddo vā natthi, sabbepi ime buddhagāravena sagāravā, buddhatejena tajjitā.
atk-s0502a:745_9: Mayi āyukappampi akathetvā nisinne paṭhamaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā na kathessanti.
atk-s0502a:745_10: Kathāsamuṭṭhāpanavattaṃ nāma mayāva jānitabbaṃ, ahameva paṭhamaṃ kathessāmī”ti madhurena
atk-s0502a:745_11: brahmassarena bhikkhū āmantetvā, “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā,
atk-s0502a:745_12: kā ca pana vo antarākathā vippakatā”ti pucchitvā, “imāya nāmā”ti vutte, “na, bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a:745_13: cūḷapanthako idāneva dandho, pubbepi dandhoyeva. Na kevalañcassāhaṃ idāneva avassayo
atk-s0502a:745_14: jāto, pubbepi avassayo ahosimeva. Pubbe panāhaṃ imaṃ lokiyakuṭumbassa sāmikaṃ akāsiṃ,
atk-s0502a:745_15: idāni lokuttarakuṭumbassā”ti vatvā tamatthaṃ vitthārato sotukāmehi bhikkhūhi āyācito atītaṃ āhari –
atk-s0502a:746_0: “Atīte, bhikkhave, bārāṇasinagaravāsī eko māṇavo takkasilaṃ gantvā sippuggahaṇatthāya
atk-s0502a:746_1: disāpāmokkhassa ācariyassa dhammantevāsiko hutvā pañcannaṃ māṇavakasatānaṃ antare
atk-s0502a:746_2: ativiya ācariyassa upakārako ahosi, pādaparikammādīni sabbakiccāni karoti. Dandhatāya
atk-s0502a:746_3: pana kiñci uggaṇhituṃ na sakko”ti. Ācariyo “ayaṃ mama bahūpakāro, sikkhāpessāmi na”nti
atk-s0502a:746_4: vāyamantopi kiñci sikkhāpetuṃ na sakkoti. So ciraṃ vasitvā ekagāthampi uggaṇhituṃ
atk-s0502a:746_5: asakkonto ukkaṇṭhitvā “gamissāmī”ti ācariyaṃ āpucchi. Ācariyo cintesi – “ayaṃ mayhaṃ
atk-s0502a:746_6: upakārako, paṇḍitabhāvamassa paccāsīsāmi, na naṃ kātuṃ sakkomi, avassaṃ mayā imassa
atk-s0502a:746_7: paccupakāro kātabbo, ekamassa mantaṃ bandhitvā dassāmī”ti so taṃ araññaṃ netvā “ghaṭṭesi
atk-s0502a:746_8: ghaṭṭesi, kiṃ kāraṇā ghaṭṭesi? Ahampi taṃ jānāmi jānāmī”ti imaṃ mantaṃ bandhitvā
atk-s0502a:746_10: paññāyatī”ti vutte “dandhena nāma vāyāmaṃ katvā paguṇaṃ kataṃ sippaṃ na palāyatī”ti
atk-s0502a:746_11: cintetvā maggaparibbayaṃ datvā, “gaccha, imaṃ mantaṃ nissāya jīvissasi, apalāyanatthāya
atk-s0502a:746_12: panassa niccaṃ sajjhāyaṃ kareyyāsī”ti vatvā taṃ uyyojesi. Athassa mātā bārāṇasiyaṃ
atk-s0502a:746_13: sampattakāle “putto me sippaṃ sikkhitvā āgato”ti mahāsakkārasammānaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a:747_0: Tadā bārāṇasirājā “atthi nu kho me kāyakammādīsu koci doso”ti paccavekkhanto attano
atk-s0502a:747_1: aruccanakaṃ kiñci kammaṃ adisvā “attano vajjaṃ nāma attano na paññāyati, paresaṃ
atk-s0502a:747_2: paññāyati, nāgarānaṃ pariggaṇhissāmī”ti cintetvā sāyaṃ aññātakavesena nikkhamitvā,
atk-s0502a:747_3: “sāyamāsaṃ bhuñjitvā nisinnamanussānaṃ kathāsallāpo nāma nānappakārako hoti, ‘sacāhaṃ
atk-s0502a:747_4: adhammena rajjaṃ kāremi, pāpena adhammikena raññā daṇḍabaliādīhi hatamhā’ti vakkhanti.
atk-s0502a:747_5: ‘Sace dhammena rajjaṃ kāremi, dīghāyuko hotu no rājā’tiādīni vatvā mama guṇaṃ kathessantī”ti
atk-s0502a:748_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe umaṅgacorā dvinnaṃ gehānaṃ antare umaṅgaṃ bhindanti ekaumaṅgeneva dve
atk-s0502a:748_1: gehāni pavisanatthāya. Rājā te disvā gehacchāyāya aṭṭhāsi. Tesaṃ umaṅgaṃ bhinditvā
atk-s0502a:748_2: gehaṃ pavisitvā bhaṇḍakaṃ olokitakāle māṇavo pabujjhitvā taṃ mantaṃ sajjhāyanto “ghaṭṭesi
atk-s0502a:748_3: ghaṭṭesi, kiṃ kāraṇā ghaṭṭesi? Ahampi taṃ jānāmi jānāmī”ti āha. Te taṃ sutvā, “iminā
atk-s0502a:748_4: kiramhā ñātā, idāni no nāsessatī”ti nivatthavatthānipi chaḍḍetvā bhītā sammukhasammukhaṭṭhāneneva
atk-s0502a:748_5: palāyiṃsu. Rājā te palāyante disvā itarassa ca mantasajjhāyanasaddaṃ sutvā gehaññeva
atk-s0502a:748_6: vavatthapetvā nāgarānaṃ pariggaṇhitvā nivesanaṃ pāvisi. So vibhātāya pana rattiyā
atk-s0502a:748_7: pātovekaṃ purisaṃ pakkositvā āha – “gaccha bhaṇe, asukavīthiyaṃ nāma yasmiṃ gehe
atk-s0502a:748_8: umaṅgo bhinno, tattha takkasilato sippaṃ uggaṇhitvā āgatamāṇavo atthi, taṃ ānehī”ti.
atk-s0502a:748_9: So gantvā “rājā taṃ pakkosatī”ti vatvā māṇavaṃ ānesi. Atha naṃ rājā āha – “tvaṃ,
atk-s0502a:748_10: tāta, takkasilato sippaṃ uggaṇhitvā āgatamāṇavo”ti? “Āma, devā”ti. “Amhākampi taṃ
atk-s0502a:748_11: sippaṃ dehī”ti. “Sādhu, deva, samānāsane nisīditvā gaṇhāhī”ti. Rājāpi tathā katvā
atk-s0502a:748_12: mantaṃ gahetvā “ayaṃ te ācariyabhāgo”ti sahassaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a:749_0: Tadā senāpati rañño kappakaṃ āha – “kadā rañño massuṃ karissasī”ti? “Sve vā parasuve
atk-s0502a:749_1: vā”ti. So tassa sahassaṃ datvā “kiccaṃ me atthī”ti vatvā, “kiṃ, sāmī”ti vutte “rañño
atk-s0502a:749_2: massukammaṃ karonto viya hutvā khuraṃ ativiya pahaṃsitvā galanāḷiṃ chinda, tvaṃ senāpati
atk-s0502a:749_3: bhavissasi, ahaṃ rājā”ti. So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā rañño massukammakaraṇadivase
atk-s0502a:749_4: gandhodakena massuṃ temetvā khuraṃ pahaṃsitvā nalāṭante gahetvā, “khuro thokaṃ kuṇṭhadhāro,
atk-s0502a:749_5: ekappahāreneva galanāḷiṃ chindituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti puna ekamantaṃ ṭhatvā khuraṃ pahaṃsi.
atk-s0502a:749_6: Tasmiṃ khaṇe rājā attano mantaṃ saritvā sajjhāyaṃ karonto “ghaṭṭesi ghaṭṭesi, kiṃ
atk-s0502a:749_7: kāraṇā ghaṭṭesi? Ahampi taṃ jānāmi jānāmī”ti āha. Nhāpitassa nalāṭato sedā mucciṃsu.
atk-s0502a:749_8: So “jānāti mama kāraṇaṃ rājā”ti bhīto khuraṃ bhūmiyaṃ khipitvā pādamūle urena nipajji.
atk-s0502a:749_9: Rājāno nāma chekā honti, tena taṃ evamāha – “are, duṭṭha, nhāpita, ‘na maṃ rājā jānātī’ti
atk-s0502a:749_10: saññaṃ karosī”ti. “Abhayaṃ me dehi, devā”ti. “Hotu, mā bhāyi, kathehī”ti. Senāpati
atk-s0502a:749_11: me, deva, sahassaṃ datvā, “rañño massuṃ karonto viya galanāḷiṃ chinda, ahaṃ rājā
atk-s0502a:749_12: hutvā taṃ senāpatiṃ karissāmī”ti āhāti. Rājā taṃ sutvā “ācariyaṃ me nissāya jīvitaṃ
atk-s0502a:749_13: laddha”nti cintetvā senāpatiṃ pakkosāpetvā, “ambho, senāpati, kiṃ nāma tayā mama
atk-s0502a:749_14: santikā na laddhaṃ, idāni taṃ daṭṭhuṃ na sakkomi, mama raṭṭhā nikkhamāhī”ti taṃ raṭṭhā
atk-s0502a:749_15: pabbājetvā ācariyaṃ pakkosāpetvā, “ācariya, taṃ nissāya mayā jīvitaṃ laddha”nti vatvā
atk-s0502a:749_16: mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ karitvā tassa senāpatiṭṭhānaṃ adāsi. “So tadā cūḷapanthako ahosi,
atk-s0502a:750_0: Satthā imaṃ atītaṃ āharitvā, “evaṃ, bhikkhave, pubbepi cūḷapanthako dandhoyeva ahosi,
atk-s0502a:750_1: tadāpissāhaṃ avassayo hutvā taṃ lokiyakuṭumbe patiṭṭhāpesi”nti vatvā puna ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0502a:750_2: “aho satthā cūḷapanthakassa avassayo jāto”ti kathāya samuṭṭhitāya cūḷaseṭṭhijātake
atk-s0502a:753_0: Gāthaṃ vatvā, “na, bhikkhave, idānevāhaṃ imassa avassayo jāto, pubbepi avassayo ahosimeva.
atk-s0502a:753_1: Pubbe panāhaṃ imaṃ lokiyakuṭumbassa sāmikaṃ akāsiṃ, idāni lokuttarakuṭumbassa. Tadā
atk-s0502a:753_2: hi cūḷantevāsiko cūḷapanthako ahosi, cūḷaseṭṭhi pana paṇḍito byatto nakkhattakovido
atk-s0502a:754_0: Punekadivasaṃ dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ, “āvuso, cūḷapanthako catūhi māsehi
atk-s0502a:754_1: catuppadaṃ gāthaṃ gahetuṃ asakkontopi vīriyaṃ anossajjitvāva arahatte patiṭṭhito,
atk-s0502a:754_2: idāni lokuttaradhammakuṭumbassa sāmiko jāto”ti. Satthā āgantvā, “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a:754_3: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā, “imāya nāmā”ti vutte, “bhikkhave, mama sāsane
atk-s0502a:754_4: āraddhavīriyo bhikkhu lokuttaradhammassa sāmiko hotiyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:757: Dīpaṃ kayirātha medhāvī, yaṃ ogho nābhikīratī”ti.
atk-s0502a:758_0: Tattha dīpaṃ kayirāthāti vīriyasaṅkhātena uṭṭhānena, satiyā avippavāsākārasaṅkhātena
atk-s0502a:758_1: appamādena, catupārisuddhisīlasaṅkhātena saṃyamena, indriyadamena cāti imehi kāraṇabhūtehi
atk-s0502a:758_2: catūhi dhammehi dhammojapaññāya samannāgato medhāvī imasmiṃ ativiya dullabhapatiṭṭhatāya
atk-s0502a:758_3: atigambhīre saṃsārasāgare attano patiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ arahattaphalaṃ dīpaṃ kayirātha
atk-s0502a:758_4: kareyya, kātuṃ sakkuṇeyyāti attho. Kīdisaṃ? Yaṃ ogho nābhikīratīti yaṃ catubbidhopi
atk-s0502a:758_5: kilesogho abhikirituṃ viddhaṃsetuṃ na sakkoti. Na hi sakkā arahattaṃ oghena abhikiritunti.
atk-s0502a:759: Gāthāpariyosāne bahū sotāpannādayo ahesuṃ. Evaṃ desanā sampattaparisāya sātthikā jātāti.
atk-s0502a:762: Pamādamanuyuñjantīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto bālanakkhattaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:763_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye sāvatthiyaṃ bālanakkhattaṃ nāma saṅghuṭṭhaṃ. Tasmiṃ nakkhatte bālā
atk-s0502a:763_1: dummedhino janā chārikāya ceva gomayena ca sarīraṃ makkhetvā sattāhaṃ asabbhaṃ bhaṇantā
atk-s0502a:763_2: vicaranti. Kiñci ñāti suhajjaṃ vā pabbajitaṃ vā disvā lajjantā nāma natthi. Dvāre
atk-s0502a:763_3: dvāre ṭhatvā asabbhaṃ bhaṇanti. Manussā tesaṃ asabbhaṃ sotuṃ asakkontā yathābalaṃ
atk-s0502a:763_4: aḍḍhaṃ vā pādaṃ vā kahāpaṇaṃ vā pesenti. Te tesaṃ dvāre laddhaṃ laddhaṃ gahetvā pakkamanti.
atk-s0502a:763_5: Tadā pana sāvatthiyaṃ pañca koṭimattā ariyasāvakā vasanti, te satthu santikaṃ sāsanaṃ
atk-s0502a:763_6: pesayiṃsu – “bhagavā, bhante, sattāhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ nagaraṃ appavisitvā
atk-s0502a:763_7: vihāreyeva hotū”ti. Tañca pana sattāhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa vihāreyeva yāgubhattādīni
atk-s0502a:763_8: sampādetvā pahiṇiṃsu, sayampi gehā na nikkhamiṃsu. Te nakkhatte pana pariyosite aṭṭhame
atk-s0502a:763_9: divase buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā nagaraṃ pavesetvā mahādānaṃ datvā
atk-s0502a:763_10: ekamantaṃ nisinnā, “bhante, atidukkhena no satta divasāni atikkantāni, bālānaṃ asabbhāni
atk-s0502a:763_11: suṇantānaṃ kaṇṇā bhijjanākārappattā honti, koci kassaci na lajjati, tena mayaṃ tumhākaṃ
atk-s0502a:763_12: antonagaraṃ pavisituṃ nādamha, mayampi gehato na nikkhamimhā”ti āhaṃsu. Satthā tesaṃ
atk-s0502a:763_13: kathaṃ sutvā, “bālānaṃ dummedhānaṃ kiriyā nāma evarūpā hoti, medhāvino pana dhanasāraṃ
atk-s0502a:763_14: viya appamādaṃ rakkhitvā amatamahānibbānasampattiṃ pāpuṇantī”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:769: Appamatto hi jhāyanto, pappoti vipulaṃ sukha”nti.
atk-s0502a:770_0: Tattha bālāti bālyena samannāgatā idhalokaparalokatthaṃ ajānantā. Dummedhinoti nippaññā.
atk-s0502a:770_1: Te pamāde ādīnavaṃ apassantā pamādaṃ anuyuñjanti pavattenti, pamādena kālaṃ vītināmenti.
atk-s0502a:770_2: Medhāvīti dhammojapaññāya samannāgato pana paṇḍito kulavaṃsāgataṃ seṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ
atk-s0502a:770_3: sattaratanadhanaṃ viya appamādaṃ rakkhati. Yathā hi uttamaṃ dhanaṃ nissāya “kāmaguṇasampattiṃ
atk-s0502a:770_4: pāpuṇissāma, puttadāraṃ posessāma, paralokagamanamaggaṃ sodhessāmā”ti dhane ānisaṃsaṃ
atk-s0502a:770_5: passantā taṃ rakkhanti, evaṃ paṇḍitopi appamatto “paṭhamajjhānādīni paṭilabhissāmi,
atk-s0502a:770_6: maggaphalādīni pāpuṇissāmi, tisso vijjā, cha abhiññā sampādessāmī”ti appamāde ānisaṃsaṃ
atk-s0502a:770_7: passanto dhanaṃ seṭṭhaṃva appamādaṃ rakkhatīti attho. Mā pamādanti tasmā tumhe mā
atk-s0502a:770_8: pamādamanuyuñjetha mā pamādena kālaṃ vītināmayittha. Mā kāmaratisanthavanti vatthukāmakilesakāmesu
atk-s0502a:770_9: ratisaṅkhātaṃ taṇhāsanthavampi mā anuyuñjetha mā cintayittha mā paṭilabhittha. Appamatto
atk-s0502a:770_10: hīti upaṭṭhitassatitāya hi appamatto jhāyanto puggalo vipulaṃ uḷāraṃ nibbānasukhaṃ pāpuṇātīti.
atk-s0502a:771: Gāthāpariyosāne bahū sotāpannādayo ahesuṃ. Mahājanassa sātthikā dhammadesanā jātāti.
atk-s0502a:774: Pamādaṃ appamādenāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto mahākassapattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:775_0: Ekasmiñhi divase thero pipphaliguhāyaṃ viharanto rājagahe piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ
atk-s0502a:775_1: piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā pamatte ca appamatte ca udakapathavīpabbatādīsu
atk-s0502a:775_2: cavanake upapajjanake ca satte dibbena cakkhunā olokento nisīdi. Satthā jetavane
atk-s0502a:775_3: nisinnakova “kena nu kho vihārena ajja mama putto kassapo viharatī”ti dibbena cakkhunā
atk-s0502a:775_4: upadhārento “sattānaṃ cutūpapātaṃ olokento viharatī”ti ñatvā “sattānaṃ cutūpapāto
atk-s0502a:775_5: nāma buddhañāṇenapi aparicchinno, mātukucchiyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā mātāpitaro ajānāpetvā
atk-s0502a:775_6: cavanasattānaṃ paricchedo kātuṃ na sakkā, te jānituṃ tava avisayo, kassapa, appamattako
atk-s0502a:775_7: tava visayo, sabbaso pana cavante ca upapajjante ca jānituṃ passituṃ buddhānameva
atk-s0502a:775_8: visayo”ti vatvā obhāsaṃ pharitvā sammukhe nisinno viya hutvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:780_0: Tattha nudatīti yathā nāma pokkharaṇiṃ pavisantaṃ navodakaṃ purāṇodakaṃ khobhetvā
atk-s0502a:780_1: tassokāsaṃ adatvā taṃ attano matthakamatthakena palāyantaṃ nudati nīharati, evameva
atk-s0502a:780_2: paṇḍito appamādalakkhaṇaṃ brūhento pamādassokāsaṃ adatvā yadā appamādavegena taṃ
atk-s0502a:780_3: nudati nīharati, atha so panunnapamādo accuggatatthena parisuddhaṃ dibbacakkhusaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0502a:780_4: paññāpāsādaṃ tassa anucchavikaṃ paṭipadaṃ pūrento tāya paṭipadāya nisseṇiyā pāsādaṃ
atk-s0502a:780_5: viya āruyha pahīnasokasallatāya asoko, appahīnasokasallatāya sokiniṃ pajaṃ sattanikāyaṃ
atk-s0502a:780_6: cavamānañceva upapajjamānañca dibbacakkhunā avekkhati passati. Yathā kiṃ? Pabbataṭṭhova
atk-s0502a:780_7: bhūmaṭṭheti pabbatamuddhani ṭhito bhūmiyaṃ ṭhite, uparipāsāde vā pana ṭhito pāsādapariveṇe
atk-s0502a:780_8: ṭhite akicchena avekkhati, tathā sopi dhīro paṇḍito mahākhīṇāsavo asamucchinnavaṭṭabīje
atk-s0502a:780_9: bāle cavante ca upapajjante ca akicchena avekkhatīti.
atk-s0502a:784: Appamatto pamattesūti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto dve sahāyake bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:785_0: Te kira satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā āraññakavihāraṃ pavisiṃsu. Tesu eko kira
atk-s0502a:785_1: kālasseva dārūni āharitvā aṅgārakapallaṃ sajjetvā daharasāmaṇerehi saddhiṃ sallapanto
atk-s0502a:785_2: paṭhamayāmaṃ visibbamāno nisīdati. Eko appamatto samaṇadhammaṃ karonto itaraṃ ovadati,
atk-s0502a:785_3: “āvuso, mā evaṃ kari, pamattassa hi cattāro apāyā sakagharasadisā. Buddhā nāma sāṭheyyena
atk-s0502a:785_4: ārādhetuṃ na sakkā”ti so tassovādaṃ na suṇāti. Itaro “nāyaṃ vacanakkhamo”ti taṃ avatvā
atk-s0502a:785_5: appamattova samaṇadhammamakāsi. Alasattheropi paṭhamayāme visibbetvā itarassa caṅkamitvā
atk-s0502a:785_6: gabbhaṃ paviṭṭhakāle pavisitvā, “mahākusīta, tvaṃ nipajjitvā sayanatthāya araññaṃ
atk-s0502a:785_7: paviṭṭhosi, kiṃ buddhānaṃ santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā uṭṭhāya samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ
atk-s0502a:785_8: vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvā nipajjitvā supati. Itaropi majjhimayāme
atk-s0502a:785_9: vissamitvā pacchimayāme paccuṭṭhāya samaṇadhammaṃ karoti. So evaṃ appamatto viharanto
atk-s0502a:785_10: na cirasseva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Itaro pamādeneva kālaṃ vītināmesi.
atk-s0502a:785_11: Te vuṭṭhavassā satthu santikaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu. Satthā
atk-s0502a:785_12: tehi saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā, “kacci, bhikkhave, appamattā samaṇadhammaṃ karittha,
atk-s0502a:785_13: kacci vo pabbajitakiccaṃ matthakaṃ patta”nti pucchi. Paṭhamaṃ pamatto bhikkhu āha
atk-s0502a:785_14: – “kuto, bhante, etassa appamādo, gatakālato paṭṭhāya nipajjitvā niddāyanto kālaṃ
atk-s0502a:785_15: vītināmesī”ti. “Tvaṃ pana bhikkhū”ti. “Ahaṃ, bhante, kālasseva dārūni āharitvā aṅgārakapallaṃ
atk-s0502a:785_16: sajjetvā paṭhamayāme visibbento nisīditvā aniddāyantova kālaṃ vītināmesi”nti. Atha
atk-s0502a:785_17: naṃ satthā “tvaṃ pamatto kālaṃ vītināmetvā ‘appamattomhī’ti vadasi, appamattaṃ pana
atk-s0502a:785_18: pamattaṃ karosī”ti āha. Puna pamāde dose, appamāde ānisaṃse pakāsetuṃ, “tvaṃ mama
atk-s0502a:785_19: puttassa santike javacchinno dubbalasso viya, esa pana tava santike sīghajavasso
atk-s0502a:789_0: Tattha appamattoti sativepullappattatāya appamādasampanne khīṇāsavo. Pamattesūti
atk-s0502a:789_1: sativosagge ṭhitesu sattesu. Suttesūti satijāgariyābhāvena sabbiriyāpathesu niddāyantesu.
atk-s0502a:789_2: Bahujāgaroti mahante sativepulle jāgariye ṭhito. Abalassaṃvāti kuṇṭhapādaṃ chinnajavaṃ
atk-s0502a:789_3: dubbalassaṃ sīghajavo sindhavājānīyo viya. Sumedhasoti uttamapañño. Tathārūpaṃ puggalaṃ
atk-s0502a:789_4: āgamenapi adhigamenapi hitvā yāti. Mandapaññasmiñhi ekaṃ suttaṃ gahetuṃ vāyamanteyeva
atk-s0502a:789_5: sumedhaso ekaṃ vaggaṃ gaṇhāti, evaṃ tāva āgamena hitvā yāti. Mandapaññe pana rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānāni
atk-s0502a:789_6: kātuṃ vāyamanteyeva kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggahetvā sajjhāyanteyeva ca sumedhaso pubbabhāgepi
atk-s0502a:789_7: parena kataṃ rattiṭṭhānaṃ vā divāṭṭhānaṃ vā pavisitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ sammasanto sabbakilese
atk-s0502a:789_8: khepetvā neva lokuttaradhamme hatthagate karoti, evaṃ adhigamenapi hitvā yāti. Vaṭṭe
atk-s0502a:789_9: pana naṃ hitvā chaḍḍetvā vaṭṭato nissaranto yātiyevāti.
atk-s0502a:793: Appamādena maghavāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā vesāliyaṃ upanissāya kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ viharanto sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:794_0: Vesāliyañhi mahāli nāma licchavī vasati, so tathāgatassa sakkapañhasuttantadesanaṃ
atk-s0502a:794_1: sutvā “sammāsambuddho sakkasampattiṃ mahatiṃ katvā kathesi, ‘disvā nu kho kathesi,
atk-s0502a:794_2: udāhu adisvā. Jānāti nu kho sakkaṃ, udāhu no’ti pucchissāmi na”nti cintesi. Atha
atk-s0502a:794_3: kho, mahāli, licchavī yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā
atk-s0502a:794_4: ekamantaṃ nisīdi, ekamantaṃ nisinno kho, mahāli, licchavī bhagavantaṃ etadavoca –
atk-s0502a:794_5: “diṭṭho kho, bhante, bhagavatā sakko devānamindo”ti? “Diṭṭho kho me, mahāli, sakko
atk-s0502a:794_6: devānamindo”ti. “So hi nuna, bhante, sakkapatirūpako bhavissati. Duddaso hi, bhante,
atk-s0502a:794_7: sakko devānamindo”ti. “Sakkañca khvāhaṃ, mahāli, pajānāmi sakkakaraṇe ca dhamme,
atk-s0502a:794_8: yesaṃ dhammānaṃ samādinnattā sakko sakkattaṃ ajjhagā, tañca pajānāmi”.
atk-s0502a:795: Sakko, mahāli, devānamindo pubbe manussabhūto samāno magho nāma māṇavo ahosi, tasmā “maghavā”ti vuccati.
atk-s0502a:796: Sakko, mahāli, devānamindo pubbe manussabhūto samāno pure dānaṃ adāsi, tasmā “purindado”ti vuccati.
atk-s0502a:797: Sakko, mahāli, devānamindo pubbe manussabhūto samāno sakkaccaṃ dānaṃ adāsi, tasmā “sakko”ti vuccati.
atk-s0502a:798: Sakko, mahāli, devānamindo pubbe manussabhūto samāno āvasathaṃ adāsi, tasmā “vāsavo”ti vuccati.
atk-s0502a:799: Sakko, mahāli, devānamindo sahassampi atthaṃ muhuttena cinteti, tasmā “sahassakkho”ti vuccati.
atk-s0502a:800: Sakkassa, mahāli, devānamindassa sujā nāma asurakaññā, pajāpati, tasmā “sujampatī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0502a:801: Sakko, mahāli, devānamindo devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ issariyādhipaccaṃ rajjaṃ kāreti, tasmā “devānamindo”ti vuccati.
atk-s0502a:802_0: Sakkassa, mahāli, devānamindassa pubbe manussabhūtassa satta vatapadāni samattāni
atk-s0502a:802_1: samādinnāni ahesuṃ, yesaṃ samādinnattā sakko sakkattaṃ ajjhagā. Katamāni satta vatapadāni?
atk-s0502a:802_2: Yāvajīvaṃ mātāpettibharo assaṃ, yāvajīvaṃ kule jeṭṭhāpacāyī assaṃ, yāvajīvaṃ saṇhavāco
atk-s0502a:802_3: assaṃ, yāvajīvaṃ apisuṇavāco assaṃ, yāvajīvaṃ vigatamalamaccherena cetasā agāraṃ
atk-s0502a:802_4: ajjhāvaseyyaṃ, muttacāgo payatapāṇi vosaggarato yācayogo dānasaṃvibhāgarato assaṃ.
atk-s0502a:802_5: Yāvajīvaṃ saccavāco assaṃ, yāvajīvaṃ akkodhano assaṃ, “sacepi me kodho uppajjeyya,
atk-s0502a:802_6: khippameva na paṭivineyya”nti. Sakkassa, mahāli, devānamindassa pubbe manussabhūtassa
atk-s0502a:802_7: imāni satta vatapadāni samattāni samādinnāni ahesuṃ, yesaṃ samādinnattā sakko sakkattaṃ ajjhagāti.
atk-s0502a:806: Taṃ ve devā tāvatiṃsā, āhu sappuriso itī”ti. –
atk-s0502a:807_0: Idaṃ, mahāli, sakkena maghamāṇavakāle katakammanti vatvā puna tena “kathaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a:807_1: maghamāṇavo paṭipajjī”ti? Tassa paṭipattiṃ vitthārato sotukāmena puṭṭho “tena hi,
atk-s0502a:808_0: Atīte magadharaṭṭhe macalagāme magho nāma māṇavo gāmakammakaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā attano
atk-s0502a:808_1: ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ pādantena paṃsuṃ viyūhitvā ramaṇīyaṃ katvā aṭṭhāsi. Aparo taṃ bāhunā
atk-s0502a:808_2: paharitvā tato apanetvā sayaṃ tattha aṭṭhāsi. So tassa akujjhitvāva aññaṃ ṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:808_3: ramaṇīyaṃ katvā ṭhito. Tatopi naṃ añño āgantvā bāhunā paharitvā apanetvā sayaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:808_4: So tassapi akujjhitvāva aññaṃ ṭhānaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ katvā ṭhito, iti taṃ gehato nikkhantā
atk-s0502a:808_5: nikkhantā purisā bāhunā paharitvā ṭhitaṭhitaṭṭhānato apanesuṃ. So “sabbepete maṃ
atk-s0502a:808_6: nissāya sukhitā jātā, iminā kammena mayhaṃ sukhadāyakena puññakammena bhavitabba”nti
atk-s0502a:808_7: cintetvā, punadivase kudālaṃ ādāya khalamaṇḍalamattaṃ ṭhānaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ akāsi. Sabbe
atk-s0502a:808_8: gantvā tattheva aṭṭhaṃsu. Atha nesaṃ sītasamaye aggiṃ katvā adāsi, gimhakāle udakaṃ.
atk-s0502a:808_9: Tato “ramaṇīyaṃ ṭhānaṃ nāma sabbesaṃ piyaṃ, kassaci appiyaṃ nāma natthi, ito paṭṭhāya
atk-s0502a:808_10: mayā maggaṃ samaṃ karontena vicarituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā, pātova nikkhamitvā, maggaṃ
atk-s0502a:808_11: samaṃ karonto chinditvā, haritabbayuttakā rukkhasākhā haranto vicarati. Atha naṃ
atk-s0502a:808_12: aparo disvā āha – “samma, kiṃ karosī”ti? “Mayhaṃ saggagāminaṃ maggaṃ karomi, sammā”ti.
atk-s0502a:808_13: “Tena hi ahampi te sahāyo homī”ti. “Hohi, samma, saggo nāma bahūnampi manāpo sukhabahulo”ti.
atk-s0502a:808_14: Tato paṭṭhāya dve janā ahesuṃ. Te disvā tatheva pucchitvā ca sutvā ca aparopi tesaṃ
atk-s0502a:808_15: sahāyo jāto, evaṃ aparopi aparopīti sabbepi tettiṃsa janā jātā. Te sabbepi kudālādihatthā
atk-s0502a:809_0: Te disvā gāmabhojako cintesi – “ime manussā ayoge yuttā, sace ime araññato macchamaṃsādīni
atk-s0502a:809_1: vā āhareyyuṃ. Suraṃ vā katvā piveyyuṃ, aññaṃ vā tādisaṃ kammaṃ kareyyuṃ, ahampi kiñci
atk-s0502a:809_2: kiñci labheyya”nti. Atha ne pakkosāpetvā pucchi – “kiṃ karontā vicarathā”ti? “Saggamaggaṃ,
atk-s0502a:809_3: sāmī”ti. “Gharāvāsaṃ vasantehi nāma evaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati, araññato macchamaṃsādīni
atk-s0502a:809_4: āharituṃ, suraṃ katvā pātuṃ, nānappakāre ca kammante kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Te tassa vacanaṃ
atk-s0502a:809_5: paṭikkhipiṃsu, evaṃ punappunaṃ vuccamānāpi paṭikkhipiṃsuyeva. So kujjhitvā “nāsessāmi
atk-s0502a:809_6: ne”ti rañño santikaṃ gantvā, “core te, deva, vaggabandhanena vicarante passāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:809_7: vatvā, “gaccha, te gahetvā ānehī”ti vutte tathā katvā sabbe te bandhitvā ānetvā rañño
atk-s0502a:809_8: dassesi. Rājā avīmaṃsitvāva “hatthinā maddāpethā”ti āṇāpesi. Magho sesānaṃ ovādamadāsi
atk-s0502a:809_9: – “sammā, ṭhapetvā mettaṃ añño amhākaṃ avassayo natthi, tumhe katthaci kopaṃ akatvā
atk-s0502a:809_10: raññe ca gāmabhojake ca maddanahatthimhi ca attani ca mettacittena samacittāva hothā”ti.
atk-s0502a:809_11: Te tathā kariṃsu. Atha nesaṃ mettānubhāvena hatthī uppasaṅkamitumpi na visahi. Rājā
atk-s0502a:809_12: tamatthaṃ sutvā bahū manusse disvā maddituṃ na visahissati? “Gacchatha, ne kilañjena
atk-s0502a:809_13: paṭicchādetvā maddāpethā”ti āha. Te kilañjena paṭicchādetvā maddituṃ pesiyamānopi
atk-s0502a:810_0: Rājā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā “kāraṇenettha bhavitabba”nti te pakkosāpetvā pucchi – “tātā,
atk-s0502a:810_1: maṃ nissāya tumhe kiṃ na labhathā”ti? “Kiṃ nāmetaṃ, devā”ti? “Tumhe kira vaggabandhanena
atk-s0502a:810_2: corā hutvā araññe vicarathā”ti? “Ko evamāha, devā”ti? “Gāmabhojako, tātā”ti. “Na
atk-s0502a:810_3: mayaṃ, deva, corā, mayaṃ pana attano saggamaggaṃ sodhentā idañcidañca karoma, gāmabhojako
atk-s0502a:810_4: amhe akusalakiriyāya niyojetvā attano vacanaṃ akaronte nāsetukāmo kujjhitvā evamāhā”ti.
atk-s0502a:810_5: Atha rājā tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā somanassappatto hutvā, “tātā, ayaṃ tiracchāno tumhākaṃ
atk-s0502a:810_6: guṇe jānāti, ahaṃ manussabhūto jānituṃ nāsakkhiṃ, khamatha me”ti. Evañca pana vatvā
atk-s0502a:810_7: saputtadāraṃ gāmabhojakaṃ tesaṃ dāsaṃ, hatthiṃ ārohaniyaṃ, tañca gāmaṃ yathāsukhaṃ
atk-s0502a:810_8: paribhogaṃ katvā adāsi. Te “idheva no katapuññassānisaṃso diṭṭho”ti bhiyyosomattāya
atk-s0502a:810_9: pasannamānasā hutvā taṃ hatthiṃ vārena vārena abhiruyha gacchantā mantayiṃsu “idāni
atk-s0502a:810_10: amhehi atirekataraṃ puññaṃ kātabbaṃ, kiṃ karoma? Catumahāpathe thāvaraṃ katvā mahājanassa
atk-s0502a:810_11: vissamanasālaṃ karissāmā”ti. Te vaḍḍhakiṃ pakkosāpetvā sālaṃ paṭṭhapesuṃ. Mātugāmesu
atk-s0502a:810_12: pana vigatacchandatāya tassā sālāya mātugāmānaṃ pattiṃ nādaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:811_0: Maghassa pana gehe nandā, cittā, sudhammā, sujāti catasso itthiyo honti. Tāsu sudhammā
atk-s0502a:811_1: vaḍḍhakinā saddhiṃ ekato hutvā, “bhātika, imissā sālāya maṃ jeṭṭhikaṃ karohī”ti vatvā
atk-s0502a:811_2: lañjaṃ adāsi. So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā paṭhamameva kaṇṇikatthāya rukkhaṃ sukkhāpetvā
atk-s0502a:811_3: tacchetvā vijjhitvā kaṇṇikaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā, “sudhammā nāma ayaṃ sālā”ti akkharāni chinditvā
atk-s0502a:811_4: vatthena paliveṭhetvā ṭhapesi. Atha ne vaḍḍhakī sālaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā kaṇṇikāropanadivase
atk-s0502a:811_5: “aho, ayyā, ekaṃ karaṇīyaṃ na sarimhā”ti āha. “Kiṃ nāma, bho”ti? “Kaṇṇika”nti. “Hotu
atk-s0502a:811_6: taṃ āharissāmā”ti. “Idāni chinnarukkhena kātuṃ na sakkā, pubbeyeva taṃ chinditvā
atk-s0502a:811_7: tacchetvā vijjhitvā ṭhapitakaṇṇikā laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. “Idāni kiṃ kātabba”nti? “Sace
atk-s0502a:811_8: kassaci gehe niṭṭhāpetvā ṭhapitā vikkāyikakaṇṇikā atthi, sā pariyesitabbā”ti. Te
atk-s0502a:811_9: pariyesantā sudhammāya gehe disvā sahassaṃ datvāpi mūlena na labhiṃsu. “Sace maṃ
atk-s0502a:811_10: sālāya pattiṃ karotha, dassāmī”ti vutte pana “mayaṃ mātugāmānaṃ pattiṃ na dammā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:812_0: Atha ne vaḍḍhakī āha – “ayyā, tumhe kiṃ kathetha, ṭhapetvā brahmalokaṃ aññaṃ mātugāmarahitaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:812_1: nāma natthi, gaṇhatha kaṇṇikaṃ. Evaṃ sante amhākaṃ kammaṃ niṭṭhaṃ gamissatī”ti. Te
atk-s0502a:812_2: “sādhū”ti kaṇṇikaṃ gahetvā sālaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā tidhā vibhajiṃsu. Ekasmiṃ koṭṭhāse issarānaṃ
atk-s0502a:812_3: vasanaṭṭhānaṃ kariṃsu, ekasmiṃ duggatānaṃ, ekasmiṃ gilānānaṃ. Tettiṃsa janā tettiṃsa
atk-s0502a:812_4: phalakāni paññapetvā hatthissa saññaṃ adaṃsu – “āgantuko āgantvā yassa atthataphalake
atk-s0502a:812_5: nisīdati, taṃ gahetvā phalakasāmikasseva gehe patiṭṭhapehi, tassa pādaparikammapiṭṭhiparikammapānīyakhādanīyabhojanīyasayanāni
atk-s0502a:812_6: sabbāni phalakasāmikasseva bhāro bhavissatī”ti. Hatthī āgatāgataṃ gahetvā phalakasāmikasseva
atk-s0502a:812_7: gharaṃ neti. So tassa taṃ divasaṃ kattabbaṃ karoti. Magho sālāya avidūre koviḷārarukkhaṃ
atk-s0502a:812_8: ropetvā tassa mūle pāsāṇaphalakaṃ atthari. Sālaṃ paviṭṭhapaviṭṭhā janā kaṇṇikaṃ oloketvā
atk-s0502a:812_9: akkharāni vācetvā, “sudhammā nāmesā sālā”ti vadanti. Tettiṃsajanānaṃ nāmaṃ na paññāyati.
atk-s0502a:812_10: Nandā cintesi – “ime sālaṃ karontā amhe apattikā kariṃsu, sudhammā pana attano byattatāya
atk-s0502a:812_11: kaṇṇikaṃ katvā pattikā jātā, mayāpi kiñci kātuṃ vaṭṭati, kiṃ nu kho karissāmī”ti?
atk-s0502a:812_12: Athassā etadahosi – “sālaṃ āgatāgatānaṃ pānīyañceva nhānodakañca laddhuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0502a:812_13: pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇāpessāmī”ti. Sā pokkharaṇiṃ kāresi. Cittā cintesi – “sudhammāya kaṇṇikā
atk-s0502a:812_14: dinnā, nandāya pokkharaṇī kāritā, mayāpi kiñci kātuṃ vaṭṭati, kiṃ nu kho karissāmī”ti?
atk-s0502a:812_15: Athassā etadahosi – “sālaṃ āgatāgatehi pānīyaṃ pivitvā nhatvā gamanakālepi mālaṃ
atk-s0502a:812_16: pilandhitvā gantuṃ vaṭṭati, pupphārāmaṃ kārāpessāmī”ti. Sā ramaṇīyaṃ pupphārāmaṃ
atk-s0502a:812_17: kāresi. Yebhuyyena tasmiṃ ārāme “asuko nāma pupphūpagaphalūpagarukkho natthī”ti nāhosi.
atk-s0502a:813_0: Sujā pana “ahaṃ maghassa mātuladhītā ceva pādaparicārikā ca, etena kataṃ kammaṃ mayhameva,
atk-s0502a:813_1: mayā kataṃ etassevā”ti cintetvā, kiñci akatvā attabhāvameva maṇḍayamānā kālaṃ vītināmesi.
atk-s0502a:813_2: Maghopi mātāpituupaṭṭhānaṃ kule jeṭṭhāpacāyanakammaṃ saccavācaṃ apharusavācaṃ api,
atk-s0502a:813_3: suṇavācaṃ maccheravinayaṃ akkodhananti imāni satta vatapadāni pūretvā –
atk-s0502a:818_0: Evaṃ pasaṃsiyabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā jīvitapariyosāne tāvatiṃsabhavane sakko devarājā hutvā
atk-s0502a:818_1: nibbatti, tepissa sahāyakā tattheva nibbattiṃsu, vaḍḍhakī vissakammadevaputto hutvā
atk-s0502a:818_2: nibbatti. Tadā tāvatiṃsabhavane asurā vasanti. Te “abhinavā devaputtā nibbattā”ti
atk-s0502a:818_3: dibbapānaṃ sajjayiṃsu. Sakko attano parisāya kassaci apivanatthāya saññamadāsi. Asurā
atk-s0502a:818_4: dibbapānaṃ pivitvā majjiṃsu. Sakko “kiṃ me imehi sādhāraṇena rajjenā”ti attano parisāya
atk-s0502a:818_5: saññaṃ datvā te pādesu gāhāpetvā mahāsamudde khipāpesi. Te avaṃsirā samudde patiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:818_6: Atha nesaṃ puññānubhāvena sineruno heṭṭhimatale asuravimānaṃ nāma nibbatti, cittapāṭali nāma nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:819_0: Devāsurasaṅgāme pana asuresu parājitesu dasayojanasahassaṃ tāvatiṃsadevanagaraṃ nāma
atk-s0502a:819_1: nibbatti. Tassa pana nagarassa pācīnapacchimadvārānaṃ antarā dasayojanasahassaṃ hoti,
atk-s0502a:819_2: tathā dakkhiṇuttaradvārānaṃ. Taṃ kho pana nagaraṃ dvārasahassayuttaṃ ahosi ārāmapokkharaṇipaṭimaṇḍitaṃ.
atk-s0502a:819_3: Tassa majjhe sālāya nissandena tiyojanasatubbedhehi dhajehi paṭimaṇḍito sattaratanamayo
atk-s0502a:819_4: sattayojanasatubbedho vejayanto nāma pāsādo uggañchi. Suvaṇṇayaṭṭhīsu maṇidhajā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0502a:819_5: maṇiyaṭṭhīsu suvaṇṇadhajā; pavāḷayaṭṭhīsu muttadhajā, muttayaṭṭhīsu pavāḷadhajā;
atk-s0502a:819_6: sattaratanamayāsu yaṭṭhīsu sattaratanadhajā, majjhe ṭhito dhajo tiyojanasatubbedho
atk-s0502a:819_7: ahosi. Iti sālāya nissandena yojanasahassubbedho pāsādo sattaratanamayova hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0502a:819_8: koviḷārarukkhassa nissandena samantā tiyojanasataparimaṇḍalo pāricchattako nibbatti,
atk-s0502a:819_9: pāsāṇaphalakassa nissandena pāricchattakamūle dīghato saṭṭhiyojanā puthulato paṇṇāsayojanā
atk-s0502a:819_10: bahalato pañcadasayojanā jayasumanarattakambalavaṇṇā paṇḍukambalasilā nibbatti. Tattha
atk-s0502a:819_11: nisinnakāle upaḍḍhakāyo pavisati, uṭṭhitakāle ūnaṃ paripūrati.
atk-s0502a:820_0: Hatthī pana erāvaṇo nāma devaputto hutvā nibbatti. Devalokasmiñhi tiracchānagatā
atk-s0502a:820_1: na honti. Tasmā so uyyānakīḷāya nikkhamanakāle attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā diyaḍḍhayojanasatiko
atk-s0502a:820_2: erāvaṇo nāma hatthī ahosi. So tettiṃsajanānaṃ atthāya tettiṃsa kumbhe māpesi āvaṭṭena
atk-s0502a:820_3: tigāvutaaḍḍhayojanappamāṇe, sabbesaṃ majjhe sakkassa atthāya sudassanaṃ nāma tiṃsayojanikaṃ
atk-s0502a:820_4: kumbhaṃ māpesi. Tassa upari dvādasayojaniko ratanamaṇḍapo hoti. Tattha antarantarā
atk-s0502a:820_5: sattaratanamayā yojanubbedhā dhajā uṭṭhahanti. Pariyante kiṅkiṇikajālaṃ olambati.
atk-s0502a:820_6: Yassa mandavāteritassa pañcaṅgikatūriyasaddasaṃmisso dibbagītasaddo viya ravo niccharati.
atk-s0502a:820_7: Maṇḍapamajjhe sakkassatthāya yojaniko maṇipallaṅko paññatto hoti, tattha sakko nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:820_8: Tettiṃsa devaputtā attano kumbhe ratanapallaṅke nisīdiṃsu. Tettiṃsāya kumbhānaṃ ekekasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:820_9: kumbhe satta satta dante māpesi. Tesu ekeko paṇṇāsayojanāyāmo, ekekasmiñcettha dante
atk-s0502a:820_10: satta satta pokkharaṇiyo honti, ekekāya pokkharaṇiyā satta satta paduminīgacchāni,
atk-s0502a:820_11: ekekasmiṃ gacche satta satta pupphāni honti, ekekasmiṃ pupphe satta satta pattāni,
atk-s0502a:820_12: ekekasmiṃ patte satta satta devadhītaro naccanti. Evaṃ samantā paṇṇāsayojanaṭhānesu
atk-s0502a:820_13: hatthidantesuyeva naṭasamajjā honti. Evaṃ mahantaṃ yasaṃ anubhavanto sakko devarājā vicarati.
atk-s0502a:821_0: Sudhammāpi kālaṃ katvā gantvā tattheva nibbatti. Tassā sudhammā nāma nava yojanasatikā
atk-s0502a:821_1: devasabhā nibbatti. Tato ramaṇīyataraṃ kira aññaṃ ṭhānaṃ nāma natthi, māsassa aṭṭha
atk-s0502a:821_2: divase dhammassavanaṃ tattheva hoti. Yāvajjatanā aññataraṃ ramaṇīyaṃ ṭhānaṃ disvā,
atk-s0502a:821_3: “sudhammā devasabhā viyā”ti vadanti. Nandāpi kālaṃ katvā gantvā tattheva nibbatti,
atk-s0502a:821_4: tassā pañcayojanasatikā nandā nāma pokkharaṇī nibbatti. Cittāpi kālaṃ katvā gantvā
atk-s0502a:821_5: tattheva nibbatti, tassāpi pañcayojanasatikaṃ cittalatāvanaṃ nāma nibbatti, tattha
atk-s0502a:821_6: uppannapubbanimitte devaputte netvā mohayamānā vicaranti. Sujā pana kālaṃ katvā ekissā
atk-s0502a:821_7: girikandarāya ekā bakasakuṇikā hutvā nibbatti. Sakko attano paricārikā olokento “sudhammā
atk-s0502a:821_8: idheva nibbattā, tathā nandā ca cittā ca, sujā nu kho kuhiṃ nibbattā”ti cintento
atk-s0502a:821_9: taṃ tattha nibbattaṃ disvā, “bālā kiñci puññaṃ akatvā idāni tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbattā,
atk-s0502a:821_10: idāni pana taṃ puññaṃ kāretvā idhānetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā aññātakavesena
atk-s0502a:821_11: tassā santikaṃ gantvā, “kiṃ karontī idha vicarasī”ti pucchi. “Ko pana tvaṃ, sāmī”ti?
atk-s0502a:821_12: “Ahaṃ te sāmiko magho”ti. “Kuhiṃ nibbattosi, sāmī”ti? “Ahaṃ tāvatiṃsadevaloke nibbatto”.
atk-s0502a:821_13: “Tava sahāyikānaṃ pana nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ jānāsī”ti? “Na jānāmi, sāmī”ti. “Tāpi mameva
atk-s0502a:821_14: santike nibbattā, passissasi tā sahāyikā”ti. “Kathāhaṃ tattha gamissāmī”ti? Sakko
atk-s0502a:821_15: “ahaṃ taṃ tattha nessāmī”ti vatvā hatthatale ṭhapetvā devalokaṃ netvā nandāya pokkharaṇiyā
atk-s0502a:821_16: tīre vissajjetvā itarāsaṃ tissannaṃ ārocesi – “tumhākaṃ sahāyikaṃ sujaṃ passissathā”ti.
atk-s0502a:821_17: “Kuhiṃ sā, devā”ti? “Nandāya pokkharaṇiyā tīre ṭhitā”ti āha. Tā tissopi gantvā, “aho
atk-s0502a:821_18: ayyāya evarūpaṃ attabhāvamaṇḍanassa phalaṃ, idānissā tuṇḍaṃ passatha, pāde passatha,
atk-s0502a:821_19: jaṅghā passatha, sobhati vatassā attabhāvo”ti keḷiṃ katvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:822_0: Puna sakko tassā santikaṃ gantvā, “diṭṭhā te sahāyikā”ti vatvā “diṭṭhā maṃ uppaṇḍetvā
atk-s0502a:822_1: gatā, tattheva maṃ nehī”ti vutte taṃ tattheva netvā udake vissajjetvā, “diṭṭhā te
atk-s0502a:822_2: tāsaṃ sampattī”ti pucchi. “Diṭṭhā, devā”ti? “Tayāpi tattha nibbattanūpāyaṃ kātuṃ
atk-s0502a:822_3: vaṭṭatī”ti. “Kiṃ karomi, devā”ti? “Mayā dinnaṃ ovādaṃ rakkhissasī”ti. “Rakkhissāmi,
atk-s0502a:822_4: devā”ti. Athassā pañca sīlāni datvā, “appamattā rakkhāhī”ti vatvā pakkāmi. Sā tato
atk-s0502a:822_5: paṭṭhāya sayaṃmatamacchakeyeva pariyesitvā khādati. Sakko katipāhaccayena tassā vīmaṃsanatthāya
atk-s0502a:822_6: gantvā, vālukāpiṭṭhe matamacchako viya hutvā uttāno nipajji. Sā taṃ disvā “matamacchako”ti
atk-s0502a:822_7: saññāya aggahesi. Maccho gilanakāle naṅguṭṭhaṃ cālesi. Sā “sajīvamacchako”ti udake
atk-s0502a:822_8: vissajjesi. So thokaṃ vītināmetvā puna tassā purato uttāno hutvā nipajji. Puna sā
atk-s0502a:822_9: “matamacchako”ti saññāya gahetvā gilanakāle agganaṅguṭṭhaṃ cālesi. Taṃ disvā “sajīvamaccho”ti
atk-s0502a:822_10: vissajjesi. Evaṃ tikkhattuṃ vīmaṃsitvā “sādhukaṃ sīlaṃ rakkhatī”ti attānaṃ jānāpetvā
atk-s0502a:822_11: “ahaṃ tava vīmaṃsanatthāya āgato, sādhukaṃ sīlaṃ rakkhasi, evaṃ rakkhamānā na cirasseva
atk-s0502a:822_12: mama santike nibbattissasi, appamattā hohī”ti vatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:823_0: Sā tato paṭṭhāya pana sayaṃmatamacchaṃ labhati vā, na vā. Alabhamānā katipāhaccayeneva
atk-s0502a:823_1: sussitvā kālaṃ katvā tassa sīlassa phalena bārāṇasiyaṃ kumbhakārassa dhītā hutvā
atk-s0502a:823_2: nibbatti. Athassā pannarasasoḷasavassuddesikakāle sakko “kuhiṃ nu kho sā nibbattā”ti
atk-s0502a:823_3: āvajjento disvā, “idāni mayā tattha gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti eḷālukavaṇṇena paññāyamānehi
atk-s0502a:823_4: sattahi ratanehi yānakaṃ pūretvā taṃ pājento bārāṇasiṃ pavisitvā, “ammatātā, eḷālukāni
atk-s0502a:823_5: gaṇhatha gaṇhathā”ti ugghosento vīthiṃ paṭipajji. Muggamāsādīni gahetvā āgate pana
atk-s0502a:823_6: “mūlena na demī”ti vatvā, “kathaṃ desī”ti vutte, “sīlarakkhikāya itthiyā dammī”ti
atk-s0502a:823_7: āha. “Sīlaṃ nāma, sāmi, kīdisaṃ, kiṃ kāḷaṃ, udāhu nīlādivaṇṇa”nti? “Tumhe ‘sīlaṃ
atk-s0502a:823_8: kīdisa’ntipi na jānātha, kimeva naṃ rakkhissatha, sīlarakkhikāya pana dassāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:823_9: “Sāmi, esā kumbhakārassa dhītā ‘sīlaṃ rakkhāmī’ti vicarati, etissā dehī”ti. Sāpi
atk-s0502a:823_10: naṃ “tena hi mayhaṃ dehi, sāmī”ti āha. “Kāsi tva”nti? “Ahaṃ avijahitapañcasīlā”ti.
atk-s0502a:823_11: “Tuyhamevetāni mayā ānītānī”ti yānakaṃ pājento tassā gharaṃ gantvā aññehi anāhariyaṃ
atk-s0502a:823_12: katvā eḷālukavaṇṇena devadattiyaṃ dhanaṃ datvā attānaṃ jānāpetvā, “idaṃ te jīvitavuttiyā
atk-s0502a:823_13: dhanaṃ, pañcasīlāni akhaṇḍādīni katvā rakkhāhī”ti vatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:824_0: Sāpi tato cavitvā asurabhavane asurajeṭṭhakassa dhītā hutvā sakkassa verighare nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:824_1: Dvīsu pana attabhāvesu sīlassa surakkhitattā abhirūpā ahosi suvaṇṇavaṇṇā asādhāraṇāya
atk-s0502a:824_2: rūpasiriyā samannāgatā. Vepacittiasurindo āgatāgatānaṃ asurānaṃ “tumhe mama dhītu
atk-s0502a:824_3: anucchavikā na hothā”ti taṃ kassaci adatvā, “mama dhītā attanāva attano anucchavikaṃ
atk-s0502a:824_4: sāmikaṃ gahessatī”ti asurabalaṃ sannipātāpetvā, “tuyhaṃ anucchavikaṃ sāmikaṃ gaṇhā”ti
atk-s0502a:824_5: tassā, hatthe pupphadāmaṃ adāsi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe sakko tassā nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ olokento
atk-s0502a:824_6: taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā, “idāni mayā gantvā taṃ ānetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti mahallakaasuravaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:824_7: nimminitvā gantvā parisapariyante aṭṭhāsi. Sāpi ito cito ca olokentī taṃ diṭṭhamattāva
atk-s0502a:824_8: pubbasannivāsavasena uppannena pemena mahogheneva ajjhotthaṭahadayā hutvā, “eso me
atk-s0502a:824_9: sāmiko”ti tassa upari pupphadāmaṃ khipi. Asurā “amhākaṃ rājā ettakaṃ kālaṃ dhītu
atk-s0502a:824_10: anucchavikaṃ alabhitvā idāni labhi, ayamevassa dhītu pitāmahato mahallako anucchaviko”ti
atk-s0502a:824_11: lajjamānā apakkamiṃsu. Sakkopi taṃ hatthe gahetvā “sakkohamasmī”ti naditvā ākāse
atk-s0502a:824_12: pakkhandi. Asurā “vañcitamhā jarasakkenā”ti taṃ anubandhiṃsu. Mātali, saṅgāhako vejayantarathaṃ
atk-s0502a:824_13: āharitvā antarāmagge aṭṭhāsi. Sakko taṃ tattha āropetvā devanagarābhimukho pāyāsi.
atk-s0502a:824_14: Athassa sippalivanaṃ sampattakāle rathasaddaṃ sutvā bhītā garuḷapotakā viraviṃsu.
atk-s0502a:824_15: Tesaṃ saddaṃ sutvā sakko mātaliṃ pucchi – “ke ete viravantī”ti? “Garuḷapotakā, devā”ti.
atk-s0502a:824_16: “Kiṃ kāraṇā”ti? “Rathasaddaṃ sutvā maraṇabhayenā”ti. “Maṃ ekaṃ nissāya ettako dijo
atk-s0502a:824_17: rathavegena vicuṇṇito mā nassi, nivattehi ratha”nti. Sopi sindhavasahassassa daṇḍakasaññaṃ
atk-s0502a:824_18: datvā rathaṃ nivattesi. Taṃ disvā asurā “jarasakko asurapurato paṭṭhāya palāyanto
atk-s0502a:824_19: idāni rathaṃ nivattesi, addhā tena upatthambho laddho bhavissatī”ti nivattetvā āgamanamaggeneva
atk-s0502a:824_20: asurapuraṃ pavisitvā puna sīsaṃ na ukkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:825_0: Sakkopi sujaṃ asurakaññaṃ devanagaraṃ netvā aḍḍhateyyānaṃ accharākoṭīnaṃ jeṭṭhikaṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a:825_1: ṭhapesi. Sā sakkaṃ varaṃ yāci – “mahārāja, mama imasmiṃ devaloke mātāpitaro vā bhātikabhaginiyo
atk-s0502a:825_2: vā natthi, yattha yattha gacchasi, tattha tattha maṃ gahetvāva gaccheyyāsī”ti. So
atk-s0502a:825_3: “sādhū”ti tassā paṭiññaṃ adāsi. Tato paṭṭhāya cittapāṭaliyā pupphitāya asurā “amhākaṃ
atk-s0502a:825_4: nibbattaṭṭhāne dibbapāricchattakassa pupphanakālo”ti yuddhatthāya saggaṃ abhiruhanti.
atk-s0502a:825_5: Sakko heṭṭhāsamudde nāgānaṃ ārakkhaṃ adāsi, tato supaṇṇānaṃ, tato kumbhaṇḍānaṃ, tato
atk-s0502a:825_6: yakkhānaṃ. Tato catunnaṃ mahārājānaṃ. Sabbūpari pana upaddavanivattanatthāya devanagaradvāresu
atk-s0502a:825_7: vajirahatthā indapaṭimā ṭhapesi. Asurā nāgādayo jinitvā āgatāpi indapaṭimā dūrato
atk-s0502a:825_8: disvā “sakko nikkhanto”ti palāyanti. Evaṃ, mahāli, magho māṇavo appamādapaṭipadaṃ
atk-s0502a:825_9: paṭipajji. Evaṃ appamatto panesa evarūpaṃ issariyaṃ patvā dvīsu devalokesu rajjaṃ
atk-s0502a:825_10: kāresi. Appamādo nāmesa buddhādīhi pasattho. Appamādañhi nissāya sabbesampi lokiyalokuttarānaṃ
atk-s0502a:825_11: visesānaṃ adhigamo hotīti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:829_0: Tattha appamādenāti macalagāme bhūmippadesasodhanaṃ ādiṃ katvā katena appamādena.
atk-s0502a:829_1: Maghavāti idāni “maghavā”tipaññāto magho māṇavo dvinnaṃ devalokānaṃ rājabhāvena devānaṃ
atk-s0502a:829_2: seṭṭhataṃ gato. Pasaṃsantīti buddhādayo paṇḍitā appamādameva thomenti vaṇṇayanti.
atk-s0502a:829_3: Kiṃ kāraṇā? Sabbesaṃ lokiyalokuttarānaṃ visesānaṃ paṭilābhakāraṇattā. Pamādo garahito
atk-s0502a:829_4: sadāti pamādo pana tehi ariyehi niccaṃ garahito nindito. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Sabbavipattīnaṃ
atk-s0502a:829_5: mūlabhāvato. Manussadobhaggaṃ vā hi apāyuppatti vā sabbā pamādamūlikāyevāti.
atk-s0502a:830: Gāthāpariyosāne mahāli licchavī sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattaparisāyapi bahū sotāpannādayo jātāti.
atk-s0502a:833: Appamādarato bhikkhūti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:834_0: So kira satthu santike yāva arahattā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā araññaṃ pavisitvā ghaṭento
atk-s0502a:834_1: vāyamanto arahattaṃ pattuṃ nāsakkhi. So “visesetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpessāmī”ti tato
atk-s0502a:834_2: nikkhamitvā satthu santikaṃ āgacchanto antarāmagge mahantaṃ dāvaggiṃ uṭṭhitaṃ disvā
atk-s0502a:834_3: vegena ekaṃ muṇḍapabbatamatthakaṃ abhiruyha nisinno araññaṃ ḍayhamānaṃ aggiṃ disvā
atk-s0502a:834_4: ārammaṇaṃ gaṇhi – “yathā ayaṃ aggi mahantāni ca khuddakāni ca upādānāni ḍahanto gacchati,
atk-s0502a:834_5: evaṃ ariyamaggañāṇaggināpi mahantāni ca khuddakāni ca saṃyojanāni ḍahantena gantabbaṃ
atk-s0502a:834_6: bhavissatī”ti. Satthā gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnova tassa cittācāraṃ ñatvā, “evameva, bhikkhu,
atk-s0502a:834_7: mahantānipi khuddakānipi upādānāni viya imesaṃ sattānaṃ abbhantare uppajjamānāni
atk-s0502a:834_8: aṇuṃthūlāni saṃyojanāni, tāni ñāṇagginā jhāpetvā abhabbuppattikāni kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0502a:834_9: vatvā obhāsaṃ vissajjetvā tassa bhikkhuno abhimukhe nisinno viya paññāyamāno imaṃ obhāsagāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:837: Saṃyojanaṃ aṇuṃ thūlaṃ, ḍahaṃ aggīva gacchatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:838_0: Tattha appamādaratoti appamāde rato abhirato, appamādena vītināmentoti attho. Pamāde
atk-s0502a:838_1: bhayadassi vāti nirayuppattiādikaṃ pamāde bhayaṃ bhayato passanto, tāsaṃ vā uppattīnaṃ
atk-s0502a:838_2: mūlattā pamādaṃ bhayato passanto. Saṃyojananti vaṭṭadukkhena saddhiṃ yojanaṃ bandhanaṃ
atk-s0502a:838_3: pajānaṃ vaṭṭe osīdāpanasamatthaṃ dasavidhaṃ saṃyojanaṃ. Aṇuṃ thūlanti mahantañca
atk-s0502a:838_4: khuddakañca. Ḍahaṃ aggīva gacchatīti yathā ayaṃ aggī etaṃ mahantañca khuddakañca
atk-s0502a:838_5: upādānaṃ ḍahantova gacchati. Evameso appamādarato bhikkhu appamādādhigatena ñāṇagginā
atk-s0502a:838_6: etaṃ saṃyojanaṃ ḍahanto abhabbuppattikaṃ karonto gacchatīti attho.
atk-s0502a:839_0: Gāthāpariyosāne so bhikkhu yathānisinnova sabbasaṃyojanāni jhāpetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi
atk-s0502a:839_1: arahattaṃ patvā ākāsenāgantvā tathāgatassa suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ sarīraṃ thometvā vaṇṇetvā
atk-s0502a:842: Appamādaratoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto nigamavāsitissattheraṃ nāma ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:843_0: Ekasmiñhi sāvatthito avidūre nigamagāme jātasaṃvaḍḍho eko kulaputto satthu sāsane
atk-s0502a:843_1: pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado “nigamavāsitissatthero nāma appiccho santuṭṭho pavivitto
atk-s0502a:843_2: āraddhavīriyo”ti paññāyi. So nibaddhaṃ ñātigāmeyeva piṇḍāya vicarati. Anāthapiṇḍikādīsu
atk-s0502a:843_3: mahādānāni karontesu, pasenadikosale asadisadānaṃ karontepi sāvatthiṃ nāgacchati.
atk-s0502a:843_4: Bhikkhū “ayaṃ nigamavāsitissatthero uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya ñātisaṃsaṭṭho viharati, anāthapiṇḍikādīsu
atk-s0502a:843_5: mahādānādīni karontesu, pasenadikosale asadisadānaṃ karontepi neva āgacchatī”ti kathaṃ
atk-s0502a:843_6: samuṭṭhāpetvā satthu ārocayiṃsu. Satthā taṃ pakkosāpetvā, “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, bhikkhu,
atk-s0502a:843_7: evaṃ karosī”ti pucchitvā, “natthi, bhante, mayhaṃ ñātisaṃsaggo, ahaṃ ete manusse
atk-s0502a:843_8: nissāya ajjhoharaṇīyamattaṃ āhāraṃ labhāmi lūkhe vā paṇīte vā. Yāpanamatte laddhe
atk-s0502a:843_9: puna kiṃ āhārapariyesanenāti na gacchāmi, ñātīhi pana me saṃsaggo nāma natthi, bhante”ti
atk-s0502a:843_10: vutte satthā pakatiyāpi tassa ajjhāsayaṃ vijānanto – “sādhu sādhu, bhikkhū”ti tassa
atk-s0502a:843_11: sādhukāraṃ datvā, “anacchariyaṃ kho panetaṃ bhikkhu, yaṃ tvaṃ mādisaṃ ācariyaṃ labhitvā
atk-s0502a:843_12: appiccho ahosi. Ayañhi appicchatā nāma mama tanti, mama paveṇī”ti vatvā bhikkhūhi
atk-s0502a:844_0: Atīte himavante gaṅgātīre ekasmiṃ udumbaravane anekasahassā suvā vasiṃsu. Tatreko
atk-s0502a:844_1: suvarājā attano nivāsarukkhassa phalesu khīṇesu yaṃ yadeva avasiṭṭhaṃ hoti aṅkuro
atk-s0502a:844_2: vā pattaṃ vā taco vā, taṃ taṃ khāditvā gaṅgāyaṃ pānīyaṃ pivitvā paramappiccho santuṭṭho
atk-s0502a:844_3: hutvā aññattha na gacchati. Tassa appicchasantuṭṭhabhāvaguṇena sakkassa bhavanaṃ
atk-s0502a:844_4: kampi. Sakko āvajjamāno taṃ disvā tassa vīmaṃsanatthaṃ attano ānubhāvena taṃ rukkhaṃ
atk-s0502a:844_5: sukkhāpesi. Rukkho obhaggo khāṇumatto chiddāvachiddova hutvā vāte paharante ākoṭito
atk-s0502a:844_6: viya saddaṃ nicchārento aṭṭhāsi. Tassa chiddehi cuṇṇāni nikkhamanti. Suvarājā tāni
atk-s0502a:844_7: khāditvā gaṅgāyaṃ pānīyaṃ pivitvā aññattha agantvā vātātapaṃ agaṇetvā udumbarakhāṇumatthake
atk-s0502a:844_8: nisīdati. Sakko tassa paramappicchabhāvaṃ ñatvā, “mittadhammaguṇaṃ kathāpetvā varamassa
atk-s0502a:844_9: datvā udumbaraṃ amataphalaṃ katvā āgamissāmī”ti eko haṃsarājā hutvā sujaṃ asurakaññaṃ
atk-s0502a:844_10: purato katvā udumbaravanaṃ gantvā avidūre ekassa rukkhassa sākhāya nisīditvā tena
atk-s0502a:846: Kasmā nu sukkhe koḷāpe, suvassa nirato mano”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:847_0: Sabbaṃ suvajātakaṃ navakanipāte āgatanayeneva vitthāretabbaṃ. Aṭṭhuppattiyeva hi
atk-s0502a:847_1: tattha ca idha ca nānā, sesaṃ tādisameva. Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā, “tadā
atk-s0502a:847_2: sakko ānando ahosi, suvarājā ahamevā”ti vatvā, “evaṃ, bhikkhave, appicchatā nāmesā
atk-s0502a:847_3: mama tanti, mama paveṇī, anacchariyā mama puttassa nigamavāsitissassa mādisaṃ ācariyaṃ
atk-s0502a:847_4: labhitvā appicchatā, bhikkhunā nāma nigamavāsitissena viya appiccheneva bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0502a:847_5: Evarūpo hi bhikkhu abhabbo samathavipassanādhammehi vā maggaphalehi vā parihānāya,
atk-s0502a:847_6: aññadatthu nibbānasseva santike hotī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:851_0: Tattha abhabbo parihānāyāti so evarūpo bhikkhu samathavipassanādhammehi vā maggaphalehi
atk-s0502a:851_1: vā parihānāya abhabbo, nāpi pattehi parihāyati, na appattāni na pāpuṇāti. Nibbānasseva
atk-s0502a:852: Gāthāpariyosāne nigamavāsitissatthero saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Aññepi bahū sotāpannādayo ahesuṃ. Mahājanassa sātthikā dhammadesanā jātāti.
atk-s0502a:857: Phandanaṃ capalaṃ cittanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā cālikāya pabbate viharanto āyasmantaṃ meghiyaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:858_0: Tassa vatthuṃ vibhāvanatthaṃ sabbaṃ meghiyasuttantaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. Satthā pana
atk-s0502a:858_1: tīhi vitakkehi anvāsattatāya tasmiṃ ambavane padhānaṃ anuyuñjituṃ asakkuṇitvā āgataṃ
atk-s0502a:858_2: meghiyattheraṃ āmantetvā, “atibhāriyaṃ te, meghiya, kataṃ ‘āgamehi tāva, meghiya,
atk-s0502a:858_3: ekakomhi yāva aññopi koci bhikkhu āgacchatī’ti maṃ yācantaṃ ekakaṃ pahāya gacchantena
atk-s0502a:858_4: bhikkhunā nāma evaṃ cittavasikena bhavituṃ na vaṭṭati, cittaṃ nāmetaṃ lahukaṃ, taṃ
atk-s0502a:858_5: attano vase vattetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā imā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:865_0: Tattha phandananti rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu vipphandamānaṃ. Capalanti ekairiyāpathena
atk-s0502a:865_1: asaṇṭhahanto gāmadārako viya ekasmiṃ ārammaṇe asaṇṭhahanato capalaṃ. Cittanti viññāṇaṃ,
atk-s0502a:865_3: ṭhāne kiṭṭhakhādakagoṇaṃ viya ekekasmiṃ sappāyārammaṇeyeva duṭṭhapanato dūrakkhaṃ.
atk-s0502a:865_4: Dunnivārayanti visabhāgārammaṇaṃ gacchantaṃ paṭisedhetuṃ dukkhattā dunnivārayaṃ.
atk-s0502a:865_5: Usukārova tejananti yathā nāma usukāro araññato ekaṃ vaṅkadaṇḍakaṃ āharitvā nittacaṃ
atk-s0502a:865_6: katvā kañjiyatelena makkhetvā aṅgārakapalle tāpetvā rukkhālake uppīḷetvā nivaṅkaṃ
atk-s0502a:865_7: ujuṃ vālavijjhanayoggaṃ karoti, katvā ca pana rājarājamahāmattānaṃ sippaṃ dassetvā
atk-s0502a:865_8: mahantaṃ sakkārasammānaṃ labhati, evameva medhāvī paṇḍito viññū puriso phandanādisabhāvametaṃ
atk-s0502a:865_9: cittaṃ dhutaṅgāraññāvāsavasena, nittacaṃ apagataoḷārikakilesaṃ katvā saddhāsinehena
atk-s0502a:865_10: temetvā kāyikacetasikavīriyena tāpetvā samathavipassanālake uppīḷetvā ujuṃ akuṭilaṃ
atk-s0502a:865_11: nibbisevanaṃ karoti, katvā ca pana saṅkhāre sammasitvā mahantaṃ avijjakkhandhaṃ padāletvā,
atk-s0502a:865_12: “tisso vijjā, cha abhiññā, nava lokuttaradhamme”ti imaṃ visesaṃ hatthagatameva katvā
atk-s0502a:866_0: Vārijovāti maccho viya, thale khittoti hatthena vā pādena vā jālādīnaṃ vā aññatarena
atk-s0502a:866_1: thale chaḍḍito. Okamokataubbhatoti “okapuṇṇehi cīvarehī”ti ettha udakaṃ okaṃ, “okaṃ
atk-s0502a:866_2: pahāya aniketasārī”ti ettha ālayo, ettha ubhayampi labbhati. “Okamokataubbhato”ti
atk-s0502a:866_3: hi ettha okamokatoti udakasaṅkhātā ālayāti ayamattho. Ubbhatoti uddhaṭo. Paripphandatidaṃ
atk-s0502a:866_4: cittanti yathā so udakālayato ubbhato thale khitto maccho udakaṃ alabhanto paripphandati,
atk-s0502a:866_5: evamidaṃ pañcakāmaguṇālayābhirataṃ cittaṃ tato uddharitvā māradheyyasaṅkhātaṃ vaṭṭaṃ
atk-s0502a:866_6: pahātuṃ vipassanākammaṭṭhāne khittaṃ kāyikacetasikavīriyena santāpiyamānaṃ paripphandati,
atk-s0502a:866_7: saṇṭhātuṃ na sakkoti. Evaṃ santepi dhuraṃ anikkhipitvā medhāvī puggalo taṃ vuttanayeneva
atk-s0502a:866_8: ujuṃ kammaniyaṃ karotīti attho. Aparo nayo – idaṃ māradheyyaṃ kilesavaṭṭaṃ avijahitvā
atk-s0502a:866_9: ṭhitaṃ cittaṃ so vārijo viya paripphandati, tasmā māradheyyaṃ pahātave, yena kilesavaṭṭasaṅkhātena
atk-s0502a:867: Gāthāpariyosāne meghiyatthero sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhito, aññepi bahū sotāpannādayo jātāti.
atk-s0502a:870: Dunniggahassa lahunoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā sāvatthiyaṃ jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:871_0: Kosalarañño kira vijite pabbatapāde mātikagāmo nāma eko ghanavāso gāmo ahosi. Athekadivasaṃ
atk-s0502a:871_1: saṭṭhimattā bhikkhū satthu santike yāva arahattā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā taṃ gāmaṃ
atk-s0502a:871_2: gantvā piṇḍāya pavisiṃsu. Atha ne yo tassa gāmassa sāmiko mātiko nāma, tassa mātā
atk-s0502a:871_3: disvā gehe nisīdāpetvā nānaggarasena yāgubhattena parivisitvā, “bhante, kattha gantukāmā”ti
atk-s0502a:871_4: pucchi. “Yathā phāsukaṭṭhānaṃ mahāupāsike”ti. Sā “vassāvāsaṭṭhānaṃ, ayyā, pariyesanti
atk-s0502a:871_5: maññe”ti ñatvā pādamūle nipajjitvā, “sace, ayyā, imaṃ temāsaṃ idha vasissanti, ahaṃ
atk-s0502a:871_6: tīṇi saraṇāni, pañca sīlāni gahetvā uposathakammaṃ karissāmī”ti āha. Bhikkhū “mayaṃ
atk-s0502a:871_7: imaṃ nissāya bhikkhāya akilamantā bhavanissaraṇaṃ kātuṃ sakkhissāmā”ti adhivāsayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:871_8: Sā tesaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ vihāraṃ paṭijaggitvā adāsi.
atk-s0502a:872_0: Te tattheva vasantā ekadivasaṃ sannipatitvā aññamaññaṃ ovadiṃsu, “āvuso, amhehi pamādacāraṃ
atk-s0502a:872_1: carituṃ na vaṭṭati. Amhākañhi sakagehaṃ viya aṭṭha mahānirayā vivaṭadvārāyeva, dharamānakabuddhassa
atk-s0502a:872_2: kho pana santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā mayaṃ āgatā, buddhā ca nāma padānupadikaṃ vicarantenāpi
atk-s0502a:872_3: saṭhena ārādhetuṃ na sakkā, yathājjhāsayeneva ārādhetuṃ sakkā, appamattā hotha, dvīhi
atk-s0502a:872_4: ekaṭṭhāne na ṭhātabbaṃ, na nisīditabbaṃ, sāyaṃ kho pana therūpaṭṭhānakāle pātova
atk-s0502a:872_5: bhikkhācārakāle ekato bhavissāma, sesakāle dve ekato na bhavissāma, apica kho pana
atk-s0502a:872_6: aphāsukena bhikkhunā āgantvā vihāramajjhe ghaṇḍiyā pahatāya ghaṇḍisaññāya āgantvā
atk-s0502a:873_0: Tesu evaṃ katikaṃ katvā viharantesu ekadivasaṃ sā upāsikā sappitelaphāṇitādīni gāhāpetvā
atk-s0502a:873_1: dāsadāsikammakarādīhi parivutā sāyanhasamaye taṃ vihāraṃ gantvā vihāramajjhe bhikkhū
atk-s0502a:873_2: adisvā, “kahaṃ nu kho, ayyā, gatā”ti purise pucchitvā, “attano attano rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānesu
atk-s0502a:873_3: nisinnā bhavissanti, ayye”ti vutte, “kiṃ nu kho katvā daṭṭhuṃ sakkhissāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:873_4: Atha naṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa katikavattaṃ jānanamanussā āhaṃsu – “ghaṇḍiyā pahatāya
atk-s0502a:873_5: sannipatissanti, ayye”ti. Sā ca ghaṇḍiṃ paharāpesi. Bhikkhū ghaṇḍisaddaṃ sutvā, “kassaci
atk-s0502a:873_6: aphāsukaṃ bhavissatī”ti sakasakaṭṭhānehi nikkhamitvā vihāramajjhe sannipatiṃsu. Dvepi
atk-s0502a:873_7: janā ekamaggenāgatā nāma natthi. Upāsikā ekekaṭṭhānato ekekameva āgacchantaṃ disvā,
atk-s0502a:873_8: “mama puttehi aññamaññaṃ kalaho kato bhavissatī”ti cintetvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ vanditvā
atk-s0502a:873_9: pucchi – “kalahaṃ nu kho, bhante, karitthā”ti? “Na karoma, mahāupāsike”ti. “Sace
atk-s0502a:873_10: vo, bhante, kalaho natthi, atha kasmā yathā amhākaṃ gehaṃ āgacchantā sabbe ekatova
atk-s0502a:873_11: āgacchatha, evaṃ anāgantvā ekekaṭṭhānato ekekāva āgatā”ti? “Mahāupāsike, ekekasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:873_12: ṭhāne nisīditvā samaṇadhammaṃ karimhā”ti. “Ko esa, bhante, samaṇadhammo nāmā”ti?
atk-s0502a:873_13: “Dvattiṃsākāre sajjhāyaṃ karoma, attabhāve ca khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapema, mahāupāsike”ti.
atk-s0502a:873_14: “Kiṃ pana, bhante, dvattiṃsākāre sajjhāyaṃ kātuṃ, attabhāve ca khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapetuṃ
atk-s0502a:873_15: tumhākameva vaṭṭati, udāhu amhākampīti, kassacipi avārito esa dhammo, mahāupāsike”ti.
atk-s0502a:873_16: “Tena hi, bhante, mayhampi dvattiṃsākāraṃ detha, attabhāve ca khayavayapaṭṭhapanaṃ
atk-s0502a:873_17: ācikkhathā”ti. “Tena hi uggaṇha, mahāupāsike”ti sabbaṃ uggaṇhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:874_0: Sā tato paṭṭhāya dvattiṃsākāre sajjhāyaṃ katvā attani khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapetvā tehi
atk-s0502a:874_1: bhikkhūhi puretarameva tayo magge, tīṇi ca phalāni pāpuṇi. Maggeneva cassā catasso
atk-s0502a:874_2: paṭisambhidā lokiyaabhiññā ca āgamiṃsu. Sā maggaphalasukhato vuṭṭhāya dibbacakkhunā
atk-s0502a:874_3: oloketvā, “kadā nu kho mama puttehi ayaṃ dhammo adhigato”ti upadhārentī sabbepime
atk-s0502a:874_4: sarāgā sadosā samohā jhānavipassanāmattampi tesaṃ natthi, “kiṃ nu kho mayhaṃ puttānaṃ
atk-s0502a:874_5: arahattassa upanissayo atthi, natthī”ti āvajjetvā, “atthī”ti disvā, “senāsanasappāyaṃ
atk-s0502a:874_6: nu kho atthi, natthī”ti āvajjetvā tampi disvā, “puggalasappāyaṃ nu kho labhanti,
atk-s0502a:874_7: na labhantī”ti āvajjesi, puggalasappāyampi disvā, “āhārasappāyaṃ nu kho labhanti,
atk-s0502a:874_8: na labhantī”ti upadhārentī “āhārasappāyaṃ nesaṃ natthī”ti disvā tato paṭṭhāya nānāvidhaṃ
atk-s0502a:874_9: yāguṃ, anekappakāraṃ khajjakaṃ, nānaggarasañca bhojanaṃ sampādetvā gehe bhikkhū nisīdāpetvā
atk-s0502a:874_10: dakkhiṇodakaṃ datvā, “bhante, tumhākaṃ yaṃ yaṃ ruccati, taṃ taṃ gahetvā paribhuñjathā”ti
atk-s0502a:874_11: niyyādesi. Te yathāruci yāguādīni gahetvā paribhuñjanti. Tesaṃ sappāyāhāraṃ labhantānaṃ
atk-s0502a:875_0: Te ekaggena cittena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā na cirasseva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ
atk-s0502a:875_1: patvā cintayiṃsu – “aho mahāupāsikā amhākaṃ patiṭṭhā jātā, sace mayaṃ sappāyāhāraṃ
atk-s0502a:875_2: na labhimha, na no maggaphalapaṭivedho abhavissa, idāni vuṭṭhavassā pavāretvā satthu
atk-s0502a:875_3: santikaṃ gamissāmā”ti. Te “satthāraṃ daṭṭhukāmamhā”ti mahāupāsikaṃ āpucchiṃsu. “Mahāupāsikā
atk-s0502a:875_4: sādhu, ayyā”ti. Te anugantvā punapi, “bhante, amhe olokeyyāthā”ti bahūni piyavacanāni
atk-s0502a:875_5: vatvā paṭinivatti. Tepi kho bhikkhū sāvatthiṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ
atk-s0502a:875_6: nisinnā “kacci, bhikkhave, khamanīyaṃ, kacci yāpanīyaṃ, na ca piṇḍakena kilamitthā”ti
atk-s0502a:875_7: vutte “khamanīyaṃ, bhante, yāpanīyaṃ, bhante, piṇḍakena pana neva kilamimha. Amhākañhi
atk-s0502a:875_8: mātikamātā nāmekā upāsikā cittācāraṃ ñatvā, ‘aho vata no evarūpaṃ nāma āhāraṃ paṭiyādeyyā’ti
atk-s0502a:875_9: cintite yathācintitaṃ āhāraṃ paṭiyādetvā adāsī”ti tassā guṇakathaṃ kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:876_0: Aññataro bhikkhu tassā guṇakathaṃ sutvā tattha gantukāmo hutvā satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:876_1: gahetvā, “bhante, taṃ gāmaṃ gamissāmī”ti satthāraṃ āpucchitvā jetavanato nikkhamitvā
atk-s0502a:876_2: anupubbena taṃ gāmaṃ patvā vihāraṃ pavisanadivaseyeva cintesi – “ayaṃ kira upāsikā
atk-s0502a:876_3: cintitacintitaṃ jānāti, ahañca maggakilanto vihāraṃ paṭijaggituṃ na sakkhissāmi,
atk-s0502a:876_4: aho vata me vihārapaṭijaggakaṃ manussaṃ peseyyā”ti. Upāsikā gehe nisinnāva āvajjentī
atk-s0502a:876_5: tamatthaṃ ñatvā, “gaccha, vihāraṃ paṭijaggitvā ehī”ti manussaṃ pesesi. Itaropi pānīyaṃ
atk-s0502a:876_6: pivitukāmo “aho vata me sakkharapānakaṃ katvā peseyyā”ti cintesi. Upāsikā tampi pesesi.
atk-s0502a:876_7: So punadivase “pātova siniddhayāguṃ me sauttaribhaṅgaṃ pesetū”ti cintesi. Upāsikā
atk-s0502a:876_8: tathā akāsi. So yāguṃ pivitvā, “aho vata me evarūpaṃ khajjakaṃ peseyyā”ti cintesi.
atk-s0502a:876_9: Upāsikā tampi pesesi. So cintesi – “ayaṃ upāsikā mayā sabbaṃ cintitacintitaṃ pesesi,
atk-s0502a:876_10: ahaṃ etaṃ daṭṭhukāmo, aho vata me nānaggarasabhojanaṃ gāhāpetvā sayameva āgaccheyyā”ti.
atk-s0502a:876_11: Upāsikā “mama putto maṃ daṭṭhukāmo, āgamanaṃ me paccāsīsatī”ti bhojanaṃ gāhāpetvā
atk-s0502a:876_12: vihāraṃ gantvā tassa adāsi. So katabhattakicco “mātikamātā nāma tvaṃ, mahāupāsike”ti
atk-s0502a:876_13: pucchi. “Āma, tātā”ti. “Tvaṃ paracittaṃ jānāsī”ti? “Kiṃ maṃ pucchasi, tātā”ti? “Mayā
atk-s0502a:876_14: cintitacintitaṃ sabbamakāsi, tena taṃ pucchāmī”ti. “Paracittajānanakabhikkhū bahū,
atk-s0502a:876_15: tātā”ti? “Nāhaṃ aññe pucchāmi, tuvaṃ pucchāmi, upāsike”ti. Evaṃ santepi upāsikā “paracittaṃ
atk-s0502a:876_16: jānāmī”ti avatvā “paracittaṃ jānantā nāma evaṃ karonti puttā”ti āha. So “bhāriyaṃ
atk-s0502a:876_17: vatidaṃ kammaṃ, puthujjanā nāma sobhanampi asobhanampi cintenti, sacāhaṃ kiñci ayuttaṃ
atk-s0502a:876_18: cintayissāmi, saha bhaṇḍakena coraṃ cūḷāya gaṇhantī viya maṃ vippakāraṃ pāpeyya,
atk-s0502a:876_19: mayā ito palāyituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā, “upāsike, ahaṃ gamissāmī”ti āha. “Kahaṃ,
atk-s0502a:876_20: ayyā”ti? “Satthu santikaṃ, upāsike”ti. “Vasatha tāva, bhante, idhā”ti. “Na vasissāmi,
atk-s0502a:876_21: upāsike, gamissāmevā”ti nikkhamitvā satthu santikaṃ agamāsi. Atha naṃ satthā “kiṃ
atk-s0502a:876_22: bhikkhu na tvaṃ tattha vasasī”ti pucchi. “Āma, bhante, na sakkā tattha vasitu”nti.
atk-s0502a:876_23: “Kiṃ kāraṇā bhikkhū”ti? “Bhante, sā upāsikā cintitacintitaṃ sabbaṃ jānāti, puthujjanā
atk-s0502a:876_24: ca nāma sobhanampi asobhanampi cintenti, sacāhaṃ kiñci ayuttaṃ cintessāmi, saha bhaṇḍakena
atk-s0502a:876_25: coraṃ cūḷāya gaṇhantī viya maṃ vippakāraṃ pāpessatī”ti cintetvā āgatomhīti. “Bhikkhu,
atk-s0502a:876_26: tattheva tayā vasituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti, “na sakkomi, bhante, nāhaṃ tattha vasissāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:876_27: “Tena hi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, ekameva rakkhituṃ sakkhissasī”ti. “Kiṃ, bhante”ti? “Tava
atk-s0502a:876_28: cittameva rakkha, cittaṃ nāmetaṃ durakkhaṃ, tvaṃ attano cittameva niggaṇha, mā aññaṃ
atk-s0502a:876_29: kiñci cintayi, cittaṃ nāmetaṃ dunniggaha”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:879: Cittassa damatho sādhu, cittaṃ dantaṃ sukhāvaha”nti.
atk-s0502a:880_0: Tattha cittaṃ nāmetaṃ dukkhena niggayhatīti dunniggahaṃ. Lahuṃ uppajjati ca nirujjhati
atk-s0502a:880_1: cāti lahu. Tassa dunniggahassa lahuno. Yatthakāmanipātinoti yattha katthacideva nipatanasīlassa.
atk-s0502a:880_2: Etañhi labhitabbaṭṭhānaṃ vā alabhitabbaṭṭhānaṃ vā yuttaṭṭhānaṃ vā ayuttaṭṭhānaṃ vā
atk-s0502a:880_3: na jānāti, neva jātiṃ oloketi, na gottaṃ, na vayaṃ. Yattha yattha icchati, tattha
atk-s0502a:880_4: tattheva nipatatīti “yatthakāmanipātī”ti vuccati. Tassa evarūpassa cittassa damatho
atk-s0502a:880_5: sādhu catūhi ariyamaggehi dantabhāvo yathā nibbisevanaṃ hoti, tathā katabhāvo sādhu.
atk-s0502a:880_6: Kiṃ kāraṇā? Idañhi cittaṃ dantaṃ sukhāvahaṃ nibbisevanaṃ kataṃ maggaphalasukhaṃ paramatthanibbānasukhañca āvahatīti.
atk-s0502a:881: Desanāpariyosāne sampattaparisāya bahū sotāpannādayo ahesuṃ, mahājanassa sātthikā dhammadesanā jātāti.
atk-s0502a:882_0: Satthā tassa bhikkhuno imaṃ ovādaṃ datvā, “gaccha, bhikkhu, aññaṃ kiñci acintayitvā
atk-s0502a:882_1: tattheva vasāhī”ti pahiṇi. So bhikkhu satthu santikā ovādaṃ labhitvā tattha agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:882_2: Kiñci bahiddhā cintanaṃ nāma na cintesi. Mahāupāsikāpi dibbena cakkhunā olokentī
atk-s0502a:882_3: theraṃ disvā, “idāni ovādadāyakaṃ ācariyaṃ labhitvā punāgato mama putto”ti attano
atk-s0502a:882_4: ñāṇeneva paricchinditvā tassa sappāyāhāraṃ paṭiyādetvā adāsi. So sappāyabhojanaṃ
atk-s0502a:882_5: sevitvā katipāheneva arahattaṃ patvā maggaphalasukhena vītināmento “aho mahāupāsikā
atk-s0502a:882_6: mayhaṃ patiṭṭhā jātā, ahaṃ imaṃ nissāya bhavanissaraṇaṃ pattomhī”ti cintetvā, “imasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:882_7: tāva me attabhāve patiṭṭhā jātā, saṃsāre pana me saṃsarantassa aññesupi attabhāvesu
atk-s0502a:882_8: ayaṃ patiṭṭhā bhūtapubbā, no”ti upadhārento ekūnaattabhāvasataṃ anussari. Sāpi ekūnaattabhāvasate
atk-s0502a:882_9: tassa pādaparicārikā aññesu paṭibaddhacittā hutvā taṃ jīvitā voropesi. Thero tassā
atk-s0502a:882_10: ettakaṃ aguṇaṃ disvā, “aho mayaṃ mahāupāsikā bhāriyaṃ kammaṃ akāsī”ti cintesi.
atk-s0502a:883_0: Mahāupāsikāpi gehe nisinnāva “kiṃ nu kho mayhaṃ puttassa pabbajitakiccaṃ mattakaṃ
atk-s0502a:883_1: pattaṃ, no”ti upadhārayamānā tassa arahattapattiṃ ñatvā uttari upadhāriyamānā, “mama
atk-s0502a:883_2: putto arahattaṃ patvā aho vata me ayaṃ upāsikā mahatī patiṭṭhā jātā”ti cintetvā,
atk-s0502a:883_3: “atītepi nu kho me ayaṃ patiṭṭhā bhūtapubbā, no”ti upadhārento ekūnaattabhāvasataṃ
atk-s0502a:883_4: anussari, “ahaṃ kho pana ekūnaattabhāvasate aññehi saddhiṃ ekato hutvā etaṃ jīvitā
atk-s0502a:883_5: voropesiṃ, ayaṃ me ettakaṃ aguṇaṃ disvā ‘aho bhāriyaṃ kammaṃ kataṃ upāsikāyā”ti cintesi.
atk-s0502a:883_6: “Atthi nu kho evaṃ saṃsāre saṃsarantiyā mama puttassa upakāro katapubbo”ti upadhārayamānā
atk-s0502a:883_7: tato uttariṃ satamaṃ attabhāvaṃ anussaritvā satame attabhāve mayā etassa pādaparicārikāya
atk-s0502a:883_8: hutvā etasmiṃ jīvitā voropanaṭṭhāne jīvitadānaṃ dinnaṃ, aho mayā mama puttassa mahāupakāro
atk-s0502a:883_9: katapubbo”ti gehe nisinnāva uttariṃ visesetvā “upadhārethā”ti āha. So dibbāya sotadhātuyā
atk-s0502a:883_10: saddaṃ sutvā visesetvā satamaṃ attabhāvaṃ anussaritvā tattha tāya attano jīvitassa
atk-s0502a:883_11: dinnabhāvaṃ disvā, “aho mama imāya mahāupāsikāya upakāro katapubbo”ti attamano hutvā
atk-s0502a:883_12: tassā tattheva catūsu maggaphalesu pañhaṃ kathetvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyīti.
atk-s0502a:886: Sududdasanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā sāvatthiyaṃ viharanto aññataraṃ ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:887_0: Satthari kira sāvatthiyaṃ viharante eko seṭṭhiputto attano kulūpagattheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā,
atk-s0502a:887_1: “bhante, ahaṃ dukkhā muccitukāmo, ekaṃ me dukkhato muccanakāraṇaṃ kathethā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:887_2: “Sādhāvuso, sacesi dukkhā muccitukāmo, salākabhattaṃ dehi, pakkhikabhattaṃ dehi,
atk-s0502a:887_3: vassāvāsikaṃ dehi, cīvarādayo paccaye dehi, attano sāpateyyaṃ tayo koṭṭhāse katvā
atk-s0502a:887_4: ekena kammantaṃ payojehi, ekena puttadāraṃ posehi, ekaṃ buddhasāsane dehī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:887_5: So “sādhu, bhante”ti vuttapaṭipāṭiyā sabbaṃ katvā puna theraṃ pucchi – “tato uttariṃ
atk-s0502a:887_6: aññaṃ kiṃ karomi, bhante”ti? “Āvuso, tīṇi saraṇāni gaṇha, pañca sīlāni gaṇhāhī”ti.
atk-s0502a:887_7: Tānipi paṭiggahetvā tato uttariṃ pucchi. “Tena hi dasa sīlāni gaṇhāhī”ti. “Sādhu,
atk-s0502a:887_8: bhante”ti gaṇhi. So evaṃ anupubbena puññakammassa katattā anupubbaseṭṭhiputto nāma
atk-s0502a:887_9: jāto. Tato “uttarimpi kattabbaṃ atthi, bhante”ti puna pucchitvā, “tena hi pabbajāhī”ti
atk-s0502a:887_10: vutto nikkhamitvā pabbaji. Tasseko ābhidhammikabhikkhu ācariyo ahosi. Eko vinayadharo
atk-s0502a:887_11: upajjhāyo. Tassa laddhūpasampadassa ācariyo attano santikaṃ āgatakāle abhidhamme
atk-s0502a:887_12: pañhaṃ kathesi – “buddhasāsane nāma idaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati, idaṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti. Upajjhāyopissa
atk-s0502a:887_13: attano santikaṃ āgatakāle vinaye pañhaṃ kathesi – “buddhasāsane nāma idaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0502a:887_14: idaṃ na vaṭṭati, idaṃ kappati, idaṃ na kappatī”ti. So cintesi – “aho bhāriyaṃ idaṃ
atk-s0502a:887_15: kammaṃ, ahaṃ dukkhā muccitukāmo pabbajito, idha ca mama hatthapasāraṇaṭṭhānampi na
atk-s0502a:887_16: paññāyati, gehe ṭhatvāva dukkhā muccituṃ sakkā, mayā gihinā bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:887_17: So tato paṭṭhāya ukkaṇṭhito anabhirato dvattiṃsākāre sajjhāyaṃ na karoti, uddesaṃ
atk-s0502a:887_18: na gaṇhāti, kiso lūkho dhamanisanthatagatto ālassiyābhibhūto kacchuparikiṇṇo ahosi.
atk-s0502a:888_0: Atha naṃ daharasāmaṇerā, “āvuso, kiṃ tvaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhāne ṭhitova nisinnaṭṭhāne nisinnova
atk-s0502a:888_1: ahosi, paṇḍurogābhibhūto kiso lūkho dhamanisanthatagatto ālassiyābhibhūto kacchuparikiṇṇo,
atk-s0502a:888_2: kiṃ te kata”nti pucchiṃsu. “Ukkaṇṭhitomhi, āvuso”ti. “Kiṃ kāraṇā”ti? So taṃ pavattiṃ
atk-s0502a:888_3: ārocesi. Te tassa ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ ācikkhiṃsu. Ācariyupajjhāyā taṃ ādāya satthu
atk-s0502a:888_4: santikaṃ agamaṃsu. Satthā “kiṃ, bhikkhave, āgatatthā”ti āha. “Bhante, ayaṃ bhikkhu
atk-s0502a:888_5: tumhākaṃ sāsane ukkaṇṭhito”ti. “Evaṃ kira bhikkhū”ti. “Āma, bhante”ti. “Kiṃ kāraṇā”ti?
atk-s0502a:888_6: “Ahaṃ, bhante, dukkhā muccitukāmova pabbajito, tassa me ācariyo abhidhammakathaṃ
atk-s0502a:888_7: kathesi, upajjhāyo vinayakathaṃ kathesi, svāhaṃ ‘idha me hatthapasāraṇaṭṭhānampi
atk-s0502a:888_8: natthi, gihinā hutvā sakkā dukkhā muccituṃ, gihi bhavissāmī’ti sanniṭṭhānamakāsiṃ,
atk-s0502a:888_9: bhante”ti. “Sace tvaṃ, bhikkhu, ekameva rakkhituṃ sakkhissasi, avasesānaṃ rakkhanakiccaṃ
atk-s0502a:888_11: bhante”ti. “Tena hi attano cittameva rakkhāhi, sakkā dukkhā muccitu”nti imaṃ ovādaṃ
atk-s0502a:891: Cittaṃ rakkhetha medhāvī, cittaṃ guttaṃ sukhāvaha”nti.
atk-s0502a:892_0: Tattha sududdasanti suṭṭhu duddasaṃ. Sunipuṇanti suṭṭhu nipuṇaṃ paramasaṇhaṃ. Yatthakāmanipātinanti
atk-s0502a:892_1: jātiādīni anoloketvā labhitabbālabhitabbayuttāyuttaṭṭhānesu yattha katthaci nipatanasīlaṃ.
atk-s0502a:892_2: Cittaṃ rakkhetha medhāvīti andhabālo dummedho attano cittaṃ rakkhituṃ samattho nāma
atk-s0502a:892_3: natthi, cittavasiko hutvā anayabyasanaṃ pāpuṇāti. Medhāvī pana paṇḍitova cittaṃ rakkhituṃ
atk-s0502a:892_4: sakkoti, tasmā tvampi cittameva gopehi. Idañhi cittaṃ guttaṃ sukhāvahaṃ maggaphalanibbānasukhāni āvahatīti.
atk-s0502a:893: Desanāpariyosāne so bhikkhu sotāpattiphalaṃ pāpuṇi, aññepi bahū sotāpannādayo ahesuṃ, desanā mahājanassa sātthikā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:896: Dūraṅgamanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā sāvatthiyaṃ viharanto saṅgharakkhitaṃ nāma bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:897_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kireko kulaputto satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā nikkhamitvā pabbajito laddhūpasampado
atk-s0502a:897_1: saṅgharakkhitatthero nāma hutvā katipāheneva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tassa kaniṭṭhabhaginī
atk-s0502a:897_2: puttaṃ labhitvā therassa nāmaṃ akāsi. So bhāgineyyasaṅgharakkhito nāma hutvā vayappatto
atk-s0502a:897_3: therasseva santike pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado aññatarasmiṃ gāmakārāme vassaṃ upagantvā,
atk-s0502a:897_4: “ekaṃ sattahatthaṃ, ekaṃ aṭṭhahattha”nti dve vassāvāsikasāṭake labhitvā aṭṭhahatthaṃ
atk-s0502a:897_5: “upajjhāyassa me bhavissatī”ti sallakkhetvā “sattahatthaṃ mayhaṃ bhavissatī”ti cintetvā
atk-s0502a:897_6: vuṭṭhavasso “upajjhāyaṃ passissāmī”ti āgacchanto antarāmagge piṇḍāya caranto āgantvā
atk-s0502a:897_7: there vihāraṃ anāgateyeva vihāraṃ pavisitvā therassa divāṭṭhānaṃ sammajjitvā pādodakaṃ
atk-s0502a:897_8: upaṭṭhapetvā āsanaṃ paññapetvā āgamanamaggaṃ olokento nisīdi. Athassāgamanabhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:897_9: disvā paccuggamanaṃ katvā pattacīvaraṃ paṭiggahetvā, “nisīdatha, bhante”ti theraṃ
atk-s0502a:897_10: nisīdāpetvā tālavaṇṭaṃ ādāya bījitvā pānīyaṃ datvā pāde dhovitvā taṃ sāṭakaṃ ānetvā
atk-s0502a:897_11: pādamūle ṭhapetvā, “bhante, imaṃ paribhuñjathā”ti vatvā bījayamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:898_0: Atha naṃ thero āha – “saṅgharakkhita, mayhaṃ cīvaraṃ paripuṇṇaṃ, tvameva paribhuñjā”ti.
atk-s0502a:898_1: “Bhante, mayā laddhakālato paṭṭhāya ayaṃ tumhākameva sallakkhito, paribhogaṃ karothā”ti.
atk-s0502a:898_2: “Hotu, saṅgharakkhita, paripuṇṇaṃ me cīvaraṃ, tvameva paribhuñjā”ti. “Bhante, mā
atk-s0502a:898_3: evaṃ karotha, tumhehi paribhutte mayhaṃ mahapphalaṃ bhavissatī”ti. Atha naṃ tassa
atk-s0502a:899_0: Evaṃ so bījayamāno ṭhitova cintesi – “ahaṃ therassa gihikāle bhāgineyyo, pabbajitakāle
atk-s0502a:899_1: saddhivihāriko, evampi mayā saddhiṃ upajjhāyo paribhogaṃ na kattukāmo. Imasmiṃ mayā
atk-s0502a:899_2: saddhiṃ paribhogaṃ akaronte kiṃ me samaṇabhāvena, gihi bhavissāmī”ti. Athassa etadahosi
atk-s0502a:899_3: – “dussaṇṭhāpito gharāvāso, kiṃ nu kho katvā gihibhūto jīvissāmī”ti. Tato cintesi
atk-s0502a:899_4: – “aṭṭhahatthasāṭakaṃ vikkiṇitvā ekaṃ eḷikaṃ gaṇhissāmi, eḷikā nāma khippaṃ vijāyati,
atk-s0502a:899_5: svāhaṃ vijātaṃ vijātaṃ vikkiṇitvā mūlaṃ karissāmi, mūle bahū katvā ekaṃ pajāpatiṃ
atk-s0502a:899_6: ānessāmi, sā ekaṃ puttaṃ vijāyissati. Athassa mama mātulassa nāmaṃ katvā cūḷayānake
atk-s0502a:899_7: nisīdāpetvā mama puttañca bhariyañca ādāya mātulaṃ vandituṃ āgamissāmi, āgacchante
atk-s0502a:899_8: antarāmagge mama bhariyaṃ evaṃ vakkhāmi – ‘ānehi tāva me puttaṃ vahissāmina’nti.
atk-s0502a:899_9: Sā ‘kiṃ te puttena, ehi, imaṃ yānakaṃ pājehī’ti vatvā puttaṃ gahetvā, ‘ahaṃ nessāmi
atk-s0502a:899_10: na’nti netvā sandhāretuṃ asakkontī cakkapathe chaḍḍessati. Athassa sarīraṃ abhiruhitvā
atk-s0502a:899_11: cakkaṃ gamissati, atha naṃ ‘tvaṃ mama puttaṃ neva mayhaṃ adāsi, naṃ sandhāretuṃ nāsakkhi
atk-s0502a:899_12: nāsitosmi tayā’ti vatvā patodayaṭṭhiyā piṭṭhiyaṃ paharissāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:900_0: So evaṃ cintentova ṭhatvā bījayamāno therassa sīse tālavaṇṭena pahari. Thero “kiṃ
atk-s0502a:900_1: nu kho ahaṃ saṅgharakkhitena sīse pahato”ti upadhārento tena cintitacintitaṃ sabbaṃ
atk-s0502a:900_2: ñatvā, “saṅgharakkhita, mātugāmassa pahāraṃ dātuṃ nāsakkhi, ko ettha mahallakattherassa
atk-s0502a:900_3: doso”ti āha. So “aho naṭṭhomhi, ñātaṃ kira me upajjhāyena cintitacintitaṃ, kiṃ me
atk-s0502a:901_0: Atha naṃ daharā ca sāmaṇerā ca anubandhitvā ādāya satthu santikaṃ agamaṃsu. Satthā
atk-s0502a:901_1: te bhikkhū disvāva “kiṃ, bhikkhave, āgatattha, eko vo bhikkhu laddho”ti pucchi. “Āma,
atk-s0502a:901_2: bhante, imaṃ daharaṃ ukkaṇṭhitvā palāyantaṃ gahetvā tumhākaṃ santikaṃ āgatamhā”ti.
atk-s0502a:901_3: “Evaṃ kira bhikkhū”ti? “Āma, bhante”ti. “Kimatthaṃ te bhikkhu evaṃ bhāriyaṃ kammaṃ
atk-s0502a:901_4: kataṃ, nanu tvaṃ āraddhavīriyassa ekassa buddhassa putto, mādisassa nāma buddhassa
atk-s0502a:901_5: sāsane pabbajitvā attānaṃ dametvā sotāpannoti vā sakadāgāmīti vā anāgāmīti vā arahāti
atk-s0502a:901_6: vā vadāpetuṃ nāsakkhi, kimatthaṃ evaṃ bhāriyaṃ kammamakāsī”ti? “Ukkaṇṭhitosmi, bhante”ti.
atk-s0502a:901_7: “Kiṃ kāraṇā ukkaṇṭhitosī”ti? So evaṃ vassāvāsikasāṭakānaṃ laddhadivasato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0502a:901_8: yāva therassa tālavaṇṭena pahārā sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ārocetvā, “iminā kāraṇena palātosmi,
atk-s0502a:901_9: bhante”ti āha. Atha naṃ satthā “ehi bhikkhu, mā cintayi cittaṃ nāmetaṃ dūre hontampi
atk-s0502a:901_10: ārammaṇaṃ sampaṭicchanakajātikaṃ, rāgadosamohabandhanā muccanatthāya vāyamituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0502a:905_0: Tattha dūraṅgamanti cittassa hi makkaṭasuttamattakampi puratthimādidisābhāgena gamanāgamanaṃ
atk-s0502a:905_1: nāma natthi, dūre santampi pana ārammaṇaṃ sampaṭicchatīti dūraṅgamaṃ nāma jātaṃ.
atk-s0502a:905_2: Sattaṭṭhacittāni pana ekato kaṇṇikabaddhāni ekakkhaṇe uppajjituṃ samatthāni nāma
atk-s0502a:905_3: natthi. Uppattikāle ekekameva cittaṃ uppajjati, tasmiṃ niruddhe puna ekekameva uppajjatīti
atk-s0502a:905_4: ekacaraṃ nāma jātaṃ. Cittassa sarīrasaṇṭhānaṃ vā nīlādippakāro vaṇṇabhedo vā natthīti
atk-s0502a:905_5: asarīraṃ nāma jātaṃ. Guhā nāma catumahābhūtaguhā, idañca hadayarūpaṃ nissāya pavattatīti
atk-s0502a:905_6: guhāsayaṃ nāma jātaṃ. Ye cittanti ye keci purisā vā itthiyo vā gahaṭṭhā vā pabbajitā
atk-s0502a:905_7: vā anuppajjanakakilesassa uppajjituṃ adentā satisammosena uppannakilesaṃ pajahantā
atk-s0502a:905_8: cittaṃ saṃyamessanti saṃyataṃ avikkhittaṃ karissanti. Mokkhanti mārabandhanāti sabbete
atk-s0502a:906: Desanāpariyosāne bhāgineyyasaṅgharakkhitatthero sotāpattiphalaṃ pāpuṇi, aññepi bahū sotāpannādayo jātā, mahājanassa sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:909: Anavaṭṭhitacittassāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā sāvatthiyaṃ viharanto cittahatthattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:910_0: Eko kira sāvatthivāsī kulaputto naṭṭhagoṇaṃ pariyesanto araññaṃ pavisitvā majjhanhike
atk-s0502a:910_1: kāle goṇaṃ disvā goyūthe vissajjetvā, “avassaṃ ayyānaṃ santike āhāramattaṃ labhissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:910_2: khuppipāsāpīḷito vihāraṃ pavisitvā bhikkhūnaṃ santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ
atk-s0502a:910_3: nisīdi. Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye bhikkhūnaṃ avakkārapātiyaṃ bhuttāvasesakaṃ bhattaṃ
atk-s0502a:910_4: hoti, te taṃ chātakapīḷitaṃ disvā, “ito bhattaṃ gahetvā bhuñjāhī”ti vadiṃsu. Buddhakāle
atk-s0502a:910_5: ca pana anekasūpabyañjanaṃ bhattaṃ uppajjati, so tato yāpanamattaṃ gahetvā bhuñjitvā
atk-s0502a:910_6: pānīyaṃ pivitvā hatthe dhovitvā bhikkhū vanditvā, “kiṃ, bhante, ajja, ayyā, nimantanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:910_7: agamaṃsū”ti pucchi. “Natthi, upāsaka, bhikkhū imināva nīhārena nibaddhaṃ labhantī”ti.
atk-s0502a:910_8: So “mayaṃ uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya rattindivaṃ nibaddhaṃ kammaṃ karontāpi evaṃ madhurabyañjanaṃ
atk-s0502a:910_9: bhattaṃ na labhāma, ime kira nibaddhaṃ bhuñjanti, kiṃ me gihibhāvena, bhikkhu bhavissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:910_10: cintetvā bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṃ yāci. Atha naṃ bhikkhū “sādhu upāsakā”ti pabbājesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:911_0: So laddhūpasampado sabbappakāraṃ vattapaṭivattaṃ akāsi. So buddhānaṃ uppannena lābhasakkārena
atk-s0502a:911_1: katipāhaccayena thūlasarīro ahosi. Tato cintesi – “kiṃ me bhikkhāya caritvā jīvitena,
atk-s0502a:911_2: gihī bhavissāmī”ti. So vibbhamitvā gehaṃ pāvisi. Tassa gehe kammaṃ karontassa katipāheneva
atk-s0502a:911_3: sarīraṃ milāyi. Tato “kiṃ me iminā dukkhena, samaṇo bhavissāmī”ti cintetvā puna gantvā
atk-s0502a:911_4: pabbaji. So katipāhaṃ vītināmetvā puna ukkaṇṭhitvā vibbhami, pabbajitakāle pana bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0502a:911_5: upakārako hoti. So katipāheneva punapi ukkaṇṭhitvā, “kiṃ me gihibhāvena, pabbajissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:911_6: gantvā bhikkhū vanditvā pabbajjaṃ yāci. Atha naṃ bhikkhū upakāravasena puna pabbājayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:911_7: Evaṃ so iminā niyāmeneva chakkhattuṃ pabbajitvā uppabbajito. Tassa bhikkhū “esa cittavasiko
atk-s0502a:912_0: Tassevaṃ aparāparaṃ vicarantasseva bhariyā gabbhinī ahosi. So sattame vāre araññato
atk-s0502a:912_1: kasibhaṇḍamādāya gehaṃ gantvā bhaṇḍakaṃ ṭhapetvā “attano kāsāvaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti gabbhaṃ
atk-s0502a:912_2: pāvisi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe tassa bhariyā nipajjitvā niddāyati. Tassā nivatthasāṭako apagato
atk-s0502a:912_3: hoti, mukhato ca lālā paggharati, nāsā ghuraghurāyati, mukhaṃ vivaṭṭaṃ, dantaṃ ghaṃsati,
atk-s0502a:912_4: sā tassa uddhumātakasarīraṃ viya upaṭṭhāsi. So “aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ ida”nti saññaṃ labhitvā,
atk-s0502a:912_5: “ahaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ pabbajitvā imaṃ nissāya bhikkhubhāve saṇṭhātuṃ nāsakkhi”nti kāsāyakoṭiyaṃ
atk-s0502a:913_0: Athassa anantaragehe ṭhitā sassu taṃ tathā gacchantaṃ disvā, “ayaṃ paṭiukkaṇṭhito
atk-s0502a:913_1: bhavissati, idāneva araññato āgantvā kāsāvaṃ udare bandhitvāva gehā nikkhanto vihārābhimukho
atk-s0502a:913_2: gacchati, kiṃ nu kho”ti gehaṃ pavisitvā niddāyamānaṃ dhītaraṃ passitvā “imaṃ disvā
atk-s0502a:913_3: so vippaṭisārī hutvā gato”ti ñatvā dhītaraṃ paharitvā “uṭṭhehi kāḷakaṇṇi, sāmiko
atk-s0502a:913_4: te taṃ niddāyamānaṃ disvā vippaṭisārī hutvā gato, natthi so ito paṭṭhāya tuyha”nti
atk-s0502a:913_5: āha. “Apehi apehi, amma, kuto tassa gamanaṃ atthi, katipāheneva punāgamissatī”ti
atk-s0502a:913_6: āha. Sopi “aniccaṃ dukkha”nti vatvā gacchanto gacchantova sotāpattiphalaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:913_7: So gantvā bhikkhū vanditvā pabbajjaṃ yāci. “Na sakkhissāma maṃyaṃ taṃ pabbājetuṃ,
atk-s0502a:913_8: kuto tuyhaṃ samaṇabhāvo, satthakanisānapāsāṇasadisaṃ tava sīsa”nti. “Bhante, idāni
atk-s0502a:913_9: maṃ anukampāya ekavāraṃ pabbājethā”ti. Te taṃ upakāravasena pabbājayiṃsu. So katipāheneva
atk-s0502a:914_0: Tepi naṃ āhaṃsu – “āvuso cittahattha, tava gamanasamayaṃ tvameva jāneyyāsi, imasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:914_1: vāre te cirāyita”nti. “Bhante, saṃsaggassa atthibhāvakāle gatamhā, so no saṃsaggo
atk-s0502a:914_2: chinno, idāni agamanadhammā jātamhā”ti. Bhikkhū satthu santikaṃ gantvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:914_3: ayaṃ bhikkhu amhehi evaṃ vutto evaṃ nāma kathesi, aññaṃ byākaroti, abhūtaṃ vadatī”ti
atk-s0502a:914_4: āhaṃsu. Satthā “āma, bhikkhave, mama putto attano anavaṭṭhitacittakāle saddhammaṃ
atk-s0502a:914_5: ajānanakāle gamanāgamanaṃ akāsi, idānissa puññañca pāpañca pahīna”nti vatvā imā dve gāthā āha –
atk-s0502a:921_0: Tattha anavaṭṭhitacittassāti cittaṃ nāmetaṃ kassaci nibaddhaṃ vā thāvaraṃ vā natthi.
atk-s0502a:921_1: Yo pana puggalo assapiṭṭhe ṭhapitakumbhaṇḍaṃ viya ca thusarāsimhi koṭṭitakhāṇuko
atk-s0502a:921_2: viya ca khallāṭasīse ṭhapitakadambapupphaṃ viya ca na katthaci saṇṭhāti, kadāci buddhasāvako
atk-s0502a:921_3: hoti, kadāci ājīvako, kadāci nigaṇṭho, kadāci tāpaso. Evarūpo puggalo anavaṭṭhitacitto
atk-s0502a:921_4: nāma. Tassa anavaṭṭhitacittassa. Saddhammaṃ avijānatoti sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammabhedaṃ
atk-s0502a:921_5: imaṃ saddhammaṃ avijānantassa parittasaddhatāya vā uplavasaddhatāya vā pariplavapasādassa
atk-s0502a:921_6: kāmāvacararūpāvacarādibhedā paññā na paripūrati. Kāmāvacarāyapi aparipūrayamānāya
atk-s0502a:921_8: rāgena atintacittassa. Ananvāhatacetasoti “āhatacitto khilajāto”ti āgataṭṭhāne dosena
atk-s0502a:921_9: cittassa pahatabhāvo vutto, idha pana dosena appaṭihatacittassāti attho. Puññapāpapahīnassāti
atk-s0502a:921_10: catutthamaggena pahīnapuññassa ceva pahīnapāpassa ca khīṇāsavassa. Natthi jāgarato
atk-s0502a:921_11: bhayanti khīṇāsavassa jāgarantasseva abhayabhāvo kathito viya. So pana saddhādīhi
atk-s0502a:921_12: pañcahi jāgaradhammehi samannāgatattā jāgaro nāma. Tasmā tassa jāgarantassāpi ajāgarantassāpi
atk-s0502a:921_13: kilesabhayaṃ natthi kilesānaṃ apacchāvattanato. Na hi taṃ kilesā anubandhanti tena
atk-s0502a:921_14: tena maggena pahīnānaṃ kilesānaṃ puna anupagamanato. Tenevāha – “sotāpattimaggena
atk-s0502a:921_15: ye kilesā pahīnā, te kilese na puneti na pacceti na paccāgacchati, sakadāgāmianāgāmiarahattamaggena
atk-s0502a:921_16: ye kilesā pahīnā, te kilese na puneti na pacceti na paccāgacchatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:923_0: Athekadivasaṃ bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “bhāriyā vatime, āvuso,
atk-s0502a:923_1: kilesā nāma, evarūpassa arahattassa upanissāyasampanno kulaputto kilesehi āloḷito
atk-s0502a:923_2: sattavāre gihī hutvā sattavāre pabbajito”ti. Satthā tesaṃ taṃ kathāpavattiṃ sutvā
atk-s0502a:923_3: taṅkhaṇānurūpena gamanena dhammasabhaṃ gantvā buddhāsane nisinno “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a:923_4: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā, “imāya nāmā”ti vutte evameva, bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a:923_5: kilesā nāma bhāriyā, sace ete rūpino hutvā katthaci pakkhipituṃ sakkā bhaveyyuṃ,
atk-s0502a:923_6: cakkavāḷaṃ atisambādhaṃ, brahmaloko atinīcakoti okāso nesaṃ na bhaveyya, mādisampi
atk-s0502a:923_7: nāmete paññāsampannaṃ purisājāneyyaṃ āloḷenti, avasesesu kā kathā? “Ahañhi aḍḍhanāḷimattaṃ
atk-s0502a:923_8: varakacorakaṃ kuṇṭhakudālañca nissāya cha vāre pabbajitvā uppabbajitapubbo”ti. “Kadā,
atk-s0502a:923_9: bhante, kadā sugatā”ti? “Suṇissatha, bhikkhave”ti. “Āma, bhante”ti. “Tena hi suṇāthā”ti atītaṃ āhari –
atk-s0502a:924_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente kudālapaṇḍito nāma bāhirakapabbajjaṃ
atk-s0502a:924_1: pabbajitvā aṭṭha māse himavante vasitvā vassārattasamaye bhūmiyā tintāya “gehe me
atk-s0502a:924_2: aḍḍhanāḷimatto varakacorako ca kuṇṭhakudālako ca atthi, varakacorakabījaṃ mā nassī”ti
