atk-s0502a:1074_4: aho mahānubhāvo thero”ti therassa guṇaṃ kathentā nisīdiṃsu. Satthā dibbāya sotadhātuyā
atk-s0502a:1074_5: kathaṃ sutvā āgantvā, “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā,
atk-s0502a:1074_6: “imāya nāmā”ti vutte, “bhikkhave, kuladamakena nāma bhikkhunā anupahacca saddhaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1074_7: anupahacca bhoge, kulaṃ akilametvā aviheṭhetvā pupphato reṇuṃ gaṇhantena bhamarena
atk-s0502a:1074_8: viya upasaṅkamitvā buddhaguṇaṃ jānāpetabbaṃ, tādiso mama putto moggallāno”ti theraṃ
atk-s0502a:1077: Paleti rasamādāya, evaṃ gāme munī care”ti.
atk-s0502a:1078_0: Tattha bhamaroti yā kāci madhukarajāti. Pupphanti pupphārāme caranto pupphañca vaṇṇañca
atk-s0502a:1078_1: gandhañca aheṭhayanto avināsento vicaratīti attho. Paletīti evaṃ caritvā yāvadatthaṃ
atk-s0502a:1078_2: rasaṃ pivitvā aparampi madhukaraṇatthāya ādāya paleti, so evaṃ vanagahanaṃ ajjhogāhetvā
atk-s0502a:1078_3: ekasmiṃ rukkhasusire taṃ rajamissakaṃ rasaṃ ṭhapetvā anupubbena madhurarasaṃ madhuṃ
atk-s0502a:1078_4: karoti, na tassa pupphārāme vicaritapaccayā pupphaṃ vā vaṇṇagandhaṃ vāssa vigacchati,
atk-s0502a:1078_5: atha kho sabbaṃ pākatikameva hoti. Evaṃ gāme munī careti evaṃ sekhāsekhabhedo anāgāriyamuni
atk-s0502a:1078_6: kulapaṭipāṭiyā gāme bhikkhaṃ gaṇhanto vicaratīti attho. Na hi tassa gāme caraṇapaccayā
atk-s0502a:1078_7: kulānaṃ saddhāhāni vā bhogahāni vā honti. Saddhāpi bhogāpi pākatikāva honti. Evaṃ
atk-s0502a:1078_8: caritvā ca pana nikkhamitvā sekhamuni tāva bahigāme udakaphāsukaṭṭhāne saṅghāṭiṃ
atk-s0502a:1078_10: piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā tathārūpaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ anupavisitvā ajjhattikakammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1078_11: sammasanto cattāro magge, cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni hatthagatāneva karoti. Asekhamuni
atk-s0502a:1078_12: pana diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāramanuyuñjati. Ayamassa bhamarena saddhiṃ madhukaraṇasarikkhatā
atk-s0502a:1080_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ vatvā uttaripi therassa guṇaṃ pakāsetuṃ “na, bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a:1080_1: idāneva moggallānena macchariyaseṭṭhi damito, pubbepi naṃ dametvā kammaphalasambandhaṃ
atk-s0502a:1080_2: jānāpesi evā”ti vatvā imamatthaṃ pakāsento atītaṃ āharitvā –
atk-s0502a:1082: Ubhinnaṃ piḷakā jātā, nāhaṃ passāmi illisa”nti. –
atk-s0502a:1086: Na paresaṃ vilomānīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā sāvatthiyaṃ viharanto pāveyyaṃ nāma ājīvakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1087_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kirekā gahapatānī puttaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā pāveyyaṃ nāma ājīvakaṃ paṭijaggi.
atk-s0502a:1087_1: Tassānantaragharesu manussā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā āgantvā, “aho acchariyā buddhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1087_2: dhammadesanā”ti nānappakārehi buddhaguṇe vaṇṇenti. Sā buddhānaṃ guṇakathaṃ sutvā
atk-s0502a:1087_3: vihāraṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sotukāmā ājīvakassa etamatthaṃ kathetvā, “gacchissāmi ahaṃ
atk-s0502a:1087_4: buddhasantikaṃ, ayyā”ti āha. So “mā gacchāhī”ti nivāretvā taṃ punappunaṃ yācamānampi
atk-s0502a:1087_5: nivāresi eva. Sā “ayaṃ mama vihāraṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sotuṃ na deti, satthāraṃ nimantetvā
atk-s0502a:1087_6: idheva dhammaṃ suṇissāmī”ti sāyanhasamaye puttaṃ pakkositvā, “gaccha, tāta, svātanāya
atk-s0502a:1087_7: satthāraṃ nimantehī”ti pesesi. So gacchanto paṭhamataraṃ ājīvakassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1087_8: gantvā taṃ vanditvā nisīdi. Atha naṃ so “kahaṃ gacchasī”ti āha. “Mātu vacanena satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:1087_9: nimantetuṃ gacchāmī”ti āha. “Mā tassa santikaṃ gacchāhī”ti. “Alaṃ, ayya, mama mātu
atk-s0502a:1087_10: bhāyāmi, gacchissāmaha”nti. “Etassa katasakkāraṃ ubhopi khādissāma, mā gacchāhī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1087_11: “Alaṃ, ayya, mātā me tajjessatī”ti. Tena hi gaccha, gantvā pana nimantetvā, “amhākaṃ
atk-s0502a:1087_12: gehaṃ asukaṭṭhāne vā asukavīthiyaṃ vā asukamaggena vā gantabba”nti mā ācikkhi. “Santike
atk-s0502a:1087_13: ṭhito viya aññena maggena gacchanto viya palāyitvā ehī”ti. So ājīvakassa vacanaṃ
atk-s0502a:1087_14: sutvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā nimantetvā ājīvakena vuttaniyāmeneva sabbaṃ katvā tassa
atk-s0502a:1087_15: santikaṃ gantvā, “kiṃ te kata”nti puṭṭho, “sabbaṃ kataṃ, ayyā”ti āha. “Bhaddakaṃ
atk-s0502a:1087_16: te kataṃ, tassa sakkāraṃ ubhopi khādissāmā”ti vatvā punadivase ājīvako pātova taṃ
atk-s0502a:1087_17: gehaṃ agamāsi. Taṃ gahetvā pacchāgabbhe nisīdāpesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:1088_0: Paṭivissakamanussā taṃ gehaṃ allagomayena upalimpitvā lājapañcamāni pupphāni vikiritvā
atk-s0502a:1088_1: satthu nisīdanatthāya mahārahaṃ āsanaṃ paññāpesuṃ. Buddhehi saddhiṃ aparicitamanussā
atk-s0502a:1088_2: hi āsanapaññattiṃ na jānanti, buddhānañca maggadesakena kiccaṃ nāma natthi, bodhimūle
atk-s0502a:1088_3: dasasahassisokadhātuṃ kampetvā sambodhiṃ pattadivaseyeva hi nesaṃ “ayaṃ maggo nirayaṃ
atk-s0502a:1088_4: gacchati, ayaṃ tiracchānayoniṃ, ayaṃ pettivisayaṃ, ayaṃ manussalokaṃ, ayaṃ devalokaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1088_5: ayaṃ amatamahānibbāna”nti sabbe maggā āvibhūtā. Gāmanigamādīnaṃ pana magge vattabbameva
atk-s0502a:1088_6: natthi. Tasmā satthā pātova pattacīvaramādāya mahāupāsikāya gehadvāraṃ gato. Sā gehā
atk-s0502a:1088_7: nikkhamitvā satthāraṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā antonivesanaṃ pavesetvā āsane nisīdāpetvā
atk-s0502a:1088_8: dakkhiṇodakaṃ datvā paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena parivisi. Upāsikā katabhattakiccassa
atk-s0502a:1088_9: satthuno anumodanaṃ kāretukāmā pattaṃ gaṇhi. Satthā madhurassarena anumodanadhammakathaṃ
atk-s0502a:1088_10: ārabhi. Upāsikā “sādhu, sādhū”ti sādhukāraṃ dadamānā dhammaṃ suṇi. Ājīvakopi pacchāgabbhe
atk-s0502a:1088_11: nisinnova tassā sādhukāraṃ datvā dhammaṃ suṇantiyā saddaṃ sutvā sandhāretuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0502a:1088_12: “Na idānesā mayha”nti nikkhamitvā “naṭṭhāsi kāḷakaṇṇi, etassa evaṃ sakkāraṃ karotī”ti
atk-s0502a:1088_13: nānappakārena upāsikañca satthārañca akkosanto palāyi. Upāsikā tassa kathāya lajjitā
atk-s0502a:1088_14: aññathattaṃ gataṃ cittaṃ desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetuṃ nāsakkhi. Atha naṃ satthā “kiṃ
atk-s0502a:1088_15: upāsike cittaṃ desanānugataṃ kātuṃ na sakkosī”ti? “Bhante, etassa me kathāya cittaṃ
atk-s0502a:1088_16: aññathattaṃ upagata”nti. Satthā “evarūpassa visabhāgajanassa kathitaṃ kathaṃ nāma
atk-s0502a:1088_17: āvajjituṃ na vaṭṭati, evarūpaṃ asamannāharitvā attano katākatameva oloketuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0502a:1092_0: Tattha na paresaṃ vilomānīti paresaṃ vilomāni pharusāni mammacchedakavacanāni na
atk-s0502a:1092_1: manasikātabbāni. Na paresaṃ katākatanti “asuko upāsako assaddho appasanno, nāpissa
atk-s0502a:1092_2: gehe kaṭacchubhikkhādīni diyyanti, na salākabhattādīni, na cīvarādipaccayadānaṃ etassa
atk-s0502a:1092_3: atthi, tathā asukā upāsikā assaddhā appasannā, nāpissā gehe kaṭacchubhikkhādīni diyyanti,
atk-s0502a:1092_4: na salākabhattādīni, na cīvarādipaccayadānaṃ etissā atthi, tathā asuko bhikkhu assaddho
atk-s0502a:1092_5: appasanno, nāpi upajjhāyavattaṃ karoti, na ācariyavattaṃ, na āgantukavattaṃ, na gamikavattaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1092_6: na cetiyaṅgaṇavattaṃ, na uposathāgāravattaṃ, na bhojanasālāvattaṃ, na jantāgharavattādīni,
atk-s0502a:1092_7: nāpissa kiñci dhutaṅgaṃ atthi, na bhāvanārāmatāya ussāhamattampī”ti evaṃ paresaṃ
atk-s0502a:1092_8: katākataṃ nāma na oloketabbaṃ. Attanova avekkheyyāti “kathaṃ bhūtassa me rattindivā
atk-s0502a:1092_9: vītivattantīti pabbajitena abhiṇhaṃ paccavekkhitabba”nti imaṃ ovādaṃ anussaranto
atk-s0502a:1092_10: saddhāpabbajito kulaputto “kiṃ nu kho ahaṃ ‘aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā’ti tilakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:1092_11: āropetvā yoge kammaṃ kātuṃ sakkhiṃ, nāsakkhi”nti evaṃ attano katākatāni olokeyyāti.
atk-s0502a:1093: Desanāvasāne sā upāsikā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhitā, desanā mahājanassa sātthikā jātāti.
atk-s0502a:1096: Yathāpi ruciraṃ pupphanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā sāvatthiyaṃ viharanto chattapāṇiupāsakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1097_0: Sāvatthiyañhi chattapāṇi nāma upāsako tipiṭakadharo anāgāmī. So pātova uposathiko
atk-s0502a:1097_1: hutvā satthu upaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi. Anāgāmiariyasāvakānañhi samādānavasena uposathakammaṃ
atk-s0502a:1097_2: nāma natthi, maggeneva tesaṃ brahmacariyañca ekabhattikañca āgataṃ. Tenevāha – “ghaṭikāro
atk-s0502a:1097_3: kho, mahārāja, kumbhakāro ekabhattiko brahmacārī sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo”ti. Evaṃ anāgāmino
atk-s0502a:1097_4: pakatiyāva ekabhattikā ca brahmacārino ca honti. Sopi tatheva uposathiko hutvā satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:1097_5: upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā dhammakathaṃ suṇanto nisīdi. Tasmiṃ samaye rājā pasenadi kosalo
atk-s0502a:1097_6: satthu upaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi. Chattapāṇi upāsako taṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā “uṭṭhātabbaṃ
atk-s0502a:1097_7: nu kho, no”ti cintetvā – “ahaṃ aggarājassa santike nisinno, tassa me padesarājānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1097_8: disvā uṭṭhātuṃ na yuttaṃ, rājā kho pana me anuṭṭhahantassa kujjhissati, etasmiṃ kujjhantepi
atk-s0502a:1097_9: neva uṭṭhahissāmi. Rājānaṃ disvā uṭṭhahantena hi rājā garukato hoti, no satthā, tasmā
atk-s0502a:1097_10: neva uṭṭhahissāmī”ti na uṭṭhahi. Paṇḍitapurisā nāma garutarānaṃ santike nisīditvā
atk-s0502a:1097_11: anuṭṭhahantaṃ disvā na kujjhanti. Rājā pana taṃ anuṭṭhahantaṃ disvā kupitamānaso
atk-s0502a:1097_12: satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Satthā kupitabhāvaṃ ñatvā, “mahārāja, ayaṃ chattapāṇi
atk-s0502a:1097_13: upāsako paṇḍito diṭṭhadhammo tipiṭakadharo atthānatthakusalo”ti upāsakassa guṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:1097_14: kathesi. Rañño tassa guṇakathaṃ suṇantasseva cittaṃ mudukaṃ jātaṃ.
atk-s0502a:1098_0: Athekadivasaṃ rājā uparipāsāde ṭhito chattapāṇiṃ upāsakaṃ katabhattakiccaṃ chattamādāya
atk-s0502a:1098_1: upāhanamāruyha rājaṅgaṇena gacchantaṃ disvā pakkosāpesi. So chattupāhanaṃ apanetvā
atk-s0502a:1098_2: rājānamupasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ rājā āha – “bho upāsaka,
atk-s0502a:1098_3: kinte chattupāhanaṃ apanīta”nti. “‘Rājā pakkosatī’ti sutvā apanetvā āgatomhī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1098_4: “Ajja amhākaṃ rājabhāvo tumhehi ñāto bhavissatī”ti. “Sadāpi mayaṃ, deva, tumhākaṃ
atk-s0502a:1098_5: rājabhāvaṃ jānāmā”ti. “Yadi evaṃ kasmā purimadivase satthu santike nisinno maṃ disvā
atk-s0502a:1098_6: na uṭṭhahī”ti? “Mahārāja, ahaṃ aggarājassa santike nisinno, padesarājānaṃ disvā uṭṭhahanto
atk-s0502a:1098_7: satthari agāravaṃ pavedeyyaṃ, tasmā na uṭṭhahi”nti. “Hotu, bho, tiṭṭhatetaṃ”. “Tumhe
atk-s0502a:1098_8: kira diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikānaṃ atthānatthānaṃ kusalā tipiṭakadharā amhākaṃ antepure
atk-s0502a:1098_9: dhammaṃ vācethā”ti. “Na sakkomi, devā”ti. “Kiṃ kāraṇā”ti? “Rājagehaṃ nāma mahāsāvajjaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1098_10: duyuttasuyuttakāni garukānettha, devā”ti. “Mā evaṃ vadetha, ‘purimadivase maṃ disvā
atk-s0502a:1098_11: na uṭṭhitomhī’ti mā kukkuccaṃ karothā”ti. “Deva, gihīnaṃ vicaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ nāma mahāsāvajjaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1098_12: ekaṃ pabbajitaṃ pakkosāpetvā dhammaṃ vācāpethā”ti. Rājā “sādhu, bho, gacchatha tumhe”ti
atk-s0502a:1098_13: taṃ uyyojetvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ yāci, “bhante, mallikā ca devī vāsabhakhattiyā
atk-s0502a:1098_14: ca dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇissāmāti vadanti, pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ nibaddhaṃ mama
atk-s0502a:1098_15: gehaṃ gantvā tāsaṃ dhammaṃ uddisathā”ti. “Buddhānaṃ nibaddhaṃ ekaṭṭhānagamanaṃ nāma
atk-s0502a:1098_16: natthi, mahārājā”ti. “Tena hi, bhante, aññaṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ dethā”ti. Satthā ānandattherassa
atk-s0502a:1098_17: bhāramakāsi. Thero nibaddhaṃ gantvā tāsaṃ uddesaṃ uddisati. Tāsu mallikā sakkaccaṃ
atk-s0502a:1098_18: gahetvā sajjhāyitvā uddesaṃ paṭicchāpesi. Vāsabhakhattiyā pana neva sakkaccaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0502a:1098_19: na sajjhāyati, na uddesaṃ paṭicchāpetuṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0502a:1099_0: Athekadivasaṃ satthā theraṃ pucchi – “kimānanda, upāsikā dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇantī”ti?
atk-s0502a:1099_1: “Āma, bhante”ti. “Kā sakkaccaṃ gaṇhātī”ti? “Mallikā, bhante, sakkaccaṃ gaṇhāti, sakkaccaṃ
atk-s0502a:1099_2: sajjhāyati, sakkaccaṃ uddesaṃ paṭicchāpetuṃ sakkoti. Tumhākaṃ pana ñātidhītā neva
atk-s0502a:1099_3: sakkaccaṃ gaṇhāti, na sajjhāyati, na uddesaṃ paṭicchāpetuṃ sakkotī”ti. Satthā therassa
atk-s0502a:1099_4: vacanaṃ sutvā, “ānanda, mayā kathitadhammo nāma sakkaccamasuṇantassa aggaṇhantassa
atk-s0502a:1099_5: asajjhāyantassa adesentassa vaṇṇasampannaṃ agandhakapupphaṃ viya aphalo hoti, sakkaccaṃ
atk-s0502a:1099_6: pana savanādīni karontassa mahapphalo hoti mahānisaṃso”ti vatvā imā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:1102: Evaṃ subhāsitā vācā, aphalā hoti akubbato.
atk-s0502a:1105: Evaṃ subhāsitā vācā, saphalā hoti kubbato”ti.
atk-s0502a:1106_0: Tattha ruciranti sobhanaṃ. Vaṇṇavantanti vaṇṇasaṇṭhānasampannaṃ, agandhakanti gandhavirahitaṃ
atk-s0502a:1106_1: pālibhaddakagirikaṇṇikajayasumanādibhedaṃ. Evaṃ subhāsitā vācāti subhāsitā vācā nāma
atk-s0502a:1106_2: tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ. Taṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānasampannaṃ agandhakapupphasadisaṃ. Yathā
atk-s0502a:1106_3: pana agandhakapupphaṃ yo naṃ dhāreti, tassa sarīre gandhaṃ na pharati, evaṃ etampi
atk-s0502a:1106_4: yo naṃ sakkaccaṃ savanādīhi na samācarati, tassa sakkaccaṃ asamācarantassa yaṃ tattha
atk-s0502a:1106_5: kattabbaṃ, taṃ akubbato sutagandhañca vācāgandhañca paṭipattigandhañca na āvahati
atk-s0502a:1106_6: aphalā hoti. Tena vuttaṃ – “evaṃ subhāsitā vācā, aphalā hoti akubbato”ti. Sagandhakanti
atk-s0502a:1106_7: campakanīluppalādibhedaṃ. Evanti yathā taṃ pupphaṃ dhārentassa sarīre gandho pharati,
atk-s0502a:1106_8: evaṃ tepiṭakabuddhavacanasaṅkhātā subhāsitā vācāpi. Kubbatoti yo sakkaccaṃ savanādīhi
atk-s0502a:1106_9: tattha kattabbaṃ karoti, sā assa puggalassa saphalā hoti, sutagandhavācāgandhapaṭipattigandhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1107: Desanāvasāne bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pattā. Desanā mahājanassa sātthikā jātāti.
atk-s0502a:1110: Yathāpi puppharāsimhāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā sāvatthiyaṃ upanissāya pubbārāme viharanto visākhaṃ upāsikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1111_0: Sā kira aṅgaraṭṭhe bhaddiyanagare meṇḍakaseṭṭhiputtassa dhanañcayaseṭṭhino aggamahesiyā
atk-s0502a:1111_1: sumanadeviyā kucchismiṃ nibbatti. Tassā sattavassikakāle satthā selabrāhmaṇādīnaṃ
atk-s0502a:1112_0: Tasmiñca samaye meṇḍako, gahapati, tasmiṃ nagare pañcannaṃ mahāpuññānaṃ jeṭṭhako
atk-s0502a:1112_1: hutvā seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ karoti. Pañca mahāpuññā nāma meṇḍako seṭṭhi, candapadumā nāma
atk-s0502a:1112_2: tasseva jeṭṭhakabhariyā, tasseva jeṭṭhakaputto dhanañcayo nāma, tassa bhariyā sumanadevī
atk-s0502a:1112_3: nāma, meṇḍakaseṭṭhino dāso puṇṇo nāmāti. Na kevalañca meṇḍakaseṭṭhiyeva, bimbisārarañño
atk-s0502a:1112_4: pana vijite pañca amitabhogā nāma ahesuṃ – jotiko, jaṭilo, meṇḍako, puṇṇako, kākavaliyoti.
atk-s0502a:1112_5: Tesu ayaṃ meṇḍakaseṭṭhi dasabalassa attano nagaraṃ sampattabhāvaṃ ñatvā puttassa
atk-s0502a:1112_6: dhanañcayaseṭṭhino dhītaraṃ visākhaṃ dārikaṃ pakkosāpetvā āha – “amma, tuyhampi maṅgalaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1112_7: amhākampi maṅgalaṃ, tava parivārehi pañcahi dārikāsatehi saddhiṃ pañca rathasatāni
atk-s0502a:1112_8: āruyha pañcahi dāsisatehi parivutā dasabalassa paccuggamanaṃ karohī”ti. Sā “sādhū”ti
atk-s0502a:1112_9: paṭissuṇitvā tathā akāsi. Kāraṇākāraṇesu pana kusalattā yāvatikā yānassa bhūmi, yānena
atk-s0502a:1112_10: gantvā yānā paccorohitvā pattikāva satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:1112_11: Athassā cariyāvasena satthā dhammaṃ desesi. Sā desanāvasāne pañcahi dārikāsatehi
atk-s0502a:1112_12: saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. Meṇḍakaseṭṭhipi kho satthāramupasaṅkamitvā dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0502a:1112_13: sutvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya svātanāya nimantetvā punadivase attano nivesane paṇītena
atk-s0502a:1112_14: khādanīyena bhojanīyena buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ parivisitvā eteneva upāyena
atk-s0502a:1112_15: aḍḍhamāsaṃ mahādānamadāsi. Satthā bhaddiyanagare yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:1113_0: Tena kho pana samayena bimbisāro ca pasenadi kosalo ca aññamaññaṃ bhaginipatikā honti.
atk-s0502a:1113_1: Athekadivasaṃ kosalarājā cintesi – “bimbisārassa vijite pañca amitabhogā mahāpuññā
atk-s0502a:1113_2: vasanti, mayhaṃ vijite ekopi tādiso natthi, yaṃnūnāhaṃ bimbisārassa santikaṃ gantvā
atk-s0502a:1113_3: ekaṃ mahāpuññaṃ yāceyya”nti. So tattha gantvā raññā katapaṭisanthāro “kiṃ kāraṇā
atk-s0502a:1113_4: āgatosī”ti puṭṭho “‘tumhākaṃ vijite pañca amitabhogā mahāpuññā vasanti, tato ekaṃ
atk-s0502a:1113_5: gahetvā gamissāmī’ti āgatomhi, tesu me ekaṃ dethā”ti āha. “Mahākulāni amhehi cāletuṃ
atk-s0502a:1113_6: na sakkā”ti āha. “Ahaṃ aladdhā na gamissāmī”ti āha. Rājā amaccehi saddhiṃ mantetvā
atk-s0502a:1113_7: “jotikādīnaṃ mahākulānaṃ cālanaṃ nāma mahāpathaviyā cālanasadisaṃ, meṇḍakamahāseṭṭhissa
atk-s0502a:1113_8: putto dhanañcayaseṭṭhi nāma atthi, tena saddhiṃ mantetvā paṭivacanaṃ te dassāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:1113_9: vatvā taṃ pakkosāpetvā, tāta, kosalarājā “‘ekaṃ dhanaseṭṭhiṃ gahetvā gamissāmī’ti
atk-s0502a:1113_10: vadati, tvaṃ tena saddhiṃ gacchāhī”ti. “Tumhesu pahiṇantesu gamissāmi, devā”ti. “Tena
atk-s0502a:1113_11: hi parivacchaṃ katvā gaccha, tātā”ti. So attano kattabbayuttakamakāsi. Rājāpissa
atk-s0502a:1113_12: mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ katvā, “imaṃ ādāya gacchathā”ti pasenadirājānaṃ uyyojesi. So taṃ
atk-s0502a:1113_13: ādāya sabbattha ekarattivāsena gacchanto ekaṃ phāsukaṭṭhānaṃ patvā nivāsaṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0502a:1113_14: atha naṃ dhanañcayaseṭṭhi pucchi – “idaṃ kassa vijita”nti? “Mayhaṃ, seṭṭhī”ti. “Kīva
atk-s0502a:1113_15: dūro ito sāvatthī”ti? “Sattayojanamatthake”ti. “Antonagaraṃ sambādhaṃ, amhākaṃ parijano
atk-s0502a:1113_16: mahanto, sace rocetha, idheva vaseyyāma, devā”ti. Rājā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā tasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:1113_17: ṭhāne nagaraṃ māpetvā tassa datvā agamāsi. Tasmiṃ padese sayaṃ vasanaṭṭhānassa gahitattā
atk-s0502a:1114_0: Sāvatthiyampi kho migāraseṭṭhino putto puṇṇavaḍḍhanakumāro nāma vayappatto ahosi.
atk-s0502a:1114_1: Atha naṃ mātāpitaro vadiṃsu – “tāta, tava ruccanaṭṭhāne ekaṃ dārikaṃ upadhārehī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1114_2: “‘Mayhaṃ evarūpāya bhariyāya kiccaṃ natthī’ti, putta, mā evaṃ kari, kulaṃ nāma aputtakaṃ
atk-s0502a:1114_3: na tiṭṭhatī”ti. So punappunaṃ vuccamāno “tena hi pañcakalyāṇasamannāgataṃ dārikaṃ
atk-s0502a:1114_4: labhamāno tumhākaṃ vacanaṃ karissāmī”ti āha. “Kāni panetāni pañca kalyāṇāni nāma,
atk-s0502a:1114_5: tātā”ti. Kesakalyāṇaṃ, maṃsakalyāṇaṃ, aṭṭhikalyāṇaṃ, chavikalyāṇaṃ, vayakalyāṇanti.
atk-s0502a:1114_6: Mahāpuññāya hi itthiyā kesā morakalāpasadisā hutvā muñcitvā vissaṭṭhā nivāsanantaṃ
atk-s0502a:1114_7: paharitvā nivattitvā uddhaggā tiṭṭhanti, idaṃ kesakalyāṇaṃ nāma, dantāvaraṇaṃ bimbaphalasadisaṃ
atk-s0502a:1114_8: vaṇṇasampannaṃ samaṃ suphusitaṃ hoti, idaṃ maṃsakalyāṇaṃ nāma, dantā sukkā samā aviraḷā
atk-s0502a:1114_9: ussāpetvā ṭhapitavajirapanti viya samacchinnasaṅkhapanti viya ca sobhanti, idaṃ aṭṭhikalyāṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:1114_10: nāma, kāḷiyā cuṇṇakādīhi avilitto eva chavivaṇṇo siniddho nīluppaladāmasadiso hoti,
atk-s0502a:1114_11: odātāya ca kaṇikārapupphadāmasadiso hoti, idaṃ chavikalyāṇaṃ nāma, dasakkhattuṃ vijātāpi
atk-s0502a:1114_12: kho pana sakiṃ vijātā viya avigatayobbanāyeva hoti, idaṃ vayakalyāṇaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0502a:1114_14: itthiyo nāma hontī”ti pucchiṃsu. “Āma, hontī”ti. “Tena hi evarūpaṃ dārikaṃ pariyesituṃ
atk-s0502a:1114_15: aṭṭha janā gacchantū”ti bahuṃ dhanaṃ datvā “āgatakāle vo kattabbaṃ jānissāma, gacchatha,
atk-s0502a:1114_16: evarūpaṃ dārikaṃ pariyesatha, diṭṭhakāle ca imaṃ pilandhanaṃ dadeyyāthā”ti satasahassagghanikaṃ
atk-s0502a:1115_0: Te mahantamahantāni nagarāni gantvā pariyesamānā pañcakalyāṇasamannāgataṃ dārikaṃ
atk-s0502a:1115_1: adisvā nivattitvā āgacchantā vivaṭanakkhattadivase sāketaṃ anuppattā – “ajja amhākaṃ
atk-s0502a:1115_2: kammaṃ nipphajjissatī”ti cintayiṃsu. Tasmiṃ pana nagare anusaṃvaccharaṃ vivaṭanakkhattaṃ
atk-s0502a:1115_3: nāma hoti. Tadā bahi anikkhamanakulānipi parivārena saddhiṃ gehā nikkhamitvā appaṭicchannena
atk-s0502a:1115_4: sarīrena padasāva nadītīraṃ gacchanti. Tasmiṃ divase khattiyamahāsālādīnaṃ puttāpi
atk-s0502a:1115_5: “attano samānajātikaṃ manāpaṃ kuladārikaṃ disvā mālāguḷena parikkhipissāmā”ti taṃ
atk-s0502a:1115_6: taṃ maggaṃ nissāya tiṭṭhanti. Tepi kho brāhmaṇā nadītīre ekaṃ sālaṃ pavisitvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1115_7: “Tasmiṃ khaṇe visākhā pannarasasoḷasavassuddesikā hutvā sabbābharaṇapaṭimaṇḍitā pañcahi
atk-s0502a:1115_8: kumārikāsatehi parivutā nadiṃ gantvā nhāyissāmī”ti taṃ padesaṃ pattā, atha kho megho
atk-s0502a:1115_9: uṭṭhahitvā pāvassi. Pañcasatā kumārikāyo vegena gantvā sālaṃ pavisiṃsu. Brāhmaṇā
atk-s0502a:1115_10: olokentā tāsu ekampi pañcakalyāṇasamannāgataṃ na passiṃsu. Atha visākhā pakatigamaneneva
atk-s0502a:1115_11: sālaṃ pāvisi, vatthābharaṇāni temiṃsu. Brāhmaṇā tassā cattāri kalyāṇāni disvā dante
atk-s0502a:1115_12: passitukāmā “alasajātikā amhākaṃ dhītā, etissā sāmiko kañjikamattampi na labhissati
atk-s0502a:1115_13: maññe”ti aññamaññaṃ kathayiṃsu. Atha ne visākhā āha – “kaṃ vadetha tumhe”ti? “Taṃ
atk-s0502a:1115_14: kathema, ammā”ti. Madhuro hi tassā saddo kaṃsatāḷasaro viya niccharati. Atha ne puna
atk-s0502a:1115_15: madhurasaddena “kiṃ kāraṇā bhaṇathā”ti pucchi. “Tava parivāritthiyo vatthālaṅkāre
atk-s0502a:1115_16: atemetvā vegena sālaṃ paviṭṭhā, tuyhaṃ ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ vegena āgamanamattampi natthi,
atk-s0502a:1115_17: vatthābharaṇāni temetvā āgatāsi. Tasmā kathema, ammā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1116_0: “Tātā, evaṃ mā vadetha, ahaṃ etāhi balavatarā, kāraṇaṃ pana sallakkhetvā javena nāgatāmhī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1116_1: “Kiṃ, ammā”ti? “Tātā, cattāro janā javamānā na sobhanti, aparampi kāraṇaṃ atthī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1116_2: “Katame cattāro janā javamānā na sobhanti, ammā”ti? Tātā, abhisittarājā tāva sabbābharaṇapaṭimaṇḍito
atk-s0502a:1116_3: kacchaṃ bandhitvā rājaṅgaṇe javamāno na sobhati, “kiṃ ayaṃ rājā gahapatiko viya dhāvatī”ti
atk-s0502a:1116_4: aññadatthu garahaṃ labhati, saṇikaṃ gacchantova sobhati. Rañño maṅgalahatthīpi alaṅkato
atk-s0502a:1116_5: javamāno na sobhati, vāraṇalīḷāya gacchantova sobhati. Pabbajito javamāno na sobhati,
atk-s0502a:1116_6: “kiṃ ayaṃ samaṇo gihī viya dhāvatī”ti kevalaṃ garahameva labhati, samitagamanena
atk-s0502a:1116_7: pana sobhati. Itthī javamānā na sobhati, “kiṃ esā itthī puriso viya dhāvatī”ti garahitabbāva
atk-s0502a:1116_8: hoti, “ime cattāro janā javamānā na sobhanti, tātā”ti. “Katamaṃ pana aparaṃ kāraṇaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1116_9: ammā”ti? “Tātā, mātāpitaro nāma dhītaraṃ aṅgapaccaṅgāni saṇṭhāpetvā posenti. Mayañhi
atk-s0502a:1116_10: vikkiṇeyyabhaṇḍaṃ nāma, amhe parakulapesanatthāya posenti. Sace javamānānaṃ nivatthadussakaṇṇe
atk-s0502a:1116_11: vā akkamitvā bhūmiyaṃ vā pakkhalitvā patitakāle hattho vā pādo vā bhijjeyya, kulasseva
atk-s0502a:1116_12: bhāro bhaveyya, pasādhanabhaṇḍaṃ pana me temetvā sussissati. Imaṃ kāraṇaṃ sallakkhetvā
atk-s0502a:1117_0: Brāhmaṇā tassā kathanakāle dantasampattiṃ disvā “evarūpā no dantasampatti diṭṭhapubbā”ti
atk-s0502a:1117_1: tassā sādhukāraṃ datvā, “amma, tuyhamevesā anucchavikā”ti vatvā taṃ suvaṇṇamālaṃ
atk-s0502a:1117_2: pilandhayiṃsu. Atha ne pucchi – “kataranagarato āgatāttha, tātā”ti? “Sāvatthito,
atk-s0502a:1117_3: ammā”ti. “Seṭṭhikulaṃ kataraṃ nāmā”ti? “Migāraseṭṭhi nāma, ammā”ti. “Ayyaputto ko
atk-s0502a:1117_4: nāmā”ti? “Puṇṇavaḍḍhanakumāro nāma, ammā”ti. Sā “samānajātikaṃ no kula”nti adhivāsetvā
atk-s0502a:1117_5: pitu sāsanaṃ pahiṇi “amhākaṃ rathaṃ pesetū”ti. Kiñcāpi hi sā āgamanakāle padasā āgatā,
atk-s0502a:1117_6: suvaṇṇamālāya pana pilandhanakālato paṭṭhāya tathā gantuṃ na labhati, issaradārikā
atk-s0502a:1117_7: rathādīhi gacchanti, itarā pakatiyānakaṃ vā abhiruhanti, chattaṃ vā tālapaṇṇaṃ vā
atk-s0502a:1117_8: upari karonti, tasmimpi asati nivatthasāṭakassa dasantaṃ ukkhipitvā aṃse khipantā
atk-s0502a:1117_9: gacchanti eva. Tassā pana pitā pañca rathasatāni pesesi. Sā saparivārā rathaṃ āruyha
atk-s0502a:1117_10: gatā. Brāhmaṇāpi ekatova agamaṃsu. Atha ne seṭṭhi pucchi – “kuto āgatātthā”ti? “Sāvatthito
atk-s0502a:1117_11: mahāseṭṭhī”ti. “Seṭṭhi kataro nāmā”ti? “Migāraseṭṭhi nāmā”ti. “Putto ko nāmā”ti?
atk-s0502a:1117_13: “Dhanaṃ tāva amhākaṃ dhanaṃ upādāya kākaṇikamattaṃ, dārikāya pana ārakkhamattāya
atk-s0502a:1117_14: laddhakālato paṭṭhāya kiṃ aññena kāraṇenā”ti adhivāsesi. So tesaṃ sakkāraṃ katvā
atk-s0502a:1118_0: Te sāvatthiṃ gantvā migāraseṭṭhissa “laddhā no dārikā”ti ārocayiṃsu. “Kassa dhītā”ti?
atk-s0502a:1118_1: “Dhanañcayaseṭṭhino”ti. So “mahākulassa me dārikā laddhā, khippameva naṃ ānetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0502a:1118_2: tattha gamanatthaṃ rañño ārocesi. Rājā “‘mahākulaṃ etaṃ mayā bimbisārassa santikā
atk-s0502a:1118_3: ānetvā sākete nivesitaṃ, tassa sammānaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī’ti ahampi āgamissāmī”ti āha,
atk-s0502a:1118_4: so “sādhu, devā”ti vatvā dhanañcayaseṭṭhino sāsanaṃ pesesi – “mayi āgacchante rājāpi
atk-s0502a:1118_5: āgamissati, mahantaṃ rājabalaṃ ettakassa janassa kattabbayuttakaṃ kātuṃ sakkhissasi,
atk-s0502a:1118_6: na sakkhissasī”ti? Itaropi “sacepi dasa rājāno āgacchanti, āgacchantū”ti paṭisāsanaṃ
atk-s0502a:1118_7: pesesi. Migāraseṭṭhi tāva mahante nagare gehagopakamattaṃ ṭhapetvā sesajanaṃ ādāya
atk-s0502a:1118_8: gantvā aḍḍhayojanamatte ṭhāne ṭhatvā “āgatāmhā”ti sāsanaṃ pahiṇi. Dhanañcayaseṭṭhi
atk-s0502a:1118_9: bahupaṇṇākāraṃ pesetvā dhītarā saddhiṃ mantesi, “amma, sasuro kira te kosalaraññā
atk-s0502a:1118_10: saddhiṃ āgato, tassa kataraṃ gehaṃ paṭijaggitabbaṃ, rañño kataraṃ, uparājādīnaṃ katarānī”ti?
atk-s0502a:1118_11: Paṇḍitā seṭṭhidhītā vajiraggatikhiṇañāṇā kappasatasahassaṃ patthitapatthanā abhinīhārasampannā
atk-s0502a:1118_12: “sasurassa me asukagehaṃ paṭijaggatha, rañño asukagehaṃ, uparājādīnaṃ asukānī”ti
atk-s0502a:1118_13: saṃvidahitvā dāsakammakare pakkosāpetvā “ettakā rañño kattabbakiccaṃ karotha, ettakā
atk-s0502a:1118_14: uparājādīnaṃ, hatthiassādayopi tumheyeva paṭijaggatha, assabandhādayopi āgantvā maṅgalachaṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:1118_15: anubhavissantī”ti saṃvidahi. “Kiṃ kāraṇā”? “‘Mayaṃ visākhāya maṅgalaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā
atk-s0502a:1118_16: na kiñci labhimha, assarakkhaṇādīni karontā sukhaṃ na vicarimhā’ti keci vattuṃ mā labhiṃsū”ti.
atk-s0502a:1119_0: Taṃ divasameva visākhāya pitā pañcasate suvaṇṇakāre pakkosāpetvā “dhītu me mahālatāpasādhanaṃ
atk-s0502a:1119_1: nāma karothā”ti rattasuvaṇṇassa nikkhasahassaṃ, tadanurūpāni ca rajatamaṇimuttāpavāḷavajirādīni
atk-s0502a:1119_2: dāpesi. Rājā katipāhaṃ vasitvāva dhanañcayaseṭṭhissa sāsanaṃ pahiṇi “na sakkā seṭṭhinā
atk-s0502a:1119_3: amhākaṃ ciraṃ posanaṃ nāma kātuṃ, dāni dārikāya gamanakālaṃ jānātū”ti. Sopi rañño
atk-s0502a:1119_4: sāsanaṃ pesesi – “idāni vassakālo āgato, na sakkā catumāsaṃ vicarituṃ, tumhākaṃ balakāyassa
atk-s0502a:1119_5: yaṃ yaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭati, sabbaṃ taṃ mama bhāro, mayā pesitakāle devo gamissatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1119_6: Tato paṭṭhāya sāketanagaraṃ niccanakkhattaṃ viya ahosi. Rājānaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbesaṃ
atk-s0502a:1119_7: mālāgandhavatthādīni paṭiyattāneva honti. Tato te janā cintayiṃsu – “seṭṭhi amhākameva
atk-s0502a:1119_8: sakkāraṃ karotī”ti, evaṃ tayo māsā atikkantā, pasādhanaṃ pana tāva na niṭṭhāti. Kammantādhiṭṭhāyakā
atk-s0502a:1119_9: āgantvā seṭṭhino ārocesuṃ – “aññaṃ asantaṃ nāma natthi, balakāyassa pana bhattapacanadārūni
atk-s0502a:1119_10: nappahontī”ti. “Gacchatha, tātā, imasmiṃ nagare parijiṇṇā hatthisālādayo ceva parijiṇṇakāni
atk-s0502a:1119_11: ca gehāni gahetvā pacathā”ti. Evaṃ pacantānampi aḍḍhamāso atikkanto. Tato punapi
atk-s0502a:1119_12: “dārūni natthī”ti ārocayiṃsu. “Imasmiṃ kāle na sakkā dārūni laddhuṃ, dussakoṭṭhāgārāni
atk-s0502a:1119_13: vivaritvā thūlasāṭakehi vaṭṭiyo katvā telacāṭīsu temetvā bhattaṃ pacathā”ti. Te aḍḍhamāsaṃ
atk-s0502a:1119_14: tathā akaṃsu. Evaṃ cattāro māsā atikkantā, pasādhanampi niṭṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0502a:1120_0: Tasmiṃ pasādhane catasso vajiranāḷiyo upayogaṃ agamaṃsu, muttānaṃ ekādasa nāḷiyo,
atk-s0502a:1120_1: pavāḷassa bāvīsati nāḷiyo, maṇīnaṃ tettiṃsa nāḷiyo. Iti etehi ca aññehi ca ratanehi
atk-s0502a:1120_2: niṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi. Asuttamayaṃ pasādhanaṃ rajatena suttakiccaṃ kariṃsu. Taṃ sīse
atk-s0502a:1120_3: paṭimukkaṃ pādapiṭṭhiṃ gacchati. Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne muddikā yojetvā katā suvaṇṇamayā
atk-s0502a:1120_4: gaṇṭhikā honti, rajatamayā pāsakā, matthakamajjhe ekā muddikā, dvīsu kaṇṇapiṭṭhīsu
atk-s0502a:1120_5: dve, galavāṭake ekā, dvīsu jattūsu dve, dvīsu kapparesu dve, dvīsu kaṭipassesu dveti.
atk-s0502a:1120_6: Tasmiṃ kho pana pasādhane ekaṃ moraṃ kariṃsu, tassa dakkhiṇapakkhe rattasuvaṇṇamayāni
atk-s0502a:1120_7: pañca pattasatāni ahesuṃ, vāmapakkhe pañca pattasatāni, tuṇḍaṃ pavāḷamayaṃ, akkhīni
atk-s0502a:1120_8: maṇimayāni, tathā gīvā ca piñchāni ca, pattanāḷiyo rajatamayā, tathā jaṅghāyo. So
atk-s0502a:1120_9: visākhāya matthakamajjhe pabbatakūṭe ṭhatvā naccanamayūro viya khāyati. Pattanāḷisahassassa
atk-s0502a:1120_10: saddo dibbasaṅgītaṃ viya pañcaṅgikatūriyaghoso viya ca pavattati. Santikaṃ upagatāyeva
atk-s0502a:1120_11: tassā amorabhāvaṃ jānanti. Pasādhanaṃ navakoṭiagghanakaṃ ahosi, satasahassaṃ hatthakammamūlaṃ dīyittha.
atk-s0502a:1121_0: “Kissa pana nissandena tāyetaṃ pasādhanaṃ laddha”nti? Sā kira kassapasammāsambuddhakāle
atk-s0502a:1121_1: vīsatiyā bhikkhusahassānaṃ cīvarasāṭakaṃ datvā suttampi sūciyopi rajanampi attano
atk-s0502a:1121_2: santakameva adāsi. Tassa cīvaradānassa nissandena imaṃ mahālatāpasādhanaṃ labhi.
atk-s0502a:1121_3: Itthīnañhi cīvaradānaṃ mahālatāpasādhanabhaṇḍena matthakaṃ pappoti, purisānaṃ iddhimayapattacīvarenāti.
atk-s0502a:1121_4: Evaṃ mahāseṭṭhi catūhi māsehi dhītu parivacchaṃ katvā tassā deyyadhammaṃ dadamāno
atk-s0502a:1121_5: kahāpaṇapūrāni pañca sakaṭasatāni adāsi, suvaṇṇabhājanapūrāni pañca, rajatabhājanapūrāni
atk-s0502a:1121_6: pañca, tambabhājanapūrāni pañca, pattuṇṇavatthakoseyyavatthapūrāni pañca, sappipūrāni
atk-s0502a:1121_7: pañca, telapūrāni pañca, sālitaṇḍulapūrāni pañca, naṅgalaphālādiupakaraṇapūrāni pañcasakaṭasatāni
atk-s0502a:1121_8: adāsi. Evaṃ kirassa ahosi – “mama dhītu gataṭṭhāne ‘asukena nāma me attho’ti mā parassa
atk-s0502a:1121_9: gehadvāraṃ pahiṇī”ti. Tasmā sabbūpakaraṇāni dāpesi. Ekekasmiṃ rathe sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitā
atk-s0502a:1121_10: tisso tisso vaṇṇadāsiyo ṭhapetvā pañca rathasatāni adāsi. “Etaṃ nhāpentiyo bhojentiyo
atk-s0502a:1121_11: alaṅkarontiyo vicarathā”ti diyaḍḍhasahassaparicārikāyo adāsi. Athassa etadahosi –
atk-s0502a:1121_12: “mama dhītu gāvo dassāmī”ti. So purise āṇāpesi – “gacchatha bhaṇe cūḷavajassa dvāraṃ
atk-s0502a:1121_13: vivaritvā tīsu gāvutesu tisso bheriyo gahetvā tiṭṭhatha, puthulato usabhamatte ṭhāne
atk-s0502a:1121_14: ubhosu passesu tiṭṭhatha. Gāvīnaṃ tato paraṃ gantuṃ mā adattha. Evaṃ ṭhitakāle bherisaññaṃ
atk-s0502a:1121_15: kareyyāthā”ti. Te tathā akaṃsu. Te gāvīnaṃ vajato nikkhamitvā gāvutaṃ gatakāle bherisaññaṃ
atk-s0502a:1121_16: akaṃsu, puna aḍḍhayojanaṃ gatakāle akaṃsu. Punapi tigāvutaṃ gatakāle bherisaññaṃ
atk-s0502a:1121_17: akaṃsu, puthulato gamanañca nivāresuṃ. Evaṃ dīghato tigāvute, puthulato usabhamatte
atk-s0502a:1122_0: Mahāseṭṭhi “mama dhītu ettakā gāvo alaṃ, dvāraṃ pidahathā”ti vajadvāraṃ pidahāpesi.
atk-s0502a:1122_1: Dvārasmiṃ pidahite visākhāya puññabalena balavagāvo ca dhenuyo ca uppatitvā uppatitvā
atk-s0502a:1122_2: nikkhamiṃsu. Manussānaṃ vārentānaṃ vārentānameva saṭṭhisahassā balavagāvo ca saṭṭhisahassā
atk-s0502a:1122_3: dhenuyo ca nikkhantā, tattakā balavavacchā tāsaṃ dhenūnaṃ usabhā uppatitvā anubandhā
atk-s0502a:1122_4: ahesuṃ. “Kissa pana nissandena evaṃ gāvo gatā”ti? Nivārentānaṃ nivārentānaṃ dinnadānassa.
atk-s0502a:1122_5: Sā kira kassapasammāsambuddhakāle kikissa rañño sattannaṃ dhītānaṃ kaniṭṭhā saṅghadāsī
atk-s0502a:1122_6: nāma hutvā vīsatiyā bhikkhusahassānaṃ pañcagorasadānaṃ dadamānā therānañca daharānañca
atk-s0502a:1122_7: sāmaṇerānañca pattaṃ pidahitvā, “alaṃ, ala”nti nivārentānampi “idaṃ madhuraṃ, idaṃ
atk-s0502a:1122_8: manāpa”nti adāsi. Evaṃ tassa nissandena vāriyamānāpi gāvo nikkhamiṃsu. Seṭṭhinā ettakassa
atk-s0502a:1122_9: dhanassa dinnakāle seṭṭhibhariyā āha – “tumhehi mayhaṃ dhītu sabbaṃ saṃvidahitaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1122_10: veyyāvaccakarā pana dāsadāsiyo na saṃvidahitā, kiṃ kāraṇā”ti? “Mama dhītari sasinehanissinehānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1122_11: jānanatthaṃ. Ahañhi tāya saddhiṃ āgacchamānake gīvāya gahetvā na pahiṇāmi, yānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1122_12: āruyha gamanakāleyeva etāya saddhiṃ gantukāmā gacchantu, mā agantukāmāti vakkhāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:1123_0: Atha “sve mama dhītā gamissatī”ti gabbhe nisinno dhītaraṃ samīpe nisīdāpetvā, “amma,
atk-s0502a:1123_1: patikule vasantiyā nāma imañca imañca ācāraṃ rakkhituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ovādamadāsi. Ayampi
atk-s0502a:1123_2: migāraseṭṭhi anantaragabbhe nisinno dhanañcayaseṭṭhino ovādaṃ assosi. Sopi seṭṭhi
atk-s0502a:1124_0: “Amma, sasurakule vasantiyā nāma antoaggi bahi na nīharitabbo, bahiaggi anto na pavesetabbo,
atk-s0502a:1124_1: dadantasseva dātabbaṃ, adadantassa na dātabbaṃ, dadantassāpi adadantassāpi dātabbaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1124_2: sukhaṃ nisīditabbaṃ, sukhaṃ bhuñjitabbaṃ, sukhaṃ nipajjitabbaṃ, aggi paricaritabbo,
atk-s0502a:1125_0: Imaṃ dasavidhaṃ ovādaṃ datvā punadivase sabbā seniyo sannipātetvā rājasenāya majjhe
atk-s0502a:1125_1: aṭṭha kuṭumbike pāṭibhoge gahetvā, “sace me gataṭṭhāne dhītu doso uppajjati, tumhehi
atk-s0502a:1125_2: sodhetabbo”ti vatvā navakoṭiagghanakena mahālatāpasādhanena dhītaraṃ pasādhetvā nhānacuṇṇamūlakaṃ
atk-s0502a:1125_3: catupaṇṇāsakoṭidhanaṃ datvā yānaṃ āropetvā sāketassa sāmantā attano santakesu anurādhapuramattesu
atk-s0502a:1125_4: cuddasasu bhattagāmesu bheriṃ carāpesi – “mama dhītarā saddhiṃ gantukāmā gacchantū”ti.
atk-s0502a:1125_5: Te saddaṃ sutvāva – “amhākaṃ ayyāya gamanakāle kiṃ amhākaṃ idhā”ti cuddasa gāmakā
atk-s0502a:1125_6: kiñci asesetvā nikkhamiṃsu? Dhanañcayaseṭṭhipi rañño ca migāraseṭṭhino ca sakkāraṃ
atk-s0502a:1125_7: katvā thokaṃ anugantvā tehi saddhiṃ dhītaraṃ uyyojesi.
atk-s0502a:1126_0: Migāraseṭṭhipi sabbapacchato yānake nisīditvā gacchanto balakāyaṃ disvā, “ke nāmete”ti
atk-s0502a:1126_1: pucchi. “Suṇisāya vo veyyāvaccakarā dāsidāsā”ti. “Ettake ko posessa”ti? “Pothetvā
atk-s0502a:1126_2: te palāpetha, apalāyante ito daṇḍaṃ karothā”ti. Visākhā pana “apetha, mā vāretha,
atk-s0502a:1126_3: balameva balassa bhattaṃ dassatī”ti āha. Seṭṭhi evaṃ vuttepi, “amma, natthi amhākaṃ
atk-s0502a:1126_4: etehi attho, ko ete posessatī”ti leḍḍudaṇḍādīhi pothetvā palāpetvā sesake “alaṃ amhākaṃ
atk-s0502a:1126_5: ettakehī”ti gahetvā pāyāsi. Atha visākhā sāvatthinagaradvāraṃ sampattakāle cintesi
atk-s0502a:1126_6: – “paṭicchannayānasmiṃ nu kho nisīditvā pavisissāmi, udāhu rathe ṭhatvā”ti. Athassā
atk-s0502a:1126_7: etadahosi – “paṭicchannayānena me pavisantiyā mahālatāpasādhanassa viseso na paññāyissatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1126_8: Sā sakalanagarassa attānaṃ dassentī rathe ṭhatvā nagaraṃ pāvisi. Sāvatthivāsino visākhāya
atk-s0502a:1126_9: sampattiṃ disvā, “esā kira visākhā nāma, evarūpā ayaṃ sampatti etissāva anucchavikā”ti
atk-s0502a:1126_10: āhaṃsu. Iti sā mahāsampattiyā seṭṭhino gehaṃ pāvisi. Gatadivase cassā sakalanagaravāsino
atk-s0502a:1126_11: “amhākaṃ dhanañcayaseṭṭhi attano nagaraṃ sampattānaṃ mahāsakkāraṃ akāsī”ti yathāsatti
atk-s0502a:1126_12: yathābalaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ pahiṇiṃsu. Visākhā pahitapahitaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ tasmiṃyeva nagare
atk-s0502a:1126_13: aññamaññesu kulesu sabbatthakameva dāpesi. Iti sā “idaṃ mayhaṃ mātu detha, idaṃ mayhaṃ
atk-s0502a:1126_14: pitu detha, idaṃ mayhaṃ bhātu detha, idaṃ mayhaṃ bhaginiyā dethā”ti tesaṃ tesaṃ vayānurūpaṃ
atk-s0502a:1126_15: piyavacanaṃ vatvā paṇṇākāraṃ pesentī sakalanagaravāsino ñātake viya akāsi. Athassā
atk-s0502a:1126_16: rattibhāgasamanantare ājaññavaḷavāya gabbhavuṭṭhānaṃ ahosi. Sā dāsīhi daṇḍadīpikā
atk-s0502a:1126_17: gāhāpetvā tattha gantvā vaḷavaṃ uṇhodakena nhāpetvā telena makkhāpetvā attano vasanaṭṭhānameva agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:1127_0: Migāraseṭṭhipi puttassa āvāhamaṅgalaṃ karonto dhuravihāre vasantampi tathāgataṃ amanasikaritvā
atk-s0502a:1127_1: dīgharattaṃ naggasamaṇakesu patiṭṭhitena pemena codiyamāno “mayhaṃ ayyānampi sakkāraṃ
atk-s0502a:1127_2: karissāmī”ti ekadivasaṃ anekasatesu navabhājanesu nirudakapāyāsaṃ pacāpetvā pañcasate
atk-s0502a:1127_3: acelake nimantāpetvā antogehaṃ pavesetvā, “āgacchatu me suṇisā, arahante vandatū”ti
atk-s0502a:1127_4: visākhāya sāsanaṃ pahiṇi. Sā “arahanto”ti vacanaṃ sutvā sotāpannā ariyasāvikā haṭṭhatuṭṭhā
atk-s0502a:1127_5: hutvā tesaṃ bhojanaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā te oloketvā, “evarūpā hirottappavirahitā arahantā
atk-s0502a:1127_6: nāma na honti, kasmā maṃ sasuro pakkosāpesī”ti, “dhī, dhī”ti seṭṭhiṃ garahitvā attano
atk-s0502a:1127_7: vasanaṭṭhānameva gatā. Acelakā taṃ disvā sabbe ekappahāreneva seṭṭhiṃ garahiṃsu –
atk-s0502a:1127_8: “kiṃ tvaṃ, gahapati, aññaṃ nālattha, samaṇassa gotamassa sāvikaṃ mahākāḷakaṇṇiṃ idha
atk-s0502a:1127_9: pavesesi, vegena naṃ imasmā gehā nikkaḍḍhāpehī”ti. So “na sakkā mayā imesaṃ vacanamatteneva
atk-s0502a:1127_10: nikkaḍḍhāpetuṃ, mahākulassa sā dhītā”ti cintetvā, “ayyā, daharā nāma jānitvā vā ajānitvā
atk-s0502a:1127_11: vā kareyyuṃ, tumhe tuṇhī hothā”ti te uyyojetvā sayaṃ mahārahe āsane nisīditvā suvaṇṇapātiyaṃ
atk-s0502a:1128_0: Tasmiṃ samaye eko piṇḍapātikatthero piṇḍāya caranto taṃ nivesanaṃ pāvisi. Visākhā
atk-s0502a:1128_1: sasuraṃ bījayamānā ṭhitā taṃ disvā “sasurassa ācikkhituṃ ayutta”nti yathā so theraṃ
atk-s0502a:1128_2: passati, evaṃ apagantvā aṭṭhāsi. So pana bālo theraṃ disvāpi apassanto viya hutvā
atk-s0502a:1128_3: adhomukho bhuñjateva. Visākhā “theraṃ disvāpi me sasuro saññaṃ na karotī”ti ñatvā,
atk-s0502a:1128_4: “aticchatha, bhante, mayhaṃ sasuro purāṇaṃ khādatī”ti āha. So nigaṇṭhehi kathitakāle
atk-s0502a:1128_5: adhivāsetvāpi “purāṇaṃ khādatī”ti vuttakkhaṇeyeva hatthaṃ apanetvā, “imaṃ pāyāsaṃ
atk-s0502a:1128_6: ito nīharatha, etaṃ imasmā gehā nikkaḍḍhatha, ayaṃ maṃ evarūpe maṅgalakāle asucikhādakaṃ
atk-s0502a:1128_7: nāma karotī”ti āha. Tasmiṃ kho pana nivesane sabbepi dāsakammakarā visākhāya santakāva,
atk-s0502a:1128_8: ko naṃ hatthe vā pāde vā gaṇhissati, mukhena kathetuṃ samatthopi natthi. Visākhā
atk-s0502a:1128_9: sasurassa kathaṃ sutvā āha – “tāta, na ettakeneva mayaṃ nikkhamāma, nāhaṃ tumhehi
atk-s0502a:1128_10: udakatitthato kumbhadāsī viya ānītā, dharamānakamātāpitūnaṃ dhītaro nāma na ettakeneva
atk-s0502a:1128_11: nikkhamanti, eteneva me kāraṇena pitā idhāgamanakāle aṭṭha kuṭumbike pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0502a:1128_12: ‘sace me dhītu doso uppajjati, sodheyyāthā’ti vatvā maṃ tesaṃ hatthe ṭhapesi, te
atk-s0502a:1129_0: Seṭṭhi “kalyāṇaṃ esā kathetī”ti aṭṭha kuṭumbike pakkosāpetvā, “ayaṃ dārikā maṅgalakāle
atk-s0502a:1129_1: nisīditvā suvaṇṇapātiyaṃ nirudakapāyāsaṃ paribhuñjantaṃ maṃ ‘asucikhādako’ti vadatī”ti
atk-s0502a:1129_2: āha, “imissā dosaṃ āropetvā imaṃ gehato nikkaḍḍhathā”ti. “Evaṃ kira, ammā”ti. Nāhaṃ
atk-s0502a:1129_3: evaṃ vadāmi, ekasmiṃ pana piṇḍapātikatthere gharadvāre ṭhite sasuro me appodakaṃ
atk-s0502a:1129_4: madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjanto taṃ na manasikaroti, ahaṃ “mayhaṃ sasuro imasmiṃ attabhāve
atk-s0502a:1129_5: puññaṃ na karoti, purāṇapuññameva khādatī”ti cintetvā, “aticchatha, bhante, mayhaṃ
atk-s0502a:1129_6: sasuro purāṇaṃ khādatī”ti avacaṃ, “ettha me ko doso”ti? “Ayya, idha doso natthi,
atk-s0502a:1129_7: amhākaṃ dhītā yuttaṃ katheti, tvaṃ kasmā kujjhasī”ti? “Ayyā, esa tāva doso mā hotu,
atk-s0502a:1129_8: ayaṃ pana ekadivasaṃ majjhimayāme dāsīparivutā pacchāgehaṃ agamāsī”ti. “Evaṃ kira,
atk-s0502a:1129_9: ammā”ti. “Tātā, nāhaṃ aññena kāraṇena gatā, imasmiṃ pana gehe ājāneyyavaḷavāya vijātāya
atk-s0502a:1129_10: saññampi akatvā nisīdituṃ nāma ayutta”nti daṇḍadīpikā gāhāpetvā uṇhodakādīnipi gāhāpetvā
atk-s0502a:1129_11: dāsīhi saddhiṃ gantvā vaḷavāya vijātaparihāraṃ kārāpesiṃ, “ettha me ko doso”ti? “Ayya,
atk-s0502a:1129_12: idha doso natthi, amhākaṃ dhītā tava gehe dāsīhipi akattabbayuttakaṃ kammaṃ karoti,
atk-s0502a:1130_0: Ayyā, idhāpi tāva doso mā hotu, imissā pana pitā idhāgamanakāle imaṃ ovadanto guyhe
atk-s0502a:1130_1: paṭicchanne dasa ovāde adāsi, tesaṃ atthaṃ na jānāmi, tesaṃ me atthaṃ kathetu. Imissā
atk-s0502a:1130_2: pana pitā “antoaggi bahi na nīharitabbo”ti āha, “sakkā nu kho amhehi ubhato paṭivissakagehānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1130_3: aggiṃ adatvā vasitu”nti? “Evaṃ kira, ammā”ti. “Tātā, mayhaṃ pitā na etaṃ sandhāya
atk-s0502a:1130_4: kathesi. Idaṃ pana sandhāya kathesi – ‘amma, tava sassusasurasāmikānaṃ aguṇaṃ disvā
atk-s0502a:1130_5: bahi tasmiṃ tasmiṃ gehe ṭhatvā mā kathesi. Evarūpo hi aggisadiso aggi nāma natthī”’ti.
atk-s0502a:1131_0: Ayyā, etaṃ tāva evaṃ hotu, imissā pana pitā “bāhirato aggi na anto pavesetabbo”ti
atk-s0502a:1131_1: āha, “kiṃ sakkā amhehi anto aggimhi nibbute bāhirato aggiṃ anāharitu”nti? “Evaṃ kira,
atk-s0502a:1131_2: ammā”ti. Tātā, mayhaṃ pitā na etaṃ sandhāya kathesi, idaṃ pana sandhāya kathesi –
atk-s0502a:1131_3: sace paṭivissakagehesu itthiyo vā purisā vā sassusasurasāmikānaṃ aguṇaṃ kathenti,
atk-s0502a:1131_4: tehi kathitaṃ āharitvā “asuko nāma tumhākaṃ evañca evañca aguṇaṃ kathetī”ti puna
atk-s0502a:1131_5: mā katheyyāsi. “Etena hi agginā sadiso aggi nāma natthī”ti. Evaṃ imasmimpi kāraṇe
atk-s0502a:1131_6: sā niddosāva ahosi. Yathā ca ettha, evaṃ sesesupi.
atk-s0502a:1132: Tesu pana ayamadhippāyo – yampi hi tassā pitarā “ye dadanti, tesaṃyeva dātabba”nti vuttaṃ. Taṃ “yācitakaṃ upakaraṇaṃ gahetvā ye paṭidenti, tesaññeva dātabba”nti sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0502a:1133: “Ye na denti, tesaṃ na dātabba”nti idampi ye yācitakaṃ gahetvā na paṭidenti, tesaṃ na dātabbanti sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0502a:1134: “Dadantassāpi adadantassāpi dātabba”nti idaṃ pana daliddesu ñātimittesu sampattesu te paṭidātuṃ sakkontu vā mā vā, tesaṃ dātumeva vaṭṭatīti sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0502a:1135: “Sukhaṃ nisīditabba”nti idampi sassusasurasāmike disvā vuṭṭhātabbaṭṭhāne nisīdituṃ na vaṭṭatīti sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0502a:1136: “Sukhaṃ bhuñjitabba”nti idaṃ pana sassusasurasāmikehi puretaraṃ abhuñjitvā te parivisitvā sabbehi laddhāladdhaṃ ñatvā pacchā sayaṃ bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0502a:1137_0: “Sukhaṃ nipajjitabba”nti idampi sassusasurasāmikehi puretaraṃ sayanaṃ āruyha na nipajjitabbaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1137_1: tesaṃ kattabbayuttakaṃ vattapaṭivattaṃ katvā pacchā sayaṃ nipajjituṃ yuttanti sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0502a:1138: “Aggi paricaritabbo”ti idaṃ pana sassumpi sasurampi sāmikampi aggikkhandhaṃ viya uragarājānaṃ viya ca katvā passituṃ vaṭṭatīti sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0502a:1139_0: “Antodevatā namassitabbā”ti idampi sassuñca sasurañca sāmikañca devatā viya katvā
atk-s0502a:1139_1: daṭṭhuṃ vaṭṭatīti sandhāya vuttaṃ. Evaṃ seṭṭhi imesaṃ dasaovādānaṃ atthaṃ sutvā paṭivacanaṃ
atk-s0502a:1140_0: Atha naṃ kuṭumbikā “kiṃ seṭṭhi aññopi amhākaṃ dhītu doso atthī”ti pucchiṃsu. “Natthi,
atk-s0502a:1140_1: ayyā”ti. “Atha kasmā naṃ niddosaṃ akāraṇena gehā nikkaḍḍhāpesī”ti evaṃ vutte visākhā
atk-s0502a:1140_2: āha – “tātā, kiñcāpi mayhaṃ sasurassa vacanena paṭhamameva gamanaṃ na yuttaṃ, pitā
atk-s0502a:1140_3: pana me āgamanakāle mama dosasodhanatthāya maṃ tumhākaṃ hatthe ṭhapesi, tumhehi ca
atk-s0502a:1140_4: me niddosabhāvo ñāto, idāni ca mayhaṃ gantuṃ yutta”nti dāsidāse “yānādīhi sajjāpethā”ti
atk-s0502a:1140_5: āṇāpesi. Atha naṃ seṭṭhi kuṭumbike gahetvā “amma, mayā ajānitvāva kathitaṃ, khamāhi
atk-s0502a:1140_6: me”ti āha. “Tāta, tumhākaṃ khamitabbaṃ tāva khamāmi, ahaṃ pana buddhasāsane aveccappasannassa
atk-s0502a:1140_7: kulassa dhītā, na mayaṃ vinā bhikkhusaṅghena vattāma, sace mama ruciyā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ
atk-s0502a:1140_8: paṭijaggituṃ labhāmi, vasissāmī”ti. “Amma, tvaṃ yathāruciyā tava samaṇe paṭijaggā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:1141_0: Visākhā dasabalaṃ nimantāpetvā punadivase nivesanaṃ pavesesi. Naggasamaṇāpi satthu
atk-s0502a:1141_1: migāraseṭṭhino gehaṃ gamanabhāvaṃ sutvā gantvā gehaṃ parivāretvā nisīdiṃsu. Visākhā
atk-s0502a:1141_2: dakkhiṇodakaṃ datvā “sabbo sakkāro paṭiyādito, sasuro me āgantvā dasabalaṃ parivisatū”ti
atk-s0502a:1141_3: sāsanaṃ pesesi. Atha naṃ gantukāmaṃ ājīvakā “mā kho tvaṃ, gahapati, samaṇassa gotamassa
atk-s0502a:1141_4: santikaṃ gacchā”ti nivāresuṃ. So “suṇhā me sayameva parivisatū”ti sāsanaṃ pahiṇi.
atk-s0502a:1141_5: Sā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ parivisitvā niṭṭhite bhattakicce puna sāsanaṃ pesesi
atk-s0502a:1141_6: – “sasuro me āgantvā dhammakathaṃ suṇātū”ti. Atha naṃ “idāni agamanaṃ nāma ativiya
atk-s0502a:1141_7: ayutta”nti dhammaṃ sotukāmatāya gacchantaṃ puna te āhaṃsu – “tena hi samaṇassa gotamassa
atk-s0502a:1141_8: dhammaṃ suṇanto bahisāṇiyā nisīditvā suṇāhī”ti. Puretaramevassa gantvā sāṇiṃ parikkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1141_9: So gantvā bahisāṇiyaṃ nisīdi. Satthā “tvaṃ bahisāṇiyaṃ vā nisīda, parakuṭṭe vā parasele
atk-s0502a:1141_10: vā paracakkavāḷe vā pana nisīda, ahaṃ buddho nāma sakkomi taṃ mama saddaṃ sāvetu”nti
atk-s0502a:1141_11: mahājambuṃ khandhe gahetvā cālento viya amatavassaṃ vassento viya ca dhammaṃ desetuṃ
atk-s0502a:1142_0: Sammāsambuddhe ca pana dhammaṃ desente purato ṭhitāpi pacchato ṭhitāpi cakkavāḷasataṃ
atk-s0502a:1142_1: cakkavāḷasahassaṃ atikkamitvā ṭhitāpi akaniṭṭhabhavane ṭhitāpi “satthā mamaññeva
atk-s0502a:1142_2: oloketi, mayhameva dhammaṃ desetī”ti vadanti. Satthā hi taṃ taṃ olokento viya tena
atk-s0502a:1142_3: tena saddhiṃ sallapanto viya ca ahosi. Candasamā kira buddhā. Yathā cando gaganamajjhe
atk-s0502a:1142_4: ṭhito “mayhaṃ upari cando, mayhaṃ upari cando”ti sabbasattānaṃ khāyati, evameva yattha
atk-s0502a:1142_5: katthaci ṭhitānaṃ abhimukhe ṭhitā viya khāyanti. Idaṃ kira tesaṃ alaṅkatasīsaṃ chinditvā
atk-s0502a:1142_6: añjitaakkhīni uppāṭetvā hadayamaṃsaṃ uppāṭetvā parassa dāsatthāya jālisadise putte
atk-s0502a:1142_7: kaṇhājināsadisā dhītaro maddisadisā pajāpatiyo pariccajitvā dinnadānassa phalaṃ.
atk-s0502a:1142_8: Migāraseṭṭhipi kho tathāgate dhammadesanaṃ vinivattente bahisāṇiyaṃ nisinnova sahassa
atk-s0502a:1142_9: nayapaṭimaṇḍite sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya acalāya saddhāya samannāgato tīsu ratanesu
atk-s0502a:1142_10: nikkaṅkho hutvā sāṇikaṇṇaṃ ukkhipitvā āgantvā suṇhāya thanaṃ mukhena gahetvā, “tvaṃ
atk-s0502a:1142_11: me ajjato paṭṭhāya mātā”ti taṃ mātuṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. Tato paṭṭhāya migāramātā nāma
atk-s0502a:1142_12: jātā. Pacchābhāge puttaṃ labhitvāpi migārotissa nāmamakāsi.
atk-s0502a:1143_0: Mahāseṭṭhi suṇhāya thanaṃ vissajjetvā gantvā bhagavato dvīsu pādesu sirasā nipatitvā
atk-s0502a:1143_1: pāde pāṇīhi ca parisambāhanto mukhena ca paricumbanto “migāro ahaṃ, bhante, migāro
atk-s0502a:1143_2: ahaṃ, bhante”ti tikkhattuṃ nāmaṃ sāvetvā, “ahaṃ, bhante, ettakaṃ kālaṃ yattha nāma
atk-s0502a:1143_3: dvinnaṃ mahapphalanti na jānāmi, idāni ca me suṇisaṃ nissāya ñātaṃ, sabbā apāyadukkhā
atk-s0502a:1143_4: muttomhi, suṇisā me imaṃ gehaṃ āgacchantī mama atthāya hitāya sukhāya āgatā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1145: Atthāya vata me bhaddā, suṇisā gharamāgatā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1146_0: Visākhā punadivasatthāyapi satthāraṃ nimantesi. Athassā punadivasepi sassu sotāpattiphalaṃ
atk-s0502a:1146_1: pattā. Tato paṭṭhāya taṃ gehaṃ sāsanassa vivaṭadvāraṃ ahosi. Tato seṭṭhi cintesi
atk-s0502a:1146_2: – “bahūpakārā me suṇisā pasannākāramassā karissāmi, etissā bhāriyaṃ pasādhanaṃ niccakālaṃ
atk-s0502a:1146_3: pasādhetuṃ na sakkā, sallahukamassā divā ca ratto ca sabbairiyāpathesu pasādhanayoggaṃ
atk-s0502a:1146_4: pasādhanaṃ kāressāmī”ti satasahassagghanakaṃ ghanamaṭṭhakaṃ nāma pasādhanaṃ kāretvā
atk-s0502a:1146_5: tasmiṃ niṭṭhite buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā sakkaccaṃ bhojetvā visākhaṃ
atk-s0502a:1146_6: soḷasahi gandhodakaghaṭehi nhāpetvā satthu sammukhe ṭhapetvā pasādhetvā satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:1146_7: vandāpesi. Satthā anumodanaṃ katvā vihārameva gato. Visākhāpi tato paṭṭhāya dānādīni
atk-s0502a:1146_8: puññāni karontī satthu santikā aṭṭha vare labhitvā gaganatale candalekhā viya paññāyamānā
atk-s0502a:1146_9: puttadhītāhi vuḍḍhiṃ pāpuṇi. Tassā kira dasa puttā dasa dhītaro ca ahesuṃ. Tesu ekekassa
atk-s0502a:1146_10: dasa dasa puttā dasa dasa dhītaro ahesuṃ. Tesu tesupi ekekassa dasa dasa puttā dasa
atk-s0502a:1146_11: dasa dhītaro cāti evamassā puttanattapanattasantānavasena pavattāni vīsādhikāni cattāri
atk-s0502a:1146_12: satāni aṭṭha ca pāṇasahassāni ahesuṃ. Tenāhu porāṇā –
atk-s0502a:1147: “Visākhā vīsati puttā, nattā ca caturo satā;
atk-s0502a:1149_0: Āyu vīsavassasataṃ ahosi, sīse ekampi palitaṃ nāma nāhosi, niccaṃ soḷasavassuddesikā
atk-s0502a:1149_1: viya ahosi. Taṃ puttanattapanattaparivāraṃ vihāraṃ gacchantiṃ disvā, “katamā ettha
atk-s0502a:1149_2: visākhā”ti paripucchitāro honti? Ye naṃ gacchantiṃ passanti, “idāni thokaṃ gacchatu,
atk-s0502a:1149_3: gacchamānāva no, ayyā sobhatī”ti, cintenti. Ye naṃ ṭhitaṃ nisinnaṃ nipannaṃ passanti,
atk-s0502a:1149_4: “idāni thokaṃ nipajjatu, nipannāva no, ayyā, sobhatī”ti cintenti. Iti sā “catūsu
atk-s0502a:1149_5: iriyāpathesu asukairiyāpathena nāma na sobhatī”ti vattabbā na hoti. Pañcannaṃ kho
atk-s0502a:1149_6: pana hatthīnaṃ balaṃ dhāreti. Rājā “visākhā kira pañcannaṃ hatthīnaṃ balaṃ dhāretī”ti
atk-s0502a:1149_7: sutvā tassā vihāraṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā āgamanavelāya thāmaṃ vīmaṃsitukāmo hatthiṃ
atk-s0502a:1149_8: vissajjāpesi, so soṇḍaṃ ukkhipitvā visākhābhimukho agamāsi. Tassā parivāritthiyo
atk-s0502a:1149_9: pañcasatā ekaccā palāyiṃsu, ekaccā na parissajjitvā “kiṃ ida”nti vutte – “rājā kira
atk-s0502a:1149_10: te, ayye, balaṃ vīmaṃsitukāmo hatthiṃ vissajjāpesī”ti vadiṃsu. Visākhā imaṃ disvā,
atk-s0502a:1149_11: “kiṃ palāyitena, kathaṃ nu kho taṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti cintetvā, “sace taṃ daḷhaṃ gaṇhissāmi,
atk-s0502a:1149_12: vinasseyyā”ti dvīhi aṅgulīhi soṇḍāya gahetvā paṭipaṇāmesi. Hatthī attānaṃ sandhāretvā
atk-s0502a:1149_13: ṭhātuṃ nāsakkhi, rājaṅgaṇe ukkuṭiko hutvā patito. Mahājano sādhukāraṃ adāsi. Sāpi
atk-s0502a:1150_0: Tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyaṃ visākhā migāramātā bahuputtā hoti bahunattā arogaputtā
atk-s0502a:1150_1: aroganattā abhimaṅgalasammatā, tāvatakesu puttanattesu ekopi antarā maraṇaṃ patto
atk-s0502a:1150_2: nāma nāhosi. Sāvatthivāsino maṅgalesu chaṇesu visākhaṃ paṭhamaṃ nimantetvā bhojenti.
atk-s0502a:1150_3: Athekasmiṃ ussavadivase mahājane maṇḍitapasādhite dhammassavanāya vihāraṃ gacchante
atk-s0502a:1150_4: visākhāpi nimantitaṭṭhāne bhuñjitvā mahālatāpasādhanaṃ pasādhetvā mahājanena saddhiṃ
atk-s0502a:1150_5: vihāraṃ gantvā ābharaṇāni omuñcitvā uttarāsaṅgena bhaṇḍikaṃ bandhitvā dāsiyā adāsi.
atk-s0502a:1151_0: “Tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyaṃ ussavo hoti, manussā alaṅkatapaṭiyattā ārāmaṃ
atk-s0502a:1151_1: gacchanti, visākhāpi migāramātā alaṅkatapaṭiyattā vihāraṃ gacchati. Atha kho visākhā
atk-s0502a:1151_2: migāramātā ābharaṇāni omuñcitvā uttarāsaṅgena bhaṇḍikaṃ bandhitvā dāsiyā adāsi ‘handa
atk-s0502a:1152_0: Sā kira vihāraṃ gacchantī cintesi – “evarūpaṃ mahagghaṃ pasādhanaṃ sīse paṭimukkaṃ
atk-s0502a:1152_1: yāva pādapiṭṭhiṃ alaṅkāraṃ alaṅkaritvā vihāraṃ pavisituṃ ayutta”nti naṃ omuñcitvā
atk-s0502a:1152_2: bhaṇḍikaṃ katvā attano puññeneva nibbattāya pañcahatthithāmadharāya dāsiyā hatthe
atk-s0502a:1152_3: adāsi. Sā eva kira taṃ gaṇhituṃ sakkoti. Tena naṃ āha – “amma, imaṃ pasādhanaṃ gaṇha,
atk-s0502a:1152_4: satthusantikā nivattanakāle pasādhessāmi na”nti. Taṃ pana datvā ghanamaṭṭhakaṃ pasādhanaṃ
atk-s0502a:1152_5: pasādhetvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ assosi, dhammassavanāvasāne bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0502a:1152_6: vanditvā uṭṭhāya pakkāmi. Sāpissā dāsī taṃ pasādhanaṃ pamuṭṭhā. Dhammaṃ sutvā pana
atk-s0502a:1152_7: pakkantāya parisāya sace kiñci pamuṭṭhaṃ hoti, taṃ ānandatthero paṭisāmeti. Iti so
atk-s0502a:1152_8: taṃ divasaṃ mahālatāpasādhanaṃ disvā satthu ārocesi – “bhante, visākhā pasādhanaṃ
atk-s0502a:1152_9: pamussitvā gatā”ti. “Ekamantaṃ ṭhapehi, ānandā”ti. Thero taṃ ukkhipitvā sopānapasse laggetvā ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a:1153_1: antovihāre vicari. Tā pana upāsikāyo antovihāre disvā sappimadhutelādīhi atthikā
atk-s0502a:1153_2: pakatiyāva daharā ca sāmaṇerā ca thālakādīni gahetvā upasaṅkamanti. Tasmimpi divase
atk-s0502a:1153_3: tatheva kariṃsu. Athekaṃ gilānaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā suppiyā “kenattho ayyassā”ti pucchitvā
atk-s0502a:1153_4: “paṭicchādanīyenā”ti vutte hotu, ayya, pesessāmīti dutiyadivase kappiyamaṃsaṃ alabhantī
atk-s0502a:1153_5: attano ūrumaṃsena kattabbakiccaṃ katvā puna satthari pasādena pākatikasarīrāva ahosi.
atk-s0502a:1153_6: Visākhāpi gilāne ca dahare ca sāmaṇere ca oloketvā aññena dvārena nikkhamitvā vihārūpacāre
atk-s0502a:1153_7: ṭhitā, “amma, pasādhanaṃ āhara pasādhessāmī”ti āha. Tasmiṃ khaṇe sā dāsī pamussitvā
atk-s0502a:1153_8: nikkhantabhāvaṃ ñatvā, “ayye, pamuṭṭhāmhī”ti āha. “Tena hi gantvā gaṇhitvā ehi, sace
atk-s0502a:1153_9: pana mayhaṃ ayyena ānandattherena ukkhipitvā aññasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhapitaṃ hoti, mā āhareyyāsi,
atk-s0502a:1153_10: ayyasseva taṃ mayā pariccatta”nti. Jānāti kira sā “kulamanussānaṃ pamuṭṭhabhaṇḍakaṃ
atk-s0502a:1153_11: thero paṭisāmetī”ti; tasmā evamāha. Theropi taṃ dāsiṃ disvāva “kimatthaṃ āgatāsī”ti
atk-s0502a:1153_12: pucchitvā, “ayyāya me pasādhanaṃ pamussitvā āgatāmhī”ti vutte, “etasmiṃ me sopānapasse
atk-s0502a:1153_13: ṭhapitaṃ, gaccha naṃ gaṇhāhī”ti āha. Sā, “ayya, tumhākaṃ hatthena āmaṭṭhabhaṇḍakaṃ
atk-s0502a:1153_14: mayhaṃ ayyāya anāhāriyaṃ kata”nti vatvā tucchahatthāva gantvā, “kiṃ, ammā”ti visākhāya
atk-s0502a:1153_15: puṭṭhā tamatthaṃ ārocesi. “Amma, nāhaṃ mama ayyena āmaṭṭhabhaṇḍaṃ pilandhissāmi,
atk-s0502a:1153_16: pariccattaṃ mayā. Ayyānaṃ pana paṭijaggituṃ dukkhaṃ, taṃ vissajjetvā kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0502a:1153_17: upanessāmi, gaccha, taṃ āharāhī”ti. Sā gantvā āhari. Visākhā taṃ apilandhitvāva kammāre
atk-s0502a:1153_18: pakkosāpetvā agghāpesi. Tehi “nava koṭiyo agghati, hatthakārāpaṇiyaṃ panassa satasahassa”nti
atk-s0502a:1153_19: vutte pasādhanaṃ yāne ṭhapāpetvā “tena hi taṃ vikkiṇathā”ti āha. Bhattakaṃ dhanaṃ
atk-s0502a:1153_20: datvā gaṇhiṃtu na koci sakkhissati. Tañhi pasādhanaṃ pasādhetuṃ anucchavikā itthiyo
atk-s0502a:1153_21: nāma dullabhā. Pathavimaṇḍalasmiñhi tissova itthiyo mahālatāpasādhanaṃ labhiṃsu visākhā
atk-s0502a:1153_22: mahāupāsikā, bandhulamallasenāpatissa bhariyā, mallikā, bārāṇasīseṭṭhino dhītāti.
atk-s0502a:1154_0: Tasmā visākhā sayameva tassa mūlaṃ datvā satasahassādhikā nava koṭiyo sakaṭe āropetvā
atk-s0502a:1154_1: vihāraṃ netvā satthāraṃ vanditvā, “bhante, mayhaṃ ayyena ānandattherena mama pasādhanaṃ
atk-s0502a:1154_2: hatthena āmaṭṭhaṃ, tena āmaṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya na sakkā taṃ mayā pilandhituṃ. Taṃ
atk-s0502a:1154_3: pana vissajjetvā kappiyaṃ upanessāmīti vikkiṇāpentī aññaṃ taṃ gaṇhituṃ samatthaṃ
atk-s0502a:1154_4: adisvā ahameva tassa mūlaṃ gāhāpetvā āgatā, catūsu paccayesu katarapaccayena upanessāmi,
atk-s0502a:1154_5: bhante”ti. Pācīnadvāre saṅghassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ kātuṃ te yuttaṃ visākheti “yuttaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1154_6: bhante”ti visākhā tuṭṭhamānasā navakoṭīhi bhūmimeva gaṇhi. Aparāhi navakoṭīhi vihāraṃ kātuṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0502a:1155_0: Athekadivasaṃ satthā paccūsasamaye lokaṃ volokento devalokā cavitvā bhaddiyanagare
atk-s0502a:1155_1: seṭṭhikule nibbattassa bhaddiyassa nāma seṭṭhiputtassa upanissayasampattiṃ disvā
atk-s0502a:1155_2: anāthapiṇḍikassa gehe bhattakiccaṃ katvā uttaradvārābhimukho ahosi. Pakatiyā hi satthā
atk-s0502a:1155_3: visākhāya gehe bhikkhaṃ gaṇhitvā dakkhiṇadvārena nikkhamitvā jetavane vasati. Anāthapiṇḍikassa
atk-s0502a:1155_4: gehe bhikkhaṃ gahetvā pācīnadvārena nikkhamitvā pubbārāme vasati. Uttaradvāraṃ sandhāya
atk-s0502a:1155_5: gacchantaṃyeva bhagavantaṃ disvā, “cārikaṃ pakkamissatī”ti jānanti. Visākhāpi taṃ
atk-s0502a:1155_6: divasaṃ “satthā uttaradvārābhimukho gato”ti sutvā vegena gantvā vanditvā āha – “cārikaṃ
atk-s0502a:1155_7: gantukāmattha, bhante”ti? “Āma, visākhe”ti. “Bhante, ettakaṃ dhanaṃ pariccajitvā
atk-s0502a:1155_8: tumhākaṃ vihāraṃ kāremi, nivattatha, bhante”ti. “Anivattagamanaṃ idaṃ visākhe”ti.
atk-s0502a:1155_9: Sā “addhā hetusampannaṃ kañci passissati bhagavā”ti cintetvā, “tena hi, bhante, mayhaṃ
atk-s0502a:1155_10: katākatavijānanakaṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ nivattetvā gacchathā”ti āha. “Yaṃ ruccasi, tassa
atk-s0502a:1155_11: pattaṃ gaṇha visākhe”ti āha. Sā kiñcāpi ānandattheraṃ piyāyati, “mahāmoggallānatthero
atk-s0502a:1155_12: iddhimā, etaṃ me nissāya kammaṃ lahuṃ nipphajjissatī”ti pana cintetvā therassa pattaṃ
atk-s0502a:1155_13: gaṇhi. Thero satthāraṃ olokesi. Satthā “tava parivāre pañcasate bhikkhū gahetvā nivatta
atk-s0502a:1155_14: moggallānā”ti āha. So tathā akāsi. Tassānubhāvena paññāsasaṭṭhiyojanānipi rukkhatthāya
atk-s0502a:1155_15: ca pāsāṇatthāya ca gatā manussā mahante mahante rukkhe ca pāsāṇe ca gahetvā taṃ divasameva
atk-s0502a:1155_16: āgacchanti, neva sakaṭe rukkhapāsāṇe āropentā kilamanti, na akkho bhijjati. Na cirasseva
atk-s0502a:1155_17: dvebhūmikaṃ pāsādaṃ kariṃsu. Heṭṭhābhūmiyaṃ pañca gabbhasatāni, uparibhūmiyaṃ pañca
atk-s0502a:1155_18: gabbhasatānīti gabbhasahassapaṭimaṇḍito pāsādo ahosi. Aṭṭhakarīse parisuddhe bhūmibhāge
atk-s0502a:1155_19: pāsādaṃ kārāpesi, “suddhapāsādo pana na sobhatī”ti taṃ parivāretvā pañca padhānavettagehasatāni,
atk-s0502a:1156_0: Atha satthā navahi māsehi cārikaṃ caritvā puna sāvatthiṃ agamāsi. Visākhāyapi pāsāde
atk-s0502a:1156_1: kammaṃ navahi māsehi niṭṭhitaṃ. Pāsādakūṭaṃ ghanakoṭṭitarattasuvaṇṇeneva saṭṭhiudakaghaṭagaṇhanakaṃ
atk-s0502a:1156_2: kārāpesi. “Satthā jetavanavihāraṃ gacchatī”ti ca sutvā paccuggamanaṃ katvā satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:1156_3: attano vihāraṃ netvā paṭiññaṃ gaṇhi, “bhante, imaṃ catumāsaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0502a:1156_4: idheva vasatha, pāsādamahaṃ karissāmī”ti. Satthā adhivāsesi. Sā tato paṭṭhāya buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0502a:1156_5: bhikkhusaṅghassa vihāre eva dānaṃ deti. Athassā ekā sahāyikā satasahassagghanakaṃ
atk-s0502a:1156_6: ekaṃ vatthaṃ ādāya āgantvā, “sahāyike ahaṃ imaṃ vatthaṃ tava pāsāde bhūmattharaṇasaṅkhepena
atk-s0502a:1156_7: attharitukāmā, attharaṇaṭṭhānaṃ me ācikkhathā”ti āha. “Sādhu sahāyike, sace tyāhaṃ
atk-s0502a:1156_8: ‘okāso natthī’ti vakkhāmi, tvaṃ ‘me okāsaṃ adātukāmā’ti maññissasi, sayameva pāsādassa
atk-s0502a:1156_9: dve bhūmiyo gabbhasahassañca oloketvā attharaṇaṭṭhānaṃ jānāhī”ti āha. Sā satasahassagghanakaṃ
atk-s0502a:1156_10: vatthaṃ gahetvā tattha tattha vicarantī tato appataramūlaṃ vatthaṃ adisvā “nāhaṃ
atk-s0502a:1156_11: imasmiṃ pāsāde puññabhāgaṃ labhāmī”ti domanassappattā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne rodantī aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:1156_12: Atha naṃ ānandatthero disvā, “kasmā rodasī”ti pucchi. Sā tamatthaṃ ārocesi. Thero
atk-s0502a:1156_13: “mā cintayi, ahaṃ te attharaṇaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhissāmī”ti vatvā, “sopānapādamūle pādadhovanaṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a:1156_14: imaṃ pādapuñchanakaṃ katvā attharāhi, bhikkhū pāde dhovitvā paṭhamaṃ ettha pādaṃ
atk-s0502a:1156_15: puñchitvā anto pavisissanti, evaṃ te mahapphalaṃ bhavissatī”ti āha. Visākhāya kiretaṃ
atk-s0502a:1157_0: Visākhā cattāro māse antovihāre buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ adāsi, avasānadivase
atk-s0502a:1157_1: bhikkhusaṅghassa cīvarasāṭake adāsi. Saṅghanavakena laddhacīvarasāṭakā sahassagghanakā
atk-s0502a:1157_2: honti. Sabbesaṃ pattāni pūretvā bhesajjaṃ adāsi. Dānapariccāge nava koṭiyo agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1157_3: Iti vihārassa bhūmiggahaṇe nava koṭiyo, vihārassa kārāpane nava, vihāramahe navāti
atk-s0502a:1157_4: sabbāpi sattavīsati koṭiyo sā buddhasāsane pariccaji. Itthibhāve ṭhatvā micchādiṭṭhikassa
atk-s0502a:1157_5: gehe vasamānāya evarūpo mahāpariccāgo nāma aññissā natthi. Sā vihāramahassa niṭṭhitadivase
atk-s0502a:1157_6: vaḍḍhamānakacchāyāya puttanattapanattaparivutā “yaṃ yaṃ mayā pubbe patthitaṃ, sabbameva
atk-s0502a:1157_7: matthakaṃ patta”nti pāsādaṃ anupariyāyantī pañcahi gāthāhi madhurasaddena imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi –
atk-s0502a:1168_0: Bhikkhū tassā saddaṃ sutvā satthu ārocayiṃsu – “bhante, amhehi ettake addhāne visākhāya
atk-s0502a:1168_1: gāyanaṃ nāma na diṭṭhapubbaṃ, sā ajja puttanattapanattaparivutā gāyamānā pāsādaṃ
atk-s0502a:1168_2: anupariyāyati, kiṃ nu khvassā pittaṃ vā kupitaṃ, udāhu ummattikā jātā”ti? Satthā
atk-s0502a:1168_3: “na, bhikkhave, mayhaṃ dhītā gāyati, attano panassā ajjhāsayo paripuṇṇo, sā ‘patthitapatthanā
atk-s0502a:1168_4: me matthakaṃ pattā’ti tuṭṭhamānasā udānaṃ udānentī vicaratī”ti vatvā “kadā pana,
atk-s0502a:1168_5: bhante, tāya patthanā patthitā”ti? “Suṇissatha, bhikkhave”ti. “Suṇissāma, bhante”ti
atk-s0502a:1169_0: “Atīte, bhikkhave, ito kappasatasahassamatthake padumuttaro nāma buddho loke nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:1169_1: Tassa vassasatasahassaṃ āyu ahosi, khīṇāsavānaṃ satasahassaparivāro, nagaraṃ haṃsavatī
atk-s0502a:1169_2: nāma, pitā sunando nāma rājā, mātā sujātā nāma devī, tassa aggaupaṭṭhāyikā ekā upāsikā
atk-s0502a:1169_3: aṭṭha vare yācitvā mātuṭṭhāne ṭhatvā satthāraṃ catūhi paccayehi paṭijaggantī sāyaṃpātaṃ
atk-s0502a:1169_4: upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati. Tassā ekā sahāyikā tāya saddhiṃ vihāraṃ nibaddhaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0502a:1169_5: Sā tassā satthārā saddhiṃ vissāsena kathanañca vallabhabhāvañca disvā, ‘kiṃ nu kho
atk-s0502a:1169_6: katvā evaṃ buddhānaṃ vallatā hotī’ti cintetvā satthāraṃ pucchi – ‘bhante, esā itthī
atk-s0502a:1169_7: tumhākaṃ kiṃ hotī”’ti? “Upaṭṭhāyikānaṃ aggā”ti. “Bhante, kiṃ katvā upaṭṭhāyikānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1169_8: aggā hotī”ti? “Kappasatasahassaṃ patthanaṃ patthetvā”ti. “Idāni patthetvā laddhuṃ
atk-s0502a:1169_9: sakkā, bhante”ti. “Āma, sakkā”ti. “Tena hi, bhante, bhikkhusatasahassena saddhiṃ
atk-s0502a:1169_10: sattāhaṃ mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti āha. Satthā adhivāsesi. Sā sattāhaṃ dānaṃ datvā
atk-s0502a:1169_11: osānadivase cīvarasāṭake datvā satthāraṃ vanditvā pādamūle nipajjitvā, “bhante, nāhaṃ
atk-s0502a:1169_12: imassa dānassa phalena devissariyādīnaṃ aññataraṃ patthemi, tumhādisassa panekassa
atk-s0502a:1169_13: buddhassa santike aṭṭha vare labhitvā mātuṭṭhāne ṭhatvā catūhi paccayehi paṭijaggituṃ
atk-s0502a:1169_14: samatthānaṃ aggā bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi. Satthā “samijjhissati nu kho
atk-s0502a:1169_15: imissā patthanā”ti anāgataṃ āvajjento kappasatasahassaṃ oloketvā “kappasatasahassapariyosāne
atk-s0502a:1169_16: gotamo nāma buddho uppajjissati, tadā tvaṃ visākhā nāma upāsikā hutvā tassa santike
atk-s0502a:1169_17: aṭṭha vare labhitvā mātuṭṭhāne ṭhatvā catūhi paccayehi paṭijaggantīnaṃ upaṭṭhāyikānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1169_18: aggā bhavissasī”ti āha. Tassā sā sampatti sveva laddhabbā viya ahosi.
atk-s0502a:1170_0: Sā yāvatāyukaṃ puññaṃ katvā tato cutā devaloke nibbattitvā devamanussesu saṃsarantī
atk-s0502a:1170_1: kassapasammāsambuddhakāle kikissa kāsirañño sattannaṃ dhītānaṃ kaniṭṭhā saṅghadāsī
atk-s0502a:1170_2: nāma hutvā parakulaṃ agantvā tāhi jeṭṭhabhaginīhi saddhiṃ dīgharattaṃ dānādīni puññāni
atk-s0502a:1170_3: katvā kassapasammāsambuddhassa pādamūlepi “anāgate tumhādisassa buddhassa mātuṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a:1170_4: ṭhatvā catupaccayadāyikānaṃ aggā bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ akāsi. Sā tato paṭṭhāya pana
atk-s0502a:1170_5: devamanussesu saṃsarantī imasmiṃ attabhāve meṇḍakaseṭṭhiputtassa dhanañcayaseṭṭhino
atk-s0502a:1170_6: dhītā hutvā nibbattā. Mayhaṃ sāsane bahūni puññāni akāsi. Iti kho, bhikkhave, “na
atk-s0502a:1170_7: mayhaṃ dhītā gāyati, patthitapatthanāya pana nipphattiṃ disvā udānaṃ udānetī”ti vatvā
atk-s0502a:1170_8: satthā dhammaṃ desento, “bhikkhave, yathā nāma cheko mālākāro nānāpupphānaṃ mahantaṃ
atk-s0502a:1170_9: rāsiṃ katvā nānappakāre mālāguṇe karoti, evameva visākhāya nānappakārāni puññāni
atk-s0502a:1170_10: kātuṃ cittaṃ namatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1173: Evaṃ jātena maccena, kattabbaṃ kusalaṃ bahu”nti.
atk-s0502a:1174_0: Tattha puppharāsimhāti nānappakārānaṃ pupphānaṃ rāsimhā. Kayirāti kareyya. Mālāguṇe
atk-s0502a:1174_1: bahūti ekato vaṇṭikamālādibhedā nānappakārā mālāvikatiyo. Maccenāti maritabbasabhāvatāya
atk-s0502a:1174_2: “macco”ti laddhanāmena sattena cīvaradānādibhedaṃ bahuṃ kusalaṃ kattabbaṃ. Tattha
atk-s0502a:1174_3: puppharāsiggahaṇaṃ bahupupphadassanatthaṃ. Sace hi appāni pupphāni honti, mālākāro
atk-s0502a:1174_4: ca cheko neva bahū mālāguṇe kātuṃ sakkoti, acheko pana appesu bahūsupi pupphesu na
atk-s0502a:1174_5: sakkotiyeva. Bahūsu pana pupphesu sati cheko mālākāro dakkho kusalo bahū mālāguṇe
atk-s0502a:1174_6: karoti, evameva sace ekaccassa saddhā mandā hoti, bhogā ca bahū saṃvijjanti, neva
atk-s0502a:1174_7: sakkoti bahūni kusalāni kātuṃ, mandāya ca pana saddhāya mandesu ca pana bhogesu na
atk-s0502a:1174_8: sakkoti. Uḷārāya ca pana saddhāya mandesu ca bhogesu na sakkotiyeva. Uḷārāya ca pana
atk-s0502a:1174_9: saddhāya uḷāresu ca bhogesu sati sakkoti. Tathārūpā ca visākhā upāsikā. Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ
atk-s0502a:1175: Desanāvasāne bahū sotāpannādayo ahesuṃ. Mahājanassa sātthikā dhammadesanā jātāti.
atk-s0502a:1178: Na pupphagandho paṭivātametīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā sāvatthiyaṃ viharanto ānandattherassa pañhaṃ vissajjento kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1179_0: Thero kira sāyanhasamaye paṭisallīno cintesi – “bhagavatā mūlagandho, sāragandho,
atk-s0502a:1179_1: pupphagandhoti tayo uttamagandhā vuttā, tesaṃ anuvātameva gandho gacchati, no paṭivātaṃ.
atk-s0502a:1179_2: Atthi nu kho taṃ gandhajātaṃ, yassa paṭivātampi gandho gacchatī”ti. Athassa etadahosi
atk-s0502a:1179_3: – “kiṃ mayhaṃ attanā vinicchitena, satthāraṃyeva pucchissāmī”ti. So satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0502a:1180_0: “Atha kho āyasmā ānando sāyanhasamaye paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami,
atk-s0502a:1180_1: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi, ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā
atk-s0502a:1181_0: “Tīṇimāni, bhante, gandhajātāni, yesaṃ anuvātameva gandho gacchati, no paṭivātaṃ.
atk-s0502a:1181_1: Katamāni tīṇi? Mūlagandho, sāragandho, pupphagandho, imāni kho, bhante, tīṇi gandhajātāni.
atk-s0502a:1181_2: Yesaṃ anuvātameva gandho gacchati, no paṭivātaṃ. Atthi nu kho, bhante, kiñci gandhajātaṃ
atk-s0502a:1181_3: yassa anuvātampi gandho gacchati, paṭivātampi gandho gacchati, anuvātapaṭivātampi gandho gacchatī”ti?
atk-s0502a:1183_0: “Atthānanda, kiñci gandhajātaṃ, yassa anuvātampi gandho gacchati, paṭivātampi gandho
atk-s0502a:1183_1: gacchati, anuvātapaṭivātampi gandho gacchatī”ti. “Katamaṃ pana taṃ, bhante, gandhajātaṃ”?
atk-s0502a:1183_2: “Yassa anuvātampi gandho gacchati, paṭivātampi gandho gacchati, anuvātapaṭivātampi gandho gacchatī”ti?
atk-s0502a:1184_0: “Idhānanda, yasmiṃ gāme vā nigame vā itthī vā puriso vā buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti,
atk-s0502a:1184_1: dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti, saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti, pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti,
atk-s0502a:1184_2: adinnādānā paṭivirato hoti, kāmesumicchācārā paṭivirato hoti, musāvādā paṭivirato
atk-s0502a:1184_3: hoti, surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭivirato hoti, sīlavā hoti kalyāṇadhammo, vigatamalamaccherena
atk-s0502a:1184_4: cetasā agāraṃ ajjhāvasati muttacāgo payatapāṇi vossaggarato yācayogo dānasaṃvibhāgarato.
atk-s0502a:1185_0: “Tassa disāsu samaṇabrāhmaṇā vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti, ‘amukasmiṃ nāma gāme vā nigame vā itthī
atk-s0502a:1185_1: vā puriso vā buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti, dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti, saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:1186_0: “Devatāpissa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti, ‘amukasmiṃ nāma gāme vā nigame vā itthī vā puriso vā
atk-s0502a:1186_1: buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti, dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti, saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti…pe…
atk-s0502a:1186_2: dānasaṃvibhāgarato”’ti. “Idaṃ kho taṃ, ānanda, gandhajātaṃ, yassa anuvātampi gandho
atk-s0502a:1186_3: gacchati, paṭivātampi gandho gacchati, anuvātapaṭivātampi gandho gacchatī”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:1195_0: Tattha na pupphagandhoti tāvatiṃsabhavane paricchattakarukkho āyāmato ca vitthārato
atk-s0502a:1195_1: ca yojanasatiko, tassa pupphānaṃ ābhā paññāsa yojanāni gacchati, gandho yojanasataṃ,
atk-s0502a:1195_2: sopi anuvātameva gacchati, paṭivātaṃ pana aṭṭhaṅgulamattampi gantuṃ na sakkoti, evarūpopi
atk-s0502a:1195_3: na pupphagandho paṭivātameti. Candananti candanagandho. Tagaramallikā vāti imesampi
atk-s0502a:1195_4: gandho eva adhippeto. Sāragandhānaṃ aggassa hi lohitacandanassāpi tagarassapi mallikāyapi
atk-s0502a:1195_5: anuvātameva vāyati, no paṭivātaṃ. Satañca gandhoti sappurisānaṃ pana buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1195_6: sīlagandho paṭivātameti. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Sabbā disā sappuriso pavāyati yasmā pana sappuriso
atk-s0502a:1195_7: sīlagandhena sabbāpi disā ajjhottharitvāva gacchati, tasmā “tassa gandho na paṭivātametī”ti
atk-s0502a:1195_8: na vattabbo. Tena vuttaṃ “paṭivātametī”ti. Vassikīti jātisumanā. Etesanti imesaṃ
atk-s0502a:1195_9: candanādīnaṃ gandhajātānaṃ gandhato sīlavantānaṃ sappurisānaṃ sīlagandhova anuttaro
atk-s0502a:1196: Desanāvasāne bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pattā. Desanā mahājanassa sātthikā jātāti.
atk-s0502a:1199: Appamatto ayaṃ gandhoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto mahākassapattherassa piṇḍapātadānaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1200_0: Ekasmiñhi divase thero sattāhaccayena nirodhā vuṭṭhāya “rājagahe sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya
atk-s0502a:1200_1: carissāmī”ti nikkhami. Tasmiṃ pana samaye sakkassa devarañño paricārikā kakuṭapādiniyo
atk-s0502a:1200_2: pañcasatā accharāyo “therassa piṇḍapātaṃ dassāmā”ti ussāhajātā pañca piṇḍapātasatāni
atk-s0502a:1200_3: sajjetvā ādāya antarāmagge ṭhatvā, “bhante, imaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ gaṇhatha, saṅgahaṃ no
atk-s0502a:1200_4: karothā”ti vadiṃsu. “Gacchatha tumhe, ahaṃ duggatānaṃ saṅgahaṃ karissāmī”ti. “Bhante,
atk-s0502a:1200_5: mā no nāsetha, saṅgahaṃ no karothā”ti. Thero ñatvā puna paṭikkhipitvā punapi apagantuṃ
atk-s0502a:1200_6: anicchamānā yācantiyo “attano pamāṇaṃ na jānātha, apagacchathā”ti accharaṃ pahari.
atk-s0502a:1200_7: Tā therassa accharasaddaṃ sutvā santhambhitvā sammukhā ṭhātuṃ asakkontiyo palāyitvā
atk-s0502a:1200_8: devalokameva gantvā, sakkena “kahaṃ gatātthā”ti puṭṭhā, “‘samāpattito vuṭṭhitassa
atk-s0502a:1200_9: therassa piṇḍapātaṃ dassāmā’ti gatāmhā, devā”ti. “Dinno pana vā”ti? “Gaṇhituṃ na
atk-s0502a:1200_10: icchatī”ti. “Kiṃ kathesī”ti? “‘Duggatānaṃ saṅgahaṃ karissāmī’ti āha, devā”ti. “Tumhe
atk-s0502a:1200_11: kenākārena gatā”ti. “Imināva, devā”ti. Sakko “tumhādisiyo therassa piṇḍapātaṃ kiṃ
atk-s0502a:1200_12: dassantī”ti sayaṃ dātukāmo hutvā, jarājiṇṇo mahallako khaṇḍadanto palitakeso otaggasarīro
atk-s0502a:1200_13: mahallakatanta vāyo hutvā sujampi devadhītaraṃ tathārūpameva mahallikaṃ katvā ekaṃ
atk-s0502a:1201_0: Theropi “duggatānaṃ saṅgahaṃ karissāmī”ti nagarābhimukho gacchanto bahinagare eva
atk-s0502a:1201_1: taṃ vīthiṃ disvā olokento dve jane addasa. Tasmiṃ khaṇe sakko tantaṃ pasāreti, sujā
atk-s0502a:1201_2: tasaraṃ vaṭṭeti. Thero cintesi – “ime mahallakakālepi kammaṃ karontiyeva imasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:1201_3: nagare imehi duggatatarā natthi maññe, imehi dinnaṃ uḷuṅkamattampi sākamattampi gahetvā
atk-s0502a:1201_4: imesaṃ saṅgahaṃ karissāmī”ti. So tesaṃ gehābhimukho ahosi. Sakko taṃ āgacchantaṃ
atk-s0502a:1201_5: disvā sujaṃ āha – “bhadde, mayhaṃ ayyo ito āgacchati, tvaṃ apassantī viya tuṇhī hutvā
atk-s0502a:1201_6: nisīda, khaṇena theraṃ vañcetvā piṇḍapātaṃ dassāmā”ti. Thero āgantvā gehadvāre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:1201_7: Tepi apassantā viya attano kammameva karontā thokaṃ āgamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1202_0: Atha sakko “gehadvāre eko thero viya ṭhito, upadhārehi tāvā”ti āha. “Gantvā upadhāretha,
atk-s0502a:1202_1: sāmī”ti. So gehā nikkhamitvā theraṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā ubhohi hatthehi jaṇṇukāni
atk-s0502a:1202_2: olambitvā nitthunanto uṭṭhāya “kataro thero nu kho ayyo”ti thokaṃ osakkitvā “akkhīni
atk-s0502a:1202_3: me dhūmāyantī”ti vatvā nalāṭe hatthaṃ ṭhapetvā uddhaṃ oloketvā “aho dukkhaṃ, ayyo
atk-s0502a:1202_4: no mahākassapatthero cirassaṃ me kuṭidvāraṃ āgato, atthi nu kho kiñci gehe”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:1202_5: Sujā thokaṃ ākulaṃ viya hutvā “atthi, sāmī”ti paṭivacanaṃ adāsi. Sakko, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:1202_6: lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vāti acintetvā saṅgahaṃ no karothā”ti pattaṃ gaṇhi. Thero “etehi
atk-s0502a:1202_7: dinnaṃ sākaṃ vā hotu kuṇḍakamuṭṭhi vā, saṅgahaṃ nesaṃ karissāmī”ti pattaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a:1202_8: So antogharaṃ pavisitvā ghaṭiodanaṃ nāma ghaṭiyā uddharitvā pattaṃ pūretvā therassa
atk-s0502a:1202_9: hatthe ṭhapesi. So ahosi piṇḍapāto anekasūpabyañjano, sakalaṃ rājagahanagaraṃ gandhena ajjhotthari.
atk-s0502a:1203_0: Tadā thero cintesi – “ayaṃ puriso appesakkho, piṇḍapāto mahesakkho, sakkassa bhojanasadiso,
atk-s0502a:1203_1: ko nu kho eso”ti. Atha naṃ “sakko”ti ñatvā āha – “bhāriyaṃ te kammaṃ kataṃ duggatānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1203_2: sampattiṃ vilumpantena, ajja mayhaṃ dānaṃ datvā kocideva duggato senāpatiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1203_3: vā seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ vā labheyyā”ti. “Mayā duggatataro natthi, bhante”ti. “Kiṃ kāraṇā
atk-s0502a:1203_4: tvaṃ duggato devaloke rajjasiriṃ anubhavanto”ti? “Bhante, evaṃ nāmetaṃ, mayā pana
atk-s0502a:1203_5: anuppanne buddhe kalyāṇakammaṃ kataṃ, buddhuppāde vattamāne kalyāṇakammaṃ katvā cūḷarathadevaputto
atk-s0502a:1203_6: mahārathadevaputto anekavaṇṇadevaputtoti ime tayo samānadevaputtā mama āsannaṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a:1203_7: nibbattā, mayā tejavantatarā. Ahañhi tesu devaputtesu ‘nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmā’ti paricārikāyo
atk-s0502a:1203_8: gahetvā antaravīthiṃ otiṇṇesu palāyitvā gehaṃ pavisāmi. Tesañhi sarīrato tejo mama
atk-s0502a:1203_9: sarīraṃ ottharati, mama sarīrato tejo tesaṃ sarīraṃ na ottharati, ‘ko mayā duggatataro,
atk-s0502a:1203_10: bhante’ti. ‘Evaṃ santepi ito paṭṭhāya mayhaṃ mā evaṃ vañcetvā dānamadāsī”’ti. “Vañcetvā
atk-s0502a:1203_11: tumhākaṃ dāne dinne mayhaṃ kusalaṃ atthi, na atthī”ti? “Atthāvuso”ti. “Evaṃ sante
atk-s0502a:1203_12: kusalakammakaraṇaṃ nāma mayhaṃ bhāro, bhante”ti. So evaṃ vatvā theraṃ vanditvā sujaṃ
atk-s0502a:1203_13: gahetvā theraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā “aho dānaṃ paramadānaṃ kassape
atk-s0502a:1204_0: “Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe. Tena kho pana samayena
atk-s0502a:1204_1: āyasmā mahākassapo pippaliguhāyaṃ viharati, sattāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena nisinno hoti aññataraṃ
atk-s0502a:1204_2: samādhiṃ samāpajjitvā. Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo tassa sattāhassa accayena tamhā
atk-s0502a:1204_3: samādhimhā vuṭṭhāsi. Atha kho āyasmato mahākassapassa tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhitassa
atk-s0502a:1205_0: “Tena kho pana samayena pañcamattāni devatāsatāni ussukkaṃ āpannāni honti āyasmato
atk-s0502a:1205_1: mahākassapassa piṇḍapātapaṭilābhāya. Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo tāni pañcamattāni
atk-s0502a:1205_2: devatāsatāni paṭikkhipitvā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:1206_0: “Tena kho pana samayena sakko devānamindo āyasmato mahākassapassa piṇḍapātaṃ dātukāmo
atk-s0502a:1206_1: hoti. Pesakāravaṇṇaṃ abhinimminitvā tantaṃ vināti, sujā asurakaññā tasaraṃ pūreti.
atk-s0502a:1206_2: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo rājagahe sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya caramāno yena sakkassa devānamindassa
atk-s0502a:1206_3: nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami, addasā kho sakko devānamindo āyasmantaṃ mahākassapaṃ dūratova
atk-s0502a:1206_4: āgacchantaṃ, disvā gharā nikkhamitvā paccuggantvā hatthato pattaṃ gahetvā gharaṃ
atk-s0502a:1206_5: pavisitvā ghaṭiyā odanaṃ uddharitvā pattaṃ pūretvā āyasmato mahākassapassa adāsi.
atk-s0502a:1206_6: So ahosi piṇḍapāto anekasūpo anekabyañjano anekarasabyañjano. Atha kho āyasmato mahākassapassa
atk-s0502a:1206_7: etadahosi – ‘ko nu kho ayaṃ satto, yassāyaṃ evarūpo iddhānubhāvo’ti. Atha kho āyasmato
atk-s0502a:1206_8: mahākassapassa etadahosi – ‘sakko kho ayaṃ devānamindo’ti viditvā sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ
atk-s0502a:1206_9: etadavoca – ‘kataṃ kho te idaṃ, kosiya, mā punapi evarūpamakāsī”’ti. “Amhākampi,
atk-s0502a:1206_10: bhante kassapa, puññena attho, amhākampi puññena karaṇīya”nti.
atk-s0502a:1207_0: “Atha kho sakko devānamindo āyasmantaṃ mahākassapaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā
atk-s0502a:1207_1: vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā ākāse antalikkhe tikkhattuṃ udānaṃ udānesi – ‘aho dānaṃ paramadānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1207_2: kassape suppatiṭṭhitaṃ, aho dānaṃ paramadānaṃ kassape suppatiṭṭhitaṃ, aho dānaṃ paramadānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1208_0: Atha kho bhagavā vihāre ṭhito eva tassa taṃ saddaṃ sutvā bhikkhū āmantetvā – “passatha,
atk-s0502a:1208_1: bhikkhave, sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ udānaṃ udānetvā ākāsena gacchanta”nti āha. “Kiṃ pana
atk-s0502a:1208_2: tena kataṃ, bhante”ti? “Vañcetvā tena mayhaṃ puttassa kassapassa piṇḍapāto dinno,
atk-s0502a:1208_3: taṃ datvā tuṭṭhamānaso udānaṃ udānento gacchatī”ti. “Therassa piṇḍapātaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0502a:1208_4: kathaṃ, bhante, tena ñātanti. “Bhikkhave, mama puttena sadisaṃ nāma piṇḍapātikaṃ
atk-s0502a:1208_5: devāpi manussāpi pihayantīti vatvā sayampi udānaṃ udāne”si. Sutte pana etthakameva āgataṃ –
atk-s0502a:1209_0: “Assosi kho bhagavā dibbāya sotadhātuyā visuddhāya atikkantamānusikāya sakkassa devānamindassa
atk-s0502a:1209_1: vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā ākāse antalikkhe tikkhattuṃ udānaṃ udānentassa “aho dānaṃ paramadānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1209_2: kassape suppatiṭṭhitaṃ, aho dānaṃ paramadānaṃ kassape suppatiṭṭhitaṃ, aho dānaṃ paramadānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1210: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi –
atk-s0502a:1215: Imañca pana udānaṃ udānetvā, “bhikkhave, sakko devānamindo mama puttassa sīlagandhena āgantvā piṇḍapātaṃ adāsī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1218: Yo ca sīlavataṃ gandho, vāti devesu uttamo”ti.
atk-s0502a:1219_0: Tattha appamattoti parittappamāṇo. Yo ca sīlavatanti yo pana sīlavantānaṃ sīlagandho,
atk-s0502a:1219_1: so tagaraṃ viya lohitacandanaṃ viya ca parittako na hoti, ativiya uḷāro vipphārito.
atk-s0502a:1219_2: Teneva kāraṇena vāti devesu uttamoti pavaro seṭṭho hutvā devesu ca manussesu ca sabbatthameva
atk-s0502a:1220: Desanāvasāne bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pattā. Desanā mahājanassa sātthikā jātāti.
atk-s0502a:1223: Tesaṃ sampannasīlānanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā rājagahaṃ upanissāya veḷuvane viharanto godhikattherassa parinibbānaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1224_0: So hi āyasmā isigilipasse kāḷasilāyaṃ viharanto appamatto ātāpī pahitatto sāmāyikaṃ
atk-s0502a:1224_1: cetovimuttiṃ phusitvā ekassa anussāyikassa rogassa vasena tato parihāyi. So dutiyampi
atk-s0502a:1224_2: tatiyampi chakkhattuṃ jhānaṃ nibbattetvā parihīno, sattame vāre uppādetvā cintesi
atk-s0502a:1224_3: – “ahaṃ chakkhattuṃ jhānā parihīno, parihīnajjhānassa kho pana aniyatā gati, idāneva
atk-s0502a:1224_4: satthaṃ āharissāmī”ti kesoropanasatthakaṃ gahetvā galanāḷiṃ chindituṃ pañcake nipajji.
atk-s0502a:1224_5: Māro tassa cittaṃ ñatvā “ayaṃ bhikkhu satthaṃ āharitukāmo, satthaṃ āharantā kho pana
atk-s0502a:1224_6: jīvite nirapekkhā honti, te vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattampi pāpuṇanti, sacāhaṃ
atk-s0502a:1224_7: etaṃ vāressāmi, na me vacanaṃ karissati, satthāraṃ vārāpessāmī”ti aññātakavesena
atk-s0502a:1230: Appattamānaso sekkho, kālaṃ kayirā jane sutā”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:1231: Tasmiṃ khaṇe therena satthaṃ āharitaṃ hoti. Satthā “māro aya”nti viditvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1234_0: Atha kho bhagavā sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ therassa satthaṃ āharitvā nipannaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1234_1: agamāsi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe māro pāpimā “kattha nu kho imassa paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ patiṭṭhita”nti
atk-s0502a:1234_2: dhūmarāsi viya timirapuñjo viya ca hutvā sabbadisāsu therassa viññāṇaṃ samanvesati.
atk-s0502a:1234_3: Bhagavā taṃ dhūmatimirabhāvaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dassetvā “eso kho, bhikkhave, māro pāpimā
atk-s0502a:1234_4: godhikassa kulaputtassa viññāṇaṃ samanvesati ‘kattha godhikassa kulaputtassa viññāṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:1234_5: patiṭṭhita’nti. Apatiṭṭhitena ca, bhikkhave, viññāṇena godhiko kulaputto parinibbuto”ti
atk-s0502a:1234_6: āha. Māropi tassa viññāṇaṭṭhānaṃ daṭṭhuṃ asakkonto kumārakavaṇṇo hutvā beluvapaṇḍuvīṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:1235: “Uddhaṃ adho ca tiriyaṃ, disā anudisā svahaṃ;
atk-s0502a:1236: Anvesaṃ nādhigacchāmi, godhiko so kuhiṃ gato”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:1242: Evaṃ vutte māro pāpimā bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi –
atk-s0502a:1245: Satthāpi “kiṃ te, pāpima, godhikassa kulaputtassa nibbattaṭṭhānena? Tassa hi nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ tumhādisānaṃ satampi sahassampi daṭṭhuṃ na sakkotī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1248: Sammadaññā vimuttānaṃ, māro maggaṃ na vindatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1249_0: Tattha tesanti yathā appatiṭṭhitena viññāṇena godhiko kulaputto parinibbuto, ye ca
atk-s0502a:1249_1: evaṃ parinibbāyanti, tesaṃ sampannasīlānanti paripuṇṇasīlānaṃ. Appamādavihārinanti
atk-s0502a:1249_2: satiavippavāsasaṅkhātena appamādena viharantānaṃ. Sammadaññā vimuttānanti hetunā
atk-s0502a:1249_4: paṭippassaddhivimuttiyā, nissaraṇavimuttiyā”ti imāhi pañcahi vimuttīhi vimuttānaṃ.
atk-s0502a:1249_5: Māro maggaṃ na vindatīti evarūpānaṃ mahākhīṇāsavānaṃ sabbathāmena maggantopi māro
atk-s0502a:1249_6: gatamaggaṃ na vindati na labhati na passatīti.
atk-s0502a:1250: Desanāvasāne bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pattā. Desanā mahājanassa sātthikā jātāti.
atk-s0502a:1253: Yathā saṅkāraṭṭhānasminti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto garahadinnaṃ nāma nigaṇṭhasāvakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1254_0: Sāvatthiyañhi sirigutto ca garahadinno cāti dve sahāyakā ahesuṃ. Tesu sirigutto upāsako
atk-s0502a:1254_1: buddhasāvako, garahadinno nigaṇṭhasāvako. Taṃ nigaṇṭhā abhikkhaṇaṃ evaṃ vadanti –
atk-s0502a:1254_2: “tava sahāyakaṃ siriguttaṃ ‘kiṃ tvaṃ samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ upasaṅkamasi, tassa santike
atk-s0502a:1254_3: kiṃ labhissasī’ti vatvā yathā amhe upasaṅkamitvā amhākañca deyyadhammaṃ dassati,
atk-s0502a:1254_4: kiṃ evaṃ ovadituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti. Garahadinno tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā abhikkhaṇaṃ gantvā
atk-s0502a:1254_5: ṭhitanisinnaṭṭhānādīsu siriguttaṃ evaṃ ovadati – “samma, kiṃ te samaṇena gotamena,
atk-s0502a:1254_6: taṃ upasaṅkamitvā kiṃ labhissasi, kiṃ te mama, ayye, upasaṅkamitvā tesaṃ dānaṃ dātuṃ
atk-s0502a:1254_7: na vaṭṭatī”ti? Sirigutto tassa kathaṃ sutvāpi bahū divase tuṇhī hutvā nibbijjitvā
atk-s0502a:1254_8: ekadivasaṃ, “samma, tvaṃ abhikkhaṇaṃ āgantvā maṃ ṭhitaṭṭhānādīsu evaṃ vadesi, ‘samaṇaṃ
