atk-s0502a:1254_9: gotamaṃ upasaṅkamitvā kiṃ labhissasi, mama, ayye, upasaṅkamitvā tesaṃ dānaṃ dehī’ti,
atk-s0502a:1254_10: kathehi tāva me, tava, ayyā, kiṃ jānantī”ti? “‘Aho, sāmi, mā evaṃ vada, mama ayyānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1254_11: aññātaṃ nāma natthi, sabbaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ sabbaṃ kāyavacīmanokammaṃ idaṃ
atk-s0502a:1254_12: bhavissati, idaṃ na bhavissatī’ti sabbaṃ bhabbābhabbaṃ jānantī”ti? “Evaṃ vadesī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1254_13: “Āma, vademī”ti. “Yadi evaṃ, atibhāriyaṃ te kataṃ, ettakaṃ kālaṃ mayhaṃ etamatthaṃ
atk-s0502a:1254_14: anācikkhantena, ajja mayā ayyānaṃ ñāṇānubhāvo ñāto, gaccha, samma, ayye, mama vacanena
atk-s0502a:1254_15: nimantehī”ti. So nigaṇṭhānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā te vanditvā “mayhaṃ sahāyako sirigutto
atk-s0502a:1254_16: svātanāya tumhe nimantetī”ti āha. “Siriguttena sāmaṃ tvaṃ vutto”ti? “Āma, ayyā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1254_17: Te haṭṭhatuṭṭhā hutvā “nipphannaṃ no kiccaṃ, siriguttassa amhesu pasannakālato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0502a:1254_18: kā nāma sampatti amhākaṃ na bhavissatī”ti vadiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1255_0: Siriguttassāpi mahantaṃ nivesanaṃ. So tasmiṃ dvinnaṃ gehānaṃ antare ubhato dīghaṃ
atk-s0502a:1255_1: āvāṭaṃ khaṇāpetvā gūthakalalassa pūrāpesi. Bahiāvāṭe dvīsu pariyantesu khāṇuke koṭṭāpetvā
atk-s0502a:1255_2: tesu rajjuyo bandhāpetvā āsanānaṃ purimapāde āvāṭassa purimapasse ṭhapāpetvā pacchimapāde
atk-s0502a:1255_3: rajjukesu ṭhapāpesi. “Evaṃ nisinnakāle evaṃ avaṃsirā patissantī”ti maññamāno yathā
atk-s0502a:1255_4: āvāṭo na paññāyati, evaṃ āsanānaṃ upari paccattharaṇāni dāpesi. Mahantā mahantā cāṭiyo
atk-s0502a:1255_5: ṭhapāpetvā kadalipaṇṇehi ca setapilotikāhi ca mukhāni bandhāpetvā tā tucchā eva gehassa
atk-s0502a:1255_7: Garahadinno pātova tassa gharaṃ vegena gantvā, “ayyānaṃ sakkāro sajjito”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a:1255_8: “Āma, samma, sajjito”ti. “Kahaṃ pana eso”ti. “Etāsu ettikāsu cāṭīsu yāgu, ettikāsu
atk-s0502a:1255_9: bhattaṃ, ettikāsu sappiphāṇitapūvādīni pūritāni, āsanāni paññattānī”ti. So “sādhū”ti
atk-s0502a:1255_10: vatvā gato tassa gatakāle pañcasatā nigaṇṭhā āgamiṃsu. Sirigutto gehā nikkhamitvā
atk-s0502a:1255_11: pañcapatiṭṭhitena nigaṇṭhe vanditvā tesaṃ purato añjaliṃ paggayha ṭhito evaṃ cintesi
atk-s0502a:1255_12: – “tumhe kira atītādibhedaṃ sabbaṃ jānātha, evaṃ tumhākaṃ upaṭṭhākena mayhaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0502a:1255_13: Sace sabbaṃ tumhe jānātha, mayhaṃ gehaṃ mā pavisittha. Mama gehaṃ paviṭṭhānañhi vo
atk-s0502a:1255_14: neva yāgu atthi, na bhattādīni. Sace ajānitvā pavisissatha, gūthaāvāṭe vo pātetvā
atk-s0502a:1255_15: pothessāmī”ti evaṃ cintetvā purisānaṃ saññaṃ adāsi. Evaṃ tesaṃ nisīdanabhāvaṃ ñatvā
atk-s0502a:1255_16: pacchimapasse ṭhatvā āsanānaṃ upari paccattharaṇāni apaneyyātha, mā tāni asucinā makkhayiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a:1256_0: Atha nigaṇṭhe “ito etha, bhante”ti āha. Nigaṇṭhā pavisitvā paññattāsanesu nisīdituṃ
atk-s0502a:1256_1: ārabhiṃsu. Atha ne manussā vadiṃsu – “āgametha, bhante, mā tāva nisīdathā”ti. “Kiṃ
atk-s0502a:1256_2: kāraṇā”ti? “Amhākaṃ gehaṃ paviṭṭhānaṃ ayyānaṃ vattaṃ ñatvā nisīdituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1256_3: “Kiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati, āvuso”ti? “Attano attano pattāsanamūlesu ṭhatvā sabbepi ekappahāreneva
atk-s0502a:1256_4: nisīdituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Idaṃ kirassa adhippāyo – “ekasmiṃ āvāṭe patite ‘mā, āvuso,
atk-s0502a:1256_5: avasesā āsane nisīdantū’ti vattuṃ mā labhatū”ti. Te “sādhū”ti vatvā “imehi kathitakathaṃ
atk-s0502a:1256_6: amhehi kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintayiṃsu. Atha sabbe attano attano pattāsanamūle paṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0502a:1256_7: aṭṭhaṃsu. Atha ne, “bhante, khippaṃ ekappahāreneva nisīdathā”ti vatvā tesaṃ nisinnabhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:1256_8: ñatvā āsanānaṃ upari paccattharaṇāni nīhariṃsu. Nigaṇṭhā ekappahāreneva nisinnā,
atk-s0502a:1256_9: rajjūnaṃ upari ṭhapitā āsanapādā bhaṭṭhā, nigaṇṭhā avaṃsirā āvāṭe patiṃsu. Sirigutto
atk-s0502a:1256_10: tesu patitesu dvāraṃ pidahitvā te uttiṇṇuttiṇṇe “atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ kasmā na
atk-s0502a:1256_11: jānāthā”ti daṇḍehi pāthetvā “ettakaṃ etesaṃ vaṭṭissatī”ti dvāraṃ vivarāpesi. Te nikkhamitvā
atk-s0502a:1256_12: palāyituṃ ārabhiṃsu. Gamanamagge pana tesaṃ sudhāparikammakataṃ bhūmiṃ picchilaṃ
atk-s0502a:1256_13: kārāpesi. Te tattha asaṇṭhahitvā patite patite puna pothāpetvā “alaṃ ettakaṃ tumhāka”nti
atk-s0502a:1256_14: uyyojesi. Te “nāsitamhā tayā, nāsitamhā tayā”ti kandantā upaṭṭhākassa gehadvāraṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1257_0: Garahadinno taṃ vippakāraṃ disvā kuddho “nāsitamhi siriguttena, hatthaṃ pasāretvā
atk-s0502a:1257_1: vandantānaṃ sadevake loke yathāruciyā dātuṃ samatthe nāma puññakkhettabhūte mama,
atk-s0502a:1257_2: ayye, pothāpetvā byasanaṃ pāpesī”ti rājakulaṃ gantvā tassa kahāpaṇasahassaṃ daṇḍaṃ
atk-s0502a:1257_3: kāresi. Athassa rājā sāsanaṃ pesesi. So gantvā rājānaṃ vanditvā, “deva, upaparikkhitvā
atk-s0502a:1257_4: daṇḍaṃ gaṇhatha, mā anupaparikkhitvā”ti āha. “Upaparikkhitvā gaṇhissāmī”ti. “Sādhu,
atk-s0502a:1257_5: devā”ti. “Tena hi gaṇhāhī”ti. Deva, mayhaṃ sahāyako nigaṇṭhasāvako maṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0502a:1257_6: ṭhitanisinnaṭṭhānādīsu abhiṇhaṃ evaṃ vadesi – “samma, kiṃ te samaṇena gotamena, taṃ
atk-s0502a:1257_7: upasaṅkamitvā kiṃ labhissasī”ti idaṃ ādiṃ katvā sirigutto sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ārocetvā
atk-s0502a:1257_8: “deva, sace imasmiṃ kāraṇe daṇḍaṃ gahetuṃ yuttaṃ, gaṇhathā”ti. Rājā garahadinnaṃ
atk-s0502a:1257_9: oloketvā “saccaṃ kira te evaṃ vutta”nti āha. “Saccaṃ, devā”ti. Tvaṃ ettakampi ajānante
atk-s0502a:1257_10: satthāroti gahetvā vicaranto “sabbaṃ jānantī”ti kiṃ kāraṇā tathāgatasāvakassa kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1257_11: “Tayā āropitadaṇḍo tuyhameva hotū”ti evaṃ sveva daṇḍaṃ pāpito, tasseva kulūpakā pothetvā nīhaṭā.
atk-s0502a:1258_0: So taṃ kujjhitvā tato paṭṭhāya aḍḍhamāsamattampi siriguttena saddhiṃ akathetvā cintesi
atk-s0502a:1258_1: – “evaṃ vicarituṃ mayhaṃ ayuttaṃ, etassa kulūpakānampi mayā byasanaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0502a:1258_3: nāma kalahopi hoti vivādopi, kiṃ tvaṃ kiñci na kathesi, kasmā evaṃ karosī”ti? “Samma,
atk-s0502a:1258_4: tava mayā saddhiṃ akathanato na kathemī”ti. “Yaṃ, samma, kataṃ, katameva taṃ na mayaṃ
atk-s0502a:1258_5: mettiṃ bhindissāmā”ti. Tato paṭṭhāya ubhopi ekaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhanti nisīdanti. Athekadivasaṃ
atk-s0502a:1258_6: sirigutto garahadinnaṃ āha – “kiṃ te nigaṇṭhehi, te upasaṅkamitvā kiṃ labhissasi,
atk-s0502a:1258_7: mama satthāraṃ upasaṅkamituṃ vā ayyānaṃ dānaṃ dātuṃ vā kiṃ te na vaṭṭatī”ti? Sopi
atk-s0502a:1258_8: etameva paccāsīsati, tenassa kaṇḍuvanaṭṭhāne nakhena vilekhitaṃ viya ahosi. So, “sirigutta,
atk-s0502a:1258_9: tava satthā kiṃ jānātī”ti pucchi. “Ambho, mā evaṃ vada, satthu me ajānitabbaṃ nāma
atk-s0502a:1258_10: natthi, atītādibhedaṃ sabbaṃ jānāti, soḷasahākārehi sattānaṃ cittaṃ paricchindatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1258_11: “Ahaṃ evaṃ na jānāmi, kasmā mayhaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ na kathesi, tena hi tvaṃ gaccha,
atk-s0502a:1258_12: tava satthāraṃ svātanāya nimantehi, bhojessāmi, pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ mama
atk-s0502a:1259_0: Sirigutto satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā evamāha – “bhante, mama sahāyako garahadinno
atk-s0502a:1259_1: tumhe nimantāpeti, pañcahi kira bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ sve tassa bhikkhaṃ gaṇhatha,
atk-s0502a:1259_2: purimadivase kho pana tassa kulūpakānaṃ mayā idaṃ nāma kataṃ, mayā katassa paṭikaraṇampi
atk-s0502a:1259_3: na jānāmi, tumhākaṃ suddhacittena bhikkhaṃ dātukāmatampi na jānāmi, āvajjetvā yuttaṃ
atk-s0502a:1259_4: ce, adhivāsetha. No ce, mā adhivāsayitthā”ti. Satthā “kiṃ nu kho so amhākaṃ kātu
atk-s0502a:1259_5: kāmo”ti āvajjetvā addasa “dvinnaṃ gehānaṃ antare mahantaṃ āvāṭaṃ khaṇāpetvā asītisakaṭamattāni
atk-s0502a:1259_6: khadiradārūni āharāpetvā pūrāpetvā aggiṃ datvā amhe aṅgāraāvāṭe pātetvā niggaṇhitukāmo”ti.
atk-s0502a:1259_7: Puna āvajjesi – “kiṃ nu kho tattha gatapaccayā attho atthi, natthī”ti. Tato idaṃ
atk-s0502a:1259_8: addasa – “ahaṃ aṅgāraāvāṭe pādaṃ pasāressāmi, taṃ paṭicchādetvā ṭhapitakilañjaṃ antaradhāyissati,
atk-s0502a:1259_9: aṅgārakāsuṃ bhinditvā cakkamattaṃ mahāpadumaṃ uṭṭhahissati, athāhaṃ padumakaṇṇikā
atk-s0502a:1259_10: akkamanto āsane nisīdissāmi, pañcasatā bhikkhūpi tatheva gantvā nisīdissanti, mahājano
atk-s0502a:1259_11: sannipatissati, ahaṃ tasmiṃ samāgame dvīhi gāthāhi anumodanaṃ karissāmi, anumodanapariyosāne
atk-s0502a:1259_12: caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo bhavissati, sirigutto ca garahadinno
atk-s0502a:1259_13: ca sotāpannā bhavissanti, attano ca dhanarāsiṃ sāsane vikirissanti, imaṃ kulaputtaṃ
atk-s0502a:1259_14: nissāya mayā gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti bhikkhaṃ adhivāsesi.
atk-s0502a:1260_0: Sirigutto gantvā satthu adhivāsanaṃ garahadinnassa ārocetvā “lokajeṭṭhassa sakkāraṃ
atk-s0502a:1260_1: karohī”ti āha. Garahadinno “idānissa kattabbayuttakaṃ jānissāmī”ti dvinnaṃ gehānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1260_2: antare mahantaṃ āvāṭaṃ khaṇāpetvā asītisakaṭamattāni khadiradārūni āharāpetvā pūrāpetvā
atk-s0502a:1260_3: aggiṃ datvā khadiraṅgārarāsīnaṃ yojāpetvā sabbarattiṃ dhamāpetvā khadiraṅgārarāsiṃ
atk-s0502a:1260_4: kārāpetvā āvāṭamatthake rukkhapadarāni ṭhapāpetvā kilañjena paṭicchādetvā gomayena
atk-s0502a:1260_5: limpāpetvā ekena passena dubbaladaṇḍake attharitvā gamanamaggaṃ kāresi, “evaṃ akkantaakkantakāle
atk-s0502a:1260_6: daṇḍakesu bhaggesu parivaṭṭetvā aṅgārakāsuyaṃ patissantī”ti maññamāno gehapacchābhāge
atk-s0502a:1260_7: siriguttena ṭhapitaniyāmeneva cāṭiyo ṭhapāpesi, āsanānipi tatheva paññāpesi. Sirigutto
atk-s0502a:1260_8: pātova tassa gehaṃ gantvā “kato te, samma, sakkāro”ti āha. “Āma, sammā”ti. “Kahaṃ
atk-s0502a:1260_9: pana so”ti? “Ehi, passāmā”ti sabbaṃ siriguttena dassitanayeneva dassesi. Sirigutto
atk-s0502a:1260_10: “sādhu, sammā”ti āha. Mahājano sannipati. Micchādiṭṭhikena hi nimantite mahanto sannipāto
atk-s0502a:1260_11: ahosi. Micchādiṭṭhikāpi “samaṇassa gotamassa vippakāraṃ passissāmā”ti sannipatanti,
atk-s0502a:1260_12: sammādiṭṭhikāpi “ajja satthā mahādhammadesanaṃ desessati, buddhavisayaṃ buddhalīlaṃ
atk-s0502a:1261_0: Punadivase satthā pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ garahadinnassa gehadvāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:1261_1: So gehā nikkhamitvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā purato añjaliṃ paggayha ṭhito cintesi
atk-s0502a:1261_2: – “bhante, ‘tumhe kira atītādibhedaṃ sabbaṃ jānātha, sattānaṃ soḷasahākārehi cittaṃ
atk-s0502a:1261_3: paricchindathā’ti evaṃ tumhākaṃ upaṭṭhākena mayhaṃ kathitaṃ. Sace jānātha, mayhaṃ
atk-s0502a:1261_4: gehaṃ mā pavisittha. Paviṭṭhānañhi vo neva yāgu atthi, na bhattādīni, sabbe kho pana
atk-s0502a:1261_5: tumhe aṅgārakāsuyaṃ pātetvā niggaṇhissāmī”ti. Evaṃ cintetvā satthu pattaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0502a:1261_6: “ito etha bhagavā”ti vatvā, “bhante, amhākaṃ gehaṃ āgatānaṃ vattaṃ ñatvā āgantuṃ
atk-s0502a:1261_7: vaṭṭatī”ti āha. “Kiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati, āvuso”ti? “Ekekassa pavisitvā purato gantvā nisinnakāle
atk-s0502a:1261_8: pacchā aññena āgantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Evaṃ kirassa ahosi – “purato gacchantaṃ aṅgārakāsuyaṃ
atk-s0502a:1261_9: patitaṃ disvā avasesā na āgacchissanti, ekekameva pātetvā niggaṇhissāmī”ti. Satthā
atk-s0502a:1261_10: “sādhū”ti vatvā ekakova pāyāsi. Garahadinno aṅgārakāsuṃ patvā apasakkitvā ṭhito “purato
atk-s0502a:1261_11: yātha, bhante”ti āha. Atha satthā aṅgārakāsumatthake pādaṃ pasāresi, kilañjaṃ antaradhāyi,
atk-s0502a:1261_12: aṅgārakāsuṃ bhinditvā cakkamattāni padumāni uṭṭhahiṃsu. Satthā padumakaṇṇikā akkamanto
atk-s0502a:1261_13: gantvā paññatte buddhāsane nisīdi, bhikkhūpi tatheva gantvā nisīdiṃsu. Garahadinnassa
atk-s0502a:1262_0: So vegena gantvā siriguttaṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “sāmi, me tāṇaṃ hohī”ti āha. “Kiṃ eta”nti?
atk-s0502a:1262_1: “Pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ gehe yāgu vā bhattādīni vā natthi, kiṃ nu kho karomī”ti?
atk-s0502a:1262_2: “Kiṃ pana tayā kata”nti āha. Ahaṃ dvinnaṃ gehānaṃ antare mahantaṃ āvāṭaṃ aṅgārassa
atk-s0502a:1262_3: pūraṃ kāresiṃ – “tattha pātetvā niggaṇhissāmī”ti. “Atha naṃ bhinditvā mahāpadumāni
atk-s0502a:1262_4: uṭṭhahiṃsu. Sabbe padumakaṇṇikā akkamitvā gantvā paññattāsanesu nisinnā, idāni kiṃ
atk-s0502a:1262_5: karomi, sāmī”ti? Nanu tvaṃ idāneva mayhaṃ “‘ettikā cāṭiyo, ettikā yāgu, ettakāni
atk-s0502a:1262_6: sattādīnī’ti dassesī”ti. “Musā taṃ, sāmi, tucchāva cāṭiyo”ti. Hotu, “gaccha, tāsu
atk-s0502a:1262_7: cāṭīsu yāguādīni olokehī”ti. Taṃ khaṇaññeva tena yāsu cāṭīsu “yāgū”ti vuttaṃ, tā
atk-s0502a:1262_8: yāguyā pūrayiṃsu, yāsu “bhattādīnī”ti vuttaṃ, tā bhattādīnaṃ paripuṇṇāva ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:1262_9: Taṃ sampattiṃ disvāva garahadinnassa sarīraṃ pītipāmojjena paripūritaṃ, cittaṃ pasannaṃ.
atk-s0502a:1262_10: So sakkaccaṃ buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ parivisitvā katabhattakiccassa satthuno
atk-s0502a:1262_11: anumodanaṃ kāretukāmo pattaṃ gaṇhi. Satthā anumodanaṃ karonto “ime sattā paññācakkhuno
atk-s0502a:1262_12: abhāveneva mama sāvakānaṃ buddhasāsanassa guṇaṃ na jānanti. Paññācakkhuvirahitā hi
atk-s0502a:1262_13: andhā nāma, paññavanto sacakkhukā nāmā”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:1269_0: Tattha saṅkāradhānasminti saṅkāraṭhānasmiṃ, kacavararāsimhīti attho. Ujjhitasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:1269_1: mahāpatheti mahāmagge chaḍḍitasmiṃ. Sucigandhanti surabhigandhaṃ. Mano ettha ramatīti
atk-s0502a:1269_2: manoramaṃ. Saṅkārabhūtesūti saṅkāramiva bhūtesu. Puthujjaneti puthūnaṃ kilesānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1269_3: jananato evaṃladdhanāme lokiyamahājane. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā nāma mahāpathe chaḍḍite
atk-s0502a:1269_4: saṅkārarāsimhi asucijegucchiyapaṭikūlepi sucigandhaṃ padumaṃ jāyetha, taṃ rājarājamahāmattādīnaṃ
atk-s0502a:1269_5: manoramaṃ piyaṃ manāpaṃ uparimatthake patiṭṭhānārahameva bhaveyya, evameva saṅkārabhūtesupi
atk-s0502a:1269_6: puthujjanesu jāto nippaññassa mahājanassa acakkhukassa antare nibbattopi attano paññābalena
atk-s0502a:1269_7: kāmesu ādīnavaṃ, nekkhamme ca ānisaṃsaṃ disvā nikkhamitvā pabbajito pabbajjāmattenapi,
atk-s0502a:1269_9: hi khīṇāsavo bhikkhu andhabhūte puthujjane atikkamitvā rocati virocati sobhatīti.
atk-s0502a:1270_0: Desanāvasāne caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Garahadinno ca sirigutto
atk-s0502a:1270_1: ca sotāpattiphalaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Te sabbaṃ attano dhanaṃ buddhasāsane vippakiriṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1270_2: Satthā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāramagamāsi. Bhikkhū sāyanhasamaye dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ
atk-s0502a:1270_3: – “aho acchariyā buddhaguṇā nāma, tathārūpaṃ nāma khadiraṅgārarāsiṃ bhinditvā padumāni
atk-s0502a:1270_4: uṭṭhahiṃsū”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti
atk-s0502a:1270_5: pucchitvā, “imāya nāmā”ti vutte – “anacchariyaṃ, bhikkhave, yaṃ mama etarahi buddhabhūtassa
atk-s0502a:1270_6: aṅgārarāsimhā padumāni uṭṭhitāni, aparipakke ñāṇe vattamānassa bodhisattabhūtassapi
atk-s0502a:1270_7: me uṭṭhahiṃsū”ti vatvā, “kadā, bhante, ācikkhatha no”ti yācito atītaṃ āharitvā –
atk-s0502a:1279: Dīghā jāgarato rattīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto pasenadikosalañceva aññatarañca purisaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1280_0: Rājā kira pasenadi kosalo ekasmiṃ chaṇadivase alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ sabbasetaṃ ekaṃ
atk-s0502a:1280_1: puṇḍarīkaṃ nāma hatthiṃ abhiruyha mahantena rājānubhāvena nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karoti.
atk-s0502a:1280_2: Ussāraṇāya vattamānāya leḍḍudaṇḍādīhi pothiyamāno mahājano palāyanto gīvaṃ parivaṭṭetvāpi
atk-s0502a:1280_3: oloketiyeva. Rājūnaṃ kira sudinnadānassetaṃ phalaṃ. Aññatarassāpi duggatapurisassa
atk-s0502a:1280_4: bhariyā sattabhūmikassa pāsādassa uparitale ṭhitā ekaṃ vātapānakavāṭaṃ vivaritvā
atk-s0502a:1280_5: rājānaṃ oloketvāva apagacchi. Rañño puṇṇacando valāhakantaraṃ paviṭṭho viya upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:1280_6: So tassā paṭibaddhacitto hatthikkhandhato patanākārappatto viya hutvā khippaṃ nagaraṃ
atk-s0502a:1280_7: padakkhiṇaṃ katvā antepuraṃ pavisitvā ekaṃ vissāsakaṃ amaccaṃ āha – “asukaṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a:1280_8: te mayā olokitapāsādo diṭṭho”ti? “Āma, devā”ti. “Tatthekaṃ itthiṃ addasā”ti? “Addasaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1280_9: devā”ti. “Gaccha, tassā sasāmikaasāmikabhāvaṃ jānāhī”ti. So gantvā tassā sasāmikabhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:1280_10: ñatvā āgantvā rañño “sasāmikā”ti ārocesi. Atha raññā “tena hi tassā sāmikaṃ pakkosāhī”ti
atk-s0502a:1280_11: vutte so gantvā, “ehi, bho, rājā taṃ pakkosatī”ti āha. So “bhariyaṃ me nissāya bhayena
atk-s0502a:1280_12: uppannena bhavitabba”nti cintetvā rañño āṇaṃ paṭibāhituṃ asakkonto gantvā rājānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1280_13: vanditvā aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ rājā “maṃ ito paṭṭhāya upaṭṭhāhī”ti āha. “Alaṃ, deva,
atk-s0502a:1280_14: ahaṃ attano kammaṃ katvā tumhākaṃ suṅkaṃ dadāmi, ghareyeva me jīvikā hotū”ti. “Tava
atk-s0502a:1280_15: suṅkena mayhaṃ attho natthi, ajjato paṭṭhāya maṃ upaṭṭhāhī”ti tassa phalakañca āvudhañca
atk-s0502a:1280_16: dāpesi. Evaṃ kirassa ahosi – “kañcidevassa dosaṃ āropetvā ghātetvā bhariyaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1280_17: Atha naṃ so maraṇabhayabhīto appamatto hutvā upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:1281_0: Rājā tassa dosaṃ apassanto kāmapariḷāhe vaḍḍhante “ekamassa dosaṃ āropetvā rājāṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:1281_1: karissāmī”ti pakkosāpetvā evamāha – “ambho ito yojanamatthake nadiyā asukaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1281_2: nāma gantvā sāyaṃ mama nhānavelāya kumuduppalāni ceva aruṇavatīmattikañca āhara.
atk-s0502a:1281_3: Sace tasmiṃ khaṇe nāgacchasi, āṇaṃ te karissāmī”ti. Sevako kira catūhipi dāsehi patikiṭṭhataro.
atk-s0502a:1281_4: Dhanakkītādayo hi dāsā “sīsaṃ me rujjati, piṭṭhi me rujjatī”ti vatvā acchituṃ labhantiyeva.
atk-s0502a:1281_5: Sevakassetaṃ natthi, āṇattakammaṃ kātumeva vaṭṭati. Tasmā so “avassaṃ mayā gantabbaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1281_6: kumuduppalehi saddhiṃ aruṇavatīmattikā nāma nāgabhavane uppajjati, ahaṃ kuhiṃ labhissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:1281_7: cintento maraṇabhayabhīto vegena gehaṃ gantvā, “bhadde, niṭṭhitaṃ me bhatta”nti āha.
atk-s0502a:1281_8: “Uddhanamatthake, sāmī”ti. So yāva bhattaṃ otarati, tāva sandhāretuṃ asakkonto uḷuṅkena
atk-s0502a:1281_9: kañjikaṃ harāpetvā yathāladdhena byañjanena saddhiṃ allameva bhattaṃ pacchiyaṃ opīḷetvā
atk-s0502a:1281_10: ādāya yojanikaṃ maggaṃ pakkhando, tassa gacchantasseva bhattaṃ pakkaṃ ahosi. So anucchiṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0502a:1281_11: katvāva thokaṃ bhattaṃ apanetvā bhuñjanto ekaṃ addhikaṃ disvā mayā apanetvā ṭhapitaṃ
atk-s0502a:1281_12: thokaṃ anucchiṭṭhaṃ bhattameva atthi gahetvā bhuñja sāmīti. So gaṇhitvā bhuñji. Itaropi
atk-s0502a:1281_13: bhuñjitvā ekaṃ bhattamuṭṭhiṃ udake khipitvā mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā mahantena saddena
atk-s0502a:1281_14: “imasmiṃ nadīpadese adhivatthā nāgā supaṇṇā devatā ca vacanaṃ me suṇantu, rājā mayhaṃ
atk-s0502a:1281_15: āṇaṃ kātukāmo ‘kumuduppalehi saddhiṃ aruṇavatīmattikaṃ āharā’ti maṃ āṇāpesi, addhikamanussassa
atk-s0502a:1281_16: ca me bhattaṃ dinnaṃ, taṃ sahassānisaṃsaṃ, udake macchānaṃ dinnaṃ, taṃ satānisaṃsaṃ.
atk-s0502a:1281_17: Ettakaṃ puññaphalaṃ tumhākaṃ pattiṃ katvā dammi, mayhaṃ kumuduppalehi saddhiṃ aruṇavatīmattikaṃ
atk-s0502a:1281_18: āharathā”ti tikkhattuṃ anussāvesi. Tattha adhivattho nāgarājā taṃ saddaṃ sutvā mahallakavesena
atk-s0502a:1281_19: tassa santikaṃ gantvā “kiṃ vadesī”ti āha. So punapi tatheva vatvā “mayhaṃ taṃ pattiṃ
atk-s0502a:1281_20: dehī”ti vutte, “demī”ti āha. Punapi “dehī”ti vutte, “demi, sāmī”ti āha. Evaṃ so dve
atk-s0502a:1281_21: tayo vāre pattiṃ āharāpetvā kumuduppalehi saddhiṃ aruṇavatīmattikaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a:1282_0: Rājā pana cintesi – “manussā nāma bahumāyā, sace so kenaci upāyena labheyya, kiccaṃ
atk-s0502a:1282_1: me na nipphajjeyyā”ti. So kālasseva dvāraṃ pidahāpetvā muddikaṃ attano santikaṃ āharāpesi.
atk-s0502a:1282_2: Itaropi puriso rañño nhānavelāyamevāgantvā dvāraṃ alabhanto dvārapālaṃ pakkosetvā
atk-s0502a:1282_3: “dvāraṃ vivarā”ti āha. “Na sakkā vivarituṃ, rājā kālasseva muddikaṃ datvā rājagehaṃ
atk-s0502a:1282_4: āharāpesī”ti. So “rājadūto ahaṃ, dvāraṃ vivarā”ti vatvāpi “dvāraṃ alabhanto natthi
atk-s0502a:1282_5: me idāni jīvitaṃ. Kiṃ nu kho karissāmī”ti cintetvā dvārassa upariummāre mattikāpiṇḍaṃ
atk-s0502a:1282_6: khipitvā tassūpari pupphāni laggetvā mahāsaddaṃ karonto, “ambho, nagaravāsino rañño
atk-s0502a:1282_7: mayā āṇattiyā gatabhāvaṃ jānātha, rājā maṃ akāraṇena vināsetukāmo”ti tikkhattuṃ viravitvā
atk-s0502a:1282_8: “kattha nu kho gacchissāmī”ti cintetvā “bhikkhū nāma muduhadayā, vihāraṃ gantvā nipajjissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:1282_9: sanniṭṭhānamakāsi. Ime hi nāma sattā sukhitakāle bhikkhūnaṃ atthibhāvampi ajānitvā
atk-s0502a:1282_10: dukkhābhibhūtakāle vihāraṃ gantukāmā honti, tasmā sopi “me aññaṃ tāṇaṃ natthī”ti
atk-s0502a:1282_11: vihāraṃ gantvā ekasmiṃ phāsukaṭṭhāne nipajji. Atha raññopi taṃ rattiṃ niddaṃ alabhantassa
atk-s0502a:1282_12: taṃ itthiṃ anussarantassa kāmapariḷāho uppajji. So cintesi – “vibhātakkhaṇeyeva taṃ
atk-s0502a:1283_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇeyeva saṭṭhiyojanikāya lohakumbhiyā nibbattā cattāro purisā pakkuthitāya
atk-s0502a:1283_1: ukkhaliyā taṇḍulā viya samparivattakaṃ paccamānā tiṃsāya vassasahassehi heṭṭhimatalaṃ
atk-s0502a:1283_2: patvā aparehi tiṃsāya vassasahassehi puna mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Te sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā
atk-s0502a:1283_3: aññamaññaṃ oloketvā ekekaṃ gāthaṃ vattukāmā vattuṃ asakkontā ekekaṃ akkharaṃ vatvā
atk-s0502a:1283_4: parivattitvā lohakumbhimeva paviṭṭhā. Rājā niddaṃ alabhanto majjhimayāmasamanantare
atk-s0502a:1283_5: taṃ saddaṃ sutvā bhīto utrastamānaso “kiṃ nu kho mayhaṃ jīvitantarāyo bhavissati,
atk-s0502a:1283_6: udāhu me aggamahesiyā, udāhu me rajjaṃ vinassissatī”ti cintento sakalarattiṃ akkhīni
atk-s0502a:1283_7: nimīletuṃ nāsakkhi. So aruṇuggamanavelāya eva purohitaṃ pakkosāpetvā, “ācariya, mayā
atk-s0502a:1283_8: majjhimayāmasamanantare mahantā bheravasaddā sutā, ‘rajjassa vā aggamahesiyā vā mayhaṃ
atk-s0502a:1283_9: vā kassa antarāyo bhavissatī’ti na jānāmi, tena me tvaṃ pakkosāpito”ti āha. Mahārāja,
atk-s0502a:1283_10: kiṃ te saddā sutāti? “Ācariya, du-iti sa-iti na-iti so-itīti ime sadde assosiṃ, imesaṃ
atk-s0502a:1283_11: nipphattiṃ upadhārehī”ti. Brāhmaṇassa mahāandhakāraṃ paviṭṭhassa viya na kiñci paññāyati,
atk-s0502a:1283_12: “na jānāmī”ti vutte “pana lābhasakkāro me parihāyissatī”ti bhāyitvā “bhāriyaṃ, mahārājā”ti
atk-s0502a:1283_13: āha. “Kiṃ, ācariyā”ti? “Jīvitantarāyo te paññāyatī”ti. So dviguṇaṃ bhīto, “ācariya,
atk-s0502a:1283_14: atthi kiñci pana paṭighātakāraṇa”nti āha. “Atthi, mahārāja, mā bhāyi, ahaṃ tayo vede
atk-s0502a:1283_15: jānāmī”ti. “Kiṃ pana laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti? “Sabbasatayaññaṃ yajitvā jīvitaṃ labhissasi,
atk-s0502a:1283_16: devā”ti. “Kiṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti? Hatthisataṃ assasataṃ usabhasataṃ dhenusataṃ ajasataṃ
atk-s0502a:1283_17: urabbhasataṃ kukkuṭasataṃ sūkarasataṃ dārakasataṃ dārikāsatanti evaṃ ekekaṃ pāṇajātiṃ
atk-s0502a:1283_18: sataṃ sataṃ katvā gaṇhāpento “sace migajātimeva gaṇhāpessāmi, ‘attano khādanīyameva
atk-s0502a:1283_19: gaṇhāpetī’ti vakkhantī”ti hatthiassamanussepi gaṇhāpeti. Rājā “mama jīvitameva mayhaṃ
atk-s0502a:1283_20: lābho”ti cintetvā “sabbapāṇe sīghaṃ gaṇhathā”ti āha. Āṇattamanussā adhikataraṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1284_0: “Tena kho pana samayena rañño pasenadissa kosalassa mahāyañño paccupaṭṭhito hoti,
atk-s0502a:1284_1: pañca ca usabhasatāni pañca ca vacchatarasatāni pañca ca vacchatarisatāni pañca ca
atk-s0502a:1284_2: ajasatāni pañca ca urabbhasatāni thūṇūpanītāni honti yaññatthāya. Yepissa te honti
atk-s0502a:1284_3: dāsāti vā pessāti vā kammakarāti vā, tepi daṇḍatajjitā bhayatajjitā assumukhā rudamānā
atk-s0502a:1285_0: Mahājano attano attano puttadhītuñātīnaṃ atthāya paridevamāno mahāsaddamakāsi, mahāpathavīundriyanasaddo
atk-s0502a:1285_1: viya ahosi. Atha mallikā devī taṃ saddaṃ sutvā rañño santikaṃ gantvā “kiṃ nu kho
atk-s0502a:1285_2: te, mahārāja, indriyāni apākatikāni, kilantarūpāni viya paññāyantī”ti pucchi. “Kiṃ
atk-s0502a:1285_3: tuyhaṃ, mallike, tvaṃ mama kaṇṇamūlena āsivisampi gacchantaṃ na jānāsī”ti? “Kiṃ panetaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1285_4: devā”ti? “Rattibhāge me evarūpo nāma saddo suto, svāhaṃ purohitaṃ pucchitvā jīvitantarāyo
atk-s0502a:1285_5: te paññāyati, sabbasatayaññaṃ yajitvā jīvitaṃ labhissasī”ti sutvā “mama jīvitameva
atk-s0502a:1285_6: mayhaṃ lābho”ti ime pāṇe gaṇhāpesinti. Mallikā devī, “andhabālosi, mahārāja, kiñcāpi
atk-s0502a:1285_7: mahābhakkhosi, anekasūpabyañjanavikatikaṃ doṇapākaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjasi, dvīsu raṭṭhesu
atk-s0502a:1285_8: rajjaṃ kāresi, paññā pana te mandā”ti āha. “Kasmā evaṃ vadesi, devī”ti? “Kahaṃ tayā
atk-s0502a:1285_9: aññassa maraṇena aññassa jīvitalābho diṭṭhapubbo, andhabālassa brāhmaṇassa kathaṃ
atk-s0502a:1285_10: gahetvā kasmā mahājanassa upari dukkhaṃ khipasi, dhuravihāre sadevakassa lokassa
atk-s0502a:1285_11: aggapuggalo atītādīsu appaṭihatañāṇo satthā vasati, taṃ pucchitvā tassovādaṃ karohī”ti
atk-s0502a:1285_12: vutte rājā sallahukehi yānehi mallikāya saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā maraṇabhayatajjito
atk-s0502a:1285_13: kiñci vattuṃ asakkonto satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:1286_0: Atha naṃ satthā “handa kuto nu tvaṃ, mahārāja, āgacchasi divā divassā”ti paṭhamataraṃ
atk-s0502a:1286_1: ālapi. So tuṇhīyeva nisīdi. Tato mallikā bhagavato ārocesi – “bhante, raññā kira
atk-s0502a:1286_2: majjhimayāmasamanantare saddo suto. Atha naṃ purohitassa ārocesi. Purohito ‘jīvitantarāyo
atk-s0502a:1286_3: te bhavissati, tassa paṭighātatthāya sabbasate pāṇe gahetvā tesaṃ galalohitena yaññe
atk-s0502a:1286_4: yajite jīvitaṃ labhissasī’ti āha. Rājā pāṇe gaṇhāpesi, tenāyaṃ mayā idhānīto”ti.
atk-s0502a:1286_5: “Evaṃ kira, mahārājā”ti? “Evaṃ, bhante”ti. “Kinti te saddo suto”ti? So attanā sutaniyāmeneva
atk-s0502a:1286_6: ācikkhi. Tathāgatassa taṃ sutvāva ekobhāso ahosi. Atha naṃ sattā āha – “mā bhāyi,
atk-s0502a:1286_7: mahārāja, tava antarāyo natthi, pāpakammino satthā attano dukkhaṃ āvīkarontā evamāhaṃsū”ti.
atk-s0502a:1286_8: “Kiṃ pana, bhante, tehi kata”nti? Atha kho bhagavā tesaṃ kammaṃ ācikkhituṃ “tena
atk-s0502a:1286_9: hi, mahārāja, suṇāhī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari –
atk-s0502a:1287_0: Atīte vīsativassasahassāyukesu manussesu kassapo bhagavā loke uppajjitvā vīsatiyā
atk-s0502a:1287_1: khīṇāsavasahassehi saddhiṃ cārikaṃ caramāno bārāṇasimagamāsi. Bārāṇasivāsino dvepi
atk-s0502a:1287_2: tayopi bahutarāpi ekato hutvā āgantukadānaṃ pavattayiṃsu. Tadā bārāṇasiyaṃ cattālīsakoṭivibhavā
atk-s0502a:1287_3: cattāro seṭṭhiputtā sahāyakā ahesuṃ. Te mantayiṃsu – “amhākaṃ gehe bahudhanaṃ, tena
atk-s0502a:1287_4: kiṃ karomā”ti? “Evarūpe buddhe cārikaṃ caramāne dānaṃ dassāma, sīlaṃ rakkhissāma,
atk-s0502a:1287_5: pūjaṃ karissāmā”ti ekopi avatvā tesu eko tāva evamāha – “tikhiṇasuraṃ pivantā madhuramaṃsaṃ
atk-s0502a:1287_6: khādantā vicarissāma, idaṃ amhākaṃ jīvitaphala”nti. Aparopi evamāha – “devasikaṃ
atk-s0502a:1287_7: tivassikagandhasālibhattaṃ nānaggarasehi bhuñjantā vicarissāmā”ti. Aparopi evamāha
atk-s0502a:1287_8: – “nānappakāraṃ pūvakhajjakavikatiṃ pacāpetvā khādantā vicarissāmā”ti. Aparopi evamāha
atk-s0502a:1287_9: – “sammā mayaṃ aññaṃ kiñci na karissāma, ‘dhanaṃ dassāmā’ti vutte anicchamānā itthī
atk-s0502a:1287_10: nāma natthi, tasmā dhanena palobhetvā pāradārikakammaṃ karissāmā”ti. “Sādhu, sādhū”ti
atk-s0502a:1288_0: Te tato paṭṭhāya abhirūpānaṃ itthīnaṃ dhanaṃ pesetvā vīsativassasahassāni pāradārikakammaṃ
atk-s0502a:1288_1: katvā kālaṃ katvā avīciniraye nibbattā. Te ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ niraye paccitvā tattha
atk-s0502a:1288_2: kālaṃ katvā pakkāvasesena saṭṭhiyojanikāya lohakumbhiyā nibbattitvā tiṃsāya vassasahassehi
atk-s0502a:1288_3: heṭṭhimatalaṃ patvā punapi tiṃsāya vassasahassehi lohakumbhimukhaṃ patvā ekekaṃ gāthaṃ
atk-s0502a:1288_4: vattukāmā hutvā vattuṃ asakkontā ekekaṃ akkharaṃ vatvā puna parivattitvā, lohakumbhimeva
atk-s0502a:1288_5: paviṭṭhā. “Vadehi, mahārāja, paṭhamaṃ te kiṃ saddo nāma suto”ti? “Du-iti, bhante”ti.
atk-s0502a:1288_6: Satthā tena aparipuṇṇaṃ katvā vuttaṃ gāthaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā dassento evamāha –
atk-s0502a:1291: Atha rañño imissā gāthāya atthaṃ pakāsetvā, “kiṃ te, mahārāja, dutiyasaddo tatiyasaddo catutthasaddo suto”ti pucchitvā “evaṃ nāmā”ti vutte avasesaṃ paripūrento –
atk-s0502a:1294: “Natthi anto kuto anto, na anto paṭidissati;
atk-s0502a:1295: Tadā hi pakataṃ pāpaṃ, mama tuyhañca mārisā.
atk-s0502a:1296: “Sohaṃ nūna ito gantvā, yoniṃ laddhāna mānusiṃ;
atk-s0502a:1298_0: Paṭipāṭiyā imā gāthā vatvā tāsaṃ atthaṃ pakāsetvā “iti kho, mahārāja, te cattāro
atk-s0502a:1298_1: janā ekekaṃ gāthaṃ vattukāmāpi vattuṃ asakkontā ekakameva akkharaṃ vatvā puna lohakumbhimeva paviṭṭhā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:1299_0: Raññā kira pasenadikosalena tassa saddassa sutakālato paṭṭhāya te heṭṭhā bhassanti
atk-s0502a:1299_1: eva, ajjāpi ekaṃ vassasahassaṃ nātikkamanti. Rañño taṃ desanaṃ sutvā mahāsaṃvego
atk-s0502a:1299_2: uppajji. So “bhāriyaṃ vatidaṃ pāradārikakammaṃ nāma, ekaṃ kira buddhantaraṃ niraye
atk-s0502a:1299_3: paccitvā tato cutā saṭṭhiyojanikāya lohakumbhiyā nibbattitvā tattha saṭṭhivassasahassāni
atk-s0502a:1299_4: paccitvā evampi nesaṃ dukkhā muccanakālo na paññāyati, ahampi paradāre sinehaṃ katvā
atk-s0502a:1299_5: sabbarattiṃ niddaṃ na labhiṃ, idāni ito paṭṭhāya paradāre mānasaṃ na bandhissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:1299_6: cintetvā tathāgataṃ āha – “bhante, ajja me rattiyā dīghabhāvo ñāto”ti. Sopi puriso
atk-s0502a:1299_7: tattheva nisinno taṃ kathaṃ sutvā “laddho me balavappaccayo”ti satthāraṃ āha – “bhante,
atk-s0502a:1299_8: raññā tāva ajja rattiyā dīghabhāvo ñāto, ahaṃ pana hiyyo sayameva yojanassa dīghabhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:1299_9: aññāsi”nti. Satthā dvinnampi kathaṃ saṃsanditvā “ekaccassa ratti dīghā hoti, ekaccassa
atk-s0502a:1299_10: yojanaṃ dīghaṃ hoti, bālassa pana saṃsāro dīgho hotī”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1303_0: Tattha dīghāti ratti nāmesā tiyāmamattāva, jāgarantassa pana dīghā hoti, dviguṇatiguṇā
atk-s0502a:1303_1: viya hutvā khāyati. Tassā dīghabhāvaṃ attānaṃ maṅkuṇasaṅghassa bhattaṃ katvā yāva
atk-s0502a:1303_2: sūriyuggamanā samparivattakaṃ semāno mahākusītopi, subhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā sirisayane
atk-s0502a:1303_3: sayamāno kāmabhogīpi na jānāti, sabbarattiṃ pana padhānaṃ padahanto yogāvacaro ca,
atk-s0502a:1303_4: dhammakathaṃ kathento dhammakathiko ca, āsanasamīpe ṭhatvā dhammaṃ suṇanto ca, sīsarogādiphuṭṭho
atk-s0502a:1303_5: vā hatthapādacchedanādiṃ patto vā vedanābhibhūto ca, rattiṃ maggapaṭipanno addhiko
atk-s0502a:1303_6: ca jānāti. Yojananti yojanampi catugāvutamattameva, santassa pana kilantassa dīghaṃ
atk-s0502a:1303_7: hoti, dviguṇatiguṇaṃ viya khāyati. Sakaladivasañhi maggaṃ gantvā kilanto paṭipathaṃ
atk-s0502a:1303_8: āgacchantaṃ disvā “purato gāmo kīvadūro”ti pucchitvā “yojana”nti vutte thokaṃ gantvā
atk-s0502a:1303_9: aparampi pucchitvā tenāpi “yojana”nti vutte puna thokaṃ gantvā aparampi pucchati.
atk-s0502a:1303_10: Sopi “yojana”nti vadati. So pucchitapucchitā yojananteva vadanti, dīghaṃ vatidaṃ
atk-s0502a:1303_11: yojanaṃ, ekayojanaṃ dve tīṇi yojanāni viya maññeti. Bālānanti idhalokaparalokatthaṃ
atk-s0502a:1303_12: pana ajānantānaṃ bālānaṃ saṃsāravaṭṭassa pariyantaṃ kātuṃ asakkontānaṃ yaṃ sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyabhedaṃ
atk-s0502a:1303_13: saddhammaṃ ñatvā saṃsārassa antaṃ karonti, taṃ saddhammaṃ avijānataṃ saṃsāro dīgho
atk-s0502a:1303_14: nāma hoti. So hi attano dhammatāya eva dīgho nāma. Vuttampi cetaṃ – “anamataggoyaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1303_15: bhikkhave, saṃsāro, pubbā koṭi na paññāyatī”ti. Bālānaṃ pana pariyantaṃ kātuṃ asakkontānaṃ atidīghoyevāti.
atk-s0502a:1304: Desanāvasāne so puriso sotāpattiphalaṃ patto, aññepi bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pattā. Mahājanassa sātthikā dhammadesanā jātāti.
atk-s0502a:1305_0: Rājā satthāraṃ vanditvā gacchantoyeva te satte bandhanā mocesi. Tattha itthipurisā
atk-s0502a:1305_1: bandhanā muttā sīsaṃ nhatvā sakāni gehāni gacchantā “ciraṃ jīvatu no, ayyā, mallikā
atk-s0502a:1305_2: devī, taṃ nissāya jīvitaṃ labhimhā”ti mallikāya guṇakathaṃ kathayiṃsu. Sāyanhasamaye
atk-s0502a:1305_3: bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ – “aho paṇḍitā vatāyaṃ, mallikā, attano
atk-s0502a:1305_4: paññaṃ nissāya ettakassa janassa jīvitadānaṃ adāsī”ti. Satthā gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnova
atk-s0502a:1305_5: tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kathaṃ sutvā gandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā dhammasabhaṃ pavisitvā paññatte
atk-s0502a:1305_6: āsane nisīditvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā
atk-s0502a:1305_7: “imāya nāmā”ti vutte, “na, bhikkhave, mallikā, idāneva attano paññaṃ nissāya mahājanassa
atk-s0502a:1305_8: jīvitadānaṃ deti, pubbepi adāsiyevā”ti vatvā tamatthaṃ pakāsanto atītaṃ āhari –
atk-s0502a:1306_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ rañño putto ekaṃ nigrodharukkhaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tattha nibbattāya
atk-s0502a:1306_1: devatāya āyāci – “sāmi devarāja, imasmiṃ jambudīpe ekasatarājāno ekasataaggamahesiyo,
atk-s0502a:1306_2: sacāhaṃ pitu accayena rajjaṃ labhissāmī, etesaṃ galalohitena baliṃ karissāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1306_3: So pitari kālakate rajjaṃ patvā “devatāya me ānubhāvena rajjaṃ pattaṃ, balimassā
atk-s0502a:1306_4: karissāmī”ti mahatiyā senāya nikkhamitvā ekaṃ rājānaṃ attano vase vattetvā tena saddhiṃ
atk-s0502a:1306_5: aparampi aparampīti sabbe rājāno attano vase katvā saddhiṃ aggamahesīhi ādāya gacchanto
atk-s0502a:1306_6: uggasenassa nāma sabbakaniṭṭhassa rañño dhammadinnā nāma aggamahesī garugabbhā, taṃ
atk-s0502a:1306_7: ohāya āgantvā “ettakajanaṃ visapānakaṃ pāyetvā māressāmī”ti rukkhamūlaṃ sodhāpesi.
atk-s0502a:1306_8: Devatā cintesi – “ayaṃ rājā ettake rājāno gaṇhanto ‘maṃ nissāya gahitā ime’ti cintetvā
atk-s0502a:1306_9: tesaṃ galalohitena mayhaṃ baliṃ kātukāmo, sace panāyaṃ ete ghātessati, jambudīpe
atk-s0502a:1306_10: rājavaṃso upacchijjissati, rukkhamūlepi, me asuci bhavissati, sakkhissāmi nu kho
atk-s0502a:1306_11: etaṃ nivāretu”nti. Sā upadhārentī “nāhaṃ sakkhissāmī”ti ñatvā aññampi devataṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0502a:1306_12: etamatthaṃ ārocetvā “tvaṃ sakkhissasī”ti āha. Tāyapi paṭikkhittā aññampi aññampīti
atk-s0502a:1306_13: evaṃ sakalacakkavāḷadevatāyo upasaṅkamitvā tāhipi paṭikkhittā catunnaṃ mahārājūnaṃ
atk-s0502a:1306_14: santikaṃ gantvā “mayaṃ na sakkoma, amhākaṃ pana rājā amhehi puññena ca paññāya ca
atk-s0502a:1306_15: visiṭṭho, taṃ pucchā”ti tehipi paṭikkhittakāle sakkaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tamatthaṃ ārocetvā,
atk-s0502a:1306_16: “deva, tumhesu appossukkataṃ āpannesu khattiyavaṃso upacchijjissati, tassa paṭisaraṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:1306_17: hothā”ti āha. Sakko “ahampi naṃ paṭibāhituṃ na sakkhissāmi, upāyaṃ pana te vakkhāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:1306_18: vatvā upāyaṃ ācikkhi – “gaccha, tvaṃ rañño passantasseva rattavatthaṃ nivāsetvā attano
atk-s0502a:1306_19: rukkhato nikkhamitvā gamanākāraṃ dassehi. Atha taṃ rājā ‘devatā gacchati, nivattāpessāmi
atk-s0502a:1306_20: na’nti nānappakārena yācissati. Atha naṃ vadeyyāsi ‘tvaṃ ekasatarājāno saddhiṃ aggamahesīhi
atk-s0502a:1306_21: ānetvā tesaṃ galalohitena baliṃ karissāmī’ti mayhaṃ āyācitvā uggasenassa rañño deviṃ
atk-s0502a:1306_22: ohāya āgato, nāhaṃ tādisassa musāvādassa baliṃ sampaṭicchāmī”ti, “evaṃ kira vutte
atk-s0502a:1306_23: rājā taṃ āṇāpessati, sā rañño dhammaṃ desetvā ettakassa janassa jīvitadānaṃ dassatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1306_24: Iminā kāraṇena sakko devatāya imaṃ upāyaṃ ācikkhi. Devatā tathā akāsi.
atk-s0502a:1307_0: Rājāpi taṃ āṇāpesi. Sā āgantvā tesaṃ rājūnaṃ pariyante nisinnampi attano rājānameva
atk-s0502a:1307_1: vandi. Rājā “mayi sabbarājajeṭṭhake ṭhite sabbakaniṭṭhaṃ attano sāmikaṃ vandatī”ti
atk-s0502a:1307_2: tassā kujjhi. Atha naṃ sā āha – “kiṃ mayhaṃ tayi paṭibaddhaṃ, ayaṃ pana me sāmiko
atk-s0502a:1307_3: issariyassa dāyako, imaṃ avanditvā kasmā taṃ vandissāmī”ti? Rukkhadevatā passantasseva
atk-s0502a:1307_4: mahājanassa “evaṃ, bhadde, evaṃ, bhadde”ti vatvā taṃ pupphamuṭṭhinā pūjesi. Puna
atk-s0502a:1307_5: rājā āha – “sace maṃ na vandasi, mayhaṃ rajjasiridāyikaṃ evaṃ mahānubhāvaṃ devataṃ
atk-s0502a:1307_6: kasmā na vandasī”ti? “Mahārāja, tayā attano puññe ṭhatvā rājāno gahitā, na devatāya
atk-s0502a:1307_7: gahetvā dinnā”ti. Punapi taṃ devatā “evaṃ, bhadde, evaṃ, bhadde”ti vatvā tatheva
atk-s0502a:1307_8: pūjesi. Puna sā rājānaṃ āha – “tvaṃ ‘devatāya me ettakā rājāno gahetvā dinnā’ti vadesi,
atk-s0502a:1307_9: idāni te devatāya upari vāmapasse rukkho agginā daḍḍho, sā taṃ aggiṃ nibbāpetuṃ kasmā
atk-s0502a:1307_10: nāsakkhi, yadi evaṃ mahānubhāvā”ti. Punapi taṃ devatā “evaṃ, bhadde, evaṃ, bhadde”ti
atk-s0502a:1308_0: Sā kathayamānā ṭhitā rodi ceva hasi ca. Atha naṃ rājā “kiṃ ummattikāsī”ti āha. “Kasmā
atk-s0502a:1308_1: deva evaṃ vadesi”? “Na mādisiyo ummattikā hontī”ti. Atha “naṃ kiṃ kāraṇā rodasi ceva
atk-s0502a:1308_2: hasasi cā”ti? “Suṇāhi, mahārāja, ahañhi atīte kuladhītā hutvā patikule vasantī sāmikassa
atk-s0502a:1308_3: sahāyakaṃ pāhunakaṃ āgataṃ disvā tassa bhattaṃ pacitukāmā ‘maṃsaṃ āharā’ti dāsiyā
atk-s0502a:1308_4: kahāpaṇaṃ datvā tāya maṃsaṃ alabhitvā āgatāya ‘natthi maṃsa’nti vutte gehassa pacchimabhāge
atk-s0502a:1308_5: sayitāya eḷikāya sīsaṃ chinditvā bhattaṃ sampādesiṃ. Sāhaṃ ekissāya eḷikāya sīsaṃ
atk-s0502a:1308_6: chinditvā niraye paccitvā pakkāvasesena tassā lomagaṇanāya sīsacchedaṃ pāpuṇiṃ, ‘tvaṃ
atk-s0502a:1308_7: ettakaṃ janaṃ vadhitvā kadā dukkhā muccissasī’ti evamahaṃ tava dukkhaṃ anussarantī
atk-s0502a:1310: Bahūnaṃ kaṇṭhe chetvāna, kathaṃ kāhasi khattiyā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1311_0: Atha “kasmā tvaṃ hasasī”ti? “‘Etasmā dukkhā muttāmhī’ti tussitvā, mahārājā”ti. Punapi
atk-s0502a:1311_1: taṃ devatā “evaṃ, bhadde, evaṃ, bhadde”ti vatvā pupphamuṭṭhinā pūjesi. Rājā “aho
atk-s0502a:1311_2: me bhāriyaṃ kataṃ kammaṃ, ayaṃ kira ekaṃ eḷikaṃ vadhitvā niraye pakkāvasesena tassā
atk-s0502a:1311_3: lomagaṇanāya sīsacchedaṃ pāpuṇi, ahaṃ ettakaṃ janaṃ vadhitvā kadā sotthiṃ pāpuṇissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:1311_4: sabbe rājāno mocetvā attano mahallakatare vanditvā daharadaharānaṃ añjaliṃ paggayha
atk-s0502a:1312_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “evaṃ, bhikkhave, na idāneva, mallikā devī, attano
atk-s0502a:1312_1: paññaṃ nissāya mahājanassa jīvitadānaṃ deti, pubbepi adāsiyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ samodhānesi
atk-s0502a:1312_2: – “tadā bārāṇasirājā pasenadi kosalo ahosi, dhammadinnā, devī mallikā, rukkhadevatā
atk-s0502a:1312_3: ahamevā”ti. Evaṃ atītaṃ samodhānetvā puna dhammaṃ desento, “bhikkhave, pāṇātipāto
atk-s0502a:1312_4: nāma na kattabbayuttako. Pāṇātipātino hi dīgharattaṃ socantī”ti vatvā imā gāthā āha –
atk-s0502a:1318: Na pāṇo pāṇinaṃ haññe, pāṇaghātī hi socatī”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:1321: Carañce nādhigaccheyyāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā sāvatthiyaṃ jetavane viharanto mahākassapattherassa saddhivihārikaṃ ārabbha kathesi. Desanā rājagahe samuṭṭhitā.
atk-s0502a:1322_0: Theraṃ kira rājagahaṃ nissāya pippaliguhāyaṃ vasantaṃ dve saddhivihārikā upaṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1322_1: Tesu eko sakkaccaṃ vattaṃ karoti, eko tena kataṃ kataṃ attanā kataṃ viya dassento
atk-s0502a:1322_3: paṭiyāditāni, mukhaṃ dhovathā”ti vadati, pādadhovananhānādikālepi evameva vadati.
atk-s0502a:1322_4: Itaro cintesi – “ayaṃ niccakālaṃ mayā kataṃ kataṃ attanā kataṃ viya katvā dasseti,
atk-s0502a:1322_5: hotu, kattabbayuttakamassa karissāmī”ti. Tassa bhuñjitvā supantasseva nhānodakaṃ
atk-s0502a:1322_6: tāpetvā ekasmiṃ ghaṭe katvā piṭṭhikoṭṭhake ṭhapesi, udakatāpanabhājane pana nāḷimattaṃ
atk-s0502a:1322_7: udakaṃ sesetvā usumaṃ muñcantaṃ ṭhapesi. Taṃ itaro sāyanhasamaye pabujjhitvā usumaṃ
atk-s0502a:1322_8: nikkhantaṃ disvā “udakaṃ tāpetvā koṭṭhake ṭhapitaṃ bhavissatī”ti vegena gantvā theraṃ
atk-s0502a:1322_9: vanditvā, “bhante, koṭṭhake udakaṃ ṭhapitaṃ, nhāyathā”ti vatvā therena saddhiṃyeva
atk-s0502a:1322_10: koṭṭhakaṃ pāvisi. Thero udakaṃ apassanto “kahaṃ udakaṃ, āvuso”ti āha. Daharo aggisālaṃ
atk-s0502a:1322_11: gantvā bhājane uḷuṅkaṃ otāretvā tucchabhāvaṃ ñatvā “passatha duṭṭhassa kammaṃ tucchabhājanaṃ
atk-s0502a:1322_12: uddhane āropetvā kuhiṃ gato, ahaṃ ‘koṭṭhake udaka’nti saññāya ārocesi”nti ujjhāyanto
atk-s0502a:1322_13: ghaṭaṃ ādāya titthaṃ agamāsi. Itaropi piṭṭhikoṭṭhakato udakaṃ āharitvā koṭṭhake ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a:1323_0: Thero cintesi – “ayaṃ daharo ‘udakaṃ me tāpetvā koṭṭhake ṭhapitaṃ, etha, bhante,
atk-s0502a:1323_1: nhāyathā’ti vatvā idāni ujjhāyanto ghaṭaṃ ādāya titthaṃ gacchati, kiṃ nu kho eta”nti
atk-s0502a:1323_2: upadhārento “ettakaṃ kālaṃ esa daharo iminā kataṃ vattaṃ attanāva kataṃ viya pakāsetī”ti
atk-s0502a:1323_3: ñatvā sāyaṃ āgantvā nisinnassa ovādamadāsi, “āvuso, bhikkhunā nāma ‘attanā katameva
atk-s0502a:1323_4: kata’nti vattuṃ vaṭṭati, no akataṃ, tvaṃ idāneva ‘koṭṭhake udakaṃ ṭhapitaṃ, nhāyatha,
atk-s0502a:1323_5: bhante’ti vatvā mayi pavisitvā ṭhite ghaṭaṃ ādāya ujjhāyanto gacchasi, pabbajitassa
atk-s0502a:1323_6: nāma evaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti. So “passatha therassa kammaṃ, udakamattakaṃ nāma nissāya
atk-s0502a:1323_7: maṃ evaṃ vadesī”ti kujjhitvā punadivase therena saddhiṃ piṇḍāya na pāvisi. Thero
atk-s0502a:1323_8: itarena saddhiṃ ekaṃ padesaṃ agamāsi. So tasmiṃ gate therassa upaṭṭhākakulaṃ gantvā
atk-s0502a:1323_9: “thero kahaṃ, bhante”ti puṭṭho “therassa aphāsukaṃ jātaṃ, vihāreyeva nisinno”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:1323_10: “Kiṃ pana, bhante, laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti? “Evarūpaṃ kira nāma āhāraṃ dethā”ti vutte
atk-s0502a:1323_11: tena vuttaniyāmeneva sampādetvā adaṃsu. So antarāmaggeva taṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā vihāraṃ
atk-s0502a:1323_12: gato. Theropi gataṭṭhāne mahantaṃ sukhumavatthaṃ labhitvā attanā saddhiṃ gatadaharassa
atk-s0502a:1323_13: adāsi. So taṃ rajitvā attano nivāsanapārupanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a:1324_0: Thero punadivase taṃ upaṭṭhākakulaṃ gantvā, “bhante, ‘tumhākaṃ kira aphāsukaṃ jāta’nti
atk-s0502a:1324_1: amhehi daharena vuttaniyāmeneva paṭiyādetvā āhāro pesito, paribhuñjitvā vo phāsukaṃ
atk-s0502a:1324_2: jāta”nti vutte tuṇhī ahosi. Vihāraṃ pana gantvā taṃ daharaṃ vanditvā nisinnaṃ evamāha
atk-s0502a:1324_3: – “āvuso, tayā kira hiyyo, idaṃ nāma kataṃ, idaṃ pabbajitānaṃ na anucchavikaṃ, viññattiṃ
atk-s0502a:1324_4: katvā bhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti. So kujjhitvā there āghātaṃ bandhitvā “purimadivase
atk-s0502a:1324_5: udakamattaṃ nissāya maṃ musāvādiṃ katvā ajja attano upaṭṭhākakule bhattamuṭṭhiyā
atk-s0502a:1324_6: bhuttakāraṇā maṃ ‘viññattiṃ katvā bhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭatī’ti vadati, vatthampi tena
atk-s0502a:1324_7: attano upaṭṭhākasseva dinnaṃ, aho therassa bhāriyaṃ kammaṃ, jānissāmissa kattabbayuttaka”nti
atk-s0502a:1324_8: punadivase there gāmaṃ pavisante sayaṃ vihāre ohīyitvā daṇḍaṃ gahetvā paribhogabhājanāni
atk-s0502a:1324_9: bhinditvā therassa paṇṇasālāya aggiṃ datvā yaṃ na jhāyati, taṃ muggarena paharanto
atk-s0502a:1324_10: bhinditvā nikkhamitvā palāto. So kālaṃ katvā avīcimahāniraye nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:1325_0: Mahājano kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi – “therassa kira saddhivihāriko ovādamattaṃ asahanto
atk-s0502a:1325_1: kujjhitvā paṇṇasālaṃ jhāpetvā palāto”ti. Atheko bhikkhu aparabhāge rājagahā nikkhamitvā
atk-s0502a:1325_2: satthāraṃ daṭṭhukāmo jetavanaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā satthārā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā
atk-s0502a:1325_3: “kuto āgatosī”ti puṭṭho “rājagahato, bhante”ti āha. “Mama puttassa mahākassapassa
atk-s0502a:1325_4: khamanīya”nti? “Khamanīyaṃ, bhante, eko pana saddhivihāriko ovādamattena kujjhitvā
atk-s0502a:1325_5: paṇṇasālaṃ jhāpetvā palāto”ti. Satthā “na so idāneva ovādaṃ sutvā kujjhati, pubbepi
atk-s0502a:1325_6: kujjhiyeva. Na idāneva kuṭiṃ dūseti, pubbepi dūsesiyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari –
atk-s0502a:1326_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente himavantapadese eko siṅgilasakuṇo kulāvakaṃ
atk-s0502a:1326_1: katvā vasi. Athekadivasaṃ deve vassante eko makkaṭo sītena kampamāno taṃ padesaṃ
atk-s0502a:1328: Atha kena nu vaṇṇena, agāraṃ te na vijjatī”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:1329: Makkaṭo “kiñcāpi me hatthapādā atthi, yāya pana paññāya vicāretvā agāraṃ kareyyaṃ, sā me paññā natthī”ti cintetvā tamatthaṃ viññāpetukāmo imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1331: Yāhu seṭṭhā manussesu, sā me paññā na vijjatī”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:1332: Atha naṃ “evarūpassa tava kathaṃ gharāvāso ijjhissatī”ti garahanto siṅgilo imaṃ gāthādvayamāha –
atk-s0502a:1337_0: Makkaṭo “ayaṃ maṃ anavaṭṭhitacittaṃ lahucittaṃ mittadubbhiṃ addhuvasīlaṃ karoti,
atk-s0502a:1337_1: idānissa mittadubbhibhāvaṃ dassessāmī”ti kulāvakaṃ viddhaṃsetvā vippakiri. Sakuṇo
atk-s0502a:1337_2: tasmiṃ kulāvakaṃ gaṇhante eva ekena passena nikkhamitvā palāyi.
atk-s0502a:1338_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā makkaṭo kuṭidūsakabhikkhu
atk-s0502a:1338_1: ahosi, siṅgilasakuṇo kassapo ahosī”ti. Jātakaṃ samodhānetvā “evaṃ, bhikkhave, na
atk-s0502a:1338_2: idāneva, pubbepi so ovādakkhaṇe kujjhitvā kuṭiṃ dūsesi, mama puttassa kassapassa
atk-s0502a:1338_3: evarūpena bālena saddhiṃ vasanato ekakasseva nivāso seyyo”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1341: Ekacariyaṃ daḷhaṃ kayirā, natthi bāle sahāyatā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1342_0: Tattha caranti iriyāpathacāraṃ aggahetvā manasācāro veditabbo, kalyāṇamittaṃ pariyesantoti
atk-s0502a:1342_1: attho. Seyyaṃ sadisamattanoti attano sīlasamādhipaññāguṇehi adhikataraṃ vā sadisaṃ
atk-s0502a:1342_2: vā na labheyya ce. Ekacariyanti etesu hi seyyaṃ labhamāno sīlādīhi vaḍḍhati, sadisaṃ
atk-s0502a:1342_3: labhamāno na parihāyati, hīnena pana saddhiṃ ekato vasanto ekato saṃbhogaparibhogaṃ
atk-s0502a:1342_4: karonto sīlādīhi parihāyati. Tena vuttaṃ – “evarūpo puggalo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo
atk-s0502a:1342_5: na payirupāsitabbo aññatra anuddayā aññatra anukampā”ti. Tasmā sace kāruññaṃ paṭicca
atk-s0502a:1342_6: “ayaṃ maṃ nissāya sīlādīhi vaḍḍhissatī”ti tamhā puggalā kiñci apaccāsīsanto taṃ saṅgaṇhituṃ
atk-s0502a:1342_7: sakkoti, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. No ce sakkoti, ekacariyaṃ daḷhaṃ kayirā ekībhāvameva thiraṃ
atk-s0502a:1342_8: katvā sabbairiyāpathesu ekakova vihareyya. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Natthi bāle sahāyatāti sahāyatā
atk-s0502a:1342_9: nāma cūḷasīlaṃ majjhimasīlaṃ mahāsīlaṃ dasa kathāvatthūni terasa dhutaṅgaguṇā vipassanāguṇā
atk-s0502a:1342_10: cattāro maggā cattāri phalāni tisso vijjā cha abhiññā. Ayaṃ sahāyatāguṇo bālaṃ nissāya natthīti.
atk-s0502a:1343: Desanāvasāne āgantuko bhikkhu sotāpattiphalaṃ patto, aññepi bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pāpuṇiṃsu, desanā mahājanassa sātthikā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:1346: Puttā matthīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā sāvatthiyaṃ viharanto ānandaseṭṭhiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1347_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira ānandaseṭṭhi nāma cattālīsakoṭivibhavo mahāmaccharī ahosi. So anvaḍḍhamāsaṃ
atk-s0502a:1347_1: ñātake sannipātetvā puttaṃ mūlasiriṃ nāma tīsu velāsu evaṃ ovadati – “idaṃ cattālīsakoṭidhanaṃ
atk-s0502a:1347_2: ‘bahū”’ti mā saññaṃ kari, vijjamānaṃ dhanaṃ na dātabbaṃ, navaṃ dhanaṃ uppādetabbaṃ.
atk-s0502a:1347_3: Ekekampi hi kahāpaṇaṃ vayaṃ karontassa pana khīyateva. Tasmā –
atk-s0502a:1350_0: So aparena samayena attano pañca mahānidhiyo puttassa anācikkhitvā dhananissito maccheramalamalino
atk-s0502a:1350_1: kālaṃ katvā tasseva nagarassa ekasmiṃ dvāragāmake caṇḍālānaṃ kulasahassaṃ paṭivasati.
atk-s0502a:1350_2: Tatthekissā caṇḍāliyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Rājā tassa kālakiriyaṃ sutvā
atk-s0502a:1350_3: puttamassa mūlasiriṃ pakkosāpetvā seṭṭhiṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. Tampi caṇḍālakulasahassaṃ
atk-s0502a:1350_4: ekatova bhatiyā kammaṃ katvā jīvamānaṃ tassa paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya neva bhatiṃ
atk-s0502a:1350_5: labhati, na yāpanamattato paraṃ bhattapiṇḍampi. Te “mayaṃ etarahi kammaṃ karontāpi
atk-s0502a:1350_6: piṇḍabhattampi na labhāma, amhākaṃ antare kāḷakaṇṇiyā bhavitabba”nti dve koṭṭhāsā
atk-s0502a:1350_7: hutvā yāva tassa mātāpitaro visuṃ honti, tāva vibhajitvā “imasmiṃ kule kāḷakaṇṇī
atk-s0502a:1351_0: Sāpi yāvassā so kucchigato, tāva yāpanamattampi kicchena labhitvā puttaṃ vijāyi.
atk-s0502a:1351_1: Tassa hatthā ca pādā ca akkhīni ca kaṇṇā ca nāsā ca mukhañca yathāṭhāne na ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:1351_2: So evarūpena aṅgavekallena samannāgato paṃsupisācako viya ativirūpo ahosi. Evaṃ santepi
atk-s0502a:1351_3: taṃ mātā na pariccaji. Kucchiyaṃ vasitaputtasmiñhi sineho balavā hoti. Sā taṃ kicchena
atk-s0502a:1351_4: posayamānā taṃ ādāya gatadivase kiñci alabhitvā gehe katvā sayameva gatadivase bhatiṃ
atk-s0502a:1351_5: labhati. Atha naṃ piṇḍāya caritvā jīvituṃ samatthakāle sā kapālakaṃ hatthe ṭhapetvā,
atk-s0502a:1351_6: “tāta, mayaṃ taṃ nissāya mahādukkhaṃ pattā, idāni na sakkomi taṃ posetuṃ, imasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:1351_7: nagare kapaṇaddhikādīnaṃ paṭiyattabhattāni atthi, tattha bhikkhāya caritvā jīvāhī”ti
atk-s0502a:1351_8: taṃ vissajjesi. So gharapaṭipāṭiyā caranto ānandaseṭṭhikāle nivuttaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā
atk-s0502a:1351_9: jātissaro hutvā attano gehaṃ pāvisi. Tīsu pana dvārakoṭṭhakesu na koci sallakkhesi.
atk-s0502a:1351_10: Catutthe dvārakoṭṭhake mūlasiriseṭṭhino puttakā disvā ubbiggahadayā parodiṃsu. Atha
atk-s0502a:1351_11: naṃ seṭṭhipurisā “nikkhama kāḷakaṇṇī”ti pothetvā nīharitvā saṅkāraṭṭhāne khipiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1351_12: Satthā ānandattherena pacchāsamaṇena piṇḍāya caranto taṃ ṭhānaṃ patto theraṃ oloketvā
atk-s0502a:1351_13: tena puṭṭho taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhi. Thero mūlasiriṃ pakkosāpesi. Atha mahājanakāyo
atk-s0502a:1351_14: sannipati. Satthā mūlasiriṃ āmantetvā “jānāsi eta”nti pucchitvā “na jānāmī”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a:1351_15: “pitā te ānandaseṭṭhī”ti vatvā asaddahantaṃ “ānandaseṭṭhi puttassa te pañca mahānidhiyo
atk-s0502a:1351_16: ācikkhāhī”ti ācikkhāpetvā saddahāpesi. So satthāraṃ saraṇaṃ agamāsi. Tassa dhammaṃ
atk-s0502a:1354: Attā hi attano natthi, kuto puttā kuto dhana”nti.
atk-s0502a:1355_0: Tassattho – puttā me atthi, dhanaṃ me atthi, iti bālo puttataṇhāya ceva dhanataṇhāya
atk-s0502a:1355_1: ca haññati vihaññati dukkhayati, “puttā me nassiṃsū”ti vihaññati, “nassantī”ti vihaññati,
atk-s0502a:1355_2: “nassissantī”ti vihaññati. Dhanepi eseva nayo. Iti chahākārehi vihaññati. “Putte
atk-s0502a:1355_3: posessāmī”ti rattiñca divā ca thalajalapathādīsu nānappakārato vāyamantopi vihaññati,
atk-s0502a:1355_4: “dhanaṃ uppādessāmī”ti kasivāṇijjādīni karontopi vihaññateva. Evaṃ vihaññassa ca
atk-s0502a:1355_5: attā hi attano natthi tena vighātena dukkhitaṃ attānaṃ sukhitaṃ kātuṃ asakkontassa
atk-s0502a:1355_6: pavattiyampissa attā hi attano natthi, maraṇamañce nipannassa māraṇantikāhi vedanāhi
atk-s0502a:1355_7: aggijālāhi viya pariḍayhamānassa chijjamānesu sandhibandhanesu, bhijjamānesu aṭṭhisaṅghāṭesu
atk-s0502a:1355_8: nimīletvā paralokaṃ ummīletvā idhalokaṃ passantassāpi divase divase dvikkhattuṃ nhāpetvā
atk-s0502a:1355_9: tikkhattuṃ bhojetvā gandhamālādīhi alaṅkaritvā yāvajīvaṃ positopi sahāyabhāvena dukkhaparittāṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:1355_10: kātuṃ asamatthatāya attā hi attano natthi. Kuto puttā kuto dhanaṃ puttā vā dhanaṃ
atk-s0502a:1355_11: vā tasmiṃ samaye kimeva karissanti, ānandaseṭṭhinopi kassaci kiñci adatvā puttassatthāya
atk-s0502a:1355_12: dhanaṃ saṇṭhapetvā pubbe vā maraṇamañce nipannassa, idāni vā imaṃ dukkhaṃ pattassa
atk-s0502a:1355_13: kuto puttā kuto dhanaṃ. Puttā vā dhanaṃ vā tasmiṃ samaye kiṃ dukkhaṃ hariṃsu, kiṃ
atk-s0502a:1356: Desanāvasāne caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Desanā mahājanassa sātthikā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:1359: Yo bāloti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto gaṇṭhibhedakacore ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1360_0: Te kira dve sahāyakā dhammassavanatthāya gacchantena mahājanena saddhiṃ jetavanaṃ
atk-s0502a:1360_1: gantvā eko dhammakathaṃ assosi, eko attano gayhūpagaṃ olokesi. Tesu eko dhammaṃ suṇamāno
atk-s0502a:1360_2: sotāpattiphalaṃ pāpuṇi, itaro ekassa dussante baddhaṃ pañcamāsakamattaṃ labhi. Tassa
atk-s0502a:1360_3: taṃ gehe pākabhattaṃ jātaṃ, itarassa gehe na paccati. Atha naṃ sahāyakacoro attano
atk-s0502a:1360_4: bhariyāya saddhiṃ uppaṇḍayamāno “tvaṃ atipaṇḍitatāya attano gehe pākabhattamūlampi
atk-s0502a:1360_5: na nipphādesī”ti āha. Itaro pana “bālabhāveneva vatāyaṃ attano paṇḍitabhāvaṃ maññatī”ti
atk-s0502a:1360_6: taṃ pavattiṃ satthu ārocetuṃ ñātīhi saddhiṃ jetavanaṃ gantvā ārocesi. Satthā tassa
atk-s0502a:1362: “Yo bālo maññati bālyaṃ, paṇḍito vāpi tena so;
atk-s0502a:1363: Bālo ca paṇḍitamānī, sa ve ‘bālo’ti vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1364_0: Tattha yo bāloti yo andhabālo apaṇḍito samāno “bālo aha”nti attano bālyaṃ bālabhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:1364_1: maññati jānāti. Tena soti tena kāraṇena so puggalo paṇḍito vāpi hoti paṇḍitasadiso
atk-s0502a:1364_2: vā. So hi “bālo aha”nti jānamāno aññaṃ paṇḍitaṃ upasaṅkamanto payirupāsanto tena
atk-s0502a:1364_3: paṇḍitabhāvatthāya ovadiyamāno anusāsiyamāno taṃ ovādaṃ gaṇhitvā paṇḍito vā hoti
atk-s0502a:1364_4: paṇḍitataro vā. Sa ve bāloti yo ca bālo samāno “ko añño mayā sadiso bahussuto vā
atk-s0502a:1364_5: dhammakathiko vā vinayadharo vā dhutaṅgadharo vā atthī”ti evaṃ paṇḍitamānī hoti.
atk-s0502a:1364_6: So aññaṃ paṇḍitaṃ anupasaṅkamanto apayirupāsanto neva pariyattiṃ uggaṇhāti, na paṭipattiṃ
atk-s0502a:1364_7: pūreti, ekantabālabhāvameva pāpuṇāti. So gaṇṭhibhedakacoro viya. Tena vuttaṃ “sa
atk-s0502a:1365: Desanāpariyosāne itarassa ñātakehi saddhiṃ mahājano sotāpattiphalādīni pāpuṇīti.
atk-s0502a:1368: Yāvajīvampi ce bāloti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto udāyittheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1369_0: So kira mahātheresu paṭikkantesu dhammasabhaṃ gantvā dhammāsane nisīdi. Atha naṃ
atk-s0502a:1369_1: ekadivasaṃ āgantukā bhikkhū disvā “ayaṃ bahussuto mahāthero bhavissatī”ti maññamānā
atk-s0502a:1369_2: khandhādipaṭisaṃyuttaṃ pañhaṃ pucchitvā kiñci ajānamānaṃ “ko eso, buddhehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0502a:1369_3: ekavihāre vasamāno khandhadhātuāyatanamattampi na jānātī”ti garahitvā taṃ pavattiṃ
atk-s0502a:1369_4: tathāgatassa ārocesuṃ. Satthā tesaṃ dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1372: Na so dhammaṃ vijānāti, dabbī sūparasaṃ yathā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1373_0: Tassattho – bālo nāmesa yāvajīvampi paṇḍitaṃ upasaṅkamanto payirupāsanto “idaṃ buddhavacanaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1373_1: ettakaṃ buddhavacana”nti evaṃ pariyattidhammaṃ vā “ayaṃ cāro, ayaṃ vihāro, ayaṃ ācāro,
atk-s0502a:1373_2: ayaṃ gocaro, idaṃ sāvajjaṃ, idaṃ anavajjaṃ, idaṃ sevitabbaṃ, idaṃ na sevitabbaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1373_3: idaṃ paṭivijjhitabbaṃ, idaṃ sacchikātabba”nti evaṃ paṭipattipaṭivedhadhammaṃ vā na
atk-s0502a:1373_4: jānāti. Yathā kiṃ? Dabbī sūparasaṃ yathāti. Yathā hi dabbī yāva parikkhayā nānappakārāya
atk-s0502a:1373_5: sūpavikatiyā samparivattamānāpi “idaṃ loṇikaṃ, idaṃ aloṇikaṃ, idaṃ tittakaṃ, idaṃ
atk-s0502a:1373_6: khārikaṃ, idaṃ kaṭukaṃ, idaṃ ambilaṃ, idaṃ anambilaṃ, idaṃ kasāva”nti sūparasaṃ na
atk-s0502a:1373_7: jānāti, evameva bālo yāvajīvampi paṇḍitaṃ payirupāsamāno vuttappakāraṃ dhammaṃ na jānātīti.
atk-s0502a:1374: Desanāvasāne āgantukā bhikkhū āsavehi cittāni vimucciṃsūti.
atk-s0502a:1377: Muhuttamapi ce viññūti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto tiṃsamatte pāveyyake bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1378_0: Tesañhi bhagavā itthiṃ pariyesantānaṃ kappāsikavanasaṇḍe paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0502a:1378_1: Tadā te sabbeva ehibhikkhubhāvaṃ patvā iddhimayapattacīvaradharā hutvā terasa dhutaṅgāni
atk-s0502a:1378_2: samādāya vattamānā punapi dīghassa addhuno accayena satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā anamataggadhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0502a:1378_3: sutvā tasmiṃyeva āsane arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Bhikkhū “aho vatimehi bhikkhūhi khippameva
atk-s0502a:1378_4: dhammo viññāto”ti dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ. Satthā taṃ sutvā “na, bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a:1378_5: idāneva, pubbepi ime tiṃsamattā sahāyakā dhuttā hutvā tuṇḍilajātake mahātuṇḍilassa
atk-s0502a:1378_6: dhammadesanaṃ sutvāpi khippameva dhammaṃ viññāya pañca sīlāni samādiyiṃsu, te teneva
atk-s0502a:1378_7: upanissayena etarahi nisinnāsaneyeva arahattaṃ pattā”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1381: Khippaṃ dhammaṃ vijānāti, jivhā sūparasaṃ yathā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1382_0: Tassattho – viññū paṇḍitapuriso muhuttamapi ce aññaṃ paṇḍitaṃ payirupāsati, so tassa
atk-s0502a:1382_1: santike uggaṇhanto paripucchanto khippameva pariyattidhammaṃ vijānāti. Tato kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1382_2: kathāpetvā paṭipattiyaṃ ghaṭento vāyamanto yathā nāma anupahatajivhāpasādo puriso
atk-s0502a:1382_3: rasavijānanatthaṃ jivhagge ṭhapetvā eva loṇikādibhedaṃ rasaṃ vijānāti, evaṃ paṇḍito
atk-s0502a:1386: Caranti bālā dummedhāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto suppabuddhakuṭṭhiṃ ārabbha kathesi. Suppabuddhakuṭṭhivatthu udāne āgatameva.
atk-s0502a:1387_0: Tadā hi suppabuddhakuṭṭhi parisapariyante nisinno bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā sotāpattiphalaṃ
atk-s0502a:1387_1: patvā attanā paṭiladdhaguṇaṃ satthu ārocetukāmo parisamajjhe ogāhituṃ avisahanto
atk-s0502a:1387_2: mahājanassa satthāraṃ vanditvā anugantvā nivattanakāle vihāraṃ agamāsi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe
atk-s0502a:1387_3: sakko devarājā “ayaṃ suppabuddhakuṭṭhi attano satthu sāsane paṭiladdhaguṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ
atk-s0502a:1387_4: kātukāmo”ti ñatvā “vīmaṃsissāmi na”nti gantvā ākāse ṭhitova etadavoca – “suppabuddha,
atk-s0502a:1387_5: tvaṃ manussadaliddo manussavarāko, ahaṃ te apariyantaṃ dhanaṃ dassāmi, ‘buddho na
atk-s0502a:1387_6: buddho, dhammo na dhammo, saṅgho na saṅgho, alaṃ me buddhena, alaṃ me dhammena, alaṃ
atk-s0502a:1387_7: me saṅghenā’ti vadehī”ti. Atha naṃ so āha – “kosi tva”nti? “Ahaṃ sakko”ti. Andhabāla,
atk-s0502a:1387_8: ahirika tvaṃ mayā saddhiṃ kathetuṃ na yuttarūpo, tvaṃ maṃ “duggato daliddo kapaṇo”ti
atk-s0502a:1387_9: vadesi, nevāhaṃ duggato, na daliddo, sukhappatto ahamasmi mahaddhano –
atk-s0502a:1389: Sutadhanañca cāgo ca, paññā ve sattamaṃ dhanaṃ.
atk-s0502a:1390: “Yassa ete dhanā atthi, itthiyā purisassa vā;
atk-s0502a:1392_0: Imāni me sattavidhaariyadhanāni santi, yesañhi imāni satta dhanāni santi, na te buddhehi
atk-s0502a:1392_1: vā paccekabuddhehi vā “daliddā”ti vuccantīti. Sakko tassa kathaṃ sutvā taṃ antarāmagge
atk-s0502a:1392_2: ohāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā sabbaṃ taṃ vacanapaṭivacanaṃ ārocesi. Atha naṃ bhagavā
atk-s0502a:1392_3: āha – “na kho, sakka, sakkā tādisānaṃ satenapi sahassenapi suppabuddhakuṭṭhiṃ ‘buddho
atk-s0502a:1392_4: na buddho’ti vā, ‘dhammo na dhammo’ti vā, ‘saṅgho na saṅgho’ti vā kathāpetu”nti.
atk-s0502a:1392_5: Suppabuddhopi kho kuṭṭhi satthu santikaṃ gantvā satthārā katapaṭisanthāro sammodamāno
atk-s0502a:1392_6: attanā paṭiladdhaguṇaṃ ārocetvā vuṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi. Atha naṃ acirapakkantaṃ gāvī
atk-s0502a:1393_0: Sā kira ekā yakkhinī pukkusātikulaputtaṃ, bāhiyaṃ dārucīriyaṃ, tambadāṭhikacoraghātakaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1393_1: suppabuddhakuṭṭhinti imesaṃ catunnaṃ janānaṃ anekasate attabhāve gāvī hutvā jīvitā
atk-s0502a:1393_2: voropesi. Te kira atīte cattāro seṭṭhiputtā hutvā ekaṃ nagarasobhiniṃ gaṇikaṃ uyyānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1393_3: netvā divasaṃ sampattiṃ anubhavitvā sāyanhasamaye evaṃ sammantayiṃsu – “imasmiṃ ṭhāne
atk-s0502a:1393_4: añño natthi, imissā amhehi dinnaṃ kahāpaṇasahassañca sabbañca pasādhanabhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0502a:1393_5: imaṃ māretvā gacchāmā”ti. Sā tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā “ime nillajjā, mayā saddhiṃ abhiramitvā
atk-s0502a:1393_6: idāni maṃ māretukāmā, jānissāmi nesaṃ kattabbayuttaka”nti tehi māriyamānā “ahaṃ yakkhinī
atk-s0502a:1393_7: hutvā yathā maṃ ete mārenti, evameva te māretuṃ samatthā bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a:1393_8: Tassa nissandena ime māresi. Sambahulā bhikkhū tassa kālakiriyaṃ bhagavato ārocetvā
atk-s0502a:1393_9: “tassa kā gati, kena ca kāraṇena kuṭṭhibhāvaṃ patto”ti pucchiṃsu. Satthā sotāpattiphalaṃ
atk-s0502a:1393_10: patvā tassa tāvatiṃsabhavane uppannabhāvañca tagarasikhipaccekabuddhaṃ disvā niṭṭhubhitvā
atk-s0502a:1393_11: apasabyaṃ katvā dīgharattaṃ niraye paccitvā vipākāvasesena idāni kuṭṭhibhāvappattiñca
atk-s0502a:1393_12: byākaritvā, “bhikkhave, ime sattā attanāva attano kaṭukavipākakammaṃ karontā vicarantī”ti
atk-s0502a:1393_13: vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā uttari dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1396: Karontā pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, yaṃ hoti kaṭukapphala”nti.
atk-s0502a:1397_0: Tattha carantīti catūhi iriyāpathehi akusalameva karontā vicaranti. Bālāti idhalokatthañca
atk-s0502a:1397_1: paralokatthañca ajānantā idha bālā nāma. Dummedhāti duppaññā. Amitteneva attanāti
atk-s0502a:1397_2: attanā amittabhūtena viya verinā hutvā. Kaṭukapphalanti tikhiṇaphalaṃ dukkhaphalanti.
atk-s0502a:1401: Na taṃ kammaṃ kataṃ sādhūti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ kassakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1402_0: So kira sāvatthito avidūre ekaṃ khettaṃ kasati. Corā udakaniddhamanena nagaraṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0502a:1402_1: ekasmiṃ aḍḍhakule umaṅgaṃ bhinditvā bahuṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ gahetvā udakaniddhamaneneva
atk-s0502a:1402_2: nikkhamiṃsu. Eko coro te vañcetvā ekaṃ sahassatthavikaṃ ovaṭṭikāya katvā taṃ khettaṃ
atk-s0502a:1402_3: gantvā tehi saddhiṃ bhaṇḍaṃ bhājetvā ādāya gacchanto ovaṭṭikato patamānaṃ sahassatthavikaṃ
atk-s0502a:1402_4: na sallakkhesi. Taṃ divasaṃ satthā paccūsasamaye lokaṃ volokento taṃ kassakaṃ attano
atk-s0502a:1402_5: ñāṇajālassa antopaviṭṭhaṃ disvā “kiṃ nu kho bhavissatī”ti upadhārayamāno idaṃ addasa
atk-s0502a:1402_6: – “ayaṃ kassako pātova kasituṃ gamissati, bhaṇḍasāmikā corānaṃ anupadaṃ gantvā ovaṭṭikato
atk-s0502a:1402_7: patamānaṃ sahassatthavikaṃ disvā etaṃ gaṇhissanti, maṃ ṭhapetvā tassa añño sakkhī
atk-s0502a:1402_8: nāma na bhavissati, sotāpattimaggassa upanissayopissa atthi, tattha mayā gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1402_9: Sopi kassako pātova kasituṃ gato. Satthā ānandattherena pacchāsamaṇena tattha agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:1402_10: Kassako satthāraṃ disvā gantvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā puna kasituṃ ārabhi. Satthā tena
atk-s0502a:1402_11: saddhiṃ kiñci avatvāva sahassatthavikāya patitaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā taṃ disvā ānandattheraṃ
atk-s0502a:1403_0: Kassako taṃ kathaṃ sutvā “mama velāya vā avelāya vā vicaraṇaṭṭhānametaṃ, āsīviso
atk-s0502a:1403_1: kirettha atthī”ti cintetvā satthari ettakaṃ vatvā pakkante “māressāmi na”nti patodalaṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0502a:1403_2: ādāya gato sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ disvā “imaṃ sandhāya satthārā kathitaṃ bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0502a:1403_3: taṃ ādāya nivatto, abyattatāya ekamante ṭhapetvā paṃsunā paṭicchādetvā puna kasituṃ
atk-s0502a:1403_4: ārabhi. Manussā ca vibhātāya rattiyā gehe corehi katakammaṃ disvā padānupadaṃ gacchantā
atk-s0502a:1403_5: taṃ khettaṃ gantvā tattha corehi bhaṇḍassa bhājitaṭṭhānaṃ disvā kassakassa padavalañjaṃ
atk-s0502a:1403_6: addasaṃsu. Te tassa padānusārena gantvā thavikāya ṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ disvā paṃsuṃ viyūhitvā
atk-s0502a:1403_7: thavikaṃ ādāya “tvaṃ gehaṃ vilumpitvā khettaṃ kasamāno viya vicarasī”ti tajjetvā
atk-s0502a:1403_8: pothetvā netvā rañño dassayiṃsu. Rājā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā tassa vadhaṃ āṇāpesi. Rājapurisā
atk-s0502a:1403_9: taṃ pacchābāhaṃ bandhitvā kasāhi tāḷentā āghātanaṃ nayiṃsu. So kasāhi tāḷiyamāno
atk-s0502a:1403_10: aññaṃ kiñci avatvā “passānanda, āsīvisoti, passāmi bhagavā ghoraviso”ti vadanto gacchati.
atk-s0502a:1403_11: Atha naṃ rājapurisā “tvaṃ satthu ceva ānandattherassa ca kathaṃ kathesi, kiṃ nāmeta”nti
atk-s0502a:1403_12: pucchitvā – “rājānaṃ daṭṭhuṃ labhamāno kathessāmī”ti vutte rañño santikaṃ netvā rañño
atk-s0502a:1403_13: taṃ pavattiṃ kathayiṃsu. Atha naṃ rājā “kasmā evaṃ kathesī”ti pucchi. So “nāhaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1403_14: deva, coro”ti vatvā kasanatthāya nikkhantakālato paṭṭhāya sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ rañño
atk-s0502a:1403_15: ācikkhi. Rājā tassa kathaṃ sutvā “ayaṃ bhaṇe loke aggapuggalaṃ satthāraṃ sakkhiṃ
atk-s0502a:1403_16: apadisati, na yuttaṃ etassa dosaṃ āropetuṃ, ahamettha kattabbaṃ jānissāmī”ti taṃ
atk-s0502a:1403_17: ādāya sāyanhasamaye satthu santikaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ pucchi – “bhagavā kacci tumhe
atk-s0502a:1403_18: ānandattherena saddhiṃ etassa kassakassa kasanaṭṭhānaṃ gatā”ti? “Āma, mahārājā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1403_19: “Kiṃ vo tattha diṭṭha”nti? “Sahassatthavikā, mahārājā”ti. “Disvā kiṃ avocutthā”ti?
atk-s0502a:1403_20: “Idaṃ nāma, mahārājā”ti. “Bhante, sacāyaṃ puriso tumhādisaṃ apadisaṃ nākarissa, na
atk-s0502a:1403_21: jīvitaṃ alabhissa, tumhehi pana kathitakathaṃ kathetvā tena jīvitaṃ laddha”nti. Taṃ
atk-s0502a:1403_22: sutvā satthā “āma, mahārāja, ahampi ettakameva vatvā gato, paṇḍitena nāma yaṃ kammaṃ
atk-s0502a:1403_23: katvā pacchānutappaṃ hoti, taṃ na kattabba”nti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ
atk-s0502a:1405: “Na taṃ kammaṃ kataṃ sādhu, yaṃ katvā anutappati;
atk-s0502a:1407_0: Tattha na taṃ kammanti yaṃ nirayādīsu nibbattanasamatthaṃ dukkhudrayaṃ kammaṃ katvā
atk-s0502a:1407_1: anussaranto anussaritānussaritakkhaṇe anutappati anusocati, taṃ kataṃ na sādhu na
atk-s0502a:1407_2: sundaraṃ niratthakaṃ. Yassa assumukhoti yassa assūhi tintamukho rodanto vipākaṃ anubhotīti.
atk-s0502a:1408: Desanāvasāne kassako upāsako sotāpattiphalaṃ patto, sampattabhikkhūpi sotāpattiphalādīni pāpuṇiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a:1411: Tañca kammaṃ kataṃ sādhūti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto sumanaṃ nāma mālākāraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1412_0: So kira devasikaṃ bimbisārarājānaṃ pātova aṭṭhahi sumanapupphanāḷīhi upaṭṭhahanto
atk-s0502a:1412_1: aṭṭha kahāpaṇe labhati. Athekadivasaṃ tasmiṃ pupphāni gahetvā nagaraṃ paviṭṭhamatte
atk-s0502a:1412_2: bhagavā mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivuto chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo vissajjetvā mahatā buddhānubhāvena
atk-s0502a:1412_3: mahatiyā buddhalīḷāya nagaraṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi. Bhagavā hi ekadā chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo cīvarena
atk-s0502a:1412_4: paṭicchādetvā aññataro piṇḍapātiko viya carati tiṃsayojanamaggaṃ aṅgulimālassa paccuggamanaṃ
atk-s0502a:1412_5: gacchanto viya, ekadā chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo vissajjetvā kapilavatthuppavesanādīsu viya.
atk-s0502a:1412_6: Tasmimpi divase sarīrato chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo vissajjento mahantena buddhānubhāvena mahatiyā
atk-s0502a:1412_7: buddhalīḷāya rājagahaṃ pāvisi. Mālākāro bhagavato ratanagghiyasadisaṃ attabhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:1412_9: “kiṃ nu kho satthu adhikāraṃ karomī”ti cintetvā aññaṃ apassanto “imehi pupphehi bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0502a:1412_10: pūjessāmī”ti cintetvā puna cintesi – “imāni rañño nibaddhaṃ upaṭṭhānapupphāni, rājā
atk-s0502a:1412_11: imāni alabhanto maṃ bandhāpeyya vā ghātāpeyya vā raṭṭhato vā pabbājeyya, kiṃ nu kho
atk-s0502a:1412_12: karomī”ti? Athassa etadahosi “rājā maṃ ghātetu vā bandhāpetu vā raṭṭhato pabbājetu
atk-s0502a:1412_13: vā, so hi mayhaṃ dadamānopi imasmiṃ attabhāve jīvitamattaṃ dhanaṃ dadeyya, satthupūjā
atk-s0502a:1412_14: pana me anekāsu kappakoṭīsu alaṃ hitāya ceva sukhāya cā”ti attano jīvitaṃ tathāgatassa pariccaji.
atk-s0502a:1413_0: So “yāva me pasannaṃ cittaṃ na patikuṭati, taṃ tāvadeva pūjaṃ karissāmī”ti haṭṭhatuṭṭho
atk-s0502a:1413_1: udaggudaggo satthāraṃ pūjesi. Kathaṃ? Paṭhamaṃ tāva dveva pupphamuṭṭhiyo tathāgatassa
atk-s0502a:1413_2: upari khipi, tā uparimatthake vitānaṃ hutvā aṭṭhaṃsu. Aparā dve muṭṭhiyo khipi, tā
atk-s0502a:1413_3: dakkhiṇahatthapassena mālāpaṭacchannena otaritvā aṭṭhaṃsu. Aparā dve muṭṭhiyo khipi,
atk-s0502a:1413_4: tā piṭṭhipassena otaritvā tatheva aṭṭhaṃsu. Aparā dve muṭṭhiyo khipi, tā vāmahatthapassena
atk-s0502a:1413_5: otaritvā tatheva aṭṭhaṃsu. Evaṃ aṭṭha nāḷiyo aṭṭha muṭṭhiyo hutvā catūsu ṭhānesu
atk-s0502a:1413_6: tathāgataṃ parikkhipiṃsu. Purato gamanadvāramattameva ahosi. Pupphānaṃ vaṇṭāni anto
atk-s0502a:1413_7: ahesuṃ, pattāni bahimukhāni. Bhagavā rajatapattaparikkhitto viya hutvā pāyāsi. Pupphāni
atk-s0502a:1413_8: acittakānipi sacittakaṃ nissāya sacittakāni viya abhijjitvā apatitvā satthārā saddhiṃyeva
atk-s0502a:1413_9: gacchanti, ṭhitaṭhitaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhanti. Satthu sarīrato satasahassavijjulatā viya
atk-s0502a:1413_10: raṃsiyo nikkhamiṃsu. Purato ca pacchato ca dakkhiṇato ca vāmato ca sīsamatthakato
atk-s0502a:1413_11: ca nirantaraṃ nikkhantaraṃsīsu ekāpi sammukhasammukhaṭṭhāneneva apalāyitvā sabbāpi
atk-s0502a:1413_12: satthāraṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā taruṇatālakkhandhappamāṇā hutvā purato eva
atk-s0502a:1413_13: dhāvanti. Sakalanagaraṃ saṅkhubhi. Antonagare nava koṭiyo, bahinagare nava koṭiyoti
atk-s0502a:1413_14: aṭṭhārasasu koṭīsu ekopi puriso vā itthī vā bhikkhaṃ gahetvā anikkhanto nāma natthi.
atk-s0502a:1413_15: Mahājano sīhanādaṃ nadanto celukkhepasahassāni karonto satthu puratova gacchati.
atk-s0502a:1413_16: Satthāpi mālākārassa guṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ tigāvutappamāṇe nagare bhericaraṇamaggeneva
atk-s0502a:1413_17: acari. Mālākārassa sakalasarīraṃ pañcavaṇṇāya pītiyā paripūri.
atk-s0502a:1414_0: So thokaññeva tathāgatena saddhiṃ caritvā manosilārase nimuggo viya buddharasmīnaṃ
atk-s0502a:1414_1: anto paviṭṭho satthāraṃ thometvā vanditvā tucchapacchimeva gahetvā gehaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:1414_2: Atha naṃ bhariyā pucchi “kahaṃ pupphānī”ti? “Satthā me pūjito”ti. “Rañño dāni kiṃ
atk-s0502a:1414_3: karissasī”ti? “Rājā maṃ ghātetu vā raṭṭhato vā nīharatu, ahaṃ jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā
atk-s0502a:1414_4: satthāraṃ pūjesiṃ, sabbapupphāni aṭṭha muṭṭhiyova ahesuṃ, evarūpā nāma pūjā jātā.
atk-s0502a:1414_5: Mahājano ukkuṭṭhisahassāni karonto satthārā saddhiṃ carati, yo esa mahājanassa ukkuṭṭhisaddo,
atk-s0502a:1414_6: tasmiṃ ṭhāne eso”ti. Athassa bhariyā andhabālatāya evarūpe pāṭihāriye pasādaṃ nāma
atk-s0502a:1414_7: ajanetvā taṃ akkositvā paribhāsitvā “rājāno nāma caṇḍā, sakiṃ kuddhā hatthapādādicchedanena
atk-s0502a:1414_8: bahumpi anatthaṃ karonti, tayā katakammena mayhampi anattho siyā”ti putte ādāya rājakulaṃ
atk-s0502a:1414_9: gantvā raññā pakkositvā “kiṃ eta”nti pucchitā āha – “mama sāmiko tumhākaṃ upaṭṭhānapupphehi
atk-s0502a:1414_10: satthāraṃ pūjetvā tucchahattho gharaṃ āgantvā ‘kahaṃ pupphānī’ti mayā puṭṭho idaṃ
atk-s0502a:1414_11: nāma vadesi, ahaṃ taṃ paribhāsitvā ‘rājāno nāma caṇḍā, sakiṃ kuddhā hatthapādādicchedanena
atk-s0502a:1414_12: bahumpi anatthaṃ karonti, tayā katakammena mayhampi anattho siyā’ti taṃ chaḍḍetvā
atk-s0502a:1414_13: idhāgatā, tena kataṃ kammaṃ sukataṃ vā hotu, dukkaṭaṃ vā, tassevetaṃ, mayā tassa
atk-s0502a:1414_14: chaḍḍitabhāvaṃ jānāhi, devā”ti. Rājā paṭhamadassaneneva sotāpattiphalaṃ patto saddho
atk-s0502a:1414_15: pasanno ariyasāvako cintesi – “aho ayaṃ itthī andhabālā, evarūpe guṇe pasādaṃ na
atk-s0502a:1414_16: uppādesī”ti. So kuddho viya hutvā, “amma, kiṃ vadesi, mayhaṃ upaṭṭhānapupphehi tena
atk-s0502a:1414_17: pūjā katā”ti? “Āma, devā”ti. “Bhaddakaṃ te kataṃ taṃ chaḍḍentiyā, mama pupphehi pūjākārassa
atk-s0502a:1414_18: ahaṃ kattabbayuttakaṃ jānissāmī”ti taṃ uyyojetvā vegena satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā
atk-s0502a:1415_0: Satthā rañño cittappasādaṃ ñatvā bhericaraṇavīthiyā nagaraṃ caritvā rañño gharadvāraṃ
atk-s0502a:1415_1: agamāsi. Rājā pattaṃ gahetvā satthāraṃ gehaṃ pavesetukāmo ahosi. Satthā pana rājaṅgaṇeyeva
atk-s0502a:1415_2: nisīdanākāraṃ dassesi. Rājā taṃ ñatvā “sīghaṃ maṇḍapaṃ karothā”ti taṅkhaṇaññeva maṇḍapaṃ
atk-s0502a:1415_3: kārāpesi. Nisīdi satthā saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena. Kasmā pana satthā rājagehaṃ na pāvisi?
atk-s0502a:1416_0: Evaṃ kirassa ahosi – “sacāhaṃ anto pavisitvā nisīdeyyaṃ, mahājano maṃ daṭṭhuṃ na
atk-s0502a:1416_1: labheyya, mālākārassa guṇo pākaṭo na bhaveyya, rājaṅgaṇe pana maṃ nisinnaṃ mahājano
atk-s0502a:1416_2: daṭṭhuṃ labhissati, mālākārassa guṇo pākaṭo bhavissatī”ti. Guṇavantānañhi guṇaṃ buddhā
atk-s0502a:1416_3: eva pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ sakkonti, avasesajano guṇavantānaṃ guṇaṃ kathento maccharāyati.
atk-s0502a:1416_4: Cattāro pupphapaṭā catuddisaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu. Mahājano satthāraṃ parivāresi. Rājā buddhappamukhaṃ
atk-s0502a:1416_5: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ paṇītenāhārena parivisi. Satthā bhattakiccāvasāne anumodanaṃ katvā
atk-s0502a:1416_6: purimanayeneva catūhi pupphapaṭehi parikkhitto sīhanādaṃ nadanto mahājanena parivuto
atk-s0502a:1416_7: vihāraṃ agamāsi. Rājā satthāraṃ anugantvā nivatto mālākāraṃ pakkosāpetvā “mama āharitapupphehi
atk-s0502a:1416_8: kinti katvā satthāraṃ pūjesī”ti pucchi. Mālākāro “rājā maṃ ghātetu vā raṭṭhato vā
atk-s0502a:1416_9: pabbājetūti jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā pūjesiṃ devā”ti āha. Rājā “tvaṃ mahāpuriso nāmā”ti
atk-s0502a:1416_10: vatvā aṭṭha hatthī ca asse ca dāse ca dāsiyo ca mahāpasādhanāni ca aṭṭha kahāpaṇasahassāni
atk-s0502a:1416_11: ca rājakulato nīharitvā sabbālaṅkārappaṭimaṇḍitā aṭṭha nāriyo ca aṭṭha gāmavare cāti
atk-s0502a:1417_0: Ānandatthero cintesi – “ajja pātova paṭṭhāya sīhanādasahassāni ceva celukkhepasahassāni
atk-s0502a:1417_1: ca pavattanti, ko nu kho mālākārassa vipāko”ti? So satthāraṃ pucchi. Atha naṃ satthā
atk-s0502a:1417_2: āha – “ānanda, iminā mālākārena appamattakaṃ kammaṃ kata”nti mā sallakkhesi, ayañhi
atk-s0502a:1417_3: mayhaṃ jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā pūjaṃ akāsi. So evaṃ mayi cittaṃ pasādetvā –
atk-s0502a:1421_0: Āha. Satthu pana vihāraṃ gantvā gandhakuṭipavisanakāle tāni pupphāni dvārakoṭṭhake
atk-s0502a:1421_1: patiṃsu. Sāyanhasamaye bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ – “aho acchariyaṃ
atk-s0502a:1421_2: mālākārassa kammaṃ, dharamānakabuddhassa jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā pupphapūjaṃ katvā taṅkhaṇaññeva
atk-s0502a:1421_3: sabbaṭṭhakaṃ nāma labhatī”ti. Satthā gandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā tiṇṇaṃ gamanānaṃ aññatarena
atk-s0502a:1421_4: gamanena dhammasabhaṃ gantvā buddhāsane nisīditvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi
atk-s0502a:1421_5: kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte, “āma, bhikkhave, yassa kammassa
atk-s0502a:1421_6: katattā pacchānutappaṃ na hoti, anussaritānussaritakkhaṇe somanassameva uppajjati,
atk-s0502a:1421_7: evarūpaṃ kammaṃ kattabbamevā”ti anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1423: “Tañca kammaṃ kataṃ sādhu, yaṃ katvā nānutappati;
atk-s0502a:1425_0: Tattha yaṃ katvāti yaṃ devamanussasampattīnañceva nibbānasampattiyā ca nibbattanasamatthaṃ
atk-s0502a:1425_1: sukhudrayaṃ kammaṃ katvā nānutappati, atha kho diṭṭhadhammeyeva anussaritānussaritakkhaṇeyeva
atk-s0502a:1425_2: pītivegena patīto somanassavegena ca sumano hutvā āyatiṃ pītisomanassajāto hutvā
atk-s0502a:1425_3: vipākaṃ paṭisevati, taṃ kammaṃ kataṃ sādhu bhaddakanti.
atk-s0502a:1429: Madhuvā maññatīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto uppalavaṇṇattheriṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1430_0: Sā kira padumuttarabuddhassa pādamūle patthanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā kappasatasahassaṃ puññāni
atk-s0502a:1430_1: kurumānā devesu ca manussesu ca saṃsarantī imasmiṃ buddhuppāde devalokato cavitvā
atk-s0502a:1430_2: sāvatthiyaṃ seṭṭhikule paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Nīluppalagabbhasamānavaṇṇatāya cassā uppalavaṇṇātveva
atk-s0502a:1430_3: nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Athassā vayappattakāle sakalajambudīpe rājāno ca seṭṭhino ca seṭṭhissa
atk-s0502a:1430_4: santikaṃ sāsanaṃ pahiṇiṃsu – “dhītaraṃ amhākaṃ detū”ti. Apahiṇanto nāma nāhosi. Tato
atk-s0502a:1430_5: seṭṭhi cintesi – “ahaṃ sabbesaṃ manaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkhissāmi, upāyaṃ panekaṃ karissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:1430_6: dhītaraṃ pakkosāpetvā, “amma, pabbajituṃ sakkhissasī”ti āha. Tassā pacchimabhavikattā
atk-s0502a:1430_7: taṃ vacanaṃ sīse āsittaṃ satapākatelaṃ viya ahosi. Tasmā pitaraṃ “pabbajissāmi, tātā”ti
atk-s0502a:1430_8: āha. So tassā mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ katvā bhikkhunīupassayaṃ netvā pabbājesi. Tassā acirapabbajitāya
atk-s0502a:1430_9: eva uposathāgāre kālavāro pāpuṇi. Sā dīpaṃ jāletvā uposathāgāraṃ sammajjitvā dīpasikhāya
atk-s0502a:1430_10: nimittaṃ gaṇhitvā ṭhitāva punappunaṃ olokayamānā tejokasiṇārammaṇaṃ jhānaṃ nibbattetvā
atk-s0502a:1430_11: tameva pādakaṃ katvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi saddhiṃ paṭisambhidāhi ceva abhiññāhi ca.
atk-s0502a:1431_0: Sā aparena samayena janapadacārikaṃ caritvā paccāgantvā andhavanaṃ pāvisi. Tadā bhikkhunīnaṃ
atk-s0502a:1431_1: araññavāso appaṭikkhitto hoti. Athassā tattha kuṭikaṃ katvā mañcakaṃ paññāpetvā sāṇiyā
atk-s0502a:1431_2: parikkhipiṃsu. Sā sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya pavisitvā nikkhami. Mātulaputto panassā nandamāṇavo
atk-s0502a:1431_3: nāma gihikālato paṭṭhāya paṭibaddhacitto. So tassā āgatabhāvaṃ sutvā theriyā āgamanato
atk-s0502a:1431_4: puretarameva andhavanaṃ gantvā taṃ kuṭikaṃ pavisitvā heṭṭhāmañcake nilīno theriyā
atk-s0502a:1431_5: āgantvā kuṭikaṃ pavisitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya mañcake nisinnamattāya bahi ātapato āgatattā
atk-s0502a:1431_6: cakkhupathe andhakāre avigateyeva heṭṭhāmañcakato nikkhamitvā mañcakaṃ abhiruyha
atk-s0502a:1431_7: “mā nassi bāla, mā nassi bālā”ti theriyā vāriyamānoyeva abhibhavitvā attanā patthitakammaṃ
atk-s0502a:1431_8: katvā pāyāsi. Athassa aguṇaṃ dhāretuṃ asakkontī viya mahāpathavī dvedhā bhijji. So
atk-s0502a:1431_9: pathaviṃ paviṭṭho gantvā mahāavīcimhi eva nibbatti. Therīpi tamatthaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ
atk-s0502a:1431_10: ārocesi. Bhikkhuniyo bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Bhikkhū bhagavato ārocayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1431_11: Taṃ sutvā satthā bhikkhū āmantetvā, “bhikkhave, bhikkhubhikkhūnī upāsakaupāsikāsu
atk-s0502a:1431_12: yo koci bālo pāpakammaṃ karonto madhusakkharādīsu kiñci deva madhurarasaṃ khādamāno
atk-s0502a:1431_13: puriso viya tuṭṭhahaṭṭho udaggudaggo viya karotī”ti anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1433: “Madhuvā maññati bālo, yāva pāpaṃ na paccati;
atk-s0502a:1434: Yadā ca paccati pāpaṃ, bālo dukkhaṃ nigacchatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1435_0: Tattha madhuvāti bālassa hi pāpaṃ akusalakammaṃ karontassa taṃ kammaṃ madhu viya
atk-s0502a:1435_1: madhurarasaṃ viya iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ manāpaṃ viya upaṭṭhāti. Iti naṃ so madhuṃva maññati.
atk-s0502a:1435_2: Yāvāti yattakaṃ kālaṃ. Pāpaṃ na paccatīti diṭṭhadhamme vā samparāye vā vipākaṃ na
atk-s0502a:1435_3: deti, tāva naṃ evaṃ maññati. Yadā cāti yadā panassa diṭṭhadhamme vā vividhā kammakāraṇā
atk-s0502a:1435_4: kayiramānassa, samparāye vā nirayādīsu mahādukkhaṃ anubhavantassa taṃ pāpaṃ paccati,
atk-s0502a:1435_5: atha so bālo dukkhaṃ nigacchati vindati paṭilabhatīti.
atk-s0502a:1437_0: Aparena pana samayena dhammasabhāyaṃ mahājano kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi “khīṇāsavāpi maññe
atk-s0502a:1437_1: kāmasukhaṃ sādiyanti, kāmaṃ sevanti, kiṃ na sevissanti, na hi ete koḷāparukkhā, na
atk-s0502a:1437_2: ca vammikā allamaṃsasarīrāva, tasmā etepi kāmasukhaṃ sādiyanti, kāmaṃ sevantī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1437_3: Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya
atk-s0502a:1437_4: nāmā”ti vutte, “na, bhikkhave, khīṇāsavā kāmasukhaṃ sādiyanti, na kāmaṃ sevanti.
atk-s0502a:1437_5: Yathā hi padumapatte patitaṃ udakabindu, na vilimpati, na saṇṭhāti, vinivattetvā
atk-s0502a:1437_6: patateva, yathā ca āragge sāsapo na vilimpati, na saṇṭhāti, vinivattetvā patateva,
atk-s0502a:1437_7: evaṃ khīṇāsavassa citte duvidhopi kāmo na vilimpati, na saṇṭhātī”ti anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā
atk-s0502a:1439: Yo na limpati kāmesu, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇa”nti. ;
atk-s0502a:1440_0: Imissā attho brāhmaṇavaggeyeva āvi bhavissati. Satthā pana rājānaṃ pasenadikosalaṃ
atk-s0502a:1440_1: pakkosāpetvā, “mahārāja, imasmiṃ sāsane yatheva kulaputtā, evaṃ kuladhītaropi mahantaṃ
atk-s0502a:1440_2: ñātigaṇañca bhogakkhandhañca pahāya pabbajitvā araññe viharanti. Tā evaṃ viharamānā
atk-s0502a:1440_3: rāgarattā pāpapuggalā omānātimānavasena viheṭhentipi, brahmacariyantarāyampi pāpenti,
atk-s0502a:1440_4: tasmā bhikkhunisaṅghassa antonagare vasanaṭṭhānaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Rājā “sādhū”ti
atk-s0502a:1440_5: sampaṭicchitvā nagarassa ekapasse bhikkhunisaṅghassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ kārāpesi. Tato
atk-s0502a:1443: Māse māseti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto jambukaṃ ājīvakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1444_0: Atīte kira kassapasammāsambuddhakāle gāmavāsī eko kuṭumbiko ekassa therassa vihāraṃ
atk-s0502a:1444_1: katvā taṃ tattha viharantaṃ catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahi. Thero tassa gehe nibaddhaṃ
atk-s0502a:1444_2: bhuñjati. Atheko khīṇāsavo bhikkhu divā piṇḍāya caranto tassa gehadvāraṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:1444_3: Kuṭumbiko taṃ disvā tassa iriyāpathe pasanno gehaṃ pavesetvā sakkaccaṃ paṇītena bhojanena
atk-s0502a:1444_4: parivisitvā, “bhante, imaṃ sāṭakaṃ rajitvā nivāseyyāthā”ti mahantaṃ sāṭakaṃ datvā,
atk-s0502a:1444_5: “bhante, kesā vo dīghā, tumhākaṃ kesoropanatthāya nhāpitaṃ ānessāmi, sayanatthāya
atk-s0502a:1444_6: ca vo mañcakaṃ gāhāpetvā āgamissāmī”ti āha. Nibaddhaṃ gehe bhuñjanto kulūpako bhikkhu
atk-s0502a:1444_7: taṃ tassa sakkāraṃ disvā cittaṃ pasādetuṃ nāsakkhi, “ayaṃ taṃ muhuttaṃ diṭṭhakassa
atk-s0502a:1444_8: evarūpaṃ sakkāraṃ karoti, nibaddhaṃ gehe bhuñjantassa pana mayhaṃ na karotī”ti cintetvā
atk-s0502a:1444_9: vihāraṃ agamāsi. Itaropi teneva saddhiṃ gantvā kuṭumbikena dinnasāṭakaṃ rajitvā nivāsesi.
atk-s0502a:1444_10: Kuṭambikopi nhāpitaṃ ādāya gantvā therassa kese ohārāpetvā mañcakaṃ attharāpetvā,
atk-s0502a:1444_11: “bhante, imasmiṃyeva mañcake sayathā”ti vatvā dvepi there svātanāya nimantetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:1445_0: Nevāsiko tassa taṃ sakkāraṃ kayiramānaṃ adhivāsetuṃ nāsakkhi. Athassa so sāyaṃ therassa
atk-s0502a:1445_1: nipannaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā catūhākārehi theraṃ akkosi, “āvuso, āgantuka kuṭumbikassa te
atk-s0502a:1445_2: gehe bhattaṃ bhuñjanato varataraṃ mīḷhaṃ khādituṃ, kuṭumbikena ānītanhāpitena kesohārāpanato
atk-s0502a:1445_3: varataraṃ tālaṭṭhikena kese luñcāpetuṃ. Kuṭumbikena dinnasāṭakanivāsanato varataraṃ
atk-s0502a:1445_4: naggena vicarituṃ, kuṭumbikena ābhatamañcake nipajjanato varataraṃ bhūmiyaṃ nipajjitu”nti.
atk-s0502a:1445_5: Theropi “mā esa bālo maṃ nissāya nassī”ti nimantanaṃ anādiyitvā pātova uṭṭhāya yathāsukhaṃ
atk-s0502a:1445_6: agamāsi. Nevāsikopi pātova vihāre kattabbavattaṃ katvā bhikkhācāravelāya “idānipi
atk-s0502a:1445_7: āgantuko niddāyati, ghaṇḍikasaddena pabujjheyyā”ti saññāya nakhapiṭṭheneva ghaṇḍiṃ
atk-s0502a:1445_8: paharitvā gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi. Kuṭumbikopi sakkāraṃ katvā therānaṃ āgamanamaggaṃ
atk-s0502a:1445_9: olokento nevāsikaṃ disvā, “bhante, thero kuhi”nti pucchi. Atha naṃ nevāsiko “mā,
atk-s0502a:1445_10: āvuso, kiñci avaca, tuyhaṃ kulūpako hiyyo, tava nikkhantavelāya ovarakaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0502a:1445_11: niddaṃ okkanto pātova uṭṭhāya mama vihārasammajjanasaddampi pānīyaghaṭaparibhojanīyaghaṭesu
atk-s0502a:1445_12: udakasiñcanasaddampi ghaṇḍikasaddampi karontassa na jānātī”ti āha. Kuṭumbiko cintesi
atk-s0502a:1445_13: – “tādisāya iriyāpathasampattiyā samannāgatassa me ayyassa yāva imamhā kālā niddāyanaṃ
atk-s0502a:1445_14: nāma natthi, maṃ pana tassa sakkāraṃ karontaṃ disvā addhā iminā bhadantena kiñci
atk-s0502a:1445_15: vuttaṃ bhavissatī”ti. So attano paṇḍitabhāvena taṃ sakkaccaṃ bhojetvā tassa pattaṃ
