atk-s0502a:1445_16: sādhukaṃ dhovitvā nānaggarasabhojanassa pūretvā, “bhante, sace me ayyaṃ passeyyātha,
atk-s0502a:1446_0: Itaro taṃ gahetvāva cintesi – “sace so evarūpaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjissati, imasmiṃyeva
atk-s0502a:1446_1: ṭhāne paluddho bhavissatī”ti antarāmagge taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ chaḍḍetvā therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1446_2: gantvā taṃ tattha olokento na addasa. Atha naṃ ettakassa kammassa katattā vīsativassasahassāni
atk-s0502a:1446_3: katopi samaṇadhammo rakkhituṃ nāsakkhi. Āyupariyosāne pana kālaṃ katvā avīcimhi nibbattitvā
atk-s0502a:1446_4: ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ mahādukkhaṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahanagare ekasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:1446_5: bahvannapāne kulaghare nibbatti. So padasā gamanakālato paṭṭhāya neva sayane sayituṃ,
atk-s0502a:1446_6: na bhattaṃ bhuñjituṃ icchati, attano sarīravalañjameva khādati. “Bālatāya ajānanto
atk-s0502a:1446_7: karotī”ti taṃ posayiṃsu. Mahallakakālepi vatthaṃ nivāsetuṃ na icchati, naggova vicarati,
atk-s0502a:1446_8: bhūmiyaṃ sayati, attano sarīravalañjameva khādati. Athassa mātāpitaro “nāyaṃ kulagharassa
atk-s0502a:1446_9: anucchaviko, kevalaṃ alajjanako ājīvakānaṃ esa anucchaviko”ti tesaṃ santikaṃ netvā
atk-s0502a:1446_10: “imaṃ dārakaṃ pabbājethā”ti adaṃsu. Atha naṃ te pabbājesuṃ. Pabbājentā ca pana galappamāṇe
atk-s0502a:1446_11: āvāṭe ṭhapetvā dvinnaṃ aṃsakūṭānaṃ upariṃ padarāni datvā tesaṃ upari nisīditvā tālaṭṭhikhaṇḍena
atk-s0502a:1446_12: kese luñciṃsu. Atha ne tassa mātāpitaro svātanāya nimantetvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1447_0: Punadivase ājīvakā “ehi, gāmaṃ pavisissāmā”ti taṃ vadiṃsu. So “gacchatha tumhe, ahaṃ
atk-s0502a:1447_1: idheva bhavissāmī”ti na icchi. Atha naṃ punappunaṃ vatvā anicchamānaṃ ohāya agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1447_2: Sopi tesaṃ gatabhāvaṃ ñatvā vaccakuṭiyā padaraṃ vivaritvā oruyha ubhohi hatthehi
atk-s0502a:1447_3: ālopaṃ ālopaṃ katvā gūthaṃ khādi. Ājīvakā tassa antogāmato āhāraṃ pahiṇiṃsu. Tampi
atk-s0502a:1447_4: na icchi. Punappunaṃ vuccamānopi “na me iminā attho. Laddho me āhāro”ti āha. “Kahaṃ
atk-s0502a:1447_5: laddho”ti? “Idheva laddho”ti. Evaṃ dutiye tatiye catutthepi divase tehi bahumpi vuccamāno
atk-s0502a:1447_6: “ahaṃ idheva bhavissāmī”ti gāmaṃ gantuṃ na icchi. Ājīvakā “ayaṃ divase divase neva
atk-s0502a:1447_7: gāmaṃ pavisituṃ icchati, na amhehi pahitāhāraṃ āharituṃ icchati, ‘idheva me laddho’ti
atk-s0502a:1447_8: vadati, kiṃ nu kho karoti, pariggaṇhissāma na”nti gāmaṃ pavisantā ekaṃ dve jane tassa
atk-s0502a:1447_9: pariggaṇhanatthaṃ ohāya gamiṃsu. Te pacchato gacchantā viya hutvā nilīyiṃsu. Sopi
atk-s0502a:1447_10: tesaṃ gatabhāvaṃ ñatvā purimanayeneva vaccakuṭiṃ oruyha gūthaṃ khādi.
atk-s0502a:1448_0: Itare tassa kiriyaṃ disvā ājīvakānaṃ ārocayiṃsu. Taṃ sutvā ājīvakā “aho bhāriyaṃ
atk-s0502a:1448_1: kammaṃ, sace samaṇassa gotamassa sāvakā jāneyyuṃ, ‘ājīvakā gūthaṃ khādamānā vicarantī’ti
atk-s0502a:1448_2: amhākaṃ akittiṃ pakāseyyuṃ, nāyaṃ amhākaṃ anucchaviko”ti taṃ attano santikā nīhariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1448_3: So tehi nīharito mahājanassa uccārakaraṇaṭṭhāne pattharito eko piṭṭhipāsāṇo atthi.
atk-s0502a:1448_4: Tasmiṃ mahantaṃ soṇḍi, piṭṭhipāsāṇaṃ nissāya mahājanassa uccārakaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ. So
atk-s0502a:1448_5: tattha gantvā rattiṃ gūthaṃ khāditvā mahājanassa sarīravalañjanatthāya āgamanakāle
atk-s0502a:1448_6: ekena hatthena pāsāṇassa ekaṃ antaṃ olubbha ekaṃ pādaṃ ukkhipitvā jaṇṇuke ṭhapetvā
atk-s0502a:1448_7: uddhaṃvātābhimukho mukhaṃ vivaritvā tiṭṭhati. Mahājano taṃ disvā upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā,
atk-s0502a:1448_8: “bhante, kasmā ayyo mukhaṃ vivaritvā ṭhito”ti pucchati. “Ahaṃ vātabhakkho, añño me
atk-s0502a:1448_9: āhāro natthī”ti. Atha “kasmā ekaṃ pādaṃ jaṇṇuke katvā ṭhitosi, bhante”ti? “Ahaṃ uggatapo
atk-s0502a:1448_10: ghoratapo, mayā dvīhi pādehi akkantā pathavī kampati, tasmā ekaṃ pādaṃ ukkhipitvā
atk-s0502a:1448_11: jaṇṇuke ṭhapetvā ṭhitomhi. Ahañhi rattindivaṃ ṭhitakova vītināmemi, na nisīdāmi,
atk-s0502a:1448_12: na nipajjāmī”ti. Manussā nāma yebhuyyena vacanamattameva saddahanti, tasmā “aho acchariyaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1448_13: evarūpāpi nāma tapassino honti, na no evarūpā diṭṭhapubbā”ti yebhuyyena aṅgamagadhavāsino
atk-s0502a:1448_14: saṅkhubhitvā upasaṅkamitvā māse māse mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ abhiharanti. So “ahaṃ vātameva
atk-s0502a:1448_15: bhakkhāmi, na aññaṃ āhāraṃ. Aññañhi me khādantassa tapo nassatī”ti tehi abhihaṭaṃ
atk-s0502a:1448_16: na kiñci icchati. Manussā “mā no, bhante, nāsetha, tumhādisena ghoratapena paribhoge
atk-s0502a:1448_17: kate amhākaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya saṃvattatī”ti punappunaṃ yācanti. Tassa añño
atk-s0502a:1448_18: āhāro na ruccati. Mahājanassa pana yācanāya pīḷito tehi ābhatāni sappiphāṇitādīni
atk-s0502a:1448_19: kusaggena jivhagge ṭhapetvā “gacchatha, alaṃ vo ettakaṃ hitāya sukhāya cā”ti uyyojesi.
atk-s0502a:1448_20: Evaṃ so pañcapaññāsa vassāni naggo gūthaṃ khādanto kese luñcanto bhūmiyaṃ sayamāno vītināmesi.
atk-s0502a:1449_0: Buddhānampi kho paccūsakāle lokavolokanaṃ avijahitameva hoti. Tasmā ekadivasaṃ bhagavato
atk-s0502a:1449_1: paccūsasamaye lokaṃ volokentassa ayaṃ jambukājīvako ñāṇajālassa anto paññāyi. Satthā
atk-s0502a:1449_2: “kiṃ nu kho bhavissatī”ti āvajjetvā tassa saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattassūpanissayaṃ
atk-s0502a:1449_3: disvā “ahaṃ etaṃ ādiṃ katvā ekaṃ gāthaṃ bhāsissāmi, gāthāvasāne caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1449_4: dhammābhisamayo bhavissati. Imaṃ kulaputtaṃ nissāya mahājano sotthibhāvaṃ pāpuṇissatī”ti
atk-s0502a:1449_5: ñatvā punadivase rājagahe piṇḍāya caritvā piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto ānandattheraṃ āmantesi
atk-s0502a:1449_6: – “ānanda, jambukājīvakassa santikaṃ gamissāmī”ti. “Bhante, kiṃ tumheyeva gamissathā”ti?
atk-s0502a:1449_7: “Āma, ahamevā”ti evaṃ vatvā satthā vaḍḍhamānakacchāyāya tassa santikaṃ pāyāsi.
atk-s0502a:1450_0: Devatā cintayiṃsu – “satthā sāyaṃ jambukājīvakassa santikaṃ gacchati, so ca jegucche
atk-s0502a:1450_1: uccārapassāvadantakaṭṭhakiliṭṭhe piṭṭhipāsāṇe vasati, devaṃ vassāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0502a:1450_2: attano ānubhāvena taṃ muhuttaṃyeva devaṃ vassāpesuṃ. Piṭṭhipāsāṇo suci nimmalo ahosi.
atk-s0502a:1450_3: Athassa upari pañcavaṇṇaṃ pupphavassaṃ vassāpesuṃ. Satthā sāyaṃ jambukājīvakassa
atk-s0502a:1450_4: santikaṃ gantvā “jambukā”ti saddamakāsi. Jambuko “ko nu kho esa, dujjano maṃ jambukavādena
atk-s0502a:1450_5: vadatī”ti cintetvā “ko eso”ti āha. “Ahaṃ samaṇo”ti. “Kiṃ mahāsamaṇā”ti? “Ajja me
atk-s0502a:1450_6: ekarattiṃ idha vasanaṭṭhānaṃ dehī”ti. “Natthi, mahāsamaṇa, imasmiṃ ṭhāne vasanaṭṭhāna”nti.
atk-s0502a:1450_7: “Jambuka, mā evaṃ kari, ekarattiṃ me vasanaṭṭhānaṃ dehi, pabbajitā nāma pabbajitaṃ
atk-s0502a:1450_8: patthenti, manussā manussaṃ, pasavo pasava”nti. “Kiṃ pana tvaṃ pabbajito”ti? “Āma,
atk-s0502a:1450_9: pabbajitomhī”ti. “Sace tvaṃ pabbajito, kahaṃ te lābukaṃ, kahaṃ dhūmakaṭacchuko, kahaṃ
atk-s0502a:1450_10: yaññasuttaka”nti? “‘Atthetaṃ mayhaṃ, visuṃ visuṃ pana gahetvā vicaraṇaṃ dukkha’nti
atk-s0502a:1450_11: abbhantareneva gahetvā carāmī”ti. So “carissasi tvaṃ etaṃ aggaṇhitvā”ti kujjhi. Atha
atk-s0502a:1450_12: naṃ satthā āha – “hotu, jambuka, mā kujjha, vasanaṭṭhānaṃ me ācikkhā”ti. “Natthi,
atk-s0502a:1451_0: Satthā tassa vasanaṭṭhānato avidūre ekaṃ pabbhāraṃ atthi, taṃ niddisanto “etasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:1451_1: pabbhāre ko vasatī”ti āha. “Natthi koci, mahāsamaṇā”ti. “Tena hi etaṃ mayhaṃ dehī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1451_2: “Tvaññeva jāna, mahāsamaṇā”ti. Satthā pabbhāre nisīdanaṃ paññāpetvā nisīdi. Paṭhamayāme
atk-s0502a:1451_3: cattāro mahārājāno catuddisaṃ ekobhāsaṃ karontā satthu upaṭṭhānaṃ āgamiṃsu. Jambuko
atk-s0502a:1451_4: obhāsaṃ disvā “ko obhāso nāmeso”ti cintesi. Majjhimayāme sakko devarājā āgami. Jambuko
atk-s0502a:1451_5: tampi disvā “ko nāmeso”ti cintesi. Pacchimayāme ekāya aṅguliyā ekaṃ, dvīhi dve, dasahi
atk-s0502a:1451_6: dasa cakkavāḷāni obhāsetuṃ samattho mahābrahmā sakalaṃ araññaṃ ekobhāsaṃ karonto
atk-s0502a:1451_7: āgami. Jambuko tampi disvā “ko nu kho eso”ti cintetvā pātova satthu santikaṃ gantvā
atk-s0502a:1451_8: paṭisanthāraṃ katvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito satthāraṃ pucchi – “mahāsamaṇa, tumhākaṃ santikaṃ
atk-s0502a:1451_9: catasso disā obhāsento ke āgatā”ti? “Cattāro mahārājāno”ti. “Kiṃ kāraṇā”ti? “Maṃ
atk-s0502a:1451_10: upaṭṭhātu”nti. “Kiṃ pana tvaṃ catūhi mahārājehi uttaritaro”ti? “Āma, jambuka, mahārājūnampi
atk-s0502a:1451_11: atirājā”ti. “Majjhimayāme pana ko āgato”ti? “Sakko devarājā, jambukā”ti. “Kiṃ kāraṇā”ti?
atk-s0502a:1451_12: “Maṃ upaṭṭhātumevā”ti. “Kiṃ pana tvaṃ sakkadevarājatopi uttaritaro”ti? “Āma, jambuka,
atk-s0502a:1451_13: sakkatopi uttaritaromhi, eso pana mayhaṃ gilānupaṭṭhāko kappiyakārakasāmaṇerasadiso”ti.
atk-s0502a:1451_14: “Pacchimayāme sakalaṃ araññaṃ obhāsetvā ko āgato”ti? “Yaṃ loke brāhmaṇādayo khipitvā
atk-s0502a:1451_15: pakkhalitvā ‘namo mahābrahmuno’ti vadanti, so eva mahābrahmā”ti. “Kiṃ pana tvaṃ mahābrahmatopi
atk-s0502a:1451_16: uttaritaro”ti? “Āma, jambuka, ahañhi brahmunāpi atibrahmā”ti. “Acchariyosi tvaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1451_17: mahāsamaṇa, mayhaṃ pana pañca paññāsa vassāni idha vasantassa etesu ekopi maṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ
atk-s0502a:1451_18: nāgatapubbo. Ahañhi ettakaṃ addhānaṃ vātabhakkho hutvā ṭhitakova vītināmesiṃ, na
atk-s0502a:1452_0: Atha naṃ satthā āha – jambuka, tvaṃ lokasmiṃ andhabālaṃ mahājanaṃ vañcayamāno mampi
atk-s0502a:1452_1: vañcetukāmo jāto, nanu tvaṃ pañcapaññāsa vassāni gūthameva khādi, bhūmiyaṃyeva nipajji,
atk-s0502a:1452_2: naggo hutvā vicari, tālaṭṭhikhaṇḍena kese luñci. Atha ca pana lokaṃ vañcento “ahaṃ
atk-s0502a:1452_3: vātabhakkho, ekapādena tiṭṭhāmi, na nisīdāmi, na nipajjāmī”ti vadesi, “mamampi vañcetukāmosi
atk-s0502a:1452_4: pubbepi tvaṃ pāpikaṃ lāmikaṃ diṭṭhiṃ nissāya ettakaṃ kālaṃ gūthabhakkho bhūmisayo
atk-s0502a:1452_5: naggo vicaranto tālaṭṭhikhaṇḍena kesaluñcanaṃ patto, idānipi pāpikaṃ lāmikaṃ diṭṭhimeva
atk-s0502a:1452_6: gaṇhāsī”ti. “Kiṃ pana mayā kataṃ, mahāsamaṇā”ti? Athassa satthā pubbe katakammaṃ
atk-s0502a:1452_7: ācikkhi. Tassa satthari kathenteyeva saṃvego uppajji, hirottappaṃ upaṭṭhitaṃ, so
atk-s0502a:1452_8: ukkuṭiko nisīdi. Athassa satthā udakasāṭikaṃ khipitvā adāsi. So taṃ nivāsetvā satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:1452_9: vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Satthāpissa anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathetvā dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0502a:1452_10: So desanāvasāne saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā satthāraṃ vanditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā
atk-s0502a:1452_11: pabbajjañca upasampadañca yāci. Ettāvatā tassa purimakammaṃ parikkhīṇaṃ. Ayañhi khīṇāsavamahātheraṃ
atk-s0502a:1452_12: catūhi akkosehi akkositvā yāvāyaṃ mahāpathavī tigāvutādhikaṃ yojanaṃ ussannā, tāva
atk-s0502a:1452_13: avīcimhi paccitvā tattha pakkāvasesena pañcapaññāsa vassāni imaṃ vippakāraṃ patto.
atk-s0502a:1452_14: Tenassa taṃ kammaṃ khīṇaṃ. Vīsati pana vassasahassāni iminā katassa samaṇadhammassa
atk-s0502a:1452_15: phalaṃ nāsetuṃ na sakkā. Tasmā satthā dakkhiṇahatthaṃ pasāretvā “ehi, bhikkhu, cara
atk-s0502a:1452_16: brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti āha. Tāvadevassa gihiliṅgaṃ antaradhāyi
atk-s0502a:1453_0: Aṅgamagadhavāsīnaṃ tassa sakkāraṃ gahetvā āgatadivaso kiresa, tasmā ubhayaraṭṭhavāsino
atk-s0502a:1453_1: sakkāraṃ gahetvā āgatā tathāgataṃ disvā “kiṃ nu kho amhākaṃ ayyo jambuko mahā, udāhu
atk-s0502a:1453_2: samaṇo gotamo”ti cintetvā “sace samaṇo gotamo mahā bhaveyya, ayaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa
atk-s0502a:1453_3: santikaṃ gaccheyya, jambukājīvakassa pana mahantatāya samaṇo gotamo imassa santikaṃ
atk-s0502a:1453_4: āgato”ti cintayiṃsu. Satthā mahājanassa parivitakkaṃ ñatvā, “jambuka, tava upaṭṭhākānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1453_5: kaṅkhaṃ chindāhī”ti āha, so “ahampi, bhante, ettakameva paccāsīsāmī”ti vatvā catutthajjhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1453_6: samāpajjitvā uṭṭhāya tālappamāṇaṃ vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā “satthā me, bhante bhagavā,
atk-s0502a:1453_7: sāvakohamasmī”ti vatvā oruyha vanditvā puna dvitālamattaṃ titālamattanti evaṃ sattatālamattaṃ
atk-s0502a:1453_8: vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā oruyha attano sāvakabhāvaṃ jānāpesi. Taṃ disvā mahājano “aho
atk-s0502a:1453_9: buddhā nāma acchariyā anopamaguṇā”ti cintesi. Satthā mahājanena saddhiṃ kathento
atk-s0502a:1453_10: evamāha – “ayaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ tumhehi ābhataṃ sakkāraṃ kusaggena jivhagge ṭhapetvā
atk-s0502a:1453_11: ‘tapacaraṇaṃ pūremī’ti idha nivuṭṭho, sacepi iminā upāyena vassasataṃ tapacaraṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:1453_12: pūreyya, yā cassa idāni kālaṃ vā bhattaṃ vā kukkuccāyitvā abhuñjantassa bhattacchedanakusalacetanā,
atk-s0502a:1453_13: tassā taṃ tapacaraṇaṃ soḷasiṃ kalampi na agghatī”ti anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1456: Na so saṅkhātadhammānaṃ, kalaṃ agghati soḷasi”nti.
atk-s0502a:1457_0: Tassattho – sace bālo apariññātadhammo sīlādiguṇā paribāhiro titthāyatane pabbajito
atk-s0502a:1457_1: “tapacaraṇaṃ pūressāmī”ti māse māse patte kusaggena bhojanaṃ bhuñjanto vassasataṃ
atk-s0502a:1457_2: bhuñjeyya bhojanaṃ. Na so saṅkhātadhammānaṃ, kalaṃ agghati soḷasinti saṅkhātadhammā
atk-s0502a:1457_3: vuccanti ñātadhammā tulitadhammā. Tesu heṭṭhimakoṭiyā sotāpanno saṅkhātadhammo, uparimakoṭiyā
atk-s0502a:1457_4: khīṇāsavo. Imesaṃ saṅkhātadhammānaṃ so bālo kalaṃ na agghati soḷasinti puggalādhiṭṭhānā
atk-s0502a:1457_5: desanā. Ayaṃ panettha attho – yā cassa tathā tapacaraṇaṃ pūrentassa vassasataṃ cetanā
atk-s0502a:1457_6: yā ca saṅkhātadhammānaṃ kālaṃ vā bhattaṃ vā kukkuccāyitvā abhuñjantānaṃ ekā bhattacchedanakusalacetanā,
atk-s0502a:1457_7: tassā cetanāya sā tāva dīgharattaṃ pavattacetanā soḷasiṃ kalaṃ na agghati. Idaṃ vuttaṃ
atk-s0502a:1457_8: hoti – yaṃ tassā saṅkhātadhammānaṃ cetanāya phalaṃ, taṃ soḷasa koṭṭhāse katvā tato
atk-s0502a:1457_9: ekekaṃ puna soḷasa soḷasa koṭṭhāse katvā tato ekassa koṭṭhāsassa yaṃ phalaṃ, tadeva
atk-s0502a:1461: Na hi pāpaṃ kataṃ kammanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto aññataraṃ ahipetaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1462_0: Ekasmiñhi divase jaṭilasahassassa abbhantaro āyasmā lakkhaṇatthero ca mahāmoggallānatthero
atk-s0502a:1462_1: ca “rājagahe piṇḍāya carissāmā”ti gijjhakūṭato otaranti. Tesu āyasmā mahāmoggallānatthero
atk-s0502a:1462_2: ekaṃ ahipetaṃ disvā sitaṃ pātvākāsi. Atha naṃ lakkhaṇatthero “kasmā, āvuso, sitaṃ
atk-s0502a:1462_3: pātukarosī”ti sitakāraṇaṃ pucchi. “Akālo, āvuso lakkhaṇa, imassa pañhassa, bhagavato
atk-s0502a:1462_4: santike maṃ puccheyyāsī”ti thero āha. Tesu rājagahe piṇḍāya caritvā bhagavato santikaṃ
atk-s0502a:1462_5: gantvā nisinnesu lakkhaṇatthero pucchi, “āvuso, moggallānaṃ tvaṃ gijjhakūṭā otaranto
atk-s0502a:1462_6: sitaṃ pātukaritvā mayā sitakāraṇaṃ puṭṭho ‘bhagavato santike maṃ puccheyyāsī’ti avaca,
atk-s0502a:1462_7: kathehi idāni taṃ kāraṇa”nti. Thero āha – “ahaṃ, āvuso, ekaṃ petaṃ disvā sitaṃ pātvākāsiṃ.
atk-s0502a:1462_8: Tassa evarūpo attabhāvo – manussasīsaṃ viya assa sīsaṃ, ahissa viya seso attabhāvo,
atk-s0502a:1462_9: ahipeto nāmesa pamāṇato pañcavīsatiyojaniko, tassa sīsato uṭṭhitā aggijālā yāva naṅguṭṭhā
atk-s0502a:1462_10: gacchanti, naṅguṭṭhato uṭṭhitā aggijālā yāva sīsā, majjhesīsato uṭṭhitā dve passāni
atk-s0502a:1462_11: gacchanti, dvīhi passehi uṭṭhitā majjhe otarantī”ti. Dvinnaṃyeva kira petānaṃ attabhāvo
atk-s0502a:1462_12: pañcavīsatiyojaniko, avasesānaṃ tigāvutappamāṇo. Imassa ceva ahipetassa kākapetassa
atk-s0502a:1462_13: ca pañcavīsatiyojaniko. Tesu ayaṃ tāva ahipeto. Kākapetampi mahāmoggallāno gijjhakūṭamatthake
atk-s0502a:1462_14: paccamānaṃ disvā tassa pubbakammaṃ pucchanto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1465: Kiṃ nu kammaṃ karitvāna, pattosi dukkhamīdisa”nti.
atk-s0502a:1469_0: Gāthaṃ vatvā āha – “bhante, kassapabuddhakāle sambahulā bhikkhū gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisiṃsu,.
atk-s0502a:1469_1: Manussā there disvā sampiyāyamānā āsanasālāyaṃ nisīdāpetvā pāde dhovitvā telaṃ makkhetvā
atk-s0502a:1469_2: yāguṃ pāyetvā khajjakaṃ datvā piṇḍapātakālaṃ āgamayamānā dhammaṃ suṇantā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1469_3: Dhammakathāvasāne therānaṃ patte ādāya attano attano gehā nānaggarasabhojanassa pūretvā
atk-s0502a:1469_4: āhariṃsu. Tadā ahaṃ kāko hutvā āsanasālāya chadanapiṭṭhe nilīno taṃ disvā ekena gahitapattato
atk-s0502a:1469_5: tikkhattuṃ mukhaṃ pūrento tayo kabaḷe aggahesiṃ. Taṃ pana bhattaṃ neva saṅghassa
atk-s0502a:1469_6: santakaṃ, na saṅghassa niyametvā dinnaṃ, na bhikkhūhi gahitāvasesakaṃ. Attano attano
atk-s0502a:1469_7: gehaṃ netvā manussehi bhuñjitabbakaṃ, kevalaṃ saṅghaṃ uddissa abhihaṭamattameva.
atk-s0502a:1469_8: Tato mayā tayo kabaḷā gahitā, ettakaṃ me pubbakammaṃ. Svāhaṃ kālaṃ katvā tassa kammassa
atk-s0502a:1469_9: vipākena avīcimhi paccitvā tattha pakkāvasesena idāni gijjhakūṭe kākapeto hutvā nibbatto
atk-s0502a:1469_10: imaṃ dukkhaṃ paccānubhomī”ti. Idaṃ kākapetassa vatthu.
atk-s0502a:1470_0: Idha pana thero “ahipetaṃ disvā sitaṃ pātvākāsi”nti āha. Athassa satthā sakkhī hutvāpi
atk-s0502a:1470_1: uṭṭhāya “saccaṃ, bhikkhave, moggallāno āha. Mayāpesa sambodhipattadivaseyeva diṭṭho,
atk-s0502a:1470_2: apicāhaṃ ‘ye me vacanaṃ na saddaheyyuṃ, tesaṃ ahitāya bhaveyyā’ti parānuddayāya na
atk-s0502a:1470_3: kathesi”nti āha. Lakkhaṇasaṃyuttepi hi mahāmoggallānena diṭṭhakāleyeva satthā tassa
atk-s0502a:1470_4: sakkhī hutvā vinītavatthūni kathesi, idampi tena tatheva kathitaṃ. Taṃ sutvā bhikkhū
atk-s0502a:1470_5: tassa pubbakammaṃ pucchiṃsu. Satthāpi tesaṃ kathesi –
atk-s0502a:1471_0: Atīte kira bārāṇasiṃ nissāya nadītīre paccekabuddhassa paṇṇasālaṃ kariṃsu. So tattha
atk-s0502a:1471_1: viharanto nibaddhaṃ nagare piṇḍāya carati. Nāgarāpi sāyaṃpātaṃ gandhapupphādihatthā
atk-s0502a:1471_2: paccekabuddhassūpaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanti. Eko bārāṇasivāsī puriso taṃ maggaṃ nissāya khettaṃ
atk-s0502a:1471_3: kasi. Mahājano sāyaṃpātaṃ paccekabuddhassūpaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanto taṃ khettaṃ maddanto
atk-s0502a:1471_4: gacchati. Kassako ca “mā me khettaṃ maddathā”ti vārentopi vāretuṃ nāsakkhi. Athassa
atk-s0502a:1471_5: etadahosi – “sace imasmiṃ ṭhāne paccekabuddhassa paṇṇasālā na bhaveyya, na me khettaṃ
atk-s0502a:1471_6: maddeyyu”nti. So paccekabuddhassa piṇḍāya paviṭṭhakāle paribhogabhājanāni bhinditvā
atk-s0502a:1471_7: paṇṇasālaṃ jhāpesi. Paccekabuddho taṃ jhāmaṃ disvā yathāsukhaṃ pakkāmi. Mahājano
atk-s0502a:1471_8: gandhamālaṃ ādāya āgato jhāmapaṇṇasālaṃ disvā “kahaṃ nu kho no ayyo gato”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:1471_9: Sopi mahājaneneva saddhiṃ gato mahājanamajjhe ṭhitakova evamāha – “mayā tassa paṇṇasālā
atk-s0502a:1471_10: jhāpitā”ti. Atha naṃ “gaṇhatha, imaṃ pāpimaṃ nissāya mayaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ daṭṭhuṃ
atk-s0502a:1471_11: na labhimhā”ti daṇḍādīhi pothetvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpesuṃ. So avīcimhi nibbattitvā
atk-s0502a:1471_12: yāvāyaṃ mahāpathavī yojanamattaṃ ussannā, tāva niraye paccitvā pakkāvasesena gijjhakūṭe
atk-s0502a:1471_13: ahipeto hutvā nibbatti. Satthā idaṃ tassa pubbakammaṃ kathetvā, “bhikkhave, pāpakammaṃ
atk-s0502a:1471_14: nāmetaṃ khīrasadisaṃ, yathā khīraṃ duyhamānameva na pariṇamati. Tathā kammaṃ kayiramānameva
atk-s0502a:1471_15: na vipaccati. Yadā pana vipaccati, tadā evarūpena dukkhena socatī”ti anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā
atk-s0502a:1473: “Na hi pāpaṃ kataṃ kammaṃ, sajjukhīraṃva muccati;
atk-s0502a:1475_0: Tattha sajjukhīraṃ vāti taṃ khaṇaṃyeva dhenuyā thanehi nikkhantaṃ abbhuṇhaṃ khīraṃ
atk-s0502a:1475_1: na muccati na pariṇamati. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā idaṃ sajjukhīraṃ taṃ khaṇaññeva
atk-s0502a:1475_2: na muccati na pariṇamati na pakatiṃ vijahati. Yasmiṃ pana bhājane duhitvā gahitaṃ
atk-s0502a:1475_3: yāva tattha takkādiambilaṃ na pakkhipati, yāva dadhibhājanādikaṃ ambilabhājanaṃ na
atk-s0502a:1475_4: pāpuṇāti, tāva pakatiṃ avijahitvā pacchā jahati, evameva pāpakammampi kariyamānameva
atk-s0502a:1475_5: na vipaccati. Yadi vipacceyya, na koci pāpakammaṃ kātuṃ visaheyya. Yāva pana kusalābhinibbattā
atk-s0502a:1475_6: khandhā dharanti, tāva naṃ te rakkhanti. Tesaṃ bhedā apāye nibbattakkhandhesu vipaccati,
atk-s0502a:1475_7: vipaccamānañca ḍahantaṃ bālamanveti.“Kiṃ viyā”ti? “Bhasmacchannova pāvako”ti. Yathā
atk-s0502a:1475_8: hi chārikāya paṭicchanno vītaccitaṅgāro akkantopi chārikāya paṭicchannattā na tāva
atk-s0502a:1475_9: ḍahati, chārikaṃ pana tāpetvā cammādīnaṃ ḍahanavasena yāva matthaluṅgā ḍahanto gacchati,
atk-s0502a:1475_10: evameva pāpakammampi yena kataṃ hoti, taṃ bālaṃ dutiye vā tatiye vā attabhāve nirayādīsu
atk-s0502a:1479: Yāvadeva anatthāyāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto saṭṭhikūṭapetaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1480_0: Purimanayeneva hi mahāmoggallānatthero lakkhaṇattherena saddhiṃ gijjhakūṭā orohanto
atk-s0502a:1480_1: aññatarasmiṃ padese sitaṃ pātvākāsi. Therena sitakāraṇaṃ puṭṭho “bhagavato santike
atk-s0502a:1480_2: maṃ puccheyyāsī”ti vatvā piṇḍāya caritvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā nisinnakāle
atk-s0502a:1480_3: puna puṭṭho āha – “ahaṃ, āvuso, ekaṃ petaṃ addasaṃ tigāvutappamāṇena attabhāvena,
atk-s0502a:1480_4: tassa saṭṭhi ayakūṭasahassāni ādittāni sampajjalitāni uparimatthake patitvā patitvā
atk-s0502a:1480_5: uṭṭhahanti sīsaṃ bhindanti, bhinnaṃ bhinnaṃ puna samuṭṭhahati, iminā attabhāvena
atk-s0502a:1480_6: mayā evarūpo attabhāvo na diṭṭhapubbo, ahaṃ taṃ disvā sitaṃ pātvākāsi”nti. Petavatthusmiñhi –
atk-s0502a:1482: Sīse tuyhaṃ nipatanti, vobhindanteva matthaka”nti. ādi –
atk-s0502a:1483_0: Imameva petaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Satthā therassa kathaṃ sutvāva, “bhikkhave, mayāpesa
atk-s0502a:1483_1: satto bodhimaṇḍe nisinneneva diṭṭho ‘ye ca pana me vacanaṃ na saddaheyyuṃ, tesaṃ
atk-s0502a:1483_2: ahitāya bhaveyyā’ti paresaṃ anukampāya na kathesiṃ, idāni pana moggallānassa sakkhī
atk-s0502a:1483_3: hutvā kathemī”ti āha. Taṃ sutvā bhikkhū tassa pubbakammaṃ pucchiṃsu. Satthāpi nesaṃ kathesi –
atk-s0502a:1484_0: Atīte kira bārāṇasiyaṃ sāḷittakasippe nipphattiṃ patto eko pīṭhasappi ahosi. So nagaradvāre
atk-s0502a:1484_1: ekassa vaṭarukkhassa heṭṭhā nisinno sakkharāni khipitvā tassa paṇṇāni chindanto “hatthirūpakaṃ
atk-s0502a:1484_2: no dassehi, assarūpakaṃ no dassehī”ti gāmadārakehi vuccamāno icchiticchitāni rūpāni
atk-s0502a:1484_3: dassetvā tesaṃ santikā khādanīyādīni labhati. Athekadivasaṃ rājā uyyānaṃ gacchanto
atk-s0502a:1484_4: taṃ padesaṃ pāpuṇi. Dārakā pīṭhasappiṃ pārohantare katvā palāyiṃsu. Rañño ṭhitamajjhanhike
atk-s0502a:1484_5: rukkhamūlaṃ paviṭṭhassa chiddāvachiddacchāyā sarīraṃ phari. So “kiṃ nu kho eta”nti
atk-s0502a:1484_6: uddhaṃ olokento rukkhapaṇṇesu hatthirūpakādīni disvā “kassetaṃ kamma”nti pucchitvā
atk-s0502a:1484_7: “pīṭhasappino”ti sutvā taṃ pakkosāpetvā āha – “mayhaṃ purohito atimukharo appamattakepi
atk-s0502a:1484_8: vutte bahuṃ bhaṇanto maṃ upaddaveti, sakkhissasi tassa mukhe nāḷimattā ajalaṇḍikā
atk-s0502a:1484_9: khipitu”nti? “Sakkhissāmi, deva. Ajalaṇḍikā āharāpetvā purohitena saddhiṃ tumhe antosāṇiyaṃ
atk-s0502a:1484_10: nisīdatha, ahamettha kattabbaṃ jānissāmī”ti. Atha rājā tathā kāresi. Itaro kattariyaggena
atk-s0502a:1484_11: sāṇiyā chiddaṃ katvā purohitassa raññā saddhiṃ kathentassa mukhe vivaṭamatte ekekaṃ
atk-s0502a:1484_12: ajalaṇḍikaṃ khipi. Purohito mukhaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ gili. Pīṭhasappī khīṇāsu ajalaṇḍikāsu
atk-s0502a:1484_13: sāṇiṃ cālesi. Rājā tāya saññāya ajalaṇḍikānaṃ khīṇabhāvaṃ ñatvā āha – “ācariya, ahaṃ
atk-s0502a:1484_14: tumhehi saddhiṃ kathento kathaṃ nittharituṃ na sakkhissāmi, tumhe atimukharatāya
atk-s0502a:1484_15: nāḷimattā ajalaṇḍikā gilantāpi tuṇhībhāvaṃ nāpajjathā”ti. Brāhmaṇo maṅguubhāvaṃ āpajjitvā
atk-s0502a:1484_16: tato paṭṭhāya mukhaṃ vivaritvā raññā saddhiṃ sallapituṃ nasakkhi. Rājā pīṭhasappiguṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:1484_17: anussaritvā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “taṃ nissāya me sukhaṃ laddha”nti tuṭṭho tassa sabbaṭṭhakaṃ
atk-s0502a:1484_18: nāma dhanaṃ datvā nagarassa catūsu disāsu cattāro varagāme adāsi. Tamatthaṃ viditvā
atk-s0502a:1485: “Sādhu kho sippakaṃ nāma, api yādisa kīdisaṃ;
atk-s0502a:1487_0: So pana amacco tena samayena ayameva bhagavā ahosi. Atheko puriso pīṭhasappinā laddhasampattiṃ
atk-s0502a:1487_1: disvā cintesi – “ayaṃ nāma pīṭhasappī hutvā imaṃ sippaṃ nissāya mahāsampattiṃ patto,
atk-s0502a:1487_2: mayāpetaṃ sikkhituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. So taṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā “idaṃ me, ācariya,
atk-s0502a:1487_3: sippaṃ dethā”ti āha. “Na sakkā, tāta, dātu”nti. So tena paṭikkhitto “hotu, ārādhessāmi
atk-s0502a:1487_4: na”nti tassa hatthapādaparikammādīni karonto cirassaṃ taṃ ārādhetvā punappunaṃ yāci,
atk-s0502a:1487_5: pīṭhasappī “ayaṃ me ativiya upakāro”ti taṃ paṭibāhituṃ asakkonto sippaṃ sikkhāpetvā
atk-s0502a:1487_6: “nipphannaṃ te, tāta, sippaṃ, idāni kiṃ karissasī”ti āha. “Bahi gantvā sippaṃ vīmaṃsissāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1487_7: “Kiṃ karissasī”ti? “Gāviṃ vā manussaṃ vā paharitvā māressāmī”ti. “Tātā, gāviṃ mārentassa
atk-s0502a:1487_8: sataṃ daṇḍo hoti manussaṃ mārentassa sahassaṃ, tvaṃ saputtadāropi taṃ nittharituṃ
atk-s0502a:1487_9: na sakkhissasi, mā vinassa, yamhi pahaṭe daṇḍo natthi, tādisaṃ nimātāpitikaṃ kañci
atk-s0502a:1487_10: upadhārehī”ti. So “sādhū”ti sakkharā ucchaṅge katvā tādisaṃ upadhārayamāno vicaranto
atk-s0502a:1487_11: gāviṃ disvā “ayaṃ sasāmikā”ti paharituṃ na visahi, manussaṃ disvā “ayaṃ samātāpitiko”ti
atk-s0502a:1488_0: Tena samayena sunetto nāma paccekabuddho taṃ nagaraṃ nissāya paṇṇasālāya viharati.
atk-s0502a:1488_1: So taṃ piṇḍāya pavisantaṃ nagaradvārantare disvā “ayaṃ nimātāpitiko, imasmiṃ pahaṭe
atk-s0502a:1488_2: daṇḍo natthi, imaṃ paharitvā sippaṃ vīmaṃsissāmī”ti paccekabuddhassa dakkhiṇakaṇṇasotaṃ
atk-s0502a:1488_3: sandhāya sakkharaṃ khipi. Sā dakkhiṇakaṇṇasotena pavisitvā vāmena nikkhami, dukkhā
atk-s0502a:1488_4: vedanā uppajji. Paccekabuddho bhikkhāya carituṃ nāsakkhi, ākāsena paṇṇasālaṃ gantvā
atk-s0502a:1488_5: parinibbāyi. Manussā paccekabuddhe anāgacchante “kiñci aphāsukaṃ bhavissatī”ti cintetvā
atk-s0502a:1488_6: tattha gantvā taṃ parinibbutaṃ disvā rodiṃsu parideviṃsu. Sopi mahājanaṃ gacchantaṃ
atk-s0502a:1488_7: disvā tattha gantvā paccekabuddhaṃ sañjānitvā “ayaṃ piṇḍāya pavisanto dvārantare
atk-s0502a:1488_8: mama sammukhībhūto, ahaṃ attano sippaṃ vīmaṃsanto imaṃ pahari”nti āha. Manussā “iminā
atk-s0502a:1488_9: kira pāpakena paccekabuddho pahaṭo, gaṇhatha gaṇhathā”ti pothetvā tattheva naṃ jīvitakkhayaṃ
atk-s0502a:1488_10: pāpesuṃ. So avīcimhi nibbattitvā yāvāyaṃ mahāpathavī yojanamattaṃ ussannā, tāva paccitvā
atk-s0502a:1488_11: vipākāvasesena gijjhakūṭamatthake saṭṭhikūṭapeto hutvā nibbatti. Satthā tassa imaṃ
atk-s0502a:1488_12: pubbakammaṃ kathetvā, “bhikkhave, bālassa nāma sippaṃ vā issariyaṃ vā uppajjamānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1488_13: anatthāya uppajjati. Bālo hi sippaṃ vā issariyaṃ vā labhitvā attano anatthameva karotī”ti
atk-s0502a:1488_14: anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0502a:1492_0: Tattha yāvadevāti avadhiparicchedanatthe nipāto. Ñattanti jānanasabhāvo. Yaṃ sippaṃ
atk-s0502a:1492_1: jānāti, yamhi vā issariye yase sampattiyañca ṭhito janena ñāyati, pākaṭo paññāto
atk-s0502a:1492_2: hoti, tassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Sippaṃ vā hi issariyādibhāvo vā bālassa anatthāyeva jāyati.
atk-s0502a:1492_3: Taṃ nissāya so attano anatthameva karoti. Hantīti vināseti. Sukkaṃsanti kusalakoṭṭhāsaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1492_4: bālassa hi sippaṃ vā issariyaṃ vā uppajjamānaṃ kusalakoṭṭhāsaṃ ghātentameva uppajjati.
atk-s0502a:1492_5: Muddhanti paññāyetaṃ nāmaṃ. Vipātayanti viddhaṃsayamānaṃ. Tassa hi taṃ sukkaṃsaṃ
atk-s0502a:1492_6: hanantaṃ paññāsaṅkhātaṃ muddhaṃ vipātentaṃ viddhaṃsentameva hantīti.
atk-s0502a:1496: Asantaṃ bhāvanamiccheyyāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sudhammattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi. Desanā macchikāsaṇḍe samuṭṭhāya sāvatthiyaṃ niṭṭhitā.
atk-s0502a:1497_0: Macchikāsaṇḍanagarasmiñhi citto nāma gahapati pañcavaggiyānaṃ abbhantaraṃ mahānāmattheraṃ
atk-s0502a:1497_1: nāma piṇḍāya caramānaṃ disvā tassa iriyāpathe pasīditvā pattaṃ ādāya gehaṃ pavesetvā
atk-s0502a:1497_2: bhojetvā bhattakiccāvasāne dhammakathaṃ suṇanto sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā acalasaddho
atk-s0502a:1497_3: hutvā ambāṭakavanaṃ nāma attano uyyānaṃ saṅghārāmaṃ kattukāmo therassa hatthe udakaṃ
atk-s0502a:1497_4: pātetvā niyyādesi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe “patiṭṭhitaṃ buddhasāsana”nti udakapariyantaṃ katvā
atk-s0502a:1497_5: mahāpathavī kampi. Mahāseṭṭhi uyyāne mahāvihāraṃ kāretvā sabbadisāhi āgatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0502a:1497_6: vivaṭadvāro ahosi. Macchikāsaṇḍe sudhammatthero nāma nevāsiko ahosi.
atk-s0502a:1498_0: Aparena samayena cittassa guṇakathaṃ sutvā dve aggasāvakā tassa saṅgahaṃ kattukāmā
atk-s0502a:1498_1: macchikāsaṇḍaṃ agamaṃsu. Citto gahapati tesaṃ āgamanaṃ sutvā aḍḍhayojanamaggaṃ paccuggantvā
atk-s0502a:1498_2: te ādāya attano vihāraṃ pavesetvā āgantukavattaṃ katvā, “bhante, thokaṃ dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0502a:1498_3: sotukāmomhī”ti dhammasenāpatiṃ yāci. Atha naṃ thero, “upāsaka, addhānena āgatāmhā
atk-s0502a:1498_4: kilantarūpā. Apica thokaṃ suṇāhī”ti tassa dhammaṃ kathesi. So therassa dhammaṃ suṇantova
atk-s0502a:1498_5: anāgāmiphalaṃ pāpuṇi. So dve aggasāvake vanditvā, “bhante, sve bhikkhusahassena saddhiṃ
atk-s0502a:1498_6: mama gehe bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti nimantetvā pacchā nevāsikaṃ sudhammattheraṃ “tumhepi,
atk-s0502a:1498_7: bhante, sve therehi saddhiṃ āgaccheyyāthā”ti nimantesi. So “ayaṃ maṃ pacchā nimantetī”ti
atk-s0502a:1498_8: kuddho paṭikkhipitvā punappunaṃ yāciyamānopi paṭikkhipi eva. Upāsako “paññāyissatha,
atk-s0502a:1498_9: bhante”ti pakkamitvā punadivase attano nivesane mahādānaṃ sajjesi. Sudhammattheropi
atk-s0502a:1498_10: paccūsakāleyeva “kīdiso nu kho gahapatinā aggasāvakānaṃ sakkāro sajjito, sve gantvā
atk-s0502a:1498_11: passissāmī”ti cintetvā pātova pattacīvaraṃ ādāya tassa gehaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:1499_0: So gahapatinā “nisīdatha, bhante”ti vuccamānopi “nāhaṃ nisīdāmi, piṇḍāya carissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:1499_1: vatvā aggasāvakānaṃ paṭiyāditaṃ sakkāraṃ oloketvā gahapatiṃ jātiyā ghaṭṭetukāmo “uḷāro
atk-s0502a:1499_2: te, gahapati, sakkāro, apicettha ekaññeva natthī”ti āha. “Kiṃ, bhante”ti? “Tilasaṃguḷikā,
atk-s0502a:1499_3: gahapatī”ti vatvā gahapatinā kākopamāya apasādito kujjhitvā “eso te, gahapati, āvāso,
atk-s0502a:1499_4: pakkamissāmaha”nti vatvā yāvatatiyaṃ vāriyamānopi pakkamitvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā
atk-s0502a:1499_5: cittena ca attanā ca vuttavacanaṃ ārocesi. Satthā “tayā upāsako saddho pasanno hīnena
atk-s0502a:1499_6: khuṃsito”ti tasseva dosaṃ āropetvā paṭisāraṇīyakammaṃ kārāpetvā “gaccha, cittagahapatiṃ
atk-s0502a:1499_7: khamāpehī”ti pesesi. So tattha gantvā, “gahapati, mayhameva so doso, khamāhi me”ti
atk-s0502a:1499_8: vatvāpi “nāhaṃ khamāmī”ti tena paṭikkhitto maṅkubhūto taṃ khamāpetuṃ nāsakkhi. Punadeva
atk-s0502a:1499_9: satthu santikaṃ paccāgamāsi. Satthā “nāssa upāsako khamissatī”ti jānantopi “mānathaddho
atk-s0502a:1499_10: esa, tiṃsayojanaṃ tāva maggaṃ gantvā paccāgacchatū”ti khamanūpāyaṃ anācikkhitvāva
atk-s0502a:1499_11: uyyojesi. Athassa punāgatakāle nihatamānassa anudūtaṃ datvā “gaccha, iminā saddhiṃ
atk-s0502a:1499_12: gantvā upāsakaṃ khamāpehī”ti vatvā “samaṇena nāma ‘mayhaṃ vihāro, mayhaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1499_13: mayhaṃ upāsako, mayhaṃ upāsikā’ti mānaṃ vā issaṃ vā kātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Evaṃ karontassa
atk-s0502a:1499_14: hi icchāmānādayo kilesā vaḍḍhantī”ti anusandhiṃ ghaṭṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:1506: Iti bālassa saṅkappo, icchā māno ca vaḍḍhatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1507_0: Tattha asantanti yo bālo bhikkhu avijjamānaṃ sambhāvanaṃ iccheyya, “assaddhova samāno
atk-s0502a:1507_1: ‘saddhoti maṃ jano jānātū’ti icchatī”ti. Pāpicchatāniddese vuttanayeneva bālo “asaddho
atk-s0502a:1507_2: dussīlo appassuto appavivitto kusīto anupaṭṭhitassati asamāhito duppañño akhīṇāsavova
atk-s0502a:1507_3: samāno ‘aho vata maṃ jano ayaṃ saddho, sīlavā, bahussuto, pavivitto, āraddhavīriyo,
atk-s0502a:1507_4: upaṭṭhitassati, samāhito, paññavā, khīṇāsavo’ti jāneyyā”ti idaṃ asantasambhāvanaṃ
atk-s0502a:1507_5: icchati. Purekkhāranti parivāraṃ. “Aho vata maṃ sakalavihāre bhikkhū parivāretvā
atk-s0502a:1507_6: pañhaṃ pucchantā vihareyyu”nti evaṃ icchācāre ṭhatvā purekkhārañca bhikkhūsu icchati.
atk-s0502a:1507_7: Āvāsesūti saṅghikesu ca āvāsesu yāni vihāramajjhe paṇītasenāsanāni, tāni attano sandiṭṭhasambhattādīnaṃ
atk-s0502a:1507_8: bhikkhūnaṃ “tumhe idha vasathā”ti vicārento sayampi varataraṃ senāsanaṃ palibodhento,
atk-s0502a:1507_9: sesānaṃ āgantukabhikkhūnaṃ paccantimāni lāmakasenāsanāni ceva amanussapariggahitāni
atk-s0502a:1507_10: ca “tumhe idha vasathā”ti vicārento āvāsesu issariyaṃ icchati. Pūjā parakulesu cāti
atk-s0502a:1507_11: neva mātāpitūnaṃ na ñātakānaṃ paresuyeva kulesu “aho vatime mayhameva dadeyyuṃ, na
atk-s0502a:1508_0: Mameva kata maññantūti yassa ca bālassa “yaṃkiñci vihāre uposathāgārādikaraṇavasena
atk-s0502a:1508_1: kataṃ navakammaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ amhākaṃ therena katanti evaṃ gihī ca pabbajitā ca ubhopi
atk-s0502a:1508_2: mameva nissāya kataṃ parikammaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ maññantū”ti saṅkappo uppajjati. Mamevātivasā
atk-s0502a:1508_3: assūti “gihī ca pabbajitā ca sabbepi mameva vase vattantu, sakaṭagoṇavāsipharasuādīni
atk-s0502a:1508_4: vā laddhabbāni hontu, antamaso yāgumattampi tāpetvā pivanādīni vā, evarūpesu kiccākiccesu
atk-s0502a:1508_5: khuddakamahantesu karaṇīyesu kismiñci ekakiccepi mameva vase vattantu, mameva āpucchitvā
atk-s0502a:1508_6: karontū”ti saṅkappo uppajjati. Iti bālassāti yassa bālassa sā ca icchā ayañca evarūpo
atk-s0502a:1508_7: saṅkappo uppajjati, tassa neva vipassanā, na maggaphalāni vaḍḍhanti. Kevalaṃ panassa
atk-s0502a:1508_8: candodaye samuddassa udakaṃ viya chasu dvāresu uppajjamānā taṇhā ceva navavidhamāno ca vaḍḍhatīti.
atk-s0502a:1510_0: Sudhammattheropi imaṃ ovādaṃ sutvā satthāraṃ vanditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā
atk-s0502a:1510_1: tena anudūtena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ gantvā upāsakassa cakkhupathe āpattiṃ paṭikaritvā
atk-s0502a:1510_2: upāsakaṃ khamāpesi. So upāsakena “khamāmahaṃ, bhante, sace mayhaṃ doso atthi, khamatha
atk-s0502a:1510_3: me”ti paṭikhamāpito satthārā dinne ovāde ṭhatvā katipāheneva saha paṭisambhidāhi
atk-s0502a:1510_4: arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Upāsakopi cintesi – “mayā satthāraṃ adisvāva sotāpattiphalaṃ pattaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1510_5: adisvā eva anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhito, satthāraṃ me daṭṭhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. So tilataṇḍulasappiphāṇitavatthacchādanādīhi
atk-s0502a:1510_6: paripūrāni pañca sakaṭasatāni yojāpetvā “satthāraṃ daṭṭhukāmā āgacchantu, piṇḍapātādīhi
atk-s0502a:1510_7: na kilamissantī”ti bhikkhusaṅghassa ārocāpetvā bhikkhunīsaṅghassāpi upāsakānampi
atk-s0502a:1510_8: upāsikānampi ārocāpesi. Tena saddhiṃ pañcasatā pañcasatā bhikkhū ca bhikkhuniyo ca
atk-s0502a:1510_9: upāsakā ca upāsikāyo ca nikkhamiṃsu. So tesañceva attano parisāya cāti tiṇṇaṃ janasahassānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1510_10: yathā tiṃsayojane magge yāgubhattādīhi kiñci vekallaṃ na hoti, tathā saṃvidahi. Tassa
atk-s0502a:1510_11: pana nikkhantabhāvaṃ ñatvā yojane yojane devatā khandhāvāraṃ bandhitvā dibbehi yāgukhajjakabhattapānakādīhi
atk-s0502a:1510_12: taṃ mahājanaṃ upaṭṭhahiṃsu, kassaci kenaci vekallaṃ na hoti. Evaṃ devatāhi upaṭṭhiyamāno
atk-s0502a:1510_13: devasikaṃ yojanaṃ gacchanto māsena sāvatthiṃ pāpuṇi, pañca sakaṭasatāni yathāpūritāneva
atk-s0502a:1510_14: ahesuṃ. Devatāhi ceva manussehi ca abhihaṭaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ vissajjentova agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:1511_0: Satthā ānandattheraṃ āha – “ānanda, ajja vaḍḍhamānakacchāyāya citto gahapati pañcahi
atk-s0502a:1511_1: upāsakasatehi parivuto āgantvā maṃ vandissatī”ti. “Kiṃ pana, bhante, tassa tumhākaṃ
atk-s0502a:1511_2: vandanakāle kiñci pāṭihāriyaṃ bhavissatī”ti? “Bhavissati, ānandā”ti. “Kiṃ, bhante”ti?
atk-s0502a:1511_3: Tassa āgantvā “maṃ vandanakāle rājamānena aṭṭhakarīsamatte padese jaṇṇukamattena
atk-s0502a:1511_4: odhinā pañcavaṇṇānaṃ dibbapupphānaṃ ghanavassaṃ vassissatī”ti. Taṃ kathaṃ sutvā nagaravāsino
atk-s0502a:1511_5: “evaṃ mahāpuñño kira citto nāma gahapati āgantvā ajja satthāraṃ vandissati, evarūpaṃ
atk-s0502a:1511_6: kira pāṭihāriyaṃ bhavissati, mayampi taṃ mahāpuññaṃ daṭṭhuṃ labhissāmā”ti paṇṇākāraṃ
atk-s0502a:1511_7: ādāya maggassa ubhosu passesu aṭṭhaṃsu. Vihārasamīpe āgatakāle pañca bhikkhusatāni
atk-s0502a:1511_8: paṭhamaṃ āgamiṃsu. Citto gahapati, “ammā, tumhe pacchato āgacchathā”ti mahāupāsikāyo
atk-s0502a:1511_9: ṭhapetvā pañcahi upāsakasatehi parivuto satthu santikaṃ agamāsi. Buddhānaṃ sammukhaṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a:1511_10: pana ṭhitā vā nisinnā vā ito vā etto vā na honti, buddhavīthiyā dvīsu passesu niccalāva
atk-s0502a:1511_11: tiṭṭhanti. Citto gahapati mahantaṃ buddhavīthiṃ okkami. Tīṇi phalāni pattena ariyasāvakena
atk-s0502a:1511_12: olokitolokitaṭṭhānaṃ kampi. “Eso kira citto gahapatī”ti mahājano olokesi. So satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:1511_13: upasaṅkamitvā chabbaṇṇānaṃ buddharasmīnaṃ anto pavisitvā dvīsu gopphakesu satthu
atk-s0502a:1511_14: pāde gahetvā vandi. Taṃ khaṇaññeva vuttappakāraṃ pupphavassaṃ vassi, sādhukārasahassāni
atk-s0502a:1511_15: pavattayiṃsu. So ekamāsaṃ satthu santike vasi, vasamāno ca sakalaṃ buddhappamukhaṃ
atk-s0502a:1511_16: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ vihāreyeva nisīdāpetvā mahādānaṃ adāsi, attanā saddhiṃ āgatepi antovihāreyeva
atk-s0502a:1511_17: katvā paṭijaggi. Ekadivasampi attano sakaṭesu kiñci gahetabbaṃ nāhosi, devamanussehi
atk-s0502a:1511_18: ābhatapaṇṇākāreneva dānaṃ adāsi, sabbakiccāni akāsi. So satthāraṃ vanditvā āha –
atk-s0502a:1511_19: “bhante, ahaṃ ‘tumhākaṃ dānaṃ dassāmī’ti āgacchanto māsaṃ antarāmagge ahosiṃ. Idheva
atk-s0502a:1511_20: me māso vītivatto, mayā ābhataṃ paṇṇākāraṃ kiñci gahetuṃ na labhāmi, ettakaṃ kālaṃ
atk-s0502a:1511_21: devamanussehi ābhatapaṇṇākāreneva dānaṃ adāsiṃ, sohaṃ sacepi idha saṃvaccharaṃ vasissāmi,
atk-s0502a:1511_22: neva mama deyyadhammaṃ dātuṃ labhissāmi. Ahaṃ sakaṭāni otāretvā gantuṃ icchāmi, paṭisāmanaṭṭhānaṃ me ārocāpethā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1512_0: Satthā ānandattheraṃ āha – “ānanda, upāsakassa ekaṃ padesaṃ tucchaṃ kāretvā dehī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1512_1: Thero tathā akāsi. Kappiyabhūmi kira cittassa gahapatino anuññātā. Upāsakopi attanā
atk-s0502a:1512_2: saddhiṃ āgatehi tīhi janasahassehi saddhiṃ tucchasakaṭehi puna maggaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0502a:1512_3: Devamanussā uṭṭhāya, “ayya, tayā tucchasakaṭehi gamanakammaṃ kata”nti sattahi ratanehi
atk-s0502a:1512_4: sakaṭāni pūrayiṃsu. So attano ābhatapaṇṇākāreneva mahājanaṃ paṭijagganto agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:1512_5: Ānandatthero satthāraṃ vanditvā āha – “bhante, tumhākaṃ santikaṃ āgacchantopi māsena
atk-s0502a:1512_6: āgato, idhāpi māsameva vuṭṭho, ettakaṃ kālaṃ devamanussehi abhihaṭapaṇṇākāreneva
atk-s0502a:1512_7: mahāvadānaṃ adāsi, idāni pañca sakaṭasatāni tucchāni katvā māseneva kira gamissati,
atk-s0502a:1512_8: devamanussā panassa uṭṭhāya, ‘ayya, tayā tucchasakaṭehi gamanakammaṃ kata’nti pañca
atk-s0502a:1512_9: sakaṭasatāni sattaratanehi pūrayiṃsu. So puna attano ābhatapaṇṇākāreneva kira mahājanaṃ
atk-s0502a:1512_10: paṭijagganto gamissatī”ti. “Kiṃ pana, bhante, etassa tumhākaṃ santikaṃ āgacchantassevāyaṃ
atk-s0502a:1512_11: sakkāro uppajjati, udāhu aññattha gacchantassāpi uppajjatī”ti? “Ānanda, mama santikaṃ
atk-s0502a:1512_12: āgacchantassāpi aññattha gacchantassāpi etassa uppajjateva. Ayañhi upāsako saddho
atk-s0502a:1512_13: pasanno sampannasīlo, evarūpo puggalo yaṃ yaṃ padesaṃ bhajati, tattha tatthevassa
atk-s0502a:1512_14: lābhasakkāro nibbattatī”ti vatvā satthā imaṃ pakiṇṇakavagge gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1514: Yaṃ yaṃ padesaṃ bhajati, tattha tattheva pūjito”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:1516: Evaṃ vutte ānandatthero cittassa pubbakammaṃ pucchi. Athassa satthā ācikkhanto āha –
atk-s0502a:1517_0: Ānanda, ayaṃ padumuttarassa bhagavato pādamūle katābhinīhāro kappasatasahassaṃ devamanussesu
atk-s0502a:1517_1: saṃsaritvā kassapabuddhakāle migaluddakakule nibbatto vuddhimanvāya ekadivasaṃ deve
atk-s0502a:1517_2: vassante migānaṃ māraṇattāya sattiṃ ādāya araññaṃ gantvā mige olokento ekasmiṃ akaṭapabbhāre
atk-s0502a:1517_3: sasīsaṃ pārupitvā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ nisinnaṃ disvā “eko, ayyo, samaṇadhammaṃ karonto
atk-s0502a:1517_4: nisinno bhavissati, bhattamassa āharissāmī”ti vegena gehaṃ gantvā ekasmiṃ uddhane
atk-s0502a:1517_5: hiyyo, ābhatamaṃsaṃ, ekasmiṃ bhattaṃ pacāpetvā aññe piṇḍapātacārike bhikkhū disvā
atk-s0502a:1517_6: tesampi patte ādāya paññattāsane nisīdāpetvā bhikkhaṃ sampādetvā, “ayye, parivisathā”ti
atk-s0502a:1517_7: aññaṃ āṇāpetvā taṃ bhattaṃ puṭake pakkhipitvā ādāya gacchanto antarāmagge nānāpupphāni
atk-s0502a:1517_8: ocinitvā pattapuṭe katvā therassa nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā “mayhaṃ, bhante, saṅgahaṃ
atk-s0502a:1517_9: karothā”ti vatvā pattaṃ ādāya pūretvā therassa hatthe ṭhapetvā tehi pupphehi pūjaṃ
atk-s0502a:1517_10: katvā “yathā me ayaṃ rasapiṇḍapāto pupphapūjāya saddhiṃ cittaṃ tosesi, evaṃ nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a:1517_11: paṇṇākārasahassāni ādāya āgantvā mayhaṃ cittaṃ tosentu, pañcavaṇṇakusumavassañca
atk-s0502a:1517_12: vassatū”ti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi. So yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devaloke nibbatti, nibbattaṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a:1517_13: jaṇṇukamattena odhinā dibbapupphavassaṃ vassi. Idānipissa jātadivase ceva idha ca
atk-s0502a:1517_14: āgatassa pupphavassavassanañca paṇṇākārābhihāro ca sattahi ratanehi sakaṭapūraṇañca
atk-s0502a:1520: Aññā hi lābhūpanisāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto vanavāsikatissattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi. Desanā rājagahe samuṭṭhitā.
atk-s0502a:1521_0: Sāriputtattherasa kira pitu vaṅgantabrāhmaṇassa sahāyako mahāsenabrāhmaṇo nāma rājagahe
atk-s0502a:1521_1: vasati. Sāriputtatthero ekadivasaṃ piṇḍāya caranto tasmiṃ anukampāya tassa gehadvāraṃ
atk-s0502a:1521_2: agamāsi. So pana parikkhīṇavibhavo daliddo. So “mama putto mayhaṃ gehadvāraṃ piṇḍāya
atk-s0502a:1521_3: carituṃ āgato bhavissati, ahañcamhi duggato, mayhaṃ duggatabhāvaṃ na jānāti maññe,
atk-s0502a:1521_4: natthi me koci deyyadhammo”ti therassa sammukhā bhavituṃ asakkonto nilīyi. Thero
atk-s0502a:1521_5: aparampi divasaṃ agamāsi, brāhmaṇo tatheva nilīyi. “Kiñcideva labhitvā dassāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:1521_6: cintentopi nālabhi. Athekadivasaṃ ekasmiṃ brāhmaṇavācake thūlasāṭakena saddhiṃ pāyasapātiṃ
atk-s0502a:1521_7: labhitvā ādāya gehaṃ gantvāva theraṃ anussari, “imaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ mayā therassa dātuṃ
atk-s0502a:1521_8: vaṭṭatī”ti. Theropi taṃ khaṇaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā samāpattito vuṭṭhāya taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:1521_9: disvā “brāhmaṇo deyyadhammaṃ labhitvā mama āgamanaṃ paccāsīsati, mayā tattha gantuṃ
atk-s0502a:1521_10: vaṭṭatī”ti saṅghāṭiṃ pārupitvā pattaṃ ādāya tassa gehadvāre ṭhitameva attānaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0502a:1522_0: Brāhmaṇo theraṃ disvāva cittaṃ pasīdi. Atha naṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā paṭisanthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:1522_1: katvā antogehe nisīdāpetvā pāyasapātiṃ gahetvā therassa patte ākiri. Thero upaḍḍhaṃ
atk-s0502a:1522_2: sampaṭicchitvā hatthena pattaṃ pidahi. Atha naṃ brāhmaṇo āha – “bhante, ekapaṭivīsamattova
atk-s0502a:1522_3: ayaṃ pāyaso, paralokasaṅgahaṃ me karotha, mā idhalokasaṅgahaṃ, niravasesameva dātukāmomhī”ti
atk-s0502a:1522_4: sabbaṃ ākiri. Thero tattheva paribhuñji. Athassa bhattakiccapariyosāne tampi sāṭakaṃ
atk-s0502a:1522_5: datvā vanditvā evamāha – “bhante, ahampi tumhehi diṭṭhadhammameva pāpuṇeyya”nti.
atk-s0502a:1522_6: Thero “evaṃ hotu brāhmaṇā”ti tassa anumodanaṃ katvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamanto anupubbena
atk-s0502a:1522_7: cārikaṃ caranto jetavanaṃ agamāsi. “Duggatakāle dinnadānaṃ pana ativiya tosetī”ti
atk-s0502a:1522_8: brāhmaṇopi taṃ dānaṃ datvā pasannacitto somanassajāto there adhimattaṃ sinehamakāsi.
atk-s0502a:1522_9: So there sineheneva kālaṃ katvā sāvatthiyaṃ therassūpaṭṭhākakule paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a:1522_10: Taṃkhaṇeyeva panassa mātā “kucchiyaṃ me gabbho patiṭṭhito”ti ñatvā sāmikassa ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:1523_0: Tassā accuṇhaatisītaatiambilādiparibhogaṃ vajjetvā sukhena gabbhaṃ parihariyamānāya
atk-s0502a:1523_1: evarūpo dohaḷo uppajji “aho vatāhaṃ sāriputtattherappamukhāni pañca bhikkhusatāni
atk-s0502a:1523_2: nimantetvā gehe nisīdāpetvā asambhinnakhīrapāyasaṃ datvā sayampi kāsāyavatthāni paridahitvā
atk-s0502a:1523_3: suvaṇṇasarakaṃ ādāya āsanapariyante nisīditvā ettakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ucchiṭṭhapāyasaṃ
atk-s0502a:1523_4: paribhuñjeyya”nti. Tassā kira so kāsāyavatthaparidahane dohaḷo kucchiyaṃ puttassa
atk-s0502a:1523_5: buddhasāsane pabbajjāya pubbanimittaṃ ahosi. Athassā ñātakā “dhammiko no dhītāya
atk-s0502a:1523_6: dohaḷo”ti sāriputtattheraṃ saṅghattheraṃ katvā pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ asambhinnakhīrapāyasaṃ
atk-s0502a:1523_7: adaṃsu. Sāpi ekaṃ kāsāvaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ pārupitvā suvaṇṇasarakaṃ gahetvā āsanapariyante
atk-s0502a:1523_8: nisinnā ucchiṭṭhapāyasaṃ paribhuñji, dohaḷo paṭippassambhi. Tassā yāva gabbhavuṭṭhānā
atk-s0502a:1523_9: antarantarā katamaṅgalesupi, dasamāsaccayena puttaṃ vijātāya katamaṅgalesupi sāriputtattherappamukhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1523_10: pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ appodakamadhupāyasameva adaṃsu. Pubbe kiresa dārakena brāhmaṇakāle
atk-s0502a:1524_0: Jātamaṅgaladivase pana taṃ dārakaṃ pātova nhāpetvā maṇḍetvā sirisayane satasahassagghanikassa
atk-s0502a:1524_1: kambalassa upari nipajjāpesuṃ. So tattha nipannakova theraṃ oloketvā “ayaṃ me pubbācariyo,
atk-s0502a:1524_2: mayā theraṃ nissāya ayaṃ sampatti laddhā, mayā imassa ekaṃ pariccāgaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0502a:1524_3: sikkhāpadagahaṇatthāya ānīyamāno taṃ kambalaṃ cūḷaṅguliyā veṭhetvā aggahesi. Athassa
atk-s0502a:1524_4: “aṅguliyaṃ kambalo laggo”ti te taṃ harituṃ ārabhiṃsu. So parodi. Ñātakā “apetha,
atk-s0502a:1524_5: mā dārakaṃ rodāpethā”ti kambaleneva saddhiṃ ānayiṃsu. So theraṃ vandanakāle kambalato
atk-s0502a:1524_6: aṅguliṃ apakaḍḍhitvā kambalaṃ therassa pādamūle pātesi. Ñātakā “daharakumārena ajānitvā
atk-s0502a:1524_7: kata”nti avatvā “puttena no dinnaṃ, pariccattameva hotu, bhante”ti vatvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:1524_8: satasahassagghanikena kambalena pūjākārakassa tumhākaṃ dāsassa sikkhāpadāni dethā”ti
atk-s0502a:1524_9: āhaṃsu. “Ko nāmo ayaṃ dārako”ti? “Bhante, ayyena samānanāmako, tisso nāmesa bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1524_10: Thero kira gihikāle upatissamāṇavo nāma ahosi. Mātāpissa cintesi – “na mayā puttassa
atk-s0502a:1524_11: ajjhāsayo bhinditabbo”ti. Evaṃ dārakassa nāmakaraṇamaṅgalaṃ katvā puna tassa āhāraparibhogamaṅgalepi
atk-s0502a:1524_12: puna tassa kaṇṇavijjhanamaṅgalepi dussagahaṇamaṅgalepi cūḷākappanamaṅgalepi sāriputtattherappamukhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1525_0: Dārako vuddhimanvāya sattavassikakāle mātaraṃ āha – “amma, therassa santike pabbajissāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1525_1: “Sādhu, tāta, pubbevāhaṃ ‘na mayā puttassa ajjhāsayo bhinditabbo’ti manaṃ akāsiṃ,
atk-s0502a:1525_2: pabbaja, puttā”ti theraṃ nimantāpetvā tassa āgatassa bhikkhañca datvā, “bhante, tumhākaṃ
atk-s0502a:1525_3: dāso ‘pabbajissāmī’ti vadati, imaṃ ādāya sāyaṃ vihāraṃ āgamissāmā”ti theraṃ uyyojetvā
atk-s0502a:1525_4: sāyanhasamaye mahantena sakkārasammānena puttaṃ ādāya vihāraṃ gantvā therassa niyyādesi.
atk-s0502a:1525_5: Thero tena saddhiṃ kathesi – “tissa, pabbajjā nāma dukkarā, uṇhena atthe sati sītaṃ
atk-s0502a:1525_6: labhati, sītena atthe sati uṇhaṃ labhati, pabbajitā kicchena jīvanti, tvañca sukhedhito”ti.
atk-s0502a:1525_7: “Bhante, ahaṃ tumhehi vuttaniyāmeneva sabbaṃ kātuṃ sakkhissāmī”ti. Thero “sādhū”ti
atk-s0502a:1525_8: vatvā tassa paṭikūlamanasikāravasena tacapañcakakammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhitvā taṃ pabbājesi.
atk-s0502a:1525_9: Sakalampi hi dvattiṃsākāraṃ kathetuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Sabbaṃ kathetuṃ asakkontena pana
atk-s0502a:1525_10: tacapañcakakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetabbameva. Idañhi kammaṭṭhānaṃ sabbabuddhānaṃ avijahitameva.
atk-s0502a:1525_11: Kesādīsu ekekakoṭṭhāsesu arahattaṃ pattānaṃ bhikkhūnampi bhikkhunīnampi upāsakānampi
atk-s0502a:1525_12: upāsikānampi paricchedo natthi. Abyattā bhikkhū pana pabbajentā arahattassūpanissayaṃ
atk-s0502a:1525_13: nāsenti. Tasmā thero kammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhitvā pabbājetvā dasasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0502a:1526_0: Mātāpitaro puttassa pabbajitasakkāraṃ karontā sattāhaṃ vihāreyeva buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0502a:1526_2: paribhuñjituṃ na sakkomā”ti ujjhāyiṃsu. Tassapi mātāpitaro sattame divase sāyaṃ gehaṃ
atk-s0502a:1526_3: agamaṃsu. Sāmaṇero aṭṭhame divase bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi. Sāvatthivāsino
atk-s0502a:1526_4: “sāmaṇero kira ajja piṇḍāya pavisissati, sakkāramassa karissāmā”ti pañcahi sāṭakasatehi
atk-s0502a:1526_5: cumbaṭakāni katvā pañca piṇḍapātasatāni sajjetvā ādāya paṭipathe ṭhatvā adaṃsu, punadivase
atk-s0502a:1526_6: vihārassa upavanaṃ āgantvā adaṃsu. Evaṃ sāmaṇero dvīheva divasehi sāṭakasahassehi
atk-s0502a:1526_7: saddhiṃ piṇḍapātasahassaṃ labhitvā bhikkhusaṅghassa dāpesi. Brāhmaṇakāle dinnathūlasāṭakassa
atk-s0502a:1526_8: kiresa nissando. Athassa bhikkhū “piṇḍapātadāyakatisso”ti nāmaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1527_0: Punekadivasaṃ sāmaṇero sītakāle vihāracārikaṃ caranto bhikkhū tattha tattha aggisālādīsu
atk-s0502a:1527_1: visibbente disvā āha – “kiṃ, bhante, visibbentā nisinnātthā”ti? “Sītaṃ no pīḷeti
atk-s0502a:1527_2: sāmaṇero”ti. “Bhante, sītakāle nāma kambalaṃ pārupituṃ vaṭṭati. So hi sītaṃ paṭibāhituṃ
atk-s0502a:1527_3: samattho”ti. Sāmaṇera “tvaṃ mahāpuñño kambalaṃ labheyyāsi, amhākaṃ kuto kambalo”ti.
atk-s0502a:1527_4: “Tena hi, bhante, kambalatthikā mayā saddhiṃ āgacchantū”ti sakalavihāre ārocāpesi.
atk-s0502a:1527_5: Atha bhikkhū “sāmaṇerena saddhiṃ gantvā kambalaṃ āharissāmā”ti sattavassikasāmaṇeraṃ
atk-s0502a:1527_6: nissāya sahassamattā bhikkhū nikkhamiṃsu. So “ettakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kuto kambalaṃ
atk-s0502a:1527_7: labhissāmī”ti cittampi anuppādetvā te ādāya nagarābhimukho pāyāsi. Sudinnassa hi
atk-s0502a:1527_8: dānassa evarūpo ānubhāvo hoti. So bahinagareyeva gharapaṭipāṭiyā caranto pañca kambalasatāni
atk-s0502a:1527_9: labhitvā antonagaraṃ pāvisi. Manussā ito cito ca kambale āharanti.
atk-s0502a:1528_0: Eko pana puriso āpaṇadvārena āgacchanto pañca kambalasatāni pasāretvā nisinnaṃ ekaṃ
atk-s0502a:1528_1: āpaṇikaṃ disvā āha – “ambho, eko sāmaṇero kambale saṃharanto āgacchati, tava kambale
atk-s0502a:1528_2: paṭicchādehī”ti? “Kiṃ pana so dinnake gaṇhāti, udāhu adinnake”ti? “Dinnake gaṇhātī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1528_3: “Evaṃ sante sace icchāmi, dassāmi, no ce, na dassāmi, gaccha tva”nti uyyojesi. Maccharino
atk-s0502a:1528_4: hi andhabālā evarūpesu dānaṃ dadamānesu maccharāyitvā asadisadānaṃ disvā maccharāyanto
atk-s0502a:1528_5: kāḷo viya niraye nibbattanti. Āpaṇiko cintesi – “ayaṃ puriso attano dhammatāya āgacchamāno
atk-s0502a:1528_6: ‘tava kambale paṭicchādehī’ti maṃ āha. ‘Sacepi so dinnakaṃ gaṇhā’ti, ahaṃ pana ‘mama
atk-s0502a:1528_7: santakaṃ sace icchāmi, dassāmi, no ce, na dassāmī’ti avacaṃ, diṭṭhakaṃ pana adentassa
atk-s0502a:1528_8: lajjā uppajjati, attano santakaṃ paṭicchādentassa doso natthi, imesu pañcakambalasatesu
atk-s0502a:1528_9: dve kambalāni satasahassagghanikāni, imāneva paṭicchādetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Dvepi kambale
atk-s0502a:1528_10: dasāya dasaṃ sambandhitvā tesaṃ antare pakkhipitvā paṭicchādesi. Sāmaṇeropi bhikkhusahassena
atk-s0502a:1528_11: saddhiṃ taṃ padesaṃ pāpuṇi. Āpaṇikassa sāmaṇeraṃ disvāva puttasineho uppajji, sakalasarīraṃ
atk-s0502a:1528_12: sinehena paripuṇṇaṃ ahosi. So cintesi – “tiṭṭhatu kambalāni, imaṃ disvā hadayamaṃsampi
atk-s0502a:1528_13: dātuṃ yutta”nti. Te dvepi kambale nīharitvā sāmaṇerassa pādamūle ṭhapetvā vanditvā,
atk-s0502a:1528_14: “bhante, tayā diṭṭhadhammassa bhāgī assa”nti avaca. Sopissa “evaṃ hotū”ti anumodanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a:1529_0: Sāmaṇero antonagarepi pañca kambalasatāni labhi. Evaṃ ekadivasaṃyeva kambalasahassaṃ
atk-s0502a:1529_1: labhitvā bhikkhusahassassa adāsi. Athassa kambaladāyakatissattheroti nāmaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1529_2: Evaṃ nāmakaraṇadivase dinnakambalo sattavassikakāle kambalasahassabhāvaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:1529_3: Buddhasāsanañhi ṭhapetvā natthaññaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ, yattha appaṃ dinnaṃ bahuṃ hoti, bahuṃ
atk-s0502a:1530: “Tathārūpoyaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhusaṅgho, yathārūpe bhikkhusaṅghe appaṃ dinnaṃ bahuṃ hoti, bahuṃ dinnaṃ bahutara”nti –
atk-s0502a:1531_0: Evaṃ sāmaṇero ekakambalassa nissandena sattavassikova kambalasahassaṃ labhi. Tassa
atk-s0502a:1531_1: jetavane viharantassa abhikkhaṇaṃ ñātidāyakā santikaṃ āgantvā kathāsallāpaṃ karonti.
atk-s0502a:1531_2: So cintesi – “mayā idha vasantena ñātidāyakesu āgantvā kathentesu akathetumpi na
atk-s0502a:1531_3: sakkā, etehi saddhiṃ kathāpapañcena attano patiṭṭhaṃ kātuṃ na sakkā, yaṃnūnāhaṃ satthu
atk-s0502a:1531_4: santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggaṇhitvā araññaṃ paviseyya”nti. So satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0502a:1531_5: vanditvā yāva arahattā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā upajjhāyaṃ vanditvā pattacīvaramādāya
atk-s0502a:1531_6: vihārā nikkhamitvā “sace āsannaṭṭhāne vasissāmi, ñātakā maṃ pakkosissantī”ti vīsati
atk-s0502a:1531_7: yojanasataṃ maggaṃ agamāsi. Athekena gāmadvārena gacchanto ekaṃ mahallakapurisaṃ
atk-s0502a:1531_8: disvā pucchi – “kiṃ nu kho, mahāupāsaka, imasmiṃ padese vasantānaṃ āraññakavihāro
atk-s0502a:1531_9: atthī”ti? “Atthi, bhante”ti. “Tena hi me maggaṃ ācikkhāhī”ti. Mahallakaupāsakassa
atk-s0502a:1531_10: pana taṃ disvāva puttasineho udapādi. Athassa tattheva ṭhito anācikkhitvā “ehi, bhante,
atk-s0502a:1531_11: ācikkhissāmi te”ti gahetvā agamāsi. Sāmaṇero tena saddhiṃ gacchanto antarāmagge nānāpupphaphalapaṭimaṇḍite
atk-s0502a:1531_12: rukkhapabbatapadese disvā “ayaṃ, upāsaka, kiṃ padeso nāma, ayaṃ upāsaka kiṃ padeso
atk-s0502a:1531_13: nāmā”ti pucchi. Sopissa tesaṃ nāmāni ācikkhanto āraññakavihāraṃ patvā “idaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a:1531_14: phāsukaṭṭhānaṃ, idheva vasāhī”ti vatvā, “bhante, ko nāmo tva”nti nāmaṃ pucchitvā
atk-s0502a:1531_15: “ahaṃ vanavāsītisso nāma upāsakā”ti vutte, “sve amhākaṃ gāme bhikkhāya carituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0502a:1531_16: vatvā nivattitvā antogāmameva gato. “Vanavāsītisso nāma vihāraṃ āgato, tassa yāgubhattādīni
atk-s0502a:1532_0: Sāmaṇero paṭhamameva tisso nāma hutvā tato piṇḍapātadāyakatisso kambaladāyakatisso
atk-s0502a:1532_1: vanavāsītissoti tīṇi nāmāni labhitvā sattavassabbhantare cattāri nāmāni labhi. So
atk-s0502a:1532_2: punadivase pātova taṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi. Manussā bhikkhaṃ datvā vandiṃsu. Sāmaṇero
atk-s0502a:1532_3: “sukhitā hotha, dukkhā muccathā”ti āha. Ekamanussopi tassa bhikkhaṃ datvā puna gehaṃ
atk-s0502a:1532_4: gantuṃ nāsakkhi, sabbeva olokentā aṭṭhaṃsu. Sopi attano yāpanamattameva gaṇhi. Sakalagāmavāsino
atk-s0502a:1532_5: tassa pādamūle urena nipajjitvā, “bhante, tumhesu imaṃ temāsaṃ idha vasantesu mayaṃ
atk-s0502a:1532_6: tīṇi saraṇāni gahetvā pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāya māsassa aṭṭha uposathakammāni upavasissāma,
atk-s0502a:1532_7: idha vasanatthāya no paṭiññaṃ dethā”ti. So upakāraṃ sallakkhetvā tesaṃ paṭiññaṃ datvā
atk-s0502a:1532_8: nibaddhaṃ tattheva piṇḍapātacāraṃ cari. Vanditavanditakkhaṇe ca “sukhitā hotha, dukkhā
atk-s0502a:1532_9: muccathā”ti padadvayameva kathetvā pakkāmi. So tatthevapaṭhamamāsañca dutiyamāsañca
atk-s0502a:1532_10: vītināmetvā tatiyamāse gacchante saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:1533_0: Athassa pavāretvā vuṭṭhavassakāle upajjhāyo satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā āha
atk-s0502a:1533_1: – “ahaṃ, bhante, tissasāmaṇerassa santikaṃ gacchāmī”ti. “Gaccha, sāriputtā”ti. So
atk-s0502a:1533_2: attano parivāre pañcasate bhikkhū ādāya pakkanto, “āvuso moggallāna, ahaṃ tissasāmaṇerassa
atk-s0502a:1533_3: santikaṃ gacchāmī”ti āha. Mahāmoggallānatthero “ahampi, āvuso, gacchāmī”ti pañcahi
atk-s0502a:1533_4: bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ nikkhami. Etenupāyena mahākassapatthero anuruddhatthero upālitthero
atk-s0502a:1533_5: puṇṇattheroti sabbe mahāsāvakā pañcahi pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1533_6: Sabbepi mahāsāvakānaṃ parivārā cattālīsa bhikkhusahassāni ahesuṃ. Te vīsatiyojanasataṃ
atk-s0502a:1533_7: maggaṃ gantvā gocaragāmaṃ sampattā. Sāmaṇerassa nibaddhūpaṭṭhāko upāsako dvāreyeva
atk-s0502a:1534_0: Atha naṃ sāriputtatthero pucchi – “atthi nu kho, upāsaka, imasmiṃ padese āraññakavihāro”ti?
atk-s0502a:1534_2: tattha vasatī”ti? “Vanavāsītisso, bhante”ti. “Tena hi maggaṃ no ācikkhā”ti. “Ke tumhe,
atk-s0502a:1534_3: bhante”ti? “Mayaṃ sāmaṇerassa santikaṃ āgatā”ti. Upāsako oloketvā dhammasenāpatiṃ
atk-s0502a:1534_4: ādiṃ katvā sabbepi mahāsāvake sañjānitvā nirantaraṃ pītiyā phuṭṭhasarīro hutvā “tiṭṭhatha
atk-s0502a:1534_5: tāva, bhante”ti vegena gāmaṃ pavisitvā “ete, ayyā, sāriputtattheraṃ ādiṃ katvā asīti
atk-s0502a:1534_6: mahāsāvakā attano attano parivārehi saddhiṃ sāmaṇerassa santikaṃ āgatā, mañcapīṭhapaccattharaṇadīpatelādīni
atk-s0502a:1534_7: gahetvā vegena nikkhamathā”ti ugghosesi. Manussā “tāvadeva mañcādīni gahetvā therānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1534_8: padānupadikā hutvā therehi saddhiṃyeva vihāraṃ pavisiṃsu. Sāmaṇero bhikkhusaṅghaṃ
atk-s0502a:1534_9: sañjānitvā katipayānaṃ mahātherānaṃ pattacīvarāni paṭiggahetvā vattamakāsi. Tassa
atk-s0502a:1534_10: therānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ saṃvidahantassa pattacīvaraṃ paṭisāmentasseva andhakāro jātā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1534_11: Sāriputtatthero upāsake āha – “gacchatha, upāsakā, tumhākaṃ andhakāro jāto”ti. “Bhante,
atk-s0502a:1534_12: ajja dhammassavanadivaso, na mayaṃ gamissāma, dhammaṃ suṇissāma, ito pubbe dhammassavanampi
atk-s0502a:1534_13: natthī”ti. “Tena hi, sāmaṇera, dīpaṃ jāletvā dhammassavanassa kālaṃ ghosehī”ti. So
atk-s0502a:1534_14: tathā akāsi. Atha naṃ thero āha – “tissa tava upaṭṭhākā ‘dhammaṃ sotukāmāmhā’ti vadanti,
atk-s0502a:1534_15: kathehi tesaṃ dhamma”nti. Upāsakā ekappahāreneva uṭṭhāya, “bhante, amhākaṃ ayyo ‘sukhitā
atk-s0502a:1534_16: hotha, dukkhā muccathā’ti imāni dve padāni ṭhapetvā aññaṃ dhammakathaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0502a:1534_17: amhākaṃ aññaṃ dhammakathikaṃ dethā”ti vadiṃsu. “Sāmaṇero pana arahattaṃ patvāpi neva
atk-s0502a:1535_0: Tadā pana naṃ upajjhāyo, “sāmaṇera, kathaṃ pana sukhitā honti, ‘kathaṃ pana dukkhā
atk-s0502a:1535_1: muccantī’ti imesaṃ no dvinnaṃ padānaṃ atthaṃ kathehī”ti āha. So “sādhu, bhante”ti
atk-s0502a:1535_2: cittabījaniṃ gahetvā dhammāsanaṃ āruyha pañcahi nikāyehi atthañca kāraṇañca ākaḍḍhitvā
atk-s0502a:1535_4: vibhajanto arahattakūṭena dhammakathaṃ kathetvā, “bhante, evaṃ arahattappattassa
atk-s0502a:1535_5: sukhaṃ hoti, arahattaṃ pattoyeva dukkhā muccati, sesajanā jātidukkhādīhi ceva nirayadukkhādīhi
atk-s0502a:1535_6: ca na parimuccantī”ti āha. “Sādhu, sāmaṇera, sukathito te paṭibhāṇo, idāni sarabhaññaṃ
atk-s0502a:1535_7: bhaṇāhī”ti. So sarabhaññampi bhaṇi. Aruṇe uggacchante sāmaṇerassa upaṭṭhākamanussā
atk-s0502a:1535_8: dve bhāgā ahesuṃ. Ekacce “na vata no ito pubbe evarūpo kakkhaḷo diṭṭhapubbo. Kathañhi
atk-s0502a:1535_9: nāma evarūpaṃ dhammakathaṃ jānanto ettakaṃ kālaṃ mātāpituṭṭhāne ṭhatvā upaṭṭhahantānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1535_10: manussānaṃ ekampi dhammapadaṃ na kathesī”ti kujjhiṃsu. Ekacce “lābhā vata no, ye
atk-s0502a:1535_11: mayaṃ evarūpaṃ bhadantaṃ guṇaṃ vā aguṇaṃ vā ajānantāpi upaṭṭhahimha, idāni ca panassa
atk-s0502a:1536_0: Sammāsambuddhopi taṃ divasaṃ paccūsasamaye lokaṃ volokento vanavāsītissassa upaṭṭhāke
atk-s0502a:1536_1: attano ñāṇajālassa anto paviṭṭhe disvā “kiṃ nu kho bhavissatī”ti āvajjento imamatthaṃ
atk-s0502a:1536_2: upadhāresi “vanavāsītissasāmaṇerassa upaṭṭhākā ekacce tuṭṭhā, ekacce kuddhā, mayhaṃ
atk-s0502a:1536_3: puttassa pana sāmaṇerassa kuddhā nirayabhāgino bhavissanti, gantabbameva tattha mayā,
atk-s0502a:1536_4: mayi gate sabbepi te sāmaṇere mettacittaṃ katvā dukkhā muccissantī”ti. Tepi manussā
atk-s0502a:1536_5: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā gāmaṃ gantvā maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā yāgubhattādīni sampādetvā
atk-s0502a:1536_6: āsanāni paññāpetvā saṅghassa āgamanamaggaṃ olokentā nisīdiṃsu. Bhikkhūpi sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ
atk-s0502a:1536_7: katvā bhikkhācāravelāya gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisantā sāmaṇeraṃ pucchiṃsu – “kiṃ, tissa,
atk-s0502a:1536_8: tvaṃ amhehi saddhiṃ gamissasi, udāhu pacchā”ti? “Mama gamanavelāyameva gamissāmi,
atk-s0502a:1536_9: gacchatha tumhe, bhante”ti. Bhikkhū pattacīvaramādāya pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1537_0: Satthā jetavanasmiṃyeva cīvaraṃ pārupitvā pattamādāya ekacittakkhaṇeneva gantvā bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0502a:1537_1: purato ṭhitameva attānaṃ dassesi. “Sammāsambuddho āgato”ti sakalagāmo saṅkhubhitvā
atk-s0502a:1537_2: ekakolāhalo ahosi. Manussā udaggacittā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nisīdāpetvā
atk-s0502a:1537_3: yāguṃ datvā khajjakaṃ adaṃsu. Sāmaṇero bhatte aniṭṭhiteyeva antogāmaṃ pāvisi. Gāmavāsino
atk-s0502a:1537_4: nīharitvā tassa sakkaccaṃ bhikkhaṃ adaṃsu. So yāpanamattaṃ gahetvā satthu santikaṃ
atk-s0502a:1537_5: gantvā pattaṃ upanāmesi. Satthā “āhara, tissā”ti hatthaṃ pasāretvā pattaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0502a:1537_6: “passa, sāriputta, tava sāmaṇerassa patta”nti therassa dassesi. Thero satthu hatthato
atk-s0502a:1537_7: pattaṃ gahetvā sāmaṇerassa datvā “gaccha, attano pattaṭṭhāne nisīditvā bhattakiccaṃ karohī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:1538_0: Gāmavāsino buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ parivisitvā satthāraṃ vanditvā anumodanaṃ
atk-s0502a:1538_1: yāciṃsu. Satthā anumodanaṃ karonto evamāha – “lābhā vata vo upāsakā, ye tumhe attano
atk-s0502a:1538_2: kulūpakaṃ sāmaṇeraṃ nissāya sāriputtaṃ moggallānaṃ kassapaṃ anuruddhanti asītimahāsāvake
atk-s0502a:1538_3: dassanāya labhatha, ahampi tumhākaṃ kulūpakameva nissāya āgato, buddhadassanampi
atk-s0502a:1538_4: vo imaṃ nissāyeva laddhaṃ, lābhā vo, suladdhaṃ vo”ti. Manussā cintayiṃsu – “aho amhākaṃ
atk-s0502a:1538_5: lābhā, buddhānañceva bhikkhusaṅghassa ca ārādhanasamatthaṃ amhākaṃ ayyaṃ dassanāya
atk-s0502a:1538_6: labhāma, deyyadhammañcassa dātuṃ labhāmā”ti sāmaṇerassa kuddhā manussā tussiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1538_7: Tuṭṭhā manussā bhiyyosomattāya pasīdiṃsu. Anumodanāvasāne bahū sotāpattiphalādīni
atk-s0502a:1538_8: pāpuṇiṃsu. Satthā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi. Manussā satthāraṃ anugantvā vanditvā nivattiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1538_9: Satthā sāmaṇerena saddhiṃ samadhurena gacchanto, “sāmaṇera, ayaṃ padeso konāmo, ayaṃ
atk-s0502a:1538_10: padeso konāmo”ti pubbe tassa upāsakena dassitapadese pucchanto agamāsi. Sāmaṇeropi,
atk-s0502a:1538_11: “bhante, ayaṃ itthannāmo, ayaṃ itthannāmo”ti ācikkhamānova agamāsi. Satthā tassa
atk-s0502a:1538_12: vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā pabbatamatthakaṃ abhiruhi. Tattha ṭhitānaṃ pana mahāsamuddo
atk-s0502a:1538_13: paññāyati. Satthā sāmaṇeraṃ pucchi – “tissa, pabbatamatthake ṭhito ito cito ca oloketvā
atk-s0502a:1538_14: kiṃ passasī”ti? “Mahāsamuddaṃ, bhante”ti. “Mahāsamuddaṃ disvā kiṃ cintesī”ti? “Mama
atk-s0502a:1538_15: dukkhitakāle rodantassa catūhi mahāsamuddehi atirekatarena assunā bhavitabbanti idaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1538_16: bhante, cintesi”nti. “Sādhu sādhu, tissa, evametaṃ. Ekekassa hi sattassa dukkhitakāle
atk-s0502a:1538_17: paggharitaassūni catūhi mahāsamuddehi atirekatarānevā”ti. Idañca pana vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1543_0: Atha naṃ puna pucchi – “tissa, kahaṃ vasasī”ti? “Imasmiṃ pabbhāre, bhante”ti. “Tattha
atk-s0502a:1543_1: pana vasanto kiṃ cintesī”ti? “Mayā marantena imasmiṃ ṭhāne katassa sarīranikkhepassa
atk-s0502a:1543_2: paricchedo ‘natthī’ti cintesiṃ, bhante”ti. “Sādhu sādhu, tissa, evametaṃ. Imesañhi
atk-s0502a:1543_3: sattānaṃ pathaviyaṃ nipajjitvā amataṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthī”ti vatvā –
atk-s0502a:1545: Asmiṃ padese daḍḍhāni, natthi loke anāmataṃ.
atk-s0502a:1546: “Yamhi saccañca dhammo ca, ahiṃsā saṃyamo damo;
atk-s0502a:1547: Etaṃ ariyā sevanti, etaṃ loke anāmata”nti. (jā.1.2.31-32) –
atk-s0502a:1548_0: Imaṃ dukanipāte upasāḷakajātakaṃ kathesi. Iti pathaviyaṃ sarīranikkhepaṃ katvā marantesu
atk-s0502a:1548_1: sattesu amatapubbapadese marantā nāma natthi, ānandattherasadisā pana amatapubbapadese parinibbāyanti.
atk-s0502a:1549_0: Ānandatthero kira vīsavassasatikakāle āyusaṅkhāraṃ olokento parikkhīṇabhāvaṃ ñatvā
atk-s0502a:1549_1: “ito sattame divase parinibbāyissāmī”ti ārocesi. Taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā rohiṇīnadiyā
atk-s0502a:1549_2: ubhayatīravāsikesu manussesu orimatīravāsikā “mayaṃ therassa bahūpakārā, amhākaṃ
atk-s0502a:1549_3: santike parinibbāyissatī”ti vadiṃsu. Paratīravāsikāpi “mayaṃ therassa bahūpakārā,
atk-s0502a:1549_4: amhākaṃ santike parinibbāyissatī”ti vadiṃsu. Thero tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā “ubhayatīravāsino
atk-s0502a:1549_5: mayhaṃ upakārā, ime nāma anupakārāti na sakkā vattuṃ, sacāhaṃ orimatīre parinibbāyissāmi,
atk-s0502a:1549_6: paratīravāsino dhātugahaṇatthaṃ tehi saddhiṃ kalahaṃ karissanti. Sace paratīre parinibbāyissāmi,
atk-s0502a:1549_7: orimatīravāsinopi tathā karissanti, kalaho uppajjamānopi maṃ nissāyeva uppajjissati,
atk-s0502a:1549_8: vūpasamamānopi maṃ nissāyeva vūpasamissatī”ti cintetvā “orimatīravāsinopi mayhaṃ
atk-s0502a:1549_9: upakārā, paratīravāsinopi mayhaṃ upakārā, anupakārāpi nāma natthi, orimatīravāsino
atk-s0502a:1549_10: orimatīreyeva sannipatantu, paratīravāsinopi paratīreyevā”ti āha. Tato sattame divase
atk-s0502a:1549_11: majjhenadiyā sattatālappamāṇe ākāse pallaṅkena nisīditvā mahājanassa dhammaṃ kathetvā
atk-s0502a:1549_12: “mama sarīraṃ majjhe bhijjitvā eko bhāgo orimatīre patatu, eko bhāgo paratīre”ti
atk-s0502a:1549_13: adhiṭṭhāya yathānisinnova tejodhātuṃ samāpajji, jālā uṭṭhahiṃsu. Sarīraṃ majjhe bhijjitvā
atk-s0502a:1549_14: eko bhāgo orimatīre pati, eko bhāgo paratīre. Tato mahājano paridevi, pathaviundriyanasaddo
atk-s0502a:1549_15: viya ārodanasaddo ahosi. Satthu parinibbāne ārodanasaddatopi kāruññataro ahosi. Manussā
atk-s0502a:1549_16: cattāro māse rodantā paridevantā “satthu pattacīvaraggāhake tiṭṭhante satthu ṭhitakālo
atk-s0502a:1549_17: viya no ahosi, idāni no satthā parinibbuto”ti vippalapantā viravantā vicariṃsūti.
atk-s0502a:1550_0: Puna satthā sāmaṇeraṃ pucchi – “tissa, imasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe dīpiādīnaṃ saddena bhāyasi,
atk-s0502a:1550_1: na bhāyasī”ti? “Na bhāyāmi bhagavā, apica kho pana me etesaṃ saddaṃ sutvā vanarati
atk-s0502a:1550_2: nāma uppajjatī”ti vatvā saṭṭhimattāhi gāthāhi vanavaṇṇanaṃ nāma kathesi. Atha naṃ
atk-s0502a:1550_3: satthā “tissā”ti āmantesi. “Kiṃ, bhante”ti? “Mayaṃ gacchāma, tvaṃ gamissasi, nivattissasī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1550_4: “Mayhaṃ upajjhāye maṃ ādāya gacchante gamissāmi, nivattente nivattissāmi, bhante”ti.
atk-s0502a:1550_5: Satthā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ pakkāmi. Sāmaṇerassa pana nivattitumeva ajjhāsayo,
atk-s0502a:1550_6: thero taṃ ñatvā “tissa, sace nivattitukāmo, nivattā”ti āha. So satthārañca bhikkhusaṅghañca
atk-s0502a:1551_0: Bhikkhūnaṃ dhammasabhāyaṃ kathā udapādi – “aho vata vanavāsītissasāmaṇero dukkaraṃ
atk-s0502a:1551_1: karoti, paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāyassa ñātakā sattasu maṅgalesu pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1551_2: appodakamadhupāyasameva adaṃsu, pabbajitakāle antovihāre buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0502a:1551_3: satta divasāni appodakamadhupāyasameva adaṃsu. Pabbajitvā aṭṭhame divase antogāmaṃ
atk-s0502a:1551_4: pavisanto dvīheva divasehi sāṭakasahassena saddhiṃ piṇḍapātasahassaṃ labhi, punekadivasaṃ
atk-s0502a:1551_5: kambalasahassaṃ labhi. Itissa idha vasanakāle mahālābhasakkāro uppajji, idāni evarūpaṃ
atk-s0502a:1551_6: lābhasakkāraṃ chaḍḍetvā araññaṃ pavisitvā missakāhārena yāpeti, dukkarakārako vata
atk-s0502a:1551_7: tissasāmaṇero”ti. Satthā āgantvā, “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti
atk-s0502a:1551_8: pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “āma, bhikkhave, lābhūpanisā nāmesā aññā, nibbānagāminī
atk-s0502a:1551_9: paṭipadā aññā. ‘Evaṃ lābhaṃ labhissāmī’ti hi āraññikādidhutaṅgasamādānavasena lābhūpanisaṃ
atk-s0502a:1551_10: rakkhantassa bhikkhuno cattāro apāyā vivaṭadvārā eva tiṭṭhanti, nibbānagāminiyā pana
atk-s0502a:1551_11: paṭipadāya uppannaṃ lābhasakkāraṃ pahāya araññaṃ pavisitvā ghaṭento vāyamanto arahattaṃ
atk-s0502a:1551_12: gaṇhātī”ti anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1556_0: Tattha aññā hi lābhūpanisā, aññā nibbānagāminīti lābhūpanisā nāmesā aññā eva, aññā
atk-s0502a:1556_1: nibbānagāminī paṭipadā. Lābhuppādakena hi bhikkhunā thokaṃ akusalakammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0502a:1556_2: kāyavaṅkādīni kātabbāni honti. Yasmiñhi kāle kāyavaṅkādīsu kiñci karoti, tadā lābho
atk-s0502a:1556_3: uppajjati. Pāyasapātiyañhi vaṅkaṃ akatvā ujukameva hatthaṃ otāretvā ukkhipantassa
atk-s0502a:1556_4: hattho makkhitamattakova hoti, vaṅkaṃ katvā otāretvā ukkhipantassa pana pāyasapiṇḍaṃ
atk-s0502a:1556_5: uddharantova nikkhamati, evaṃ kāyavaṅkādīni karaṇakāleyeva lābho uppajjati. Ayaṃ
atk-s0502a:1556_6: adhammikā lābhūpanissā nāma. Upadhisampadā cīvaradhāraṇaṃ bāhusaccaṃ parivāro araññavāsoti
atk-s0502a:1556_7: evarūpehi pana kāraṇehi uppanno lābho dhammiko nāma hoti. Nibbānagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ
atk-s0502a:1556_8: pūrentena pana bhikkhunā kāyavaṅkādīni pahātabbāni. Anandheneva andhena viya, amūgeneva
atk-s0502a:1556_9: mūgena viya, abadhireneva badhirena viya bhavituṃ vaṭṭati. Asaṭhena amāyena bhavituṃ
atk-s0502a:1556_10: vaṭṭati. Evametanti etaṃ lābhuppādanaṃ paṭipadañca nibbānagāminiṃ paṭipadañca evaṃ
atk-s0502a:1556_11: ñatvā sabbesaṃ saṅkhatāsaṅkhatadhammānaṃ bujjhanaṭṭhena buddhassa savanante jātaṭṭhena
atk-s0502a:1556_12: ovādānusāsaniṃ vā savanaṭṭhena sāvako bhikkhu adhammikaṃ catupaccayasakkāraṃ nābhinandeyya,
atk-s0502a:1556_13: na ceva dhammikaṃ paṭikkoseyya, kāyavivekādikaṃ vivekaṃ anubrūhaye. Tattha kāyavivekoti
atk-s0502a:1556_14: kāyassa ekībhāvo. Cittavivekoti aṭṭha samāpattiyo. Upadhivivekoti nibbānaṃ. Tesu
atk-s0502a:1556_15: kāyaviveko gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ vinodeti, cittaviveko kilesasaṅgaṇikaṃ vinodeti, upadhiviveko
atk-s0502a:1556_16: saṅkhārasaṅgaṇikaṃ vinodeti. Kāyaviveko cittavivekassa paccayo hoti, cittaviveko
atk-s0502a:1557: “Kāyaviveko ca vivekaṭṭhakāyānaṃ nekkhammābhiratānaṃ, cittaviveko ca parisuddhacittānaṃ paramavodānappattānaṃ, upadhiviveko ca nirupadhīnaṃ puggalānaṃ visaṅkhāragatāna”nti. –
atk-s0502a:1558: Imaṃ tividhampi vivekaṃ brūheyya vaḍḍheyya, upasampajja vihareyyāti attho.
atk-s0502a:1565: Nidhīnaṃva pavattāranti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto āyasmantaṃ rādhattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1566_0: So kira gihikāle sāvatthiyaṃ duggatabrāhmaṇo ahosi. So “bhikkhūnaṃ santike jīvissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:1566_1: cintetvā vihāraṃ gantvā appaharitakaṃ karonto pariveṇaṃ sammajjanto mukhadhovanādīni
atk-s0502a:1566_2: dadanto antovihāreyeva vasi. Bhikkhūpi naṃ saṅgaṇhiṃsu, pabbājetuṃ pana na icchanti.
atk-s0502a:1566_3: So pabbajjaṃ alabhamāno kiso ahosi. Athekadivasaṃ satthā paccūsakāle lokaṃ volokento
atk-s0502a:1566_4: taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ disvā “kiṃ nu kho”ti upadhārento “arahā bhavissatī”ti ñatvā sāyanhasamaye
atk-s0502a:1566_5: vihāracārikaṃ caranto viya brāhmaṇassa santikaṃ gantvā, “brāhmaṇa, kiṃ karonto vicarasī”ti
atk-s0502a:1566_6: āha. “Bhikkhūnaṃ vattapaṭivattaṃ karonto, bhante”ti. “Labhasi nesaṃ santikā saṅgaha”nti?
atk-s0502a:1566_7: “Āma, bhante, āhāramattaṃ labhāmi, na pana maṃ pabbājentī”ti. Satthā etasmiṃ nidāne
atk-s0502a:1566_8: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātāpetvā tamatthaṃ pucchitvā, “bhikkhave, atthi koci imassa
atk-s0502a:1566_9: brāhmaṇassa adhikāraṃ saratī”ti pucchi. Sāriputtatthero “ahaṃ, bhante, sarāmi, ayaṃ
atk-s0502a:1566_10: me rājagahe piṇḍāya carantassa attano abhihaṭaṃ kaṭacchubhikkhaṃ dāpesi, imamassāhaṃ
atk-s0502a:1566_11: adhikāraṃ sarāmī”ti āha. So satthārā “kiṃ pana te, sāriputta, evaṃ katūpakāraṃ dukkhato
atk-s0502a:1566_12: mocetuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vutte, “sādhu, bhante, pabbājessāmī”ti taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ pabbājesi.
atk-s0502a:1566_13: Tassa bhattagge āsanapariyante āsanaṃ pāpuṇāti, yāgubhattādīhipi kilamati. Thero
atk-s0502a:1566_14: taṃ ādāya cārikaṃ pakkāmi, abhikkhaṇañca naṃ “idaṃ te kattabbaṃ, idaṃ te na kattabba”nti
atk-s0502a:1566_15: ovadi anusāsi. So suvaco ahosi padakkhiṇaggāhī. Tasmā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāno
atk-s0502a:1567_0: Thero taṃ ādāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā nisīdi. Atha naṃ satthā paṭisanthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:1567_1: katvā āha – “suvaco nu kho, sāriputta, te antevāsiko”ti. “Āma, bhante, ativiya suvaco,
atk-s0502a:1567_2: kismiñci dose vuccamāne na kuddhapubbo”ti. “Sāriputta, evarūpe saddhivihārike labhanto
atk-s0502a:1567_3: kittake gaṇheyyāsī”ti? “Bhante, bahukepi gaṇheyyamevā”ti. Athekadivasaṃ dhammasabhāya
atk-s0502a:1567_4: kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ – “sāriputtatthero kira kataññū katavedī, kaṭacchubhikkhāmattaṃ
atk-s0502a:1567_5: upakāraṃ saritvā duggatabrāhmaṇaṃ pabbājesi. Theropi ovādakkhamo ovādakkhamameva
atk-s0502a:1567_6: labhī”ti. Satthā tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi sāriputto kataññū
atk-s0502a:1573_0: Imaṃ dukanipāte alīnacittajātakaṃ vitthāretvā kathesi. Tadā kira vaḍḍhakīhi pādassa
atk-s0502a:1573_1: arogakaraṇabhāvena kahaṃ attano upakāraṃ ñatvā sabbasetassa hatthipotakassa dāyako
atk-s0502a:1573_2: ekacāriko hatthī sāriputtatthero ahosīti evaṃ theraṃ ārabbha jātakaṃ kathetvā rādhattheraṃ
atk-s0502a:1573_3: ārabbha, “bhikkhave, bhikkhunā nāma rādhena viya suvacena bhavitabbaṃ, dosaṃ dassetvā
atk-s0502a:1573_4: ovadiyamānenapi na kujjhitabbaṃ, ovādadāyako pana nidhiācikkhaṇako viya daṭṭhabbo”ti
atk-s0502a:1573_5: vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1577: Tādisaṃ bhajamānassa, seyyo hoti na pāpiyo”ti.
atk-s0502a:1578_0: Tattha nidhīnanti tattha tattha nidahitvā ṭhapitānaṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇādipūrānaṃ nidhikumbhīnaṃ.
atk-s0502a:1578_1: Pavattāranti kicchajīvike duggatamanusse anukampaṃ katvā “ehi, sukhena jīvanūpāyaṃ
atk-s0502a:1578_2: dassessāmī”ti nidhiṭṭhānaṃ netvā hatthaṃ pasāretvā “imaṃ gahetvā sukhena jīvā”ti
atk-s0502a:1578_3: ācikkhitāraṃ viya. Vajjadassinanti dve vajjadassino “iminā naṃ asāruppena vā khalitena
atk-s0502a:1578_4: vā saṅghamajjhe niggaṇhissāmī”ti randhagavesako ca, aññātaṃ ñāpanatthāya ñātaṃ anuggahaṇatthāya
atk-s0502a:1578_5: sīlādīnamassa vuddhikāmatāya taṃ taṃ vajjaṃ olokanena ullumpanasabhāvasaṇṭhito ca.
atk-s0502a:1578_6: Ayaṃ idha adhippeto. Yathā hi duggatamanusso “imaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti tajjetvāpi pothetvāpi
atk-s0502a:1578_7: nidhiṃ dassente kopaṃ na karoti, pamudito eva hoti, evameva evarūpe puggale asāruppaṃ
atk-s0502a:1578_8: vā khalitaṃ vā disvā ācikkhante kopo na kātabbo, tuṭṭheneva bhavitabbaṃ, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:1578_9: mahantaṃ vo kammaṃ kataṃ, mayhaṃ ācariyupajjhāyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā ovadantehi punapi maṃ
atk-s0502a:1578_10: vadeyyāthā”ti pavāretabbameva. Niggayhavādinti ekacco hi saddhivihārikādīnaṃ asāruppaṃ
atk-s0502a:1578_11: vā khalitaṃ vā disvā “ayaṃ me mukhodakadānādīhi sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahati, sace naṃ vakkhāmi,
atk-s0502a:1578_12: na maṃ upaṭṭhahissati, evaṃ me parihāni bhavissatī”ti vatthuṃ avisahanto na niggayhavādī
atk-s0502a:1578_13: nāma hoti. So imasmiṃ sāsane kacavaraṃ ākirati. Yo pana tathārūpaṃ vajjaṃ disvā vajjānurūpaṃ
atk-s0502a:1578_14: tajjento paṇāmento daṇḍakammaṃ karonto vihārā taṃ nīharanto sikkhāpeti, ayaṃ niggayhavādī
atk-s0502a:1578_15: nāma seyyathāpi sammāsambuddho. Vuttañhetaṃ – “niggayha niggayhāhaṃ, ānanda, vakkhāmi,
atk-s0502a:1578_16: pavayha pavayha, ānanda, vakkhāmi, yo sāro so ṭhassatī”ti. Medhāvinti dhammojapaññāya
atk-s0502a:1578_17: samannāgataṃ. Tādisanti evarūpaṃ paṇḍitaṃ bhajeyya payirupāseyya. Tādisañhi ācariyaṃ
atk-s0502a:1578_18: bhajamānassa antevāsikassa seyyo hoti, na pāpiyo vaḍḍhiyeva hoti, no parihānīti.
atk-s0502a:1582: Ovadeyyānusāseyyāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto assajipunabbasukabhikkhū ārabbha kathesi. Desanā pana kīṭāgirismiṃ samuṭṭhitā.
atk-s0502a:1583_0: Te kira dve bhikkhū kiñcāpi aggasāvakānaṃ saddhivihārikā, alajjino pana ahesuṃ pāpabhikkhū.
atk-s0502a:1583_1: Te pāpakehi attano parivārehi pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ kīṭāgirismiṃ viharantā
atk-s0502a:1583_2: “mālāvacchaṃ ropentipi ropāpentipī”tiādikaṃ nānappakāraṃ anācāraṃ karontā kuladūsakakammaṃ
atk-s0502a:1583_3: katvā tato uppannehi paccayehi jīvikaṃ kappentā taṃ āvāsaṃ pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anāvāsaṃ
atk-s0502a:1583_4: akaṃsu. Satthā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā tesaṃ pabbājanīyakammakaraṇatthāya saparivāre dve
atk-s0502a:1583_5: aggasāvake āmantetvā “gacchatha, sāriputtā, tesu ye tumhākaṃ vacanaṃ na karonti,
atk-s0502a:1583_6: tesaṃ pabbājanīyakammaṃ karotha, ye pana karonti, te ovadatha anusāsatha. Ovadanto
atk-s0502a:1583_7: hi anusāsanto apaṇḍitānaṃyeva appiyo hoti amanāpo, paṇḍitānaṃ pana piyo hoti manāpo”ti
atk-s0502a:1583_8: anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1586: Satañhi so piyo hoti, asataṃ hoti appiyo”ti.
atk-s0502a:1587_0: Tattha ovadeyyāti uppanne vatthusmiṃ vadanto ovadati nāma, anuppanne vatthusmiṃ “ayasopi
atk-s0502a:1587_1: te siyā”tiādivasena anāgataṃ dassento anusāsati nāma. Sammukhā vadanto ovadati nāma,
atk-s0502a:1587_2: parammukhā dūtaṃ vā sāsanaṃ vā pesento anusāsati nāma. Sakiṃ vadanto ovadati nāma,
atk-s0502a:1587_3: punappunaṃ vadanto anusāsati nāma. Ovadanto eva vā anusāsati nāmāti evaṃ ovadeyya
atk-s0502a:1587_4: anusāseyya. Asabbhā cāti akusaladhammā ca nivāreyya, kusaladhamme patiṭṭhāpeyyāti
atk-s0502a:1587_5: attho. Satañhi so piyo hotīti so evarūpo puggalo buddhādīnaṃ sappurisānaṃ piyo hoti.
atk-s0502a:1587_6: Ye pana adiṭṭhadhammā avitiṇṇaparalokā āmisacakkhukā jīvikatthāya pabbajitā, tesaṃ
atk-s0502a:1587_7: asataṃ so ovādako anusāsako, “‘na tvaṃ amhākaṃ upajjhāyo, na ācariyo, kasmā amhe
atk-s0502a:1587_8: ovadasī’ti evaṃ mukhasattīhi vijjhantānaṃ appiyo hotī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1588_0: Desanāvasāne bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pāpuṇiṃsūti. Sāriputtamoggallānāpi tattha gantvā
atk-s0502a:1588_1: te bhikkhū ovadiṃsu anusāsiṃsu. Tesu ekacce ovādaṃ sampaṭicchitvā sammā vattiṃsu,
atk-s0502a:1591: Na bhaje pāpake mitteti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto channattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1592_0: So kira āyasmā “ahaṃ amhākaṃ ayyaputtena saddhiṃ mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhanto tadā
atk-s0502a:1592_1: aññaṃ ekampi na passāmi, idāni pana ‘ahaṃ sāriputto nāma, ahaṃ moggallāno nāma, mayaṃ
atk-s0502a:1592_2: aggasāvakamhā’ti vatvā ime vicarantī”ti dve aggasāvake akkosati. Satthā bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0502a:1592_3: santikā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā channattheraṃ pakkosāpetvā ovadati. So taṅkhaṇeyeva tuṇhī
atk-s0502a:1592_4: hutvā puna gantvā there akkosatiyeva. Evaṃ yāvatatiyaṃ akkosantaṃ pakkosāpetvā satthā
atk-s0502a:1592_5: ovaditvā “channa, dve aggasāvakā nāma tuyhaṃ kalyāṇamittā uttamapurisā, evarūpe kalyāṇamitte
atk-s0502a:1592_6: sevassu bhajassū”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1594: “Na bhaje pāpake mitte, na bhaje purisādhame;
atk-s0502a:1596_1: vā ekavīsatianesanādibhede vā aṭṭhāne niyojakā purisādhamā nāma. Ubhopi vā ete pāpamittā
atk-s0502a:1596_2: ceva purisādhamā ca, te na bhajeyya na payirupāseyya, viparītā pana kalyāṇamittā
atk-s0502a:1596_3: ceva sappurisā ca, te bhajetha payirupāsethāti.
atk-s0502a:1598_0: Channatthero pana taṃ ovādaṃ sutvāpi purimanayeneva bhikkhū akkosati paribhāsati.
atk-s0502a:1598_1: Punapi satthu ārocesuṃ. Satthā, “bhikkhave, mayi dharante channaṃ sikkhāpetuṃ na
atk-s0502a:1598_2: sakkhissatha, mayi pana parinibbute sakkhissathā”ti vatvā parinibbānakāle āyasmatā
atk-s0502a:1598_3: ānandena, “bhante, kathaṃ channatthere amhehi paṭipajjitabba”nti vutte, “ānanda,
atk-s0502a:1598_4: channassa bhikkhuno brahmadaṇḍo dātabbo”ti āṇāpesi. So satthari parinibbute ānandattherena
atk-s0502a:1598_5: ārocitaṃ brahmadaṇḍaṃ sutvā dukkhī dummano tikkhattuṃ mucchito patitvā “mā maṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a:1598_6: nāsayitthā”ti yācitvā sammā vattaṃ pūrento na cirasseva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇīti.
atk-s0502a:1601: Dhammapīti sukhaṃ setīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto mahākappinattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1602_0: Tatrāyaṃ anupubbī kathā – atīte kira āyasmā mahākappino padumuttarabuddhassa pādamūle
atk-s0502a:1602_1: katābhinīhāro saṃsāre saṃsaranto bārāṇasito avidūre ekasmiṃ pesakāragāme jeṭṭhakapesakāro
atk-s0502a:1602_2: hutvā nibbatti. Tadā sahassamattā paccekabuddhā aṭṭha māse himavante vasitvā vassike
atk-s0502a:1602_3: cattāro māse janapade vasanti. Te ekavāraṃ bārāṇasiyā avidūre otaritvā “senāsanakaraṇatthāya
atk-s0502a:1602_4: hatthakammaṃ yācathā”ti rañño santikaṃ aṭṭha paccekabuddhe pahiṇiṃsu. Tadā pana rañño
atk-s0502a:1602_5: vappamaṅgalakālo hoti. So “paccekabuddhā kira āgatā”ti sutvā tasmiṃ khaṇe nikkhamitvā
atk-s0502a:1602_6: āgatakāraṇaṃ pucchitvā “ajja, bhante, okāso natthi, sve amhākaṃ vappamaṅgalaṃ, tatiyadivase
atk-s0502a:1602_7: karissāmī”ti vatvā paccekabuddhe animantetvāva pāvisi. Paccekabuddhā “aññattha gamissāmā”ti
atk-s0502a:1602_8: pakkamiṃsu. Tasmiṃ khaṇe jeṭṭhapesakārassa bhariyā kenacideva karaṇīyena bārāṇasiṃ
atk-s0502a:1602_9: gacchantī te paccekabuddhe disvā vanditvā “kiṃ, bhante, avelāya, ayyā, āgatā”ti pucchitvā
atk-s0502a:1602_10: ādito paṭṭhāya kathesuṃ. Taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā saddhāsampannā ñāṇasampannā itthī “sve,
atk-s0502a:1602_11: bhante, amhākaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti nimantesi. “Bahukā mayaṃ bhaginī”ti. “Kittakā,
atk-s0502a:1602_12: bhante”ti? “Sahassamattā”ti. “Bhante, imasmiṃ gāme sahassapesakārā vasimha. Ekeko
atk-s0502a:1602_13: ekekassa bhikkhaṃ dassati, bhikkhaṃ adhivāsetha, ahameva vo vasanaṭṭhānampi kāressāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:1603_0: Sā gāmaṃ pavisitvā ugghosesi – “ahaṃ sahassamatte paccekabuddhe disvā nimantayiṃ,
atk-s0502a:1603_1: ayyānaṃ nisīdanaṭṭhānaṃ saṃvidahatha, yāgubhattādīni sampādethā”ti. Gāmamajjhe maṇḍapaṃ
atk-s0502a:1603_2: kāretvā āsanāni paññāpetvā punadivase paccekabuddhe nisīdāpetvā paṇītena khādanīyena
atk-s0502a:1603_3: bhojanīyena parivisitvā bhattakiccāvasāne tasmiṃ gāme sabbā itthiyo ādāya tāhi saddhiṃ
atk-s0502a:1603_4: paccekabuddhe vanditvā, “bhante, temāsaṃ vasanatthāya paṭiññaṃ dethā”ti tesaṃ paṭiññaṃ
atk-s0502a:1603_5: gahetvā puna gāme ugghosesi – “ammatātā, ekekakulato ekeko puriso pharasuvāsiādīni
atk-s0502a:1603_6: gahetvā araññaṃ pavisitvā dabbasambhāre āharitvā ayyānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ karotū”ti.
atk-s0502a:1603_7: Gāmavāsino tassāyeva vacanaṃ sutvā ekeko ekekaṃ katvā saddhiṃ rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānehi
atk-s0502a:1603_8: paṇṇasālasahassaṃ kāretvā attano attano paṇṇasālāyaṃ vassūpagate paccekabuddhe “ahaṃ
