atk-s0502a:1603_9: sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmi, ahaṃ sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti upaṭṭhahiṃsu. Vassaṃvuṭṭhakāle
atk-s0502a:1603_10: “attano attano paṇṇasālāya vassaṃvuṭṭhānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ cīvarasāṭake sajjethā”ti
atk-s0502a:1603_11: samādapetvā ekekassa sahassasahassamūlaṃ cīvaraṃ dāpesi. Paccekabuddhā vuṭṭhavassā
atk-s0502a:1604_0: Gāmavāsinopi idaṃ puññakammaṃ katvā ito cutā tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbattitvā gaṇadevaputtā
atk-s0502a:1604_1: nāma ahesuṃ. Te tattha dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā kassapasammāsambuddhakāle bārāṇasiyaṃ
atk-s0502a:1604_2: kuṭumbikagehesu nibbattiṃsu. Jeṭṭhakapesakāro jeṭṭhakakuṭumbikassa putto ahosi. Bhariyāpissa
atk-s0502a:1604_3: jeṭṭhakakuṭumbikasseva dhītā ahosi. Tā sabbāpi vayappattā parakulaṃ gacchantiyo tesaṃ
atk-s0502a:1604_4: tesaṃyeva gehāni agamiṃsu. Athekadivasaṃ vihāre dhammassavanaṃ saṅghuṭṭhaṃ. “Satthā
atk-s0502a:1604_5: dhammaṃ desessatī”ti sutvā sabbepi te kuṭumbikā “dhammaṃ sossāmā”ti bhariyāhi saddhiṃ
atk-s0502a:1604_6: vihāraṃ agamiṃsu. Tesaṃ vihāramajjhaṃ paviṭṭhakkhaṇe vassaṃ uṭṭhahi. Yesaṃ kulūpakā
atk-s0502a:1604_7: vā ñātisāmaṇerādayo vā atthi, te tesaṃ pariveṇāni pavisiṃsu. Te pana tathārūpānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1604_8: natthitāya katthaci, pavisituṃ avisahantā vihāramajjheyeva aṭṭhaṃsu. Atha ne jeṭṭhakakuṭumbiko
atk-s0502a:1604_9: āha – “passatha amhākaṃ vippakāraṃ, kulaputtehi nāma ettakena lajjituṃ yutta”nti.
atk-s0502a:1604_10: “Ayya, kiṃ pana karomā”ti? “Mayaṃ vissāsikaṭṭhānassa abhāvena imaṃ vippakāraṃ pattā,
atk-s0502a:1604_11: sabbe dhanaṃ saṃharitvā pariveṇaṃ karomā”ti. “Sādhu, ayyā”ti jeṭṭhako sahassaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0502a:1604_12: sesā pañca pañca satāni. Itthiyo aḍḍhateyyāni aḍḍhateyyāni satāni. Te taṃ dhanaṃ
atk-s0502a:1604_13: saṃharitvā sahassakūṭāgāraparivāraṃ satthu vasanatthāya mahāpariveṇaṃ nāma ārabhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1604_14: Navakammassa mahantatāya dhane appahonte pubbe dinnadhanato puna upaḍḍhūpaḍḍhaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1604_15: Niṭṭhite pariveṇe vihāramahaṃ karontā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa sattāhaṃ
atk-s0502a:1604_16: mahādānaṃ datvā vīsatiyā bhikkhusahassānaṃ cīvarāni sajjiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1605_0: Jeṭṭhakakuṭumbikassa pana bhariyā sabbehi samānaṃ akatvā attano paññāya ṭhitā “atirekataraṃ
atk-s0502a:1605_1: katvā satthāraṃ pūjessāmī”ti anojapupphavaṇṇena sahassamūlena sāṭakena saddhiṃ anojapupphacaṅkoṭakaṃ
atk-s0502a:1605_2: gahetvā anumodanakāle satthāraṃ anojapupphehi pūjetvā taṃ sāṭakaṃ satthu pādamūle
atk-s0502a:1605_3: ṭhapetvā, “bhante, nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne anojapupphavaṇṇaṃyeva me sarīraṃ hotu,
atk-s0502a:1605_4: anojā eva ca me nāmaṃ hotū”ti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi. Satthā “evaṃ hotū”ti anumodanaṃ
atk-s0502a:1605_5: akāsi. Te sabbepi yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cutā devaloke nibbattitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0502a:1605_6: devalokā cavitvā jeṭṭhakakuṭumbiko kukkuṭavatīnagare rājakule nibbattitvā vayappatto
atk-s0502a:1605_7: mahākappinarājā nāma ahosi, sesā amaccakule nibbattiṃsu. Jeṭṭhakakuṭumbikassa bhariyā
atk-s0502a:1605_8: maddaraṭṭhe sāgalanagare rājakule nibbatti, anojapupphavaṇṇamevassā sarīraṃ ahosi,
atk-s0502a:1605_9: anojātvevassā nāmaṃ kariṃsu. Sā vayappattā mahākappinarañño gehaṃ gantvā anojādevī
atk-s0502a:1605_10: nāma ahosi. Sesitthiyopi amaccakulesu nibbattitvā vayappattā tesaṃyeva amaccaputtānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1605_11: gehāni agamaṃsu. Te sabbe rañño sampattisadisaṃ sampattiṃ anubhaviṃsu. Yadā rājā
atk-s0502a:1605_12: sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍito hatthiṃ abhiruhitvā vicari, tadā tepi tatheva vicaranti.
atk-s0502a:1605_13: Tasmiṃ assena vā rathena vā vicarante tepi tatheva vicaranti? Evaṃ te ekato hutvā
atk-s0502a:1605_14: katānaṃ puññānaṃ ānubhāvena ekatova sampattiṃ anubhaviṃsu. Rañño pana balo, balavāhano,
atk-s0502a:1605_15: puppho, pupphavāhano, supattoti pañca assā honti. Rājā tesu supattaṃ assaṃ sayaṃ
atk-s0502a:1605_16: ārohati, itare cattāro assārohānaṃ sāsanāharaṇatthāya adāsi. Rājā te pātova bhojetvā
atk-s0502a:1605_17: “gacchatha dve vā tīṇi vā yojanāni āhiṇḍitvā buddhassa vā dhammassa vā saṅghassa
atk-s0502a:1605_18: vā uppannabhāvaṃ ñatvā mayhaṃ sukhasāsanaṃ āharathā”ti pesesi. Te catūhi dvārehi
atk-s0502a:1605_19: nikkhamitvā tīṇi yojanāni āhiṇḍitvā sāsanaṃ alabhitvā paccāgacchanti.
atk-s0502a:1606_0: Athekadivasaṃ rājā supattaṃ assaṃ āruyha amaccasahassaparivuto uyyānaṃ gacchanto
atk-s0502a:1606_1: kilantarūpe pañcasatavāṇijake nagaraṃ pavisante disvā “ime addhānakilantā, addhā
atk-s0502a:1606_2: imesaṃ santikā ekaṃ bhaddakaṃ sāsanaṃ sossāmī”ti te pakkosāpetvā “kuto āgacchathā”ti
atk-s0502a:1606_3: pucchi. “Atthi, deva, ito vīsatiyojanasatamatthake sāvatthi nāma nagaraṃ, tato āgacchāmā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1606_4: “Atthi pana vo padese kiñci sāsanaṃ uppanna”nti. “Deva, aññaṃ kiñci natthi, sammāsambuddho
atk-s0502a:1606_5: pana uppanno”ti. Rājā tāvadeva pañcavaṇṇāya pītiyā phuṭṭhasarīro kiñci sallakkhetuṃ
atk-s0502a:1606_6: asakkonto muhuttaṃ vītināmetvā, “tātā, kiṃ vadethā”ti pucchi. “Buddho, deva, uppanno”ti.
atk-s0502a:1606_7: Rājā dutiyampi tatiyampi tatheva vītināmetvā catutthe vāre “kiṃ vadetha, tātā”ti
atk-s0502a:1606_8: pucchitvā “buddho, deva, uppanno”ti vutte, “tātā, vo satasahassaṃ dadāmī”ti vatvā
atk-s0502a:1606_9: “aññampi kiñci sāsanaṃ atthī”ti pucchi. “Atthi, deva, dhammo uppanno”ti. Rājā tampi
atk-s0502a:1606_10: sutvā purimanayeneva tayo vāre vītināmetvā catutthe vāre “dhammo uppanno”ti vutte
atk-s0502a:1606_11: “idhāpi vo satasahassaṃ dammī”ti vatvā “aparampi sāsanaṃ atthi, tātā”ti pucchi. “Atthi,
atk-s0502a:1606_12: deva, saṅgharatanaṃ uppanna”nti. Rājā tampi sutvā tayo vāre vītināmetvā catutthe
atk-s0502a:1606_13: vāre “saṅgho”ti pade vutte “idhāpi vo satasahassaṃ dammī”ti vatvā amaccasahassaṃ
atk-s0502a:1606_14: oloketvā, “tātā, kiṃ karissathā”ti pucchi. “Deva, tumhe kiṃ karissathā”ti? “Ahaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1606_15: tātā, ‘buddho uppanno, dhammo uppanno, saṅgho uppanno’ti sutvā na puna nivattissāmi,
atk-s0502a:1606_16: satthāraṃ uddissa gantvā tassa santike pabbajissāmī”ti. “Mayampi, deva, tumhehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0502a:1606_17: pabbajissāmā”ti. Rājā suvaṇṇapaṭṭe akkharāni likhāpetvā vāṇijake āha – “anojā nāma
atk-s0502a:1606_18: devī tumhākaṃ tīṇi satasahassāni dassati, evañca pana naṃ vadeyyātha ‘rañño kira
atk-s0502a:1606_19: te issariyaṃ vissaṭṭhaṃ, yathāsukhaṃ sampattiṃ paribhuñjāhī’ti, sace pana vo ‘rājā
atk-s0502a:1606_20: kaha’nti pucchati, ‘satthāraṃ uddissa pabbajissāmīti vatvā gato’ti āroceyyāthā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1606_21: Amaccāpi attano attano bhariyānaṃ tatheva sāsanaṃ pahiṇiṃsu. Rājā vāṇijake uyyojetvā
atk-s0502a:1606_22: assaṃ abhiruyha amaccasahassaparivuto taṃ khaṇaṃyeva nikkhami.
atk-s0502a:1607_0: Satthāpi taṃ divasaṃ paccūsakāle lokaṃ volokento mahākappinarājānaṃ saparivāraṃ disvā
atk-s0502a:1607_1: “ayaṃ mahākappino vāṇijakānaṃ santikā tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ uppannabhāvaṃ sutvā tesaṃ
atk-s0502a:1607_2: vacanaṃ tīhi satasahassehi pūjetvā rajjaṃ pahāya amaccasahassehi parivuto maṃ uddissa
atk-s0502a:1607_3: pabbajitukāmo sve nikkhamissati. So saparivāro saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇissati,
atk-s0502a:1607_4: paccuggamanamassa karissāmī”ti punadivase cakkavattī viya khuddakagāmabhojakaṃ paccuggacchanto
atk-s0502a:1607_5: sayameva pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā vīsayojanasataṃ maggaṃ paccuggantvā candabhāgāya nadiyā
atk-s0502a:1607_6: tīre nigrodharukkhamūle chabbaṇṇarasmiyo vissajjento nisīdi. “Rājāpi āgacchanto ekaṃ
atk-s0502a:1607_7: nadiṃ patvā “kā nāmesā”ti pucchi. “Aparacchā nāma, devā”ti. “Kimassā parimāṇaṃ, tātā”ti?
atk-s0502a:1607_8: “Gambhīrato gāvutaṃ, puthulato dve gāvutāni, devā”ti. “Atthi panettha nāvā vā uḷumpo
atk-s0502a:1607_9: vā”ti? “Natthi, devā”ti. “Nāvādīni olokente amhe jāti jaraṃ upaneti, jarā maraṇaṃ.
atk-s0502a:1607_10: Ahaṃ nibbematiko hutvā tīṇi ratanāni uddissa nikkhanto, tesaṃ me ānubhāvena imaṃ
atk-s0502a:1607_11: udakaṃ udakaṃ viya mā ahosī”ti tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ guṇaṃ āvajjetvā “itipi so bhagavā
atk-s0502a:1607_12: arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”ti buddhānussatiṃ anussaranto saparivāro assasahassena udakapiṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0502a:1607_13: pakkhandi. Sindhavā piṭṭhipāsāṇe viya pakkhandiṃsu. Khurānaṃ aggā neva temiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1608_0: So taṃ uttaritvā purato gacchanto aparampi nadiṃ disvā “ayaṃ kā nāmā”ti pucchi. “Nīlavāhinī
atk-s0502a:1608_1: nāma, devā”ti. “Kimassā parimāṇa”nti? “Gambhīratopi puthulatopi aḍḍhayojanaṃ, devā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1608_2: Sesaṃ purimasadisameva. Taṃ pana nadiṃ disvā “svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo”ti dhammānussatiṃ
atk-s0502a:1608_3: anussaranto pakkhandi. Tampi atikkamitvā gacchanto aparampi nadiṃ disvā “ayaṃ kā
atk-s0502a:1608_4: nāmā”ti pucchi. “Candabhāgā nāma, devā”ti. “Kimassā parimāṇa”nti? “Gambhīratopi puthulatopi
atk-s0502a:1608_5: yojanaṃ, devā”ti. Sesaṃ purimasadisameva. Imaṃ pana nadiṃ disvā “suppaṭipanno bhagavato
atk-s0502a:1608_6: sāvakasaṅgho”ti saṅghānussatiṃ anussaranto pakkhandi. Taṃ pana nadiṃ atikkamitvā
atk-s0502a:1608_7: gacchanto satthu sarīrato nikkhantā chabbaṇṇarasmiyo addasa. Nigrodharukkhassa sākhāviṭapapalāsāni
atk-s0502a:1608_8: sovaṇṇamayāni viya ahesuṃ. Rājā cintesi – “ayaṃ pana obhāso neva candassa, na sūriyassa,
atk-s0502a:1608_9: na devamārabrahmanāgasupaṇṇādīnaṃ aññatarassa, addhā ahaṃ satthāraṃ uddissa āgacchanto
atk-s0502a:1608_10: mahāgotamabuddhena diṭṭho bhavissāmī”ti. So tāvadeva assapiṭṭhito otaritvā onatasarīro
atk-s0502a:1608_11: rasmianusārena satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā manosilārase nimujjanto viya buddharasmīnaṃ
atk-s0502a:1608_12: anto pavisitvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi saddhiṃ amaccasahassena, satthā
atk-s0502a:1608_13: tassa anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathesi. Desanāvasāne rājā saparivāro sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0502a:1608_14: Atha sabbeva uṭṭhahitvā pabbajjaṃ yāciṃsu. Satthā “āgamissati nu kho imesaṃ kulaputtānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1608_17: adaṃsu. Anacchariyaṃ imesaṃ iddhimayapattacīvarāgamana”nti ñatvā dakkhiṇahatthaṃ
atk-s0502a:1608_18: pasāretvā “etha, bhikkhavo, caratha brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti
atk-s0502a:1608_19: āha. Te tāvadeva aṭṭhaparikkhāradharā vassasaṭṭhikattherā viya hutvā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā
atk-s0502a:1609_0: Tepi vāṇijakā rājakulaṃ gantvā raññā pahitabhāvaṃ ārocāpetvā deviyā “āgacchantū”ti
atk-s0502a:1609_1: vutte pavisitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu. Atha ne devī pucchi – “tātā, kiṃ kāraṇā
atk-s0502a:1609_2: āgatātthā”ti? “Mayaṃ raññā tumhākaṃ santikaṃ pahitā, tīṇi kira no satasahassāni dethā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1609_3: “Tātā, atibahuṃ bhaṇatha, kiṃ tumhehi rañño kataṃ, kismiṃ vo rājā pasanno ettakaṃ
atk-s0502a:1609_4: dhanaṃ dāpesī”ti? “Devi, na aññaṃ kiñci kataṃ, rañño pana ekaṃ sāsanaṃ ārocayimhā”ti?
atk-s0502a:1609_5: “Sakkā pana, tātā, mayhaṃ ārocetu”nti. “Sakkā, devī”ti. “Tena hi, tātā, vadethā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1609_6: “Devi buddho loke uppanno”ti. Sāpi “taṃ sutvā purimanayeneva pītiyā phuṭṭhasarīrā
atk-s0502a:1609_7: tikkhattuṃ kiñci asallakkhetvā catutthe vāre ‘buddho’ti padaṃ sutvā, tātā, imasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:1609_8: pade raññā kiṃ dinna”nti? “Satasahassaṃ, devī”ti. “Tātā, ananucchavikaṃ raññā kataṃ
atk-s0502a:1609_9: evarūpaṃ sāsanaṃ sutvā tumhākaṃ satasahassaṃ dadamānena. Ahañhi vo mama duggatapaṇṇākāre
atk-s0502a:1609_10: tīṇi satasahassāni dammi, aparampi tumhehi rañño kiṃ ārocita”nti? Te idañcidañcāti
atk-s0502a:1609_11: itarānipi dve sāsanāni ārocayiṃsu. Devī purimanayeneva pītiyā phuṭṭhasarīrā tikkhattuṃ
atk-s0502a:1609_12: kiñci asallakkhetvā catutthe vāre tatheva sutvā tīṇi tīṇi satasahassāni dāpesi, evaṃ
atk-s0502a:1610_0: Atha ne devī pucchi – “rājā kahaṃ, tātā”ti? Devi, “satthāraṃ uddissa ‘pabbajissāmī’ti
atk-s0502a:1610_1: gato”ti. “Mayhaṃ tena kiṃ sāsanaṃ dinna”nti? “Sabbaṃ kira tena tumhākaṃ issariyaṃ
atk-s0502a:1610_2: vissaṭṭhaṃ, tumhe kira yathāruciyā sampattiṃ anubhavathā”ti. “Amaccā pana kahaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1610_3: tātā”ti? Tepi “‘raññā saddhiṃyeva pabbajissāmā’ti gatā, devī”ti. Sā tesaṃ bhariyāyo
atk-s0502a:1610_4: pakkosāpetvā, ammā, tumhākaṃ sāmikā “raññā saddhiṃ pabbajissāmā”ti gatā, “tumhe kiṃ
atk-s0502a:1610_5: karissathā”ti? “Kiṃ pana tehi amhākaṃ sāsanaṃ pahitaṃ, devī”ti? “Tehi kira attano
atk-s0502a:1610_6: sampatti tumhākaṃ vissaṭṭhā, tumhe kira taṃ sampattiṃ yathāruci paribhuñjathā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1610_7: “Tumhe pana, devi, kiṃ karissathā”ti? “Ammā, so tāva rājā sāsanaṃ sutvā magge ṭhitakova
atk-s0502a:1610_8: tīhi satasahassehi tīṇi ratanāni pūjetvā kheḷapiṇḍaṃ viya sampattiṃ pahāya ‘pabbajissāmī’ti
atk-s0502a:1610_9: nikkhanto, mayā pana tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ sāsanaṃ sutvā tīṇi ratanāni navahi satasahassehi
atk-s0502a:1610_10: pūjitāni, na kho panesā sampatti nāma raññoyeva dukkhā, mayhampi dukkhāyeva. Ko raññā
atk-s0502a:1610_11: chaḍḍitakheḷapiṇḍaṃ jāṇukehi patiṭṭhahitvā mukhena gaṇhissati, na mayhaṃ sampattiyā
atk-s0502a:1610_12: attho, ahampi satthāraṃ uddissa gantvā pabbajissāmī”ti. “Devi, mayampi tumheheva
atk-s0502a:1610_13: saddhiṃ pabbajissāmā”ti. “Sace sakkotha, sādhu, ammā”ti? “Sakkoma, devī”ti. “Sādhu,
atk-s0502a:1610_14: ammā, tena hi ethā”ti rathasahassaṃ yojāpetvā rathaṃ āruyha tāhi saddhiṃ nikkhamitvā
atk-s0502a:1610_15: antarāmagge paṭhamaṃ nadiṃ disvā yathā raññā puṭṭhaṃ, tatheva pucchitvā sabbapavattiṃ
atk-s0502a:1610_16: sutvā “rañño gatamaggaṃ olokethā”ti vatvā “sindhavānaṃ padavalañjaṃ na passāma, devī”ti
atk-s0502a:1610_17: vutte “rājā tīṇi ratanāni uddissa nikkhanto saccakiriyaṃ katvā gato bhavissati. Ahampi
atk-s0502a:1610_18: tīṇi ratanāni uddissa nikkhantā, tesameva anubhāvena idaṃ udakaṃ viya mā ahosī”ti
atk-s0502a:1610_19: tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ guṇaṃ anussaritvā rathasahassaṃ pesesi. Udakaṃ piṭṭhipāsāṇasadisaṃ
atk-s0502a:1610_20: ahosi. Cakkānaṃ aggagganemivaṭṭiyo neva temiṃsu. Eteneva upāyena itarā dve nadiyo uttari.
atk-s0502a:1611_0: Atha satthā tassāgamanabhāvaṃ ñatvā yathā attano santike nisinnā bhikkhū na paññāyanti,
atk-s0502a:1611_1: evamakāsi. Sāpi gacchantī gacchantī satthu sarīrato nikkhantā chabbaṇṇarasmiyo disvā
atk-s0502a:1611_2: tatheva cintetvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhitā pucchi – “bhante,
atk-s0502a:1611_3: mahākappino tumhākaṃ uddissa nikkhanto āgatettha maññe, kahaṃ so, amhākampi naṃ dassethā”ti?
atk-s0502a:1611_4: “Nisīdatha tāva, idheva naṃ passissathā”ti. Tā sabbāpi tuṭṭhacittā “idheva kira nisinnā
atk-s0502a:1611_5: sāmike passissāmā”ti nisīdiṃsu. Satthā tāsaṃ anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathesi, anojādevī
atk-s0502a:1611_6: desanāvasāne saparivārā sotāpattiphalaṃ pāpuṇi. Mahākappinatthero tāsaṃ vaḍḍhitadhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0502a:1611_7: suṇanto saparivāro saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe satthā tāsaṃ
atk-s0502a:1611_8: te bhikkhū arahattappatte dassesi. Tāsaṃ kira āgatakkhaṇeyeva attano sāmike kāsāvadhare
atk-s0502a:1611_9: muṇḍakasīse disvā cittaṃ ekaggaṃ na bhaveyya, tena maggaphalāni pattuṃ na sakkuṇeyyuṃ.
atk-s0502a:1611_10: Tasmā acalasaddhāya patiṭṭhitakāle tāsaṃ te bhikkhū arahattappatteyeva dassesi.
atk-s0502a:1612_0: Tāpi te disvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā, “bhante, tumhākaṃ tāva pabbajitakiccaṃ
atk-s0502a:1612_1: matthakaṃ patta”nti vatvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhitā pabbajjaṃ yāciṃsu. Evaṃ
atk-s0502a:1612_2: kira vutte “satthā uppalavaṇṇāya āgamanaṃ cintesī”ti ekacce vadanti. Satthā pana
atk-s0502a:1612_3: tā upāsikāyo āha – “sāvatthiṃ gantvā bhikkhunīupassaye pabbajethā”ti. Tā anupubbena
atk-s0502a:1612_4: janapadacārikaṃ caramānā antarāmagge mahājanena abhihaṭasakkārasammānā padasāva vīsayojanasatikaṃ
atk-s0502a:1612_5: gantvā bhikkhunīupassaye pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Satthāpi bhikkhusahassaṃ
atk-s0502a:1612_6: ādāya ākāseneva jetavanaṃ agamāsi. Tatra sudaṃ āyasmā mahākappino rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānādīsu
atk-s0502a:1612_7: “aho sukhaṃ, aho sukha”nti udānaṃ udānento vicarati. Bhikkhū bhagavato ārocesuṃ –
atk-s0502a:1612_8: “bhante, mahākappino ‘aho sukhaṃ, aho sukha’nti udānaṃ udānento vicarati, attano
atk-s0502a:1612_9: kāmasukhaṃ rajjasukhaṃ ārabbha kathesi maññe”ti. Satthā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ
atk-s0502a:1612_10: kira tvaṃ, kappina, kāmasukhaṃ rajjasukhaṃ ārabbha udānaṃ udānesī”ti. “Bhagavā me,
atk-s0502a:1612_11: bhante, taṃ ārabbha udānabhāvaṃ vā anudānabhāvaṃ vā jānātī”ti? Satthā “na, bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a:1612_12: mama putto kāmasukhaṃ rajjasukhaṃ ārabbha udānaṃ udāneti, puttassa pana me dhammapīti
atk-s0502a:1612_13: nāma dhammarati nāma uppajjati, so amatamahānibbānaṃ ārabbha eva udānaṃ udānesī”ti
atk-s0502a:1612_14: anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1616_0: Tattha dhammapītīti dhammapāyako, dhammaṃ pivantoti attho. Dhammo ca nāmesa na sakkā
atk-s0502a:1616_1: bhājanena yāguādīni viya pātuṃ? Navavidhaṃ pana lokuttaradhammaṃ nāmakāyena phusanto
atk-s0502a:1616_2: ārammaṇato sacchikaronto pariññābhisamayādīhi dukkhādīni ariyasaccāni paṭivijjhanto
atk-s0502a:1616_3: dhammaṃ pivati nāma. Sukhaṃ setīti desanāmattamevetaṃ, catūhipi iriyāpathehi sukhaṃ
atk-s0502a:1616_4: viharatīti attho. Vippasannenāti anāvilena nirupakkilesena. Ariyappavediteti buddhādīhi
atk-s0502a:1616_5: ariyehi pavedite satipaṭṭhānādibhede bodhipakkhiyadhamme. Sadā ramatīti evarūpo dhammapīti
atk-s0502a:1616_6: vippasannena cetasā viharanto paṇḍiccena samannāgato sadā ramati abhiramatīti.
atk-s0502a:1620: Udakañhi nayantīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto paṇḍitasāmaṇeraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1621_0: Atīte kira kassapasammāsambuddho vīsatikhīṇāsavasahassaparivāro bārāṇasiṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:1621_1: Manussā attano balaṃ sallakkhetvā aṭṭhapi dasapi ekato hutvā agantukadānādīni adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1622_0: “Upāsakā idha ekacco ‘attano santakameva dātuṃ vaṭṭati, kiṃ parena samādapitenā’ti
atk-s0502a:1622_1: attanāva dānaṃ deti, paraṃ na samādapeti. So nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne bhogasampadaṃ
atk-s0502a:1622_2: labhati, no parivārasampadaṃ. Ekacco paraṃ samādapeti, attanā na deti. So nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a:1622_3: parivārasampadaṃ labhati, no bhogasampadaṃ ekacco attanāpi na deti, parampi na samādapeti.
atk-s0502a:1622_4: So nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne neva bhogasampadaṃ labhati, na parivārasampadaṃ, vighāsādova
atk-s0502a:1622_5: hutvā jīvati. Ekacco attanā ca deti, parañca samādapeti. So nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a:1623_0: Taṃ sutvā samīpe ṭhito eko paṇḍitapuriso cintesi – “ahaṃ dāni tathā karissāmi, yathā
atk-s0502a:1623_1: me dvepi sampattiyo bhavissantī”ti. So satthāraṃ vanditvā āha – “bhante, svātanāya
atk-s0502a:1623_2: mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti. “Kittakehi te bhikkhūhi attho”ti? “Kittako pana vo,
atk-s0502a:1623_3: bhante, parivāro”ti? “Vīsati bhikkhusahassānī”ti. “Bhante, sabbehi saddhiṃ svātanāya
atk-s0502a:1623_4: mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti. Satthā adhivāsesi. So gāmaṃ pavisitvā, “ammatātā, svātanāya
atk-s0502a:1623_5: mayā buddhappamukho bhikkhusaṅgho nimantito, tumhe yattakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dātuṃ sakkhissatha,
atk-s0502a:1623_6: tattakānaṃ dānaṃ dethā”ti ārocetvā vicaranto attano attano balaṃ sallakkhetvā “mayaṃ
atk-s0502a:1623_7: dasannaṃ dassāma, mayaṃ vīsatiyā, mayaṃ satassa, mayaṃ pañcasatāna”nti vutte sabbesaṃ
atk-s0502a:1624_0: Tena ca samayena tasmiṃ nagare atiduggatabhāveneva “mahāduggato”ti paññāto eko puriso
atk-s0502a:1624_1: atthi. So tampi sammukhāgataṃ disvā, samma mahāduggata, mayā svātanāya buddhappamukho
atk-s0502a:1624_2: bhikkhusaṅgho nimantito, sve nagaravāsino dānaṃ dassanti, “tvaṃ kati bhikkhū bhojessasī”ti?
atk-s0502a:1624_3: “Sāmi, mayhaṃ kiṃ bhikkhūhi, bhikkhūhi nāma sadhanānaṃ attho, mayhaṃ pana sve yāguatthāya
atk-s0502a:1624_4: taṇḍulanāḷimattampi natthi, ahaṃ bhatiṃ katvā jīvāmi, kiṃ me bhikkhūhī”ti? Samādapakena
atk-s0502a:1624_5: nāma byattena bhavitabbaṃ. Tasmā so tena “natthī”ti vuttepi tuṇhībhūto ahutvā evamāha
atk-s0502a:1624_6: – “samma mahāduggata, imasmiṃ nagare subhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā sukhumavatthaṃ nivāsetvā
atk-s0502a:1624_7: nānābharaṇapaṭimaṇḍitā sirisayane sayamānā bahū janā sampattiṃ anubhavanti, tvaṃ
atk-s0502a:1624_8: pana divasaṃ bhatiṃ katvā kucchipūraṇamattampi na labhasi, evaṃ santepi ‘ahaṃ pubbe
atk-s0502a:1624_9: puññaṃ akatattā kiñci na labhāmī’ti na jānāsī”ti? “Jānāmi, sāmī”ti. “Atha kasmā idāni
atk-s0502a:1624_10: puññaṃ na karosi, tvaṃ yuvā balasampanno, kiṃ tayā bhatiṃ katvāpi yathābalaṃ dānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1624_11: dātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti? So tasmiṃ kathenteyeva saṃvegappatto hutvā “mayhampi ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0502a:1624_12: paṇṇe āropehi, kiñcideva bhatiṃ katvā ekassa bhikkhaṃ dassāmī”ti āha. Itaro “kiṃ
atk-s0502a:1624_13: ekena bhikkhunā paṇṇe āropitenā”ti na āropesi? Mahāduggatopi gehaṃ gantvā bhariyaṃ
atk-s0502a:1624_14: āha – “bhadde, nagaravāsino sve saṅghabhattaṃ karissanti, ahampi samādapakena ‘ekassa
atk-s0502a:1624_15: bhikkhaṃ dehī’ti vutto, mayampi sve ekassa bhikkhaṃ dassāmā”ti. Athassa bhariyā “mayaṃ
atk-s0502a:1624_16: daliddā, kasmā tayā sampaṭicchita”nti avatvāva, “sāmi, bhaddakaṃ te kataṃ, mayaṃ
atk-s0502a:1624_17: pubbepi kiñci adatvā idāni duggatā jātā, mayaṃ ubhopi bhatiṃ katvā ekassa bhikkhaṃ
atk-s0502a:1624_18: dassāma, sāmī”ti vatvā ubhopi gehā nikkhamitvā bhatiṭṭhānaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1625_0: Mahāseṭṭhi taṃ disvā “kiṃ, samma mahāduggata, bhatiṃ karissasī”ti pucchi. “Āma, ayyā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1625_1: “Kiṃ karissasī”ti? “Yaṃ tumhe kāressatha, taṃ karissāmī”ti. “Tena hi mayaṃ sve dve
atk-s0502a:1625_2: tīṇi bhikkhusatāni bhojessāma, ehi, dārūni phālehī”ti vāsipharasuṃ nīharitvā dāpesi.
atk-s0502a:1625_3: Mahāduggato daḷhaṃ kacchaṃ bandhitvā mahussāhappatto vāsiṃ pahāya pharasuṃ gaṇhanto,
atk-s0502a:1625_4: pharasuṃ pahāya vāsiṃ gaṇhanto dārūni phāleti. Atha naṃ seṭṭhi āha – “samma, tvaṃ
atk-s0502a:1625_5: ajja ativiya ussāhappatto kammaṃ karosi, kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti? “Sāmi, ahaṃ sve ekaṃ
atk-s0502a:1625_6: bhikkhuṃ bhojessāmī”ti. Taṃ sutvā seṭṭhi pasannamānaso cintesi – “aho iminā dukkaraṃ
atk-s0502a:1625_7: kataṃ, ‘ahaṃ duggato’ti tuṇhībhāvaṃ anāpajjitvā ‘bhatiṃ katvā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ bhojessāmī’ti
atk-s0502a:1625_8: vadatī”ti. Seṭṭhibhariyāpi tassa bhariyaṃ disvā, “amma, kiṃ kammaṃ karissasī”ti pucchitvā
atk-s0502a:1625_9: “yaṃ tumhe kāressatha, taṃ karomī”ti vutte udukkhalasālaṃ pavesetvā suppamusalādīni
atk-s0502a:1625_10: dāpesi. Sā naccantī viya tuṭṭhapahaṭṭhā vīhiṃ koṭṭeti ceva ophuṇāti ca. Atha naṃ
atk-s0502a:1625_11: seṭṭhibhariyā pucchi – “amma, tvaṃ ativiya tuṭṭhapahaṭṭhā kammaṃ karosi, kiṃ nu kho
atk-s0502a:1625_12: kāraṇa”nti? “Ayye, imaṃ bhatiṃ katvā mayampi ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ bhojessāmā”ti. Taṃ sutvā
atk-s0502a:1625_13: seṭṭhibhariyāpi tassaṃ “aho vatāyaṃ dukkarakārikā”ti pasīdi. Seṭṭhi mahāduggatassa
atk-s0502a:1625_14: dārūnaṃ phālitakāle “ayaṃ te bhatī”ti sālīnaṃ catasso nāḷiyo dāpetvā “ayaṃ te tuṭṭhidāyo”ti
atk-s0502a:1626_0: So gehaṃ gantvā bhariyaṃ āha – “mayā bhatiṃ katvā sāli laddho, ayaṃ nivāpo bhavissati,
atk-s0502a:1626_1: tayā laddhāya bhatiyā dadhitelakaṭukabhaṇḍāni gaṇhāhī”ti. Seṭṭhibhariyāpi puna tassā
atk-s0502a:1626_2: ekaṃ sappikaroṭikañceva dadhibhājanañca kaṭukabhaṇḍañca suddhataṇḍuḷināḷiñca dāpesi.
atk-s0502a:1626_3: Iti ca ubhinnampi nava taṇḍulanāḷiyo ahesuṃ. Te “deyyadhammo no laddho”ti tuṭṭhahaṭṭhā
atk-s0502a:1626_4: pātova uṭṭhahiṃsu. Bhariyā mahāduggataṃ āha – “gaccha, sāmi, paṇṇaṃ pariyesitvā āharā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1626_5: So antarāpaṇe paṇṇaṃ adisvā nadītīraṃ gantvā “ajja ayyānaṃ bhojanaṃ dātuṃ labhissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:1626_6: pahaṭṭhamānaso gāyanto paṇṇaṃ uccinati. Mahājālaṃ khipitvā ṭhito kevaṭṭo “mahāduggatassa
atk-s0502a:1626_7: saddena bhavitabba”nti taṃ pakkositvā pucchi – “ativiya tuṭṭhacitto gāyasi, kiṃ nu
atk-s0502a:1626_8: kho kāraṇa”nti? “Paṇṇaṃ uccināmi, sammā”ti. “Kiṃ karissasī”ti? “Ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ bhojessāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1626_9: “Aho sukhito, bhikkhu, so tava kiṃ paṇṇaṃ khādissatī”ti? “Kiṃ karomi, samma, attanā
atk-s0502a:1626_10: laddhapaṇṇena bhojessāmī”ti? “Tena hi ehī”ti. “Kiṃ karomi, sammā”ti? “Ime macche
atk-s0502a:1626_11: gahetvā pādagghanakāni aḍḍhagghanakāni kahāpaṇagghanakāni ca uddānāni karohī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1626_12: So tathā akāsi. Baddhabaddhe macche nagaravāsino nimantitanimantitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0502a:1626_13: atthāya hariṃsu. Tassa macchuddānāni karontasseva bhikkhācāravelā pāpuṇi. So velaṃ
atk-s0502a:1626_14: sallakkhetvā “gamissāmahaṃ, samma, ayaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āgamanavelā”ti āha. “Atthi pana
atk-s0502a:1626_15: kiñci macchuddāna”nti? “Natthi, samma, sabbāni khīṇānī”ti. “Tena hi mayā attano atthāya
atk-s0502a:1626_16: vālukāya nikhaṇitvā cattāro rohitamacchā ṭhapitā, sace bhikkhuṃ bhojetukāmosi, ime
atk-s0502a:1626_17: gahetvā gacchā”ti te macche tassa adāsi.
atk-s0502a:1627_0: Taṃ divasaṃ pana satthā paccūsakāle lokaṃ volokento mahāduggataṃ attano ñāṇajālassa
atk-s0502a:1627_1: anto paviṭṭhaṃ disvā “kiṃ nu kho bhavissatī”ti āvajjento “mahāduggato ‘ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0502a:1627_2: bhojessāmī’ti bhariyāya saddhiṃ hiyyo bhatiṃ akāsi, kataraṃ nu kho bhikkhuṃ labhissatī”ti
atk-s0502a:1627_3: cintetvā “manussā paṇṇe āropitasaññāya bhikkhū gahetvā attano attano gehesu nisīdāpessanti,
atk-s0502a:1627_4: mahāduggato maṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ na labhissatī”ti upadhāresi. Buddhā kira
atk-s0502a:1627_5: duggatesu anukampaṃ karonti. Tasmā satthā pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā “mahāduggataṃ
atk-s0502a:1627_6: saṅgaṇhissāmī”ti gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā nisīdi. Mahāduggatepi macche gahetvā gehaṃ
atk-s0502a:1627_7: pavisante sakkassa paṇḍukambalasilāsanaṃ uṇhākāraṃ dassesi. So “kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti
atk-s0502a:1627_8: olokento “hiyyo, mahāduggato ‘ekassa bhikkhuno bhikkhaṃ dassāmī’ti attano bhariyāya
atk-s0502a:1627_9: saddhiṃ bhatiṃ akāsi, kataraṃ nu kho bhikkhuṃ labhissatī”ti cintetvā “natthetassa
atk-s0502a:1627_10: añño bhikkhu, satthā pana mahāduggatassa saṅgahaṃ karissāmī”ti gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinno.
atk-s0502a:1627_11: Mahāduggato attano upakappanakaṃ yāgubhattaṃ paṇṇasūpeyyampi tathāgatassa dadeyya,
atk-s0502a:1627_12: “yaṃnūnāhaṃ mahāduggatassa gehaṃ gantvā bhattakārakakammaṃ kareyya”nti aññātakavesena
atk-s0502a:1627_13: tassa gehasamīpaṃ gantvā “atthi nu kho kassaci kiñci bhatiyā kātabba”nti pucchi.
atk-s0502a:1627_14: Mahāduggato taṃ disvā āha – “samma, kiṃ kammaṃ karissasī”ti? “Ahaṃ, sāmi, sabbasippiko,
atk-s0502a:1627_15: mayhaṃ ajānanasippaṃ nāma natthi, yāgubhattādīnipi sampādetuṃ jānāmī”ti. “Samma,
atk-s0502a:1627_16: mayaṃ tava kammena atthikā, tuyhaṃ pana kiñci dātabbaṃ bhatiṃ na passāmā”ti. “Kiṃ
atk-s0502a:1627_17: pana te kattabba”nti? “Ekassa bhikkhussa bhikkhaṃ dātukāmomhi, tassa yāgubhattasaṃvidhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1627_18: icchāmī”ti. “Sace bhikkhussa bhikkhaṃ dassasi, na me bhatiyā attho, kiṃ mama puññaṃ
atk-s0502a:1627_19: na vaṭṭatī”ti? “Evaṃ sante sādhu, samma, pavisā”ti. So tassa gehaṃ pavisitvā telataṇḍulādīni
atk-s0502a:1627_20: āharāpetvā “gaccha, attano pattabhikkhuṃ ānehī”ti taṃ uyyojesi. Dānaveyyāvaṭikopi
atk-s0502a:1627_21: paṇṇe āropitaniyāmeneva tesaṃ tesaṃ gehāni bhikkhū pahiṇi.
atk-s0502a:1628_0: Mahāduggato tassa santikaṃ gantvā “mayhaṃ pattabhikkhuṃ dehī”ti āha. So tasmiṃ khaṇe
atk-s0502a:1628_1: satiṃ labhitvā “ahaṃ tava bhikkhuṃ pamuṭṭho”ti āha. Mahāduggato tikhiṇāya sattiyā
atk-s0502a:1628_2: kucchiyaṃ pahaṭo viya, “sāmi, kasmā maṃ nāsesi, ahaṃ tayā hiyyo samādapito bhariyāya
atk-s0502a:1628_3: saddhiṃ divasaṃ bhatiṃ katvā ajja pātova paṇṇatthāya nadītīre āhiṇḍitvā āgato, dehi
atk-s0502a:1628_4: me ekaṃ bhikkhu”nti bāhā paggayha paridevi. Manussā sannipatitvā “kimetaṃ, mahāduggatā”ti
atk-s0502a:1628_5: pucchiṃsu. So tamatthaṃ ārocesi. Te veyyāvaṭikaṃ pucchiṃsu – “saccaṃ kira, samma,
atk-s0502a:1628_6: tayā esa ‘bhatiṃ katvā ekassa bhikkhussa bhikkhaṃ dehī’ti samādapito”ti? “Āma, ayyā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1628_7: “Bhāriyaṃ te kammaṃ kataṃ, yo tvaṃ ettake bhikkhū saṃvidahanto etassa ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0502a:1628_8: nādāsī”ti. So tesaṃ vacanena maṅkubhūto taṃ āha – “samma mahāduggata, mā maṃ nāsayi,
atk-s0502a:1628_9: ahaṃ tava kāraṇā mahāvihesaṃ patto, manussā paṇṇe āropitaniyāmena attano attano pattabhikkhū
atk-s0502a:1628_10: nayiṃsu, attano gehe nisinnabhikkhuṃ nīharitvā dento nāma natthi, satthā pana mukhaṃ
atk-s0502a:1628_11: dhovitvā gandhakuṭiyameva nisinno, rājayuvarājasenāpatiādayo satthu gandhakuṭito
atk-s0502a:1628_12: nikkhamanaṃ olokentā nisinnā satthu pattaṃ gahetvā ‘gamissāmā’ti. Buddhā nāma duggate
atk-s0502a:1628_13: anukampaṃ karonti, tvaṃ vihāraṃ gantvā ‘duggatomhi, bhante, mama saṅgahaṃ karothā’ti
atk-s0502a:1628_14: satthāraṃ vanda, sace te puññaṃ atthi, addhā lacchasī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1629_0: So vihāraṃ agamāsi. Atha naṃ aññesu divasesu vihāre vighāsādabhāvena diṭṭhattā rājayuvarājādayo,
atk-s0502a:1629_1: “mahāduggata, na tāva bhattakālo, kasmā tvaṃ āgacchasī”ti āhaṃsu. So “jānāmi, sāmi,
atk-s0502a:1629_2: ‘na tāva bhattakālo’ti. Satthāraṃ pana vandituṃ āgacchāmī”ti vadanto gantvā gandhakuṭiyā
atk-s0502a:1629_3: ummāre sīsaṃ ṭhapetvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā, “bhante, imasmiṃ nagare mayā duggatataro
atk-s0502a:1629_4: natthi, avassayo me hotha, karotha me saṅgaha”nti āha. Satthā gandhakuṭidvāraṃ vivaritvā
atk-s0502a:1629_5: pattaṃ nīharitvā tassa hatthe ṭhapesi. So cakkavattisiriṃ patto viya ahosi, rājayuvarājādayo
atk-s0502a:1629_6: aññamaññassa mukhāni olokayiṃsu. Satthārā dinnapattañhi koci issariyavasena gahetuṃ
atk-s0502a:1629_7: samattho nāma natthi. Evaṃ pana vadiṃsu, “samma mahāduggata, satthu pattaṃ amhākaṃ
atk-s0502a:1629_8: dehi ettakaṃ nāma te dhanaṃ dassāma, tvaṃ duggato dhanaṃ gaṇhāhi, kiṃ te pattenā”ti?
atk-s0502a:1629_9: Mahāduggato “na kassaci dassāmi, na me dhanena attho, satthāraṃyeva bhojessāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:1629_10: āha. Avasesā taṃ yācitvā pattaṃ alabhitvā nivattiṃsu. Rājā pana “mahāduggato dhanena
atk-s0502a:1629_11: palobhiyamānopi satthu pattaṃ na deti, satthārā ca sayaṃ dinnapattaṃ koci gahetuṃ
atk-s0502a:1629_12: na sakkoti, imassa deyyadhammo nāma kittako bhavissati, iminā deyyadhammassa dinnakāle
atk-s0502a:1629_13: satthāraṃ ādāya gehaṃ netvā mayhaṃ sampāditaṃ āhāraṃ dassāmī”ti cintetvā satthārā
atk-s0502a:1629_14: saddhiṃyeva agamāsi. Sakkopi devarājā yāgukhajjakabhattasūpeyyapaṇṇādīni sampādetvā
atk-s0502a:1630_0: Mahāduggato satthāraṃ netvā “pavisatha, bhante”ti āha. Vasanagehañcassa nīcaṃ hoti,
atk-s0502a:1630_1: anonatena pavisituṃ na sakkā. Buddhā ca nāma gehaṃ pavisantā na onamitvā pavisanti.
atk-s0502a:1630_2: Gehañhi pavisanakāle mahāpathavī vā heṭṭhā ogacchati, gehaṃ vā uddhaṃ gacchati. Idaṃ
atk-s0502a:1630_3: tesaṃ sudinnadānassa phalaṃ. Puna nikkhamitvā gatakāle sabbaṃ pākatikameva hoti.
atk-s0502a:1630_4: Tasmā satthā ṭhitakova gehaṃ pavisitvā sakkena paññattāsane nisīdi. Satthari nisinne
atk-s0502a:1630_5: rājā āha – “samma mahāduggata, tayā amhākaṃ yācantānampi satthu patto na dinno, passāma
atk-s0502a:1630_6: tāva, kīdiso te satthu sakkāro kato”ti? Athassa sakko yāgukhajjakādīni vivaritvā
atk-s0502a:1630_7: dassesi. Tesaṃ vāsagandho sakalanagaraṃ chādetvā aṭṭhāsi. Rājā yāguādīni oloketvā
atk-s0502a:1630_8: bhagavantaṃ āha – “bhante, ‘ahaṃ mahāduggatassa deyyadhammo kittako bhavissati, iminā
atk-s0502a:1630_9: deyyadhamme dinne satthāraṃ gehaṃ netvā attano sampāditaṃ āhāraṃ dassāmī’ti cintetvā
atk-s0502a:1630_10: āgato, mayā evarūpo āhāro na diṭṭhapubbo, mayi idha ṭhite mahāduggato kilameyya,
atk-s0502a:1630_11: gacchāmaha”nti satthāraṃ vanditvā pakkāmi. Sakkopi satthāraṃ yāguādīni datvā sakkaccaṃ
atk-s0502a:1630_12: parivisi. Satthāpi katabhattakicco anumodanaṃ katvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:1631_0: Sakko mahāduggatassa saññaṃ adāsi. So pattaṃ gahetvā satthāraṃ anugacchi. Sakko nivattitvā
atk-s0502a:1631_1: mahāduggatassa gehadvāre ṭhito ākāsaṃ olokesi. Tāvadeva ākāsato sattaratanavassaṃ
atk-s0502a:1631_2: vassitvā tassa gehe sabbabhājanāni pūretvā sakalaṃ gehaṃ pūresi. Tassa gehe okāso
atk-s0502a:1631_3: nāhosi. Tassa bhariyā dārake hatthesu gahetvā nīharitvā bahi aṭṭhāsi. So satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:1631_4: anugantvā nivatto dārake bahi disvā “kiṃ ida”nti pucchi. “Sāmi, sakalaṃ no gehaṃ
atk-s0502a:1631_5: sattahi ratanehi puṇṇaṃ, pavisituṃ okāso natthī”ti. So “ajjeva me dānena vipāko dinno”ti
atk-s0502a:1631_6: cintetvā rañño santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā, “kasmā āgatosī”ti vutte āha –“deva, gehaṃ
atk-s0502a:1631_7: me sattahi ratanehi puṇṇaṃ, taṃ dhanaṃ gaṇhathā”ti. Rājā “aho buddhānaṃ dinnadānaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1631_8: ajjeva matthakaṃ patta”nti cintetvā taṃ āha – “kiṃ te laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti? “Dhanaharaṇatthāya
atk-s0502a:1631_9: sakaṭasahassaṃ, devā”ti. Rājā sakaṭasahassaṃ pesetvā dhanaṃ āharāpetvā rājaṅgaṇe
atk-s0502a:1631_10: okirāpesi. Tālappamāṇo rāsi ahosi. Rājā nagare sannipātāpetvā “imasmiṃ nagare atthi
atk-s0502a:1631_11: kassaci ettakaṃ dhana”nti pucchi. “Natthi, devā”ti. “Evaṃ mahādhanassa kiṃ kātuṃ
atk-s0502a:1631_12: vaṭṭatī”ti? “Seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭati, devā”ti. Rājā tassa mahāsakkāraṃ katvā
atk-s0502a:1632_0: Athassa pubbe ekassa seṭṭhino gehaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhitvā “ettha jāte gacche harāpetvā
atk-s0502a:1632_1: gehaṃ uṭṭhāpetvā vasāhī”ti āha. Tassa taṃ ṭhānaṃ sodhetvā samaṃ katvā bhūmiyā khaññamānāya
atk-s0502a:1632_2: aññamaññaṃ āhacca nidhikumbhiyo uṭṭhahiṃsu. Tena rañño ārocite “tava puññena nibbattā,
atk-s0502a:1632_3: tvameva gaṇhāhī”ti āha. So gehaṃ kāretvā sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0502a:1632_4: mahādānaṃ adāsi. Tato parampi yāvatāyukaṃ tiṭṭhanto puññāni karitvā āyupariyosāne devaloke nibbatto.
atk-s0502a:1633_0: Ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde tato cuto sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0502a:1633_1: sāriputtattherassūpaṭṭhākakule seṭṭhidhītu kucchiyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Athassā mātāpitaro
atk-s0502a:1633_2: gabbhassa patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ ñatvā gabbhaparihāraṃ adaṃsu. Tassā aparena samayena evarūpo
atk-s0502a:1633_3: dohaḷo uppajji – “aho vatāhaṃ dhammadesanāpatiṃ ādiṃ katvā pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1633_4: rohitamaccharasena dānaṃ datvā kāsāyāni vatthāni nivāsetvā āsanapariyante nisinnā
atk-s0502a:1633_5: tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ucchiṭṭhabhattaṃ paribhuñjeyya”nti. Sā mātāpitūnaṃ ārocetvā tathā
atk-s0502a:1633_6: akāsi, dohaḷo paṭipassambhi. Athassā tato aparesupi sattasu maṅgalesu rohitamaccharaseneva
atk-s0502a:1633_7: dhammasenāpatittherappamukhāni pañca bhikkhusatāni bhojesuṃ. Sabbaṃ tissakumārassa
atk-s0502a:1633_8: vatthumhi vuttaniyāmeneva veditabbaṃ. Ayamassa pana mahāduggatakāle dinnassa rohitamaccharasadānasseva
atk-s0502a:1633_9: nissando. Nāmaggahaṇadivase panassa, “bhante, dāsassa vo sikkhāpadāni dethā”ti mātarā
atk-s0502a:1633_10: vutte thero āha – “konāmo ayaṃ dārako”ti? “Bhante, imassa dārakassa kucchiyaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇato
atk-s0502a:1633_11: paṭṭhāya imasmiṃ gehe jaḷā eḷamūgāpi paṇḍitā jātā, tasmā me puttassa paṇḍitotveva
atk-s0502a:1633_12: nāmaṃ bhavissatī”ti. Thero sikkhāpadāni adāsi. Jātadivasato paṭṭhāya panassa “nāhaṃ
atk-s0502a:1633_13: mama puttassa ajjhāsayaṃ bhindissāmī”ti mātu cittaṃ uppajji. So sattavassikakāle
atk-s0502a:1633_14: mātaraṃ āha – “amma, therassa santike pabbajissāmī”ti. “Sādhu, tāta, ‘ahaṃ tava ajjhāsayaṃ
atk-s0502a:1633_15: na bhindissāmicceva manaṃ uppādesi”’nti vatvā theraṃ nimantetvā bhojetvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:1633_16: dāso vo pabbajitukāmo, ahaṃ imaṃ sāyanhasamaye vihāraṃ ānessāmī”ti theraṃ uyyojetvā
atk-s0502a:1633_17: ñātake sannipātāpetvā “mama puttassa gihikāle kattabbasakkāraṃ ajjeva karissāmā”ti
atk-s0502a:1633_18: mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ kāretvā taṃ ādāya vihāraṃ gantvā “imaṃ, bhante, pabbājethā”ti therassa adāsi.
atk-s0502a:1634_0: Thero pabbajjāya dukkarabhāvaṃ ācikkhitvā “karissāmahaṃ, bhante, tumhākaṃ ovāda”nti
atk-s0502a:1634_1: vutte “tena hi ehī”ti kese temetvā tacapañcakakammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhitvā pabbājesi.
atk-s0502a:1634_2: Mātāpitaropissa sattāhaṃ vihāreyeva vasantā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa rohitamaccharaseneva
atk-s0502a:1634_3: dānaṃ datvā sattame divase sāyaṃ gehaṃ agamaṃsu. Thero aṭṭhame divase antogāmaṃ gacchanto
atk-s0502a:1634_4: taṃ ādāya gacchati, bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ nāgamāsi. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Na tāvassa pattacīvaraggahaṇāni
atk-s0502a:1634_5: vā iriyāpatho vā pāsādiko hoti, apica vihāre therassa kattabbavattaṃ atthi. Thero
atk-s0502a:1634_6: hi bhikkhusaṅghe antogāmaṃ paviṭṭhe sakalavihāraṃ vicaranto asammajjanaṭṭhānaṃ sammajjitvā
atk-s0502a:1634_8: paṭisāmetvā pacchā gāmaṃ pavisati. Apica “aññatitthiyā tucchavihāraṃ pavisitvā ‘passatha
atk-s0502a:1634_9: samaṇassa gotamassa sāvakānaṃ nisinnaṭṭhānānī’ti vattuṃ mā labhiṃsū”ti sakalavihāraṃ
atk-s0502a:1634_10: paṭijaggitvā pacchā gāmaṃ pavisati. Tasmā taṃ divasampi sāmaṇerena pattacīvaraṃ gāhāpetvā
atk-s0502a:1635_0: Sāmaṇero upajjhāyena saddhiṃ gacchanto antarāmagge mātikaṃ disvā, “bhante, idaṃ kiṃ
atk-s0502a:1635_1: nāmā”ti pucchi. “Mātikā nāma, sāmaṇerā”ti. “Imāya kiṃ karontī”ti? “Ito cito ca udakaṃ
atk-s0502a:1635_2: āharitvā attano sassakammaṃ sampādentī”ti. “Kiṃ pana, bhante, udakassa cittaṃ atthī”ti?
atk-s0502a:1635_4: So cintesi – “sace evarūpampi acittakaṃ attano icchiticchitaṭṭhānaṃ haritvā kammaṃ
atk-s0502a:1635_5: karonti, kasmā sacittakāpi cittaṃ attano vase vattetvā samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkhissantī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1635_6: Atheso purato gacchanto usukāre saradaṇḍakaṃ aggimhi tāpetvā akkhikoṭiyā oloketvā
atk-s0502a:1635_7: ujukaṃ karonte disvā, “ime, bhante, ke nāmā”ti pucchi. “Usukārā nāmāvuso”ti. “Kiṃ
atk-s0502a:1635_8: panete karontī”ti? “Aggimhi tāpetvā saradaṇḍakaṃ ujuṃ karontī”ti. “Sacittako, bhante,
atk-s0502a:1635_9: eso”ti? “Acittako, āvuso”ti. So cintesi – “sace acittakaṃ gahetvā aggimhi tāpetvā
atk-s0502a:1635_10: ujuṃ karonti, kasmā sacittakāpi attano cittaṃ vase vattetvā samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ na
atk-s0502a:1635_11: sakkhissantī”ti. Atheso purato gacchanto dārūni araneminābhiādīni tacchante disvā,
atk-s0502a:1635_12: “bhante, ime ke nāmā”ti pucchi. “Tacchakā nāmāvuso”ti. “Kiṃ panete karontī”ti? “Dārūni
atk-s0502a:1635_13: gahetvā yānakādīnaṃ cakkādīni karonti, āvuso”ti. “Etāni pana sacittakāni, bhante”ti?
atk-s0502a:1635_14: “Acittakāni, āvuso”ti. Athassa etadahosi – “sace acittakāni kaṭṭhakaliṅgarāni gahetvā
atk-s0502a:1635_15: cakkādīni karonti, kasmā sacittakā attano cittaṃ vase vattetvā samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ
atk-s0502a:1635_16: na sakkhissantī”ti. So imāni kāraṇāni disvā, “bhante, sace tumhākaṃ pattacīvare tumhe
atk-s0502a:1635_17: gaṇheyyātha, ahaṃ nivatteyya”nti. Thero “ayaṃ adhunā pabbajito daharasāmaṇero maṃ
atk-s0502a:1635_18: anubandhamāno evaṃ vadetī”ti cittaṃ anuppādetvāva “āhara, sāmaṇerā”ti vatvā attano
atk-s0502a:1636_0: Sāmaṇeropi upajjhāyaṃ vanditvā nivattanto, “bhante, mayhaṃ āhāraṃ āharanto rohitamaccharaseneva
atk-s0502a:1636_1: āhareyyāthā”ti āha. “Kathaṃ labhissāmāvuso”ti? “Bhante, attano puññena alabhantā
atk-s0502a:1636_2: mama puññena labhissathā”ti āha. Thero “daharasāmaṇerassa bahi nisinnakassa paripanthopi
atk-s0502a:1636_3: bhaveyyā”ti kuñjikaṃ datvā “mayhaṃ vasanagabbhassa dvāraṃ vivaritvā anto pavisitvā
atk-s0502a:1636_4: nisīdeyyāsī”ti āha. So tathā katvā attano karajakāye ñāṇaṃ otāretvā attabhāvaṃ sammasanto
atk-s0502a:1636_5: nisīdi. Athassa guṇatejena sakkassa āsanaṃ uṇhākāraṃ dassesi. So “kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti
atk-s0502a:1636_7: nivatto, mayāpi tattha gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā cattāro mahārāje āmantetvā “vihārassa
atk-s0502a:1636_8: upavane vasante sakuṇe palāpetvā samantato ārakkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vatvā candadevaputtaṃ
atk-s0502a:1636_10: gaṇhāhī”ti vatvā sayaṃ gantvā āviñchanarajjuṭṭhāne ārakkhaṃ gahetvā aṭṭhāsi, vihāre
atk-s0502a:1636_11: purāṇapaṇṇassa patantassapi saddo nāhosi, sāmaṇerassa cittaṃ ekaggaṃ ahosi. So antarābhatteyeva
atk-s0502a:1637_0: Theropi “sāmaṇero vihāre nisinno, tassa upakappanakaṃ bhojanaṃ asukakule nāma sakkā
atk-s0502a:1637_1: laddhu”nti ekaṃ pemagāravayuttaṃ upaṭṭhākakulaṃ agamāsi. Tattha ca manussā taṃ divasaṃ
atk-s0502a:1637_2: rohitamacche labhitvā therasseva āgamanaṃ olokento nisīdiṃsu. Te theraṃ āgacchantaṃ
atk-s0502a:1637_3: disvā, “bhante, bhaddakaṃ vo kataṃ idhāgacchantehī”ti antogehe pavesetvā yāgukhajjakādīni
atk-s0502a:1637_4: datvā rohitamaccharasenassa piṇḍapātaṃ adaṃsu. Thero haraṇākāraṃ dassesi. Manussā
atk-s0502a:1637_5: “paribhuñjatha, bhante, haraṇakabhattampi labhissathā”ti vatvā therassa bhattakiccāvasāne
atk-s0502a:1637_6: pattaṃ rohitamaccharasabhojanassa pūretvā adaṃsu. Thero “sāmaṇero me chāto”ti sīghaṃ
atk-s0502a:1637_7: agamāsi. Satthāpi taṃ divasaṃ kālasseva bhuñjitvā vihāraṃ gantvā evaṃ āvajjesi –
atk-s0502a:1637_9: nipphajjissati nu kho assa pabbajitakicca”nti upadhārento tiṇṇaṃ phalānaṃ pattabhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:1637_10: ñatvā “arahattassa upanissayo atthi, natthī”ti āvajjento “atthī”ti disvā “purebhattameva
atk-s0502a:1637_11: arahattaṃ pattuṃ sakkhissati, na sakkhissatī”ti upadhārento “sakkhissatī”ti aññāsi.
atk-s0502a:1637_12: Athassa etadahosi – “sāriputto sāmaṇerassa bhattaṃ ādāya sīghaṃ āgacchati, antarāyampissa
atk-s0502a:1637_13: kareyya dvārakoṭṭhake ārakkhaṃ gahetvā nisīdissāmi, atha naṃ pañhaṃ pucchissāmi,
atk-s0502a:1637_14: tasmiṃ pañhe vissajjiyamāne sāmaṇero saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇissatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1637_15: Tato gantvā dvārakoṭṭhake ṭhatvā sampattaṃ theraṃ cattāro pañhe pucchi, puṭṭhaṃ puṭṭhaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjesi.
atk-s0502a:1638_0: Tatridaṃ pucchāvissajjanaṃ – satthā kira naṃ āha – “sāriputta, kiṃ te laddha”nti?
atk-s0502a:1638_1: “Āhāro, bhante”ti. “Āhāro nāma kiṃ āharati, sāriputtā”ti? “Vedanaṃ, bhante”ti. “Vedanaṃ
atk-s0502a:1638_2: kiṃ āharati, sāriputtā”ti? “Rūpaṃ, bhante”ti. “Rūpaṃ pana kiṃ āharati, sāriputtā”ti?
atk-s0502a:1638_3: “Phassaṃ, bhante”ti. Tatrāyaṃ adhippāyo – “jighacchitena hi paribhutto āhāro tassa
atk-s0502a:1638_4: khuddaṃ pariharitvā sukhaṃ vedanaṃ āharati. Āhāraparibhogena sukhitassa sukhāya vedanāya
atk-s0502a:1638_5: uppajjamānāya sarīre vaṇṇasampatti hoti. Evaṃ vedanā rūpaṃ āharati. Sukhito pana
atk-s0502a:1638_6: āhārajarūpavasena uppannasukhasomanasso ‘idāni me assādo jāto’ti nippajjanto vā nisīdanto
atk-s0502a:1639_0: Evaṃ imesu catūsu pañhesu vissajjikesu sāmaṇero saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patto.
atk-s0502a:1639_1: Satthāpi theraṃ āha – “gaccha, sāriputta, tava sāmaṇerassa bhattaṃ dehī”ti. Thero
atk-s0502a:1639_2: gantvā dvāraṃ ākoṭesi. Sāmaṇero nikkhamitvā therassa hatthato pattaṃ gahetvā ekamantaṃ
atk-s0502a:1639_3: ṭhapetvā tālavaṇṭena theraṃ bīji. Atha naṃ thero āha – “sāmaṇera, bhattakiccaṃ karohī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1639_4: “Tumhe pana, bhante”ti. “Kataṃ mayā bhattakiccaṃ, tvaṃ karohī”ti. Sattavassikadārako
atk-s0502a:1639_5: pabbajitvā aṭṭhame divase taṃ khaṇaṃ vikasitapadumuppalasadiso arahattaṃ patto, paccavekkhitaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1639_6: pana paccavekkhanto nisīditvā bhattakiccamakāsi. Tena pattaṃ dhovitvā paṭisāmitakāle
atk-s0502a:1639_7: candadevaputto candamaṇḍalaṃ vissajjesi, sūriyadevaputto sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ. Cattāro
atk-s0502a:1639_8: mahārājāno catuddisaṃ ārakkhaṃ vissajjesuṃ, sakko devarājā āviñchanake ārakkhaṃ vissajjesi.
atk-s0502a:1640_0: Bhikkhū ujjhāyiṃsu, “chāyā adhikappamāṇā jātā, sūriyo majjhaṭṭhānato galitvā gato,
atk-s0502a:1640_1: sāmaṇerena ca idāneva bhuttaṃ, kiṃ nu kho eta”nti. Satthā taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā āgantvā
atk-s0502a:1640_2: pucchi – “bhikkhave, kiṃ kathethā”ti? “Idaṃ nāma, bhante”ti? “Āma, bhikkhave, puññavato
atk-s0502a:1640_3: samaṇadhammaṃ karaṇakāle candadevaputto candamaṇḍalaṃ, sūriyadevaputto sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ
atk-s0502a:1640_4: ākaḍḍhitvā gaṇhi, cattāro mahārājāno vihāropavane catuddisaṃ ārakkhaṃ gaṇhiṃsu, sakko
atk-s0502a:1640_5: devarājā āviñchanake ārakkhaṃ gaṇhi, ahampi ‘buddhomhī’ti appossukko nisīdituṃ nālatthaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1640_6: gantvā dvārakoṭṭhake mama puttassa ārakkhaṃ aggahesiṃ, nettike ca mātikāya udakaṃ
atk-s0502a:1640_7: harante, usukāre ca usuṃ ujuṃ karonte, tacchake ca dārūni tacchante disvā ettakaṃ
atk-s0502a:1640_8: ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā paṇḍitā attānaṃ dametvā arahattaṃ gaṇhantiyevā”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ
atk-s0502a:1643: Dāruṃ namayanti tacchakā, attānaṃ damayanti paṇḍitā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1644_0: Tattha udakanti pathaviyā thalaṭṭhānaṃ khaṇitvā āvāṭaṭṭhānaṃ pūretvā mātikaṃ vā katvā
atk-s0502a:1644_1: rukkhadoṇiṃ vā ṭhapetvā attanā icchiticchitaṭṭhānaṃ udakaṃ. Nentīti nettikā. Tejananti
atk-s0502a:1644_2: kaṇḍaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – nettikā attano ruciyā udakaṃ nayanti, usukārāpi tāpetvā
atk-s0502a:1644_3: tejanaṃ namayanti usuṃ ujuṃ karonti. Tacchakāpi nemiādīnaṃ atthāya tacchantā dāruṃ
atk-s0502a:1644_4: namayanti attano ruciyā ujuṃ vā vaṅkaṃ vā karonti. Evaṃ ettakaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā paṇḍitā
atk-s0502a:1644_5: sotāpattimaggādīni uppādentā attānaṃ damayanti, arahattappattā pana ekantadantā nāma hontīti.
atk-s0502a:1648: Selo yathāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto lakuṇḍakabhaddiyattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1649_0: Puthujjanā kira sāmaṇerādayo theraṃ disvā sīsepi kaṇṇesupi nāsāyapi gahetvā “kiṃ,
atk-s0502a:1649_1: cūḷapita, sāsanasmiṃ na ukkaṇṭhasi, abhiramasī”ti vadanti. Thero tesu neva kujjhati,
atk-s0502a:1649_2: na dussati. Dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “passathāvuso, lakuṇḍakabhaddiyattheraṃ
atk-s0502a:1649_3: disvā sāmaṇerādayo evañcevañca viheṭhenti, so tesu neva kujjhati, na dussatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1649_4: Satthā āgantvā “kiṃ kathetha, bhikkhave”ti pucchitvā “imaṃ nāma, bhante”ti vutte
atk-s0502a:1649_5: “āma, bhikkhave, khīṇāsavā nāma neva kujjhanti, na dussanti. Ghanaselasadisā hete
atk-s0502a:1649_6: acalā akampiyā”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1653_0: Tattha nindāpasaṃsāsūti kiñcāpi idha dve lokadhammā vuttā, attho pana aṭṭhannampi
atk-s0502a:1653_1: vasena veditabbo. Yathā hi ekaghano asusiro selo puratthimādibhedena vātena na samīrati
atk-s0502a:1653_2: na iñjati na calati, evaṃ aṭṭhasupi lokadhammesu ajjhottharantesu paṇḍitā na samiñjanti,
atk-s0502a:1653_3: paṭighavasena vā anunayavasena vā na calanti na kampanti.
atk-s0502a:1657: Yathāpi rahadoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kāṇamātaraṃ ārabbha kathesi. Vatthu vinaye āgatameva.
atk-s0502a:1658_0: Tadā pana kāṇamātarā atucchahatthaṃ dhītaraṃ patikulaṃ pesetuṃ pakkesu pūvesu catukkhattuṃ
atk-s0502a:1658_1: catunnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dinnakāle satthārā tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ sikkhāpade paññatte kāṇāya
atk-s0502a:1658_2: sāmikena aññāya pajāpatiyā ānītāya kāṇā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā “imehi me gharāvāso nāsito”ti
atk-s0502a:1658_3: diṭṭhadiṭṭhe bhikkhū akkosati paribhāsati. Bhikkhū taṃ vīthiṃ paṭipajjituṃ na visahiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1658_4: Satthā taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā tattha agamāsi. Kāṇamātā satthāraṃ vanditvā paññattāsane
atk-s0502a:1658_5: nisīdāpetvā yāgukhajjakaṃ adāsi. Satthā katapātarāso “kahaṃ kāṇā”ti pucchi. “Esā,
atk-s0502a:1658_6: bhante, tumhe disvā maṅkubhūtā rodantī ṭhitā”ti. “Kiṃ kāraṇā”ti? “Esā, bhante, bhikkhū
atk-s0502a:1658_7: akkosati paribhāsati, tasmā tumhe disvā maṅkubhūtā rodamānā ṭhitā”ti. Atha naṃ satthā
atk-s0502a:1658_8: pakkosāpetvā – “kāṇe, kasmā maṃ disvā maṅkubhūtā nilīyitvā rodasī”ti. Athassā mātā
atk-s0502a:1658_9: tāya katakiriyaṃ ārocesi. Atha naṃ satthā āha – “kiṃ pana kāṇamāte mama sāvakā tayā
atk-s0502a:1658_10: dinnakaṃ gaṇhiṃsu, adinnaka”nti? “Dinnakaṃ, bhante”ti. “Sace mama sāvakā piṇḍāya
atk-s0502a:1658_11: carantā tava gehadvāraṃ pattā tayā dinnakaṃ gaṇhiṃsu, ko tesaṃ doso”ti? “Natthi,
atk-s0502a:1658_12: bhante, ayyānaṃ doso”. “Etissāyeva doso”ti. Satthā kāṇaṃ āha – “kāṇe, mayhaṃ kira
atk-s0502a:1658_13: sāvakā piṇḍāya caramānā gehadvāraṃ āgatā, atha nesaṃ tava mātarā pūvā dinnā, ko nāmettha
atk-s0502a:1658_14: mama sāvakānaṃ doso”ti? “Natthi, bhante, ayyānaṃ doso, mayhameva doso”ti satthāraṃ vanditvā khamāpesi.
atk-s0502a:1659_0: Athassā satthā anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathesi, sā sotāpattiphalaṃ pāpuṇi. Satthā uṭṭhāyāsanā
atk-s0502a:1659_1: vihāraṃ gacchanto rājaṅgaṇena pāyāsi. Rājā disvā “satthā viya bhaṇe”ti pucchitvā
atk-s0502a:1659_2: “āma, devā”ti vutte “gacchatha, mama āgantvā vandanabhāvaṃ ārocethā”ti pesetvā rājaṅgaṇe
atk-s0502a:1659_3: ṭhitaṃ satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā “kahaṃ, bhante, gatātthā”ti pucchi. “Kāṇamātāya
atk-s0502a:1659_4: gehaṃ, mahārājā”ti. “Kiṃ kāraṇā, bhante”ti? “Kāṇā kira bhikkhū akkosati paribhāsati,
atk-s0502a:1659_5: taṃkāraṇā gatomhī”ti. “Kiṃ pana vo, bhante, tassā anakkosanabhāvo kato”ti? “Āma,
atk-s0502a:1659_6: mahārāja, bhikkhūnañca anakkosikā katā, lokuttarakuṭumbasāminī cā”ti. “Hotu, bhante,
atk-s0502a:1659_7: tumhehi sā lokuttarakuṭumbasāminī katā, ahaṃ pana naṃ lokiyakuṭumbasāminiṃ karissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:1659_8: vatvā rājā satthāraṃ vanditvā paṭinivatto paṭicchannamahāyoggaṃ pahiṇitvā kāṇaṃ pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0502a:1659_9: sabbābharaṇehi alaṅkaritvā jeṭṭhadhītuṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā “mama dhītaraṃ posetuṃ samatthā
atk-s0502a:1659_10: gaṇhantū”ti āha. Atheko sabbatthakamahāmatto “ahaṃ devassa dhītaraṃ posessāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:1659_11: taṃ attano gehaṃ netvā sabbaṃ issariyaṃ paṭicchāpetvā “yathāruci puññāni karohī”ti
atk-s0502a:1659_12: āha. Tato paṭṭhāya kāṇā catūsu dvāresu purise ṭhapetvā attanā upaṭṭhātabbe bhikkhū
atk-s0502a:1659_13: ca bhikkhuniyo ca pariyesamānāpi na labhati. Kāṇāya gehadvāre paṭiyādetvā ṭhapitaṃ
atk-s0502a:1659_14: khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ mahogho viya pavattati. Bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ
atk-s0502a:1659_15: “pubbe, āvuso, cattāro mahallakattherā kāṇāya vippaṭisāraṃ kariṃsu, sā evaṃ vippaṭisārinī
atk-s0502a:1659_16: hutvāpi satthāraṃ āgamma saddhāsampadaṃ labhi. Satthārā puna tassā gehadvāraṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0502a:1659_17: upasaṅkamanārahaṃ kataṃ. Idāni upaṭṭhātabbe bhikkhū vā bhikkhuniyo vā pariyesamānāpi
atk-s0502a:1659_18: na labhati, aho buddhā nāma acchariyaguṇā”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a:1659_19: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, idāneva
atk-s0502a:1659_20: tehi mahallakabhikkhūhi kāṇāya vippaṭisāro kato, pubbepi kariṃsuyeva. Na ca idāneva
atk-s0502a:1659_21: mayā kāṇā mama vacanakārikā katā, pubbepi katāyevā”ti vatvā tamatthaṃ sotukāmehi bhikkhūhi yācito –
atk-s0502a:1661: Tatiyo ca catuttho ca, idaṃ te babbukā bila”nti. –
atk-s0502a:1662_0: Idaṃ babbujātakaṃ vitthārena kathetvā “tadā cattāro mahallakabhikkhū cattāro biḷārā
atk-s0502a:1662_1: ahesuṃ, mūsikā kāṇā, maṇikāro ahamevā”ti jātakaṃ samodhānetvā “evaṃ, bhikkhave, atītepi
atk-s0502a:1662_2: kāṇā dummanā āvilacittā vikkhittacittā hutvā mama vacanena pasannaudakarahado viya
atk-s0502a:1662_3: vippasannacittā ahosī”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1666_0: Tattha rahadoti yo caturaṅginiyāpi senāya ogāhantiyā nakhubhati evarūpo udakaṇṇavo,
atk-s0502a:1666_1: sabbākārena pana caturāsītiyojanasahassagambhīro nīlamahāsamuddo rahado nāma. Tassa
atk-s0502a:1666_2: hi heṭṭhā cattālīsayojanasahassamatte ṭhāne udakaṃ macchehi calati, upari tāvattakeyeva
atk-s0502a:1666_3: ṭhāne udakaṃ vātena calati, majjhe catuyojanasahassamatte ṭhāne udakaṃ niccalaṃ tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0502a:1666_4: Ayaṃ gambhīro rahado nāma. Evaṃ dhammānīti desanādhammāni. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā
atk-s0502a:1666_5: nāma rahado anākulatāya vippasanno, acalatāya anāvilo, evaṃ mama desanādhammaṃ sutvā
atk-s0502a:1666_6: sotāpattimaggādivasena nirupakkilesacittataṃ āpajjantā vippasīdanti paṇḍitā, arahattappattā
atk-s0502a:1670: Sabbattha ve sappurisā cajantīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto pañcasate bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi. Desanā verañjāyaṃ samuṭṭhitā.
atk-s0502a:1671_0: Paṭhamabodhiyañhi bhagavā verañjaṃ gantvā verañjena brāhmaṇena nimantito pañcahi
atk-s0502a:1671_1: bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ vassaṃ upagañchi. Verañjo brāhmaṇo mārāvaṭṭanena āvaṭṭo ekadivasampi
atk-s0502a:1671_2: satthāraṃ ārabbha satiṃ na uppādesi. Verañjāpi dubbhikkhā ahosi, bhikkhū santarabāhiraṃ
atk-s0502a:1671_3: verañjaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā piṇḍapātaṃ alabhantā kilamiṃsu. Tesaṃ assavāṇijakā patthapatthapulakaṃ
atk-s0502a:1671_4: bhikkhaṃ paññāpesuṃ. Te kilamante disvā mahāmoggallānatthero pathavojaṃ bhojetukāmo,
atk-s0502a:1671_5: uttarakuruñca piṇḍāya pavesetukāmo ahosi, satthā taṃ paṭikkhipi. Bhikkhūnaṃ ekadivasampi
atk-s0502a:1671_6: piṇḍapātaṃ ārabbha parittāso nāhosi, icchācāraṃ vajjetvā eva vihariṃsu. Satthā tattha
atk-s0502a:1671_7: temāsaṃ vasitvā verañjaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ apaloketvā tena katasakkārasammāno taṃ saraṇesu
atk-s0502a:1671_8: patiṭṭhāpetvā tato nikkhanto anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno ekasmiṃ samaye sāvatthiṃ
atk-s0502a:1671_9: patvā jetavane vihāsi, sāvatthivāsino satthu āgantukabhattāni kariṃsu. Tadā pana
atk-s0502a:1671_10: pañcasatamattā vighāsādā bhikkhū nissāya antovihāreyeva vasanti. Te bhikkhūnaṃ bhuttāvasesāni
atk-s0502a:1671_11: paṇītabhojanāni bhuñjitvā niddāyitvā uṭṭhāya nadītīraṃ gantvā nadantā vaggantā mallamuṭṭhiyuddhaṃ
atk-s0502a:1671_12: yujjhantā kīḷantā antovihārepi bahivihārepi anācārameva carantā vicaranti. Bhikkhū
atk-s0502a:1671_13: dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “passathāvuso, ime vighāsādā dubbhikkhakāle verañjāyaṃ
atk-s0502a:1671_14: kañci vikāraṃ na dassesuṃ, idāni pana evarūpāni paṇītabhojanāni bhuñjitvā anekappakāraṃ
atk-s0502a:1671_15: vikāraṃ dassentā vicaranti. Bhikkhū pana verañjāyampi upasantarūpā viharitvā idānipi
atk-s0502a:1671_16: upasantupasantāva viharantī”ti. Satthā dhammasabhaṃ gantvā, “bhikkhave, kiṃ kathethā”ti
atk-s0502a:1671_17: pucchitvā “idaṃ nāmā”ti vutte “pubbepete gadrabhayoniyaṃ nibbattā pañcasatā gadrabhā
atk-s0502a:1671_19: udakena madditvā makacipilotikāhi parissāvitattā ‘volodaka’nti saṅkhyaṃ gataṃ apparasaṃ
atk-s0502a:1671_20: nihīnaṃ pivitvā madhumattā viya nadantā vicariṃsūti vatvā –
atk-s0502a:1680_0: Idaṃ vālodakajātakaṃ vitthārena kathetvā “evaṃ, bhikkhave, sappurisā lokadhammaṃ
atk-s0502a:1680_1: vivajjetvā sukhitakālepi dukkhitakālepi nibbikārāva hontī”ti anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā
atk-s0502a:1686_0: Tattha sabbatthāti pañcakkhandhādibhedesu sabbadhammesu. Sappurisāti supurisā. Cajantīti
atk-s0502a:1686_1: arahattamaggañāṇena apakaḍḍhantā chandarāgaṃ vijahanti. Kāmakāmāti kāme kāmayantā
atk-s0502a:1686_2: kāmahetu kāmakāraṇā. Na lapayanti santoti buddhādayo santo kāmahetu neva attanā lapayanti,
atk-s0502a:1686_3: na paraṃ lapāpenti. Ye hi bhikkhāya paviṭṭhā icchācāre ṭhitā “kiṃ, upāsaka, sukhaṃ
atk-s0502a:1686_4: te puttadārassa, rājacorādīnaṃ vasena dvipadacatuppadesu natthi koci upaddavo”tiādīni
atk-s0502a:1686_5: vadanti, tāva te lapayanti nāma. Tathā pana vatvā “āma, bhante, sabbesaṃ no sukhaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1686_6: natthi koci upaddavo, idāni no gehaṃ pahūtaannapānaṃ, idheva vasathā”ti attānaṃ nimantāpentā
atk-s0502a:1686_7: lapāpenti nāma. Santo pana idaṃ ubhayampi na karonti. Sukhena phuṭṭhā atha vā dukhenāti
atk-s0502a:1686_8: desanāmattametaṃ, aṭṭhahi pana lokadhammehi phuṭṭhā tuṭṭhibhāvamaṅkubhāvavasena vā
atk-s0502a:1686_9: vaṇṇabhaṇanaavaṇṇabhaṇanavasena vā uccāvacaṃ ākāraṃ paṇḍitā na dassayantīti.
atk-s0502a:1690: Na attahetūti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto dhammikattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1691_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kireko upāsako dhammena samena agāraṃ ajjhāvasati. So pabbajitukāmo hutvā
atk-s0502a:1691_1: ekadivasaṃ bhariyāya saddhiṃ nisīditvā sukhakathaṃ kathento āha – “bhadde, icchāmahaṃ
atk-s0502a:1691_2: pabbajitu”nti. “Tena hi, sāmi, āgamehi tāva, yāvāhaṃ kucchigataṃ dārakaṃ vijāyāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1691_3: So āgametvā dārakassa padasā gamanakāle puna taṃ āpucchitvā “āgamehi tāva, sāmi,
atk-s0502a:1691_4: yāvāyaṃ vayappatto hotī”ti vutte “kiṃ me imāya apalokitāya vā anapalokitāya vā, attano
atk-s0502a:1691_5: dukkhanissaraṇaṃ karissāmī”ti nikkhamitvā pabbaji. So kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā ghaṭento
atk-s0502a:1691_6: vāyamanto attano pabbajitakiccaṃ niṭṭhapetvā tesaṃ dassanatthāya puna sāvatthiṃ gantvā
atk-s0502a:1691_7: puttassa dhammakathaṃ kathesi. Sopi nikkhamitvā pabbaji, pabbajitvā ca pana na cirasseva
atk-s0502a:1691_8: arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Purāṇadutiyikāpissa “yesaṃ atthāya ahaṃ gharāvāse vaseyyaṃ, te
atk-s0502a:1691_9: ubhopi pabbajitā, idāni me kiṃ gharāvāsena, pabbajissāmī”ti nikkhamitvā pabbaji,
atk-s0502a:1691_10: pabbajitvā ca pana na cirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Athekadivasaṃ dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ
atk-s0502a:1691_11: samuṭṭhāpesuṃ – “āvuso, dhammikaupāsako attano dhamme patiṭṭhitattā nikkhamitvā pabbajitvā
atk-s0502a:1691_12: arahattaṃ patto puttadārassāpi patiṭṭhā jāto”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a:1691_13: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā ‘imāya nāmā”’ti vutte, “bhikkhave, paṇḍitena
atk-s0502a:1691_14: nāma neva attahetu, na parahetu samiddhi icchitabbā, dhammikeneva pana dhammapaṭisaraṇena
atk-s0502a:1691_15: bhavitabba”nti anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1694: Na puttamicche na dhanaṃ na raṭṭhaṃ;
atk-s0502a:1697_0: Tattha na attahetūti paṇḍito nāma attahetu vā parahetu vā pāpaṃ na karoti. Na puttamiccheti
atk-s0502a:1697_1: puttaṃ vā dhanaṃ vā raṭṭhaṃ vā pāpakammena na iccheyya, etānipi icchato pāpakammaṃ
atk-s0502a:1697_2: na karotiyevāti attho. Samiddhimattanoti yā attano samiddhi, tampi adhammena na iccheyya,samiddhikāraṇāpi
atk-s0502a:1697_3: pāpaṃ na karotīti attho. Sa sīlavāti yo evarūpo puggalo, so eva sīlavā ca paññavā
atk-s0502a:1697_4: ca dhammikoca siyā, na aññoti attho.
atk-s0502a:1701: Appakā te manussesūti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto dhammassavanaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1702_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira ekavīthivāsino manussā samaggā hutvā gaṇabandhena dānaṃ datvā sabbarattiṃ
atk-s0502a:1702_1: dhammassavanaṃ kāresuṃ, sabbarattiṃ pana dhammaṃ sotuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu. Ekacce kāmaratinissitā
atk-s0502a:1702_2: hutvā, puna gehameva gatā, ekacce dosanissitā hutvā, ekacce mānanissitā hutvā, ekacce
atk-s0502a:1702_3: thinamiddhasamaṅgino hutvā tattheva nisīditvā pacalāyantā sotuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu. Punadivase
atk-s0502a:1702_4: bhikkhū taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ. Satthā āgantvā “kāya
atk-s0502a:1702_5: nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a:1702_6: “bhikkhave, imā sattā nāma yebhuyyena bhavanissitā, bhavesu eva laggā viharanti,
atk-s0502a:1702_7: pāragāmino nāma appakā”ti anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā āha –
atk-s0502a:1709_0: Tattha appakāti thokā na bahū. Pāragāminoti nibbānapāragāmino. Athāyaṃ itarā pajāti
atk-s0502a:1709_1: yā panāyaṃ avasesā pajā sakkāyadiṭṭhitīrameva anudhāvati, ayameva bahutarāti attho.
atk-s0502a:1709_2: Sammadakkhāteti sammā akkhāte sukathite. Dhammeti desanādhamme. Dhammānuvattinoti
atk-s0502a:1709_3: taṃ dhammaṃ sutvā tadanucchavikaṃ paṭipadaṃ pūretvā maggaphalasacchikaraṇena dhammānuvattino.
atk-s0502a:1709_4: Pāramessantīti te evarūpā janā nibbānapāraṃ gamissanti. Maccudheyyanti kilesamārasaṅkhātassa
atk-s0502a:1709_5: maccussa nivāsaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ tebhūmikavaṭṭaṃ. Suduttaranti ye janā dhammānuvattino,
atk-s0502a:1709_6: te etaṃ suduttaraṃ duratikkamaṃ māradheyyaṃ taritvā atikkamitvā nibbānapāraṃ gamissantīti attho.
atk-s0502a:1713: Kaṇhaṃ dhammaṃ vippahāyāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto pañcasate āgantuke bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1714_0: Kosalaraṭṭhe kira pañcasatā bhikkhū vassaṃ vasitvā vuṭṭhavassā “satthāraṃ passissāmā”ti
atk-s0502a:1714_1: jetavanaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu. Satthā tesaṃ cariyapaṭipakkhaṃ
atk-s0502a:1714_2: nisāmetvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:1725_0: Tattha kaṇhaṃ dhammanti kāyaducaritādibhedaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ vippahāya jahitvā.
atk-s0502a:1725_1: Sukkaṃ bhāvethāti paṇḍito bhikkhu abhinikkhamanato paṭṭhāya yāva arahattamaggā kāyasucaritādibhedaṃ
atk-s0502a:1725_2: sukkaṃ dhammaṃ bhāveyya. Kathaṃ? Okā anokamāgammāti okaṃ vuccati ālayo, anokaṃ vuccati
atk-s0502a:1725_3: anālayo, ālayato nikkhamitvā anālayasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ paṭicca ārabbha taṃ patthayamāno
atk-s0502a:1725_4: bhāveyyāti attho. Tatrābhiratimiccheyyāti yasmiṃ anālayasaṅkhāte viveke nibbāne imehi
atk-s0502a:1725_5: sattehi durabhiramaṃ, tatra abhiratiṃ iccheyya. Hitvā kāmeti vatthukāmakilesakāme
atk-s0502a:1725_6: hitvā akiñcano hutvā viveke abhiratiṃ iccheyyāti attho. Cittaklesehīti pañcahi nīvaraṇehi,
atk-s0502a:1725_7: attānaṃ pariyodapeyya vodāpeyya, parisodheyyāti attho. Sambodhiyaṅgesūti sambojjhaṅgesu.
atk-s0502a:1725_8: Sammā cittaṃ subhāvitanti hetunā nayena cittaṃ suṭṭhu bhāvitaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ. Ādānapaṭinissaggeti
atk-s0502a:1725_9: ādānaṃ vuccati gahaṇaṃ, tassa paṭinissaggasaṅkhāte aggahaṇe catūhi upādānehi kiñci
atk-s0502a:1725_10: anupādiyitvā ye ratāti attho. Jutimantoti ānubhāvavanto, arahattamaggañāṇajutiyā
atk-s0502a:1725_11: khandhādibhede dhamme jotetvā ṭhitāti attho. Te loketi imasmiṃ khandhādiloke parinibbutā
atk-s0502a:1725_12: nāma arahattapattito paṭṭhāya kilesavaṭṭassa khepitattā saupādisesena, carimacittanirodhena
atk-s0502a:1725_13: khandhavaṭṭassa khepitattā anupādisesena cāti dvīhi parinibbānehi parinibbutā, anupādāno
atk-s0502a:1732: Gataddhinoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jīvakambavane viharanto jīvakena puṭṭhapañhaṃ ārabbha kathesi. Jīvakavatthu khandhake vitthāritameva.
atk-s0502a:1733_0: Ekasmiṃ pana samaye devadatto ajātasattunā saddhiṃ ekato hutvā gijjhakūṭaṃ abhiruhitvā
atk-s0502a:1733_1: paduṭṭhacitto “satthāraṃ vadhissāmī”ti silaṃ pavijjhi. Taṃ dve pabbatakūṭāni sampaṭicchiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1733_2: Tato bhijjitvā gatā papaṭikā bhagavato pādaṃ paharitvā lohitaṃ uppādesi, bhusā vedanā
atk-s0502a:1733_3: pavattiṃsu. Bhikkhū satthāraṃ maddakucchiṃ nayiṃsu. Satthā tatopi jīvakambavanaṃ
atk-s0502a:1733_4: gantukāmo “tattha maṃ nethā”ti āha. Bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ ādāya jīvakambavanaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1733_5: Jīvako taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā vaṇapaṭikammatthāya tikhiṇabhesajjaṃ
atk-s0502a:1733_6: datvā vaṇaṃ bandhitvā satthāraṃ etadavoca – “bhante, mayā antonagare ekassa manussassa
atk-s0502a:1733_7: bhesajjaṃ kataṃ, tassa santikaṃ gantvā puna āgamissāmi, idaṃ bhesajjaṃ yāva mamāgamanā
atk-s0502a:1733_8: baddhaniyāmeneva tiṭṭhatū”ti. So gantvā tassa purisassa kattabbakiccaṃ katvā dvārapidahanavelāya
atk-s0502a:1733_9: āgacchanto dvāraṃ na sampāpuṇi. Athassa etadahosi – “aho mayā bhāriyaṃ kammaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0502a:1733_10: yvāhaṃ aññatarassa purisassa viya tathāgatassa pāde tikhiṇabhesajjaṃ datvā vaṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:1733_11: bandhiṃ, ayaṃ tassa mocanavelā, tasmiṃ amuccamāne sabbarattiṃ bhagavato sarīre pariḷāho
atk-s0502a:1733_12: uppajjissatī”ti. Tasmiṃ khaṇe satthā ānandattheraṃ āmantesi – “ānanda, jīvako sāyaṃ
atk-s0502a:1733_13: āgacchanto dvāraṃ na sampāpuṇi, ‘ayaṃ vaṇassa mocanavelā’ti pana cintesi, mocesi
atk-s0502a:1733_14: na”nti. Thero mocesi, vaṇo rukkhato challi viya apagato. Jīvako antoaruṇeyeva satthu
atk-s0502a:1733_15: santikaṃ vegena āgantvā “kiṃ nu kho, bhante, sarīre vo pariḷāho uppanno”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a:1733_16: Satthā “tathāgatassa kho, jīvaka, bodhimaṇḍeyeva sabbapariḷāho vūpasanto”ti anusandhiṃ
atk-s0502a:1737_0: Tattha gataddhinoti gatamaggassa kantāraddhā vaṭṭaddhāti dve addhā nāma. Tesu kantārapaṭipanno
atk-s0502a:1737_1: yāva icchitaṭṭhānaṃ na pāpuṇāti, tāva addhikoyeva, etasmiṃ pana patte gataddhi nāma
atk-s0502a:1737_2: hoti. Vaṭṭasannissitāpi sattā yāva vaṭṭe vasanti, tāva addhikā eva. Kasmā? Vaṭṭassa
atk-s0502a:1737_3: akhepitattā. Sotāpannādayopi addhikā eva, vaṭṭaṃ pana khepetvā ṭhito khīṇāsavo gataddhi
atk-s0502a:1737_4: nāma hoti. Tassa gataddhino. Visokassāti vaṭṭamūlakassa sokassa vigatattā visokassa.
atk-s0502a:1737_5: Vippamuttassa sabbadhīti sabbesu khandhādidhammesu vippamuttassa, sabbaganthappahīnassāti
atk-s0502a:1737_6: catunnampi ganthānaṃ pahīnattā sabbāganthappahīnassa. Pariḷāho na vijjatīti duvidho
atk-s0502a:1737_7: pariḷāho kāyiko cetasiko cāti. Tesu khīṇāsavassa sītuṇhādivasena uppannattā kāyikapariḷāho
atk-s0502a:1737_8: anibbutova, taṃ sandhāya jīvako pucchati. Satthā pana dhammarājatāya desanāvidhikusalatāya
atk-s0502a:1737_9: cetasikapariḷāhavasena desanaṃ vinivattento, “jīvaka, paramatthena evarūpassa khīṇāsavassa
atk-s0502a:1741: Uyyuñjantīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto mahākassapattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1742_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye satthā rājagahe vuṭṭhavasso “addhamāsaccayena cārikaṃ pakkamissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:1742_1: bhikkhūnaṃ ārocāpesi. Vattaṃ kiretaṃ buddhānaṃ bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ cārikaṃ caritukāmānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1742_2: “evaṃ bhikkhū attano pattapacanacīvararajanādīni katvā sukhaṃ gamissantī”ti “idāni
atk-s0502a:1742_3: addhamāsaccayena cārikaṃ pakkamissāmī”ti bhikkhūnaṃ ārocāpanaṃ. Bhikkhūsu pana attano
atk-s0502a:1742_4: pattacīvarādīni karontesu mahākassapattheropi cīvarāni dhovi. Bhikkhū ujjhāyiṃsu
atk-s0502a:1742_5: “thero kasmā cīvarāni dhovati, imasmiṃ nagare anto ca bahi ca aṭṭhārasa manussakoṭiyo
atk-s0502a:1742_6: vasanti. Tattha ye therassa na ñātakā, te upaṭṭhākā, ye na upaṭṭhākā, te ñātakā.
atk-s0502a:1742_7: Te therassa catūhi paccayehi sammānasakkāraṃ karonti. Ettakaṃ upakāraṃ pahāya esa
atk-s0502a:1742_8: kahaṃ gamissati? Sacepi gaccheyya, māpamādakandarato paraṃ na gamissatī”ti. Satthā
atk-s0502a:1742_9: kira yaṃ kandaraṃ patvā nivattetabbayuttake bhikkhū “tumhe ito nivattatha, mā pamajjitthā”ti
atk-s0502a:1742_10: vadati. Taṃ “māpamādakandara”nti vuccati, taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0502a:1743_0: Satthāpi cārikaṃ pakkamanto cintesi – “imasmiṃ nagare anto ca bahi ca aṭṭhārasa manussakoṭiyo
atk-s0502a:1743_1: vasanti. Manussānaṃ maṅgalāmaṅgalaṭṭhānesu bhikkhūhi gantabbaṃ hoti, na sakkā vihāraṃ
atk-s0502a:1743_2: tucchaṃ kātuṃ, kaṃ nu kho nivattessāmī”ti? Athassa etadahosi –“kassapassa hete manussā
atk-s0502a:1743_3: ñātakā ca upaṭṭhākā ca, kassapaṃ nivattetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. So theraṃ āha – “kassapa,
atk-s0502a:1743_4: na sakkā vihāraṃ tucchaṃ kātuṃ, manussānaṃ maṅgalāmaṅgalaṭṭhānesu bhikkhūhi attho
atk-s0502a:1743_5: hoti, tvaṃ attano parisāya saddhiṃ nivattassū”ti. “Sādhu, bhante”ti thero parisaṃ
atk-s0502a:1743_6: ādāya nivatti. Bhikkhū upajjhāyiṃsu “diṭṭhaṃ vo, āvuso, nanu idāneva amhehi vuttaṃ
atk-s0502a:1743_7: ‘mahākassapo kasmā cīvarāni dhovati, na eso satthārā saddhiṃ gamissatī’ti, yaṃ amhehi
atk-s0502a:1743_8: vuttaṃ, tadeva jāta”nti. Satthā bhikkhūnaṃ kathaṃ sutvā nivattitvā ṭhito āha – “bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a:1743_9: kiṃ nāmetaṃ kathethā”ti? “Mahākassapattheraṃ ārabbha kathema, bhante”ti attanā kathitaniyāmeneva
atk-s0502a:1743_10: sabbaṃ ārocesuṃ. Taṃ sutvā satthā “na, bhikkhave, tumhe kassapaṃ ‘kulesu ca paccayesu
atk-s0502a:1743_11: ca laggo’ti vadetha, so ‘mama vacanaṃ karissāmī’ti nivatto. Eso hi pubbe patthanaṃ
atk-s0502a:1743_12: karontoyeva ‘catūsu paccayesu alaggo candūpamo hutvā kulāni upasaṅkamituṃ samattho
atk-s0502a:1743_13: bhaveyya’nti patthanaṃ akāsi. Natthetassa kule vā paccaye vā laggo, ahaṃ candopamappaṭipadañceva
atk-s0502a:1743_14: ariyavaṃsappaṭipadañca kathento mama puttaṃ kassapaṃ ādiṃ katvā kathesi”nti āha.
atk-s0502a:1744_0: Bhikkhū satthāraṃ pucchiṃsu – “bhante, kadā pana therena patthanā ṭhapitā”ti? “Sotukāmāttha,
atk-s0502a:1744_1: bhikkhave”ti? “Āma, bhante”ti. Satthā tesaṃ, “bhikkhave, ito kappasatasahassamatthake
atk-s0502a:1744_2: padumuttaro nāma buddho loke udapādī”ti vatvā padumuttarapādamūle tena ṭhapitapatthanaṃ
atk-s0502a:1744_3: ādiṃ katvā sabbaṃ therassa pubbacaritaṃ kathesi. Taṃ therapāḷiyaṃ vitthāritameva.
atk-s0502a:1744_4: Satthā pana imaṃ therassa pubbacaritaṃ vitthāretvā “iti kho, bhikkhave, ahaṃ candopamappaṭipadañceva
atk-s0502a:1744_5: ariyavaṃsappaṭipadañca mama puttaṃ kassapaṃ ādiṃ katvā kathesiṃ, mama puttassa kassapassa
atk-s0502a:1744_6: paccayesu vā kulesu vā vihāresu vā pariveṇesu vā laggo nāma natthi, pallale otaritvā
atk-s0502a:1744_7: tattha caritvā gacchanto rājahaṃso viya katthaci alaggoyeva mama putto”ti anusandhiṃ
atk-s0502a:1747: Haṃsāva pallalaṃ hitvā, okamokaṃ jahanti te”ti.
atk-s0502a:1748_0: Tattha uyyuñjanti satīmantoti sativepullappattā khīṇāsavā attanā paṭividdhaguṇesu
atk-s0502a:1748_2: Na nikete ramanti teti tesaṃ ālaye rati nāma natthi. Haṃsāvāti desanāsīsametaṃ, ayaṃ
atk-s0502a:1748_3: panettha attho – yathā gocarasampanne pallale sakuṇā attano gocaraṃ gahetvā gamanakāle
atk-s0502a:1748_4: “mama udakaṃ, mama padumaṃ, mama uppalaṃ, mama kaṇṇikā”ti tasmiṃ ṭhāne kañci ālayaṃ
atk-s0502a:1748_5: akatvā anapekkhāva taṃ ṭhānaṃ pahāya uppatitvā ākāse kīḷamānā gacchanti; evamevaṃ
atk-s0502a:1748_6: khīṇāsavā yattha katthaci viharantāpi kulādīsu alaggā eva viharitvā gamanasamayepi
atk-s0502a:1748_7: taṃ ṭhānaṃ pahāya gacchantā “mama vihāro, mama pariveṇaṃ, mamūpaṭṭhākā”ti anālayā
atk-s0502a:1748_8: anupekkhāva gacchanti. Okamokanti ālayālayaṃ, sabbālaye pariccajantīti attho.
atk-s0502a:1752: Yesaṃ sannicayo natthīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto āyasmantaṃ belaṭṭhasīsaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1753_0: So kirāyasmā antogāme ekaṃ vīthiṃ piṇḍāya caritvā bhattakiccaṃ katvā puna aparaṃ
atk-s0502a:1753_1: vīthiṃ caritvā sukkhaṃ kūraṃ ādāya vihāraṃ haritvā paṭisāmetvā “nibaddhaṃ piṇḍapātapariyesanaṃ
atk-s0502a:1753_2: nāma dukkha”nti katipāhaṃ jhānasukhena vītināmetvā āhārena atthe sati taṃ paribhuñjati.
atk-s0502a:1753_3: Bhikkhū ñatvā ujjhāyitvā tamatthaṃ bhagavato ārocesuṃ. Satthā etasmiṃ nidāne āyatiṃ
atk-s0502a:1753_4: sannidhikāraparivajjanatthāya bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapetvāpi therena pana apaññatte
atk-s0502a:1753_5: sikkhāpade appicchataṃ nissāya katattā tassa dosābhāvaṃ pakāsento anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā
atk-s0502a:1756: Suññato animitto ca, vimokkho yesaṃ gocaro;
atk-s0502a:1758_0: Tattha sannicayoti dve sannicayā – kammasannicayo ca, paccayasannicayo ca. Tesu kusalākusalakammaṃ
atk-s0502a:1758_1: kammasannicayo nāma, cattāro paccayā paccayasannicayo nāma. Tattha vihāre vasantassa
atk-s0502a:1758_2: bhikkhuno ekaṃ guḷapiṇḍaṃ, catubhāgamattaṃ sappiṃ, ekañca taṇḍulanāḷiṃ ṭhapentassa
atk-s0502a:1758_3: paccayasannicayo natthi, tato uttari hoti. Yesaṃ ayaṃ duvidhopi sannicayo natthi.
atk-s0502a:1758_4: Pariññātabhojanāti tīhi pariññāhi pariññātabhojanā. Yāguādīnañhi yāgubhāvādijānanaṃ
atk-s0502a:1758_5: ñātapariññā, āhāre paṭikūlasaññāvasena pana bhojanassa parijānanaṃ tīraṇapariññā,
atk-s0502a:1758_6: kabaḷīkārāhāre chandarāgaapakaḍḍhanañāṇaṃ pahānapariññā. Imāhi tīhi pariññāhi ye
atk-s0502a:1758_7: pariññātabhojanā. Suññato animitto cāti ettha appaṇihitavimokkhopi gahitoyeva. Tīṇipi
atk-s0502a:1758_8: cetāni nibbānasseva nāmāni. Nibbānañhi rāgadosamohānaṃ abhāvena suññato, tehi ca
atk-s0502a:1758_9: vimuttanti suññato vimokkho, tathā rāgādinimittānaṃ abhāvena animittaṃ, tehi ca vimuttanti
atk-s0502a:1758_10: animitto vimokkho, rāgādipaṇidhīnaṃ pana abhāvena appaṇihitaṃ, tehi ca vimuttanti
atk-s0502a:1758_11: appaṇihito vimokkhoti vuccati. Phalasamāpattivasena taṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā viharantānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1758_12: ayaṃ tividho vimokkho yesaṃ gocaro. Gati tesaṃ durannayāti yathā nāma ākāsena gatānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1758_13: sakuṇānaṃ padanikkhepassa adassanena gati durannayā na sakkā jānituṃ, evameva yesaṃ
atk-s0502a:1758_14: ayaṃ duvidho sannicayo natthi, imāhi ca tīhi pariññāhi pariññātabhojanā, yesañca
atk-s0502a:1758_15: ayaṃ vuttappakāro vimokkho gocaro, tesaṃ tayo bhavā, catasso yoniyo, pañca gatiyo,
atk-s0502a:1758_16: satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo, nava sattāvāsāti imesu pañcasu koṭṭhāsesu iminā nāma gatāti
atk-s0502a:1758_17: gamanassa apaññāyanato gati durannayā na sakkā paññāpetunti.
atk-s0502a:1762: Yassāsavāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto anuruddhattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1763_0: Ekasmiñhi divase thero jiṇṇacīvaro saṅkārakūṭādīsu cīvaraṃ pariyesati. Tassa ito
atk-s0502a:1763_1: tatiye attabhāve purāṇadutiyikā tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbattitvā jālinī nāma devadhītā
atk-s0502a:1763_2: ahosi. Sā theraṃ coḷakāni pariyesamānaṃ disvā therassa atthāya terasahatthāyatāni
atk-s0502a:1763_3: catuhatthavitthatāni tīṇi dibbadussāni gahetvā “sacāhaṃ imāni iminā nīhārena dassāmi,
atk-s0502a:1763_4: thero na gaṇhissatī”ti cintetvā tassa coḷakāni pariyesamānassa purato ekasmiṃ saṅkārakūṭe
atk-s0502a:1763_5: yathā nesaṃ dasantamattameva paññāyati, tathā ṭhapesi. Thero tena maggena coḷakapariyesamānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1763_6: caranto nesaṃ dasantaṃ disvā tattheva gahetvā ākaḍḍhamāno vuttappamāṇāni dibbadussāni
atk-s0502a:1763_7: disvā “ukkaṭṭhapaṃsukūlaṃ vata ida”nti ādāya pakkāmi. Athassa cīvarakaraṇadivase
atk-s0502a:1763_8: satthā pañcasatabhikkhuparivāro vihāraṃ gantvā nisīdi, asītimahātherāpi tattheva
atk-s0502a:1763_9: nisīdiṃsu, cīvaraṃ sibbetuṃ mahākassapatthero mūle nisīdi, sāriputtatthero majjhe,
atk-s0502a:1763_10: ānandatthero agge, bhikkhusaṅgho suttaṃ vaṭṭesi, satthā sūcipāsake āvuṇi, mahāmoggallānatthero
atk-s0502a:1763_11: yena yena attho, taṃ taṃ upanento vicari.
atk-s0502a:1764_0: Devadhītāpi antogāmaṃ pavisitvā “bhontā ayyassa no anuruddhattherassa cīvaraṃ karonto
atk-s0502a:1764_1: satthā asītimahāsāvakaparivuto pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ vihāre nisīdi, yāguādīni
atk-s0502a:1764_2: ādāya vihāraṃ gacchathā”ti bhikkhaṃ samādapesi. Mahāmoggallānattheropi antarābhatte
atk-s0502a:1764_3: mahājambupesiṃ āhari, pañcasatā bhikkhū parikkhīṇaṃ khādituṃ nāsakkhiṃsu. Sakko cīvarakaraṇaṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a:1764_4: bhūmiparibhaṇḍamakāsi, bhūmi alattakarasarañjitā viya ahosi. Bhikkhūhi paribhuttāvasesānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1764_5: yāgukhajjakabhattānaṃ mahārāsi ahosi. Bhikkhū ujjhāyiṃsu “ettakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kiṃ
atk-s0502a:1764_6: evaṃbahukehi yāguādīhi, nanu nāma pamāṇaṃ sallakkhetvā ettakaṃ nāma āharathā”ti ñātakā
atk-s0502a:1764_7: ca upaṭṭhākā ca vattabbā siyuṃ, anuruddhatthero attano ñātiupaṭṭhākānaṃ bahubhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:1764_8: ñāpetukāmo maññe”ti, atha ne satthā “kiṃ, bhikkhave, kathethā”ti pucchitvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:1764_9: idaṃ nāmā”ti vutte “kiṃ pana tumhe, bhikkhave, ‘idaṃ anuruddhena āharāpita’nti maññathā”ti?
atk-s0502a:1764_10: “Āma, bhante”ti. “Na, bhikkhave, mama putto anuruddho evarūpaṃ vadeti. Na hi khīṇāsavā
atk-s0502a:1764_11: paccayapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ kathaṃ kathenti, ayaṃ pana piṇḍapāto devatānubhāvena nibbatto”ti
atk-s0502a:1764_12: anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1767: Suññato animitto ca, vimokkho yassa gocaro;
atk-s0502a:1769_0: Tattha yassāsavāti yassa cattāro āsavā parikkhīṇā. Āhāre ca anissitoti āhārasmiñca
atk-s0502a:1769_1: taṇhādiṭṭhinissayehi anissito. Padaṃ tassa durannayanti yathā ākāse gacchantānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1769_2: sakuṇānaṃ “imasmiṃ ṭhāne pādehi akkamitvā gatā, idaṃ ṭhānaṃ urena paharitvā gatā,
atk-s0502a:1769_3: idaṃ sīsena, idaṃ pakkhehī”ti na sakkā ñātuṃ, evameva evarūpassa bhikkhuno “nirayapadena
atk-s0502a:1769_4: vā gato, tiracchānayonipadena vā”tiādinā nayena padaṃ paññāpetuṃ nāma na sakkoti.
atk-s0502a:1773: Yassindriyānīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā pubbārāme viharanto mahākaccāyanattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1774_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye bhagavā mahāpavāraṇāya migāramātuyā pāsādassa heṭṭhā mahāsāvakaparivuto
atk-s0502a:1774_1: nisīdi. Tasmiṃ samaye mahākaccāyanatthero avantīsu viharati. So panāyasmā dūratopi
atk-s0502a:1774_2: āgantvā dhammassavanaṃ paggaṇhātiyeva. Tasmā mahātherā nisīdantā mahākaccāyanattherassa
atk-s0502a:1774_3: āsanaṃ ṭhapetvā nisīdiṃsu. Sakko devarājā dvīhi devalokehi devaparisāya saddhiṃ āgantvā
atk-s0502a:1774_4: dibbagandhamālādīhi satthāraṃ pūjetvā ṭhito mahākaccāyanattheraṃ adisvā kiṃ nu kho
atk-s0502a:1774_5: mama, ayyo, na dissati, sādhu kho panassa sace āgaccheyyāti. Theropi taṃ khaṇaññeva
atk-s0502a:1774_6: āgantvā attano āsane nisinnameva attānaṃ dassesi. Sakko theraṃ disvā gopphakesu daḷhaṃ
atk-s0502a:1774_7: gahetvā “sādhu vata me, ayyo, āgato, ahaṃ ayyassa āgamanameva paccāsīsāmī”ti vatvā
atk-s0502a:1774_8: ubhohi hatthehi pāde sambāhitvā gandhamālādīhi pūjetvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:1774_9: Bhikkhū ujjhāyiṃsu. “Sakko mukhaṃ oloketvā sakkāraṃ karoti, avasesamahāsāvakānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1774_10: evarūpaṃ sakkāraṃ akaritvā mahākaccāyanaṃ disvā vegena gopphakesu gahetvā ‘sādhu
atk-s0502a:1774_11: vata me, ayyo, āgato, ahaṃ ayyassa āgamanameva paccāsīsāmī’ti vatvā ubhohi hatthehi
atk-s0502a:1774_12: pāde sambāhitvā pūjetvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito”ti. Satthā tesaṃ taṃ kathaṃ sutvā,
atk-s0502a:1774_13: “bhikkhave, mama puttena mahākaccāyanena sadisā indriyesu guttadvārā bhikkhū devānampi
atk-s0502a:1774_14: manussānampi piyāyevā”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1780_0: Tassattho – yassa bhikkhuno chekena sārathinā sudantā assā viya cha indriyāni samathaṃ
atk-s0502a:1780_1: dantabhāvaṃ nibbisevanabhāvaṃ gatāni, tassa navavidhaṃ mānaṃ pahāya ṭhitattā pahīnamānassa
atk-s0502a:1780_2: catunnaṃ āsavānaṃ abhāvena anāsavassa. Tādinoti tādibhāvasaṇṭhitassa tathārūpassa
atk-s0502a:1780_3: devāpi pihayanti, manussāpi dassanañca āgamanañca patthentiyevāti.
atk-s0502a:1784: Pathavisamoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sāriputtattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1785_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye āyasmā sāriputto vuṭṭhavasso cārikaṃ pakkamitukāmo bhagavantaṃ āpucchitvā
atk-s0502a:1785_1: vanditvā attano parivārena saddhiṃ nikkhami. Aññepi bahū bhikkhū theraṃ anugacchiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1785_2: Thero ca nāmagottavasena paññāyamāne bhikkhū nāmagottavasena kathetvā nivattāpesi.
atk-s0502a:1785_3: Aññataro nāmagottavasena apākaṭo bhikkhu cintesi – “aho vata mampi nāmagottavasena
atk-s0502a:1785_4: paggaṇhanto kathetvā nivattāpeyyā”ti thero mahābhikkhusaṅghassa antare taṃ na sallakkhesi.
atk-s0502a:1785_5: So “aññe viya bhikkhū na maṃ paggaṇhātī”ti there āghātaṃ bandhi. Therassapi saṅghāṭikaṇṇo
atk-s0502a:1785_6: tassa bhikkhuno sarīraṃ phusi, tenāpi āghātaṃ bandhiyeva. So “dāni thero vihārūpacāraṃ
atk-s0502a:1785_7: atikkanto bhavissatī”ti ñatvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā “āyasmā maṃ, bhante, sāriputto
atk-s0502a:1785_8: tumhākaṃ aggasāvakomhīti kaṇṇasakkhaliṃ bhindanto viya paharitvā akhamāpetvāva cārikaṃ
atk-s0502a:1786_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe mahāmoggallānatthero ca ānandatthero ca cintesuṃ – “amhākaṃ aggajeṭṭhabhātarā
atk-s0502a:1786_1: imassa bhikkhuno apahaṭabhāvaṃ satthā no na jānāti, sīhanādaṃ pana nadāpetukāmo bhavissatīti
atk-s0502a:1786_2: parisaṃ sannipātāpessāmā”ti. Te kuñcikahatthā pariveṇadvārāni vivaritvā “abhikkamathāyasmanto,
atk-s0502a:1786_3: abhikkamathāyasmanto, idānāyasmā sāriputto bhagavato sammukhā sīhanādaṃ nadissatī”ti
atk-s0502a:1786_4: mahābhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātesuṃ. Theropi āgantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā nisīdi. Atha
atk-s0502a:1786_5: naṃ satthā tamatthaṃ pucchi. Thero “nāyaṃ bhikkhu mayā pahaṭo”ti avatvāva attano
atk-s0502a:1786_6: guṇakathaṃ kathento “yassa nūna, bhante, kāye kāyagatāsati anupaṭṭhitā assa, so idha
atk-s0502a:1786_7: aññataraṃ sabrahmacāriṃ āsajja appaṭinissajja cārikaṃ pakkameyyā”ti vatvā “seyyathāpi,
atk-s0502a:1786_8: bhante, pathaviyaṃ sucimpi nikkhipanti, asucimpi nikkhipantī”tiādinā nayena attano
atk-s0502a:1786_10: ahikuṇapādīhi viya attano kāyena aṭṭiyanañca medakathālikā viya attano kāyapariharaṇañca
atk-s0502a:1786_11: pakāsesi. Imāhi ca pana navahi upamāhi there attano guṇe kathente navasupi ṭhānesu
atk-s0502a:1786_12: udakapariyantaṃ katvā mahāpathavī kampi. Rajoharaṇacaṇḍālakumārakamedakathāliko pamānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1786_13: pana āharaṇakāle puthujjanā bhikkhū assūni sandhāretuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu, khīṇāsavānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1787_0: There attano guṇaṃ kathenteyeva abbhācikkhanakassa bhikkhuno sakalasarīre ḍāho uppajji,
atk-s0502a:1787_1: so tāvadeva bhagavato pādesu patitvā attano abbhācikkhanadosaṃ pakāsetvā accayaṃ
atk-s0502a:1787_2: desesi. Satthā theraṃ āmantetvā, “sāriputta, khama imassa moghapurisassa, yāvassa
atk-s0502a:1787_3: sattadhā muddhā na phalatī”ti āha. Thero ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggayha “khamāmahaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1787_4: bhante, tassa āyasmato, khamatu ca me so āyasmā, sace mayhaṃ doso atthī”ti āha. Bhikkhū
atk-s0502a:1787_5: kathayiṃsu “passatha dānāvuso, therassa anopamaguṇaṃ, evarūpassa nāma musāvādena
atk-s0502a:1787_6: abbhācikkhanakassa bhikkhuno upari appamattakampi kopaṃ vā dosaṃ vā akatvā sayameva
atk-s0502a:1787_7: ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggayha khamāpetī”ti. “Satthā taṃ kathaṃ sutvā, bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a:1787_8: kiṃ kathethā”ti pucchitvā “idaṃ nāma, bhante”ti vutte, “na bhikkhave, sakkā sāriputtasadisānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1787_9: kopaṃ vā dosaṃ vā uppādetuṃ, mahāpathavīsadisaṃ, bhikkhave, indakhīlasadisaṃ pasannaudakarahadasadisañca
atk-s0502a:1787_10: sāriputtassa citta”nti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1793_0: Tassattho – bhikkhave, yathā nāma pathaviyaṃ sucīni gandhamālādīnipi nikkhipanti,
atk-s0502a:1793_1: asucīni muttakarīsādīnipi nikkhipanti, yathā nāma nagaradvāre nikhātaṃ indakhīlaṃ
atk-s0502a:1793_2: dārakādayo omuttentipi ūhadantipi, apare pana taṃ gandhamālādīhi sakkaronti. Tattha
atk-s0502a:1793_3: pathaviyā indakhīlassa ca neva anurodho uppajjati, na virodho; evameva yvāyaṃ khīṇāsavo
atk-s0502a:1793_4: bhikkhu aṭṭhahi lokadhammehi akampiyabhāvena tādi, vatānaṃ sundaratāya subbato. So
atk-s0502a:1793_5: “ime maṃ catūhi paccayehi sakkaronti, ime pana na sakkarontī”ti sakkārañca asakkārañca
atk-s0502a:1793_6: karontesu neva anurujjhati, no virujjhati, atha kho pathavisamo ca indakhilupamo
atk-s0502a:1793_7: eva ca hoti. Yathā ca apagatakaddamo rahado pasannodako hoti, evaṃ apagatakilesatāya
atk-s0502a:1793_8: rāgakaddamādīhi akaddamo vippasannova hoti. Tādinoti tassa pana evarūpassa sugatiduggatīsu
atk-s0502a:1794: Desanāvasāne nava bhikkhusahassāni saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a:1797: Santaṃ tassa manaṃ hotīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto tissattherassa sāmaṇeraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
