atk-s0502a:1798_0: Eko kira kosambivāsī kulaputto satthu sāsane pabbajitvā laddhupasampado “kosambivāsītissatthero”ti
atk-s0502a:1798_1: paññāyi. Tassa kosambiyaṃ vuṭṭhavassassa upaṭṭhāko ticīvarañceva sappiphāṇitañca
atk-s0502a:1798_2: āharitvā pādamūle ṭhapesi. Atha naṃ thero āha – “kiṃ idaṃ upāsakā”ti. “Nanu mayā,
atk-s0502a:1798_3: bhante, tumhe vassaṃ vāsitā, amhākañca vihāre vuṭṭhavassā imaṃ lābhaṃ labhanti, gaṇhatha,
atk-s0502a:1798_4: bhante”ti. “Hotu, upāsaka, na mayhaṃ iminā attho”ti. “Kiṃ kāraṇā, bhante”ti? “Mama
atk-s0502a:1798_5: santike kappiyakārako sāmaṇeropi natthi, āvuso”ti. “Sace, bhante, kappiyakārako natthi,
atk-s0502a:1798_6: mama putto ayyassa santike sāmaṇero bhavissatī”ti. Thero adhivāsesi. Upāsako sattavassikaṃ
atk-s0502a:1798_7: attano puttaṃ therassa santikaṃ netvā “imaṃ pabbājethā”ti adāsi. Athassa thero kese
atk-s0502a:1798_8: temetvā tacapañcakakammaṭṭhānaṃ datvā pabbājesi. So khuraggeyeva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:1799_0: Thero taṃ pabbājetvā aḍḍhamāsaṃ tattha vasitvā “satthāraṃ passissāmī”ti sāmaṇeraṃ
atk-s0502a:1799_1: bhaṇḍakaṃ gāhāpetvā gacchanto antarāmagge ekaṃ vihāraṃ pāvisi. Sāmaṇero upajjhāyassa
atk-s0502a:1799_2: senāsanaṃ gahetvā paṭijaggi. Tassa taṃ paṭijaggantasseva vikālo jāto, tena attano
atk-s0502a:1799_3: senāsanaṃ paṭijaggituṃ nāsakkhi. Atha naṃ upaṭṭhānavelāyaṃ āgantvā nisinnaṃ thero
atk-s0502a:1799_4: pucchi – “sāmaṇera, attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ paṭijaggita”nti? “Bhante, paṭijaggituṃ okāsaṃ
atk-s0502a:1799_5: nālattha”nti. “Tena hi mama vasanaṭṭhāneyeva vasa, dukkhaṃ te āgantukaṭṭhāne bahi
atk-s0502a:1799_6: vasitu”nti taṃ gahetvāva senāsanaṃ pāvisi. Thero pana puthujjano nipannamattova niddaṃ
atk-s0502a:1799_7: okkami. Sāmaṇero cintesi – “ajja me upajjhāyena saddhiṃ tatiyo divaso ekasenāsane
atk-s0502a:1799_8: vasantassa, ‘sace nipajjitvā niddāyissāmi, thero sahaseyyaṃ āpajjeyyā’ti nisinnakova
atk-s0502a:1799_9: vītināmessāmī”ti upajjhāyassa mañcakasamīpe pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisinnakova rattiṃ
atk-s0502a:1799_10: vītināmesi. Thero paccūsakāle paccuṭṭhāya “sāmaṇeraṃ nikkhamāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti mañcakapasse
atk-s0502a:1799_11: ṭhapitabījaniṃ gahetvā bījanipattassa aggena sāmaṇerassa kaṭasārakaṃ paharitvā bījaniṃ
atk-s0502a:1799_12: uddhaṃ ukkhipanto “sāmaṇera, bahi nikkhamā”ti āha, bījanipattadaṇḍako akkhimhi paṭihaññi,
atk-s0502a:1799_13: tāvadeva akkhi bhijji. So “kiṃ, bhante”ti vatvā uṭṭhāya “bahi nikkhamā”ti vutte “akkhi
atk-s0502a:1799_14: me, bhante, bhinna”nti avatvā ekena hatthena paṭicchādetvā nikkhami. Vattakaraṇakāle
atk-s0502a:1799_15: ca pana “akkhi me bhinna”nti tuṇhī anisīditvā ekena hatthena akkhiṃ gahetvā ekena
atk-s0502a:1799_16: hatthena muṭṭhisammuñjaniṃ ādāya vaccakuṭiñca mukhadhovanaṭṭhānañca sammajjitvā mukhadhovanodakañca
atk-s0502a:1799_17: ṭhapetvā pariveṇaṃ sammajji. So upajjhāyassa dantakaṭṭhaṃ dadamāno ekeneva hatthena adāsi.
atk-s0502a:1800_0: Atha naṃ upajjhāyo āha – “asikkhito vatāyaṃ sāmaṇero, ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ ekena hatthena
atk-s0502a:1800_1: dantakaṭṭhaṃ dātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti. Jānāmahaṃ, bhante, “na evaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti, eko pana
atk-s0502a:1800_2: me hattho na tucchoti. “Kiṃ sāmaṇerā”ti? So ādito paṭṭhāya taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:1800_3: Thero sutvāva saṃviggamānaso “aho vata mayā bhāriyaṃ kammaṃ kata”nti vatvā “khamāhi
atk-s0502a:1800_4: me, sappurisa, nāhametaṃ jānāmi, avassayo me hohī”ti añjaliṃ paggayha sattavassikadārakassa
atk-s0502a:1800_5: pādamūle ukkuṭikaṃ nisīdi. Atha naṃ sāmaṇero āha – “nāhaṃ, bhante, etadatthāya kathesiṃ,
atk-s0502a:1800_6: tumhākaṃ cittaṃ anurakkhantena mayā evaṃ vuttaṃ nevettha tumhākaṃ doso atthi, na
atk-s0502a:1800_7: mayhaṃ. Vaṭṭasseveso doso, mā cintayittha, mayā tumhākaṃ vippaṭisāraṃ rakkhanteneva
atk-s0502a:1800_8: nārocita”nti. Thero sāmaṇerena assāsiyamānopi anassāsitvā uppannasaṃvego sāmaṇerassa
atk-s0502a:1800_9: bhaṇḍakaṃ gahetvā satthu santikaṃ pāyāsi. Satthāpissa āgamanaṃ olokentova nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:1800_10: So gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā satthārā saddhiṃ paṭisammodanaṃ katvā “khamanīyaṃ te
atk-s0502a:1800_11: bhikkhu, kiñci atirekaṃ aphāsukaṃ atthī”ti pucchito āha – “khamanīyaṃ, bhante, natthi
atk-s0502a:1800_12: me kiñci atirekaṃ aphāsukaṃ, apica kho pana me ayaṃ daharasāmaṇero viya añño atirekaguṇo
atk-s0502a:1800_13: na diṭṭhapubbo”ti. “Kiṃ pana iminā kataṃ bhikkhū”ti. So ādito paṭṭhāya sabbaṃ taṃ
atk-s0502a:1800_14: pavattiṃ bhagavato ārocento āha – “evaṃ, bhante, mayā khamāpiyamāno maṃ evaṃ vadesi
atk-s0502a:1800_15: ‘nevettha tumhākaṃ doso atthi, na mayhaṃ. Vaṭṭasseveso doso, tumhe mā cintayitthā’ti,
atk-s0502a:1800_16: iti maṃ assāsesiyeva, mayi neva kopaṃ, na dosamakāsi, na me, bhante, evarūpo guṇasampanno
atk-s0502a:1800_17: diṭṭhapubbo”ti. Atha naṃ satthā “bhikkhu khīṇāsavā nāma na kassaci kuppanti, na dussanti,
atk-s0502a:1800_18: santindriyā santamānasāva hontī”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1802: “Santaṃ tassa manaṃ hoti, santā vācā ca kamma ca;
atk-s0502a:1804_0: Tattha santaṃ tassāti tassa khīṇāsavasāmaṇerassa abhijjhādīnaṃ abhāvena manaṃ santameva
atk-s0502a:1804_1: hoti upasantaṃ nibbutaṃ. Tathā musāvādādīnaṃ abhāvena vācā ca pāṇātipātādīnaṃ abhāvena
atk-s0502a:1804_2: kāyakammañca santameva hoti. Sammadaññā vimuttassāti nayena hetunā jānitvā pañcahi
atk-s0502a:1804_3: vimuttīhi vimuttassa. Upasantassāti abbhantare rāgādīnaṃ upasamena upasantassa. Tādinoti
atk-s0502a:1805: Desanāvasāne kosambivāsītissatthero saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Sesamahājanassāpi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:1808: Assaddhoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sāriputtattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1809_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye tiṃsamattā āraññakā bhikkhū satthu santikaṃ āgantvā vanditvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1809_1: Satthā tesaṃ saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattassūpanissayaṃ disvā sāriputtattheraṃ āmantetvā
atk-s0502a:1809_2: “saddahasi tvaṃ, sāriputta, saddhindriyaṃ bhāvitaṃ bahulīkataṃ amatogadhaṃ hoti amatapariyosāna”nti
atk-s0502a:1809_3: evaṃ pañcindriyāni ārabbha pañhaṃ pucchi. Thero “na khvāhaṃ, bhante, ettha bhagavato
atk-s0502a:1809_4: saddhāya gacchāmi, saddhindriyaṃ…pe… amatapariyosānaṃ. Yesañhetaṃ, bhante, aññātaṃ
atk-s0502a:1809_5: assa adiṭṭhaṃ aviditaṃ asacchikataṃ aphassitaṃ paññāya, te tattha paresaṃ saddhāya
atk-s0502a:1809_6: gaccheyyuṃ. Saddhindriyaṃ…pe… amatapariyosāna”nti evaṃ taṃ pañhaṃ byākāsi. Taṃ sutvā
atk-s0502a:1809_7: bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “sāriputtatthero micchāgahaṇaṃ neva vissajjesi, ajjāpi
atk-s0502a:1809_8: sammāsambuddhassa na saddahatiyevā”ti. Taṃ sutvā satthā “kiṃ nāmetaṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a:1809_9: vadetha. Ahañhi ‘pañcindriyāni abhāvetvā samathavipassanaṃ avaḍḍhetvā maggaphalāni
atk-s0502a:1809_10: sacchikātuṃ samattho nāma atthīti saddahasi tvaṃ sāriputto’ti pucchiṃ. So ‘evaṃ sacchikaronto
atk-s0502a:1809_11: atthi nāmāti na saddahāmi, bhante’ti kathesi. Na dinnassa vā katassa vā phalaṃ vipākaṃ
atk-s0502a:1809_12: na saddahati, nāpi buddhādīnaṃ guṇaṃ na saddahati. Eso pana attanā paṭividdhesu jhānavipassanāmaggaphaladhammesu
atk-s0502a:1809_13: paresaṃ saddhāya na gacchati. Tasmā anupavajjo”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ
atk-s0502a:1811: “Assaddho akataññū ca, sandhicchedo ca yo naro,
atk-s0502a:1813_0: Tassatho – attano paṭividdhaguṇaṃ paresaṃ kathāya na saddahatīti assaddho. Akataṃ
atk-s0502a:1813_1: nibbānaṃ jānātīti akataññū, sacchikatanibbānoti attho. Vaṭṭasandhiṃ, saṃsārasandhiṃ
atk-s0502a:1813_2: chinditvā ṭhitoti sandhicchedo. Kusalākusalakammabījassa khīṇattā nibbattanāvakāso
atk-s0502a:1813_3: hato assāti hatāvakāso. Catūhi maggehi kattabbakiccassa katattā,sabbā āsā iminā vantāti
atk-s0502a:1813_4: vantāso. So evarūpo naro. Paṭividdhalokuttaradhammatāya purisesu uttamabhāvaṃ pattoti purisuttamoti.
atk-s0502a:1814: Gāthāvasāne te āraññakā tiṃsamattā bhikkhū saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Sesajanassāpi satthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:1817: Gāme vāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto khadiravaniyarevatattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1818_0: Āyasmā hi sāriputto sattāsītikoṭidhanaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā cālā, upacālā, sīsūpacālāti
atk-s0502a:1818_1: tisso bhaginiyo, cundo upasenoti ime dve ca bhātaro pabbājesi. Revatakumāro ekova
atk-s0502a:1818_2: gehe avasiṭṭho. Athassa mātā cintesi – “mama putto upatisso ettakaṃ dhanaṃ pahāya
atk-s0502a:1818_3: pabbajitvā tisso ca bhaginiyo dve ca bhātaro pabbājesi, revato ekova avaseso. Sace
atk-s0502a:1818_4: imampi pabbājessati, ettakaṃ no dhanaṃ nassissati, kulavaṃso pacchijjissati, daharakāleyeva
atk-s0502a:1818_5: naṃ gharāvāsena bandhissāmī”ti. Sāriputtattheropi paṭikacceva bhikkhū āṇāpesi “sace,
atk-s0502a:1818_6: āvuso, revato pabbajitukāmo āgacchati, āgatamattameva naṃ pabbājeyyātha, mama mātāpitaro
atk-s0502a:1818_7: micchādiṭṭhikā, kiṃ tehi āpucchitehi, ahameva tassa mātā ca pitā cā”ti. Mātāpissa
atk-s0502a:1818_8: revatakumāraṃ sattavassikameva gharabandhanena bandhitukāmā samānajātike kule dārikaṃ
atk-s0502a:1818_9: vāretvā divasaṃ vavatthapetvā kumāraṃ maṇḍetvā pasādhetvā mahatā parivārena saddhiṃ
atk-s0502a:1818_10: ādāya kumārikāya ñātigharaṃ agamāsi. Atha nesaṃ katamaṅgalānaṃ dvinnampi ñātakesu
atk-s0502a:1818_11: sannipatitesu udakapātiyaṃ hatthe otāretvā maṅgalāni vatvā kumārikāya vuḍḍhiṃ ākaṅkhamānā
atk-s0502a:1818_12: ñātakā “tava ayyikāya diṭṭhadhammaṃ passa, ayyikā viya ciraṃ jīva, ammā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1818_13: Revatakumāro “ko nu kho imissā ayyikāya diṭṭhadhammo”ti cintetvā “katarā imissā ayyikā”ti
atk-s0502a:1818_14: pucchi. Atha naṃ āhaṃsu, “tāta, kiṃ na passasi imaṃ vīsavassasatikaṃ khaṇḍadantaṃ
atk-s0502a:1818_15: palitakesaṃ valittacaṃ tilakāhatagattaṃ gopānasivaṅkaṃ, esā etissā ayyikā”ti. “Kiṃ
atk-s0502a:1818_16: pana ayampi evarūpā bhavissatī”ti? “Sace jīvissati, bhavissati, tātā”ti. So cintesi
atk-s0502a:1818_17: – “evarūpampi nāma sarīraṃ jarāya imaṃ vippakāraṃ pāpuṇissati, imaṃ me bhātarā upatissena
atk-s0502a:1818_18: diṭṭhaṃ bhavissati, ajjeva mayā palāyitvā pabbajituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Atha naṃ ñātakā
atk-s0502a:1818_19: kumārikāya saddhiṃ ekayānaṃ āropetvā ādāya pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1819_0: So thokaṃ gantvā sarīrakiccaṃ apadisitvā “ṭhapetha tāva yānaṃ, otaritvā āgamissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:1819_1: yānā otaritvā ekasmiṃ gumbe thokaṃ papañcaṃ katvā agamāsi. Punapi thokaṃ gantvā teneva
atk-s0502a:1819_2: apadesena otaritvā abhiruhi, punapi tatheva akāsi. Athassa ñātakā “addhā imassa uṭṭhānāni
atk-s0502a:1819_3: vattantī”ti sallakkhetvā nātidaḷhaṃ ārakkhaṃ kariṃsu. So punapi thokaṃ gantvā teneva
atk-s0502a:1819_4: apadesena otaritvā “tumhe pājento purato gacchatha, mayaṃ pacchato saṇikaṃ āgamissāmā”ti
atk-s0502a:1819_5: vatvā otaritvā gumbābhimukho ahosi. Ñātakāpissa “pacchato āgamissatī”ti saññāya yānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1819_6: pājentā gamiṃsu. Sopi tato palāyitvā ekasmiṃ padese tiṃsamattā bhikkhū vasanti, tesaṃ
atk-s0502a:1819_7: santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā āha – “pabbājetha maṃ, bhante”ti. “Āvuso, tvaṃ sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍito,
atk-s0502a:1819_8: mayaṃ te rājaputtabhāvaṃ vā amaccaputtabhāvaṃ vā na jānāma, kathaṃ pabbājessāmā”ti?
atk-s0502a:1819_9: “Tumhe maṃ, bhante, na jānāthā”ti? “Na jānāmāvuso”ti. “Ahaṃ upatissassa kaniṭṭhabhātiko”ti.
atk-s0502a:1819_10: “Ko esa upatisso nāmā”ti? “Bhante, bhaddantā mama bhātaraṃ ‘sāriputto’ti vadanti,
atk-s0502a:1819_11: tasmā mayā ‘upatisso’ti vutte na jānantī”ti. “Kiṃ pana tvaṃ sāriputtattherassa kaniṭṭhabhātiko”ti?
atk-s0502a:1819_12: “Āma, bhante”ti. “Tena hi ehi, bhātarā te anuññātamevā”ti vatvā bhikkhū tassa ābharaṇāni
atk-s0502a:1819_13: omuñcāpetvā ekamantaṃ ṭhapetvā taṃ pabbājetvā therassa sāsanaṃ pahiṇiṃsu. Thero taṃ
atk-s0502a:1819_14: sutvā bhagavato ārocesi – “bhante, ‘āraññikabhikkhūhi kira revato pabbājito’ti sāsanaṃ
atk-s0502a:1819_15: pahiṇiṃsu, gantvā taṃ passitvā āgamissāmī”ti. Satthā “adhivāsehi tāva, sāriputtā”ti
atk-s0502a:1819_16: gantuṃ na adāsi. Thero puna katipāhaccayena satthāraṃ āpucchi. Satthā “adhivāsehi
atk-s0502a:1819_17: tāva, sāriputta, mayampi āgamissāmā”ti neva gantuṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a:1820_0: Sāmaṇeropi “sacāhaṃ idha vasissāmi, ñātakā maṃ anubandhitvā pakkosissantī”ti tesaṃ
atk-s0502a:1820_1: bhikkhūnaṃ santike yāva arahattā kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggaṇhitvā pattacīvaramādāya cārikaṃ
atk-s0502a:1820_2: caramāno tato tiṃsayojanike ṭhāne khadiravanaṃ gantvā antovasseyeva temāsabbhantare
atk-s0502a:1820_3: saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Theropi pavāretvā satthāraṃ puna tattha gamanatthāya
atk-s0502a:1820_4: āpucchi. Satthā “mayampi gamissāma, sāriputtā”ti pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ nikkhami.
atk-s0502a:1820_5: Thokaṃ gatakāle ānandatthero dvedhāpathe ṭhatvā satthāraṃ āha – “bhante, revatassa
atk-s0502a:1820_6: santikaṃ gamanamaggesu ayaṃ parihārapatho saṭṭhiyojaniko manussāvāso, ayaṃ ujumaggo
atk-s0502a:1820_7: tiṃsayojaniko amanussapariggahito, katarena gacchāmā”ti. “Sīvali, pana, ānanda, amhehi
atk-s0502a:1820_8: saddhiṃ āgato”ti? “Āma, bhante”ti. “Sace, sīvali, āgato, ujumaggameva gaṇhāhī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1820_9: Satthā kira “ahaṃ tumhākaṃ yāgubhattaṃ uppādessāmi, ujumaggaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti avatvā “tesaṃ
atk-s0502a:1820_10: tesaṃ janānaṃ puññassa vipākadānaṭṭhānaṃ eta”nti ñatvā “sace, sīvali, āgato, ujumaggaṃ
atk-s0502a:1820_11: gaṇhāhī”ti āha. Satthari pana taṃ maggaṃ paṭipanne devatā “amhākaṃ ayyassa sīvalittherassa
atk-s0502a:1820_12: sakkāraṃ karissāmā”ti cintetvā ekekayojane vihāre kāretvā ekayojanato uddhaṃ gantuṃ
atk-s0502a:1820_13: adatvā pāto vuṭṭhāya dibbayāguādīni gahetvā, “ayyo, no sīvalitthero kahaṃ nisinno”ti
atk-s0502a:1820_14: vicaranti. Thero attano abhihaṭaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dāpesi. Evaṃ
atk-s0502a:1820_15: satthā saparivāro tiṃsayojanikaṃ kantāraṃ sīvalittherassa puññaṃ anubhavamānova āgamāsi.
atk-s0502a:1820_16: Revatattheropi satthu āgamanaṃ ñatvā bhagavato gandhakuṭiṃ māpetvā pañca kūṭāgārasatāni,
atk-s0502a:1820_17: pañca caṅkamanasatāni, pañcarattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānasatāni ca māpesi. Satthā tassa santike
atk-s0502a:1820_18: māsamattameva vasi. Tasmiṃ vasamānopi sīvalittherasseva puññaṃ anubhavi.
atk-s0502a:1821_0: Tattha pana dve mahallakabhikkhū satthu khadiravanaṃ pavisanakāle evaṃ cintayiṃsu
atk-s0502a:1821_1: – “ayaṃ bhikkhu ettakaṃ navakammaṃ karonto kiṃ sakkhissati samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ, satthā
atk-s0502a:1821_2: ‘sāriputtassa kaniṭṭho’ti mukholokanakiccaṃ karonto evarūpassa navakammikassa bhikkhussa
atk-s0502a:1821_3: santikaṃ āgato”ti. Satthāpi taṃ divasaṃ paccūsakāle lokaṃ voloketvā te bhikkhū disvā
atk-s0502a:1821_4: tesaṃ cittācāraṃ aññāsi. Tasmā tattha māsamattaṃ vasitvā nikkhamanadivase yathā te
atk-s0502a:1821_5: bhikkhū attano telanāḷiñca udakatumbañca upāhanāni ca pamussanti, tathā adhiṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0502a:1821_6: nikkhamanto vihārūpacārato bahi nikkhantakāle iddhiṃ vissajjesi. Atha te bhikkhū
atk-s0502a:1821_7: “mayā idañcidañca pamuṭṭhaṃ, mayāpi pamuṭṭha”nti ubhopi nivattitvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ asallakkhetvā
atk-s0502a:1821_8: khadirarukkhakaṇṭakehi vijjhamānā vicaritvā ekasmiṃ khadirarukkhe olambantaṃ attano
atk-s0502a:1821_9: bhaṇḍakaṃ disvā ādāya pakkamiṃsu. Satthāpi bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ādāya puna māsamatteneva
atk-s0502a:1821_10: sīvalittherassa puññaṃ anubhavamāno paṭigantvā pubbārāmaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:1822_0: Atha te mahallakabhikkhū pātova mukhaṃ dhovitvā “āgantukabhattadāyikāya visākhāya
atk-s0502a:1822_1: gharaṃ yāguṃ pivissāmā”ti gantvā yāguṃ pivitvā khajjakaṃ khāditvā nisīdiṃsu. Atha
atk-s0502a:1822_2: ne visākhā pucchi – “tumhepi, bhante, satthārā saddhiṃ revatattherassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1822_3: agamitthā”ti. “Āma, upāsiketi, ramaṇīyaṃ, bhante, therassa vasanaṭṭhāna”nti. “Kuto
atk-s0502a:1822_4: tassa ramaṇīyatā setakaṇṭakakhadirarukkhagahanaṃ petānaṃ nivāsanaṭṭhānasadisaṃ upāsike”ti.
atk-s0502a:1822_5: Athaññe dve daharabhikkhū āgamiṃsu. Upāsikā tesampi yāgukhajjakaṃ datvā tatheva paṭipucchi.
atk-s0502a:1822_6: Te āhaṃsu – “na sakkā upāsike vaṇṇetuṃ, sudhammadevasabhāsadisaṃ iddhiyā abhisaṅkhataṃ
atk-s0502a:1822_7: viya therassa vasanaṭṭhāna”nti. Upāsikā cintesi – “paṭhamaṃ āgatā bhikkhū aññathā
atk-s0502a:1822_8: vadiṃsu, ime aññathā vadanti, paṭhamaṃ āgatā bhikkhū kiñcideva pamussitvā iddhiyā
atk-s0502a:1822_9: vissaṭṭhakāle paṭinivattitvā gatā bhavissanti, ime pana iddhiyā abhisaṅkharitvā nimmitakāle
atk-s0502a:1822_10: gatā bhavissantī”ti attano paṇḍitabhāvena etamatthaṃ ñatvā “satthāraṃ āgatakāle pucchissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:1822_11: aṭṭhāsi. Tato muhuttaṃyeva satthā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto visākhāya gehaṃ gantvā paññattāsane
atk-s0502a:1822_12: nisīdi. Sā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sakkaccaṃ parivisitvā bhattakiccāvasāne
atk-s0502a:1822_13: satthāraṃ vanditvā paṭipucchi – “bhante, tumhehi saddhiṃ gatabhikkhūsu ekacce revatattherassa
atk-s0502a:1822_14: vasanaṭṭhānaṃ ‘khadiragahanaṃ arañña’nti vadanti, ekacce ‘ramaṇīya’nti, kiṃ nu kho
atk-s0502a:1822_15: eta”nti? Taṃ sutvā satthā “upāsike gāmo vā hotu araññaṃ vā, yasmiṃ ṭhāne arahanto
atk-s0502a:1822_16: viharanti, taṃ ramaṇīyamevā”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1824: “Gāme vā yadi vāraññe, ninne vā yadi vā thale;
atk-s0502a:1826_0: Tattha kiñcāpi arahanto gāmante kāyavivekaṃ na labhanti, cittavivekaṃ pana labhanteva.
atk-s0502a:1826_1: Tesañhi dibbapaṭibhāgānipi ārammaṇāni cittaṃ cāletuṃ na sakkonti. Tasmā gāmo vā hotu
atk-s0502a:1826_2: araññādīnaṃ vā aññataraṃ, yattha arahanto viharanti, taṃ bhūmirāmaṇeyyakanti so bhūmipadeso
atk-s0502a:1828_0: Aparena samayena bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ – “āvuso, kena nu kho kāraṇena āyasmā
atk-s0502a:1828_1: sīvalitthero sattadivasasattamāsādhikāni satta vassāni mātu kucchiyaṃ vasi, kena
atk-s0502a:1828_2: niraye pacci, kena nissandena lābhaggayasaggappatto jāto”ti? Satthā taṃ kathaṃ sutvā,
atk-s0502a:1828_3: “bhikkhave, kiṃ kathethā”ti pucchitvā, “bhante, idaṃ nāmā”ti vutte tassāyasmato pubbakammaṃ kathento āha –
atk-s0502a:1829_0: Bhikkhave, ito ekanavutikappe vipassī bhagavā loke uppajjitvā ekasmiṃ samaye janapadacārikaṃ
atk-s0502a:1829_1: caritvā pitu nagaraṃ paccāgamāsi. Rājā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa āgantukadānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1829_2: sajjetvā nāgarānaṃ sāsanaṃ pesesi “āgantvā mayhaṃ dāne sahāyakā hontū”ti. Te tathā
atk-s0502a:1829_3: katvā “raññā dinnadānato atirekataraṃ dassāmā”ti satthāraṃ nimantetvā punadivase
atk-s0502a:1829_4: dānaṃ paṭiyādetvā rañño sāsanaṃ pahiṇiṃsu. Rājā āgantvā tesaṃ dānaṃ disvā “ito adhikataraṃ
atk-s0502a:1829_5: dassāmī”ti punadivasatthāya satthāraṃ nimantesi, neva rājā nāgare parājetuṃ sakkhi,
atk-s0502a:1829_6: na nāgarā rājānaṃ. Nāgarā chaṭṭhe vāre “sve dāni yathā ‘imasmiṃ dāne idaṃ nāma natthī’ti
atk-s0502a:1829_7: na sakkā hoti vattuṃ, evaṃ dānaṃ dassāmā”ti cintetvā punadivase dānaṃ paṭiyādetvā
atk-s0502a:1829_8: “kiṃ nu kho ettha natthī”ti olokentā allamadhumeva na addasaṃsu. Pakkamadhu pana
atk-s0502a:1829_9: bahuṃ atthi. Te allamadhussatthāya catūsu nagaradvāresu cattāri kahāpaṇasahassāni
atk-s0502a:1829_10: gāhāpetvā pahiṇiṃsu. Atheko janapadamanusso gāmabhojakaṃ passituṃ āgacchanto antarāmagge
atk-s0502a:1829_11: madhupaṭalaṃ disvā makkhikā palāpetvā sākhaṃ chinditvā sākhādaṇḍakeneva saddhiṃ madhupaṭalaṃ
atk-s0502a:1829_12: ādāya “gāmabhojakassa dassāmī”ti nagaraṃ pāvisi. Madhuatthāya gato taṃ disvā, “ambho,
atk-s0502a:1829_13: vikkiṇiyaṃ madhu”nti pucchi. “Na vikkiṇiyaṃ, sāmī”ti. “Handa, imaṃ kahāpaṇaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0502a:1829_14: dehī”ti. So cintesi – “imaṃ madhupaṭalaṃ pādamattampi na agghati, ayaṃ pana kahāpaṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:1829_15: deti. Bahukahāpaṇako maññe, mayā vaḍḍhetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Atha naṃ “na demī”ti āha,
atk-s0502a:1829_16: “tena hi dve kahāpaṇe gaṇhāhī”ti. “Dvīhipi na demī”ti. Evaṃ tāva vaḍḍhesi, yāva so
atk-s0502a:1829_17: “tena hi idaṃ sahassaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti bhaṇḍikaṃ upanesi.
atk-s0502a:1830_0: Atha naṃ so āha – “kiṃ nu kho tvaṃ ummattako, udāhu kahāpaṇānaṃ ṭhapanokāsaṃ na labhasi,
atk-s0502a:1830_1: pādampi na agghanakaṃ madhuṃ ‘sahassaṃ gahetvā dehī’ti vadasi, ‘kiṃ nāmeta”’nti?
atk-s0502a:1830_2: ‘Jānāmahaṃ, bho, iminā pana me kammaṃ atthi, tenevaṃ vadāmī’ti. “Kiṃ kammaṃ, sāmī”ti?
atk-s0502a:1830_4: tatrekaṃ allamadhumeva natthi, tasmā evaṃ gaṇhāmī”ti. Evaṃ, sante, nāhaṃ mūlena dassāmi,
atk-s0502a:1830_5: sace “ahampi dāne pattiṃ labhissāmi, dassāmī”ti. So gantvā nāgarānaṃ tamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:1830_6: Nāgarā tassa saddhāya balavabhāvaṃ ñatvā, “sādhu, pattiko hotū”ti paṭijāniṃsu, te
atk-s0502a:1830_7: buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nisīdāpetvā yāgukhajjakaṃ datvā mahatiṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ
atk-s0502a:1830_8: āharāpetvā madhupaṭalaṃ pīḷāpesuṃ. Teneva manussena paṇṇākāratthāya dadhivārakopi
atk-s0502a:1830_9: āhaṭo atthi, so tampi dadhiṃ pātiyaṃ ākiritvā tena madhunā saṃsanditvā buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0502a:1830_10: bhikkhusaṅghassa ādito paṭṭhāya adāsi. Taṃ yāvadatthaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ sabbesaṃ pāpuṇi
atk-s0502a:1830_11: uttarimpi avasiṭṭhaṃ ahosiyeva. “Evaṃ thokaṃ madhu kathaṃ tāva bahūnaṃ pāpuṇī”ti
atk-s0502a:1830_12: na cintetabbaṃ. Tañhi buddhānubhāvena pāpuṇi. Buddhavisayo na cintetabbo. Cattāri
atk-s0502a:1830_13: hi “acinteyyānī”ti vuttāni. Tāni cintento ummādasseva bhāgī hotīti. So puriso ettakaṃ
atk-s0502a:1830_14: kammaṃ katvā āyupariyosāne devaloke nibbattitvā ettakaṃ kālaṃ saṃsaranto ekasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:1830_15: samaye devalokā cavitvā bārāṇasiyaṃ rājakule nibbatto pitu accayena rajjaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:1830_16: So “ekaṃ nagaraṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti gantvā parivāresi, nāgarānañca sāsanaṃ pahiṇi “rajjaṃ
atk-s0502a:1830_17: vā me dentu yuddhaṃ vā”ti. Te “neva rajjaṃ dassāma, na yuddha”nti vatvā cūḷadvārehi
atk-s0502a:1831_0: Itaropi cattāri mahādvārāni rakkhanto sattamāsādhikāni satta vassāni nagaraṃ uparundhi.
atk-s0502a:1831_1: Athassa mātā “kiṃ me putto karotī”ti pucchitvā “idaṃ nāma devī”ti taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā
atk-s0502a:1831_2: “bālo mama putto, gacchatha, tassa ‘cūḷadvārānipi pidhāya nagaraṃ uparundhatū’ti
atk-s0502a:1831_3: vadethā”ti. So mātu sāsanaṃ sutvā tathā akāsi. Nāgarāpi bahi nikkhamituṃ alabhantā
atk-s0502a:1831_4: sattame divase attano rājānaṃ māretvā tassa rajjaṃ adaṃsu. So imaṃ kammaṃ katvā āyupariyosāne
atk-s0502a:1831_5: avīcimhi nibbattitvā yāvāyaṃ pathavī yojanamattaṃ ussannā, tāva niraye paccitvā catunnaṃ
atk-s0502a:1831_6: cūḷadvārānaṃ pidahitattā tato cuto tassā eva mātu kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā
atk-s0502a:1831_7: sattamāsādhikāni satta vassāni antokucchismiṃ vasitvā satta divasāni yonimukhe tiriyaṃ
atk-s0502a:1831_8: nipajji. Evaṃ, bhikkhave, sīvali, tadā nagaraṃ uparundhitvā gahitakammena ettakaṃ
atk-s0502a:1831_9: kālaṃ niraye paccitvā catunnaṃ cūḷadvārānaṃ pidahitattā tato cuto tassā eva mātu
atk-s0502a:1831_10: kucchiyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā ettakaṃ kālaṃ kucchiyaṃ vasi. Navamadhuno dinnattā
atk-s0502a:1832_0: Punekadivasaṃ bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ – “aho sāmaṇerassa lābho, aho puññaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1832_1: yena ekakena pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ pañcakūṭāgārasatādīni katānī”ti. Satthā āgantvā
atk-s0502a:1832_2: “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a:1832_3: “bhikkhave, mayhaṃ puttassa neva puññaṃ atthi, na pāpaṃ, ubhayamassa pahīna”nti vatvā
atk-s0502a:1834: Asokaṃ virajaṃ suddhaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇa”nti. ;
atk-s0502a:1837: Ramaṇīyānīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ itthiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1838_0: Eko kira piṇḍapātiko bhikkhu satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā ekaṃ jiṇṇauyyānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1838_1: pavisitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karoti. Ekā nagarasobhinī itthī purisena saddhiṃ “ahaṃ asukaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1838_2: nāma gamissāmi, tvaṃ tattha āgaccheyyāsī”ti saṅketaṃ katvā agamāsi. So puriso nāgacchi.
atk-s0502a:1838_3: Sā tassa āgamanamaggaṃ olokentī taṃ adisvā ukkaṇṭhitvā ito cito ca vicaramānā taṃ
atk-s0502a:1838_4: uyyānaṃ pavisitvā theraṃ pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisinnaṃ disvā ito cito ca olokayamānā
atk-s0502a:1838_5: aññaṃ kañci adisvā “ayañca puriso eva, imassa cittaṃ pamohessāmī”ti tassa purato
atk-s0502a:1838_6: ṭhatvā punappunaṃ nivatthasāṭakaṃ mocetvā nivāseti, kese muñcitvā bandhati, pāṇiṃ
atk-s0502a:1838_7: paharitvā hasati. Therassa saṃvego uppajjitvā sakalasarīraṃ phari. So “kiṃ nu kho
atk-s0502a:1838_8: ida”nti cintesi. Satthāpi “mama santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā ‘samaṇadhammaṃ karissāmī’ti
atk-s0502a:1838_9: gatassa bhikkhuno kā nu kho pavattī”ti upadhārento taṃ itthiṃ disvā tassā anācārakiriyaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1838_10: therassa ca saṃveguppattiṃ ñatvā gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnova tena saddhiṃ kathesi – “bhikkhu,
atk-s0502a:1838_11: kāmagavesakānaṃ aramaṇaṭṭhānameva vītarāgānaṃ ramaṇaṭṭhānaṃ hotī”ti. Evañca pana
atk-s0502a:1838_12: vatvā obhāsaṃ pharitvā tassa dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1842_1: nāma ramaṇīyāni. Yatthāti yesu araññesu vikasitesu padumavanesu gāmamakkhikā viya
atk-s0502a:1842_2: kāmagavesako jano na ramati. Vītarāgāti vigatarāgā pana khīṇāsavā nāma bhamaramadhukarā
atk-s0502a:1842_3: viya padumavanesu tathārūpesu araññesu ramissanti. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Na te kāmapavesino,
atk-s0502a:1842_4: yasmā te kāmagavesino na hontīti attho.
atk-s0502a:1843: Desanāvasāne so thero yathānisinnova saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇitvā ākāsenāgantvā thutiṃ karonto tathāgatassa pāde vanditvā agamāsīti.
atk-s0502a:1849: Sahassamapi ce vācāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto tambadāṭhikacoraghātakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1850_0: Ekūnapañcasatā kira corā gāmaghātakādīni karontā jīvikaṃ kappesuṃ. Atheko puriso
atk-s0502a:1850_1: nibbiddhapiṅgalo tambadāṭhiko tesaṃ santikaṃ gantvā “ahampi tumhehi saddhiṃ jīvissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:1850_2: āha. Atha naṃ corajeṭṭhakassa dassetvā “ayampi amhākaṃ santike vasituṃ icchatī”ti
atk-s0502a:1850_3: āhaṃsu. Atha naṃ corajeṭṭhako oloketvā “ayaṃ mātu thanaṃ chinditvā pitu vā galalohitaṃ
atk-s0502a:1850_4: nīharitvā khādanasamattho atikakkhaḷo”ti cintetvā “natthetassa amhākaṃ santike vasanakicca”nti
atk-s0502a:1850_5: paṭikkhipi. So evaṃ paṭikkhittopi āgantvā ekaṃ tasseva antevāsikaṃ upaṭṭhahanto ārādhesi.
atk-s0502a:1850_6: So taṃ ādāya corajeṭṭhakaṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “sāmi, bhaddako esa, amhākaṃ upakārako,
atk-s0502a:1850_7: saṅgaṇhatha na”nti yācitvā corajeṭṭhakaṃ paṭicchāpesi. Athekadivasaṃ nāgarā rājapurisehi
atk-s0502a:1850_8: saddhiṃ ekato hutvā te core gahetvā vinicchayamahāmaccānaṃ santikaṃ nayiṃsu. Amaccā
atk-s0502a:1850_9: tesaṃ pharasunā sīsacchedaṃ āṇāpesuṃ. Tato “ko nu kho ime māressatī”ti pariyesantā
atk-s0502a:1850_10: te māretuṃ icchantaṃ kañci adisvā corajeṭṭhakaṃ āhaṃsu – “tvaṃ ime māretvā jīvitañceva
atk-s0502a:1850_11: labhissasi sammānañca, mārehi ne”ti. Sopi attānaṃ nissāya vasitattā te māretuṃ na
atk-s0502a:1850_12: icchi. Etenūpāyena ekūnapañcasate pucchiṃsu, sabbepi na icchiṃsu. Sabbapacchā taṃ
atk-s0502a:1850_13: nibbiddhapiṅgalaṃ tambadāṭhikaṃ pucchiṃsu. So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā te sabbepi
atk-s0502a:1850_14: māretvā jīvitañceva sammānañca labhi. Etenūpāyena nagarassa dakkhiṇatopi pañca corasatāni
atk-s0502a:1850_15: ānetvā amaccānaṃ dassetvā tehi tesampi sīsacchede āṇatte corajeṭṭhakaṃ ādiṃ katvā
atk-s0502a:1850_16: pucchantā kañci māretuṃ icchantaṃ adisvā “purimadivase eko puriso pañcasate core
atk-s0502a:1850_17: māresi, kahaṃ nu kho so”ti. “Asukaṭṭhāne amheti diṭṭho”ti vutte taṃ pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0502a:1850_18: “ime mārehi, sammānaṃ lacchasī”ti āṇāpesuṃ. So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā te sabbepi
atk-s0502a:1850_19: māretvā sammānaṃ labhi. Atha naṃ “bhaddako ayaṃ puriso, nibaddhaṃ coraghātakameva
atk-s0502a:1850_20: etaṃ karissāmā”ti mantetvā tassa taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ datvāva sammānaṃ kariṃsu. So pacchimadisatopi
atk-s0502a:1850_21: uttaradisatopi ānīte pañcasate pañcasate core ghātesiyeva. Evaṃ catūhi disāhi ānītāni
atk-s0502a:1850_22: dve sahassāni māretvā tato paṭṭhāya devasikaṃ ekaṃ dveti ānīte te manusse māretvā
atk-s0502a:1851_0: So mahallakakāle ekappahāreneva sīsaṃ chindituṃ na sakkoti, dve tayo vāre paharanto
atk-s0502a:1851_1: manusse kilameti. Nāgarā cintayiṃsu – “aññopi coraghātako uppajjissati, ayaṃ ativiya
atk-s0502a:1851_2: manusse kilameti, kiṃ iminā”ti tassa taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ hariṃsu. So pubbe coraghātakakammaṃ
atk-s0502a:1851_3: karonto “ahatasāṭake nivāsetuṃ, navasappinā saṅkhataṃ khīrayāguṃ pivituṃ, sumanapupphāni
atk-s0502a:1851_4: pilandhituṃ, gandhe vilimpitu”nti imāni cattāri na labhi. So ṭhānā cāvitadivase “khīrayāguṃ
atk-s0502a:1851_5: me pacathā”ti vatvā ahatavatthasumanamālāvilepanāni gāhāpetvā nadiṃ gantvā nhatvā
atk-s0502a:1851_6: ahatavatthāni nivāsetvā mālā pilandhitvā gandhehi anulittagatto gehaṃ āgantvā nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:1851_7: Athassa navasappinā saṅkhataṃ khīrayāguṃ purato ṭhapetvā hatthadhovanodakaṃ āhariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1851_8: Tasmiṃ khaṇe sāriputtatthero samāpattito vuṭṭhāya “kattha nu kho ajja mayā gantabba”nti
atk-s0502a:1851_9: attano bhikkhācāraṃ olokento tassa gehe khīrayāguṃ disvā “karissati nu kho me puriso
atk-s0502a:1851_10: saṅgaha”nti upadhārento “maṃ disvā mama saṅgahaṃ karissati, karitvā ca pana mahāsampattiṃ
atk-s0502a:1851_11: labhissati ayaṃ kulaputto”ti ñatvā cīvaraṃ pārupitvā pattaṃ ādāya tassa gehadvāre
atk-s0502a:1852_0: So theraṃ disvā pasannacitto cintesi – “mayā ciraṃ coraghātakakammaṃ kataṃ, bahū
atk-s0502a:1852_1: manussā māritā, idāni me gehe khīrayāgu paṭiyattā, thero āgantvā mama gehadvāre ṭhito,
atk-s0502a:1852_2: idāni mayā ayyassa deyyadhammaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti purato ṭhapitayāguṃ apanetvā theraṃ
atk-s0502a:1852_3: upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā antogehe nisīdāpetvā patte khīrayāguṃ ākiritvā navasappiṃ
atk-s0502a:1852_4: āsiñcitvā theraṃ bījamāno aṭṭhāsi. Athassa ca dīgharattaṃ aladdhapubbatāya khīrayāguṃ
atk-s0502a:1852_5: pātuṃ balavaajjhāsayo ahosi. Thero tassa ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvā “tvaṃ, upāsaka, attano
atk-s0502a:1852_6: yāguṃ pivā”ti āha. So aññassa hatthe bījaniṃ datvā yāguṃ pivi. Thero bījamānaṃ purisaṃ
atk-s0502a:1852_7: “gaccha, upāsakameva bījāhī”ti āha. So bījiyamāno kucchipūraṃ yāguṃ pivitvā āgantvā
atk-s0502a:1852_8: theraṃ bījamāno ṭhatvā katāhārakiccassa therassa pattaṃ aggahesi. Thero tassa anumodanaṃ
atk-s0502a:1852_9: ārabhi. So attano cittaṃ therassa dhammadesanānugaṃ kātuṃ nāsakkhi. Thero sallakkhetvā,
atk-s0502a:1852_10: “upāsaka, kasmā cittaṃ desanānugaṃ kātuṃ na sakkosī”ti pucchi. “Bhante, mayā dīgharattaṃ
atk-s0502a:1852_11: kakkhaḷakammaṃ kataṃ, bahū manussā māritā, tamahaṃ attano kammaṃ anussaranto cittaṃ
atk-s0502a:1852_12: ayyassa desanānugaṃ kātuṃ nāsakkhi”nti. Thero “vañcessāmi na”nti cintetvā “kiṃ pana
atk-s0502a:1852_13: tvaṃ attano ruciyā akāsi, aññehi kāritosī”ti? “Rājā maṃ kāresi, bhante”ti. “Kiṃ nu
atk-s0502a:1852_14: kho te, upāsaka, evaṃ sante akusalaṃ hotī”ti? Mandadhātuko upāsako therenevaṃ vutte
atk-s0502a:1852_15: “natthi mayhaṃ akusala”nti saññī hutvā tena hi, “bhante, dhammaṃ kathethā”ti. So
atk-s0502a:1852_16: there anumodanaṃ karonte ekaggacitto hutvā dhammaṃ suṇanto sotāpattimaggassa orato
atk-s0502a:1852_17: anulomikaṃ khantiṃ nibbattesi. Theropi anumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:1853_0: Upāsakaṃ theraṃ anugantvā nivattamānaṃ ekā yakkhinī dhenuvesena āgantvā ure paharitvā
atk-s0502a:1853_1: māresi. So kālaṃ katvā tusitapure nibbatti. Bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ
atk-s0502a:1853_2: “coraghātako pañcapaṇṇāsa vassāni kakkhaḷakammaṃ katvā ajjeva tato mutto, ajjeva
atk-s0502a:1853_3: therassa bhikkhaṃ datvā ajjeva kālaṃ kato, kahaṃ nu kho nibbatto”ti. Satthā āgantvā
atk-s0502a:1853_4: “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a:1853_5: “bhikkhave, tusitapure nibbatto”ti āha. “Kiṃ, bhante, vadetha, ettakaṃ kālaṃ ettake
atk-s0502a:1853_6: manusse ghātetvā tusitavimāne nibbatto”ti. “Āma, bhikkhave, mahanto tena kalyāṇamitto
atk-s0502a:1853_7: laddho, so sāriputtassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā anulomañāṇaṃ nibbattetvā ito cuto tusitavimāne
atk-s0502a:1856_0: “Bhante, anumodanakathā nāma na balavā, tena kataṃ akusalakammaṃ mahantaṃ, kathaṃ
atk-s0502a:1856_1: ettakena visesaṃ nibbattesī”ti. Satthā “kiṃ, bhikkhave, ‘mayā desitadhammassa appaṃ
atk-s0502a:1856_2: vā bahuṃ vā’ti mā pamāṇaṃ gaṇhatha. Ekavācāpi hi atthanissitā seyyāvā”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ
atk-s0502a:1859: Ekaṃ atthapadaṃ seyyo, yaṃ sutvā upasammatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1860_0: Tattha sahassamapīti paricchedavacanaṃ, ekaṃ sahassaṃ dve sahassānīti evaṃ sahassena
atk-s0502a:1860_1: cepi paricchinnavācā honti, tā ca pana anatthapadasaṃhitā ākāsavaṇṇanāpabbatavaṇṇanāvanavaṇṇanādīni
atk-s0502a:1860_2: pakāsakehi aniyyānadīpakehi anatthakehi padehi saṃhitā yāva bahukā hoti, tāva pāpikā
atk-s0502a:1860_3: evāti attho. Ekaṃ atthapadanti yaṃ pana “ayaṃ kāyo, ayaṃ kāyagatāsati, tisso vijjā
atk-s0502a:1860_4: anuppatto, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana”nti evarūpaṃ ekaṃ atthapadaṃ sutvā rāgādivūpasamena
atk-s0502a:1864: Sahassamapi ce gāthāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto dārucīriyattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1865_0: Ekasmiñhi kāle bahū manussā nāvāya mahāsamuddaṃ pakkhanditvā antomahāsamudde bhinnāya
atk-s0502a:1865_1: nāvāya macchakacchapabhakkhā ahesuṃ. Ekovettha ekaṃ phalakaṃ gahetvā vāyamanto suppārakapaṭṭanatīraṃ
atk-s0502a:1865_2: okkami, tassa nivāsanapārupanaṃ natthi. So aññaṃ kiñci apassanto sukkhakaṭṭhadaṇḍake
atk-s0502a:1865_3: vākehi paliveṭhetvā nivāsanapārupanaṃ katvā devakulato kapālaṃ gahetvā suppārakapaṭṭanaṃ
atk-s0502a:1865_4: agamāsi, manussā taṃ disvā yāgubhattādīni datvā “ayaṃ eko arahā”ti sambhāvesuṃ. So
atk-s0502a:1865_5: vatthesu upanītesu “sacāhaṃ nivāsessāmi vā pārupissāmi vā, lābhasakkāro me parihāyissatī”ti
atk-s0502a:1865_6: tāni vatthāni paṭikkhipitvā dārucīrāneva paridahi. Athassa bahūhi “arahā arahā”ti
atk-s0502a:1865_7: vuccamānassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi “ye kho keci loke arahanto vā arahattamaggaṃ
atk-s0502a:1865_8: vā samāpannā, ahaṃ tesaṃ aññataro”ti. Athassa purāṇasālohitā devatā evaṃ cintesi.
atk-s0502a:1866_0: Purāṇasālohitāti pubbe ekato katasamaṇadhammā. Pubbe kira kassapadasabalassa sāsane
atk-s0502a:1866_1: osakkamāne sāmaṇerādīnaṃ vippakāraṃ disvā satta bhikkhū saṃvegappattā “yāva sāsanassa
atk-s0502a:1866_2: antaradhānaṃ na hoti, tāva attano patiṭṭhaṃ karissāmā”ti suvaṇṇacetiyaṃ vanditvā
atk-s0502a:1866_3: araññaṃ paviṭṭhā ekaṃ pabbataṃ disvā “jīvite sālayā nivattantu. Nirālayā imaṃ pabbataṃ
atk-s0502a:1866_4: abhiruhantū”ti vatvā nisseṇiṃ bandhitvā sabbepi taṃ abhiruyha nisseṇiṃ pātetvā samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0502a:1866_5: kariṃsu. Tesu saṅghatthero ekarattātikkameneva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. So anotattadahe
atk-s0502a:1866_6: nāgalatādantakaṭṭhaṃ khāditvā uttarakuruto piṇḍapātaṃ āharitvā te bhikkhū āha – “āvuso,
atk-s0502a:1866_7: imaṃ dantakaṭṭhaṃ khāditvā mukhaṃ dhovitvā imaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjathā”ti. Kiṃ
atk-s0502a:1866_8: pana, bhante, amhehi evaṃ katikā katā “yo paṭhamaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti, tenābhataṃ
atk-s0502a:1866_9: piṇḍapātaṃ avasesā paribhuñjissantī”ti? “No hetaṃ, āvuso”ti. “Tena hi sace mayampi
atk-s0502a:1866_10: tumhe viya visesaṃ nibbattessāma, sayaṃ āharitvā paribhuñjissāmā”ti na icchiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1866_11: Dutiyadivase dutiyatthero anāgāmiphalaṃ pāpuṇi. Sopi tatheva piṇḍapātaṃ āharitvā
atk-s0502a:1866_12: itare nimantesi. Te evamāhaṃsu – “kiṃ pana, bhante, amhehi evaṃ katikā katā ‘mahātherena
atk-s0502a:1866_13: ābhataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ abhuñjitvā anutherena ābhataṃ bhuñjissāmā”’ti? “No hetaṃ, āvuso”ti.
atk-s0502a:1866_14: “Evaṃ sante tumhe viya mayampi visesaṃ nibbattetvā attano purisakārena bhuñjituṃ
atk-s0502a:1866_15: sakkontā bhuñjissāmā”ti na icchiṃsu. Tesu arahattaṃ patto bhikkhu parinibbāyi, anāgāmī
atk-s0502a:1866_16: brahmaloke nibbatti. Itare pañca therā visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ asakkontā sussitvā sattame
atk-s0502a:1866_17: divase kālaṃ katvā devaloke nibbattitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde tato cavitvā tattha tattha
atk-s0502a:1866_18: kulagharesu nibbattiṃsu. Tesu eko pukkusāti rājā ahosi, eko kumārakassapo, eko dārucīriyo,
atk-s0502a:1866_19: eko dabbo mallaputto eko sabhiyo paribbājakoti. Tattha yo brahmaloke nibbatto bhikkhu
atk-s0502a:1867_0: Tassa hi brahmuno etadahosi – “ayaṃ mayā saddhiṃ nisseṇiṃ bandhitvā pabbataṃ abhiruhitvā
atk-s0502a:1867_1: samaṇadhammaṃ akāsi, idāni imaṃ laddhiṃ gahetvā vicaranto vinasseyya, saṃvejessāmi
atk-s0502a:1867_2: na”nti. Atha naṃ upasaṅkamitvā evamāha – “neva kho tvaṃ, bāhiya, arahā, napi arahattamaggaṃ
atk-s0502a:1867_3: vā samāpanno, sāpi te paṭipadā natthi, yāya tvaṃ arahā vā assa arahattamaggaṃ vā
atk-s0502a:1867_4: samāpanno”ti. Bāhiyo ākāse ṭhatvā kathentaṃ mahābrahmānaṃ oloketvā cintesi – “aho
atk-s0502a:1867_5: bhāriyaṃ kammaṃ kataṃ, ahaṃ ‘arahantomhī’ti cintesiṃ, ayañca maṃ ‘na tvaṃ arahā,
atk-s0502a:1867_6: napi arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpannosī’ti vadati, atthi nu kho loke añño arahā”ti. Atha
atk-s0502a:1867_7: naṃ pucchi – “atthi nu kho etarahi devate loke arahā vā arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpanno”ti.
atk-s0502a:1867_8: Athassa devatā ācikkhi – “atthi, bāhiya, uttaresu janapadesu sāvatthi nāma nagaraṃ,
atk-s0502a:1867_9: tattha so bhagavā etarahi viharati arahaṃ sammāsambuddho. So hi, bāhiya, bhagavā
atk-s0502a:1867_10: arahā ceva arahattatthāya ca dhammaṃ desetī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1868_0: Bāhiyo rattibhāge devatāya kathaṃ sutvā saṃviggamānaso taṃ khaṇaṃyeva suppārakā nikkhamitvā
atk-s0502a:1868_1: ekarattivāsena sāvatthiṃ agamāsi, sabbaṃ vīsayojanasatikaṃ maggaṃ ekarattivāseneva
atk-s0502a:1868_2: agamāsi. Gacchanto ca pana devatānubhāvena gato. “Buddhānubhāvenā”tipi vadantiyeva.
atk-s0502a:1868_3: Tasmiṃ pana khaṇe satthā sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho hoti. So bhuttapātarāse kāyaālasiyavimocanatthaṃ
atk-s0502a:1868_4: abbhokāse caṅkamante sambahule bhikkhū “kahaṃ etarahi satthā”ti pucchi. Bhikkhū “bhagavā
atk-s0502a:1868_5: sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho”ti vatvā taṃ pucchiṃsu – “tvaṃ pana kuto āgatosī”ti? “Suppārakā
atk-s0502a:1868_7: nisīda, tava pāde dhovitvā telena makkhetvā thokaṃ vissamāhi, āgatakāle satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:1868_8: dakkhissasī”ti. “Ahaṃ, bhante, satthu vā attano vā jīvitantarāyaṃ na jānāmi, ekarattenevamhi
atk-s0502a:1868_9: katthaci aṭṭhatvā anisīditvā vīsayojanasatikaṃ maggaṃ āgato, satthāraṃ passitvāva
atk-s0502a:1868_10: vissamissāmī”ti. So evaṃ vatvā taramānarūpo sāvatthiṃ pavisitvā bhagavantaṃ anopamāya
atk-s0502a:1868_11: buddhasiriyā piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā “cirassaṃ vata me gotamo sammāsambuddho diṭṭho”ti
atk-s0502a:1868_12: diṭṭhaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya onatasarīro gantvā antaravīthiyameva pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā
atk-s0502a:1868_13: gopphakesu daḷhaṃ gahetvā evamāha – “desetu me, bhante, bhagavā dhammaṃ, desetu sugato
atk-s0502a:1868_14: dhammaṃ, yaṃ mamassa dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā”ti. Atha naṃ satthā “akālo kho tāva,
atk-s0502a:1869_0: Taṃ sutvā bāhiyo, bhante, saṃsāre saṃsarantena kabaḷīkārāhāro na aladdhapubbo, tumhākaṃ
atk-s0502a:1869_1: vā mayhaṃ vā jīvitantarāyaṃ na jānāmi, desetu me dhammanti. Satthā dutiyampi paṭikkhipiyeva.
atk-s0502a:1869_2: Evaṃ kirassa ahosi – “imassa maṃ diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya sakalasarīraṃ pītiyā nirantaraṃ
atk-s0502a:1869_3: ajjhotthaṭaṃ hoti, balavapītivego dhammaṃ sutvāpi na sakkhissati paṭivijjhituṃ, majjhattupekkhāya
atk-s0502a:1869_4: tāva tiṭṭhatu, ekaratteneva vīsayojanasatikaṃ maggaṃ āgatattā darathopissa balavā,
atk-s0502a:1869_5: sopi tāva paṭippassambhatū”ti. Tasmā dvikkhattuṃ paṭikkhipitvā tatiyaṃ yācito antaravīthiyaṃ
atk-s0502a:1869_6: ṭhitova “tasmātiha te, bāhiya, evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ ‘diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ bhavissatī”’tiādinā
atk-s0502a:1869_7: nayena dhammaṃ desesi. So satthu dhammaṃ suṇantoyeva sabbāsave khepetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi
atk-s0502a:1869_8: arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tāvadeva ca pana bhagavantaṃ pabbajjaṃ yāci, “paripuṇṇaṃ te pattacīvara”nti
atk-s0502a:1869_9: puṭṭho “na paripuṇṇa”nti āha. Atha naṃ satthā “tena hi pattacīvaraṃ pariyesāhī”ti vatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:1870_0: “So kira vīsati vassasahassāni samaṇadhammaṃ karonto ‘bhikkhunā nāma attanā paccaye
atk-s0502a:1870_1: labhitvā aññaṃ anoloketvā sayameva paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī’ti ekabhikkhussāpi pattena
atk-s0502a:1870_2: vā cīvarena vā saṅgahaṃ na akāsi, tenassa iddhimayapattacīvaraṃ na upajjissatī”ti
atk-s0502a:1870_3: ñatvā ehibhikkhubhāvena pabbajjaṃ na adāsi. Tampi pattacīvaraṃ pariyesamānameva ekā
atk-s0502a:1870_4: yakkhinī dhenurūpena āgantvā uramhi paharitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpesi. Satthā piṇḍāya
atk-s0502a:1870_5: caritvā katabhattakicco sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ nikkhanto bāhiyassa sarīraṃ
atk-s0502a:1870_6: saṅkāraṭṭhāne patitaṃ disvā bhikkhū āṇāpesi, “bhikkhave, ekasmiṃ gehadvāre ṭhatvā
atk-s0502a:1870_7: mañcakaṃ āharāpetvā imaṃ sarīraṃ nagarato nīharitvā jhāpetvā thūpaṃ karothā”ti. Bhikkhū
atk-s0502a:1870_8: tathā kariṃsu, katvā ca pana vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā attanā katakiccaṃ
atk-s0502a:1870_9: ārocetvā tassa abhisamparāyaṃ pucchiṃsu. Atha nesaṃ bhagavā tassa parinibbutabhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:1870_10: ācikkhitvā “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ khippābhiññānaṃ yadidaṃ
atk-s0502a:1870_11: bāhiyo dārucīriyo”ti etadagge ṭhapesi. Atha naṃ bhikkhū pucchiṃsu – “bhante, tumhe
atk-s0502a:1870_12: ‘bāhiyo arahattaṃ patto’ti vadetha, kadā so arahattaṃ patto”ti? “Mama dhammaṃ sutakāle,
atk-s0502a:1870_13: bhikkhave”ti. “Kadā panassa, bhante, tumhehi dhammo kathito”ti? “Piṇḍāya carantena
atk-s0502a:1870_14: antaravīthiyaṃ ṭhatvā”ti. “Appamattako hi, bhante, tumhehi antaravīthiyaṃ ṭhatvā
atk-s0502a:1870_15: kathitadhammo kathaṃ so tāvattakena visesaṃ nibbattesī”ti, atha ne satthā “kiṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a:1870_16: mama dhammaṃ ‘appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā’ti mā pamāṇaṃ gaṇhatha. Anekānipi hi gāthāsahassāni
atk-s0502a:1870_17: anatthanissitāni na seyyo, atthanissitaṃ pana ekampi gāthāpadaṃ seyyo”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ
atk-s0502a:1873: Ekaṃ gāthāpadaṃ seyyo, yaṃ sutvā upasammatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1874: Tattha ekaṃ gāthāpadaṃ seyyoti “appamādo amatapadaṃ…pe… yathā mayā”ti evarūpā ekā gāthāpi seyyoti attho. Sesaṃ purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0502a:1878: Yo ca gāthāsataṃ bhāseti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kuṇḍalakesiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1879_0: Rājagahe kira ekā seṭṭhidhītā soḷasavassuddesikā abhirūpā ahosi dassanīyā pāsādikā.
atk-s0502a:1879_1: Tasmiñca vaye ṭhitā nāriyo purisajjhāsayā honti purisalolā. Atha naṃ mātāpitaro sattabhūmikassa
atk-s0502a:1879_2: pāsādassa uparimatale sirigabbhe nivāsāpesuṃ. Ekamevassā dāsiṃ paricārikaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1879_3: Athekaṃ kulaputtaṃ corakammaṃ karontaṃ gahetvā pacchābāhaṃ bandhitvā catukke catukke
atk-s0502a:1879_4: kasāhi paharitvā āghātanaṃ nayiṃsu. Seṭṭhidhītā mahājanassa saddaṃ sutvā “kiṃ nu
atk-s0502a:1879_5: kho eta”nti pāsādatale ṭhatvā olokentī taṃ disvā paṭibaddhacittā hutvā taṃ patthayamānā
atk-s0502a:1879_6: āhāraṃ paṭikkhipitvā mañcake nipajji. Atha naṃ mātā pucchi – “kiṃ idaṃ, ammā”ti?
atk-s0502a:1879_7: “Sace etaṃ ‘coro’ti gahetvā niyyamānaṃ purisaṃ labhissāmi, jīvissāmi. No ce labhissāmi,
atk-s0502a:1879_8: jīvitaṃ me natthi, idheva marissāmī”ti. “Amma, mā evaṃ kari, amhākaṃ jātiyā ca gottena
atk-s0502a:1879_9: ca bhogena ca sadisaṃ aññaṃ sāmikaṃ labhissasī”ti. “Mayhaṃ aññena kiccaṃ natthi,
atk-s0502a:1879_10: imaṃ alabhamānā marissāmī”ti. Mātā dhītaraṃ saññāpetuṃ asakkontī pituno ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:1879_11: Sopi naṃ saññāpetuṃ asakkonto “kiṃ sakkā kātu”nti cintetvā taṃ coraṃ gahetvā gacchantassa
atk-s0502a:1879_12: rājapurisassa sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ pesesi – “imaṃ gahetvā etaṃ purisaṃ mayhaṃ dehī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1879_13: So “sādhū”ti kahāpaṇe gahetvā taṃ muñcitvā aññaṃ māretvā “mārito, deva, coro”ti rañño
atk-s0502a:1880_0: Sā tato paṭṭhāya “sāmikaṃ ārādhessāmī”ti sabbābharaṇapaṭimaṇḍitā sayameva tassa yāguādīni
atk-s0502a:1880_1: saṃvidahati, coro katipāhaccayena cintesi – “kadā nu kho imaṃ māretvā etissā ābharaṇāni
atk-s0502a:1880_2: gahetvā ekasmiṃ surāgehe vikkiṇitvā khādituṃ labhissāmī”ti? So “attheko upāyo”ti
atk-s0502a:1880_3: cintetvā āhāraṃ paṭikkhipitvā mañcake nipajji, atha naṃ sā upasaṅkamitvā “kiṃ te,
atk-s0502a:1880_4: sāmi, rujjatī”ti pucchi. “Na kiñci me, bhaddeti, kacci pana me mātāpitaro tuyhaṃ
atk-s0502a:1880_5: kuddhā”ti? “Na kujjhanti, bhadde”ti. Atha “kiṃ nāmeta”nti? “Bhadde, ahaṃ taṃ divasaṃ
atk-s0502a:1880_6: bandhitvā niyyamāno corapapāte adhivatthāya devatāya balikammaṃ paṭissuṇitvā jīvitaṃ
atk-s0502a:1880_7: labhiṃ, tvampi mayā tassā eva ānubhāvena laddhā, ‘taṃ me devatāya balikammaṃ ṭhapita’nti
atk-s0502a:1880_8: cintemi, bhadde”ti. “Sāmi, mā cintayi, karissāmi balikammaṃ, vadehi, kenattho”ti?
atk-s0502a:1880_9: “Appodakamadhupāyasena ca lājapañcamakapupphehi cā”ti. “Sādhu, sāmi, ahaṃ paṭiyādessāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:1880_10: sā sabbaṃ balikammaṃ paṭiyādetvā “ehi, sāmi, gacchāmā”ti āha. “Tena hi, bhadde, tava
atk-s0502a:1880_11: ñātake nivattetvā mahagghāni vatthābharaṇāni gahetvā attānaṃ alaṅkarohi, hasantā
atk-s0502a:1880_12: kīḷantā sukhaṃ gamissāmā”ti. Sā tathā akāsi.
atk-s0502a:1881_0: Atha naṃ so pabbatapādaṃ gatakāle āha – “bhadde, ito paraṃ ubhova janā gamissāma,
atk-s0502a:1881_1: sesajanaṃ yānakena saddhiṃ nivattāpetvā balikammabhājanaṃ sayaṃ ukkhipitvā gaṇhāhī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1881_2: Sā tathā akāsi. Coro taṃ gahetvā corapapātapabbataṃ abhiruhi. Tassa hi ekena passena
atk-s0502a:1881_3: manussā abhiruhanti, ekaṃ passaṃ chinnapapātaṃ. Pabbatamatthake ṭhitā tena passena
atk-s0502a:1881_4: core pātenti. Te khaṇḍākhaṇḍaṃ hutvā bhūmiyaṃ patanti. Tasmā “corapapāto”ti vuccati.
atk-s0502a:1881_5: Sā tassa pabbatassa matthake ṭhatvā “balikammaṃ te, sāmi, karohī”ti āha. So tuṇhī
atk-s0502a:1881_6: ahosi. Puna tāya “kasmā, sāmi, tuṇhībhūtosī”ti vutte taṃ āha – “na mayhaṃ balikammenattho,
atk-s0502a:1881_7: vañcetvā pana taṃ ādāya āgatomhī”ti. “Kiṃ kāraṇā, sāmī”ti? “Taṃ māretvā tava ābharaṇāni
atk-s0502a:1881_8: gahetvā palāyanatthāyā”ti. Sā maraṇabhayatajjitā āha – “sāmi, ahañca ābharaṇāni ca
atk-s0502a:1881_9: tava santakāneva, kasmā evaṃ vadesī”ti? So, “mā evaṃ karohī”ti, punappunaṃ yāciyamānopi
atk-s0502a:1881_10: “māremi evā”ti āha. “Evaṃ sante kiṃ te mama maraṇena? Imāni ābharaṇāni gahetvā mayhaṃ
atk-s0502a:1881_11: jīvitaṃ dehi, ito paṭṭhāya maṃ ‘matā’ti dhārehi, dāsī vā te hutvā kammaṃ karissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:1883: Sabbaṃ harassu bhaddante, maṃ ca dāsīti sāvayā”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:1884: Taṃ sutvā coro “evaṃ kate tvaṃ gantvā mātāpitūnaṃ ācikkhissasi, māressāmiyeva, mā tvaṃ bāḷhaṃ paridevasī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1886: Na tuyhaṃ jīvitaṃ atthi, sabbaṃ gaṇhāmi bhaṇḍaka”nti. –
atk-s0502a:1887_0: Sā cintesi – “aho idaṃ kammaṃ bhāriyaṃ. Paññā nāma na pacitvā khādanatthāya katā,
atk-s0502a:1887_1: atha kho vicāraṇatthāya katā, jānissāmissa kattabba”nti, atha naṃ āha – “sāmi, yadā
atk-s0502a:1887_2: tvaṃ ‘coro’ti gahetvā nīyasi, tadāhaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ ācikkhiṃ, te sahassaṃ vissajjetvā
atk-s0502a:1887_3: taṃ āharāpetvā gehe kariṃsu. Tato paṭṭhāya ahaṃ tuyhaṃ upakārikā, ajja me sudiṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0502a:1887_4: katvā attānaṃ vandituṃ dehī”ti. So “sādhu, bhadde, sudiṭṭhaṃ katvā vandāhī”ti vatvā
atk-s0502a:1887_5: pabbatante aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ sā tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā catūsu ṭhānesu vanditvā,
atk-s0502a:1887_6: “sāmi, idaṃ te pacchimadassanaṃ, idāni tuyhaṃ vā mama dassanaṃ, mayhaṃ vā tava dassanaṃ
atk-s0502a:1887_7: natthī”ti purato ca pacchato ca āliṅgitvā pamattaṃ hutvā pabbatante ṭhitaṃ piṭṭhipasse
atk-s0502a:1887_8: ṭhatvā ekena hatthena khandhe gahetvā ekena piṭṭhikacchāya gahetvā pabbatapapāte
atk-s0502a:1887_9: khipi. So pabbatakucchiyaṃ paṭihato khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ hutvā bhūmiyaṃ pati. Corapapātamatthake
atk-s0502a:1887_10: adhivatthā devatā tesaṃ dvinnampi kiriyaṃ disvā tassā itthiyā sādhukāraṃ datvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1888: “Na hi sabbesu ṭhānesu, puriso hoti paṇḍito;
atk-s0502a:1889: Itthīpi paṇḍitā hoti, tattha tattha vicakkhaṇā”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:1890_0: Sāpi coraṃ papāte khipitvā cintesi – “sacāhaṃ gehaṃ gamissāmi, ‘sāmiko te kuhi’nti
atk-s0502a:1890_1: pucchissanti, sacāhaṃ evaṃ puṭṭhā ‘mārito me’ti vakkhāmi, ‘dubbinīte sahassaṃ datvā
atk-s0502a:1890_2: taṃ āharāpetvā idāni naṃ māresī’ti maṃ mukhasattīhi vijjhissanti, ‘ābharaṇatthāya
atk-s0502a:1890_3: so maṃ māretukāmo ahosī’ti vuttepi na saddahissanti, alaṃ me gehenā”ti tatthevābharaṇāni
atk-s0502a:1890_4: chaḍḍetvā araññaṃ pavisitvā anupubbena vicarantī ekaṃ paribbājakānaṃ assamaṃ patvā
atk-s0502a:1890_5: vanditvā “mayhaṃ, bhante, tumhākaṃ santike pabbajjaṃ dethā”ti āha. Atha naṃ pabbājesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:1890_6: Sā pabbajitvāva pucchi – “bhante, tumhākaṃ pabbajjāya kiṃ uttama”nti? “Bhadde, dasasu
atk-s0502a:1890_7: vā kasiṇesu parikammaṃ katvā jhānaṃ nibbattetabbaṃ, vādasahassaṃ vā uggaṇhitabbaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1890_8: ayaṃ amhākaṃ pabbajjāya uttamattho”ti. “Jhānaṃ tāva nibbattetuṃ ahaṃ na sakkhissāmi,
atk-s0502a:1890_9: vādasahassaṃ pana uggaṇhissāmi, ayyā”ti. Atha naṃ te vādasahassaṃ uggaṇhāpetvā “uggahitaṃ
atk-s0502a:1890_10: te sippaṃ, idāni tvaṃ jambudīpatale vicaritvā attanā saddhiṃ pañhaṃ kathetuṃ samatthaṃ
atk-s0502a:1890_11: olokehī”ti tassa hatthe jambusākhaṃ datvā uyyojesuṃ – “gaccha, bhadde, sace koci
atk-s0502a:1890_12: gihibhūto tayā saddhiṃ pañhaṃ kathetuṃ sakkoti, tasseva pādaparicārikā bhavāhi, sace
atk-s0502a:1891_0: Sā nāmena jambuparibbājikā nāma hutvā tato nikkhamitvā diṭṭhe diṭṭhe pañhaṃ pucchantī
atk-s0502a:1891_1: vicarati. Tāya saddhiṃ kathetuṃ samattho nāma nāhosi. “Ito jambuparibbājikā āgacchatī”ti
atk-s0502a:1891_2: sutvāva manussā palāyanti. Sā gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā bhikkhāya pavisantī gāmadvāre vālukarāsiṃ
atk-s0502a:1891_3: katvā tattha jambusākhaṃ ṭhapetvā “mayā saddhiṃ kathetuṃ samattho jambusākhaṃ maddatū”ti
atk-s0502a:1891_4: vatvā gāmaṃ pāvisi. Taṃ ṭhānaṃ upasaṅkamituṃ samattho nāma nāhosi. Sāpi milātāya
atk-s0502a:1891_5: jambusākhāya aññaṃ jambusākhaṃ gaṇhāti, iminā nīhārena vicarantī sāvatthiṃ patvā
atk-s0502a:1891_6: gāmadvāre vālukarāsiṃ katvā jambusākhaṃ ṭhapetvā vuttanayeneva vatvā bhikkhāya pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:1891_7: Sambahulā gāmadārakā jambusākhaṃ parivāretvā aṭṭhaṃsu. Tadā sāriputtatthero piṇḍāya
atk-s0502a:1891_8: caritvā katabhattakicco nagarā nikkhanto te dārake jambusākhaṃ parivāretvā ṭhite
atk-s0502a:1891_9: disvā “kiṃ ida”nti pucchi. Dārakā therassa taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhiṃsu. “Tena hi dārakā
atk-s0502a:1891_10: imaṃ sākhaṃ maddathā”ti. “Bhāyāma, bhante”ti. “Ahaṃ pañhaṃ kathessāmi, maddatha tumhe”ti.
atk-s0502a:1891_11: Te therassa vacanena sañjātussāhā tathā katvā maddantā jambusākhaṃ ukkhipiṃsu. Paribbājikā
atk-s0502a:1891_12: āgantvā te paribhāsitvā “tumhehi saddhiṃ mama pañhena kiccaṃ natthi, kasmā me sākhaṃ
atk-s0502a:1891_13: maddathā”ti āha. “Ayyenamhā maddāpitā”ti āhaṃsu. “Bhante, tumhehi me sākhā maddāpitā”ti?
atk-s0502a:1891_14: “Āma, bhaginī”ti. “Tena hi mayā saddhiṃ pañhaṃ kathethā”ti. “Sādhu kathessāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1892_0: Sā vaḍḍhamānakacchāyāya pañhaṃ pucchituṃ therassa santikaṃ agamāsi, sakalanagaraṃ
atk-s0502a:1892_1: saṅkhubhi. “Dvinnaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ kathaṃ suṇissāmā”ti nāgarā tāya saddhiṃyeva gantvā
atk-s0502a:1892_2: theraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu. Paribbājikā theraṃ āha – “bhante, pucchāmi te
atk-s0502a:1892_3: pañha”nti. “Puccha, bhaginī”ti. Sā vādasahassaṃ pucchi, pucchitaṃ pucchitaṃ thero
atk-s0502a:1892_4: vissajjesi. Atha naṃ thero āha – “ettakā eva te pañhā, aññepi atthī”ti? “Ettakā eva,
atk-s0502a:1892_5: bhante”ti. “Tayā bahū pañhā puṭṭhā, mayampi ekaṃ pucchāma, vissajjissasi no”ti? “Jānamānā
atk-s0502a:1892_6: vissajjissāmi pucchatha, bhante”ti. Thero “ekaṃ nāma ki”nti pañhaṃ pucchi. Sā “evaṃ
atk-s0502a:1892_7: nāmesa vissajjetabbo”ti ajānantī “kiṃ nāmetaṃ, bhante”ti pucchi. “Buddhapañho nāma,
atk-s0502a:1892_8: bhaginī”ti. “Mayhampi taṃ detha, bhante”ti. “Sace mādisā bhavissasi, dassāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1892_9: “Tena hi maṃ pabbājethā”ti. Thero bhikkhunīnaṃ ācikkhitvā pabbājesi. Sā pabbajitvā
atk-s0502a:1892_10: laddhūpasampadā kuṇḍalakesittherī nāma hutvā katipāhaccayeneva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:1893_1: bahuṃ natthi, pabbajitakiccañcassā matthakaṃ pattaṃ, ekena kira corena saddhiṃ mahāsaṅgāmaṃ
atk-s0502a:1893_2: katvā jinitvā āgatā”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti
atk-s0502a:1893_3: pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte, “bhikkhave, mayā desitadhammaṃ ‘appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā’ti
atk-s0502a:1893_4: pamāṇaṃ mā gaṇhatha, anatthakaṃ padasatampi seyyo na hoti, dhammapadaṃ pana ekampi
atk-s0502a:1893_5: seyyova. Avasesacore jinantassa ca jayo nāma na hoti, ajjhattikakilesacore jinantasseva
atk-s0502a:1893_6: pana jayo nāma hotī”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:1896: Ekaṃ dhammapadaṃ seyyo, yaṃ sutvā upasammati.
atk-s0502a:1900_0: Tattha gāthāsatanti yo ca puggalo sataparicchedā bahūpi gāthā bhāseyyāti attho. Anatthapadasaṃhitāti
atk-s0502a:1900_1: ākāsavaṇṇanādivasena anatthakehi padehi saṃhitā. Dhammapadanti atthasādhakaṃ khandhādipaṭisaṃyuttaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1900_2: “cattārimāni paribbājakā dhammapadāni. Katamāni cattāri? Anabhijjhā paribbājakā dhammapadaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1900_3: abyāpādo paribbājakā dhammapadaṃ, sammāsati paribbājakā dhammapadaṃ, sammāsamādhi
atk-s0502a:1900_4: paribbājakā dhammapada”nti evaṃ vuttesu catūsu dhammapadesu ekampi dhammapadaṃ seyyo.
atk-s0502a:1900_5: Yo sahassaṃ sahassenāti yo eko saṅgāmayodho sahassena guṇitaṃ sahassaṃ mānuse ekasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:1900_6: saṅgāme jineyya, dasamanussasatasahassaṃ jinitvā jayaṃ āhareyya, ayampi saṅgāmajinataṃ
atk-s0502a:1900_7: uttamo pavaro nāma na hoti. Ekañca jeyyamattānanti yo rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānesu ajjhattikakammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1900_8: sammasanto attano lobhādikilesajayena attānaṃ jineyya. Sa ve saṅgāmajuttamoti so
atk-s0502a:1904: Attā haveti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto anatthapucchakaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1905_0: So kira brāhmaṇo “kiṃ nu kho sammāsambuddho atthameva jānāti, udāhu anatthampi, pucchissāmi
atk-s0502a:1905_1: na”nti satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchi – “bhante, tumhe atthameva jānātha maññe, no
atk-s0502a:1905_2: anattha”nti? “Atthañcāhaṃ, brāhmaṇa, jānāmi anatthañcā”ti. “Tena hi me anatthaṃ kathethā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1908: Etaṃ brāhmaṇa sevassu, anatthaṃ te bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1909_0: Taṃ sutvā brāhmaṇo sādhukāramadāsi “sādhu sādhu, gaṇācariya, gaṇajeṭṭhaka, tumhe
atk-s0502a:1909_1: atthañca jānātha anatthañcā”ti. “Evaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, atthānatthajānanako nāma mayā
atk-s0502a:1909_2: sadiso natthī”ti. Athassa satthā ajjhāsayaṃ upadhāretvā, “brāhmaṇa, kena kammena
atk-s0502a:1909_3: jīvasī”ti pucchi. “Jūtakammena, bho gotamā”ti. “Kiṃ pana te jayo hoti parājayo”ti.
atk-s0502a:1909_4: “Jayopi hoti parājayopī”ti vutte, “brāhmaṇa, appamattako esa, paraṃ jinantassa jayo
atk-s0502a:1909_5: nāma na seyyo. Yo pana kilesajayena attānaṃ jināti, tassa jayo seyyo. Na hi taṃ jayaṃ
atk-s0502a:1909_6: koci apajayaṃ kātuṃ sakkotī”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:1911: “Attā have jitaṃ seyyo, yā cāyaṃ itarā pajā;
atk-s0502a:1914: “Neva devo na gandhabbo, na māro saha brahmunā;
atk-s0502a:1916_0: Tattha haveti nipāto. Jitanti liṅgavipallāso, attano kilesajayena attā jito seyyoti
atk-s0502a:1916_1: attho. Yā cāyaṃ itarā pajāti yā panāyaṃ avasesā pajā jūtena vā dhanaharaṇena vā saṅgāmena
atk-s0502a:1916_2: vā balābhibhavena vā jitā bhaveyya, taṃ jinantena yaṃ jitaṃ, na taṃ seyyoti attho.
atk-s0502a:1916_3: Kasmā pana tadeva jitaṃ seyyo, idaṃ na seyyoti? Yasmā attadantassa…pe… tathārūpassa
atk-s0502a:1916_4: jantunoti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yasmā hi yvāyaṃ nikkilesatāya attadanto poso, tassa
atk-s0502a:1916_5: attadantassa kāyādīhi niccaṃ saññatacārino evarūpassa imehi kāyasaññamādīhi saññatassa
atk-s0502a:1916_6: jantuno devo vā gandhabbo vā māro vā brahmunā saha uṭṭhahitvā “ahamassa jitaṃ apajitaṃ
atk-s0502a:1916_7: karissāmi, maggabhāvanāya pahīne kilese puna uppādessāmī”ti ghaṭentopi vāyamantopi
atk-s0502a:1916_8: yathā dhanādīhi parājito pakkhantaro hutvā itarena jitaṃ puna jinanto apajitaṃ kareyya,
atk-s0502a:1920: Māse māseti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto sāriputtattherassa mātulabrāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1921_0: Thero kira tassa santikaṃ gantvā āha – “kiṃ nu kho, brāhmaṇa, kiñcideva kusalaṃ karosī”ti?
atk-s0502a:1921_1: “Karomi, bhante”ti. “Kiṃ karosī”ti? “Māse māse sahassapariccāgena dānaṃ dammī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1921_3: “Kiṃ pana brahmalokassa ayaṃ maggo”ti? “Āma, bhante”ti. “Ko evamāhā”ti? “Ācariyehi
atk-s0502a:1921_4: me kathitaṃ, bhante”ti. “No tvaṃ brahmalokassa maggaṃ jānāsi, nāpi te ācariyā, satthāva
atk-s0502a:1921_5: eko jānāti, ehi, brāhmaṇa, brahmalokassa te maggaṃ kathāpessāmī”ti taṃ ādāya satthu
atk-s0502a:1921_6: santikaṃ netvā, “bhante, ayaṃ brāhmaṇo evamāhā”ti, “taṃ pavattiṃ ārocetvā sādhu vatassa
atk-s0502a:1921_7: brahmalokassa maggaṃ kathethā”ti. Satthā “evaṃ kira, brāhmaṇā”ti pucchitvā “āma,
atk-s0502a:1921_8: bho gotamā”ti vutte, “brāhmaṇa, tayā evaṃ dadamānena vassasataṃ dinnadānatopi muhuttamattaṃ
atk-s0502a:1921_9: pasannacittena mama sāvakassa olokanaṃ vā kaṭacchubhikkhāmattadānaṃ vā mahapphalatara”nti
atk-s0502a:1921_10: vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1923: “Māse māse sahassena, yo yajetha sataṃ samaṃ;
atk-s0502a:1925: Sāyeva pūjanā seyyo, yañce vassasataṃ huta”nti.
atk-s0502a:1926_0: Tattha sahassenāhi sahassapariccāgena. Yo yajetha sataṃ samanti yo vassasataṃ māse
atk-s0502a:1926_1: māse sahassaṃ pariccajanto lokiyamahājanassa dānaṃ dadeyya, ekañca bhāvitattānanti
atk-s0502a:1926_2: yo pana ekaṃ sīlādiguṇavisesena vaḍḍhitaattānaṃ heṭṭhimakoṭiyā sotāpannaṃ, uparimakoṭiyā
atk-s0502a:1926_3: khīṇāsavaṃ gharadvāraṃ sampattaṃ kaṭacchubhikkhādānavasena vā yāpanamattaāhāradānavasena
atk-s0502a:1926_4: vā thūlasāṭakadānamattena vā pūjeyya. Yaṃ itarena vassasataṃ hutaṃ. Tato sāyeva pūjanā
atk-s0502a:1927: Desanāvasāne so brāhmaṇo sotāpattiphalaṃ patto, aññepi bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pāpuṇiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a:1930: Yo ca vassasataṃ jantūti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto sāriputtattherassa bhāgineyyaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1931_0: Tampi hi thero upasaṅkamitvā āha – “kiṃ, brāhmaṇa, kusalaṃ karosī”ti? “Āma, bhante”ti.
atk-s0502a:1931_1: “Kiṃ karosī”ti? “Māse māse ekaṃ ekaṃ pasuṃ ghātetvā aggiṃ paricarāmī”ti. “Kimatthaṃ
atk-s0502a:1931_3: bhante”ti. “Neva tvaṃ brahmalokassa maggaṃ jānāsi, nāpi te ācariyā, ehi, satthu santikaṃ
atk-s0502a:1931_4: gamissāmā”ti taṃ satthu santikaṃ netvā taṃ pavattiṃ ārocetvā “imassa, bhante, brahmalokassa
atk-s0502a:1931_5: maggaṃ kathethā”ti āha. Satthā “evaṃ kirā”ti pucchitvā “evaṃ, bho gotamā”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a:1931_6: “brāhmaṇa, vassasatampi evaṃ aggiṃ paricarantassa tava aggipāricariyā mama sāvakassa
atk-s0502a:1931_7: taṅkhaṇamattaṃ pūjampi na pāpuṇātī”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1933: “Yo ca vassasataṃ jantu, aggiṃ paricare vane;
atk-s0502a:1935: Sāyeva pūjanā seyyo, yañce vassasataṃ huta”nti.
atk-s0502a:1936: Tattha jantūti sattādhivacanametaṃ. Aggiṃ paricare vaneti nippapañcabhāvapatthanāya vanaṃ pavisitvāpi tattha aggiṃ paricareyya. Sesaṃ purimasadisamevāti.
atk-s0502a:1937: Desanāvasāne so brāhmaṇo sotāpattiphalaṃ pāpuṇi, aññepi bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pāpuṇiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a:1940: Yaṃ kiñci yiṭṭhaṃ vāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto sāriputtattherassa sahāyakabrāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1941_0: Tampi hi thero upasaṅkamitvā “kiṃ, brāhmaṇa, kiñci kusalaṃ karosī”ti pucchi. “Āma,
atk-s0502a:1941_1: bhante”ti. “Kiṃ karosī”ti? “Yiṭṭhayāgaṃ yajāmī”ti. “Tadā kira taṃ yāgaṃ mahāpariccāgena
atk-s0502a:1941_2: yaja”nti. Ito paraṃ thero purimanayeneva pucchitvā taṃ satthu santikaṃ netvā taṃ
atk-s0502a:1941_3: pavattiṃ ārocetvā “imassa, bhante, brahmalokassa maggaṃ kathethā”ti āha. Satthā,
atk-s0502a:1941_4: “brāhmaṇa, evaṃ kirā”ti pucchitvā “evaṃ, bho gotamā”ti vutte, “brāhmaṇa, tayā saṃvaccharaṃ
atk-s0502a:1941_5: yiṭṭhayāgaṃ yajantena lokiyamahājanassa dinnadānaṃ pasannacittena mama sāvakānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1941_6: vandantānaṃ uppannakusalacetanāya catubhāgamattampi na agghatī”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ
atk-s0502a:1943: “Yaṃ kiñci yiṭṭhaṃ va hutaṃ va loke,
atk-s0502a:1947_0: Tattha yaṃ kiñcīti anavasesapariyādānavacanametaṃ. Yiṭṭhanti yebhuyyena maṅgalakiriyādivasesu
atk-s0502a:1947_1: dinnadānaṃ. Hutanti abhisaṅkharitvā kataṃ pāhunadānañceva, kammañca phalañca saddahitvā
atk-s0502a:1947_2: katadānañca. Saṃvaccharaṃ yajethāti ekasaṃvaccharaṃ nirantarameva vuttappakāraṃ dānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1947_3: sakalacakkavāḷepi lokiyamahājanassa dadeyya. Puññapekkhoti puññaṃ icchanto. Ujjugatesūti
atk-s0502a:1947_4: heṭṭhimakoṭiyā sotāpannesu uparimakoṭiyā khīṇāsavesu. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – “evarūpesu
atk-s0502a:1947_5: pasannacittena sarīraṃ onamitvā vandantassa kusalacetanāya yaṃ phalaṃ, tato catubhāgampi
atk-s0502a:1947_6: sabbaṃ taṃ dānaṃ na agghati, tasmā ujugatesu abhivādanameva seyyo”ti.
atk-s0502a:1948: Desanāvasāne so brāhmaṇo sotāpattiphalaṃ patto, aññepi bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pāpuṇiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a:1951: Abhivādanasīlissāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā dīghalaṅghikaṃ nissāya araññakuṭiyaṃ viharanto dīghāyukumāraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1952_0: Dīghalaṅghikanagaravāsino kira dve brāhmaṇā bāhirakapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā aṭṭhacattālīsa
atk-s0502a:1952_1: vassāni tapacaraṇaṃ kariṃsu. Tesu eko “paveṇi me nassissati, vibbhamissāmī”ti cintetvā
atk-s0502a:1952_2: attanā kataṃ tapaṃ paresaṃ vikkiṇitvā gosatena ceva kahāpaṇasatena ca saddhiṃ bhariyaṃ
atk-s0502a:1952_3: labhitvā kuṭumbaṃ saṇṭhapesi. Athassa bhariyā puttaṃ vijāyi. Itaro panassa sahāyako
atk-s0502a:1952_4: pavāsaṃ gantvā punadeva taṃ nagaraṃ paccāgami. So tassa āgatabhāvaṃ sutvā puttadāraṃ
atk-s0502a:1952_5: ādāya sahāyakassa dassanatthāya agamāsi. Gantvā puttaṃ mātu hatthe datvā sayaṃ tāva
atk-s0502a:1952_6: vandi, mātāpi puttaṃ pitu hatthe datvā vandi. So “dīghāyukā hothā”ti āha, putte pana
atk-s0502a:1952_7: vandāpite tuṇhī ahosi. Atha naṃ “kasmā, bhante, amhehi vandite ‘dīghāyukā hothā’ti
atk-s0502a:1952_8: vatvā imassa vandanakāle kiñci na vadethā”ti āha. “Imasseko antarāyo atthi, brāhmaṇā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1952_10: bhante”ti? “Nāhaṃ paṭibāhanakāraṇaṃ jānāmī”ti. “Ko pana jāneyya, bhante”ti? “Samaṇo
atk-s0502a:1952_11: gotamo jāneyya, tassa santikaṃ gantvā pucchāhī”ti. “Tattha gacchanto tapaparihānito
atk-s0502a:1952_12: bhāyāmī”ti. “Sace te puttasineho atthi, tapaparihāniṃ acintetvā tassa santikaṃ gantvā pucchāhī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1953_0: So satthu santikaṃ gantvā sayaṃ tāva vandi. Satthā “dīghāyuko hohī”ti āha, pajāpatiyā
atk-s0502a:1953_1: vandanakālepi tassā tatheva vatvā puttassa vandāpanakāle tuṇhī ahosi. So purimanayeneva
atk-s0502a:1953_2: satthāraṃ pucchi, satthāpi tatheva byākāsi. So kira brāhmaṇo sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ apaṭivijjhitvāva
atk-s0502a:1953_3: attano mantaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇena saṃsandesi, paṭibāhanūpāyaṃ pana na jānāti. Brāhmaṇo
atk-s0502a:1953_4: satthāraṃ pucchi – “atthi pana, bhante, paṭibāhanūpāyo”ti? “Bhaveyya, brāhmaṇā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1953_5: “Kiṃ bhaveyyā”ti? “Sace tvaṃ attano gehadvāre maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā tassa majjhe pīṭhikaṃ
atk-s0502a:1953_6: kāretvā taṃ parikkhipanto aṭṭha vā soḷasa vā āsanāni paññāpetvā tesu mama sāvake
atk-s0502a:1953_7: nisīdāpetvā sattāhaṃ nirantaraṃ parittaṃ kātuṃ sakkuṇeyyāsi, evamassa antarāyo nasseyyā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1953_8: “Bho gotama, mayā maṇḍapādīni sakkā kātuṃ, tumhākaṃ pana sāvake kathaṃ lacchāmī”ti?
atk-s0502a:1953_9: “Tayā ettake kate ahaṃ mama sāvake pahiṇissāmī”ti. “Sādhu, bho gotamā”ti so attano
atk-s0502a:1953_10: gehadvāre sabbaṃ kiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā satthu santikaṃ agamāsi. Satthā bhikkhū pahiṇi,
atk-s0502a:1953_11: te gantvā tattha nisīdiṃsu, dārakampi pīṭhikāyaṃ nipajjāpesuṃ, bhikkhū sattarattindivaṃ
atk-s0502a:1953_12: nirantaraṃ parittaṃ bhaṇiṃsu, sattame divase sāyaṃ satthā āgacchi. Tasmiṃ āgate sabbacakkavāḷadevatā
atk-s0502a:1953_13: sannipatiṃsu. Eko pana avaruddhako nāma yakkho dvādasa saṃvaccharāni vessavaṇaṃ upaṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0502a:1953_14: tassa santikā varaṃ labhanto “ito sattame divase imaṃ dārakaṃ gaṇheyyāsī”ti labhi.
atk-s0502a:1954_0: Satthari pana tattha gate mahesakkhāsu devatāsu sannipatitāsu appesakkhā devatā osakkitvā
atk-s0502a:1954_1: osakkitvā okāsaṃ alabhamānā dvādasa yojanāni paṭikkamiṃsu. Avaruddhakopi tatheva
atk-s0502a:1954_2: paṭikkami, satthāpi sabbarattiṃ parittamakāsi. Sattāhe vītivatte avaruddhako dārakaṃ
atk-s0502a:1954_3: na labhi. Aṭṭhame pana divase aruṇe uggatamatte dārakaṃ ānetvā satthāraṃ vandāpesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:1954_4: Satthā “dīghāyuko hohī”ti āha. “Kīvaciraṃ pana, bho gotama, dārako ṭhassatī”ti? “Vīsavassasataṃ,
atk-s0502a:1954_5: brāhmaṇā”ti. Athassa “āyuvaḍḍhanakumāro”ti nāmaṃ kariṃsu. So vuddhimanvāya pañcahi
atk-s0502a:1954_6: upāsakasatehi parivuto vicari. Athekadivasaṃ dhammasabhāyaṃ bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ
atk-s0502a:1954_7: “passathāvuso, āyuvaḍḍhanakumārena kira sattame divase maritabbaṃ abhavissa, so idāni
atk-s0502a:1954_8: vīsavassasataṭṭhāyī hutvā pañcahi upāsakasatehi parivuto vicarati, atthi maññe imesaṃ
atk-s0502a:1954_9: sattānaṃ āyuvaḍḍhanakāraṇa”nti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya
atk-s0502a:1954_10: sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte, “bhikkhave, na kevalaṃ āyuvaḍḍhanameva,
atk-s0502a:1954_11: ime pana sattā guṇavante vandantā abhivādentā catūhi kāraṇehi vaḍḍhanti, parissayato
atk-s0502a:1954_12: muccanti, yāvatāyukameva tiṭṭhantī”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1957: Cattāro dhammā vaḍḍhanti, āyu vaṇṇo sukhaṃ bala”nti.
atk-s0502a:1958_0: Tattha abhivādanasīlissāti vandanasīlissa, abhiṇhaṃ vandanakiccapasutassāti attho.
atk-s0502a:1958_1: Vuḍḍhāpacāyinoti gihissa vā tadahupabbajite daharasāmaṇerepi, pabbajitassa vā pana
atk-s0502a:1958_2: pabbajjāya vā upasampadāya vā vuḍḍhatare guṇavuḍḍhe apacāyamānassa, abhivādanena
atk-s0502a:1958_3: vā niccaṃ pūjentassāti attho. Cattāro dhammā vaḍḍhantīti āyumhi vaḍḍhamāne yattakaṃ
atk-s0502a:1958_4: kālaṃ taṃ vaḍḍhati, tattakaṃ itarepi vaḍḍhantiyeva. Yena hi paññāsavassaāyusaṃvattanikaṃ
atk-s0502a:1958_5: kusalaṃ kataṃ, pañcavīsativassakāle cassa jīvitantarāyo uppajjeyya, so abhivādanasīlatāya
atk-s0502a:1958_6: paṭippassambhati, so yāvatāyukameva tiṭṭhati, vaṇṇādayopissa āyunāva saddhiṃ vaḍḍhanti.
atk-s0502a:1958_7: Ito uttaripi eseva nayo. Anantarāyena pavattassāyuno vaḍḍhanaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0502a:1959: Desanāvasāne āyuvaḍḍhanakumāro pañcahi upāsakasatehi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, aññepi bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pāpuṇiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a:1962: Yo ca vassasataṃ jīveti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto saṃkiccasāmaṇeraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1963_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira tiṃsamattā kulaputtā satthu dhammakathaṃ sutvā sāsane uraṃ datvā
atk-s0502a:1963_1: pabbajiṃsu. Te upasampadāya pañcavassā hutvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā ganthadhuraṃ
atk-s0502a:1963_2: vipassanādhuranti dve dhurānīti sutvā “mayaṃ mahallakakāle pabbajitā”ti ganthadhure
atk-s0502a:1963_3: ussāhaṃ akatvā vipassanādhuraṃ pūretukāmā yāva arahattā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā,
atk-s0502a:1963_4: “bhante, ekaṃ araññāyatanaṃ gamissāmā”ti satthāraṃ āpucchiṃsu. Satthā “kataraṃ ṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1963_5: gamissathā”ti pucchitvā “asukaṃ nāmā”ti vutte “tattha tesaṃ ekaṃ vighāsādaṃ nissāya
atk-s0502a:1963_6: bhayaṃ uppajjissati, tañca pana saṃkiccasāmaṇere gate vūpasamissati, atha nesaṃ pabbajitakiccaṃ
atk-s0502a:1964_0: Saṃkiccasāmaṇero nāma sāriputtattherassa sāmaṇero sattavassiko jātiyā. Tassa kira
atk-s0502a:1964_1: mātā sāvatthiyaṃ aḍḍhakulassa dhītā. Sā tasmiṃ kucchigate ekena byādhinā taṅkhaṇaññeva
atk-s0502a:1964_2: kālamakāsi. Tassā jhāpiyamānāya ṭhapetvā gabbhamaṃsaṃ sesaṃ jhāyi. Athassā gabbhamaṃsaṃ
atk-s0502a:1964_3: citakato otāretvā dvīsu tīsu ṭhānesu sūlehi vijjhiṃsu. Sūlakoṭi dārakassa akkhikoṭiṃ
atk-s0502a:1964_4: pahari. Evaṃ gabbhamaṃsaṃ vijjhitvā aṅgārarāsimhi khipitvā aṅgāreheva paṭicchādetvā
atk-s0502a:1964_5: pakkamiṃsu. Gabbhamaṃsaṃ jhāyi, aṅgāramatthake pana suvaṇṇabimbasadiso dārako padumagabbhe
atk-s0502a:1964_6: nipanno viya ahosi. Pacchimabhavikassa sattassa hi sinerunā otthariyamānassapi arahattaṃ
atk-s0502a:1964_7: appatvā jīvitakkhayo nāma natthi. Punadivase “citakaṃ nibbāpessāmā”ti āgatā tathānipannaṃ
atk-s0502a:1964_8: dārakaṃ disvā acchariyabbhutacittajātā “kathañhi nāma ettakesu dārūsu khīyamānesu
atk-s0502a:1964_9: sakalasarīre jhāpiyamāne dārako na jhāyi, kiṃ nu kho bhavissatī”ti dārakaṃ ādāya
atk-s0502a:1964_10: antogāmaṃ gantvā nemittake pucchiṃsu. Nemittakā “sace ayaṃ dārako agāraṃ ajjhāvassissati,
atk-s0502a:1964_11: yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā ñātakā duggatā bhavissanti? Sace pabbajissati, pañcahi
atk-s0502a:1964_12: samaṇasatehi parivuto vicarissatī”ti āhaṃsu. Tassa saṅkunā akkhikoṭiyā bhinnattā
atk-s0502a:1964_13: saṃkiccanti nāmaṃ kariṃsu. So aparena samayena saṃkiccoti paññāyi. Atha naṃ ñātakā
atk-s0502a:1964_14: “hotu, vaḍḍhitakāle amhākaṃ ayyassa sāriputtassa santike pabbājessāmā”ti posiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1964_15: So sattavassikakāle “tava mātukucchiyaṃ vasanakāle mātā te kālamakāsi, tassā sarīre
atk-s0502a:1964_16: jhāpiyamānepi tvaṃ na jhāyī”ti kumārakānaṃ kathaṃ sutvā “ahaṃ kira evarūpā bhayā
atk-s0502a:1964_17: mutto, kiṃ me gharāvāsena, pabbajissāmī”ti ñātakānaṃ ārocesi. Te “sādhu, tātā”ti
atk-s0502a:1964_18: sāriputtattherassa santikaṃ netvā, “bhante, imaṃ pabbājethā”ti adaṃsu. Thero tacapañcakakammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1964_19: datvā pabbājesi. So khuraggeyeva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Ayaṃ saṃkiccasāmaṇero nāma.
atk-s0502a:1965_0: Satthā “etasmiṃ gate taṃ bhayaṃ vūpasamissati, atha nesaṃ pabbajitakiccaṃ pāripūriṃ
atk-s0502a:1965_1: gamissatī”ti ñatvā, “bhikkhave, tumhākaṃ jeṭṭhabhātikaṃ sāriputtattheraṃ oloketvā
atk-s0502a:1965_2: gacchathā”ti āha. Te “sādhū”ti vatvā therassa santikaṃ gantvā “kiṃ, āvuso”ti vutte
atk-s0502a:1965_3: mayaṃ satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññaṃ pavisitukāmā hutvā āpucchimhā,
atk-s0502a:1965_4: atha no satthā evamāha – “tumhākaṃ jeṭṭhabhātikaṃ oloketvā gacchathā”ti? “Tenamhā
atk-s0502a:1965_5: idhāgatā”ti. Thero “satthārā ime ekaṃ kāraṇaṃ disvā idha pahitā bhavissanti, kiṃ
atk-s0502a:1965_6: nu kho eta”nti āvajjento tamatthaṃ ñatvā āha – “atthi pana vo, āvuso, sāmaṇero”ti?
atk-s0502a:1965_7: “Natthi, āvuso”ti. “Sace natthi, imaṃ saṃkiccasāmaṇeraṃ gahetvā gacchathā”ti. “Alaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1965_8: āvuso, sāmaṇeraṃ nissāya no palibodho bhavissati, kiṃ araññe vasantānaṃ sāmaṇerenā”ti?
atk-s0502a:1965_9: “Nāvuso, imaṃ nissāya tumhākaṃ palibodho, apica kho pana tumhe nissāya imassa palibodho
atk-s0502a:1965_10: bhavissati. Satthāpi tumhe mama santikaṃ pahiṇanto tumhehi saddhiṃ sāmaṇerassa pahiṇanaṃ
atk-s0502a:1965_11: paccāsīsanto pahiṇi, imaṃ gahetvā gacchathā”ti. Te “sādhū”ti adhivāsetvā sāmaṇerena
atk-s0502a:1965_12: saddhiṃ ekatiṃsa janā theraṃ apaloketvā vihārā nikkhamma cārikaṃ carantā vīsayojanasatamatthake
atk-s0502a:1966_0: Manussā te disvā pasannacittā sakkaccaṃ parivisitvā, “bhante, kattha gamissathā”ti
atk-s0502a:1966_1: pucchitvā “yathāphāsukaṭṭhānaṃ, āvuso”ti vutte pādamūle nipajjitvā “mayaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a:1966_2: ayyesu imaṃ ṭhānaṃ nissāya antovassaṃ vasantesu pañcasīlaṃ samādāya uposathakammaṃ
atk-s0502a:1966_3: karissāmā”ti yāciṃsu. Therā adhivāsesuṃ. Atha nesaṃ manussā rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānacaṅkamanapaṇṇasālāyo
atk-s0502a:1966_4: saṃvidahitvā “ajja mayaṃ, sve maya”nti ussāhappattā upaṭṭhānamakaṃsu. Therā vassūpanāyikadivase
atk-s0502a:1966_5: katikavattaṃ kariṃsu, “āvuso, amhehi dharamānakabuddhassa santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahitaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1966_6: na kho pana sakkā aññatra paṭipattisampadāya buddhe ārādhetuṃ, amhākañca apāyadvārāni
atk-s0502a:1966_7: vivaṭāneva, tasmā aññatra pāto bhikkhācāravelaṃ, sāyaṃ therūpaṭṭhānavelañca sesakāle
atk-s0502a:1966_8: dve ekaṭṭhāne na bhavissāma, yassa aphāsukaṃ bhavissati, tena ghaṇḍiyā pahaṭāya tassa
atk-s0502a:1966_9: santikaṃ gantvā bhesajjaṃ karissāma, ito aññasmiṃ rattibhāge vā divasabhāge vā appamattā
atk-s0502a:1967_0: Tesu evaṃ katikaṃ katvā viharantesu eko duggatapuriso dhītaraṃ upanissāya jīvanto
atk-s0502a:1967_1: tasmiṃ ṭhāne dubbhikkhe uppanne aparaṃ dhītaraṃ upanissāya jīvitukāmo maggaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0502a:1967_2: Therāpi gāme piṇḍāya caritvā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ āgacchantā antarāmagge ekissā nadiyā nhatvā
atk-s0502a:1967_3: vālukapuline nisīditvā bhattakiccaṃ kariṃsu. Tasmiṃ khaṇe so puriso taṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā
atk-s0502a:1967_4: ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ therā “kahaṃ gacchasī”ti pucchiṃsu. So tamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:1967_5: Therā tasmiṃ kāruññaṃ uppādetvā, “upāsaka, ativiya chātosi, gaccha, paṇṇaṃ āhara,
atk-s0502a:1967_6: ekamekaṃ te bhattapiṇḍaṃ dassāmā”ti vatvā tena paṇṇe āhaṭe attanā attanā bhuñjananiyāmeneva
atk-s0502a:1967_7: sūpabyañjanehi sannahitvā ekamekaṃ piṇḍaṃ adaṃsu. Etadeva kira vattaṃ, yaṃ bhojanakāle
atk-s0502a:1967_8: āgatassa bhattaṃ dadamānena bhikkhunā aggabhattaṃ adatvā attanā bhuñjananiyāmeneva
atk-s0502a:1967_9: thokaṃ vā bahuṃ vā dātabbaṃ. Tasmā tepi tathā adaṃsu. So katabhattakicco there vanditvā
atk-s0502a:1967_10: pucchi – “kiṃ, bhante, ayyā, kenaci nimantitā”ti? “Natthi, upāsaka, nimantanaṃ, manussā
atk-s0502a:1967_11: devasikaṃ evarūpameva āhāraṃ dentī”ti. So cintesi – “mayaṃ niccakālaṃ uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya
atk-s0502a:1967_12: kammaṃ karontāpi evarūpaṃ āhāraṃ laddhuṃ na sakkoma, kiṃ me aññattha gatena, imesaṃ
atk-s0502a:1967_13: santikeyeva jīvissāmī”ti. Atha ne āha – “ahaṃ vattapaṭivattaṃ katvā ayyānaṃ santike
atk-s0502a:1967_14: vasituṃ icchāmī”ti. “Sādhu, upāsakā”ti. So tehi saddhiṃ tesaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā
atk-s0502a:1967_15: sādhukaṃ vattapaṭivattaṃ karonto bhikkhū ativiya ārādhetvā dvemāsaccayena dhītaraṃ
atk-s0502a:1967_16: daṭṭhukāmo hutvā “sace, ayye, āpucchissāmi, na maṃ vissajjissanti, anāpucchā gamissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:1967_17: tesaṃ anācikkhitvāva nikkhami. Ettakameva kirassa oḷārikaṃ khalitaṃ ahosi, yaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anārocetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:1968_0: Tassa pana gamanamagge ekā aṭavī atthi. Tattha pañcasatānaṃ corānaṃ “yo imaṃ aṭaviṃ
atk-s0502a:1968_1: pavisati, taṃ māretvā tassa maṃsalohitena tuyhaṃ balikammaṃ karissāmā”ti devatāya
atk-s0502a:1968_2: āyācanaṃ katvā vasantānaṃ sattamo divaso hoti. Tasmā sattame divase corajeṭṭhako
atk-s0502a:1968_3: rukkhaṃ āruyha olokento taṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā corānaṃ saññamadāsi. Te tassa aṭavimajjhaṃ
atk-s0502a:1968_4: paviṭṭhabhāvaṃ ñatvā parikkhipitvā taṃ gaṇhitvā gāḷhabandhanaṃ katvā araṇisahitena
atk-s0502a:1968_5: aggiṃ nibbattetvā dārūni saṅkaḍḍhitvā mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ katvā sūlāni tacchiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1968_6: So tesaṃ taṃ kiriyaṃ disvā, “sāmi, imasmiṃ ṭhāne neva sūkarā, na migādayo dissanti,
atk-s0502a:1968_7: kiṃ kāraṇā idaṃ karothā”ti pucchi. “Taṃ māretvā tava maṃsalohitena devatāya balikammaṃ
atk-s0502a:1968_8: karissāmā”ti. So maraṇabhayatajjito bhikkhūnaṃ taṃ upakāraṃ acintetvā kevalaṃ attano
atk-s0502a:1968_9: jīvitameva rakkhamāno evamāha – “sāmi, ahaṃ vighāsādo, ucchiṭṭhabhattaṃ bhuñjitvā
atk-s0502a:1968_10: vaḍḍhito, vighāsādo nāma kāḷakaṇṇiko, ayyā pana yato tato nikkhamitvā pabbajitāpi
atk-s0502a:1968_11: khattiyāva, asukasmiṃ ṭhāne ekatiṃsa bhikkhū vasanti, te māretvā balikammaṃ karotha,
atk-s0502a:1968_12: ativiya vo devatā tussissatī”ti. Taṃ sutvā corā “bhaddakaṃ esa vadeti, kiṃ iminā
atk-s0502a:1968_13: kāḷakaṇṇinā, khattiye māretvā balikammaṃ karissāmā”ti cintetvā “ehi, nesaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1968_14: dassehī”ti tameva maggadesakaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā vihāramajjhe bhikkhū adisvā
atk-s0502a:1968_15: “kahaṃ bhikkhū”ti naṃ pucchiṃsu. So dve māse vasitattā tesaṃ katikavattaṃ jānanto
atk-s0502a:1968_16: evamāha – “attano divāṭṭhānarattiṭṭhānesu nisinnā, etaṃ ghaṇḍiṃ paharatha, ghaṇḍisaddena
atk-s0502a:1969_0: Bhikkhū ghaṇḍisaddaṃ sutvā “akāle ghaṇḍi pahaṭā, kassaci aphāsukaṃ bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0502a:1969_1: āgantvā vihāramajjhe paṭipāṭiyā paññattesu pāsāṇaphalakesu nisīdiṃsu. Saṅghatthero
atk-s0502a:1969_2: core oloketvā pucchi – “upāsakā kenāyaṃ ghaṇḍi pahaṭā”ti? Corajeṭṭhako āha – “mayā,
atk-s0502a:1969_3: bhante”ti. “Kiṃ kāraṇā”ti? “Amhehi aṭavidevatāya āyācitaṃ atthi, tassā balikammakaraṇatthāya
atk-s0502a:1969_4: ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ gahetvā gamissāmā”ti. Taṃ sutvā mahāthero bhikkhū āha – “āvuso, bhātikānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1969_5: uppannakiccaṃ nāma jeṭṭhabhātikena nittharitabbaṃ, ahaṃ attano jīvitaṃ tumhākaṃ pariccajitvā
atk-s0502a:1969_6: imehi saddhiṃ gamissāmi, mā sabbesaṃ antarāyo hotu, appamattā samaṇadhammaṃ karothā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1969_7: Anuthero āha – “bhante, jeṭṭhabhātu kiccaṃ nāma kaniṭṭhassa bhāro, ahaṃ gamissāmi,
atk-s0502a:1969_8: tumhe appamattā hothā”ti. Iminā upāyena “ahameva ahamevā”ti vatvā paṭipāṭiyā tiṃsapi
atk-s0502a:1969_9: janā uṭṭhahiṃsu, evaṃ te neva ekissā mātuyā puttā, na ekassa pituno, nāpi vītarāgā,
atk-s0502a:1969_10: atha ca pana avasesānaṃ atthāya paṭipāṭiyā jīvitaṃ pariccajiṃsu. Tesu ekopi “tvaṃ
atk-s0502a:1970_0: Saṃkiccasāmaṇero tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā, “bhante, tumhe tiṭṭhatha, ahaṃ tumhākaṃ jīvitaṃ
atk-s0502a:1970_1: pariccajitvā gamissāmī”ti āha. Te āhaṃsu – “āvuso, mayaṃ sabbe ekato māriyamānāpi
atk-s0502a:1970_2: taṃ ekakaṃ na vissajjessāmā”ti. “Kiṃ kāraṇā, bhante”ti? “‘Āvuso, tvaṃ dhammasenāpatisāriputtattherassa
atk-s0502a:1970_3: sāmaṇero, sace taṃ vissajjessāma, sāmaṇeraṃ me ādāya gantvā corānaṃ niyyādiṃsū’ti
atk-s0502a:1970_4: thero no garahissati, taṃ nindaṃ nittharituṃ na sakkhissāma, tena taṃ na vissajjessāmā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1970_5: “Bhante, sammāsambuddho tumhe mama upajjhāyassa santikaṃ pahiṇantopi, mama upajjhāyo
atk-s0502a:1970_6: maṃ tumhehi saddhiṃ pahiṇantopi idameva kāraṇaṃ disvā pahiṇi, tiṭṭhatha tumhe, ahameva
atk-s0502a:1970_7: gamissāmī”ti so tiṃsa bhikkhū vanditvā “sace, bhante, me doso atthi, khamathā”ti
atk-s0502a:1970_8: vatvā nikkhami. Tadā bhikkhūnaṃ mahāsaṃvego uppajji, akkhīni assupuṇṇāni hadayamaṃsaṃ
atk-s0502a:1970_9: pavedhi. Mahāthero core āha – “upāsakā ayaṃ daharako tumhe aggiṃ karonte, sūlāni
atk-s0502a:1970_10: tacchante, paṇṇāni attharante disvā bhāyissati, imaṃ ekamante ṭhapetvā tāni kiccāni
atk-s0502a:1970_11: kareyyāthā”ti. Corā sāmaṇeraṃ ādāya gantvā ekamante ṭhapetvā sabbakiccāni kariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1971_0: Kiccapariyosāne corajeṭṭhako asiṃ abbāhitvā sāmaṇeraṃ upasaṅkami. Sāmaṇero nisīdamāno
atk-s0502a:1971_1: jhānaṃ samāpajjitvāva nisīdi. Corajeṭṭhako asiṃ parivattetvā sāmaṇerassa khandhe
atk-s0502a:1971_2: pātesi, asi namitvā dhārāya dhāraṃ pahari, so “na sammā pahari”nti maññamāno puna
atk-s0502a:1971_3: taṃ ujukaṃ katvā pahari. Asi tālapaṇṇaṃ viya veṭhayamāno tharumūlaṃ agamāsi. Sāmaṇerañhi
atk-s0502a:1971_4: tasmiṃ kāle sinerunā avattharantopi māretuṃ samattho nāma natthi, pageva asinā. Taṃ
atk-s0502a:1971_5: pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā corajeṭṭhako cintesi – “pubbe me asi silāthambhaṃ vā khadirakhāṇuṃ
atk-s0502a:1971_6: vā kaḷīraṃ viya chindati, idāni ekavāraṃ nami, ekavāraṃ tālapattaveṭhako viya jāto.
atk-s0502a:1971_7: Ayaṃ nāma asi acetanā hutvāpi imassa guṇaṃ jānāti, ahaṃ sacetanopi na jānāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1971_8: So asiṃ bhūmiyaṃ khipitvā tassa pādamūle urena nipajjitvā, “bhante, mayaṃ dhanakāraṇā
atk-s0502a:1971_9: aṭaviṃ paviṭṭhāmhā, amhe dūratova disvā sahassamattāpi manussā pavedhanti, dve tisso
atk-s0502a:1971_10: kathā kathetuṃ na sakkonti. Tava pana santāsamattampi natthi, ukkāmukhe suvaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:1971_11: viya supupphitakaṇikāraṃ viya ca te mukhaṃ virocati, kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti pucchanto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1972: “Tassa te natthi bhītattaṃ, bhiyyo vaṇṇo pasīdati;
atk-s0502a:1974_0: Sāmaṇero jhānā vuṭṭhāya tassa dhammaṃ desento, “āvuso gāmaṇi, khīṇāsavassa attabhāvo
atk-s0502a:1974_1: nāma sīse ṭhapitabhāro viya hoti, so tasmiṃ bhijjante vā nassante vā tussateva, na
atk-s0502a:1978: Na bhayaṃ maraṇe hoti, bhāranikkhepane yathā”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:1979_0: So tassa kathaṃ sutvā pañca corasatāni oloketvā āha – “tumhe kiṃ karissathā”ti? “Tumhe
atk-s0502a:1979_1: pana, sāmī”ti. “Mama tāva, bho, ‘evarūpaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā agāramajjhe kammaṃ natthi,
atk-s0502a:1979_2: ayyassa santike pabbajissāmī’ti. Mayampi tatheva karissāmā”ti. “Sādhu, tātā”ti tato
atk-s0502a:1979_3: pañcasatāpi corā sāmaṇeraṃ vanditvā pabbajjaṃ yāciṃsu. So tesaṃ asidhārāhi eva kese
atk-s0502a:1979_4: ceva vatthadasā ca chinditvā tambamattikāya rajitvā tāni kāsāyāni acchādāpetvā dasasu
atk-s0502a:1979_5: sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā te ādāya gacchanto cintesi – “sacāhaṃ there adisvāva gamissāmi,
atk-s0502a:1979_6: te samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkhissanti. Corānañhi maṃ gahetvā nikkhantakālato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0502a:1979_7: tesu ekopi assūni sandhāretuṃ nāsakkhi, ‘mārito nu kho sāmaṇero, no’ti cintentānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1979_8: kammaṭṭhānaṃ abhimukhaṃ na bhavissati, tasmā disvāva ne gamissāmī”ti. So pañcasatabhikkhuparivāro
atk-s0502a:1979_9: tattha gantvā attano dassanena paṭiladdhaassāsehi tehi “kiṃ, sappurisa, saṃkicca,
atk-s0502a:1979_10: laddhaṃ te jīvita”nti vutte, “āma, bhante, ime maṃ māretukāmā hutvā māretuṃ asakkontā
atk-s0502a:1979_11: mama guṇe pasīditvā dhammaṃ sutvā pabbajitā, ahaṃ ‘tumhe disvāva gamissāmī’ti āgato,
atk-s0502a:1979_12: appamattā samaṇadhammaṃ karotha, ahaṃ satthu santikaṃ gamissāmī”ti te bhikkhū vanditvā
