atk-s0502a:1979_13: itare ādāya upajjhāyassa santikaṃ gantvā “kiṃ saṃkicca, antevāsikā te laddhā”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a:1979_14: “āma, bhante”ti taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi. Therena “gaccha saṃkicca, satthāraṃ passāhī”ti
atk-s0502a:1979_15: vutte, “sādhū”ti theraṃ vanditvā te ādāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā satthārāpi “kiṃ
atk-s0502a:1979_16: saṃkicca, antevāsikā te laddhā”ti vutte, “āma, bhante”ti taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi. Satthā
atk-s0502a:1979_17: “evaṃ kira, bhikkhave”ti pucchitvā, “āma, bhante”ti vutte, “bhikkhave, tumhākaṃ corakammaṃ
atk-s0502a:1979_18: katvā dussīle patiṭṭhāya vassasataṃ jīvanato idāni sīle patiṭṭhāya ekadivasampi jīvitaṃ
atk-s0502a:1979_19: seyyo”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1983: Tattha dussīloti nissīlo. Sīlavantassāti dussīlassa vassasataṃ jīvanato sīlavantassa dvīhi jhānehi jhāyino ekadivasampi ekamuhuttampi jīvitaṃ seyyo, uttamanti attho.
atk-s0502a:1984: Desanāvasāne te pañcasatāpi bhikkhū saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu, sampattamahājanassāpi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:1985_0: Aparena samayena saṃkicco upasampadaṃ labhitvā dasavasso hutvā sāmaṇeraṃ gaṇhi. So
atk-s0502a:1985_1: pana tasseva bhāgineyyo adhimuttasāmaṇero nāma. Atha naṃ thero paripuṇṇavassakāle
atk-s0502a:1985_2: āmantetvā “upasampadaṃ te karissāmi, gaccha, ñātakānaṃ santike vassaparimāṇaṃ pucchitvā
atk-s0502a:1985_3: ehī”ti uyyojesi. So mātāpitūnaṃ santikaṃ gacchanto antarāmagge pañcasatehi corehi
atk-s0502a:1985_4: balikammatthāya māriyamāno tesaṃ dhammaṃ desetvā pasannacittehi tehi “na te imasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:1985_5: ṭhāne amhākaṃ atthibhāvo kassaci ārocetabbo”ti vissaṭṭho paṭipathe mātāpitaro āgacchante
atk-s0502a:1985_6: disvā tameva maggaṃ paṭipajjantānampi tesaṃ saccamanurakkhanto nārocesi. Tesaṃ corehi
atk-s0502a:1985_7: viheṭhiyamānānaṃ “tvampi corehi saddhiṃ ekato hutvā maññe, amhākaṃ nārocesī”ti paridevantānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1985_8: saddaṃ sutvā te mātāpitūnampi anārocitabhāvaṃ ñatvā pasannacittā pabbajjaṃ yāciṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1985_9: Sopi saṃkiccasāmaṇero viya te sabbe pabbājetvā upajjhāyassa santikaṃ ānetvā tena
atk-s0502a:1985_10: satthu santikaṃ pesito gantvā taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi. Satthā “evaṃ kira, bhikkhave”ti
atk-s0502a:1985_11: pucchitvā, “āma, bhante”ti vutte purimanayeneva anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imameva gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1991: Yo ca vassasataṃ jīveti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto khāṇukoṇḍaññattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1992_0: So kira thero satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññe viharanto arahattaṃ patvā
atk-s0502a:1992_1: “satthu ārocessāmī”ti tato āgacchanto antarāmagge kilanto maggā okkamma ekasmiṃ piṭṭhipāsāṇe
atk-s0502a:1992_2: nisinno jhānaṃ samāpajji. Athekaṃ gāmaṃ vilumpitvā pañcasatā corā attano balānurūpena
atk-s0502a:1992_3: bhaṇḍikaṃ bandhitvā sīsenādāya gacchantā dūraṃ gantvā kilantarūpā “dūraṃ āgatāmha,
atk-s0502a:1992_4: imasmiṃ piṭṭhipāsāṇe vissamissāmā”ti maggā okkamma piṭṭhipāsāṇassa santikaṃ gantvā
atk-s0502a:1992_5: theraṃ disvāpi “khāṇuko aya”nti saññino ahesuṃ. Atheko coro therassa sīse bhaṇḍikaṃ
atk-s0502a:1992_6: ṭhapesi, aparopi taṃ nissāya bhaṇḍikaṃ ṭhapesi. Evaṃ pañcasatāpi corā pañcahi bhaṇḍikasatehi
atk-s0502a:1992_7: theraṃ parikkhipitvā sayampi nisinnā niddāyitvā aruṇuggamanakāle pabujjhitvā attano
atk-s0502a:1992_8: attano bhaṇḍikaṃ gaṇhantā theraṃ disvā “amanusso”ti saññāya palāyituṃ ārabhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1992_9: Atha ne thero āha – “mā bhāyittha upāsakā, pabbajito aha”nti. Te therassa pādamūle
atk-s0502a:1992_10: nipajjitvā “khamatha, bhante, mayaṃ khāṇukasaññino ahumhā”ti theraṃ khamāpetvā corajeṭṭhakena
atk-s0502a:1992_11: “ahaṃ ayyassa santike pabbajissāmī”ti vutte sesā “mayampi pabbajissāmā”ti vatvā sabbepi
atk-s0502a:1992_12: ekacchandā hutvā theraṃ pabbajjaṃ yāciṃsu. Thero saṃkiccasāmaṇero viya sabbepi te
atk-s0502a:1992_13: pabbājesi. Tato paṭṭhāya khāṇukoṇḍaññoti paññāyi. So tehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ satthu
atk-s0502a:1992_14: santikaṃ gantvā satthārā “kiṃ, koṇḍañña, antevāsikā te laddhā”ti vutte taṃ pavattiṃ
atk-s0502a:1992_15: ārocesi. Satthā “evaṃ kira, bhikkhave”ti pucchitvā, “āma, bhante, na no aññassa evarūpo
atk-s0502a:1992_16: ānubhāvo diṭṭhapubbo, tenamhā pabbajitā”ti vutte, “bhikkhave, evarūpe duppaññakamme
atk-s0502a:1992_17: patiṭṭhāya vassasataṃ jīvanato idāni vo paññāsampadāya vattamānānaṃ ekāhampi jīvitaṃ
atk-s0502a:1992_18: seyyo”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1996: Tattha duppañño nippañño. Paññavantassāti sappaññassa. Sesaṃ purimasadisamevāti.
atk-s0502a:1997: Desanāvasāne pañcasatāpi te bhikkhū saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Sampattamahājanassāpi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:2000: Yo ca vassasataṃ jīveti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sappadāsattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2001_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kireko kulaputto satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado
atk-s0502a:2001_1: aparena samayena ukkaṇṭhitvā “mādisassa kulaputtassa gihibhāvo nāma ayutto, pabbajjāya
atk-s0502a:2001_2: ṭhatvā maraṇamhi me seyyo”ti cintetvā attano maraṇūpāyaṃ cintento vicarati. Athekadivasaṃ
atk-s0502a:2001_3: pātova katabhattakiccā bhikkhū vihāraṃ gantvā aggisālāya sappaṃ disvā taṃ ekasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:2001_4: kuṭe pakkhipitvā kuṭaṃ pidahitvā ādāya vihārā nikkhamiṃsu. Ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhupi bhattakiccaṃ
atk-s0502a:2001_5: katvā āgacchanto te bhikkhū disvā “kiṃ idaṃ, āvuso”ti pucchitvā “sappo, āvuso”ti
atk-s0502a:2001_6: vutte iminā “kiṃ karissathā”ti? “Chaḍḍessāma na”nti. Tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā “iminā attānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2001_7: ḍaṃsāpetvā marissāmī”ti “āharatha, ahaṃ taṃ chaḍḍessāmī”ti tesaṃ hatthato kuṭaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0502a:2001_8: ekasmiṃ ṭhāne nisinno tena sappena attānaṃ ḍaṃsāpeti, sappo ḍaṃsituṃ na icchati.
atk-s0502a:2001_9: So kuṭe hatthaṃ otāretvā ito cito ca āloleti, ghorasappassa mukhaṃ vivaritvā aṅguliṃ
atk-s0502a:2001_10: pakkhipati, neva naṃ sappo ḍaṃsi. So “nāyaṃ āsīviso, gharasappo eso”ti taṃ pahāya
atk-s0502a:2001_11: vihāraṃ agamāsi. Atha naṃ bhikkhū “chaḍḍito te, āvuso, sappo”ti āhaṃsu. “Na so, āvuso,
atk-s0502a:2001_12: ghorasappo, gharasappo eso”ti. “Ghorasappoyevāvuso, mahantaṃ phaṇaṃ katvā susuyanto
atk-s0502a:2001_13: dukkhena amhehi gahito, kiṃ kāraṇā evaṃ tvaṃ vadesī”ti āhaṃsu. “Ahaṃ, āvuso, tena
atk-s0502a:2001_14: attānaṃ ḍaṃsāpentopi mukhe aṅguliṃ pakkhipentopi taṃ ḍaṃsāpetuṃ nāsakkhi”nti. Taṃ
atk-s0502a:2002_0: Athekadivasaṃ nhāpito dve tayo khure ādāya vihāraṃ gantvā ekaṃ bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0502a:2002_1: ekena bhikkhūnaṃ kese ohāreti. So bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapitaṃ khuraṃ gahetvā “iminā gīvaṃ chinditvā
atk-s0502a:2002_2: marissāmī”ti ekasmiṃ rukkhe gīvaṃ upanidhāya khuradhāraṃ galanāḷiyaṃ katvā ṭhito
atk-s0502a:2002_3: upasampadāmāḷato paṭṭhāya attano sīlaṃ āvajjento vimalacandamaṇḍalaṃ viya sudhotamaṇikhandhamiva
atk-s0502a:2002_4: ca nimmalaṃ sīlaṃ addasa. Tassa taṃ olokentassa sakalasarīraṃ pharantī pīti uppajji.
atk-s0502a:2002_5: So pītiṃ vikkhambhetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā khuraṃ
atk-s0502a:2002_6: ādāya vihāramajjhaṃ pāvisi. Atha naṃ bhikkhū “kahaṃ gatosi, āvuso”ti pucchiṃsu. “‘Iminā
atk-s0502a:2002_7: khurena galanāḷiṃ chinditvā marissāmī’ti gatomhi, āvuso”ti. Atha “kasmā na matosī”ti?
atk-s0502a:2002_8: Idānimhi satthaṃ āharituṃ abhabbo jāto. Ahañhi “iminā khurena galanāḷiṃ chindissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:2002_9: ñāṇakhurena sabbakilese chindinti. Bhikkhū “ayaṃ abhūtena aññaṃ byākarotī”ti bhagavato
atk-s0502a:2002_10: ārocesuṃ. Bhagavā tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā āha – “na, bhikkhave, khīṇāsavā nāma sahatthā
atk-s0502a:2002_11: attānaṃ jīvitā voropentī”ti. Bhante, tumhe imaṃ “khīṇāsavo”ti vadatha, evaṃ arahattūpanissayasampanno
atk-s0502a:2002_12: panāyaṃ kasmā ukkaṇṭhati, kimassa arahattūpanissayakāraṇaṃ “kasmā so sappo etaṃ na
atk-s0502a:2002_13: ḍaṃsatī”ti? “Bhikkhave, so tāva sappo imassa ito tatiye attabhāve dāso ahosi, so
atk-s0502a:2002_14: attano sāmikassa sarīraṃ ḍaṃsituṃ na visahatī”ti. Evaṃ tāva nesaṃ satthā ekaṃ kāraṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:2002_15: ācikkhi. Tato paṭṭhāya ca so bhikkhu sappadāso nāma jāto.
atk-s0502a:2003_0: Kassapasammāsambuddhakāle kireko kulaputto satthu dhammakathaṃ sutvā uppannasaṃvego
atk-s0502a:2003_1: pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado aparena samayena anabhiratiyā uppannāya ekassa sahāyakassa
atk-s0502a:2003_2: bhikkhuno ārocesi. So tassa abhiṇhaṃ gihibhāve ādīnavaṃ kathesi. Taṃ sutvā itaro
atk-s0502a:2003_3: sāsane abhiramitvā pubbe anabhiratakāle malaggahite samaṇaparikkhāre ekasmiṃ soṇḍitīre
atk-s0502a:2003_4: nimmale karonto nisīdi. Sahāyakopissa santikeyeva nisinno. Atha naṃ so evamāha –
atk-s0502a:2003_5: “ahaṃ, āvuso, uppabbajanto ime parikkhāre tuyhaṃ dātukāmo ahosi”nti. So lobhaṃ uppādetvā
atk-s0502a:2003_6: cintesi – “iminā mayhaṃ pabbajitena vā uppabbajitena vā ko attho, idāni parikkhāre
atk-s0502a:2003_7: gaṇhissāmī”ti. So tato paṭṭhāya “kiṃ dānāvuso, amhākaṃ jīvitena, ye mayaṃ kapālahatthā
atk-s0502a:2003_8: parakulesu bhikkhāya carāma, puttadārehi saddhiṃ ālāpasallāpaṃ na karomā”tiādīni
atk-s0502a:2003_9: vadanto gihibhāvassa guṇaṃ kathesi. So tassa kathaṃ sutvā puna ukkaṇṭhito hutvā cintesi
atk-s0502a:2003_10: – “ayaṃ mayā ‘ukkaṇṭhitomhī’ti vutte paṭhamaṃ gihibhāve ādīnavaṃ kathetvā idāni abhiṇhaṃ
atk-s0502a:2003_11: guṇaṃ katheti, ‘kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”’nti cintento “imesu samaṇaparikkhāresu lobhenā”ti
atk-s0502a:2003_12: ñatvā sayameva attano cittaṃ nivattesi. Evamassa kassapasammāsambuddhakāle ekassa
atk-s0502a:2003_13: bhikkhuno ukkaṇṭhāpitattā idāni anabhirati uppannā. Yo pana teneva tadā vīsati vassasahassāni
atk-s0502a:2003_14: samaṇadhammo kato, svassa etarahi arahattūpanissayo jātoti.
atk-s0502a:2004_0: Imamatthaṃ te bhikkhū bhagavato santikā sutvā uttariṃ pucchiṃsu – “bhante, ayaṃ kira
atk-s0502a:2004_1: bhikkhu khuradhāraṃ galanāḷiyaṃ katvā ṭhitova arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti, uppajjissati nu
atk-s0502a:2004_2: kho ettakena khaṇena arahattamaggo”ti. “Āma, bhikkhave, āraddhavīriyassa bhikkhuno
atk-s0502a:2004_3: pādaṃ ukkhipitvā bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapentassa pāde bhūmiyaṃ asampatteyeva arahattamaggo uppajjati.
atk-s0502a:2004_4: Kusītassa puggalassa hi vassasataṃ jīvanato āraddhavīriyassa khaṇamattampi jīvitaṃ
atk-s0502a:2004_5: seyyo”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2008_0: Tattha kusītoti kāmavitakkādīhi tīhi vitakkehi vītināmento puggalo. Hīnavīriyoti
atk-s0502a:2008_1: nibbīriyo. Vīriyamārabhato daḷhanti duvidhajjhānanibbattanasamatthaṃ thiraṃ vīriyaṃ
atk-s0502a:2012: Yo ca vassasataṃ jīveti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto paṭācāraṃ theriṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2013_0: Sā kira sāvatthiyaṃ cattālīsakoṭivibhavassa seṭṭhino dhītā ahosi abhirūpā. Taṃ soḷasavassuddesikakāle
atk-s0502a:2013_1: sattabhūmikassa pāsādassa uparimatale rakkhantā vasāpesuṃ. Evaṃ santepi sā ekena
atk-s0502a:2013_2: attano cūḷūpaṭṭhākena saddhiṃ vippaṭipajji. Athassā mātāpitaro samajātikakule ekassa
atk-s0502a:2013_3: kumārassa paṭissuṇitvā vivāhadivasaṃ ṭhapesuṃ. Tasmiṃ upakaṭṭhe sā taṃ cūḷūpaṭṭhākaṃ
atk-s0502a:2013_4: āha – “maṃ kira asukakulassa nāma dassanti, mayi patikulaṃ gate mama paṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā
atk-s0502a:2013_5: āgatopi tattha pavesanaṃ na labhissasi, sace te mayi sineho atthi, idāneva maṃ gahetvā
atk-s0502a:2013_6: yena vā tena vā palāyassū”ti. “So sādhu, bhadde”ti. “Tena hi ahaṃ sve pātova nagaradvārassa
atk-s0502a:2013_7: asukaṭṭhāne nāma ṭhassāmi, tvaṃ ekena upāyena nikkhamitvā tattha āgaccheyyāsī”ti
atk-s0502a:2013_8: vatvā dutiyadivase saṅketaṭṭhāne aṭṭhāsi. Sāpi pātova kiliṭṭhaṃ vatthaṃ nivāsetvā
atk-s0502a:2013_9: kese vikkiritvā kuṇḍakena sarīraṃ makkhitvā kuṭaṃ ādāya dāsīhi saddhiṃ gacchantī
atk-s0502a:2013_10: viya gharā nikkhamitvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ agamāsi. So taṃ ādāya dūraṃ gantvā ekasmiṃ gāme
atk-s0502a:2013_11: nivāsaṃ kappetvā araññe khettaṃ kasitvā dārupaṇṇādīni āharati. Itarā kuṭena udakaṃ
atk-s0502a:2013_12: āharitvā sahatthā koṭṭanapacanādīni karontī attano pāpassa phalaṃ anubhoti. Athassā
atk-s0502a:2013_13: kucchiyaṃ gabbho patiṭṭhāsi. Sā paripuṇṇagabbhā “idha me koci upakārako natthi, mātāpitaro
atk-s0502a:2013_14: nāma puttesu muduhadayā honti, tesaṃ santikaṃ maṃ nehi, tattha me gabbhavuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2013_15: bhavissatī”ti sāmikaṃ yāci. So “kiṃ, bhadde, kathesi, maṃ disvā tava mātāpitaro vividhā
atk-s0502a:2013_16: kammakāraṇā kareyyuṃ, na sakkā mayā tattha gantu”nti paṭikkhipi. Sā punappunaṃ yācitvāpi
atk-s0502a:2013_17: gamanaṃ alabhamānā tassa araññaṃ gatakāle paṭivissake āmantetvā “sace so āgantvā
atk-s0502a:2013_18: maṃ apassanto ‘kahaṃ gatā’ti pucchissati, mama attano kulagharaṃ gatabhāvaṃ ācikkheyyāthā”ti
atk-s0502a:2013_19: vatvā gehadvāraṃ pidahitvā pakkāmi. Sopi āgantvā taṃ apassanto paṭivissake pucchitvā
atk-s0502a:2013_20: taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā “nivattessāmi na”nti anubandhitvā taṃ disvā nānappakāraṃ yāciyamānopi
atk-s0502a:2013_21: nivattetuṃ nāsakkhi. Athassā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne kammajavātā caliṃsu. Sā ekaṃ gacchantaraṃ
atk-s0502a:2013_22: pavisitvā, “sāmi, kammajavātā me calitā”ti vatvā bhūmiyaṃ nipajjitvā samparivattamānā
atk-s0502a:2013_23: kicchena dārakaṃ vijāyitvā “yassatthāyāhaṃ kulagharaṃ gaccheyyaṃ, so attho nipphanno”ti
atk-s0502a:2013_24: punadeva tena saddhiṃ gehaṃ āgantvā vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0502a:2014_0: Tassā aparena samayena puna gabbho patiṭṭhahi. Sā paripuṇṇagabbhā hutvā purimanayeneva
atk-s0502a:2014_1: sāmikaṃ yācitvā gamanaṃ alabhamānā puttaṃ aṅkenādāya tatheva pakkamitvā tena anubandhitvā
atk-s0502a:2014_2: “tiṭṭhāhī”ti vutte nivattituṃ na icchi. Atha nesaṃ gacchantānaṃ mahā akālamegho udapādi
atk-s0502a:2014_3: samantā vijjulatāhi ādittaṃ viya meghatthanitehi, bhijjamānaṃ viya udakadhārānipātanirantaraṃ
atk-s0502a:2014_4: nabhaṃ ahosi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe tassā kammajavātā caliṃsu. Sā sāmikaṃ āmantetvā, “sāmi,
atk-s0502a:2014_5: kammajavātā me calitā, na sakkomi sandhāretuṃ, anovassakaṭṭhānaṃ me jānāhī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:2014_6: So hatthagatāya vāsiyā ito cito ca upadhārento ekasmiṃ vammikamatthake jātaṃ gumbaṃ
atk-s0502a:2014_7: disvā chindituṃ ārabhi. Atha naṃ vammikato nikkhamitvā ghoraviso āsīviso ḍaṃsi. Taṅkhaṇaññevassa
atk-s0502a:2014_8: sarīraṃ antosamuṭṭhitāhi aggijālāhi ḍayhamānaṃ viya nīlavaṇṇaṃ hutvā tattheva pati.
atk-s0502a:2014_9: Itarāpi mahādukkhaṃ anubhavamānā tassa āgamanaṃ olokentīpi taṃ adisvāva aparampi
atk-s0502a:2014_10: puttaṃ vijāyi. Dve dārakā vātavuṭṭhivegaṃ asahamānā mahāviravaṃ viravanti. Sā ubhopi
atk-s0502a:2014_11: te urantare katvā dvīhi jaṇṇukehi ceva hatthehi ca bhūmiyaṃ uppīḷetvā tathā ṭhitāva
atk-s0502a:2014_12: rattiṃ vītināmesi. Sakalasarīraṃ nillohitaṃ viya paṇḍupalāsavaṇṇaṃ ahosi. Sā uṭṭhite
atk-s0502a:2014_13: aruṇe maṃsapesivaṇṇaṃ ekaṃ puttaṃ aṅkenādāya itaraṃ aṅguliyā gahetvā “ehi, tāta,
atk-s0502a:2014_14: pitā te ito gato”ti vatvā sāmikassa gatamaggena gacchantī taṃ vammikamatthake kālaṃ
atk-s0502a:2014_15: katvā patitaṃ nīlavaṇṇaṃ thaddhasarīraṃ disvā “maṃ nissāya mama sāmiko panthe mato”ti
atk-s0502a:2015_0: Sā sakalarattiṃ devena vuṭṭhattā aciravatiṃ nadiṃ jaṇṇuppamāṇena kaṭippamāṇena thanappamāṇena
atk-s0502a:2015_1: udakena paripuṇṇaṃ disvā attano mandabuddhitāya dvīhi dārakehi saddhiṃ udakaṃ otarituṃ
atk-s0502a:2015_2: avisahantī jeṭṭhaputtaṃ orimatīre ṭhapetvā itaraṃ ādāya paratīraṃ gantvā sākhābhaṅgaṃ
atk-s0502a:2015_3: attharitvā nipajjāpetvā “itarassa santikaṃ gamissāmī”ti bālaputtakaṃ pahāya tarituṃ
atk-s0502a:2015_4: asakkontī punappunaṃ nivattitvā olokayamānā pāyāsi. Athassā nadīmajjhaṃ gatakāle
atk-s0502a:2015_5: eko seno taṃ kumāraṃ disvā “maṃsapesī”ti saññāya ākāsato bhassi. Sā taṃ puttassatthāya
atk-s0502a:2015_6: bhassantaṃ disvā ubho hatthe ukkhipitvā “sūsū”ti tikkhattuṃ mahāsaddaṃ nicchāresi.

atk-s0502a:2031_0: Desanāvasāne paṭācārā mahāpathaviyaṃ paṃsuparimāṇe kilese jhāpetvā sotāpattiphale
atk-s0502a:2031_1: patiṭṭhahi, aññepi bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pāpuṇiṃsūti. Sā pana sotāpannā hutvā satthāraṃ

atk-s0502a:2031_4: udakaṃ āsiñci, taṃ thokaṃ gantvā pacchijji. Dutiyavāre āsittaṃ tato dūrataraṃ agamāsi.

atk-s0502a:2031_7: gataṃ dutiyavāre āsittaṃ udakaṃ viya majjhimavayepi maranti, tatopi dūrataraṃ gataṃ
atk-s0502a:2031_8: tatiyavāre āsittaṃ udakaṃ viya pacchimavayepi marantiyevā”ti cintesi. Satthā gandhakuṭiyaṃ

atk-s0502a:2040_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kirekassa seṭṭhissa gehe cattālīsakoṭidhanaṃ aṅgārā eva hutvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:2040_1: Seṭṭhi taṃ disvā uppannasoko āhāraṃ paṭikkhipitvā mañcake nipajji. Tasseko sahāyako
atk-s0502a:2040_2: gehaṃ gantvā, “samma, kasmā socasī”ti pucchitvā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā, “samma, mā soci,
atk-s0502a:2040_3: ahaṃ ekaṃ upāyaṃ jānāmi, taṃ karohī”ti. “Kiṃ karomi, sammā”ti? Attano āpaṇe kilañjaṃ
atk-s0502a:2040_4: pasāretvā tattha te aṅgāre rāsiṃ katvā vikkiṇanto viya nisīda, āgatāgatesu manussesu
atk-s0502a:2040_5: ye evaṃ vadanti – “sesajanā vatthatelamadhuphāṇitādīni vikkiṇanti, tvaṃ pana aṅgāre
atk-s0502a:2040_6: vikkiṇanto nisinno”ti. Te vadeyyāsi – “attano santakaṃ avikkiṇanto kiṃ karomī”ti?
atk-s0502a:2040_7: Yo pana taṃ evaṃ vadati “sesajanā vatthatelamadhuphāṇitādīni vikkiṇanti, tvaṃ pana
atk-s0502a:2040_8: hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ vikkiṇanto nisinno”ti. Taṃ vadeyyāsi “kahaṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇa”nti. “Ida”nti
atk-s0502a:2040_9: ca vutte “āhara, tāva na”nti hatthehi paṭiccheyyāsi. Evaṃ dinnaṃ tava hatthe hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:2040_10: bhavissati. Sā pana sace kumārikā hoti, tava gehe puttassa naṃ āharitvā cattālīsakoṭidhanaṃ
atk-s0502a:2040_11: tassā niyyādetvā tāya dinnaṃ valañjeyyāsi. Sace kumārako hoti, tava gehe vayappattaṃ
atk-s0502a:2040_12: dhītaraṃ tassa datvā cattālīsakoṭidhanaṃ niyyādetvā tena dinnaṃ valañjeyyāsīti. So
atk-s0502a:2040_13: “bhaddako upāyo”ti attano āpaṇe aṅgāre rāsiṃ katvā vikkiṇanto viya nisīdi. Ye pana
atk-s0502a:2040_14: naṃ evamāhaṃsu – “sesajanā vatthatelamadhuphāṇitādīni vikkiṇanti, kiṃ pana tvaṃ aṅgāre
atk-s0502a:2040_15: vikkiṇanto nisinno”ti? Tesaṃ “attano santakaṃ avikkiṇanto kiṃ karomī”ti paṭivacanaṃ
atk-s0502a:2040_16: adāsi. Athekā gotamī nāma kumārikā kisasarīratāya kisāgotamīti paññāyamānā parijiṇṇakulassa
atk-s0502a:2040_17: dhītā attano ekena kiccena āpaṇadvāraṃ gantvā taṃ seṭṭhiṃ disvā evamāha – “kiṃ, tāta,
atk-s0502a:2040_18: sesajanā vatthatelamadhuphāṇitādīni vikkiṇanti, tvaṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ vikkiṇanto nisinno”ti?
atk-s0502a:2040_19: “Kahaṃ, amma, hiraññasuvaṇṇa”nti? “Nanu ‘tvaṃ tadeva gahetvā nisinnosī’ti, āhara,
atk-s0502a:2040_20: tāva naṃ, ammā”ti. Sā hatthapūraṃ gahetvā tassa hatthesu ṭhapesi, taṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇameva ahosi.
atk-s0502a:2041_0: Atha naṃ seṭṭhi “kataraṃ te, amma, geha”nti pucchitvā “asukaṃ nāmā”ti vutte tassā
atk-s0502a:2041_1: assāmikabhāvaṃ ñatvā dhanaṃ paṭisāmetvā taṃ attano puttassa ānetvā cattālīsakoṭidhanaṃ
atk-s0502a:2041_2: paṭicchāpesi. Sabbaṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇameva ahosi. Tassā aparena samayena gabbho patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0502a:2041_3: Sā dasamāsaccayena puttaṃ vijāyi. So padasā gamanakāle kālamakāsi. Sā adiṭṭhapubbamaraṇatāya
atk-s0502a:2041_4: taṃ jhāpetuṃ nīharante vāretvā “puttassa me bhesajjaṃ pucchissāmī”ti matakaḷevaraṃ
atk-s0502a:2041_5: aṅkenādāya “api nu me puttassa bhesajjaṃ jānāthā”ti pucchantī gharapaṭipāṭiyā vicarati.
atk-s0502a:2041_6: Atha naṃ manussā, “amma, tvaṃ ummattikā jātā, matakaputtassa bhesajjaṃ pucchantī
atk-s0502a:2041_7: vicarasī”ti vadanti. Sā “avassaṃ mama puttassa bhesajjaṃ jānanakaṃ labhissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:2041_8: maññamānā vicarati. Atha naṃ eko paṇḍitapuriso disvā, “ayaṃ mama dhītā paṭhamaṃ puttakaṃ
atk-s0502a:2041_9: vijātā bhavissati adiṭṭhapubbamaraṇā, mayā imissā avassayena bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0502a:2041_10: cintetvā āha – “amma, ahaṃ bhesajjaṃ na jānāmi, bhesajjajānanakaṃ pana jānāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2041_11: “Ko jānāti, tātā”ti? “Satthā, amma, jānāti, gaccha, taṃ pucchāhī”ti. Sā “gamissāmi,
atk-s0502a:2041_12: tāta, pucchissāmi, tātā”ti vatvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhitā
atk-s0502a:2041_13: pucchi – “tumhe kira me puttassa bhesajjaṃ jānātha, bhante”ti? “Āma, jānāmī”ti. “Kiṃ
atk-s0502a:2041_15: bhante”. “Kassa pana gehe laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti? “Yassa gehe putto vā dhītā vā na koci
atk-s0502a:2041_16: matapubbo”ti. Sā “sādhu, bhante”ti satthāraṃ vanditvā mataputtakaṃ aṅkenādāya antogāmaṃ
atk-s0502a:2041_17: pavisitvā paṭhamagehassa dvāre ṭhatvā “atthi nu kho imasmiṃ gehe siddhatthako, puttassa
atk-s0502a:2041_18: kira me bhesajjaṃ eta”nti vatvā “atthī”ti vutte tena hi dethāti. Tehi āharitvā siddhatthakesu
atk-s0502a:2041_19: diyyamānesu “imasmiṃ gehe putto vā dhītā vā matapubbo koci natthi, ammā”ti pucchitvā
atk-s0502a:2041_20: “kiṃ vadesi, amma? Jīvamānā hi katipayā, matakā eva bahukā”ti vutte “tena hi gaṇhatha
atk-s0502a:2041_21: vo siddhatthake, netaṃ mama puttassa bhesajja”nti paṭiadāsi.
atk-s0502a:2042_0: Sā iminā nīyāmena ādito paṭṭhāya naṃ pucchantī vicari. Sā ekagehepi siddhatthake
atk-s0502a:2042_1: agahetvā sāyanhasamaye cintesi – “aho bhāriyaṃ kammaṃ, ahaṃ ‘mameva putto mato’ti
atk-s0502a:2042_2: saññamakāsiṃ, sakalagāmepi pana jīvantehi matakāva bahutarā”ti. Tassā evaṃ cintayamānāya
atk-s0502a:2042_3: puttasinehaṃ mudukahadayaṃ thaddhabhāvaṃ agamāsi. Sā puttaṃ araññe chaḍḍetvā satthu
atk-s0502a:2042_4: santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ satthā “laddhā te ekaccharamattā
atk-s0502a:2042_5: siddhatthakā”ti āha. “Na laddhā, bhante, sakalagāme jīvantehi matakāva bahutarā”ti.
atk-s0502a:2042_6: Atha naṃ satthā “tvaṃ ‘mameva putto mato’ti sallakkhesi, dhuvadhammo esa sattānaṃ.

atk-s0502a:2055_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kirekasmiṃ kule satta puttā satta ca dhītaro ahesuṃ. Te sabbepi vayappattā
atk-s0502a:2055_1: gehe patiṭṭhahitvā attano dhammatāya sukhappattā ahesuṃ. Tesaṃ aparena samayena pitā
atk-s0502a:2055_2: kālamakāsi. Mahāupāsikā sāmike naṭṭhepi na tāva kuṭumbaṃ vibhajati. Atha naṃ puttā
atk-s0502a:2055_3: āhaṃsu – “amma, amhākaṃ pitari naṭṭhe tuyhaṃ ko attho kuṭumbena, kiṃ mayaṃ taṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ
atk-s0502a:2055_4: na sakkomā”ti. Sā tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā tuṇhī hutvā punappunaṃ tehi vuccamānā “puttā
atk-s0502a:2055_5: maṃ paṭijaggissanti, kiṃ me visuṃ kuṭumbenā”ti sabbaṃ sāpateyyaṃ majjhe bhinditvā
atk-s0502a:2055_6: adāsi. Atha naṃ katipāhaccayena jeṭṭhaputtassa bhariyā “aho amhākaṃ, ayyā, ‘jeṭṭhaputto
atk-s0502a:2055_7: me’ti dve koṭṭhāse datvā viya imameva gehaṃ āgacchatī”ti āha. Sesaputtānaṃ bhariyāpi
atk-s0502a:2055_8: evameva vadiṃsu. Jeṭṭhadhītaraṃ ādiṃ katvā tāsaṃ gehaṃ gatakālepi naṃ evameva vadiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2055_9: Sā avamānappattā hutvā “kiṃ imesaṃ santike vuṭṭhena, bhikkhunī hutvā jīvissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:2055_10: bhikkhunīupassayaṃ gantvā pabbajjaṃ yāci. Tā naṃ pabbājesuṃ. Sā laddhūpasampadā hutvā
atk-s0502a:2055_11: bahuputtikattherīti paññāyi. Sā “ahaṃ mahallakakāle pabbajitā, appamattāya me bhavitabba”nti
atk-s0502a:2055_12: bhikkhunīnaṃ vattapaṭivattaṃ karontī “sabbarattiṃ samaṇadhammaṃ karissāmī”ti heṭṭhāpāsāde
atk-s0502a:2055_13: ekaṃ thambhaṃ hatthena gahetvā taṃ āviñchamānāva samaṇadhammaṃ karoti, caṅkamamānāpi
atk-s0502a:2055_14: “andhakāraṭṭhāne me rukkhe vā katthaci vā sīsaṃ paṭihaññeyyā”ti taṃ rukkhaṃ hatthena
atk-s0502a:2055_15: gahetvā taṃ āviñchamānāva samaṇadhammaṃ karoti, “satthārā desitadhammameva karissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:2055_16: dhammaṃ āvajjetvā dhammaṃ anussaramānāva samaṇadhammaṃ karoti. Atha satthā gandhakuṭiyaṃ
atk-s0502a:2055_17: nisinnova obhāsaṃ pharitvā sammukhe nisinno viya tāya saddhiṃ kathento “bahuputtike
atk-s0502a:2055_18: mayā desitaṃ dhammaṃ anāvajjentassa apassantassa vassasataṃ jīvanato mayā desitaṃ
atk-s0502a:2055_19: dhammaṃ passantassa muhuttampi jīvitaṃ seyyo”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ
atk-s0502a:2059_0: Tattha dhammamuttamanti navavidhaṃ lokuttaradhammaṃ. So hi uttamo dhammo nāma. Yo
atk-s0502a:2059_1: hi taṃ na passati, tassa vassasatampi jīvanato taṃ dhammaṃ passantassa paṭivijjhantassa
atk-s0502a:2060: Gāthāpariyosāne bahuputtikattherī saha paṭisambhidāhi arahatte patiṭṭhahīti.
atk-s0502a:2070: Abhittharetha kalyāṇeti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto cūḷekasāṭakabrāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2071_0: Vipassidasabalassa kālasmiñhi mahāekasāṭakabrāhmaṇo nāma ahosi, ayaṃ pana etarahi
atk-s0502a:2071_1: sāvatthiyaṃ cūḷekasāṭako nāma. Tassa hi eko nivāsanasāṭako ahosi, brāhmaṇiyāpi eko.
atk-s0502a:2071_2: Ubhinnampi ekameva pārupanaṃ, bahi gamanakāle brāhmaṇo vā brāhmaṇī vā taṃ pārupati.
atk-s0502a:2071_3: Athekadivasaṃ vihāre dhammassavane ghosite brāhmaṇo āha – “bhoti dhammassavanaṃ ghositaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2071_4: kiṃ divā dhammassavanaṃ gamissasi, udāhu rattiṃ. Pārupanassa hi abhāvena na sakkā
atk-s0502a:2071_5: amhehi ekato gantu”nti. Brāhmaṇī, “sāmi, ahaṃ divā gamissāmī”ti sāṭakaṃ pārupitvā
atk-s0502a:2071_6: agamāsi. Brāhmaṇo divasabhāgaṃ gehe vītināmetvā rattiṃ gantvā satthu purato nisinnova
atk-s0502a:2071_7: dhammaṃ assosi. Athassa sarīraṃ pharamānā pañcavaṇṇā pīti uppajji. So satthāraṃ pūjitukāmo
atk-s0502a:2071_8: hutvā “sace imaṃ sāṭakaṃ dassāmi, neva brāhmaṇiyā, na mayhaṃ pārupanaṃ bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0502a:2071_9: cintesi. Athassa maccheracittānaṃ sahassaṃ uppajji, punekaṃ saddhācittaṃ uppajji.
atk-s0502a:2071_10: Taṃ abhibhavitvā puna maccherasahassaṃ uppajji. Itissa balavamaccheraṃ bandhitvā
atk-s0502a:2071_11: gaṇhantaṃ viya saddhācittaṃ paṭibāhatiyeva. Tassa “dassāmi, na dassāmī”ti cintentasseva
atk-s0502a:2071_12: paṭhamayāmo apagato, majjhimayāmo sampatto. Tasmimpi dātuṃ nāsakkhi. Pacchimayāme
atk-s0502a:2071_13: sampatte so cintesi – “mama saddhācittena maccheracittena ca saddhiṃ yujjhantasseva
atk-s0502a:2071_14: dve yāmā vītivattā, idaṃ mama ettakaṃ maccheracittaṃ vaḍḍhamānaṃ catūhi apāyehi sīsaṃ
atk-s0502a:2071_15: ukkhipituṃ na dassati, dassāmi na”nti. So maccherasahassaṃ abhibhavitvā saddhācittaṃ
atk-s0502a:2071_16: purecārikaṃ katvā sāṭakaṃ ādāya satthu pādamūle ṭhapetvā “jitaṃ me, jitaṃ me”ti tikkhattuṃ mahāsaddamakāsi.
atk-s0502a:2072_0: Rājā pasenadi kosalo dhammaṃ suṇanto taṃ saddaṃ sutvā “pucchatha naṃ, kiṃ kira tena
atk-s0502a:2072_1: jita”nti āha. So rājapurisehi pucchito tamatthaṃ ārocesi. Taṃ sutvā rājā “dukkaraṃ
atk-s0502a:2072_2: kataṃ brāhmaṇena, saṅgahamassa karissāmī”ti ekaṃ sāṭakayugaṃ dāpesi. So tampi tathāgatasseva
atk-s0502a:2072_3: adāsi. Puna rājā dve cattāri aṭṭha soḷasāti dviguṇaṃ katvā dāpesi. So tānipi tathāgatasseva
atk-s0502a:2072_4: adāsi. Athassa rājā dvattiṃsa yugāni dāpesi. Brāhmaṇo “attano aggahetvā laddhaṃ laddhaṃ
atk-s0502a:2072_5: vissajjesiyevā”ti vādamocanatthaṃ tato ekaṃ yugaṃ attano, ekaṃ brāhmaṇiyāti dve yugāni
atk-s0502a:2072_6: gahetvā tiṃsa yugāni tathāgatasseva adāsi. Rājā pana tasmiṃ sattakkhattumpi dadante
atk-s0502a:2072_7: puna dātukāmoyeva ahosi. Pubbe mahāekasāṭako catusaṭṭhiyā sāṭakayugesu dve aggahesi,
atk-s0502a:2072_8: ayaṃ pana dvattiṃsāya laddhakāle dve aggahesi. Rājā purise āṇāpesi – “dukkaraṃ bhaṇe
atk-s0502a:2072_9: brāhmaṇena kataṃ, antepure mama dve kambalāni āharāpeyyāthā”ti. Te tathā kariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2072_10: Rājā satasahassagghanake dve kambale dāpesi. Brāhmaṇo “na ime mama sarīre upayogaṃ
atk-s0502a:2072_11: arahanti, buddhasāsanasseva ete anucchavikā”ti ekaṃ kambalaṃ antogandhakuṭiyaṃ satthu
atk-s0502a:2072_12: sayanassa upari vitānaṃ katvā bandhi, ekaṃ attano ghare nibaddhaṃ bhuñjantassa bhikkhuno
atk-s0502a:2072_13: bhattakiccaṭṭhāne vitānaṃ katvā bandhi. Rājā sāyanhasamaye satthu santikaṃ gantvā
atk-s0502a:2072_14: taṃ kambalaṃ sañjānitvā, “bhante, kena pūjā katā”ti pucchitvā “ekasāṭakenā”ti vutte
atk-s0502a:2072_15: “brāhmaṇo mama pasādaṭṭhāneyeva pasīdatī”ti vatvā “cattāro hatthī cattāro asse cattāri
atk-s0502a:2072_16: kahāpaṇasahassāni catasso itthiyo catasso dāsiyo cattāro purise caturo gāmavare”ti
atk-s0502a:2072_17: evaṃ yāva sabbasatā cattāri cattāri katvā sabbacatukkaṃ nāma assa dāpesi.
atk-s0502a:2073_0: Bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ – “aho acchariyaṃ cūḷekasāṭakassa kammaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2073_1: taṃmuhuttameva sabbacatukkaṃ labhi, idāni katena kalyāṇakammena ajjameva vipāko dinno”ti.
atk-s0502a:2073_2: Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya
atk-s0502a:2073_3: nāmā”ti vutte, “bhikkhave, sacāyaṃ ekasāṭako paṭhamayāme mayhaṃ dātuṃ asakkhissa,
atk-s0502a:2073_4: sabbasoḷasakaṃ alabhissa. Sace majjhimayāme asakkhissa, sabbaṭṭhakaṃ alabhissa. Balavapacchimayāme
atk-s0502a:2073_5: dinnattā panesa sabbacatukkaṃ labhi. Kalyāṇakammaṃ karontena hi uppannaṃ cittaṃ ahāpetvā
atk-s0502a:2073_6: taṅkhaṇaññeva kātabbaṃ. Dandhaṃ kataṃ kusalañhi sampattiṃ dadamānaṃ dandhameva dadāti,
atk-s0502a:2073_7: tasmā cittuppādasamanantarameva kalyāṇakammaṃ kātabba”nti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā
atk-s0502a:2076: Dandhañhi karoto puññaṃ, pāpasmiṃ ramatī mano”ti.
atk-s0502a:2077_0: Tattha abhittharethāti turitaturitaṃ sīghasīghaṃ kareyyāti attho. Gihinā vā hi “salākabhattadānādīsu
atk-s0502a:2077_1: kiñcideva kusalaṃ karissāmī”ti citte uppanne yathā aññe okāsaṃ na labhanti, evaṃ
atk-s0502a:2077_2: “ahaṃ pure, ahaṃ pure”ti turitaturitameva kātabbaṃ. Pabbajitena vā upajjhāyavattādīni
atk-s0502a:2077_3: karontena aññassa okāsaṃ adatvā “ahaṃ pure, ahaṃ pure”ti turitaturitameva kātabbaṃ.
atk-s0502a:2077_4: Pāpā cittanti kāyaduccaritādipāpakammato vā akusalacittuppādato vā sabbathāmena cittaṃ
atk-s0502a:2077_5: nivāraye. Dandhañhi karototi yo pana “dassāmi, na dassāmi sampajjissati nu kho me,
atk-s0502a:2077_6: no”ti evaṃ cikkhallamaggena gacchanto viya dandhaṃ puññaṃ karoti, tassa ekasāṭakassa
atk-s0502a:2077_7: viya maccherasahassaṃ pāpaṃ okāsaṃ labhati. Athassa pāpasmiṃ ramatī mano, kusalakammakaraṇakāleyeva
atk-s0502a:2077_8: hi cittaṃ kusale ramati, tato muccitvā pāpaninnameva hotīti.
atk-s0502a:2081: Pāpañca purisoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto seyyasakattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2082_0: So hi lāḷudāyittherassa saddhivihāriko, attano anabhiratiṃ tassa ārocetvā tena paṭhamasaṅghādisesakamme
atk-s0502a:2082_1: samādapito uppannuppannāya anabhiratiyā taṃ kammamakāsi. Satthā tassa kiriyaṃ sutvā
atk-s0502a:2082_2: taṃ pakkosāpetvā “evaṃ kira tvaṃ karosī”ti pucchitvā “āma, bhante”ti vutte “kasmā
atk-s0502a:2082_3: bhāriyaṃ kammaṃ akāsi, ananucchavikaṃ moghapurisā”ti nānappakārato garahitvā sikkhāpadaṃ
atk-s0502a:2082_4: paññāpetvā “evarūpañhi kammaṃ diṭṭhadhammepi samparāyepi dukkhasaṃvattanikameva hotī”ti
atk-s0502a:2082_5: vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2084: “Pāpañce puriso kayirā, na naṃ kayirā punappunaṃ;
atk-s0502a:2085: Na tamhi chandaṃ kayirātha, dukkho pāpassa uccayo”ti.
atk-s0502a:2086_0: Tassattho – sace puriso sakiṃ pāpakammaṃ kareyya, taṅkhaṇeyeva paccavekkhitvā “idaṃ
atk-s0502a:2086_1: appatirūpaṃ oḷārika”nti na naṃ kayirā punappunaṃ. Yopi tamhi chando vā ruci vā uppajjeyya,
atk-s0502a:2086_2: tampi vinodetvā na kayirātheva. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Dukkho pāpassa uccayo. Pāpassa hi uccayo
atk-s0502a:2090: Puññañceti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto lājadevadhītaraṃ ārabbha kathesi. Vatthu rājagahe samuṭṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0502a:2091_0: Āyasmā hi mahākassapo pippaliguhāyaṃ viharanto jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā sattame divase
atk-s0502a:2091_1: vuṭṭhāya dibbena cakkhunā bhikkhācāraṭṭhānaṃ olokento ekaṃ sālikhettapālikaṃ itthiṃ
atk-s0502a:2091_2: sālisīsāni gahetvā lāje kurumānaṃ disvā “saddhā nu kho, assaddhā”ti vīmaṃsitvā “saddhā”ti
atk-s0502a:2091_3: ñatvā “sakkhissati nu kho me saṅgahaṃ kātuṃ, no”ti upadhārento “visāradā kuladhītā
atk-s0502a:2091_4: mama saṅgahaṃ karissati, katvā ca pana mahāsampattiṃ labhissatī”ti ñatvā cīvaraṃ
atk-s0502a:2091_5: pārupitvā pattamādāya sālikhettasamīpeyeva aṭṭhāsi. Kuladhītā theraṃ disvāva pasannacittā
atk-s0502a:2091_6: pañcavaṇṇāya pītiyā phuṭṭhasarīrā “tiṭṭhatha, bhante”ti vatvā lāje ādāya vegena gantvā
atk-s0502a:2091_7: therassa patte ākiritvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā, “bhante, tumhehi diṭṭhadhammassa
atk-s0502a:2091_8: bhāginī assa”nti patthanaṃ akāsi. Thero “evaṃ hotū”ti anumodanamakāsi. Sāpi theraṃ
atk-s0502a:2091_9: vanditvā attanā dinnadānaṃ āvajjamānā nivatti. Tāya ca pana kedāramariyādāya gamanamagge
atk-s0502a:2091_10: ekasmiṃ bile ghoraviso sappo nipajji. So therassa kāsāyapaṭicchannaṃ jaṅghaṃ ḍaṃsituṃ
atk-s0502a:2091_11: nāsakkhi. Itarā dānaṃ āvajjamānā nivattantī taṃ padesaṃ pāpuṇi. Sappo bilā nikkhamitvā
atk-s0502a:2091_12: taṃ ḍaṃsitvā tattheva pātesi. Sā pasannacittena kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane tiṃsayojanike
atk-s0502a:2091_13: kanakavimāne suttappabuddhā viya sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitena tigāvutena attabhāvena
atk-s0502a:2091_14: nibbatti. Sā dvādasayojanikaṃ ekaṃ dibbavatthaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ pārupitvā accharāsahassaparivutā
atk-s0502a:2091_16: vimānadvāre ṭhitā attano sampattiṃ oloketvā “kiṃ nu kho me katvā ayaṃ sampatti laddhā”ti
atk-s0502a:2091_17: dibbena cakkhunā upadhārentī “ayyassa me mahākassapattherassa dinnalājanissandena
atk-s0502a:2092_0: Sā evaṃ parittakena kammena evarūpaṃ sampattiṃ labhitvā “na dāni mayā pamajjituṃ
atk-s0502a:2092_1: vaṭṭati, ayyassa vattapaṭivattaṃ katvā imaṃ sampattiṃ thāvaraṃ karissāmī”ti cintetvā
atk-s0502a:2092_2: pātova kanakamayaṃ sammajjaniñceva kacavarachaḍḍanakañca pacchiṃ ādāya gantvā therassa
atk-s0502a:2092_3: pariveṇaṃ sammajjitvā pānīyaparibhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhāpesi. Thero taṃ disvā “kenaci daharena
atk-s0502a:2092_4: vā sāmaṇerena vā vattaṃ kataṃ bhavissatī”ti sallakkhesi. Sā dutiyadivasepi tatheva
atk-s0502a:2092_5: akāsi, theropi tatheva sallakkhesi. Tatiyadivase pana thero tassā sammajjanisaddaṃ
atk-s0502a:2092_6: sutvā tālacchiddādīhi ca paviṭṭhaṃ sarīrobhāsaṃ disvā dvāraṃ vivaritvā “ko esa sammajjatī”ti
atk-s0502a:2092_7: pucchi. “Ahaṃ, bhante, tumhākaṃ upaṭṭhāyikā lājadevadhītā”ti. “Nanu mayhaṃ evaṃnāmikā
atk-s0502a:2092_8: upaṭṭhāyikā nāma natthī”ti. “Ahaṃ, bhante, sālikhettaṃ rakkhamānā lāje datvā pasannacittā
atk-s0502a:2092_9: nivattantī sappena daṭṭhā kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsadevaloke uppannā, mayā ayyaṃ nissāya
atk-s0502a:2092_10: ayaṃ sampatti laddhā, idānipi tumhākaṃ vattapaṭivattaṃ katvā ‘sampattiṃ thāvaraṃ
atk-s0502a:2092_11: karissāmī’ti āgatāmhi, bhante”ti. “Hiyyopi parepi tayāvetaṃ ṭhānaṃ sammajjitaṃ, tayāva
atk-s0502a:2092_12: pānīyabhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhāpita”nti. “Āma, bhante”ti. “Apehi devadhīte, tayā kataṃ vattaṃ
atk-s0502a:2092_13: kataṃva hotu, ito paṭṭhāya imaṃ ṭhānaṃ mā āgamī”ti. “Bhante, mā maṃ nāsetha, tumhākaṃ
atk-s0502a:2092_14: vattaṃ katvā sampattiṃ me thiraṃ kātuṃ dethā”ti. “Apehi devadhīte, mā maṃ anāgate
atk-s0502a:2092_15: cittabījaniṃ gahetvā nisinnehi dhammakathikehi ‘mahākassapattherassa kira ekā devadhītā
atk-s0502a:2092_16: āgantvā vattapaṭivattaṃ katvā pānīyaparibhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhāpesī’ti vattabbataṃ kari,
atk-s0502a:2092_17: ito paṭṭhāya idha mā āgami, paṭikkamā”ti. Sā “mā maṃ, bhante, nāsethā”ti punappunaṃ
atk-s0502a:2092_18: yāciyeva. Thero “nāyaṃ mama vacanaṃ suṇātī”ti cintetvā “tuvaṃ pamāṇaṃ na jānāsī”ti
atk-s0502a:2092_19: accharaṃ pahari. Sā tattha saṇṭhātuṃ asakkontī ākāse uppatitvā añjaliṃ paggayha,
atk-s0502a:2092_20: “bhante, mayā laddhasampattiṃ mā nāsetha, thāvaraṃ kātuṃ dethā”ti rodantī ākāse aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:2093_0: Satthā jetavane gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnova tassā roditasaddaṃ sutvā obhāsaṃ pharitvā
atk-s0502a:2093_1: devadhītāya sammukhe nisīditvā kathento viya “devadhīte mama puttassa kassapassa
atk-s0502a:2093_2: saṃvarakaraṇameva bhāro, puññatthikānaṃ pana ‘ayaṃ no attho’ti sallakkhetvā puññakaraṇameva
atk-s0502a:2093_3: bhāro. Puññakaraṇañhi idha ceva samparāye ca sukhamevā”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā
atk-s0502a:2096: Tamhi chandaṃ kayirātha, sukho puññassa uccayo”ti.
atk-s0502a:2097_0: Tassattho – sace puriso puññaṃ kareyya, “ekavāraṃ me puññaṃ kataṃ, alaṃ ettāvatā”ti
atk-s0502a:2097_1: anoramitvā punappunaṃ karotheva. Tassa akaraṇakkhaṇepi tamhi puññe chandaṃ ruciṃ
atk-s0502a:2097_2: ussāhaṃ karotheva. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Sukho puññassa uccayo. Puññassa hi uccayo vuḍḍhi idhalokaparalokasukhāvahanato sukhoti.
atk-s0502a:2098: Desanāvasāne devadhītā pañcacattālīsayojanamatthake ṭhitāva sotāpattiphalaṃ pāpuṇīti.
atk-s0502a:2101: Pāpopi passatī bhadranti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto anāthapiṇḍikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2102_0: Anāthapiṇḍiko hi vihārameva uddissa catupaṇṇāsakoṭidhanaṃ buddhasāsane vikiritvā
atk-s0502a:2102_1: satthari jetavane viharante devasikaṃ tīṇi mahāupaṭṭhānāni gacchati, gacchanto ca
atk-s0502a:2102_2: “kiṃ nu kho ādāya āgatoti sāmaṇerā vā daharā vā hatthampi me olokeyyu”nti tucchahattho
atk-s0502a:2102_3: nāma na gatapubbo. Pātova gacchanto yāguṃ gāhāpetvāva gacchati, katapātarāso sappinavanītādīni
atk-s0502a:2102_4: bhesajjāni. Sāyanhasamaye mālāgandhavilepanavatthādīni gāhāpetvā gacchati. Evaṃ niccakālameva
atk-s0502a:2102_5: divase divase dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ rakkhati. Aparabhāge dhanaṃ parikkhayaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0502a:2102_6: Vohārūpajīvinopissa hatthato aṭṭhārasakoṭidhanaṃ iṇaṃ gaṇhiṃsu, kulasantakāpissa
atk-s0502a:2102_7: aṭṭhārasahiraññakoṭiyo, nadītīre nidahitvā ṭhapitā udakena kūle bhinne mahāsamuddaṃ
atk-s0502a:2102_8: pavisiṃsu. Evamassa anupubbena dhanaṃ parikkhayaṃ agamāsi. So evaṃbhūtopi saṅghassa
atk-s0502a:2102_9: dānaṃ detiyeva, paṇītaṃ pana katvā dātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0502a:2103_0: So ekadivasaṃ satthārā “dīyati pana te, gahapati, kule dāna”nti vutte “dīyati, bhante,
atk-s0502a:2103_1: tañca kho kaṇājakaṃ bilaṅgadutiya”nti āha. Atha naṃ satthā, “gahapati, ‘lūkhaṃ dānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2103_2: demī’ti mā cintayi. Cittasmiñhi paṇīte buddhādīnaṃ dinnadānaṃ lūkhaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0502a:2103_3: apica tvaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ ariyapuggalānaṃ dānaṃ desi, ahaṃ pana velāmakāle sakalajambudīpaṃ
atk-s0502a:2103_4: unnaṅgalaṃ katvā mahādānaṃ pavattayamānopi tisaraṇagatampi kañci nālatthaṃ, dakkhiṇeyyā
atk-s0502a:2103_5: nāma evaṃ dullabhā. Tasmā ‘lūkhaṃ me dāna’nti mā cintayī”ti vatvā velāmasuttamassa
atk-s0502a:2103_6: kathesi. Athassa dvārakoṭṭhake adhivatthā devatā satthari ceva satthusāvakesu ca
atk-s0502a:2103_7: gehaṃ pavisantesu tesaṃ tejena saṇṭhātuṃ asakkontī, “yathā ime imaṃ gehaṃ na pavisanti,
atk-s0502a:2103_8: tathā gahapatiṃ paribhindissāmī”ti taṃ vattukāmāpi issarakāle kiñci vattuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0502a:2103_9: idāni “panāyaṃ duggato gaṇhissati me vacana”nti rattibhāge seṭṭhissa sirigabbhaṃ
atk-s0502a:2103_10: pavisitvā ākāse aṭṭhāsi. Atha seṭṭhi naṃ disvā “ko eso”ti āha. Ahaṃ te mahāseṭṭhi
atk-s0502a:2103_11: catutthadvārakoṭṭhake adhivatthā devatā, tuyhaṃ ovādadānatthāya āgatāti. Tena hi
atk-s0502a:2103_12: ovadehīti. Mahāseṭṭhi tayā pacchimakālaṃ anoloketvāva samaṇassa gotamassa sāsane
atk-s0502a:2103_13: bahuṃ dhanaṃ vippakiṇṇaṃ, idāni duggato hutvāpi taṃ na muñcasiyeva, evaṃ vattamāno
atk-s0502a:2103_14: katipāheneva ghāsacchādanamattampi na labhissasi, kiṃ te samaṇena gotamena, atipariccāgato
atk-s0502a:2103_15: oramitvā kammante payojento kuṭumbaṃ saṇṭhāpehīti. Ayaṃ me tayā dinnaovādoti. Āma,
atk-s0502a:2103_16: seṭṭhīti. Gaccha, nāhaṃ tādisīnaṃ satenapi sahassenapi satasahassenapi sakkā kampetuṃ,
atk-s0502a:2103_17: ayuttaṃ te vuttaṃ, kaṃ tayā mama gehe vasamānāya, sīghaṃ sīghaṃ me gharā nikkhamāhīti.
atk-s0502a:2103_18: Sā sotāpannassa ariyasāvakassa vacanaṃ sutvā ṭhātuṃ asakkontī dārake ādāya nikkhami,
atk-s0502a:2103_19: nikkhamitvā ca pana aññattha vasanaṭṭhānaṃ alabhamānā “seṭṭhiṃ khamāpetvā tattheva
atk-s0502a:2103_20: vasissāmī”ti nagarapariggāhakaṃ devaputtaṃ upasaṅkamitvā attanā katāparādhaṃ ācikkhitvā
atk-s0502a:2103_21: “ehi, maṃ seṭṭhissa santikaṃ netvā khamāpetvā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ dāpehī”ti āha. So “ayuttaṃ
atk-s0502a:2103_22: tayā vuttaṃ, nāhaṃ tassa santikaṃ gantuṃ ussahāmī”ti taṃ paṭikkhipi. Sā catunnaṃ
atk-s0502a:2103_23: mahārājānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā tehipi paṭikkhittā sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā taṃ
atk-s0502a:2103_24: pavattiṃ ācikkhitvā, “ahaṃ, deva, vasanaṭṭhānaṃ alabhamānā dārake hatthena gahetvā
atk-s0502a:2103_25: anāthā vicarāmi, vasanaṭṭhānaṃ me dāpehī”ti suṭṭhutaraṃ yāci.
atk-s0502a:2104_0: Atha naṃ so “ahampi tava kāraṇā seṭṭhiṃ vattuṃ na sakkhissāmi, ekaṃ pana te upāyaṃ
atk-s0502a:2104_1: kathessāmī”ti āha. Sādhu, deva, kathehīti. Gaccha, seṭṭhino āyuttakavesaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0502a:2104_2: seṭṭhissa hatthato paṇṇaṃ āropetvā vohārūpajīvīhi gahitaṃ aṭṭhārasakoṭidhanaṃ attano
atk-s0502a:2104_3: ānubhāvena sodhetvā tucchagabbhe pūretvā mahāsamuddaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ aṭṭhārasakoṭidhanaṃ
atk-s0502a:2104_4: atthi, aññampi asukaṭṭhāne nāma assāmikaṃ aṭṭhārasakoṭidhanaṃ atthi, taṃ sabbaṃ saṃharitvā
atk-s0502a:2104_5: tassa tucchagabbhe pūretvā daṇḍakammaṃ katvā khamāpehīti. Sā “sādhu, devā”ti vuttanayeneva
atk-s0502a:2104_6: taṃ sabbaṃ katvā puna tassa sirigabbhaṃ obhāsayamānā ākāse ṭhatvā “ko eso”ti vutte
atk-s0502a:2104_7: ahaṃ te catutthadvārakoṭṭhake adhivatthā andhabāladevatā, mayā andhabālatāya yaṃ
atk-s0502a:2104_8: tumhākaṃ santike kathitaṃ, taṃ me khamatha. Sakkassa hi me vacanena catupaṇṇāsakoṭidhanaṃ
atk-s0502a:2104_9: saṃharitvā tucchagabbhapūraṇaṃ daṇḍakammaṃ kataṃ, vasanaṭṭhānaṃ alabhamānā kilamāmīti.
atk-s0502a:2104_10: Anāthapiṇḍiko cintesi – “ayaṃ devatā ‘daṇḍakammañca me kata’nti vadati, attano ca
atk-s0502a:2104_11: dosaṃ paṭijānāti, sammāsambuddhassa naṃ dassessāmī”ti. So taṃ satthu santikaṃ netvā
atk-s0502a:2104_12: tāya katakammaṃ sabbaṃ ārocesi. Devatā satthu pādesu sirasā nipatitvā, “bhante, yaṃ
atk-s0502a:2104_13: mayā andhabālatāya tumhākaṃ guṇe ajānitvā pāpakaṃ vacanaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ me khamathā”ti
atk-s0502a:2104_14: satthāraṃ khamāpetvā mahāseṭṭhiṃ khamāpesi. Satthā kalyāṇapāpakānaṃ kammānaṃ vipākavasena
atk-s0502a:2104_15: seṭṭhiñceva devatañca ovadanto “idha, gahapati, pāpapuggalopi yāva pāpaṃ na paccati,
atk-s0502a:2104_16: tāva bhadrampi passati. Yadā panassa pāpaṃ paccati, tadā pāpameva passati. Bhadrapuggalopi
atk-s0502a:2104_17: yāva bhadraṃ na paccati, tāva pāpāni passati. Yadā panassa bhadraṃ paccati, tadā
atk-s0502a:2104_18: bhadrameva passatī”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:2106: “Pāpopi passatī bhadraṃ, yāva pāpaṃ na paccati;
atk-s0502a:2107: Yadā ca paccatī pāpaṃ, atha pāpo pāpāni passati.
atk-s0502a:2109: “Bhadropi passatī pāpaṃ, yāva bhadraṃ na paccati;
atk-s0502a:2110: Yadā ca paccatī bhadraṃ, atha bhadro bhadrāni passatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2111_0: Tattha pāpoti kāyaduccaritādinā pāpakammena yuttapuggalo. Sopi hi purimasucaritānubhāvena
atk-s0502a:2111_1: nibbattaṃ sukhaṃ anubhavamāno bhadrampi passati. Yāva pāpaṃ na paccatīti yāvassa
atk-s0502a:2111_2: taṃ pāpakammaṃ diṭṭhadhamme vā samparāye vā vipākaṃ na deti. Yadā panassa taṃ diṭṭhadhamme
atk-s0502a:2111_3: vā samparāye vā vipākaṃ deti, atha diṭṭhadhamme vividhā kammakāraṇā, samparāye ca
atk-s0502a:2111_4: apāyadukkhaṃ anubhonto so pāpo pāpāniyeva passati. Dutiyagāthāyapi kāyasucaritādinā
atk-s0502a:2111_5: bhadrakammena yutto bhadro. Sopi hi purimaduccaritānubhāvena nibbattaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavamāno
atk-s0502a:2111_6: pāpaṃ passati. Yāva bhadraṃ na paccatīti yāvassa taṃ bhadraṃ kammaṃ diṭṭhadhamme
atk-s0502a:2111_7: vā samparāye vā vipākaṃ na deti. Yadā pana taṃ vipākaṃ deti, atha diṭṭhadhamme lābhasakkārādisukhaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2111_8: samparāye ca dibbasampattisukhaṃ anubhavamāno so bhadro bhadrāniyeva passatīti.
atk-s0502a:2112: Desanāvasāne sā devatā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattaparisāyapi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:2115: Māvamaññetha pāpassāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ asaññataparikkhāraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2116_0: So kira yaṃ kiñci mañcapīṭhādibhedaṃ parikkhāraṃ bahi paribhuñjitvā tattheva chaḍḍeti.
atk-s0502a:2116_1: Parikkhāro vassenapi ātapenapi upacikādīhipi vinassati. So bhikkhūhi “nanu, āvuso,
atk-s0502a:2116_2: parikkhāro nāma paṭisāmitabbo”ti vutte “appakaṃ mayā kataṃ, āvuso, etaṃ, na etassa
atk-s0502a:2116_3: cittaṃ atthi, na pitta”nti vatvā tatheva karoti. Bhikkhū tassa kiriyaṃ satthu ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:2116_4: Satthā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu evaṃ karosī”ti pucchi. So satthārā
atk-s0502a:2116_5: pucchitopi “kiṃ etaṃ bhagavā appakaṃ mayā kataṃ, na tassa cittaṃ atthi, nāssa pitta”nti
atk-s0502a:2116_6: tatheva avamaññanto āha. Atha naṃ satthā “bhikkhūhi evaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati, pāpakammaṃ
atk-s0502a:2116_7: nāma ‘appaka’nti na avamaññitabbaṃ. Ajjhokāse ṭhapitañhi vivaṭamukhaṃ bhājanaṃ deve
atk-s0502a:2116_8: vassante kiñcāpi ekabindunā na pūrati, punappunaṃ vassante pana pūrateva, evamevaṃ
atk-s0502a:2116_9: pāpaṃ karonto puggalo anupubbena mahantaṃ pāparāsiṃ karotī”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā
atk-s0502a:2120: Bālo pūrati pāpassa, thokaṃ thokampi ācina”nti.
atk-s0502a:2121_0: Tattha māvamaññethāti na avajāneyya. Pāpassāti pāpaṃ. Na mandaṃ āgamissatīti “appamattakaṃ
atk-s0502a:2121_1: me pāpakaṃ kataṃ, kadā etaṃ vipaccissatī”ti evaṃ pāpaṃ nāvajāneyyāti attho. Udakumbhopīti
atk-s0502a:2121_2: deve vassante mukhaṃ vivaritvā ṭhapitaṃ yaṃ kiñci kulālabhājanaṃ yathā taṃ ekekassāpi
atk-s0502a:2121_3: udakabinduno nipātena anupubbena pūrati, evaṃ bālapuggalo thokaṃ thokampi pāpaṃ ācinanto
atk-s0502a:2122: Desanāvasāne bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pāpuṇiṃsu. Satthāpi “ajjhokāse seyyaṃ santharitvā paṭipākatikaṃ akaronto imaṃ nāma āpattimāpajjatī”ti sikkhāpadaṃ paññāpesīti.
atk-s0502a:2125: Māvamaññetha puññassāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto biḷālapādakaseṭṭhiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2126: Ekasmiñhi samaye sāvatthivāsino vaggabandhanena buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ denti. Athekadivasaṃ satthā anumodanaṃ karonto evamāha –
atk-s0502a:2127_0: “Upāsakā idhekacco attanāva dānaṃ deti, paraṃ na samādapeti. So nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a:2127_1: bhogasampadaṃ labhati, no parivārasampadaṃ. Ekacco attanā dānaṃ na deti, paraṃ samādapeti.
atk-s0502a:2127_2: So nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne parivārasampadaṃ labhati, no bhogasampadaṃ. Ekacco attanā
atk-s0502a:2127_3: ca na deti, parañca na samādapeti. So nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne neva bhogasampadaṃ labhati,
atk-s0502a:2127_4: na parivārasampadaṃ, vighāsādo hutvā vicarati. Ekacco attanā ca deti, parañca samādapeti.
atk-s0502a:2128_0: Atheko paṇḍitapuriso taṃ dhammadesanaṃ sutvā “aho acchariyamidaṃ kāraṇaṃ, ahaṃ dāni
atk-s0502a:2128_1: ubhayasampattisaṃvattanikaṃ kammaṃ karissāmī”ti cintetvā satthāraṃ uṭṭhāya gamanakāle
atk-s0502a:2128_2: āha – “bhante, sve amhākaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti. Kittakehi pana te bhikkhūhi atthoti?
atk-s0502a:2128_3: Sabbabhikkhūhi, bhanteti. Satthā adhivāsesi. Sopi gāmaṃ pavisitvā, “ammatātā, mayā
atk-s0502a:2128_4: svātanāya buddhappamukho bhikkhusaṅgho nimantito, yo yattakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0502a:2128_5: so tattakānaṃ yāguādīnaṃ atthāya taṇḍulādīni detu, ekasmiṃ ṭhāne pacāpetvā dānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2129_0: Atha naṃ eko seṭṭhi attano āpaṇadvāraṃ sampattaṃ disvā “ayaṃ attano pahonake bhikkhū
atk-s0502a:2129_1: animantetvā pana sakalagāmaṃ samādapento vicaratī”ti kujjhitvā “tayā gahitabhājanaṃ
atk-s0502a:2129_2: āharā”ti tīhi aṅgulīhi gahetvā thoke taṇḍule adāsi, tathā mugge, tathā māseti. So
atk-s0502a:2129_3: tato paṭṭhāya biḷālapādakaseṭṭhi nāma jāto, sappiphāṇitādīni dentopi karaṇḍaṃ kuṭe
atk-s0502a:2129_4: pakkhipitvā ekato koṇaṃ katvā binduṃ binduṃ paggharāyanto thokathokameva adāsi. Upāsako
atk-s0502a:2129_5: avasesehi dinnaṃ ekato katvā iminā dinnaṃ visuṃyeva aggahesi. So seṭṭhi tassa kiriyaṃ
atk-s0502a:2129_6: disvā “kiṃ nu kho esa mayā dinnaṃ visuṃ gaṇhātī”ti cintetvā tassa pacchato pacchato
atk-s0502a:2129_7: ekaṃ cūḷupaṭṭhākaṃ pahiṇi “gaccha, yaṃ esa karoti, taṃ jānāhī”ti. So gantvā “seṭṭhissa
atk-s0502a:2129_8: mahapphalaṃ hotū”ti yāgubhattapūvānaṃ atthāya ekaṃ dve taṇḍule pakkhipitvā muggamāsepi
atk-s0502a:2129_9: telaphāṇitādibindūnipi sabbabhājanesu pakkhipi. Cūḷupaṭṭhāko gantvā seṭṭhissa ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:2129_10: Taṃ sutvā seṭṭhi cintesi – “sace me so parisamajjhe avaṇṇaṃ bhāsissati, mama nāme
atk-s0502a:2129_11: gahitamatteyeva naṃ paharitvā māressāmī”ti nivāsanantare churikaṃ bandhitvā punadivase
atk-s0502a:2129_12: gantvā bhattagge aṭṭhāsi. So puriso buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ parivisitvā bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0502a:2129_13: āha – “bhante, mayā mahājanaṃ samādapetvā imaṃ dānaṃ dinnaṃ, tattha samādapitamanussā
atk-s0502a:2129_14: attano attano balena bahūnipi thokānipi taṇḍulādīni adaṃsu, tesaṃ sabbesaṃ mahapphalaṃ
atk-s0502a:2129_15: hotū”ti. Taṃ sutvā so seṭṭhi cintesi – “ahaṃ ‘asukena nāma accharāya gaṇhitvā taṇḍulādīni
atk-s0502a:2129_16: dinnānīti mama nāme gahitamatte imaṃ māressāmī’ti āgato, ayaṃ pana sabbasaṅgāhikaṃ
atk-s0502a:2129_17: katvā ‘yehipi nāḷiādīhi minitvā dinnaṃ, yehipi accharāya gahetvā dinnaṃ, sabbesaṃ
atk-s0502a:2129_18: mahapphalaṃ hotū’ti vadati. Sacāhaṃ evarūpaṃ na khamāpessāmi, devadaṇḍo mama matthake
atk-s0502a:2129_19: patissatī”ti. So tassa pādamūle nipajjitvā “khamāhi me, sāmī”ti āha. “Kiṃ ida”nti
atk-s0502a:2129_20: ca tena vutte sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi. Taṃ kiriyaṃ disvā satthā “kiṃ ida”nti
atk-s0502a:2129_21: dānaveyyāvaṭikaṃ pucchi. So atītadivasato paṭṭhāya sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi. Atha
atk-s0502a:2129_22: naṃ satthā “evaṃ kira seṭṭhī”ti pucchitvā, “āma, bhante”ti vutte, “upāsaka, puññaṃ
atk-s0502a:2129_23: nāma ‘appaka’nti na avamaññitabbaṃ, mādisassa buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0502a:2129_24: dānaṃ datvā ‘appaka’nti na avamaññitabbaṃ. Paṇḍitamanussā hi puññaṃ karontā vivaṭabhājanaṃ
atk-s0502a:2129_25: viya udakena anukkamena puññena pūrantiyevā”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ
atk-s0502a:2133: Dhīro pūrati puññassa, thokaṃ thokampi ācina”nti.
atk-s0502a:2134_0: Tassattho – paṇḍitamanusso puññaṃ katvā “appakamattaṃ mayā kataṃ, na mandaṃ vipākavasena
atk-s0502a:2134_1: āgamissati, evaṃ parittakaṃ kammaṃ kahaṃ maṃ dakkhissati, ahaṃ vā taṃ kahaṃ dakkhissāmi,
atk-s0502a:2134_2: kadā etaṃ vipaccissatī”ti evaṃ puññaṃ māvamaññetha na avajāneyya. Yathā hi nirantaraṃ
atk-s0502a:2134_3: udabindunipātena vivaritvā ṭhapitaṃ kulālabhājanaṃ pūrati, evaṃ dhīro paṇḍitapuriso
atk-s0502a:2134_4: thokaṃ thokampi puññaṃ ācinanto puññassa pūratīti.
atk-s0502a:2135: Desanāvasāne so seṭṭhi sotāpattiphalaṃ pāpuṇi, sampattaparisāyapi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:2138: Vāṇijovāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto mahādhanavāṇijaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2139_0: Tassa kira vāṇijassa gehe pañcasatā corā otāraṃ gavesamānā otāraṃ na labhiṃsu. Aparena
atk-s0502a:2139_1: samayena vāṇijo pañca sakaṭasatāni bhaṇḍassa pūretvā bhikkhūnaṃ ārocāpesi – “ahaṃ
atk-s0502a:2139_2: asukaṭṭhānaṃ nāma vāṇijjatthāya gacchāmi, ye, ayyā, taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantukāmā, te nikkhamantu,
atk-s0502a:2139_3: magge bhikkhāya na kilamissantī”ti. Taṃ sutvā pañcasatā bhikkhū tena saddhiṃ maggaṃ
atk-s0502a:2139_4: paṭipajjiṃsu. Tepi corā “so kira vāṇijo nikkhanto”ti gantvā aṭaviyaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu. Vāṇijopi
atk-s0502a:2139_5: gantvā aṭavimukhe ekasmiṃ gāme vāsaṃ katvā dve tayopi divase goṇasakaṭādīni saṃvidahi,
atk-s0502a:2139_6: tesaṃ pana bhikkhūnaṃ nibaddhaṃ bhikkhaṃ detiyeva. Corā tasmiṃ aticirāyante “gaccha,
atk-s0502a:2139_7: tassa nikkhamanadivasaṃ ñatvā ehī”ti ekaṃ purisaṃ pahiṇiṃsu. So taṃ gāmaṃ gantvā
atk-s0502a:2139_8: ekaṃ sahāyakaṃ pucchi – “kadā vāṇijo nikkhamissatī”ti. So “dvīhatīhaccayenā”ti vatvā
atk-s0502a:2139_9: “kimatthaṃ pana pucchasī”ti āha. Athassa so “mayaṃ pañcasatā corā etassatthāya aṭaviyaṃ
atk-s0502a:2139_10: ṭhitā”ti ācikkhi. Itaro “tena hi gaccha, sīghaṃ nikkhamissatī”ti taṃ uyyojetvā, “kiṃ
atk-s0502a:2139_11: nu kho core vāremi, udāhu vāṇija”nti cintetvā, “kiṃ me corehi, vāṇijaṃ nissāya pañcasatā
atk-s0502a:2139_12: bhikkhū jīvanti, vāṇijassa saññaṃ dassāmī”ti so tassa santikaṃ gantvā “kadā gamissathā”ti
atk-s0502a:2139_13: pucchitvā “tatiyadivase”ti vutte mayhaṃ vacanaṃ karotha, aṭaviyaṃ kira tumhākaṃ atthāya
atk-s0502a:2139_14: pañcasatā corā ṭhitā, mā tāva gamitthāti. Tvaṃ kathaṃ jānāsīti? Tesaṃ antare mama
atk-s0502a:2139_15: sahāyo atthi, tassa me kathāya ñātanti. “Tena hi ‘kiṃ me etto gatenā’ti nivattitvā
atk-s0502a:2139_16: gehameva gamissāmī”ti āha. Tasmiṃ cirāyante puna tehi corehi pesito puriso āgantvā
atk-s0502a:2139_17: taṃ sahāyakaṃ pucchitvā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā “nivattitvā gehameva kira gamissatī”ti
atk-s0502a:2139_18: gantvā corānaṃ ārocesi. Taṃ sutvā corā tato nikkhamitvā itarasmiṃ magge aṭṭhaṃsu,
atk-s0502a:2139_19: tasmiṃ cirayante punapi te corā tassa santikaṃ purisaṃ pesesuṃ. So tesaṃ tattha ṭhitabhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:2139_20: ñatvā puna vāṇijassa ārocesi. Vāṇijo “idhāpi me vekallaṃ natthi, evaṃ sante neva
atk-s0502a:2139_21: etto gamissāmi, na ito, idheva bhavissāmī”ti bhikkhūnaṃ santikaṃ gantvā āha – “bhante,
atk-s0502a:2139_22: corā kira maṃ vilumpitukāmā magge ṭhitā, ‘puna nivattissatī’ti sutvā itarasmiṃ magge
atk-s0502a:2139_23: ṭhitā, ahaṃ etto vā ito vā agantvā thokaṃ idheva bhavissāmi, bhadantā idheva vasitukāmā
atk-s0502a:2139_24: vasantu, gantukāmā attano ruciṃ karontū”ti. Bhikkhū “evaṃ sante mayaṃ nivattissāmā”ti
atk-s0502a:2139_25: vāṇijaṃ āpucchitvā punadeva sāvatthiṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā nisīdiṃsu. Satthā
atk-s0502a:2139_26: “kiṃ, bhikkhave, mahādhanavāṇijena saddhiṃ na gamitthā”ti pucchitvā “āma, bhante,
atk-s0502a:2139_27: mahādhanavāṇijassa vilumpanatthāya dvīsupi maggesu corā pariyuṭṭhiṃsu, tena so tattheva
atk-s0502a:2139_28: ṭhito, mayaṃ pana taṃ āpucchitvā āgatā”ti vutte, “bhikkhave, mahādhanavāṇijo corānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2139_29: atthitāya maggaṃ parivajjati, jīvitukāmo viya puriso halāhalaṃ visaṃ parivajjeti,
atk-s0502a:2139_30: bhikkhunāpi ‘tayo bhavā corehi pariyuṭṭhitamaggasadisā’ti ñatvā pāpaṃ parivajjetuṃ
atk-s0502a:2139_31: vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2143_0: Tattha bhayanti bhāyitabbaṃ, corehi pariyuṭṭhitattā sappaṭibhayanti attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ
atk-s0502a:2143_1: hoti – yathā mahādhanavāṇijo appasattho sappaṭibhayaṃ maggaṃ, yathā ca jīvitukāmo
atk-s0502a:2143_2: halāhalaṃ visaṃ parivajjeti, evaṃ paṇḍito bhikkhu appamattakānipi pāpāni parivajjeyyāti.
atk-s0502a:2144: Desanāvasāne te bhikkhū saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu, sampattamahājanassāpi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:2147: Pāṇimhi ceti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto kukkuṭamittaṃ nāma nesādaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2148_0: Rājagahe kira ekā seṭṭhidhītā vayappattā sattabhūmikapāsādassa upari sirigabbhe ārakkhaṇatthāya
atk-s0502a:2148_1: ekaṃ paricārikaṃ datvā mātāpitūhi vāsiyamānā ekadivasaṃ sāyanhasamaye vātapānena
atk-s0502a:2148_2: antaravīthiṃ olokentī pañca pāsasatāni pañca sūlasatāni ādāya mige vadhitvā jīvamānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2148_3: ekaṃ kukkuṭamittaṃ nāma nesādaṃ pañca migasatāni vadhitvā tesaṃ maṃsena mahāsakaṭaṃ
atk-s0502a:2148_4: pūretvā sakaṭadhure nisīditvā maṃsavikkiṇanatthāya nagaraṃ pavisantaṃ disvā tasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:2148_5: paṭibaddhacittā paricārikāya hatthe paṇṇākāraṃ datvā “gaccha, etassa paṇṇākāraṃ datvā
atk-s0502a:2148_6: gamanakālaṃ ñatvā ehī”ti pesesi. Sā gantvā tassa paṇṇākāraṃ datvā pucchi – “kadā
atk-s0502a:2148_7: gamissasī”ti? So “ajja maṃsaṃ vikkiṇitvā pātova asukadvārena nāma nikkhamitvā gamissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:2148_8: āha. Sā tena kathitakathaṃ sutvā āgantvā tassā ārocesi. Seṭṭhidhītā attanā gahetabbayuttakaṃ
atk-s0502a:2148_9: vatthābharaṇajātaṃ saṃvidahitvā pātova malinavatthaṃ nivāsetvā kuṭaṃ ādāya dāsīhi
atk-s0502a:2148_10: saddhiṃ udakatitthaṃ gacchantī viya nikkhamitvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā tassāgamanaṃ olokentī
atk-s0502a:2148_11: aṭṭhāsi. Sopi pātova sakaṭaṃ pājento nikkhami. Sā tassa pacchato pacchato pāyāsi.
atk-s0502a:2148_12: So taṃ disvā “ahaṃ taṃ ‘asukassa nāma dhītā’ti na jānāmi, mā maṃ anubandhi, ammā”ti
atk-s0502a:2148_13: āha. Na maṃ tvaṃ pakkosasi, ahaṃ attano dhammatāya āgacchāmi, tvaṃ tuṇhī hutvā attano
atk-s0502a:2148_14: sakaṭaṃ pājehīti. So punappunaṃ taṃ nivāretiyeva. Atha naṃ sā āha – “sāmi, sirī nāma
atk-s0502a:2148_15: attano santikaṃ āgacchantī nivāretuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti. So tassā nissaṃsayena āgamanakāraṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:2148_16: ñatvā taṃ sakaṭaṃ āropetvā agamāsi. Tassā mātāpitaro ito cito ca pariyesāpetvā apassantā
atk-s0502a:2148_17: “matā bhavissatī”ti matakabhattaṃ kariṃsu. Sāpi tena saddhiṃ saṃvāsamanvāya paṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0502a:2148_18: satta putte vijāyitvā te vayappatte gharabandhanena bandhi.
atk-s0502a:2149_0: Athekadivasaṃ satthā paccūsasamaye lokaṃ volokento kukkuṭamittaṃ saputtaṃ sasuṇisaṃ
atk-s0502a:2149_1: attano ñāṇajālassa anto paviṭṭhaṃ disvā, “kiṃ nu kho eta”nti upadhārento tesaṃ pannarasannampi
atk-s0502a:2149_2: sotāpattimaggassa upanissayaṃ disvā pātova pattacīvaraṃ ādāya tassa pāsaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:2149_3: Taṃ divasaṃ pāse baddho ekamigopi nāhosi. Satthā tassa pāsamūle padavalañjaṃ dassetvā
atk-s0502a:2149_4: purato ekassa gumbassa heṭṭhā chāyāyaṃ nisīdi. Kukkuṭamitto pātova dhanuṃ ādāya pāsaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2149_5: gantvā ādito paṭṭhāya pāse olokayamāno pāse baddhaṃ ekampi migaṃ adisvā satthu padavalañjaṃ
atk-s0502a:2149_6: addasa. Athassa etadahosi – “ko mayhaṃ baddhamige mocento vicaratī”ti. So satthari
atk-s0502a:2149_7: āghātaṃ bandhitvā gacchanto gumbamūle nisinnaṃ satthāraṃ disvā, “iminā mama migā
atk-s0502a:2149_8: mocitā bhavissanti, māressāmi na”nti dhanuṃ ākaḍḍhi. Satthā dhanuṃ ākaḍḍhituṃ datvā
atk-s0502a:2149_9: vissajjetuṃ nādāsi. So saraṃ vissajjetumpi oropetumpi asakkonto phāsukāhi bhijjantīhi
atk-s0502a:2149_10: viya mukhato kheḷena paggharantena kilantarūpo aṭṭhāsi. Athassa puttā gehaṃ gantvā
atk-s0502a:2149_11: “pitā no cirāyati, kiṃ nu kho eta”nti vatvā “gacchatha, tātā, pitu santika”nti mātarā
atk-s0502a:2149_12: pesitā dhanūni ādāya gantvā pitaraṃ tathāṭhitaṃ disvā “ayaṃ no pitu paccāmitto bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0502a:2149_13: sattapi janā dhanūni ākaḍḍhitvā buddhānubhāvena yathā nesaṃ pitā ṭhito, tatheva aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2149_14: Atha nesaṃ mātā “kiṃ nu kho me puttāpi cirāyantī”ti vatvā sattahi suṇisāhi saddhiṃ
atk-s0502a:2149_15: gantvā te tathāṭhite disvā “kassa nu kho ime dhanūni ākaḍḍhitvā ṭhitā”ti olokentī
atk-s0502a:2149_16: satthāraṃ disvā bāhā paggayha – “mā me pitaraṃ nāsetha, mā me pitaraṃ nāsethā”ti
atk-s0502a:2149_17: mahāsaddamakāsi. Kukkuṭamitto taṃ saddaṃ sutvā cintesi – “naṭṭho vatamhi, sasuro
atk-s0502a:2149_18: kira me esa, aho mayā bhāriyaṃ kammaṃ kata”nti. Puttāvissa “ayyako kira no esa, aho
atk-s0502a:2149_19: bhāriyaṃ kammaṃ kata”nti cintayiṃsu. Kukkuṭamitto “ayaṃ sasuro me”ti mettacittaṃ
atk-s0502a:2149_20: upaṭṭhapesi, puttāpissa “ayyako no”ti mettacittaṃ upaṭṭhapesuṃ. Atha te nesaṃ mātā
atk-s0502a:2149_21: seṭṭhidhītā “khippaṃ dhanūni chaḍḍetvā pitaraṃ me khamāpethā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:2150_0: Satthā tesaṃ muducittataṃ ñatvā dhanuṃ otāretuṃ adāsi. Te sabbe satthāraṃ vanditvā
atk-s0502a:2150_1: “khamatha no, bhante”ti khamāpetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu. Atha nesaṃ satthā anupubbiṃ
atk-s0502a:2150_2: kathaṃ kathesi. Desanāvasāne kukkuṭamitto saddhiṃ puttehi ceva suṇisāhi ca attapañcadasamo
atk-s0502a:2150_3: sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. Satthā piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ vihāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:2150_4: Atha naṃ ānandatthero pucchi – “bhante, kahaṃ gamitthā”ti. Kukkuṭamittassa santikaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2150_5: ānandāti. Pāṇātipātakammassa vo, bhante, akārako katoti. Āmānanda, so attapañcadasamo
atk-s0502a:2150_6: acalasaddhāya patiṭṭhāya tīsu ratanesu nikkaṅkho hutvā pāṇātipātakammassa akārako
atk-s0502a:2150_7: jātoti. Bhikkhū āhaṃsu – “nanu, bhante, bhariyāpissa atthī”ti. Āma, bhikkhave, sā
atk-s0502a:2150_8: kulagehe kumārikā hutvā sotāpattiphalaṃ pattāti. Bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “kukkuṭamittassa
atk-s0502a:2150_9: kira bhariyā kumārikakāle eva sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā tassa gehaṃ gantvā satta putte
atk-s0502a:2150_10: labhi, sā ettakaṃ kālaṃ sāmikena ‘dhanuṃ āhara, sare āhara, sattiṃ āhara, sūlaṃ āhara,
atk-s0502a:2150_11: jālaṃ āharā’ti vuccamānā tāni adāsi. Sopi tāya dinnāni ādāya gantvā pāṇātipātaṃ karoti,
atk-s0502a:2150_12: kiṃ nu kho sotāpannāpi pāṇātipātaṃ karontī”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a:2150_13: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte, “na, bhikkhave, sotāpannā
atk-s0502a:2150_14: pāṇātipātaṃ karonti, sā pana ‘sāmikassa vacanaṃ karomī’ti tathā akāsi. ‘Idaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0502a:2150_15: esa gantvā pāṇātipātaṃ karotū’ti tassā cittaṃ natthi. Pāṇitalasmiñhi vaṇe asati visaṃ
atk-s0502a:2150_16: gaṇhantassa taṃ visaṃ anuḍahituṃ na sakkoti, evamevaṃ akusalacetanāya abhāvena pāpaṃ
atk-s0502a:2150_17: akarontassa dhanuādīni nīharitvā dadatopi pāpaṃ nāma na hotī”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ
atk-s0502a:2152: “Pāṇimhi ce vaṇo nāssa, hareyya pāṇinā visaṃ;
atk-s0502a:2154_0: Tattha nāssāti na bhaveyya. Hareyyāti harituṃ sakkuṇeyya. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Yasmā nābbaṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:2154_1: visamanveti avaṇañhi pāṇiṃ visaṃ anvetuṃ na sakkoti, evameva dhanuādīni nīharitvā
atk-s0502a:2154_2: dentassāpi akusalacetanāya abhāvena pāpaṃ akubbato pāpaṃ nāma natthi, avaṇaṃ pāṇiṃ
atk-s0502a:2154_3: visaṃ viya nāssa cittaṃ pāpaṃ anugacchatīti.
atk-s0502a:2156_0: Aparena samayena bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ – “ko nu kho kukkuṭamittassa saputtassa
atk-s0502a:2156_1: sasuṇisassa sotāpattimaggassūpanissayo, kena kāraṇena nesādakule nibbatto”ti. Satthā
atk-s0502a:2156_2: āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti
atk-s0502a:2156_3: vutte, bhikkhave, atīte kassapadasabalassa dhātucetiyaṃ saṃvidahantā evamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0502a:2156_4: “kiṃ nu kho imassa cetiyassa mattikā bhavissati, kiṃ udaka”nti. Atha nesaṃ etadahosi
atk-s0502a:2156_5: – “haritālamanosilā mattikā bhavissati, tilatelaṃ udaka”nti. Te haritālamanosilā
atk-s0502a:2156_6: koṭṭetvā tilatelena saṃsanditvā iṭṭhakāya ghaṭetvā suvaṇṇena khacitvā anto ciniṃsu,
atk-s0502a:2156_7: bahimukhe pana ekagghanasuvaṇṇaiṭṭhakāva ahesuṃ. Ekekā satasahassagghanikā ahosi.
atk-s0502a:2156_8: Te yāva dhātunidhānā cetiye niṭṭhite cintayiṃsu – “dhātunidhānakāle bahunā dhanena
atk-s0502a:2156_9: attho, kaṃ nu kho jeṭṭhakaṃ karomā”ti.
atk-s0502a:2157_0: Atheko gāmavāsiko seṭṭhi “ahaṃ jeṭṭhako bhavissāmī”ti dhātunidhāne ekaṃ hiraññakoṭiṃ
atk-s0502a:2157_1: pakkhipi. Taṃ disvā raṭṭhavāsino “ayaṃ nagaraseṭṭhi dhanameva saṃharati, evarūpe
atk-s0502a:2157_2: cetiye jeṭṭhako bhavituṃ na sakkoti, gāmavāsī pana koṭidhanaṃ pakkhipitvā jeṭṭhako
atk-s0502a:2157_3: jāto”ti ujjhāyiṃsu. So tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā “ahaṃ dve koṭiyo datvā jeṭṭhako bhavissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:2157_4: dve koṭiyo adāsi. Itaro “ahameva jeṭṭhako bhavissāmī”ti tisso koṭiyo adāsi. Evaṃ
atk-s0502a:2157_5: vaḍḍhetvā vaḍḍhetvā nagaravāsī aṭṭha koṭiyo adāsi. Gāmavāsino pana gehe navakoṭidhanameva
atk-s0502a:2157_6: atthi, nagaravāsino cattālīsakoṭidhanaṃ. Tasmā gāmavāsī cintesi – “sacāhaṃ nava koṭiyo
atk-s0502a:2157_7: dassāmi, ayaṃ ‘dasa koṭiyo dassāmī’ti vakkhati, atha me niddhanabhāvo paññāyissatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2157_8: So evamāha – “ahaṃ ettakañca dhanaṃ dassāmi, saputtadāro ca cetiyassa dāso bhavissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:2157_9: satta putte satta suṇisāyo bhariyañca gahetvā attanā saddhiṃ cetiyassa niyyādesi.
atk-s0502a:2157_10: Raṭṭhavāsino “dhanaṃ nāma sakkā uppādetuṃ, ayaṃ pana saputtadāro attānaṃ niyyādesi,
atk-s0502a:2157_11: ayameva jeṭṭhako hotū”ti taṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ kariṃsu. Iti te soḷasapi janā cetiyassa dāsā
atk-s0502a:2157_12: ahesuṃ. Raṭṭhavāsino pana te bhujisse akaṃsu. Evaṃ santepi cetiyameva paṭijaggitvā
atk-s0502a:2157_13: yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cutā devaloke nibbattiṃsu. Tesu ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devaloke
atk-s0502a:2157_14: vasantesu imasmiṃ buddhuppāde bhariyā tato cavitvā rājagahe seṭṭhino dhītā hutvā
atk-s0502a:2157_15: nibbatti. Sā kumārikāva hutvā sotāpattiphalaṃ pāpuṇi. Adiṭṭhasaccassa pana paṭisandhi
atk-s0502a:2157_16: nāma bhāriyāti tassā sāmiko samparivattamāno gantvā nesādakule nibbatti. Tassa saha
atk-s0502a:2157_17: dassaneneva seṭṭhidhītaraṃ pubbasineho ajjhotthari. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-s0502a:2159: Evaṃ taṃ jāyate pemaṃ, uppalaṃva yathodake”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:2160_0: Sā pubbasineheneva nesādakulaṃ agamāsi. Puttāpissā devalokā cavitvā tassā eva kucchismiṃ
atk-s0502a:2160_1: paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhiṃsu, suṇisāyopissā tattha tattha nibbattitvā vayappattā tesaṃyeva
atk-s0502a:2160_2: gehaṃ agamaṃsu. Evaṃ te sabbepi tadā cetiyaṃ paṭijaggitvā tassa kammassānubhāvena
atk-s0502a:2163: Yo appaduṭṭhassāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kokaṃ nāma sunakhaluddakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2164_0: So kira ekadivasaṃ pubbaṇhasamaye dhanuṃ ādāya sunakhaparivuto araññaṃ gacchanto
atk-s0502a:2164_1: antarāmagge ekaṃ piṇḍāya pavisantaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā kujjhitvā “kāḷakaṇṇi me diṭṭho,
atk-s0502a:2164_2: ajja kiñci na labhissāmī”ti cintetvā pakkāmi. Theropi gāme piṇḍāya caritvā katabhattakicco
atk-s0502a:2164_3: puna vihāraṃ pāyāsi. Itaropi araññe vicaritvā kiñci alabhitvā paccāgacchanto puna
atk-s0502a:2164_4: theraṃ disvā “ajjāhaṃ imaṃ kāḷakaṇṇiṃ disvā araññaṃ gato kiñci na labhiṃ, idāni me
atk-s0502a:2164_5: punapi abhimukho jāto, sunakhehi naṃ khādāpessāmī”ti saññaṃ datvā sunakhe vissajjesi.
atk-s0502a:2164_6: Theropi “mā evaṃ kari upāsakā”ti yāci. So “ajjāhaṃ tava sammukhībhūtattā kiñci nālatthaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2164_7: punapi me sammukhībhāvamāgatosi, khādāpessāmeva ta”nti vatvā sunakhe uyyojesi. Thero
atk-s0502a:2164_8: vegena ekaṃ rukkhaṃ abhiruhitvā purisappamāṇe ṭhāne nisīdi. Sunakhā rukkhaṃ parivāresuṃ.
atk-s0502a:2164_9: Luddako gantvā “rukkhaṃ abhiruhatopi te mokkho natthī”ti taṃ saratuṇḍena pādatale
atk-s0502a:2164_10: vijjhi. Thero “mā evaṃ karohī”ti taṃ yāciyeva. Itaro tassa yācanaṃ anādiyitvā punappunaṃ
atk-s0502a:2164_11: vijjhiyeva. Thero ekasmiṃ pādatale vijjhiyamāne taṃ ukkhipitvā dutiyaṃ pādaṃ olambitvā
atk-s0502a:2164_12: tasmiṃ vijjhiyamāne tampi ukkhipati, evamassa so yācanaṃ anādiyitvāva dvepi pādatalāni
atk-s0502a:2164_13: vijjhiyeva. Therassa sarīraṃ ukkāhi ādittaṃ viya ahosi. So vedanānuvattiko hutvā
atk-s0502a:2164_14: satiṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetuṃ nāsakkhi, pārutacīvaraṃ bhassantampi na sallakkhesi. Taṃ patamānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2164_15: kokaṃ sīsato paṭṭhāya parikkhipantameva pati. Sunakhā “thero patito”ti saññāya cīvarantaraṃ
atk-s0502a:2164_16: pavisitvā attano sāmikaṃ luñjitvā khādantā aṭṭhimattāvasesaṃ kariṃsu. Sunakhā cīvarantarato
atk-s0502a:2165_0: Atha nesaṃ thero ekaṃ sukkhadaṇḍakaṃ bhañjitvā khipi. Sunakhā theraṃ disvā “sāmikova
atk-s0502a:2165_1: amhehi khādito”ti ñatvā araññaṃ pavisiṃsu. Thero kukkuccaṃ uppādesi “mama cīvarantaraṃ
atk-s0502a:2165_2: pavisitvā esa naṭṭho, arogaṃ nu kho me sīla”nti. So rukkhā otaritvā satthu santikaṃ
atk-s0502a:2165_3: gantvā ādito paṭṭhāya sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ārocetvā – “bhante, mama cīvaraṃ nissāya
atk-s0502a:2165_4: so upāsako naṭṭho, kacci me arogaṃ sīlaṃ, atthi me samaṇabhāvo”ti pucchi. Satthā
atk-s0502a:2165_5: tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “bhikkhu arogaṃ te sīlaṃ, atthi te samaṇabhāvo, so appaduṭṭhassa
atk-s0502a:2165_6: padussitvā vināsaṃ patto, na kevalañca idāneva, atītepi appaduṭṭhānaṃ padussitvā
atk-s0502a:2165_7: vināsaṃ pattoyevā”ti vatvā tamatthaṃ pakāsento atītaṃ āhari –
atk-s0502a:2166_0: Atīte kireko vejjo vejjakammatthāya gāmaṃ vicaritvā kiñci kammaṃ alabhitvā chātajjhatto
atk-s0502a:2166_1: nikkhamitvā gāmadvāre sambahule kumārake kīḷante disvā “ime sappena ḍaṃsāpetvā tikicchitvā
atk-s0502a:2166_2: āhāraṃ labhissāmī”ti ekasmiṃ rukkhabile sīsaṃ niharitvā nipannaṃ sappaṃ dassetvā,
atk-s0502a:2166_3: “ambho, kumārakā eso sāḷikapotako, gaṇhatha na”nti āha. Atheko kumārako sappaṃ gīvāyaṃ
atk-s0502a:2166_4: daḷhaṃ gahetvā nīharitvā tassa sappabhāvaṃ ñatvā viravanto avidūre ṭhitassa vejjassa
atk-s0502a:2166_5: matthake khipi. Sappo vejjassa khandhaṭṭhikaṃ parikkhipitvā daḷhaṃ ḍaṃsitvā tattheva
atk-s0502a:2166_6: jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpesi, evamesa koko sunakhaluddako pubbepi appaduṭṭhassa padussitvā
atk-s0502a:2167: Satthā imaṃ atītaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2169: “Yo appaduṭṭhassa narassa dussati, suddhassa posassa anaṅgaṇassa;
atk-s0502a:2170: Tameva bālaṃ pacceti pāpaṃ, sukhumo rajo paṭivātaṃva khitto”ti.
atk-s0502a:2171_0: Tattha appaduṭṭhassāti attano vā sabbasattānaṃ vā aduṭṭhassa. Narassāti sattassa.
atk-s0502a:2171_1: Dussatīti aparajjhati. Suddhassāti niraparādhasseva. Posassāti idampi aparenākārena
atk-s0502a:2171_2: sattādhivacanameva. Anaṅgaṇassāti nikkilesassa. Paccetīti patieti. Paṭivātanti yathā
atk-s0502a:2171_3: ekena purisena paṭivāte ṭhitaṃ paharitukāmatāya khitto sukhumo rajoti tameva purisaṃ
atk-s0502a:2171_4: pacceti, tasseva upari patati, evameva yo puggalo apaduṭṭhassa purisassa pāṇippaharādīni
atk-s0502a:2171_5: dadanto padussati, tameva bālaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme, samparāye vā nirayādīsu vipaccamānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2172: Desanāvasāne so bhikkhu arahatte patiṭṭhahi, sampattaparisāyapi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:2175: Gabbhameketi imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto maṇikārakulūpakaṃ tissattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2176_0: So kira thero ekassa maṇikārassa kule dvādasa vassāni bhuñji. Tasmiṃ kule jayampatikā
atk-s0502a:2176_1: mātāpituṭṭhāne ṭhatvā theraṃ paṭijaggiṃsu. Athekadivasaṃ so maṇikāro therassa purato
atk-s0502a:2176_2: maṃsaṃ chindanto nisinno hoti. Tasmiṃ khaṇe rājā pasenadi kosalo ekaṃ maṇiratanaṃ
atk-s0502a:2176_3: “imaṃ dhovitvā vijjhitvā pahiṇatū”ti pesesi. Maṇikāro salohiteneva hatthena taṃ paṭiggahetvā
atk-s0502a:2176_4: peḷāya upari ṭhapetvā hatthadhovanatthaṃ anto pāvisi. Tasmiṃ pana gehe posāvaniyakoñcasakuṇo
atk-s0502a:2176_5: atthi. So lohitagandhena maṃsasaññāya taṃ maṇiṃ therassa passantasseva gili. Maṇikāro
atk-s0502a:2176_6: āgantvā maṇiṃ apassanto “maṇi kena gahito”ti bhariyañca puttake ca paṭipāṭiyā pucchitvā
atk-s0502a:2176_7: tehi “na gaṇhāmā”ti vutte “therena gahito bhavissatī”ti. Cintetvā bhariyāya saddhiṃ
atk-s0502a:2176_8: mantesi – “therena maṇi gahito bhavissatī”ti. Sā, sāmi, mā evaṃ avaca, ettakaṃ kālaṃ
atk-s0502a:2176_9: mayā therassa na kiñci vajjaṃ diṭṭhapubbaṃ, na so maṇiṃ gaṇhātīti. Maṇikāro theraṃ
atk-s0502a:2176_10: pucchi – “bhante, imasmiṃ ṭhāne maṇiratanaṃ tumhehi gahita”nti. Na gaṇhāmi, upāsakāti.
atk-s0502a:2176_11: Bhante, na idha añño atthi, tumhehiyeva gahito bhavissati, detha me maṇiratananti.
atk-s0502a:2176_12: So tasmiṃ asampaṭicchante puna bhariyaṃ āha – “thereneva maṇi gahito, pīḷetvā naṃ
atk-s0502a:2176_13: pucchissāmī”ti. Sā, sāmi, mā no nāsayi, varaṃ amhehi dāsabyaṃ upagantuṃ, na ca theraṃ
atk-s0502a:2176_14: evarūpaṃ vattunti. So “sabbeva mayaṃ dāsattaṃ upagacchantā maṇimūlaṃ na agghāmā”ti
atk-s0502a:2176_15: rajjuṃ gahetvā therassa sīsaṃ veṭhetvā daṇḍena ghaṭṭesi. Therassa sīsato ca kaṇṇanāsāhi
atk-s0502a:2176_16: ca lohitaṃ pagghari, akkhīni nikkhamanākārappattāni ahesuṃ, so vedanāpamatto bhūmiyaṃ
atk-s0502a:2176_17: pati. Koñco lohitagandhenā gantvā lohitaṃ pivi. Atha naṃ maṇikāro there uppannakodhavegena
atk-s0502a:2176_18: “tvaṃ kiṃ karosī”ti pādena paharitvā khipi. So ekappahāreneva maritvā uttāno ahosi.
atk-s0502a:2177_0: Thero taṃ disvā, upāsaka, sīse veṭhanaṃ tāva me sithilaṃ katvā imaṃ koñcaṃ olokehi
atk-s0502a:2177_1: “mato vā, no vā”ti. Atha naṃ so āha – “eso viya tvampi marissasī”ti. Upāsaka, iminā
atk-s0502a:2177_2: so maṇi gilito, sace ayaṃ na amarissā, na te ahaṃ marantopi maṇiṃ ācikkhissanti.
atk-s0502a:2177_3: So tassa udaraṃ phāletvā maṇiṃ disvā pavedhento saṃviggamānaso therassa pādamūle
atk-s0502a:2177_4: nipajjitvā “khamatha, me, bhante, ajānantena mayā kata”nti āha. Upāsaka, neva tuyhaṃ
atk-s0502a:2177_5: doso atthi, na mayhaṃ, vaṭṭassevesa doso, khamāmi teti. Bhante, sace me khamatha,
atk-s0502a:2177_6: pakatiniyāmeneva me gehe nisīditvā bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathāti. “Upāsaka, na dānāhaṃ ito
atk-s0502a:2177_7: paṭṭhāya paresaṃ gehassa antochadanaṃ pavisissāmi, antogehapavesanasseva hi ayaṃ
atk-s0502a:2177_8: doso, ito paṭṭhāya pādesu āvahantesu gehadvāre ṭhitova bhikkhaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti vatvā
atk-s0502a:2178: “Paccati munino bhattaṃ, thokaṃ thokaṃ kule kule;
atk-s0502a:2180_0: Idañca pana vatvā thero teneva byādhinā na cirasseva parinibbāyi. Koñco maṇikārassa
atk-s0502a:2180_1: bhariyāya kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Maṇikāro kālaṃ katvā niraye nibbatti. Maṇikārassa
atk-s0502a:2180_2: bhariyā there muducittatāya kālaṃ katvā devaloke nibbatti. Bhikkhū satthāraṃ tesaṃ
atk-s0502a:2180_3: abhisamparāyaṃ pucchiṃsu. Satthā, “bhikkhave, idhekacce gabbhe nibbattanti, ekacce
atk-s0502a:2180_4: pāpakārino niraye nibbattanti, ekacce katakalyāṇā devaloke nibbattanti, anāsavā pana
atk-s0502a:2180_5: parinibbāyantī”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2184: Tattha gabbhanti idha manussagabbhova adhippeto. Sesamettha uttānatthameva.
atk-s0502a:2188: Na antalikkheti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto tayo jane ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2189_0: Satthari kira jetavane viharante sambahulā bhikkhū satthu dassanatthāya āgacchantā
atk-s0502a:2189_1: ekaṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisiṃsu. Gāmavāsino te sampatte ādāya āsanasālāya nisīdāpetvā
atk-s0502a:2189_2: yāgukhajjakaṃ datvā piṇḍapātavelaṃ āgamayamānā dhammaṃ suṇantā nisīdiṃsu. Tasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:2189_3: khaṇe bhattaṃ pacitvā sūpabyañjanaṃ dhūpayamānāya ekissā itthiyā bhājanato aggijālā
atk-s0502a:2189_4: uṭṭhahitvā chadanaṃ gaṇhi. Tato ekaṃ tiṇakaraḷaṃ uṭṭhahitvā jalamānaṃ ākāsaṃ pakkhandi.
atk-s0502a:2189_5: Tasmiṃ khaṇe eko kāko ākāsena gacchanto tattha gīvaṃ pavesetvā tiṇavalliveṭhito jhāyitvā
atk-s0502a:2189_6: gāmamajjhe pati. Bhikkhū taṃ disvā “aho bhāriyaṃ kammaṃ, passathāvuso, kākena pattaṃ
atk-s0502a:2189_7: vippakāraṃ, iminā katakammaṃ aññatra satthārā ko jānissati, satthāramassa kammaṃ
atk-s0502a:2190_0: Aparesampi bhikkhūnaṃ satthu dassanatthāya nāvaṃ abhiruyha gacchantānaṃ nāvā samudde
atk-s0502a:2190_1: niccalā aṭṭhāsi. Manussā “kāḷakaṇṇinā ettha bhavitabba”nti salākaṃ vicāresuṃ. Nāvikassa
atk-s0502a:2190_2: ca bhariyā paṭhamavaye ṭhitā dassanīyā pāsādikā, salākā tassā pāpuṇi. “Salākaṃ puna
atk-s0502a:2190_3: vicārethā”ti vatvā yāvatatiyaṃ vicāresuṃ, tikkhattumpi tassā eva pāpuṇi. Manussā
atk-s0502a:2190_4: “kiṃ, sāmī”ti nāvikassa mukhaṃ olokesuṃ. Nāviko “na sakkā ekissā atthāya mahājanaṃ
atk-s0502a:2190_5: nāsetuṃ, udake naṃ khipathā”ti āha. Sā gahetvā udake khipiyamānā maraṇabhayatajjitā
atk-s0502a:2190_6: viravaṃ akāsi. Taṃ sutvā nāviko ko attho imissā ābharaṇehi naṭṭhehi, sabbābharaṇāni
atk-s0502a:2190_7: omuñcitvā ekaṃ pilotikaṃ nivāsāpetvā chaḍḍetha naṃ, ahaṃ panetaṃ udakapiṭṭhe plavamānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2190_8: daṭṭhuṃ na sakkhissāmī tasmā yathā naṃ ahaṃ na passāmi, tathā ekaṃ vālukakuṭaṃ gīvāya
atk-s0502a:2190_9: bandhitvā samudde khipathāti. Te tathā kariṃsu. Tampi patitaṭṭhāneyeva macchakacchapā
atk-s0502a:2190_10: vilumpiṃsu. Bhikkhū taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā “ṭhapetvā satthāraṃ ko añño etissā itthiyā
atk-s0502a:2190_11: katakammaṃ jānissati, satthāraṃ tassā kammaṃ pucchissāmā”ti icchitaṭṭhānaṃ patvā
atk-s0502a:2191_0: Aparepi satta bhikkhū satthu dassanatthāya gacchantā sāyaṃ ekaṃ vihāraṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0502a:2191_1: vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pucchiṃsu. Ekasmiñca leṇe satta mañcā honti. Tesaṃ tadeva labhitvā
atk-s0502a:2191_2: tattha nipannānaṃ rattibhāge kūṭāgāramatto pāsāṇo pavaṭṭamāno āgantvā leṇadvāraṃ
atk-s0502a:2191_3: pidahi. Nevāsikā bhikkhū “mayaṃ imaṃ leṇaṃ āgantukabhikkhūnaṃ pāpayimhā, ayañca mahāpāsāṇo
atk-s0502a:2191_4: leṇadvāraṃ pidahanto aṭṭhāsi, apanessāma na”nti samantā sattahi gāmehi manusse sannipātetvā
atk-s0502a:2191_5: vāyamantāpi ṭhānā cāletuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu. Anto paviṭṭhabhikkhūpi vāyamiṃsuyeva. Evaṃ
atk-s0502a:2191_6: santepi sattāhaṃ pāsāṇaṃ cāletuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu. Āgantukā sattāhaṃ chātajjhattā mahādukkhaṃ
atk-s0502a:2191_7: anubhaviṃsu. Sattame divase pāsāṇo sayameva pavaṭṭitvā apagato. Bhikkhū nikkhamitvā
atk-s0502a:2191_8: “amhākaṃ imaṃ pāpaṃ aññatra satthārā ko jānissati, satthāraṃ pucchissāmā”ti cintetvā
atk-s0502a:2191_9: pakkamiṃsu. Te purimehi saddhiṃ antarāmagge samāgantvā sabbe ekatova satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0502a:2191_10: vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinnā satthārā katapaṭisanthārā attanā attanā diṭṭhānubhūtāni
atk-s0502a:2192_0: Satthāpi tesaṃ paṭipāṭiyā evaṃ byākāsi – “bhikkhave, so tāva kāko attanā katakammameva
atk-s0502a:2192_1: anubhosi. Atītakāle hi bārāṇasiyaṃ eko kassako attano goṇaṃ damento dametuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0502a:2192_2: So hissa goṇo thokaṃ gantvā nipajji, pothetvā uṭṭhāpitopi thokaṃ gantvā punapi tatheva
atk-s0502a:2192_3: nipajji. So vāyamitvā taṃ dametuṃ asakkonto kodhābhibhūto hutvā ‘ito dāni paṭṭhāya
atk-s0502a:2192_4: sukhaṃ nipajjissasī’ti palālapiṇḍaṃ viya karonto palālena tassa gīvaṃ paliveṭhetvā
atk-s0502a:2192_5: aggimadāsi, goṇo tattheva jhāyitvā mato. Tadā, bhikkhave, tena kākena taṃ pāpakammaṃ
atk-s0502a:2192_6: kataṃ. So tassa vipākena dīgharattaṃ niraye paccitvā vipākāvasesena sattakkhattuṃ
atk-s0502a:2192_7: kākayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā evameva ākāse jhāyitvāva mato”ti.
atk-s0502a:2193_0: Sāpi, bhikkhave, itthī attanā katakammameva anubhosi. Sā hi atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ ekassa
atk-s0502a:2193_1: gahapatikassa bhariyā udakaharaṇakoṭṭanapacanādīni sabbakiccāni sahattheneva akāsi.
atk-s0502a:2193_2: Tassā eko sunakho taṃ gehe sabbakiccāni kurumānaṃ olokentova nisīdati. Khette bhattaṃ
atk-s0502a:2193_3: harantiyā dārupaṇṇādīnaṃ vā atthāya araññaṃ gacchantiyā tāya saddhiṃyeva gacchati.
atk-s0502a:2193_4: Taṃ disvā daharamanussā “ambho nikkhanto sunakhaluddako, ajja mayaṃ maṃsena bhuñjissāmā”ti
atk-s0502a:2193_5: uppaṇḍenti. Sā tesaṃ kathāya maṅku hutvā sunakhaṃ leḍḍudaṇḍādīhi paharitvā palāpeti,
atk-s0502a:2193_6: sunakho nivattitvā puna anubandhati. So kirassā tatiye attabhāve bhattā ahosi, tasmā
atk-s0502a:2193_7: sinehaṃ chindituṃ na sakkoti. Kiñcāpi hi anamatagge saṃsāre jāyā vā pati vā abhūtapubbā
atk-s0502a:2193_8: nāma natthi, avidūre pana attabhāve ñātakesu adhimatto sineho hoti, tasmā so sunakho
atk-s0502a:2193_9: taṃ vijahituṃ na sakkoti. Sā tassa kujjhitvā khettaṃ sāmikassa yāguṃ haramānā rajjuṃ
atk-s0502a:2193_10: ucchaṅge ṭhapetvā agamāsi, sunakho tāyeva saddhiṃ gato. Sā sāmikassa yāguṃ datvā
atk-s0502a:2193_11: tucchakuṭaṃ ādāya ekaṃ udakaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā kuṭaṃ vālukāya pūretvā samīpe oloketvā
atk-s0502a:2193_12: ṭhitassa sunakhassa saddamakāsi. Sunakho “cirassaṃ vata me ajja madhurakathā laddhā”ti
atk-s0502a:2193_13: naṅguṭṭhaṃ cālento taṃ upasaṅkami. Sā taṃ gīvāyaṃ daḷhaṃ gahetvā ekāya rajjukoṭiyā
atk-s0502a:2193_14: kuṭaṃ bandhitvā ekaṃ rajjukoṭiṃ sunakhassa gīvāyaṃ bandhitvā kuṭaṃ udakābhimukhaṃ
atk-s0502a:2193_15: pavaṭṭesi. Sunakho kuṭaṃ anubandhanto udake patitvā tattheva kālamakāsi. Sā tassa
atk-s0502a:2193_16: kammassa vipākena dīgharattaṃ niraye paccitvā vipākāvasesena attabhāvasate vālukakuṭaṃ
atk-s0502a:2194_0: Tumhehipi, bhikkhave, attanā katakammameva anubhūtaṃ. Atītasmiñhi bārāṇasivāsino
atk-s0502a:2194_1: satta gopālakadārakā ekasmiṃ aṭavipadese sattāhavārena gāviyo vicarantā ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0502a:2194_2: gāviyo vicāretvā āgacchantā ekaṃ mahāgodhaṃ disvā anubandhiṃsu. Godhā palāyitvā ekaṃ
atk-s0502a:2194_3: vammikaṃ pāvisi. Tassa pana vammikassa satta chiddāni, dārakā “mayaṃ dāni gahetuṃ
atk-s0502a:2194_4: na sakkhissāma, sve āgantvā gaṇhissāmā”ti ekeko ekekaṃ sākhabhaṅgamuṭṭhiṃ ādāya sattapi
atk-s0502a:2194_5: janā satta chiddāni pidahitvā pakkamiṃsu. Te punadivase taṃ godhaṃ amanasikatvā aññasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:2194_6: padese gāviyo vicāretvā sattame divase gāviyo ādāya gacchantā taṃ vammikaṃ disvā
atk-s0502a:2194_7: satiṃ paṭilabhitvā “kā nu kho tassā godhāya pavattī”ti attanā attanā pidahitāni chiddāni
atk-s0502a:2194_8: vivariṃsu. Godhā jīvite nirālayā hutvā aṭṭhicammāvasesā pavedhamānā nikkhami. Te
atk-s0502a:2194_9: taṃ disvā anukampaṃ katvā “mā naṃ māretha, sattāhaṃ chinnabhattā jātā”ti tassā piṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0502a:2194_10: parimajjitvā “sukhena gacchāhī”ti vissajjesuṃ. Te godhāya amāritattā niraye tāva
atk-s0502a:2194_11: na pacciṃsu. Te pana satta janā ekato hutvā cuddasasu attabhāvesu satta satta divasāni
atk-s0502a:2194_12: chinnabhattā ahesuṃ. Tadā, bhikkhave, tumhehi sattahi gopālakehi hutvā taṃ kammaṃ
atk-s0502a:2194_13: katanti. Evaṃ satthā tehi puṭṭhapuṭṭhaṃ pañhaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0502a:2195_0: Atheko bhikkhu satthāraṃ āha – “kiṃ pana, bhante, pāpakammaṃ katvā ākāse uppatitassapi
atk-s0502a:2195_1: samuddaṃ pakkhandassāpi pabbatantaraṃ paviṭṭhassāpi mokkho natthī”ti. Satthā “evametaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2195_2: bhikkhave, ākāsādīsupi ekapadesopi natthi, yattha ṭhito pāpakammato mucceyyā”ti vatvā
atk-s0502a:2195_3: anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2197: “Na antalikkhe na samuddamajjhe, na pabbatānaṃ vivaraṃ pavissa;
atk-s0502a:2198: Na vijjatī so jagatippadeso, yatthaṭṭhito mucceyya pāpakammā”ti.
atk-s0502a:2199_0: Tassattho – sace hi koci “iminā upāyena pāpakammato muccissāmī”ti antalikkhe vā nisīdeyya,
atk-s0502a:2199_1: caturāsītiyojanasahassagambhīraṃ mahāsamuddaṃ vā paviseyya, pabbatantare vā nisīdeyya,
atk-s0502a:2199_2: neva pāpakammato mucceyya. Puratthimādīsu jagatipadesesu pathavībhāgesu na so vālaggamattopi
atk-s0502a:2199_3: okāso atthi, yattha ṭhito pāpakammato muccituṃ sakkuṇeyyāti.
atk-s0502a:2200: Desanāvasāne te bhikkhū sotāpattiphalādīni pāpuṇiṃsu, sampattamahājanassāpi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:2203: Na antalikkheti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā nigrodhārāme viharanto suppabuddhaṃ sakkaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
