atk-s0502a:2204_0: So kira “ayaṃ mama dhītaraṃ chaḍḍetvā nikkhanto ca, mama puttaṃ pabbājetvā tassa
atk-s0502a:2204_1: veriṭṭhāne ṭhito cā”ti imehi dvīhi kāraṇehi satthari āghātaṃ bandhitvā ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0502a:2204_2: “na dānissa nimantanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā bhuñjituṃ dassāmī”ti gamanamaggaṃ pidahitvā antaravīthiyaṃ
atk-s0502a:2204_3: suraṃ pivanto nisīdi. Athassa satthari bhikkhusaṅghaparivute taṃ ṭhānaṃ āgate “satthā
atk-s0502a:2204_4: āgato”ti ārocesuṃ. So āha – “purato gacchāti tassa vadetha, nāyaṃ mayā mahallakataro,
atk-s0502a:2204_5: nāssa maggaṃ dassāmī”ti punappunaṃ vuccamānopi tatheva vatvā nisīdi. Satthā mātulassa
atk-s0502a:2204_6: santikā maggaṃ alabhitvā tato nivatti. Sopi ekaṃ carapurisaṃ pesesi “gaccha, tassa
atk-s0502a:2204_7: kathaṃ sutvā ehī”ti. Satthāpi nivattanto sitaṃ katvā ānandattherena “ko nu kho, bhante,
atk-s0502a:2204_8: sitassa pātukammassa paccayo”ti puṭṭho āha – “passasi, ānanda, suppabuddha”nti. Passāmi,
atk-s0502a:2204_9: bhanteti. Bhāriyaṃ tena kammaṃ kataṃ mādisassa buddhassa maggaṃ adentena, ito sattame
atk-s0502a:2204_10: divase heṭṭhāpāsāde sopānapādamūle pathaviṃ pavisissatīti. Carapuriso taṃ kathaṃ
atk-s0502a:2204_11: sutvā suppabuddhassa santikaṃ gantvā “kiṃ mama bhāgineyyena nivattantena vutta”nti
atk-s0502a:2204_12: puṭṭho yathāsutaṃ ārocesi. So tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “na dāni mama bhāgineyyassa kathāya
atk-s0502a:2204_13: doso atthi, addhā yaṃ so vadati, taṃ tatheva hoti. Evaṃ santepi naṃ idāni musāvādena
atk-s0502a:2204_14: niggaṇhissāmi. So hi maṃ ‘sattame divase pathaviṃ pavisissatī’ti aniyamena avatvā
atk-s0502a:2204_15: ‘heṭṭhāpāsāde sopānapādamūle pathaviṃ pavisissatī”’ti āha. “Ito dāni paṭṭhāyāhaṃ
atk-s0502a:2204_16: taṃ ṭhānaṃ na gamissāmi, atha naṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne pathaviṃ apavisitvā musāvādena niggaṇhissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:2204_17: attano upabhogajātaṃ sabbaṃ sattabhūmikapāsādassa upari āropetvā sopānaṃ harāpetvā
atk-s0502a:2204_18: dvāraṃ pidahāpetvā ekekasmiṃ dvāre dve dve malle ṭhapetvā “sacāhaṃ pamādena heṭṭhā
atk-s0502a:2204_19: orohitukāmo homi, nivāreyyātha ma”nti vatvā sattame pāsādatale sirigabbhe nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:2204_20: Satthā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā, “bhikkhave, suppabuddho na kevalaṃ pāsādatale vehāsaṃ
atk-s0502a:2204_21: uppatitvā ākāse vā nisīdatu, nāvāya vā samuddaṃ pakkhandatu, pabbatantaraṃ vā pavisatu,
atk-s0502a:2204_22: buddhānaṃ kathāya dvidhābhāvo nāma natthi, mayā vuttaṭṭhāneyeva so pathaviṃ pavisissatī”ti
atk-s0502a:2204_23: vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2206: “Na antalikkhe na samuddamajjhe, na pabbatānaṃ vivaraṃ pavissa;
atk-s0502a:2207: Na vijjatī so jagatippadeso, yatthaṭṭhitaṃ nappasaheyya maccū”ti.
atk-s0502a:2208: Tattha yattha ṭhitaṃ nappasaheyya, maccūti yasmiṃ padese ṭhitaṃ maraṇaṃ nappasaheyya nābhibhaveyya, kesaggamattopi pathavippadeso natthi. Sesaṃ purimasadisamevāti.
atk-s0502a:2210_0: Sattame divase satthu bhikkhācāramaggassa niruddhavelāya heṭṭhāpāsāde suppabuddhassa
atk-s0502a:2210_1: maṅgalasso uddāmo hutvā taṃ taṃ bhittiṃ pahari. So upari nisinnovassa saddaṃ sutvā
atk-s0502a:2210_2: “kimeta”nti pucchi. “Maṅgalasso uddāmo”ti. So panasso suppabuddhaṃ disvāva sannisīdati.
atk-s0502a:2210_3: Atha naṃ so gaṇhitukāmo hutvā nisinnaṭṭhānā uṭṭhāya dvārābhimukho ahosi, dvārāni
atk-s0502a:2210_4: sayameva vivaṭāni, sopānaṃ sakaṭṭhāneyeva ṭhitaṃ. Dvāre ṭhitā mallā taṃ gīvāyaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0502a:2210_5: heṭṭhābhimukhaṃ khipiṃsu. Etenupāyena sattasupi talesu dvārāni sayameva vivaṭāni,
atk-s0502a:2210_6: sopānāni yathāṭhāne ṭhitāni. Tattha tattha mallā taṃ gīvāyameva gahetvā heṭṭhābhimukhaṃ
atk-s0502a:2210_7: khipiṃsu. Atha naṃ heṭṭhāpāsāde sopānapādamūlaṃ sampattameva mahāpathavī vivaramānā
atk-s0502a:2210_8: bhijjitvā sampaṭicchi, so gantvā avīcimhi nibbattīti.
atk-s0502a:2216: Sabbe tasantīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2217_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye sattarasavaggiyehi senāsane paṭijaggite chabbaggiyā bhikkhū “nikkhamatha,
atk-s0502a:2217_1: mayaṃ mahallakatarā, amhākaṃ etaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti vatvā tehi “na mayaṃ dassāma, amhehi
atk-s0502a:2217_2: paṭhamaṃ paṭijaggita”nti vutte te bhikkhū pahariṃsu. Sattarasavaggiyā maraṇabhayatajjitā
atk-s0502a:2217_3: mahāviravaṃ viraviṃsu. Satthā tesaṃ saddaṃ sutvā “kiṃ ida”nti pucchitvā “idaṃ nāmā”ti
atk-s0502a:2217_4: ārocite “na, bhikkhave, ito paṭṭhāya bhikkhunā nāma evaṃ kattabbaṃ, yo karoti, so
atk-s0502a:2217_5: imaṃ nāma āpattiṃ āpajjatī”ti pahāradānasikkhāpadaṃ paññāpetvā, “bhikkhave, bhikkhunā
atk-s0502a:2217_6: nāma ‘yathā ahaṃ, tatheva aññepi daṇḍassa tasanti, maccuno bhāyantī’ti ñatvā paro
atk-s0502a:2217_7: na paharitabbo, na ghātetabbo”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2220: Attānaṃ upamaṃ katvā, na haneyya na ghātaye”ti.
atk-s0502a:2221_0: Tattha sabbe tasantīti sabbepi sattā attani daṇḍe patante tassa daṇḍassa tasanti.
atk-s0502a:2221_1: Maccunoti maraṇassāpi bhāyantiyeva. Imissā ca desanāya byañjanaṃ niravasesaṃ, attho
atk-s0502a:2221_2: pana sāvaseso. Yathā hi raññā “sabbe sannipatantū”ti bheriyā carāpitāyapi rājamahāmatte
atk-s0502a:2221_3: ṭhapetvā sesā sannipatanti, evamidha “sabbe tasantī”ti vuttepi hatthājāneyyo assājāneyyo
atk-s0502a:2221_4: usabhājāneyyo khīṇāsavoti ime cattāro ṭhapetvā avasesāva tasantīti veditabbā. Imesu
atk-s0502a:2221_5: hi khīṇāsavo sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā pahīnattā maraṇakasattaṃ apassanto na bhāyati, itare
atk-s0502a:2221_6: tayo sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā balavattā attano paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ sattaṃ apassantā na bhāyantīti.
atk-s0502a:2221_7: Na haneyya na ghātayeti yathā ahaṃ, evaṃ aññepi sattāti neva paraṃ pahareyya na paharāpeyyāti attho.
atk-s0502a:2225: Sabbe tasantīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2226_0: Teyeva ekasmiñhi samaye teneva kāraṇena purimasikkhāpade sattarasavaggiye pahariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2226_1: Teneva kāraṇena tesaṃ talasattikaṃ uggiriṃsu. Idhāpi satthā tesaṃ saddaṃ sutvā “kiṃ
atk-s0502a:2226_2: ida”nti pucchitvā “idaṃ nāmā”ti ārocite “na, bhikkhave, ito paṭṭhāya bhikkhunā nāma
atk-s0502a:2226_3: evaṃ kattabbaṃ, yo karoti, so imaṃ nāma āpattiṃ āpajjatī”ti talasattikasikkhāpadaṃ
atk-s0502a:2226_4: paññāpetvā, “bhikkhave, bhikkhunā nāma ‘yathā ahaṃ, tatheva aññepi daṇḍassa tasanti,
atk-s0502a:2226_5: yathā ca mayhaṃ, tatheva nesaṃ jīvitaṃ piya’nti ñatvā paro na paharitabbo na ghāṭetabbo”ti
atk-s0502a:2226_6: vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2229: Attānaṃ upamaṃ katvā, na haneyya na ghātaye”ti.
atk-s0502a:2230: Tattha sabbesaṃ jīvitaṃ piyanti khīṇāsavaṃ ṭhapetvā sesasattānaṃ jīvitaṃ piyaṃ madhuraṃ, khīṇāsavo pana jīvite vā maraṇe vā upekkhakova hoti. Sesaṃ purimasadisamevāti.
atk-s0502a:2234: Sukhakāmāni bhūtānīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sambahule kumārake ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2235_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye satthā sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya pavisanto antarāmagge sambahule kumārake
atk-s0502a:2235_1: ekaṃ gharasappajātikaṃ ahiṃ daṇḍakena paharante disvā “kumārakā kiṃ karothā”ti pucchitvā
atk-s0502a:2235_2: “ahiṃ, bhante, daṇḍakena paharāmā”ti vutte “kiṃ kāraṇā”ti puna pucchitvā “ḍaṃsanabhayena,
atk-s0502a:2235_3: bhante”ti vutte “tumhe ‘attano sukhaṃ karissāmā’ti imaṃ paharantā nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a:2235_4: sukhalābhino na bhavissatha. Attano sukhaṃ patthentena hi paraṃ paharituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0502a:2235_5: vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:2238: Attano sukhamesāno, pecca so na labhate sukhaṃ.
atk-s0502a:2241: Attano sukhamesāno, pecca so labhate sukha”nti.
atk-s0502a:2242_0: Tattha yo daṇḍenāti yo puggalo daṇḍena vā leḍḍuādīhi vā viheṭheti. Pecca so na labhate
atk-s0502a:2242_1: sukhanti so puggalo paraloke manussasukhaṃ vā dibbasukhaṃ vā paramatthabhūtaṃ vā
atk-s0502a:2242_2: nibbānasukhaṃ na labhati. Dutiyagāthāya pecca so labhateti so puggalo paraloke vuttappakāraṃ
atk-s0502a:2243: Desanāvasāne pañcasatāpi te kumārakā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a:2246: Māvoca pharusaṃ kañcīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto koṇḍadhānattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2247_0: Tassa kira pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya ekaṃ itthirūpaṃ therena saddhiṃyeva vicarati.
atk-s0502a:2247_1: Taṃ thero na passati, mahājano pana passati. Antogāmaṃ piṇḍāya caratopissa manussā
atk-s0502a:2247_2: ekaṃ bhikkhaṃ datvā, “bhante, ayaṃ tumhākaṃ hotu, ayaṃ pana tumhākaṃ sahāyikāyā”ti
atk-s0502a:2248_0: Kiṃ tassa pubbakammanti? Kassapasammāsambuddhakāle kira dve sahāyakā bhikkhū ekamātukucchito
atk-s0502a:2248_1: nikkhantasadisā ativiya samaggā ahesuṃ. Dīghāyukabuddhakāle ca anusaṃvaccharaṃ vā
atk-s0502a:2248_2: anuchamāsaṃ vā bhikkhū uposathatthāya sannipatanti. Tasmā tepi “uposathaggaṃ gamissāmā”ti
atk-s0502a:2248_3: vasanaṭṭhānā nikkhamiṃsu. Te ekā tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbattadevatā disvā “ime bhikkhū
atk-s0502a:2248_4: ativiya samaggā, sakkā nu kho ime bhinditu”nti cintetvā attano bālatāya cintitasamanantarameva
atk-s0502a:2248_5: āgantvā tesu ekena, “āvuso, muhuttaṃ āgamehi, sarīrakiccenamhi atthiko”ti vutte sā
atk-s0502a:2248_6: devatā ekaṃ manussitthivaṇṇaṃ māpetvā therassa gacchantaraṃ pavisitvā nikkhamanakāle
atk-s0502a:2248_7: ekena hatthena kesakalāpaṃ, ekena nivāsanaṃ saṇṭhāpayamānā tassa piṭṭhito nikkhami.
atk-s0502a:2248_8: So taṃ na passati, tamāgamayamāno pana purato ṭhitabhikkhu nivattitvā olokayamāno
atk-s0502a:2248_9: taṃ tathā katvā nikkhamantaṃ passi. Sā tena diṭṭhabhāvaṃ ñatvā antaradhāyi. Itaro
atk-s0502a:2248_10: taṃ bhikkhuṃ attano santikaṃ āgatakāle āha – “āvuso, sīlaṃ te bhinna”nti. “Natthāvuso,
atk-s0502a:2248_11: mayhaṃ evarūpa”nti. Idāneva te mayā pacchato nikkhamamānā taruṇaitthī idaṃ nāma karontī
atk-s0502a:2248_12: diṭṭhā, tvaṃ “natthi mayhaṃ evarūpa”nti kiṃ vadesīti. So asaniyā matthake avatthaṭo
atk-s0502a:2248_13: viya mā maṃ, āvuso, nāsehi, natthi mayhaṃ evarūpanti. Itaro “mayā sāmaṃ akkhīhi diṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2248_14: kiṃ tava saddahissāmī”ti daṇḍako viya bhijjitvā pakkāmi, uposathaggepi “nāhaṃ iminā
atk-s0502a:2248_15: saddhiṃ uposathaṃ karissāmī”ti nisīdi. Itaro “mayhaṃ, bhante, sīle aṇumattampi kāḷaṃ
atk-s0502a:2248_16: natthī”ti bhikkhūnaṃ kathesi. Sopi “mayā sāmaṃ diṭṭha”nti āha. Devatā taṃ tena saddhiṃ
atk-s0502a:2248_17: uposathaṃ kātuṃ anicchantaṃ disvā “bhāriyaṃ mayā kammaṃ kata”nti cintetvā – “bhante,
atk-s0502a:2248_18: mayhaṃ ayyassa sīlabhedo natthi, mayā pana vīmaṃsanavasenetaṃ kataṃ, karotha tena
atk-s0502a:2248_19: saddhiṃ uposatha”nti āha. So tassā ākāse ṭhatvā kathentiyā saddahitvā uposathaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0502a:2248_20: na pana there pubbe viya muducitto ahosi. Ettakaṃ devatāya pubbakammaṃ.
atk-s0502a:2249_0: Āyupariyosāne pana te therā yathāsukhaṃ devaloke nibbattiṃsu. Devatā apīcimhi nibbattitvā
atk-s0502a:2249_1: ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ tattha paccitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ nibbattitvā vuddhimanvāya
atk-s0502a:2249_2: sāsane pabbajitvā upasampadaṃ labhi. Tassa pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya taṃ itthirūpaṃ
atk-s0502a:2249_3: tatheva paññāyi. Tenevassa koṇḍadhānattheroti nāmaṃ kariṃsu. Taṃ tathāvicarantaṃ
atk-s0502a:2249_4: disvā bhikkhū anāthapiṇḍikaṃ āhaṃsu – “mahāseṭṭhi, imaṃ dussīlaṃ tava vihārā nīhara.
atk-s0502a:2249_5: Imañhi nissāya sesabhikkhūnaṃ ayaso uppajjissatī”ti. Kiṃ pana, bhante, satthā vihāre
atk-s0502a:2249_6: natthīti? Atthi upāsakāti. Tena hi, bhante, satthāva jānissatīti. Bhikkhū gantvā
atk-s0502a:2249_7: visākhāyapi tatheva kathesuṃ. Sāpi nesaṃ tatheva paṭivacanaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a:2250_0: Bhikkhūpi tehi asampaṭicchitavacanā rañño ārocesuṃ – “mahārāja, koṇḍadhānatthero
atk-s0502a:2250_1: ekaṃ itthiṃ gahetvā vicaranto sabbesaṃ ayasaṃ uppādesi, taṃ tumhākaṃ vijitā nīharathā”ti.
atk-s0502a:2250_2: “Kahaṃ pana so, bhante”ti? “Vihāre, mahārājā”ti. “Katarasmiṃ senāsane viharatī”ti?
atk-s0502a:2250_3: “Asukasmiṃ nāmā”ti. “Tena hi gacchatha, ahaṃ taṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti so sāyanhasamaye vihāraṃ
atk-s0502a:2250_4: gantvā taṃ senāsanaṃ purisehi parikkhipāpetvā therassa vasanaṭṭhānābhimukho agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:2250_5: Thero mahāsaddaṃ sutvā vihārā nikkhamitvā pamukhe aṭṭhāsi. Tampissa itthirūpaṃ piṭṭhipasse
atk-s0502a:2250_6: ṭhitaṃ rājā addasa. Thero rañño āgamanaṃ ñatvā vihāraṃ abhiruhitvā nisīdi. Rājā theraṃ
atk-s0502a:2250_7: na vandi, tampi itthiṃ nāddasa. So dvārantarepi heṭṭhāmañcepi olokento adisvāva theraṃ
atk-s0502a:2250_8: āha – “bhante, imasmiṃ ṭhāne ekaṃ itthiṃ addasaṃ, kahaṃ sā”ti? “Na passāmi, mahārājā”ti.
atk-s0502a:2250_9: “Idāni mayā tumhākaṃ piṭṭhipasse ṭhitā diṭṭhā”ti vuttepi “ahaṃ na passāmi”ccevāha.
atk-s0502a:2250_10: Rājā “kiṃ nu kho eta”nti cintetvā, “bhante, ito tāva nikkhamathā”ti āha. There nikkhamitvā
atk-s0502a:2250_11: pamukhe ṭhite puna sā therassa piṭṭhipasse aṭṭhāsi. Rājā taṃ disvā puna uparitalaṃ
atk-s0502a:2250_12: abhiruhi, tassa āgatabhāvaṃ ñatvā thero nisīdi. Puna rājā taṃ sabbaṭṭhānesu olokentopi
atk-s0502a:2250_13: adisvā, “bhante, kahaṃ sā itthī”ti puna theraṃ pucchi. Nāhaṃ passāmi mahārājāti.
atk-s0502a:2250_14: “Kiṃ kathetha, bhante, mayā idāneva tumhākaṃ piṭṭhipasse ṭhitā diṭṭhā”ti āha. Āma,
atk-s0502a:2250_15: mahārāja, mahājanopi “me pacchato pacchato itthī vicaratī”ti vadati, ahaṃ pana na
atk-s0502a:2250_16: passāmīti. Rājā “paṭirūpakena bhavitabba”nti sallakkhetvā puna theraṃ, “bhante, ito
atk-s0502a:2250_17: tāva otarathā”ti vatvā there otaritvā pamukhe ṭhite puna taṃ tassa piṭṭhipasse ṭhitaṃ
atk-s0502a:2250_18: disvā uparitalaṃ abhiruhi. Puna nāddasa. So puna theraṃ pucchitvā tena “na passāmi”cceva
atk-s0502a:2250_19: vutte “paṭirūpakameveta”nti niṭṭhaṃ gantvā theraṃ āha – “bhante, evarūpe saṃkilese
atk-s0502a:2250_20: tumhākaṃ piṭṭhito vicarante añño koci tumhākaṃ bhikkhaṃ na dassati, nibaddhaṃ mama
atk-s0502a:2250_21: gehaṃ pavisatha, ahameva catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti theraṃ nimantetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:2251_0: Bhikkhū “passathāvuso, rañño pāpakiriyaṃ, ‘etaṃ vihārato nīharā’ti vutte āgantvā
atk-s0502a:2251_1: catūhi paccayehi nimantetvā gato”ti ujjhāyiṃsu. Tampi theraṃ āhaṃsu – “ambho, dussīla,
atk-s0502a:2251_2: idānisi rājakoṇḍo jāto”ti. Sopi pubbe bhikkhū kiñci vattuṃ asakkonto “tumhe dussīlā,
atk-s0502a:2251_3: tumhe koṇḍā, tumhe itthiṃ gahetvā vicarathā”ti āha. Te gantvā satthu ārocesuṃ – “bhante,
atk-s0502a:2251_4: koṇḍadhānatthero amhehi vutto amhe ‘dussīlā’tiādīni vatvā akkosatī”ti. Satthā taṃ
atk-s0502a:2251_5: pakkosāpetvā pucchi – “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, bhikkhu, evaṃ vadesī”ti? “Saccaṃ, bhante”ti.
atk-s0502a:2251_6: “Kiṃ kāraṇā”ti? “Mayā saddhiṃ kathitakāraṇā”ti. “Tumhe, bhikkhave, iminā saddhiṃ
atk-s0502a:2251_7: kasmā kathethā”ti. “Imassa pacchato itthiṃ vicarantiṃ disvā, bhante”ti. “Ime kira
atk-s0502a:2251_8: tayā saddhiṃ itthiṃ vicarantiṃ disvā vadanti, tvaṃ kasmā kathesi, ete tāva disvā
atk-s0502a:2251_9: kathenti. Tvaṃ adisvāva imehi saddhiṃ kasmā kathesi, nanu pubbe taveva pāpikaṃ diṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0502a:2251_10: nissāya idaṃ jātaṃ, idāni kasmā puna pāpikaṃ diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāsī”ti. Bhikkhū “kiṃ pana,
atk-s0502a:2251_11: bhante, iminā pubbe kata”nti pucchiṃsu. Atha nesaṃ satthā tassa pubbakammaṃ kathetvā
atk-s0502a:2251_12: “bhikkhu idaṃ pāpakammaṃ nissāya tvaṃ imaṃ vippakāraṃ patto, idāni te puna tathārūpaṃ
atk-s0502a:2251_13: pāpikaṃ diṭṭhiṃ gahetuṃ na yuttaṃ, mā puna bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ kiñci kathehi, nissaddo
atk-s0502a:2251_14: mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ chinnakaṃsathālasadiso hohi, evaṃ karonto nibbānappatto nāma bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0502a:2251_15: vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:2254: Dukkhā hi sārambhakathā, paṭidaṇḍā phuseyyu taṃ.
atk-s0502a:2257: Esa pattosi nibbānaṃ, sārambho te na vijjatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2258_0: Tattha māvoca pharusaṃ kañcīti kañci ekapuggalampi pharusaṃ mā avaca. Vuttāti tayā
atk-s0502a:2258_1: pare “dussīlā”ti vuttā, tampi tatheva paṭivadeyyuṃ. Sārambhakathāti esā karaṇuttarā
atk-s0502a:2258_2: yugaggāhakathā nāma dukkhā. Paṭidaṇḍāti kāyadaṇḍādīhi paraṃ paharantassa tādisā paṭidaṇḍā
atk-s0502a:2258_3: ca tava matthake pateyyuṃ. Sace neresīti sace attānaṃ niccalaṃ kātuṃ sakkhissasi.
atk-s0502a:2258_4: Kaṃso upahato yathāti mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ chinditvā talamattaṃ katvā ṭhapitakaṃsathālaṃ
atk-s0502a:2258_5: viya. Tañhi hatthapādehi vā daṇḍakena vā pahaṭampi saddaṃ na karoti, esa pattosīti
atk-s0502a:2258_6: sace evarūpo bhavituṃ sakkhissasi, imaṃ paṭipadaṃ pūrayamāno idāni appattopi eso
atk-s0502a:2258_7: nibbānappatto nāma. Sārambho te na vijjatīti evaṃ sante ca pana “tvaṃ dussīlo, tumhe
atk-s0502a:2258_8: dussīlā”tievamādiko uttarakaraṇavācālakkhaṇo sārambhopi te na vijjati, na bhavissatiyevāti attho.
atk-s0502a:2259: Desanāvasāne bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pāpuṇiṃsu, koṇḍadhānattheropi satthārā dinnaovāde ṭhatvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi, na cirasseva ākāse uppatitvā paṭhamaṃ salākaṃ gaṇhīti.
atk-s0502a:2262: Yathā daṇḍenāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā pubbārāme viharanto visākhādīnaṃ upāsikānaṃ uposathakammaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2263_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira ekasmiṃ mahāuposathadivase pañcasatamattā itthiyo uposathikā hutvā
atk-s0502a:2263_1: vihāraṃ agamiṃsu. Visākhā tāsu mahallakitthiyo upasaṅkamitvā pucchi, “ammā, kimatthaṃ
atk-s0502a:2263_2: uposathikā jātatthā”ti. Tāhi “dibbasampattiṃ patthetvā”ti vutte majjhimitthiyo pucchi,
atk-s0502a:2263_3: tāhi “sapattivāsā muccanatthāyā”ti vutte taruṇitthiyo pucchi, tāhi “paṭhamagabbhe
atk-s0502a:2263_4: puttapaṭilābhatthāyā”ti vutte kumārikāyo pucchi, tāhi “taruṇabhāveyeva patikulagamanatthāyā”ti
atk-s0502a:2263_5: vutte taṃ sabbampi tāsaṃ kathaṃ sutvā tā ādāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā paṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0502a:2263_6: ārocesi. Taṃ sutvā satthā “visākhe imesaṃ sattānaṃ jātiādayo nāma daṇḍahatthakagopālakasadisā,
atk-s0502a:2263_7: jāti jarāya santikaṃ, jarā byādhino santikaṃ, byādhi maraṇassa santikaṃ pesetvā maraṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:2263_8: kuṭhāriyā chindantā viya jīvitaṃ chindati, evaṃ santepi vivaṭṭaṃ patthentā nāma natthi,
atk-s0502a:2263_9: vaṭṭameva pana patthentī”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2266: Evaṃ jarā ca maccu ca, āyuṃ pājenti pāṇina”nti.
atk-s0502a:2267_0: Tattha pājetīti cheko gopālo kedārantaraṃ pavisantiyo gāvo daṇḍena nivāretvā teneva
atk-s0502a:2267_1: pothento sulabhatiṇodakaṃ gocaraṃ neti. Āyuṃ pājentīti jīvitindriyaṃ chindanti khepenti.
atk-s0502a:2267_2: Gopālako viya hi jarā ca maccu ca, gogaṇo viya jīvitindriyaṃ, gocarabhūmi viya maraṇaṃ.
atk-s0502a:2267_3: Tattha jāti tāva sattānaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ jarāya santikaṃ pesesi, jarā byādhino santikaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2267_4: byādhi maraṇassa santikaṃ. Tameva maraṇaṃ kuṭhāriyā chedaṃ viya chinditvā gacchatīti
atk-s0502a:2271: Atha pāpāni kammānīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto ajagarapetaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2272_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye mahāmoggallānatthero lakkhaṇattherena saddhiṃ gijjhakūṭato otaranto
atk-s0502a:2272_1: dibbena cakkhunā pañcavīsatiyojanikaṃ ajagarapetaṃ nāma addasa. Tassa sīsato aggijālā
atk-s0502a:2272_2: uṭṭhahitvā pariyantaṃ gacchanti, pariyantato uṭṭhahitvā sīsaṃ gacchanti, ubhayato
atk-s0502a:2272_3: uṭṭhahitvā majjhe otaranti. Thero taṃ disvā sitaṃ pātvākāsi. Lakkhaṇattherena sitakāraṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:2272_4: puṭṭho “akālo, āvuso, imassa pañhassa veyyākaraṇāya, satthu santike maṃ puccheyyāsī”ti
atk-s0502a:2272_5: vatvā rājagahe piṇḍāya caritvā satthu santikaṃ gatakāle lakkhaṇattherena puṭṭho āha
atk-s0502a:2272_6: – “tatrāhaṃ, āvuso, ekaṃ petaṃ addasaṃ, tassa evarūpo nāma attabhāvo, ahaṃ taṃ disvā
atk-s0502a:2272_7: ‘na vata me evarūpo attabhāvo diṭṭhapubbo’ti sitaṃ pātvākāsi”nti. Satthā “cakkhubhūtā
atk-s0502a:2272_8: vata, bhikkhave, sāvakā viharantī”tiādīni vadanto therassa kathaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā “mayāpi
atk-s0502a:2272_9: eso, bhikkhave, peto bodhimaṇḍeyeva diṭṭho, ‘ye ca pana me vacanaṃ na saddaheyyuṃ,
atk-s0502a:2272_10: tesaṃ taṃ ahitāya assā’ti na kathesiṃ, idāni moggallānaṃ sakkhiṃ labhitvā kathemī”ti
atk-s0502a:2272_11: vatvā bhikkhūhi tassa pubbakammaṃ puṭṭho byākāsi –
atk-s0502a:2273_0: Kassapabuddhakāle kira sumaṅgalaseṭṭhi nāma suvaṇṇiṭṭhakāhi bhūmiṃ santharitvā vīsatiusabhaṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a:2273_1: tattakeneva dhanena vihāraṃ kāretvā tāvattakeneva vihāramahaṃ kāresi. So ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0502a:2273_2: pātova satthu santikaṃ gacchanto nagaradvāre ekissā sālāya kāsāvaṃ sasīsaṃ pārupitvā
atk-s0502a:2273_3: kalalamakkhitehi pādehi nipannaṃ ekaṃ coraṃ disvā “ayaṃ kalalamakkhitapādo rattiṃ
atk-s0502a:2273_4: vicaritvā divā nipannamanusso bhavissatī”ti āha. Coro mukhaṃ vivaritvā seṭṭhiṃ disvā
atk-s0502a:2273_5: “hotu, jānissāmi te kattabba”nti āghātaṃ bandhitvā sattakkhattuṃ khettaṃ jhāpesi,
atk-s0502a:2273_6: sattakkhattuṃ vaje gunnaṃ pāde chindi, sattakkhattuṃ gehaṃ jhāpesi, so ettakenāpi
atk-s0502a:2273_7: kopaṃ nibbāpetuṃ asakkonto tassa cūḷūpaṭṭhākena saddhiṃ mittasanthavaṃ katvā “kiṃ
atk-s0502a:2273_8: te seṭṭhino piya”nti puṭṭho “gandhakuṭito aññaṃ tassa piyataraṃ natthī”ti sutvā “hotu,
atk-s0502a:2273_9: gandhakuṭiṃ jhāpetvā kopaṃ nibbāpessāmī”ti satthari piṇḍāya paviṭṭhe pānīyaparibhojanīyaghaṭe
atk-s0502a:2273_10: bhinditvā gandhakuṭiyaṃ aggiṃ adāsi. Seṭṭhi “gandhakuṭi kira jhāyatī”ti sutvā āgacchanto
atk-s0502a:2273_11: jhāmakāle āgantvā gandhakuṭiṃ jhāmaṃ olokento vālaggamattampi domanassaṃ akatvā vāmabāhuṃ
atk-s0502a:2273_12: samañjitvā dakkhiṇena hatthena mahāapphoṭanaṃ apphoṭesi. Atha naṃ samīpe ṭhitā pucchiṃsu
atk-s0502a:2273_13: – “kasmā, sāmi, ettakaṃ dhanaṃ vissajjetvā katagandhakuṭiyā jhāmakāle apphoṭesī”ti?
atk-s0502a:2273_14: So āha – “ettakaṃ me, tātā, aggiādīhi asādhāraṇe buddhassa sāsane dhanaṃ nidahituṃ
atk-s0502a:2273_15: laddhaṃ, ‘punapi ettakaṃ dhanaṃ vissajjetvā satthu gandhakuṭiṃ kātuṃ labhissāmī’ti
atk-s0502a:2273_16: tuṭṭhamānaso apphoṭesi”nti. So puna tattakaṃ dhanaṃ vissajjetvā gandhakuṭiṃ kāretvā
atk-s0502a:2273_17: vīsatisahassabhikkhuparivārassa satthuno dānaṃ adāsi. Taṃ disvā coro cintesi – “ahaṃ
atk-s0502a:2273_18: imaṃ amāretvā maṅkukātuṃ na sakkhissāmi, hotu, māressāmi na”nti nivāsanantare churikaṃ
atk-s0502a:2273_19: bandhitvā sattāhaṃ vihāre vicarantopi okāsaṃ na labhi. Mahāseṭṭhipi satta divasāni
atk-s0502a:2273_20: buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ datvā satthāraṃ vanditvā āha – “bhante,
atk-s0502a:2273_21: mama ekena purisena sattakkhattuṃ khettaṃ jhāpitaṃ, sattakkhattuṃ vaje gunnaṃ pādā
atk-s0502a:2273_22: chinnā, sattakkhattuṃ gehaṃ jhāpitaṃ, idāni gandhakuṭipi teneva jhāpitā bhavissati,
atk-s0502a:2273_23: ahaṃ imasmiṃ dāne paṭhamaṃ pattiṃ tassa dammī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2274_0: Taṃ sutvā coro “bhāriyaṃ vata me kammaṃ kataṃ, evaṃ aparādhakārake mayi imassa kopamattampi
atk-s0502a:2274_1: natthi, imasmimpi dāne mayhameva paṭhamaṃ pattiṃ deti, ahaṃ imasmiṃ dubbhāmi, evarūpaṃ
atk-s0502a:2274_2: me purisaṃ akhamāpentassa devadaṇḍopi me matthake pateyyā”ti gantvā seṭṭhissa pādamūle
atk-s0502a:2274_3: nipajjitvā “khamāhi me, sāmī”ti vatvā “kiṃ ida”nti vutte, “sāmi, evaṃ ayuttakaṃ kammaṃ
atk-s0502a:2274_4: mayā kataṃ, tassa me khamāhī”ti āha. Atha naṃ seṭṭhi “tayā me idañcidañca kata”nti
atk-s0502a:2274_5: sabbaṃ pucchitvā “āma, mayā kata”nti vutte, “tvaṃ mayā na diṭṭhapubbo, kasmā me kujjhitvā
atk-s0502a:2274_6: evamakāsī”ti pucchi. So ekadivasaṃ nagarā nikkhantena tena vuttavacanaṃ sāretvā “iminā
atk-s0502a:2274_7: me kāraṇena kopo uppādito”ti āha. Seṭṭhi attanā vuttaṃ saritvā “āma, tāta, vuttaṃ
atk-s0502a:2274_8: mayā, taṃ me khamāhī”ti coraṃ khamāpetvā “uṭṭhehi, tāta, khamāmi te, gaccha, tātā”ti
atk-s0502a:2274_9: āha. Sace me, sāmi, khamasi, saputtadāraṃ maṃ gehe dāsaṃ karohīti. Tāta, tvaṃ mayā
atk-s0502a:2274_10: ettake kathite evarūpaṃ chedanaṃ akāsi, gehe vasantena pana saddhiṃ na sakkā kiñci
atk-s0502a:2274_11: kathetuṃ, na me tayā gehe vasantena kiccaṃ atthi, khamāmi te, gaccha, tātāti. Coro
atk-s0502a:2274_12: taṃ kammaṃ katvā āyupariyosāne avīcimhi nibbatto dīgharattaṃ tattha paccitvā vipākāvasesena
atk-s0502a:2275_0: Evaṃ satthā tassa pubbakammaṃ kathetvā, “bhikkhave, bālā nāma pāpāni kammāni karontā
atk-s0502a:2275_1: na bujjhanti, pacchā pana attanā katakammehi ḍayhamānā attanāva attano dāvaggisadisāva
atk-s0502a:2275_2: hontī”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2277: “Atha pāpāni kammāni, karaṃ bālo na bujjhati;
atk-s0502a:2279_0: Tattha atha pāpānīti na kevalaṃ bālo kodhavasena pāpāni karoti, karontopi pana na
atk-s0502a:2279_1: bujjhatīti attho. Pāpaṃ karonto ca “pāpaṃ karomī”ti abujjhanako nāma natthi. “Imassa
atk-s0502a:2279_2: kammassa evarūpo nāma vipāko”ti ajānanatāya “na bujjhatī”ti vuttaṃ. Sehīti so tehi
atk-s0502a:2279_3: attano santakehi kammehi dummedho nippañño puggalo niraye nibbattitvā aggiḍaḍḍhova tappatīti attho.
atk-s0502a:2283: Yo daṇḍenāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto mahāmoggallānattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2284_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye titthiyā sannipatitvā mantesuṃ – “jānāthāvuso, ‘kena kāraṇena samaṇassa
atk-s0502a:2284_1: gotamassa lābhasakkāro mahā hutvā nibbatto’ti. Mayaṃ na jānāma, tumhe pana jānāthāti.
atk-s0502a:2284_2: Āma, jānāma, mahāmoggallānaṃ nāma ekaṃ nissāya uppanno. So hi devalokaṃ gantvā devatāhi
atk-s0502a:2284_3: katakammaṃ pucchitvā āgantvā manussānaṃ katheti ‘idaṃ nāma katvā evarūpaṃ sampattiṃ
atk-s0502a:2284_4: labhantī’ti. Niraye nibbattānampi kammaṃ pucchitvā āgantvā manussānaṃ katheti ‘idaṃ
atk-s0502a:2284_5: nāma katvā evarūpaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavantī’ti. Manussā tassa kathaṃ sutvā mahantaṃ lābhasakkāraṃ
atk-s0502a:2284_6: abhiharanti, sace taṃ māretuṃ sakkhissāma, so lābhasakkāro amhākaṃ nibbattissatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2284_7: Te “attheko upāyo”ti sabbe ekacchandā hutvā “yaṃkiñci katvā taṃ mārāpessāmā”ti attano
atk-s0502a:2284_8: upaṭṭhāke samādapetvā kahāpaṇasahassaṃ labhitvā purisaghātakammaṃ katvā carante core
atk-s0502a:2284_9: pakkosāpetvā “mahāmoggallānatthero nāma kāḷasilāyaṃ vasati, tattha gantvā taṃ mārethā”ti
atk-s0502a:2284_10: tesaṃ kahāpaṇe adaṃsu. Corā dhanalobhena sampaṭicchitvā “theraṃ māressāmā”ti gantvā
atk-s0502a:2284_11: tassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ parivāresuṃ. Thero tehi parikkhittabhāvaṃ ñatvā kuñcikacchiddena
atk-s0502a:2284_12: nikkhamitvā pakkāmi. Te corā taṃ divasaṃ theraṃ adisvā punekadivasaṃ gantvā parikkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2284_13: Thero ñatvā kaṇṇikāmaṇḍalaṃ bhinditvā ākāsaṃ pakkhandi. Evaṃ te paṭhamamāsepi majjhimamāsepi
atk-s0502a:2284_14: theraṃ gahetuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu. Pacchimamāse pana sampatte thero attanā katakammassa
atk-s0502a:2284_15: ākaḍḍhanabhāvaṃ ñatvā na apagacchi. Corā gantvā theraṃ gahetvā taṇḍulakaṇamattānissa
atk-s0502a:2284_16: aṭṭhīni karontā bhindiṃsu. Atha naṃ “mato”ti saññāya ekasmiṃ gumbapiṭṭhe khipitvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2285_0: Thero “satthāraṃ passitvāva parinibbāyissāmī”ti attabhāvaṃ jhānaveṭhanena veṭhetvā
atk-s0502a:2285_1: thiraṃ katvā ākāsena satthu santikaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā, “bhante, parinibbāyissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:2285_3: bhante”ti. Tena hi, moggallāna, mayhaṃ dhammaṃ kathetvā yāhi. Tādisassa hi me sāvakassa
atk-s0502a:2285_4: idāni dassanaṃ natthīti. So “evaṃ karissāmi, bhante”ti satthāraṃ vanditvā ākāsaṃ
atk-s0502a:2285_5: uppatitvā parinibbānadivase sāriputtatthero viya nānappakārā iddhiyo katvā dhammaṃ
atk-s0502a:2285_6: kathetvā satthāraṃ vanditvā kāḷasilāṭaviṃ gantvā parinibbāyi. “Theraṃ kira corā māresu”nti
atk-s0502a:2285_7: ayampi kathā sakalajambudīpe patthari. Rājā ajātasattu core pariyesanatthāya carapurise
atk-s0502a:2285_8: payojesi. Tesupi coresu surāpāne suraṃ pivantesu eko ekassa piṭṭhiṃ paharitvā pātesi.
atk-s0502a:2285_9: So taṃ santejjetvā “ambho dubbinīta, tvaṃ kasmā me piṭṭhiṃ pātesī”ti āha. Kiṃ pana
atk-s0502a:2285_10: hare duṭṭhacora, tayā mahāmoggallānatthero paṭhamaṃ pahaṭoti? Kiṃ pana mayā pahaṭabhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:2285_11: tvaṃ na jānāsīti? Iti nesaṃ “mayā pahaṭo, mayā pahaṭo”ti vadantānaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā
atk-s0502a:2285_12: te carapurisā te sabbe core gahetvā rañño ārocesuṃ. Rājā core pakkosāpetvā pucchi
atk-s0502a:2285_14: devā”ti. Rājā pañcasate naggasamaṇake gāhāpetvā pañcasatehi corehi saddhiṃ rājaṅgaṇe
atk-s0502a:2285_15: nābhippamāṇesu āvāṭesu nikhaṇāpetvā palālehi paṭicchādāpetvā aggiṃ dāpesi. Atha nesaṃ
atk-s0502a:2285_16: jhāmabhāvaṃ ñatvā ayanaṅgalehi kasāpetvā sabbe khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ kārāpesi.
atk-s0502a:2286_0: Bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ – “mahāmoggallānatthero attano ananurūpameva
atk-s0502a:2286_1: maraṇaṃ patto”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti
atk-s0502a:2286_2: pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte, “bhikkhave, moggallāno imasseva attabhāvassa ananurūpaṃ
atk-s0502a:2286_3: maraṇaṃ patto, pubbe pana tena katassa kammassa anurūpameva maraṇaṃ patto”ti vatvā
atk-s0502a:2286_4: “kiṃ panassa, bhante, pubbakamma”nti puṭṭho vitthāretvā kathesi –
atk-s0502a:2287_0: Atīte kira bārāṇasivāsī eko kulaputto sayameva koṭṭanapacanādīni kammāni karonto
atk-s0502a:2287_1: mātāpitaro paṭijaggi. Athassa mātāpitaro naṃ, “tāta, tvaṃ ekakova gehe ca araññe
atk-s0502a:2287_2: ca kammaṃ karonto kilamasi, ekaṃ te kumārikaṃ ānessāmā”ti vatvā, “ammatātā, na mayhaṃ
atk-s0502a:2287_3: evarūpāyattho, ahaṃ yāva tumhe jīvatha, tāva vo sahatthā upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti tena paṭikkhittā
atk-s0502a:2287_4: punappunaṃ taṃ yācitvā kumārikaṃ ānayiṃsu. Sā katipāhameva te upaṭṭhahitvā pacchā
atk-s0502a:2287_5: tesaṃ dassanampi anicchantī “na sakkā tava mātāpitūhi saddhiṃ ekaṭṭhāne vasitu”nti
atk-s0502a:2287_6: ujjhāyitvā tasmiṃ attano kathaṃ aggaṇhante tassa bahigatakāle makacivākakhaṇḍāni
atk-s0502a:2287_7: ca yāgupheṇañca gahetvā tattha tattha ākiritvā tenāgantvā “kiṃ ida”nti puṭṭhā āha
atk-s0502a:2287_8: – “imesaṃ andhamahallakānaṃ etaṃ kammaṃ, sabbaṃ gehaṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ karontā vicaranti,
atk-s0502a:2287_9: na sakkā etehi saddhiṃ ekaṭṭhāne vasitu”nti. Evaṃ tāya naṃ punappunaṃ kathayamānāya
atk-s0502a:2287_10: evarūpopi pūritapāramī satto mātāpitūhi saddhiṃ bhijji. So “hotu, jānissāmi nesaṃ
atk-s0502a:2287_11: kattabba”nti te bhojetvā, “ammatātā, asukaṭṭhāne nāma tumhākaṃ ñātakā āgamanaṃ paccāsīsanti,
atk-s0502a:2287_12: tattha gamissāmā”ti te yānakaṃ āropetvā ādāya gacchanto aṭavimajjhaṃ pattakāle, “tāta,
atk-s0502a:2287_13: rasmiyo gaṇhātha, gāvo patodasaññāya gamissanti, imasmiṃ ṭhāne corā vasanti, ahaṃ
atk-s0502a:2287_14: otarāmī”ti pitu hatthe rasmiyo datvā otaritvā gacchanto saddaṃ parivattetvā corānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2287_15: uṭṭhitasaddamakāsi. Mātāpitaro saddaṃ sutvā “corā uṭṭhitā”ti saññāya, “tāta, mayaṃ
atk-s0502a:2287_16: mahallakā, tvaṃ attānameva rakkhāhī”ti āhaṃsu. So mātāpitaro tathāviravantepi corasaddaṃ
atk-s0502a:2287_17: karonto koṭṭetvā māretvā aṭaviyaṃ khipitvā paccāgami.
atk-s0502a:2288_0: Satthā idaṃ tassa pubbakammaṃ kathetvā, “bhikkhave, moggallāno ettakaṃ kammaṃ katvā
atk-s0502a:2288_1: anekavassasatasahassāni niraye paccitvā vipākāvasesena attabhāvasate evameva koṭṭetvā
atk-s0502a:2288_2: saṃcuṇṇito maraṇaṃ patto. Evaṃ moggallānena attano kammānurūpameva maraṇaṃ laddhaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2288_3: pañcahi corasatehi saddhiṃ labhiṃsu. Appaduṭṭhesu hi padussanto dasahi kāraṇehi anayabyasanaṃ
atk-s0502a:2288_4: pāpuṇātiyevā”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:2294: Garukaṃ vāpi ābādhaṃ, cittakkhepaṃ va pāpuṇe.
atk-s0502a:2297: Parikkhayaṃ va ñātīnaṃ, bhogānaṃ va pabhaṅguraṃ.
atk-s0502a:2301_0: Tattha adaṇḍesūti kāyadaṇḍādirahitesu khīṇāsavesu. Appaduṭṭhesūti paresu vā attani
atk-s0502a:2301_1: vā niraparādhesu. Dasannamaññataraṃ ṭhānanti dasasu dukkhakāraṇesu aññataraṃ kāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0502a:2301_2: Vedananti sīsarogādibhedaṃ pharusaṃ vedanaṃ. Jāninti kicchādhigatassa dhanassa jāniṃ.
atk-s0502a:2301_4: garukābādhaṃ vā. Cittakkhepanti ummādaṃ. Upasagganti yasavilopasenāpatiṭṭhānādiacchindanādikaṃ
atk-s0502a:2301_5: rājato upasaggaṃ vā. Abbhakkhānanti adiṭṭhaasutaacintitapubbaṃ “idaṃ sandhicchedādikammaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2301_6: idaṃ vā rājāparādhitakammaṃ tayā kata”nti evarūpaṃ dāruṇaṃ abbhakkhānaṃ vā. Parikkhayaṃ
atk-s0502a:2301_7: va ñātīnanti attano avassayo bhavituṃ samatthānaṃ ñātīnaṃ parikkhayaṃ vā. Pabhaṅguranti
atk-s0502a:2301_8: pabhaṅgubhāvaṃ pūtibhāvaṃ. Yaṃ hissa gehe dhaññaṃ, taṃ pūtibhāvaṃ āpajjati, suvaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:2301_9: aṅgārabhāvaṃ, muttā kappāsaṭṭhibhāvaṃ, kahāpaṇaṃ kapālakhaṇḍādibhāvaṃ, dvipadacatuppadā
atk-s0502a:2301_10: kāṇakuṇādibhāvanti attho. Aggi ḍahatīti ekasaṃvacchare dvattikkhattuṃ aññasmiṃ ḍāhake
atk-s0502a:2301_11: avijjamānepi asaniaggi vā patitvā ḍahati, attanova dhammatāya uṭṭhito pāvako vā ḍahatiyeva.
atk-s0502a:2301_12: Nirayanti diṭṭheva dhamme imesaṃ dasannaṃ ṭhānānaṃ aññataraṃ patvāpi ekaṃsena samparāye
atk-s0502a:2305: Na naggacariyāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto bahubhaṇḍikaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2306_0: Sāvatthivāsī kireko kuṭumbiko bhariyāya kālakatāya pabbaji. So pabbajanto attano
atk-s0502a:2306_1: pariveṇañca aggisālañca bhaṇḍagabbhañca kāretvā sabbampi bhaṇḍagabbhaṃ sappimadhutelādīhi
atk-s0502a:2306_2: pūretvā pabbaji, pabbajitvā ca pana attano dāse pakkosāpetvā yathārucikaṃ āhāraṃ
atk-s0502a:2306_3: pacāpetvā bhuñjati. Bahubhaṇḍo ca bahuparikkhāro ca ahosi. Rattiṃ aññaṃ nivāsanapārupanaṃ
atk-s0502a:2306_4: hoti, divā aññaṃ nivāsanapārupanaṃ hoti, divā aññaṃ vihārapaccante vasati. Tassekadivasaṃ
atk-s0502a:2306_5: cīvarapaccattharaṇāni sukkhāpentassa senāsanacārikaṃ āhiṇḍantā bhikkhū passitvā “kassimāni,
atk-s0502a:2306_6: āvuso”ti pucchitvā “mayha”nti vutte, “āvuso, bhagavatā ticīvarāni anuññātāni, tvañca
atk-s0502a:2306_7: pana evaṃ appicchassa buddhassa sāsane pabbajitvā evaṃ bahuparikkhāro jāto”ti taṃ
atk-s0502a:2306_8: satthu santikaṃ netvā, “bhante, ayaṃ bhikkhu atibahubhaṇḍo”ti ārocesuṃ. Satthā “saccaṃ
atk-s0502a:2306_9: kira taṃ bhikkhū”ti pucchitvā “saccaṃ, bhante”ti vutte āha – “kasmā pana tvaṃ, bhikkhu,
atk-s0502a:2306_10: mayā appicchatāya dhamme desite evaṃ bahubhaṇḍo jāto”ti. So tāvattakeneva kupito
atk-s0502a:2306_11: “iminā dāni nīhārena carissāmī”ti pārupanaṃ chaḍḍetvā parisamajjhe ekacīvaro aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:2306_12: Atha naṃ satthā upatthambhayamāno nanu tvaṃ bhikkhu pubbe hirottappagavesako dakarakkhasakālepi
atk-s0502a:2306_13: hirottappaṃ gavesamāno dvādasa vassāni vihāsi, kasmā idāni evaṃ garuke buddhasāsane
atk-s0502a:2306_14: pabbajitvā catuparisamajjhe pārupanaṃ chaḍḍetvā hirottappaṃ pahāya ṭhitosīti. So
atk-s0502a:2306_15: satthu vacanaṃ sutvā hirottappaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā taṃ cīvaraṃ pārupitvā satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:2306_16: vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Bhikkhū tassa atthassa āvibhāvatthaṃ bhagavantaṃ yāciṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2307_0: Atīte kira bārāṇasirañño aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ bodhisatto paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Tassa
atk-s0502a:2307_1: nāmaggahaṇadivase mahiṃsakumāroti nāmaṃ kariṃsu. Tassa kaniṭṭhabhātā candakumāro
atk-s0502a:2307_2: nāma ahosi. Tesaṃ mātari kālakatāya rājā aññaṃ aggamahesiṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. Sāpi puttaṃ
atk-s0502a:2307_3: vijāyi, sūriyakumārotissa nāmaṃ kariṃsu. Taṃ disvā rājā tuṭṭho “puttassa te varaṃ
atk-s0502a:2307_4: dammī”ti āha. Sāpi kho, “deva, icchitakāle gaṇhissāmī”ti vatvā puttassa vayappattakāle
atk-s0502a:2307_5: rājānaṃ āha – “devena mayhaṃ puttassa jātakāle varo dinno, idāni me puttassa rajjaṃ
atk-s0502a:2307_6: dehī”ti. Rājā “mama dve puttā aggikkhandhā viya jalantā vicaranti, na sakkā tassa
atk-s0502a:2307_7: rajjaṃ dātu”nti paṭikkhipitvāpi taṃ punappunaṃ yācamānameva disvā “ayaṃ me puttānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2307_8: anatthampi kareyyā”ti putte pakkosāpetvā, “tātā, ahaṃ sūriyakumārassa jātakāle varaṃ
atk-s0502a:2307_9: adāsiṃ, idānissa mātā rajjaṃ yācati, ahaṃ tassa na dātukāmo, tassa mātā tumhākaṃ
atk-s0502a:2307_10: anatthampi kareyya, gacchatha tumhe, araññe vasitvā mamaccayenāgantvā rajjaṃ gaṇhathā”ti
atk-s0502a:2307_11: uyyojesi. Te pitaraṃ vanditvā pāsādā otarante rājaṅgaṇe kīḷamāno sūriyakumāro disvā
atk-s0502a:2307_12: taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā tehi saddhiṃ nikkhami. Tesaṃ himavantaṃ paviṭṭhakāle bodhisatto
atk-s0502a:2307_13: maggā okkamma aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīditvā sūriyakumāraṃ āha – “tāta, etaṃ saraṃ
atk-s0502a:2307_14: gantvā nhatvā ca pivitvā ca amhākampi paduminipaṇṇehi udakaṃ āharā”ti. So pana saro
atk-s0502a:2307_15: vessavaṇṇassa santikā ekena dakarakkhasena laddho hoti. Vessavaṇṇo ca taṃ āha – “ṭhapetvā
atk-s0502a:2307_16: devadhammajānanake ye ca aññe imaṃ saraṃ otaranti, te khādituṃ labhasī”ti. Tato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0502a:2307_17: so taṃ saraṃ otiṇṇotiṇṇe devadhamme pucchitvā ajānante khādati, sūriyakumāropi taṃ
atk-s0502a:2307_18: saraṃ avīmaṃsitvāva otari, tena ca “devadhamme jānāsī”ti pucchito “devadhammā nāma
atk-s0502a:2307_19: candimasūriyā”ti āha. Atha naṃ “tvaṃ devadhamme na jānāsī”ti udakaṃ pavesetvā attano
atk-s0502a:2307_20: bhavane ṭhapesi. Bodhisattopi taṃ cirāyantaṃ disvā candakumāraṃ pesesi. Sopi tena
atk-s0502a:2307_21: “devadhamme jānāsī”ti pucchito “devadhammā nāma catasso disā”ti āha. Dakarakkhaso
atk-s0502a:2308_0: Bodhisatto tasmimpi cirāyante “antarāyena bhavitabba”nti sayaṃ gantvā dvinnampi otaraṇapadaṃyeva
atk-s0502a:2308_1: disvā “ayaṃ saro rakkhasapariggahito”ti ñatvā khaggaṃ sannayhitvā dhanuṃ gahetvā
atk-s0502a:2308_2: aṭṭhāsi. Rakkhaso taṃ anotarantaṃ disvā vanakammikapurisavesenāgantvā āha – “bho
atk-s0502a:2308_3: purisa, tvaṃ maggakilanto, kasmā imaṃ saraṃ otaritvā nhatvā ca pivitvā ca bhisamulālaṃ
atk-s0502a:2308_4: khāditvā pupphāni pilandhitvā na gacchasī”ti. Bodhisatto taṃ disvāva “esa so yakkho”ti
atk-s0502a:2308_5: ñatvā “tayā me bhātaro gahitā”ti āha. Āma, mayā gahitāti. Kiṃ kāraṇāti? Ahaṃ imaṃ
atk-s0502a:2308_6: saraṃ otiṇṇotiṇṇe labhāmīti. Kiṃ pana sabbeva labhasīti? Devadhammajānanake ṭhapetvā
atk-s0502a:2308_7: avasese labhāmīti. Atthi pana te devadhammehi atthoti? Āma, atthīti. Ahaṃ kathessāmīti.
atk-s0502a:2308_8: Tena hi kathehīti. Na sakkā kiliṭṭhena gattena kathetunti. Yakkho bodhisattaṃ nhāpetvā
atk-s0502a:2308_9: pānīyaṃ pāyetvā alaṅkaritvā alaṅkatamaṇḍapamajjhe pallaṅkaṃ āropetvā sayamassa pādamūle
atk-s0502a:2308_10: nisīdi. Atha naṃ bodhisatto “sakkaccaṃ suṇāhī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2311_0: Yakkho imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasanno bodhisattaṃ āha – “paṇḍita, ahaṃ te pasanno,
atk-s0502a:2311_1: ekaṃ bhātaraṃ dammi, kataraṃ ānemī”ti? “Kaniṭṭhaṃ ānehī”ti. Paṇḍita, tvaṃ kevalaṃ
atk-s0502a:2311_2: devadhamme jānāsiyeva, na pana tesu vattasīti. Kiṃ kāraṇāti? Yasmā jeṭṭhaṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0502a:2311_3: kaniṭṭhaṃ āharāpento jeṭṭhāpacāyikakammaṃ na karosīti, devadhamme cāhaṃ yakkha jānāmi,
atk-s0502a:2311_4: tesu ca vattāmi. Mayañhi etaṃ nissāya imaṃ araññaṃ paviṭṭhā. Etassa hi atthāya amhākaṃ
atk-s0502a:2311_5: pitaraṃ etassa mātā rajjaṃ yāci, amhākaṃ pana pitā taṃ varaṃ adatvā amhākaṃ anurakkhaṇatthāya
atk-s0502a:2311_6: araññe vāsaṃ anujāni, so kumāro anivattitvā amhehi saddhiṃ āgato. “Taṃ araññe eko
atk-s0502a:2311_7: yakkho khādī”ti vuttepi na koci saddahissati. Tenāhaṃ garahabhayabhīto tamevāharāpemīti.
atk-s0502a:2311_8: Yakkho bodhisattassa pasīditvā “sādhu paṇḍita, tvameva devadhamme jānāsi, devadhammesu
atk-s0502a:2311_9: ca vattasī”ti dve bhātaro ānetvā adāsi. Atha naṃ bodhisatto yakkhabhāve ādīnavaṃ
atk-s0502a:2311_10: kathetvā pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpesi. So tena susaṃvihitārakkho tasmiṃ araññe vasitvā
atk-s0502a:2311_11: pitari kālakate yakkhaṃ ādāya bārāṇasiṃ gantvā rajjaṃ gahetvā candakumārassa uparajjaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2311_12: sūriyakumārassa senāpatiṭṭhānaṃ datvā yakkhassa ramaṇīye ṭhāne āyatanaṃ kārāpetvā
atk-s0502a:2311_13: yathā so lābhaggappatto hoti, tathā akāsi.
atk-s0502a:2312_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā rakkhaso bahubhaṇḍikabhikkhu
atk-s0502a:2312_1: ahosi, sūriyakumāro ānando, candakumāro sāriputto, mahiṃsakumāro pana ahamevā”ti.
atk-s0502a:2312_2: Evaṃ satthā jātakaṃ kathetvā “evaṃ tvaṃ, bhikkhu, pubbe devadhamme gavesamāno hiriottappasampanno
atk-s0502a:2312_3: vicaritvā idāni catuparisamajjhe iminā nīhārena ṭhatvā mama purato ‘appicchomhī’ti
atk-s0502a:2312_4: vadanto ayuttaṃ akāsi. Na hi sāṭakapaṭikkhepādimattena samaṇo nāma hotī”ti vatvā
atk-s0502a:2312_5: anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2314: “Na naggacariyā na jaṭā na paṅkā, nānāsakā thaṇḍilasāyikā vā;
atk-s0502a:2316_0: Tattha nānāsakāti na anasakā, bhattapaṭikkhepakāti attho. Thaṇḍilasāyikāti bhūmisayanā.
atk-s0502a:2316_1: Rajojallanti kaddamalepanākārena sarīre sannihitarajo. Ukkuṭikappadhānanti ukkuṭikabhāvena
atk-s0502a:2316_2: āraddhavīriyaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yo hi macco “evaṃ ahaṃ lokanissaraṇasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0502a:2316_3: suddhiṃ pāpuṇissāmī”ti imesu naggacariyādīsu yaṃ kiñci samādāya vatteyya, so kevalaṃ
atk-s0502a:2316_4: micchādassanañceva vaḍḍheyya, kilamathassa ca bhāgī assa. Na hi etāni susamādinnānipi
atk-s0502a:2316_5: aṭṭhavatthukāya kaṅkhāya avitiṇṇabhāvena avitiṇṇakaṅkhaṃ maccaṃ sodhentīti.
atk-s0502a:2320: Alaṅkato cepīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto santatimahāmattaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2321_0: So hi ekasmiṃ kāle rañño pasenadikosalassa paccantaṃ kupitaṃ vūpasametvā āgato. Athassa
atk-s0502a:2321_1: rājā tuṭṭho satta divasāni rajjaṃ datvā ekaṃ naccagītakusalaṃ itthiṃ adāsi. So satta
atk-s0502a:2321_2: divasāni surāmadamatto hutvā sattame divase sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍito hatthikkhandhavaragato
atk-s0502a:2321_3: nhānatitthaṃ gacchanto satthāraṃ piṇḍāya pavisantaṃ dvārantare disvā hatthikkhandhavaragatova
atk-s0502a:2321_4: sīsaṃ cāletvā vanditvā pakkāmi. Satthā sitaṃ katvā “ko nu kho, bhante, sitapātukaraṇe
atk-s0502a:2321_5: hetū”ti ānandattherena puṭṭho sitakāraṇaṃ ācikkhanto āha – “passānanda, santatimahāmattaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2321_6: ajja sabbābharaṇapaṭimaṇḍitova mama santikaṃ āgantvā catuppadikagāthāvasāne arahattaṃ
atk-s0502a:2321_7: patvā sattatālamatte ākāse nisīditvā parinibbāyissatī”ti. Mahājano therena saddhiṃ
atk-s0502a:2321_8: kathentassa satthu vacanaṃ assosi. Tattha micchādiṭṭhikā cintayiṃsu – “passatha samaṇassa
atk-s0502a:2321_9: gotamassa kiriyaṃ, mukhappattameva bhāsati, ajja kira esa evaṃ surāmadamatto yathālaṅkatova
atk-s0502a:2321_10: etassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā parinibbāyissati, ajjeva taṃ musāvādena niggaṇhissāmā”ti.
atk-s0502a:2321_11: Sammādiṭṭhikā cintesuṃ – “aho buddhānaṃ mahānubhāvatā, ajja buddhalīḷañceva santatimahāmattalīḷañca
atk-s0502a:2322_0: Santatimahāmattopi nhānatitthe divasabhāgaṃ udakakīḷaṃ kīḷitvā uyyānaṃ gantvā āpānabhūmiyaṃ
atk-s0502a:2322_1: nisīdi. Sāpi itthī raṅgamajjhaṃ otaritvā naccagītaṃ dassetuṃ ārabhi. Tassā sarīralīḷāya
atk-s0502a:2322_2: dassanatthaṃ sattāhaṃ appāhāratāya taṃ divasaṃ naccagītaṃ dassayamānāya antokucchiyaṃ
atk-s0502a:2322_3: satthakavātā samuṭṭhāya hadayamaṃsaṃ kantitvā agamaṃsu. Sā taṅkhaṇaññeva mukhena
atk-s0502a:2322_4: ceva akkhīhi ca vivaṭehi kālamakāsi. Santatimahāmatto “upadhāretha na”nti vatvā “niruddhā,
atk-s0502a:2322_5: sāmī”ti ca vuttamatteyeva balavasokena abhibhūto taṅkhaṇaññevassa sattāhaṃ pītasurā
atk-s0502a:2322_6: tattakapāle udakabindu viya parikkhayaṃ agamāsi. So “na me imaṃ sokaṃ aññe nibbāpetuṃ
atk-s0502a:2322_7: sakkhissanti aññatra tathāgatenā”ti balakāyaparivuto sāyanhasamaye satthu santikaṃ
atk-s0502a:2322_8: gantvā vanditvā evamāha – “bhante, ‘evarūpo me soko uppanno, taṃ me tumhe nibbāpetuṃ
atk-s0502a:2322_9: sakkhissathā’ti āgatomhi, paṭisaraṇaṃ me hothā”ti. Atha naṃ satthā “sokaṃ nibbāpetuṃ
atk-s0502a:2322_10: samatthasseva santikaṃ āgatosi. Imissā hi itthiyā imināva ākārena matakāle tava rodantassa
atk-s0502a:2322_11: paggharitaassūni catunnaṃ mahāsamuddānaṃ udakato atirekatarānī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2323: “Yaṃ pubbe taṃ visosehi, pacchā te māhu kiñcanaṃ;
atk-s0502a:2324: Majjhe ce no gahessasi, upasanto carissasī”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:2325_0: Gāthāpariyosāne santatimahāmatto arahattaṃ patvā attano āyusaṅkhāraṃ olokento tassa
atk-s0502a:2325_1: appavattanabhāvaṃ ñatvā satthāraṃ āha – “bhante, parinibbānaṃ me anujānāthā”ti. Satthā
atk-s0502a:2325_2: tena katakammaṃ jānantopi “musāvādena niggaṇhanatthaṃ sannipatitā micchādiṭṭhikā
atk-s0502a:2325_3: okāsaṃ na labhissanti, ‘buddhalīḷañceva santatimahāmattalīḷañca passissāmā’ti sannipatitā
atk-s0502a:2325_4: sammādiṭṭhikā iminā katakammaṃ sutvā puññesu ādaraṃ karissantī”ti sallakkhetvā “tena
atk-s0502a:2325_5: hi tayā katakammaṃ mayhaṃ kathehi, kathento ca bhūmiyaṃ ṭhito akathetvā sattatālamatte
atk-s0502a:2325_6: ākāse ṭhito kathehī”ti āha. So “sādhu, bhante”ti satthāraṃ vanditvā ekatālappamāṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:2325_7: uggamma orohitvā puna satthāraṃ vanditvā uggacchanto paṭipāṭiyā sattatālappamāṇe
atk-s0502a:2325_8: ākāse pallaṅkena nisīditvā “suṇātha me, bhante, pubbakamma”nti vatvā āha –
atk-s0502a:2326_0: Ito ekanavutikappe vipassīsammāsambuddhakāle ahaṃ bandhumatinagare ekasmiṃ kule nibbattitvā
atk-s0502a:2326_1: cintesiṃ – “kiṃ nu kho paresaṃ chedaṃ vā pīḷaṃ vā akaraṇakamma”nti upadhārento dhammaghosakakammaṃ
atk-s0502a:2326_2: disvā tato paṭṭhāya taṃ kammaṃ karonto mahājanaṃ samādapetvā “puññāni karotha, uposathadivasesu
atk-s0502a:2326_3: uposathaṃ samādiyatha, dānaṃ detha, dhammaṃ suṇātha, buddharatanādīhi sadisaṃ aññaṃ
atk-s0502a:2326_4: nāma natthi, tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ sakkāraṃ karothā”ti ugghosento vicarāmi. Tassa mayhaṃ
atk-s0502a:2326_5: saddaṃ sutvā buddhapitā bandhumatimahārājā maṃ pakkosāpetvā, “tāta, kiṃ karonto vicarasī”ti
atk-s0502a:2326_6: pucchitvā, “deva, tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ guṇaṃ pakāsetvā mahājanaṃ puññakammesu samādapento
atk-s0502a:2326_7: vicarāmī”ti vutte, “kattha nisinno vicarasī”ti maṃ pucchitvā “padasāva, devā”ti mayā
atk-s0502a:2326_8: vutte, “tāta, na tvaṃ evaṃ vicarituṃ arahasi, imaṃ pupphadāmaṃ pilandhitvā assapiṭṭhe
atk-s0502a:2326_9: nisinnova vicarā”ti mayhaṃ muttādāmasadisaṃ pupphadāmaṃ datvā dantaṃ assaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a:2326_10: Atha maṃ raññā dinnaparihārena tatheva ugghosetvā vicarantaṃ puna rājā pakkosāpetvā,
atk-s0502a:2326_11: “tāta, kiṃ karonto vicarasī”ti pucchitvā “tadeva, devā”ti vutte, “tāta, assopi te
atk-s0502a:2326_12: nānucchaviko, idha nisīditvā vicarā”ti catusindhavayuttarathaṃ adāsi. Tatiyavārepi
atk-s0502a:2326_13: me rājā saddaṃ sutvā pakkosāpetvā, “tāta, kiṃ karonto vicarasī”ti pucchitvā “tadeva,
atk-s0502a:2326_14: devā”ti vutte, “tāta, rathopi te nānucchaviko”ti mayhaṃ mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ mahāpasādhanañca
atk-s0502a:2326_15: datvā ekañca hatthiṃ adāsi. Svāhaṃ sabbābharaṇapaṭimaṇḍito hatthikkhandhe nisinno
atk-s0502a:2326_16: asīti vassasahassāni dhammaghosakakammaṃ akāsiṃ, tassa me ettakaṃ kālaṃ kāyato candanagandho
atk-s0502a:2326_17: vāyati, mukhato uppalagandho vāyati. Idaṃ mayā katakammanti.
atk-s0502a:2327_0: Evaṃ so attano pubbakammaṃ kathetvā ākāse nisinnova tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0502a:2327_1: Sarīre aggijālā uṭṭhahitvā maṃsalohitaṃ jhāpesi, sumanapupphāni viya dhātuyo avasissiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2327_2: Satthā suddhavatthaṃ pasāresi, dhātuyo tattha patiṃsu. Tā patte pakkhipitvā catumahāpathe
atk-s0502a:2327_3: thūpaṃ kāresi “mahājano vanditvā puññabhāgī bhavissatī”ti. Bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ
atk-s0502a:2327_4: kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ, “āvuso, santatimahāmatto gāthāvasāne arahattaṃ patvā alaṅkatapaṭiyattoyeva
atk-s0502a:2327_5: ākāse nisīditvā parinibbuto, kiṃ nu kho etaṃ ‘samaṇo’ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati udāhu brāhmaṇo”ti.
atk-s0502a:2327_6: Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya
atk-s0502a:2327_7: nāmā”ti vutte, “bhikkhave, mama puttaṃ ‘samaṇo’tipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati, ‘brāhmaṇo’tipi
atk-s0502a:2327_8: vattuṃ vaṭṭatiyevā”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2332: So brāhmaṇo so samaṇo sa bhikkhū”ti.
atk-s0502a:2333_0: Tattha alaṅkatoti vatthābharaṇehi paṭimaṇḍito. Tassattho – vatthālaṅkārādīhi alaṅkato
atk-s0502a:2333_1: cepi puggalo kāyādīhi samaṃ careyya, rāgādivūpasamena santo indriyadamanena danto
atk-s0502a:2333_2: catumagganiyamena niyato seṭṭhacariyāya brahmacārī kāyadaṇḍādīnaṃ oropitatāya sabbesu
atk-s0502a:2333_3: bhūtesu nidhāya daṇḍaṃ. So evarūpo bāhitapāpattā brāhmaṇotipi samitapāpattā samaṇotipi
atk-s0502a:2337: Hirīnisedhoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto pilotikattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2338_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye ānandatthero ekaṃ pilotikakhaṇḍanivatthaṃ kapālaṃ ādāya bhikkhāya
atk-s0502a:2338_1: carantaṃ dārakaṃ disvā “kiṃ te evaṃ vicaritvā jīvanato pabbajjā na uttaritarā”ti
atk-s0502a:2338_2: vatvā, “bhante, ko maṃ pabbājessatī”ti vutte “ahaṃ pabbājessāmī”ti taṃ ādāya gantvā
atk-s0502a:2338_3: sahatthā nhāpetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ datvā pabbājesi. Tañca pana nivatthapilotikakhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0502a:2338_4: pasāretvā olokento parissāvanakaraṇamattampi gayhūpagaṃ kañci padesaṃ adisvā kapālena
atk-s0502a:2338_5: saddhiṃ ekissā rukkhasākhāya ṭhapesi. So pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado buddhānaṃ uppannalābhasakkāraṃ
atk-s0502a:2338_6: paribhuñjamāno mahagghāni cīvarāni acchādetvā vicaranto thūlasarīro hutvā ukkaṇṭhitvā
atk-s0502a:2338_7: “kiṃ me janassa saddhādeyyaṃ nivāsetvā vicaraṇena, attano pilotikameva nivāsessāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:2338_8: taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā pilotikaṃ gahetvā “ahirika nillajja evarūpānaṃ vatthānaṃ acchādanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2338_9: pahāya imaṃ pilotikakhaṇḍaṃ nivāsetvā kapālahattho bhikkhāya carituṃ gacchasī”ti
atk-s0502a:2338_10: taṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā attanāva attānaṃ ovadi, ovadantasseva panassa cittaṃ sannisīdi.
atk-s0502a:2338_11: So taṃ pilotikaṃ tattheva paṭisāmetvā nivattitvā vihārameva gato. So katipāhaccayena
atk-s0502a:2338_12: punapi ukkaṇṭhitvā tatheva vatvā nivatti, punapi tathevāti. Taṃ evaṃ aparāparaṃ vicarantaṃ
atk-s0502a:2338_13: disvā bhikkhū “kahaṃ, āvuso, gacchasī”ti pucchanti. So “ācariyassa santikaṃ gacchāmāvuso”ti
atk-s0502a:2338_14: vatvā eteneva nīhārena attano pilotikakhaṇḍameva ārammaṇaṃ katvā attānaṃ nisedhetvā
atk-s0502a:2338_15: katipāheneva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Bhikkhū āhaṃsu – “kiṃ, āvuso, na dāni ācariyassa santikaṃ
atk-s0502a:2338_16: gacchasi, nanu ayaṃ te vicaraṇamaggo”ti. Āvuso, ācariyena saddhiṃ saṃsagge sati gatomhi,
atk-s0502a:2338_17: idāni pana me chinno saṃsaggo, tenassa santikaṃ na gacchāmīti. Bhikkhū tathāgatassa
atk-s0502a:2338_18: ārocesuṃ – “bhante, pilotikatthero aññaṃ byākarotī”ti. Kimāha, bhikkhaveti? Idaṃ
atk-s0502a:2338_19: nāma, bhanteti. Taṃ sutvā satthā “āma, bhikkhave, mama putto saṃsagge sati ācariyassa
atk-s0502a:2338_20: santikaṃ gato, idāni panassa saṃsaggo chinno, attanāva attānaṃ nisedhetvā arahattaṃ
atk-s0502a:2341: Yo niddaṃ apabodheti, asso bhadro kasāmiva.
atk-s0502a:2349_0: Tattha anto uppannaṃ akusalavitakkaṃ hiriyā nisedhetīti hirīnisedho. Koci lokasminti
atk-s0502a:2349_1: evarūpo puggalo dullabho, kocideva lokasmiṃ vijjati. Yo niddanti appamatto samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0502a:2349_2: karonto attano uppannaṃ niddaṃ apaharanto bujjhatīti apabodheti. Kasāmivāti yathā
atk-s0502a:2349_3: bhadro asso attani patamānaṃ kasaṃ apaharati, attani patituṃ na deti. Yo evaṃ niddaṃ
atk-s0502a:2350_0: Dutiyagāthāya ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – “bhikkhave, yathā bhadro asso pamādamāgamma kasāya
atk-s0502a:2350_1: niviṭṭho, ahampi nāma kasāya pahaṭo”ti aparabhāge ātappaṃ karoti, evaṃ tumhepi ātāpino
atk-s0502a:2350_2: saṃvegino bhavatha, evaṃbhūtā lokiyalokuttarāya duvidhāya saddhāya ca catupārisuddhisīlena
atk-s0502a:2350_3: ca kāyikacetasikavīriyena ca aṭṭhasamāpattisamādhinā ca kāraṇākāraṇajānanalakkhaṇena
atk-s0502a:2350_4: dhammavinicchayena ca samannāgatā hutvā tissannaṃ vā aṭṭhannaṃ vā vijjānaṃ, pañcadasannañca
atk-s0502a:2350_5: caraṇānaṃ sampattiyā sampannavijjācaraṇā. Upaṭṭhitasatitāya patissatā hutvā idaṃ
atk-s0502a:2354: Udakañhi nayantīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sukhasāmaṇeraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2355_0: Atītasmiñhi bārāṇasiseṭṭhino gandhakumāro nāma putto ahosi. Rājā tassa pitari kālakate
atk-s0502a:2355_1: taṃ pakkosāpetvā samassāsetvā mahantena sakkārena tasseva seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ adāsi. So
atk-s0502a:2355_2: tato paṭṭhāya gandhaseṭṭhīti paññāyi. Athassa bhaṇḍāgāriko dhanagabbhadvāraṃ vivaritvā,
atk-s0502a:2355_3: “sāmi, idaṃ te ettakaṃ pitu dhanaṃ, ettakaṃ pitāmahādīna”nti nīharitvā dassesi. So
atk-s0502a:2355_4: taṃ dhanarāsiṃ oloketvā āha – “kiṃ pana te imaṃ dhanaṃ gahetvā na gamiṃsū”ti. “Sāmi,
atk-s0502a:2355_5: dhanaṃ gahetvā gatā nāma natthi. Attanā kataṃ kusalākusalameva hi ādāya sattā gacchantī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2355_6: So cintesi – “te bālatāya dhanaṃ saṇṭhāpetvā pahāya gatā, ahaṃ panetaṃ gahetvāva
atk-s0502a:2355_7: gamissāmī”ti. Evaṃ pana cintento “dānaṃ vā dassāmi, pūjaṃ vā karissāmī”ti acintetvā
atk-s0502a:2355_8: “idaṃ sabbaṃ khāditvāva gamissāmī”ti cintesi. So satasahassaṃ vissajjetvā phalikamayaṃ
atk-s0502a:2355_9: nhānakoṭṭhakaṃ kāresi, satasahassaṃ datvā phalikamayameva nhānaphalakaṃ, satasahassaṃ
atk-s0502a:2355_10: datvā nisīdanapallaṅkaṃ, satasahassaṃ datvā bhojanapātiṃ, satasahassameva datvā bhojanaṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a:2355_11: maṇḍapaṃ kārāpesi, satasahassaṃ datvā bhojanapātiyā āsittakūpadhānaṃ kāresi, satasahasseneva
atk-s0502a:2355_12: gehe sīhapañjaraṃ saṇṭhāpesi, attano pātarāsatthāya sahassaṃ adāsi, sāyamāsatthāyapi
atk-s0502a:2355_13: sahassameva. Puṇṇamadivase pana bhojanatthāya satasahassaṃ dāpesi, taṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjanadivase
atk-s0502a:2355_14: satasahassaṃ vissajjetvā nagaraṃ alaṅkaritvā bheriṃ carāpesi – “gandhaseṭṭhissa kira
atk-s0502a:2356_0: Mahājano mañcātimañce bandhitvā sannipati. Sopi satasahassagghanake nhānakoṭṭhake
atk-s0502a:2356_1: satasahassagghanake phalake nisīditvā soḷasahi gandhodakaghaṭehi nhatvā taṃ sīhapañjaraṃ
atk-s0502a:2356_2: vivaritvā tasmiṃ pallaṅke nisīdi. Athassa tasmiṃ āsittakūpadhāne taṃ pātiṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0502a:2356_3: satasahassagghanakaṃ bhojanaṃ vaḍḍhesuṃ. So nāṭakaparivuto evarūpāya sampattiyā taṃ
atk-s0502a:2356_4: bhojanaṃ bhuñjati. Aparena samayena eko gāmikamanusso attano paribbayāharaṇatthaṃ
atk-s0502a:2356_5: dāruādīni yānake pakkhipitvā nagaraṃ gantvā sahāyakassa gehe nivāsaṃ gaṇhi. Tadā
atk-s0502a:2356_6: pana puṇṇamadivaso hoti. “Gandhaseṭṭhino bhuñjanalīḷaṃ olokentū”ti nagare bheriṃ
atk-s0502a:2356_7: carāpesi. Atha naṃ sahāyako āha – “samma, gandhaseṭṭhino te bhuñjanalīḷaṃ diṭṭhapubba”nti.
atk-s0502a:2356_8: “Na diṭṭhapubbaṃ, sammā”ti. “Tena hi ehi, gacchāma, ayaṃ nagare bherī carati, etassa
atk-s0502a:2356_9: mahāsampattiṃ passāmā”ti nagaravāsī janapadavāsiṃ gahetvā agamāsi. Mahājanopi mañcātimañce
atk-s0502a:2356_10: abhiruhitvā passati. Gāmavāsī bhattagandhaṃ ghāyitvāva nagaravāsiṃ āha – “mayhaṃ
atk-s0502a:2356_11: etāya pātiyā bhattapiṇḍe pipāsā jātā”ti. Samma, mā etaṃ patthayi, na sakkā laddhunti.
atk-s0502a:2356_12: Samma, alabhanto na jīvissāmīti. So taṃ paṭibāhituṃ asakkonto parisapariyante ṭhatvā
atk-s0502a:2356_13: “paṇamāmi te, sāmī”ti tikkhattuṃ mahāsaddaṃ nicchāretvā “ko eso”ti vutte ahaṃ, sāmīti.
atk-s0502a:2356_14: “Kimeta”nti. “Ayaṃ eko gāmavāsī tumhākaṃ pātiyaṃ bhattapiṇḍe pipāsaṃ upādesi, ekaṃ
atk-s0502a:2356_15: bhattapiṇḍaṃ dāpethā”ti. “Na sakkā laddhu”nti. “Kiṃ, samma, sutaṃ te”ti? “Sutaṃ me,
atk-s0502a:2356_16: apica labhanto jīvissāmi, alabhantassa me maraṇaṃ bhavissatī”ti. So punapi viravi
atk-s0502a:2356_17: – “ayaṃ kira, sāmi, alabhanto marissati, jīvitamassa dethā”ti. Ambho bhattapiṇḍo
atk-s0502a:2356_18: nāma satampi agghati, satadvayampi agghati. Yo yo yācati, tassa tassa dadamāno ahaṃ
atk-s0502a:2356_19: kiṃ bhuñjissāmīti? Sāmi, ayaṃ alabhanto marissati, jīvitamassa dethāti. Na sakkāva
atk-s0502a:2356_20: mudhā laddhuṃ, yadi pana alabhanto na jīvati, tīṇi saṃvaccharāni mama gehe bhatiṃ
atk-s0502a:2356_21: karotu, evamassa bhattapātiṃ dāpessāmīti. Gāmavāsī taṃ sutvā “evaṃ hotu, sammā”ti
atk-s0502a:2356_22: sahāyakaṃ vatvā puttadāraṃ pahāya “bhattapātiatthāya tīṇi saṃvaccharāni bhatiṃ karissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:2356_23: seṭṭhissa gehaṃ pāvisi. So bhatiṃ karonto sabbakiccāni sakkaccaṃ akāsi. Gehe vā araññe
atk-s0502a:2356_24: vā rattiṃ vā divā vā sabbāni kattabbakammāni katāneva paññāyiṃsu. “Bhattabhatiko”ti
atk-s0502a:2356_25: ca vutte sakalanagarepi paññāyi. Athassa divase paripuṇṇe bhattaveyyāvaṭiko “bhattabhatikassa,
atk-s0502a:2356_26: sāmi, divaso puṇṇo, dukkaraṃ tena kataṃ tīṇi saṃvaccharāni bhatiṃ karontena, ekampi
atk-s0502a:2357_0: Athassa seṭṭhi attano sāyapātarāsatthāya dve sahassāni, tassa pātarāsatthāya sahassanti
atk-s0502a:2357_1: tīṇi sahassāni dāpetvā āha – “ajja mayhaṃ kattabbaṃ parihāraṃ tasseva karothā”ti.
atk-s0502a:2357_2: Vatvā ca pana ṭhapetvā ekaṃ cintāmaṇiṃ nāma piyabhariyaṃ avasesajanampi “ajja tameva
atk-s0502a:2357_3: parivārethā”ti vatvā sabbasampattiṃ tassa niyyādesi. So seṭṭhino nhānodakena tasseva
atk-s0502a:2357_4: koṭṭhake tasmiṃ phalake nisinno nhatvā tasseva nivāsanasāṭake nivāsetvā tasseva pallaṅke
atk-s0502a:2357_5: nisīdi. Seṭṭhipi nagare bheriṃ carāpesi – “bhattabhatiko gandhaseṭṭhissa gehe tīṇi
atk-s0502a:2357_6: saṃvaccharāni bhatiṃ katvā pātiṃ labhi, tassa bhuñjanasampattiṃ olokentū”ti. Mahājano
atk-s0502a:2357_7: mañcātimañce abhiruhitvā passati, gāmavāsissa olokitolokitaṭṭhānaṃ kampanākārappattaṃ
atk-s0502a:2357_8: ahosi. Nāṭakā parivāretvā aṭṭhasuṃ, tassa purato bhattapātiṃ vaḍḍhetvā ṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2357_9: Athassa hatthadhovanavelāya gandhamādane eko paccekabuddho sattame divase samāpattito
atk-s0502a:2357_10: vuṭṭhāya “kattha nu kho ajja bhikkhācāratthāya gacchāmī”ti upadhārento bhattabhatikaṃ
atk-s0502a:2357_11: addasa. Atha so “ayaṃ tīṇi saṃvaccharāni bhatiṃ katvā bhattapātiṃ labhi, atthi nu
atk-s0502a:2357_12: kho etassa saddhā, natthī”ti upadhārento “atthī”ti ñatvā “saddhāpi ekacce saṅgahaṃ
atk-s0502a:2357_13: kātuṃ na sakkonti, sakkhissati nu kho me saṅgahaṃ kātu”nti cintetvā “sakkhissati
atk-s0502a:2357_14: ceva mama ca saṅgahakaraṇaṃ nissāya mahāsampattiṃ labhissatī”ti ñatvā cīvaraṃ pārupitvā
atk-s0502a:2357_15: pattamādāya vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā parisantarena gantvā tassa purato ṭhitameva attānaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0502a:2358_0: So paccekabuddhaṃ disvā cintesi – “ahaṃ pubbe adinnabhāvena ekissā bhattapātiyā atthāya
atk-s0502a:2358_1: tīṇi saṃvaccharāni paragehe bhatiṃ akāsiṃ, idāni me idaṃ bhattaṃ ekaṃ rattindivaṃ
atk-s0502a:2358_2: rakkheyya, sace pana naṃ ayyassa dassāmi, anekānipi kappakoṭisahassāni rakkhissati,
atk-s0502a:2358_3: ayyasseva naṃ dassāmī”ti. So tīṇi saṃvaccharāni bhatiṃ katvā laddhabhattapātito ekapiṇḍampi
atk-s0502a:2358_4: mukhe aṭṭhapetvā taṇhaṃ vinodetvā sayameva pātiṃ ukkhipitvā paccekabuddhassa santikaṃ
atk-s0502a:2358_5: gantvā pātiṃ aññassa hatthe datvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā pātiṃ vāmahatthena gahetvā
atk-s0502a:2358_6: dakkhiṇahatthena tassa patte bhattaṃ ākiri. Paccekabuddho bhattassa upaḍḍhasesakāle
atk-s0502a:2358_7: pattaṃ hatthena pidahi. Atha naṃ so āha – “bhante, ekova paṭiviso na sakkā dvidhā
atk-s0502a:2358_8: kātuṃ, mā maṃ idhalokena saṅgaṇhatha, paralokena saṅgahameva karotha, sāvasesaṃ akatvā
atk-s0502a:2358_9: niravasesameva dassāmī”ti. Attano hi thokampi anavasesetvā dinnaṃ niravasesadānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2358_10: nāma, taṃ mahapphalaṃ hoti. So tathā karonto sabbaṃ datvā puna vanditvā āha – “bhante,
atk-s0502a:2358_11: ekaṃ bhattapātiṃ nissāya tīṇi saṃvaccharāni me paragehe bhatiṃ karontena dukkhaṃ
atk-s0502a:2358_12: anubhūtaṃ, idāni me nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne sukhameva hotu, tumhehi diṭṭhadhammasseva
atk-s0502a:2358_13: bhāgī assa”nti. Paccekabuddho “evaṃ hotu, cintāmaṇi viya te sabbakāmadado manosaṅkappā
atk-s0502a:2360: Sabbe pūrentu saṅkappā, cando pannaraso yathā.
atk-s0502a:2362: Sabbe pūrentu saṅkappā, maṇi jotiraso yathā”ti. –
atk-s0502a:2363: Vatvā “ayaṃ mahājano yāva gandhamādanapabbatagamanā maṃ passanto tiṭṭhatū”ti adhiṭṭhāya ākāsena gandhamādanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:2364_0: Mahājanopi naṃ passantova aṭṭhāsi. So tattha gantvā taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ pañcasatānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2364_1: vibhajitvā adāsi. Sabbe attano pahonakaṃ gaṇhiṃsu. “Appo piṇḍapāto kathaṃ pahosī”ti
atk-s0502a:2364_2: na cintetabbaṃ. Cattāri hi acinteyyāni vuttāni, tatrāyaṃ paccekabuddhavisayoti. Mahājano
atk-s0502a:2364_3: paccekabuddhānaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ vibhajitvā diyyamānaṃ disvā sādhukārasahassāni pavattesi,
atk-s0502a:2364_4: asanisatanipākasaddo viya ahosi. Taṃ sutvā gandhaseṭṭhi cintesi – “bhattabhatiko
atk-s0502a:2364_5: mayā dinnasampattiṃ dhāretuṃ nāsakkhi maññe, tenāyaṃ mahājano parihāsaṃ karonto sannipatito
atk-s0502a:2364_6: nadatī”ti. So tappavattijānanatthaṃ manusse pesesi. Te āgantvā “sampattidhārakā nāma,
atk-s0502a:2364_7: sāmi, evaṃ hontū”ti vatvā taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ. Seṭṭhi taṃ sutvāva pañcavaṇṇāya
atk-s0502a:2364_8: pītiyā phuṭṭhasarīro hutvā “aho dukkaraṃ tena kataṃ, ahaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ evarūpāya
atk-s0502a:2364_9: sampattiyā ṭhito kiñci dātuṃ nāsakkhi”nti taṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tayā idaṃ
atk-s0502a:2364_10: nāma kata”nti pucchitvā “āma, sāmī”ti vutte, “handa, sahassaṃ gahetvā tava dāne mayhampi
atk-s0502a:2364_11: pattiṃ dehī”ti āha. So tathā akāsi. Seṭṭhipissa sabbaṃ attano santakaṃ majjhe bhinditvā adāsi.
atk-s0502a:2365_0: Catasso hi sampadā nāma – vatthusampadā, paccayasampadā, cetanāsampadā, guṇātirekasampadāti.
atk-s0502a:2365_1: Tattha nirodhasamāpattiraho arahā vā anāgāmī vā dakkhiṇeyyo vatthusampadā nāma. Paccayānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2365_2: dhammena samena uppatti paccayasampadā nāma. Dānato pubbe dānakāle pacchā bhāgeti
atk-s0502a:2365_3: tīsu kālesu cetanāya somanassasahagatañāṇasampayuttabhāvo cetanāsampadā nāma. Dakkhiṇeyyassa
atk-s0502a:2365_4: samāpattito vuṭṭhitabhāvo guṇātirekasampadā nāmāti. Imassa ca khīṇāsavo paccekabuddho
atk-s0502a:2365_5: dakkhiṇeyyā, bhatiṃ katvā laddhabhāvena paccayo dhammato uppanno, tīsu kālesu parisuddhā
atk-s0502a:2365_6: cetanā, samāpattito vuṭṭhitamatto paccekabuddho guṇātirekoti catassopi sampadā nipphannā.
atk-s0502a:2365_7: Etāsaṃ ānubhāvena diṭṭheva dhamme mahāsampattiṃ pāpuṇanti. Tasmā so seṭṭhino santikā
atk-s0502a:2365_8: sampattiṃ labhi. Aparabhāge ca rājāpi iminā katakammaṃ sutvā taṃ pakkosāpetvā sahassaṃ
atk-s0502a:2365_9: datvā pattiṃ gahetvā tuṭṭhamānaso mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ datvā seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a:2365_10: Bhattabhatikaseṭṭhītissa nāmaṃ akāsi. So gandhaseṭṭhinā saddhiṃ sahāyo hutvā ekato
atk-s0502a:2365_11: khādanto pivanto yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cuto devaloke nibbattitvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ
atk-s0502a:2365_12: dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ sāriputtattherassūpaṭṭhākakule
atk-s0502a:2365_13: paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Athassa mātā laddhagabbhaparihārā katipāhaccayena “aho vatāhaṃ
atk-s0502a:2365_14: pañcasatehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ sāriputtattherassa satarasabhojanaṃ datvā kāsāyavatthanivatthā
atk-s0502a:2365_15: suvaṇṇasarakaṃ ādāya āsanapariyante nisinnā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ucchiṭṭhāvasesakaṃ paribhuñjeyya”nti
atk-s0502a:2365_16: dohaḷinī hutvā tatheva katvā dohaḷaṃ paṭivinodesi. Sā sesamaṅgalesupi tathārūpameva
atk-s0502a:2365_17: dānaṃ datvā puttaṃ vijāyitvā nāmaggahaṇadivase “puttassa me, bhante, sikkhāpadāni
atk-s0502a:2365_18: dethā”ti theraṃ āha. Thero “kimassa nāma”nti pucchi. “Bhante, puttassa me paṭisandhiggahaṇato
atk-s0502a:2365_19: paṭṭhāya imasmiṃ gehe kassaci dukkhaṃ nāma na bhūtapubbaṃ, tenevassa sukhakumāroti
atk-s0502a:2365_20: nāmaṃ bhavissatī”ti vutte tadevassa nāmaṃ gahetvā sikkhāpadāni adāsi.
atk-s0502a:2366_0: Tadā evañcassa mātu “nāhaṃ mama puttassa ajjhāsayaṃ bhindissāmī”ti cittaṃ uppajji.
atk-s0502a:2366_1: Sā tassa kaṇṇavijjhanamaṅgalādīsupi tatheva dānaṃ adāsi. Kumāropi sattavassikakāle
atk-s0502a:2366_2: “icchāmahaṃ, amma, therassa santike pabbajitu”nti āha. Sā “sādhu, tāta, nāhaṃ tava
atk-s0502a:2366_3: ajjhāsayaṃ bhindissāmī”ti theraṃ nimantetvā bhojetvā, “bhante, putto me pabbajituṃ
atk-s0502a:2366_4: icchati, imāhaṃ sāyanhasamaye vihāraṃ ānessāmī”ti theraṃ uyyojetvā ñātake sannipātetvā
atk-s0502a:2366_5: “puttassa me gihikāle kattabbaṃ kiccaṃ ajjeva karissāmā”ti vatvā puttaṃ alaṅkaritvā
atk-s0502a:2366_6: mahantena sirisobhaggena vihāraṃ netvā therassa niyyādesi. Theropi taṃ, “tāta, pabbajjā
atk-s0502a:2366_7: nāma dukkarā, sakkhissasi abhiramitu”nti vatvā “karissāmi vo, bhante, ovāda”nti vutte
atk-s0502a:2366_8: kammaṭṭhānaṃ datvā pabbājesi. Mātāpitaropissa pabbajjāya sakkāraṃ karontā antovihāreyeva
atk-s0502a:2366_9: sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa satarasabhojanaṃ datvā sāyaṃ attano gehaṃ
atk-s0502a:2366_10: agamaṃsu. Aṭṭhame divase sāriputtatthero bhikkhusaṅghe gāmaṃ paviṭṭhe vihāre kattabbakiccaṃ
atk-s0502a:2366_11: katvā sāmaṇeraṃ pattacīvaraṃ gāhāpetvā gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi. Sāmaṇero antarāmagge
atk-s0502a:2366_12: mātikādīni disvā paṇḍitasāmaṇero viya pucchi. Theropi tassa tatheva byākāsi. Sāmaṇero
atk-s0502a:2366_13: tāni kāraṇāni sutvā “sace tumhe attano pattacīvaraṃ gaṇheyyātha, ahaṃ nivatteyya”nti
atk-s0502a:2366_14: vatvā therena tassa ajjhāsayaṃ abhinditvā, “sāmaṇera, dehi mama pattacīvara”nti pattacīvare
atk-s0502a:2366_15: gahite theraṃ vanditvā nivattamāno, “bhante, mayhaṃ āhāraṃ āharamāno satarasabhojanaṃ
atk-s0502a:2366_16: āhareyyāthā”ti āha. Kuto taṃ labhissāmīti? Attano puññena alabhanto mama puññena
atk-s0502a:2366_17: labhissatha, bhanteti. Athassa thero kuñcikaṃ datvā gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi. Sopi vihāraṃ
atk-s0502a:2366_18: āgantvā therassa gabbhaṃ vivaritvā pavisitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya attano kāye ñāṇaṃ otāretvā nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:2367_0: Tassa guṇatejena sakkassa āsanaṃ uṇhākāraṃ dassesi. Sakko “kiṃ nu kho eta”nti olokento
atk-s0502a:2367_1: sāmaṇeraṃ disvā “sukhasāmaṇero attano upajjhāyassa pattacīvaraṃ datvā ‘samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0502a:2367_2: karissāmī’ti nivatto, mayā tattha gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā cattāro mahārāje pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0502a:2367_3: “gacchatha, tātā, vihārassūpavane dussaddake sakuṇe palāpethā”ti uyyojesi. Te tathā
atk-s0502a:2367_4: katvā sāmantā ārakkhaṃ gaṇhiṃsu. Candimasūriye “attano vimānāni gahetvā tiṭṭhathā”ti
atk-s0502a:2367_5: āṇāpesi. Tepi tathā kariṃsu. Sayampi āviñchanaṭṭhāne ārakkhaṃ gaṇhi. Vihāro sannisinno
atk-s0502a:2367_6: niravo ahosi. Sāmaṇero ekaggacittena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā tīṇi maggaphalāni pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:2367_7: Thero “sāmaṇerena ‘satarasabhojanaṃ āhareyyāthā’ti vuttaṃ, kassa nu kho ghare sakkā
atk-s0502a:2367_8: laddhu”nti olokento ekaṃ ajjhāsayasampannaṃ upaṭṭhākatulaṃ disvā tattha gantvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:2367_9: sādhu vo kataṃ ajja idhāgacchantehī”ti tehi tuṭṭhamānasehi pattaṃ gahetvā nisīdāpetvā
atk-s0502a:2367_10: yāgukhajjakaṃ datvā yāva bhattakālaṃ dhammakathaṃ yācito tesaṃ sāraṇīyadhammakathaṃ
atk-s0502a:2367_11: kathetvā kālaṃ sallakkhetvā desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi. Athassa satarasabhojanaṃ datvā taṃ
atk-s0502a:2367_12: ādāya gantukāmaṃ theraṃ disvā “bhuñjatha, bhante, aparampi te dassāmā”ti theraṃ bhojetvā
atk-s0502a:2367_13: puna pattapūraṃ adaṃsu. Thero taṃ ādāya “sāmaṇero me chāto”ti turitaturito vihāraṃ
atk-s0502a:2367_14: pāyāsi. Taṃ divasaṃ satthā pātova nikkhamitvā gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnova āvajjesi –
atk-s0502a:2367_15: “ajja sukhasāmaṇero upajjhāyassa pattacīvaraṃ datvā ‘samaṇadhammaṃ karissāmī’ti nivatto,
atk-s0502a:2367_16: nipphannaṃ nu kho tassa kicca”nti. So tiṇṇaṃyeva maggaphalānaṃ pattabhāvaṃ disvā
atk-s0502a:2367_17: uttaripi upadhārento “sakkhissatāyaṃ ajja arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ, sāriputto pana ‘sāmaṇero
atk-s0502a:2367_18: me chāto’ti vegena bhattaṃ ādāya nikkhamati, sace imasmiṃ arahattaṃ appatte bhattaṃ
atk-s0502a:2367_19: āharissati, imassa antarāyo bhavissati, mayā gantvā dvārakoṭṭhake ārakkhaṃ gaṇhituṃ
atk-s0502a:2367_20: vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā gandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā dvārakoṭṭhake ṭhatvā ārakkhaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a:2368_0: Theropi bhattaṃ āhari. Atha naṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva cattāro pañhe pucchi. Pañhavissajjanāvasāne
atk-s0502a:2368_1: sāmaṇero arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Satthā theraṃ āmantetvā “gaccha, sāriputta, sāmaṇerassa
atk-s0502a:2368_2: te bhattaṃ dehī”ti āha. Thero gantvā dvāraṃ ākoṭesi. Sāmaṇeropi nikkhamitvā upajjhāyassa
atk-s0502a:2368_3: vattaṃ katvā “bhattakiccaṃ karohī”ti vutte therassa bhattena anatthikabhāvaṃ ñatvā
atk-s0502a:2368_4: sattavassikakumāro taṅkhaṇaññeva arahattaṃ patto nīcāsanaṭṭhānaṃ paccavekkhanto bhattakiccaṃ
atk-s0502a:2368_5: katvā pattaṃ dhovi. Tasmiṃ kāle cattāro mahārājāno ārakkhaṃ vissajjesuṃ. Candimasūriyāpi
atk-s0502a:2368_6: vimānāni muñciṃsu. Sakkopi āviñchanaṭṭhāne ārakkhaṃ vissajjesi. Sūriyo nabhamajjhaṃ
atk-s0502a:2368_7: atikkantoyeva paññāyi. Bhikkhū “sāyanho paññāyati, sāmaṇerena ca idāneva bhattakiccaṃ
atk-s0502a:2368_8: kataṃ, kiṃ nu kho ajja pubbaṇho balavā jāto, sāyanho mando”ti vadiṃsu. Satthā āgantvā
atk-s0502a:2368_9: “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā, “bhante, ajja pubbaṇho
atk-s0502a:2368_10: balavā jāto, sāyanho mando, sāmaṇerena ca idāneva bhattakiccaṃ kataṃ, atha ca pana
atk-s0502a:2368_11: sūriyo nabhamajjhaṃ atikkantoyeva paññāyatī”ti vutte, “bhikkhave, evamevaṃ hoti puññavantānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2368_12: samaṇadhammakaraṇakāle. Ajja hi cattāro mahārājāno sāmantā ārakkhaṃ gaṇhiṃsu, candimasūriyā
atk-s0502a:2368_13: vimānāni gahetvā aṭṭhaṃsu, sakko āviñchanake ārakkhaṃ gaṇhi, ahampi dvārakoṭṭhake
atk-s0502a:2368_14: ārakkhaṃ gaṇhiṃ, ajja sukhasāmaṇero mātikāya udakaṃ harante, usukāre usuṃ ujuṃ karonte,
atk-s0502a:2368_15: tacchake cakkādīni karonte disvā attānaṃ dametvā arahattaṃ patto”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2371: Dāruṃ namayanti tacchakā, attānaṃ damayanti subbatā”ti.
atk-s0502a:2372: Tattha subbatāti suvadā, sukhena ovaditabbā anusāsitabbāti attho. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
atk-s0502a:2379: Ko nu hāso kimānandoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto visākhāya sahāyikāyo ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2380_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira pañcasatā kulaputtā “evaṃ imā appamādavihāriniyo bhavissantī”ti
atk-s0502a:2380_1: attano attano bhariyāyo visākhaṃ mahāupāsikaṃ sampaṭicchāpesuṃ. Tā uyyānaṃ vā vihāraṃ
atk-s0502a:2380_2: vā gacchantiyo tāya saddhiṃyeva gacchanti. Tā ekasmiṃ kāle “sattāhaṃ surāchaṇo bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0502a:2380_3: chaṇe saṅghuṭṭhe attano attano sāmikānaṃ suraṃ paṭiyādesuṃ. Te sattāhaṃ surāchaṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:2380_4: kīḷitvā aṭṭhame divase kammantabheriyā nikkhantāya kammante agamaṃsu. Tāpi itthiyo
atk-s0502a:2380_5: “mayaṃ sāmikānaṃ sammukhā suraṃ pātuṃ na labhimhā, avasesā surā ca atthi, idaṃ yathā
atk-s0502a:2380_6: te na jānanti, tathā pivissāmā”ti visākhāya santikaṃ gantvā “icchāma, ayye, uyyānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2380_7: daṭṭhu”nti vatvā “sādhu, ammā, tena hi kattabbakiccāni katvā nikkhamathā”ti vutte
atk-s0502a:2380_8: tāya saddhiṃ gantvā paṭicchannākārena suraṃ nīharāpetvā uyyāne pivitvā mattā vicariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2380_9: Visākhāpi “ayuttaṃ imāhi kataṃ, idāni maṃ ‘samaṇassa gotamassa sāvikā visākhā suraṃ
atk-s0502a:2380_10: pivitvā vicaratī’ti titthiyāpi garahissantī”ti cintetvā tā itthiyo āha – “ammā ayuttaṃ
atk-s0502a:2380_11: vo kataṃ, mamapi ayaso uppādito, sāmikāpi vo kujjhissanti, idāni kiṃ karissathā”ti.
atk-s0502a:2380_12: Gilānālayaṃ dassayissāma, ayyeti. Tena hi paññāyissatha sakena kammenāti. Tā gehaṃ
atk-s0502a:2380_13: gantvā gilānālayaṃ kariṃsu. Atha tāsaṃ sāmikā “itthannāmā ca itthannāmā ca kaha”nti
atk-s0502a:2380_14: pucchitvā “gilānā”ti sutvā “addhā etāhi avasesasurā pītā bhavissantī”ti sallakkhetvā
atk-s0502a:2380_15: tā pothetvā anayabyasanaṃ pāpesuṃ. Tā aparasmimpi chaṇavāre tatheva suraṃ pivitukāmā
atk-s0502a:2380_16: visākhaṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “ayye, uyyānaṃ no nehī”ti vatvā “pubbepi me tumhehi ayaso
atk-s0502a:2380_17: uppādito, gacchatha, na vo ahaṃ nessāmī”ti tāya paṭikkhittā “idāni evaṃ na karissāmā”ti
atk-s0502a:2380_18: sammantayitvā puna taṃ upasaṅkamitvā āhaṃsu, “ayye, buddhapūjaṃ kātukāmāmhā, vihāraṃ
atk-s0502a:2380_19: no nehī”ti. Idāni ammā yujjati, gacchatha, parivacchaṃ karothāti. Tā caṅkoṭakehi
atk-s0502a:2380_20: gandhamālādīni gāhāpetvā surāpuṇṇe muṭṭhivārake hatthehi olambetvā mahāpaṭe pārupitvā
atk-s0502a:2380_21: visākhaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tāya saddhiṃ vihāraṃ pavisamānā ekamantaṃ gantvā muṭṭhivārakeheva
atk-s0502a:2380_22: suraṃ pivitvā vārake chaḍḍetvā dhammasabhāyaṃ satthu purato nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2381_0: Visākhā “imāsaṃ, bhante, dhammaṃ kathethā”ti āha. Tāpi madavegena kampamānasarīrā
atk-s0502a:2381_1: “iccāma, gāyāmā”ti cittaṃ uppādesuṃ. Athekā mārakāyikā devatā “imāsaṃ sarīre adhimuccitvā
atk-s0502a:2381_2: samaṇassa gotamassa purato vippakāraṃ dassessāmī”ti cintetvā tāsaṃ sarīre adhimucci.
atk-s0502a:2381_3: Tāsu ekaccā satthu purato pāṇiṃ paharitvā hasituṃ, ekaccā naccituṃ ārabhiṃsu. Satthā
atk-s0502a:2381_4: “kiṃ ida”nti āvajjento taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā “na idāni mārakāyikānaṃ otāraṃ labhituṃ
atk-s0502a:2381_5: dassāmi. Na hi mayā ettakaṃ kālaṃ pāramiyo pūrentena mārakāyikānaṃ otāralābhatthāya
atk-s0502a:2381_6: pūritā”ti tā saṃvejetuṃ bhamukalomato rasmiyo vissajjesi, tāvadeva andhakāratimisā
atk-s0502a:2381_7: ahosi. Tā bhītā ahesuṃ maraṇabhayatajjitā. Tena tāsaṃ kucchiyaṃ surā jīri. Satthā
atk-s0502a:2381_8: nisinnapallaṅke antarahito sinerumuddhani ṭhatvā uṇṇālomato rasmiṃ vissajjesi, taṅkhaṇaṃyeva
atk-s0502a:2381_9: candasahassuggamanaṃ viya ahosi. Atha satthā tā itthiyo āmantetvā “tumhehi mama santikaṃ
atk-s0502a:2381_10: āgacchamānāhi pamattāhi āgantuṃ na vaṭṭati. Tumhākañhi pamādeneva mārakāyikā devatā
atk-s0502a:2381_11: otāraṃ labhitvā tumhe hasādīnaṃ akaraṇaṭṭhāne hasādīni kārāpesi, idāni tumhehi rāgādīnaṃ
atk-s0502a:2381_12: aggīnaṃ nibbāpanatthāya ussāhaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2383: “Ko nu hāso kimānando, niccaṃ pajjalite sati;
atk-s0502a:2385_0: Tattha ānandoti tuṭṭhi. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – imasmiṃ lokasannivāse rāgādīhi ekādasahi
atk-s0502a:2385_1: aggīhi niccaṃ pajjalite sati ko nu tumhākaṃ hāso vā tuṭṭhi vā? Nanu esa akattabbarūpoyeva.
atk-s0502a:2385_2: Aṭṭhavatthukena hi avijjāndhakārena onaddhā tumhe tasseva andhakārassa vidhamanatthāya
atk-s0502a:2385_3: kiṃ kāraṇā ñāṇappadīpaṃ na gavesatha na karothāti.
atk-s0502a:2386: Desanāvasāne pañcasatāpi tā itthiyo sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2387_0: Satthā tāsaṃ acalasaddhāya patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ ñatvā sinerumatthakā otaritvā buddhāsane
atk-s0502a:2387_1: nisīdi. Atha naṃ visākhā āha – “bhante, surā nāmesā pāpikā. Evarūpā hi nāma imā itthiyo
atk-s0502a:2387_2: tumhādisassa buddhassa purato nisīditvā iriyāpathamattampi saṇṭhāpetuṃ asakkontiyo
atk-s0502a:2387_3: uṭṭhāya pāṇiṃ paharitvā hasanagītanaccādīni ārabhiṃsū”ti. Satthā “āma, visākhe, pāpikā
atk-s0502a:2387_4: eva esā surā nāma. Etañhi nissāya aneke sattā anayabyasanaṃ pattā”ti vatvā “kadā
atk-s0502a:2387_5: panesā, bhante, uppannā”ti vutte tassā uppattiṃ vitthārena kathetuṃ atītaṃ āharitvā
atk-s0502a:2390: Passa cittakatanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto sirimaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2391_0: Sā kira rājagahe abhirūpā gaṇikā. Ekasmiṃ pana antovasse sumanaseṭṭhiputtassa bhariyāya
atk-s0502a:2391_1: puṇṇakaseṭṭhissa dhītāya uttarāya nāma upāsikāya aparajjhitvā taṃ pasādetukāmā tassā
atk-s0502a:2391_2: gehe bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ katabhattakiccaṃ satthāraṃ khamāpetvā taṃ divasaṃ dasabalassa
atk-s0502a:2394_0: Gāthāpariyosāne sotāpattiphalaṃ pāpuṇi. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthārakathā pana kodhavagge
atk-s0502a:2394_1: anumodanagāthāvaṇṇanāyameva āvibhavissati. Evaṃ sotāpattiphalaṃ pattā pana sirimā
atk-s0502a:2394_2: dasabalaṃ nimantetvā punadivase mahādānaṃ datvā saṅghassa aṭṭhakabhattaṃ nibaddhaṃ
atk-s0502a:2394_3: dāpesi. Ādito paṭṭhāya nibaddhaṃ aṭṭha bhikkhū gehaṃ gacchanti. “Sappiṃ gaṇhatha,
atk-s0502a:2394_4: khīraṃ gaṇhathā”tiādīni vatvā tesaṃ patte pūreti. Ekena laddhaṃ tiṇṇampi catunnampi
atk-s0502a:2394_5: pahoti. Devasikaṃ soḷasakahāpaṇaparibbayena piṇḍapāto dīyati. Athekadivasaṃ eko bhikkhu
atk-s0502a:2394_6: tassā gehe aṭṭhakabhattaṃ bhuñjitvā tiyojanamatthake ekaṃ vihāraṃ agamāsi. Atha naṃ
atk-s0502a:2394_7: sāyaṃ therupaṭṭhāne nisinnaṃ pucchiṃsu – “āvuso, kahaṃ bhikkhaṃ gahetvā āgatosī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2394_8: Sirimāya aṭṭhakabhattaṃ me bhuttanti. Manāpaṃ katvā deti, āvusoti. “Na sakkā tassā
atk-s0502a:2394_9: bhattaṃ vaṇṇetuṃ, ativiya paṇītaṃ katvā deti, ekena laddhaṃ tiṇṇampi catunnampi pahoti,
atk-s0502a:2394_10: tassā pana deyyadhammatopi dassanameva uttaritaraṃ. Sā hi itthī evarūpā ca evarūpā
atk-s0502a:2395_0: Atheko bhikkhu tassā guṇakathaṃ sutvā adassaneneva sinehaṃ uppādetvā “mayā gantvā
atk-s0502a:2395_1: taṃ daṭṭhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti attano vassaggaṃ kathetvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ ṭhitikaṃ pucchitvā
atk-s0502a:2395_2: “sve, āvuso, tasmiṃ gehe tvaṃ saṅghatthero hutvā aṭṭhakabhattaṃ labhissasī”ti sutvā
atk-s0502a:2395_3: taṅkhaṇaññeva pattacīvaraṃ ādāya pakkantopi pātova aruṇe uggate salākaggaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0502a:2395_4: ṭhito saṅghatthero hutvā tassā gehe aṭṭhakabhattaṃ labhi. Yo pana bhikkhu hiyyo bhuñjitvā
atk-s0502a:2395_5: pakkāmi, tassa gatavelāyameva assā sarīre rogo uppajji. Tasmā sā ābharaṇāni omuñcitvā
atk-s0502a:2395_6: nipajji. Athassā dāsiyo aṭṭhakabhattaṃ labhitvā āgate bhikkhū disvā ārocesuṃ. Sā
atk-s0502a:2395_7: sahatthā patte gahetvā nisīdāpetuṃ vā parivisituṃ vā asakkontī dāsiyo āṇāpesi – “ammā
atk-s0502a:2395_8: patte gahetvā, ayye, nisīdāpetvā yāguṃ pāyetvā khajjakaṃ datvā bhattavelāya patte
atk-s0502a:2395_9: pūretvā dethā”ti. Tā “sādhu, ayye”ti bhikkhū pavesetvā yāguṃ pāyetvā khajjakaṃ datvā
atk-s0502a:2395_10: bhattavelāya bhattassa patte pūretvā tassā ārocayiṃsu. Sā “maṃ pariggahetvā netha,
atk-s0502a:2395_11: ayye, vandissāmī”ti vatvā tāhi pariggahetvā bhikkhūnaṃ santikaṃ nītā vedhamānena
atk-s0502a:2395_12: sarīrena bhikkhū vandi. So bhikkhu taṃ oloketvā cintesi – “gilānāya tāva evarūpā
atk-s0502a:2395_13: ayaṃ etissā rūpasobhā, arogakāle pana sabbābharaṇapaṭimaṇḍitāya imissā kīdisī rūpasampattī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2395_14: Athassa anekavassakoṭisannicito kileso samudācari, so aññāṇī hutvā bhattaṃ bhuñjituṃ
atk-s0502a:2395_15: asakkonto pattamādāya vihāraṃ gantvā pattaṃ pidhāya ekamante ṭhapetvā cīvaraṃ pattharitvā nipajji.
atk-s0502a:2396_0: Atha naṃ eko sahāyako bhikkhu yācantopi bhojetuṃ nāsakkhi. So chinnabhatto ahosi.
atk-s0502a:2396_1: Taṃ divasameva sāyanhasamaye sirimā kālamakāsi. Rājā satthu sāsanaṃ pesesi – “bhante,
atk-s0502a:2396_2: jīvakassa kaniṭṭhabhaginī, sirimā, kālamakāsī”ti. Satthā taṃ sutvā rañño sāsanaṃ
atk-s0502a:2396_3: pahiṇi “sirimāya jhāpanakiccaṃ natthi, āmakasusāne taṃ yathā kākasunakhādayo na khādanti,
atk-s0502a:2396_4: tathā nipajjāpetvā rakkhāpethā”ti. Rājāpi tathā akāsi. Paṭipāṭiyā tayo divasā atikkantā,
atk-s0502a:2396_5: catutthe divase sarīraṃ uddhumāyi, navahi vaṇamukhehi puḷavā pagghariṃsu, sakalasarīraṃ
atk-s0502a:2396_6: bhinnaṃ sālibhattacāṭi viya ahosi. Rājā nagare bheriṃ carāpesi – “ṭhapetvā geharakkhake
atk-s0502a:2396_7: dārake sirimāya dassanatthaṃ anāgacchantānaṃ aṭṭha kahāpaṇāni daṇḍo”ti. Satthu santi
atk-s0502a:2396_8: kañca pesesi – “buddhappamukho kira bhikkhusaṅgho sirimāya dassanatthaṃ āgacchatū”ti.
atk-s0502a:2396_9: Satthā bhikkhūnaṃ ārocesi – “sirimāya dassanatthaṃ gamissāmā”ti. Sopi daharabhikkhu
atk-s0502a:2396_10: cattāro divase kassaci vacanaṃ aggahetvā chinnabhattova nipajji. Patte bhattaṃ pūtikaṃ
atk-s0502a:2396_11: jātaṃ, patte malaṃ uṭṭhahi. Atha naṃ so sahāyako bhikkhu upasaṅkamitvā, “āvuso, satthā
atk-s0502a:2396_12: sirimāya dassanatthaṃ gacchatī”ti āha. So tathā chātajjhattopi “sirimā”ti vuttapadeyeva
atk-s0502a:2396_13: sahasā uṭṭhahitvā “kiṃ bhaṇasī”ti āha. “Satthā sirimaṃ daṭṭhuṃ gacchati, tvampi gamissasī”ti
atk-s0502a:2396_14: vutte, “āma, gamissāmī”ti bhattaṃ chaḍḍetvā pattaṃ dhovitvā thavikāya pakkhipitvā
atk-s0502a:2396_15: bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ agamāsi. Satthā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto ekapasse aṭṭhāsi, bhikkhunisaṅghopi
atk-s0502a:2397_0: Satthā rājānaṃ pucchi – “kā esā, mahārājo”ti. Bhante, jīvakassa bhaginī, sirimā,
atk-s0502a:2397_1: nāmāti. Sirimā, esāti. Āma, bhanteti. Tena hi nagare bheriṃ carāpehi “sahassaṃ datvā
atk-s0502a:2397_2: sirimaṃ gaṇhantū”ti. Rājā tathā kāresi. Ekopi ‘ha’nti vā ‘hu’nti vā vadanto nāma
atk-s0502a:2397_3: nāhosi. Rājā satthu ārocesi – “na gaṇhanti, bhante”ti. Tena hi, mahārāja, agghaṃ
atk-s0502a:2397_4: ohārehīti. Rājā “pañcasatāni datvā gaṇhantū”ti bheriṃ carāpetvā kañci gaṇhanakaṃ
atk-s0502a:2397_5: adisvā “aḍḍhateyyāni satāni, dve satāni, sataṃ, paṇṇāsaṃ, pañcavīsati kahāpaṇe, dasa
atk-s0502a:2397_6: kahāpaṇe, pañca kahāpaṇe, ekaṃ kahāpaṇaṃ aḍḍhaṃ, pādaṃ, māsakaṃ, kākaṇikaṃ datvā
atk-s0502a:2397_7: sirimaṃ gaṇhantū”ti bheriṃ carāpesi. Koci taṃ na icchi. “Mudhāpi gaṇhantū”ti bheriṃ
atk-s0502a:2397_8: carāpesi. ‘Ha’nti vā ‘hu’nti vā vadanto nāma nāhosi. Rājā “mudhāpi, bhante, gaṇhanto
atk-s0502a:2397_9: nāma natthī”ti āha. Satthā “passatha, bhikkhave, mahājanassa piyaṃ mātugāmaṃ, imasmiṃyeva
atk-s0502a:2397_10: nagare sahassaṃ datvā pubbe ekadivasaṃ labhiṃsu, idāni mudhā gaṇhantopi natthi, evarūpaṃ
atk-s0502a:2397_11: nāma rūpaṃ khayavayappattaṃ, passatha, bhikkhave, āturaṃ attabhāva”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2400: Āturaṃ bahusaṅkappaṃ, yassa natthi dhuvaṃ ṭhitī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2401_0: Tattha cittakatanti katacittaṃ, vatthābharaṇamālālattakādīhi vicittanti attho. Bimbanti
atk-s0502a:2401_1: dīghādiyuttaṭṭhānesu dīghādīhi aṅgapaccaṅgehi saṇṭhitaṃ attabhāvaṃ. Arukāyanti navannaṃ
atk-s0502a:2401_2: vaṇamukhānaṃ vasena arubhūtaṃ kāyaṃ. Samussitanti tīhi aṭṭhisatehi samussitaṃ. Āturanti
atk-s0502a:2401_3: sabbakālaṃ iriyāpathādīhi pariharitabbatāya niccagilānaṃ. Bahusaṅkappanti mahājanena
