atk-s0502a:2401_4: bahudhā saṅkappitaṃ. Yassa natthi dhuvaṃ ṭhitīti yassa dhuvabhāvo vā ṭhitibhāvo vā
atk-s0502a:2401_5: natthi, ekantena bhedanavikiraṇaviddhaṃsanadhammamevetaṃ, imaṃ passathāti attho.
atk-s0502a:2402: Desanāvasāne caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi, sopi bhikkhu sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahīti.
atk-s0502a:2405: Parijiṇṇamidanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto uttarātheriṃ nāma bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2406_0: Therī kira vīsavassasatikā jātiyā piṇḍāya caritvā laddhapiṇḍapātā antaravīthiyaṃ
atk-s0502a:2406_1: ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā piṇḍapātena āpucchitvā tassa apaṭikkhipitvā gaṇhantassa sabbaṃ
atk-s0502a:2406_2: datvā nirāhārā ahosi. Evaṃ dutiyepi tatiyepi divase tasseva bhikkhuno tasmiṃyeva
atk-s0502a:2406_3: ṭhāne bhattaṃ datvā nirāhārā ahosi, catutthe divase pana piṇḍāya carantī ekasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:2406_4: sambādhaṭṭhāne satthāraṃ disvā paṭikkamantī olambantaṃ attano cīvarakaṇṇaṃ akkamitvā
atk-s0502a:2406_5: saṇṭhātuṃ asakkontī parivattitvā pati. Satthā tassā santikaṃ gantvā, “bhagini, parijiṇṇo
atk-s0502a:2406_6: te attabhāvo na cirasseva bhijjissatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2410_0: Tassattho – bhagini idaṃ tava sarīrasaṅkhātaṃ rūpaṃ mahallakabhāvena parijiṇṇaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2410_1: tañca kho sabbarogānaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānaṭṭhena roganīḷaṃ, yathā kho pana taruṇopi siṅgālo
atk-s0502a:2410_2: “jarasiṅgālo”ti vuccati, taruṇāpi gaḷocīlatā “pūtilatā”ti vuccati, evaṃ tadahujātaṃ
atk-s0502a:2410_3: suvaṇṇavaṇṇampi samānaṃ niccaṃ paggharaṇaṭṭhena pūtitāya pabhaṅguraṃ, so esa pūtiko
atk-s0502a:2410_4: samāno tava deho bhijjati, na cirasseva bhijjissatīti veditabbo. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Maraṇantañhi
atk-s0502a:2410_5: jīvitaṃ yasmā sabbasattānaṃ jīvitaṃ maraṇapariyosānamevāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0502a:2411: Desanāvasāne sā therī sotāpattiphalaṃ pattā, mahājanassāpi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:2414: Yānimānīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sambahule adhimānike bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2415_0: Pañcasatā kira bhikkhū satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññaṃ pavisitvā ghaṭentā
atk-s0502a:2415_1: vāyamantā jhānaṃ nibbattetvā “kilesānaṃ asamudācārena pabbajitakiccaṃ no nipphannaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2415_2: attanā paṭiladdhaguṇaṃ satthu ārocessāmā”ti āgamiṃsu. Satthā tesaṃ bahidvārakoṭṭhakaṃ
atk-s0502a:2415_3: pattakāleyeva ānandattheraṃ āha – “ānanda, etesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pavisitvā mayā diṭṭhena
atk-s0502a:2415_4: kammaṃ natthi, āmakasusānaṃ gantvā tato āgantvā maṃ passantū”ti. Thero gantvā tesaṃ
atk-s0502a:2415_5: tamatthaṃ ārocesi. Te “kiṃ amhākaṃ āmakasusānenā”ti avatvāva “dīghadassinā buddhena
atk-s0502a:2415_6: kāraṇaṃ diṭṭhaṃ bhavissatī”ti āmakasusānaṃ gantvā tattha kuṇapāni passantā ekāhadvīhapatitesu
atk-s0502a:2415_7: kuṇapesu āghātaṃ paṭilabhitvā taṃ khaṇaṃ patitesu allasarīresu rāgaṃ uppādayiṃsu,
atk-s0502a:2415_8: tasmiṃ khaṇe attano sakilesabhāvaṃ jāniṃsu. Satthā gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnova obhāsaṃ
atk-s0502a:2415_9: pharitvā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sammukhe kathento viya “nappatirūpaṃ nu kho, bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a:2415_10: tumhākaṃ evarūpaṃ aṭṭhisaṅghātaṃ disvā rāgaratiṃ uppādetu”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2418: Kāpotakāni aṭṭhīni, tāni disvāna kā ratī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2419_0: Tattha apatthānīti chaḍḍitāni. Sāradeti saradakāle vātātapapahatāni tattha tattha
atk-s0502a:2419_1: vippakiṇṇaalābūni viya. Kāpotakānīti kapotakavaṇṇāni. Tāni disvānāti tāni evarūpāni
atk-s0502a:2419_2: aṭṭhīni disvā tumhākaṃ kā rati, nanu appamattakampi kāmaratiṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatiyevāti attho.
atk-s0502a:2420: Desanāvasāne te bhikkhū yathāṭhitāva arahattaṃ patvā bhagavantaṃ abhitthavamānā āgantvā vandiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a:2423: Aṭṭhīnaṃ nagaraṃ katanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto janapadakalyāṇiṃ rūpanandātheriṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2424_0: Sā kira ekadivasaṃ cintesi – “mayhaṃ jeṭṭhabhātiko rajjasiriṃ pahāya pabbajitvā loke
atk-s0502a:2424_1: aggapuggalo buddho jāto, puttopissa rāhulakumāro pabbajito, bhattāpi me pabbajito,
atk-s0502a:2424_2: mātāpi me pabbajitā, ahampi ettake ñātijane pabbajite gehe kiṃ karissāmi, pabbajissāmā”ti.
atk-s0502a:2424_3: Sā bhikkhunupassayaṃ gantvā pabbaji ñātisineheneva, no saddhāya, abhirūpatāya pana
atk-s0502a:2424_4: rūpanandāti paññāyi. “Satthā kira ‘rūpaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā, vedanā… saññā… saṅkhārā…
atk-s0502a:2424_5: viññāṇaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā’ti vadetī”ti sutvā sā evaṃ dassanīye pāsādike mamapi
atk-s0502a:2424_6: rūpe dosaṃ katheyyāti satthu sammukhībhāvaṃ na gacchati. Sāvatthivāsino pātova dānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2424_7: datvā samādinnuposathā suddhuttarāsaṅgā gandhamālādihatthā sāyanhasamaye jetavane
atk-s0502a:2424_8: sannipatitvā dhammaṃ suṇanti. Bhikkhunisaṅghopi satthu dhammadesanāya uppannacchando
atk-s0502a:2424_9: vihāraṃ gantvā dhammaṃ suṇāti. Dhammaṃ sutvā nagaraṃ pavisanto satthu guṇakathaṃ
atk-s0502a:2425_0: Catuppamāṇike hi lokasannivāse appakāva te sattā, yesaṃ tathāgataṃ passantānaṃ pasādo
atk-s0502a:2425_1: na uppajjati. Rūpappamāṇikāpi hi tathāgatassa lakkhaṇānubyañjanapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:2425_2: sarīraṃ disvā pasīdanti, ghosappamāṇikāpi anekāni jātisatāni nissāya pavattaṃ satthu
atk-s0502a:2425_3: guṇaghosañceva aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ dhammadesanāghosañca sutvā pasīdanti, lūkhappamāṇikāpissa
atk-s0502a:2425_4: cīvarādilūkhataṃ paṭicca pasīdanti, dhammappamāṇikāpi “evarūpaṃ dasabalassa sīlaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2425_5: evarūpo samādhi, evarūpā paññā, bhagavā sīlādīhi guṇehi asamo appaṭipuggalo”ti pasīdanti.
atk-s0502a:2425_6: Tesaṃ tathāgatassa guṇaṃ kathentānaṃ mukhaṃ nappahoti. Rūpanandā bhikkhunīnañceva
atk-s0502a:2425_7: upāsikānañca santikā tathāgatassa guṇakathaṃ sutvā cintesi – “ativiya me bhātikassa
atk-s0502a:2425_8: vaṇṇaṃ kathentiyeva. Ekadivasampi me rūpe dosaṃ kathento kittakaṃ kathessati. Yaṃnūnāhaṃ
atk-s0502a:2425_9: bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ gantvā attānaṃ adassetvāva tathāgataṃ passitvā dhammamassa suṇitvā
atk-s0502a:2425_10: āgaccheyya”nti. Sā “ahampi ajja dhammassavanaṃ gamissāmī”ti bhikkhunīnaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:2426_0: Bhikkhuniyo “cirassaṃ vata rūpanandāya satthu upaṭṭhānaṃ gantukāmatā uppannā, ajja
atk-s0502a:2426_1: satthā imaṃ nissāya vicitradhammadesanaṃ nānānayaṃ desessatī”ti tuṭṭhamānasā taṃ
atk-s0502a:2426_2: ādāya nikkhamiṃsu. Sā nikkhantakālato paṭṭhāya “ahaṃ attānaṃ neva dassessāmī”ti cintesi.
atk-s0502a:2426_3: Satthā “ajja rūpanandā mayhaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ āgamissati, kīdisī nu kho tassā dhammadesanā
atk-s0502a:2426_4: sappāyā”ti cintetvā “rūpagarukā esā attabhāve balavasinehā, kaṇṭakena kaṇṭakuddharaṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:2426_5: viya rūpenevassā rūpamadanimmadanaṃ sappāya”nti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā tassā vihāraṃ
atk-s0502a:2426_6: pavisanasamaye ekaṃ pana abhirūpaṃ itthiṃ soḷasavassuddesikaṃ rattavatthanivatthaṃ
atk-s0502a:2426_7: sabbābharaṇapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ bījaniṃ gahetvā attano santike ṭhatvā bījayamānaṃ iddhibalena
atk-s0502a:2426_8: abhinimmini. Taṃ kho pana itthiṃ satthā ceva passati rūpanandā ca. Sā bhikkhunīhi
atk-s0502a:2426_9: saddhiṃ vihāraṃ pavisitvā bhikkhunīnaṃ piṭṭhipasse ṭhatvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:2426_10: vanditvā bhikkhunīnaṃ antare nisinnā pādantato paṭṭhāya satthāraṃ olokentī lakkhaṇavicittaṃ
atk-s0502a:2426_11: anubyañjanasamujjalaṃ byāmappabhāparikkhittaṃ satthu sarīraṃ disvā puṇṇacandasassirikaṃ
atk-s0502a:2426_12: mukhaṃ olokentī samīpe ṭhitaṃ itthirūpaṃ addasa. Sā taṃ oloketvā attabhāvaṃ olokentī
atk-s0502a:2426_13: suvaṇṇarājahaṃsiyā purato kākīsadisaṃ attānaṃ avamaññi. Iddhimayarūpaṃ diṭṭhakālato
atk-s0502a:2426_14: paṭṭhāyeva hi tassā akkhīni bhamiṃsu. Sā “aho imissā kesā sobhanā, aho nalāṭaṃ sobhana”nti
atk-s0502a:2426_15: sabbesaṃ sārīrappadesānaṃ rūpasiriyā samākaḍḍhitacittā tasmiṃ rūpe balavasinehā ahosi.
atk-s0502a:2427_0: Satthā tassā tattha abhiratiṃ ñatvā dhammaṃ desentova taṃ rūpaṃ soḷasavassuddesikabhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:2427_1: atikkamitvā vīsativassuddesikaṃ katvā dassesi. Rūpanandā oloketvā “na vatidaṃ rūpaṃ
atk-s0502a:2427_2: purimasadisa”nti thokaṃ virattacittā ahosi. Satthā anukkameneva tassā itthiyā sakiṃ
atk-s0502a:2427_3: vijātavaṇṇaṃ majjhimitthivaṇṇaṃ jarājiṇṇamahallikitthivaṇṇañca dassesi. Sāpi anupubbeneva
atk-s0502a:2427_4: “idampi antarahitaṃ, idampi antarahita”nti jarājiṇṇakāle taṃ virajjamānā khaṇḍadantiṃ
atk-s0502a:2427_5: palitasiraṃ obhaggaṃ gopānasivaṅkaṃ daṇḍaparāyaṇaṃ pavedhamānaṃ disvā ativiya virajji.
atk-s0502a:2427_6: Atha satthā taṃ byādhinā abhibhūtaṃ katvā dassesi. Sā taṅkhaṇaññeva daṇḍañca tālavaṇṭañca
atk-s0502a:2427_7: chaḍḍetvā mahāviravaṃ viravamānā bhūmiyaṃ patitvā sake muttakarīse nimuggā aparāparaṃ
atk-s0502a:2427_8: parivatti. Rūpanandā tampi disvā ativiya virajji. Satthāpi tassā itthiyā maraṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:2427_9: dassesi. Sā taṅkhaṇaṃyeva uddhumātakabhāvaṃ āpajji, navahi vaṇamukhehi pubbavaṭṭiyo
atk-s0502a:2427_10: ceva puḷavā ca pagghariṃsu, kākādayo sannipatitvā vilumpiṃsu. Rūpanandāpi taṃ oloketvā
atk-s0502a:2427_11: “ayaṃ itthī imasmiṃyeva ṭhāne jaraṃ pattā, byādhiṃ pattā, maraṇaṃ pattā, imassāpi
atk-s0502a:2427_12: me attabhāvassa evameva jarābyādhimaraṇāni āgamissantī”ti attabhāvaṃ aniccato passi.
atk-s0502a:2427_13: Aniccato diṭṭhattā eva pana dukkhato anattato diṭṭhoyeva hoti. Athassā tayo bhavā
atk-s0502a:2427_14: ādittā gehā viya gīvāya baddhakuṇapaṃ viya ca upaṭṭhahiṃsu, kammaṭṭhānābhimukhaṃ
atk-s0502a:2427_15: cittaṃ pakkhandi. Satthā tāya aniccato diṭṭhabhāvaṃ ñatvā “sakkhissati nu kho sayameva
atk-s0502a:2427_16: attano patiṭṭhaṃ kātu”nti olokento “na sakkhissati, bahiddhā paccayaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0502a:2427_17: cintetvā tassā sappāyavasena dhammaṃ desento āha –
atk-s0502a:2430: “Yathā idaṃ tathā etaṃ, yathā etaṃ tathā idaṃ;
atk-s0502a:2431: Dhātuto suññato passa, mā lokaṃ punarāgami;
atk-s0502a:2433_0: Itthaṃ sudaṃ bhagavā nandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti. Nandā desanānusārena
atk-s0502a:2433_1: ñāṇaṃ pesetvā sotāpattiphalaṃ pāpuṇi. Athassā upari tiṇṇaṃ maggaphalānaṃ vipassanāparivāsatthāya
atk-s0502a:2433_2: suññatākammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetuṃ, “nande, mā ‘imasmiṃ sarīre sāro atthī’ti saññaṃ kari.
atk-s0502a:2433_3: Appamattakopi hi ettha sāro natthi, tīṇi aṭṭhisatāni ussāpetvā kataṃ aṭṭhinagarameta”nti
atk-s0502a:2436: Yattha jarā ca maccu ca, māno makkho ca ohito”ti.
atk-s0502a:2437_0: Tassattho – yatheva hi pubbaṇṇāparaṇṇādīnaṃ odahanatthāya kaṭṭhāni ussāpetvā vallīhi
atk-s0502a:2437_1: bandhitvā mattikāya vilimpetvā nagarasaṅkhātaṃ bahiddhā gehaṃ karonti, evamidaṃ ajjhattikampi
atk-s0502a:2437_2: tīṇi aṭṭhisatāni ussāpetvā nhāruvinaddhaṃ maṃsalohitalepanaṃ tacapaṭicchannaṃ jīraṇalakkhaṇāya
atk-s0502a:2437_3: jarāya maraṇalakkhaṇassa maccuno ārohasampadādīni paṭicca maññanalakkhaṇassa mānassa
atk-s0502a:2437_4: sukatakāraṇavināsanalakkhaṇassa makkhassa ca odahanatthāya nagaraṃ kataṃ. Evarūpo
atk-s0502a:2437_5: eva hi ettha kāyikacetasiko ābādho ohito, ito uddhaṃ kiñci gayhūpagaṃ natthīti.
atk-s0502a:2438: Desanāvasāne sā therī arahattaṃ pāpuṇi, mahājanassāpi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:2441: Jīranti veti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto mallikaṃ deviṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2442_0: Sā kira ekadivasaṃ nhānakoṭṭhakaṃ paviṭṭhā mukhaṃ dhovitvā onatasarīrā jaṅghaṃ dhovituṃ
atk-s0502a:2442_1: ārabhi. Tāya ca saddhiṃyeva paviṭṭho eko vallabhasunakho atthi. So taṃ tathā onataṃ
atk-s0502a:2442_2: disvā asaddhammasanthavaṃ kātuṃ ārabhi. Sā phassaṃ sādiyantī aṭṭhāsi. Rājāpi uparipāsāde
atk-s0502a:2442_3: vātapānena olokento taṃ disvā tato āgatakāle “nassa, vasali, kasmā evarūpamakāsī”ti
atk-s0502a:2442_4: āha. Kiṃ mayā kataṃ, devāti. Sunakhena saddhiṃ santhavoti. Natthetaṃ, devāti. Mayā
atk-s0502a:2442_5: sāmaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, nāhaṃ tava saddahissāmi, nassa, vasalīti. “Mahārāja, yo koci imaṃ
atk-s0502a:2442_6: koṭṭhakaṃ paviṭṭho iminā vātapānena olokentassa ekova dvidhā paññāyatī”ti abhūtaṃ
atk-s0502a:2442_7: kathesi. Deva, sace me saddahasi, etaṃ koṭṭhakaṃ pavisa, ahaṃ taṃ iminā vātapānena
atk-s0502a:2442_8: olokessāmīti. Rājā mūḷhadhātuko tassā vacanaṃ saddahitvā koṭṭhakaṃ pāvisi. Sāpi kho
atk-s0502a:2442_9: devī vātapāne ṭhatvā olokentī “andhabāla, mahārāja, kiṃ nāmetaṃ, ajikāya saddhiṃ
atk-s0502a:2442_10: santhavaṃ karosī”ti āha. “Nāhaṃ, bhadde, evarūpaṃ karomī”ti ca vuttepi “mayā sāmaṃ
atk-s0502a:2443_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā “addhā imaṃ koṭṭhakaṃ paviṭṭho ekova dvidhā paññāyatī”ti saddahi.
atk-s0502a:2443_1: Mallikā cintesi – “ayaṃ rājā andhabālatāya mayā vañcito, pāpaṃ me kataṃ, ayañca me
atk-s0502a:2443_2: abhūtena abbhācikkhito, idaṃ me kammaṃ satthāpi jānissati, dve aggasāvakāpi asīti
atk-s0502a:2443_3: mahāsāvakāpi jānissanti, aho vata me bhāriyaṃ kammaṃ kata”nti. Ayaṃ kira rañño asadisadāne
atk-s0502a:2443_4: sahāyikā ahosi. Tattha ca ekadivasaṃ katapariccāgo dhanassa cuddasakoṭiagghanako
atk-s0502a:2443_5: ahosi. Tathāgatassa setacchattaṃ nisīdanapallaṅko ādhārako pādapīṭhanti imāni pana
atk-s0502a:2443_6: cattāri anagghāneva ahesuṃ. Sā maraṇakāle evarūpaṃ mahāpariccāgaṃ nānussaritvā tadeva
atk-s0502a:2443_7: pāpakammaṃ anussarantī kālaṃ katvā avīcimhi nibbatti. Rañño pana sā ativiya piyā
atk-s0502a:2443_8: ahosi. So balavasokābhibhūto tassā sarīrakiccaṃ kāretvā “nibbattaṭṭhānamassā pucchissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:2443_9: satthu santikaṃ agamāsi. Satthā yathā so āgatakāraṇaṃ na sarati, tathā akāsi. So
atk-s0502a:2443_10: satthu santike sāraṇīyadhammakathaṃ sutvā gehaṃ paviṭṭhakāle saritvā “ahaṃ bhaṇe
atk-s0502a:2443_11: mallikāya nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ pucchissāmīti satthu santikaṃ gantvā pamuṭṭho, sve puna
atk-s0502a:2443_12: pucchissāmī”ti punadivasepi agamāsi. Satthāpi paṭipāṭiyā satta divasāni yathā so
atk-s0502a:2443_13: na sarati, tathā akāsi. Sāpi sattāhameva niraye paccitvā aṭṭhame divase tato cutā
atk-s0502a:2443_14: tusitabhavane nibbatti. Kasmā panassa satthā asaraṇabhāvaṃ akāsīti? Sā kira tassa
atk-s0502a:2443_15: ativiya piyā ahosi manāpā, tasmā tassā niraye nibbattabhāvaṃ sutvā “sace evarūpā
atk-s0502a:2443_16: saddhāsampannā niraye nibbattā, dānaṃ datvā kiṃ karissāmī”ti micchādiṭṭhiṃ gahetvā
atk-s0502a:2443_17: pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ gehe pavattaṃ niccabhattaṃ harāpetvā niraye nibbatteyya,
atk-s0502a:2443_18: tenassa satthā sattāhaṃ asaraṇabhāvaṃ katvā aṭṭhame divase piṇḍāya caranto sayameva
atk-s0502a:2444_0: Rājā “satthā āgato”ti sutvā nikkhamitvā pattaṃ ādāya pāsādaṃ abhiruhituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0502a:2444_1: Satthā pana rathasālāya nisīdituṃ ākāraṃ dassesi. Rājā satthāraṃ tattheva nisīdāpetvā
atk-s0502a:2444_2: yāgukhajjakena paṭimānetvā vanditvā nisinnova ahaṃ, bhante, mallikāya deviyā nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2444_3: pucchissāmīti gantvā pamuṭṭho, kattha nu kho sā, bhante, nibbattāti. Tusitabhavane,
atk-s0502a:2444_4: mahārājāti, bhante, tāya tusitabhavane anibbattantiyā ko añño nibbattissati, bhante,
atk-s0502a:2444_5: natthi tāya sadisā itthī. Tassā hi nisinnaṭṭhānādīsu “sve tathāgatassa idaṃ dassāmi,
atk-s0502a:2444_6: idaṃ karissāmī”ti dānasaṃvidhānaṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ kiccameva natthi, bhante, tassā
atk-s0502a:2444_7: paralokaṃ gatakālato paṭṭhāya sarīraṃ me na vahatīti. Atha naṃ satthā “mā cintayi,
atk-s0502a:2444_8: mahārāja, sabbesaṃ dhuvadhammo aya”nti vatvā “ayaṃ, mahārāja, ratho kassā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a:2444_9: Taṃ sutvā rājā sirasmiṃ añjaliṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā “pitāmahassa me, bhante”ti āha. “Ayaṃ
atk-s0502a:2444_10: kassā”ti? “Pitu me, bhante”ti. “Ayaṃ pana ratho kassā”ti? “Mama, bhante”ti. Evaṃ
atk-s0502a:2444_11: vutte satthā, “mahārāja, tava pitāmahassa ratho tenevākārena tava pitu rathaṃ na
atk-s0502a:2444_12: pāpuṇi, tava pitu ratho tava rathaṃ na pāpuṇi, evarūpassa nāma kaṭṭhakaliṅgarassāpi
atk-s0502a:2444_13: jarā āgacchati, kimaṅgaṃ pana attabhāvassa. Mahārāja, sappurisadhammasseva hi jarā
atk-s0502a:2444_14: natthi, sattā pana ajīrakā nāma natthī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2450_0: Tattha veti nipāto. Sucittāti sattahi ratanehi aparehi ca rathālaṅkārehi suṭṭhu cittitā
atk-s0502a:2450_1: rājūnaṃ rathāpi jīranti. Sarīrampīti na kevalaṃ rathā eva, idaṃ suppaṭijaggitaṃ sarīrampi
atk-s0502a:2450_2: khaṇḍiccādīni pāpuṇantaṃ jaraṃ upeti. Satañcāti buddhādīnaṃ pana santānaṃ navavidho
atk-s0502a:2450_3: lokuttaradhammo ca kiñci upaghātaṃ na upetīti na jaraṃ upeti nāma. Pavedayantīti
atk-s0502a:2450_4: evaṃ santo buddhādayo sabbhi paṇḍitehi saddhiṃ kathentīti attho.
atk-s0502a:2454: Appassutāyanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto lāḷudāyittheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2455_0: So kira maṅgalaṃ karontānaṃ gehaṃ gantvā “tirokuṭṭesu tiṭṭhantī”tiādinā nayena avamaṅgalaṃ
atk-s0502a:2455_1: katheti, avamaṅgalaṃ karontānaṃ gehaṃ gantvā tirokuṭṭādīsu kathetabbesu “dānañca
atk-s0502a:2455_2: dhammacariyā cā”tiādinā nayena maṅgalagāthā vā “yaṃ kiñci vittaṃ idha vā huraṃ vā”ti
atk-s0502a:2455_3: ratanasuttaṃ vā katheti. Evaṃ tesu tesu ṭhānesu “aññaṃ kathessāmī”ti aññaṃ kathentopi
atk-s0502a:2455_4: “aññaṃ kathemī”ti na jānāti. Bhikkhū tassa kathaṃ sutvā satthu ārocesuṃ – “kiṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a:2455_5: lāḷudāyissa maṅgalāmaṅgalaṭṭhānesu gamanena, aññasmiṃ kathetabbe aññameva kathetī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2455_6: Satthā “na, bhikkhave, idānevesa evaṃ katheti, pubbepi aññasmiṃ kathetabbe aññameva
atk-s0502a:2456_0: Atīte kira bārāṇasiyaṃ aggidattassa nāma brāhmaṇassa putto somadattakumāro nāma rājānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2456_1: upaṭṭhahi. So raññā piyo ahosi manāpo. Brāhmaṇo pana kasikammaṃ nissāya jīvati. Tassa
atk-s0502a:2456_2: dveyeva goṇā ahesuṃ. Tesu eko mato. Brāhmaṇo puttaṃ āha – “tāta, somadatta, rājānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2456_3: me yācitvā ekaṃ goṇaṃ āharā”ti. Somadatto “sacāhaṃ rājānaṃ yācissāmi, lahubhāvo me
atk-s0502a:2456_4: paññāyissatī”ti cintetvā “tumheyeva, tāta, rājānaṃ yācathā”ti vatvā “tena hi, tāta,
atk-s0502a:2456_5: maṃ gahetvā yāhī”ti vutto cintesi – “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo dandhapañño abhikkamādivacanamattampi
atk-s0502a:2456_6: na jānāti, aññasmiṃ vattabbe aññameva vadati, sikkhāpetvā pana naṃ nessāmī”ti. So
atk-s0502a:2456_7: taṃ ādāya bīraṇatthambhakaṃ nāma susānaṃ gantvā tiṇakalāpe bandhitvā “ayaṃ rājā,
atk-s0502a:2456_8: ayaṃ uparājā, ayaṃ senāpatī”ti nāmāni katvā paṭipāṭiyā pitu dassetvā “tumhehi rājakulaṃ
atk-s0502a:2456_9: gantvā evaṃ abhikkamitabbaṃ, evaṃ paṭikkamitabbaṃ, evaṃ nāma rājā vattabbo, evaṃ
atk-s0502a:2456_10: nāma uparājā, rājānaṃ pana upasaṅkamitvā ‘jayatu bhavaṃ, mahārājā’ti vatvā evaṃ ṭhatvā
atk-s0502a:2456_11: imaṃ gāthaṃ vatvā goṇaṃ yāceyyāthā”ti gāthaṃ uggaṇhāpesi –
atk-s0502a:2457: “Dve me goṇā mahārāja, yehi khettaṃ kasāmase;
atk-s0502a:2458: Tesu eko mato deva, dutiyaṃ dehi khattiyā”ti.
atk-s0502a:2459_0: So hi saṃvaccharamattena taṃ gāthaṃ paguṇaṃ katvā paguṇabhāvaṃ puttassa ārocetvā
atk-s0502a:2459_1: “tena hi, tāta, kañcideva paṇṇākāraṃ ādāya āgacchatha, ahaṃ purimataraṃ gantvā rañño
atk-s0502a:2459_2: santike ṭhassāmī”ti vutte “sādhu, tātā”ti paṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā somadattassa rañño santike
atk-s0502a:2459_3: ṭhitakāle ussāhappatto rājakulaṃ gantvā raññā tuṭṭhacittena katapaṭisammodano, “tāta,
atk-s0502a:2459_4: cirassaṃ vata āgatattha, idamāsanaṃ nisīditvā vadatha, yenattho”ti vutte imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2460: “Dve me goṇā mahārāja, yehi khettaṃ kasāmase;
atk-s0502a:2461: Tesu eko mato deva, dutiyaṃ gaṇha khattiyā”ti.
atk-s0502a:2462_0: Raññā “kiṃ vadesi, tāta, puna vadehī”ti vuttepi tameva gāthaṃ āha. Rājā tena virajjhitvā
atk-s0502a:2462_1: kathitabhāvaṃ ñatvā sitaṃ katvā, “somadatta, tumhākaṃ gehe bahū maññe goṇā”ti vatvā
atk-s0502a:2462_2: “tumhehi dinnā bahū bhavissanti, devā”ti vutte bodhisattassa tussitvā brāhmaṇassa
atk-s0502a:2462_3: soḷasa goṇe alaṅkārabhaṇḍakaṃ nivāsagāmañcassa brahmadeyyaṃ datvā mahantena yasena
atk-s0502a:2463_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “tadā rājā ānando ahosi, brāhmaṇo lāḷudāyī, somadatto
atk-s0502a:2463_1: pana ahamevā”ti jātakaṃ samodhānetvā “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepesa attano appassutatāya
atk-s0502a:2463_2: aññasmiṃ vattabbe aññameva vadati. Appassutapuriso hi balibaddasadiso nāma hotī”ti
atk-s0502a:2466: Maṃsāni tassa vaḍḍhanti, paññā tassa na vaḍḍhatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2467_0: Tattha appassutāyanti ekassa vā dvinnaṃ vā paṇṇāsakānaṃ. Atha vā pana vaggānaṃ sabbantimena
atk-s0502a:2467_1: paricchedena ekassa vā dvinnaṃ vā suttantānaṃ vāpi abhāvena appassuto ayaṃ. Kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2467_2: pana uggahetvā anuyuñjanto bahussutova. Balibaddova jīratīti yathā hi balibaddo jīramāno
atk-s0502a:2467_3: vaḍḍhamāno neva mātu, na pitu, na sesañātakānaṃ atthāya vaḍḍhati, atha kho niratthakameva
atk-s0502a:2467_4: jīrati, evamevaṃ ayampi na upajjhāyavattaṃ karoti, na ācariyavattaṃ, na āgantukavattādīni,
atk-s0502a:2467_5: na bhāvanārāmataṃ anuyuñjati, niratthakameva jīrati, maṃsāni tassa vaḍḍhantīti yathā
atk-s0502a:2467_6: balibaddassa “yuganaṅgalādīni vahituṃ asamattho eso”ti araññe vissaṭṭhassa tattheva
atk-s0502a:2467_7: vicarantassa khādantassa pivantassa maṃsāni vaḍḍhanti, evameva imassāpi upajjhāyādīhi
atk-s0502a:2467_8: vissaṭṭhassa saṅghaṃ nissāya cattāro paccaye labhitvā uddhavirecanādīni katvā kāyaṃ
atk-s0502a:2467_9: posentassa maṃsāni vaḍḍhanti, thūlasarīro hutvā vicarati. Paññā tassāti lokiyalokuttarā
atk-s0502a:2467_10: panassa paññā ekaṅgulamattāpi na vaḍḍhati, araññe pana gacchalatādīni viya cha dvārāni
atk-s0502a:2467_11: nissāya taṇhā ceva navavidhamāno ca vaḍḍhatīti attho.
atk-s0502a:2471: Anekajātisaṃsāranti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā bodhirukkhamūle nisinno udānavasena udānetvā aparabhāge ānandattherena puṭṭho kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2472_0: So hi bodhirukkhamūle nisinno sūriye anatthaṅgateyeva mārabalaṃ viddhaṃsetvā paṭhamayāme
atk-s0502a:2472_1: pubbenivāsapaṭicchādakaṃ tamaṃ padāletvā majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṃ visodhetvā pacchimayāme
atk-s0502a:2472_2: sattesu kāruññataṃ paṭicca paccayākāre ñāṇaṃ otāretvā taṃ anulomapaṭilomavasena sammasanto
atk-s0502a:2472_3: aruṇuggamanavelāya sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhitvā anekehi buddhasatasahassehi avijahitaṃ
atk-s0502a:2478: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā, gahakūṭaṃ visaṅkhataṃ;
atk-s0502a:2480_0: Tattha gahakāraṃ gavesantoti ahaṃ imassa attabhāvasaṅkhātassa gehassa kārakaṃ taṇhāvaḍḍhakiṃ
atk-s0502a:2480_1: gavesanto yena ñāṇena sakkā taṃ daṭṭhuṃ, tassa bodhiñāṇassatthāya dīpaṅkarapādamūle
atk-s0502a:2480_2: katābhinīhāro ettakaṃ kālaṃ anekajātisaṃsāraṃ anekajātisatasahassasaṅkhātaṃ imaṃ
atk-s0502a:2480_3: saṃsāravaṭṭaṃ anibbisaṃ taṃ ñāṇaṃ avindanto alabhantoyeva sandhāvissaṃ saṃsariṃ,
atk-s0502a:2480_4: aparāparaṃ anuvicarinti attho. Dukkhā jāti punappunanti idaṃ gahakārakagavesanassa
atk-s0502a:2480_5: kāraṇavacanaṃ. Yasmā jarābyādhimaraṇamissitāya jāti nāmesā punappunaṃ upagantuṃ dukkhā,
atk-s0502a:2480_6: na ca sā tasmiṃ adiṭṭhe nivattati. Tasmā taṃ gavesanto sandhāvissanti attho. Diṭṭhosīti
atk-s0502a:2480_7: sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhantena mayā idāni diṭṭhosi. Puna gehanti puna imasmiṃ saṃsāravaṭṭe
atk-s0502a:2480_8: attabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ mama gehaṃ na kāhasi. Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggāti tava sabbā avasesā
atk-s0502a:2480_9: kilesaphāsukā mayā bhaggā. Gahakūṭaṃ visaṅkhatanti imassa tayā katassa attabhāvagehassa
atk-s0502a:2480_10: avijjāsaṅkhātaṃ kaṇṇikamaṇḍalampi mayā viddhaṃsitaṃ. Visaṅkhāragataṃ cittanti idāni
atk-s0502a:2480_11: mama cittaṃ visaṅkhāraṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena gataṃ anupaviṭṭhaṃ. Taṇhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2483: Acaritvāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā isipatane migadāye viharanto mahādhanaseṭṭhiputtaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2484_0: So kira bārāṇasiyaṃ asītikoṭivibhave kule nibbatti. Athassa mātāpitaro cintesuṃ –
atk-s0502a:2484_1: “amhākaṃ kule mahābhogakkhandho, puttassa no hatthe ṭhapetvā yathāsukhaṃ paribhogaṃ
atk-s0502a:2484_2: karissāma, aññena kammena kiccaṃ natthī”ti. Taṃ naccagītavāditamattameva sikkhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:2484_3: Tasmiṃyeva nagare aññasmiṃ asītikoṭivibhave kule ekā dhītāpi nibbatti. Tassāpi mātāpitaro
atk-s0502a:2484_4: tatheva cintetvā taṃ naccagītavāditamattameva sikkhāpesuṃ. Tesaṃ vayappattānaṃ āvāhavivāho
atk-s0502a:2484_5: ahosi. Atha nesaṃ aparabhāge mātāpitaro kālamakaṃsu. Dveasītikoṭidhanaṃ ekasmiṃyeva
atk-s0502a:2484_6: gehe ahosi. Seṭṭhiputto divasassa tikkhattuṃ rañño upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati. Atha tasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:2484_7: nagare dhuttā cintesuṃ – “sacāyaṃ seṭṭhiputto surāsoṇḍo bhavissati, amhākaṃ phāsukaṃ
atk-s0502a:2484_8: bhavissati, uggaṇhāpema naṃ surāsoṇḍabhāva”nti. Te suraṃ ādāya khajjakamaṃse ceva
atk-s0502a:2484_9: loṇasakkharā ca dussante bandhitvā mūlakande gahetvā tassa rājakulato āgacchantassa
atk-s0502a:2484_10: maggaṃ olokayamānā nisīditvā taṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā suraṃ pivitvā loṇasakkharaṃ mukhe
atk-s0502a:2484_11: khipitvā mūlakandaṃ ḍaṃsitvā “vassasataṃ jīva sāmi, seṭṭhiputta, taṃ nissāya mayaṃ
atk-s0502a:2484_12: khādanapivanasamatthā bhaveyyāmā”ti āhaṃsu. So tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā pacchato āgacchantaṃ
atk-s0502a:2484_13: cūḷūpaṭṭhākaṃ pucchi – “kiṃ ete pivantī”ti. Ekaṃ pānakaṃ, sāmīti. Manāpajātikaṃ etanti.
atk-s0502a:2484_14: Sāmi, imasmiṃ jīvaloke iminā sadisaṃ pātabbayuttakaṃ nāma natthīti. So “evaṃ sante
atk-s0502a:2484_15: mayāpi pātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti thokaṃ thokaṃ āharāpetvā pivati. Athassa nacirasseva te dhuttā
atk-s0502a:2484_16: pivanabhāvaṃ ñatvā taṃ parivārayiṃsu. Gacchante kāle parivāro mahā ahosi. So satenapi
atk-s0502a:2484_17: satadvayenapi suraṃ āharāpetvā pivanto iminā anukkameneva nisinnaṭṭhānādīsu kahāpaṇarāsiṃ
atk-s0502a:2484_18: ṭhapetvā suraṃ pivanto “iminā mālā āharatha, iminā gandhe, ayaṃ jano jute cheko,
atk-s0502a:2484_19: ayaṃ nacce, ayaṃ gīte, ayaṃ vādite. Imassa sahassaṃ detha, imassa dve sahassānī”ti
atk-s0502a:2484_20: evaṃ vikiranto nacirasseva attano santakaṃ asītikoṭidhanaṃ khepetvā “khīṇaṃ te, sāmi,
atk-s0502a:2484_21: dhana”nti vutte kiṃ bhariyāya me santakaṃ natthīti. Atthi, sāmīti. Tena hi taṃ āharathāti.
atk-s0502a:2484_22: Tampi tatheva khepetvā anupubbena khettaārāmuyyānayoggādikampi antamaso bhājanabhaṇḍakampi
atk-s0502a:2484_23: attharaṇapāvuraṇanisīdanampi sabbaṃ attano santakaṃ vikkiṇitvā khādi. Atha naṃ mahallakakāle
atk-s0502a:2484_24: yehissa kulasantakaṃ gehaṃ vikkiṇitvā gahitaṃ, te taṃ gehā nīhariṃsu. So bhariyaṃ
atk-s0502a:2484_25: ādāya parajanassa gehabhittiṃ nissāya vasanto kapālakhaṇḍaṃ ādāya bhikkhāya caritvā
atk-s0502a:2485_0: Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ āsanasālāya dvāre ṭhatvā daharasāmaṇerehi diyyamānaṃ ucchiṭṭhakabhojanaṃ
atk-s0502a:2485_1: paṭiggaṇhantaṃ disvā satthā sitaṃ pātvākāsi. Atha naṃ ānandatthero sitakāraṇaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0502a:2485_2: Satthā sitakāraṇaṃ kathento “passānanda, imaṃ mahādhanaseṭṭhiputtaṃ imasmiṃ nagare
atk-s0502a:2485_3: dveasītikoṭidhanaṃ khepetvā bhariyaṃ ādāya bhikkhāya carantaṃ. Sace hi ayaṃ paṭhamavaye
atk-s0502a:2485_4: bhoge akhepetvā kammante payojayissa, imasmiṃyeva nagare aggaseṭṭhi abhavissa. Sace
atk-s0502a:2485_5: pana nikkhamitvā pabbajissa, arahattaṃ pāpuṇissa, bhariyāpissa anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhahissa.
atk-s0502a:2485_6: Sace majjhimavaye bhoge akhepetvā kammante payojayissa, dutiyaseṭṭhi abhavissa, nikkhamitvā
atk-s0502a:2485_7: pabbajanto anāgāmī abhavissa. Bhariyāpissa sakadāgāmiphale patiṭṭhahissa. Sace pacchimavaye
atk-s0502a:2485_8: bhoge akhepetvā kammante payojayissa, tatiyaseṭṭhi abhavissa, nikkhamitvā pabbajantopi
atk-s0502a:2485_9: sakadāgāmī abhavissa, bhariyāpissa sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahissa. Idāni panesa gihibhogatopi
atk-s0502a:2485_10: parihīno sāmaññatopi. Parihāyitvā ca pana sukkhapallale koñcasakuṇo viya jāto”ti
atk-s0502a:2492_0: Tattha acaritvāti brahmacariyavāsaṃ avasitvā. Yobbaneti anuppanne vā bhoge uppādetuṃ
atk-s0502a:2492_1: uppanne vā bhoge rakkhituṃ samatthakāle dhanampi alabhitvā. Khīṇamaccheti te evarūpā
atk-s0502a:2492_2: bālā udakassa abhāvā khīṇamacche pallale parikkhīṇapattā jiṇṇakoñcā viya avajhāyanti.
atk-s0502a:2492_3: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – pallale udakassa abhāvo viya hi imesaṃ vasanaṭṭhānassa abhāvo,
atk-s0502a:2492_4: macchānaṃ khīṇabhāvo viya imesaṃ bhogānaṃ abhāvo, khīṇapattānaṃ koñcānaṃ uppatitvā
atk-s0502a:2492_5: gamanābhāvo viya imesaṃ idāni jalathalapathādīhi bhoge saṇṭhāpetuṃ asamatthabhāvo.
atk-s0502a:2492_6: Tasmā te khīṇapattā koñcā viya ettheva bajjhitvā avajhāyantīti. Cāpātikhīṇāvāti cāpato
atk-s0502a:2492_7: atikhīṇā, cāpā vinimuttāti attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā cāpā vinimuttā sarā yathāvegaṃ
atk-s0502a:2492_8: gantvā patitā, taṃ gahetvā ukkhipante asati tattheva upacikānaṃ bhattaṃ honti, evaṃ
atk-s0502a:2492_9: imepi tayo vaye atikkantā idāni attānaṃ uddharituṃ asamatthatāya maraṇaṃ upagamissanti.
atk-s0502a:2492_10: Tena vuttaṃ – “senti cāpātikhīṇāvā”ti. Purāṇāni anutthunanti “iti amhehi khāditaṃ
atk-s0502a:2492_11: iti pīta”nti pubbe katāni khāditapivitanaccagītavāditādīni anutthunantā socantā anusocantā sentīti.
atk-s0502a:2499: Attānañceti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā bhesakaḷāvane viharanto bodhirājakumāraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2500_0: So kira pathavītale aññehi pāsādehi asadisarūpaṃ ākāse uppatamānaṃ viya kokanudaṃ
atk-s0502a:2500_1: nāma pāsādaṃ kāretvā vaḍḍhakiṃ pucchi – “kiṃ tayā aññatthāpi evarūpo pāsādo katapubbo,
atk-s0502a:2500_2: udāhu paṭhamasippameva te ida”nti. “Paṭhamasippameva, devā”ti ca vutte cintesi –
atk-s0502a:2500_3: “sace ayaṃ aññassapi evarūpaṃ pāsādaṃ karissati, ayaṃ pāsādo anacchariyo bhavissati.
atk-s0502a:2500_4: Imaṃ mayā māretuṃ vā hatthapāde vāssa chindituṃ akkhīni vā uppāṭetuṃ vaṭṭati, evaṃ
atk-s0502a:2500_5: aññassa pāsādaṃ na karissatī”ti. So tamatthaṃ attano piyasahāyakassa sañjīvakaputtassa
atk-s0502a:2500_6: nāma māṇavakassa kathesi. So cintesi – “nissaṃsayaṃ esa vaḍḍhakiṃ nāsessati, anaggho
atk-s0502a:2500_7: sippī, so mayi passante mā nassatu, saññamassa dassāmī”ti. So taṃ upasaṅkamitvā “pāsāde
atk-s0502a:2500_8: te kammaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ, no”ti pucchitvā “niṭṭhita”nti vutte “rājakumāro taṃ nāsetukāmo
atk-s0502a:2500_9: attānaṃ rakkheyyāsī”ti āha. Vaḍḍhakīpi “bhaddakaṃ te, sāmi, kataṃ mama ārocentena,
atk-s0502a:2500_10: ahamettha kattabbaṃ jānissāmī”ti vatvā “kiṃ, samma, amhākaṃ pāsāde kammaṃ niṭṭhita”nti
atk-s0502a:2500_11: rājakumārena puṭṭho “na tāva, deva, niṭṭhitaṃ, bahu avasiṭṭha”nti āha. Kiṃ kammaṃ
atk-s0502a:2500_12: nāma avasiṭṭhanti? Pacchā, deva, ācikkhissāmi, dārūni tāva āharāpethāti. Kiṃ dārūni
atk-s0502a:2500_13: nāmāti? Nissārāni sukkhadārūni, devāti. So āharāpetvā adāsi. Atha naṃ āha – “deva,
atk-s0502a:2500_14: te ito paṭṭhāya mama santikaṃ nāgantabbaṃ. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Sukhumakammaṃ karontassa hi
atk-s0502a:2500_15: aññehi saddhiṃ sallapantassa me kammavikkhepo hoti, āhāravelāyaṃ pana me bhariyāva
atk-s0502a:2500_16: āhāraṃ āharissatī”ti. Rājakumāropi “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇi. Sopi ekasmiṃ gabbhe nisīditvā
atk-s0502a:2500_17: tāni dārūni tacchetvā attano puttadārassa anto nisīdanayoggaṃ garuḷasakuṇaṃ katvā
atk-s0502a:2500_18: āhāravelāya pana bhariyaṃ āha – “gehe vijjamānakaṃ sabbaṃ vikkiṇitvā hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:2500_19: gaṇhāhī”ti. Rājakumāropi vaḍḍhakissa anikkhamanatthāya gehaṃ parikkhipitvā ārakkhaṃ
atk-s0502a:2500_20: ṭhapesi. Vaḍḍhakīpi sakuṇassa niṭṭhitakāle “ajja sabbepi dārake gahetvā āgaccheyyāsī”ti
atk-s0502a:2500_21: bhariyaṃ vatvā bhuttapātarāso puttadāraṃ sakuṇassa kucchiyaṃ nisīdāpetvā vātapānena
atk-s0502a:2500_22: nikkhamitvā palāyi. So tesaṃ, “deva, vaḍḍhakī palāyatī”ti kandantānaṃyeva gantvā
atk-s0502a:2500_23: himavante otaritvā ekaṃ nagaraṃ māpetvā kaṭṭhavāhanarājā nāma jāto.
atk-s0502a:2501_0: Rājakumāropi “pāsādamahaṃ karissāmī”ti satthāraṃ nimantetvā pāsāde catujjātiyagandhehi
atk-s0502a:2501_1: paribhaṇḍikaṃ katvā paṭhamaummārato paṭṭhāya celapaṭikaṃ patthari. So kira aputtako,
atk-s0502a:2501_2: tasmā “sacāhaṃ puttaṃ vā dhītaraṃ vā lacchāmi, satthā imaṃ akkamissatī”ti cintetvā
atk-s0502a:2501_3: patthari. So satthari āgate satthāraṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā pattaṃ gahetvā “pavisatha,
atk-s0502a:2501_4: bhante”ti āha. Satthā na pāvisi, so dutiyampi tatiyampi yāci. Satthā apavisitvāva
atk-s0502a:2501_5: ānandattheraṃ olokesi. Thero olokitasaññāyeva vatthānaṃ anakkamanabhāvaṃ ñatvā taṃ
atk-s0502a:2501_6: “saṃharatu, rājakumāra, dussāni, na bhagavā celapaṭikaṃ akkamissati, pacchimajanataṃ
atk-s0502a:2501_7: tathāgato oloketī”ti dussāni saṃharāpesi. So dussāni saṃharitvā satthāraṃ antonivesanaṃ
atk-s0502a:2501_8: pavesatvā yāgukhajjakena sammānetvā ekamantaṃ nisinno vanditvā āha – “bhante, ahaṃ
atk-s0502a:2501_9: tumhākaṃ upakārako tikkhattuṃ saraṇaṃ gato, kucchigato ca kiramhi ekavāraṃ saraṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:2501_10: gato, dutiyaṃ taruṇadārakakāle, tatiyaṃ viññubhāvaṃ pattakāle. Tassa me kasmā celapaṭikaṃ
atk-s0502a:2501_11: na akkamitthā”ti? “Kiṃ pana tvaṃ, kumāra, cintetvā celāni attharī”ti? “Sace puttaṃ
atk-s0502a:2501_12: vā dhītaraṃ vā lacchāmi, satthā me celapaṭikaṃ akkamissatī”ti idaṃ cintetvā, bhanteti.
atk-s0502a:2501_13: Tenevāhaṃ taṃ na akkaminti. “Kiṃ panāhaṃ, bhante, puttaṃ vā dhītaraṃ vā neva lacchāmī”ti?
atk-s0502a:2501_14: “Āma, kumārā”ti. “Kiṃ kāraṇā”ti? “Purimakaattabhāve jāyāya saddhiṃ pamādaṃ āpannattā”ti.
atk-s0502a:2501_15: “Kasmiṃ kāle, bhante”ti? Athassa satthā atītaṃ āharitvā dassesi –
atk-s0502a:2502_0: Atīte kira anekasatā manussā mahatiyā nāvāya samuddaṃ pakkhandiṃsu. Nāvā samuddamajjhe
atk-s0502a:2502_1: bhijji. Dve jayampatikā ekaṃ phalakaṃ gahetvā antaradīpakaṃ pavisiṃsu, sesā sabbe
atk-s0502a:2502_2: tattheva mariṃsu. Tasmiṃ kho pana dīpake mahāsakuṇasaṅgho vasati. Te aññaṃ khāditabbakaṃ
atk-s0502a:2502_3: adisvā chātajjhattā sakuṇaaṇḍāni aṅgāresu pacitvā khādiṃsu, tesu appahontesu sakuṇacchāpe
atk-s0502a:2502_4: gahetvā khādiṃsu. Evaṃ paṭhamavayepi majjhimavayepi pacchimavayepi khādiṃsuyeva.
atk-s0502a:2502_5: Ekasmimpi vaye appamādaṃ nāpajjiṃsu, ekopi ca nesaṃ appamādaṃ nāpajji.
atk-s0502a:2503_0: Satthā idaṃ tassa pubbakammaṃ dassetvā “sace hi tvaṃ, kumāra, tadā ekasmimpi vaye
atk-s0502a:2503_1: bhariyāya saddhiṃ appamādaṃ āpajjissa, ekasmimpi vaye putto vā dhītā vā uppajjeyya.
atk-s0502a:2503_2: Sace pana vo ekopi appamatto abhavissa, taṃ paṭicca putto vā dhītā vā uppajjissa.
atk-s0502a:2503_3: Kumāra, attānañhi piyaṃ maññamānena tīsupi vayesu appamattena attā rakkhitabbo, evaṃ
atk-s0502a:2503_4: asakkontena ekavayepi rakkhitabboyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2507_0: Tattha yāmanti satthā attano dhammissaratāya desanākusalatāya ca idha tiṇṇaṃ vayānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2507_1: aññataraṃ vayaṃ yāmanti katvā desesi, tasmā evamettha attho veditabbo. Sace attānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2507_2: piyaṃ jāneyya, rakkheyya naṃ surakkhitanti yathā so surakkhito hoti, evaṃ naṃ rakkheyya.
atk-s0502a:2507_3: Tattha sace gīhī samāno “attānaṃ rakkhissāmī”ti uparipāsādatale susaṃvutaṃ gabbhaṃ
atk-s0502a:2507_4: pavisitvā sampannārakkho hutvā vasantopi, pabbajito hutvā susaṃvute pihitadvāravātapāne
atk-s0502a:2507_5: leṇe viharantopi attānaṃ na rakkhatiyeva. Gihī pana samāno yathābalaṃ dānasīlādīni
atk-s0502a:2507_6: puññāni karonto, pabbajito vā pana vattapaṭivattapariyattimanasikāresu ussukkaṃ āpajjanto
atk-s0502a:2507_7: attānaṃ rakkhati nāma. Evaṃ tīsu vayesu asakkonto aññatarasmimpi vaye paṇḍitapuriso
atk-s0502a:2507_8: attānaṃ paṭijaggatiyeva. Sace hi gihibhūto paṭhamavaye khiḍḍāpasutatāya kusalaṃ kātuṃ
atk-s0502a:2507_9: na sakkoti, majjhimavaye appamattena hutvā kusalaṃ kātabbaṃ. Sace majjhimavaye puttadāraṃ
atk-s0502a:2507_10: posento kusalaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti, pacchimavaye kātabbameva. Evampi karontena attā
atk-s0502a:2507_11: paṭijaggitova hoti. Evaṃ akarontassa pana attā piyo nāma na hoti, apāyaparāyaṇameva
atk-s0502a:2507_12: naṃ karoti. Sace pana pabbajito paṭhamavaye sajjhāyaṃ karonto dhārento vācento vattapaṭivattaṃ
atk-s0502a:2507_13: karonto pamādaṃ āpajjati, majjhimavaye appamattena samaṇadhammo kātabbo. Sace paṭhamavaye
atk-s0502a:2507_14: uggahitapariyattiyā aṭṭhakathaṃ vinicchayaṃ kāraṇākāraṇañca pucchanto majjhimavaye
atk-s0502a:2507_15: pamādaṃ āpajjati, pacchimavaye appamattena samaṇadhammo kātabboyeva. Evampi karontena
atk-s0502a:2507_16: attā paṭijaggitova hoti. Evaṃ akarontassa pana attā piyo nāma na hoti, pacchānutāpeneva naṃ tāpetīti.
atk-s0502a:2508: Desanāvasāne bodhirājakumāro sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattaparisāyapi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:2511: Attānameva paṭhamanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2512_0: So kira thero dhammakathaṃ kathetuṃ cheko. Tassa appicchatādipaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0502a:2512_1: sutvā bahū bhikkhu taṃ ticīvarehi pūjetvā dhutaṅgāni samādiyiṃsu. Tehi vissaṭṭhaparikkhāre
atk-s0502a:2512_2: soyeva gaṇhi. So ekasmiṃ antovasse upakaṭṭhe janapadaṃ agamāsi. Atha naṃ ekasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:2512_3: vihāre daharasāmaṇerā dhammakathikapemena, “bhante, idha vassaṃ upethā”ti vadiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2512_4: “Idha kittakaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ labbhatī”ti pucchitvā tehi “ekeko sāṭako”ti vutte tattha
atk-s0502a:2512_5: upāhanā ṭhapetvā aññaṃ vihāraṃ agamāsi. Dutiyaṃ vihāraṃ gantvā “idha kiṃ labbhatī”ti
atk-s0502a:2512_6: pucchitvā “dve sāṭakā”ti vutte kattarayaṭṭhiṃ ṭhapesi. Tatiyaṃ vihāraṃ gantvā “idha
atk-s0502a:2512_7: kiṃ labbhatī”ti pucchitvā “tayo sāṭakā”ti vutte tattha udakatumbaṃ ṭhapesi. Catutthaṃ
atk-s0502a:2512_8: vihāraṃ gantvā “idha kiṃ labbhatī”ti pucchitvā “cattāro sāṭakā”ti vutte “sādhu idha
atk-s0502a:2512_9: vasissāmī”ti tattha vassaṃ upagantvā gahaṭṭhānañceva bhikkhūnañca dhammakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2512_10: Te naṃ bahūhi vatthehi ceva cīvarehi ca pūjesuṃ. So vuṭṭhavasso itaresupi vihāresu
atk-s0502a:2512_11: sāsanaṃ pesetvā “mayā parikkhārassa ṭhapitattā vassāvāsikaṃ laddhabbaṃ, taṃ me pahiṇantū”ti
atk-s0502a:2513_0: Athekasmiṃ vihāre dve daharabhikkhū dve sāṭake ekañca kambalaṃ labhitvā “tuyhaṃ sāṭakā
atk-s0502a:2513_1: hontu, mayhaṃ kambalo”ti bhājetuṃ asakkontā maggasamīpe nisīditvā vivadanti. Te taṃ
atk-s0502a:2513_2: theraṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā, “bhante, tumhe no bhājetvā dethā”ti vadiṃsu. Tumheyeva
atk-s0502a:2513_3: bhājethāti. Na sakkoma, bhante, tumheyeva no bhājetvā dethāti. Tena hi mama vacane
atk-s0502a:2513_4: ṭhassathāti. Āma, ṭhassāmāti. “Tena hi sādhū”ti tesaṃ dve sāṭake datvā “ayaṃ dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0502a:2513_5: kathentānaṃ amhākaṃ pārupanāraho”ti mahagghaṃ kambalaṃ ādāya pakkāmi. Daharabhikkhū
atk-s0502a:2513_6: vippaṭisārino hutvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Satthā “na, bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a:2513_7: idāneva tumhākaṃ santakaṃ gahetvā tumhe vippaṭisārino karoti, pubbepi akāsiyevā”ti
atk-s0502a:2514_0: Atītasmiṃ anutīracārī ca gambhīracārī cāti dve uddā mahantaṃ rohitamacchaṃ labhitvā
atk-s0502a:2514_1: “mayhaṃ sīsaṃ hotu, tava naṅguṭṭha”nti vivādāpannā bhājetuṃ asakkontā ekaṃ siṅgālaṃ
atk-s0502a:2514_2: disvā āhaṃsu – “mātula, imaṃ no bhājetvā dehī”ti. Ahaṃ raññā vinicchayaṭṭhāne ṭhapito,
atk-s0502a:2514_3: tattha ciraṃ nisīditvā jaṅghavihāratthāya āgatomhi, idāni me okāso natthīti. Mātula,
atk-s0502a:2514_4: mā evaṃ karotha, bhājetvā eva no dethāti. Mama vacane ṭhassathāti. Ṭhassāma, mātulāti.
atk-s0502a:2514_5: “Tena hi sādhū”ti so sīsaṃ chinditvā ekamante akāsi, naṅguṭṭhaṃ ekamante. Katvā ca
atk-s0502a:2514_6: pana, “tātā, yena vo anutīre caritaṃ, so naṅguṭṭhaṃ gaṇhātu. Yena gambhīre caritaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2514_7: tassa sīsaṃ hotu. Ayaṃ pana majjhimo khaṇḍo mama vinicchayadhamme ṭhitassa bhavissatī”ti te saññāpento –
atk-s0502a:2517: Imaṃ gāthaṃ vatvā majjhimakhaṇḍaṃ ādāya pakkāmi. Tepi vippaṭisārino taṃ oloketvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2518_0: Satthā imaṃ atītaṃ dassetvā “evamesa atītepi tumhe vippaṭisārino akāsiyevā”ti te
atk-s0502a:2518_1: bhikkhū saññāpetvā upanandaṃ garahanto, “bhikkhave, paraṃ ovadantena nāma paṭhamameva
atk-s0502a:2518_2: attā patirūpe patiṭṭhāpetabbo”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2522_0: Tattha patirūpe nivesayeti anucchavike guṇe patiṭṭhāpeyya. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yo
atk-s0502a:2522_1: appicchatādiguṇehi vā ariyavaṃsapaṭipadādīhi vā paraṃ anusāsitukāmo, so attānameva
atk-s0502a:2522_2: paṭhamaṃ tasmiṃ guṇe patiṭṭhāpeyya. Evaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā athaññaṃ tehi guṇehi anusāseyya.
atk-s0502a:2522_3: Attānañhi tattha anivesetvā kevalaṃ parameva anusāsamāno parato nindaṃ labhitvā kilissati
atk-s0502a:2522_4: nāma, tattha attānaṃ nivesetvā anusāsamāno parato pasaṃsaṃ labhati, tasmā na kilissati
atk-s0502a:2522_5: nāma. Evaṃ karonto paṇḍito na kilisseyyāti.
atk-s0502a:2523: Desanāvasāne te bhikkhū sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu, mahājanassāpi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:2526: Attānañceti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto padhānikatissattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2527_0: So kira satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā pañcasate bhikkhū ādāya araññe vassaṃ
atk-s0502a:2527_1: upagantvā, “āvuso, dharamānakassa buddhassa santike vo kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahitaṃ, appamattāva
atk-s0502a:2527_2: samaṇadhammaṃ karothā”ti ovaditvā sayaṃ gantvā nipajjitvā supati. Te bhikkhū paṭhamayāme
atk-s0502a:2527_3: caṅkamitvā majjhimayāme vihāraṃ pavisanti. So niddāyitvā pabuddhakāle tesaṃ santikaṃ
atk-s0502a:2527_4: gantvā “kiṃ tumhe ‘nipajjitvā niddāyissāmā’ti āgatā, sīghaṃ nikkhamitvā samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0502a:2527_5: karothā”ti vatvā sayaṃ gantvā tatheva supati. Itare majjhimayāme bahi caṅkamitvā
atk-s0502a:2527_6: pacchimayāme vihāraṃ pavisanti. So punapi pabujjhitvā tesaṃ santikaṃ gantvā te vihārā
atk-s0502a:2527_7: nīharitvā sayaṃ puna gantvā tatheva supati. Tasmiṃ niccakālaṃ evaṃ karonte te bhikkhū
atk-s0502a:2527_8: sajjhāyaṃ vā kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā manasikātuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu, cittaṃ aññathattaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:2527_9: Te “amhākaṃ ācariyo ativiya āraddhavīriyo, pariggaṇhissāma na”nti pariggaṇhantā tassa
atk-s0502a:2527_10: kiriyaṃ disvā “naṭṭhamhā, āvuso, ācariyo no tuccharavaṃ ravatī”ti vadiṃsu. Tesaṃ
atk-s0502a:2527_11: ativiya niddāya kilamantānaṃ ekabhikkhupi visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ nāsakkhi. Te vuṭṭhavassā
atk-s0502a:2527_12: satthu santikaṃ gantvā satthārā katapaṭisanthārā “kiṃ, bhikkhave, appamattā hutvā
atk-s0502a:2527_13: samaṇadhammaṃ karitthā”ti pucchitā tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Satthā “na, bhikkhave, idāneva,
atk-s0502a:2527_14: pubbepesa tumhākaṃ antarāyamakāsiyevā”ti vatvā tehi yācito –
atk-s0502a:2529: Nāyaṃ kālaṃ akālaṃ vā, abhijānāti kukkuṭo”ti. –
atk-s0502a:2530_0: Imaṃ akālarāvikukkuṭajātakaṃ vitthāretvā kathesi. “Tadā hi so kukkuṭo ayaṃ padhānikatissatthero
atk-s0502a:2530_1: ahosi, ime pañca satā bhikkhū te māṇavā ahesuṃ, disāpāmokkho ācariyo ahamevā”ti satthā
atk-s0502a:2530_2: imaṃ jātakaṃ vitthāretvā, “bhikkhave, paraṃ ovadantena nāma attā sudanto kātabbo.
atk-s0502a:2530_3: Evaṃ ovadanto hi sudanto hutvā dameti nāmā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2533: Sudanto vata dametha, attā hi kira duddamo”ti.
atk-s0502a:2534_0: Tassattho – yo hi bhikkhu “paṭhamayāmādīsu caṅkamitabba”nti vatvā paraṃ ovadati,
atk-s0502a:2534_1: sayaṃ caṅkamanādīni adhiṭṭhahanto attānañce tathā kayirā, yathāññamanusāsati, evaṃ
atk-s0502a:2534_2: sante sudanto vata damethāti yena guṇena paraṃ anusāsati, tena attanā sudanto hutvā
atk-s0502a:2534_3: dameyya. Attā hi kira duddamoti ayañhi attā nāma duddamo. Tasmā yathā so sudanto
atk-s0502a:2535: Desanāvasāne pañca satāpi te bhikkhū arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a:2538: Attā hi attano nāthoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kumārakassapattherassa mātaraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2539_0: Sā kira rājagahanagare seṭṭhidhītā viññutaṃ pattakālato paṭṭhāya pabbajjaṃ yāci.
atk-s0502a:2539_1: Atha sā punappunaṃ yācamānāpi mātāpitūnaṃ santikā pabbajjaṃ alabhitvā vayappattā
atk-s0502a:2539_2: patikulaṃ gantvā patidevatā hutvā agāraṃ ajjhāvasi. Athassā na cirasseva kucchismiṃ
atk-s0502a:2539_3: gabbho patiṭṭhahi. Sā gabbhassa patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ ajānitvāva sāmikaṃ ārādhetvā pabbajjaṃ
atk-s0502a:2539_4: yāci. Atha naṃ so mahantena sakkārena bhikkhunupassayaṃ netvā ajānanto devadattapakkhikānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2539_5: bhikkhunīnaṃ santike pabbājesi. Aparena samayena bhikkhuniyo tassā gabbhinibhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:2539_6: ñatvā tāhi “kiṃ ida”nti vuttā nāhaṃ, ayye, jānāmi “kimetaṃ”, sīlaṃ vata me arogamevāti.
atk-s0502a:2539_7: Bhikkhuniyo taṃ devadattassa santikaṃ netvā “ayaṃ bhikkhunī saddhāpabbajitā, imissā
atk-s0502a:2539_8: mayaṃ gabbhassa patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ jānāma, kālaṃ na jānāma, kiṃ dāni karomā”ti pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2539_9: Devadatto “mā mayhaṃ ovādakārikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ ayaso uppajjatū”ti ettakameva cintetvā
atk-s0502a:2539_10: “uppabbājetha na”nti āha. Taṃ sutvā sā daharā mā maṃ, ayye, nāsetha, nāhaṃ devadattaṃ
atk-s0502a:2539_11: uddissa pabbajitā, etha, maṃ satthu santikaṃ jetavanaṃ nethāti. Tā taṃ ādāya jetavanaṃ
atk-s0502a:2539_12: gantvā satthu ārocesuṃ. Satthā “tassā gihikāle gabbho patiṭṭhito”ti jānantopi paravādamocanatthaṃ
atk-s0502a:2539_13: rājānaṃ pasenadikosalaṃ mahāanāthapiṇḍikaṃ cūḷaanāthapiṇḍikaṃ visākhāupāsikaṃ aññāni
atk-s0502a:2539_14: ca mahākulāni pakkosāpetvā upālittheraṃ āṇāpesi – “gaccha, imissā daharāya bhikkhuniyā
atk-s0502a:2539_15: catuparisamajjhe kammaṃ parisodhehī”ti. Thero rañño purato visākhaṃ pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0502a:2539_16: taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ paṭicchāpesi. Sā sāṇipākāraṃ parikkhipāpetvā antosāṇiyaṃ tassā hatthapādanābhiudarapariyosānāni
atk-s0502a:2539_17: oloketvā māsadivase samānetvā “gihibhāve imāya gabbho laddho”ti ñatvā therassa tamatthaṃ
atk-s0502a:2539_18: ārocesi. Athassā thero parisamajjhe parisuddhabhāvaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi. Sā aparena samayena
atk-s0502a:2539_19: padumuttarabuddhassa pādamūle patthitapatthanaṃ mahānubhāvaṃ puttaṃ vijāyi.
atk-s0502a:2540_0: Athekadivasaṃ rājā bhikkhunupassayasamīpena gacchanto dārakasaddaṃ sutvā “kiṃ ida”nti
atk-s0502a:2540_1: pucchitvā, “deva, ekissā bhikkhuniyā putto jāto, tassesa saddo”ti vutte taṃ kumāraṃ
atk-s0502a:2540_2: attano gharaṃ netvā dhātīnaṃ adāsi. Nāmaggahaṇadivase cassa kassapoti nāmaṃ katvā
atk-s0502a:2540_3: kumāraparihārena vaḍḍhitattā kumārakassapoti sañjāniṃsu. So kīḷāmaṇḍale dārake paharitvā
atk-s0502a:2540_5: vadanti, mātaraṃ me ācikkhathā”ti pucchitvā raññā dhātiyo dassetvā “imā te mātaro”ti
atk-s0502a:2540_6: vutte “na ettikā me mātaro, ekāya me mātarā bhavitabbaṃ, taṃ me ācikkhathā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:2540_7: Rājā “na sakkā imaṃ vañcetu”nti cintetvā, tāta, tava mātā bhikkhunī, tvaṃ mayā bhikkhunupassayā
atk-s0502a:2540_8: ānītoti. So tāvatakeneva samuppannasaṃvego hutvā, “tāta, pabbājetha ma”nti āha. Rājā
atk-s0502a:2540_9: “sādhu, tātā”ti taṃ mahantena sakkārena satthu santike pabbājesi. So laddhūpasampado
atk-s0502a:2540_10: kumārakassapattheroti paññāyi. So satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0502a:2540_11: vāyamitvā visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ asakkonto “puna kammaṭṭhānaṃ visesetvā gahessāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:2541_0: Atha naṃ kassapabuddhakāle ekato samaṇadhammaṃ katvā anāgāmiphalaṃ patvā brahmaloke
atk-s0502a:2541_1: nibbattabhikkhu brahmalokato āgantvā pannarasa pañhe pucchitvā “ime pañhe ṭhapetvā
atk-s0502a:2541_2: satthāraṃ añño byākātuṃ samattho nāma natthi, gaccha, satthu santike imesaṃ atthaṃ
atk-s0502a:2541_3: uggaṇhā”ti uyyojesi. So tathā katvā pañhavissajjanāvasāne arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tassa
atk-s0502a:2541_4: pana nikkhantadivasato paṭṭhāya dvādasa vassāni mātubhikkhuniyā akkhīhi assūni pavattiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2541_5: Sā puttaviyogadukkhitā assutinteneva mukhena bhikkhāya caramānā antaravīthiyaṃ theraṃ
atk-s0502a:2541_6: disvāva, “putta, puttā”ti viravantī taṃ gaṇhituṃ upadhāvamānā parivattitvā pati.
atk-s0502a:2541_7: Sā thanehi khīraṃ muñcantehi uṭṭhahitvā allacīvarā gantvā theraṃ gaṇhi. So cintesi
atk-s0502a:2541_8: – “sacāyaṃ mama santikā madhuravacanaṃ labhissati, vinassissati. Thaddhameva katvā
atk-s0502a:2541_9: imāya saddhiṃ sallapissāmī”ti. Atha naṃ āha – “kiṃ karontī vicarasi, sinehamattampi
atk-s0502a:2541_10: chindituṃ na sakkosī”ti. Sā “aho kakkhaḷā therassa kathā”ti cintetvā “kiṃ vadesi,
atk-s0502a:2541_11: tātā”ti vatvā punapi tena tatheva vuttā cintesi – “ahaṃ imassa kāraṇā dvādasa vassāni
atk-s0502a:2541_12: assūni sandhāretuṃ na sakkomi, ayaṃ panevaṃ thaddhahadayo, kiṃ me iminā”ti puttasinehaṃ
atk-s0502a:2542_0: Aparena samayena dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ – “āvuso, devadattena evaṃ upanissayasampanno
atk-s0502a:2542_1: kumārakassapo ca therī ca nāsitā, satthā pana tesaṃ patiṭṭhā jāto, aho buddhā nāma
atk-s0502a:2542_2: lokānukampakā”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti
atk-s0502a:2542_3: pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, idāneva ahaṃ imesaṃ paccayo patiṭṭhā
atk-s0502a:2542_4: jāto, pubbepi nesaṃ ahaṃ patiṭṭhā ahosiṃyevā”ti vatvā –
atk-s0502a:2544: Nigrodhasmiṃ mataṃ seyyo, yañce sākhasmi jīvita”nti. –
atk-s0502a:2545_0: Imaṃ nigrodhajātakaṃ vitthārena kathetvā “tadā sākhamigo devadatto ahosi, parisāpissa
atk-s0502a:2545_1: devadattaparisā, vārappattā migadhenu therī ahosi, putto kumārakassapo, gabbhinīmigiyā
atk-s0502a:2545_2: jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā gato nigrodhamigarājā pana ahamevā”ti jātakaṃ samodhānetvā puttasinehaṃ
atk-s0502a:2545_3: chinditvā theriyā attanāva attano patiṭṭhānakatabhāvaṃ pakāsento, “bhikkhave, yasmā
atk-s0502a:2545_4: parassa attani ṭhitena saggaparāyaṇena vā maggaparāyaṇena vā bhavituṃ na sakkā, tasmā
atk-s0502a:2545_5: attāva attano nātho, paro kiṃ karissatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2547: “Attā hi attano nātho, ko hi nātho paro siyā;
atk-s0502a:2548: Attanā hi sudantena, nāthaṃ labhati dullabha”nti.
atk-s0502a:2549_0: Tattha nāthoti patiṭṭhā. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yasmā attani ṭhitena attasampannena kusalaṃ
atk-s0502a:2549_1: katvā saggaṃ vā pāpuṇituṃ, maggaṃ vā bhāvetuṃ, phalaṃ vā sacchikātuṃ sakkā. Tasmā
atk-s0502a:2549_2: hi attāva attano patiṭṭhā hoti, paro ko nāma kassa patiṭṭhā siyā. Attanā eva hi sudantena
atk-s0502a:2549_3: nibbisevanena arahattaphalasaṅkhātaṃ dullabhaṃ nāthaṃ labhati. Arahattañhi sandhāya
atk-s0502a:2553: Attanā hi kataṃ pāpanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ mahākālaṃ nāma sotāpannaupāsakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2554_0: So kira māsassa aṭṭhadivasesu uposathiko hutvā vihāre sabbarattiṃ dhammakathaṃ suṇāti.
atk-s0502a:2554_1: Atha rattiṃ corā ekasmiṃ gehe sandhiṃ chinditvā bhaṇḍakaṃ gahetvā lohabhājanasaddena
atk-s0502a:2554_2: pabuddhehi sāmikehi anubaddhā gahitabhaṇḍaṃ chaḍḍetvā palāyiṃsu. Sāmikāpi te anubandhiṃsuyeva,
atk-s0502a:2554_3: te disā pakkhandiṃsu. Eko pana vihāramaggaṃ gahetvā mahākālassa rattiṃ dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0502a:2554_4: sutvā pātova pokkharaṇitīre mukhaṃ dhovantassa purato bhaṇḍikaṃ chaḍḍetvā palāyi.
atk-s0502a:2554_5: Core anubandhitvā āgatamanussā bhaṇḍikaṃ disvā “tvaṃ no gehasandhiṃ chinditvā bhaṇḍikaṃ
atk-s0502a:2554_6: haritvā dhammaṃ suṇanto viya vicarasī”ti taṃ gahetvā pothetvā māretvā chaḍḍetvā agamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2554_7: Atha naṃ pātova pānīyaghaṭaṃ ādāya gatā daharasāmaṇerā disvā “vihāre dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0502a:2554_8: sutvā sayitaupāsako ayuttaṃ maraṇaṃ labhatī”ti vatvā satthu ārocesuṃ. Satthā “āma,
atk-s0502a:2554_9: bhikkhave, imasmiṃ attabhāve kālena appatirūpaṃ maraṇaṃ laddhaṃ, pubbe katakammassa
atk-s0502a:2554_10: pana tena yuttameva laddha”nti vatvā tehi yācito tassa pubbakammaṃ kathesi –
atk-s0502a:2555_0: Atīte kira bārāṇasirañño vijite ekassa paccantagāmassa aṭavimukhe corā paharanti.
atk-s0502a:2555_1: Rājā aṭavimukhe ekaṃ rājabhaṭaṃ ṭhapesi, so bhatiṃ gahetvā manusse orato pāraṃ neti,
atk-s0502a:2555_2: pārato oraṃ āneti. Atheko manusso abhirūpaṃ attano bhariyaṃ cūḷayānakaṃ āropetvā
atk-s0502a:2555_3: taṃ ṭhānaṃ agamāsi. Rājabhaṭo taṃ itthiṃ disvāva sañjātasineho tena “aṭaviṃ no, sāmi,
atk-s0502a:2555_4: atikkāmehī”ti vuttepi “idāni vikālo, pātova atikkāmessāmī”ti āha. So sakālo, sāmi,
atk-s0502a:2555_5: idāneva no nehīti. Nivatta, bho, amhākaṃyeva gehe āhāro ca nivāso ca bhavissatīti.
atk-s0502a:2555_6: So neva nivattituṃ icchi. Itaro purisānaṃ saññaṃ datvā yānakaṃ nivattāpetvā anicchantasseva
atk-s0502a:2555_7: dvārakoṭṭhake nivāsaṃ datvā āhāraṃ paṭiyādāpesi. Tassa pana gehe ekaṃ maṇiratanaṃ
atk-s0502a:2555_8: atthi. So taṃ tassa yānakantare pakkhipāpetvā paccūsakāle corānaṃ paviṭṭhasaddaṃ
atk-s0502a:2555_9: kāresi. Athassa purisā “maṇiratanaṃ, sāmi, corehi haṭa”nti ārocesuṃ. So gāmadvāresu
atk-s0502a:2555_10: ārakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā “antogāmato nikkhamante vicinathā”ti āha. Itaropi pātova yānakaṃ
atk-s0502a:2555_11: yojetvā pāyāsi. Athassa yānakaṃ sodhentā attanā ṭhapitaṃ maṇiratanaṃ disvā santajjetvā
atk-s0502a:2555_12: “tvaṃ maṇiṃ gahetvā palāyasī”ti pothetvā “gahito no, sāmi, coro”ti gāmabhojakassa
atk-s0502a:2555_13: dassesuṃ. So “bhatakassa vata me gehe nivāsaṃ datvā bhattaṃ dinnaṃ, maṇiṃ gahetvā
atk-s0502a:2555_14: gato, gaṇhatha naṃ pāpapurisa”nti pothāpetvā māretvā chaḍḍāpesi. Idaṃ tassa pubbakammaṃ.
atk-s0502a:2555_15: So tato cuto avīcimhi nibbattitvā tattha dīgharattaṃ paccitvā vipākāvasesena attabhāvasate
atk-s0502a:2556: Evaṃ satthā mahākālassa pubbakammaṃ dassetvā, “bhikkhave, evaṃ ime satte attanā katapāpakammameva catūsu apāyesu abhimatthatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2560_0: Tattha vajiraṃvasmamayaṃ maṇinti vajiraṃva asmamayaṃ maṇiṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā
atk-s0502a:2560_1: pāsāṇamayaṃ pāsāṇasambhavaṃ vajiraṃ tameva asmamayaṃ maṇiṃ attano uṭṭhānaṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0502a:2560_2: pāsāṇamaṇiṃ khāditvā chiddaṃ chiddaṃ khaṇḍaṃ khaṇḍaṃ katvā aparibhogaṃ karoti, evameva
atk-s0502a:2560_3: attanā kataṃ attani jātaṃ attasambhavaṃ pāpaṃ dummedhaṃ nippaññaṃ puggalaṃ catūsu
atk-s0502a:2564: Yassa accantadussīlyanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto devadattaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2565_0: Ekasmiñhi divase bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ – “āvuso, devadatto
atk-s0502a:2565_1: dussīlo pāpadhammo dussīlyakāraṇena vaḍḍhitāya taṇhāya ajātasattuṃ saṅgaṇhitvā mahantaṃ
atk-s0502a:2565_2: lābhasakkāraṃ nibbattetvā ajātasattuṃ pituvadhe samādapetvā tena saddhiṃ ekato hutvā
atk-s0502a:2565_3: nānappakārena tathāgatassa vadhāya parisakkatī”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a:2565_4: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, idāneva,
atk-s0502a:2565_5: pubbepi devadatto nānappakārena mayhaṃ vadhāya parisakkatī”ti vatvā kuruṅgamigajātakādīni
atk-s0502a:2565_6: kathetvā, “bhikkhave, accantadussīlapuggalaṃ nāma dussīlyakāraṇā uppannā taṇhā māluvā
atk-s0502a:2565_7: viya sālaṃ pariyonandhitvā sambhañjamānā nirayādīsu pakkhipatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthāmāha –
atk-s0502a:2568: Karoti so tathattānaṃ, yathā naṃ icchatī diso”ti.
atk-s0502a:2569_0: Tattha accantadussīlyanti ekantadussīlabhāvo. Gihī vā jātito paṭṭhāya dasa akusalakammapathe
atk-s0502a:2569_1: karonto, pabbajito vā upasampannadivasato paṭṭhāya garukāpattiṃ āpajjamāno accantadussīlo
atk-s0502a:2569_2: nāma. Idha pana yo dvīsu tīsu attabhāvesu dussīlo, etassa gatiyā āgataṃ dussīlabhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:2569_3: sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Dussīlabhāvoti cettha dussīlassa cha dvārāni nissāya uppannā
atk-s0502a:2569_4: taṇhā veditabbā. Māluvā sālamivotthatanti yassa puggalassa taṃ taṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ dussīlyaṃ
atk-s0502a:2569_5: yathā nāma māluvā sālaṃ ottharantī deve vassante pattehi udakaṃ sampaṭicchitvā sambhañjanavasena
atk-s0502a:2569_6: sabbatthakameva pariyonandhati, evaṃ attabhāvaṃ otthataṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0502a:2569_7: So māluvāya sambhañjitvā bhūmiyaṃ pātiyamāno rukkho viya tāya dussīlyasaṅkhātāya
atk-s0502a:2569_8: taṇhāya sambhañjitvā apāyesu pātiyamāno, yathā naṃ anatthakāmo diso icchati, tathā
atk-s0502a:2573: Sukarānīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto saṅghabhedaparisakkanaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2574_0: Ekadivasañhi devadatto saṅghabhedāya parisakkanto āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ
atk-s0502a:2574_1: disvā attano adhippāyaṃ ārocesi. Taṃ sutvā thero satthu santikaṃ gantvā bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0502a:2574_2: etadavoca – “idhāhaṃ, bhante, pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya rājagahaṃ
atk-s0502a:2574_3: piṇḍāya pāvisiṃ. Addasā kho maṃ, bhante, devadatto rājagahe piṇḍāya carantaṃ. Disvā
atk-s0502a:2574_4: yenāhaṃ tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā maṃ etadavoca – ‘ajjatagge dānāhaṃ, āvuso ānanda,
atk-s0502a:2574_5: aññatreva bhagavatā aññatra bhikkhusaṅghena uposathaṃ karissāmi saṅghakammañcā’ti.
atk-s0502a:2574_6: Ajja bhagavā devadatto saṅghaṃ bhindissati, uposathañca karissati saṅghakammāni cā”ti. Evaṃ vutte satthā –
atk-s0502a:2577: Imaṃ udānaṃ udānetvā, “ānanda, attano ahitakammaṃ nāma sukaraṃ, hitakammameva dukkara”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2580: Yaṃ ve hitañca sādhuñca, taṃ ve paramadukkara”nti.
atk-s0502a:2581_0: Tassattho – yāni kammāni asādhūni sāvajjāni apāyasaṃvattanikattāyeva attano ahitāni
atk-s0502a:2581_1: ca honti, tāni sukarāni. Yaṃ pana sugatisaṃvattanikattā attano hitañca anavajjatthena
atk-s0502a:2581_2: sādhuñca sugatisaṃvattanikañceva nibbānasaṃvattanikañca kammaṃ, taṃ pācīnaninnāya
atk-s0502a:2585: Yo sāsananti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kālattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2586_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kirekā itthī mātuṭṭhāne ṭhatvā taṃ theraṃ upaṭṭhahi. Tassā paṭivissakagehe
atk-s0502a:2586_1: manussā satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā āgantvā “aho buddhā nāma acchariyā, aho dhammadesanā
atk-s0502a:2586_2: madhurā”ti pasaṃsanti. Sā itthī tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā, “bhante, ahampi satthu dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0502a:2586_3: sotukāmā”ti tassa ārocesi. So “tattha mā gamī”ti taṃ nivāresi. Sā punadivase punadivasepīti
atk-s0502a:2586_4: yāvatatiyaṃ tena nivāriyamānāpi sotukāmāva ahosi. Kasmā so panetaṃ nivāresīti? Evaṃ
atk-s0502a:2586_5: kirassa ahosi – “satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā mayi bhijjissatī”ti. Sā ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0502a:2586_6: pātova bhuttapātarāsā uposathaṃ samādiyitvā, “amma, sādhukaṃ ayyaṃ pariviseyyāsī”ti
atk-s0502a:2586_7: dhītaraṃ āṇāpetvā vihāraṃ agamāsi. Dhītāpissā taṃ bhikkhuṃ āgatakāle parivisitvā
atk-s0502a:2586_8: “kuhiṃ mahāupāsikā”ti vuttā “dhammassavanāya vihāraṃ gatā”ti āha. So taṃ sutvāva
atk-s0502a:2586_9: kucchiyaṃ uṭṭhitena ḍāhena santappamāno “idāni sā mayi bhinnā”ti vegena gantvā satthu
atk-s0502a:2586_10: santike dhammaṃ suṇamānaṃ disvā satthāraṃ āha, “bhante, ayaṃ itthī dandhā sukhumaṃ
atk-s0502a:2586_11: dhammakathaṃ na jānāti, imissā khandhādipaṭisaṃyuttaṃ sukhumaṃ dhammakathaṃ akathetvā
atk-s0502a:2586_12: dānakathaṃ vā sīlakathaṃ vā kathetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Satthā tassajjhāsayaṃ viditvā “tvaṃ
atk-s0502a:2586_13: duppañño pāpikaṃ diṭṭhiṃ nissāya buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ paṭikkosasi. Attaghātāyeva vāyamasī”ti
atk-s0502a:2591_0: Tassattho – yo dummedho puggalo attano sakkārahānibhayena pāpikaṃ diṭṭhiṃ nissāya
atk-s0502a:2591_1: “dhammaṃ vā sossāma, dānaṃ vā dassāmā”ti vadante paṭikkosanto arahataṃ ariyānaṃ dhammajīvinaṃ
atk-s0502a:2591_2: buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ paṭikkosati, tassa taṃ paṭikkosanaṃ sā ca pāpikā diṭṭhi veḷusaṅkhātassa
atk-s0502a:2591_3: kaṭṭhakassa phalāni viya hoti. Tasmā yathā kaṭṭhako phalāni gaṇhanto attaghātāya
atk-s0502a:2591_4: phallati, attano ghātatthameva phalati, evaṃ sopi attaghātāya phallatīti. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-s0502a:2592: “Phalaṃ ve kadaliṃ hanti, phalaṃ veḷuṃ phalaṃ naḷaṃ;
atk-s0502a:2593: Sakkāro kāpurisaṃ hanti, gabbho assatariṃ yathā”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:2594: Desanāvasāne upāsikā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattaparisāyapi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:2597: Attanā hi katanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto cūḷakālaṃ upāsakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2598_0: Ekadivasañhi mahākālavatthusmiṃ vuttanayeneva umaṅgacorā sāmikehi anubaddhā rattiṃ
atk-s0502a:2598_1: vihāre dhammakathaṃ sutvā pātova vihārā nikkhamitvā sāvatthiṃ āgacchantassa tassa
atk-s0502a:2598_2: upāsakassa purato bhaṇḍikaṃ chaḍḍetvā palāyiṃsu. Manussā taṃ disvā “ayaṃ rattiṃ corakammaṃ
atk-s0502a:2598_3: katvā dhammaṃ suṇanto viya carati, gaṇhatha na”nti taṃ pothayiṃsu. Kumbhadāsiyo udakatitthaṃ
atk-s0502a:2598_4: gacchamānā taṃ disvā “apetha, sāmi, nāyaṃ evarūpaṃ karotī”ti taṃ mocesuṃ. So vihāraṃ
atk-s0502a:2598_5: gantvā, “bhante, ahamhi manussehi nāsito, kumbhadāsiyo me nissāya jīvitaṃ laddha”nti
atk-s0502a:2598_6: bhikkhūnaṃ ārocesi. Bhikkhū tathāgatassa tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Satthā tesaṃ kathaṃ
atk-s0502a:2598_7: sutvā, “bhikkhave, cūḷakālaupāsako kumbhadāsiyo ceva nissāya, attano ca akaraṇabhāvena
atk-s0502a:2598_8: jīvitaṃ labhi. Ime hi nāma sattā attanā pāpakammaṃ katvā nirayādīsu attanāva kilissanti,
atk-s0502a:2598_9: kusalaṃ katvā pana sugatiñceva nibbānañca gacchantā attanāva visujjhantī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2602: Suddhī asuddhi paccattaṃ, nāñño aññaṃ visodhaye”ti.
atk-s0502a:2603_0: Tassattho – yena attanā akusalakammaṃ kataṃ hoti, so catūsu apāyesu dukkhaṃ anubhavanto
atk-s0502a:2603_1: attanāva saṃkilissati. Yena pana attanā akataṃ pāpaṃ, so sugatiñceva nibbānañca gacchanto
atk-s0502a:2603_2: attanāva visujjhati. Kusalakammasaṅkhātā suddhi akusalakammasaṅkhātā ca asuddhi paccattaṃ
atk-s0502a:2603_3: kārakasattānaṃ attaniyeva vipaccati. Añño puggalo aññaṃ puggalaṃ na visodhaye neva
atk-s0502a:2604: Desanāvasāne cūḷakālo sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattaparisāyapi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:2607: Attadatthanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto attadatthattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2608_0: Satthārā hi parinibbānakāle, “bhikkhave, ahaṃ ito catumāsaccayena parinibbāyissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:2608_1: vutte uppannasaṃvegā sattasatā puthujjanā bhikkhū satthu santikaṃ avijahitvā “kiṃ
atk-s0502a:2608_2: nu kho, āvuso, karissāmā”ti sammantayamānā vicaranti. Attadatthatthero pana cintesi
atk-s0502a:2608_3: – “satthā kira catumāsaccayena parinibbāyissati, ahañcamhi avītarāgo, satthari dharamāneyeva
atk-s0502a:2608_4: arahattatthāya vāyamissāmī”ti. So bhikkhūnaṃ santikaṃ na gacchati. Atha naṃ bhikkhū
atk-s0502a:2608_5: “kasmā, āvuso, tvaṃ neva amhākaṃ santikaṃ āgacchasi, na kiñci mantesī”ti vatvā satthu
atk-s0502a:2608_6: santikaṃ netvā “ayaṃ, bhante, evaṃ nāma karotī”ti ārocayiṃsu. So satthārāpi “kasmā
atk-s0502a:2608_7: evaṃ karosī”ti vutte “tumhe kira, bhante, catumāsaccayena parinibbāyissatha, ahaṃ
atk-s0502a:2608_8: tumhesu dharantesuyeva arahattappattiyā vāyamissāmī”ti. Satthā tassa sādhukāraṃ datvā,
atk-s0502a:2608_9: “bhikkhave, yassa mayi sineho atthi, tena attadatthena viya bhavituṃ vaṭṭati. Na
atk-s0502a:2608_10: hi gandhādīhi pūjentā maṃ pūjenti, dhammānudhammapaṭipattiyā pana maṃ pūjenti. Tasmā
atk-s0502a:2608_11: aññenapi attadatthasadiseneva bhavitabba”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2612_0: Tassattho – gihibhūtā tāva kākaṇikamattampi attano atthaṃ sahassamattenāpi parassa
atk-s0502a:2612_1: atthena na hāpaye. Kākaṇikamattenāpi hissa attadatthova khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ
atk-s0502a:2612_2: vā nipphādeyya, na parattho. Idaṃ pana evaṃ akathetvā kammaṭṭhānasīsena kathitaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2612_3: tasmā “attadatthaṃ na hāpemī”ti bhikkhunā nāma saṅghassa uppannaṃ cetiyapaṭisaṅkharaṇādikiccaṃ
atk-s0502a:2612_4: vā upajjhāyādivattaṃ vā na hāpetabbaṃ. Ābhisamācārikavattañhi pūrentoyeva ariyaphalādīni
atk-s0502a:2612_5: sacchikaroti, tasmā ayampi attadatthova. Yo pana accāraddhavipassako “ajja vā suve
atk-s0502a:2612_6: vā”ti paṭivedhaṃ patthayamāno vicarati, tena upajjhāyavattādīnipi hāpetvā attano
atk-s0502a:2612_7: kiccameva kātabbaṃ. Evarūpañhi attadatthamabhiññāya “ayaṃ me attano attho”ti sallakkhetvā,
atk-s0502a:2612_8: sadatthapasuto siyāti tasmiṃ sake atthe uyyuttapayutto bhaveyyāti.
atk-s0502a:2613: Desanāvasāne so thero arahatte patiṭṭhahi, sampattabhikkhūnampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:2619: Hīnaṃ dhammanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ daharabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2620_0: Aññataro kira thero daharabhikkhunā saddhiṃ pātova visākhāya gehaṃ agamāsi. Visākhāya
atk-s0502a:2620_1: gehe pañcasatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhuvayāgu niccapaññattā hoti. Thero tattha yāguṃ pivitvā
atk-s0502a:2620_2: daharabhikkhuṃ nisīdāpetvā sayaṃ aññaṃ gehaṃ agamāsi. Tena ca samayena visākhāya
atk-s0502a:2620_3: puttassa dhītā ayyikāya ṭhāne ṭhatvā bhikkhūnaṃ veyyāvaccaṃ karoti. Sā tassa daharassa
atk-s0502a:2620_4: udakaṃ parissāventī cāṭiyaṃ attano mukhanimittaṃ disvā hasi, daharopi taṃ oloketvā
atk-s0502a:2620_5: hasi. Sā taṃ hasamānaṃ disvā “chinnasīso hasatī”ti āha. Atha naṃ daharo “tvaṃ chinnasīsā,
atk-s0502a:2620_6: mātāpitaropi te chinnasīsā”ti akkosi. Sā rodamānā mahānase ayyikāya santikaṃ gantvā
atk-s0502a:2620_7: “kiṃ idaṃ, ammā”ti vutte tamatthaṃ ārocesi. Sā daharassa santikaṃ āgantvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:2620_8: mā kujjhi, na etaṃ chinnakesanakhassa chinnanivāsanapārupanassa majjhe chinnakapālaṃ
atk-s0502a:2620_9: ādāya bhikkhāya carantassa ayyassa agaruka”nti āha. Daharo āma, upāsike, tvaṃ mama
atk-s0502a:2620_10: chinnakesādibhāvaṃ jānāsi, imissā maṃ “chinnasīso”ti katvā akkosituṃ vaṭṭissatīti.
atk-s0502a:2620_11: Visākhā neva daharaṃ saññāpetuṃ asakkhi, napi dārikaṃ. Tasmiṃ khaṇe thero āgantvā
atk-s0502a:2620_12: “kimidaṃ upāsike”ti pucchitvā tamatthaṃ sutvā daharaṃ ovadanto āha – “apehi, āvuso,
atk-s0502a:2620_13: nāyaṃ chinnakesanakhavatthassa majjhe chinnakapālaṃ ādāya bhikkhāya carantassa akkoso,
atk-s0502a:2620_14: tuṇhī hohī”ti. Āma, bhante, kiṃ tumhe attano upaṭṭhāyikaṃ atajjetvā maṃ tajjetha,
atk-s0502a:2620_15: maṃ “chinnasīso”ti akkosituṃ vaṭṭissatīti. Tasmiṃ khaṇe satthā āgantvā “kiṃ ida”nti
atk-s0502a:2620_16: pucchi. Visākhā ādito paṭṭhāya taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi. Satthā tassa daharassa sotāpattiphalūpanissayaṃ
atk-s0502a:2620_17: disvā “mayā imaṃ daharaṃ anuvattituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā visākhaṃ āha – “kiṃ pana
atk-s0502a:2620_18: visākhe tava dārikāya chinnakesādimattakeneva mama sāvake chinnasīse katvā akkosituṃ
atk-s0502a:2620_19: vaṭṭatī”ti? Daharo tāvadeva uṭṭhāya añjaliṃ paggahetvā, “bhante, etaṃ pañhaṃ tumheva
atk-s0502a:2620_20: suṭṭhu jānātha, amhākaṃ upajjhāyo ca upāsikā ca suṭṭhu na jānantī”ti āha. Satthā
atk-s0502a:2620_21: daharassa attano anukulabhāvaṃ ñatvā “kāmaguṇaṃ ārabbha hasanabhāvo nāma hīno dhammo,
atk-s0502a:2620_22: hīnañca nāma dhammaṃ sevituṃ pamādena saddhiṃ saṃvasituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2622: “Hīnaṃ dhammaṃ na seveyya, pamādena na saṃvase;
atk-s0502a:2623: Micchādiṭṭhiṃ na seveyya, na siyā lokavaḍḍhano”ti.
atk-s0502a:2624_0: Tattha hīnaṃ dhammanti pañcakāmaguṇaṃ dhammaṃ. So hi hīno dhammo na antamaso oṭṭhagoṇādīhipi
atk-s0502a:2624_1: paṭisevitabbo. Hīnesu ca nirayādīsu ṭhānesu nibbattāpetīti hīno nāma, taṃ na seveyya.
atk-s0502a:2624_2: Pamādenāti sativossaggalakkhaṇena pamādenāpi na saṃvase. Na seveyyāti micchādiṭṭhimpi
atk-s0502a:2624_3: na gaṇheyya. Lokavaḍḍhanoti yo hi evaṃ karoti, so lokavaḍḍhano nāma hoti. Tasmā evaṃ
atk-s0502a:2625: Desanāvasāne so daharo sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:2628: Uttiṭṭheti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā nigrodhārāme viharanto pitaraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2629_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye satthā paṭhamagamanena kapilapuraṃ gantvā ñātīhi katapaccuggamano
atk-s0502a:2629_1: nigrodhārāmaṃ patvā ñātīnaṃ mānabhindanatthāya ākāse ratanacaṅkamaṃ māpetvā tattha
atk-s0502a:2629_2: caṅkamanto dhammaṃ desesi. Ñātī pasannacittā suddhodanamahārājānaṃ ādiṃ katvā vandiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2629_3: Tasmiṃ ñātisamāgame pokkharavassaṃ vassi. Taṃ ārabbha mahājanena kathāya samuṭṭhāpitāya
atk-s0502a:2629_4: “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi mayhaṃ ñātisamāgame pokkharavassaṃ vassiyevā”ti
atk-s0502a:2629_5: vatvā vessantarajātakaṃ kathesi. Dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pakkamantesu ñātīsu ekopi satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:2629_6: na nimantesi. Rājāpi “mayhaṃ putto mama gehaṃ anāgantvā kahaṃ gamissatī”ti animantetvāva
atk-s0502a:2629_7: agamāsi. Gantvā ca pana gehe vīsatiyā bhikkhusahassānaṃ yāguādīni paṭiyādāpetvā āsanāni
atk-s0502a:2629_8: paññāpesi. Punadivase satthā piṇḍāya pavisanto “kiṃ nu kho atītabuddhā pitu nagaraṃ
atk-s0502a:2629_9: patvā ujukameva ñātikulaṃ pavisiṃsu, udāhu paṭipāṭiyā piṇḍāya cariṃsū”ti āvajjento
atk-s0502a:2629_10: “paṭipāṭiyā cariṃsū”ti disvā paṭhamagehato paṭṭhāya piṇḍāya caranto pāyāsi. Rāhulamātā
atk-s0502a:2629_11: pāsādatale nisinnāva disvā taṃ pavattiṃ rañño ārocesi. Rājā sāṭakaṃ saṇṭhāpento vegena
atk-s0502a:2629_12: nikkhamitvā satthāraṃ vanditvā – “putta, kasmā maṃ nāsesi, ativiya te piṇḍāya carantena
atk-s0502a:2629_13: lajjā uppāditā, yuttaṃ nāma vo imasmiṃyeva nagare suvaṇṇasivikādīhi vicaritvā piṇḍāya
atk-s0502a:2629_14: carituṃ, kiṃ maṃ lajjāpesī”ti? “Nāhaṃ taṃ, mahārāja, lajjāpemi, attano pana kulavaṃsaṃ
atk-s0502a:2629_15: anuvattāmī”ti. “Kiṃ pana, tāta, piṇḍāya caritvā jīvanavaṃso mama vaṃso”ti? “Neso,
atk-s0502a:2629_16: mahārāja, tava vaṃso, mama paneso vaṃso. Anekāni hi buddhasahassāni piṇḍāya caritvāva
atk-s0502a:2629_17: jīviṃsū”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:2632: Dhammacārī sukhaṃ seti, asmiṃ loke paramhi ca.
atk-s0502a:2634: “Dhammaṃ care sucaritaṃ, na naṃ duccaritaṃ care;
atk-s0502a:2635: Dhammacārī sukhaṃ seti, asmiṃ loke paramhi cā”ti.
atk-s0502a:2636_0: Tattha uttiṭṭheti uṭṭhahitvā paresaṃ gharadvāre ṭhatvā gahetabbapiṇḍe. Nappamajjeyyāti
atk-s0502a:2636_1: piṇḍacārikavattañhi hāpetvā paṇītabhojanāni pariyesanto uttiṭṭhe pamajjati nāma,
atk-s0502a:2636_2: sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya caranto pana na pamajjati nāma. Evaṃ karonto uttiṭṭhe nappamajjeyya.
atk-s0502a:2636_3: Dhammanti anesanaṃ pahāya sapadānaṃ caranto tameva bhikkhācariyadhammaṃ sucaritaṃ
atk-s0502a:2636_4: care. Sukhaṃ setīti desanāmattametaṃ, evaṃ panetaṃ bhikkhācariyadhammaṃ caranto dhammacārī
atk-s0502a:2636_5: idha loke catūhi iriyāpathehi sukhaṃ viharatīti attho. Na naṃ duccaritanti vesiyādibhede
atk-s0502a:2636_6: agocare caranto bhikkhācariyadhammaṃ duccaritaṃ carati nāma. Evaṃ acaritvā dhammaṃ
atk-s0502a:2636_7: care sucaritaṃ, na naṃ duccaritaṃ care. Sesaṃ vuttatthameva.
atk-s0502a:2637: Desanāvasāne rājā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:2640: Yathā pubbuḷakanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto pañcasate vipassake bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2641_0: Te kira satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññaṃ pavisitvā ghaṭentā vāyamantā
atk-s0502a:2641_1: appavisesā “visesetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahessāmā”ti satthu santikaṃ āgacchantā antarāmagge
atk-s0502a:2641_2: marīcikammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāventāva āgamiṃsu. Tesaṃ vihāraṃ paviṭṭhakkhaṇeyeva devo vassi.
atk-s0502a:2641_3: Te tattha tattha pamukhesu ṭhatvā dhārāvegena uṭṭhahitvā bhijjante pubbaḷake disvā
atk-s0502a:2641_4: “ayampi attabhāvo uppajjitvā bhijjanatthena pubbuḷakasadisoyevā”ti ārammaṇaṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2641_5: Satthā gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnova te bhikkhū oloketvā tehi saddhiṃ kathento viya obhāsaṃ
atk-s0502a:2644: Evaṃ lokaṃ avekkhantaṃ, maccurājā na passatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2645_0: Tattha marīcikanti mayūkhaṃ. Te hi dūratova gehasaṇṭhānādivasena upaṭṭhitāpi upagacchantānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2645_1: agayhūpagā rittakā tucchakāva. Tasmā yathā uppajjitvā bhijjanatthena pubbuḷakaṃ rittatucchādibhāveneva
atk-s0502a:2645_2: passeyya, evaṃ khandhādilokaṃ avekkhantaṃ maccurājā na passatīti attho.
atk-s0502a:2646: Desanāvasāne te bhikkhū ṭhitaṭṭhāneyeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a:2649: Etha passathimaṃ lokanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto abhayarājakumāraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2650_0: Tassa kira paccantaṃ vūpasametvā āgatassa pitā bimbisāro tussitvā ekaṃ naccagītakusalaṃ
atk-s0502a:2650_1: nāṭakitthiṃ datvā sattāhaṃ rajjamadāsi. So sattāhaṃ gehā bahi anikkhantova rajjasiriṃ
atk-s0502a:2650_2: anubhavitvā aṭṭhame divase nadītitthaṃ gantvā nhatvā uyyānaṃ pavisitvā santatimahāmatto
atk-s0502a:2650_3: viya tassā itthiyā naccagītaṃ passanto nisīdi. Sāpi taṅkhaṇaññeva santatimahāmattassa
atk-s0502a:2650_4: nāṭakitthī viya satthakavātānaṃ vasena kālamakāsi. Kumāro tassā kālakiriyāya uppannasoko
atk-s0502a:2650_5: “na me imaṃ sokaṃ ṭhapetvā satthāraṃ añño nibbāpetuṃ sakkhissatī”ti satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā,
atk-s0502a:2650_6: “bhante, sokaṃ me nibbāpethā”ti āha. Satthā taṃ samassāsetvā “tayā hi, kumāra, imissā
atk-s0502a:2650_7: itthiyā evameva matakāle rodantena pavattitānaṃ assūnaṃ anamatagge saṃsāre pamāṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:2650_8: natthī”ti vatvā tāya desanāya sokassa tanubhāvaṃ ñatvā, “kumāra, mā soci, bālajanānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2653: Yattha bālā visīdanti, natthi saṅgo vijānata”nti.
atk-s0502a:2654_0: Tattha te passathāti rājakumārameva sandhāyāha. Imaṃ lokanti imaṃ khandhalokādisaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0502a:2654_1: attabhāvaṃ. Cittanti sattaratanādivicittaṃ rājarathaṃ viya vatthālaṅkārādicittitaṃ.
atk-s0502a:2654_2: Yattha bālāti yasmiṃ attabhāve bālā evaṃ visīdanti. Vijānatanti vijānantānaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2654_3: ettha rāgasaṅgādīsu ekopi saṅgo natthīti attho.
atk-s0502a:2655: Desanāvasāne rājakumāro sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:2658: Yo ca pubbeti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sammajjanattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2659_0: So kira pāto vā sāyaṃ vāti velaṃ pamāṇaṃ akatvā abhikkhaṇaṃ sammajjantova vicarati.
atk-s0502a:2659_1: So ekadivasaṃ sammajjaniṃ gahetvā divāṭṭhāne nisinnassa revatattherassa santikaṃ
atk-s0502a:2659_2: gantvā “ayaṃ mahākusīto janassa saddhādeyyaṃ bhuñjitvā āgantvā nisīdati, kiṃ nāmetassa
atk-s0502a:2659_3: sammajjaniṃ gahetvā ekaṃ ṭhānaṃ sammajjituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti āha. Thero “ovādamassa
atk-s0502a:2659_4: dassāmī”ti cintetvā ehāvusoti. Kiṃ, bhanteti? Gaccha nhatvā ehīti. So tathā akāsi.
atk-s0502a:2659_5: Atha naṃ thero ekamantaṃ nisīdāpetvā ovadanto āha – “āvuso, bhikkhunā nāma na sabbakālaṃ
atk-s0502a:2659_6: sammajjantena vicarituṃ vaṭṭati, pāto eva pana sammajjitvā piṇḍāya caritvā piṇḍapātapaṭikkantena
atk-s0502a:2659_7: āgantvā rattiṭṭhāne vā divāṭṭhāne vā nisinnena dvattiṃsākāraṃ sajjhāyitvā attabhāve
atk-s0502a:2659_8: khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapetvā sāyanhe uṭṭhāya sammajjituṃ vaṭṭati, niccakālaṃ asammajjitvā
atk-s0502a:2659_9: attanopi nāma okāso kātabbo”ti. So therassa ovāde ṭhatvā na cirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:2659_10: Taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ uklāpaṃ ahosi. Atha naṃ bhikkhū āhaṃsu – “āvuso sammajjanatthera,
atk-s0502a:2659_11: taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ uklāpaṃ kasmā na sammajjasī”ti? “Bhante, mayā pamādakāle evaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0502a:2659_12: idānāmhi appamatto”ti. Bhikkhū “ayaṃ thero aññaṃ byākarotī”ti satthu ārocesuṃ. Satthā
atk-s0502a:2659_13: “āma, bhikkhave, mama putto pubbe pamādakāle sammajjanto vicari, idāni pana maggaphalasukhena
atk-s0502a:2659_14: vītināmento na sammajjatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2661: “Yo ca pubbe pamajjitvā, pacchā so nappamajjati;
atk-s0502a:2662: Somaṃ lokaṃ pabhāseti, abbhā muttova candimā”ti.
atk-s0502a:2663_0: Tassattho – yo puggalo pubbe vattapaṭivattakaraṇena vā sajjhāyādīhi vā pamajjitvā
atk-s0502a:2663_1: pacchā maggaphalasukhena vītināmento nappamajjati, so abbhādīhi mutto candova okāsalokaṃ
atk-s0502a:2663_2: maggañāṇena imaṃ khandhādilokaṃ obhāseti, ekālokaṃ karotīti.
atk-s0502a:2667: Yassa pāpanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aṅgulimālattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi. Vatthu aṅgulimālasuttantavaseneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0502a:2668: Thero pana satthu santike pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Atha kho āyasmā aṅgulimālo rahogato paṭisallīno vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedī. Tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi –
atk-s0502a:2669: “Yo ca pubbe pamajjitvā, pacchā so nappamajjati;
atk-s0502a:2670: Somaṃ lokaṃ pabhāseti, abbhā muttova candimā”ti. –
atk-s0502a:2671_0: Ādinā nayena udānaṃ udānetvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbuto. Bhikkhū “kahaṃ
atk-s0502a:2671_1: nu kho, āvuso, thero uppanno”ti dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ? Satthā āgantvā
atk-s0502a:2671_2: “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā, “bhante, aṅgulimālattherassa
atk-s0502a:2671_3: nibbattaṭṭhānakathāyā”ti vutte “parinibbuto ca, bhikkhave, mama putto”ti. “Bhante,
atk-s0502a:2671_4: ettake manusse māretvā parinibbuto”ti? “Āma, bhikkhave, so pubbe ekaṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ
atk-s0502a:2671_5: alabhitvā ettakaṃ pāpamakāsi, pacchā pana kalyāṇamittapaccayaṃ labhitvā appamatto
atk-s0502a:2671_6: ahosi. Tenassa taṃ pāpakammaṃ kusalena pihita”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2674: Somaṃ lokaṃ pabhāseti, abbhā muttova candimā”ti.
atk-s0502a:2675: Tattha kusalenāti arahattamaggaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0502a:2679: Andhabhūtoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā aggāḷave cetiye viharanto ekaṃ pesakāradhītaraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2680_0: Ekadivasañhi āḷavivāsino satthari āḷaviṃ sampatte nimantetvā dānaṃ adaṃsu. Satthā
atk-s0502a:2680_1: bhattakiccāvasāne anumodanaṃ karonto “addhuvaṃ me jīvitaṃ, dhuvaṃ me maraṇaṃ, avassaṃ
atk-s0502a:2680_2: mayā maritabbameva, maraṇapariyosānaṃ me jīvitaṃ, jīvitameva aniyataṃ, maraṇaṃ niyatanti
atk-s0502a:2680_3: evaṃ maraṇassatiṃ bhāvetha. Yesañhi maraṇassati abhāvitā, te pacchime kāle āsīvisaṃ
atk-s0502a:2680_4: disvā bhītaadaṇḍapuriso viya santāsappattā bheravaravaṃ ravantā kālaṃ karonti. Yesaṃ
atk-s0502a:2680_5: pana maraṇassati bhāvitā, te dūratova āsīvisaṃ disvā daṇḍakena gahetvā chaḍḍetvā
atk-s0502a:2680_6: ṭhitapuriso viya pacchime kāle na santasanti, tasmā maraṇassati bhāvetabbā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:2680_7: Taṃ dhammadesanaṃ sutvā avasesajanā sakiccappasutāva ahesuṃ. Ekā pana soḷasavassuddesikā
atk-s0502a:2680_8: pesakāradhītā “aho buddhānaṃ kathā nāma acchariyā, mayā pana maraṇassatiṃ bhāvetuṃ
atk-s0502a:2680_9: vaṭṭatī”ti rattindivaṃ maraṇassatimeva bhāvesi. Satthāpi tato nikkhamitvā jetavanaṃ
atk-s0502a:2680_10: agamāsi. Sāpi kumārikā tīṇi vassāni maraṇassatiṃ bhāvesiyeva.
atk-s0502a:2681_0: Athekadivasaṃ satthā paccūsasamaye lokaṃ olokento taṃ kumārikaṃ attano ñāṇajālassa
atk-s0502a:2681_1: antopaviṭṭhaṃ disvā “kiṃ nu kho bhavissatī”ti upadhārento “imāya kumārikāya mama
atk-s0502a:2681_2: dhammadesanāya sutadivasato paṭṭhāya tīṇi vassāni maraṇassati bhāvitā, idānāhaṃ tattha
atk-s0502a:2681_3: gantvā imaṃ kumārikaṃ cattāro pañhe pucchitvā tāya vissajjentiyā catūsu ṭhānesu sādhukāraṃ
atk-s0502a:2681_4: datvā imaṃ gāthaṃ bhāsissāmi. Sā gāthāvasāne sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahissati, taṃ
atk-s0502a:2681_5: nissāya mahājanassāpi sātthikā dhammadesanā bhavissatī”ti ñatvā pañcasatabhikkhuparivāro
atk-s0502a:2681_6: jetavanā nikkhamitvā anupubbena aggāḷavavihāraṃ agamāsi. Āḷavivāsino “satthā āgato”ti
atk-s0502a:2681_7: sutvā taṃ vihāraṃ gantvā nimantayiṃsu. Tadā sāpi kumārikā satthu āgamanaṃ sutvā “āgato
atk-s0502a:2681_8: kira mayhaṃ pitā, sāmi, ācariyo puṇṇacandamukho mahāgotamabuddho”ti tuṭṭhamānasā
atk-s0502a:2681_9: “ito me tiṇṇaṃ saṃvaccharānaṃ matthake suvaṇṇavaṇṇo satthā diṭṭhapubbo, idānissa
atk-s0502a:2681_10: suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ sarīraṃ daṭṭhuṃ madhurojañca varadhammaṃ sotuṃ labhissāmī”ti cintesi.
atk-s0502a:2681_11: Pitā panassā sālaṃ gacchanto āha – “amma, parasantako me sāṭako āropito, tassa vidatthimattaṃ
atk-s0502a:2681_12: aniṭṭhitaṃ, taṃ ajja niṭṭhāpessāmi, sīghaṃ me tasaraṃ vaṭṭetvā āhareyyāsī”ti. Sā
atk-s0502a:2681_13: cintesi – “ahaṃ satthu dhammaṃ sotukāmā, pitā ca maṃ evaṃ āha. Kiṃ nu kho satthu
atk-s0502a:2681_14: dhammaṃ suṇāmi, udāhu pitu tasaraṃ vaṭṭetvā harāmī”ti? Athassā etadahosi “pitā maṃ
atk-s0502a:2681_15: tasare anāhariyamāne potheyyapi pahareyyapi, tasmā tasaraṃ vaṭṭetvā tassa datvā pacchā
atk-s0502a:2681_16: dhammaṃ sossāmī”ti pīṭhake nisīditvā tasaraṃ vaṭṭesi.
atk-s0502a:2682_0: Āḷavivāsinopi satthāraṃ parivisitvā pattaṃ gahetvā anumodanatthāya aṭṭhaṃsu. Satthā
atk-s0502a:2682_1: “yamahaṃ kuladhītaraṃ nissāya tiṃsayojanamaggaṃ āgato, sā ajjāpi okāsaṃ na labhati.
atk-s0502a:2682_2: Tāya okāse laddhe anumodanaṃ karissāmī”ti tuṇhībhūto ahosi. Evaṃ tuṇhībhūtampi satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:2682_3: sadevake loke koci kiñci vattuṃ na visahati. Sāpi kho kumārikā tasaraṃ vaṭṭetvā pacchiyaṃ
atk-s0502a:2682_4: ṭhapetvā pitu santikaṃ gacchamānā parisapariyante ṭhatvā satthāraṃ olokayamānāva
atk-s0502a:2682_5: aṭṭhāsi. Satthāpi gīvaṃ ukkhipitvā taṃ olokesi. Sā olokitākāreneva aññāsi – “satthā
atk-s0502a:2682_6: evarūpāya parisāya majjhe nisīditvāva maṃ olokento mamāgamanaṃ paccāsīsati, attano
atk-s0502a:2682_7: santikaṃ āgamanameva paccāsīsatī”ti. Sā tasarapacchiṃ ṭhapetvā satthu santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:2682_8: Kasmā pana naṃ satthā olokesīti? Evaṃ kirassa ahosi “esā ettova gacchamānā puthujjanakālakiriyaṃ
atk-s0502a:2682_9: katvā aniyatagatikā bhavissati, mama santikaṃ āgantvā gacchamānā sotāpattiphalaṃ
atk-s0502a:2682_10: patvā niyatagatikā hutvā tusitavimāne nibbattissatī”ti. Tassā kira taṃ divasaṃ maraṇato
atk-s0502a:2682_11: mutti nāma natthi. Sā olokitasaññāṇeneva satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā chabbaṇṇaraṃsīnaṃ
atk-s0502a:2682_12: antaraṃ pavisitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Tathārūpāya parisāya majjhe nisīditvā
atk-s0502a:2682_13: tuṇhībhūtaṃ satthāraṃ vanditvā ṭhitakkhaṇeyeva taṃ āha – “kumārike, kuto āgacchasī”ti?
atk-s0502a:2682_14: “Na jānāmi, bhante”ti. “Kattha gamissasī”ti? “Na jānāmi, bhante”ti. “Na jānāsī”ti?
atk-s0502a:2682_15: “Jānāmi, bhante”ti. “Jānāsī”ti? “Na jānāmi, bhante”ti. Iti naṃ satthā cattāro pañhe
atk-s0502a:2682_16: pucchi. Mahājano ujjhāyi – “ambho, passatha, ayaṃ pesakāradhītā sammāsambuddhena
atk-s0502a:2682_17: saddhiṃ icchiticchitaṃ kathesi, nanu nāma imāya ‘kuto āgacchasī’ti vutte ‘pesakāragehato’ti
atk-s0502a:2683_0: Satthā mahājanaṃ nissaddaṃ katvā, “kumārike, tvaṃ kuto āgacchasī”ti vutte “kasmā
atk-s0502a:2683_1: na jānāmīti vadesī”ti pucchi. Bhante, tumhe mama pesakāragehato āgatabhāvaṃ jānātha,
