atk-s0502a:2683_2: “kuto āgatāsī”ti pucchantā pana “kuto āgantvā idha nibbattāsī”ti pucchatha. Ahaṃ
atk-s0502a:2683_3: pana na jānāmi “kuto ca āgantvā idha nibbattāmhī”ti. Athassā satthā “sādhu sādhu,
atk-s0502a:2683_4: kumārike, mayā pucchitapañhova tayā vissajjito”ti paṭhamaṃ sādhukāraṃ datvā uttarimpi
atk-s0502a:2683_5: pucchi – “kattha gamissasīti puna puṭṭhā kasmā ‘na jānāmī’ti vadesī”ti? Bhante, tumhe
atk-s0502a:2683_6: maṃ tasarapacchiṃ gahetvā pesakārasālaṃ gacchantiṃ jānātha, “ito gantvā kattha nibbattissasī”ti
atk-s0502a:2683_7: pucchatha. Ahañca ito cutā na jānāmi “kattha gantvā nibbattissāmī”ti. Athassā satthā
atk-s0502a:2683_8: “mayā pucchitapañhoyeva tayā vissajjito”ti dutiyaṃ sādhukāraṃ datvā uttarimpi pucchi
atk-s0502a:2683_9: – “atha kasmā ‘na jānāsī’ti puṭṭhā ‘jānāmī’ti vadesī”ti? “Maraṇabhāvaṃ jānāmi, bhante,
atk-s0502a:2683_10: tasmā evaṃ vademī”ti. Athassā satthā “mayā pucchitapañhoyeva tayā vissajjito”ti tatiyaṃ
atk-s0502a:2683_11: sādhukāraṃ datvā uttarimpi pucchi – “atha kasmā ‘jānāsī’ti puṭṭhā ‘na jānāmī’ti vadesī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2683_12: Mama maraṇabhāvameva ahaṃ jānāmi, bhante, “rattindivapubbaṇhādīsu pana asukakāle
atk-s0502a:2683_13: nāma marissāmī”ti na jānāmi, tasmā evaṃ vademīti. Athassā satthā “mayā pucchitapañhoyeva
atk-s0502a:2683_14: tayā vissajjito”ti catutthaṃ sādhukāraṃ datvā parisaṃ āmantetvā “ettakaṃ nāma tumhe
atk-s0502a:2683_15: imāya kathitaṃ na jānātha, kevalaṃ ujjhāyatheva. Yesañhi paññācakkhu natthi, te andhā
atk-s0502a:2683_16: eva. Yesaṃ paññācakkhu atthi, te eva cakkhumanto”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2687_0: Tattha andhabhūto ayaṃ lokoti ayaṃ lokiyamahājano paññācakkhuno abhāvena andhabhūto.
atk-s0502a:2687_1: Tanuketthāti tanuko ettha, na bahu jano aniccādivasena vipassati. Jālamuttovāti yathā
atk-s0502a:2687_2: chekena sākuṇikena jālena ottharitvā gayhamānesu vaṭṭakesu kocideva jālato muccati.
atk-s0502a:2687_3: Sesā antojālameva pavisanti. Tathā maraṇajālena otthaṭesu sattesu bahū apāyagāmino
atk-s0502a:2687_4: honti, appo kocideva satto saggāya gacchati, sugatiṃ vā nibbānaṃ vā pāpuṇātīti attho.
atk-s0502a:2688: Desanāvasāne kumārikā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, mahājanassāpi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:2689_0: Sāpi tasarapacchiṃ gahetvā pitu santikaṃ agamāsi, sopi nisinnakova niddāyi. Tassā
atk-s0502a:2689_1: asallakkhetvāva tasarapacchiṃ upanāmentiyā tasarapacchi vemakoṭiyaṃ paṭihaññitvā
atk-s0502a:2689_2: saddaṃ kurumānā pati. So pabujjhitvā gahitanimitteneva vemakoṭiṃ ākaḍḍhi. Vemakoṭi
atk-s0502a:2689_3: gantvā taṃ kumārikaṃ ure pahari, sā tattheva kālaṃ katvā tusitabhavane nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:2689_4: Athassā pitā taṃ olokento sakalasarīrena lohitamakkhitena patitvā mataṃ addasa. Athassa
atk-s0502a:2689_5: mahāsoko uppajji. So “na mama sokaṃ añño nibbāpetuṃ sakkhissatī”ti rodanto satthu
atk-s0502a:2689_6: santikaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ ārocetvā, “bhante, sokaṃ me nibbāpethā”ti āha. Satthā taṃ
atk-s0502a:2689_7: samassāsetvā “mā soci, upāsaka. Anamataggasmiñhi saṃsāre tava evameva dhītu maraṇakāle
atk-s0502a:2689_8: paggharitaassu catunnaṃ mahāsamuddānaṃ udakato atirekatara”nti vatvā anamataggakathaṃ
atk-s0502a:2689_9: kathesi. So tanubhūtasoko satthāraṃ pabbajjaṃ yācitvā laddhūpasampado na cirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇīti.
atk-s0502a:2692: Haṃsādiccapatheti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto tiṃsa bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2693_0: Ekasmiñhi divase tiṃsamattā disāvāsikā bhikkhū satthāraṃ upasaṅkamiṃsu. Ānandatthero
atk-s0502a:2693_1: satthu vattakaraṇavelāya āgantvā te bhikkhū disvā “satthārā imehi saddhiṃ paṭisanthāre
atk-s0502a:2693_2: kate vattaṃ karissāmī”ti dvārakoṭṭhake aṭṭhāsi. Satthāpi tehi saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:2693_3: katvā tesaṃ sāraṇīyadhammaṃ kathesi. Taṃ sutvā te sabbepi arahattaṃ patvā uppatitvā
atk-s0502a:2693_4: ākāsena agamiṃsu. Ānandatthero tesu cirāyantesu satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:2693_5: idāneva tiṃsamattā bhikkhū āgatā, te kuhi”nti pucchi. “Gatā, ānandā”ti. “Katarena
atk-s0502a:2693_6: maggena, bhante”ti? “Ākāsenānandā”ti. “Kiṃ pana te, bhante, khīṇāsavā”ti? “Āmānanda,
atk-s0502a:2693_7: mama santike dhammaṃ sutvā arahattaṃ pattā”ti. Tasmiṃ pana khaṇe ākāsena haṃsā āgamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2693_8: Satthā “yassa kho panānanda, cattāro iddhipādā subhāvitā, so haṃsā viya ākāsena gacchatī”ti
atk-s0502a:2696: Nīyanti dhīrā lokamhā, jetvā māraṃ savāhini”nti.
atk-s0502a:2697_0: Tassattho – ime haṃsā ādiccapathe ākāse gacchanti. Yesaṃ iddhipādā subhāvitā, tepi
atk-s0502a:2697_1: ākāse yanti iddhiyā. Dhīrā paṇḍitā savāhiniṃ māraṃ jetvā imamhā vaṭṭalokā nīyanti,
atk-s0502a:2701: Ekaṃ dhammanti dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ciñcamāṇavikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2702_0: Paṭhamabodhiyañhi dasabalassa puthubhūtesu sāvakesu appamāṇesu devamanussesu ariyabhūmiṃ
atk-s0502a:2702_1: okkantesu patthaṭe guṇasamudaye mahālābhasakkāro udapādi. Titthiyā sūriyuggamane
atk-s0502a:2702_2: khajjopanakasadisā ahesuṃ hatalābhasakkārā. Te antaravīthiyaṃ ṭhatvā “kiṃ samaṇo
atk-s0502a:2702_3: gotamova buddho, mayampi buddhā, kiṃ tasseva dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ, amhākampi dinnaṃ
atk-s0502a:2702_4: mahapphalameva, amhākampi detha sakkarothā”ti evaṃ manusse viññāpentāpi lābhasakkāraṃ
atk-s0502a:2702_5: alabhitvā raho sannipatitvā “kena nu kho upāyena samaṇassa gotamassa manussānaṃ antare
atk-s0502a:2703_0: Tadā sāvatthiyaṃ ciñcamāṇavikā nāmekā paribbājikā uttamarūpadharā sobhaggappattā
atk-s0502a:2703_1: devaccharā viya. Assā sarīrato rasmiyo niccharanti. Atheko kharamantī evamāha – “ciñcamāṇavikaṃ
atk-s0502a:2703_2: paṭicca samaṇassa gotamassa avaṇṇaṃ uppādetvā lābhasakkāraṃ nāsessāmā”ti. Te “attheko
atk-s0502a:2703_3: upāyo”ti sampaṭicchiṃsu. Atha sā titthiyārāmaṃ gantvā vanditvā aṭṭhāsi, titthiyā
atk-s0502a:2703_4: tāya saddhiṃ na kathesuṃ. Sā “ko nu kho me doso”ti yāvatatiyaṃ “vandāmi, ayyā”ti
atk-s0502a:2703_5: vatvā, “ayyā, ko nu kho me doso, kiṃ mayā saddhiṃ na kathethā”ti āha. “Bhagini, samaṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:2703_6: gotamaṃ amhe viheṭhayantaṃ hatalābhasakkāre katvā vicarantaṃ na jānāsī”ti? “Na jānāmi,
atk-s0502a:2703_7: ayyā, kiṃ panettha mayā kattabba”nti. “Sace tvaṃ, bhagini, amhākaṃ sukhamicchasi,
atk-s0502a:2703_8: attānaṃ paṭicca samaṇassa gotamassa avaṇṇaṃ uppādetvā lābhasakkāraṃ nāsehī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2704_0: Sā “sādhu, ayyā, mayhaṃveso bhāro, mā cintayitthā”ti vatvā pakkamitvā itthimāyāsu
atk-s0502a:2704_1: kusalatāya tato paṭṭhāya sāvatthivāsīnaṃ dhammakathaṃ sutvā jetavanā nikkhamanasamaye
atk-s0502a:2704_2: indagopakavaṇṇaṃ paṭaṃ pārupitvā gandhamālādihatthā jetavanābhimukhī gacchati. “Imāya
atk-s0502a:2704_3: velāya kuhiṃ gacchasī”ti vutte, “kiṃ tumhākaṃ mama gamanaṭṭhānenā”ti vatvā jetavanasamīpe
atk-s0502a:2704_4: titthiyārāme vasitvā pātova “aggavandanaṃ vandissāmā”ti nagarā nikkhamante upāsakajane
atk-s0502a:2704_5: jetavanassa antovuṭṭhā viya hutvā nagaraṃ pavisati. “Kuhiṃ vuṭṭhāsī”ti vutte, “kiṃ
atk-s0502a:2704_6: tumhākaṃ mama vuṭṭhaṭṭhānenā”ti vatvā māsaddhamāsaccayena pucchiyamānā jetavane samaṇena
atk-s0502a:2704_7: gotamena saddhiṃ ekagandhakuṭiyā vuṭṭhāmhīti. Puthujjanānaṃ “saccaṃ nu kho etaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2704_8: no”ti kaṅkhaṃ uppādetvā temāsacatumāsaccayena pilotikāhi udaraṃ veṭhetvā gabbhinivaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:2704_9: dassetvā upari rattapaṭaṃ pārupitvā “samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ paṭicca gabbho uppanno”ti andhabāle
atk-s0502a:2704_10: saddahāpetvā aṭṭhanavamāsaccayena udare dārumaṇḍalikaṃ bandhitvā upari paṭaṃ pārupitvā
atk-s0502a:2704_11: hatthapādapiṭṭhiyo gohanukena koṭṭāpetvā ussade dassetvā kilantindriyā hutvā sāyanhasamaye
atk-s0502a:2704_12: tathāgate alaṅkatadhammāsane nisīditvā dhammaṃ desente dhammasabhaṃ gantvā tathāgatassa
atk-s0502a:2704_13: purato ṭhatvā, “mahāsamaṇa, mahājanassa tāva dhammaṃ desesi, madhuro te saddo, samphusitaṃ
atk-s0502a:2704_14: dantāvaraṇaṃ. Ahaṃ pana taṃ paṭicca gabbhaṃ labhitvā paripuṇṇagabbhā jātā, neva me
atk-s0502a:2704_15: sūtigharaṃ jānāsi, sappitelādīni sayaṃ akaronto upaṭṭhākānampi aññataraṃ kosalarājānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2704_16: vā anāthapiṇḍikaṃ vā visākhaṃ upāsikaṃ vā ‘imissā ciñcamāṇavikāya kattabbayuttakaṃ
atk-s0502a:2704_17: karohī’ti na vadesi, abhiramituṃyeva jānāsi, gabbhaparihāraṃ na jānāsī”ti gūthapiṇḍaṃ
atk-s0502a:2704_18: gahetvā candamaṇḍalaṃ dūsetuṃ vāyamantī viya parisamajjhe tathāgataṃ akkosi. Tathāgato
atk-s0502a:2704_19: dhammakathaṃ ṭhapetvā sīho viya abhinadanto, “bhagini, tayā kathitassa tathabhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:2704_20: vā vitathabhāvaṃ vā ahameva ca tvañca jānāmā”ti āha. “Āma, mahāsamaṇa, tayā ca mayā
atk-s0502a:2705_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe sakkassa āsanaṃ uṇhākāraṃ dassesi. So āvajjamāno “ciñcamāṇavikā tathāgataṃ
atk-s0502a:2705_1: abhūtena akkosatī”ti ñatvā “idaṃ vatthuṃ sodhessāmī”ti catūhi devaputtehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0502a:2705_2: āgami. Devaputtā mūsikapotakā hutvā dārumaṇḍalikassa bandhanarajjuke ekappahāreneva
atk-s0502a:2705_3: chindiṃsu, pārutapaṭaṃ vāto ukkhipi, dārumaṇḍalikaṃ patamānaṃ tassā pādapiṭṭhiyaṃ
atk-s0502a:2705_4: pati, ubho aggapādā chijjiṃsu. Manussā “dhī kāḷakaṇṇi, sammāsambuddhaṃ akkosī”ti
atk-s0502a:2705_5: sīse kheḷaṃ pātetvā leḍḍudaṇḍādihattā jetavanā nīhariṃsu. Athassā tathāgatassa cakkhupathaṃ
atk-s0502a:2705_6: atikkantakāle mahāpathavī bhijjitvā vivaramadāsi, avīcito aggijālā uṭṭhahi. Sā kuladattiyaṃ
atk-s0502a:2705_7: kambalaṃ pārupamānā viya gantvā avīcimhi nibbatti. Aññatitthiyānaṃ lābhasakkāro parihāyi,
atk-s0502a:2705_8: dasabalassa bhiyyosomattāya vaḍḍhi. Punadivase dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ,
atk-s0502a:2705_9: “āvuso, ciñcamāṇavikā evaṃ uḷāraguṇaṃ aggadakkhiṇeyyaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ abhūtena akkositvā
atk-s0502a:2705_10: mahāvināsaṃ pattā”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti
atk-s0502a:2705_11: pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi esā maṃ abhūtena
atk-s0502a:2709_0: Tadā kiresā mahāpadumakumārassa bodhisattassa mātu sapattī rañño aggamahesī hutvā
atk-s0502a:2709_1: mahāsattaṃ asaddhammena nimantetvā tassa manaṃ alabhitvā attanāva attani vippakāraṃ
atk-s0502a:2709_2: katvā gilānālayaṃ dassetvā “tava putto maṃ anicchantiṃ imaṃ vippakāraṃ pāpesī”ti
atk-s0502a:2709_3: rañño ārocesi. Rājā kuddho mahāsattaṃ corapapāte khipi. Atha naṃ pabbatakucchiyaṃ
atk-s0502a:2709_4: adhivatthā devatā paṭiggahetvā nāgarājassa phaṇagabbhe patiṭṭhapesi. Nāgarājā taṃ
atk-s0502a:2709_5: nāgabhavanaṃ netvā upaḍḍharajjena sammānesi. So tattha saṃvaccharaṃ vasitvā pabbajitukāmo
atk-s0502a:2709_6: himavantappadesaṃ patvā pabbajitvā jhānābhiññāyo nibbattesi. Atha naṃ eko vanacarako
atk-s0502a:2709_7: disvā rañño ārocesi. Rājā tassa santikaṃ gantvā katapaṭisanthāro sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ
atk-s0502a:2709_8: ñatvā mahāsattaṃ rajjena nimantetvā tena “mayhaṃ rajjena kiccaṃ natthi, tvaṃ pana
atk-s0502a:2709_9: dasa rājadhamme akopetvā agatigamanaṃ pahāya dhammena rajjaṃ kārehī”ti ovadito uṭṭhāyāsanā
atk-s0502a:2709_10: roditvā nagaraṃ gacchanto antarāmagge amacce pucchi – “ahaṃ kaṃ nissāya evaṃ ācārasampannena
atk-s0502a:2709_11: puttena viyogaṃ patto”ti? “Aggamahesiṃ nissāya, devā”ti. Rājā taṃ uddhaṃpādaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0502a:2709_12: corapapāte khipāpetvā nagaraṃ pavisitvā dhammena rajjaṃ kāresi. Tadā mahāpadumakumāro
atk-s0502a:2710: Satthā imamatthaṃ pakāsetvā, “bhikkhave, ekaṃ dhammañhi saccavacanaṃ pahāya musāvāde patiṭṭhitānaṃ vissaṭṭhaparalokānaṃ akattabbapāpakammaṃ nāma natthī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2714_0: Tattha ekaṃ dhammanti saccaṃ. Musāvādissāti yassa dasasu vacanesu ekampi saccaṃ natthi,
atk-s0502a:2714_1: evarūpassa musāvādino. Vitiṇṇaparalokassāti vissaṭṭhaparalokassa. Evarūpo hi manussasampattiṃ
atk-s0502a:2714_2: devasampattiṃ avasāne nibbānasampattinti imā tissopi sampattiyo na passati. Natthi
atk-s0502a:2714_3: pāpanti tassa evarūpassa idaṃ nāma pāpaṃ akattabbanti natthi.
atk-s0502a:2718: Na ve kadariyāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto asadisadānaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2719_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye satthā cārikaṃ caritvā pañcasatabhikkhuparivāro jetavanaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:2719_1: Rājā vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ nimantetvā punadivase āgantukadānaṃ sajjetvā “dānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2719_2: me passantū”ti nāgare pakkosi. Nāgarā āgantvā rañño dānaṃ disvā punadivase satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:2719_3: nimantetvā dānaṃ sajjetvā “amhākampi dānaṃ, devo, passatū”ti rañño pahiṇiṃsu. Rājā
atk-s0502a:2719_4: tesaṃ dānaṃ disvā “imehi mama dānato uttaritaraṃ kataṃ, puna dānaṃ karissāmī”ti punadivasepi
atk-s0502a:2719_5: dānaṃ sajjesi. Nāgarāpi taṃ disvā punadivase sajjayiṃsu. Evaṃ neva rājā nāgare parājetuṃ
atk-s0502a:2719_6: sakkoti, na nāgarā rājānaṃ. Atha chaṭṭhe vāre nāgarā sataguṇaṃ sahassaguṇaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0502a:2719_7: yathā na sakkā hoti “idaṃ nāma imesaṃ dāne natthī”ti vattuṃ, evaṃ dānaṃ sajjayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2719_8: Rājā taṃ disvā “sacāhaṃ imesaṃ dānato uttaritaraṃ kātuṃ na sakkhissāmi, kiṃ me jīvitenā”ti
atk-s0502a:2719_9: upāyaṃ cintento nipajji. Atha naṃ mallikā devī upasaṅkamitvā, “kasmā, mahārāja, evaṃ
atk-s0502a:2719_10: nipannosi, kena te indriyāni kilantāni viyā”ti pucchi. Rājā āha – “na dāni tvaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2719_11: devi, jānāsī”ti. “Na jānāmi, devā”ti. So tassā tamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:2720_0: Atha naṃ mallikā āha – “deva, mā cintayi, kahaṃ tayā pathavissaro rājā nāgarehi parājiyamāno
atk-s0502a:2720_1: diṭṭhapubbo vā sutapubbo vā, ahaṃ te dānaṃ saṃvidahissāmī”ti. Itissa asadisadānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2720_2: saṃvidahitukāmatāya evaṃ vatvā, mahārāja, sālakalyāṇipadarehi pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2720_3: anto āvaṭṭe nisīdanamaṇḍapaṃ kārehi, sesā bahiāvaṭṭe nisīdissanti. Pañca setacchattasatāni
atk-s0502a:2720_4: kārehi, tāni gahetvā pañcasatā hatthī pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ matthake dhārayamānā
atk-s0502a:2720_5: ṭhassanti. Aṭṭha vā dasa vā rattasuvaṇṇanāvāyo kārehi, tā maṇḍapamajjhe bhavissanti.
atk-s0502a:2720_6: Dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ antare ekekā khattiyadhītā nisīditvā gandhe pisissati,
atk-s0502a:2720_7: ekekā khattiyadhītā bījanaṃ ādāya dve dve bhikkhū bījamānā ṭhassati, sesā khattiyadhītaro
atk-s0502a:2720_8: pise pise gandhe haritvā suvaṇṇanāvāsu pakkhipissanti, tāsu ekaccā khattiyadhītaro
atk-s0502a:2720_9: nīluppalakalāpe gahetvā suvaṇṇanāvāsu pakkhittagandhe āloḷetvā vāsaṃ gāhāpessanti.
atk-s0502a:2720_10: Nāgarānañhineva khattiyadhītaro atthi, na setacchattāni, na hatthino ca. Imehi kāraṇehi
atk-s0502a:2720_11: nāgarā parājissanti, evaṃ karohi, mahārājāti. Rājā “sādhu, devi, kalyāṇaṃ te kathita”nti
atk-s0502a:2720_12: tāya kathitaniyāmena sabbaṃ kāresi. Ekassa pana bhikkhuno eko hatthi nappahosi. Atha
atk-s0502a:2720_13: rājā mallikaṃ āha – “bhadde, ekassa bhikkhuno eko hatthi nappahoti, kiṃ karissāmā”ti.
atk-s0502a:2720_14: “Kiṃ, deva, pañca hatthisatāni natthī”ti? “Atthi, devi, avasesā duṭṭhahatthino, te
atk-s0502a:2720_15: bhikkhū disvāva verambhavātā viya caṇḍā hontī”ti. “Deva, ahaṃ ekassa duṭṭhahatthipotakassa
atk-s0502a:2720_16: chattaṃ gahetvā tiṭṭhanaṭṭhānaṃ jānāmī”ti. “Kattha naṃ ṭhapessāmā”ti? “Ayyassa aṅgulimālassa
atk-s0502a:2720_17: santike”ti. Rājā tathā kāresi. Hatthipotako vāladhiṃ antarasatthimhi pakkhipitvā
atk-s0502a:2720_18: ubho kaṇṇe pātetvā akkhīni nimiletvā aṭṭhāsi. Mahājano “evarūpassa nāma caṇḍahatthino
atk-s0502a:2721_0: Rājā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ parivisitvā satthāraṃ vanditvā, “bhante, yaṃ
atk-s0502a:2721_1: imasmiṃ dānagge kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ vā akappiyabhaṇḍaṃ vā, sabbaṃ taṃ tumhākameva dammī”ti
atk-s0502a:2721_2: āha. Tasmiṃ pana dāne ekadivaseneva pariccattaṃ cuddasakoṭidhanaṃ hoti. Satthu pana
atk-s0502a:2721_3: setacchattaṃ nisīdanapallaṅko ādhārako pādapīṭhikāti cattāri anagghāneva. Puna evarūpaṃ
atk-s0502a:2721_4: katvā buddhānaṃ dānaṃ nāma dātuṃ samattho nāhosi, teneva taṃ “asadisadāna”nti paññāyi.
atk-s0502a:2721_5: Taṃ kira sabbabuddhānaṃ ekavāraṃ hotiyeva, sabbesaṃ pana itthīyeva saṃvidahati. Rañño
atk-s0502a:2721_6: pana kāḷo ca juṇho cāti dve amaccā ahesuṃ. Tesu kāḷo cintesi – “aho rājakulassa parihāni,
atk-s0502a:2721_7: ekadivaseneva cuddasakoṭidhanaṃ khayaṃ gacchati, ime imaṃ dānaṃ bhuñjitvā gantvā
atk-s0502a:2721_8: nipannā niddāyissanti, aho naṭṭhaṃ rājakula”nti. Juṇho cintesi – “aho rañño dānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2721_9: sudinnaṃ. Na hi sakkā rājabhāve aṭṭhitena evarūpaṃ dānaṃ dātuṃ, sabbasattānaṃ pattiṃ
atk-s0502a:2721_10: adento nāma natthi, ahaṃ panidaṃ dānaṃ anumodāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2722_0: Satthu bhattakiccāvasāne rājā anumodanatthāya pattaṃ gaṇhi. Satthā cintesi – “raññā
atk-s0502a:2722_1: mahoghaṃ pavattentena viya mahādānaṃ dinnaṃ, asakkhi nu kho mahājano cittaṃ pasādetuṃ,
atk-s0502a:2722_2: udāhu no”ti. So tesaṃ amaccānaṃ cittācāraṃ ñatvā “sace rañño dānānucchavikaṃ anumodanaṃ
atk-s0502a:2722_3: karissāmi, kāḷassa muddhā sattadhā phalissati, juṇho sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahissatī”ti
atk-s0502a:2722_4: ñatvā kāḷe anukampaṃ paṭicca evarūpaṃ dānaṃ datvā ṭhitassa rañño catuppadikaṃ gāthameva
atk-s0502a:2722_5: vatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ gato. Bhikkhū aṅgulimālaṃ pucchiṃsu – “na kiṃ nu kho, āvuso,
atk-s0502a:2722_6: duṭṭhahatthiṃ chattaṃ dhāretvā ṭhitaṃ disvā bhāyī”ti? “Na bhāyiṃ, āvuso”ti. Te satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:2722_7: upasaṅkamitvā āhaṃsu – “aṅgulimālo, bhante, aññaṃ byākarosī”ti. Satthā “na, bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a:2722_8: aṅgulimālo bhāyati. Khīṇāsavausabhānañhi antare jeṭṭhakausabhā mama puttasadisā bhikkhū
atk-s0502a:2722_9: na bhāyantī”ti vatvā brāhmaṇavagge imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2724: Anejaṃ nhātakaṃ buddhaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇa”nti. ;
atk-s0502a:2725_0: Rājāpi domanassappatto “evarūpāya nāma parisāya dānaṃ datvā ṭhitassa mayhaṃ anucchavikaṃ
atk-s0502a:2725_1: anumodanaṃ akatvā gāthameva vatvā satthā uṭṭhāyāsanā gato. Mayā satthu anucchavikaṃ
atk-s0502a:2725_2: dānaṃ akatvā ananucchavikaṃ kataṃ bhavissati, kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ adatvā akappiyabhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0502a:2725_3: vā dinnaṃ bhavissati, satthārā me kupitena bhavitabbaṃ. Evañhi asadisadānaṃ nāma,
atk-s0502a:2725_4: dānānurūpaṃ anumodanaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā etadavoca
atk-s0502a:2725_5: – “kiṃ nu kho me, bhante, dātabbayuttakaṃ dānaṃ na dinnaṃ, udāhu dānānurūpaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0502a:2725_6: adatvā akappiyabhaṇḍameva dinna”nti. “Kimetaṃ, mahārājā”ti? “Na me tumhehi dānānucchavikā
atk-s0502a:2725_7: anumodanā katā”ti? “Mahārāja, anucchavikameva te dānaṃ dinnaṃ. Etañhi asadisadānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2725_8: nāma, ekassa buddhassa ekavārameva sakkā dātuṃ, puna evarūpaṃ nāma dānaṃ duddada”nti.
atk-s0502a:2725_9: “Atha kasmā, bhante, me dānānurūpaṃ anumodanaṃ na karitthā”ti? “Parisāya asuddhattā,
atk-s0502a:2725_10: mahārājā”ti. “Ko nu kho, bhante, parisāya doso”ti? Athassa satthā dvinnampi amaccānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2725_11: cittācāraṃ ārocetvā kāḷe anukampaṃ paṭicca anumodanāya akatabhāvaṃ ācikkhi. Rājā
atk-s0502a:2725_12: “saccaṃ kira te, kāḷa, evaṃ cintita”nti pucchitvā “sacca”nti vutte “tava santakaṃ
atk-s0502a:2725_13: aggahetvā mama puttadārehi saddhiṃ mayi attano santakaṃ dente tuyhaṃ kā pīḷā. Gaccha,
atk-s0502a:2725_14: bho, yaṃ te mayā dinnaṃ, taṃ dinnameva hotu, raṭṭhato pana me nikkhamā”ti taṃ raṭṭhā
atk-s0502a:2725_15: nīharitvā juṇhaṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira te evaṃ cintita”nti pucchitvā “sacca”nti
atk-s0502a:2725_16: vutte, “sādhu, mātula, pasannosmi, tvaṃ mama parijanaṃ gahetvā mayā dinnaniyāmeneva
atk-s0502a:2725_17: satta divasāni dānaṃ dehī”ti sattāhaṃ rajjaṃ niyyādetvā satthāraṃ āha – “passatha,
atk-s0502a:2725_18: bhante, bālassa karaṇaṃ, mayā evaṃ dinnadāne pahāramadāsī”ti. Satthā “āma, mahārāja,
atk-s0502a:2725_19: bālā nāma parassa dānaṃ anabhinanditvā duggatiparāyaṇā honti, dhīrā pana paresampi
atk-s0502a:2725_20: dānaṃ anumoditvā saggaparāyaṇā eva hontī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2727: “Na ve kadariyā devalokaṃ vajanti, bālā have nappasaṃsanti dānaṃ;
atk-s0502a:2728: Dhīro ca dānaṃ anumodamāno, teneva so hoti sukhī paratthā”ti.
atk-s0502a:2729_0: Tattha kadariyāti thaddhamaccharino. Bālāti idhalokaparalokaṃ ajānanakā. Dhīroti
atk-s0502a:2729_1: paṇḍito. Sukhī paratthāti teneva so dānānumodanapuññena paraloke dibbasampattiṃ anubhavamāno sukhī hotīti.
atk-s0502a:2730: Desanāvasāne juṇho sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattaparisāyapi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosi, juṇhopi sotāpanno hutvā sattāhaṃ raññā dinnaniyāmeneva dānaṃ adāsīti.
atk-s0502a:2733: Pathabyā ekarajjenāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kālaṃ nāma anāthapiṇḍikassa puttaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2734_0: So kira tathāvidhassa saddhāsampannassa seṭṭhino putto hutvā neva satthu santikaṃ
atk-s0502a:2734_1: gantuṃ, na gehaṃ āgatakāle daṭṭhuṃ, na dhammaṃ sotuṃ, na saṅghassa veyyāvaccaṃ kātuṃ
atk-s0502a:2734_2: icchati. Pitarā “mā evaṃ, tāta, karī”ti vuttopi tassa vacanaṃ na suṇāti. Athassa
atk-s0502a:2734_3: pitā cintesi – “ayaṃ evarūpaṃ diṭṭhiṃ gahetvā vicaranto avīciparāyaṇo bhavissati,
atk-s0502a:2734_4: na kho panetaṃ patirūpaṃ, yaṃ mayi passante mama putto nirayaṃ gaccheyya. Imasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:2734_5: kho pana loke dhanadānena abhijjanakasatto nāma natthi, dhanena naṃ bhindissāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2734_6: Atha naṃ āha – “tāta, uposathiko hutvā vihāraṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā ehi, kahāpaṇasataṃ
atk-s0502a:2734_7: te dassāmī”ti. Dassatha, tātāti. Dassāmi, puttāti. So yāvatatiyaṃ paṭiññaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0502a:2734_8: uposathiko hutvā vihāraṃ agamāsi. Dhammassavanena panassa kiccaṃ natthi, yathāphāsukaṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a:2734_9: sayitvā pātova gehaṃ agamāsi. Athassa pitā “putto me uposathiko ahosi, sīghamassa
atk-s0502a:2734_10: yāguādīni āharathā”ti vatvā dāpesi. So “kahāpaṇe aggahetvā na bhuñjissāmī”ti āhaṭāhaṭaṃ
atk-s0502a:2734_11: paṭikkhipi. Athassa pitā pīḷaṃ asahanto kahāpaṇabhaṇḍaṃ dāpesi. So taṃ hatthena gahetvāva āhāraṃ paribhuñji.
atk-s0502a:2735_0: Atha naṃ punadivase seṭṭhi, “tāta, kahāpaṇasahassaṃ te dassāmi, satthu purato ṭhatvā
atk-s0502a:2735_1: ekaṃ dhammapadaṃ uggaṇhitvā āgaccheyyāsī”ti pesesi. Sopi vihāraṃ gantvā satthu purato
atk-s0502a:2735_2: ṭhatvāva ekameva padaṃ uggaṇhitvā palāyitukāmo ahosi. Athassa satthā asallakkhaṇākāraṃ
atk-s0502a:2735_3: akāsi. So taṃ padaṃ asallakkhetvā uparipadaṃ uggaṇhissāmīti ṭhatvā assosiyeva. Uggaṇhissāmīti
atk-s0502a:2735_4: suṇantova kira sakkaccaṃ suṇāti nāma. Evañca kira suṇantānaṃ dhammo sotāpattimaggādayo
atk-s0502a:2735_5: deti. Sopi uggaṇhissāmīti suṇāti, satthāpissa asallakkhaṇākāraṃ karoti. So “uparipadaṃ
atk-s0502a:2736_0: So punadivase buddhappamukhena bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃyeva sāvatthiṃ pāvisi. Mahāseṭṭhi
atk-s0502a:2736_1: taṃ disvā “ajja mama puttassa ākāro ruccatī”ti cintesi. Tassapi etadahosi – “aho
atk-s0502a:2736_2: vata me pitā ajja satthu santike kahāpaṇe na dadeyya, kahāpaṇakāraṇā mayhaṃ uposathikabhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:2736_3: paṭicchādeyyā”ti. Satthā panassa hiyyova kahāpaṇassa kāraṇā uposathikabhāvaṃ aññāsi.
atk-s0502a:2736_4: Mahāseṭṭhi, buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa yāguṃ dāpetvā puttassapi dāpesi. So
atk-s0502a:2736_5: nisīditvā tuṇhībhūtova yāguṃ pivi, khādanīyaṃ khādi, bhattaṃ bhuñji. Mahāseṭṭhi satthu
atk-s0502a:2736_6: bhattakiccāvasāne puttassa purato sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ ṭhapāpetvā, “tāta, mayā te ‘sahassaṃ
atk-s0502a:2736_7: dassāmī’ti vatvā uposathaṃ samādāpetvā vihāraṃ pahito. Idaṃ te sahassa”nti āha. So
atk-s0502a:2736_8: satthu purato kahāpaṇe diyyamāne disvā lajjanto “alaṃ me kahāpaṇehī”ti vatvā, “gaṇha,
atk-s0502a:2736_9: tātā”ti vuccamānopi na gaṇhi. Athassa pitā satthāraṃ vanditvā, “bhante, ajja me puttassa
atk-s0502a:2736_10: ākāro ruccatī”ti vatvā “kiṃ, mahāseṭṭhī”ti vutte “mayā esa purimadivase ‘kahāpaṇasataṃ
atk-s0502a:2736_11: te dassāmī’ti vatvā vihāraṃ pesito. Punadivase kahāpaṇe aggahetvā bhuñjituṃ na icchi,
atk-s0502a:2736_12: ajja pana diyyamānepi kahāpaṇe na icchatī”ti āha. Satthā “āma, mahāseṭṭhi, ajja tava
atk-s0502a:2740_0: Tattha pathabyā ekarajjenāti cakkavattirajjena. Saggassa gamanena vāti chabbīsatividhassa
atk-s0502a:2740_1: saggassa adhigamanena. Sabbalokādhipaccenāti na ekasmiṃ ettake loke nāgasupaṇṇavemānikapetehi
atk-s0502a:2740_2: saddhiṃ, sabbasmiṃ loke ādhipaccena. Sotāpattiphalaṃ varanti yasmā ettake ṭhāne rajjaṃ
atk-s0502a:2740_3: kāretvāpi nirayādīhi amuttova hoti, sotāpanno pana pihitāpāyadvāro hutvā sabbadubbalopi
atk-s0502a:2740_4: aṭṭhame bhave na nibbattati, tasmā sotāpattiphalameva varaṃ uttamanti attho.
atk-s0502a:2747: Yassa jitanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā bodhimaṇḍe viharanto māradhītaro ārabbha kathesi. Desanaṃ pana sāvatthiyaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā puna kururaṭṭhe māgaṇḍiyabrāhmaṇassa kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2748_0: Kururaṭṭhe kira māgaṇḍiyabrāhmaṇassa dhītā māgaṇḍiyāyeva nāma ahosi uttamarūpadharā.
atk-s0502a:2748_1: Taṃ patthayamānā anekabrāhmaṇamahāsālā ceva khattiyamahāsālā ca “dhītaraṃ no detū”ti
atk-s0502a:2748_2: māgaṇḍiyassa pahiṇiṃsu. Sopi “na tumhe mayhaṃ dhītu anucchavikā”ti sabbe paṭikkhipateva.
atk-s0502a:2748_3: Athekadivasaṃ satthā paccūsasamaye lokaṃ volokento attano ñāṇajālassa anto paviṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0502a:2748_4: māgaṇḍiyabrāhmaṇaṃ disvā “kiṃ nu kho bhavissatī”ti upadhārento brāhmaṇassa ca brāhmaṇiyā
atk-s0502a:2748_5: ca tiṇṇaṃ maggaphalānaṃ upanissayaṃ addasa. Brāhmaṇopi bahigāme nibaddhaṃ aggiṃ paricarati.
atk-s0502a:2748_6: Satthā pātova pattacīvaramādāya taṃ ṭhānaṃ agamāsi. Brāhmaṇo satthu rūpasiriṃ olokento
atk-s0502a:2748_7: “imasmiṃ loke iminā sadiso puriso nāma natthi, ayaṃ mayhaṃ dhītu anucchaviko, imassa
atk-s0502a:2748_8: me dhītaraṃ dassāmā”ti cintetvā satthāraṃ āha – “samaṇa, mama ekā dhītā atthi, ahaṃ
atk-s0502a:2748_9: tassā anucchavikaṃ purisaṃ apassanto taṃ na kassaci adāsiṃ, tvaṃ panassā anucchaviko,
atk-s0502a:2748_10: ahaṃ te dhītaraṃ pādaparicārikaṃ katvā dātukāmo, yāva naṃ ānemi, tāva idheva tiṭṭhāhī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2748_11: Satthā tassa kathaṃ sutvā neva abhinandi, na paṭikkosi.
atk-s0502a:2749_0: Brāhmaṇopi gehaṃ gantvā brāhmaṇiṃ āha – “bhoti, ajja me dhītu anucchaviko puriso
atk-s0502a:2749_1: diṭṭho, tassa naṃ dassāmā”ti dhītaraṃ alaṅkārāpetvā ādāya brāhmaṇiyā saddhiṃ taṃ
atk-s0502a:2749_2: ṭhānaṃ agamāsi. Mahājanopi kutūhalajāto nikkhami. Satthā brāhmaṇena vuttaṭṭhāne aṭṭhatvā
atk-s0502a:2749_3: tattha padacetiyaṃ dassetvā aññasmiṃ ṭhāne aṭṭhāsi. Buddhānaṃ kira padacetiyaṃ “idaṃ
atk-s0502a:2749_4: asuko nāma passatū”ti adhiṭṭhahitvā akkantaṭṭhāneyeva paññāyati, sesaṭṭhāne taṃ passanto
atk-s0502a:2749_5: nāma natthi. Brāhmaṇo attanā saddhiṃ gacchamānāya brāhmaṇiyā “kahaṃ so”ti puṭṭho
atk-s0502a:2749_6: “imasmiṃ ṭhāne tiṭṭhāhīti taṃ avaca”nti olokento padavalañjaṃ disvā “idamassa pada”nti
atk-s0502a:2749_7: dassesi. Sā lakkhaṇamantakusalatāya “na idaṃ, brāhmaṇa, kāmabhogino pada”nti vatvā
atk-s0502a:2749_8: brāhmaṇena, “bhoti, tvaṃ udakapātimhi susumāraṃ passasi, mayā so samaṇo diṭṭho ‘dhītaraṃ
atk-s0502a:2749_9: te dassāmī’ti vutto, tenāpi adhivāsita”nti vutte, “brāhmaṇa, kiñcāpi tvaṃ evaṃ vadesi,
atk-s0502a:2749_10: idaṃ pana nikkilesasseva pada”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2754_0: Atha naṃ brāhmaṇo, “bhoti, mā viravi, tuṇhībhūtāva ehī”ti gacchanto satthāraṃ disvā
atk-s0502a:2754_1: “ayaṃ so puriso”ti tassā dassetvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “samaṇa, dhītaraṃ te dassāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:2754_2: āha. Satthā “na me tava dhītāya attho”ti avatvā, “brāhmaṇa, ekaṃ te kāraṇaṃ kathessāmi,
atk-s0502a:2754_3: suṇissasī”ti vatvā “kathehi, bho samaṇa, suṇissāmī”ti vutte abhinikkhamanato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0502a:2755_0: Tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepakathā – mahāsatto rajjasiriṃ pahāya kaṇṭakaṃ āruyha channasahāyo
atk-s0502a:2755_1: abhinikkhamanto nagaradvāre ṭhitena mārena “siddhattha, nivatta, ito te sattame divase
atk-s0502a:2755_2: cakkaratanaṃ pātubhavissatī”ti vutte, “ahametaṃ, māra, jānāmi, na me tenattho”ti
atk-s0502a:2755_3: āha. Atha kimatthāya nikkhamasīti? Sabbaññutaññāṇatthāyāti. “Tena hi sace ajjato
atk-s0502a:2755_4: paṭṭhāya kāmavitakkādīnaṃ ekampi vitakkaṃ vitakkessasi, jānissāmi te kattabba”nti
atk-s0502a:2755_5: āha. So tato paṭṭhāya otārāpekkho satta vassāni mahāsattaṃ anubandhi.
atk-s0502a:2756_0: Satthāpi chabbassāni dukkarakārikaṃ caritvā paccattapurisakāraṃ nissāya bodhimūle
atk-s0502a:2756_1: sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhitvā vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedayamāno pañcamasattāhe ajapālanigrodhamūle
atk-s0502a:2756_2: nisīdi. Tasmiṃ samaye māro “ahaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ anubandhitvā otārāpekkhopi imassa
atk-s0502a:2756_3: kiñci khalitaṃ nāddasaṃ, atikkanto idāni esa mama visaya”nti domanassappatto mahāmagge
atk-s0502a:2756_4: nisīdi. Athassa taṇhā aratī ragāti imā tisso dhītaro “pitā no na paññāyati, kahaṃ
atk-s0502a:2756_5: nu kho etarahī”ti olokayamānā taṃ tathā nisinnaṃ disvā upasaṅkamitvā “kasmā, tāta,
atk-s0502a:2756_6: dukkhī dummanosī”ti pucchiṃsu. So tāsaṃ tamatthaṃ ārocesi. Atha naṃ tā āhaṃsu – “tāta,
atk-s0502a:2756_7: mā cintayi, mayaṃ taṃ attano vase katvā ānessāmā”ti. “Na sakkā ammā, esa kenaci vase
atk-s0502a:2756_8: kātunti. “Tāta, mayaṃ itthiyo nāma idāneva naṃ rāgapāsādīhi bandhitvā ānessāma, tumhe
atk-s0502a:2756_9: mā cintayitthā”ti satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā “pāde te, samaṇa, paricāremā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2756_10: Satthā neva tāsaṃ vacanaṃ manasākāsi, na akkhīni ummīletvā olokesi.
atk-s0502a:2757_0: Puna māradhītaro “uccāvacā kho purisānaṃ adhippāyā, kesañci kumārikāsu pemaṃ hoti,
atk-s0502a:2757_1: kesañci paṭhamavaye ṭhitāsu, kesañci majjhimavaye ṭhitāsu, kesañci pacchimavaye ṭhitāsu,
atk-s0502a:2757_2: nānappakārehi taṃ palobhessāmā”ti ekekā kumārikavaṇṇādivasena sataṃ sataṃ attabhāve
atk-s0502a:2757_3: abhinimminitvā kumāriyo, avijātā, sakiṃ vijātā, duvijātā, majjhimitthiyo, mahallakitthiyo
atk-s0502a:2757_4: ca hutvā chakkhattuṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “pāde te, samaṇa, paricāremā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2757_5: Tampi bhagavā na manasākāsi yathā taṃ anuttare upadhisaṅkhaye vimuttoti. Atha satthā
atk-s0502a:2757_6: ettakenapi tā anugacchantiyo “apetha, kiṃ disvā evaṃ vāyamatha, evarūpaṃ nāma vītarāgānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2757_7: purato kātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Tathāgatassa pana rāgādayo pahīnā. Kena taṃ kāraṇena attano
atk-s0502a:2757_8: vasaṃ nessathā”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:2768_0: Tattha yassa jitaṃ nāvajīyatīti yassa sammāsambuddhassa tena tena maggena jitaṃ rāgādikilesajātaṃ
atk-s0502a:2768_1: puna asamudācaraṇato nāvajīyati, dujjitaṃ nāma na hoti. Noyātīti na uyyāti, yassa
atk-s0502a:2768_2: jitaṃ kilesajātaṃ rāgādīsu koci eko kilesopi loke pacchato vattī nāma na hoti, nānubandhatīti
atk-s0502a:2768_3: attho. Anantagocaranti anantārammaṇassa sabbaññutaññāṇassa vasena apariyanta gocaraṃ.
atk-s0502a:2768_4: Kena padenāti yassa hi rāgapadādīsu ekapadampi atthi, taṃ tumhe tena padena nessatha.
atk-s0502a:2768_5: Buddhassa pana ekapadampi natthi, taṃ apadaṃ buddhaṃ tumhe kena padena nessatha.
atk-s0502a:2769_0: Dutiyagāthāya taṇhā nāmesā saṃsibbitapariyonandhanaṭṭhena jālamassā atthītipi jālakārikātipi
atk-s0502a:2769_1: jālūpamātipi jālinī. Rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu visattatāya visattamanatāya visāharatāya
atk-s0502a:2769_2: visapupphatāya visaphalatāya visaparibhogatāya visattikā. Sā evarūpā taṇhā yassa
atk-s0502a:2769_3: kuhiñci bhave netuṃ natthi, taṃ tumhe apadaṃ buddhaṃ kena padena nessathāti attho.
atk-s0502a:2770: Desanāvasāne bahūnaṃ devatānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Māradhītaropi tattheva antaradhāyiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2771_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā, “māgaṇḍiya, ahaṃ pubbe imā tisso māradhītaro
atk-s0502a:2771_1: addasaṃ semhādīhi apalibuddhena suvaṇṇakkhandhasadisena attabhāvena samannāgatā,
atk-s0502a:2771_2: tadāpi methunasmiṃ chando nāhosiyeva. Tava dhītu sarīraṃ dvattiṃsākārakuṇapaparipūraṃ
atk-s0502a:2771_3: bahivicitto viya asucighaṭo. Sace hi mama pādo asucimakkhito bhaveyya, ayañca ummāraṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a:2771_4: tiṭṭheyya, tathāpissā sarīre ahaṃ pāde na phuseyya”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2779: Ye jhānapasutā dhīrāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā saṅkassanagaradvāre bahū devamanusse ārabbha kathesi. Desanā pana rājagahe samuṭṭhitā.
atk-s0502a:2780_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye rājagahaseṭṭhi parissayamocanatthañceva pamādena galitānaṃ ābharaṇādīnaṃ
atk-s0502a:2780_1: rakkhaṇatthañca jālakaraṇḍakaṃ parikkhipāpetvā gaṅgāya udakakīḷaṃ kīḷi. Atheko rattacandanarukkho
atk-s0502a:2780_2: gaṅgāya uparitīre jāto gaṅgodakena dhotamūlo patitvā tattha tattha pāsāṇesu saṃbhajjamāno
atk-s0502a:2780_3: vippakiri. Tato ekā ghaṭappamāṇā ghaṭikā pāsāṇehi ghaṃsiyamānā udakaūmīhi pothiyamānā
atk-s0502a:2780_4: maṭṭhā hutvā anupubbena vuyhamānā sevālapariyonaddhā āgantvā tassa jāle laggi. Seṭṭhi
atk-s0502a:2780_5: “kimeta”nti vatvā “rukkhaghaṭikā”ti sutvā taṃ āharāpetvā “kiṃ nāmeta”nti upadhāraṇatthaṃ
atk-s0502a:2780_6: vāsikaṇṇena tacchāpesi. Tāvadeva alattakavaṇṇaṃ rattacandanaṃ paññāyi. Seṭṭhi pana
atk-s0502a:2780_7: neva sammādiṭṭhi na micchādiṭṭhi, majjhattadhātuko. So cintesi – “mayhaṃ gehe rattacandanaṃ
atk-s0502a:2780_8: bahu, kiṃ nu kho iminā karissāmī”ti. Athassa etadahosi – “imasmiṃ loke ‘mayaṃ arahanto
atk-s0502a:2780_9: mayaṃ arahanto’ti vattāro bahū, ahaṃ ekaṃ arahantampi na passāmi. Gehe bhamaṃ yojetvā
atk-s0502a:2780_10: pattaṃ likhāpetvā sikkāya ṭhapetvā veḷuparamparāya saṭṭhihatthamatte ākāse olambāpetvā
atk-s0502a:2780_11: ‘sace arahā atthi, imaṃ ākāsenāgantvā gaṇhātū’ti vakkhāmi. Yo taṃ gahessati, taṃ
atk-s0502a:2780_12: saputtadāro saraṇaṃ gamissāmī”ti. So cintitaniyāmeneva pattaṃ likhāpetvā veḷuparamparāya
atk-s0502a:2780_13: ussāpetvā “yo imasmiṃ loke arahā, so ākāsenāgantvā imaṃ pattaṃ gaṇhātū”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:2781_0: Cha satthāro “amhākaṃ esa anucchaviko, amhākameva naṃ dehī”ti vadiṃsu. So “ākāsenāgantvā
atk-s0502a:2781_1: gaṇhathā”ti āha. Atha chaṭṭhe divase nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto antevāsike pesesi – “gacchatha,
atk-s0502a:2781_2: seṭṭhiṃ evaṃ vadetha – ‘amhākaṃ ācariyasseva anucchavikoyaṃ, mā appamattakassa kāraṇā
atk-s0502a:2781_3: ākāsenāgamanaṃ kari, dehi kira me taṃ patta”’nti. Te gantvā seṭṭhiṃ tathā vadiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2781_4: Seṭṭhi “ākāsenāgantvā gaṇhituṃ samatthova gaṇhātū”ti āha. Nāṭaputto sayaṃ gantukāmo
atk-s0502a:2781_5: antevāsikānaṃ saññaṃ adāsi – “ahaṃ ekaṃ hatthañca pādañca ukkhipitvā uppatitukāmo
atk-s0502a:2781_6: viya bhavissāmi, tumhe maṃ, ‘ācariya, kiṃ karotha, dārumayapattassa kāraṇā paṭicchannaṃ
atk-s0502a:2781_7: arahattaguṇaṃ mahājanassa mā dassayitthā’ti vatvā maṃ hatthesu ca pādesu ca gahetvā
atk-s0502a:2781_8: ākaḍḍhantā bhūmiyaṃ pāteyyāthā”ti. So tattha gantvā seṭṭhiṃ āha, “mahāseṭṭhi, mayhaṃ
atk-s0502a:2781_9: ayaṃ patto anucchaviko, aññesaṃ nānucchaviko, mā te appamattakassa kāraṇā mama ākāse
atk-s0502a:2781_10: uppatanaṃ rucci, dehi me patta”nti. Bhante, ākāse uppatitvāva gaṇhathāti. Tato nāṭaputto
atk-s0502a:2781_11: “tena hi apetha apethā”ti antevāsike apanetvā “ākāse uppatissāmī”ti ekaṃ hatthañca
atk-s0502a:2781_12: pādañca ukkhipi. Atha naṃ antevāsikā, “ācariya, kiṃ nāmetaṃ karotha, chavassa lāmakassa
atk-s0502a:2781_13: dārumayapattassa kāraṇā paṭicchannaguṇena mahājanassa dassitena ko attho”ti taṃ hatthapādesu
atk-s0502a:2781_14: gahetvā ākaḍḍhitvā bhūmiyaṃ pātesuṃ. So seṭṭhiṃ āha – “ime, mahāseṭṭhi, uppatituṃ
atk-s0502a:2781_15: na denti, dehi me patta”nti. Uppatitvā gaṇhatha, bhanteti. Evaṃ titthiyā cha divasāni
atk-s0502a:2782_0: Sattame divase āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa ca āyasmato piṇḍolabhāradvājassa ca “rājagahe
atk-s0502a:2782_1: piṇḍāya carissāmā”ti gantvā ekasmiṃ piṭṭhipāsāṇe ṭhatvā cīvaraṃ pārupanakāle dhuttakā
atk-s0502a:2782_2: kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “ambho pubbe cha satthāro loke ‘mayaṃ arahantamhā’ti vicariṃsu.,
atk-s0502a:2782_3: Rājagahaseṭṭhino pana ajja sattamo divaso pattaṃ ussāpetvā ‘sace arahā atthi, ākāsenāgantvā
atk-s0502a:2782_4: gaṇhātū’ti vadantassa, ekopi ‘ahaṃ arahā’ti ākāse uppatanto natthi. Ajja no loke
atk-s0502a:2782_5: arahantānaṃ natthibhāvo ñāto”ti. Taṃ kathaṃ sutvā āyasmā mahāmoggallāno āyasmantaṃ
atk-s0502a:2782_6: piṇḍolabhāradvājaṃ āha – “sutaṃ te, āvuso bhāradvāja, imesaṃ vacanaṃ, ime buddhassa
atk-s0502a:2782_7: sāsanaṃ pariggaṇhantā viya vadanti. Tvañca mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo, gaccha taṃ pattaṃ
atk-s0502a:2782_8: ākāsena gantvā gaṇhāhī”ti. Āvuso mahāmoggallāna, tvaṃ iddhimantānaṃ aggo, tvaṃ etaṃ
atk-s0502a:2782_9: gaṇhāhi, tayi pana aggaṇhante ahaṃ gaṇhissāmīti. “Gaṇhāvuso”ti vutte āyasmā piṇḍolabhāradvājo
atk-s0502a:2782_10: abhiññāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā uṭṭhāya tigāvutaṃ piṭṭhipāsāṇaṃ pādantena
atk-s0502a:2782_11: paṭicchādento tulapicu viya ākāse uṭṭhāpetvā rājagahanagarassa upari sattakkhattuṃ
atk-s0502a:2782_12: anupariyāyi. So tigāvutapamāṇassa nagarassa pidhānaṃ viya paññāyi. Nagaravāsino “pāsāṇo
atk-s0502a:2782_13: no avattharitvā gaṇhātī”ti bhītā suppādīni matthake katvā tattha tattha nilīyiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2782_14: Sattame vāre thero piṭṭhipāsāṇaṃ bhinditvā attānaṃ dassesi. Mahājano theraṃ disvā,
atk-s0502a:2782_15: “bhante piṇḍolabhāradvāja, tava pāsāṇaṃ daḷhaṃ katvā gaṇha, mā no sabbe nāsayī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2782_16: Thero pāsāṇaṃ pādantena khipitvā vissajjesi. So gantvā yathāṭhāneyeva patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:2782_17: Thero seṭṭhissa gehamatthake aṭṭhāsi. Taṃ disvā seṭṭhi urena nipajjitvā “otaratha
atk-s0502a:2782_18: sāmī”ti vatvā ākāsato otiṇṇaṃ theraṃ nisīdāpetvā pattaṃ otārāpetvā catumadhurapuṇṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:2782_19: katvā therassa adāsi. Thero pattaṃ gahetvā vihārābhimukho pāyāsi. Athassa ye araññagatā
atk-s0502a:2782_20: vā suññāgāragatā vā taṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ nāddasaṃsu. Te sannipatitvā, “bhante, amhākampi
atk-s0502a:2782_21: pāṭihāriyaṃ dassehī”ti theraṃ anubandhiṃsu. So tesaṃ tesaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ dassetvā vihāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:2783_0: Satthā taṃ anubandhitvā unnādentassa mahājanassa saddaṃ sutvā, “ānanda, kasseso saddo”ti
atk-s0502a:2783_1: pucchitvā, “bhante, piṇḍolabhāradvājena ākāse uppatitvā candanapatto gahito, tassa
atk-s0502a:2783_2: santike eso saddo”ti sutvā bhāradvājaṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tayā evaṃ kata”nti
atk-s0502a:2783_3: pucchitvā “saccaṃ, bhante”ti vutte, “kasmā te, bhāradvāja, evaṃ kata”nti theraṃ garahitvā
atk-s0502a:2783_4: taṃ pattaṃ khaṇḍākhaṇḍaṃ bhedāpetvā bhikkhūnaṃ añjanapisanatthāya dāpetvā pāṭihāriyassa
atk-s0502a:2784_0: Titthiyā “samaṇo kira gotamo taṃ pattaṃ bhedāpetvā pāṭihāriyassa akaraṇatthāya sāvakānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2784_1: sikkhāpadaṃ paññāpesī”ti sutvā “samaṇassa gotamassa sāvakā paññattaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ
atk-s0502a:2784_2: jīvitahetupi nātikkamanti, samaṇopi gotamo taṃ rakkhissateva. Idāni amhehi okāso
atk-s0502a:2784_3: laddho”ti nagaravīthīsu ārocentā vicariṃsu “mayaṃ attano guṇaṃ rakkhantā pubbe dārumayapattassa
atk-s0502a:2784_4: kāraṇā attano guṇaṃ mahājanassa na dassayimhā, samaṇassa gotamassa sāvakā pattakamattassa
atk-s0502a:2784_5: kāraṇā attano guṇaṃ mahājanassa dassesuṃ. Samaṇo gotamo attano paṇḍitatāya pattaṃ
atk-s0502a:2784_6: bhedāpetvā sikkhāpadaṃ paññāpesi, idāni mayaṃ teneva saddhiṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ karissāmā”ti.
atk-s0502a:2785_0: Rājā bimbisāro taṃ kathaṃ sutvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā “tumhehi kira, bhante, pāṭihāriyassa
atk-s0502a:2785_1: akaraṇatthāya sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññatta”nti? “Āma, mahārājā”ti. Idāni titthiyā
atk-s0502a:2785_2: “tumhehi saddhiṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ karissāmā”ti vadanti, kiṃ idāni karissathāti? “Tesu
atk-s0502a:2785_3: karontesu karissāmi, mahārājā”ti. Nanu tumhehi sikkhāpadaṃ paññattanti. Nāhaṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0502a:2785_4: attano sikkhāpadaṃ paññāpesiṃ, taṃ mameva sāvakānaṃ paññattanti. Tumhe ṭhapetvā aññattha
atk-s0502a:2785_5: sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ nāma hoti, bhanteti. Tena hi, mahārāja, tamevettha paṭipucchāmi,
atk-s0502a:2785_6: “atthi pana te, mahārāja, vijite uyyāna”nti. “Atthi, bhante”ti. “Sace te, mahārāja,
atk-s0502a:2785_7: uyyāne mahājano ambādīni khādeyya, kimassa kattabba”nti? “Daṇḍo, bhante”ti. “Tvaṃ
atk-s0502a:2785_8: pana khādituṃ labhasī”ti? “Āma, bhante, mayhaṃ daṇḍo natthi, ahaṃ attano santakaṃ
atk-s0502a:2785_9: khādituṃ labhāmī”ti. “Mahārāja, yathā tava tiyojanasatike rajje āṇā pavattati, attano
atk-s0502a:2785_10: uyyāne ambādīni khādantassa daṇḍo natthi, aññesaṃ atthi, evaṃ mamapi cakkavāḷakoṭisatasahasse
atk-s0502a:2785_11: āṇā pavattati, attano sikkhāpadapaññattiyā atikkamo nāma natthi, aññesaṃ pana atthi,
atk-s0502a:2785_12: karissāmahaṃ pāṭihāriya”nti. Titthiyā taṃ kathaṃ sutvā “idānamhā naṭṭhā, samaṇena
atk-s0502a:2785_13: kira gotamena sāvakānaṃyeva sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ, na attano. Sayameva kira pāṭihāriyaṃ
atk-s0502a:2785_14: kattukāmo, kiṃ nu kho karomā”ti mantayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2786_0: Rājā satthāraṃ pucchi – “bhante, kadā pāṭihāriyaṃ karissathā”ti. “Ito catumāsaccayena
atk-s0502a:2786_2: mahārājā”ti. “Kasmā pana satthā evaṃ dūraṭṭhānaṃ apadisī”ti? “Yasmā taṃ sabbabuddhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2786_4: apadisī”ti. Titthiyā taṃ kathaṃ sutvā “ito kira catunnaṃ māsānaṃ accayena samaṇo
atk-s0502a:2786_5: gotamo sāvatthiyaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ karissati, idāni taṃ amuñcitvāva anubandhissāma, mahājano
atk-s0502a:2786_6: amhe disvā ‘kiṃ ida’nti pucchissati. Athassa vakkhāma ‘mayaṃ samaṇena gotamena saddhiṃ
atk-s0502a:2786_7: pāṭihāriyaṃ karissāmā’ti vadimhā. So palāyati, mayamassa palāyituṃ adatvā anubandhāmā”ti.
atk-s0502a:2786_8: Satthā rājagahe piṇḍāya caritvā nikkhami. Titthiyāpissa pacchatova nikkhamitvā bhattakiccaṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a:2786_9: vasanti. Vasitaṭṭhāne punadivase pātarāsaṃ karonti. Te manussehi “kimida”nti pucchitā
atk-s0502a:2786_10: heṭṭhā cintitaniyāmeneva ārocesuṃ. Mahājanopi “pāṭihāriyaṃ passissāmā”ti anubandhi.
atk-s0502a:2787_0: Satthā anupubbena sāvatthiṃ pāpuṇi. Titthiyāpi tena saddhiṃyeva gantvā upaṭṭhāke
atk-s0502a:2787_1: samādapetvā satasahassaṃ labhitvā khadirathambhehi maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā nīluppalehi chādāpetvā
atk-s0502a:2787_2: “idha pāṭihāriyaṃ karissāmā”ti nisīdiṃsu. Rājā pasenadi kosalo satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā,
atk-s0502a:2787_3: “bhante, titthiyehi maṇḍapo kārito, ahampi tumhākaṃ maṇḍapaṃ karissāmī”ti. “Alaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2787_4: mahārāja, atthi mayhaṃ maṇḍapakārako”ti. “Bhante, maṃ ṭhapetvā ko añño kātuṃ sakkhissatī”ti?
atk-s0502a:2787_6: mahārājā”ti. Titthiyā “ambarukkhamūle kira pāṭihāriyaṃ karissatī”ti sutvā attano
atk-s0502a:2787_7: upaṭṭhākānaṃ ārocetvā yojanabbhantare ṭhāne antamaso tadahujātampi ambapotakaṃ uppāṭetvā araññe khipāpesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:2788_0: Satthā āsāḷhipuṇṇamadivase antonagaraṃ pāvisi. Raññopi uyyānapālo kaṇḍo nāma ekaṃ
atk-s0502a:2788_1: piṅgalakipillikehi katapattapuṭassa antare mahantaṃ ambapakkaṃ disvā tassa gandharasalobhena
atk-s0502a:2788_2: sampatante vāyase palāpetvā rañño khādanatthāya ādāya gacchanto antarāmagge satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:2788_3: disvā cintesi – “rājā imaṃ ambaṃ khāditvā mayhaṃ aṭṭha vā soḷasa vā kahāpaṇe dadeyya,
atk-s0502a:2788_4: taṃ me ekattabhāvepi jīvitavuttiyā nālaṃ. Sace panāhaṃ satthu imaṃ dassāmi, avassaṃ
atk-s0502a:2788_5: taṃ me dīghakālaṃ hitāvahaṃ bhavissatī”ti. So taṃ ambapakkaṃ satthu upanāmesi. Satthā
atk-s0502a:2788_6: ānandattheraṃ olokesi. Athassa thero catumahārājadattiyaṃ pattaṃ nīharitvā hatthe
atk-s0502a:2788_7: ṭhapesi. Satthā pattaṃ upanāmetvā ambapakkaṃ paṭiggahetvā tattheva nisīdanākāraṃ
atk-s0502a:2788_8: dassesi. Thero cīvaraṃ paññāpetvā adāsi. Athassa tasmiṃ nisinne thero pānīyaṃ parissāvetvā
atk-s0502a:2788_9: ambapakkaṃ madditvā pānakaṃ katvā adāsi. Satthā ambapānakaṃ pivitvā kaṇḍaṃ āha –
atk-s0502a:2788_10: “imaṃ ambaṭṭhiṃ idheva paṃsuṃ viyūhitvā ropehī”ti. So tathā akāsi. Satthā tassa upari
atk-s0502a:2788_11: hatthaṃ dhovi. Hatthe dhovitamatteyeva naṅgalasīsamattakkhandho hutvā ubbedhena paṇṇāsahattho
atk-s0502a:2788_12: ambarukkho uṭṭhahi. Catūsu disāsu ekekā, uddhaṃ ekāti pañca mahāsākhā paṇṇāsahatthā
atk-s0502a:2788_13: ahesuṃ. So tāvadeva pupphaphalasañchanno hutvā ekekasmiṃ ṭhāne paripakkaambapiṇḍidharo
atk-s0502a:2788_14: ahosi. Pacchato āgacchantā bhikkhū ambapakkāni khādantā eva āgamiṃsu. Rājā “evarūpo
atk-s0502a:2788_15: kira ambarukkho uṭṭhito”ti sutvā “mā naṃ koci chindī”ti ārakkhaṃ ṭhapesi. So pana
atk-s0502a:2788_16: kaṇḍena ropitattā kaṇḍambarukkhotveva paññāyi. Dhuttakāpi ambapakkāni khāditvā “hare
atk-s0502a:2788_17: duṭṭhatitthiyā ‘samaṇo kira gotamo kaṇḍambarukkhamūle pāṭihāriyaṃ karissatī’ti tumhehi
atk-s0502a:2788_18: yojanabbhantare tadahujātāpi ambapotakā uppāṭāpitā, kaṇḍambo nāma aya”nti vatvā te
atk-s0502a:2789_0: Sakko vātavalāhakaṃ devaputtaṃ āṇāpesi “titthiyānaṃ maṇḍapaṃ vātehi uppāṭetvā ukkārabhūmiyaṃ
atk-s0502a:2789_1: khipāpehī”ti. So tathā akāsi. Sūriyampi devaputtaṃ āṇāpesi “sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ nikaḍḍhanto
atk-s0502a:2789_2: tāpehī”ti. So tathā akāsi. Puna vātavalāhakaṃ āṇāpesi “vātamaṇḍalaṃ uṭṭhāpento yāhī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2789_3: So tathā karonto titthiyānaṃ paggharitasedasarīre rajovaṭṭiyā okiri. Te tambamattikasadisā
atk-s0502a:2789_4: ahesuṃ. Vassavalāhakampi āṇāpesi “mahantāni bindūni pātehī”ti. So tathā akāsi. Atha
atk-s0502a:2789_5: nesaṃ kāyo kabaragāvisadiso ahosi. Te nigaṇṭhā lajjamānā hutvā sammukhasammukhaṭṭhāneneva
atk-s0502a:2789_6: palāyiṃsu. Evaṃ palāyantesu purāṇakassapassa upaṭṭhāko eko kassako “idāni me ayyānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2789_7: pāṭihāriyakaraṇavelā, gantvā pāṭihāriyaṃ passissāmī”ti goṇe vissajjetvā pātova ābhataṃ
atk-s0502a:2789_8: yāgukuṭañceva yottakañca gahetvā āgacchanto purāṇaṃ tathā palāyantaṃ disvā, bhante,
atk-s0502a:2789_9: ajja ‘ayyānaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ passissāmī’ti āgacchāmi, tumhe kahaṃ gacchathā”ti. Kiṃ
atk-s0502a:2789_10: te pāṭihāriyena, imaṃ kuṭañca yottañca dehīti. So tena dinnaṃ kuṭañca yottañca ādāya
atk-s0502a:2789_11: nadītīraṃ gantvā kuṭaṃ yottena attano gīvāya bandhitvā lajjanto kiñci akathetvā rahade
atk-s0502a:2789_12: patitvā udakapubbuḷe uṭṭhāpento kālaṃ katvā avīcimhi nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:2790_0: Sakko ākāse ratanacaṅkamaṃ māpesi. Tassa ekā koṭi pācīnacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0502a:2790_1: ekā pacchimacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ. Satthā sannipatitāya chattiṃsayojanikāya parisāya
atk-s0502a:2790_3: aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ gharaṇī nāma iddhimantī ekā anāgāmiupāsikā upasaṅkamitvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:2790_4: mādisāya dhītari vijjamānāya tumhākaṃ kilamanakiccaṃ natthi, ahaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ karissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:2790_5: āha. “Kathaṃ tvaṃ karissasi, gharaṇī”ti? “Bhante, ekasmiṃ cakkavāḷagabbhe mahāpathaviṃ
atk-s0502a:2790_6: udakaṃ katvā udakasakuṇikā viya nimujjitvā pācīnacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ attānaṃ dassessāmi,
atk-s0502a:2790_7: tathā pacchimauttaradakkhiṇacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ, tathā majjhe”. Mahājano maṃ disvā
atk-s0502a:2790_8: “kā esā”ti vutte vakkhati “gharaṇī nāmesā, ayaṃ tāva ekissā itthiyā ānubhāvo, buddhānubhāvo
atk-s0502a:2790_9: pana kīdiso bhavissatī”ti. Evaṃ titthiyā tumhe adisvāva palāyissantīti. Atha naṃ
atk-s0502a:2790_10: satthā “jānāmi te gharaṇī evarūpaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ kātuṃ samatthabhāvaṃ, na panāyaṃ tavatthāya
atk-s0502a:2790_11: baddho mālāpuṭo”ti vatvā paṭikkhipi. Sā “na me satthā anujānāti, addhā mayā uttaritaraṃ
atk-s0502a:2790_12: pāṭihāriyaṃ kātuṃ samattho añño atthī”ti ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Satthāpi “evameva tesaṃ
atk-s0502a:2790_13: guṇo pākaṭo bhavissatīti evaṃ chattiṃsayojanikāya parisāya majjhe sīhanādaṃ nadissatī”ti
atk-s0502a:2790_14: maññamāno aparepi pucchi – “tumhe kathaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ karissathā”ti. Te “evañca evañca
atk-s0502a:2790_15: karissāma, bhante”ti satthu purato ṭhitāva sīhanādaṃ nadiṃsu. Tesu kira cūḷaanāthapiṇḍiko
atk-s0502a:2790_16: “mādise anāgāmiupāsake putte vijjamāne satthu kilamanakiccaṃ natthī”ti cintetvā “ahaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2790_17: bhante, pāṭihāriyaṃ karissāmī”ti vatvā “kathaṃ karissasī”ti puṭṭho “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a:2790_18: dvādasayojanikaṃ brahmattabhāvaṃ nimminitvā imissā parisāya majjhe mahāmeghagajjitasadisena
atk-s0502a:2790_19: saddena brahmaapphoṭanaṃ nāma apphoṭessāmī”ti. Mahājano “kiṃ nāmeso saddo”ti pucchitvā
atk-s0502a:2790_21: kira tāva eso ānubhāvo, buddhānubhāvo kīdiso bhavissatī”ti tumhe adisvāva palāyissantīti.
atk-s0502a:2790_22: Satthā “jānāmi te ānubhāva”nti tassapi tatheva vatvā pāṭihāriyakaraṇaṃ nānujāni.
atk-s0502a:2791_0: Athekā paṭisambhidappattā sattavassikā cīrasāmaṇerī kira nāma satthāraṃ vanditvā
atk-s0502a:2791_1: “ahaṃ, bhante, pāṭihāriyaṃ karissāmī”ti āha. “Kathaṃ karissasi cīre”ti? “Bhante,
atk-s0502a:2791_2: sineruñca cakkavāḷapabbatañca himavantañca āharitvā imasmiṃ ṭhāne paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapetvā
atk-s0502a:2791_3: ahaṃ haṃsasakuṇī viya tato tato nikkhamitvā asajjamānā gamissāmi, mahājano maṃ disvā
atk-s0502a:2791_4: ‘kā esā’ti pucchitvā ‘cīrasāmaṇerī’ti vakkhati. Titthiyā ‘sattavassikāya tāva sāmaṇeriyā
atk-s0502a:2791_5: ayamānubhāvo, buddhānubhāvo kīdiso bhavissatī’ti tumhe adisvāva palāyissantī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2791_6: Ito paraṃ evarūpāni vacanāni vuttānusāreneva veditabbāni. Tassāpi bhagavā “jānāmi
atk-s0502a:2791_7: te ānubhāva”nti vatvā pāṭihāriyakaraṇaṃ nānujāni. Atheko paṭisambhidappatto khīṇāsavo
atk-s0502a:2791_8: cundasāmaṇero nāma jātiyā sattavassiko satthāraṃ vanditvā “ahaṃ bhagavā pāṭihāriyaṃ
atk-s0502a:2791_9: karissāmī”ti vatvā “kathaṃ karissasī”ti puṭṭho āha – “ahaṃ, bhante, jambudīpassa
atk-s0502a:2791_10: dhajabhūtaṃ mahājamburukkhaṃ khandhe gahetvā cāletvā mahājambupesiyo āharitvā imaṃ
atk-s0502a:2791_11: parisaṃ khādāpessāmi, pāricchattakakusumāni ca āharitvā tumhe vandissāmī”ti. Satthā
atk-s0502a:2792_0: Atha uppalavaṇṇā therī satthāraṃ vanditvā “ahaṃ, bhante, pāṭihāriyaṃ karissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:2792_1: vatvā “kathaṃ karissasī”ti puṭṭhā āha – “ahaṃ, bhante, samantā dvādasayojanikaṃ parisaṃ
atk-s0502a:2792_2: dassetvā āvaṭṭato chattiṃsayojanāya parisāya parivuto cakkavattirājā hutvā āgantvā
atk-s0502a:2792_3: tumhe vandissāmī”ti. Satthā “jānāmi te ānubhāva”nti tassāpi pāṭihāriyakaraṇaṃ paṭikkhipi.
atk-s0502a:2792_4: Atha mahāmoggallānatthero bhagavantaṃ vanditvā “ahaṃ, bhante, pāṭihāriyaṃ karissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:2792_5: vatvā “kathaṃ karissasī”ti puṭṭho āha – “ahaṃ, bhante, sinerupabbatarājānaṃ dantantare
atk-s0502a:2792_6: ṭhapetvā māsasāsapabījaṃ viya khādissāmī”ti. “Aññaṃ kiṃ karissasī”ti? “Imaṃ mahāpathaviṃ
atk-s0502a:2792_7: kaṭasārakaṃ viya saṃvellitvā aṅgulantare nikkhipissāmī”ti. “Aññaṃ kiṃ karissasī”ti?
atk-s0502a:2792_8: “Mahāpathaviṃ kulālacakkaṃ viya parivattetvā mahājanaṃ pathavojaṃ khādāpessāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2792_9: “Aññaṃ kiṃ karissasī”ti? “Vāmahatthe pathaviṃ katvā ime satte dakkhiṇahatthena aññasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:2792_10: dīpe ṭhapessāmī”ti. “Aññaṃ kiṃ karissasī”ti? “Sineruṃ chattadaṇḍaṃ viya katvā mahāpathaviṃ
atk-s0502a:2792_11: ukkhipitvā tassupari ṭhapetvā chattahattho bhikkhu viya ekahatthenādāya ākāse caṅkamissāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2792_12: Satthā “jānāmi te ānubhāva”nti tassapi pāṭihāriyakaraṇaṃ nānujāni. So “jānāti maññe
atk-s0502a:2792_13: satthā mayā uttaritaraṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ kātuṃ samattha”nti ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:2793_0: Atha naṃ satthā “nāyaṃ moggallānaṃ tavatthāya baddho bālāpuṭo. Ahañhi asamadhuro,
atk-s0502a:2793_1: mama dhuraṃ añño vahituṃ samattho nāma natthi. Anacchariyametaṃ, yaṃ idāni mama dhuraṃ
atk-s0502a:2793_2: vahituṃ samattho nāma bhaveyya. Ahetukatiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbattakālepi mama dhuraṃ
atk-s0502a:2793_3: añño vahituṃ samattho nāma nāhosiyevā”ti vatvā “kadā pana, bhante”ti therena puṭṭho atītaṃ āharitvā –
atk-s0502a:2795: Tadāssu kaṇhaṃ yuñjanti, svāssu taṃ vahate dhura”nti. –
atk-s0502a:2796: Idaṃ kaṇhausabhajātakaṃ vitthāretvā puna tameva vatthuṃ visesetvā dassento –
atk-s0502a:2799: Dhanañca naṃ alābhesi, tena cattamano ahū”ti. –
atk-s0502a:2800_0: Idaṃ nandivisālajātakaṃ vitthāretvā kathesi. Kathetvā ca pana satthā ratanacaṅkamaṃ
atk-s0502a:2800_1: abhiruhi, purato dvādasayojanikā parisā ahosi tathā pacchato ca uttarato ca dakkhiṇato
atk-s0502a:2800_2: ca. Ujukaṃ pana catuvīsatiyojanikāya parisāya majjhe bhagavā yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a:2801_0: Taṃ pāḷito tāva evaṃ veditabbaṃ – katamaṃ tathāgatassa yamakapāṭihāriye ñāṇaṃ? Idhaṃ
atk-s0502a:2801_1: tathāgato yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ karoti asādhāraṇaṃ sāvakehi, uparimakāyato aggikkhandho
atk-s0502a:2801_2: pavattati, heṭṭhimakāyato udakadhārā pavattati. Heṭṭhimakāyato aggikkhandho pavattati,
atk-s0502a:2801_3: uparimakāyato udakadhārā pavattati. Puratthimakāyato, pacchimakāyato; pacchimakāyato,
atk-s0502a:2801_4: puratthimakāyato; dakkhiṇaakkhito, vāmaakkhito; vāmaakkhito, dakkhiṇaakkhito; dakkhiṇakaṇṇasotato,
atk-s0502a:2801_8: dakkhiṇapassato, vāmapassato; vāmapassato, dakkhiṇapassato; dakkhiṇapādato, vāmapādato;
atk-s0502a:2801_9: vāmapādato, dakkhiṇapādato; aṅgulaṅgulehi, aṅgulantarikāhi; aṅgulantarikāhi, aṅgulaṅgulehi;
atk-s0502a:2801_10: ekekalomakūpato aggikkhandho pavattati, ekekalomato udakadhārā pavattati. Ekekalomato
atk-s0502a:2801_11: aggikkhandho pavattati, ekekalomakūpato udakadhārā pavattati channaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ nīlānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2801_12: pītakānaṃ lohitakānaṃ odātānaṃ mañjeṭṭhānaṃ pabhassarānaṃ. Bhagavā caṅkamati, buddhanimmito
atk-s0502a:2801_13: tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti…pe… nimmito seyyaṃ kappeti, bhagavā caṅkamati
atk-s0502a:2801_14: vā tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati vā. Idaṃ tathāgatassa yamakapāṭihāriye ñāṇanti.
atk-s0502a:2802_0: Idaṃ pana pāṭihāriyaṃ bhagavā tasmiṃ caṅkame caṅkamitvā akāsi. Tassa tejokasiṇasamāpattivasena
atk-s0502a:2802_1: uparimakāyato aggikkhandho pavattati, āpokasiṇasamāpattivasena heṭṭhimakāyato udakadhārā
atk-s0502a:2802_2: pavattati. Na pana udakadhārāya pavattanaṭṭhānato aggikkhandho pavattati, aggikkhandhassa
atk-s0502a:2802_4: vuttaṃ. Eseva nayo sabbapadesu. Aggikkhandho panettha udakadhārāya asammisso ahosi,
atk-s0502a:2802_5: tathā udakadhārā aggikkhandhena. Ubhayampi kira cetaṃ yāva brahmalokā uggantvā cakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ
atk-s0502a:2802_6: patati. “Channaṃ vaṇṇāna”nti vuttā panassa chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo ghaṭehi āsiñcamānaṃ vilīnasuvaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:2802_7: viya yantanālikato nikkhantasuvaṇṇarasadhārā viya ca ekacakkavāḷagabbhato uggantvā
atk-s0502a:2802_8: brahmalokaṃ āhacca paṭinivattitvā cakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭimeva gaṇhiṃsu. Ekacakkavāḷagabbhaṃ
atk-s0502a:2803_0: Taṃdivasaṃ satthā caṅkamitvā pāṭihāriyaṃ karonto antarantarā mahājanassa dhammaṃ
atk-s0502a:2803_1: kathesi. Kathento ca janaṃ nirassāsaṃ akatvā tassa assāsavāraṃ deti. Tasmiṃ khaṇe
atk-s0502a:2803_2: mahājano sādhukāraṃ pavattesi. Tassa sādhukārapavattanakāle satthā tāvamahatiyā parisāya
atk-s0502a:2803_3: cittaṃ olokento ekekassa soḷasannaṃ ākārānaṃ vasena cittācāraṃ aññāsi. Evaṃ lahukaparivattaṃ
atk-s0502a:2803_4: buddhānaṃ cittaṃ. Yo yo yasmiñca dhamme yasmiñca pāṭihīre pasanno, tassa tassa ajjhāsayavaseneva
atk-s0502a:2803_5: dhammañca kathesi, pāṭihīrañca akāsi. Evaṃ dhamme desiyamāne pāṭihīre ca kariyamāne
atk-s0502a:2803_6: mahājanassa dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Satthā pana tasmiṃ samāgame attano manaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0502a:2803_7: aññaṃ pañhaṃ pucchituṃ samatthaṃ adisvā nimmitabuddhaṃ māpesi. Tena pucchitaṃ pañhaṃ
atk-s0502a:2803_8: satthā vissajjesi, satthārā pucchitaṃ so vissajjesi. Bhagavato caṅkamanakāle nimmito
atk-s0502a:2803_9: ṭhānādīsu aññataraṃ kappesi, nimmitassa caṅkamanakāle bhagavā ṭhānādīsu aññataraṃ
atk-s0502a:2803_10: kappesi. Tamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “nimmito caṅkamati vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Evaṃ karontassa satthu
atk-s0502a:2803_11: pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā dhammakathaṃ sutvā tasmiṃ samāgame vīsatiyā pāṇakoṭīnaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
atk-s0502a:2804_0: Satthā pāṭihīraṃ karontova “kattha nu kho atītabuddhā idaṃ pāṭihīraṃ katvā vassaṃ
atk-s0502a:2804_1: upentī”ti āvajjetvā “tāvatiṃsabhavane vassaṃ upagantvā mātu abhidhammapiṭakaṃ desentī”ti
atk-s0502a:2804_2: disvā dakkhiṇapādaṃ ukkhipitvā yugandharamatthake ṭhapetvā itaraṃ pādaṃ ukkhipitvā
atk-s0502a:2804_3: sinerumatthake ṭhapesi. Evaṃ aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyojanasatasahassaṭṭhāne tayo padavārā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0502a:2804_4: dve pādachiddāni. Satthā pādaṃ pasāretvā akkamīti na sallakkhetabbaṃ. Tassa hi pādukkhipanakāleyeva
atk-s0502a:2804_5: pabbatā pādamūlaṃ āgantvā sampaṭicchiṃsu, satthārā akkamanakāle te pabbatā uṭṭhāya
atk-s0502a:2804_6: sakaṭṭhāneyeva aṭṭhaṃsu. Sakko satthāraṃ disvā cintesi – “paṇḍukambalasilāya maññe
atk-s0502a:2804_7: satthā imaṃ vassāvāsaṃ upessati, bahūnañca devatānaṃ upakāro bhavissati, satthari
atk-s0502a:2804_8: panettha vassāvāsaṃ upagate aññā devatā hatthampi ṭhapetuṃ na sakkhissanti. Ayaṃ
atk-s0502a:2804_9: kho pana paṇḍukambalasilā dīghato saṭṭhiyojanā, vitthārato paṇṇāsayojanā, puthulato
atk-s0502a:2804_10: pannarasayojanā, satthari nisinnepi tucchaṃ bhavissatī”ti. Satthā tassa ajjhāsayaṃ
atk-s0502a:2804_11: viditvā attano saṅghāṭiṃ silāsanaṃ paṭicchādayamānaṃ khipi. Sakko cintesi – “cīvaraṃ
atk-s0502a:2804_12: tāva paṭicchādayamānaṃ khipi, sayaṃ pana parittake ṭhāne nisīdissatī”ti. Satthā tassa
atk-s0502a:2804_13: ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā nīcapīṭhakaṃ mahāpaṃsukūliko viya paṇḍukambalasilaṃ antocīvarabhogeyeva
atk-s0502a:2804_14: katvā nisīdi. Mahājanopi taṃkhaṇaññeva satthāraṃ olokento nāddasa, candassa atthaṅgamitakālo
atk-s0502a:2804_15: viya sūriyassa ca atthaṅgamitakālo viya ahosi. Mahājano –
atk-s0502a:2805: “Gato nu cittakūṭaṃ vā, kelāsaṃ vā yugandharaṃ;
atk-s0502a:2806: Na no dakkhemu sambuddhaṃ, lokajeṭṭhaṃ narāsabha”nti. –
atk-s0502a:2807_0: Imaṃ gāthaṃ vadanto paridevi. Apare “satthā nāma pavivekarato, so ‘evarūpāya me parisāya
atk-s0502a:2807_1: evarūpaṃ pāṭihīraṃ kata’nti lajjāya aññaṃ raṭṭhaṃ vā janapadaṃ vā gato bhavissati,
atk-s0502a:2807_2: na dāni taṃ dakkhissāmā”ti paridevantā imaṃ gāthamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0502a:2809: Na no dakkhemu sambuddhaṃ, lokajeṭṭhaṃ narāsabha”nti.
atk-s0502a:2810_0: Te mahāmoggallānaṃ pucchiṃsu – “kahaṃ, bhante, satthā”ti? So sayaṃ jānantopi “paresampi
atk-s0502a:2810_1: guṇā pākaṭā hontū”ti ajjhāsayena “anuruddhaṃ pucchathā”ti āha. Te theraṃ tathā pucchiṃsu
atk-s0502a:2810_2: – “kahaṃ, bhante, satthā”ti? Tāvatiṃsabhavane paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ vassaṃ upagantvā
atk-s0502a:2810_3: mātu abhidhammapiṭakaṃ desetuṃ gatoti. “Kadā āgamissati, bhante”ti? “Tayo māse abhidhammapiṭakaṃ
atk-s0502a:2810_4: desetvā mahāpavāraṇadivase”ti. Te “satthāraṃ adisvā na gamissāmā”ti tattheva khandhāvāraṃ
atk-s0502a:2810_5: bandhiṃsu. Ākāsameva kira nesaṃ chadanaṃ ahosi. Tāya ca mahatiyā parisāya sarīranighaṃso
atk-s0502a:2810_6: nāma na paññāyi, pathavī vivaraṃ adāsi, sabbattha parisuddhameva bhūmitalaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0502a:2811_0: Satthā paṭhamameva moggallānattheraṃ avoca – “moggallāna, tvaṃ etissāya parisāya
atk-s0502a:2811_1: dhammaṃ deseyyāsi, cūḷaanāthapiṇḍiko āhāraṃ dassatī”ti. Tasmā taṃ temāsaṃ cūḷaanāthapiṇḍikova
atk-s0502a:2811_2: tassā parisāya yāpanaṃ yāgubhattaṃ khādanīyaṃ tambulatelagandhamālāpilandhanāni ca
atk-s0502a:2811_3: adāsi. Mahāmoggallāno dhammaṃ desesi, pāṭihāriyadassanatthaṃ āgatāgatehi puṭṭhapañhe
atk-s0502a:2811_4: ca vissajjesi. Satthārampi mātu abhidhammadesanatthaṃ paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ vassaṃ
atk-s0502a:2818_0: Evaṃ sabbā devatā attano sarīrappabhāya abhibhavitvā nisinnassa panassa mātā tusitavimānato
atk-s0502a:2818_1: āgantvā dakkhiṇapasse nisīdi. Indakopi devaputto āgantvā dakkhiṇapasseyeva nisīdi,
atk-s0502a:2818_2: aṅkuro vāmapasse nisīdi. So mahesakkhāsu devatāsu sannipatantīsu apagantvā dvādasayojanike
atk-s0502a:2818_3: ṭhāne okāsaṃ labhi, indako tattheva nisīdi. Satthā te ubhopi oloketvā attano sāsane
atk-s0502a:2818_5: tayā dīghamantare dasavassasahassaparimāṇakāle dvādasayojanikaṃ uddhanapantiṃ katvā
atk-s0502a:2818_6: mahādānaṃ dinnaṃ, idāni mama samāgamaṃ āgantvā dvādasayojanike ṭhāne okāsaṃ labhi,
atk-s0502a:2818_7: kiṃ nu kho ettha kāraṇa”nti? Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-s0502a:2823: So saddho pathavītalaṃ pāpuṇi. Sabbāpi naṃ sā parisā assosi. Evaṃ vutte –
atk-s0502a:2825: Kiṃ mayhaṃ tena dānena, dakkhiṇeyyena suññataṃ.
atk-s0502a:2826: “Ayaṃ so indako yakkho, dajjā dānaṃ parittakaṃ;
atk-s0502a:2828_0: Tattha dajjāti datvā. Evaṃ vutte satthā indakaṃ āha – “indaka, tvaṃ mama dakkhiṇapasse
atk-s0502a:2828_1: nisinno, kasmā anapagantvāva nisīdasī”ti? So “ahaṃ, bhante, sukhette appakabījaṃ
atk-s0502a:2828_2: vapanakassako viya dakkhiṇeyyasampadaṃ alattha”nti dakkhiṇeyyaṃ pabhāvento āha –
atk-s0502a:2830: Na phalaṃ vipulaṃ hoti, napi toseti kassakaṃ.
atk-s0502a:2832: Na phalaṃ vipulaṃ hoti, napi toseti dāyakaṃ.
atk-s0502a:2834: Sammā dhāraṃ pavecchante, phalaṃ toseti kassakaṃ.
atk-s0502a:2836: Appakampi kataṃ kāraṃ, puññaṃ hoti mahapphala”nti. ;
atk-s0502a:2837_0: Kiṃ panetassa pubbakammanti? So kira anuruddhattherassa antogāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhassa
atk-s0502a:2837_1: attano ābhataṃ kaṭacchubhikkhaṃ dāpesi. Tadā tassa puññaṃ aṅkurena dasavassasahassāni
atk-s0502a:2837_2: dvādasayojanikaṃ uddhanapantiṃ katvā dinnadānato mahapphalataraṃ jātaṃ. Tasmā evamāha.
atk-s0502a:2838_0: Evaṃ vutte satthā, “aṅkura, dānaṃ nāma viceyya dātuṃ vaṭṭati, evaṃ taṃ sukhettesu
atk-s0502a:2838_1: vuttabījaṃ viya mahapphalaṃ hoti. Tvaṃ pana na tathā akāsi, tena te dānaṃ mahapphalaṃ
atk-s0502a:2844: Vatvā uttarimpi dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:2846: Tasmā hi vītarāgesu, dinnaṃ hoti mahapphalaṃ.
atk-s0502a:2848: Tasmā hi vītadosesu, dinnaṃ hoti mahapphalaṃ.
atk-s0502a:2850: Tasmā hi vītamohesu, dinnaṃ hoti mahapphalaṃ.
atk-s0502a:2852: Tasmā hi vigaticchesu, dinnaṃ hoti mahapphala”nti.
atk-s0502a:2853: Desanāvasāne aṅkuro ca indako ca sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu, mahājanassāpi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:2854_0: Atha satthā devaparisāya majjhe nisinno mātaraṃ ārabbha “kusalā dhammā, akusalā dhammā,
atk-s0502a:2854_1: abyākatā dhammā”ti abhidhammapiṭakaṃ paṭṭhapesi. Evaṃ tayo māse nirantaraṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ
atk-s0502a:2854_2: kathesi. Kathento pana bhikkhācāravelāya “yāva mamāgamanā ettakaṃ nāma dhammaṃ desetū”ti
atk-s0502a:2854_3: nimmitabuddhaṃ māpetvā himavantaṃ gantvā nāgalatādantakaṭṭhaṃ khāditvā anotattadahe
atk-s0502a:2854_4: mukhaṃ dhovitvā uttarakuruto piṇḍapātaṃ āharitvā mahāsālamāḷake nisinno bhattakiccaṃ
atk-s0502a:2854_5: akāsi. Sāriputtatthero tattha gantvā satthu vattaṃ karoti. Satthā bhattakiccapariyosāne,
atk-s0502a:2854_6: “sāriputta, ajja mayā ettako nāma dhammo bhāsito, tvaṃ attano antevāsikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0502a:2854_7: vācehī”ti therassa kathesi. Yamakapāṭihīre kira pasīditvā pañcasatā kulaputtā therassa
atk-s0502a:2854_8: santike pabbajiṃsu. Te sandhāya theraṃ evamāha. Vatvā ca pana devalokaṃ gantvā nimmitabuddhena
atk-s0502a:2854_9: desitaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya sayaṃ dhammaṃ desesi. Theropi gantvā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0502a:2854_10: desesi. Te satthari devaloke viharanteyeva sattapakaraṇikā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:2855_0: Te kira kassapabuddhakāle khuddakavagguliyo hutvā ekasmiṃ pabbhāre olambantā dvinnaṃ
atk-s0502a:2855_1: therānaṃ caṅkamitvā abhidhammaṃ sajjhāyantānaṃ saddaṃ sutvā sare nimittaṃ aggahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:2855_2: Te “ime khandhā nāma, imā dhātuyo nāmā”ti ajānitvā sare nimittagahaṇamatteneva tato
atk-s0502a:2855_3: cutā devaloke nibbattā, ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā tato cavitvā
atk-s0502a:2855_4: sāvatthiyaṃ kulagharesu nibbattā. Yamakapāṭihīre uppannapasādā therassa santike pabbajitvā
atk-s0502a:2855_5: sabbapaṭhamaṃ sattapakaraṇikā ahesuṃ. Satthāpi teneva nīhārena taṃ temāsaṃ abhidhammaṃ
atk-s0502a:2855_6: desesi. Desanāvasāne asītikoṭisahassānaṃ devatānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi, mahāmāyāpi
atk-s0502a:2856_0: Sāpi kho chattiṃsayojanaparimaṇḍalā parisā “idāni sattame divase mahāpavāraṇā bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0502a:2856_1: mahāmoggallānattheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā āha – “bhante satthu, orohaṇadivasaṃ saññātuṃ
atk-s0502a:2856_2: vaṭṭati, na hi mayaṃ satthāraṃ adisvā gamissāmā”ti. Āyasmā mahāmoggallāno taṃ kathaṃ
atk-s0502a:2856_3: sutvā “sādhāvuso”ti vatvā tattheva pathaviyaṃ nimuggo sinerupādaṃ gantvā “maṃ abhiruhantaṃ
atk-s0502a:2856_4: parisā passatū”ti adhiṭṭhāya maṇiratanena āvutaṃ paṇḍukambalasuttaṃ viya paññāyamānarūpova
atk-s0502a:2856_5: sinerumajjhena abhiruhi. Manussāpi naṃ “ekayojanaṃ abhiruḷho, dviyojanaṃ abhiruḷho”ti
atk-s0502a:2856_6: olokayiṃsu. Theropi satthu pāde sīsena ukkhipanto viya abhiruhitvā vanditvā evamāha
atk-s0502a:2856_7: – “bhante, parisā tumhe disvāva gantukāmā, kadā orohissathā”ti. “Kahaṃ pana te, moggallāna,
atk-s0502a:2856_8: jeṭṭhabhātiko sāriputto”ti. “Bhante, saṅkassanagare vassaṃ upagato”ti. Moggallāna,
atk-s0502a:2856_9: ahaṃ ito sattame divase mahāpavāraṇāya saṅkassanagaradvāre otarissāmi, maṃ daṭṭhukāmā
atk-s0502a:2856_10: tattha āgacchantu, sāvatthito saṅkassanagaradvāraṃ tiṃsayojanāni, ettake magge kassaci
atk-s0502a:2856_11: pātheyyakiccaṃ natthi, uposathikā hutvā dhuravihāraṃ dhammassavanatthāya gacchantā
atk-s0502a:2856_12: viya āgaccheyyāthāti tesaṃ āroceyyāsīti. Thero “sādhu, bhante”ti gantvā tathā ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:2857_0: Satthā vuṭṭhavasso pavāretvā sakkassa ārocesi – “mahārāja, manussapathaṃ gamissāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2857_1: Sakko suvaṇṇamayaṃ maṇimayaṃ rajatamayanti tīṇi sopānāni māpesi. Tesaṃ pādā saṅkassanagaradvāre
atk-s0502a:2857_2: patiṭṭhahiṃsu, sīsāni sinerumuddhani. Tesu dakkhiṇapasse suvaṇṇamayaṃ sopānaṃ devatānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2857_3: ahosi, vāmapasse rajatamayaṃ sopānaṃ mahābrahmānaṃ ahosi, majjhe maṇimayaṃ sopānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2857_4: tathāgatassa ahosi. Satthāpi sinerumuddhani ṭhatvā devorohaṇasamaye yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ
atk-s0502a:2857_5: katvā uddhaṃ olokesi, yāva brahmalokā ekaṅgaṇā ahesuṃ. Adho olokesi, yāva avīcito
atk-s0502a:2857_6: ekaṅgaṇaṃ ahosi. Disāvidisā olokesi, anekāni cakkavāḷasatasahassāni ekaṅgaṇāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:2857_7: Devā manusse passiṃsu, manussāpi deve passiṃsu, sabbe sammukhāva passiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2858_0: Bhagavā chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo vissajjesi. Taṃ divasaṃ buddhasiriṃ oloketvā chattiṃsayojana
atk-s0502a:2858_1: parimaṇḍalāya parisāya ekopi buddhabhāvaṃ apatthento nāma natthi. Suvaṇṇasopānena
atk-s0502a:2858_2: devā otariṃsu, rajatasopānena mahābrahmāno otariṃsu, maṇisopānena sammāsambuddho
atk-s0502a:2858_3: otari. Pañcasikho gandhabbadevaputto beluvapaṇḍuvīṇaṃ ādāya dakkhiṇapasse ṭhatvā
atk-s0502a:2858_4: satthu gandhabbamadhuradibbavīṇāya saddena pūjaṃ karonto otari, mātali, saṅgāhako
atk-s0502a:2858_5: vāmapasse ṭhatvā dibbagandhamālāpupphaṃ gahetvā namassamāno pūjaṃ katvā otari, mahābrahmā
atk-s0502a:2858_6: chattaṃ dhāresi, suyāmo vālabījaniṃ dhāresi. Satthā iminā parivārena saddhiṃ otaritvā
atk-s0502a:2858_7: saṅkassanagaradvāre patiṭṭhahi. Sāriputtattheropi āgantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā yasmā
atk-s0502a:2858_8: sāriputtattherena tathārūpāya buddhasiriyā otaranto satthā ito pubbe na diṭṭhapubbo, tasmā –
atk-s0502a:2859: “Na me diṭṭho ito pubbe, na suto uda kassaci;
atk-s0502a:2861_0: Ādīhi attano tuṭṭhiṃ pakāsetvā, “bhante, ajja sabbepi devamanussā tumhākaṃ pihayanti,
atk-s0502a:2861_1: patthentī”ti āha. Atha naṃ satthā, “sāriputta, evarūpehi guṇehi samannāgatā buddhā
atk-s0502a:2861_2: devamanussānaṃ piyā hontiyevā”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2865_0: Tattha ye jhānapasutāti lakkhaṇūpanijjhānaṃ ārammaṇūpanijjhānanti imesu dvīsu jhānesu
atk-s0502a:2865_2: ratāti ettha pabbajjā nekkhammanti na gahetabbā, kilesavūpasamanibbānaratiṃ pana
atk-s0502a:2865_3: sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Devāpīti devāpi manussāpi tesaṃ pihayanti patthenti. Satīmatanti
atk-s0502a:2865_4: evarūpaguṇānaṃ tesaṃ satiyā samannāgatānaṃ sambuddhānaṃ. “Aho vata mayaṃ buddhā bhaveyyāmā”ti
atk-s0502a:2866: Desanāvasāne tiṃsamattānaṃ pāṇakoṭīnaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi, therassa saddhivihārikā pañcasatabhikkhū arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2867_0: Sabbabuddhānaṃ kira avijahitameva yamakapāṭihīraṃ katvā devaloke vassaṃ vasitvā saṅkassanagaradvāre
atk-s0502a:2867_1: otaraṇaṃ. Tattha pana dakkhiṇapādassa patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ acalacetiyaṭṭhānaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0502a:2867_2: Satthā tattha ṭhatvā puthujjanādīnaṃ visaye pañhaṃ pucchi, puthujjanā attano visaye
atk-s0502a:2867_3: pañhe vissajjetvā sotāpannavisaye pañhaṃ vissajjetuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu. Tathā sakadāgāmiādīnaṃ
atk-s0502a:2867_4: visaye sotāpannādayo, mahāmoggallānavisaye sesamahāsāvakā, sāriputtattherassa visaye
atk-s0502a:2867_5: mahāmoggallāno, buddhavisaye ca sāriputtopi vissajjetuṃ nāsakkhiyeva. So pācīnadisaṃ
atk-s0502a:2867_6: ādiṃ katvā sabbadisā olokesi, sabbattha ekaṅgaṇameva ahosi. Aṭṭhasu disāsu devamanussā
atk-s0502a:2867_7: uddhaṃ yāva brahmalokā heṭṭhā bhūmaṭṭhā ca yakkhanāgasupaṇṇā añjaliṃ paggahetvā,
atk-s0502a:2867_8: “bhante, idha tassa pañhassa vissajjetā natthi, ettheva upadhārethā”ti āhaṃsu. Satthā
atk-s0502a:2868: “Ye ca saṅkhātadhammāse, ye ca sekhā puthū idha;
atk-s0502a:2869: Tesaṃ me nipako iriyaṃ, puṭṭho pabrūhi mārisā”ti. –
atk-s0502a:2870_0: Imaṃ buddhavisaye puṭṭhapañhaṃ sutvā ‘satthā maṃ sekhāsekhānaṃ āgamanapaṭipadaṃ pucchatī’ti
atk-s0502a:2870_1: pañhe nikkaṅkho, khandhādīsu pana katarena nu kho mukhena imaṃ paṭipadaṃ kathento
atk-s0502a:2870_2: ‘ahaṃ satthu ajjhāsayaṃ gaṇhituṃ na sakkhissāmī’ti mama ajjhāsaye kaṅkhati, so mayā
atk-s0502a:2870_3: naye adinne kathetuṃ na sakkhissati, nayamassa dassāmīti nayaṃ dassento “bhūtamidaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2870_4: sāriputta, samanupassasī”ti āha. Evaṃ kirassa ahosi “sāriputto mama ajjhāsayaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0502a:2870_5: kathento khandhavasena kathessatī”ti. Therassa saha nayadānena so pañho nayasatena
atk-s0502a:2870_6: nayasahassena nayasatasahassena upaṭṭhāsi. So satthārā dinnanaye ṭhatvā taṃ pañhaṃ
atk-s0502a:2870_7: kathesi. Ṭhapetvā kira sammāsambuddhaṃ añño sāriputtattherassa paññaṃ pāpuṇituṃ samattho
atk-s0502a:2870_8: nāma natthi. Teneva kira thero satthu purato ṭhatvā sīhanādaṃ nadi – “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a:2870_9: sakalakappampi deve vuṭṭhe ‘ettakāni bindūni mahāsamudde patitāni, ettakāni bhūmiyaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2870_10: ettakāni pabbate’ti gaṇetvā lekhaṃ āropetuṃ samattho”ti. Satthāpi naṃ “jānāmi, sāriputta,
atk-s0502a:2870_11: gaṇetuṃ samatthabhāva”nti āha. Tassa āyasmato paññāya upamā nāma natthi. Tenevāha –
atk-s0502a:2872: Mahiyā mattikā khīye, na khīye mama buddhiyā”ti.
atk-s0502a:2873_0: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – sace hi, bhante, buddhisampannalokanātha, mayā ekasmiṃ pañhe vissajjite
atk-s0502a:2873_1: ekaṃ vā vālukaṃ ekaṃ vā udakabinduṃ ekaṃ vā paṃsukhaṇḍaṃ akhipitvā pañhānaṃ satena
atk-s0502a:2873_2: vā sahassenavā satasahassena vā vissajjite gaṅgāya vālukādīsu ekekaṃ ekamante khipeyya,
atk-s0502a:2873_3: khippataraṃ gaṅgādīsu vālukādayo parikkhayaṃ gaccheyyuṃ, na tveva mama pañhānaṃ vissajjananti.
atk-s0502a:2873_4: Evaṃ mahāpaññopi hi bhikkhu buddhavisaye pañhassa antaṃ vā koṭiṃ vā adisvā satthārā
atk-s0502a:2873_5: dinnanaye ṭhatvāva pañhaṃ vissajjesi. Taṃ sutvā bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ – “yaṃ
atk-s0502a:2873_6: pañhaṃ puṭṭho sabbopi jano kathetuṃ na sakkhi, taṃ dhammasenāpati sāriputto ekakova
atk-s0502a:2873_7: kathesī”ti. Satthā taṃ kathaṃ sutvā “na idāneva sāriputto yaṃ pañhaṃ mahājano vissajjetuṃ
atk-s0502a:2873_8: nāsakkhi, taṃ vissajjesi, pubbepi anena vissajjitoyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āharituṃ –
atk-s0502a:2881: Kiccho manussapaṭilābhoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā bārāṇasiyaṃ upanissāya sattasirīsakarukkhamūle viharanto erakapattaṃ nāma nāgarājaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2882_0: So kira pubbe kassapabuddhasāsane daharabhikkhu hutvā gaṅgāya nāvaṃ abhiruyha gacchanto
atk-s0502a:2882_1: ekasmiṃ erakagumbe erakapattaṃ gahetvā nāvāya vegasā gacchamānāyapi na muñci, erakapattaṃ
atk-s0502a:2882_2: chijjitvā gataṃ. So “appamattakaṃ eta”nti āpattiṃ adesetvā vīsati vassasahassāni
atk-s0502a:2882_3: araññe samaṇadhammaṃ katvāpi maraṇakāle erakapattena gīvāya gahito viya āpattiṃ desetukāmopi
atk-s0502a:2882_4: aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ apassamāno “aparisuddhaṃ me sīla”nti uppannavippaṭisāro tato cavitvā
atk-s0502a:2882_5: ekarukkhadoṇikanāvappamāṇo nāgarājā hutvā nibbatti, erakapattotvevassa nāmaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0502a:2882_6: So nibbattakkhaṇeyeva attabhāvaṃ oloketvā “ettakaṃ nāma kālaṃ samaṇadhammaṃ katvā
atk-s0502a:2882_7: ahetukayoniyaṃ maṇḍūkabhakkhaṭṭhāne nibbattomhī”ti vippaṭisārī ahosi. So aparabhāge
atk-s0502a:2882_8: ekaṃ dhītaraṃ labhitvā majjhe gaṅgāya udakapiṭṭhe mahantaṃ phalaṃ ukkhipitvā dhītaraṃ
atk-s0502a:2882_9: tasmiṃ ṭhapetvā naccāpetvā gāyāpesi. Evaṃ kirassa ahosi – “addhā ahaṃ idha iminā
atk-s0502a:2882_10: upāyena buddhe uppanne tassa uppannabhāvaṃ suṇissāmī”ti. Yo me gītassa paṭigītaṃ
atk-s0502a:2882_11: āharati, tassa mahantena nāgabhavanena saddhiṃ dhītaraṃ dassāmīti anvaḍḍhamāsaṃ uposathadivase
atk-s0502a:2882_12: taṃ dhītaraṃ phaṇe ṭhapesi. Sā tattha ṭhitā naccantī –
atk-s0502a:2884: Kathaṃsu virajo hoti, kathaṃ bāloti vuccatī”ti. –
atk-s0502a:2886_0: Sakalajambudīpavāsino “nāgamāṇavikaṃ gaṇhissāmā”ti gantvā attano attano paññābalena
atk-s0502a:2886_1: paṭigītaṃ katvā gāyanti. Sā taṃ paṭikkhipati. Tassā anvaḍḍhamāsaṃ phaṇe ṭhatvā evaṃ
atk-s0502a:2886_2: gāyantiyāva ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ vītivattaṃ. Atha amhākaṃ satthā loke uppajjitvā ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0502a:2886_3: paccūsakāle lokaṃ volokento erakapattaṃ ādiṃ katvā uttaramāṇavaṃ nāma attano ñāṇajālassa
atk-s0502a:2886_4: anto paviṭṭhaṃ disvā “kiṃ nu kho bhavissatī”ti āvajjento “ajja erakapattassa dhītaraṃ
atk-s0502a:2886_5: phaṇe ṭhapetvā naccāpanadivaso, ayaṃ uttaramāṇavo mayā dinnaṃ paṭigītaṃ gaṇhantova
atk-s0502a:2886_6: sotāpanno hutvā taṃ ādāya nāgarājassa santikaṃ gamissati. So taṃ sutvā ‘buddho uppanno’ti
atk-s0502a:2886_7: ñatvā mama santikaṃ āgamissati, ahaṃ tasmiṃ āgate mahāsamāgame gāthaṃ kathessāmi,
atk-s0502a:2886_8: gāthāpariyosāne caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo bhavissatī”ti addasa.
atk-s0502a:2886_9: So tattha gantvā bārāṇasito avidūre satta sirīsakarukkhā atthi, tesu ekassa mūle
atk-s0502a:2886_10: nisīdi. Jambudīpavāsino gītapaṭigītaṃ ādāya sannipatiṃsu. Satthā avidūre ṭhāne gacchantaṃ
atk-s0502a:2886_11: uttaramāṇavaṃ disvā “ehi, uttarā”ti āha. “Kiṃ, bhante”ti? “Ito tāva ehī”ti. Atha
atk-s0502a:2886_12: naṃ āgantvā vanditvā nisinnaṃ āha “kahaṃ gacchasī”ti? “Erakapattassa dhītu gāyanaṭṭhāna”nti.
atk-s0502a:2886_13: “Jānāsi pana gītapaṭigīta”nti? “Jānāmi, bhante”ti. “Vadehi tāva na”nti? Atha naṃ
atk-s0502a:2886_14: attano jānananiyāmeneva vadantaṃ “na uttaraṃ etaṃ paṭigītaṃ, ahaṃ te paṭigītaṃ dassāmi,
atk-s0502a:2886_15: ādāya naṃ gamissasī”ti. “Sādhu, bhante”ti. Atha naṃ satthā, uttara, tvaṃ nāgamāṇavikāya gītakāle –
atk-s0502a:2888: Arajjaṃ virajo hoti, rajjaṃ bāloti vuccatī”ti. –
atk-s0502a:2890_0: Māṇavikāya gītassa attho – kiṃsu adhippatī rājāti kiṃ adhippati rājā nāma hoti? Kiṃsu
atk-s0502a:2890_1: rājā rajjissaroti kathaṃ pana rājā rajjissaro nāma hoti? Kathaṃsu virajo hotīti kathaṃ
atk-s0502a:2890_2: nu kho so rājā virajo nāma hotīti?
atk-s0502a:2891_0: Paṭigītassa pana attho – chadvārādhippatī rājāti yo channaṃ dvārānaṃ adhippati, ekadvārepi
atk-s0502a:2891_1: rūpādīhi anabhibhūto, ayaṃ rājā nāma. Rajjamāno rajjissaroti yo pana tesu ārammaṇesu
atk-s0502a:2891_2: rajjati, so rajjamāno rajjissaro nāma. Arajjanti arajjamāno pana virajo nāma hoti.
atk-s0502a:2892: Evamassa satthā paṭigītaṃ datvā, uttara, tayā imasmiṃ gīte gāyite imassa gītassa imaṃ paṭigītaṃ gāyissati –
atk-s0502a:2894: Yogakkhemī kathaṃ hoti, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito”ti.
atk-s0502a:2898: Tassattho – “kāmoghādinā catubbidhena oghena bālo vuyhati, taṃ oghaṃ paṇḍito sammappadhānasaṅkhātena yogena nudati. So sabbehi kāmayogādīhi visaṃyutto yogakkhemī nāma vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2899_0: Uttaro imaṃ paṭigītaṃ gaṇhantova sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. So sotāpanno hutvā taṃ
atk-s0502a:2899_1: gāthaṃ ādāya gantvā, “ambho, mayā gītapaṭigītaṃ āhaṭaṃ, okāsaṃ me dethā”ti vatvā
atk-s0502a:2899_2: nirantaraṃ ṭhitassa mahājanassa jaṇṇunā akkamanto agamāsi. Nāgamāṇavikā pitu phaṇe
atk-s0502a:2899_3: ṭhatvā naccamānā “kiṃsu adhippatī rājā”ti gītaṃ gāyati? Uttaro “chadvārādhippatī
atk-s0502a:2899_4: rājā”ti paṭigītaṃ gāyi. Puna nāgamāṇavikā “kenassu vuyhatī”ti tassa gītaṃ gāyati?
atk-s0502a:2899_5: Athassā paṭigītaṃ gāyanto uttaro “oghena vuyhatī”ti imaṃ gāthamāha. Nāgarājā taṃ
atk-s0502a:2899_6: sutvāva buddhassa uppannabhāvaṃ ñatvā “mayā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ evarūpaṃ padaṃ nāma
atk-s0502a:2899_7: na sutapubbaṃ, uppanno vata, bho, loke buddho”ti tuṭṭhamānaso naṅguṭṭhena udakaṃ
atk-s0502a:2899_8: pahari, mahāvīciyo uṭṭhahiṃsu, ubho tīrāni bhijjiṃsu. Ito cito ca usabhamatte ṭhāne
atk-s0502a:2899_9: manussā udake nimujjiṃsu. So ettakaṃ mahājanaṃ phaṇe ṭhapetvā ukkhipitvā thale patiṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a:2899_10: So uttaraṃ upasaṅkamitvā “kahaṃ, sāmi, satthā”ti pucchi. “Ekasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisinno,
atk-s0502a:2899_11: mahārājā”ti. So “ehi, sāmi, gacchāmā”ti uttarena saddhiṃ agamāsi. Mahājanopi tena
atk-s0502a:2899_12: saddhiṃyeva gato. Nāgarājā gantvā chabbaṇṇaraṃsīnaṃ antaraṃ pavisitvā satthāraṃ vanditvā
atk-s0502a:2899_13: rodamāno aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ satthā āha – “kiṃ idaṃ, mahārājā”ti? “Ahaṃ, bhante, tumhādisassa
atk-s0502a:2899_14: buddhassa sāvako hutvā vīsati vassasahassāni samaṇadhammaṃ akāsiṃ, sopi maṃ samaṇadhammo
atk-s0502a:2899_15: niddhāretuṃ nāsakkhi. Appamattakaṃ erakapattachindanamattaṃ nissāya ahetukapaṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0502a:2899_16: gahetvā urena parisakkanaṭṭhāne nibbattosmi, ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ neva manussattaṃ labhāmi,
atk-s0502a:2899_17: na saddhammassavanaṃ, na tumhādisassa buddhassa dassana”nti satthā tassa kathaṃ sutvā,
atk-s0502a:2899_18: “mahārāja, manussattaṃ nāma dullabhameva, tathā saddhammassavanaṃ, tathā buddhuppādo,
atk-s0502a:2899_19: idaṃ kicchena kasirena labbhatī”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2903_0: Tassattho – mahantena hi vāyāmena mahantena kusalena laddhattā manussattapaṭilābho
atk-s0502a:2903_1: nāma kiccho dullabho. Nirantaraṃ kasikammādīni katvā jīvitavuttiṃ ghaṭanatopi parittaṭṭhāyitāyapi
atk-s0502a:2903_2: maccānaṃ jīvitaṃ kicchaṃ. Anekesupi kappesu dhammadesakassa puggalassa dullabhatāya
atk-s0502a:2903_3: saddhammassavanampi kicchaṃ. Mahantena vāyāmena abhinīhārassa samijjhanato samiddhābhinīhārassa
atk-s0502a:2903_4: ca anekehipi kappakoṭisahassehi dullabhuppādato buddhānaṃ uppādopi kicchoyeva, ativiya dullabhoti.
atk-s0502a:2904_0: Desanāvasāne caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Nāgarājāpi taṃdivasaṃ
atk-s0502a:2904_1: sotāpattiphalaṃ labheyya, tiracchānagatattā pana nālattha. So yesu paṭisandhigahaṇatacajahanavissaṭṭhaniddokkamanasajātiyāmethunasevanacutisaṅkhātesu
atk-s0502a:2904_2: pañcasu ṭhānesu nāgasarīrameva gahetvā kilamanti, tesu akilamanabhāvaṃ patvā māṇavarūpeneva
atk-s0502a:2907: Sabbapāpassa akaraṇanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ānandattherassa pañhaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2908_0: Thero kira divāṭṭhāne nisinno cintesi – “satthārā sattannaṃ buddhānaṃ mātāpitaro
atk-s0502a:2908_1: āyuparicchedo bodhi sāvakasannipāto aggasāvakasannipāto aggasāvakaupaṭṭhākoti idaṃ
atk-s0502a:2908_2: sabbaṃ kathitaṃ, uposatho pana akathito, kiṃ nu kho tesampi ayameva uposatho, añño”ti?
atk-s0502a:2908_3: So satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā tamatthaṃ pucchi. Yasmā pana tesaṃ buddhānaṃ kālabhedova
atk-s0502a:2908_4: ahosi, na kathābhedo. Vipassī sammāsambuddho hi sattame sattame saṃvacchare uposathaṃ
atk-s0502a:2908_5: akāsi. Ekadivasaṃ dinnovādoyeva hissa sattannaṃ saṃvaccharānaṃ alaṃ hoti. Sikhī ceva
atk-s0502a:2908_6: vessabhū ca chaṭṭhe chaṭṭhe saṃvacchare uposathaṃ kariṃsu, kakusandho koṇāgamano
atk-s0502a:2908_7: ca saṃvacchare saṃvacchare. Kassapadasabalo chaṭṭhe chaṭṭhe māse uposathaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a:2908_8: Ekadivasaṃ dinnovādo eva hissa channaṃ māsānaṃ alaṃ ahosi. Tasmā satthā tesaṃ imaṃ
atk-s0502a:2908_9: kālabhedaṃ ārocetvā “ovādagāthā pana nesaṃ imāyevā”ti vatvā sabbesaṃ ekameva uposathaṃ
atk-s0502a:2920: Adhicitte ca āyogo, etaṃ buddhāna sāsana”nti.
atk-s0502a:2921_0: Tattha sabbapāpassāti sabbassa akusalakammassa. Upasampadāti abhinikkhamanato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0502a:2921_1: yāva arahattamaggā kusalassa uppādanañceva uppāditassa ca bhāvanā. Sacittapariyodapananti
atk-s0502a:2921_2: pañcahi nīvaraṇehi attano cittassa vodāpanaṃ. Etaṃ buddhāna sāsananti sabbabuddhānaṃ ayamanusiṭṭhi.
atk-s0502a:2922_0: Khantīti yā esā titikkhāsaṅkhātā khantī nāma, idaṃ imasmiṃ sāsane paramaṃ uttamaṃ
atk-s0502a:2922_1: tapo. Nibbānaṃ paramaṃ vadanti buddhāti buddhā ca paccekabuddhā ca anubuddhā cāti
atk-s0502a:2922_2: ime tayo buddhā nibbānaṃ uttamantī vadanti. Na hi pabbajitoti pāṇiādīhi paraṃ apahananto
atk-s0502a:2922_3: viheṭhento parūpaghātī pabbajito nāma na hoti. Na samaṇoti vuttanayeneva paraṃ viheṭhayanto
atk-s0502a:2923_0: Anūpavādoti anūpavādanañceva anūpavādāpanañca. Anūpaghātoti anūpaghātanañceva anūpaghātāpanañca.
atk-s0502a:2923_1: Pātimokkheti jeṭṭhakasīle. Saṃvaroti pidahanaṃ. Mattaññutāti mattaññubhāvo pamāṇajānanaṃ.
atk-s0502a:2923_2: Pantanti vivittaṃ. Adhicitteti aṭṭhasamāpattisaṅkhāte adhicitte. Āyogoti payogakaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0502a:2923_3: Etanti etaṃ sabbesaṃ buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ. Ettha hi anūpavādena vācasikaṃ sīlaṃ kathitaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2923_4: anūpaghātena kāyikasīlaṃ, “pātimokkhe ca saṃvaro”ti sīlaṃ kathitaṃ, anūpaghātena
atk-s0502a:2923_5: kāyikasīlaṃ, “pātimokkhe ca saṃvaro”ti iminā pātimokkhasīlañceva indriyasaṃvarañca,
atk-s0502a:2923_6: mattaññutāya ājīvapārisuddhi ceva paccayasannisitasīlañca, pantasenāsanena sappāyasenāsanaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2923_7: adhicittena aṭṭha samāpattiyo. Evaṃ imāya gāthāya tissopi sikkhā kathitā eva hontīti.
atk-s0502a:2927: Na kahāpaṇavassenāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ anabhiratabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2928_0: So kira sāsane pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado “asukaṭṭhānaṃ nāma gantvā uddesaṃ uggaṇhāhī”ti
atk-s0502a:2928_1: upajjhāyena pesito tattha agamāsi. Athassa pituno rogo uppajji. So puttaṃ daṭṭhukāmo
atk-s0502a:2928_2: hutvā taṃ pakkosituṃ samatthaṃ kañci alabhitvā puttasokena vippalapantoyeva āsannamaraṇo
