atk-s0502a:2928_3: hutvā “idaṃ me puttassa pattacīvaramūlaṃ kareyyāsī”ti kahāpaṇasataṃ kaniṭṭhassa hatthe
atk-s0502a:2928_4: datvā kālamakāsi. So daharassa āgatakāle pādamūle nipatitvā pavaṭṭento roditvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:2928_5: pitā te vippalapantova kālakato, mayhaṃ pana tena kahāpaṇasataṃ hatthe ṭhapitaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2928_6: tena kiṃ karomī”ti āha. Daharo “na me kahāpaṇehi attho”ti paṭikkhipitvā aparabhāge
atk-s0502a:2928_7: cintesi – “kiṃ me parakulesu piṇḍāya caritvā jīvitena, sakkā taṃ kahāpaṇasataṃ nissāya
atk-s0502a:2928_8: jīvituṃ, vibbhamissāmī”ti. So anabhiratiyā pīḷito vissaṭṭhasajjhāyanakammaṭṭhāno
atk-s0502a:2928_9: paṇḍurogī viya ahosi. Atha naṃ daharasāmaṇerā “kiṃ ida”nti pucchitvā “ukkaṇṭhitomhī”ti
atk-s0502a:2928_10: vutte ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ ācikkhiṃsu. Atha naṃ te satthu santikaṃ netvā satthu dassesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:2928_11: Satthā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ ukkaṇṭhito”ti pucchitvā, “āma, bhante”ti vutte “kasmā evamakāsi,
atk-s0502a:2928_12: atthi pana te koci jīvitapaccayo”ti āha. “Āma, bhante”ti. “Kiṃ te atthī”ti? “Kahāpaṇasataṃ,
atk-s0502a:2928_13: bhante”ti. Tena hi katthaci tāva sakkharā āhara, gaṇetvā jānissāma “sakkā vā tāvattakena
atk-s0502a:2928_14: jīvituṃ, no vā”ti. So sakkharā āhari. Atha naṃ satthā āha – “paribhogatthāya tāva
atk-s0502a:2928_15: paṇṇāsaṃ ṭhapehi, dvinnaṃ goṇānaṃ atthāya catuvīsati, ettakaṃ nāma bījatthāya, yuganaṅgalatthāya,
atk-s0502a:2928_16: kuddālavāsipharasuatthāyā”ti evaṃ gaṇiyamāne taṃ kahāpaṇasataṃ nappahoti. Atha naṃ
atk-s0502a:2928_17: satthā “bhikkhu tava kahāpaṇā appakā, kathaṃ ete nissāya taṇhaṃ pūressasi, atīte
atk-s0502a:2928_18: kira cakkavattirajjaṃ kāretvā apphoṭitamattena dvādasayojanaṭṭhāne kaṭippamāṇena
atk-s0502a:2928_19: ratanavassaṃ vassāpetuṃ samattho yāva chattiṃsa sakkā cavanti, ettakaṃ kālaṃ devarajjaṃ
atk-s0502a:2928_20: kāretvāpi maraṇakāle taṇhaṃ apūretvāva kālamakāsī”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āharitvā
atk-s0502a:2930: Sabbeva dāsā mandhātu, ye pāṇā pathavissitā”ti. –
atk-s0502a:2931: Imissā gāthāya anantarā imā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:2934: Appassādā dukhā kāmā, iti viññāya paṇḍito.
atk-s0502a:2938_0: Tattha kahāpaṇavassenāti yaṃ so apphoṭetvā sattaratanavassaṃ vassāpesi, taṃ idha
atk-s0502a:2938_1: kahāpaṇavassanti vuttaṃ. Tenapi hi vatthukāmakilesakāmesu titti nāma natthi. Evaṃ
atk-s0502a:2938_2: duppūrā esā taṇhā. Appassādāti supinasadisatāya parittasukhā. Dukhāti dukkhakkhandhādīsu
atk-s0502a:2938_3: āgatadukkhavasena pana bahudukkhāva. Iti viññāyāti evamete kāme jānitvā. Api dibbesūti
atk-s0502a:2938_4: sace hi devānaṃ upakappanakakāmehi nimanteyyāpi āyasmā samiddhi viya evampi tesu
atk-s0502a:2938_5: kāmesu ratiṃ na vindatiyeva. Taṇhakkhayaratoti arahatte ceva nibbāne ca abhirato
atk-s0502a:2938_6: hoti, taṃ patthayamāno viharati. Sammāsambuddhasāvakoti sammāsambuddhena desitassa
atk-s0502a:2939: Desanāvasāne so bhikkhu sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattaparisāyapi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:2942: Bahuṃ ve saraṇaṃ yantīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto vālikarāsimhi nisinnaṃ aggidattaṃ nāma kosalarañño purohitaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2943_0: So kira mahākosalassa purohito ahosi. Atha naṃ pitari kālakate rājā pasenadi kosalo
atk-s0502a:2943_1: “pitu me purohito”ti gāravena tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne ṭhapetvā tassa attano upaṭṭhānaṃ āgatakāle
atk-s0502a:2943_2: paccuggamanaṃ karoti, “ācariya, idha nisīdathā”ti samānāsanaṃ dāpesi. So cintesi
atk-s0502a:2943_3: – “ayaṃ rājā mayi ativiya gāravaṃ karoti, na kho pana rājūnaṃ niccakālameva sakkā
atk-s0502a:2943_4: cittaṃ gahetuṃ. Samānavayeneva hi saddhiṃ rajjasukhaṃ nāma sukhaṃ hoti, ahañcamhi
atk-s0502a:2943_5: mahallako, pabbajituṃ me yutta”nti. So rājānaṃ pabbajjaṃ anujānāpetvā nagare bheriṃ
atk-s0502a:2943_6: carāpetvā sattāhena sabbaṃ attano dhanaṃ dānamukhe vissajjetvā bāhirakapabbajjaṃ
atk-s0502a:2943_7: pabbaji. Taṃ nissāya dasa purisasahassāni anupabbajiṃsu. So tehi saddhiṃ aṅgamagadhānañca
atk-s0502a:2943_8: kururaṭṭhassa ca antare vāsaṃ kappetvā imaṃ ovādaṃ deti, “tātā, yassa kāmavitakkādayo
atk-s0502a:2943_9: uppajjanti, so nadito ekekaṃ vālukapuṭaṃ uddharitvā imasmiṃ okiratū”ti. Te “sādhū”ti
atk-s0502a:2943_10: paṭissuṇitvā kāmavitakkādīnaṃ uppannakāle tathā kariṃsu. Aparena samayena mahāvālukarāsi
atk-s0502a:2943_11: ahosi, taṃ ahichatto nāma nāgarājā paṭiggahesi. Aṅgamagadhavāsino ceva kururaṭṭhavāsino
atk-s0502a:2943_12: ca māse māse tesaṃ mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ abhiharitvā dānaṃ denti. Atha nesaṃ aggidatto
atk-s0502a:2943_13: imaṃ ovādaṃ adāsi – “pabbataṃ saraṇaṃ yātha, vanaṃ saraṇaṃ yātha, ārāmaṃ saraṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:2943_14: yātha, rukkhaṃ saraṇaṃ yātha, evaṃ sabbadukkhato muccissathā”ti. Attano antevāsikepi
atk-s0502a:2944_0: Bodhisattopi katābhinikkhamano sammāsambodhiṃ patvā tasmiṃ samaye sāvatthiṃ nissāya
atk-s0502a:2944_1: jetavane viharanto paccūsakāle lokaṃ volokento aggidattabrāhmaṇaṃ saddhiṃ antevāsikehi
atk-s0502a:2944_2: attano ñāṇajālassa anto paviṭṭhaṃ disvā “sabbepi ime arahattassa upanissayasampannā”ti
atk-s0502a:2944_3: ñatvā sāyanhasamaye mahāmoggallānattheraṃ āha – “moggallāna, kiṃ passasi aggidattabrāhmaṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:2944_4: mahājanaṃ atitthe pakkhandāpentaṃ, gaccha tesaṃ ovādaṃ dehī”ti. Bhante, bahū ete,
atk-s0502a:2944_5: ekakassa mayhaṃ avisayhā. Sace tumhepi āgamissatha, visayhā bhavissantīti. Moggallāna,
atk-s0502a:2944_6: ahampi āgamissāmi, tvaṃ purato yāhīti. Thero purato gacchantova cintesi – “ete balavanto
atk-s0502a:2944_7: ceva bahū ca. Sace sabbesaṃ samāgamaṭṭhāne kiñci kathessāmi, sabbepi vaggavaggena
atk-s0502a:2944_8: uṭṭhaheyyu”nti attano ānubhāvena thūlaphusitakaṃ devaṃ vuṭṭhāpesi. Te thūlaphusitakesu
atk-s0502a:2944_9: patantesu uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya attano attano paṇṇasālaṃ pavisiṃsu. Thero aggidattassa brāhmaṇassa
atk-s0502a:2944_10: paṇṇasāladvāre ṭhatvā “aggidattā”ti āha. So therassa saddaṃ sutvā “maṃ imasmiṃ loke
atk-s0502a:2944_11: nāmena ālapituṃ samattho nāma natthi, ko nu kho maṃ nāmena ālapatī”ti mānathaddhatāya
atk-s0502a:2944_12: “ko eso”ti āha. “Ahaṃ, brāhmaṇā”ti. “Kiṃ vadesī”ti? “Ajja me ekarattiṃ idha vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2944_13: tvaṃ ācikkhāhī”ti. “Idha vasanaṭṭhānaṃ natthi, ekassa ekāva paṇṇasālā”ti. “Aggidatta,
atk-s0502a:2944_14: manussā nāma manussānaṃ, gāvo gunnaṃ, pabbajitā pabbajitānaṃ santikaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0502a:2944_15: mā evaṃ kari, dehi me vasanaṭṭhāna”nti. “Kiṃ pana tvaṃ pabbajito”ti? “Āma, pabbajitomhī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2944_16: “Sace pabbajito, kahaṃ te khāribhaṇḍaṃ, ko pabbajitaparikkhāro”ti. “Atthi me parikkhāro,
atk-s0502a:2944_17: visuṃ pana naṃ gahetvā vicarituṃ dukkhanti abbhantareneva naṃ gahetvā vicarāmi, brāhmaṇā”ti.
atk-s0502a:2944_18: So “taṃ gahetvā vicarissasī”ti therassa kujjhi. Atha naṃ so āha – “amhe, aggidatta,
atk-s0502a:2944_19: mā kujjhi, vasanaṭṭhānaṃ me ācikkhāhī”ti. Natthi ettha vasanaṭṭhānanti. Etasmiṃ pana
atk-s0502a:2944_20: vālukarāsimhi ko vasatīti. Eko, nāgarājāti. Etaṃ me dehīti. Na sakkā dātuṃ, bhāriyaṃ
atk-s0502a:2944_21: etassa kammanti. Hotu, dehi meti. Tena hi tvaṃ eva jānāhīti.
atk-s0502a:2945_0: Thero vālukarāsiabhimukho pāyāsi. Nāgarājā taṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā “ayaṃ samaṇo ito
atk-s0502a:2945_1: āgacchati, na jānāti maññe mama atthibhāvaṃ, dhūmāyitvā naṃ māressāmī”ti dhūmāyi.
atk-s0502a:2945_2: Thero “ayaṃ nāgarājā ‘ahameva dhūmāyituṃ sakkomi, aññe na sakkontī’ti maññe sallakkhetī”ti
atk-s0502a:2945_3: sayampi dhūmāyi. Dvinnampi sarīrato uggatā dhūmā yāva brahmalokā uṭṭhahiṃsu. Ubhopi
atk-s0502a:2945_4: dhūmā theraṃ abādhetvā nāgarājānameva bādhenti. Nāgarājā dhūmavegaṃ sahituṃ asakkonto
atk-s0502a:2945_5: pajjali. Theropi tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā tena saddhiṃyeva pajjali. Aggijālā yāva
atk-s0502a:2945_6: brahmalokā uṭṭhahiṃsu. Ubhopi theraṃ abādhetvā nāgarājānameva bādhayiṃsu. Athassa
atk-s0502a:2945_7: sakalasarīraṃ ukkāhi padittaṃ viya ahosi. Isigaṇo oloketvā cintesi – “nāgarājā, samaṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:2945_8: jhāpeti, bhaddako vata samaṇo amhākaṃ vacanaṃ asutvā naṭṭho”ti. Thero nāgarājānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2945_9: dametvā nibbisevanaṃ katvā vālukarāsimhi nisīdi. Nāgarājā vālukarāsiṃ bhogehi parikkhipitvā
atk-s0502a:2945_10: kūṭāgārakucchipamāṇaṃ phaṇaṃ māpetvā therassa upari dhāresi.
atk-s0502a:2946_0: Isigaṇā pātova “samaṇassa matabhāvaṃ vā amatabhāvaṃ vā jānissāmā”ti therassa santikaṃ
atk-s0502a:2946_1: gantvā taṃ vālukarāsimatthake nisinnaṃ disvā añjaliṃ paggayha abhitthavantā āhaṃsu
atk-s0502a:2946_2: – “samaṇa, kacci nāgarājena na bādhito”ti. “Kiṃ na passatha mama upariphaṇaṃ dhāretvā
atk-s0502a:2946_3: ṭhita”nti? Te “acchariyaṃ vata bho, samaṇassa evarūpo nāma nāgarājā damito”ti theraṃ
atk-s0502a:2946_4: parivāretvā aṭṭhaṃsu. Tasmiṃ khaṇe satthā āgato. Thero satthāraṃ disvā uṭṭhāya vandi.
atk-s0502a:2946_5: Atha naṃ isayo āhaṃsu – “ayampi tayā mahantataro”ti. Eso bhagavā satthā, ahaṃ imassa
atk-s0502a:2946_6: sāvakoti. Satthā vālukarāsimatthake nisīdi, isigaṇo “ayaṃ tāva sāvakassa ānubhāvo,
atk-s0502a:2946_7: imassa pana ānubhāvo kīdiso bhavissatī”ti añjaliṃ paggayha satthāraṃ abhitthavi.
atk-s0502a:2946_8: Satthā aggidattaṃ āmantetvā āha – “aggidatta, tvaṃ tava sāvakānañca upaṭṭhākānañca
atk-s0502a:2946_9: ovādaṃ dadamāno kinti vatvā desī”ti. “Etaṃ pabbataṃ saraṇaṃ gacchatha, vanaṃ ārāmaṃ
atk-s0502a:2946_10: rukkhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchatha. Etāni hi saraṇaṃ gato sabbadukkhā pamuccatī”ti evaṃ tesaṃ
atk-s0502a:2946_11: ovādaṃ dammīti. Satthā “na kho, aggidatta, etāni saraṇaṃ gato sabbadukkhā pamuccati,
atk-s0502a:2946_12: buddhaṃ dhammaṃ saṅghaṃ pana saraṇaṃ gantvā sakalavaṭṭadukkhā pamuccatī”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:2948: “Bahuṃ ve saraṇaṃ yanti, pabbatāni vanāni ca;
atk-s0502a:2954: “Yo ca buddhañca dhammañca, saṅghañca saraṇaṃ gato;
atk-s0502a:2962_0: Tattha bahunti bahu. Pabbatānīti tattha tattha isigilivepullavebhārādike pabbate
atk-s0502a:2962_1: ca mahāvanagosiṅgasālavanādīni vanāni ca veḷuvanajīvakambavanādayo ārāme ca udenacetiyagotamacetiyādīni
atk-s0502a:2962_2: rukkhacetyāni ca te te manussā tena tena bhayena tajjitā bhayato muccitukāmā puttalābhādīni
atk-s0502a:2962_3: vā patthayamānā saraṇaṃ yantīti attho. Netaṃ saraṇanti etaṃ sabbampi saraṇaṃ neva
atk-s0502a:2962_4: khemaṃ na uttamaṃ, na ca etaṃ paṭicca jātiādidhammesu sattesu ekopi jātiādito sabbadukkhā pamuccatīti attho.
atk-s0502a:2963_0: Yo cāti idaṃ akhemaṃ anuttamaṃ saraṇaṃ dassetvā khemaṃ uttamaṃ saraṇaṃ dassanatthaṃ
atk-s0502a:2963_1: āraddhaṃ. Tassattho – yo ca gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā “itipi so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”tiādikaṃ
atk-s0502a:2963_2: buddhadhammasaṅghānussatikammaṭṭhānaṃ nissāya seṭṭhavasena buddhañca dhammañca saṅghañca
atk-s0502a:2963_3: saraṇaṃ gato, tassapi taṃ saraṇagamanaṃ aññatitthiyavandanādīhi kuppati calati. Tassa
atk-s0502a:2963_4: pana acalabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ maggena āgatasaraṇameva pakāsanto cattāri ariyasaccāni
atk-s0502a:2963_5: sammappaññāya passatīti āha. Yo hi etesaṃ saccānaṃ dassanavasena etāni saraṇaṃ gato,
atk-s0502a:2963_6: etassa etaṃ saraṇaṃ khemañca uttamañca, so ca puggalo etaṃ saraṇaṃ paṭicca sakalasmāpi
atk-s0502a:2963_7: vaṭṭadukkhā pamuccati, tasmā etaṃ kho saraṇaṃ khemantiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0502a:2964_0: Desanāvasāne sabbepi te isayo saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā satthāraṃ vanditvā
atk-s0502a:2964_1: pabbajjaṃ yāciṃsu. Satthāpi cīvaragabbhato hatthaṃ pasāretvā “etha bhikkhavo, caratha
atk-s0502a:2964_2: brahmacariya”nti āha. Te taṅkhaṇeyeva aṭṭhaparikkhāradharā vassasaṭṭhikatherā viya
atk-s0502a:2964_3: ahesuṃ. So ca sabbesampi aṅgamagadhakururaṭṭhavāsīnaṃ sakkāraṃ ādāya āgamanadivaso
atk-s0502a:2964_4: ahosi. Te sakkāraṃ ādāya āgatā sabbepi te isayo pabbajite disvā “kiṃ nu kho amhākaṃ
atk-s0502a:2964_5: aggidattabrāhmaṇo mahā, udāhu samaṇo gotamo”ti cintetvā samaṇassa gotamassa āgatattā
atk-s0502a:2964_6: “aggidattova mahā”ti maññiṃsu. Satthā tesaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ oloketvā, “aggidatta, parisāya
atk-s0502a:2964_7: kaṅkhaṃ chindā”ti āha. So “ahampi ettakameva paccāsīsāmī”ti iddhibalena sattakkhattuṃ
atk-s0502a:2964_8: vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā punappunaṃ oruyha satthāraṃ vanditvā “satthā me, bhante, bhagavā,
atk-s0502a:2967: Dullabhoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ānandattherassa pañhaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2968_0: Thero hi ekadivasaṃ divāṭṭhāne nisinno cintesi – “hatthājānīyo chaddantakule vā uposathakule
atk-s0502a:2968_1: vā uppajjati, assājānīyo sindhavakule vā valāhakassarājakule vā, usabho goājanīyo
atk-s0502a:2968_2: dakkhiṇapathetiādīni vadantena satthārā hatthiājānīyādīnaṃ uppattiṭṭhānādīni kathitāni,
atk-s0502a:2968_3: purisājānīyo pana kahaṃ nu kho uppajjatī”ti. So satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā
atk-s0502a:2968_4: ekamantaṃ nisīditvā etamatthaṃ pucchi. Satthā, “ānanda, purisājānīyo nāma sabbattha
atk-s0502a:2968_5: nuppajjati, ujukato pana tiyojanasatāyāme vitthārato aḍḍhateyyasate āvaṭṭato navayojanasatappamāṇe
atk-s0502a:2968_6: majjhimapadesaṭṭhāne uppajjati. Uppajjanto ca pana na yasmiṃ vā tasmiṃ vā kule uppajjati,
atk-s0502a:2968_7: khattiyamahāsālabrāhmaṇamahāsālakulānaṃ pana aññatarasmiṃyeva uppajjatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2971: Yattha so jāyatī dhīro, taṃ kulaṃ sukhamedhatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2972_0: Tattha dullabhoti purisājañño hi dullabho, na hatthiājānīyādayo viya sulabho, so
atk-s0502a:2972_1: sabbattha paccantadese vā nīcakule vā na jāyati, majjhimadesepi mahājanassa abhivādanādisakkārakaraṇaṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a:2972_2: khattiyabrāhmaṇakulānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ kule jāyati. Evaṃ jāyamāno yattha so jāyati
atk-s0502a:2972_3: dhīro uttamapañño sammāsambuddho, taṃ kulaṃ sukhamedhatīti sukhappattameva hotīti attho.
atk-s0502a:2976: Sukho buddhānanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sambahulānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kathaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2977_0: Ekadivasañhi pañcasatabhikkhū upaṭṭhānasālāyaṃ nisinnā, “āvuso, kiṃ nu kho imasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:2977_1: loke sukha”nti kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ? Tattha keci “rajjasukhasadisaṃ sukhaṃ nāma natthī”ti
atk-s0502a:2977_2: āhaṃsu. Keci kāmasukhasadisaṃ, keci “sālimaṃsabhojanādisadisaṃ sukhaṃ nāma natthī”ti
atk-s0502a:2977_3: āhaṃsu. Satthā tesaṃ nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya
atk-s0502a:2977_4: sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte, “bhikkhave, kiṃ kathetha? Idañhi sabbampi
atk-s0502a:2977_5: sukhaṃ vaṭṭadukkhapariyāpannameva, imasmiṃ loke buddhuppādo dhammassavanaṃ, saṅghasāmaggī,
atk-s0502a:2977_6: sammodamānabhāvoti idameva sukha”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2980: Sukhā saṅghassa sāmaggī, samaggānaṃ tapo sukho”ti.
atk-s0502a:2981_0: Tattha buddhānamuppādoti yasmā buddhā uppajjamānā mahājanaṃ rāgakantārādīhi tārenti,
atk-s0502a:2981_1: tasmā buddhānaṃ uppādo sukho uttamo. Yasmā saddhammadesanaṃ āgamma jātiādidhammā
atk-s0502a:2981_2: sattā jātiādīhi muccanti, tasmā saddhammadesanā sukhā. Sāmaggīti samacittatā, sāpi
atk-s0502a:2981_3: sukhā eva. Samaggānaṃ pana ekacittānaṃ yasmā buddhavacanaṃ vā uggaṇhituṃ dhutaṅgāni
atk-s0502a:2981_4: vā pariharituṃ samaṇadhammaṃ vā kātuṃ sakkā, tasmā samaggānaṃ tapo sukhoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0502a:2981_5: Tenevāha – “yāvakīvañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhū samaggā sannipatissanti, sammaggā vuṭṭhahissanti,
atk-s0502a:2981_6: samaggā saṅghakaraṇīyāni karissanti, vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṃ pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihānī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2982: Desanāvasāne te bhikkhū arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu, mahājanassāpi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:2985: Pūjāraheti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā cārikaṃ caramāno kassapadasabalassa suvaṇṇacetiyaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2986_0: Tathāgato sāvatthito nikkhamitvā anupubbena bārāṇasiṃ gacchanto antarāmagge todeyyagāmassa
atk-s0502a:2986_1: samīpe mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivāro aññataraṃ devaṭṭhānaṃ sampāpuṇi. Tatra nisinno sugato
atk-s0502a:2986_2: dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṃ pesetvā avidūre kasikammaṃ karontaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ pakkosāpesi. So
atk-s0502a:2986_3: brāhmaṇo āgantvā tathāgataṃ anabhivanditvā tameva devaṭṭhānaṃ vanditvā aṭṭhāsi. Sugatopi
atk-s0502a:2986_4: “imaṃ padesaṃ kinti maññasi brāhmaṇā”ti āha. Amhākaṃ paveṇiyā āgatacetiyaṭṭhānanti
atk-s0502a:2986_5: vandāmi, bho gotamāti. “Imaṃ ṭhānaṃ vandantena tayā sādhu kataṃ brāhmaṇā”ti sugato
atk-s0502a:2986_6: taṃ sampahaṃsesi. Taṃ sutvā bhikkhū “kena nu kho kāraṇena bhagavā evaṃ sampahaṃsesī”ti
atk-s0502a:2986_7: saṃsayaṃ sañjanesuṃ. Tato tathāgato tesaṃ saṃsayamapanetuṃ majjhimanikāye ghaṭikārasuttantaṃ
atk-s0502a:2986_8: vatvā iddhānubhāvena kassapadasabalassa yojanubbedhaṃ kanakacetiyaṃ aparañca kanakacetiyaṃ
atk-s0502a:2986_9: ākāse nimminitvā mahājanaṃ dassetvā, “brāhmaṇa, evaṃvidhānaṃ pūjārahānaṃ pūjā yuttatarāvā”ti
atk-s0502a:2986_10: vatvā mahāparinibbānasutte dassitanayeneva buddhādike cattāro thūpārahe pakāsetvā
atk-s0502a:2986_11: sarīracetiyaṃ uddissacetiyaṃ paribhogacetiyanti tīṇi cetiyāni visesato paridīpetvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:2992: Na sakkā puññaṃ saṅkhātuṃ, imettamapi kenacī”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:2993_0: Tattha pūjituṃ arahā pūjārahā, pūjituṃ yuttāti attho. Pūjārahe pūjayatoti abhivādanādīhi
atk-s0502a:2993_1: ca catūhi ca paccayehi pūjentassa. Pūjārahe dasseti buddhetiādinā. Buddheti sammāsambuddhe.
atk-s0502a:2993_2: Yadīti yadi vā, atha vāti attho. Tattha paccekabuddheti kathitaṃ hoti, sāvake ca.
atk-s0502a:2993_4: ime dve atikkanteti attho. Etehi pūjārahattaṃ dassitaṃ.
atk-s0502a:2994_0: Teti buddhādayo. Tādiseti vuttagahaṇavasena. Nibbuteti rāgādinibbutiyā. Natthi kutoci
atk-s0502a:2994_1: bhavato vā ārammaṇato vā etesaṃ bhayanti akutobhayā, te akutobhaye. Na sakkā puññaṃ
atk-s0502a:2994_2: saṅkhātunti puññaṃ gaṇetuṃ na sakkā. Kathanti ce? Imettamapi kenacīti imaṃ ettakaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2994_3: imaṃ ettakanti kenacīti apisaddo idha sambandhitabbo, kenaci puggalena mānena vā.
atk-s0502a:2994_4: Tattha puggalenāti tena brahmādinā. Mānenāti tividhena mānena tīraṇena dhāraṇena
atk-s0502a:2994_5: pūraṇena vā. Tīraṇaṃ nāma idaṃ ettakanti nayato tīraṇaṃ. Dhāraṇanti tulāya dhāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0502a:2994_6: Pūraṇaṃ nāma aḍḍhapasatapatthanāḷikādivasena pūraṇaṃ. Kenaci puggalena imehi tīhi
atk-s0502a:2994_7: mānehi buddhādike pūjayato puññaṃ vipākavasena gaṇetuṃ na sakkā pariyantarahitatoti
atk-s0502a:2994_8: dvīsu ṭhānesu pūjayato kiṃ dānaṃ paṭhamaṃ dharamāne buddhādī pūjayato na sakkā puññaṃ
atk-s0502a:2994_9: saṅkhātuṃ, puna te tādise kilesaparinibbānanimittena khandhaparinibbānena nibbutepi
atk-s0502a:2994_10: pūjayato na sakkā saṅkhātunti bhedā yujjanti. Tena hi vimānavatthumhi –
atk-s0502a:2995: “Tiṭṭhante nibbute cāpi, same citte samaṃ phalaṃ;
atk-s0502a:2997_0: Desanāvasāne so brāhmaṇo sotāpanno ahosīti. Yojanikaṃ kanakacetiyaṃ sattāhamākāseva
atk-s0502a:2997_1: aṭṭhāsi, mahantena samāgamo cāhosi, sattāhaṃ cetiyaṃ nānappakārena pūjesuṃ. Tato
atk-s0502a:2997_2: bhinnaladdhikānaṃ laddhibhedo jāto, buddhānubhāvena taṃ cetiyaṃ sakaṭṭhānameva gataṃ,
atk-s0502a:2997_3: tattheva taṃkhaṇe mahantaṃ pāsāṇacetiyaṃ ahosi. Tasmiṃ samāgame caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ
atk-s0502a:3004: Susukhaṃ vatāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā sakkesu viharanto kalahavūpasamanatthaṃ ñātake ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3005_0: Sākiyakoliyā kira kapilavatthunagarassa ca koliyanagarassa ca antare rohiṇiṃ nāma
atk-s0502a:3005_1: nadiṃ ekeneva āvaraṇena bandhāpetvā sassāni karonti. Atha jeṭṭhamūlamāse sassesu
atk-s0502a:3005_2: milāyantesu ubhayanagaravāsikānampi kammakārā sannipatiṃsu. Tattha koliyanagaravāsino
atk-s0502a:3005_3: āhaṃsu – “idaṃ udakaṃ ubhayato hariyamānaṃ neva tumhākaṃ, na amhākaṃ pahossati, amhākaṃ
atk-s0502a:3005_4: pana sassaṃ ekaudakeneva nipphajjissati, idaṃ udakaṃ amhākaṃ dethā”ti. Itarepi āhaṃsu
atk-s0502a:3005_5: – “tumhesu koṭṭhake pūretvā ṭhitesu mayaṃ rattasuvaṇṇanīlamaṇikāḷakahāpaṇe ca gahetvā
atk-s0502a:3005_6: pacchipasibbakādihatthā na sakkhissāma tumhākaṃ gharadvāre vicarituṃ, amhākampi sassaṃ
atk-s0502a:3005_7: ekaudakeneva nipphajjissati, idaṃ udakaṃ amhākaṃ dethā”ti. Na mayaṃ dassāmāti. Mayampi
atk-s0502a:3005_8: na dassāmāti evaṃ kathaṃ vaḍḍhetvā eko uṭṭhāya ekassa pahāraṃ adāsi, sopi aññassāti
atk-s0502a:3005_9: evaṃ aññamaññaṃ paharitvā rājakulānaṃ jātiṃ ghaṭṭetvā kalahaṃ vaḍḍhayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3006_0: Koliyakammakārā vadanti – “tumhe kapilavatthuvāsike gahetvā gajjatha, ye soṇasiṅgālādayo
atk-s0502a:3006_1: viya attano bhaginīhi saddhiṃ saṃvasiṃsu, etesaṃ hatthino ceva assā ca phalakāvudhāni
atk-s0502a:3006_2: ca amhākaṃ kiṃ karissantī”ti. Sākiyakammakārāpi vadanti “tumhe idāni kuṭṭhino dārake
atk-s0502a:3006_3: gahetvā gajjatha, ye anāthā niggatikā tiracchānā viya kolarukkhe vasiṃsu, etesaṃ
atk-s0502a:3006_4: hatthino ca assā ca phalakāvudhāni ca amhākaṃ kiṃ karissantī”ti. Te gantvā tasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:3006_5: kamme niyuttānaṃ amaccānaṃ kathayiṃsu, amaccā rājakulānaṃ kathesuṃ. Tato sākiyā “bhaginīhi
atk-s0502a:3006_6: saddhiṃ saṃvasitakānaṃ thāmañca balañca dassessāmā”ti yuddhasajjā nikkhamiṃsu. Koliyāpi
atk-s0502a:3007_0: Satthāpi paccūsasamaye lokaṃ volokento ñātake disvā “mayi agacchante ime nassissanti,
atk-s0502a:3007_1: mayā gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā ekakova ākāsena gantvā rohiṇinadiyā majjhe ākāse
atk-s0502a:3007_2: pallaṅkena nisīdi. Ñātakā satthāraṃ disvā āvudhāni chaḍḍetvā vandiṃsu. Atha ne satthā
atk-s0502a:3007_3: āha – “kiṃ kalaho nāmesa, mahārājā”ti? “Na jānāma, bhante”ti. “Ko dāni jānissatī”ti?
atk-s0502a:3007_4: Te “uparājā jānissati, senāpati jānissatī”ti iminā upāyena yāva dāsakammakare pucchitvā,
atk-s0502a:3007_5: “bhante, udakakalaho”ti āhaṃsu. “Udakaṃ kiṃ agghati, mahārājā”ti? “Appagghaṃ, bhante”ti.
atk-s0502a:3007_6: “Khattiyā kiṃ agghanti mahārājā”ti? “Khattiyā nāma anagghā, bhante”ti. “Ayuttaṃ tumhākaṃ
atk-s0502a:3007_7: appamattataṃ udakaṃ nissāya anagghe khattiye nāsetu”nti. Te tuṇhī ahesuṃ. Atha te
atk-s0502a:3007_8: satthā āmantetvā “kasmā mahārājā evarūpaṃ karotha, mayi asante ajja lohitanadī pavattissati,
atk-s0502a:3007_9: ayuttaṃ vo kataṃ, tumhe pañcahi verehi saverā viharatha, ahaṃ avero viharāmi. Tumhe
atk-s0502a:3007_10: kilesāturā hutvā viharatha, ahaṃ anāturo. Tumhe kāmaguṇapariyesanussukkā hutvā viharatha,
atk-s0502a:3007_11: ahaṃ anussukko viharāmī”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3017_0: Tattha susukhanti suṭṭhu sukhaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – ye gihino sandhicchedādivasena,
atk-s0502a:3017_1: pabbajitā vā pana vejjakammādivasena jīvitavuttiṃ uppādetvā “sukhena jīvāmā”ti vadanti,
atk-s0502a:3017_2: tehi mayameva susukhaṃ vata jīvāma, ye mayaṃ pañcahi verīhi verinesu manussesu averino,
atk-s0502a:3017_3: kilesāturesu manussesu nikkilesatāya anāturā, pañcakāmaguṇapariyesane ussukesu tāya
atk-s0502a:3021: Susukhaṃ vata jīvāmāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā pañcasālāya brāhmaṇagāme viharanto māraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3022_0: Ekadivasañhi satthā pañcasatānaṃ kumārikānaṃ sotāpattimaggassūpanissayaṃ disvā taṃ
atk-s0502a:3022_1: gāmaṃ upanissāya vihāsi. Tāpi kumārikāyo ekasmiṃ nakkhattadivase nadiṃ gantvā nhatvā
atk-s0502a:3022_2: alaṅkatapaṭiyattā gāmābhimukhiyo pāyiṃsu. Satthāpi taṃ gāmaṃ pavisitvā piṇḍāya carati.
atk-s0502a:3022_3: Atha māro sakalagāmavāsīnaṃ sarīre adhimuccitvā yathā satthā kaṭacchubhattamattampi
atk-s0502a:3022_4: na labhati, evaṃ katvā yathādhotena pattena nikkhamantaṃ satthāraṃ gāmadvāre ṭhatvā
atk-s0502a:3022_5: āha – “api, samaṇa, piṇḍapātaṃ labhitthā”ti. “Kiṃ pana tvaṃ, pāpima, tathā akāsi,
atk-s0502a:3022_6: yathāhaṃ piṇḍaṃ na labheyya”nti? “Tena hi, bhante, puna pavisathā”ti. Evaṃ kirassa
atk-s0502a:3022_7: ahosi – “sace puna pavisati, sabbesaṃ sarīre adhimuccitvā imassa purato pāṇiṃ paharitvā
atk-s0502a:3022_8: hassakeḷiṃ karissāmī”ti. Tasmiṃ khaṇe tā kumārikāyo gāmadvāraṃ patvā satthāraṃ disvā
atk-s0502a:3022_9: vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu. Māropi satthāraṃ āha – “api, bhante, piṇḍaṃ alabhamānā
atk-s0502a:3022_10: jighacchādukkhena pīḷitatthā”ti. Satthā “ajja mayaṃ, pāpima, kiñci alabhitvāpi ābhassaraloke
atk-s0502a:3022_11: mahābrahmāno viya pītisukheneva vītināmessāmā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3024: “Susukhaṃ vata jīvāma, yesaṃ no natthi kiñcanaṃ;
atk-s0502a:3026_0: Tattha yesaṃ noti yesaṃ amhākaṃ palibujjhanatthena rāgādīsu kiñcanesu ekampi kiñcanaṃ
atk-s0502a:3026_1: natthi. Pītibhakkhāti yathā ābhassarā devā pītibhakkhā hutvā pītisukheneva vītināmenti,
atk-s0502a:3026_2: evaṃ mayampi, pāpima, kiñci alabhitvā pītibhakkhā bhavissāmāti attho.
atk-s0502a:3030: Jayaṃ veranti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kosalarañño parājayaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3031_0: So kira kāsikagāmaṃ nissāya bhāgineyyena ajātasattunā saddhiṃ yujjhanto tena tayo
atk-s0502a:3031_1: vāre parājito tatiyavāre cintesi – “ahaṃ khīramukhampi dārakaṃ parājetuṃ nāsakkhiṃ,
atk-s0502a:3031_2: kiṃ me jīvitenā”ti. So āhārūpacchedaṃ katvā mañcake nipajji. Athassa sā pavatti sakalanagaraṃ
atk-s0502a:3031_3: patthari. Bhikkhū tathāgatassa ārocesuṃ – “bhante, rājā kira kāsikagāmakaṃ nissāya
atk-s0502a:3031_4: tayo vāre parājito, so idāni parājitvā āgato ‘khīramukhampi dārakaṃ parājetuṃ nāsakkhiṃ,
atk-s0502a:3031_5: kiṃ me jīvitenā’ti āhārūpacchedaṃ katvā mañcake nipanno”ti. Satthā tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā,
atk-s0502a:3031_6: “bhikkhave, jinantopi veraṃ pasavati, parājito pana dukkhaṃ setiyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3035_0: Tattha jayanti paraṃ jinanto veraṃ paṭilabhati. Parājitoti parena parājito “kadā
atk-s0502a:3035_1: nu kho paccāmittassa piṭṭhiṃ daṭṭhuṃ sakkhissāmī”ti dukkhaṃ seti sabbiriyāpathesu
atk-s0502a:3035_2: dukkhameva viharatīti attho. Upasantoti abbhantare upasantarāgādikileso khīṇāsavo
atk-s0502a:3035_3: jayañca parājayañca hitvā sukhaṃ seti, sabbiriyāpathesu sukhameva viharatīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3039: Natthi rāgasamoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ kuladārikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3040_0: Tassā kira mātāpitaro āvāhaṃ katvā maṅgaladivase satthāraṃ nimantayiṃsu. Satthā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto
atk-s0502a:3040_1: tattha gantvā nisīdi. Sāpi kho vadhukā bhikkhusaṅghassa udakaparissāvanādīni karontī
atk-s0502a:3040_2: aparāparaṃ sañcarati. Sāmikopissā taṃ olokento aṭṭhāsi. Tassa rāgavasena olokentassa
atk-s0502a:3040_3: anto kileso samudācari. So aññāṇābhibhūto neva buddhaṃ upaṭṭhahi, na asīti mahāthere.
atk-s0502a:3040_4: Hatthaṃ pasāretvā “taṃ vadhukaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti pana cittaṃ akāsi. Satthā tassajjhāsayaṃ
atk-s0502a:3040_5: oloketvā yathā taṃ itthiṃ na passati, evamakāsi. So adisvā satthāraṃ olokento aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:3040_6: Satthā tassa oloketvā ṭhitakāle “kumāraka, na hi rāgagginā sadiso aggi nāma, dosakalinā
atk-s0502a:3040_7: sadiso kali nāma, khandhapariharaṇadukkhena sadisaṃ dukkhaṃ nāma atthi, nibbānasukhasadisaṃ
atk-s0502a:3043: Natthi khandhasamā dukkhā, natthi santiparaṃ sukha”nti.
atk-s0502a:3044_0: Tattha natthi rāgasamoti dhūmaṃ vā jālaṃ vā aṅgāraṃ vā adassetvā antoyeva jhāpetvā
atk-s0502a:3044_1: bhasmamuṭṭhiṃ kātuṃ samattho rāgena samo añño aggi nāma natthi. Kalīti dosena samo
atk-s0502a:3044_2: aparādhopi natthi. Khandhasamāti khandhehi samā. Yathā parihariyamānā khandhā dukkhā,
atk-s0502a:3044_3: evaṃ aññaṃ dukkhaṃ nāma natthi. Santiparanti nibbānato uttariṃ aññaṃ sukhampi natthi.
atk-s0502a:3044_4: Aññañhi sukhaṃ sukhameva, nibbānaṃ paramasukhanti attho.
atk-s0502a:3045: Desanāvasāne kumārikā ca kumārako ca sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu. Tasmiṃ samaye bhagavā tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ dassanākāraṃ akāsīti.
atk-s0502a:3048: Jighacchāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā āḷaviyaṃ viharanto ekaṃ upāsakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3049_0: Ekasmiñhi divase satthā jetavane gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnova paccūsakāle lokaṃ volokento
atk-s0502a:3049_1: āḷaviyaṃ ekaṃ duggatamanussaṃ disvā tassūpanissayasampattiṃ ñatvā pañcasatabhikkhuparivāro
atk-s0502a:3049_2: āḷaviṃ agamāsi. Āḷavivāsino satthāraṃ nimantayiṃsu. Sopi duggatamanusso “satthā kira
atk-s0502a:3049_3: āgato”ti sutvā “satthu santike dhammaṃ sossāmī”ti manaṃ akāsi. Taṃdivasameva cassa
atk-s0502a:3049_4: eko goṇo palāyi. So “kiṃ nu kho goṇaṃ pariyesissāmi, udāhu dhammaṃ suṇāmī”ti cintetvā
atk-s0502a:3049_5: “goṇaṃ pariyesitvā pacchā dhammaṃ sossāmī”ti pātova gehā nikkhami. Āḷavivāsinopi
atk-s0502a:3049_6: buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nisīdāpetvā parivisitvā anumodanatthāya pattaṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3049_7: Satthā “yaṃ nissāya ahaṃ tiṃsayojanamaggaṃ āgato, so goṇaṃ pariyesituṃ araññaṃ paviṭṭho,
atk-s0502a:3049_8: tasmiṃ āgateyeva dhammaṃ desessāmī”ti tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0502a:3050_0: Sopi manusso divā goṇaṃ disvā gogaṇe pakkhipitvā “sacepi aññaṃ natthi, satthu vandanamattampi
atk-s0502a:3050_1: karissāmī”ti jighacchāpīḷitopi gehaṃ gamanāya manaṃ akatvā vegena satthu santikaṃ
atk-s0502a:3050_2: āgantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Satthā tassa ṭhitakāle dānaveyyāvaṭikaṃ
atk-s0502a:3050_3: āha – “atthi kiñci bhikkhusaṅghassa atirittabhatta”nti? “Bhante, sabbaṃ atthī”ti.
atk-s0502a:3050_4: Tena hi “imaṃ parivisāhī”ti. So satthārā vuttaṭṭhāneyeva taṃ nisīdāpetvā yāgukhādanīyabhojanīyehi
atk-s0502a:3050_5: sakkaccaṃ parivisi. So bhuttabhatto mukhaṃ vikkhālesi. Ṭhapetvā kira imaṃ ṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:3050_6: tīsu piṭakesu aññattha gatāgatassa bhattavicāraṇaṃ nāma natthi. Tassa passaddhadarathassa
atk-s0502a:3050_7: cittaṃ ekaggaṃ ahosi. Athassa satthā anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathetvā saccāni pakāsesi.
atk-s0502a:3050_8: So desanāvasāne sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. Satthāpi anumodanaṃ katvā uṭṭhāyāsanā
atk-s0502a:3051_0: Bhikkhū satthārā saddhiṃ gacchantāyeva ujjhāyiṃsu – “passathāvuso, satthu kammaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3051_1: aññesu divasesu evarūpaṃ natthi, ajja panekaṃ manussaṃ disvāva yāguādīni vicāretvā
atk-s0502a:3051_2: dāpesī”ti. Satthā nivattitvā ṭhitakova “kiṃ kathetha, bhikkhave”ti pucchitvā tamatthaṃ
atk-s0502a:3051_3: sutvā “āma, bhikkhave, ahaṃ tiṃsayojanaṃ kantāraṃ āgacchanto tassa upāsakassūpanissayaṃ
atk-s0502a:3051_4: disvā āgato, so ativiya jighacchito, pātova paṭṭhāya goṇaṃ pariyesanto araññe vicari.
atk-s0502a:3051_5: ‘Jighacchadukkhena dhamme desiyamānepi paṭivijjhituṃ na sakkhissatī’ti cintetvā evaṃ
atk-s0502a:3051_6: akāsiṃ, jighacchārogasadiso rogo nāma natthī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3054: Etaṃ ñatvā yathābhūtaṃ, nibbānaṃ paramaṃ sukha”nti.
atk-s0502a:3055_0: Tattha jighacchāparamā rogāti yasmā añño rogo sakiṃ tikicchito vinassati vā tadaṅgavasena
atk-s0502a:3055_1: vā pahīyati, jighacchā pana niccakālaṃ tikicchitabbāyevāti sesarogānaṃ ayaṃ paramā
atk-s0502a:3055_2: nāma. Saṅkhārāti pañca khandhā. Etaṃ ñatvāti jighacchāsamo rogo natthi, khandhapariharaṇasamaṃ
atk-s0502a:3055_3: dukkhaṃ nāma natthīti etamatthaṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñatvā paṇḍito nibbānaṃ sacchi karoti.
atk-s0502a:3055_4: Nibbānaṃ paramaṃ sukhanti tañhi sabbasukhānaṃ paramaṃ uttamaṃ sukhanti attho.
atk-s0502a:3059: Ārogyaparamā lābhāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto rājānaṃ pasenadikosalaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3060_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye rājā taṇḍuladoṇassa odanaṃ tadupiyena sūpabyañjanena bhuñjati. Ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0502a:3060_1: bhuttapātarāso bhattasammadaṃ avinodetvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā kilantarūpo ito cito
atk-s0502a:3060_2: ca samparivattati, niddāya abhibhūyamānopi ujukaṃ nipajjituṃ asakkonto ekamantaṃ
atk-s0502a:3060_3: nisīdi. Atha naṃ satthā āha – “kiṃ, mahārāja, avissamitvāva āgatosī”ti? “Āma, bhante,
atk-s0502a:3060_4: bhuttakālato paṭṭhāya me mahādukkhaṃ hotī”ti. Atha naṃ satthā, “mahārāja, atibahubhojanaṃ
atk-s0502a:3060_5: evaṃ dukkhaṃ hotī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3065: Imāya gāthāya ovaditvā, “mahārāja, bhojanaṃ nāma mattāya bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Mattabhojino hi sukhaṃ hotī”ti uttari ovadanto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3070_0: Rājā gāthaṃ uggaṇhituṃ nāsakkhi, samīpe ṭhitaṃ pana bhāgineyyaṃ, sudassanaṃ nāma
atk-s0502a:3070_1: māṇavaṃ “imaṃ gāthaṃ uggaṇha, tātā”ti āha. So taṃ gāthaṃ uggaṇhitvā “kiṃ karomi,
atk-s0502a:3070_2: bhante”ti satthāraṃ pucchi. Atha naṃ satthā āha – “rañño bhuñjantassa osānapiṇḍakāle
atk-s0502a:3070_3: imaṃ gāthaṃ vadeyyāsi, rājā atthaṃ sallakkhetvā yaṃ piṇḍaṃ chaḍḍessati, tasmiṃ piṇḍe
atk-s0502a:3070_4: sitthagaṇanāya rañño bhattapacanakāle tattake taṇḍule hareyyāsī”ti. So “sādhu, bhante”ti
atk-s0502a:3070_5: sāyampi pātopi rañño bhuñjantassa osānapiṇḍakāle taṃ gāthaṃ udāharitvā tena chaḍḍitapiṇḍe
atk-s0502a:3070_6: sitthagaṇanāya taṇḍule hāpesi. Rājāpi tassa gāthaṃ sutvā sahassaṃ sahassaṃ dāpesi.
atk-s0502a:3070_7: So aparena samayena nāḷikodanaparamatāya saṇṭhahitvā sukhappatto tanusarīro ahosi.
atk-s0502a:3071_0: Athekadivasaṃ satthu santikaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā āha – “bhante, idāni me sukhaṃ
atk-s0502a:3071_1: jātaṃ, migampi assampi anubandhitvā gaṇhanasamattho jātomhi. Pubbe me bhāgineyyena
atk-s0502a:3071_2: saddhiṃ yuddhameva hoti, idāni vajīrakumāriṃ nāma dhītaraṃ bhāgineyyassa datvā so
atk-s0502a:3071_3: gāmo tassāyeva nhānacuṇṇamūlaṃ katvā dinno, tena saddhiṃ viggaho vūpasanto, imināpi
atk-s0502a:3071_4: me kāraṇena sukhameva jātaṃ. Kulasantakaṃ rājamaṇiratanaṃ no gehe purimadivase naṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3071_5: tampi idāni hatthapattaṃ āgataṃ, imināpi me kāraṇena sukhameva jātaṃ. Tumhākaṃ sāvakehi
atk-s0502a:3071_6: saddhiṃ vissāsaṃ icchantena ñātidhītāpi no gehe katā, imināpi me kāraṇena sukhameva
atk-s0502a:3071_7: jāta”nti. Satthā “ārogyaṃ nāma, mahārāja, paramo lābho, yathāladdhena santuṭṭhabhāvasadisampi
atk-s0502a:3071_8: dhanaṃ, vissāsasadiso ca paramā ñāti, nibbānasadisañca sukhaṃ nāma natthī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3075_0: Tattha ārogyaparamā lābhāti arogabhāvaparamā lābhā. Rogino hi vijjamānāpi lābhā alābhāyeva,
atk-s0502a:3075_1: tasmā arogassa sabbalābhā āgatāva honti. Tenetaṃ vuttaṃ – “ārogyaparamā lābhā”ti.
atk-s0502a:3075_2: Santuṭṭhiparamaṃ dhananti gihino vā pabbajitassa vā yaṃ attanā laddhaṃ attano santakaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3075_3: teneva tussanabhāvo santuṭṭhī nāma sesadhanehi paramaṃ dhanaṃ. Vissāsaparamā ñātīti
atk-s0502a:3075_4: mātā vā hotu pitā vā, yena saddhiṃ vissāso natthi, so aññātakova. Yena aññātakena
atk-s0502a:3075_5: pana saddhiṃ vissāso atthi, so asambandhopi paramo uttamo ñāti. Tena vuttaṃ – “vissāsaparamā
atk-s0502a:3075_6: ñātī”ti. Nibbānasadisaṃ pana sukhaṃ nāma natthi, tenevāha – nibbānaparamaṃ sukhanti.
atk-s0502a:3079: Pavivekarasanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā vesāliyaṃ viharanto aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3080_0: Satthārā hi, “bhikkhave, ahaṃ ito catūhi māsehi parinibbāyissāmī”ti vutte satthu
atk-s0502a:3080_1: santike satta bhikkhusatāni santāsaṃ āpajjiṃsu, khīṇāsavānaṃ dhammasaṃvego uppajji,
atk-s0502a:3080_2: puthujjanā assūni sandhāretuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu. Bhikkhū vaggā vaggā hutvā “kiṃ nu kho
atk-s0502a:3080_3: karissāmā”ti mantentā vicaranti. Atheko tissatthero nāma bhikkhū “satthā kira catumāsaccayena
atk-s0502a:3080_4: parinibbāyissati, ahañcamhi avītarāgo, satthari dharamāneyeva mayā arahattaṃ gaṇhituṃ
atk-s0502a:3080_5: vaṭṭatī”ti catūsu iriyāpathesu ekakova vihāsi. Bhikkhūnaṃ santike gamanaṃ vā kenaci
atk-s0502a:3080_6: saddhiṃ kathāsallāpo vā natthi. Atha naṃ bhikkhū āhaṃsu – “āvuso, tissa tasmā evaṃ
atk-s0502a:3080_7: karosī”ti. So tesaṃ kathaṃ na suṇāti. Te tassa pavattiṃ satthu ārocetvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:3080_8: tumhesu tissattherassa sineho natthī”ti āhaṃsu. Satthā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “kasmā tissa
atk-s0502a:3080_9: evaṃ akāsī”ti pucchitvā tena attano adhippāye ārocite “sādhu, tissā”ti sādhukāraṃ
atk-s0502a:3080_10: datvā, “bhikkhave, mayi sineho tissasadisova hotu. Gandhamālādīhi pūjaṃ karontāpi
atk-s0502a:3080_11: neva maṃ pūjenti, dhammānudhammaṃ paṭipajjamānāyeva pana maṃ pūjentī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3084_0: Tattha pavivekarasanti pavivekato uppannaṃ rasaṃ, ekībhāvasukhanti attho. Pitvāti
atk-s0502a:3084_1: dukkhapariññādīni karonto ārammaṇato sacchikiriyāvasena pivitvā. Upasamassa cāti
atk-s0502a:3084_2: kilesūpasamanibbānassa ca rasaṃ pitvā. Niddaro hotīti tena ubhayarasapānena khīṇāsavo
atk-s0502a:3084_3: bhikkhu abbhantare rāgadarathādīnaṃ abhāvena niddaro ceva nippāpo ca hoti. Rasaṃ
atk-s0502a:3084_4: pivanti navavidhalokuttaradhammavasena uppannaṃ pītirasaṃ pivantopi niddaro nippāpo ca hoti.
atk-s0502a:3085: Desanāvasāne tissatthero arahattaṃ pāpuṇi, mahājanassāpi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:3088: Sāhu dassananti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvagāmake viharanto sakkaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3089_0: Tathāgatassa hi āyusaṅkhāre vissaṭṭhe lohitapakkhandikābādhassa uppannabhāvaṃ ñatvā
atk-s0502a:3089_1: sakko devarājā “mayā satthu santikaṃ gantvā gilānupaṭṭhānaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā
atk-s0502a:3089_2: tigāvutappamāṇaṃ attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā hatthehi pāde parimajji.
atk-s0502a:3089_3: Atha naṃ satthā āha “ko eso”ti? “Ahaṃ, bhante, sakko”ti. “Kasmā āgatosī”ti? “Tumhe
atk-s0502a:3089_4: gilāne upaṭṭhahituṃ, bhante”ti. “Sakka, devānaṃ manussagandho yojanasatato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0502a:3089_5: gale baddhakuṇapaṃ viya hoti, gaccha tvaṃ, atthi me gilānupaṭṭhakā bhikkhū”ti. “Bhante,
atk-s0502a:3089_6: caturāsītiyojanasahassamatthake ṭhito tumhākaṃ sīlagandhaṃ ghāyitvā āgato, ahameva
atk-s0502a:3089_7: upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti so satthu sarīravaḷañjanabhājanaṃ aññassa hatthenāpi phusituṃ adatvā
atk-s0502a:3089_8: sīseyeva ṭhapetvā nīharanto mukhasaṅkocanamattampi na akāsi, gandhabhājanaṃ pariharanto
atk-s0502a:3089_9: viya ahosi. Evaṃ satthāraṃ paṭijaggitvā satthu phāsukakāleyeva agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:3090_0: Bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “aho satthari sakkassa sineho, evarūpaṃ nāma dibbasampattiṃ
atk-s0502a:3090_1: pahāya mukhasaṅkocanamattampi akatvā gandhabhājanaṃ nīharanto viya satthu sarīravaḷañjanabhājanaṃ
atk-s0502a:3090_2: sīsena nīharanto upaṭṭhānamakāsī”ti. Satthā tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā kiṃ vadetha, bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a:3090_3: anacchariyaṃ etaṃ, yaṃ sakko devarājā mayi sinehaṃ karoti. Ayaṃ sakko hi devarājā
atk-s0502a:3090_4: maṃ nissāya jarasakkabhāvaṃ vijahitvā sotāpanno hutvā taruṇasakkassa bhāvaṃ patto,
atk-s0502a:3090_5: ahaṃ hissa maraṇabhayatajjitassa pañcasikhagandhabbadevaputtaṃ purato katvā āgatakāle
atk-s0502a:3091: “Puccha vāsava maṃ pañhaṃ, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasi;
atk-s0502a:3092: Tassa tasseva pañhassa, ahaṃ antaṃ karomi te”ti. –
atk-s0502a:3093_0: Vatvā tassa kaṅkhaṃ vinodento dhammaṃ desesiṃ. Desanāvasāne cuddasannaṃ pāṇakoṭīnaṃ
atk-s0502a:3093_1: dhammābhisamayo ahosi, sakkopi yathānisinnova sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā taruṇasakko jāto.
atk-s0502a:3093_2: Evamassāhaṃ bahūpakāro. Tassa mayi sineho nāma anacchariyo. Bhikkhave, ariyānañhi
atk-s0502a:3093_3: dassanampi sukhaṃ, tehi saddhiṃ ekaṭṭhāne sannivāsopi sukho. Bālehi saddhiṃ pana
atk-s0502a:3093_4: sabbametaṃ dukkhanti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3104: Taṃ tādisaṃ sappurisaṃ sumedhaṃ,bhajetha nakkhattapathaṃ va candimā”ti.
atk-s0502a:3105_0: Tattha sāhūti sundaraṃ bhaddakaṃ. Sannivāsoti na kevalañca tesaṃ dassanameva, tehi
atk-s0502a:3105_1: saddhiṃ ekaṭṭhāne nisīdanādibhāvopi tesaṃ vattapaṭivattaṃ kātuṃ labhanabhāvopi sādhuyeva.
atk-s0502a:3105_2: Bālasaṅgatacārī hīti yo bālena sahacārī. Dīghamaddhānanti so bālasahāyena “ehi sandhicchedādīni
atk-s0502a:3105_3: karomā”ti vuccamāno tena saddhiṃ ekacchando hutvā tāni karonto hatthacchedādīni patvā
atk-s0502a:3105_4: dīghamaddhānaṃ socati. Sabbadāti yathā asihatthena vā amittena āsīvisādīhi vā saddhiṃ
atk-s0502a:3105_5: ekato vāso nāma niccaṃ dukkho, tatheva bālehi saddhinti attho. Dhīro ca sukhasaṃvāsoti
atk-s0502a:3105_6: ettha sukho saṃvāso etenāti sukhasaṃvāso, paṇḍitena saddhiṃ ekaṭṭhāne saṃvāso sukhoti
atk-s0502a:3105_7: attho. Kathaṃ? Ñātīnaṃva samāgamoti yathāpi ñātīnaṃ samāgamo sukho, evaṃ sukho.
atk-s0502a:3106_0: Tasmā hīti yasmā bālehi saddhiṃ saṃvāso dukkho, paṇḍitena saddhiṃ sukho, tasmā hi
atk-s0502a:3106_3: ceva dhutaṅgavatena ca vatavantaṃ, kilesehi ārakatāya ariyaṃ, tathārūpaṃ sappurisaṃ
atk-s0502a:3106_4: sobhanapañhaṃ yathā nimmalaṃ nakkhattapathasaṅkhātaṃ ākāsaṃ candimā bhajati, evaṃ
atk-s0502a:3113: Ayogeti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto tayo pabbajite ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3114_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira ekasmiṃ kule mātāpitūnaṃ ekaputtako ahosi piyo manāpo. So ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0502a:3114_1: gehe nimantitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anumodanaṃ karontānaṃ dhammakathaṃ sutvā pabbajitukāmo
atk-s0502a:3114_2: hutvā mātāpitaro pabbajjaṃ yāci. Te nānujāniṃsu. Tassa etadahosi – “ahaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ
atk-s0502a:3114_3: apassantānaṃyeva bahi gantvā pabbajissāmī”ti. Athassa pitā bahi nikkhamanto “imaṃ
atk-s0502a:3114_4: rakkheyyāsī”ti mātaraṃ paṭicchāpesi, mātā bahi nikkhamantī pitaraṃ paṭicchāpesi.
atk-s0502a:3114_5: Athassa ekadivasaṃ pitari bahi gate mātā “puttaṃ rakkhissāmī”ti ekaṃ dvārabāhaṃ nissāya
atk-s0502a:3114_6: ekaṃ pādehi uppīḷetvā chamāya nisinnā suttaṃ kantati. So “imaṃ vañcetvā gamissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:3114_7: cintetvā, “amma, thokaṃ tāva apehi, sarīravalañjaṃ karissāmī”ti vatvā tāya pāde samiñjite
atk-s0502a:3114_8: nikkhamitvā vegena vihāraṃ gantvā bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā “pabbājetha maṃ, bhante”ti
atk-s0502a:3115_0: Athassa pitā āgantvā mātaraṃ pucchi – “kahaṃ me putto”ti? “Sāmi, imasmiṃ padese ahosī”ti.
atk-s0502a:3115_1: So “kahaṃ nu kho me putto”ti olokento taṃ adisvā “vihāraṃ gato bhavissatī”ti vihāraṃ
atk-s0502a:3115_2: gantvā puttaṃ pabbajitaṃ disvā kanditvā roditvā, “tāta, kiṃ maṃ nāsesī”ti vatvā “mama
atk-s0502a:3115_3: putte pabbajite ahaṃ idāni gehe kiṃ karissāmī”ti sayampi bhikkhū yācitvā pabbaji.
atk-s0502a:3115_4: Athassa mātāpi “kiṃ nu kho me putto ca pati ca cirāyanti, kacci vihāraṃ gantvā pabbajitā”ti
atk-s0502a:3115_5: te olokentī vihāraṃ gantvā ubhopi pabbajite disvā “imesaṃ pabbajitakāle mama gehena
atk-s0502a:3115_6: ko attho”ti sayampi bhikkhuniupassayaṃ gantvā pabbaji. Te pabbajitvāpi vinā bhavituṃ
atk-s0502a:3115_7: na sakkonti, vihārepi bhikkhuniupassayepi ekatova nisīditvā sallapantā divasaṃ vītināmenti.
atk-s0502a:3116_0: Athekadivasaṃ bhikkhū nesaṃ kiriyaṃ satthuṃ ārocesuṃ. Satthā te pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ
atk-s0502a:3116_1: kira tumhe evaṃ karothā”ti pucchitvā “sacca”nti vutte “kasmā evaṃ karotha? Na hi
atk-s0502a:3116_2: esa pabbajitānaṃ yogo”ti. “Bhante, vinā bhavituṃ na sakkomā”ti. “Pabbajitakālato
atk-s0502a:3116_3: paṭṭhāya evaṃ karaṇaṃ ayuttaṃ. Piyānañhi adassanaṃ, appiyānañca dassanaṃ dukkhameva.
atk-s0502a:3116_4: Tasmā sattesu ca saṅkhāresu ca kañci piyaṃ vā appiyaṃ vā kātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3124: “Tasmā piyaṃ na kayirātha, piyāpāyo hi pāpako;
atk-s0502a:3125: Ganthā tesaṃ na vijjanti, yesaṃ natthi piyāppiya”nti.
atk-s0502a:3126_0: Tattha ayogeti ayuñjitabbe ayonisomanasikāre. Vesiyāgocarādibhedassa hi chabbidhassa
atk-s0502a:3126_1: agocarassa sevanaṃ idha ayonisomanasikāro nāma, tasmiṃ ayonisomanasikāre attānaṃ
atk-s0502a:3126_2: yuñjantoti attho. Yogasminti tabbiparīte ca yonisomanasikāre ayuñjantoti attho. Atthaṃ
atk-s0502a:3126_3: hitvāti pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya adhisīlādisikkhattayaṃ attho nāma, taṃ atthaṃ hitvā.
atk-s0502a:3126_4: Piyaggāhīti pañcakāmaguṇasaṅkhātaṃ piyameva gaṇhanto. Pihetattānuyoginanti tāya paṭipattiyā
atk-s0502a:3126_5: sāsanato cuto gihibhāvaṃ patvā pacchā ye attānuyogaṃ anuyuttā sīlādīni sampādetvā
atk-s0502a:3126_6: devamanussānaṃ santikā sakkāraṃ labhanti, tesaṃ piheti, “aho vatāhampi evarūpo assa”nti icchatīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3127_0: Mā piyehīti piyehi sattehi vā saṅkhārehi vā kudācanaṃ ekakkhaṇepi na samāgaccheyya,
atk-s0502a:3127_1: tathā appiyehi. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Piyā nañhi viyogavasena adassanaṃ appiyānañca upasaṅkamanavasena
atk-s0502a:3127_2: dassanaṃ nāma dukkhaṃ. Tasmāti yasmā idaṃ ubhayampi dukkhaṃ, tasmā kañci sattaṃ vā
atk-s0502a:3127_3: saṅkhāraṃ vā piyaṃ nāma na kareyya. Piyāpāyo hīti piyehi apāyo viyogo. Pāpakoti lāmako.
atk-s0502a:3127_4: Ganthā tesaṃ na vijjantīti yesaṃ piyaṃ natthi, tesaṃ abhijjhākāyagantho pahīyati.
atk-s0502a:3127_5: Yesaṃ appiyaṃ natthi, tesaṃ byāpādo kāyagantho. Tesu pana dvīsu pahīnesu sesaganthā
atk-s0502a:3127_6: pahīnā honti. Tasmā piyaṃ vā appiyaṃ vā na kattabbanti attho.
atk-s0502a:3128: Desanāvasāne bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pāpuṇiṃsūti. Tena pana tayo janā “mayaṃ vinā bhavituṃ na sakkomā”ti vibbhamitvā gehameva agamiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a:3131: Piyato jāyatīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ kuṭumbikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3132_0: So hi attano putte kālakate puttasokābhibhūto āḷāhanaṃ gantvā rodati, puttasokaṃ
atk-s0502a:3132_1: sandhāretuṃ na sakkoti. Satthā paccūsakāle lokaṃ volokento tassa sotāpattimaggassūpanissayaṃ
atk-s0502a:3132_2: disvā piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto ekaṃ pacchāsamaṇaṃ gahetvā tassa gehadvāraṃ agamāsi. So
atk-s0502a:3132_3: satthu āgatabhāvaṃ sutvā “mayā saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ kātukāmo bhavissatī”ti satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:3132_4: pavesetvā gehamajjhe āsanaṃ paññāpetvā satthari nisinne āgantvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:3132_5: Atha naṃ satthā “kiṃ nu kho, upāsaka, dukkhitosī”ti pucchitvā tena puttaviyogadukkhe
atk-s0502a:3132_6: ārocite, “upāsaka, mā cintayi, idaṃ maraṇaṃ nāma na ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne, na ca ekasseva
atk-s0502a:3132_7: hoti, yāvatā pana bhavuppatti nāma atthi, sabbasattānaṃ hotiyeva. Ekasaṅkhāropi nicco
atk-s0502a:3132_8: nāma natthi. Tasmā ‘maraṇadhammaṃ mataṃ, bhijjanadhammaṃ bhinna’nti yoniso paccavekkhitabbaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3132_9: na socitabbaṃ. Porāṇapaṇḍitāpi hi puttassa matakāle ‘maraṇadhammaṃ mataṃ, bhijjanadhammaṃ
atk-s0502a:3132_10: bhinna’nti sokaṃ akatvā maraṇassatimeva bhāvayiṃsū”ti vatvā, “bhante, ke evamakaṃsu,
atk-s0502a:3132_11: kadā ca akaṃsu, ācikkhatha me”ti yācito tassatthassa pakāsanatthaṃ atītaṃ āharitvā –
atk-s0502a:3133: “Uragova tacaṃ jiṇṇaṃ, hitvā gacchati saṃ tanuṃ;
atk-s0502a:3134: Evaṃ sarīre nibbhoge, pete kālakate sati.
atk-s0502a:3136: Tasmā etaṃ na socāmi, gato so tassa yā gatī”ti. –
atk-s0502a:3137_0: Imaṃ pañcakanipāte uragajātakaṃ vitthāretvā “evaṃ pubbe paṇḍitā piyaputte kālakate
atk-s0502a:3137_1: yathā etarahi tvaṃ kammante vissajjetvā nirāhāro rodanto vicarasi, tathā avicaritvā
atk-s0502a:3137_2: maraṇassatibhāvanābalena sokaṃ akatvā āhāraṃ paribhuñjiṃsu, kammantañca adhiṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3137_3: Tasmā ‘piyaputto me kālakato’ti mā cintayi. Uppajjamāno hi soko vā bhayaṃ vā piyameva
atk-s0502a:3140: Piyato vippamuttassa, natthi soko kuto bhaya”nti.
atk-s0502a:3141: Tattha piyatoti vaṭṭamūlako hi soko vā bhayaṃ vā uppajjamānaṃ piyameva sattaṃ vā saṅkhāraṃ vā nissāya uppajjati, tato pana vippamuttassa ubhayampetaṃ natthīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3142: Desanāvasāne kuṭumbiko sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:3145: Pemato jāyatīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto visākhaṃ upāsikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3146_0: Sā kira puttassa dhītaraṃ sudattaṃ nāma kumārikaṃ attano ṭhāne ṭhapetvā gehe bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0502a:3146_1: veyyāvaccaṃ kāresi. Sā aparena samayena kālamakāsi. Sā tassā sarīranikkhepaṃ kāretvā
atk-s0502a:3146_2: sokaṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkontī dukkhinī dummanā satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ
atk-s0502a:3146_3: nisīdi. Atha naṃ satthā “kiṃ nu kho tvaṃ, visākhe, dukkhinī dummanā assumukhā rodamānā
atk-s0502a:3146_4: nisinnā”ti āha. Sā tamatthaṃ ārocetvā “piyā me, bhante, sā kumārikā vattasampannā,
atk-s0502a:3146_5: idāni tathārūpaṃ na passāmī”ti āha. “Kittakā pana, visākhe, sāvatthiyaṃ manussā”ti?
atk-s0502a:3146_6: “Bhante, tumhehiyeva me kathitaṃ satta janakoṭiyo”ti. “Sace panāyaṃ ettako jano tava
atk-s0502a:3146_7: nattāya sadiso bhaveyya, iccheyyāsi na”nti? “Āma, bhante”ti. “Kati pana janā sāvatthiyaṃ
atk-s0502a:3146_8: devasikaṃ kālaṃ karontī”ti? “Bahū, bhante”ti. “Nanu evaṃ, bhante, tava asocanakālo
atk-s0502a:3146_9: na bhaveyya, rattindivaṃ rodantīyeva vicareyyāsī”ti. “Hotu, bhante, ñātaṃ mayā”ti.
atk-s0502a:3146_10: Atha naṃ satthā “tena hi mā soci, soko vā bhayaṃ vā pematova jāyatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3149: Pemato vippamuttassa, natthi soko kuto bhaya”nti.
atk-s0502a:3150: Tattha pematoti puttadhītādīsu kataṃ pemameva nissāya soko jāyatīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3154: Ratiyā jāyatīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā vesāliṃ nissāya kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ viharanto licchavī ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3155_0: Te kira ekasmiṃ chaṇadivase aññamaññaṃ asadisehi alaṅkārehi alaṅkaritvā uyyānagamanatthāya
atk-s0502a:3155_1: nagarā nikkhamiṃsu. Satthā piṇḍāya pavisanto te disvā bhikkhū āmantesi – “passatha,
atk-s0502a:3155_2: bhikkhave, licchavayo, yehi devā tāvatiṃsā na diṭṭhapubbā, te ime olokentū”ti vatvā
atk-s0502a:3155_3: nagaraṃ pāvisi. Tepi uyyānaṃ gacchantā ekaṃ nagarasobhiniṃ itthiṃ ādāya gantvā taṃ
atk-s0502a:3155_4: nissāya issābhibhūtā aññamaññaṃ paharitvā lohitaṃ nadiṃ viya pavattayiṃsu. Atha ne
atk-s0502a:3155_5: mañcenādāya ukkhipitvā āgamaṃsu. Satthāpi katabhattakicco nagarā nikkhami. Bhikkhūpi
atk-s0502a:3155_6: licchavayo tathā nīyamāne disvā satthāraṃ āhaṃsu – “bhante, licchavirājāno pātova
atk-s0502a:3155_7: alaṅkatapaṭiyattā devā viya nagarā nikkhamitvā idāni ekaṃ itthiṃ nissāya imaṃ byasanaṃ
atk-s0502a:3155_8: pattā”ti. Satthā, “bhikkhave, soko vā bhayaṃ vā uppajjamānaṃ ratiṃ nissāya uppajjatiyevā”ti
atk-s0502a:3158: Ratiyā vippamuttassa, natthi soko kuto bhaya”nti.
atk-s0502a:3159: Tattha ratiyāti pañcakāmaguṇaratito, taṃ nissāyāti attho.
atk-s0502a:3163: Kāmatoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto anitthigandhakumāraṃ nāma ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3164_0: So kira brahmalokā cutasatto sāvatthiyaṃ mahābhogakule nibbatto jātadivasato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0502a:3164_1: itthisamīpaṃ upagantuṃ na icchati, itthiyā gayhamāno rodati. Vatthacumbaṭakena naṃ
atk-s0502a:3164_2: gahetvā thaññaṃ pāyenti. So vayappatto mātāpitūhi, “tāta, āvāhaṃ te karissāmā”ti
atk-s0502a:3164_3: vutte “na me itthiyā attho”ti paṭikkhipitvā punappunaṃ yāciyamāno pañcasate suvaṇṇakāre
atk-s0502a:3164_4: pakkosāpetvā rattasuvaṇṇanikkhasahassaṃ dāpetvā ativiya pāsādikaṃ ghanakoṭṭimaṃ itthirūpaṃ
atk-s0502a:3164_5: kāretvā puna mātāpitūhi, “tāta, tayi āvāhaṃ akaronte kulavaṃso na patiṭṭhahissati,
atk-s0502a:3164_6: kumārikaṃ te ānessāmā”ti vutte “tena hi sace me evarūpaṃ kumārikaṃ ānessatha, karissāmi
atk-s0502a:3164_7: vo vacana”nti taṃ suvaṇṇarūpakaṃ dasseti. Athassa mātāpitaro abhiññāte brāhmaṇe pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0502a:3164_8: “amhākaṃ putto mahāpuñño, avassaṃ iminā saddhiṃ katapuññā kumārikā bhavissati, gacchatha
atk-s0502a:3164_9: imaṃ suvaṇṇarūpakaṃ gahetvā evarūpaṃ kumārikaṃ āharathā”ti pahiṇiṃsu. Te “sādhū”ti
atk-s0502a:3164_10: cārikaṃ carantā maddaraṭṭhe sāgalanagaraṃ gatā. Tasmiñca nagare ekā soḷasavassuddesikā
atk-s0502a:3164_11: abhirūpā kumārikā ahosi, taṃ mātāpitaro sattabhūmikassa pāsādassūparimatale parivāsesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:3164_12: Tepi kho brāhmaṇā “sace idha evarūpā kumārikā bhavissati, imaṃ disvā ‘ayaṃ asukassa
atk-s0502a:3164_13: kulassa dhītā viya abhirūpā’ti vakkhantī”ti taṃ suvaṇṇarūpakaṃ titthamagge ṭhapetvā
atk-s0502a:3165_0: Athassa kumārikāya dhātī taṃ kumārikaṃ nhāpetvā sayampi nhāyitukāmā hutvā titthaṃ
atk-s0502a:3165_1: āgatā taṃ rūpakaṃ disvā “dhītā me”ti saññāya “dubbinītāsi, idānevāhaṃ nhāpetvā nikkhantā,
atk-s0502a:3165_2: tvaṃ mayā puretaraṃ idhāgatāsī”ti hatthena paharitvā thaddhabhāvañceva nibbikāratañca
atk-s0502a:3165_3: ñatvā “ahaṃ me, dhītāti saññamakāsiṃ, kiṃ nāmeta”nti āha. Atha naṃ te brāhmaṇā “evarūpā
atk-s0502a:3165_4: te, amma, dhītā”ti pucchiṃsu. Ayaṃ mama dhītu santike kiṃ agghatīti? Tena hi te dhītaraṃ
atk-s0502a:3165_5: amhākaṃ dassehīti. Sā tehi saddhiṃ gehaṃ gantvā sāmikānaṃ ārocesi. Te brāhmaṇehi
atk-s0502a:3165_6: saddhiṃ katapaṭisammodanā dhītaraṃ otāretvā heṭṭhāpāsāde suvaṇṇarūpakassa santike
atk-s0502a:3165_7: ṭhapesuṃ. Suvaṇṇarūpakaṃ nippabhaṃ ahosi, kumārikā sappabhā ahosi. Brāhmaṇā taṃ tesaṃ
atk-s0502a:3165_8: datvā kumārikaṃ paṭicchāpetvā gantvā anitthigandhakumārassa mātāpitūnaṃ ārocayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3165_9: Te tuṭṭhamānasā “gacchatha, naṃ sīghaṃ ānethā”ti mahantena sakkārena pahiṇiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3166_0: Kumāropi taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā “kañcanarūpatopi kira abhirūpatarā dārikā atthī”ti savanavaseneva
atk-s0502a:3166_1: sinehaṃ uppādetvā “sīghaṃ ānentū”ti āha. Sāpi kho yānaṃ āropetvā ānīyamānā atisukhumālatāya
atk-s0502a:3166_2: yānugghātena samuppāditavātarogā antarāmaggeyeva kālamakāsi. Kumāropi “āgatā”ti nirantaraṃ
atk-s0502a:3166_3: pucchati, tassa atisinehena pucchantassa sahasāva anārocetvā katipāhaṃ vikkhepaṃ
atk-s0502a:3166_4: katvā tamatthaṃ ārocayiṃsu. So “tathārūpāya nāma itthiyā saddhiṃ samāgamaṃ nālattha”nti
atk-s0502a:3166_5: uppannadomanasso pabbatena viya sokadukkhena ajjhotthaṭo ahosi. Satthā tassūpanissayaṃ
atk-s0502a:3166_6: disvā piṇḍāya caranto taṃ gehadvāraṃ agamāsi. Athassa mātāpitaro satthāraṃ antogehaṃ
atk-s0502a:3166_7: pavesetvā sakkaccaṃ parivisiṃsu. Satthā bhattakiccāvasāne “kahaṃ anitthigandhakumāro”ti
atk-s0502a:3166_8: pucchi. “Eso, bhante, āhārūpacchedaṃ katvā antogabbhe nisinno”ti. “Pakkosatha na”nti.
atk-s0502a:3166_9: So āgantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Satthā “kiṃ nu kho, kumāra, balavasoko
atk-s0502a:3166_10: uppanno”ti vutte, “āma, bhante, ‘evarūpā nāma itthī antarāmagge kālakatā’ti sutvā
atk-s0502a:3166_11: balavasoko uppanno, bhattampi me nacchādetī”ti. Atha naṃ satthā “jānāsi pana tvaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3166_12: kumāra, kiṃ te nissāya soko uppanno”ti? “Na jānāmi, bhante”ti. “Kāmaṃ nissāya, kumāra,
atk-s0502a:3166_13: balavasoko uppanno, soko vā bhayaṃ vā kāmaṃ nissāya uppajjatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3169: Kāmato vippamuttassa, natthi soko kuto bhaya”nti.
atk-s0502a:3170: Tattha kāmatoti vatthukāmakilesakāmato, duvidhampetaṃ kāmaṃ nissāyāti attho.
atk-s0502a:3174: Taṇhāya jāyatīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3175_0: So kira micchādiṭṭhiko ekadivasaṃ nadītīraṃ gantvā khettaṃ sodheti. Satthā tassa
atk-s0502a:3175_1: upanissayasampattiṃ disvā tassa santikaṃ agamāsi. So satthāraṃ disvāpi sāmīcikammaṃ
atk-s0502a:3175_2: akatvā tuṇhī ahosi. Atha naṃ satthā puretaraṃ ālapitvā, “brāhmaṇa, kiṃ karosī”ti
atk-s0502a:3175_3: āha. “Khettaṃ, bho gotama, sodhemī”ti. Satthā ettakameva vatvā gato. Punadivasepi
atk-s0502a:3175_4: tassa khettaṃ kasituṃ āgatassa santikaṃ gantvā, “brāhmaṇa, kiṃ karosī”ti pucchitvā
atk-s0502a:3175_5: “khettaṃ kasāmi, bho gotamā”ti sutvā pakkāmi. Punadivasādīsupi tatheva gantvā pucchitvā,
atk-s0502a:3175_6: “bho gotama, khettaṃ vapāmi niddemi rakkhāmī”ti sutvā pakkāmi. Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0502a:3175_7: brāhmaṇo āha – “bho gotama, tvaṃ mama khettasodhanadivasato paṭṭhāya āgato. Sace
atk-s0502a:3175_8: me sassaṃ sampajjissati, tuyhampi saṃvibhāgaṃ karissāmi, tuyhaṃ adatvā sayaṃ na khādissāmi,
atk-s0502a:3175_9: ito dāni paṭṭhāya tvaṃ mama sahāyo”ti.
atk-s0502a:3176_0: Athassa aparena samayena sassaṃ sampajji, tassa “sampannaṃ me sassaṃ, sve dāni lāyāpessāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:3176_1: lāyanatthaṃ kattabbakiccassa rattiṃ mahāmegho vassitvā sabbaṃ sassaṃ hari, khettaṃ
atk-s0502a:3176_2: tacchetvā ṭhapitasadisaṃ ahosi. Satthā pana paṭhamadivasaṃyeva “taṃ sassaṃ na sampajjissatī”ti
atk-s0502a:3176_3: aññāsi. Brāhmaṇo pātova “khettaṃ olokessāmī”ti gato tucchaṃ khettaṃ disvā uppannabalavasoko
atk-s0502a:3176_4: cintesi – “samaṇo gotamo mama khettasodhanakālato paṭṭhāya āgato, ahampi naṃ ‘imasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:3176_5: sasse nipphanne tuyhampi saṃvibhāgaṃ karissāmi, tuyhaṃ adatvā sayaṃ na khādissāmi,
atk-s0502a:3176_6: ito paṭṭhāya dāni tvaṃ mama sahāyo’ti avacaṃ. Sopi me manoratho matthakaṃ na pāpuṇī”ti
atk-s0502a:3176_7: āhārūpacchedaṃ katvā mañcake nipajji. Athassa satthā gehadvāraṃ agamāsi. So satthu
atk-s0502a:3176_8: āgamanaṃ sutvā “sahāyaṃ me ānetvā idha nisīdāpethā”ti āha. Parijano tathā akāsi.
atk-s0502a:3176_9: Satthā nisīditvā “kahaṃ brāhmaṇo”ti pucchitvā “gabbhe nipanno”ti vutte “pakkosatha
atk-s0502a:3176_10: na”nti pakkosāpetvā āgantvā ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ āha “kiṃ, brāhmaṇā”ti? Bho gotama,
atk-s0502a:3176_11: tumhe mama khettasodhanadivasato paṭṭhāya āgatā, ahampi “sasse nipphanne tumhākaṃ
atk-s0502a:3176_12: saṃvibhāgaṃ karissāmī”ti avacaṃ. So me manoratho anipphanno, tena me soko uppanno,
atk-s0502a:3176_13: bhattampi me nacchādetīti. Atha naṃ satthā “jānāsi pana, brāhmaṇa, kiṃ te nissāya
atk-s0502a:3176_14: soko uppanno”ti pucchitvā “na jānāmi, bho gotama, tvaṃ pana jānāsī”ti vutte, “āma,
atk-s0502a:3176_15: brāhmaṇa, uppajjamāno soko vā bhayaṃ vā taṇhaṃ nissāya uppajjatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3179: Taṇhāya vippamuttassa, natthi soko kuto bhaya”nti.
atk-s0502a:3180: Tattha taṇhāyāti chadvārikāya taṇhāya, etaṃ taṇhaṃ nissāya uppajjatīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3184: Sīladassanasampannanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto antarāmagge pañcasatadārake ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3185_0: Ekadivasañhi satthā asītimahātherehi saddhiṃ pañcasatabhikkhuparivāro rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya
atk-s0502a:3185_1: pavisanto ekasmiṃ chaṇadivase pañcasate dārake pūvapacchiyo ukkhipāpetvā nagarā nikkhamma
atk-s0502a:3185_2: uyyānaṃ gacchante addasa. Tepi satthāraṃ vanditvā pakkamiṃsu, te ekaṃ bhikkhumpi
atk-s0502a:3185_3: “pūvaṃ gaṇhathā”ti na vadiṃsu. Satthā tesaṃ gatakāle bhikkhū āha – “khādissatha,
atk-s0502a:3185_4: bhikkhave, pūve”ti. “Kahaṃ bhante, pūvā”ti? “Kiṃ na passatha te dārake pūvapacchiyo
atk-s0502a:3185_5: ukkhipāpetvā atikkante”ti? “Bhante, evarūpā nāma dārakā kassaci pūvaṃ na dentī”ti.
atk-s0502a:3185_6: “Bhikkhave, kiñcāpi ete maṃ vā tumhe vā pūvehi na nimantayiṃsu, pūvasāmiko pana bhikkhu
atk-s0502a:3185_7: pacchato āgacchati, pūve khāditvāva gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Buddhānañhi ekapuggalepi issā
atk-s0502a:3185_8: vā doso vā natthi, tasmā imaṃ vatvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ādāya ekasmiṃ rukkhamūle chāyāya
atk-s0502a:3185_9: nisīdi. Dārakā mahākassapattheraṃ pacchato āgacchantaṃ disvā uppannasinehā pītivegena
atk-s0502a:3185_10: paripuṇṇasarīrā hutvā pacchiyo otāretvā theraṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā pūve pacchīhi
atk-s0502a:3185_11: saddhiṃyeva ukkhipitvā “gaṇhatha, bhante”ti theraṃ vadiṃsu. Atha ne thero āha – “esa
atk-s0502a:3185_12: satthā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ gahetvā rukkhamūle nisinno, tumhākaṃ deyyadhammaṃ ādāya gantvā
atk-s0502a:3185_13: bhikkhusaṅghassa saṃvibhāgaṃ karothā”ti. Te “sādhu, bhante”ti nivattitvā therena
atk-s0502a:3185_14: saddhiṃyeva gantvā pūve datvā olokayamānā ekamante ṭhatvā paribhogāvasāne udakaṃ
atk-s0502a:3185_15: adaṃsu. Bhikkhū ujjhāyiṃsu “dārakehi mukholokanena bhikkhā dinnā, sammāsambuddhaṃ
atk-s0502a:3185_16: vā mahāthere vā pūvehi anāpucchitvā mahākassapattheraṃ disvā pacchīhi saddhiṃyeva
atk-s0502a:3185_17: ādāya āgamiṃsū”ti. Satthā tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā, “bhikkhave, mama puttena mahākassapena
atk-s0502a:3185_18: sadiso bhikkhu devamanussānaṃ piyo hoti, te ca tassa catupaccayena pūjaṃ karontiyevā”ti
atk-s0502a:3188: Attano kamma kubbānaṃ, taṃ jano kurute piya”nti.
atk-s0502a:3189_0: Tattha sīladassanasampannanti catupārisuddhisīlena ceva maggaphalasampayuttena ca
atk-s0502a:3189_1: sammādassanena sampannaṃ. Dhammaṭṭhanti navavidhalokuttaradhamme ṭhitaṃ, sacchikatalokuttaradhammanti
atk-s0502a:3189_2: attho. Saccavedinanti catunnaṃ saccānaṃ soḷasahākārehi sacchikatattā saccañāṇena
atk-s0502a:3189_3: saccavedinaṃ. Attano kamma kubbānanti attano kammaṃ nāma tisso sikkhā, tā pūrayamānanti
atk-s0502a:3189_4: attho. Taṃ janoti taṃ puggalaṃ lokiyamahājano piyaṃ karoti, daṭṭhukāmo vanditukāmo
atk-s0502a:3190: Desanāvasāne sabbepi te dārakā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a:3193: Chandajātoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ anāgāmittheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3194_0: Ekadivasañhi taṃ theraṃ saddhivihārikā pucchiṃsu – “atthi pana vo, bhante, visesādhigamo”ti.
atk-s0502a:3194_1: Thero “anāgāmiphalaṃ nāma gahaṭṭhāpi pāpuṇanti, arahattaṃ pattakāleyeva tehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0502a:3194_2: kathessāmī”ti harāyamāno kiñci akathetvāva kālakato suddhāvāsadevaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:3194_3: Athassa saddhivihārikā roditvā paridevitvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā
atk-s0502a:3194_4: rodantāva ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu. Atha ne satthā “kiṃ, bhikkhave, rodathā”ti āha. “Upajjhāyo
atk-s0502a:3194_5: no, bhante, kālakato”ti. “Hotu, bhikkhave, mā cintayittha, dhuvadhammo nāmeso”ti?
atk-s0502a:3194_6: “Āma, bhante, mayampi jānāma, apica mayaṃ upajjhāyaṃ visesādhigamaṃ pucchimhā, so
atk-s0502a:3194_7: kiñci akathetvāva kālakato, tenamha dukkhitā”ti. Satthā, “bhikkhave, mā cintayittha,
atk-s0502a:3194_8: upajjhāyena vo anāgāmiphalaṃ pattaṃ, so ‘gihīpetaṃ pāpuṇanti, arahattaṃ patvāva nesaṃ
atk-s0502a:3194_9: kathessāmī’ti harāyanto tumhākaṃ kiñci akathetvā kālaṃ katvā suddhāvāse nibbatto,
atk-s0502a:3194_10: assāsatha, bhikkhave, upajjhāyo vo kāmesu appaṭibaddhacittataṃ patto”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3198_0: Tattha chandajātoti kattukāmatāvasena jātachando ussāhapatto. Anakkhāteti nibbāne.
atk-s0502a:3198_1: Tañhi “asukena kataṃ vā nīlādīsu evarūpaṃ vā”ti avattabbatāya anakkhātaṃ nāma. Manasā
atk-s0502a:3198_2: ca phuṭo siyāti heṭṭhimehi tīhi maggaphalacittehi phuṭo pūrito bhaveyya. Appaṭibaddhacittoti
atk-s0502a:3198_3: anāgāmimaggavasena kāmesu appaṭibaddhacitto. Uddhaṃsototi evarūpo bhikkhu avihesu
atk-s0502a:3198_4: nibbattitvā tato paṭṭhāya paṭisandhivasena akaniṭṭhaṃ gacchanto uddhaṃsototi vuccati,
atk-s0502a:3199: Desanāvasāne te bhikkhū arahattaphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu, mahājanassāpi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:3202: Cirappavāsinti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā isipatane viharanto nandiyaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3203_0: Bārāṇasiyaṃ kira saddhāsampannassa kulassa nandiyo nāma putto ahosi, so mātāpitūnaṃ
atk-s0502a:3203_1: anurūpo saddhāsampanno saṅghupaṭṭhāko ahosi. Athassa mātāpitaro vayappattakāle sammukhagehato
atk-s0502a:3203_2: mātuladhītaraṃ revatiṃ nāma ānetukāmā ahesuṃ. Sā pana assaddhā adānasīlā, nandiyo
atk-s0502a:3203_3: taṃ na icchi. Athassa mātā revatiṃ āha – “amma, tvaṃ imasmiṃ gehe bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0502a:3203_4: nisajjanaṭṭhānaṃ upalimpitvā āsanāni paññāpehi, ādhārake ṭhapehi, bhikkhūnaṃ āgatakāle
atk-s0502a:3203_5: pattaṃ gahetvā nisīdāpetvā dhammakaraṇena pānīyaṃ parissāvetvā bhuttakāle patte dhova,
atk-s0502a:3203_6: evaṃ me puttassa ārādhitā bhavissasī”ti. Sā tathā akāsi. Atha naṃ “ovādakkhamā jātā”ti
atk-s0502a:3203_7: puttassa ārocetvā tena sādhūti sampaṭicchite divasaṃ ṭhapetvā āvāhaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3204_0: Atha naṃ nandiyo āha – “sace bhikkhusaṅghañca mātāpitaro ca me upaṭṭhahissasi, evaṃ
atk-s0502a:3204_1: imasmiṃ gehe vasituṃ labhissasi, appamattā hohī”ti. Sā “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā katipāhaṃ
atk-s0502a:3204_2: saddhā viya hutvā bhattāraṃ upaṭṭhahantī dve putte vijāyi. Nandiyassāpi mātāpitaro
atk-s0502a:3204_3: kālamakaṃsu, gehe sabbissariyaṃ tassāyeva ahosi. Nandiyopi mātāpitūnaṃ kālakiriyato
atk-s0502a:3204_4: paṭṭhāya mahādānapati hutvā bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ paṭṭhapesi. Kapaṇaddhikādīnampi
atk-s0502a:3204_5: gehadvāre pākavattaṃ paṭṭhapesi. So aparabhāge satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā āvāsadāne
atk-s0502a:3204_6: ānisaṃsaṃ sallakkhetvā isipatane mahāvihāre catūhi gabbhehi paṭimaṇḍitaṃ catusālaṃ
atk-s0502a:3204_7: kāretvā mañcapīṭhādīni attharāpetvā taṃ āvāsaṃ niyyādento buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0502a:3204_8: dānaṃ datvā tathāgatassa dakkhiṇodakaṃ adāsi. Satthu hatthe dakkhiṇodakapatiṭṭhānena
atk-s0502a:3204_9: saddhiṃyeva tāvatiṃsadevaloke sabbadisāsu dvādasayojaniko uddhaṃ yojanasatubbedho
atk-s0502a:3205_0: Athekadivase mahāmoggallānatthero devacārikaṃ gantvā tassa pāsādassa avidūre ṭhito
atk-s0502a:3205_1: attano santike āgate devaputte pucchi – “kasseso accharāgaṇaparivuto dibbapāsādo
atk-s0502a:3205_2: nibbatto”ti. Athassa devaputtā vimānasāmikaṃ ācikkhantā āhaṃsu – “bhante, yena nandiyena
atk-s0502a:3205_3: nāma gahapatiputtena isipatane satthu vihāraṃ kāretvā dinno, tassatthāya etaṃ vimānaṃ
atk-s0502a:3205_4: nibbatta”nti. Accharāsaṅghopi naṃ disvā pāsādato orohitvā āha – “bhante, mayaṃ ‘nandiyassa
atk-s0502a:3205_5: paricārikā bhavissāmā’ti idha nibbattā, taṃ pana apassantī ativiya ukkaṇṭhitamhā,
atk-s0502a:3205_6: mattikapātiṃ bhinditvā suvaṇṇapātigahaṇaṃ viya manussasampattiṃ jahitvā dibbasampattigahaṇaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3205_7: idhāgamanatthāya naṃ vadeyyāthā”ti. Thero tato āgantvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchi
atk-s0502a:3205_8: – “nibbattati nu kho, bhante, manussaloke ṭhitānaṃyeva katakalyāṇānaṃ dibbasampattī”ti.
atk-s0502a:3205_9: “Moggallāna, nanu te devaloke nandiyassa nibbattā dibbasampatti sāmaṃ diṭṭhā, kasmā
atk-s0502a:3206_0: Atha naṃ satthā “moggallānaṃ kiṃ nāmetaṃ kathesi. Yathā hi cirappavuṭṭhaṃ puttaṃ
atk-s0502a:3206_1: vā bhātaraṃ vā vippavāsato āgacchantaṃ gāmadvāre ṭhito kocideva disvā vegena gehaṃ
atk-s0502a:3206_2: āgantvā ‘asuko nāma āgato’ti āroceyya, athassa ñātakā haṭṭhapahaṭṭhā vegena nikkhamitvā
atk-s0502a:3206_3: ‘āgatosi, tāta, arogosi, tātā’ti taṃ abhinandeyyuṃ, evameva idha katakalyāṇaṃ itthiṃ
atk-s0502a:3206_4: vā purisaṃ vā imaṃ lokaṃ jahitvā paralokaṃ gataṃ dasavidhaṃ dibbapaṇṇākāraṃ ādāya
atk-s0502a:3206_5: ‘ahaṃ purato, ahaṃ purato’ti paccuggantvā devatā abhinandantī”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3213_0: Tattha cirappavāsinti cirappavuṭṭhaṃ. Dūrato sotthimāgatanti vaṇijjaṃ vā rājaporisaṃ
atk-s0502a:3213_1: vā katvā laddhalābhaṃ nipphannasampattiṃ anupaddavena dūraṭṭhānato āgataṃ. Ñātimittā
atk-s0502a:3213_2: suhajjā cāti kulasambandhavasena ñātī ca sandiṭṭhādibhāvena mittā ca suhadayabhāvena
atk-s0502a:3213_3: suhajjā ca. Abhinandanti āgatanti naṃ disvā āgatanti vacanamattena vā añjalikaraṇamattena
atk-s0502a:3213_4: vā gehasampattaṃ pana nānappakārapaṇṇākārābhiharaṇavasena abhinandanti. Tathevāti
atk-s0502a:3213_5: tenevākārena katapuññampi puggalaṃ imasmā lokā paralokaṃ gataṃ dibbaṃ āyuvaṇṇasukhayasaādhipateyyaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3213_6: dibbaṃ rūpasaddagandharasaphoṭṭhabbanti imaṃ dasavidhaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ ādāya mātāpituṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a:3213_7: ṭhitāni puññāni abhinandantāni paṭiggaṇhanti. Piyaṃ ñātīvāti idhaloke piyañātakaṃ
atk-s0502a:3220: Kodhaṃ jaheti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā nigrodhārāme viharanto rohiniṃ nāma khattiyakaññaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3221_0: Ekasmiṃ kira samaye āyasmā anuruddho pañcasatehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ kapilavatthuṃ
atk-s0502a:3221_1: agamāsi. Athassa ñātakā “thero āgato”ti sutvā therassa santikaṃ agamaṃsu ṭhapetvā
atk-s0502a:3221_2: rohiniṃ nāma therassa bhaginiṃ. Thero ñātake pucchi “kahaṃ, rohinī”ti? “Gehe, bhante”ti.
atk-s0502a:3221_3: “Kasmā idha nāgatā”ti? “Sarīre tassā chavirogo uppannoti lajjāya nāgatā, bhante”ti.
atk-s0502a:3221_4: Thero “pakkosatha na”nti pakkosāpetvā paṭakañcukaṃ paṭimuñcitvā āgataṃ evamāha –
atk-s0502a:3221_5: “rohini, kasmā nāgatāsī”ti? “Sarīre me, bhante, chavirogo uppanno, tasmā lajjāya
atk-s0502a:3221_6: nāgatāmhī”ti. “Kiṃ pana te puññaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti? “Kiṃ karomi, bhante”ti? “Āsanasālaṃ
atk-s0502a:3221_7: kārehī”ti. “Kiṃ gahetvā”ti? “Kiṃ te pasādhanabhaṇḍakaṃ natthī”ti? “Atthi, bhante”ti.
atk-s0502a:3221_8: “Kiṃ mūla”nti? “Dasasahassamūlaṃ bhavissatī”ti. “Tena hi taṃ vissajjetvā āsanasālaṃ
atk-s0502a:3221_9: kārehī”ti. “Ko me, bhante, kāressatī”ti? Thero samīpe ṭhitañātake oloketvā “tumhākaṃ
atk-s0502a:3221_10: bhāro hotū”ti āha. “Tumhe pana, bhante, kiṃ karissathā”ti? “Ahampi idheva bhavissāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:3221_11: “Tena hi etissā dabbasambhāre āharathā”ti. Te “sādhu, bhante”ti āhariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3222_0: Thero āsanasālaṃ saṃvidahanto rohiniṃ āha – “dvibhūmikaṃ āsanasālaṃ kāretvā upari
atk-s0502a:3222_1: padarānaṃ dinnakālato paṭṭhāya heṭṭhāsālaṃ nibaddhaṃ sammajjitvā āsanāni paññāpehi,
atk-s0502a:3222_2: nibaddhaṃ pānīyaghaṭe upaṭṭhāpehī”ti. Sā “sādhu, bhante”ti pasādhanabhaṇḍakaṃ vissajjetvā
atk-s0502a:3222_3: dvibhūmikaāsanasālaṃ kāretvā upari padarānaṃ dinnakālato paṭṭhāya heṭṭhāsālaṃ sammajjanādīni
atk-s0502a:3222_4: akāsi. Nibaddhaṃ bhikkhū nisīdanti. Athassā āsanasālaṃ sammajjantiyāva chavirogo
atk-s0502a:3222_5: milāyi. Sā āsanasālāya niṭṭhitāya buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā āsanasālaṃ
atk-s0502a:3222_6: pūretvā nisinnassa buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa paṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ
atk-s0502a:3222_7: adāsi. Satthā katabhattakicco “kassetaṃ dāna”nti pucchi. “Bhaginiyā me, bhante, rohiniyā”ti.
atk-s0502a:3222_8: “Sā pana kaha”nti? “Gehe, bhante”ti. “Pakkosatha na”nti? Sā āgantuṃ na icchi. Atha
atk-s0502a:3222_9: naṃ satthā anicchamānampi pakkosāpesiyeva. Āgantvā ca pana vanditvā nisinnaṃ āha
atk-s0502a:3222_10: – “rohini, kasmā nāgamitthā”ti? “Sarīre me, bhante, chavirogo atthi, tena lajjamānā
atk-s0502a:3222_11: nāgatāmhī”ti. “Jānāsi pana kiṃ te nissāya esa uppanno”ti? “Na jānāmi, bhante”ti.
atk-s0502a:3222_12: “Tava kodhaṃ nissāya uppanno eso”ti. “Kiṃ pana me, bhante, kata”nti? “Tena hi suṇāhī”ti.
atk-s0502a:3223_0: Atīte bārāṇasirañño aggamahesī ekissā rañño nāṭakitthiyā āghātaṃ bandhitvā “dukkhamassā
atk-s0502a:3223_1: uppādessāmī”ti cintetvā mahākacchuphalāni āharāpetvā taṃ nāṭakitthiṃ attano santikaṃ
atk-s0502a:3223_2: pakkosāpetvā yathā sā na jānāti, evamassā sayane ceva pāvārakojavādīnañca antaresu
atk-s0502a:3223_3: kacchucuṇṇāni ṭhapāpesi, keḷiṃ kurumānā viya tassā sarīrepi okiri. Taṃ khaṇaṃyeva
atk-s0502a:3223_4: tassā sarīraṃ uppakkuppakkaṃ gaṇḍāgaṇḍajātaṃ ahosi. Sā kaṇḍuvantī gantvā sayane nipajji,
atk-s0502a:3223_5: tatrāpissā kacchucuṇṇehi khādiyamānāya kharatarā vedanā uppajji. Tadā aggamahesī rohinī ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:3224: Satthā imaṃ atītaṃ āharitvā, “rohini, tadā tayāvetaṃ kammaṃ kataṃ. Appamattakopi hi kodho vā issā vā kātuṃ na yuttarūpo evā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3230_0: Tattha kodhanti sabbākārampi kodhaṃ navavidhampi mānaṃ jaheyya. Saṃyojananti kāmarāgasaṃyojanādikaṃ
atk-s0502a:3230_1: dasavidhampi sabbasaṃyojanaṃ atikkameyya. Asajjamānanti alaggamānaṃ. Yo hi “mama
atk-s0502a:3230_2: rūpaṃ mama vedanā”tiādinā nayena nāmarūpaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti, tasmiñca bhijjamāne socati
atk-s0502a:3230_3: vihaññati, ayaṃ nāmarūpasmiṃ sajjati nāma. Evaṃ aggaṇhanto avihaññanto na sajjati
atk-s0502a:3230_4: nāma. Taṃ puggalaṃ evaṃ asajjamānaṃ rāgādīnaṃ abhāvena akiñcanaṃ dukkhā nāma nānupatantīti
atk-s0502a:3230_5: attho. Desanāvasāne bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pāpuṇiṃsūti. Rohinīpi sotāpattiphale
atk-s0502a:3231_0: Sā tato cutā tāvatiṃsabhavane catunnaṃ devaputtānaṃ sīmantare nibbattitvā pāsādikā
atk-s0502a:3231_1: rūpasobhaggappattā ahosi. Cattāropi devaputtā taṃ disvā uppannasinehā hutvā “mama
atk-s0502a:3231_2: sīmāya anto nibbattā, mama sīmāya anto nibbattā”ti vivadantā sakkassa devarañño santikaṃ
atk-s0502a:3231_3: gantvā, “deva, imaṃ no nissāya aḍḍo uppanno, taṃ vinicchināthā”ti āhaṃsu. Sakkopi
atk-s0502a:3231_4: taṃ oloketvāva uppannasineho hutvā evamāha – “imāya vo diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya kathaṃ
atk-s0502a:3231_5: cittāni uppannānī”ti. Atheko āha – “mama tāva uppannacittaṃ saṅgāmabheri viya sannisīdituṃ
atk-s0502a:3231_6: nāsakkhī”ti. Dutiyo “mama cittaṃ pabbatanadī viya sīghaṃ pavattatiyevā”ti. Tatiyo
atk-s0502a:3231_7: “mama imissā diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya kakkaṭassa viya akkhīni nikkhamiṃsū”ti. Catuttho
atk-s0502a:3231_8: “mama cittaṃ cetiye ussāpitadhajo viya niccalaṃ ṭhātuṃ nāsakkhī”ti. Atha ne sakko
atk-s0502a:3231_9: āha – “tātā, tumhākaṃ tāva cittāni pasayharūpāni, ahaṃ pana imaṃ labhanto jīvissāmi,
atk-s0502a:3231_10: alabhantassa me maraṇaṃ bhavissatī”ti. Devaputtā, “mahārāja, tumhākaṃ maraṇena attho
atk-s0502a:3231_11: natthī”ti taṃ sakkassa vissajjetvā pakkamiṃsu. Sā sakkassa piyā ahosi manāpā. “Asukakīḷaṃ
atk-s0502a:3231_12: nāma gacchāmā”ti vutte sakko tassā vacanaṃ paṭikkhipituṃ nāsakkhīti.
atk-s0502a:3234: Yo ve uppatitanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā aggāḷave cetiye viharanto aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3235_0: Satthārā hi bhikkhusaṅghassa senāsane anuññāte rājagahaseṭṭhiādīhi senāsanesu kariyamānesu
atk-s0502a:3235_1: eko āḷaviko bhikkhu attano senāsanaṃ karonto ekaṃ manāparukkhaṃ disvā chindituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0502a:3235_2: Tattha pana nibbattā ekā taruṇaputtā devatā puttaṃ aṅkenādāya ṭhitā yāci “mā me,
atk-s0502a:3235_3: sāmi, vimānaṃ chindi, na sakkhissāmi puttaṃ ādāya anāvāsā vicaritu”nti. So “ahaṃ
atk-s0502a:3235_4: aññatra īdisaṃ rukkhaṃ na labhissāmī”ti tassā vacanaṃ nādiyi. Sā “imampi tāva dārakaṃ
atk-s0502a:3235_5: oloketvā oramissatī”ti puttaṃ rukkhasākhāya ṭhapesi. Sopi bhikkhu ukkhipitaṃ pharasuṃ
atk-s0502a:3235_6: sandhāretuṃ asakkonto dārakassa bāhuṃ chindi, devatā uppannabalavakodhā “paharitvā
atk-s0502a:3235_7: naṃ māressāmī”ti ubho hatthe ukkhipitvā evaṃ tāva cintesi – “ayaṃ bhikkhu sīlavā.
atk-s0502a:3235_8: Sacāhaṃ imaṃ māressāmi, nirayagāminī bhavissāmi. Sesadevatāpi attano rukkhaṃ chindante
atk-s0502a:3235_9: bhikkhū disvā ‘asukadevatāya evaṃ nāma mārito bhikkhū’ti maṃ pamāṇaṃ katvā bhikkhū
atk-s0502a:3235_10: māressanti. Ayañca sasāmiko bhikkhu, sāmikasseva naṃ kathessāmī”ti ukkhittahatthe
atk-s0502a:3235_11: apanetvā rodamānā satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ satthā
atk-s0502a:3235_12: “kiṃ devate”ti āha. Sā, “bhante, tumhākaṃ me sāvakena idaṃ nāma kataṃ, ahampi naṃ
atk-s0502a:3235_13: māretukāmā hutvā idaṃ nāma cintetvā amāretvāva idhāgatā”ti sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ vitthārato ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:3236: Satthā taṃ sutvā “sādhu, sādhu devate, sādhu te kataṃ evaṃ uggataṃ kopaṃ bhantaṃ rathaṃ viya niggaṇhamānāyā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3238: “Yo ve uppatitaṃ kodhaṃ, rathaṃ bhantaṃva vāraye;
atk-s0502a:3239: Tamahaṃ sārathiṃ brūmi, rasmiggāho itaro jano”ti.
atk-s0502a:3240_0: Tattha uppatitanti uppannaṃ. Rathaṃ bhantaṃ vāti yathā nāma cheko sārathi ativegena
atk-s0502a:3240_1: dhāvantaṃ rathaṃ niggaṇhitvā yathicchakaṃ ṭhapeti, evaṃ yo puggalo uppannaṃ kodhaṃ
atk-s0502a:3240_2: vāraye niggaṇhituṃ sakkoti. Tamahanti taṃ ahaṃ sārathiṃ brūmi. Itaro janoti itaro
atk-s0502a:3240_3: pana rājauparājādīnaṃ rathasārathijano rasmiggāho nāma hoti, na uttamasārathīti.
atk-s0502a:3241: Desanāvasāne devatā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattaparisāyapi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:3242_0: Devatā pana sotāpannā hutvāpi rodamānā aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ satthā “kiṃ devate”ti pucchitvā,
atk-s0502a:3242_1: “bhante, vimānaṃ me naṭṭhaṃ, idāni kiṃ karissāmī”ti vutte, “alaṃ devate, mā cintayi,
atk-s0502a:3242_2: ahaṃ te vimānaṃ dassāmī”ti jetavane gandhakuṭisamīpe purimadivase cutadevataṃ ekaṃ
atk-s0502a:3242_3: rukkhaṃ apadisanto “amukasmiṃ okāse rukkho vivitto, tattha upagacchā”ti āha. Sā tattha
atk-s0502a:3242_4: upagañchi. Tato paṭṭhāya “buddhadattiyaṃ imissā vimāna”nti mahesakkhadevatāpi āgantvā
atk-s0502a:3242_5: taṃ cāletuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu. Satthā taṃ atthuppattiṃ katvā bhikkhūnaṃ bhūtagāmasikkhāpadaṃ paññāpesīti.
atk-s0502a:3245: Akkodhena jine kodhanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto uttarāya gehe katabhattakicco uttaraṃ upāsikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3246_0: Tatrāyamanupubbī kathā – rājagahe kira sumanaseṭṭhiṃ nissāya puṇṇo nāma daliddo bhatiṃ
atk-s0502a:3246_1: katvā jīvati. Tassa bhariyā ca uttarā nāma dhītā cāti dveyeva gehamānusakā. Athekadivasaṃ
atk-s0502a:3246_2: “sattāhaṃ nakkhattaṃ kīḷitabba”nti rājagahe ghosanaṃ kariṃsu. Taṃ sutvā sumanaseṭṭhi
atk-s0502a:3246_3: pātova āgataṃ puṇṇaṃ āmantetvā, “tāta, amhākaṃ parijano nakkhattaṃ kīḷitukāmo, tvaṃ
atk-s0502a:3246_4: kiṃ nakkhattaṃ kīḷissasi, udāhu bhatiṃ karissasī”ti āha. “Sāmi, nakkhattaṃ nāma sadhanānaṃ
atk-s0502a:3246_5: hoti, mama pana gehe svātanāya yāgutaṇḍulampi natthi, kiṃ me nakkhattena, goṇe labhanto
atk-s0502a:3246_6: kasituṃ gamissāmī”ti. “Tena hi goṇe gaṇhāhī”ti. So balavagoṇe ca naṅgalañca gahetvā,
atk-s0502a:3246_7: “bhadde, nāgarā nakkhattaṃ kīḷanti, ahaṃ daliddatāya bhatiṃ kātuṃ gamissāmi, mayhampi
atk-s0502a:3246_8: tāva ajja dviguṇaṃ nivāpaṃ pacitvā bhattaṃ āhareyyāsī”ti bhariyaṃ vatvā khettaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:3247_0: Sāriputtattheropi sattāhaṃ nirodhasamāpanno taṃ divasaṃ vuṭṭhāya “kassa nu kho ajja
atk-s0502a:3247_1: mayā saṅgahaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti olokento puṇṇaṃ attano ñāṇajālassa anto paviṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0502a:3247_2: disvā “saddho nu kho esa, sakkhissati vā me saṅgahaṃ kātu”nti olokento tassa saddhabhāvañca
atk-s0502a:3247_3: saṅgahaṃ kātuṃ samatthabhāvañca tappaccayā cassa mahāsampattipaṭilābhañca ñatvā pattacīvaramādāya
atk-s0502a:3247_4: tassa kasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā āvāṭatīre ekaṃ gumbaṃ olokento aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:3248_0: Puṇṇo theraṃ disvāva kasiṃ ṭhapetvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena theraṃ vanditvā “dantakaṭṭhena
atk-s0502a:3248_1: attho bhavissatī”ti dantakaṭṭhaṃ kappiyaṃ katvā adāsi. Athassa thero pattañca parissāvanañca
atk-s0502a:3248_2: nīharitvā adāsi. So “pānīyena attho bhavissatī”ti taṃ ādāya pānīyaṃ parissāvetvā
atk-s0502a:3248_3: adāsi. Thero cintesi – “ayaṃ paresaṃ pacchimagehe vasati. Sacassa gehadvāraṃ gamissāmi,
atk-s0502a:3248_4: imassa bhariyā maṃ daṭṭhuṃ na labhissati. Yāvassā bhattaṃ ādāya maggaṃ paṭipajjati,
atk-s0502a:3248_5: tāva idheva bhavissāmī”ti. So tattheva thokaṃ vītināmetvā tassa maggāruḷhabhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:3249_0: Sā antarāmagge theraṃ disvā cintesi – “appekadāhaṃ deyyadhamme sati ayyaṃ na passāmi,
atk-s0502a:3249_1: appekadā me ayyaṃ passantiyā deyyadhammo na hoti. Ajja pana me ayyo ca diṭṭho, deyyadhammo
atk-s0502a:3249_2: cāyaṃ atthi, karissati nu kho me saṅgaha”nti. Sā bhattabhājanaṃ oropetvā theraṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena
atk-s0502a:3249_3: vanditvā, “bhante, idaṃ lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vāti acintetvā dāsassa vo saṅgahaṃ karothā”ti
atk-s0502a:3249_4: āha. Thero pattaṃ upanāmetvā tāya ekena hatthena bhājanaṃ dhāretvā ekena hatthena
atk-s0502a:3249_5: tato bhattaṃ dadamānāya upaḍḍhabhatte dinne “ala”nti hatthena pattaṃ pidahi. Sā,
atk-s0502a:3249_6: “bhante, ekova paṭiviso, na sakkā dvidhā kātuṃ. Tumhākaṃ dāsassa idhalokasaṅgahaṃ
atk-s0502a:3249_7: akatvā paralokasaṅgahaṃ karotha, niravasesameva dātukāmamhī”ti vatvā sabbameva therassa
atk-s0502a:3249_8: patte patiṭṭhapetvā “tumhehi diṭṭhadhammasseva bhāgī assa”nti patthanaṃ akāsi. Thero
atk-s0502a:3249_9: “evaṃ hotū”ti vatvā ṭhitakova anumodanaṃ karitvā ekasmiṃ udakaphāsukaṭṭhāne nisīditvā
atk-s0502a:3249_10: bhattakiccamakāsi. Sāpi nivattitvā taṇḍule pariyesitvā bhattaṃ paci. Puṇṇopi aḍḍhakarīsamattaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:3249_11: kasitvā jighacchaṃ sahituṃ asakkonto goṇe vissajjetvā ekarukkhacchāyaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0502a:3250_0: Athassa bhariyā bhattaṃ ādāya gacchamānā taṃ disvāva “esa jighacchāya pīḷito maṃ
atk-s0502a:3250_1: olokento nisinno. Sace maṃ ‘ativiya je cirāyī’ti tajjetvā patodalaṭṭhiyā maṃ paharissati,
atk-s0502a:3250_2: mayā katakammaṃ niratthakaṃ bhavissati. Paṭikaccevassa ārocessāmī”ti cintetvā evamāha
atk-s0502a:3250_3: – “sāmi, ajjekadivasaṃ cittaṃ pasādehi, mā mayā katakammaṃ niratthakaṃ kari. Ahañhi
atk-s0502a:3250_4: pātova te bhattaṃ āharantī antarāmagge dhammasenāpatiṃ disvā tava bhattaṃ tassa datvā
atk-s0502a:3250_5: puna gantvā bhattaṃ pacitvā āgatā, pasādehi, sāmi, citta”nti. So “kiṃ vadesi, bhadde”ti
atk-s0502a:3250_6: pucchitvā puna tamatthaṃ sutvā, “bhadde, sādhu vata te kataṃ mama bhattaṃ ayyassa
atk-s0502a:3250_7: dadamānāya, mayāpissa ajja pātova dantakaṭṭhañca mukhodakañca dinna”nti pasannamānaso
atk-s0502a:3250_8: taṃ vacanaṃ abhinanditvā ussure laddhabhattatāya kilantakāyo tassā aṅke sīsaṃ katvā niddaṃ okkami.
atk-s0502a:3251_0: Athassa pātova kasitaṭṭhānaṃ paṃsucuṇṇaṃ upādāya sabbaṃ rattasuvaṇṇaṃ kaṇikārapuppharāsi
atk-s0502a:3251_1: viya sobhamānaṃ aṭṭhāsi. So pabuddho oloketvā bhariyaṃ āha – “bhadde, etaṃ kasitaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:3251_2: sabbaṃ mama suvaṇṇaṃ hutvā paññāyati, kiṃ nu kho me atiussure laddhabhattatāya akkhīni
atk-s0502a:3251_3: bhamantī”ti. “Sāmi, mayhampi evameva paññāyatī”ti. So uṭṭhāya tattha gantvā ekapiṇḍaṃ
atk-s0502a:3251_4: gahetvā naṅgalasīse paharitvā suvaṇṇabhāvaṃ ñatvā “aho ayyassa dhammasenāpatissa
atk-s0502a:3251_5: me dinnadānena ajjeva vipāko dassito, na kho pana sakkā ettakaṃ dhanaṃ paṭicchādetvā
atk-s0502a:3251_6: paribhuñjitu”nti bhariyāya ābhataṃ bhattapātiṃ suvaṇṇassa pūretvā rājakulaṃ gantvā
atk-s0502a:3251_7: raññā katokāso pavisitvā rājānaṃ abhivādetvā “kiṃ, tātā”ti vutte, “deva, ajja mayā
atk-s0502a:3251_8: kasitaṭṭhānaṃ sabbaṃ suvaṇṇabharitameva hutvā ṭhitaṃ, idaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ āharāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:3251_9: “Kosi tva”nti? “Puṇṇo nāma aha”nti. “Kiṃ pana te ajja kata”nti? “Dhammasenāpatissa
atk-s0502a:3251_10: me ajja pātova dantakaṭṭhañca mukhodakañca dinnaṃ, bhariyāyapi me mayhaṃ āharaṇabhattaṃ tasseva dinna”nti.
atk-s0502a:3252_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā “ajjeva kira, bho, dhammasenāpatissa dinnadānena vipāko dassito”ti
atk-s0502a:3252_1: vatvā, “tāta, kiṃ karomī”ti pucchi. “Bahūni sakaṭasahassāni pahiṇitvā suvaṇṇaṃ āharāpethā”ti.
atk-s0502a:3252_2: Rājā sakaṭāni pahiṇi. Rājapurisesu “rañño santaka”nti gaṇhantesu gahitagahitaṃ mattikāva
atk-s0502a:3252_3: hoti. Te gantvā rañño ārocetvā “tumhehi kinti vatvā gahita”nti. Puṭṭhā “tumhākaṃ
atk-s0502a:3252_4: santaka”nti āhaṃsu. Na mayhaṃ, tātā, santakaṃ, gacchatha “puṇṇassa santaka”nti vatvā
atk-s0502a:3252_5: gaṇhathāti. Te tathā kariṃsu, gahitagahitaṃ suvaṇṇameva ahosi. Sabbampi āharitvā
atk-s0502a:3252_6: rājaṅgaṇe rāsimakaṃsu, asītihatthubbedho rāsi ahosi. Rājā nāgare sannipātetvā “imasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:3252_7: nagare atthi kassaci ettakaṃ suvaṇṇa”nti? “Natthi, devā”ti. “Kiṃ panassa dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti?
atk-s0502a:3252_8: “Seṭṭhichattaṃ, devā”ti. Rājā “bāhudhanaseṭṭhi nāma hotū”ti mahantena bhogena saddhiṃ
atk-s0502a:3252_9: tassa seṭṭhichattamadāsi. Atha naṃ so āha – “mayaṃ, deva, ettakaṃ kālaṃ parakule
