atk-s0502a:3252_10: vasimhā, vasanaṭṭhānaṃ no dethā”ti. “Tena hi passa, esa gumbo paññāyati, etaṃ harāpetvā
atk-s0502a:3252_11: gehaṃ kārehī”ti purāṇaseṭṭhissa gehaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhi. So tasmiṃ ṭhāne katipāheneva
atk-s0502a:3252_12: gehaṃ kārāpetvā gehappavesanamaṅgalañca chattamaṅgalañca ekatova karonto sattāhaṃ
atk-s0502a:3252_13: buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ adāsi. Athassa satthā anumodanaṃ karonto
atk-s0502a:3252_14: anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathesi. Dhammakathāvasāne puṇṇaseṭṭhi ca bhariyā cassa dhītā ca
atk-s0502a:3253_0: Aparabhāge rājagahaseṭṭhi puṇṇaseṭṭhino dhītaraṃ attano puttassa vāresi. So “nāhaṃ
atk-s0502a:3253_1: dassāmī”ti vatvā “mā evaṃ karotu, ettakaṃ kālaṃ amhe nissāya vasanteneva te sampatti
atk-s0502a:3253_2: laddhā, detu me puttassa dhītara”nti vutte “so micchādiṭṭhiko, mama dhītā tīhi ratanehi
atk-s0502a:3253_3: vinā vattituṃ na sakkoti, nevassa dhītaraṃ dassāmī”ti āha. Atha naṃ bahū seṭṭhigaṇādayo
atk-s0502a:3253_4: kulaputtā “mā tena saddhiṃ vissāsaṃ bhindi, dehissa dhītara”nti yāciṃsu. So tesaṃ
atk-s0502a:3253_5: vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā āsāḷhipuṇṇamāyaṃ dhītaraṃ adāsi. Sā patikulaṃ gatakālato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0502a:3253_6: bhikkhuṃ vā bhikkhuniṃ vā upasaṅkamituṃ dānaṃ vā dātuṃ dhammaṃ vā sotuṃ nālattha.
atk-s0502a:3253_7: Evaṃ aḍḍhatiyesu māsesu vītivattesu santike ṭhitaṃ paricārikaṃ pucchi – “idāni kittakaṃ
atk-s0502a:3253_8: antovassassa avasiṭṭha”nti? “Aḍḍhamāso, ayye”ti. Sā pitu sāsanaṃ pahiṇi “kasmā maṃ
atk-s0502a:3253_9: evarūpe bandhanāgāre pakkhipiṃsu, varaṃ me lakkhaṇāhataṃ katvā paresaṃ dāsiṃ sāvetuṃ.
atk-s0502a:3253_10: Evarūpassa micchādiṭṭhikulassa dātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Āgatakālato paṭṭhāya bhikkhudassanādīsu
atk-s0502a:3254_0: Athassā pitā “dukkhitā vata me dhītā”ti anattamanataṃ pavedetvā pañcadasa kahāpaṇasahassāni
atk-s0502a:3254_1: pesesi “imasmiṃ nagare sirimā nāma gaṇikā atthi, devasikaṃ sahassaṃ gaṇhāti. Imehi
atk-s0502a:3254_2: kahāpaṇehi taṃ ānetvā sāmikassa pādaparicārikaṃ katvā sayaṃ puññāni karotū”ti. Sā
atk-s0502a:3254_3: sirimaṃ pakkosāpetvā “sahāyike ime kahāpaṇe gahetvā imaṃ aḍḍhamāsaṃ tava sahāyakaṃ
atk-s0502a:3254_4: paricarāhī”ti āha. Sā “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇi. Sā taṃ ādāya sāmikassa santikaṃ gantvā
atk-s0502a:3254_5: tena sirimaṃ disvā “kiṃ ida”nti vutte, “sāmi, imaṃ aḍḍhamāsaṃ mama sahāyikā tumhe
atk-s0502a:3254_6: paricaratu, ahaṃ pana imaṃ aḍḍhamāsaṃ dānañceva dātukāmā dhammañca sotukāmā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:3254_7: So taṃ abhirūpaṃ itthiṃ disvā uppannasineho “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchi.
atk-s0502a:3255_0: Uttarāpi kho buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā, “bhante, imaṃ aḍḍhamāsaṃ
atk-s0502a:3255_1: aññattha agantvā idheva bhikkhā gahetabbā”ti satthu paṭiññaṃ gahetvā “ito dāni paṭṭhāya
atk-s0502a:3255_2: yāva mahāpavāraṇā, tāva satthāraṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ dhammañca sotuṃ labhissāmī”ti tuṭṭhamānasā
atk-s0502a:3255_3: “evaṃ yāguṃ pacatha, evaṃ pūve pacathā”ti mahānase sabbakiccāni saṃvidahantī vicarati.
atk-s0502a:3255_4: Athassā sāmiko “sve pavāraṇā bhavissatī”ti mahānasābhimukho vātapāne ṭhatvā “kiṃ
atk-s0502a:3255_5: nu kho karontī sā andhabālā vicaratī”ti olokento taṃ seṭṭhīdhītaraṃ sedakilinnaṃ
atk-s0502a:3255_6: chārikāya okiṇṇaṃ aṅgāramasimakkhitaṃ tathā saṃvidahitvā vicaramānaṃ disvā “aho andhabālā
atk-s0502a:3255_7: evarūpe ṭhāne imaṃ sirisampattiṃ nānubhavati, ‘muṇḍakasamaṇe upaṭṭhahissāmī’ti tuṭṭhacittā
atk-s0502a:3256_0: Tasmiṃ apagate tassa santike ṭhitā sirimā “kiṃ nu kho oloketvā esa hasī”ti teneva
atk-s0502a:3256_1: vātapānena olokentī uttaraṃ disvā “imaṃ oloketvā iminā hasitaṃ, addhā imassa etāya
atk-s0502a:3256_2: saddhiṃ santhavo atthī”ti cintesi. Sā kira aḍḍhamāsaṃ tasmiṃ gehe bāhirakaitthī hutvā
atk-s0502a:3256_3: vasamānāpi taṃ sampattiṃ anubhavamānā attano bāhirakaitthibhāvaṃ ajānitvā “ahaṃ gharasāminī”ti
atk-s0502a:3256_4: saññamakāsi. Sā uttarāya āghātaṃ bandhitvā “dukkhamassā uppādessāmī”ti pāsādā oruyha
atk-s0502a:3256_5: mahānasaṃ pavisitvā pūvapacanaṭṭhāne pakkuthitaṃ sappiṃ kaṭacchunā ādāya uttarābhimukhaṃ
atk-s0502a:3256_6: pāyāsi. Uttarā taṃ āgacchantiṃ disvā “mama sahāyikāya mayhaṃ upakāro kato, cakkavāḷaṃ
atk-s0502a:3256_7: atisambādhaṃ, brahmaloko atinīcako, mama sahāyikāya guṇova mahanto. Ahañhi etaṃ nissāya
atk-s0502a:3256_8: dānañca dātuṃ dhammañca sotuṃ labhiṃ. Sace mama etissā upari kopo atthi, idaṃ sappi
atk-s0502a:3256_9: maṃ dahatu. Sace natthi, mā dahatū”ti taṃ mettāya phari. Tāya tassā matthake āsittaṃ
atk-s0502a:3257_0: Atha naṃ “idaṃ sītalaṃ bhavissatī”ti kaṭacchuṃ pūretvā ādāya āgacchantiṃ uttarāya
atk-s0502a:3257_1: dāsiyo disvā “apehi dubbinīte, na tvaṃ amhākaṃ ayyāya pakkuthitaṃ sappiṃ āsiñcituṃ
atk-s0502a:3257_2: anucchavikā”ti santajjentiyo ito cito ca uṭṭhāya hatthehi ca pādehi ca pothetvā bhūmiyaṃ
atk-s0502a:3257_3: pātesuṃ. Uttarā vārentīpi vāretuṃ nāsakkhi. Athassā upari ṭhitā sabbā dāsiyo paṭibāhitvā
atk-s0502a:3257_4: “kissa te evarūpaṃ bhāriyaṃ kata”nti sirimaṃ ovaditvā uṇhodakena nhāpetvā satapākatelena
atk-s0502a:3257_5: abbhañji. Tasmiṃ khaṇe sā attano bāhirakitthibhāvaṃ ñatvā cintesi – “mayā bhāriyaṃ
atk-s0502a:3257_6: kammaṃ kataṃ sāmikassa hasanamattakāraṇā imissā upari pakkuthitaṃ sappiṃ āsiñcantiyā,
atk-s0502a:3257_7: ayaṃ ‘gaṇhatha na’nti dāsiyo na āṇāpesi. Maṃ viheṭhanakālepi sabbadāsiyo paṭibāhitvā
atk-s0502a:3257_8: mayhaṃ kattabbameva akāsi. Sacāhaṃ imaṃ na khamāpessāmi, muddhā me sattadhā phaleyyā”ti
atk-s0502a:3257_9: tassā pādamūle nipajjitvā, “ayye, khamāhi me”ti āha. Ahaṃ sapitikā dhītā, pitari
atk-s0502a:3257_10: khamante khamāmīti. Hotu, ayye, pitaraṃ te puṇṇaseṭṭhiṃ khamāpessāmīti. Puṇṇo mama
atk-s0502a:3257_11: vaṭṭajanakapitā, vivaṭṭajanake pitari khamante panāhaṃ khamissāmīti. Ko pana te vivaṭṭajanakapitāti?
atk-s0502a:3257_12: Sammāsambuddhoti. Mayhaṃ tena saddhiṃ vissāso natthīti. Ahaṃ karissāmi, satthā sve
atk-s0502a:3257_13: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ādāya idhāgamissati, tvaṃ yathāladdhaṃ sakkāraṃ gahetvā idheva āgantvā
atk-s0502a:3257_14: taṃ khamāpehīti. Sā “sādhu, ayye”ti uṭṭhāya attano gehaṃ gantvā pañcasatā parivāritthiyo
atk-s0502a:3257_15: āṇāpetvā nānāvidhāni khādanīyāni ceva sūpeyyāni ca sampādetvā punadivase taṃ sakkāraṃ
atk-s0502a:3257_16: ādāya uttarāya gehaṃ āgantvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa patte patiṭṭhāpetuṃ
atk-s0502a:3257_17: avisahantī aṭṭhāsi. Taṃ sabbaṃ gahetvā uttarāva saṃvidahi. Sirimāpi bhattakiccāvasāne
atk-s0502a:3258_0: Atha naṃ satthā pucchi – “ko te aparādho”ti? Bhante, mayā hiyyo idaṃ nāma kataṃ,
atk-s0502a:3258_1: atha me sahāyikā maṃ viheṭhayamānā dāsiyo nivāretvā mayhaṃ upakārameva akāsi. Sāhaṃ
atk-s0502a:3258_2: imissā guṇaṃ jānitvā imaṃ khamāpesiṃ, atha maṃ esā “tumhesu khamantesu khamissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:3258_3: āha. “Evaṃ kira uttare”ti? “Āma, bhante, sīse me sahāyikāya pakkuthitasappi āsitta”nti.
atk-s0502a:3258_4: Atha “tayā kiṃ cintita”nti? “Cakkavāḷaṃ atisambādhaṃ, brahmaloko atinīcako, mama
atk-s0502a:3258_5: sahāyikāya guṇova mahanto. Ahañhi etaṃ nissāya dānañca dātuṃ dhammañca sotuṃ alatthaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3258_6: sace me imissā upari kopo atthi, idaṃ maṃ dahatu. No ce, mā dahatū”ti evaṃ cintetvā
atk-s0502a:3258_7: imaṃ mettāya phariṃ, bhanteti. Satthā “sādhu sādhu, uttare, evaṃ kodhaṃ jinituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0502a:3258_8: Kodho hi nāma akkodhena, akkosakaparibhāsako anakkosantena aparibhāsantena, thaddhamaccharī
atk-s0502a:3258_9: attano santakassa dānena, musāvādī saccavacanena jinitabbo”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3262_0: Tattha akkodhenāti kodhano hi puggalo akkodhena hutvā jinitabbo. Asādhunti abhaddako
atk-s0502a:3262_1: bhaddakena hutvā jinitabbo. Kadariyanti thaddhamaccharī attano santakassa cāgacittena
atk-s0502a:3262_2: jinitabbo. Alikavādī saccavacanena jinitabbo. Tasmā evamāha – “akkodhena jine kodhaṃ…pe…
atk-s0502a:3263: Desanāvasāne sirimā saddhiṃ pañcasatāhi itthīhi sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahīti.
atk-s0502a:3266: Saccaṃ bhaṇeti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto mahāmoggallānattherassa pañhaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3267_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye thero devacārikaṃ gantvā mahesakkhāya devatāya vimānadvāre ṭhatvā
atk-s0502a:3267_1: taṃ attano santikaṃ āgantvā vanditvā ṭhitaṃ evamāha – “devate mahatī te sampatti,
atk-s0502a:3267_2: kiṃ kammaṃ katvā imaṃ alatthā”ti? “Mā maṃ, bhante, pucchathā”ti. Devatā kira attano
atk-s0502a:3267_3: parittakammena lajjamānā evaṃ vadati. Sā pana therena “kathehiyevā”ti vuccamānā āha
atk-s0502a:3267_4: – “bhante, mayā neva dānaṃ dinnaṃ, na pūjā katā, na dhammo suto, kevalaṃ saccamattaṃ
atk-s0502a:3267_5: rakkhita”nti. Thero aññāni vimānadvārāni gantvā āgatāgatā aparāpi devadhītaro pucchi.
atk-s0502a:3267_6: Tāsupi tatheva niguhitvā theraṃ paṭibāhituṃ asakkontīsu ekā tāva āha – “bhante, mayā
atk-s0502a:3267_7: neva dānādīsu kataṃ nāma atthi, ahaṃ pana kassapabuddhakāle parassa dāsī ahosiṃ,
atk-s0502a:3267_8: tassā me sāmiko ativiya caṇḍo pharuso, gahitaggahiteneva kaṭṭhena vā kaliṅgarena
atk-s0502a:3267_9: vā sīsaṃ bhindati. Sāhaṃ uppanne kope ‘esa tava sāmiko lakkhaṇāhataṃ vā kātuṃ nāsādīni
atk-s0502a:3267_10: vā chindituṃ issaro, mā kujjhī’ti attānameva paribhāsetvā kopaṃ nāma na akāsiṃ, tena
atk-s0502a:3267_11: me ayaṃ sampatti laddhā”ti. Aparā āha – “ahaṃ, bhante, ucchukhettaṃ rakkhamānā ekassa
atk-s0502a:3267_12: bhikkhuno ucchuyaṭṭhiṃ adāsiṃ”. Aparā ekaṃ timbarusakaṃ adāsiṃ. Aparā ekaṃ eḷālukaṃ
atk-s0502a:3267_13: adāsiṃ. Aparā ekaṃ phārusakaṃ adāsiṃ. Aparā ekaṃ mūlamuṭṭhiṃ. Aparā “nimbamuṭṭhi”ntiādinā
atk-s0502a:3267_14: nayena attanā attanā kataṃ parittadānaṃ ārocetvā “iminā iminā kāraṇena amhehi ayaṃ
atk-s0502a:3268_0: Thero tāhi katakammaṃ sutvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchi – “sakkā nu kho, bhante,
atk-s0502a:3268_2: dibbasampattiṃ laddhu”nti. “Kasmā maṃ, moggallāna, pucchasi, nanu te devatāhi ayaṃ
atk-s0502a:3268_3: attho kathito”ti? “Āma, bhante, labbhati maññe ettakena dibbasampattī”ti. Atha naṃ
atk-s0502a:3268_4: satthā “moggallāna, saccamattaṃ kathetvāpi kopamattaṃ jahitvāpi parittakaṃ dānaṃ
atk-s0502a:3268_5: datvāpi devalokaṃ gacchatiyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3270: “Saccaṃ bhaṇe na kujjheyya, dajjā appampi yācito;
atk-s0502a:3271: Etehi tīhi ṭhānehi, gacche devāna santike”ti.
atk-s0502a:3272_0: Tattha saccaṃ bhaṇeti saccaṃ dīpeyya vohareyya, sacce patiṭṭhaheyyāti attho. Na kujjheyyāti
atk-s0502a:3272_1: parassa na kujjheyya. Yācitoti yācakā nāma sīlavanto pabbajitā. Te hi kiñcāpi “dethā”ti
atk-s0502a:3272_2: ayācitvāva gharadvāre tiṭṭhanti, atthato pana yācantiyeva nāma. Evaṃ sīlavantehi
atk-s0502a:3272_3: yācito appasmiṃ deyyadhamme vijjamāne appamattakampi dadeyya. Etehi tīhīti etesu
atk-s0502a:3272_4: tīsu ekenāpi kāraṇena devalokaṃ gaccheyyāti attho.
atk-s0502a:3276: Ahiṃsakā yeti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā sāketaṃ nissāya añjanavane viharanto bhikkhūhi paṭṭhapañhaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3277_0: Bhagavato kira bhikkhusaṅghaparivutassa sāketaṃ piṇḍāya pavisanakāle eko sāketavāsī
atk-s0502a:3277_1: mahallakabrāhmaṇo nagarato nikkhamanto antaragharadvāre dasabalaṃ disvā pādesu nipatitvā
atk-s0502a:3277_2: gopphakesu daḷhaṃ gahetvā, “tāta, nanu nāma puttehi jiṇṇakāle mātāpitaro paṭijaggitabbā,
atk-s0502a:3277_3: kasmā ettakaṃ kālaṃ amhākaṃ attānaṃ na dassesi. Mayā tāva diṭṭhosi, mātarampi passituṃ
atk-s0502a:3277_4: ehī”ti satthāraṃ gahetvā attano gehaṃ agamāsi. Satthā tattha gantvā paññatte āsane
atk-s0502a:3277_5: nisīdi saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena. Brāhmaṇīpi āgantvā satthu pādesu nipatitvā, “tāta,
atk-s0502a:3277_6: ettakaṃ kālaṃ kuhiṃ gatosi, nanu nāma mātāpitaro mahallakakāle upaṭṭhātabbā”ti vatvā
atk-s0502a:3277_7: puttadhītaro “etha bhātaraṃ vandathā”ti vandāpesi. Te ubhopi tuṭṭhamānasā buddhappamukhaṃ
atk-s0502a:3277_8: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ parivisitvā, “bhante, idheva nibaddhaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vatvā
atk-s0502a:3277_9: “buddhā nāma ekaṭṭhāneyeva nibaddhaṃ bhikkhaṃ na gaṇhantī”ti vutte, “tena hi, bhante,
atk-s0502a:3277_10: ye vo nimantetuṃ āgacchanti, te amhākaṃ santikaṃ pahiṇeyyāthā”ti āhaṃsu. Satthā tato
atk-s0502a:3277_11: paṭṭhāya nimantetuṃ āgate “gantvā brāhmaṇassa āroceyyāthā”ti pesesi. Te gantvā “mayaṃ
atk-s0502a:3277_12: svātanāya satthāraṃ nimantemā”ti brāhmaṇaṃ vadanti. Brāhmaṇo punadivase attano gehato
atk-s0502a:3277_13: bhattabhājanasūpeyyabhājanāni ādāya satthu nisīdanaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati. Aññatra pana
atk-s0502a:3277_14: nimantane asati satthā brāhmaṇasseva gehe bhattakiccaṃ karoti. Te ubhopi attano deyyadhammaṃ
atk-s0502a:3277_15: niccakālaṃ tathāgatassa dentā dhammakathaṃ suṇantā anāgāmiphalaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3278_0: Bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ, “āvuso, brāhmaṇo ‘tathāgatassa suddhodano
atk-s0502a:3278_1: pitā, mahāmāyā mātā’ti jānāti, jānantova saddhiṃ brāhmaṇiyā tathāgataṃ ‘amhākaṃ putto’ti
atk-s0502a:3278_2: vadati, satthāpi tatheva adhivāseti. Kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti? Satthā tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā,
atk-s0502a:3278_3: “bhikkhave, ubhopi te attano puttameva puttoti vadantī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0502a:3279_0: Atīte, bhikkhave, ayaṃ brāhmaṇo nirantaraṃ pañca jātisatāni mayhaṃ pitā ahosi, pañca
atk-s0502a:3279_1: jātisatāni cūḷapitā, pañca jātisatāni mahāpitā. Sāpi me brāhmaṇī nirantarameva pañca
atk-s0502a:3279_2: jātisatāni mātā ahosi, pañca jātisatāni cūḷamātā, pañca jātisatāni mahāmātā. Evāhaṃ
atk-s0502a:3279_3: diyaḍḍhajātisahassaṃ brāhmaṇassa hatthe saṃvaḍḍho, diyaḍḍhajātisahassaṃ brāhmaṇiyā
atk-s0502a:3279_4: hattheti tīṇi jātisahassāni tesaṃ puttabhāvaṃ dassetvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3283: Evaṃ taṃ jāyate pemaṃ, uppalaṃva yathodake”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:3284_0: Satthā temāsameva taṃ kulaṃ nissāya vihāsi. Te ubhopi arahattaṃ sacchikatvā parinibbāyiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3284_1: Atha nesaṃ mahāsakkāraṃ katvā ubhopi ekakūṭāgārameva āropetvā nīhariṃsu. Satthāpi
atk-s0502a:3284_2: pañcasatabhikkhuparivāro tehi saddhiṃyeva āḷāhanaṃ agamāsi. “Buddhānaṃ kira mātāpitaro”ti
atk-s0502a:3284_3: mahājano nikkhami. Satthāpi āḷāhanasamīpe ekaṃ sālaṃ pavisitvā aṭṭhāsi. Manussā satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:3284_4: vanditvā ekamante ṭhatvā, “bhante, ‘mātāpitaro vo kālakatā’ti mā cintayitthā”ti satthārā
atk-s0502a:3284_5: saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ karonti. Satthā te “mā evaṃ avacutthā”ti appaṭikkhipitvā parisāya
atk-s0502a:3289_0: Idaṃ jarāsuttaṃ kathesi. Desanāvasāne caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo
atk-s0502a:3289_1: ahosi. Bhikkhū brāhmaṇassa ca brāhmaṇiyā ca parinibbutabhāvaṃ ajānantā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:3289_2: tesaṃ ko abhisamparāyo”ti pucchiṃsu. Satthā, “bhikkhave, evarūpānaṃ asekhamunīnaṃ
atk-s0502a:3289_3: abhisamparāyo nāma natthi. Evarūpā hi accutaṃ amataṃ mahānibbānameva pāpuṇantī”ti
atk-s0502a:3292: Te yanti accutaṃ ṭhānaṃ, yattha gantvā na socare”ti.
atk-s0502a:3293_0: Tattha munayoti moneyyapaṭipadāya maggaphalapattā asekhamunayo. Kāyenāti desanāmattamevetaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3293_1: tīhipi dvārehi susaṃvutāti attho. Accutanti sassataṃ. Ṭhānanti akuppaṭṭhānaṃ dhuvaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0502a:3293_2: Yatthāti yasmiṃ nibbāne gantvā na socare na socanti na vihaññanti, taṃ ṭhānaṃ gacchantīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3297: Sadā jāgaramānānanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā gijjhakūṭe viharanto puṇṇaṃ nāma rājagahaseṭṭhino dāsiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3298_0: Tassā kira ekadivasaṃ koṭṭanatthāya bahuvīhiṃ adaṃsu. Sā rattimpi dīpaṃ jāletvā vīhiṃ
atk-s0502a:3298_1: koṭṭentī vissamanatthāya sedatintena gattena bahivāte aṭṭhāsi. Tasmiṃ samaye dabbo
atk-s0502a:3298_2: mallaputto bhikkhūnaṃ senāsanapaññāpako ahosi. So dhammassavanaṃ sutvā attano attano
atk-s0502a:3298_3: senāsanaṃ gacchantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aṅguliṃ jāletvā purato purato maggadesanatthāya
atk-s0502a:3298_4: gacchanto bhikkhūnaṃ ālokaṃ nimmini. Puṇṇā tenālokena pabbate vicarante bhikkhū disvā
atk-s0502a:3298_5: “ahaṃ tāva attano dukkhena upaddutā imāyapi velāya niddaṃ na upemi, bhaddantā kiṃ
atk-s0502a:3298_6: kāraṇā na niddāyantī”ti cintetvā “addhā kassaci bhikkhuno aphāsukaṃ vā bhavissati,
atk-s0502a:3298_7: dīghajātikena vā upaddavo bhavissatī”ti saññaṃ katvā pātova kuṇḍakaṃ ādāya udakena
atk-s0502a:3298_8: temetvā hatthatale pūvaṃ katvā aṅgāresu pacitvā ucchaṅge katvā titthamagge khādissāmīti
atk-s0502a:3298_9: ghaṭaṃ ādāya titthābhimukhī pāyāsi. Satthāpi gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisituṃ tameva maggaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0502a:3299_0: Sā satthāraṃ disvā cintesi – “aññesu divasesu satthari diṭṭhepi mama deyyadhammo
atk-s0502a:3299_1: na hoti, deyyadhamme sati satthāraṃ na passāmi, idāni me deyyadhammo ca atthi, satthā
atk-s0502a:3299_2: ca sammukhībhūto. Sace lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vāti acintetvā gaṇheyya, dadeyyāhaṃ imaṃ
atk-s0502a:3299_3: pūva”nti ghaṭaṃ ekamante nikkhipitvā satthāraṃ vanditvā, “bhante, imaṃ lūkhaṃ dānaṃ
atk-s0502a:3299_4: paṭiggaṇhantā mama saṅgahaṃ karothā”ti āha. Satthā ānandattheraṃ oloketvā tena nīharitvā
atk-s0502a:3299_5: dinnaṃ mahārājadattiyaṃ pattaṃ upanāmetvā pūvaṃ gaṇhi. Puṇṇāpi taṃ satthu patte patiṭṭhapetvāva
atk-s0502a:3299_6: pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā, “bhante, tumhehi diṭṭhadhammoyeva me samijjhatū”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:3300_0: Puṇṇāpi cintesi – “kiñcāpi me satthā saṅgahaṃ karonto pūvaṃ gaṇhi, na panidaṃ khādissati.
atk-s0502a:3300_1: Addhā purato kākassa vā sunakhassa vā datvā rañño vā rājaputtassa vā gehaṃ gantvā
atk-s0502a:3300_2: paṇītabhojanaṃ bhuñjissatī”ti. Satthāpi “kiṃ nu kho esā cintesī”ti tassā cittācāraṃ
atk-s0502a:3300_3: ñatvā ānandattheraṃ oloketvā nisīdanākāraṃ dassesi. Thero cīvaraṃ paññāpetvā adāsi.
atk-s0502a:3300_4: Satthā bahinagareyeva nisīditvā bhattakiccaṃ akāsi. Devatā sakalacakkavāḷagabbhe
atk-s0502a:3300_5: devamanussānaṃ upakappanakaṃ ojaṃ madhupaṭalaṃ viya pīḷetvā tattha pakkhipiṃsu. Puṇṇā
atk-s0502a:3300_6: ca olokentī aṭṭhāsi. Bhattakiccāvasāne thero udakaṃ adāsi. Satthā katabhattakicco
atk-s0502a:3300_7: puṇṇaṃ āmantetvā “kasmā tvaṃ puṇṇe mama sāvake paribhavasī”ti āha. Na paribhavāmi,
atk-s0502a:3300_8: bhanteti. Atha tayā mama sāvake oloketvā kiṃ kathitanti? “Ahaṃ tāva iminā dukkhupaddavena
atk-s0502a:3300_9: niddaṃ na upemi, bhaddantā kimatthaṃ niddaṃ na upenti, addhā kassaci aphāsukaṃ vā
atk-s0502a:3300_10: bhavissati, dīghajātikena vā upaddavo bhavissatī”ti ettakaṃ mayā, bhante, cintitanti.
atk-s0502a:3300_11: Satthā tassā vacanaṃ sutvā “puṇṇe tvaṃ na tāva dukkhupaddavena niddāyasi, mama sāvakā
atk-s0502a:3300_12: sadā jāgariyamanuyuttatāya na niddāyantī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3304_0: Tattha ahorattānusikkhinanti divā ca rattiñca tisso sikkhā sikkhamānānaṃ. Nibbānaṃ
atk-s0502a:3304_1: adhimuttānanti nibbānajjhāsayānaṃ. Atthaṃ gacchantīti evarūpānaṃ sabbepi āsavā atthaṃ
atk-s0502a:3305: Desanāvasāne yathāṭhitā puṇṇā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattaparisāyapi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:3306_0: Satthā kuṇḍakaaṅgārapūvena bhattakiccaṃ katvā vihāraṃ agamāsi. Bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ
atk-s0502a:3306_1: kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “dukkaraṃ, āvuso, sammāsambuddhena kataṃ puṇṇāya dinnena kuṇḍakaaṅgārapūvena
atk-s0502a:3306_2: bhattakiccaṃ karontenā”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya
atk-s0502a:3306_3: sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi mayā
atk-s0502a:3306_4: imāya dinnakuṇḍakaṃ paribhuttamevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āharitvā –
atk-s0502a:3308: Etaṃ te bhojanaṃ āsi, kasmā dāni na bhuñjasi.
atk-s0502a:3309: “Yattha posaṃ na jānanti, jātiyā vinayena vā;
atk-s0502a:3312: Jānanto jānamāgamma, na te bhakkhāmi kuṇḍaka”nti. –
atk-s0502a:3316: Porāṇametanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto atulaṃ nāma upāsakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3317_0: So hi sāvatthivāsī upāsako pañcasataupāsakaparivāro ekadivasaṃ te upāsake ādāya dhammassavanatthāya
atk-s0502a:3317_1: vihāraṃ gantvā revatattherassa santike dhammaṃ sotukāmo hutvā revatattheraṃ vanditvā
atk-s0502a:3317_2: nisīdi. So panāyasmā paṭisallānārāmo sīho viya ekacāro, tasmā tena saddhiṃ na kiñci
atk-s0502a:3317_3: kathesi. So “ayaṃ thero na kiñci kathesī”ti kuddho uṭṭhāya sāriputtattherassa santikaṃ
atk-s0502a:3317_4: gantvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito therena “kenatthena āgatatthā”ti vutte “ahaṃ, bhante, ime
atk-s0502a:3317_5: upāsake ādāya dhammassavanatthāya revatattheraṃ upasaṅkamiṃ, tassa me thero na kiñci
atk-s0502a:3317_6: kathesi, svāhaṃ tassa kujjhitvā idhāgato, dhammaṃ me kathethā”ti āha. Atha thero
atk-s0502a:3317_7: “tena hi upāsakā nisīdathā”ti vatvā bahukaṃ katvā abhidhammakathaṃ kathesi. Upāsakopi
atk-s0502a:3317_8: “abhidhammakathā nāma atisaṇhā, thero bahuṃ abhidhammameva kathesi, amhākaṃ iminā
atk-s0502a:3317_9: ko attho”ti kujjhitvā parisaṃ ādāya ānandattherassa santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:3318_0: Therenāpi “kiṃ upāsakā”ti vutte, “bhante, mayaṃ dhammassavanatthāya revatattheraṃ
atk-s0502a:3318_1: upasaṅkamimhā, tassa santike ālāpasallāpamattampi alabhitvā kuddhā sāriputtattherassa
atk-s0502a:3318_2: santikaṃ agamimhā, sopi no atisaṇhaṃ bahuṃ abhidhammameva kathesi, ‘iminā amhākaṃ
atk-s0502a:3318_3: ko attho’ti etassāpi kujjhitvā idhāgamimhā, kathehi no, bhante, dhammakatha”nti.
atk-s0502a:3318_4: Tena hi nisīditvā suṇāthāti thero tesaṃ suviññeyyaṃ katvā appakameva dhammaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3318_5: Te therassapi kujjhitvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu, atha
atk-s0502a:3318_6: ne satthā āha – “kasmā upāsakā āgatatthā”ti? “Dhammassavanāya, bhante”ti. “Suto pana
atk-s0502a:3318_7: vo dhammo”ti? “Bhante, mayaṃ ādito revatattheraṃ upasaṅkamimhā, so amhehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0502a:3318_8: na kiñci kathesi, tassa kujjhitvā sāriputtattheraṃ upasaṅkamimhā, tena no bahu abhidhammo
atk-s0502a:3318_9: kathito, taṃ asallakkhetvā kujjhitvā ānandattheraṃ upasaṅkamimhā, tena no appamattakova
atk-s0502a:3319_0: Satthā tassa kathaṃ sutvā, “atula, porāṇato paṭṭhāya āciṇṇamevetaṃ, tuṇhībhūtampi
atk-s0502a:3319_1: bahukathampi mandakathampi garahantiyeva. Ekantaṃ garahitabboyeva vā hi pasaṃsitabboyeva
atk-s0502a:3319_2: vā natthi. Rājānopi ekacce nindanti, ekacce pasaṃsanti. Mahāpathavimpi candimasūriyepi
atk-s0502a:3319_3: ākāsādayopi catuparisamajjhe nisīditvā dhammaṃ kathentampi sammāsambuddhaṃ ekacce
atk-s0502a:3319_4: garahanti, ekacce pasaṃsanti. Andhabālānañhi nindā vā pasaṃsā vā appamāṇā, paṇḍitena
atk-s0502a:3319_5: pana medhāvinā nindito nindito nāma, pasaṃsito ca pasaṃsito nāma hotī”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3325: “Na cāhu na ca bhavissati, na cetarahi vijjati;
atk-s0502a:3326: Ekantaṃ nindito poso, ekantaṃ vā pasaṃsito.
atk-s0502a:3328: “Yaṃ ce viññū pasaṃsanti, anuvicca suve suve;
atk-s0502a:3333_0: Tattha porāṇametanti purāṇakaṃ etaṃ. Atulāti taṃ upāsakaṃ nāmena ālapati. Netaṃ ajjatanāmivāti
atk-s0502a:3333_1: idaṃ nindanaṃ vā pasaṃsanaṃ vā ajjatanaṃ adhunā uppannaṃ viya na hoti. Tuṇhimāsīnanti
atk-s0502a:3333_2: kiṃ eso mūgo viya badhiro viya kiñci ajānanto viya tuṇhī hutvā nisinnoti nindanti.
atk-s0502a:3333_3: Bahubhāṇinanti kiṃ esa vātāhatatālapaṇṇaṃ viya taṭataṭāyati, imassa kathāpariyantoyeva
atk-s0502a:3333_4: natthīti nindanti. Mitabhāṇimpīti kiṃ esa suvaṇṇahiraññaṃ viya attano vacanaṃ maññamāno
atk-s0502a:3333_5: ekaṃ vā dve vā vatvā tuṇhī ahosīti nindanti. Evaṃ sabbathāpi imasmiṃ loke anindito
atk-s0502a:3333_6: nāma natthīti attho. Na cāhūti atītepi nāhosi, anāgatepi na bhavissati.
atk-s0502a:3334_0: Yaṃ ce viññūti bālānaṃ nindā vā pasaṃsā vā appamāṇā, yaṃ pana paṇḍitā divase divase
atk-s0502a:3334_1: anuvicca nindakāraṇaṃ vā pasaṃsakāraṇaṃ vā jānitvā pasaṃsanti, acchiddāya vā sikkhāya
atk-s0502a:3334_2: acchiddāya vā jīvitavuttiyā samannāgatattā acchiddavuttiṃ dhammojapaññāya samannāgatattā
atk-s0502a:3334_3: medhāviṃ lokiyalokuttarapaññāya ceva catupārisuddhisīlena ca samannāgatattā paññāsīlasamāhitaṃ
atk-s0502a:3334_4: pasaṃsanti, taṃ suvaṇṇadosavirahitaṃ ghaṭṭanamajjanakkhamaṃ jambonadanikkhaṃ viya
atk-s0502a:3334_5: ko ninditumarahatīti attho. Devāpīti devatāpi paṇḍitamanussāpi taṃ bhikkhuṃ upaṭṭhāya
atk-s0502a:3334_6: thomenti pasaṃsanti. Brahmunāpīti na kevalaṃ devamanussehi, dasasahassacakkavāḷe
atk-s0502a:3338: Kāyappakopanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3339_0: Ekadivasañhi satthā veḷuvane viharanto tesaṃ chabbaggiyānaṃ ubhohi hatthehi yaṭṭhiyo
atk-s0502a:3339_1: gahetvā kaṭṭhapādukā āruyha piṭṭhipāsāṇe caṅkamantānaṃ khaṭakhaṭātisaddaṃ sutvā,
atk-s0502a:3339_2: “ānanda, kiṃ saddo nāmeso”ti pucchitvā “chabbaggiyānaṃ pādukā āruyha caṅkamantānaṃ
atk-s0502a:3339_3: khaṭakhaṭasaddo”ti sutvā sikkhāpadaṃ paññāpetvā “bhikkhunā nāma kāyādīni rakkhituṃ
atk-s0502a:3339_4: vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3351: Manasā saṃvutā dhīrā, te ve suparisaṃvutā”ti.
atk-s0502a:3352_0: Tattha kāyappakopanti tividhaṃ kāyaduccaritaṃ rakkheyya. Kāyena saṃvutoti kāyadvāre
atk-s0502a:3352_1: duccaritapavesanaṃ nivāretvā saṃvuto pihitadvāro siyā. Yasmā pana kāyaduccaritaṃ
atk-s0502a:3352_2: hitvā kāyasucaritaṃ caranto ubhayampetaṃ karoti, tasmā kāyaduccaritaṃ hitvā, kāyena
atk-s0502a:3352_3: sucaritaṃ careti vuttaṃ. Anantaragāthāsupi eseva nayo. Kāyena saṃvutā dhīrāti ye
atk-s0502a:3352_4: paṇḍitā pāṇātipātādīni akarontā kāyena, musāvādādīni akarontā vācāya, abhijjhādīni
atk-s0502a:3352_5: asamuṭṭhapentā manasā saṃvutā, te idha lokasmiṃ susaṃvutā surakkhitā sugopitā supihitadvārāti attho.
atk-s0502a:3359: Paṇḍupalāsova dānisīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ goghātakaputtaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3360_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kireko goghātako gāvo vadhitvā varamaṃsāni gahetvā pacāpetvā puttadārehi
atk-s0502a:3360_1: saddhiṃ nisīditvā maṃsañca khādati, mūlena ca vikkiṇitvā jīvikaṃ kappesi. So evaṃ
atk-s0502a:3360_2: pañcapaṇṇāsa vassāni goghātakakammaṃ karonto dhuravihāre viharantassa satthu ekadivasampi
atk-s0502a:3360_3: kaṭacchumattampi yāguṃ vā bhattaṃ vā na adāsi. So ca vinā maṃsena bhattaṃ na bhuñjati.
atk-s0502a:3360_4: So ekadivasaṃ divasabhāge maṃsaṃ vikkiṇitvā attano atthāya pacituṃ ekaṃ maṃsakhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0502a:3360_5: bhariyāya datvā nhāyituṃ agamāsi. Athassa sahāyako gehaṃ gantvā bhariyaṃ āha – “thokaṃ
atk-s0502a:3360_6: me vikkiṇiyamaṃsaṃ dehi, gehaṃ me pāhunako āgato”ti. Natthi vikkiṇiyamaṃsaṃ, sahāyako
atk-s0502a:3360_7: te maṃsaṃ vikkiṇitvā idāni nhāyituṃ gatoti. Mā evaṃ kari, sace maṃsakhaṇḍaṃ atthi,
atk-s0502a:3360_8: dehīti. Sahāyakassa te nikkhittamaṃsaṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ natthīti. So “sahāyakassa me
atk-s0502a:3360_9: atthāya ṭhapitamaṃsato aññaṃ maṃsaṃ natthi, so ca vinā maṃsena na bhuñjati, nāyaṃ
atk-s0502a:3360_10: dassatī”ti sāmaṃyeva taṃ maṃsaṃ gahetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:3361_0: Goghātakopi nhatvā āgato tāya attano pakkapaṇṇena saddhiṃ vaḍḍhetvā bhatte upanīte
atk-s0502a:3361_1: āha “kahaṃ maṃsa”nti? “Natthi, sāmī”ti. Nanu ahaṃ paccanatthāya maṃsaṃ datvā gatoti.
atk-s0502a:3361_2: Tava sahāyako āgantvā “pāhunako me āgato, vikkiṇiyamaṃsaṃ dehī”ti vatvā mayā “sahāyakassa
atk-s0502a:3361_3: te ṭhapitamaṃsato aññaṃ maṃsaṃ natthi, so ca vinā maṃsena na bhuñjatī”ti vuttepi
atk-s0502a:3361_4: balakkārena taṃ maṃsaṃ sāmaṃyeva gahetvā gatoti. Ahaṃ vinā maṃsena bhattaṃ na bhuñjāmi,
atk-s0502a:3361_5: harāhi nanti. Kiṃ sakkā kātuṃ, bhuñja, sāmīti. So “nāhaṃ bhuñjāmī”ti taṃ bhattaṃ
atk-s0502a:3361_6: harāpetvā satthaṃ ādāya pacchāgehe ṭhito goṇo atthi, tassa santikaṃ gantvā mukhe
atk-s0502a:3361_7: hatthaṃ pakkhipitvā jivhaṃ nīharitvā satthena mūle chinditvā ādāya gantvā aṅgāresu
atk-s0502a:3361_8: pacāpetvā bhattamatthake ṭhapetvā nisinno ekaṃ bhattapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjitvā ekaṃ maṃsakhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0502a:3361_9: mukhe ṭhapesi. Taṅkhaṇaññevassa jivhā chijjitvā bhattapātiyaṃ pati. Taṅkhaṇaññeva
atk-s0502a:3361_10: kammasarikkhakaṃ vipākaṃ labhi. Sopi kho goṇo viya lohitadhārāya mukhato paggharantiyā
atk-s0502a:3362_0: Tasmiṃ samaye goghātakassa putto pitaraṃ olokento samīpe ṭhito hoti. Atha naṃ mātā
atk-s0502a:3362_1: āha – “passa, putta, imaṃ goghātakaṃ goṇaṃ viya gehamajjhe jaṇṇukehi vicaritvā viravantaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3362_2: idaṃ dukkhaṃ tava matthake patissati, mamampi anoloketvā attano sotthiṃ karonto palāyassū”ti.
atk-s0502a:3362_3: So maraṇabhayatajjito mātaraṃ vanditvā palāyi, palāyitvā ca pana takkasilaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:3362_4: Goghātakopi goṇo viya gehamajjhe viravanto vicaritvā kālakato avīcimhi nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:3362_5: Goṇopi kālamakāsi. Goghātakaputtopi takkasilaṃ gantvā suvaṇṇakārakammaṃ uggaṇhi.
atk-s0502a:3362_6: Athassācariyo gāmaṃ gacchanto “evarūpaṃ nāma alaṅkāraṃ kareyyāsī”ti vatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:3362_7: Sopi tathārūpaṃ alaṅkāraṃ akāsi. Athassācariyo āgantvā alaṅkāraṃ disvā “ayaṃ yattha
atk-s0502a:3362_8: katthaci gantvā jīvituṃ samattho”ti vayappattaṃ attano dhītaraṃ adāsi. So puttadhītāhi vaḍḍhi.
atk-s0502a:3363_0: Athassa puttā vayappattā sippaṃ uggaṇhitvā aparabhāge sāvatthiyaṃ gantvā tattha gharāvāsaṃ
atk-s0502a:3363_1: saṇṭhapetvā vasantā saddhā pasannā ahesuṃ. Pitāpi nesaṃ takkasilāyaṃ kiñci kusalaṃ
atk-s0502a:3363_2: akatvāva jaraṃ pāpuṇi. Athassa puttā “pitā no mahallako”ti attano santikaṃ pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0502a:3363_3: “pitu atthāya dānaṃ dassāmā”ti buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantayiṃsu. Te punadivase
atk-s0502a:3363_4: antogehe buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nisīdāpetvā sakkaccaṃ parivisitvā bhattakiccāvasāne
atk-s0502a:3363_5: satthāraṃ āhaṃsu – “bhante, amhehi idaṃ pitu jīvabhattaṃ dinnaṃ, pitu no anumodanaṃ
atk-s0502a:3363_6: karothā”ti. Satthā taṃ āmantetvā, “upāsaka, tvaṃ mahallako paripakkasarīro paṇḍupalāsasadiso,
atk-s0502a:3363_7: tava paralokagamanāya kusalapātheyyaṃ natthi, attano patiṭṭhaṃ karohi, paṇḍito bhava,
atk-s0502a:3363_8: mā bālo”ti anumodanaṃ karonto imā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3374_0: Tattha paṇḍupalāsova dānisīti, upāsaka, tvaṃ idāni chijjitvā bhūmiyaṃ patitapaṇḍupalāso
atk-s0502a:3374_1: viya ahosi. Yamapurisāti yamadūtā vuccanti, idaṃ pana maraṇameva sandhāya vuttaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3374_2: maraṇaṃ te paccupaṭṭhitanti attho. Uyyogamukheti parihānimukhe, avuḍḍhimukhe ca ṭhitosīti
atk-s0502a:3374_3: attho. Pātheyyanti gamikassa taṇḍulādipātheyyaṃ viya paralokaṃ gacchantassa tava
atk-s0502a:3374_4: kusalapātheyyampi natthīti attho. So karohīti so tvaṃ samudde nāvāya bhinnāya dīpasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0502a:3374_5: patiṭṭhaṃ viya attano kusalapatiṭṭhaṃ karohi. Karonto ca khippaṃ vāyama, sīghaṃ sīghaṃ
atk-s0502a:3374_6: vīriyaṃ ārabha, attano kusalakammapatiṭṭhakaraṇena paṇḍito bhava. Yo hi maraṇamukhaṃ
atk-s0502a:3374_7: appatvā kātuṃ samatthakāleva kusalaṃ karoti, esa paṇḍito nāma, tādiso bhava, mā andhabāloti
atk-s0502a:3374_8: attho. Dibbaṃ ariyabhūminti evaṃ vīriyaṃ karonto rāgādīnaṃ malānaṃ nīhaṭatāya niddhantamalo
atk-s0502a:3374_9: aṅgaṇābhāvena anaṅgaṇo nikkileso hutvā pañcavidhaṃ suddhāvāsabhūmiṃ pāpuṇissasīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3375: Desanāvasāne upāsako sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:3376_0: Te punadivasatthāyapi satthāraṃ nimantetvā dānaṃ datvā katabhattakiccaṃ satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:3376_1: anumodanakāle āhaṃsu – “bhante, idampi amhākaṃ pitu jīvabhattameva, imasseva anumodanaṃ
atk-s0502a:3376_2: karothā”ti. Satthā tassa anumodanaṃ karonto imā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3387_0: Tattha upanītavayoti upāti nipātamattaṃ, nītavayoti vigatavayo atikkantavayo, tvañcasi
atk-s0502a:3387_1: dāni tayo vaye atikkamitvā maraṇamukhe ṭhitoti attho. Sampayātosi yamassa santikanti
atk-s0502a:3387_2: maraṇamukhaṃ gantuṃ sajjo hutvā ṭhitosīti attho. Vāso te natthi antarāti yathā maggaṃ
atk-s0502a:3387_3: gacchantā tāni tāni kiccāni karontā antarāmagge vasanti, na evaṃ paralokaṃ gacchantā.
atk-s0502a:3387_4: Na hi sakkā paralokaṃ gacchantena “adhivāsetha katipāhaṃ, dānaṃ tāva demi, dhammaṃ
atk-s0502a:3387_5: tāva suṇāmī”tiādīni vattuṃ. Ito pana cavitvā paraloke nibbattova hoti. Imamatthaṃ
atk-s0502a:3387_6: sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Pātheyyanti idaṃ kiñcāpi heṭṭhā vuttameva, upāsakassa pana punappunaṃ
atk-s0502a:3387_7: daḷhīkaraṇatthaṃ idhāpi satthārā kathitaṃ. Jātijaranti ettha byādhimaraṇānipi gahitāneva
atk-s0502a:3387_8: honti. Heṭṭhimagāthāhi ca anāgāmimaggo kathito, idha arahattamaggo kathito. Evaṃ
atk-s0502a:3387_9: santepi yathā nāma raññā attano mukhapamāṇena kabaḷaṃ vaḍḍhetvā puttassa upanīte
atk-s0502a:3387_10: so kumāro attano mukhapamāṇeneva gaṇhāti, evameva satthārā uparimaggavasena dhamme
atk-s0502a:3387_11: desitepi upāsako attano upanissayavasena heṭṭhā sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā imissā anumodanāya
atk-s0502a:3387_12: avasāne anāgāmiphalaṃ patto. Sesaparisāyapi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:3390: Anupubbenāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññatarabrāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3391_0: So kira ekadivasaṃ pātova nikkhamitvā bhikkhūnaṃ cīvarapārupanaṭṭhāne bhikkhū cīvaraṃ
atk-s0502a:3391_1: pārupante olokento aṭṭhāsi. Taṃ pana ṭhānaṃ virūḷhatiṇaṃ hoti. Athekassa bhikkhuno
atk-s0502a:3391_2: cīvaraṃ pārupantassa cīvarakaṇṇo tiṇesu pavaṭṭento ussāvabindūhi temi. Brāhmaṇo “imaṃ
atk-s0502a:3391_3: ṭhānaṃ appaharitaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti punadivase kuddālaṃ ādāya gantvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ tacchetvā
atk-s0502a:3391_4: khalamaṇḍalasadisaṃ akāsi. Punadivasepi taṃ ṭhānaṃ āgantvā bhikkhūsu cīvaraṃ pārupantesu
atk-s0502a:3391_5: ekassa cīvarakaṇṇaṃ bhūmiyaṃ patitvā paṃsumhi pavaṭṭamānaṃ disvā “idha vālukaṃ okirituṃ
atk-s0502a:3392_0: Athekadivasaṃ purebhattaṃ caṇḍo ātapo ahosi, tadāpi bhikkhūnaṃ cīvaraṃ pārupantānaṃ
atk-s0502a:3392_1: gattato sede muccante disvā “idha mayā maṇḍapaṃ kāretuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā maṇḍapaṃ
atk-s0502a:3392_2: kāresi. Punadivase pātova vassaṃ vassi, vaddalikaṃ ahosi. Tadāpi brāhmaṇo bhikkhū
atk-s0502a:3392_3: olokentova ṭhito tintacīvarake bhikkhū disvā “ettha mayā sālaṃ kāretuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0502a:3392_4: sālaṃ kāretvā “idāni sālamahaṃ karissāmī”ti cintetvā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ
atk-s0502a:3392_5: nimantetvā anto ca bahi ca bhikkhū nisīdāpetvā bhattakiccāvasāne anumodanatthāya
atk-s0502a:3392_6: satthu pattaṃ gahetvā, “bhante, ahaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cīvarapārupanakāle imasmiṃ ṭhāne
atk-s0502a:3392_7: olokento ṭhito idañcidañca disvā idañcidañca kāresi”nti ādito paṭṭhāya sabbaṃ taṃ
atk-s0502a:3392_8: pavattiṃ ārocesi. Satthā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā, “brāhmaṇa, paṇḍitā nāma khaṇe khaṇe
atk-s0502a:3392_9: thokaṃ kusalaṃ karontā anupubbena attano akusalamalaṃ nīharantiyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3396_0: Tattha anupubbenāti anupaṭipāṭiyā. Medhāvīti dhammojapaññāya samannāgato. Khaṇe khaṇeti
atk-s0502a:3396_1: okāse okāse kusalaṃ karonto. Kammāro rajatassevāti yathā suvaṇṇakāro ekavārameva
atk-s0502a:3396_2: suvaṇṇaṃ tāpetvā koṭṭetvā malaṃ nīharitvā pilandhanavikatiṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti, punappunaṃ
atk-s0502a:3396_3: tāpento koṭṭento pana malaṃ nīharati, tato anekavidhaṃ pilandhanavikatiṃ karoti,
atk-s0502a:3396_4: evameva punappunaṃ kusalaṃ karonto paṇḍito attano rāgādimalaṃ niddhameyya, evaṃ niddhantamalo
atk-s0502a:3397: Desanāvasāne brāhmaṇo sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhati, mahājanassāpi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:3400: Ayasāva malanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto tissattheraṃ nāma bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3401_0: Eko kira sāvatthivāsī kulaputto pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado tissattheroti paññāyi.
atk-s0502a:3401_1: So aparabhāge janapadavihāre vassūpagato aṭṭhahatthakaṃ thūlasāṭakaṃ labhitvā vutthavasso
atk-s0502a:3401_2: pavāretvā taṃ ādāya gantvā bhaginiyā hatthe ṭhapesi. Sā “na me eso sāṭako bhātu anucchaviko”ti
atk-s0502a:3401_3: taṃ tikhiṇāya vāsiyā chinditvā hīrahīraṃ katvā udukkhale koṭṭetvā pavisetvā pothetvā
atk-s0502a:3401_4: vaṭṭetvā sukhumasuttaṃ kantitvā sāṭakaṃ vāyāpesi. Theropi suttañceva sūciyo ca saṃvidahitvā
atk-s0502a:3401_5: cīvarakārake daharasāmaṇere sannipātetvā bhaginiyā santikaṃ gantvā “taṃ me sāṭakaṃ
atk-s0502a:3401_6: detha, cīvaraṃ kāressāmī”ti āha. Sā navahatthaṃ sāṭakaṃ nīharitvā kaniṭṭhabhātikassa
atk-s0502a:3401_7: hatthe ṭhapesi. So taṃ gahetvā vitthāretvā oloketvā “mama sāṭako thūlo aṭṭhahattho,
atk-s0502a:3401_8: ayaṃ sukhumo navahattho. Nāyaṃ mama sāṭako, tumhākaṃ esa, na me iminā attho, tameva
atk-s0502a:3401_9: me dethā”ti āha. “Bhante, tumhākameva eso, gaṇhatha na”nti? So neva icchi. Athassa
atk-s0502a:3401_10: attanā katakiccaṃ sabbaṃ ārocetvā, “bhante, tumhākamevesa, gaṇhatha na”nti adāsi.
atk-s0502a:3401_11: So taṃ ādāya vihāraṃ gantvā cīvarakammaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a:3402_0: Athassa bhaginī cīvarakārānaṃ atthāya yāgubhattādīni sampādesi. Cīvarassa niṭṭhitadivase
atk-s0502a:3402_1: pana atirekasakkāraṃ kāresi. So cīvaraṃ oloketvā tasmiṃ uppannasineho “sve dāni naṃ
atk-s0502a:3402_2: pārupissāmī”ti saṃharitvā cīvaravaṃse ṭhapetvā taṃ rattiṃ bhuttāhāraṃ jirāpetuṃ asakkonto
atk-s0502a:3402_3: kālaṃ katvā tasmiṃyeva cīvare ūkā hutvā nibbatti. Bhaginīpissa kālakiriyaṃ sutvā
atk-s0502a:3402_4: bhikkhūnaṃ pādesu pavattamānā rodi. Bhikkhū tassa sarīrakiccaṃ katvā gilānupaṭṭhākassa
atk-s0502a:3402_5: abhāvena saṅghasseva taṃ pāpuṇāti. “Bhājessāma na”nti taṃ cīvaraṃ nīharāpesuṃ. Sā
atk-s0502a:3402_6: ūkā “ime mama santakaṃ vilumpantī”ti viravantī ito cito ca sandhāvi. Satthā gandhakuṭiyaṃ
atk-s0502a:3402_7: nisinnova dibbāya sotadhātuyā taṃ saddaṃ sutvā, “ānanda, tissassa cīvaraṃ abhājetvā
atk-s0502a:3402_8: sattāhaṃ nikkhipituṃ vadehī”ti āha. Thero tathā kāresi. Sāpi sattame divase kālaṃ
atk-s0502a:3402_9: katvā tusitavimāne nibbatti. Satthā “aṭṭhame divase tissassa cīvaraṃ bhājetvā gaṇhathā”ti
atk-s0502a:3403_0: Bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “kasmā nu kho satthā tissassa cīvaraṃ
atk-s0502a:3403_1: satta divase ṭhapāpetvā aṭṭhame divase gaṇhituṃ anujānī”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya
atk-s0502a:3403_2: nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a:3403_3: “bhikkhave, tisso attano cīvare ūkā hutvā nibbatto, tumhehi tasmiṃ bhājiyamāne ‘ime
atk-s0502a:3403_4: mama santakaṃ vilumpantī’ti viravantī ito cito ca dhāvi. Sā tumhehi cīvare gayhamāne
atk-s0502a:3403_5: tumhesu manaṃ padussitvā niraye nibbatteyya, tena cāhaṃ cīvaraṃ nikkhipāpesiṃ. Idāni
atk-s0502a:3403_6: pana sā tusitavimāne nibbattā, tena vo mayā cīvaragahaṇaṃ anuññāta”nti vatvā puna
atk-s0502a:3403_7: tehi “bhāriyā vata ayaṃ, bhante, taṇhā nāmā”ti vutte “āma, bhikkhave, imesaṃ sattānaṃ
atk-s0502a:3403_8: taṇhā nāma bhāriyā. Yathā ayato malaṃ uṭṭhahitvā ayameva khādati vināseti aparibhogaṃ
atk-s0502a:3403_9: karoti, evamevāyaṃ taṇhā imesaṃ sattānaṃ abbhantare uppajjitvā te satte nirayādīsu
atk-s0502a:3403_10: nibbattāpeti, vināsaṃ pāpetī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3409_0: Tattha ayasāvāti ayato samuṭṭhitaṃ. Tatuṭṭhāyāti tato uṭṭhāya. Atidhonacārinanti
atk-s0502a:3409_1: dhonā vuccati cattāro paccaye “idamatthaṃ ete”ti paccavekkhitvā paribhuñjanapaññā,
atk-s0502a:3409_2: taṃ atikkamitvā caranto atidhonacārī nāma. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā ayato malaṃ samuṭṭhāya
atk-s0502a:3409_3: tato samuṭṭhitaṃ tameva khādati, evamevaṃ catupaccaye apaccavekkhitvā paribhuñjantaṃ
atk-s0502a:3409_4: atidhonacārinaṃ sāni kammāni attani ṭhitattā attano santakāneva tāni kammāni duggatiṃ nayantīti.
atk-s0502a:3413: Asajjhāyamalāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto lāludāyittheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3414_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira pañcakoṭimattā ariyasāvakā vasanti, dve koṭimattā puthujjanā vasanti.
atk-s0502a:3414_1: Tesu ariyasāvakā purebhattaṃ dānaṃ datvā pacchābhattaṃ sappitelamadhuphāṇitavatthādīni
atk-s0502a:3414_2: gahetvā vihāraṃ gantvā dhammakathaṃ suṇanti. Dhammaṃ sutvā gamanakāle ca sāriputtamoggallānānaṃ
atk-s0502a:3414_3: guṇakathaṃ kathenti. Udāyitthero tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā “etesaṃ tāva dhammaṃ sutvā tumhe
atk-s0502a:3414_4: evaṃ kathetha, mama dhammakathaṃ sutvā kiṃ nu kho na kathessathā”ti vadati. Manussā
atk-s0502a:3414_5: tassa kathaṃ sutvā “ayaṃ eko dhammakathiko bhavissati, imassapi amhehi dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0502a:3414_6: sotuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti te ekadivasaṃ theraṃ yācitvā, “bhante, ajja amhākaṃ dhammassavanadivaso”ti
atk-s0502a:3414_7: saṅghassa dānaṃ datvā, “bhante, tumhe amhākaṃ divā dhammakathaṃ katheyyāthā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3415_0: Tehi dhammassavanavelāya āgantvā, “bhante, no dhammaṃ kathethā”ti vutte lāludāyitthero
atk-s0502a:3415_1: āsane nisīditvā cittabījaniṃ gahetvā cālento ekampi dhammapadaṃ adisvā “ahaṃ sarabhaññaṃ
atk-s0502a:3415_2: bhaṇissāmi, añño dhammakathaṃ kathetū”ti vatvā otari. Te aññena dhammakathaṃ kathāpetvā
atk-s0502a:3415_3: sarabhāṇatthāya puna taṃ āsanaṃ āropayiṃsu. So punapi kiñci adisvā “ahaṃ rattiṃ kathessāmi,
atk-s0502a:3415_4: añño sarabhaññaṃ bhaṇatū”ti vatvā āsanā otari. Te aññena sarabhaññaṃ bhaṇāpetvā puna
atk-s0502a:3415_5: rattiṃ theraṃ ānayiṃsu. So rattimpi kiñci adisvā “ahaṃ paccūsakāle kathessāmi, rattiṃ
atk-s0502a:3415_6: añño kathetū”ti vatvā otari. Te aññena rattiṃ kathāpetvā puna paccūse taṃ ānayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3415_7: So punapi kiñci nāddasa. Mahājano leḍḍudaṇḍādīni gahetvā, “andhabāla, tvaṃ sāriputtamoggallānānaṃ
atk-s0502a:3415_8: vaṇṇe kathiyamāne evañcevañca vadesi, idāni kasmā na kathesī”ti santajjetvā palāyantaṃ
atk-s0502a:3415_9: anubandhi. So palāyanto ekissā vaccakuṭiyā pati.
atk-s0502a:3416_0: Mahājano kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi – “ajja lāludāyī sāriputtamoggallānānaṃ guṇakathāya
atk-s0502a:3416_1: pavattamānāya ussūyanto attano dhammakathikabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā manussehi sakkāraṃ katvā
atk-s0502a:3416_2: ‘dhammaṃ suṇomā’ti vutte catukkhattuṃ āsane nisīditvā kathetabbayuttakaṃ kiñci apassanto
atk-s0502a:3416_3: ‘tvaṃ amhākaṃ ayyehi sāriputtamoggallānattherehi saddhiṃ yugaggāhaṃ gaṇhāsī’ti leḍḍudaṇḍādīni
atk-s0502a:3416_4: gahetvā santajjetvā palāpiyamāno vaccakuṭiyā patito”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha,
atk-s0502a:3416_5: bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a:3416_6: idāneva, pubbepi eso gūthakūpe nimuggoyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āharitvā –
atk-s0502a:3418: Ehi samma nivattassu, kiṃ nu bhīto palāyasi.
atk-s0502a:3420: Sace yujjhitukāmosi, jayaṃ samma dadāmi te”ti. –
atk-s0502a:3421_0: Imaṃ jātakaṃ vitthāretvā kathesi. Tadā sīho sāriputto ahosi, sūkaro lāludāyīti. Satthā
atk-s0502a:3421_1: imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā, “bhikkhave, lāludāyinā appamattakova dhammo uggahito,
atk-s0502a:3421_2: sajjhāyaṃ pana neva akāsi, kiñci pariyattiṃ uggahetvā tassā asajjhāyakaraṇaṃ malamevā”ti
atk-s0502a:3424: Malaṃ vaṇṇassa kosajjaṃ, pamādo rakkhato mala”nti.
atk-s0502a:3425_0: Tattha asajjhāyamalāti yākāci pariyatti vā sippaṃ vā yasmā asajjhāyantassa ananuyuñjantassa
atk-s0502a:3425_1: vinassati vā nirantaraṃ vā na upaṭṭhāti, tasmā “asajjhāyamalā mantā”ti vuttaṃ. Yasmā
atk-s0502a:3425_2: pana gharāvāsaṃ vasantassa uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya jiṇṇapaṭisaṅkharaṇādīni akarontassa gharaṃ
atk-s0502a:3425_3: nāma vinassati, tasmā “anuṭṭhānamalā gharā”ti vuttaṃ. Yasmā gihissa vā pabbajitassa
atk-s0502a:3425_4: vā kosajjavasena sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ vā parikkhārapaṭijagganaṃ vā akarontassa kāyo
atk-s0502a:3425_5: dubbaṇṇo hoti, tasmā “malaṃ vaṇṇassa kosajja”nti vuttaṃ. Yasmā gāvo rakkhantassa
atk-s0502a:3425_6: pamādavasena niddāyantassa vā kīḷantassa vā tā gāvo atitthapakkhandanādinā vā vāḷamigacorādiupaddavena
atk-s0502a:3425_7: vā paresaṃ sālikhettādīni otaritvā khādanavasena vināsaṃ āpajjanti, sayampi daṇḍaṃ
atk-s0502a:3425_8: vā paribhāsaṃ vā pāpuṇāti, pabbajitaṃ vā pana cha dvārāni arakkhantaṃ pamādavasena
atk-s0502a:3425_9: kilesā otaritvā sāsanā cāventi, tasmā “pamādo rakkhato mala”nti vuttaṃ. So hissa
atk-s0502a:3429: Malitthiyā duccaritanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto aññataraṃ kulaputtaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3430_0: Tassa kira samānajātikaṃ kulakumārikaṃ ānesuṃ. Sā ānītadivasato paṭṭhāya aticārinī
atk-s0502a:3430_1: ahosi. So kulaputto tassā aticārena lajjito kassaci sammukhībhāvaṃ upagantuṃ asakkonto
atk-s0502a:3430_2: buddhupaṭṭhānādīni pacchinditvā katipāhaccayena satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā
atk-s0502a:3430_3: ekamantaṃ nisinno “kiṃ, upāsaka, na dissasī”ti vutte tamatthaṃ ārocesi. Atha naṃ
atk-s0502a:3430_4: satthā, “upāsaka, pubbepi mayā ‘itthiyo nāma nadīādisadisā, tāsu paṇḍitena kodho
atk-s0502a:3430_5: na kātabbo’ti vuttaṃ, tvaṃ pana bhavapaṭicchannattā na sallakkhesī”ti vatvā tena yācito –
atk-s0502a:3431: “Yathā nadī ca pantho ca, pānāgāraṃ sabhā papā;
atk-s0502a:3432: Evaṃ lokitthiyo nāma, velā tāsaṃ na vijjatī”ti. –
atk-s0502a:3433_0: Jātakaṃ vitthāretvā, “upāsaka, itthiyā hi aticārinibhāvo malaṃ, dānaṃ dentassa maccheraṃ
atk-s0502a:3433_1: malaṃ, idhalokaparalokesu sattānaṃ akusalakammaṃ vināsanatthena malaṃ, avijjā pana
atk-s0502a:3433_2: sabbamalānaṃ uttamamala”nti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3436: Malā ve pāpakā dhammā, asmiṃ loke paramhi ca.
atk-s0502a:3439: Etaṃ malaṃ pahantvāna, nimmalā hotha bhikkhavo”ti.
atk-s0502a:3440_0: Tattha duccaritanti aticāro. Aticāriniñhi itthiṃ sāmikopi gehā nīharati, mātāpitūnaṃ
atk-s0502a:3440_1: santikaṃ gatampi “tvaṃ kulassa agāravabhūtā, akkhīhipi na daṭṭhabbā”ti taṃ nīharanti.
atk-s0502a:3440_2: Sā anāthā vicarantī mahādukkhaṃ pāpuṇāti. Tenassā duccaritaṃ “mala”nti vuttaṃ. Dadatoti
atk-s0502a:3440_3: dāyakassa. Yassa hi khettakasanakāle “imasmiṃ khette sampanne salākabhattādīni dassāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:3440_4: cintetvā nipphanne sassepi maccheraṃ uppajjitvā cāgacittaṃ nivāreti, so maccheravasena
atk-s0502a:3440_5: cāgacitte avirūhante manussasampattiṃ dibbasampattiṃ nibbānasampattinti tisso sampattiyo
atk-s0502a:3440_6: na labhati. Tena vuttaṃ – “maccheraṃ dadato mala”nti. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Pāpakā
atk-s0502a:3440_7: dhammāti akusaladhammā pana idhaloke ca paraloke ca malameva.
atk-s0502a:3441_0: Tatoti heṭṭhā vuttamalato. Malataranti atirekamalaṃ vo kathemīti attho. Avijjāti
atk-s0502a:3441_1: aṭṭhavatthukaṃ aññāṇameva paramaṃ malaṃ. Pahantvānāti etaṃ malaṃ jahitvā, bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a:3445: Sujīvanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto cūḷasāriṃ nāma sāriputtattherassa saddhivihārikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3446_0: So kira ekadivase vejjakammaṃ katvā paṇītabhojanaṃ labhitvā ādāya nikkhamanto antarāmagge
atk-s0502a:3446_1: theraṃ disvā, “bhante, idaṃ mayā vejjakammaṃ katvā laddhaṃ, tumhe aññattha evarūpaṃ
atk-s0502a:3446_2: bhojanaṃ na labhissatha, imaṃ bhuñjatha, ahaṃ te vejjakammaṃ katvā niccakālaṃ evarūpaṃ
atk-s0502a:3446_3: āhāraṃ āharissāmī”ti āha. Thero tassa vacanaṃ sutvā tuṇhībhūtova pakkāmi. Bhikkhū
atk-s0502a:3446_4: vihāraṃ gantvā satthu tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Satthā, “bhikkhave, ahiriko nāma pagabbho
atk-s0502a:3446_5: kākasadiso hutvā ekavīsatividhāya anesanāya ṭhatvā sukhaṃ jīvati, hiriottappasampanno
atk-s0502a:3446_6: pana dukkhaṃ jīvatī”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3453_0: Tattha ahirikenāti chinnahirottappakena. Evarūpena hi amātarameva “mātā me”ti apitādayo
atk-s0502a:3453_1: eva ca “pitā me”tiādinā nayena vatvā ekavīsatividhāya anesanāya patiṭṭhāya sukhena
atk-s0502a:3453_2: jīvatuṃ sakkā. Kākasūrenāti sūrakākasadisena. Yathā hi sūrakāko kulagharesu yāguādīni
atk-s0502a:3453_3: gaṇhitukāmo bhittiādīsu nisīditvā attano olokanabhāvaṃ ñatvā anolokento viya aññavihitako
atk-s0502a:3453_4: viya niddāyanto viya ca hutvā manussānaṃ pamādaṃ sallakkhetvā anupatitvā “sūsū”ti
atk-s0502a:3453_5: vadantesuyeva bhājanato mukhapūraṃ gahetvā palāyati, evamevaṃ ahirikapuggalopi bhikkhūhi
atk-s0502a:3453_6: saddhiṃ gāmaṃ pavisitvā yāgubhattaṭṭhānādīni vavatthapeti. Tattha bhikkhū piṇḍāya
atk-s0502a:3453_7: caritvā yāpanamattaṃ ādāya āsanasālaṃ gantvā paccavekkhantā yāguṃ pivitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:3453_8: manasi karonti sajjhāyanti āsanasālaṃ sammajjanti. Ayaṃ pana akatvā gāmābhimukhova hoti.
atk-s0502a:3454_0: So hi bhikkhūhi “passathima”nti olokiyamānopi anolokento viya aññavihito viya niddāyanto
atk-s0502a:3454_1: viya gaṇṭhikaṃ paṭimuñcanto viya cīvaraṃ saṃvidahanto viya hutvā “asukaṃ nāma me
atk-s0502a:3454_2: kammaṃ atthī”ti vadanto uṭṭhāyāsanā gāmaṃ pavisitvā pātova vavatthapitagehesu aññataraṃ
atk-s0502a:3454_3: gehaṃ upasaṅkamitvā gharamānusakesu thokaṃ kavāṭaṃ pidhāya dvāre nisīditvā kandantesupi
atk-s0502a:3454_4: ekena hatthena kavāṭaṃ paṇāmetvā anto pavisati. Atha naṃ disvā akāmakāpi āsane nisīdāpetvā
atk-s0502a:3454_5: yāguādīsu yaṃ atthi, taṃ denti. So yāvadatthaṃ bhuñjitvā avasesaṃ pattenādāya pakkamati.
atk-s0502a:3454_6: Ayaṃ kākasūro nāma. Evarūpena ahirikena sujīvanti attho.
atk-s0502a:3455_0: Dhaṃsināti “asukatthero nāma appiccho”tiādīni vadantesu – “kiṃ pana mayaṃ na appicchā”tiādivacanena
atk-s0502a:3455_1: paresaṃ guṇadhaṃsanatāya dhaṃsinā. Tathārūpassa vacanaṃ sutvā “ayampi appicchatādiguṇe
atk-s0502a:3455_2: yutto”ti maññamānā manussā dātabbaṃ maññanti. So pana tato paṭṭhāya viññūpurisānaṃ
atk-s0502a:3455_3: cittaṃ ārādhetuṃ asakkonto tamhāpi lābhā parihāyati. Evaṃ dhaṃsipuggalo attanopi
atk-s0502a:3456_0: Pakkhandināti pakkhandacārinā. Paresaṃ kiccānipi attano kiccāni viya dassento pātova
atk-s0502a:3456_1: bhikkhūsu cetiyaṅgaṇādīsu vattaṃ katvā kammaṭṭhānamanasikārena thokaṃ nisīditvā uṭṭhāya
atk-s0502a:3456_3: attabhāvaṃ maṇḍetvā sammajjanto viya dve tayo sammajjanipahāre datvā dvārakoṭṭhakābhimukho
atk-s0502a:3456_4: hoti. Manussā pātova “cetiyaṃ vandissāma, mālāpūjaṃ karissāmā”ti āgatā taṃ disvā
atk-s0502a:3456_5: “ayaṃ vihāro imaṃ daharaṃ nissāya paṭijagganaṃ labhati, imaṃ mā pamajjitthā”ti vatvā
atk-s0502a:3456_6: tassa dātabbaṃ maññanti. Evarūpena pakkhandināpi sujīvaṃ. Pagabbhenāti kāyapāgabbhiyādīhi
atk-s0502a:3456_7: samannāgatena. Saṃkiliṭṭhena jīvitanti evaṃ jīvikaṃ kappetvā jīvantena hi puggalena
atk-s0502a:3456_8: saṃkiliṭṭhena hutvā jīvitaṃ nāma hoti, taṃ dujjīvitaṃ pāpamevāti attho.
atk-s0502a:3457_0: Hirīmatā cāti hirottappasampannena puggalena dujjīvaṃ. So hi amātādayova “mātā me”tiādīni
atk-s0502a:3457_1: avatvā adhammike paccaye gūthaṃ viya jigucchanto dhammena samena pariyesanto sapadānaṃ
atk-s0502a:3457_2: piṇḍāya caritvā jīvikaṃ kappento lūkhaṃ jīvikaṃ jīvatīti attho. Sucigavesināti sucīni
atk-s0502a:3457_3: kāyakammādīni gavesantena. Alīnenāti jīvitavuttimanallīnena. Suddhājīvena passatāti
atk-s0502a:3457_4: evarūpo hi puggalo suddhājīvo nāma hoti. Tena evaṃ suddhājīvena tameva suddhājīvaṃ
atk-s0502a:3457_5: sārato passatā lūkhajīvitavasena dujjīvaṃ hotīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3461: Yo pāṇanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto pañca upāsake ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3462_0: Tesu hi eko pāṇātipātāveramaṇisikkhāpadameva rakkhati, itare itarāni. Te ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0502a:3462_1: “ahaṃ dukkaraṃ karomi, dukkaraṃ rakkhāmī”ti vivādāpannā satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā
atk-s0502a:3462_2: tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Satthā tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā ekasīlampi kaniṭṭhakaṃ akatvā “sabbāneva
atk-s0502a:3468: Idheva meso lokasmiṃ, mūlaṃ khaṇati attano.
atk-s0502a:3471: Mā taṃ lobho adhammo ca, ciraṃ dukkhāya randhayu”nti.
atk-s0502a:3472_0: Tattha yo pāṇamatipātetīti yo sāhatthikādīsu chasu payogesu ekapayogenāpi parassa
atk-s0502a:3472_1: jīvitindriyaṃ upacchindati. Musāvādanti paresaṃ atthabhañjanakaṃ musāvādañca bhāsati.
atk-s0502a:3472_2: Loke adinnamādiyatīti imasmiṃ sattaloke theyyāvahārādīsu ekenapi avahārena parapariggahitaṃ
atk-s0502a:3472_3: ādiyati. Paradārañca gacchatīti parassa rakkhitagopitesu bhaṇḍesu aparajjhanto uppathacāraṃ
atk-s0502a:3472_4: carati. Surāmerayapānanti yassa kassaci surāya ceva merayassa ca pānaṃ. Anuyuñjatīti
atk-s0502a:3472_5: sevati bahulīkaroti. Mūlaṃ khaṇatīti tiṭṭhatu paraloko, so pana puggalo idha lokasmiṃyeva
atk-s0502a:3472_6: yena khettavatthuādinā mūlena patiṭṭhapeyya, tampi aṭṭhapetvā vā vissajjetvā vā suraṃ
atk-s0502a:3472_7: pivanto attano mūlaṃ khaṇati, anātho kapaṇo hutvā vicarati. Evaṃ, bhoti pañcadussīlyakammakārakaṃ
atk-s0502a:3472_8: puggalaṃ ālapati. Pāpadhammāti lāmakadhammā. Asaññatāti kāyasaññatādirahitā. Acetasātipi
atk-s0502a:3472_9: pāṭho, acittakāti attho. Lobho adhammo cāti lobho ceva doso ca. Ubhayampi hetaṃ akusalameva.
atk-s0502a:3472_10: Ciraṃ dukkhāya randhayunti cirakālaṃ nirayadukkhādīnaṃ atthāya taṃ ete dhammā mā
atk-s0502a:3473: Desanāvasāne te pañca upāsakā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:3476: Dadāti veti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto tissadaharaṃ nāma ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3477_0: So kira anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatino visākhāya upāsikāyāti pañcannaṃ ariyasāvakakoṭīnaṃ
atk-s0502a:3477_1: dānaṃ nindanto vicari, asadisadānampi nindiyeva. Tesaṃ tesaṃ dānagge sītalaṃ labhitvā
atk-s0502a:3477_2: “sītala”nti nindi, uṇhaṃ labhitvā “uṇha”nti nindi. Appaṃ dentepi “kiṃ ime appamattakaṃ
atk-s0502a:3477_3: dentī”ti nindi, bahuṃ dentepi “imesaṃ gehe ṭhapanaṭṭhānaṃ maññe natthi, nanu nāma
atk-s0502a:3477_4: bhikkhūnaṃ yāpanamattaṃ dātabbaṃ, ettakaṃ yāgubhattaṃ niratthakameva vissajjatī”ti
atk-s0502a:3477_5: nindi. Attano pana ñātake ārabbha “aho amhākaṃ ñātakānaṃ gehaṃ catūhi disāhi āgatāgatānaṃ
atk-s0502a:3477_6: bhikkhūnaṃ opānabhūta”ntiādīni vatvā pasaṃsaṃ pavattesi. So panekassa dovārikassa
atk-s0502a:3477_7: putto janapadaṃ vicarantehi vaḍḍhakīhi saddhiṃ vicaranto sāvatthiṃ patvā pabbajito.
atk-s0502a:3477_8: Atha naṃ bhikkhū evaṃ manussānaṃ dānādīni nindantaṃ disvā “pariggaṇhissāma na”nti
atk-s0502a:3477_9: cintetvā, “āvuso, tava ñātakā kahaṃ vasantī”ti pucchitvā “asukagāme nāmā”ti sutvāva
atk-s0502a:3477_10: katipaye dahare pesesuṃ. Te tattha gantvā gāmavāsikehi āsanasālāya nisīdāpetvā katasakkārā
atk-s0502a:3477_11: pucchiṃsu – “imamhā gāmā nikkhamitvā pabbajito tisso nāma daharo atthi. Tassa katame
atk-s0502a:3477_12: ñātakā”ti? Manussā “idha kulagehato nikkhamitvā pabbajitadārako natthi, kiṃ nu kho
atk-s0502a:3477_13: ime vadantī”ti cintetvā, “bhante, eko dovārikaputto vaḍḍhakīhi saddhiṃ vicaritvā
atk-s0502a:3477_14: pabbajitoti suṇoma, taṃ sandhāya vadetha maññe”ti āhaṃsu. Daharabhikkhū tissassa
atk-s0502a:3477_15: tattha issarañātakānaṃ abhāvaṃ ñatvā sāvatthiṃ gantvā “akāraṇameva, bhante, tisso
atk-s0502a:3477_16: vilapanto vicaratī”ti taṃ pavattiṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ārocesuṃ. Bhikkhūpi taṃ tathāgatassa ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:3478: Satthā “na, bhikkhave, idāneva vikatthento vicarati, pubbepi vikatthakova ahosī”ti vatvā bhikkhūhi yācito atītaṃ āharitvā –
atk-s0502a:3481_0: Imaṃ kaṭāhajātakaṃ vitthāretvā, “bhikkhave, yo hi puggalo parehi appake vā bahuke
atk-s0502a:3481_1: vā lūkhe vā paṇīte vā dinne aññesaṃ vā datvā attano adinne maṅku hoti, tassa jhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:3481_2: vā vipassanaṃ vā maggaphalādīni vā na uppajjantī”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3484: Tattha yo ca maṅku hoti, paresaṃ pānabhojane;
atk-s0502a:3485: Na so divā vā rattiṃ vā, samādhimadhigacchati.
atk-s0502a:3488: Sa ve divā vā rattiṃ vā, samādhimadhigacchatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:3489_0: Tattha dadāti ve yathāsaddhanti lūkhapaṇītādīsu yaṃkiñci dento jano yathāsaddhaṃ
atk-s0502a:3489_1: attano saddhānurūpameva deti. Yathāpasādananti theranavādīsu cassa yasmiṃ yasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:3489_2: pasādo uppajjati, tassa dento yathāpasādanaṃ attano pasādānurūpameva deti. Tatthāti
atk-s0502a:3489_3: tasmiṃ parassa dāne “mayā appaṃ vā laddhaṃ, lūkhaṃ vā laddha”nti maṅkubhāvaṃ āpajjati.
atk-s0502a:3489_4: Samādhinti so puggalo divā vā rattiṃ vā upacārappanāvasena vā maggaphalavasena vā
atk-s0502a:3489_5: samādhiṃ nādhigacchati. Yassa cetanti yassa puggalassa etaṃ ekesu ṭhānesu maṅkubhāvasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0502a:3489_6: akusalaṃ samucchinnaṃ mūlaghaccaṃ katvā arahattamaggañāṇena samūhataṃ, so vuttappakāraṃ
atk-s0502a:3493: Natthi rāgasamo aggīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto pañca upāsake ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3494_0: Te kira dhammaṃ sotukāmā vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu. Buddhānañca
atk-s0502a:3494_1: “ayaṃ khattiyo, ayaṃ brāhmaṇo, ayaṃ aḍḍho, ayaṃ duggato, imassa uḷāraṃ katvā dhammaṃ
atk-s0502a:3494_2: desessāmi, imassa no”ti cittaṃ na uppajjati. Yaṃkiñci ārabbha dhammaṃ desento dhammagāravaṃ
atk-s0502a:3494_3: purakkhatvā ākāsagaṅgaṃ otārento viya deseti. Evaṃ desentassa pana tathāgatassa santike
atk-s0502a:3494_4: nisinnānaṃ tesaṃ eko nisinnakova niddāyi, eko aṅguliyā bhūmiṃ likhanto nisīdi, eko
atk-s0502a:3494_5: ekaṃ rukkhaṃ cālento nisīdi, eko ākāsaṃ ullokento nisīdi, eko pana sakkaccaṃ dhammaṃ assosi.
atk-s0502a:3495_0: Ānandatthero satthāraṃ bījayamāno tesaṃ ākāraṃ olokento satthāraṃ āha – “bhante,
atk-s0502a:3495_1: tumhe imesaṃ mahāmeghagajjitaṃ gajjantā viya dhammaṃ desetha, ete pana tumhesupi
atk-s0502a:3495_2: dhammaṃ kathentesu idañcidañca karontā nisinnā”ti. “Ānanda, tvaṃ ete na jānāsī”ti?
atk-s0502a:3495_3: “Āma, na jānāmi, bhante”ti. Etesu hi yo esa niddāyanto nisinno, esa pañca jātisatāni
atk-s0502a:3495_4: sappayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā bhogesu sīsaṃ ṭhapetvā niddāyi, idānipissa niddāya titti
atk-s0502a:3495_5: natthi, nāssa kaṇṇaṃ mama saddo pavisatīti. Kiṃ pana, bhante, paṭipāṭiyā kathetha,
atk-s0502a:3495_6: udāhu antarantarāti. Ānanda, etassa hi kālena manussattaṃ, kālena devattaṃ, kālena
atk-s0502a:3495_7: nāgattanti evaṃ antarantarā uppajjantassa upapattiyo sabbaññutaññāṇenāpi na sakkā
atk-s0502a:3495_8: paricchindituṃ. Paṭipāṭiyā panesa pañca jātisatāni nāgayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā niddāyantopi
atk-s0502a:3495_9: niddāya atittoyeva. Aṅguliyā bhūmiṃ likhanto nisinnapurisopi pañca jātisatāni gaṇḍuppādayoniyaṃ
atk-s0502a:3495_10: nibbattitvā bhūmiṃ khaṇi, idānipi bhūmiṃ khaṇantova mama saddaṃ na suṇāti. Esa rukkhaṃ
atk-s0502a:3495_11: cālento nisinnapurisopi paṭipāṭiyā pañca jātisatāni makkaṭayoniyaṃ nibbatti, idānipi
atk-s0502a:3495_12: pubbāciṇṇavasena rukkhaṃ cāletiyeva, nāssa kaṇṇaṃ mama saddo pavisati. Esa ākāsaṃ
atk-s0502a:3495_13: ulloketvā nisinnapurisopi pañca jātisatāni nakkhattapāṭhako hutvā nibbatti, idāni
atk-s0502a:3495_14: pubbāciṇṇavasena ajjāpi ākāsameva ulloketi, nāssa kaṇṇaṃ mama saddo pavisati. Esa
atk-s0502a:3495_15: sakkaccaṃ dhammaṃ suṇanto nisinnapuriso pana paṭipāṭiyā pañca jātisatāni tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ
atk-s0502a:3495_16: pāragū mantajjhāyakabrāhmaṇo hutvā nibbatti, idānipi mantaṃ saṃsandanto viya sakkaccaṃ suṇātīti.
atk-s0502a:3496_0: “Bhante, tumhākaṃ dhammadesanā chaviādīni chinditvā aṭṭhimiñjaṃ āhacca tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0502a:3496_1: kasmā ime tumhesupi dhammaṃ desentesu sakkaccaṃ na suṇantī”ti? “Ānanda, mama dhammo
atk-s0502a:3496_2: sussavanīyoti saññaṃ karosi maññe”ti. “Kiṃ pana, bhante, dussavanīyo”ti? “Āma, ānandā”ti.
atk-s0502a:3496_3: “Kasmā, bhante”ti? “Ānanda, buddhoti vā dhammoti vā saṅghoti vā padaṃ imehi sattehi
atk-s0502a:3496_4: anekesupi kappakoṭisatasahassesu asutapubbaṃ. Yasmā imaṃ dhammaṃ sotuṃ na sakkontā
atk-s0502a:3496_5: anamatagge saṃsāre ime sattā anekavihitaṃ tiracchānakathaṃyeva suṇantā āgatā, tasmā
atk-s0502a:3496_6: surāpānakeḷimaṇḍalādīsu gāyantā naccantā vicaranti, dhammaṃ sotuṃ na sakkontī”ti.
atk-s0502a:3497_0: Athassa satthā, “ānanda, rāgaṃ nissāya dosaṃ nissāya mohaṃ nissāya taṇhaṃ nissāya
atk-s0502a:3497_1: na sakkonti. Rāgaggisadiso aggi nāma natthi, so chārikampi asesetvā satte dahati.
atk-s0502a:3497_2: Kiñcāpi sattasūriyapātubhāvaṃ nissāya uppanno kappavināsako aggipi kiñci anavasesetvāva
atk-s0502a:3497_3: lokaṃ dahati, so pana aggi kadāciyeva dahati. Rāgaggino adahanakālo nāma natthi,
atk-s0502a:3497_4: tasmā rāgasamo vā aggi dosasamo vā gaho mohasamaṃ vā jālaṃ taṇhāsamā vā nadī nāma
atk-s0502a:3500: Natthi mohasamaṃ jālaṃ, natthi taṇhāsamā nadī”ti.
atk-s0502a:3501_0: Tattha rāgasamoti dhūmādīsu kiñci adassetvā antoyeva uṭṭhāya jhāpanavasena rāgena
atk-s0502a:3501_1: samo aggi nāma natthi. Dosasamoti yakkhagahaajagaragahakumbhilagahādayo ekasmiṃyeva
atk-s0502a:3501_2: attabhāve gaṇhituṃ sakkonti, dosagaho pana sabbattha ekantameva gaṇhātīti dosena
atk-s0502a:3501_3: samo gaho nāma natthi. Mohasamanti onandhanapariyonandhanaṭṭhena pana mohasamaṃ jālaṃ
atk-s0502a:3501_4: nāma natthi. Taṇhāsamāti gaṅgādīnaṃ nadīnaṃ puṇṇakālopi ūnakālopi sukkhakālopi paññāyati,
atk-s0502a:3501_5: taṇhāya pana puṇṇakālo vā sukkhakālo vā natthi, niccaṃ ūnāva paññāyatīti duppūraṇaṭṭhena
atk-s0502a:3501_6: taṇhāya samā nadī nāma natthīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3502: Desanāvasāne sakkaccaṃ dhammaṃ suṇanto upāsako sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:3505: Sudassaṃ vajjanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā bhaddiyanagaraṃ nissāya jātiyāvane viharanto meṇḍakaseṭṭhiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3506_0: Satthā kira aṅguttarāpesu cārikaṃ caranto meṇḍakaseṭṭhino ca, bhariyāya cassa candapadumāya,
atk-s0502a:3506_1: puttassa ca dhanañcayaseṭṭhino, suṇisāya ca sumanadeviyā, nattāya cassa visākhāya,
atk-s0502a:3506_2: dāsassa ca puṇṇassāti imesaṃ sotāpattiphalūpanissayaṃ disvā bhaddiyanagaraṃ gantvā
atk-s0502a:3506_3: jātiyāvane vihāsi. Meṇḍakaseṭṭhi satthu āgamanaṃ assosi. Kasmā panesa meṇḍakaseṭṭhi
atk-s0502a:3506_4: nāma jātoti? Tassa kira pacchimagehe aṭṭhakarīsamatte ṭhāne hatthiassausabhapamāṇā
atk-s0502a:3506_5: suvaṇṇameṇḍakā pathaviṃ bhinditvā piṭṭhiyā piṭṭhiṃ paharamānā uṭṭhahiṃsu. Tesaṃ mukhesu
atk-s0502a:3506_6: pañcavaṇṇānaṃ suttānaṃ geṇḍukā pakkhittā honti. Sappitelamadhuphāṇitādīhi vā vatthacchādanahiraññasuvaṇṇādīhi
atk-s0502a:3506_7: vā atthe sati tesaṃ mukhato geṇḍuke apanenti, ekassāpi meṇḍakassa mukhato jambudīpavāsīnaṃ
atk-s0502a:3507_0: Kiṃ panassa pubbakammanti? Vipassībuddhakāle kira esa avarojassa nāma kuṭumbikassa
atk-s0502a:3507_1: bhāgineyyo mātulena samānanāmo avarojo nāma ahosi. Athassa mātulo satthu gandhakuṭiṃ
atk-s0502a:3507_2: kātuṃ ārabhi. So tassa santikaṃ gantvā, “mātula, ubhopi saheva karomā”ti vatvā “ahaṃ
atk-s0502a:3507_3: aññehi saddhiṃ asādhāraṇaṃ katvā ekakova karissāmī”ti tena pana paṭikkhittakāle “imasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:3507_4: ṭhāne gandhakuṭiyā katāya imasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne kuñjarasālaṃ nāma laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0502a:3507_5: cintetvā araññato dabbasambhāre āharāpetvā ekaṃ thambhaṃ suvaṇṇakhacitaṃ, ekaṃ rajatakhacitaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3507_7: sabbāpi suvaṇṇādikhacitāva kāretvā gandhakuṭiyā sammukhaṭṭhāne tathāgatassa sattaratanamayaṃ
atk-s0502a:3507_8: kuñjarasālaṃ kāresi. Tassā upari ghanarattasuvaṇṇamayā kambalā pavāḷamayā sikharathūpikāyo
atk-s0502a:3507_9: ahesuṃ. Kuñjarasālāya majjhe ṭhāne ratanamaṇḍapaṃ kāretvā dhammāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0502a:3507_10: Tassa ghanarattasuvaṇṇamayā pādā ahesuṃ, tathā catasso aṭaniyo. Cattāro pana suvaṇṇameṇḍake
atk-s0502a:3507_11: kārāpetvā āsanassa catunnaṃ pādānaṃ heṭṭhā ṭhapesi, dve meṇḍake kārāpetvā pādapīṭhakāya
atk-s0502a:3507_12: heṭṭhā ṭhapesi, cha suvaṇṇameṇḍake kārāpetvā maṇḍapaṃ parikkhipento ṭhapesi. Dhammāsanaṃ
atk-s0502a:3507_13: paṭhamaṃ suttamayehi rajjukehi vāyāpetvā majjhe suvaṇṇasuttamayehi upari muttamayehi
atk-s0502a:3507_14: suttehi vāyāpesi. Tassa candanamayo apassayo ahosi. Evaṃ kuñjarasālaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0502a:3507_15: sālāmahaṃ karonto aṭṭhasaṭṭhīhi bhikkhusatasahassehi saddhiṃ satthāraṃ nimantetvā
atk-s0502a:3507_16: cattāro māse dānaṃ datvā osānadivase ticīvaraṃ adāsi. Tattha saṅghanavakassa satasahassagghanikaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:3508_0: Evaṃ vipassībuddhakāle puññakammaṃ katvā tato cuto devesu ca manussesu ca saṃsaranto
atk-s0502a:3508_1: imasmiṃ bhaddakappe bārāṇasiyaṃ mahābhogakule nibbattitvā bārāṇasiseṭṭhi nāma ahosi.
atk-s0502a:3508_2: So ekadivasaṃ rājūpaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanto purohitaṃ disvā “kiṃ, ācariya, nakkhattamuhuttaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3508_3: upadhārethā”ti āha. Āma, upadhāremi, kiṃ aññaṃ amhākaṃ kammanti. Tena hi kīdisaṃ
atk-s0502a:3508_4: janapadacārittanti? Ekaṃ bhayaṃ bhavissatīti. Kiṃ bhayaṃ nāmāti? Chātakabhayaṃ seṭṭhīti.
atk-s0502a:3508_5: Kadā bhavissatīti? Ito tiṇṇaṃ saṃvaccharānaṃ accayenāti. Taṃ sutvā seṭṭhi bahuṃ kasikammaṃ
atk-s0502a:3508_6: kāretvā gehe vijjamānadhanenāpi dhaññameva gahetvā aḍḍhaterasāni koṭṭhasatāni kāretvā
atk-s0502a:3508_7: sabbakoṭṭhake vīhīhi paripūresi. Koṭṭhesu appahontesu cāṭiādīni pūretvā avasesaṃ
atk-s0502a:3508_8: bhūmiyaṃ āvāṭe katvā nikhaṇi. Nidhānāvasesaṃ mattikāya saddhiṃ madditvā bhittiyo limpāpesi.
atk-s0502a:3509_0: So aparena samayena chātakabhaye sampatte yathānikkhittaṃ dhaññaṃ paribhuñjanto koṭṭhesu
atk-s0502a:3509_1: ca cāṭiādīsu ca nikkhittadhaññe parikkhīṇe parijane pakkosāpetvā āha – “gacchatha,
atk-s0502a:3509_2: tātā, pabbatapādaṃ pavisitvā jīvantā subhikkhakāle mama santikaṃ āgantukāmā āgacchatha,
atk-s0502a:3509_3: anāgantukāmā tattha tattheva jīvathā”ti. Te rodamānā assumukhā hutvā seṭṭhiṃ vanditvā
atk-s0502a:3509_4: khamāpetvā sattāhaṃ nisīditvā tathā akaṃsu. Tassa pana santike veyyāvaccakaro ekova
atk-s0502a:3509_5: puṇṇo nāma dāso ohīyi, tena saddhiṃ seṭṭhijāyā seṭṭhiputto seṭṭhisuṇisāti pañceva
atk-s0502a:3509_6: janā ahesuṃ. Te bhūmiyaṃ āvāṭesu nihitadhaññepi parikkhīṇe bhittimattikaṃ pātetvā
atk-s0502a:3509_7: temetvā tato laddhadhaññena yāpayiṃsu. Athassa jāyā chātake avattharante mattikāya
atk-s0502a:3509_8: khīyamānāya bhittipādesu avasiṭṭhamattikaṃ pātetvā temetvā aḍḍhāḷhakamattaṃ vīhiṃ
atk-s0502a:3509_9: labhitvā koṭṭetvā ekaṃ taṇḍulanāḷiṃ gahetvā “chātakakāle corā bahū hontī”ti corabhayena
atk-s0502a:3509_10: ekasmiṃ kuṭe pakkhipitvā pidahitvā bhūmiyaṃ nikhaṇitvā ṭhapesi. Atha naṃ seṭṭhi rājūpaṭṭhānato
atk-s0502a:3509_11: āgantvā āha – “bhadde, chātomhi, atthi kiñcī”ti. Sā vijjamānaṃ “natthī”ti avatvā
atk-s0502a:3509_12: “ekā taṇḍulanāḷi atthī”ti āha. “Kahaṃ sā”ti? “Corabhayena me nikhaṇitvā ṭhapitā”ti.
atk-s0502a:3509_13: “Tena hi naṃ uddharitvā kiñci pacāhī”ti. “Sace yāguṃ pacissāmi, dve vāre labhissati.
atk-s0502a:3509_14: Sace bhattaṃ pacissāmi, ekavārameva labhissati, kiṃ pacāmi, sāmī”ti āha. “Amhākaṃ
atk-s0502a:3509_15: añño paccayo natthi, bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā marissāma, bhattameva pacāhī”ti. Sā bhattaṃ
atk-s0502a:3509_16: pacitvā pañca koṭṭhāse katvā seṭṭhino koṭṭhāsaṃ vaḍḍhetvā purato ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a:3510_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe gandhamādanapabbate paccekabuddho samāpattito vuṭṭhāti. Antosamāpattiyaṃ
atk-s0502a:3510_1: kira samāpattibalena jighacchā na bādhati. Samāpattito vuṭṭhitānaṃ pana balavatī
atk-s0502a:3510_2: hutvā udarapaṭalaṃ ḍayhantī viya uppajjati. Tasmā te labhanaṭṭhānaṃ oloketvā gacchanti.
atk-s0502a:3510_3: Taṃ divasañca tesaṃ dānaṃ datvā senāpatiṭṭhānādīsu aññatarasampattiṃ labhanti. Tasmā
atk-s0502a:3510_4: sopi dibbena cakkhunā olokento “sakalajambudīpe chātakabhayaṃ uppannaṃ, seṭṭhigehe
atk-s0502a:3510_5: ca pañcannaṃ janānaṃ nāḷikodanova pakko, saddhā nu kho ete, sakkhissanti vā mama
atk-s0502a:3510_6: saṅgahaṃ kātu”nti tesaṃ saddhabhāvañca saṅgahaṃ kātuṃ samatthabhāvañca disvā pattacīvaramādāya
atk-s0502a:3510_7: mahāseṭṭhissa purato dvāre ṭhitameva attānaṃ dassesi. So taṃ disvā pasannacitto “pubbepi
atk-s0502a:3510_8: mayā dānassa adinnattā evarūpaṃ chātakaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, idaṃ kho pana bhattaṃ maṃ ekadivasameva
atk-s0502a:3510_9: rakkheyya. Ayyassa pana dinnaṃ anekāsu kappakoṭīsu mama hitasukhāvahaṃ bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0502a:3510_10: taṃ bhattapātiṃ apanetvā paccekabuddhaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā
atk-s0502a:3510_11: gehaṃ pavesetvā āsane nisinnassa pāde dhovitvā suvaṇṇapādapīṭhe ṭhapetvā bhattapātimādāya
atk-s0502a:3510_12: paccekabuddhassa patte okiri. Upaḍḍhāvasese bhatte paccekabuddho hatthena pattaṃ
atk-s0502a:3510_13: pidahi. Atha naṃ, “bhante, ekāya taṇḍulanāḷiyā pañcannaṃ janānaṃ pakkaodanassa ayaṃ
atk-s0502a:3510_14: eko koṭṭhāso, imaṃ dvidhā kātuṃ na sakkā. Mā mayhaṃ idhaloke saṅgahaṃ karotha, ahaṃ
atk-s0502a:3510_15: niravasesaṃ dātukāmomhī”ti vatvā sabbaṃ bhattamadāsi. Datvā ca pana patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi,
atk-s0502a:3510_16: “mā, bhante, puna nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne evarūpaṃ chātakabhayaṃ addasaṃ, ito paṭṭhāya
atk-s0502a:3510_17: sakalajambudīpavāsīnaṃ bījabhattaṃ dātuṃ samattho bhaveyyaṃ, sahatthena kammaṃ katvā
atk-s0502a:3510_18: jīvikaṃ na kappeyyaṃ, aḍḍhaterasa koṭṭhasatāni sodhāpetvā sīsaṃ nhāyitvā tesaṃ dvāre
atk-s0502a:3510_19: nisīditvā uddhaṃ olokitakkhaṇeyeva me rattasālidhārā patitvā sabbakoṭṭhe pūreyyuṃ.
atk-s0502a:3510_20: Nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne ca ayameva bhariyā, ayameva putto, ayameva suṇisā, ayameva dāso hotū”ti.
atk-s0502a:3511_0: Bhariyāpissa “mama sāmike jighacchāya pīḷiyamāne na sakkā mayā bhuñjitu”nti cintetvā
atk-s0502a:3511_1: attano koṭṭhāsaṃ paccekabuddhassa datvā patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi, “bhante, idāni nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a:3511_2: evarūpaṃ chātakabhayaṃ na passeyyaṃ, bhattathālikaṃ purato katvā sakalajambudīpavāsīnaṃ
atk-s0502a:3511_3: bhattaṃ dentiyāpi ca me yāva na uṭṭhahissāmi, tāva gahitagahitaṭṭhānaṃ pūritameva
atk-s0502a:3511_4: hotu. Ayameva sāmiko, ayameva putto, ayameva suṇisā, ayameva dāso hotū”ti. Puttopissa
atk-s0502a:3511_5: attano koṭṭhāsaṃ paccekabuddhassa datvā patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi, “bhante, ito paṭṭhāya
atk-s0502a:3511_6: evarūpaṃ chātakabhayaṃ na passeyyaṃ, ekañca me sahassathavikaṃ gahetvā sakalajambudīpavāsīnaṃ
atk-s0502a:3511_7: kahāpaṇaṃ dentassāpi ayaṃ sahassathavikā paripuṇṇāva hotu, imeyeva mātāpitaro hontu,
atk-s0502a:3512_0: Suṇisāpissa attano koṭṭhāsaṃ paccekabuddhassa datvā patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi, “ito paṭṭhāya
atk-s0502a:3512_1: evarūpaṃ chātakabhayaṃ na passeyyaṃ, ekañca me dhaññapiṭakaṃ purato ṭhapetvā sakalajambudīpavāsīnaṃ
atk-s0502a:3512_2: bījabhattaṃ dentiyāpi khīṇabhāvo mā paññāyittha, nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne imeyeva sasurā
atk-s0502a:3512_3: hontu, ayameva sāmiko, ayameva dāso hotū”ti. Dāsopi attano koṭṭhāsaṃ paccekabuddhassa
atk-s0502a:3512_4: datvā patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi, “ito paṭṭhāya evarūpaṃ chātakabhayaṃ na passeyyaṃ, sabbe
atk-s0502a:3512_5: ime sāmikā hontu, kasantassa ca me ito tisso, etto tisso, majjhe ekāti dāruambaṇamattā
atk-s0502a:3512_6: satta satta sītāyo gacchantū”ti. So taṃ divasaṃ senāpatiṭṭhānaṃ patthetvā laddhuṃ
atk-s0502a:3512_7: samatthopi sāmikesu sinehena “imeyeva me sāmikā hontū”ti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi. Paccekabuddho
atk-s0502a:3514: Sabbe pūrentu saṅkappā, cando pannaraso yathā.
atk-s0502a:3516: Sabbe pūrentu saṅkappā, maṇi jotiraso yathā”ti. –
atk-s0502a:3517_0: Paccekabuddhagāthāhi anumodanaṃ katvā “mayā imesaṃ cittaṃ pasādetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā
atk-s0502a:3517_1: “yāva gandhamādanapabbatā ime maṃ passantū”ti adhiṭṭhahitvā pakkāmi. Tepi oloketvāva
atk-s0502a:3517_2: aṭṭhaṃsu. So gantvā taṃ bhattaṃ pañcahi paccekabuddhasatehi saddhiṃ saṃvibhaji. Taṃ
atk-s0502a:3517_3: tassānubhāvena sabbesampi pahoti. Te olokentāyeva aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3518_0: Atikkante pana majjhanhike seṭṭhibhariyā ukkhaliṃ dhovitvā pidahitvā ṭhapesi. Seṭṭhipi
atk-s0502a:3518_1: jighacchāya pīḷito nipajjitvā niddaṃ okkami. So sāyanhe pabujjhitvā bhariyaṃ āha
atk-s0502a:3518_2: – “bhadde, ativiya chātomhi, atthi nu kho ukkhaliyā tale jhāmakasitthānī”ti. Sā dhovitvā
atk-s0502a:3518_3: ukkhaliyā ṭhapitabhāvaṃ jānantīpi “natthī”ti avatvā “ukkhaliṃ vivaritvā ācikkhissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:3518_4: uṭṭhāya ukkhalimūlaṃ gantvā ukkhaliṃ vivari, tāvadeva sumanamakulasadisavaṇṇassa
atk-s0502a:3518_5: bhattassa pūrā ukkhali pidhānaṃ ukkhipitvā aṭṭhāsi. Sā taṃ disvāva pītiyā phuṭṭhasarīrā
atk-s0502a:3518_6: seṭṭhiṃ āha – “uṭṭhehi, sāmi, ahaṃ ukkhaliṃ dhovitvā pidahiṃ, sā pana sumanamakulasadisavaṇṇassa
atk-s0502a:3518_7: bhattassa pūrā, puññāni nāma kattabbarūpāni, dānaṃ nāma kattabbayuttakaṃ. Uṭṭhehi,
atk-s0502a:3518_8: sāmi, bhuñjassū”ti. Sā dvinnaṃ pitāputtānaṃ bhattaṃ adāsi. Tesu sutvā uṭṭhitesu suṇisāya
atk-s0502a:3518_9: saddhiṃ nisīditvā bhuñjitvā puṇṇassa bhattaṃ adāsi. Gahitagahitaṭṭhānaṃ na khīyati,
atk-s0502a:3518_10: kaṭacchunā sakiṃ gahitaṭṭhānameva paññāyati. Taṃdivasameva koṭṭhādayo pubbe pūritaniyāmeneva
atk-s0502a:3518_11: puna pūrayiṃsu. “Seṭṭhissa gehe bhattaṃ uppannaṃ, bījabhattehi atthikā āgantvā gaṇhantū”ti
atk-s0502a:3518_12: nagare ghosanaṃ kāresi. Manussā tassa gehato bījabhattaṃ gaṇhiṃsu. Sakalajambudīpavāsino
atk-s0502a:3519_0: So tato cuto devaloke nibbattitvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde bhaddiyanagare
atk-s0502a:3519_1: seṭṭhikule nibbatti. Bhariyāpissa mahābhogakule nibbattitvā vayappattā tasseva gehaṃ
atk-s0502a:3519_2: agamāsi. Tassa taṃ pubbakammaṃ nissāya pacchāgehe pubbe vuttappakārā meṇḍakā uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3519_3: Puttopi nesaṃ puttova, suṇisā suṇisāva, dāso dāsova ahosi. Athekadivasaṃ seṭṭhi attano
atk-s0502a:3519_4: puññaṃ vīmaṃsitukāmo aḍḍhaterasāni koṭṭhasatāni sodhāpetvā sīsaṃ nhāto dvāre nisīditvā
atk-s0502a:3519_5: uddhaṃ olokesi. Sabbānipi vuttappakārānaṃ rattasālīnaṃ pūrayiṃsu. So sesānampi puññāni
atk-s0502a:3519_6: vīmaṃsitukāmo bhariyañca puttādayo ca “tumhākampi puññāni vīmaṃsissathā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:3520_0: Athassa bhariyā sabbālaṅkārehi alaṅkaritvā mahājanassa passantasseva taṇḍule mināpetvā
atk-s0502a:3520_1: tehi bhattaṃ pacāpetvā dvārakoṭṭhake paññattāsane nisīditvā suvaṇṇakaṭacchuṃ ādāya
atk-s0502a:3520_2: “bhattena atthikā āgacchantū”ti ghosāpetvā āgatāgatānaṃ upanītabhājanāni pūretvā
atk-s0502a:3520_3: adāsi. Sakaladivasampi dentiyā kaṭacchunā gahitaṭṭhānameva paññāyati. Tassā pana
atk-s0502a:3520_4: purimabuddhānampi bhikkhusaṅghassa vāmahatthena ukkhaliṃ dakkhiṇahatthena kaṭacchuṃ
atk-s0502a:3520_5: gahetvā evameva patte pūretvā bhattassa dinnattā vāmahatthatalaṃ pūretvā padumalakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:3520_6: nibbatti, dakkhiṇahatthatalaṃ pūretvā candalakkhaṇaṃ nibbatti. Yasmā pana vāmahatthato
atk-s0502a:3520_7: dhammakaraṇaṃ ādāya bhikkhusaṅghassa udakaṃ parissāvetvā dadamānā aparāparaṃ vicari,
atk-s0502a:3520_8: tenassā dakkhiṇapādatalaṃ pūretvā candalakkhaṇaṃ nibbatti, vāmapādatalaṃ pūretvā
atk-s0502a:3520_9: padumalakkhaṇaṃ nibbatti. Tassā iminā kāraṇena candapadumāti nāmaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3521_0: Puttopissa sīsaṃ nhāto sahassathavikaṃ ādāya “kahāpaṇehi atthikā āgacchantū”ti vatvā
atk-s0502a:3521_1: āgatāgatānaṃ gahitabhājanāni pūretvā adāsi. Thavikāya kahāpaṇasahassaṃ ahosiyeva.
atk-s0502a:3521_2: Suṇisāpissa sabbālaṅkārehi alaṅkaritvā vīhipiṭakaṃ ādāya ākāsaṅgaṇe nisinnā “bījabhattehi
atk-s0502a:3521_3: atthikā āgacchantū”ti vatvā āgatāgatānaṃ gahitabhājanāni pūretvā adāsi. Piṭakaṃ yathāpūritameva
atk-s0502a:3521_4: ahosi. Dāsopissa sabbālaṅkārehi alaṅkaritvā suvaṇṇayugesu suvaṇṇayottehi goṇe yojetvā
atk-s0502a:3521_5: suvaṇṇapatodayaṭṭhiṃ ādāya dvinnaṃ goṇānaṃ gandhapañcaṅgulikāni datvā visāṇesu suvaṇṇakosake
atk-s0502a:3521_6: paṭimuñcitvā khettaṃ gantvā pājesi. Ito tisso, etto tisso, majjhe ekāti satta sītā
atk-s0502a:3521_7: bhijjitvā agamaṃsu. Jambudīpavāsino bhattabījahiraññasuvaṇṇādīsu yathārucitaṃ seṭṭhigehatoyeva
atk-s0502a:3522_0: Evaṃ mahānubhāvo seṭṭhi “satthā kira āgato”ti sutvā “satthu paccuggamanaṃ karissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:3522_1: nikkhamanto antarāmagge titthiye disvā tehi “kasmā taṃ, gahapati, kiriyavādo samāno
atk-s0502a:3522_2: akiriyavādassa samaṇassa gotamassa santikaṃ gacchasī”ti nivāriyamānopi tesaṃ vacanaṃ
atk-s0502a:3522_3: anādiyitvā gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Athassa satthā anupubbiṃ kathaṃ
atk-s0502a:3522_4: kathesi. So desanāvasāne sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā satthu titthiyehi avaṇṇaṃ vatvā attano
atk-s0502a:3522_5: nivāritabhāvaṃ ārocesi. Atha naṃ satthā, “gahapati, ime sattā nāma mahantampi attano
atk-s0502a:3522_6: dosaṃ na passanti, avijjamānampi paresaṃ dosaṃ vijjamānaṃ katvā tattha tattha bhusaṃ
atk-s0502a:3525: Paresañhi so vajjāni, opunāti yathā bhusaṃ;
atk-s0502a:3526: Attano pana chādeti, kaliṃva kitavā saṭho”ti.
atk-s0502a:3527_0: Tattha sudassaṃ vajjanti parassa aṇumattampi vajjaṃ khalitaṃ sudassaṃ sukheneva passituṃ
atk-s0502a:3527_1: sakkā, attano pana atimahantampi duddasaṃ. Paresaṃ hīti teneva kāraṇena so puggalo
atk-s0502a:3527_2: saṅghamajjhādīsu paresaṃ vajjāni uccaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā bhusaṃ opunanto viya opunāti.
atk-s0502a:3527_3: Kaliṃva kitavā saṭhoti ettha sakuṇesu aparajjhanabhāvena attabhāvo kali nāma, sākhabhaṅgādikaṃ
atk-s0502a:3527_4: paṭicchādanaṃ kitavā nāma, sākuṇiko saṭho nāma. Yathā sakuṇaluddako sakuṇe gahetvā
atk-s0502a:3527_5: māretukāmo kitavā viya attabhāvaṃ paṭicchādeti, evaṃ attano vajjaṃ chādetīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3531: Paravajjānupassissāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ujjhānasaññiṃ nāma ekaṃ theraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3532_0: So kira “ayaṃ evaṃ nivāseti, evaṃ pārupatī”ti bhikkhūnaṃ antarameva gavesanto vicarati.
atk-s0502a:3532_1: Bhikkhū “asuko nāma, bhante, thero evaṃ karotī”ti satthu ārocesuṃ. Satthā, “bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a:3532_2: vattasīse ṭhatvā evaṃ ovadanto ananupavādo. Yo pana niccaṃ ujjhānasaññitāya paresaṃ
atk-s0502a:3532_3: antaraṃ pariyesamāno evaṃ vatvā vicarati, tassa jhānādīsu ekopi viseso nuppajjati,
atk-s0502a:3532_4: kevalaṃ āsavāyeva vaḍḍhantī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3535: Āsavā tassa vaḍḍhanti, ārā so āsavakkhayā”ti.
atk-s0502a:3536_0: Tattha ujjhānasaññinoti evaṃ nivāsetabbaṃ evaṃ pārupitabbanti paresaṃ antaragavesitāya
atk-s0502a:3536_1: ujjhānabahulassa puggalassa jhānādīsu ekadhammopi na vaḍḍhati, atha kho āsavāva tassa
atk-s0502a:3536_2: vaḍḍhanti. Teneva kāraṇena so arahattamaggasaṅkhātā āsavakkhayā ārā dūraṃ gatova hotīti.
atk-s0502a:3540: Ākāseti idaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā kusinārāyaṃ upavattane mallānaṃ sālavane parinibbānamañcake nipanno subhaddaṃ paribbājakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3541_0: So kira atīte kaniṭṭhabhātari ekasmiṃ sasse navakkhattuṃ aggadānaṃ dente dānaṃ dātuṃ
atk-s0502a:3541_1: anicchanto osakkitvā avasāne adāsi. Tasmā paṭhamabodhiyampi majjhimabodhiyampi satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:3541_2: daṭṭhuṃ nālattha. Pacchimabodhiyaṃ pana satthu parinibbānakāle “ahaṃ tīsu pañhesu
atk-s0502a:3541_3: attano kaṅkhaṃ mahallake paribbājake pucchitvā samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ ‘daharo’ti saññāya
atk-s0502a:3541_4: na pucchiṃ, tassa ca dāni parinibbānakālo, pacchā me samaṇassa gotamassa apucchitakāraṇā
atk-s0502a:3541_5: vippaṭisāro uppajjeyyā”ti satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā ānandattherena nivāriyamānopi satthārā
atk-s0502a:3541_6: okāsaṃ katvā, “ānanda, mā subhaddaṃ nivārayi, pucchatu maṃ pañha”nti vutte antosāṇiṃ
atk-s0502a:3541_7: pavisitvā heṭṭhāmañcake nisinno, “bho samaṇa, kiṃ nu kho ākāse padaṃ nāma atthi,
atk-s0502a:3541_8: ito bahiddhā samaṇo nāma atthi, saṅkhārā sassatā nāma atthī”ti ime pañhe pucchi.
atk-s0502a:3541_9: Athassa satthā tesaṃ abhāvaṃ ācikkhanto imāhi gāthāhi dhammaṃ desesi –
atk-s0502a:3548_0: Tattha padanti imasmiṃ ākāse vaṇṇasaṇṭhānavasena evarūpanti paññāpetabbaṃ kassaci
atk-s0502a:3548_1: padaṃ nāma natthi. Bāhireti mama sāsanato bahiddhā maggaphalaṭṭho samaṇo nāma natthi.
atk-s0502a:3548_2: Pajāti ayaṃ sattalokasaṅkhātā pajā taṇhādīsu papañcesuyevābhiratā. Nippapañcāti bodhimūleyeva
atk-s0502a:3548_3: sabbapapañcānaṃ samucchinnattā nippapañcā tathāgatā. Saṅkhārāti pañcakkhandhā. Tesu
atk-s0502a:3548_4: hi ekopi sassato nāma natthi. Iñjitanti buddhānaṃ pana taṇhāmānādīsu iñjitesu yena
atk-s0502a:3548_5: saṅkhārā sassatāti gaṇheyya, taṃ ekaṃ iñjitampi nāma natthīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3549: Desanāvasāne subhaddo anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattaparisāyapi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:3555: Na tena hotīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto vinicchayamahāmatte ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3556_0: Ekadivasañhi bhikkhū sāvatthiyaṃ uttaradvāragāme piṇḍāya caritvā piṇḍapātapaṭikkantā
atk-s0502a:3556_1: nagaramajjhena vihāraṃ āgacchanti. Tasmiṃ khaṇe megho uṭṭhāya pāvassi. Te sammukhāgataṃ
atk-s0502a:3556_2: vinicchayasālaṃ pavisitvā vinicchayamahāmatte lañjaṃ gahetvā sāmike asāmike karonte
atk-s0502a:3556_3: disvā “aho ime adhammikā, mayaṃ pana ‘ime dhammena vinicchayaṃ karontī’ti saññino
atk-s0502a:3556_4: ahumhā”ti cintetvā vasse vigate vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinnā
atk-s0502a:3556_5: tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Satthā “na, bhikkhave, chandādivasikā hutvā sāhasena atthaṃ vinicchinantā
atk-s0502a:3556_6: dhammaṭṭhā nāma honti, aparādhaṃ pana anuvijjitvā aparādhānurūpaṃ asāhasena vinicchayaṃ
atk-s0502a:3556_7: karontā eva dhammaṭṭhā nāma hontī”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3558: “Na tena hoti dhammaṭṭho, yenatthaṃ sāhasā naye;
atk-s0502a:3559: Yo ca atthaṃ anatthañca, ubho niccheyya paṇḍito.
atk-s0502a:3563_0: Tattha tenāti ettakeneva kāraṇena. Dhammaṭṭhoti rājā hi attano kātabbe vinicchayadhamme
atk-s0502a:3563_1: ṭhitopi dhammaṭṭho nāma na hoti. Yenāti yena kāraṇena. Atthanti otiṇṇaṃ vinicchitabbaṃ
atk-s0502a:3563_2: atthaṃ. Sāhasā nayeti chandādīsu patiṭṭhito sāhasena musāvādena viniccheyya. Yo hi
atk-s0502a:3563_3: chande patiṭṭhāya ñātīti vā mittoti vā musā vatvā asāmikameva sāmikaṃ karoti, dose
atk-s0502a:3563_4: patiṭṭhāya attano verīnaṃ musā vatvā sāmikameva asāmikaṃ karoti, mohe patiṭṭhāya
atk-s0502a:3563_5: lañjaṃ gahetvā vinicchayakāle aññavihito viya ito cito ca olokento musā vatvā “iminā
atk-s0502a:3563_6: jitaṃ, ayaṃ parājito”ti paraṃ nīharati, bhaye patiṭṭhāya kassacideva issarajātikassa
atk-s0502a:3563_7: parājayaṃ pāpuṇantassāpi jayaṃ āropeti, ayaṃ sāhasena atthaṃ neti nāma. Eso dhammaṭṭho
atk-s0502a:3563_8: nāma na hotīti attho. Atthaṃ anatthañcāti bhūtañca abhūtañca kāraṇaṃ. Ubho niccheyyāti
atk-s0502a:3563_9: yo pana paṇḍito ubho atthānatthe vinicchinitvā vadati. Asāhasenāti amusāvādena. Dhammenāti
atk-s0502a:3563_10: vinicchayadhammena, na chandādivasena. Samenāti aparādhānurūpeneva pare nayati, jayaṃ
atk-s0502a:3563_11: vā parājayaṃ vā pāpeti. Dhammassa guttoti so dhammagutto dhammarakkhito dhammojapaññāya
atk-s0502a:3563_12: samannāgato medhāvī vinicchayadhamme ṭhitattā dhammaṭṭhoti pavuccatīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3567: Na tena paṇḍito hotīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto chabbaggiye ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3568_0: Te kira vihārepi gāmepi bhattaggaṃ ākulaṃ karontā vicaranti. Athekadivase bhikkhū
