atk-s0502a:3568_1: gāme bhattakiccaṃ katvā āgate dahare sāmaṇere ca pucchiṃsu – “kīdisaṃ, āvuso, bhattagga”nti?
atk-s0502a:3568_2: Bhante, mā pucchatha, chabbaggiyā “mayameva viyattā, mayameva paṇḍitā, ime paharitvā
atk-s0502a:3568_3: sīse kacavaraṃ ākiritvā nīharissāmā”ti vatvā amhe piṭṭhiyaṃ gahetvā kacavaraṃ okirantā
atk-s0502a:3568_4: bhattaggaṃ ākulaṃ akaṃsūti. Bhikkhū satthu santikaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Satthā
atk-s0502a:3568_5: “nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, bahuṃ bhāsitvā pare viheṭhayamānaṃ ‘paṇḍito’ti vadāmi, kheminaṃ
atk-s0502a:3568_6: pana averīnaṃ abhayameva paṇḍitoti vadāmī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3570: “Na tena paṇḍito hoti, yāvatā bahu bhāsati;
atk-s0502a:3572_0: Tattha yāvatāti yattakena kāraṇena saṅghamajjhādīsu bahuṃ katheti, tena paṇḍito nāma
atk-s0502a:3572_1: na hoti. Yo pana sayaṃ khemī pañcannaṃ verānaṃ abhāvena averī nibbhayo, yaṃ vā āgamma
atk-s0502a:3572_2: mahājanassa bhayaṃ na hoti, so paṇḍito nāma hotīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3576: Na tāvatāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekudānattheraṃ nāma khīṇāsavaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3577: So kira ekakova ekasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe viharati, ekamevassa udānaṃ paguṇaṃ –
atk-s0502a:3582_0: So kira uposathadivasesu sayameva dhammassavanaṃ ghosetvā imaṃ gāthaṃ vadati. Pathaviundriyanasaddo
atk-s0502a:3582_1: viya devatānaṃ sādhukārasaddo hoti. Athekasmiṃ uposathadivase pañcapañcasataparivārā
atk-s0502a:3582_2: dve tipiṭakadharā bhikkhū tassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ agamaṃsu. So te disvāva tuṭṭhamānaso
atk-s0502a:3582_3: “sādhu vo kataṃ idha āgacchantehi, ajja mayaṃ tumhākaṃ dhammaṃ suṇissāmā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:3582_4: Atthi pana, āvuso, idha dhammaṃ sotukāmāti. Atthi, bhante, ayaṃ vanasaṇḍo dhammassavanadivase
atk-s0502a:3582_5: devatānaṃ sādhukārasaddena ekaninnādo hotīti. Tesu eko tipiṭakadharo dhammaṃ osāresi,
atk-s0502a:3582_6: eko kathesi. Ekadevatāpi sādhukāraṃ nādāsi. Te āhaṃsu – “tvaṃ, āvuso, dhammassavanadivase
atk-s0502a:3582_7: imasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe devatā mahantena saddena sādhukāraṃ dentīti vadesi, kiṃ nāmeta”nti.
atk-s0502a:3582_8: Bhante, aññesu divasesu sādhukārasaddena ekaninnādo eva hoti, na ajja pana jānāmi
atk-s0502a:3582_9: “kimeta”nti. “Tena hi, āvuso, tvaṃ tāva dhammaṃ kathehī”ti. So bījaniṃ gahetvā āsane
atk-s0502a:3582_10: nisinno tameva gāthaṃ vadesi. Devatā mahantena saddena sādhukāramadaṃsu. Atha nesaṃ
atk-s0502a:3582_11: parivārā bhikkhū ujjhāyiṃsu “imasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe devatā mukholokanena sādhukāraṃ dadanti,
atk-s0502a:3582_12: tipiṭakadharabhikkhūsu ettakaṃ bhaṇantesupi kiñci pasaṃsanamattampi avatvā ekena
atk-s0502a:3582_13: mahallakattherena ekagāthāya kathitāya mahāsaddena sādhukāraṃ dadantī”ti. Tepi vihāraṃ
atk-s0502a:3583_0: Satthā “nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, yo bahumpi uggaṇhati vā bhāsati vā, taṃ dhammadharoti vadāmi.
atk-s0502a:3583_1: Yo pana ekampi gāthaṃ uggaṇhitvā saccāni paṭivijjhati, ayaṃ dhammadharo nāmā”ti vatvā
atk-s0502a:3586: Yo ca appampi sutvāna, dhammaṃ kāyena passati;
atk-s0502a:3587: Sa ve dhammadharo hoti, yo dhammaṃ nappamajjatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:3588_0: Tattha yāvatāti yattakena uggahaṇadhāraṇavācanādinā kāraṇena bahuṃ bhāsati, tāvattakena
atk-s0502a:3588_1: dhammadharo na hoti, vaṃsānurakkhako pana paveṇipālako nāma hoti. Yo ca appampīti
atk-s0502a:3588_2: yo pana appamattakampi sutvā dhammamanvāya atthamanvāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno
atk-s0502a:3588_3: hutvā nāmakāyena dukkhādīni parijānanto catusaccadhammaṃ passati, sa ve dhammadharo
atk-s0502a:3588_4: hoti. Yo dhammaṃ nappamajjatīti yopi āraddhavīriyo hutvā ajja ajjevāti paṭivedhaṃ
atk-s0502a:3588_5: ākaṅkhanto dhammaṃ nappamajjati, ayampi dhammadharoyevāti attho.
atk-s0502a:3592: Na tena thero so hotīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto lakuṇḍakabhaddiyattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3593_0: Ekadivasañhi tasmiṃ there satthu upaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā pakkantamatte tiṃsamattā āraññikā
atk-s0502a:3593_1: bhikkhū taṃ passantā eva āgantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā nisīdiṃsu. Satthā tesaṃ arahattūpanissayaṃ
atk-s0502a:3593_2: disvā imaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi – “ito gataṃ ekaṃ theraṃ passathā”ti? “Na passāma, bhante”ti.
atk-s0502a:3593_3: “Kiṃ nu diṭṭho vo”ti? “Ekaṃ, bhante, sāmaṇeraṃ passimhā”ti. “Na so, bhikkhave, sāmaṇero,
atk-s0502a:3593_4: thero eva so”ti? “Ativiya khuddako, bhante”ti. “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, mahallakabhāvena
atk-s0502a:3593_5: therāsane nisinnamattakena theroti vadāmi. Yo pana saccāni paṭivijjhitvā mahājanassa
atk-s0502a:3593_6: ahiṃsakabhāve ṭhito, ayaṃ thero nāmā”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3595: “Na tena thero so hoti, yenassa palitaṃ siro;
atk-s0502a:3598: “Yamhi saccañca dhammo ca, ahiṃsā saṃyamo damo;
atk-s0502a:3599: Sa ve vantamalo dhīro, thero iti pavuccatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:3600_0: Tattha paripakkoti pariṇato, vuḍḍhabhāvaṃ pattoti attho. Moghajiṇṇoti anto therakarānaṃ
atk-s0502a:3600_1: dhammānaṃ abhāvena tucchajiṇṇo nāma. Yamhi saccañca dhammo cāti yamhi pana puggale
atk-s0502a:3600_2: soḷasahākārehi paṭividdhattā catubbidhaṃ saccaṃ, ñāṇena sacchikatattā navavidho lokuttaradhammo
atk-s0502a:3600_3: ca atthi. Ahiṃsāti ahiṃsanabhāvo. Desanāmattametaṃ, yamhi pana catubbidhāpi appamaññābhāvanā
atk-s0502a:3600_4: atthīti attho. Saṃyamo damoti sīlañceva indriyasaṃvaro ca. Vantamaloti maggañāṇena
atk-s0502a:3600_5: nīhaṭamalo. Dhīroti dhitisampanno. Theroti so imehi thirabhāvakārakehi samannāgatattā
atk-s0502a:3604: Na vākkaraṇamattenāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3605_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye dahare ceva sāmaṇere ca attano dhammācariyānameva cīvararajanādīni
atk-s0502a:3605_1: veyyāvaccāni karonte disvā ekacce therā cintayiṃsu – “mayampi byañjanasamaye kusalā,
atk-s0502a:3605_2: amhākameva kiñci natthi. Yaṃnūna mayaṃ satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadeyyāma, ‘bhante,
atk-s0502a:3605_3: mayaṃ byañjanasamaye kusalā, aññesaṃ santike dhammaṃ uggaṇhitvāpi imesaṃ santike
atk-s0502a:3605_4: asodhetvā mā sajjhāyitthāti daharasāmaṇere āṇāpethā’ti. Evañhi amhākaṃ lābhasakkāro
atk-s0502a:3605_5: vaḍḍhissatī”ti. Te satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā tathā vadiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3606_0: Satthā tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā “imasmiṃ sāsane paveṇivaseneva evaṃ vattuṃ labhati, ime
atk-s0502a:3606_1: pana lābhasakkāre nissitāti ñatvā ahaṃ tumhe vākkaraṇamattena sādhurūpāti na vadāmi.
atk-s0502a:3606_2: Yassa panete issādayo dhammā arahattamaggena samucchinnā, eso eva sādhurūpo”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3609: Sādhurūpo naro hoti, issukī maccharī saṭho.
atk-s0502a:3613_1: Vaṇṇapokkharatāya vāti sarīravaṇṇassa manāpabhāvena vā. Naroti ettakeneva kāraṇena
atk-s0502a:3613_2: paralābhādīsu issāmanako pañcavidhena maccherena samannāgato kerāṭikabhāvena saṭho
atk-s0502a:3613_3: naro sādhurūpo na hoti. Yassa cetanti yassa ca puggalassetaṃ issādidosajātaṃ arahattamaggañāṇena
atk-s0502a:3613_4: samūlakaṃ chinnaṃ, mūlaghātaṃ katvā samūhataṃ, so vantadoso dhammojapaññāya samannāgato
atk-s0502a:3617: Na muṇḍakena samaṇoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā sāvatthiyaṃ viharanto hatthakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3618_0: So kira vādakkhitto “tumhe asukavelāya asukaṭṭhānaṃ nāma āgaccheyyātha, vādaṃ karissāmā”ti
atk-s0502a:3618_1: vatvā puretarameva tattha gantvā “passatha, titthiyā mama bhayena nāgatā, esova pana
atk-s0502a:3618_2: nesaṃ parājayo”tiādīni vatvā vādakkhitto aññenaññaṃ paṭicaranto vicarati. Satthā
atk-s0502a:3618_3: “hatthako kira evaṃ karotī”ti sutvā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, hatthaka,
atk-s0502a:3618_4: evaṃ karosī”ti pucchitvā “sacca”nti vutte, “kasmā evaṃ karosi? Evarūpañhi musāvādaṃ
atk-s0502a:3618_5: karonto sīsamuṇḍanādimatteneva samaṇo nāma na hoti. Yo pana aṇūni vā thūlāni vā pāpāni
atk-s0502a:3618_6: sametvā ṭhito, ayameva samaṇo”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3623: “Yo ca sameti pāpāni, aṇuṃ thūlāni sabbaso;
atk-s0502a:3625_0: Tattha muṇḍakenāti sīsamuṇḍanamattena. Abbatoti sīlavatena ca dhutaṅgavatena ca virahito.
atk-s0502a:3625_1: Alikaṃ bhaṇanti musāvādaṃ bhaṇanto asampattesu ārammaṇesu icchāya pattesu ca lobhena
atk-s0502a:3625_2: samannāgato samaṇo nāma kiṃ bhavissati? Sametīti yo ca parittāni vā mahantāni vā
atk-s0502a:3625_3: pāpāni vūpasameti, so tesaṃ samitattā samaṇoti pavuccatīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3629: Na tena bhikkhu so hotīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3630_0: So kira bāhirasamaye pabbajitvā bhikkhaṃ caranto cintesi – “samaṇo gotamo attano
atk-s0502a:3630_1: sāvake bhikkhāya caraṇena ‘bhikkhū’ti vadati, mampi ‘bhikkhū’ti vattuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:3630_2: So satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “bho gotama, ahampi bhikkhaṃ caritvā jīvāmi, mampi ‘bhikkhū’ti
atk-s0502a:3630_3: vadehī”ti āha. Atha naṃ satthā “nāhaṃ, brāhmaṇa, bhikkhanamattena bhikkhūti vadāmi.
atk-s0502a:3630_4: Na hi vissaṃ dhammaṃ samādāya vattanto bhikkhu nāma hoti. Yo pana sabbasaṅkhāresu
atk-s0502a:3630_5: saṅkhāya carati, so bhikkhu nāmā”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3632: “Na tena bhikkhu so hoti, yāvatā bhikkhate pare;
atk-s0502a:3633: Vissaṃ dhammaṃ samādāya, bhikkhu hoti na tāvatā.
atk-s0502a:3636: Saṅkhāya loke carati, sa ve bhikkhūti vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:3637_0: Tattha yāvatāti yattakena pare bhikkhate, tena bhikkhanamattena bhikkhu nāma na hoti.
atk-s0502a:3637_1: Vissanti visamaṃ dhammaṃ, vissagandhaṃ vā kāyakammādikaṃ dhammaṃ samādāya caranto
atk-s0502a:3637_2: bhikkhu nāma na hoti. Yodhāti yo idha sāsane ubhayampetaṃ puññañca pāpañca maggabrahmacariyena
atk-s0502a:3637_3: bāhetvā panuditvā brahmacariyavā hoti. Saṅkhāyāti ñāṇena. Loketi khandhādiloke “ime
atk-s0502a:3637_4: ajjhattikā khandhā, ime bāhirā”ti evaṃ sabbepi dhamme jānitvā carati, so tena ñāṇena
atk-s0502a:3641: Na monenāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto titthiye ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3642_0: Te kira bhuttaṭṭhānesu manussānaṃ “khemaṃ hotu, sukhaṃ hotu, āyu vaḍḍhatu, asukaṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a:3642_1: nāma kalalaṃ atthi, asukaṭṭhāne nāma kaṇṭako atthi, evarūpaṃ ṭhānaṃ gantuṃ na vaṭṭatī”tiādinā
atk-s0502a:3642_2: nayena maṅgalaṃ vatvā pakkamanti. Bhikkhū pana paṭhamabodhiyaṃ anumodanādīnaṃ ananuññātakāle
atk-s0502a:3642_3: bhattagge manussānaṃ anumodanaṃ akatvā pakkamanti. Manussā “titthiyānaṃ santikā maṅgalaṃ
atk-s0502a:3642_4: suṇāma, bhaddantā pana tuṇhībhūtā pakkamantī”ti ujjhāyiṃsu. Bhikkhū tamatthaṃ satthu
atk-s0502a:3642_5: ārocesuṃ. Satthā, “bhikkhave, ito paṭṭhāya bhattaggādīsu yathāsukhaṃ anumodanaṃ karotha,
atk-s0502a:3642_6: upanisinnakathaṃ karotha, dhammaṃ kathethā”ti anujāni. Te tathā kariṃsu. Manussā
atk-s0502a:3642_7: anumodanādīni suṇantā ussāhappattā bhikkhū nimantetvā sakkāraṃ karontā vicaranti.
atk-s0502a:3642_8: Titthiyā pana “mayaṃ munino monaṃ karoma, samaṇassa gotamassa sāvakā bhattaggādīsu
atk-s0502a:3643_0: Satthā tamatthaṃ sutvā “nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, tuṇhībhāvamattena ‘munī’ti vadāmi. Ekacce
atk-s0502a:3643_1: hi ajānantā na kathenti, ekacce avisāradatāya, ekacce ‘mā no imaṃ atisayatthaṃ aññe
atk-s0502a:3643_2: jāniṃsū’ti maccherena. Tasmā monamattena muni na hoti, pāpavūpasamena pana muni nāma
atk-s0502a:3646: Yo ca tulaṃva paggayha, varamādāya paṇḍito.
atk-s0502a:3648: “Pāpāni parivajjeti, sa munī tena so muni;
atk-s0502a:3649: Yo munāti ubho loke, muni tena pavuccatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:3650_0: Tattha na monenāti kāmañhi moneyyapaṭipadāsaṅkhātena maggañāṇamonena muni nāma hoti,
atk-s0502a:3650_1: idha pana tuṇhībhāvaṃ sandhāya “monenā”ti vuttaṃ. Mūḷharūpoti tuccharūpo. Aviddasūti
atk-s0502a:3650_2: aviññū. Evarūpo hi tuṇhībhūtopi muni nāma na hoti. Atha vā monena muni nāma na hoti,
atk-s0502a:3650_3: tucchasabhāvo pana aviññū ca hotīti attho. Yo ca tulaṃva pagayhāti yathā hi tulaṃ
atk-s0502a:3650_4: gahetvā ṭhito atirekaṃ ce hoti, harati. Ūnaṃ ce hoti, pakkhipati. Evameva yo atirekaṃ
atk-s0502a:3650_5: haranto viya pāpaṃ harati parivajjeti, ūnake pakkhipanto viya kusalaṃ paripūreti.
atk-s0502a:3650_7: ādāya pāpāni akusalakammāni parivajjeti. Sa munīti so muni nāmāti attho. Tena so
atk-s0502a:3650_8: munīti kasmā pana so munīti ce? Yaṃ heṭṭhā vuttakāraṇaṃ, tena so munīti attho. So
atk-s0502a:3650_9: munāti ubho loketi yo puggalo imasmiṃ khandhādiloke tulaṃ āropetvā minanto viya “ime
atk-s0502a:3650_10: ajjhattikā khandhā, ime bāhirā”tiādinā nayena ime ubho atthe munāti. Muni tena pavuccatīti
atk-s0502a:3654: Na tena ariyo hotīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ ariyaṃ nāma bālisikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3655_0: Ekadivasañhi satthā tassa sotāpattimaggassūpanissayaṃ disvā sāvatthiyā uttaradvāragāme
atk-s0502a:3655_1: piṇḍāya caritvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto tato āgacchati. Tasmiṃ khaṇe so bālisiko balisena
atk-s0502a:3655_2: macche gaṇhanto buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ disvā balisayaṭṭhiṃ chaḍḍetvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:3655_3: Satthā tassa avidūre ṭhāne nivattitvā ṭhito “tvaṃ kiṃ nāmosī”ti sāriputtattherādīnaṃ
atk-s0502a:3655_4: nāmāni pucchi. Tepi “ahaṃ sāriputto ahaṃ moggallāno”ti attano attano nāmāni kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3655_5: Bālisiko cintesi – “satthā sabbesaṃ nāmāni pucchati, mamampi nāmaṃ pucchissati maññe”ti.
atk-s0502a:3655_6: Satthā tassa icchaṃ ñatvā, “upāsaka, tvaṃ ko nāmosī”ti pucchitvā “ahaṃ, bhante, ariyo
atk-s0502a:3655_7: nāmā”ti vutte “na, upāsaka, tādisā pāṇātipātino ariyā nāma honti, ariyā pana mahājanassa
atk-s0502a:3657: “Na tena ariyo hoti, yena pāṇāni hiṃsati;
atk-s0502a:3659_0: Tattha ahiṃsāti ahiṃsanena. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yena hi pāṇāni hiṃsati, na tena kāraṇena
atk-s0502a:3659_1: ariyo hoti. Yo pana sabbapāṇānaṃ pāṇiādīhi ahiṃsanena mettādibhāvanāya patiṭṭhitattā
atk-s0502a:3659_2: hiṃsato ārāva ṭhito, ayaṃ ariyoti vuccatīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3660: Desanāvasāne bālisiko sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:3663: Na sīlabbatamattenāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sambahule sīlādisampanne bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3664_0: Tesu kira ekaccānaṃ evaṃ ahosi – “mayaṃ sampannasīlā, mayaṃ dhutaṅgadharā, mayaṃ
atk-s0502a:3664_1: bahussutā, mayaṃ pantasenāsanavāsino, mayaṃ jhānalābhino, na amhākaṃ arahattaṃ dullabhaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3664_2: icchitadivaseyeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇissāmā”ti. Yepi tattha anāgāmino, tesampi etadahosi
atk-s0502a:3664_3: – “na amhākaṃ idāni arahattaṃ dullabha”nti. Te sabbepi ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0502a:3664_4: vanditvā nisinnā “api nu kho vo, bhikkhave, pabbajitakiccaṃ matthakaṃ patta”nti satthārā
atk-s0502a:3664_5: puṭṭhā evamāhaṃsu – “bhante, mayaṃ evarūpā evarūpā ca, tasmā ‘icchiticchitakkhaṇeyeva
atk-s0502a:3665_0: Satthā tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā, “bhikkhave, bhikkhunā nāma parisuddhasīlādimattakena
atk-s0502a:3665_1: vā anāgāmisukhappattamattakena vā ‘appakaṃ no bhavadukkha’nti vattuṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0502a:3665_2: āsavakkhayaṃ pana appatvā ‘sukhitomhī’ti cittaṃ na uppādetabba”nti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3672_0: Tattha sīlabbatamattenāti catupārisuddhisīlamattena vā terasadhutaṅgamattena vā.
atk-s0502a:3672_1: Bāhusaccena vāti tiṇṇaṃ piṭakānaṃ uggahitamattena vā. Samādhilābhenāti aṭṭhasamāpattiyā
atk-s0502a:3672_2: lābhena. Nekkhammasukhanti anāgāmisukhaṃ. Taṃ anāgāmisukhaṃ phusāmīti ettakamattena
atk-s0502a:3672_3: vā. Aputhujjanasevitanti puthujjanehi asevitaṃ ariyasevitameva. Bhikkhūti tesaṃ aññataraṃ
atk-s0502a:3672_4: ālapanto āha. Vissāsamāpādīti vissāsaṃ na āpajjeyya. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – bhikkhu iminā
atk-s0502a:3672_6: arahattaṃ appatto hutvā bhikkhu nāma vissāsaṃ nāpajjeyya. Yathā hi appamattakopi
atk-s0502a:3672_7: gūtho duggandho hoti, evaṃ appamattakopi bhavo dukkhoti.
atk-s0502a:3673: Desanāvasāne te bhikkhū arahatte patiṭṭhahaṃsu, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:3679: Maggānaṭṭhaṅgikoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto pañcasate bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3680_0: Te kira satthari janapadacārikaṃ caritvā puna sāvatthiṃ āgate upaṭṭhānasālāya nisīditvā
atk-s0502a:3680_1: “asukagāmato asukagāmassa maggo samo, asukagāmassa maggo visamo, sasakkharo, asakkharo”tiādinā
atk-s0502a:3680_2: nayena attano vicaritamaggaṃ ārabbha maggakathaṃ kathesuṃ. Satthā tesaṃ arahattassūpanissayaṃ
atk-s0502a:3680_3: disvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ āgantvā paññattāsane nisinno “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya
atk-s0502a:3680_4: sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte, “bhikkhave, ayaṃ bāhirakamaggo, bhikkhunā
atk-s0502a:3680_5: nāma ariyamagge kammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati, evañhi karonto bhikkhu sabbadukkhā pamuccatī”ti
atk-s0502a:3689: Akkhāto vo mayā maggo, aññāya sallakantanaṃ.
atk-s0502a:3693_0: Tattha maggānaṭṭhaṅgikoti jaṅghamaggādayo vā hontu dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatamaggā vā,
atk-s0502a:3693_1: tesaṃ sabbesampi maggānaṃ sammādiṭṭhiādīhi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi micchādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ
atk-s0502a:3693_2: pahānaṃ karonto nirodhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā catūsupi saccesu dukkhaparijānanādikiccaṃ
atk-s0502a:3693_3: sādhayamāno aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo seṭṭho uttamo. Saccānaṃ caturo padāti “saccaṃ bhaṇe
atk-s0502a:3693_4: na kujjheyyā”ti āgataṃ vacīsaccaṃ vā hotu, “sacco brāhmaṇo sacco khattiyo”tiādibhedaṃ
atk-s0502a:3693_5: sammutisaccaṃ vā “idameva saccaṃ moghamañña”nti diṭṭhisaccaṃ vā “dukkhaṃ ariyasacca”ntiādibhedaṃ
atk-s0502a:3693_6: paramatthasaccaṃ vā hotu, sabbesampi imesaṃ saccānaṃ parijānitabbaṭṭhena sacchikātabbaṭṭhena
atk-s0502a:3693_7: pahātabbaṭṭhena bhāvetabbaṭṭhena ekapaṭivedhaṭṭhena ca tathapaṭivedhaṭṭhena ca dukkhaṃ
atk-s0502a:3693_8: ariyasaccantiādayo caturo padā seṭṭhā nāma. Virāgo seṭṭho dhammānanti “yāvatā, bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a:3693_9: dhammā saṅkhatā vā asaṅkhatā vā, virāgo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”ti vacanato sabbadhammānaṃ
atk-s0502a:3693_10: nibbānasaṅkhāto virāgo seṭṭho. Dvipadānañca cakkhumāti sabbesaṃ devamanussādibhedānaṃ
atk-s0502a:3693_11: dvipadānaṃ pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumā tathāgatova seṭṭho. Ca-saddo sampiṇḍanattho,
atk-s0502a:3693_12: arūpadhamme sampiṇḍeti. Tasmā arūpadhammānampi tathāgato seṭṭho uttamo.
atk-s0502a:3694_0: Dassanassa visuddhiyāti maggaphaladassanassa visuddhatthaṃ yo mayā “seṭṭho”ti vutto,
atk-s0502a:3694_1: esova maggo, natthañño. Etañhi tumheti tasmā tumhe etameva paṭipajjatha. Mārassetaṃ
atk-s0502a:3694_2: pamohananti etaṃ māramohanaṃ māramanthananti vuccati. Dukkhassantanti sakalassapi
atk-s0502a:3694_3: vaṭṭadukkhassa antaṃ paricchedaṃ karissathāti attho. Aññāya sallakantananti rāgasallādīnaṃ
atk-s0502a:3694_4: kantanaṃ nimmathanaṃ abbūhaṇaṃ etaṃ maggaṃ, mayā vinā anussavādīhi attapaccakkhato
atk-s0502a:3694_5: ñatvāva ayaṃ maggo akkhāto, idāni tumhehi kilesānaṃ ātāpanena “ātappa”nti saṅkhaṃ
atk-s0502a:3694_6: gataṃ tassa adhigamatthāya sammappadhānavīriyaṃ kiccaṃ karaṇīyaṃ. Kevalañhi akkhātārova
atk-s0502a:3694_7: tathāgatā. Tasmā tehi akkhātavasena ye paṭipannā dvīhi jhānehi jhāyino, te tebhūmakavaṭṭasaṅkhātā
atk-s0502a:3695: Desanāvasāne te bhikkhū arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:3698: Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto pañcasate bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3699_0: Te kira satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā gantvā araññe vāyamantāpi arahattaṃ appatvā
atk-s0502a:3699_1: “visesetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggaṇhissāmā”ti satthu santikaṃ āgamiṃsu. Satthā “kiṃ nu
atk-s0502a:3699_2: kho imesaṃ sappāya”nti vīmaṃsanto “ime kassapabuddhakāle vīsati vassasahassāni aniccalakkhaṇe
atk-s0502a:3699_3: anuyuñjiṃsu, tasmā aniccalakkhaṇeneva tesaṃ ekaṃ gāthaṃ desetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā,
atk-s0502a:3699_4: “bhikkhave, kāmabhavādīsu sabbepi saṅkhārā hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccā evā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3702: Atha nibbindati dukkhe, esa maggo visuddhiyā”ti.
atk-s0502a:3703_0: Tattha sabbe saṅkhārāti kāmabhavādīsu uppannā khandhā tattha tattheva nirujjhanato
atk-s0502a:3703_1: aniccāti yadā vipassanāpaññāya passati, atha imasmiṃ khandhapariharaṇadukkhe nibbindati,
atk-s0502a:3703_2: nibbindanto dukkhaparijānanādivasena saccāni paṭivijjhati. Esa maggo visuddhiyāti
atk-s0502a:3704: Desanāvasāne te bhikkhū arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu, sampattaparisānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:3707_0: Dutiyagāthāyapi evarūpameva vatthu. Tadā hi bhagavā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dukkhalakkhaṇe
atk-s0502a:3707_1: katābhiyogabhāvaṃ ñatvā, “bhikkhave, sabbepi khandhā paṭipīḷanaṭṭhena dukkhā evā”ti
atk-s0502a:3710: Atha nibbindati dukkhe, esa maggo visuddhiyā”ti.
atk-s0502a:3711: Tattha dukkhāti paṭipīḷanaṭṭhena dukkhā. Sesaṃ purimasadisameva.
atk-s0502a:3714_0: Tatiyagāthāyapi eseva nayo. Kevalañhi ettha bhagavā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pubbe anattalakkhaṇe
atk-s0502a:3714_1: anuyuttabhāvaṃ ñatvā, “bhikkhave, sabbepi khandhā avasavattanaṭṭhena anattā evā”ti
atk-s0502a:3717: Atha nibbindati dukkhe, esa maggo visuddhiyā”ti.
atk-s0502a:3718_0: Tattha sabbe dhammāti pañcakkhandhā eva adhippetā. Anattāti “mā jīyantu mā mīyantū”ti
atk-s0502a:3718_1: vase vattetuṃ na sakkāti avasavattanaṭṭhena anattā attasuññā assāmikā anissarāti
atk-s0502a:3721: Uṭṭhānakālamhīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto padhānakammikatissattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3722_0: Sāvatthivāsino kira pañcasatā kulaputtā satthu santike pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0502a:3722_1: araññaṃ agamaṃsu. Tesu eko tattheva ohīyi. Avasesā araññe samaṇadhammaṃ karontā arahattaṃ
atk-s0502a:3722_2: patvā “paṭiladdhaguṇaṃ satthu ārocessāmā”ti puna sāvatthiṃ agamaṃsu. Te sāvatthito
atk-s0502a:3722_3: yojanamatte ekasmiṃ gāmake piṇḍāya carante disvā eko upāsako yāgubhattādīhi patimānetvā
atk-s0502a:3722_4: anumodanaṃ sutvā punadivasatthāyapi nimantesi. Te tadaheva sāvatthiṃ gantvā pattacīvaraṃ
atk-s0502a:3722_5: paṭisāmetvā sāyanhasamaye satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu. Satthā
atk-s0502a:3722_6: tehi saddhiṃ ativiya tuṭṭhiṃ pavedayamāno paṭisanthāraṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a:3723_0: Atha nesaṃ tattha ohīno sahāyakabhikkhu cintesi – “satthu imehi saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:3723_1: karontassa mukhaṃ nappahoti, mayhaṃ pana maggaphalābhāvena mayā saddhiṃ na katheti,
atk-s0502a:3723_2: ajjeva arahattaṃ patvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā mayā saddhiṃ kathāpessāmī”ti. Tepi
atk-s0502a:3723_3: bhikkhū, “bhante, mayaṃ āgamanamagge ekena upāsakena svātanāya nimantitā, tattha
atk-s0502a:3723_4: pātova gamissāmā”ti satthāraṃ apalokesuṃ. Atha nesaṃ sahāyako bhikkhu sabbarattiṃ
atk-s0502a:3723_5: caṅkamanto niddāvasena caṅkamakoṭiyaṃ ekasmiṃ pāsāṇaphalake pati, ūruṭṭhi bhijji.
atk-s0502a:3723_6: So mahāsaddena viravi. Tassa te sahāyakā bhikkhū saddaṃ sañjānitvā ito cito ca upadhāviṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3723_7: Tesaṃ dīpaṃ jāletvā tassa kattabbakiccaṃ karontānaṃyeva aruṇo uṭṭhahi, te taṃ gāmaṃ
atk-s0502a:3723_8: gantuṃ okāsaṃ na labhiṃsu. Atha ne satthā āha – “kiṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhācāragāmaṃ
atk-s0502a:3723_9: na gamitthā”ti. Te “āma, bhante”ti taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ. Satthā “na, bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a:3723_10: esa idāneva tumhākaṃ lābhantarāyaṃ karoti, pubbepi akāsiyevā”ti vatvā tehi yācito atītaṃ āharitvā –
atk-s0502a:3726: Jātakaṃ vitthāresi. Tadā kira te bhikkhū pañcasatā māṇavakā ahesuṃ, kusītamāṇavako ayaṃ bhikkhu ahosi, ācariyo pana tathāgatova ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:3727: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā, “bhikkhave, yo hi uṭṭhānakāle uṭṭhānaṃ na karoti, saṃsannasaṅkappo hoti, kusīto so jhānādibhedaṃ visesaṃ nādhigacchatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3733_0: Tattha anuṭṭhahānoti anuṭṭhahanto avāyamanto. Yuvā balīti paṭhamayobbane ṭhito balasampannopi
atk-s0502a:3733_1: hutvā alasabhāvena upeto hoti, bhutvā sayati. Saṃsannasaṅkappamanoti tīhi micchāvitakkehi
atk-s0502a:3733_2: suṭṭhu avasannasammāsaṅkappacitto. Kusītoti nibbīriyo. Alasoti mahāalaso paññāya
atk-s0502a:3733_3: daṭṭhabbaṃ ariyamaggaṃ apassanto na vindati, na paṭilabhatīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3737: Vācānurakkhīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto sūkarapetaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3738_0: Ekasmiñhi divase mahāmoggallānatthero lakkhaṇattherena saddhiṃ gijjhakūṭā orohanto
atk-s0502a:3738_1: ekasmiṃ padese sitaṃ pātvākāsi. “Ko nu kho, āvuso, hetu sitassa pātukammāyā”ti lakkhaṇattherena
atk-s0502a:3738_2: puṭṭho “akālo, āvuso, imassa pañhassa, satthu santike maṃ puccheyyāthā”ti vatvā lakkhaṇattherena
atk-s0502a:3738_3: saddhiṃyeva rājagahe piṇḍāya caritvā piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto veḷuvanaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:3738_4: vanditvā nisīdi. Atha naṃ lakkhaṇatthero tamatthaṃ pucchi. So āha – “āvuso, ahaṃ
atk-s0502a:3738_5: ekaṃ petaṃ addasaṃ, tassa tigāvutappamāṇaṃ sarīraṃ, taṃ manussasarīrasadisaṃ. Sīsaṃ
atk-s0502a:3738_6: pana sūkarassa viya, tassa mukhe naṅguṭṭhaṃ jātaṃ, tato puḷavā paggharanti. Svāhaṃ
atk-s0502a:3738_7: ‘na me evarūpo satto diṭṭhapubbo’ti taṃ disvā sitaṃ pātvākāsi”nti. Satthā “cakkhubhūtā
atk-s0502a:3738_8: vata, bhikkhave, mama sāvakā viharantī”ti vatvā “ahampetaṃ sattaṃ bodhimaṇḍeyeva
atk-s0502a:3738_9: addasaṃ. ‘Ye pana me na saddaheyyuṃ, tesaṃ ahitāya assā’ti paresaṃ anukampāya na
atk-s0502a:3738_10: kathesiṃ. Idāni moggallānaṃ sakkhiṃ katvā kathemi. Saccaṃ, bhikkhave, moggallāno
atk-s0502a:3738_11: āhā”ti kathesi. Taṃ sutvā bhikkhū satthāraṃ pucchiṃsu – “kiṃ pana, bhante, tassa
atk-s0502a:3738_12: pubbakamma”nti. Satthā “tena hi, bhikkhave, suṇāthā”ti atītaṃ āharitvā tassa pubbakammaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3739_0: Kassapabuddhakāle kira ekasmiṃ gāmakāvāse dve therā samaggavāsaṃ vasiṃsu. Tesu eko
atk-s0502a:3739_1: saṭṭhivasso, eko ekūnasaṭṭhivasso. Ekūnasaṭṭhivasso itarassa pattacīvaraṃ ādāya vicari,
atk-s0502a:3739_2: sāmaṇero viya sabbaṃ vattapaṭivattaṃ akāsi. Tesaṃ ekamātukucchiyaṃ vutthabhātūnaṃ
atk-s0502a:3739_3: viya samaggavāsaṃ vasantānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ eko dhammakathiko āgami. Tadā ca dhammassavanadivaso
atk-s0502a:3739_4: hoti. Therā naṃ saṅgaṇhitvā “dhammakathaṃ no kathehi sappurisā”ti āhaṃsu. So dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0502a:3739_5: kathesi. Therā “dhammakathiko no laddho”ti tuṭṭhacittā punadivase taṃ ādāya dhuragāmaṃ
atk-s0502a:3739_6: piṇḍāya pavisitvā tattha katabhattakiccā, “āvuso, hiyyo kathitaṭṭhānatova thokaṃ
atk-s0502a:3739_7: dhammaṃ kathehī”ti manussānaṃ dhammaṃ kathāpesuṃ. Manussā dhammakathaṃ sutvā punadivasatthāyapi
atk-s0502a:3739_8: nimantayiṃsu. Evaṃ samantā bhikkhācāragāmesu dve dve divase taṃ ādāya piṇḍāya cariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3740_0: Dhammakathiko cintesi – “ime dvepi atimudukā, mayā ubhopete palāpetvā imasmiṃ vihāre
atk-s0502a:3740_1: vasituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. So sāyaṃ therūpaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā bhikkhūnaṃ uṭṭhāya gatakāle nivattitvā
atk-s0502a:3740_2: mahātheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “bhante, kiñci vattabbaṃ atthī”ti vatvā “kathehi, āvuso”ti
atk-s0502a:3740_3: vutte thokaṃ cintetvā, “bhante, kathā nāmesā mahāsāvajjā”ti vatvā akathetvāva pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:3740_4: Anutherassāpi santikaṃ gantvā tatheva akāsi. So dutiyadivase tatheva katvā tatiyadivase
atk-s0502a:3740_5: tesaṃ ativiya kotuhale uppanne mahātheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “bhante, kiñci vattabbaṃ
atk-s0502a:3740_6: atthi, tumhākaṃ pana santike vattuṃ na visahāmī”ti vatvā therena “hotu, āvuso, kathehī”ti
atk-s0502a:3740_7: nippīḷito āha – “kiṃ pana, bhante, anuthero tumhehi saddhiṃ saṃbhogo”ti. Sappurisa,
atk-s0502a:3740_8: kiṃ nāmetaṃ kathesi, mayaṃ ekamātukucchiyaṃ vutthaputtā viya, amhesu ekena yaṃ laddhaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3740_9: itarenāpi laddhameva hoti. Mayā etassa ettakaṃ kālaṃ aguṇo nāma na diṭṭhapubboti?
atk-s0502a:3740_10: Evaṃ, bhanteti. Āmāvusoti. Bhante maṃ anuthero evamāha – “sappurisa, tvaṃ kulaputto,
atk-s0502a:3740_11: ayaṃ mahāthero lajjī pesaloti etena saddhiṃ saṃbhogaṃ karonto upaparikkhitvā kareyyāsī”ti
atk-s0502a:3741_0: Mahāthero taṃ sutvāva kuddhamānaso daṇḍābhihataṃ kulālabhājanaṃ viya bhijji. Itaropi
atk-s0502a:3741_1: uṭṭhāya anutherassa santikaṃ gantvā tatheva avoca, sopi tatheva bhijji. Tesu kiñcāpi
atk-s0502a:3741_2: ettakaṃ kālaṃ ekopi visuṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhapubbo nāma natthi, punadivase pana visuṃ
atk-s0502a:3741_3: piṇḍāya pavisitvā anuthero puretaraṃ āgantvā upaṭṭhānasālāya aṭṭhāsi, mahāthero pacchā
atk-s0502a:3741_4: agamāsi. Taṃ disvā anuthero cintesi – “kiṃ nu kho imassa pattacīvaraṃ paṭiggahetabbaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3741_5: udāhu no”ti. So “na idāni paṭiggahessāmī”ti cintetvāpi “hotu, na mayā evaṃ katapubbaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3741_6: mayā attano vattaṃ hāpetuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti cittaṃ mudukaṃ katvā theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā,
atk-s0502a:3741_7: “bhante, pattacīvaraṃ dethā”ti āha. Itaro “gaccha, dubbinīta, na tvaṃ mama pattacīvaraṃ
atk-s0502a:3741_8: paṭiggahetuṃ yuttarūpo”ti accharaṃ paharitvā tenapi “āma, bhante, ahampi tumhākaṃ
atk-s0502a:3741_9: pattacīvaraṃ na paṭiggaṇhāmīti cintesi”nti vutte, “āvuso navaka, kiṃ tvaṃ cintesi,
atk-s0502a:3741_10: mama imasmiṃ vihāre koci saṅgo atthī”ti āha. Itaropi “tumhe pana, bhante, kiṃ evaṃ
atk-s0502a:3741_11: maññatha ‘mama imasmiṃ vihāre koci saṅgo atthī’ti, eso te vihāro”ti vatvā pattacīvaraṃ
atk-s0502a:3741_12: ādāya nikkhami. Itaropi nikkhami. Te ubhopi ekamaggenāpi agantvā eko pacchimadvārena
atk-s0502a:3741_13: maggaṃ gaṇhi, eko puratthimadvārena. Dhammakathiko, “bhante, mā evaṃ karotha, mā
atk-s0502a:3741_14: evaṃ karothā”ti vatvā “tiṭṭhāvuso”ti vutte nivatti. So punadivase dhuragāmaṃ paviṭṭho
atk-s0502a:3741_15: manussehi, “bhante, bhaddantā kuhi”nti vutte, “āvuso, mā pucchatha, tumhākaṃ kulupakā
atk-s0502a:3741_16: hiyyo kalahaṃ katvā nikkhamiṃsu, ahaṃ yācantopi nivattetuṃ nāsakkhi”nti āha. Tesu
atk-s0502a:3741_17: bālā tuṇhī ahesuṃ. Paṇḍitā pana “amhehi ettakaṃ kālaṃ bhaddantānaṃ kiñci khalitaṃ
atk-s0502a:3741_18: nāma na diṭṭhapubbaṃ, tesaṃ bhayaṃ imaṃ nissāya uppannaṃ bhavissatī”ti domanassappattā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:3742_0: Tepi therā gataṭṭhāne cittasukhaṃ nāma na labhiṃsu. Mahāthero cintesi – “aho navakassa
atk-s0502a:3742_1: bhikkhuno bhāriyaṃ kammaṃ kataṃ, muhuttaṃ diṭṭhaṃ nāma āgantukabhikkhuṃ āha – ‘mahātherena
atk-s0502a:3742_2: saddhiṃ saṃbhogaṃ mā akāsī”’ti. Itaropi cintesi – “aho mahātherassa bhāriyaṃ kammaṃ
atk-s0502a:3742_3: kataṃ, muhuttaṃ diṭṭhaṃ nāma āgantukabhikkhuṃ āha – ‘iminā saddhiṃ saṃbhogaṃ mā akāsī”’ti.
atk-s0502a:3742_4: Tesaṃ neva sajjhāyo na manasikāro ahosi. Te vassasataccayena pacchimadisāya ekaṃ
atk-s0502a:3742_5: vihāraṃ agamaṃsu. Tesaṃ ekameva senāsanaṃ pāpuṇi. Mahāthere pavisitvā mañcake nisinne
atk-s0502a:3742_6: itaropi pāvisi. Mahāthero taṃ disvāva sañjānitvā assūni sandhāretuṃ nāsakkhi. Itaropi
atk-s0502a:3742_7: mahātheraṃ sañjānitvā assupuṇṇehi nettehi “kathemi nu kho mā kathemī”ti cintetvā
atk-s0502a:3742_8: “na taṃ saddheyyarūpa”nti theraṃ vanditvā “ahaṃ, bhante, ettakaṃ kālaṃ tumhākaṃ pattacīvaraṃ
atk-s0502a:3742_9: gahetvā vicariṃ, api nu kho me kāyadvārādīsu tumhehi kiñci asāruppaṃ diṭṭhapubba”nti.
atk-s0502a:3742_10: “Na diṭṭhapubbaṃ, āvuso”ti. Atha kasmā dhammakathikaṃ avacuttha “mā etena saddhiṃ
atk-s0502a:3742_11: saṃbhogamakāsī”ti? “Nāhaṃ, āvuso, evaṃ kathemi, tayā kira mama antare evaṃ vutta”nti.
atk-s0502a:3742_12: “Ahampi, bhante, na vadāmī”ti. Te tasmiṃ khaṇe “tena amhe bhinditukāmena evaṃ vuttaṃ
atk-s0502a:3742_13: bhavissatī”ti ñatvā aññamaññaṃ accayaṃ desayiṃsu. Te vassasataṃ cittassādaṃ alabhantā
atk-s0502a:3742_14: taṃ divasaṃ samaggā hutvā “āyāma, naṃ tato vihārā nikkaḍḍhissāmā”ti pakkamitvā anupubbena
atk-s0502a:3743_0: Dhammakathikopi there disvā pattacīvaraṃ paṭiggahetuṃ upagacchi. Therā “na tvaṃ imasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:3743_1: vihāre vasituṃ yuttarūpo”ti accharaṃ pahariṃsu. So saṇṭhātuṃ asakkonto tāvadeva nikkhamitvā
atk-s0502a:3743_2: palāyi. Atha naṃ vīsati vassasahassāni kato samaṇadhammo sandhāretuṃ nāsakkhi, tato
atk-s0502a:3743_3: cavitvā avīcimhi nibbatto ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ paccitvā idāni gijjhakūṭe vuttappakārena
atk-s0502a:3744: Satthā idaṃ tassa pubbakammaṃ āharitvā, “bhikkhave, bhikkhunā nāma kāyādīhi upasantarūpena bhavitabba”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3750_0: Tassattho – catunnaṃ vacīduccaritānaṃ vajjanena vācānurakkhī abhijjhādīnaṃ anuppādanena
atk-s0502a:3750_1: manasā ca suṭṭhu saṃvuto pāṇātipātādayo pajahanto kāyena ca akusalaṃ na kayirā. Evaṃ
atk-s0502a:3750_2: ete tayo kammapathe visodhaye. Evaṃ visodhento hi sīlakkhandhādīnaṃ esakehi buddhādīhi
atk-s0502a:3754: Yogā veti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto poṭṭhilaṃ nāma theraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3755_0: So kira sattannampi buddhānaṃ sāsane tepiṭako pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ dhammaṃ vācesi.
atk-s0502a:3755_1: Satthā cintesi – “imassa bhikkhuno ‘attano dukkhanissaraṇaṃ karissāmī’ti cittampi
atk-s0502a:3755_2: natthi saṃvejessāmi na”nti. Tato paṭṭhāya taṃ theraṃ attano upaṭṭhānaṃ āgatakāle
atk-s0502a:3755_3: “ehi, tucchapoṭṭhila, vanda, tucchapoṭṭhila, nisīda, tucchapoṭṭhila, yāhi, tucchapoṭṭhilā”ti
atk-s0502a:3755_4: vadati. Uṭṭhāya gatakālepi “tucchapoṭṭhilo gato”ti vadati. So cintesi – “ahaṃ sāṭṭhakathāni
atk-s0502a:3755_5: tīṇi piṭakāni dhāremi, pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ aṭṭhārasa mahāgaṇe dhammaṃ vācemi,
atk-s0502a:3755_6: atha pana maṃ satthā abhikkhaṇaṃ, ‘tucchapoṭṭhilā’ti vadeti, addhā maṃ satthā jhānādīnaṃ
atk-s0502a:3755_7: abhāvena evaṃ vadetī”ti. So uppannasaṃvego “dāni araññaṃ pavisitvā samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0502a:3755_8: karissāmī”ti sayameva pattacīvaraṃ saṃvidahitvā paccūsakāle sabbapacchā dhammaṃ uggaṇhitvā
atk-s0502a:3755_9: nikkhamantena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ nikkhami. Pariveṇe nisīditvā sajjhāyantā naṃ “ācariyo”ti
atk-s0502a:3755_10: na sallakkhesuṃ. So vīsayojanasatamaggaṃ gantvā ekasmiṃ araññāvāse tiṃsa bhikkhū
atk-s0502a:3755_11: vasanti, te upasaṅkamitvā saṅghattheraṃ vanditvā, “bhante, avassayo me hothā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:3755_12: Āvuso, tvaṃ dhammakathiko, amhehi nāma taṃ nissāya kiñci jānitabbaṃ bhaveyya, kasmā
atk-s0502a:3755_13: evaṃ vadesīti? Mā, bhante, evaṃ karotha, avassayo me hothāti. Te pana sabbe khīṇāsavāva.
atk-s0502a:3755_14: Atha naṃ mahāthero “imassa uggahaṃ nissāya māno atthiyevā”ti anutherassa santikaṃ
atk-s0502a:3755_15: pahiṇi. Sopi naṃ tathevāha. Iminā nīhārena sabbepi taṃ pesentā divāṭṭhāne nisīditvā
atk-s0502a:3755_16: sūcikammaṃ karontassa sabbanavakassa sattavassikasāmaṇerassa santikaṃ pahiṇiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3756_0: So nihatamāno sāmaṇerassa santike añjaliṃ paggahetvā “avassayo me hohi sappurisā”ti
atk-s0502a:3756_1: āha. Aho, ācariya, kiṃ nāmetaṃ kathetha, tumhe mahallakā bahussutā, tumhākaṃ santike
atk-s0502a:3756_2: mayā kiñci kāraṇaṃ jānitabbaṃ bhaveyyāti. Mā evaṃ kari, sappurisa, hohiyeva me avassayoti.
atk-s0502a:3756_3: Bhante, sacepi ovādakkhamā bhavissatha, bhavissāmi vo avassayoti. Homi, sappurisa,
atk-s0502a:3756_4: ahaṃ “aggiṃ pavisā”ti vutte aggiṃ pavisāmiyevāti. Atha naṃ so avidūre ekaṃ saraṃ
atk-s0502a:3756_5: dassetvā, “bhante, yathānivatthapārutova imaṃ saraṃ pavisathā”ti āha. So hissa mahagghānaṃ
atk-s0502a:3756_6: dupaṭṭacīvarānaṃ nivatthapārutabhāvaṃ ñatvāpi “ovādakkhamo nu kho”ti vīmaṃsanto evamāha.
atk-s0502a:3756_7: Theropi ekavacaneneva udakaṃ otari. Atha naṃ cīvarakaṇṇānaṃ temitakāle “etha, bhante”ti
atk-s0502a:3756_8: vatvā ekavacaneneva āgantvā ṭhitaṃ āha – “bhante, ekasmiṃ vammike cha chiddāni, tattha
atk-s0502a:3756_9: ekena chiddena godhā anto paviṭṭhā, taṃ gaṇhitukāmo itarāni pañca chiddāni thaketvā
atk-s0502a:3756_10: chaṭṭhaṃ bhinditvā paviṭṭhachiddeneva gaṇhāti, evaṃ tumhepi chadvārikesu ārammaṇesu
atk-s0502a:3756_11: sesāni pañcadvārāni pidhāya manodvāre kammaṃ paṭṭhapethā”ti. Bahussutassa bhikkhuno
atk-s0502a:3756_12: ettakeneva padīpujjalanaṃ viya ahosi. So “ettakameva hotu sappurisā”ti karajakāye
atk-s0502a:3757_0: Satthā vīsayojanasatamatthake nisinnova taṃ bhikkhuṃ oloketvā “yathevāyaṃ bhikkhu
atk-s0502a:3757_1: bhūripañño, evamevaṃ anena attānaṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā tena saddhiṃ
atk-s0502a:3757_2: kathento viya obhāsaṃ pharitvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3760: Etaṃ dvedhāpathaṃ ñatvā, bhavāya vibhavāya ca;
atk-s0502a:3762_0: Tattha yogāti aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu yoniso manasikārā. Bhūrīti pathavīsamāya vitthatāya
atk-s0502a:3762_1: paññāyetaṃ nāmaṃ. Saṅkhayoti vināso. Etaṃ dvedhāpathanti etaṃ yogañca ayogañca. Bhavāya
atk-s0502a:3762_2: vibhavāya cāti vuddhiyā ca avuddhiyā ca. Tathāti yathā ayaṃ bhūrisaṅkhātā paññā pavaḍḍhati,
atk-s0502a:3766: Vanaṃ chindathāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sambahule mahallake bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3767_0: Te kira gihikāle sāvatthiyaṃ kuṭumbikā mahaddhanā aññamaññasahāyakā ekato puññāni
atk-s0502a:3767_1: karontā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā “mayaṃ mahallakā, kiṃ no gharāvāsenā”ti satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:3767_2: pabbajjaṃ yācitvā pabbajiṃsu, mahallakabhāvena pana dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇituṃ asakkontā
atk-s0502a:3767_3: vihārapariyante paṇṇasālaṃ kāretvā ekatova vasiṃsu. Piṇḍāya carantāpi yebhuyyena
atk-s0502a:3767_4: puttadārasseva gehaṃ gantvā bhuñjiṃsu. Tesu ekassa purāṇadutiyikā madhurapācikā nāma,
atk-s0502a:3767_5: sā tesaṃ sabbesampi upakārikā ahosi. Kasmā sabbepi attanā laddhāhāraṃ gahetvā tassā
atk-s0502a:3767_6: eva gehe nisīditvā bhuñjanti? Sāpi nesaṃ yathāsannihitaṃ sūpabyañjanaṃ deti. Sā aññatarābādhena
atk-s0502a:3767_7: phuṭṭhā kālamakāsi. Atha te mahallakattherā sahāyakassa therassa paṇṇasālāya sannipatitvā
atk-s0502a:3767_8: aññamaññaṃ gīvāsu gahetvā “madhurapācikā upāsikā kālakatā”ti vilapantā rodiṃsu. Bhikkhūhi
atk-s0502a:3767_9: ca samantato upadhāvitvā “kiṃ idaṃ, āvuso”ti puṭṭhā, “bhante, sahāyakassa no purāṇadutiyikā
atk-s0502a:3767_10: kālakatā, sā amhākaṃ ativiya upakārikā. Idāni kuto tathārūpiṃ labhissāmāti iminā
atk-s0502a:3768_0: Bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a:3768_1: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, idāneva,
atk-s0502a:3768_2: pubbepi te kākayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā samuddatīre caramānā samuddaūmiyā samuddaṃ pavesetvā
atk-s0502a:3768_3: māritāya kākiyā roditvā paridevitvā taṃ nīharissāmāti mukhatuṇḍakehi mahāsamuddaṃ
atk-s0502a:3771_0: Imaṃ kākajātakaṃ vitthāretvā te bhikkhū āmantetvā, “bhikkhave, rāgadosamohavanaṃ
atk-s0502a:3771_1: nissāya tumhehi idaṃ dukkhaṃ pattaṃ, taṃ vanaṃ chindituṃ vaṭṭati, evaṃ niddukkhā
atk-s0502a:3773: “Vanaṃ chindatha mā rukkhaṃ, vanato jāyate bhayaṃ;
atk-s0502a:3774: Chetvā vanañca vanathañca, nibbanā hotha bhikkhavo.
atk-s0502a:3780_0: Tattha mā rukkhanti satthārā hi “vanaṃ chindathā”ti vutte tesaṃ acirapabbajitānaṃ
atk-s0502a:3780_1: “satthā amhe vāsiādīni gahetvā vanaṃ chindāpetī”ti rukkhaṃ chinditukāmatā uppajji.
atk-s0502a:3780_2: Atha ne “mayā rāgādikilesavanaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ, na rukkhe”ti paṭisedhento “mā
atk-s0502a:3780_3: rukkha”nti āha. Vanatoti yathā pākatikavanato sīhādibhayaṃ jāyati, evaṃ jātiādibhayampi
atk-s0502a:3780_4: kilesavanato jāyatīti attho. Vanañca vanathañcāti ettha mahantā rukkhā vanaṃ nāma,
atk-s0502a:3780_5: khuddakā tasmiṃ vane ṭhitattā vanathā nāma. Pubbuppattikarukkhā vā vanaṃ nāma, aparāparuppattikā
atk-s0502a:3780_6: vanathā nāma. Evameva mahantamahantā bhavākaḍḍhanakā kilesā vanaṃ nāma, pavattiyaṃ
atk-s0502a:3780_7: vipākadāyakā vanathā nāma. Pubbappattikā vanaṃ nāma, aparāparuppattikā vanathā nāma.
atk-s0502a:3780_8: Taṃ ubhayaṃ catutthamaggañāṇena chinditabbaṃ. Tenāha – “chetvā vanañca vanathañca,
atk-s0502a:3780_9: nibbanā hotha bhikkhavo”ti. Nibbanā hothāti nikkilesā hotha. Yāva hi vanathoti yāva
atk-s0502a:3780_10: esa aṇumattopi kilesavanatho narassa nārīsu na chijjati, tāva so khīrapako vaccho
atk-s0502a:3780_11: mātari viya paṭibaddhamano laggacittova hotīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3781: Desanāvasāne pañcapi te mahallakattherā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:3784: Ucchindāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sāriputtattherassa saddhivihārikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3785_0: Eko kira suvaṇṇakāraputto abhirūpo sāriputtattherassa santike pabbaji. Thero “taruṇānaṃ
atk-s0502a:3785_1: rāgo ussanno hotī”ti cintetvā tassa rāgapaṭighātāya asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ adāsi. Tassa
atk-s0502a:3785_2: pana taṃ asappāyaṃ. Tasmā araññaṃ pavisitvā temāsaṃ vāyamanto cittekaggamattampi
atk-s0502a:3785_3: alabhitvā puna therassa santikaṃ āgantvā therena “upaṭṭhitaṃ te, āvuso, kammaṭṭhāna”nti
atk-s0502a:3785_4: vutte taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi. Athassa thero “kammaṭṭhānaṃ na sampajjatīti vosānaṃ āpajjituṃ
atk-s0502a:3785_5: na vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā puna tadeva kammaṭṭhānaṃ sādhukaṃ kathetvā adāsi. So dutiyavārepi
atk-s0502a:3785_6: kiñci visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ asakkonto āgantvā therassa ārocesi. Athassa theropi sakāraṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:3785_7: saupamaṃ katvā tadeva kammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhi. So punapi āgantvā kammaṭṭhānassa asampajjanabhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:3785_8: kathesi. Thero cintesi – “kārako bhikkhu attani vijjamāne kāmacchandādayo vijjamānāti
atk-s0502a:3785_9: avijjamāne avijjamānāti pajānāti. Ayaṃ bhikkhu kārako, no akārako, paṭipanno, no
atk-s0502a:3785_10: appaṭipanno, ahaṃ panetassa ajjhāsayaṃ na jānāmi, buddhaveneyyo eso bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0502a:3785_11: taṃ ādāya sāyanhasamaye satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā “ayaṃ, bhante, mama saddhivihāriko,
atk-s0502a:3785_12: imassa mayā iminā kāraṇena idaṃ nāma kammaṭṭhānaṃ dinna”nti sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:3786_0: Atha naṃ satthā “āsayānusayañāṇaṃ nāmetaṃ pāramiyo pūretvā dasasahassilokadhātuṃ
atk-s0502a:3786_1: unnādetvā sabbaññutaṃ pattānaṃ buddhānaṃyeva visayo”ti vatvā “katarakulā nu kho esa
atk-s0502a:3786_2: pabbajito”ti āvajjento “suvaṇṇakārakulā”ti ñatvā atīte attabhāve olokento tassa suvaṇṇakārakuleyeva
atk-s0502a:3786_3: paṭipāṭiyā nibbattāni pañca attabhāvasatāni disvā “iminā daharena dīgharattaṃ suvaṇṇakārakammaṃ
atk-s0502a:3786_5: tasmā imassa asubhapaṭikūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ na vaṭṭati, manāpamevassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ sappāya”nti
atk-s0502a:3786_6: cintetvā, “sāriputta, tayā kammaṭṭhānaṃ datvā cattāro māse kilamitaṃ bhikkhuṃ ajja
atk-s0502a:3786_7: pacchābhatteyeva arahattaṃ pattaṃ passissasi, gaccha tva”nti theraṃ uyyojetvā iddhiyā
atk-s0502a:3786_8: cakkamattaṃ suvaṇṇapadumaṃ māpetvā pattehi ceva nālehi ca udakabindūni muñcantaṃ
atk-s0502a:3786_9: viya katvā “bhikkhu imaṃ padumaṃ ādāya vihārapaccante vālukarāsimhi ṭhapetvā sammukhaṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a:3786_10: pallaṅkena nisīditvā ‘lohitakaṃ lohitaka’nti parikammaṃ karohī”ti adāsi. Tassa satthuhatthato
atk-s0502a:3786_11: padumaṃ gaṇhantasseva cittaṃ pasīdi. So vihārapaccantaṃ gantvā vālukaṃ ussāpetvā
atk-s0502a:3786_12: tattha padumanālaṃ pavesetvā sammukhe pallaṅkena nisinno “lohitakaṃ lohitaka”nti
atk-s0502a:3786_13: parikammaṃ ārabhi. Athassa taṅkhaṇaññeva nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhiṃsu, upacārajjhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:3786_14: uppajji. Tadanantaraṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā pañcahākārehi vasībhāvaṃ pāpetvā
atk-s0502a:3786_15: yathānisinnova dutiyajjhānādīnipi patvā vasībhūto catutthajjhānena jhānakīḷaṃ kīḷanto nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:3787_0: Satthā tassa jhānānaṃ uppannabhāvaṃ ñatvā “sakkhissati nu kho esa attano dhammatāya
atk-s0502a:3787_1: uttari visesaṃ nibbattetu”nti olokento “na sakkhissatī”ti ñatvā “taṃ padumaṃ milāyatū”ti
atk-s0502a:3787_2: adhiṭṭhahi. Taṃ hatthehi madditapadumaṃ milāyantaṃ viya kāḷavaṇṇaṃ ahosi. So jhānā
atk-s0502a:3787_3: vuṭṭhāya taṃ oloketvā “kiṃ nu kho imaṃ padumaṃ jarāya pahaṭaṃ paññāyati, anupādiṇṇakepi
atk-s0502a:3787_4: evaṃ jarāya abhibhuyyamāne upādiṇṇake kathāva natthi. Idampi hi jarā abhibhavissatī”ti
atk-s0502a:3787_5: aniccalakkhaṇaṃ passi. Tasmiṃ pana diṭṭhe dukkhalakkhaṇañca anattalakkhaṇañca diṭṭhameva
atk-s0502a:3787_6: hoti. Tassa tayo bhavā ādittā viya kaṇḍe baddhakuṇapā viya ca khāyiṃsu. Tasmiṃ khaṇe
atk-s0502a:3787_7: tassa avidūre kumārakā ekaṃ saraṃ otaritvā kumudāni bhañjitvā thale rāsiṃ karonti.
atk-s0502a:3787_8: So jale ca thale ca kumudāni olokesi. Athassa jale kumudāni abhirūpāni udakapaggharantāni
atk-s0502a:3787_9: viya upaṭṭhahiṃsu, itarāni aggaggesu parimilātāni. So “anupādiṇṇakaṃ jarā evaṃ paharati,
atk-s0502a:3787_10: upādiṇṇakaṃ kiṃ pana na paharissatī”ti suṭṭhutaraṃ aniccalakkhaṇādīni addasa. Satthā
atk-s0502a:3787_11: “pākaṭībhūtaṃ idāni imassa bhikkhuno kammaṭṭhāna”nti ñatvā gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnakova
atk-s0502a:3787_12: obhāsaṃ muñci, so tassa mukhaṃ pahari. Athassa “kiṃ nu kho eta”nti olokentassa satthā
atk-s0502a:3787_13: āgantvā sammukhe ṭhito viya ahosi. So uṭṭhāya añjaliṃ paggaṇhi. Athassa satthā sappāyaṃ
atk-s0502a:3791_0: Tattha ucchindāti arahattamaggena ucchinda. Sāradikanti saradakāle nibbattaṃ. Santimagganti
atk-s0502a:3791_1: nibbānagāmiṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ. Brūhayāti vaḍḍhaya. Nibbānañhi sugatena desitaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3795: Idha vassanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto mahādhanavāṇijaṃ nāma ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3796_0: So kira bārāṇasito kusumbharattānaṃ vatthānaṃ pañca sakaṭasatāni pūretvā vaṇijjāya
atk-s0502a:3796_1: sāvatthiṃ āgato nadītīraṃ patvā “sve nadiṃ uttarissāmī”ti tattheva sakaṭāni mocetvā
atk-s0502a:3796_2: vasi. Rattiṃ mahāmegho uṭṭhahitvā vassi. Nadī sattāhaṃ udakassa pūrā aṭṭhāsi. Nāgarāpi
atk-s0502a:3796_3: sattāhaṃ nakkhattaṃ kīḷiṃsu. Kusumbharattehi vatthehi kiccaṃ na niṭṭhitaṃ. Vāṇijo
atk-s0502a:3796_4: cintesi – “ahaṃ dūraṃ āgato. Sace puna gamissāmi, papañco bhavissati. Idheva vassañca
atk-s0502a:3796_5: hemantañca gimhañca mama kammaṃ karonto vasitvā imāni vikkiṇissāmī”ti. Satthā nagare
atk-s0502a:3796_6: piṇḍāya caranto tassa cittaṃ ñatvā sitaṃ pātukaritvā ānandattherena sitakāraṇaṃ puṭṭho
atk-s0502a:3796_7: āha – “diṭṭho te, ānanda, mahādhanavāṇijo”ti? “Āma, bhante”ti. So attano jīvitantarāyaṃ
atk-s0502a:3796_8: ajānitvā imaṃ saṃvaccharaṃ idheva vasitvā bhaṇḍaṃ vikkiṇituṃ cittamakāsīti. “Kiṃ
atk-s0502a:3796_9: pana tassa, bhante, antarāyo bhavissatī”ti? Satthā “āmānanda, sattāhameva jīvitvā
atk-s0502a:3796_10: so maccumukhe patissatī”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3798: Na hi no saṅgaraṃ tena, mahāsenena maccunā.
atk-s0502a:3800: Taṃ ve bhaddekarattoti, santo ācikkhate munī”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:3801_0: Gacchāmissa, bhante, ārocessāmīti. Vissattho gacchānandāti. Thero sakaṭaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā
atk-s0502a:3801_1: bhikkhāya cari. Vāṇijo theraṃ āhārena patimānesi. Atha naṃ thero āha – “kittakaṃ
atk-s0502a:3801_2: kālaṃ idha vasissasī”ti? “Bhante, ahaṃ dūrato āgato”. Sace puna gamissāmi, papañco
atk-s0502a:3801_3: bhavissati, imaṃ saṃvaccharaṃ idha vasitvā bhaṇḍaṃ vikkiṇitvā gamissāmīti. Upāsaka,
atk-s0502a:3801_4: dujjāno jīvitantarāyo, appamādaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti. “Kiṃ pana, bhante, antarāyo bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:3801_5: “Āma, upāsaka, sattāhameva te jīvitaṃ pavattissatīti”. So saṃviggamānaso hutvā buddhappamukhaṃ
atk-s0502a:3801_6: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā anumodanatthāya pattaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a:3801_7: Athassa satthā anumodanaṃ karonto, “upāsaka, paṇḍitena nāma ‘idheva vassādīni vasissāmi,
atk-s0502a:3801_8: idañcidañca kammaṃ payojessāmī’ti cintetuṃ na vaṭṭati, attano pana jīvitantarāyameva
atk-s0502a:3804: Iti bālo vicinteti, antarāyaṃ na bujjhatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:3805_0: Tattha idha vassanti imasmiṃ ṭhāne idañcidañca karonto catumāsaṃ vassaṃ vasissāmi.
atk-s0502a:3805_1: Hemantagimhisūti hemantagimhesupi “cattāro māse idañcidañca karonto idheva vasissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:3805_2: evaṃ diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaṃ atthaṃ ajānanto bālo vicinteti. Antarāyanti “asukasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:3805_3: nāma kāle vā dese vā vaye vā marissāmī”ti attano jīvitantarāyaṃ na bujjhatīti.
atk-s0502a:3806_0: Desanāvasāne so vāṇijo sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā
atk-s0502a:3806_1: ahosi. Vāṇijopi satthāraṃ anugantvā nivattitvā “sīsarogo viya me uppanno”ti sayane
atk-s0502a:3806_2: nipajji, tathānipannova kālaṃ katvā tusitavimāne nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:3809: Taṃ puttapasusammattanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kisāgotamiṃ ārabbha kathesi. Vatthu sahassavagge –
atk-s0502a:3810: “Yo ca vassasataṃ jīve, apassaṃ amataṃ padaṃ;
atk-s0502a:3811: Ekāhaṃ jīvitaṃ seyyo, passato amataṃ pada”nti. –
atk-s0502a:3812_0: Gāthāvaṇṇanāya vitthāretvā kathitaṃ. Tadā hi satthā “kisāgotami laddhā te ekaccharamattā
atk-s0502a:3812_1: siddhatthakā”ti āha. “Na laddhā, bhante, sakalagāme jīvantehi kira matakā eva bahutarā”ti.
atk-s0502a:3812_2: Atha naṃ satthā “tvaṃ ‘mameva putto mato’ti sallakkhesi, dhuvadhammo esa sabbasattānaṃ.
atk-s0502a:3812_3: Maccurājā hi sabbasatte aparipuṇṇajjhāsaye eva mahogho viya parikaḍḍhamāno apāyasamudde
atk-s0502a:3812_4: pakkhipatī”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3815: Suttaṃ gāmaṃ mahoghova, maccu ādāya gacchatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:3816_0: Tattha taṃ puttapasusammattanti taṃ rūpabalādisampanne putte ca pasū ca labhitvā
atk-s0502a:3816_1: “mama puttā abhirūpā balasampannā paṇḍitā sabbakiccasamatthā, mama goṇā abhirūpā
atk-s0502a:3816_2: arogā mahābhāravahā, mama gāvī bahukhīrā”ti evaṃ puttehi ca pasūhi ca sammattaṃ naraṃ.
atk-s0502a:3816_3: Byāsattamanasanti hiraññasuvaṇṇādīsu vā pattacīvarādīsu vā kiñcideva labhitvā tato
atk-s0502a:3816_4: uttaritaraṃ patthanatāya āsattamānasaṃ vā, cakkhuviññeyyādīsu ārammaṇesu vuttappakāresu
atk-s0502a:3816_5: vā parikkhāresu yaṃ yaṃ laddhaṃ hoti, tattha tattheva lagganatāya byāsattamānasaṃ
atk-s0502a:3816_6: vā. Suttaṃ gāmanti niddaṃ upagataṃ sattanikāyaṃ. Mahoghovāti yathā evarūpaṃ gāmaṃ
atk-s0502a:3816_7: gambhīravitthato mahanto mahānadīnaṃ ogho antamaso sunakhampi asesetvā sabbaṃ ādāya
atk-s0502a:3816_8: gacchati, evaṃ vuttappakāraṃ naraṃ maccu ādāya gacchatīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3817: Desanāvasāne kisāgotamī sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:3820: Na santi puttāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto paṭācāraṃ ārabbha kathesi. Vatthu sahassavagge –
atk-s0502a:3823_0: Gāthāvaṇṇanāya vitthāretvā kathitaṃ. Tadā pana satthā paṭācāraṃ tanubhūtasokaṃ ñatvā
atk-s0502a:3823_1: “paṭācāre puttādayo nāma paralokaṃ gacchantassa tāṇaṃ vā leṇaṃ vā saraṇaṃ vā bhavituṃ
atk-s0502a:3823_2: na sakkonti, tasmā vijjamānāpi te na santiyeva. Paṇḍitena pana sīlaṃ visodhetvā attano
atk-s0502a:3823_3: nibbānagāmimaggameva sodhetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3825: “Na santi puttā tāṇāya, na pitā nāpi bandhavā;
atk-s0502a:3830_0: Tattha tāṇāyāti tāṇabhāvāya patiṭṭhānatthāya. Bandhavāti putte ca mātāpitaro ca ṭhapetvā
atk-s0502a:3830_1: avasesā ñātisuhajjā. Antakenādhipannassāti maraṇena abhibhūtassa. Pavattiyañhi puttādayo
atk-s0502a:3830_2: annapānādidānena ceva uppannakiccanittharaṇena ca tāṇā hutvāpi maraṇakāle kenaci
atk-s0502a:3830_3: upāyena maraṇaṃ paṭibāhituṃ asamatthatāya tāṇatthāya leṇatthāya na santi nāma. Teneva
atk-s0502a:3830_4: vuttaṃ – “natthi ñātīsu tāṇatā”ti. Etamatthavasanti evaṃ tesaṃ aññamaññassa tāṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:3830_5: bhavituṃ asamatthabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ kāraṇaṃ jānitvā paṇḍito catupārisuddhisīlena saṃvuto
atk-s0502a:3830_6: rakkhitagopito hutvā nibbānagamanaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ sīghaṃ sīghaṃ visodheyyāti attho.
atk-s0502a:3831: Desanāvasāne paṭācārā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, aññe ca bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pāpuṇiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a:3837: Mattāsukhapariccāgāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto attano pubbakammaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3838_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye vesālī iddhā ahosi phītā bahujanā ākiṇṇamanussā. Tattha hi vārena
atk-s0502a:3838_1: vārena rajjaṃ kārentānaṃ khattiyānaṃyeva sattasatādhikāni sattasahassāni satta ca
atk-s0502a:3838_2: khattiyā ahesuṃ. Tesaṃ vasanatthāya tattakāyeva pāsādā tattakāneva kūṭāgārāni uyyāne
atk-s0502a:3838_3: vihāratthāya tattakāyeva ārāmā ca pokkharaṇiyo ca ahesuṃ. Sā aparena samayena dubbhikkhā
atk-s0502a:3838_4: ahosi dussassā. Tattha chātakabhayena paṭhamaṃ duggatamanussā kālamakaṃsu. Tesaṃ
atk-s0502a:3838_5: tesaṃ tattha tattha chaḍḍitānaṃ kuṇapānaṃ gandhena amanussā nagaraṃ pavisiṃsu. Amanussūpaddavena
atk-s0502a:3838_6: bahutarā kālamakaṃsu. Tesaṃ kuṇapagandhapaṭikkūlatāya sattānaṃ ahivātarogo uppajji.
atk-s0502a:3838_7: Evaṃ dubbhikkhabhayaṃ amanussabhayaṃ rogabhayanti tīṇi bhayāni uppajjiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3839_0: Nagaravāsino sannipatitvā rājānaṃ āhaṃsu – “mahārāja, imasmiṃ nagare tīṇi bhayāni
atk-s0502a:3839_1: uppannāni, ito pubbe yāva sattamā rājaparivaṭṭā evarūpaṃ bhayaṃ nāma na uppannapubbaṃ.
atk-s0502a:3839_2: Adhammikarājūnañhi kāle evarūpaṃ bhayaṃ uppajjatī”ti. Rājā santhāgāre sabbesaṃ sannipātaṃ
atk-s0502a:3839_3: kāretvā “sace me adhammikabhāvo atthi, taṃ vicinathā”ti āha. Vesālivāsino sabbaṃ
atk-s0502a:3839_4: paveṇi vicinantā rañño kañci dosaṃ adisvā, “mahārāja, natthi te doso”ti vatvā “kathaṃ
atk-s0502a:3839_5: nu kho idaṃ amhākaṃ bhayaṃ vūpasamaṃ gaccheyyā”ti mantayiṃsu. Tattha ekaccehi “balikammena
atk-s0502a:3839_6: āyācanāya maṅgalakiriyāyā”ti vutte sabbampi taṃ vidhiṃ katvā paṭibāhituṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3839_7: Athaññe evamāhaṃsu – “cha satthāro mahānubhāvā, tesu idhāgatamattesu bhayaṃ vūpasameyyā”ti.
atk-s0502a:3839_8: Apare “sammāsambuddho loke uppanno. So hi bhagavā sabbasattahitāya dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0502a:3839_9: mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo. Tasmiṃ idha āgate imāni bhayāni vūpasameyyu”nti āhaṃsu. Tesaṃ
atk-s0502a:3839_10: vacanaṃ sabbepi abhinanditvā “kahaṃ nu kho so bhagavā etarahi viharatī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3839_11: Tadā pana satthā upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya rañño bimbisārassa paṭiññaṃ datvā veḷuvane
atk-s0502a:3839_12: viharati. Tena ca samayena bimbisārasamāgame bimbisārena saddhiṃ sotāpattiphalaṃ
atk-s0502a:3839_13: patto mahāli nāma licchavī tassaṃ parisāyaṃ nisinno hoti.
atk-s0502a:3840_0: Vesālivāsino mahantaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ sajjetvā rājānaṃ bimbisāraṃ saññāpetvā “satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:3840_1: idhānethā”ti mahāliñceva licchaviṃ purohitaputtañca pahiṇiṃsu. Te gantvā rañño paṇṇākāraṃ
atk-s0502a:3840_2: datvā taṃ pavattiṃ nivedetvā, “mahārāja, satthāraṃ amhākaṃ nagaraṃ pesethā”ti yāciṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3840_3: Rājā “tumheva jānāthā”ti na sampaṭicchi. Te bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā yāciṃsu
atk-s0502a:3840_4: – “bhante, vesāliyaṃ tīṇi bhayāni uppannāni, tāni tumhesu āgatesu vūpasamissanti,
atk-s0502a:3840_5: etha, bhante, gacchāmā”ti. Satthā tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā āvajjento “vesāliyaṃ ratanasutte
atk-s0502a:3840_6: vutte sā rakkhā cakkavāḷānaṃ koṭisatasahassaṃ pharissati, suttapariyosāne caturāsītiyā
atk-s0502a:3840_7: pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo bhavissati, tāni ca bhayāni vūpasamissantī”ti ñatvā
atk-s0502a:3841_0: Rājā bimbisāro “satthārā kira vesāligamanaṃ sampaṭicchita”nti sutvā nagare ghosanaṃ
atk-s0502a:3841_1: kāretvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā “kiṃ, bhante, vesāligamanaṃ sampaṭicchita”nti pucchitvā
atk-s0502a:3841_2: “āma, mahārājā”ti vutte “tena hi, bhante, āgametha, tāva maggaṃ paṭiyādessāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:3841_3: vatvā rājagahassa ca gaṅgāya ca antare pañcayojanabhūmiṃ samaṃ kāretvā yojane yojane
atk-s0502a:3841_4: vihāraṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā satthu gamanakālaṃ ārocesi. Satthā pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0502a:3841_5: maggaṃ paṭipajji. Rājā yojanantare jaṇṇumattena odhinā pañcavaṇṇāni pupphāni okirāpetvā
atk-s0502a:3841_6: dhajapaṭākakadalīādīni ussāpetvā bhagavato chattātichattaṃ katvā dve setacchattāni
atk-s0502a:3841_7: ekamekassa bhikkhuno ekamekaṃ setacchattaṃ upari dhāretvā saparivāro pupphagandhādīhi
atk-s0502a:3841_8: pūjaṃ karonto satthāraṃ ekekasmiṃ vihāre vasāpetvā mahādānādīni datvā pañcahi divasehi
atk-s0502a:3841_9: gaṅgātīraṃ pāpetvā tattha nāvaṃ alaṅkaronto vesālikānaṃ sāsanaṃ pesesi – “maggaṃ
atk-s0502a:3841_10: paṭiyādetvā satthu paccuggamanaṃ karontū”ti. Te “diguṇaṃ pūjaṃ karissāmā”ti vesāliyā
atk-s0502a:3841_11: ca gaṅgāya ca antare tiyojanabhūmiṃ samaṃ kāretvā bhagavato catūhi setacchattehi
atk-s0502a:3841_12: ekamekassa bhikkhuno dvīhi dvīhi setacchattehi chattātichattāni sajjetvā pūjaṃ kurumānā
atk-s0502a:3841_13: āgantvā gaṅgātīre aṭṭhaṃsu. Bimbisāro dve nāvā saṅghāṭetvā maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā pupphadāmādīhi
atk-s0502a:3841_14: alaṅkārāpetvā sabbaratanamayaṃ buddhāsanaṃ paññāpesi. Bhagavā tasmiṃ nisīdi. Bhikkhūpi
atk-s0502a:3841_15: nāvaṃ abhiruhitvā bhagavantaṃ parivāretvā nisīdiṃsu. Rājā anugacchanto galappamāṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:3841_16: udakaṃ otaritvā “yāva, bhante, bhagavā āgacchati, tāvāhaṃ idheva gaṅgātīre vasissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:3841_17: vatvā nāvaṃ uyyojetvā nivatti. Satthā yojanamattaṃ addhānaṃ gaṅgāya gantvā vesālikānaṃ sīmaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:3842_0: Licchavīrājāno satthāraṃ paccuggantvā galappamāṇaṃ udakaṃ otaritvā nāvaṃ tīraṃ upanetvā
atk-s0502a:3842_1: satthāraṃ nāvāto otārayiṃsu. Satthārā otaritvā tīre akkantamatteyeva mahāmegho uṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0502a:3842_2: pokkharavassaṃ vassi. Sabbattha jaṇṇuppamāṇaūruppamāṇakaṭippamāṇādīni udakāni sandantāni
atk-s0502a:3842_3: sabbakuṇapāni gaṅgaṃ pavesayiṃsu, parisuddho bhūmibhāgo ahosi. Licchavīrājāno satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:3842_4: yojane yojane vasāpetvā mahādānaṃ datvā diguṇaṃ pūjaṃ karontā tīhi divasehi vesāliṃ
atk-s0502a:3842_5: nayiṃsu. Sakko devarājā devagaṇaparivuto āgamāsi, mahesakkhānaṃ devānaṃ sannipātena
atk-s0502a:3842_6: amanussā yebhuyyena palāyiṃsu. Satthā sāyaṃ nagaradvāre ṭhatvā ānandattheraṃ āmantesi
atk-s0502a:3842_7: – “imaṃ, ānanda, ratanasuttaṃ uggaṇhitvā licchavīkumārehi saddhiṃ vicaranto vesāliyā
atk-s0502a:3843_0: Thero satthārā dinnaṃ ratanasuttaṃ uggaṇhitvā satthu selamayapattena udakaṃ ādāya
atk-s0502a:3843_1: nagaradvāre ṭhito paṇidhānato paṭṭhāya tathāgatassa dasa pāramiyo dasa upapāramiyo
atk-s0502a:3843_2: dasa paramatthapāramiyoti samatiṃsa pāramiyo pañca mahāpariccāge lokatthacariyā ñātatthacariyā
atk-s0502a:3843_3: buddhatthacariyāti tisso cariyāyo pacchimabhave gabbhavokkantiṃ jātiṃ abhinikkhamanaṃ
atk-s0502a:3843_5: navalokuttaradhammeti sabbepime buddhaguṇe āvajjetvā nagaraṃ pavisitvā tiyāmarattiṃ
atk-s0502a:3843_6: tīsu pākārantaresu parittaṃ karonto vicari. Tena “yaṃkiñcī”ti vuttamatteyeva uddhaṃ
atk-s0502a:3843_7: khittaudakaṃ amanussānaṃ upari pati. “Yānīdha bhūtānī”ti gāthākathanato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0502a:3843_8: rajatavaṭaṃsakā viya udakabindūni ākāsena gantvā gilānamanussānaṃ upari patiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3843_9: Tāvadeva vūpasantarogā manussā uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya theraṃ parivāresuṃ. “Yaṃkiñcī”ti vuttapadato
atk-s0502a:3843_10: paṭṭhāya pana udakaphusitehi phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhā sabbe apalāyantā saṅkārakūṭabhittipadesādinissitā
atk-s0502a:3843_11: amanussā tena tena dvārena palāyiṃsu. Dvārāni anokāsāni ahesuṃ. Te okāsaṃ alabhantā
atk-s0502a:3844_0: Mahājano nagaramajjhe santhāgāraṃ sabbagandhehi upalimpetvā upari suvaṇṇatārakādivicittaṃ
atk-s0502a:3844_1: vitānaṃ bandhitvā buddhāsanaṃ paññāpetvā satthāraṃ ānesi. Satthā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:3844_2: Bhikkhusaṅghopi licchavīgaṇopi satthāraṃ parivāretvā nisīdi. Sakko devarājā devagaṇaparivuto
atk-s0502a:3844_3: patirūpe okāse aṭṭhāsi. Theropi sakalanagaraṃ anuvicaritvā vūpasantarogena mahājanena
atk-s0502a:3844_4: saddhiṃ āgantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā nisīdi. Satthā parisaṃ oloketvā tadeva ratanasuttaṃ
atk-s0502a:3844_5: abhāsi. Desanāvasāne caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Evaṃ punadivasepīti
atk-s0502a:3844_6: sattāhaṃ tadeva ratanasuttaṃ desetvā sabbabhayānaṃ vūpasantabhāvaṃ ñatvā licchavīgaṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:3844_7: āmantetvā vesālito nikkhami. Licchavīrājāno diguṇaṃ sakkāraṃ karontā puna tīhi divasehi
atk-s0502a:3845_0: Gaṅgāya nibbattanāgarājāno cintesuṃ – “manussā tathāgatassa sakkāraṃ karonti, mayaṃ
atk-s0502a:3845_1: kiṃ na karomā”ti. Te suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimayā nāvāyo māpetvā suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimaye pallaṅke
atk-s0502a:3845_2: paññāpetvā pañcavaṇṇapadumasañchannaṃ udakaṃ karitvā, “bhante, amhākampi anuggahaṃ
atk-s0502a:3845_3: karothā”ti attano attano nāvaṃ abhiruhaṇatthāya satthāraṃ yāciṃsu. “Manussā ca nāgā
atk-s0502a:3845_4: ca tathāgatassa pūjaṃ karonti, mayaṃ pana kiṃ na karomā”ti bhūmaṭṭhakadevepi ādiṃ
atk-s0502a:3845_5: katvā yāva akaniṭṭhabrahmalokā sabbe devā sakkāraṃ kariṃsu. Tattha nāgā yojanikāni
atk-s0502a:3845_6: chattātichattāni ukkhipiṃsu. Evaṃ heṭṭhā nāgā bhūmitale rukkhagacchapabbatādīsu bhūmaṭṭhakā
atk-s0502a:3845_7: devatā, antalikkhe ākāsaṭṭhadevāti nāgabhavanaṃ ādiṃ katvā cakkavāḷapariyantena yāva
atk-s0502a:3845_8: brahmalokā chattātichattāni ussāpitāni ahesuṃ. Chattantaresu dhajā, dhajantaresu
atk-s0502a:3845_9: paṭākā, tesaṃ antarantarā pupphadāmavāsacuṇṇadhumādīhi sakkāro ahosi. Sabbalaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitā
atk-s0502a:3845_10: devaputtā chaṇavesaṃ gahetvā ugghosayamānā ākāse vicariṃsu. Tayo eva kira samāgamā
atk-s0502a:3845_11: mahantā ahesuṃ – yamakapāṭihāriyasamāgamo devorohaṇasamāgamo ayaṃ gaṅgorohaṇasamāgamoti.
atk-s0502a:3846_0: Paratīre bimbisāropi licchavīhi katasakkārato diguṇaṃ sakkāraṃ sajjetvā bhagavato
atk-s0502a:3846_1: āgamanaṃ udikkhamāno aṭṭhāsi. Satthā gaṅgāya ubhosu passesu rājūnaṃ mahantaṃ pariccāgaṃ
atk-s0502a:3846_2: oloketvā nāgādīnañca ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā ekekāya nāvāya pañcapañcabhikkhusataparivāraṃ
atk-s0502a:3846_3: ekekaṃ nimmitabuddhaṃ māpesi. So ekekassa setacchattassa ceva kapparukkhassa ca pupphadāmassa
atk-s0502a:3846_4: ca heṭṭhā nāgagaṇaparivuto nisinno hoti. Bhūmaṭṭhakadevatādīsupi ekekasmiṃ okāse
atk-s0502a:3846_5: saparivāraṃ ekekaṃ nimmitabuddhaṃ māpesi. Evaṃ sakalacakkavāḷagabbhe ekālaṅkāre ekussave
atk-s0502a:3846_6: ekachaṇeyeva ca jāte satthā nāgānamanuggahaṃ karonto ekaṃ ratananāvaṃ abhiruhi. Bhikkhūsupi
atk-s0502a:3846_7: ekeko ekekameva abhiruhi. Nāgarājāno buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nāgabhavanaṃ
atk-s0502a:3846_8: pavesetvā sabbarattiṃ satthu santike dhammakathaṃ sutvā dutiyadivase dibbena khādanīyena
atk-s0502a:3846_9: bhojanīyena buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ parivisiṃsu. Satthā anumodanaṃ katvā nāgabhavanā
atk-s0502a:3846_10: nikkhamitvā sakalacakkavāḷadevatāhi pūjiyamāno pañcahi nāvāsatehi gaṅgānadiṃ atikkami.
atk-s0502a:3847_0: Rājā paccuggantvā satthāraṃ nāvāto otāretvā āgamanakāle licchavīti katasakkārato
atk-s0502a:3847_1: diguṇaṃ sakkāraṃ katvā purimanayeneva pañcahi divasehi rājagahaṃ abhinesi. Dutiyadivase
atk-s0502a:3847_2: bhikkhū piṇḍapātapaṭikkantā sāyanhasamaye dhammasabhāyaṃ sannisinnā kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ
atk-s0502a:3847_3: – “aho buddhānaṃ mahānubhāvo, aho satthari devamanussānaṃ pasādo, gaṅgāya nāma orato
atk-s0502a:3847_4: ca pārato ca aṭṭhayojane magge buddhagatena pasādena rājūhi samatalaṃ bhūmiṃ katvā
atk-s0502a:3847_5: vālukā okiṇṇā, jaṇṇumattena odhinā nānāvaṇṇāni pupphāni santhatāni, gaṅgāya udakaṃ
atk-s0502a:3847_6: nāgānubhāvena pañcavaṇṇehi padumehi sañchannaṃ, yāva akaniṭṭhabhavanā chattātichattāni
atk-s0502a:3847_7: ussāpitāni, sakalacakkavāḷagabbhaṃ ekālaṅkāraṃ ekussavaṃ viya jāta”nti. Satthā āgantvā
atk-s0502a:3847_8: “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte
atk-s0502a:3847_9: “na, bhikkhave, esa pūjāsakkāro mayhaṃ buddhānubhāvena nibbatto, na nāgadevabrahmānubhāvena.
atk-s0502a:3847_10: Atīte pana appamattakapariccāgānubhāvena nibbatto”ti vatvā bhikkhūhi yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0502a:3848_0: Atīte takkasilāyaṃ saṅkho nāma brāhmaṇo ahosi. Tassa putto susīmo nāma māṇavo soḷasavassuddesiko
atk-s0502a:3848_1: ekadivasaṃ pitaraṃ upasaṅkamitvā āha – “icchāmahaṃ, tāta, bārāṇasiṃ gantvā mante
atk-s0502a:3848_2: ajjhāyitu”nti. Atha naṃ pitā āha – “tena hi, tāta, asuko nāma brāhmaṇo mama sahāyako,
atk-s0502a:3848_3: tassa santikaṃ gantvā adhīyassū”ti. So “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā anupubbena bārāṇasiṃ
atk-s0502a:3848_4: gantvā taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pitarā pahitabhāvamācikkhi. Atha naṃ so “sahāyakassa
atk-s0502a:3848_5: me putto”ti sampaṭicchitvā paṭipassaddhadarathaṃ bhaddakena divasena mante vācetumārabhi.
atk-s0502a:3848_6: So lahuñca gaṇhanto bahuñca gaṇhanto attano uggahituggahitaṃ suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittasīhatelamiva
atk-s0502a:3848_7: avinassamānaṃ dhārento na cirasseva ācariyassa sammukhato uggaṇhitabbaṃ sabbaṃ uggaṇhitvā
atk-s0502a:3848_8: sajjhāyaṃ karonto attano uggahitasippassa ādimajjhameva passati, no pariyosānaṃ.
atk-s0502a:3849_0: So ācariyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “ahaṃ imassa sippassa ādimajjhameva passāmi, no pariyosāna”nti
atk-s0502a:3849_1: vatvā ācariyena “ahampi, tāta, na passāmī”ti vutte “atha ko, ācariya, pariyosānaṃ
atk-s0502a:3849_2: jānātī”ti pucchitvā “ime, tāta, isayo isipatane viharanti, te jāneyyuṃ, tesaṃ santikaṃ
atk-s0502a:3849_3: upasaṅkamitvā pucchassū”ti ācariyena vutte paccekabuddhe upasaṅkamitvā pucchi – “tumhe
atk-s0502a:3849_4: kira pariyosānaṃ jānāthā”ti? “Āma, jānāmā”ti. “Tena hi me ācikkhathā”ti? “Na mayaṃ
atk-s0502a:3849_5: apabbajitassa ācikkhāma. Sace te pariyosānenattho, pabbajassū”ti. So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā
atk-s0502a:3849_6: tesaṃ santike pabbaji. Athassa te “idaṃ tāva sikkhassū”ti vatvā “evaṃ te nivāsetabbaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3849_7: evaṃ pārupitabba”ntiādinā nayena ābhisamācārikaṃ ācikkhiṃsu. So tattha sikkhanto
atk-s0502a:3849_9: gaganatale puṇṇacando viya pākaṭo lābhaggayasaggappatto ahosi, so appāyukasaṃvattanikassa
atk-s0502a:3849_10: kammassa katattā na cirasseva parinibbāyi. Athassa paccekabuddhā ca mahājano ca sarīrakiccaṃ
atk-s0502a:3849_11: katvā dhātuyo ca gahetvā nagaradvāre thūpaṃ kāresuṃ.
atk-s0502a:3850_0: Saṅkhopi brāhmaṇo “putto me ciraṃ gato, pavattimassa jānissāmī”ti taṃ daṭṭhukāmo
atk-s0502a:3850_1: takkasilāto nikkhamitvā anupubbena bārāṇasiṃ patvā mahājanakāyaṃ sannipatitaṃ disvā
atk-s0502a:3850_2: “addhā imesu ekopi me puttassa pavattiṃ jānissatī”ti upasaṅkamitvā pucchi – “susīmo
atk-s0502a:3850_3: nāma māṇavo idhāgami, api nu kho tassa pavattiṃ jānāthā”ti? “Āma, brāhmaṇa, jānāma,
atk-s0502a:3850_4: asukassa brāhmaṇassa santike tayo vede sajjhāyitvā pabbajitvā paccekasambodhiṃ sacchikatvā
atk-s0502a:3850_5: parinibbuto, ayamassa thūpo patiṭṭhāpito”ti. So bhūmiṃ hatthena paharitvā roditvā
atk-s0502a:3850_6: kanditvā taṃ cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ gantvā tiṇāni uddharitvā uttarasāṭakena vālukaṃ āharitvā
atk-s0502a:3850_7: cetiyaṅgaṇe ākiritvā kamaṇḍaluto udakena paripphositvā vanapupphehi pūjaṃ katvā sāṭakena
atk-s0502a:3850_8: paṭākaṃ āropetvā thūpassa upari attano chattakaṃ bandhitvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:3851_0: Satthā idaṃ atītaṃ āharitvā “tadā, bhikkhave, ahaṃ saṅkho brāhmaṇo ahosiṃ. Mayā susīmassa
atk-s0502a:3851_1: paccekabuddhassa cetiyaṅgaṇe tiṇāni uddhaṭāni, tassa me kammassa nissandena aṭṭhayojanamaggaṃ
atk-s0502a:3851_2: vihatakhāṇukakaṇṭakaṃ katvā suddhaṃ samatalaṃ kariṃsu. Mayā tattha vālukā okiṇṇā,
atk-s0502a:3851_3: tassa me nissandena aṭṭhayojanamagge vālukaṃ okiriṃsu. Mayā tattha vanakusumehi pūjā
atk-s0502a:3851_4: katā, tassa me nissandena aṭṭhayojanamagge nānāvaṇṇāni pupphāni okiṇṇāni, ekayojanaṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a:3851_5: gaṅgāya udakaṃ pañcavaṇṇehi padumehi sañchannaṃ. Mayā tattha kamaṇḍaluudakena bhūmi
atk-s0502a:3851_6: paripphositā, tassa me nissandena vesāliyaṃ pokkharavassaṃ vassi. Mayā tattha paṭākā,
atk-s0502a:3851_7: āropitā, chattakañca baddhaṃ, tassa me nissandena yāva akaniṭṭhabhavanā dhajapaṭākachattātichattādīhi
atk-s0502a:3851_8: sakalacakkavāḷagabbhaṃ ekussavaṃ viya jātaṃ. Iti kho, bhikkhave, esa pūjāsakkāro
atk-s0502a:3851_9: mayhaṃ neva buddhānubhāvena nibbatto, na nāgadevabrahmānubhāvena, atīte pana appamattakapariccāgānubhāvenā”ti
atk-s0502a:3854: Caje mattāsukhaṃ dhīro, sampassaṃ vipulaṃ sukha”nti.
atk-s0502a:3855_0: Tattha mattāsukhapariccāgāti mattāsukhanti pamāṇayuttakaṃ parittasukhaṃ vuccati,
atk-s0502a:3855_1: tassa pariccāgena. Vipulaṃ sukhanti uḷāraṃ sukhaṃ nibbānasukhaṃ vuccati, taṃ ce passeyyāti
atk-s0502a:3855_2: attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – ekañhi bhojanapātiṃ sajjāpetvā bhuñjantassa mattāsukhaṃ
atk-s0502a:3855_3: nāma uppajjati, taṃ pana pariccajitvā uposathaṃ vā karontassa dānaṃ vā dadantassa
atk-s0502a:3855_4: vipulaṃ uḷāraṃ nibbānasukhaṃ nāma nibbattati. Tasmā sace evaṃ tassa mattāsukhassa
atk-s0502a:3855_5: pariccāgā vipulaṃ sukhaṃ passati, athetaṃ vipulaṃ sukhaṃ sammā passanto paṇḍito taṃ
atk-s0502a:3859: Paradukkhūpadhānenāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ kukkuṭaaṇḍakhādikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3860_0: Sāvatthiyā kira avidūre paṇḍuraṃ nāma eko gāmo, tattheko kevaṭṭo vasati. So sāvatthiṃ
atk-s0502a:3860_1: gacchanto aciravatiyaṃ kacchapaaṇḍāni disvā tāni ādāya sāvatthiṃ gantvā ekasmiṃ gehe
atk-s0502a:3860_2: pacāpetvā khādanto tasmiṃ gehe kumārikāyapi ekaṃ aṇḍaṃ adāsi. Sā taṃ khāditvā tato
atk-s0502a:3860_3: paṭṭhāya aññaṃ khādanīyaṃ nāma na icchi. Athassā mātā kukkuṭiyā vijātaṭṭhānato ekaṃ
atk-s0502a:3860_4: aṇḍaṃ gahetvā adāsi. Sā taṃ khāditvā rasataṇhāya baddhā tato paṭṭhāya sayameva kukkuṭiyā
atk-s0502a:3860_5: aṇḍāni gahetvā khādati. Kukkuṭī vijātavijātakāle taṃ attano aṇḍāni gahetvā khādantiṃ
atk-s0502a:3860_6: disvā tāya upaddutā āghātaṃ bandhitvā “ito dāni cutā yakkhinī hutvā tava jātadārake
atk-s0502a:3860_7: khādituṃ samatthā hutvā nibbatteyya”nti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā kālaṃ katvā tasmiṃyeva
atk-s0502a:3860_8: gehe majjārī hutvā nibbatti. Itarāpi kālaṃ katvā tattheva kukkuṭī hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:3860_9: Kukkuṭī aṇḍāni vijāyi, majjārī āgantvā tāni khāditvā dutiyampi tatiyampi khādiyeva.
atk-s0502a:3860_10: Kukkuṭī “tayo vāre mama aṇḍāni khāditvā idāni mampi khāditukāmāsi, ito cutā saputtakaṃ
atk-s0502a:3860_11: taṃ khādituṃ labheyya”nti patthanaṃ katvā tato cutā dīpinī hutvā nibbatti. Itarāpi
atk-s0502a:3860_12: kālaṃ katvā migī hutvā nibbatti. Tassā vijātakāle dīpinī āgantvā taṃ saddhiṃ puttehi
atk-s0502a:3860_13: khādi. Evaṃ khādantā pañcasu attabhāvasatesu aññamaññassa dukkhaṃ uppādetvā avasāne
atk-s0502a:3860_14: ekā yakkhinī hutvā nibbatti, ekā sāvatthiyaṃ kuladhītā hutvā nibbatti. Ito paraṃ
atk-s0502a:3860_15: “na hi verena verānī”ti gāthāya vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Idha pana satthā “verañhi
atk-s0502a:3860_16: averena upasammati, no verenā”ti vatvā ubhinnampi dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3864_0: Tattha paradukkhūpadhānenāti parasmiṃ dukkhūpadhānena, parassa dukkhuppādanenāti
atk-s0502a:3864_2: vasena aññamaññaṃ katena verasaṃsaggena saṃsaṭṭho. Verā so na parimuccatīti niccakālaṃ
atk-s0502a:3865: Desanāvasāne yakkhinī saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya pañca sīlāni samādiyitvā verato mucci, itarāpi sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:3868: Yañhi kiccanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā bhaddiyaṃ nissāya jātiyāvane viharanto bhaddiye bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3869_0: Te kira pādukamaṇḍane uyyuttā ahesuṃ. Yathāha – “tena kho pana samayena bhaddiyā
atk-s0502a:3869_1: bhikkhū anekavihitaṃ pādukamaṇḍanānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti, tiṇapādukaṃ karontipi
atk-s0502a:3869_2: kārāpentipi, muñjapādukaṃ karontipi kārāpentipi, pabbajapādukaṃ hintālapādukaṃ kamalapādukaṃ
atk-s0502a:3869_3: kambalapādukaṃ karontipi kārāpentipi, riñcanti uddesaṃ paripucchaṃ adhisīlaṃ adhicittaṃ
atk-s0502a:3869_4: adhipañña”nti. Bhikkhū tesaṃ tathākaraṇabhāvaṃ jānitvā ujjhāyitvā satthu ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:3869_5: Satthā te bhikkhū garahitvā, “bhikkhave, tumhe aññena kiccena āgatā aññasmiṃyeva
atk-s0502a:3869_6: kicce uyyuttā”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3875: Akiccaṃ te na sevanti, kicce sātaccakārino;
atk-s0502a:3877_0: Tattha yañhi kiccanti bhikkhuno hi pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya aparimāṇasīlakkhandhagopanaṃ
atk-s0502a:3877_1: araññāvāso dhutaṅgapariharaṇaṃ bhāvanārāmatāti evamādīni kiccaṃ nāma. Imehi pana
atk-s0502a:3877_2: yaṃ attano kiccaṃ, taṃ apaviddhaṃ chaḍḍitaṃ. Akiccanti bhikkhuno chattamaṇḍanaṃ upāhanamaṇḍanaṃ
atk-s0502a:3877_4: taṃ kayirati, tesaṃ mānanaḷaṃ ukkhipitvā caraṇena unnaḷānaṃ sativossaggena pamattānaṃ
atk-s0502a:3877_5: cattāro āsavā vaḍḍhantīti attho. Susamāraddhāti supaggahitā. Kāyagatā satīti kāyānupassanābhāvanā.
atk-s0502a:3877_6: Akiccanti te etaṃ chattamaṇḍanādikaṃ akiccaṃ na sevanti na karontīti attho. Kicceti
atk-s0502a:3877_7: pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya kattabbe aparimāṇasīlakkhandhagopanādike karaṇīye. Sātaccakārinoti
atk-s0502a:3877_8: satatakārino aṭṭhitakārino. Tesaṃ satiyā avippavāsena satānaṃ sātthakasampajaññaṃ
atk-s0502a:3877_9: sappāyasampajaññaṃ gocarasampajaññaṃ asammohasampajaññanti catūhi sampajaññehi sampajānānaṃ
atk-s0502a:3877_10: cattāropi āsavā atthaṃ gacchanti, parikkhayaṃ abhāvaṃ gacchantīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3878: Desanāvasāne te bhikkhū arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:3881: Mātaranti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto lakuṇḍakabhaddiyattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3882_0: Ekadivasañhi sambahulā āgantukā bhikkhū satthāraṃ divāṭṭhāne nisinnaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0502a:3882_1: vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu. Tasmiṃ khaṇe lakuṇḍakabhaddiyatthero bhagavato avidūre
atk-s0502a:3882_2: atikkamati. Satthā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cittācāraṃ ñatvā oloketvā “passatha, bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a:3882_3: ayaṃ bhikkhu mātāpitaro hantvā niddukkho hutvā yātī”ti vatvā tehi bhikkhūhi “kiṃ
atk-s0502a:3882_4: nu kho satthā vadatī”ti aññamaññaṃ mukhāni oloketvā saṃsayapakkhandehi, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:3882_5: kiṃ nāmetaṃ vadethā”ti vutte tesaṃ dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3884: “Mātaraṃ pitaraṃ hantvā, rājāno dve ca khattiye;
atk-s0502a:3885: Raṭṭhaṃ sānucaraṃ hantvā, anīgho yāti brāhmaṇo”ti.
atk-s0502a:3886_0: Tattha sānucaranti āyasādhakena āyuttakena sahitaṃ. Ettha hi “taṇhā janeti purisa”nti
atk-s0502a:3886_1: vacanato tīsu bhavesu sattānaṃ jananato taṇhā mātā nāma. “Ahaṃ asukassa nāma rañño
atk-s0502a:3886_2: vā rājamahāmattassa vā putto”ti pitaraṃ nissāya asmimānassa uppajjanato asmimāno
atk-s0502a:3886_3: pitā nāma. Loko viya rājānaṃ yasmā sabbadiṭṭhigatāni dve sassatucchedadiṭṭhiyo bhajanti,
atk-s0502a:3886_4: tasmā dve sassatucchedadiṭṭhiyo dve khattiyarājāno nāma. Dvādasāyatanāni vitthataṭṭhena
atk-s0502a:3886_5: raṭṭhadisattā raṭṭhaṃ nāma. Āyasādhako āyuttakapuriso viya tannissito nandirāgo anucaro
atk-s0502a:3886_6: nāma. Anīghoti niddukkho. Brāhmaṇoti khīṇāsavo. Etesaṃ taṇhādīnaṃ arahattamaggañāṇāsinā
atk-s0502a:3886_7: hatattā khīṇāsavo niddukkho hutvā yātīti ayametthattho.
atk-s0502a:3888: Dutiyagāthāyapi vatthu purimasadisameva. Tadā hi satthā lakuṇḍakabhaddiyattherameva ārabbha kathesi. Tesaṃ dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3890: “Mātaraṃ pitaraṃ hantvā, rājāno dve ca sotthiye;
atk-s0502a:3892_0: Tattha dve ca sotthiyeti dve ca brāhmaṇe. Imissā gāthāya satthā attano dhammissaratāya
atk-s0502a:3892_1: ca desanāvidhikusalatāya ca sassatucchedadiṭṭhiyo dve brāhmaṇarājāno ca katvā kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3892_2: Veyagghapañcamanti ettha byagghānucarito sappaṭibhayo duppaṭipanno maggo veyaggho
atk-s0502a:3892_3: nāma, vicikicchānīvaraṇampi tena sadisatāya veyagghaṃ nāma, taṃ pañcamaṃ assāti nīvaraṇapañcakaṃ
atk-s0502a:3892_4: veyagghapañcamaṃ nāma. Idañca veyagghapañcamaṃ arahattamaggañāṇāsinā nissesaṃ hantvā
atk-s0502a:3892_5: anīghova yāti brāhmaṇoti ayametthattho. Sesaṃ purimasadisamevāti.
atk-s0502a:3895: Suppabuddhanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto dārusākaṭikassa puttaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3896_0: Rājagahasmiñhi sammādiṭṭhikaputto micchādiṭṭhikaputtoti dve dārakā abhikkhaṇaṃ guḷakīḷaṃ
atk-s0502a:3896_1: kīḷanti. Tesu sammādiṭṭhikaputto guḷaṃ khipamāno buddhānussatiṃ āvajjetvā “namo buddhassā”ti
atk-s0502a:3896_2: vatvā vatvā guḷaṃ khipati. Itaro titthiyaguṇe uddisitvā “namo arahantāna”nti vatvā
atk-s0502a:3896_3: vatvā khipati. Tesu sammādiṭṭhikassa putto jināti, itaro pana parājayati. So tassa
atk-s0502a:3896_4: kiriyaṃ disvā “ayaṃ evaṃ anussaritvā evaṃ vatvā guḷaṃ khipanto mamaṃ jināti, ahampi
atk-s0502a:3896_5: evarūpaṃ karissāmī”ti buddhānussatiyaṃ paricayamakāsi. Athekadivasaṃ tassa pitā sakaṭaṃ
atk-s0502a:3896_6: yojetvā dārūnaṃ atthāya gacchanto tampi dārakaṃ ādāya gantvā aṭaviyaṃ dārūnaṃ sakaṭaṃ
atk-s0502a:3896_7: pūretvā āgacchanto bahinagare susānasāmante udakaphāsukaṭṭhāne goṇe mocetvā bhattavissaggamakāsi.
atk-s0502a:3896_8: Athassa te goṇā sāyanhasamaye nagaraṃ pavisantena gogaṇena saddhiṃ nagarameva pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3896_9: Sākaṭikopi goṇe anubandhanto nagaraṃ pavisitvā sāyaṃ goṇe disvā ādāya nikkhamanto
atk-s0502a:3896_10: dvāraṃ na sampāpuṇi. Tasmiñhi asampatteyeva dvāraṃ pihitaṃ.
atk-s0502a:3897_0: Athassa putto ekakova rattibhāge sakaṭassa heṭṭhā nipajjitvā niddaṃ okkami. Rājagahaṃ
atk-s0502a:3897_1: pana pakatiyāpi amanussabahulaṃ. Ayañca susānasantike nipanno. Tattha naṃ dve amanussā
atk-s0502a:3897_2: passiṃsu. Eko sāsanassa paṭikaṇḍako micchādiṭṭhiko, eko sammādiṭṭhiko. Tesu micchādiṭṭhiko
atk-s0502a:3897_3: āha – “ayaṃ no bhakkho, imaṃ khādissāmā”ti. Itaro “alaṃ mā te ruccī”ti nivāreti.
atk-s0502a:3897_4: So tena nivāriyamānopi tassa vacanaṃ anādiyitvā dārakaṃ pādesu gahetvā ākaḍḍhi. So
atk-s0502a:3897_5: buddhānussatiyā paricitattā tasmiṃ khaṇe “namo buddhassā”ti āha. Amanusso mahābhayabhīto
atk-s0502a:3897_6: paṭikkamitvā aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ itaro “amhehi akiccaṃ kataṃ, daṇḍakammaṃ tassa karomā”ti
atk-s0502a:3897_7: vatvā taṃ rakkhamāno aṭṭhāsi. Micchādiṭṭhiko nagaraṃ pavisitvā rañño bhojanapātiṃ
atk-s0502a:3897_8: pūretvā bhojanaṃ āhari. Atha naṃ ubhopi tassa mātāpitaro viya hutvā upaṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0502a:3897_9: bhojetvā “imāni akkharāni rājāva passatu, mā añño”ti taṃ pavattiṃ pakāsentā yakkhānubhāvena
atk-s0502a:3897_10: bhojanapātiyaṃ akkharāni chinditvā pātiṃ dārusakaṭe pakkhipitvā sabbarattiṃ ārakkhaṃ katvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3898_0: Punadivase “rājakulato corehi bhojanabhaṇḍaṃ avahaṭa”nti kolāhalaṃ karontā dvārāni
atk-s0502a:3898_1: pidahitvā olokentā tattha apassantā nagarā nikkhamitvā ito cito ca olokentā dārusakaṭe
atk-s0502a:3898_2: suvaṇṇapātiṃ disvā “ayaṃ coro”ti taṃ dārakaṃ gahetvā rañño dassesuṃ. Rājā akkharāni
atk-s0502a:3898_3: disvā “kiṃ etaṃ, tātā”ti pucchitvā “nāhaṃ, deva, jānāmi, mātāpitaro me āgantvā rattiṃ
atk-s0502a:3898_4: bhojetvā rakkhamānā aṭṭhaṃsu, ahampi mātāpitaro maṃ rakkhantīti nibbhayova niddaṃ
atk-s0502a:3898_5: upagato. Ettakaṃ ahaṃ jānāmī”ti. Athassa mātāpitaropi taṃ ṭhānaṃ āgamaṃsu. Rājā taṃ
atk-s0502a:3898_6: pavattiṃ ñatvā te tayopi jane ādāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā sabbaṃ ārocetvā “kiṃ nu
atk-s0502a:3898_7: kho, bhante, buddhānussati eva rakkhā hoti, udāhu dhammānussatiādayopī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a:3898_8: Athassa satthā, “mahārāja, na kevalaṃ buddhānussatiyeva rakkhā, yesaṃ pana chabbidhena
atk-s0502a:3898_9: cittaṃ subhāvitaṃ, tesaṃ aññena rakkhāvaraṇena vā mantosadhehi vā kiccaṃ natthī”ti
atk-s0502a:3898_10: vatvā cha ṭhānāni dassento imā gāthā abhāsi.
atk-s0502a:3901: Yesaṃ divā ca ratto ca, niccaṃ buddhagatā sati.
atk-s0502a:3904: Yesaṃ divā ca ratto ca, niccaṃ dhammagatā sati.
atk-s0502a:3907: Yesaṃ divā ca ratto ca, niccaṃ saṅghagatā sati.
atk-s0502a:3910: Yesaṃ divā ca ratto ca, niccaṃ kāyagatā sati.
atk-s0502a:3913: Yesaṃ divā ca ratto ca, ahiṃsāya rato mano.
atk-s0502a:3916: Yesaṃ divā ca ratto ca, bhāvanāya rato mano”ti.
atk-s0502a:3917_0: Tattha suppabuddhaṃ pabujjhantīti buddhagataṃ satiṃ gahetvā supantā, gahetvāyeva
atk-s0502a:3917_1: ca pabujjhantā suppabuddhaṃ pabujjhanti nāma. Sadā gotamasāvakāti gotamagottassa
atk-s0502a:3917_2: buddhassa savanante jātattā tasseva anusāsaniyā savanatāya gotamasāvakā. Buddhagatā
atk-s0502a:3917_3: satīti yesaṃ “itipi so bhagavā”tiādippabhede buddhaguṇe ārabbha uppajjamānā sati
atk-s0502a:3917_4: niccakālaṃ atthi, te sadāpi suppabuddhaṃ pabujjhantīti attho. Tathā asakkontā pana
atk-s0502a:3917_5: ekadivasaṃ tīsu kālesu dvīsu kālesu ekasmimpi kāle buddhānussatiṃ manasi karontā
atk-s0502a:3917_6: suppabuddhaṃ pabujjhantiyeva nāma. Dhammagatā satīti “svākhāto bhagavatā dhammo”tiādippabhede
atk-s0502a:3917_7: dhammaguṇe ārabbha uppajjamānā sati. Saṅghagatā satīti “suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho”tiādippabhede
atk-s0502a:3917_8: saṅghaguṇe ārabbha uppajjamānā sati. Kāyagatā satīti dvattiṃsākāravasena vā navasivathikāvasena
atk-s0502a:3917_9: vā catudhātuvavatthānavasena vā ajjhattanīlakasiṇādirūpajjhānavasena vā uppajjamānā
atk-s0502a:3917_10: sati. Ahiṃsāya ratoti “so karuṇāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”ti
atk-s0502a:3917_11: evaṃ vuttāya karuṇābhāvanāya rato. Bhāvanāyāti mettābhāvanāya. Kiñcāpi heṭṭhā karuṇābhāvanāya
atk-s0502a:3917_12: vuttattā idha sabbāpi avasesā bhāvanā nāma, idha pana mettābhāvanāva adhippetā. Sesaṃ
atk-s0502a:3918: Desanāvasāne dārako saddhiṃ mātāpitūhi sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. Pacchā pana pabbajitvā sabbepi arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:3921_0: Duppabbajjanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā vesāliṃ nissāya mahāvane viharanto aññataraṃ
atk-s0502a:3921_1: vajjiputtakaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – aññataro vajjiputtako
atk-s0502a:3921_2: bhikkhu vesāliyaṃ viharati aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe, tena kho pana samayena vesāliyaṃ
atk-s0502a:3921_3: sabbarattichaṇo hoti. Atha kho so bhikkhu vesāliyā tūriyatāḷitavāditanigghosasaddaṃ
atk-s0502a:3921_4: sutvā paridevamāno tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3926_0: So kira vajjiraṭṭhe rājaputto vārena sampattaṃ rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajito vesāliyaṃ
atk-s0502a:3926_1: cātumahārājikehi saddhiṃ ekābaddhaṃ katvā sakalanagare dhajapaṭākādīhi paṭimaṇḍite
atk-s0502a:3926_2: komudiyā puṇṇamāya sabbarattiṃ chaṇavāre vattamāne bheriyādīnaṃ tūriyānaṃ tāḷitānaṃ
atk-s0502a:3926_3: nigghosaṃ vīṇādīnañca vāditānaṃ saddaṃ sutvā yāni vesāliyaṃ satta rājasahassāni satta
atk-s0502a:3926_4: rājasatāni satta rājāno, tattakā eva ca nesaṃ uparājasenāpatiādayo, tesu alaṅkatapaṭiyattesu
atk-s0502a:3926_5: nakkhattakīḷanatthāya vīthiṃ otiṇṇesu saṭṭhihatthe mahācaṅkame caṅkamamāno gaganamajjhe
atk-s0502a:3926_6: ṭhitaṃ puṇṇacandaṃ disvā caṅkamakoṭiyaṃ phalakaṃ nissāya ṭhito veṭhanālaṅkāravirahitattā
atk-s0502a:3926_7: vane chaḍḍitadārukaṃ viya attabhāvaṃ oloketvā “atthi nu kho añño amhehi lāmakataro”ti
