atk-s0502a:3926_8: cintento pakatiyā āraññakādiguṇayuttopi tasmiṃ khaṇe anabhiratiyā pīḷito evamāha.
atk-s0502a:3926_9: So tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthāya devatāya “imaṃ bhikkhuṃ saṃvejessāmī”ti adhippāyena –
atk-s0502a:3927: “Ekakova tvaṃ araññe viharasi, apaviddhaṃva vanasmiṃ dārukaṃ;
atk-s0502a:3928: Tassa te bahukā pihayanti, nerayikā viya saggagāmina”nti. –
atk-s0502a:3929_0: Vuttaṃ imaṃ gāthaṃ sutvā punadivase satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā nisīdi. Satthā
atk-s0502a:3929_1: taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā gharāvāsassa dukkhataṃ pakāsetukāmo pañca dukkhāni samodhānetvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3933: Tasmā na caddhagū siyā, na ca dukkhānupatito siyā”ti.
atk-s0502a:3934_0: Tattha duppabbajjanti appaṃ vā mahantaṃ vā bhogakkhandhañceva ñātiparivaṭṭañca pahāya
atk-s0502a:3934_1: imasmiṃ sāsane uraṃ datvā pabbajjaṃ nāma dukkhaṃ. Durabhiramanti evaṃ pabbajitenāpi
atk-s0502a:3934_3: abhiramituṃ dukkhaṃ. Durāvāsāti yasmā pana gharaṃ āvasantena rājūnaṃ rājakiccaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3934_4: issarānaṃ issarakiccaṃ vahitabbaṃ, parijanā ceva dhammikā samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca saṅgahitabbā.
atk-s0502a:3934_5: Evaṃ santepi gharāvāso chiddaghaṭo viya mahāsamuddo viya ca duppūro. Tasmā gharāvāsā
atk-s0502a:3934_6: nāmete durāvāsā dukkhā āvasituṃ, teneva kāraṇena dukkhāti attho. Dukkho samānasaṃvāsoti
atk-s0502a:3934_7: gihino vā hi ye jātigottakulabhogehi pabbajitā vā sīlācārabāhusaccādīhi samānāpi
atk-s0502a:3934_8: hutvā “kosi tvaṃ, kosmi aha”ntiādīni vatvā adhikaraṇapasutā honti, te asamānā nāma,
atk-s0502a:3934_9: tehi saddhiṃ saṃvāso dukkhoti attho. Dukkhānupatitaddhagūti ye vaṭṭasaṅkhātaṃ addhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:3934_10: paṭipannattā addhagū, te dukkhe anupatitāva. Tasmā na caddhagūti yasmā dukkhānupatitabhāvopi
atk-s0502a:3934_11: dukkho addhagūbhāvopi, tasmā vaṭṭasaṅkhātaṃ addhānaṃ gamanatāya addhagū na bhaveyya,
atk-s0502a:3934_12: vuttappakārena dukkhena anupatitopi na bhaveyyāti attho.
atk-s0502a:3935: Desanāvasāne so bhikkhu pañcasu ṭhānesu dassite dukkhe nibbindanto pañcorambhāgiyāni pañca uddhambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni padāletvā arahatte patiṭṭhahīti.
atk-s0502a:3938_0: Saddhoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto cittagahapatiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3938_1: Vatthu bālavagge “asantaṃ bhāvanamiccheyyā”ti gāthāvaṇṇanāya vitthāritaṃ. Gāthāpi
atk-s0502a:3939_0: “Kiṃ pana, bhante, etassa tumhākaṃ santikaṃ āgacchantassevāyaṃ lābhasakkāro uppajjati,
atk-s0502a:3939_1: udāhu aññattha gacchantassāpi uppajjatī”ti. “Ānanda, mama santikaṃ āgacchantassāpi
atk-s0502a:3939_2: aññattha gacchantassāpi tassa uppajjateva. Ayañhi upāsako saddho pasanno sampannasīlo,
atk-s0502a:3939_3: evarūpo puggalo yaṃ yaṃ padesaṃ bhajati, tattha tatthevassa lābhasakkāro nibbattatī”ti
atk-s0502a:3942: Yaṃ yaṃ padesaṃ bhajati, tattha tattheva pūjito”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:3943_0: Tattha saddhoti lokiyalokuttarasaddhāya samannāgato. Sīlenāti āgāriyasīlaṃ, anāgāriyasīlanti
atk-s0502a:3943_1: duvidhaṃ sīlaṃ. Tesu idha āgāriyasīlaṃ adhippetaṃ, tena samannāgatoti attho. Yasobhogasamappitoti
atk-s0502a:3943_3: yasena dhanadhaññādiko ceva sattavidhaariyadhanasaṅkhāto cāti duvidho bhogo, tena
atk-s0502a:3943_4: samannāgatoti attho. Yaṃ yaṃ padesanti puratthimādīsu disāsu evarūpo kulaputto yaṃ
atk-s0502a:3943_5: yaṃ padesaṃ bhajati, tattha tattha evarūpena lābhasakkārena pūjitova hotīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3947: Dūre santoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto anāthapiṇḍikassa dhītaraṃ cūḷasubhaddaṃ nāma ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3948_0: Anāthapiṇḍikassa kira daharakālato paṭṭhāya ugganagaravāsī uggo nāma seṭṭhiputto
atk-s0502a:3948_1: sahāyako ahosi. Te ekācariyakule sippaṃ uggaṇhantā aññamaññaṃ katikaṃ kariṃsu “amhākaṃ
atk-s0502a:3948_2: vayappattakāle puttadhītāsu jātāsu yo puttassa dhītaraṃ vāreti, tena tassa dhītā
atk-s0502a:3948_3: dātabbā”ti. Te ubhopi vayappattā attano attano nagare seṭṭhiṭṭhāne patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3948_4: Athekasmiṃ samaye uggaseṭṭhi vaṇijjaṃ payojento pañcahi sakaṭasatehi sāvatthiṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:3948_5: Anāthapiṇḍiko attano dhītaraṃ cūḷasubhaddaṃ āmantetvā, “amma, pitā te uggaseṭṭhi
atk-s0502a:3948_6: nāma āgato, tassa kattabbakiccaṃ sabbaṃ tava bhāro”ti āṇāpesi. Sā “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā
atk-s0502a:3948_7: tassa āgatadivasato paṭṭhāya sahattheneva sūpabyañjanādīni sampādeti, mālāgandhavilepanādīni
atk-s0502a:3948_8: abhisaṅkharoti, bhojanakāle tassa nhānodakaṃ paṭiyādāpetvā nhānakālato paṭṭhāya sabbakiccāni sādhukaṃ karoti.
atk-s0502a:3949_0: Uggaseṭṭhi tassā ācārasampattiṃ disvā pasannacitto ekadivasaṃ anāthapiṇḍikena saddhiṃ
atk-s0502a:3949_1: sukhakathāya sannisinno “mayaṃ daharakāle evaṃ nāma katikaṃ karimhā”ti sāretvā cūḷasubhaddaṃ
atk-s0502a:3949_2: attano puttassatthāya vāresi. So pana pakatiyāva micchādiṭṭhiko. Tasmā dasabalassa
atk-s0502a:3949_3: tamatthaṃ ārocetvā satthārā uggaseṭṭhissūpanissayaṃ disvā anuññāto bhariyāya saddhiṃ
atk-s0502a:3949_4: mantetvā tassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā divasaṃ vavatthapetvā dhītaraṃ visākhaṃ datvā
atk-s0502a:3949_5: uyyojento dhanañcayaseṭṭhi viya mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ katvā subhaddaṃ āmantetvā, “amma,
atk-s0502a:3949_6: sasurakule vasantiyā nāma antoaggi bahi na nīharitabbo”ti dhanañcayaseṭṭhinā visākhāya
atk-s0502a:3949_7: dinnanayeneva dasa ovāde datvā “sace me gataṭṭhāne dhītu doso uppajjati, tumhehi
atk-s0502a:3949_8: sodhetabbo”ti aṭṭha kuṭumbike pāṭibhoge gahetvā tassā uyyojanadivase buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0502a:3949_9: bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā purimabhave dhītarā katānaṃ sucaritānaṃ phalavibhūtiṃ
atk-s0502a:3949_10: lokassa pākaṭaṃ katvā dassento viya mahantena sakkārena dhītaraṃ uyyojesi. Tassā
atk-s0502a:3949_11: anupubbena ugganagaraṃ pattakāle sasurakulena saddhiṃ mahājano paccuggamanamakāsi.
atk-s0502a:3950_0: Sāpi attano sirivibhavaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ visākhā viya sakalanagarassa attānaṃ dassentī
atk-s0502a:3950_1: rathe ṭhatvā nagaraṃ pavisitvā nāgarehi pesite paṇṇākāre gahetvā anurūpavasena tesaṃ
atk-s0502a:3950_2: tesaṃ pesentī sakalanagaraṃ attano guṇehi ekābaddhamakāsi. Maṅgaladivasādīsu panassā
atk-s0502a:3950_3: sasuro acelakānaṃ sakkāraṃ karonto “āgantvā amhākaṃ samaṇe vandatū”ti pesesi. Sā
atk-s0502a:3950_4: lajjāya nagge passituṃ asakkontī gantuṃ na icchati. So punappunaṃ pesetvāpi tāya
atk-s0502a:3950_5: paṭikkhitto kujjhitvā “nīharatha na”nti āha. Sā “na sakkā mama akāraṇena dosaṃ āropetu”nti
atk-s0502a:3950_6: kuṭumbike pakkosāpetvā tamatthaṃ ārocesi. Te tassā niddosabhāvaṃ ñatvā seṭṭhiṃ saññāpesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:3950_7: So “ayaṃ mama samaṇe ahirikāti na vandī”ti bhariyāya ārocesi. Sā “kīdisā nu kho imissā
atk-s0502a:3950_8: samaṇā, ativiya tesaṃ pasaṃsatī”ti taṃ pakkosāpetvā āha –
atk-s0502a:3951: “Kīdisā samaṇā tuyhaṃ, bāḷhaṃ kho ne pasaṃsasi;
atk-s0502a:3952: Kiṃsīlā kiṃsamācārā, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchitā”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:3953: Athassā subhaddā buddhānañceva buddhasāvakānañca guṇe pakāsentī –
atk-s0502a:3959: Puṇṇā suddhehi dhammehi, tādisā samaṇā mama.
atk-s0502a:3969_0: Atha naṃ “sakkā tava samaṇe amhākampi dassetu”nti vatvā “sakkā”ti vutte “tena hi
atk-s0502a:3969_1: yathā mayaṃ te passāma, tathā karohī”ti vutte sā “sādhū”ti buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0502a:3969_2: mahādānaṃ sajjetvā uparipāsādatale ṭhatvā jetavanābhimukhī sakkaccaṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena
atk-s0502a:3969_3: vanditvā buddhaguṇe āvajjetvā gandhavāsapupphadhumehi pūjaṃ katvā, “bhante, svātanāya
atk-s0502a:3969_4: buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantemi, iminā me saññāṇena satthā nimantitabhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:3969_5: jānātū”ti sumanapupphānaṃ aṭṭha muṭṭhiyo ākāse khipi. Pupphāni gantvā catuparisamajjhe
atk-s0502a:3969_6: dhammaṃ desentassa satthuno upari mālāvitānaṃ hutvā aṭṭhaṃsu. Tasmiṃ khaṇe anāthapiṇḍikopi
atk-s0502a:3969_7: dhammakathaṃ sutvā svātanāya satthāraṃ nimantesi. Satthā “adhivutthaṃ mayā, gahapati,
atk-s0502a:3969_8: svātanāya bhatta”nti vatvā, “bhante, mayā puretaraṃ āgato natthi, kassa nu kho vo
atk-s0502a:3969_9: adhivuttha”nti vutte “cūḷasubhaddāya, gahapati, nimantito”ti vatvā “nanu, bhante,
atk-s0502a:3969_10: cūḷasubhaddā dūre vasati ito vīsatiyojanasatamatthake”ti vutte, “āma gahapati, dūre
atk-s0502a:3969_11: vasantāpi hi sappurisā abhimukhe ṭhitā viya pakāsentī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3972: Asantettha na dissanti, rattiṃ khittā yathā sarā”ti.
atk-s0502a:3973_0: Tattha santoti rāgādīnaṃ santatāya buddhādayo santā nāma. Idha pana pubbabuddhesu
atk-s0502a:3973_1: katādhikārā ussannakusalamūlā bhāvitabhāvanā sattā santoti adhippetā. Pakāsentīti
atk-s0502a:3973_2: dūre ṭhitāpi buddhānaṃ ñāṇapathaṃ āgacchantā pākaṭā honti. Himavanto vāti yathā hi
atk-s0502a:3973_4: himavantapabbato dūre ṭhitānampi abhimukhe ṭhito viya pakāseti, evaṃ pakāsentīti
atk-s0502a:3973_5: attho. Asantetthāti diṭṭhadhammagarukā vitiṇṇaparalokā āmisacakkhukā jīvikatthāya
atk-s0502a:3973_6: pabbajitā bālapuggalā asanto nāma, te ettha buddhānaṃ dakkhiṇassa jāṇumaṇḍalassa
atk-s0502a:3973_7: santike nisinnāpi na dissanti na paññāyanti. Rattiṃ khittāti rattiṃ caturaṅgasamannāgate
atk-s0502a:3973_8: andhakāre khittasarā viya tathārūpassa upanissayabhūtassa pubbahetuno abhāvena na paññāyantīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3975_0: Sakko devarājā “satthārā subhaddāya nimantanaṃ adhivāsita”nti ñatvā vissakammadevaputtaṃ
atk-s0502a:3975_1: āṇāpesi – “pañca kūṭāgārasatāni nimminitvā sve buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ugganagaraṃ
atk-s0502a:3975_2: nehī”ti. So punadivase pañcasatāni kūṭāgārāni nimminitvā jetavanadvāre aṭṭhāsi. Satthā
atk-s0502a:3975_3: uccinitvā visuddhakhīṇāsavānaṃyeva pañcasatāni ādāya saparivāro kūṭāgāresu nisīditvā
atk-s0502a:3975_4: ugganagaraṃ agamāsi. Uggaseṭṭhipi saparivāro subhaddāya dinnanayeneva tathāgatassa
atk-s0502a:3975_5: āgatamaggaṃ olokento satthāraṃ mahantena sirivibhavena āgacchantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso
atk-s0502a:3975_6: mālādīhi mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ karonto saparivāro sampaṭicchitvā vanditvā mahādānaṃ datvā
atk-s0502a:3975_7: punappunaṃ nimantetvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ adāsi. Satthāpissa sappāyaṃ sallakkhetvā
atk-s0502a:3975_8: dhammaṃ desesi. Taṃ ādiṃ katvā caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
atk-s0502a:3975_9: Satthā “cūḷasubhaddāya anuggahaṇatthaṃ tvaṃ idheva hohī”ti anuruddhattheraṃ nivattāpetvā
atk-s0502a:3975_10: sāvatthimeva agamāsi. Tato paṭṭhāya taṃ nagaraṃ saddhāsampannaṃ ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:3978: Ekāsananti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekavihārittheraṃ nāma ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3979_0: So kira thero ekakova seyyaṃ kappeti, ekakova nisīdati, ekakova caṅkamati, ekakova
atk-s0502a:3979_1: tiṭṭhatīti catuparisantare pākaṭo ahosi. Atha naṃ bhikkhū, “bhante, evarūpo nāmāyaṃ
atk-s0502a:3979_2: thero”ti tathāgatassārocesuṃ. Satthā “sādhu sādhū”ti tassa sādhukāraṃ datvā “bhikkhunā
atk-s0502a:3979_3: nāma pavivittena bhavitabba”nti viveke ānisaṃsaṃ kathetvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3983_0: Tattha ekāsanaṃ ekaseyyanti bhikkhusahassamajjhepi mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ avijahitvā teneva
atk-s0502a:3983_1: manasikārena nisinnassa āsanaṃ ekāsanaṃ nāma. Lohapāsādasadisepi ca pāsāde bhikkhusahassamajjhepi
atk-s0502a:3983_2: paññatte vicitrapaccattharaṇūpadhāne mahārahe sayane satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā dakkhiṇena
atk-s0502a:3983_3: passena mūlakammaṭṭhānamanasikārena nipannassa bhikkhuno seyyā ekaseyyā nāma. Evarūpaṃ
atk-s0502a:3983_4: ekāsanañca ekaseyyañca bhajethāti attho. Atanditoti jaṅghabalaṃ nissāya jīvitakappanena
atk-s0502a:3983_5: akusīto hutvā sabbīriyāpathesu ekakova carantoti attho. Eko damayanti rattiṭṭhānādīsu
atk-s0502a:3983_6: kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjitvā maggaphalādhigamavasena ekova hutvā attānaṃ damentoti attho.
atk-s0502a:3983_7: Vanante ramito siyāti evaṃ attānaṃ damento itthipurisasaddādīhi pavivitte vananteyeva
atk-s0502a:3983_8: abhiramito bhaveyya. Na hi sakkā ākiṇṇavihārinā evaṃ attānaṃ dametunti attho.
atk-s0502a:3984: Desanāvasāne bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pāpuṇiṃsu. Tato paṭṭhāya mahājano ekavihārikameva patthesīti.
atk-s0502a:3990: Abhūtavādīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sundariṃ paribbājikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3991_0: “Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā sakkato hoti garukato mānito pūjito”ti vatthu vitthārato
atk-s0502a:3991_1: udāne āgatameva. Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepo – bhagavato kira bhikkhusaṅghassa ca pañcannaṃ
atk-s0502a:3991_2: mahānadīnaṃ mahoghasadise lābhasakkāre uppanne hatalābhasakkārā aññatitthiyā sūriyuggamanakāle
atk-s0502a:3991_3: khajjopanakā viya nippabhā hutvā ekato sannipatitvā mantayiṃsu – “mayaṃ samaṇassa
atk-s0502a:3991_4: gotamassa uppannakālato paṭṭhāya hatalābhasakkārā, na no koci atthibhāvampi jānāti,
atk-s0502a:3991_5: kena nu kho saddhiṃ ekato hutvā samaṇassa gotamassa avaṇṇaṃ uppādetvā lābhasakkāramassa
atk-s0502a:3991_6: antaradhāpeyyāmā”ti. Atha nesaṃ etadahosi – “sundariyā saddhiṃ ekato hutvā sakkuṇissāmā”ti.
atk-s0502a:3991_7: Te ekadivasaṃ sundariṃ titthiyārāmaṃ pavisitvā vanditvā ṭhitaṃ nālapiṃsu. Sā punappunaṃ
atk-s0502a:3991_8: sallapantīpi paṭivacanaṃ alabhitvā “api panayyā, kenaci viheṭhitatthā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a:3991_9: “Kiṃ, bhagini, samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ amhe viheṭhetvā hatalābhasakkāre katvā vicarantaṃ
atk-s0502a:3991_10: na passasī”ti? “Mayā ettha kiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti? “Tvaṃ khosi, bhagini, abhirūpā sobhaggappattā,
atk-s0502a:3991_11: samaṇassa gotamassa ayasaṃ āropetvā mahājanaṃ tava kathaṃ gāhāpetvā hatalābhasakkāraṃ
atk-s0502a:3991_12: karohī”ti. Sā taṃ sutvā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā pakkantā tato paṭṭhāya mālāgandhavilepanakappūrakaṭukaphalādīni
atk-s0502a:3991_13: gahetvā sāyaṃ mahājanassa satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā nagaraṃ pavisanakāle jetavanābhimukhī
atk-s0502a:3991_14: gacchati, “kahaṃ gacchasī”ti ca puṭṭhā “samaṇassa gotamassa santikaṃ gamissāmi, ahañhi
atk-s0502a:3991_15: tena saddhiṃ ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vasāmī”ti vatvā aññatarasmiṃ titthiyārāme vasitvā pātova
atk-s0502a:3991_16: jetavanamaggaṃ otaritvā nagarābhimukhī āgacchantī “kiṃ, sundari, kahaṃ gatāsī”ti
atk-s0502a:3991_17: puṭṭhā “samaṇena gotamena saddhiṃ ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vasitvā taṃ kilesaratiyā ramāpetvā āgatāmhī”ti vadati.
atk-s0502a:3992_0: Atha te katipāhaccayena dhuttānaṃ kahāpaṇe datvā “gacchatha sundariṃ māretvā samaṇassa
atk-s0502a:3992_1: gotamassa gandhakuṭiyā samīpe mālākacavarantare nikkhipitvā ethā”ti vadiṃsu. Te tathā
atk-s0502a:3992_2: akaṃsu. Tato titthiyā “sundariṃ na passāmā”ti kolāhalaṃ katvā rañño ārocetvā “kahaṃ
atk-s0502a:3992_3: vo āsaṅkā”ti vuttā “imesu divasesu jetavane vasati, tatthassā pavattiṃ na jānāmā”ti
atk-s0502a:3992_4: vatvā “tena hi gacchatha, naṃ vicinathā”ti raññā anuññātā attano upaṭṭhāke gahetvā
atk-s0502a:3992_5: jetavanaṃ gantvā vicinantā mālākacavarantare taṃ disvā mañcakaṃ āropetvā nagaraṃ
atk-s0502a:3992_6: pavesetvā “samaṇassa gotamassa sāvakā ‘satthārā kataṃ pāpakammaṃ paṭicchādessāmā’ti
atk-s0502a:3992_7: sundariṃ māretvā mālākacavarantare nikkhipiṃsū”ti rañño ārocayiṃsu. Rājā “tena hi
atk-s0502a:3992_8: gacchatha, nagaraṃ āhiṇḍathā”ti āha. Te nagaravīthīsu “passatha samaṇānaṃ sakyaputtiyānaṃ
atk-s0502a:3992_9: kamma”ntiādīni vatvā puna rañño nivesanadvāraṃ āgamiṃsu. Rājā sundariyā sarīraṃ āmakasusāne
atk-s0502a:3992_10: aṭṭakaṃ āropetvā rakkhāpesi. Sāvatthivāsino ṭhapetvā ariyasāvake sesā yebhuyyena
atk-s0502a:3992_11: “passatha samaṇānaṃ sakyaputtiyānaṃ kamma”ntiādīni vatvā antonagarepi bahinagarepi
atk-s0502a:3992_12: bhikkhū akkosantā vicaranti. Bhikkhū taṃ pavattiṃ tathāgatassa ārocesuṃ. Satthā “tena
atk-s0502a:3992_13: hi tumhepi te manusse evaṃ paṭicodethā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3998_0: Tattha abhūtavādīti parassa dosaṃ adisvāva musāvādaṃ katvā tucchena paraṃ abbhācikkhanto.
atk-s0502a:3998_1: Katvāti yo vā pana pāpakammaṃ katvā “nāhaṃ etaṃ karomī”ti āha. Pecca samā bhavantīti
atk-s0502a:3998_2: te ubhopi janā paralokaṃ gantvā nirayaṃ upagamanena gatiyā samā bhavanti. Gatiyeva
atk-s0502a:3998_3: nesaṃ paricchinnā, āyu pana nesaṃ na paricchinnaṃ. Bahukañhi pāpakammaṃ katvā ciraṃ
atk-s0502a:3998_4: niraye paccanti, parittaṃ katvā appamattakameva kālaṃ. Yasmā pana nesaṃ ubhinnampi
atk-s0502a:3998_5: lāmakameva kammaṃ, tena vuttaṃ – “nihīnakammā manujā paratthā”ti. Paratthāti imassa
atk-s0502a:3998_6: pana padassa purato peccapadena sambandho. Pecca parattha ito gantvā te nihīnakammā
atk-s0502a:3998_7: paraloke samā bhavantīti attho. Desanāvasāne bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pāpuṇiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a:3999_0: Rājā “sundariyā aññehi māritabhāvaṃ jānāthā”ti purise uyyojesi. Atha te dhuttā tehi
atk-s0502a:3999_1: kahāpaṇehi suraṃ pivantā aññamaññaṃ kalahaṃ kariṃsu. Eko ekaṃ āha – “tvaṃ sundariṃ
atk-s0502a:3999_2: ekappahāreneva māretvā mālākacavarantare nikkhipitvā tato laddhakahāpaṇehi suraṃ
atk-s0502a:3999_3: pivasi, hotu hotū”ti. Rājapurisā te dhutte gahetvā rañño dassesuṃ. Atha ne rājā “tumhehi
atk-s0502a:3999_4: sā māritā”ti pucchi. “Āma, devā”ti. “Kehi mārāpitā”ti? “Aññatitthiyehi, devā”ti.
atk-s0502a:3999_5: Rājā titthiye pakkosāpetvā pucchi. Te tatheva vadiṃsu. Tena hi gacchatha tumhe evaṃ
atk-s0502a:3999_6: vadantā nagaraṃ āhiṇḍatha – “ayaṃ sundarī samaṇassa gotamassa avaṇṇaṃ āropetukāmehi
atk-s0502a:3999_7: amhehi mārāpitā, neva samaṇassa gotamassa, na sāvakānaṃ doso atthi, amhākameva doso”ti.
atk-s0502a:3999_8: Te tathā kariṃsu. Bālamahājano tadā saddahi, titthiyāpi dhuttāpi purisavadhadaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0502a:3999_9: pāpuṇiṃsu. Tato paṭṭhāya buddhānaṃ sakkāro mahā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:4002: Kāsāvakaṇṭhāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto duccaritaphalānubhāvena pīḷite satte ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4003_0: Āyasmā hi moggallāno lakkhaṇattherena saddhiṃ gijjhakūṭā orohanto aṭṭhisaṅkhalikapetādīnaṃ
atk-s0502a:4003_1: attabhāve disvā sitaṃ karonto lakkhaṇattherena sitakāraṇaṃ puṭṭho “akālo, āvuso,
atk-s0502a:4003_2: imassa pañhassa, tathāgatassa santike maṃ puccheyyāsī”ti vatvā tathāgatassa santike
atk-s0502a:4003_3: therena puṭṭho aṭṭhisaṅkhalikapetādīnaṃ diṭṭhabhāvaṃ ācikkhitvā “idhāhaṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0502a:4003_4: gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṃ bhikkhuṃ vehāsaṃ gacchantaṃ, tassa saṅghāṭipi
atk-s0502a:4003_5: ādittā sampajjalitā sajotibhūtā…pe… kāyopi āditto”tiādinā nayena saddhiṃ pattacīvarakāyabandhanādīhi
atk-s0502a:4003_6: ḍayhamāne pañca sahadhammike ārocesi. Satthā tesaṃ kassapadasabalassa sāsane pabbajitvā
atk-s0502a:4003_7: pabbajjāya anurūpaṃ kātuṃ asakkontānaṃ pāpabhāvaṃ ācikkhitvā tasmiṃ khaṇe tattha
atk-s0502a:4003_8: nisinnānaṃ bahūnaṃ pāpabhikkhūnaṃ duccaritakammassa vipākaṃ dassento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4006: Pāpā pāpehi kammehi, nirayaṃ te upapajjare”ti.
atk-s0502a:4007_0: Tattha kāsāvakaṇṭhāti kāsāvena paliveṭhitakaṇṭhā. Pāpadhammāti lāmakadhammā. Asaññatāti
atk-s0502a:4007_1: kāyādisaṃyamarahitā, tathārūpā pāpapuggalā attanā katehi akusalakammehi nirayaṃ upapajjanti,
atk-s0502a:4007_2: te tattha paccitvā tato cutā vipākāvasesena petesupi evaṃ paccantīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4011: Seyyo ayoguḷoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā vesāliṃ upanissāya mahāvane viharanto vaggumudātīriye bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi. Vatthu uttarimanussadhammapārājike āgatameva.
atk-s0502a:4012_0: Tadā hi satthā te bhikkhū “kiṃ pana tumhe, bhikkhave, udarassatthāya gihīnaṃ aññamaññassa
atk-s0502a:4012_1: uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsitthā”ti vatvā tehi “āma, bhante”ti vutte te bhikkhū
atk-s0502a:4016_0: Tattha yañce bhuñjeyyāti yaṃ dussīlo nissīlapuggalo kāyādīhi asaññato raṭṭhavāsīhi
atk-s0502a:4016_1: saddhāya dinnaṃ raṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ “samaṇomhī”ti paṭijānanto gahetvā bhuñjeyya, tatto āditto
atk-s0502a:4016_2: aggivaṇṇo ayoguḷova bhutto seyyo sundarataro. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Tappaccayā hi ekova attabhāvo
atk-s0502a:4016_3: jhāyeyya, dussīlo pana saddhādeyyaṃ bhuñjitvā anekānipi jātisatāni niraye pacceyyāti attho.
atk-s0502a:4020: Cattāri ṭhānānīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto anāthapiṇḍikassa bhāgineyyaṃ khemakaṃ nāma seṭṭhiputtaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4021_0: So kira abhirūpo ahosi, yebhuyyena itthiyo taṃ disvā rāgābhibhūtā sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ
atk-s0502a:4021_1: nāsakkhiṃsu. Sopi paradārakammābhiratova ahosi. Atha naṃ rattiṃ rājapurisā gahetvā
atk-s0502a:4021_2: rañño dassesuṃ. Rājā mahāseṭṭhissa lajjāmīti taṃ kiñci avatvā vissajjāpesi. So pana
atk-s0502a:4021_3: neva virami. Atha naṃ dutiyampi tatiyampi rājapurisā gahetvā rañño dassesuṃ. Rājā
atk-s0502a:4021_4: vissajjāpesiyeva. Mahāseṭṭhi, taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā taṃ ādāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā
atk-s0502a:4021_5: taṃ pavattiṃ ārocetvā, “bhante, imassa dhammaṃ desethā”ti āha. Satthā tassa saṃvegakathaṃ
atk-s0502a:4021_6: vatvā paradārasevanāya dosaṃ dassento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:4032_0: Tattha ṭhānānīti dukkhakāraṇāni. Pamattoti sativossaggena samannāgato. Āpajjatīti
atk-s0502a:4032_1: pāpuṇāti. Paradārūpasevīti paradāraṃ upasevanto uppathacārī. Apuññalābhanti akusalalābhaṃ.
atk-s0502a:4032_2: Na nikāmaseyyanti yathā icchati, evaṃ seyyaṃ alabhitvā anicchitaṃ parittakameva kālaṃ
atk-s0502a:4032_3: seyyaṃ labhati. Apuññalābho cāti evaṃ tassa ayañca apuññalābho, tena ca apuññena
atk-s0502a:4032_4: nirayasaṅkhātā pāpikā gati hoti. Ratī ca thokikāti yā tassa bhītassa bhītāya itthiyā
atk-s0502a:4032_5: saddhiṃ rati, sāpi thokikā parittā hoti. Garukanti rājā ca hatthacchedādivasena garukaṃ
atk-s0502a:4032_6: daṇḍaṃ paṇeti. Tasmāti yasmā paradāraṃ sevanto etāni apuññādīni pāpuṇāti, tasmā paradāraṃ na seveyyāti attho.
atk-s0502a:4033_0: Desanāvasāne khemako sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. Tato paṭṭhāya mahājano sukhaṃ vītināmesi.
atk-s0502a:4033_1: Kiṃ panassa pubbakammanti? So kira kassapabuddhakāle uttamamallo hutvā dve suvaṇṇapaṭākā
atk-s0502a:4033_2: dasabalassa kañcanathūpe āropetvā patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi “ṭhapetvā ñātisālohititthiyo
atk-s0502a:4033_3: avasesā maṃ disvā rajjantū”ti. Idamassa pubbakammanti. Tena taṃ nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a:4033_4: disvā paresaṃ itthiyo sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ nāsakkhiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a:4036: Kuso yathāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ dubbacabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4037_0: Eko kira bhikkhu asañcicca ekaṃ tiṇaṃ chinditvā kukkucce uppanne ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā,
atk-s0502a:4037_1: “āvuso, yo tiṇaṃ chindati, tassa kiṃ hotī”ti taṃ attanā katabhāvaṃ ārocetvā pucchi.
atk-s0502a:4037_2: Atha naṃ itaro “tvaṃ tiṇassa chinnakāraṇā kiñci hotīti saññaṃ karosi, na ettha kiñci
atk-s0502a:4037_3: hoti, desetvā pana muccatī”ti vatvā sayampi ubhohi hatthehi tiṇaṃ luñcitvā aggahesi.
atk-s0502a:4037_4: Bhikkhū taṃ pavattiṃ satthu ārocesuṃ. Satthā taṃ bhikkhuṃ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā
atk-s0502a:4042: “Yaṃ kiñci sithilaṃ kammaṃ, saṃkiliṭṭhañca yaṃ vataṃ;
atk-s0502a:4043: Saṅkassaraṃ brahmacariyaṃ, na taṃ hoti mahapphalaṃ.
atk-s0502a:4046: Sithilo hi paribbājo, bhiyyo ākirate raja”nti.
atk-s0502a:4047_0: Tattha kusoti yaṃ kiñci tikhiṇadhāraṃ tiṇaṃ antamaso tālapaṇṇampi, yathā so kuso
atk-s0502a:4047_1: yena duggahito, tassa hatthaṃ anukantati phāleti, evameva samaṇadhammasaṅkhātaṃ sāmaññampi
atk-s0502a:4047_2: khaṇḍasīlāditāya dupparāmaṭṭhaṃ nirayāyupakaḍḍhati, niraye nibbattāpetīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4047_3: Sithilanti olīyitvā karaṇena sithilagāhaṃ katvā kataṃ yaṃkiñci kammaṃ. Saṃkiliṭṭhanti
atk-s0502a:4047_4: vesiyādikesu agocaresu caraṇena saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ. Saṅkassaranti saṅkāhi saritabbaṃ, uposathakiccādīsu
atk-s0502a:4047_5: aññatarakiccena sannipatitampi saṅghaṃ disvā “addhā ime mama cariyaṃ ñatvā maṃ ukkhipitukāmāva
atk-s0502a:4047_6: sannipatitā”ti evaṃ attano āsaṅkāhi saritaṃ ussaṅkitaṃ parisaṅkitaṃ. Na taṃ hotīti
atk-s0502a:4047_7: taṃ evarūpaṃ samaṇadhammasaṅkhātaṃ brahmacariyaṃ tassa puggalassa mahapphalaṃ na
atk-s0502a:4047_8: hoti, tassa mahapphalābhāveneva bhikkhadāyakānampissa na mahapphalaṃ hotīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4047_9: Kayirā ceti tasmā yaṃ kammaṃ kareyya, taṃ kareyyātheva. Daḷhamenaṃ parakkameti thirakatameva
atk-s0502a:4047_10: katvā avattasamādāno hutvā enaṃ kayirā. Paribbājoti sithilabhāvena kato khaṇḍādibhāvappatto
atk-s0502a:4047_11: samaṇadhammo. Bhiyyo ākirate rajanti abbhantare vijjamānaṃ rāgarajādiṃ evarūpo samaṇadhammo
atk-s0502a:4047_12: apanetuṃ na sakkoti, atha kho tassa upari aparampi rāgarajādiṃ ākiratīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4048: Desanāvasāne bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pāpuṇiṃsu, sopi bhikkhu saṃvare ṭhatvā pacchā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇīti.
atk-s0502a:4051: Akatanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ issāpakataṃ itthiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4052_0: Tassā kira sāmiko ekāya gehadāsiyā saddhiṃ santhavaṃ akāsi. Sā issāpakatā taṃ dāsiṃ
atk-s0502a:4052_1: hatthapādesu bandhitvā tassā kaṇṇanāsaṃ chinditvā ekasmiṃ guḷhagabbhe pakkhipitvā
atk-s0502a:4052_2: dvāraṃ pidahitvā tassa kammassa attanā katabhāvaṃ paṭicchādetuṃ “ehi, ayya, vihāraṃ
atk-s0502a:4052_3: gantvā dhammaṃ suṇissāmā”ti sāmikaṃ ādāya vihāraṃ gantvā dhammaṃ suṇantī nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:4052_4: Athassā āgantukañātakā gehaṃ āgantvā dvāraṃ vivaritvā taṃ vippakāraṃ disvā dāsiṃ
atk-s0502a:4052_5: mocayiṃsu. Sā vihāraṃ gantvā catuparisamajjhe ṭhitā tamatthaṃ dasabalassa ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:4052_6: Satthā tassā vacanaṃ sutvā “duccaritaṃ nāma ‘idaṃ me aññe na jānantī’ti appamattakampi
atk-s0502a:4052_7: na kātabbaṃ, aññasmiṃ ajānantepi sucaritameva kātabbaṃ. Paṭicchādetvā katampi hi
atk-s0502a:4052_8: duccaritaṃ nāma pacchānutāpaṃ karoti, sucaritaṃ pāmojjameva janetī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4055: Katañca sukataṃ seyyo, yaṃ katvā nānutappatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:4056_0: Tattha dukkaṭanti sāvajjaṃ apāyasaṃvattanikaṃ kammaṃ akatameva seyyo varaṃ uttamaṃ.
atk-s0502a:4056_1: Pacchā tappatīti tañhi anussaritānussaritakāle tappatiyeva. Sukatanti anavajjaṃ pana
atk-s0502a:4056_2: sukhadāyakaṃ sugatisaṃvattanikameva kammaṃ kataṃ seyyo. Yaṃ katvāti yaṃ kammaṃ katvā
atk-s0502a:4056_3: pacchā anussaraṇakāle na tappati nānutappati, somanassajātova hoti, taṃ kammaṃ varanti attho.
atk-s0502a:4057: Desanāvasāne upāsako ca sā ca itthī sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu. Tañca pana dāsiṃ tattheva bhujissaṃ katvā dhammacāriniṃ kariṃsūti.
atk-s0502a:4060: Nagaraṃ yathāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sambahule āgantuke bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4061_0: Te kira ekasmiṃ paccante vassaṃ upagantvā paṭhamamāse sukhaṃ vihariṃsu. Majjhimamāse
atk-s0502a:4061_1: corā āgantvā tesaṃ gocaragāmaṃ paharitvā karamare gahetvā agamaṃsu. Tato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0502a:4061_2: manussā corānaṃ paṭibāhanatthāya taṃ paccantanagaraṃ abhisaṅkharontā te bhikkhū sakkaccaṃ
atk-s0502a:4061_3: upaṭṭhātuṃ okāsaṃ na labhiṃsu. Te aphāsukaṃ vassaṃ vasitvā vutthavassā satthu dassanāya
atk-s0502a:4061_4: sāvatthiṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu. Satthā tehi saddhiṃ katapaṭisanthāro
atk-s0502a:4061_5: “kiṃ, bhikkhave, sukhaṃ vasitthā”ti pucchitvā, “bhante, mayaṃ paṭhamamāsameva sukhaṃ
atk-s0502a:4061_6: vasimhā, majjhimamāse corā gāmaṃ pahariṃsu, tato paṭṭhāya manussā nagaraṃ abhisaṅkharontā
atk-s0502a:4061_7: sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ okāsaṃ na labhiṃsu. Tasmā aphāsukaṃ vassaṃ vasimhā”ti vutte
atk-s0502a:4061_8: “alaṃ, bhikkhave, mā cintayittha, phāsuvihāro nāma niccakālaṃ dullabho, bhikkhunā
atk-s0502a:4061_9: nāma yathā te manussā nagaraṃ gopayiṃsu, evaṃ attabhāvameva gopayituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0502a:4064: Evaṃ gopetha attānaṃ, khaṇo vo mā upaccagā;
atk-s0502a:4066_0: Tattha santarabāhiranti, bhikkhave, yathā tehi manussehi taṃ paccantanagaraṃ dvārapākārādīni
atk-s0502a:4066_1: thirāni karontehi saantaraṃ, aṭṭālakaparikhādīni thirāni karontehi sabāhiranti santarabāhiraṃ
atk-s0502a:4066_2: suguttaṃ kataṃ, evaṃ tumhepi satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā ajjhattikāni cha dvārāni pidahitvā
atk-s0502a:4066_3: dvārarakkhikaṃ satiṃ avissajjetvā yathā gayhamānāni bāhirāni cha āyatanāni ajjhattikānaṃ
atk-s0502a:4066_4: upaghātāya saṃvattanti, tathā aggahaṇena tānipi thirāni katvā tesaṃ appavesāya dvārarakkhikaṃ
atk-s0502a:4066_5: satiṃ appahāya vicarantā attānaṃ gopethāti attho. Khaṇo vo mā upaccagāti yo hi evaṃ
atk-s0502a:4066_6: attānaṃ na gopeti, taṃ puggalaṃ ayaṃ buddhuppādakhaṇo majjhimadese uppattikhaṇo sammādiṭṭhiyā
atk-s0502a:4066_7: paṭiladdhakhaṇo channaṃ āyatanānaṃ avekallakhaṇoti sabbopi ayaṃ khaṇo atikkamati,
atk-s0502a:4066_8: so khaṇo tumhe mā atikkamatu. Khaṇātītāti ye hi taṃ khaṇaṃ atītā, te ca puggale so
atk-s0502a:4066_9: ca khaṇo atīto, te nirayamhi samappitā hutvā tattha nibbattitvā socantīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4067: Desanāvasāne te bhikkhū uppannasaṃvegā arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a:4070: Alajjitāyeti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto nigaṇṭhe ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4071_0: Ekasmiñhi divase bhikkhū nigaṇṭhe disvā kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ, “āvuso, sabbaso appaṭicchannehi
atk-s0502a:4071_1: acelakehi ime nigaṇṭhā varatarā, ye ekaṃ purimapassampi tāva paṭicchādenti, sahirikā
atk-s0502a:4071_2: maññe ete”ti. Taṃ sutvā nigaṇṭhā “na mayaṃ etena kāraṇena paṭicchādema, paṃsurajādayo
atk-s0502a:4071_3: pana puggalā eva, jīvitindriyapaṭibaddhā eva, te no bhikkhābhājanesu mā patiṃsūti
atk-s0502a:4071_4: iminā kāraṇena paṭicchādemā”ti vatvā tehi saddhiṃ vādapaṭivādavasena bahuṃ kathaṃ
atk-s0502a:4071_5: kathesuṃ. Bhikkhū satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā nisinnakāle taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ. Satthā,
atk-s0502a:4071_6: “bhikkhave, alajjitabbena lajjitvā lajjitabbena alajjamānā nāma duggatiparāyaṇāva
atk-s0502a:4071_7: hontī”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:4078_0: Tattha alajjitāyeti alajjitabbena. Bhikkhābhājanañhi alajjitabbaṃ nāma, te pana taṃ
atk-s0502a:4078_1: paṭicchādetvā vicarantā tena lajjanti nāma. Lajjitāyeti apaṭicchannena hirikopīnaṅgena
atk-s0502a:4078_2: lajjitabbena. Te pana taṃ apaṭicchādetvā vicarantā lajjitāye na lajjanti nāma. Tena
atk-s0502a:4078_3: tesaṃ alajjitabbena lajjitaṃ lajjitabbena alajjitaṃ tucchagahaṇabhāvena ca aññathāgahaṇabhāvena
atk-s0502a:4078_4: ca micchādiṭṭhi hoti. Taṃ samādiyitvā vicarantā pana te micchādiṭṭhisamādānā sattā
atk-s0502a:4078_5: nirayādibhedaṃ duggatiṃ gacchantīti attho. Abhayeti bhikkhābhājanaṃ nissāya rāgadosamohamānadiṭṭhikilesaduccaritabhayānaṃ
atk-s0502a:4078_6: anuppajjanato bhikkhābhājanaṃ abhayaṃ nāma, bhayena taṃ paṭicchādentā pana abhaye
atk-s0502a:4078_7: bhayadassino nāma. Hirikopīnaṅgaṃ pana nissāya rāgādīnaṃ uppajjanato taṃ bhayaṃ nāma,
atk-s0502a:4078_8: tassa apaṭicchādanena bhaye cābhayadassino. Tassa taṃ ayathāgahaṇassa samādinnattā
atk-s0502a:4079: Desanāvasāne bahū nigaṇṭhā saṃviggamānasā pabbajiṃsu, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:4082: Avajjeti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto titthiyasāvake ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4083_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye aññatitthiyasāvakā attano putte sammādiṭṭhikānaṃ upāsakānaṃ puttehi
atk-s0502a:4083_1: saddhiṃ saparivāre kīḷamāne disvā gehaṃ āgatakāle “na vo samaṇā sakyaputtiyā vanditabbā,
atk-s0502a:4083_2: nāpi tesaṃ vihāraṃ pavisitabba”nti sapathaṃ kārayiṃsu. Te ekadivasaṃ jetavanavihārassa
atk-s0502a:4083_3: bahidvārakoṭṭhakasāmante kīḷantā pipāsitā ahesuṃ. Athekaṃ upāsakadārakaṃ “tvaṃ ettha
atk-s0502a:4083_4: gantvā pānīyaṃ pivitvā amhākampi āharāhī”ti pahiṇiṃsu. So vihāraṃ pavisitvā satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:4083_5: vanditvā pānīyaṃ pivitvā tamatthaṃ ārocesi. Atha naṃ satthā “tvameva pānīyaṃ pivitvā
atk-s0502a:4083_6: gantvā itarepi pānīyapivanatthāya idheva pesehī”ti āha. So tathā akāsi. Te āgantvā
atk-s0502a:4083_7: pānīyaṃ piviṃsu. Satthā te pakkosāpetvā tesaṃ sappāyaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathetvā te acalasaddhe
atk-s0502a:4083_8: katvā saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpesi. Te sakāni gehāni gantvā tamatthaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ
atk-s0502a:4083_9: ārocesuṃ. Atha nesaṃ mātāpitaro “puttakā no vipannadiṭṭhikā jātā”ti domanassappattā
atk-s0502a:4083_10: parideviṃsu. Atha tesaṃ chekā sambahulā paṭivissakā manussā āgantvā domanassavūpasamanatthāya
atk-s0502a:4083_11: dhammaṃ kathayiṃsu. Te tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā “ime dārake samaṇassa gotamasseva niyyādessāmā”ti
atk-s0502a:4083_12: mahantena ñātigaṇena saddhiṃ vihāraṃ nayiṃsu. Satthā tesaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ oloketvā dhammaṃ
atk-s0502a:4090_0: Tattha avajjeti dasavatthukāya sammādiṭṭhiyā, tassā upanissayabhūte dhamme ca. Vajjamatinoti
atk-s0502a:4090_1: vajjaṃ idanti uppannamatino. Dasavatthukāya micchādiṭṭhiyā pana tassā upanissayabhūte
atk-s0502a:4090_2: dhamme ca avajjadassino, etissā avajjaṃ vajjato vajjañca avajjato ñatvā gahaṇasaṅkhātāya
atk-s0502a:4090_3: micchādiṭṭhiyā samādinnattā micchādiṭṭhisamādānā sattā duggatiṃ gacchantīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4091: Desanāvasāne sabbepi te tīsu saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya aparāparaṃ dhammaṃ suṇantā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a:4097: Ahaṃ nāgo vāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā kosambiyaṃ viharanto attānaṃ ārabbha kathesi. Vatthu appamādavaggassa ādigāthāvaṇṇanāya vitthāritameva. Vuttañhetaṃ tattha –
atk-s0502a:4098_0: Māgaṇḍiyā tāsaṃ kiñci kātuṃ asakkuṇitvā “samaṇassa gotamasseva kattabbaṃ karissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:4098_1: nāgarānaṃ lañjaṃ datvā “samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ antonagaraṃ pavisitvā carantaṃ dāsakammakaraporisehi
atk-s0502a:4098_2: saddhiṃ akkosetvā paribhāsetvā palāpethā”ti āṇāpesi. Micchādiṭṭhikā tīsu ratanesu
atk-s0502a:4098_3: appasannā antonagaraṃ paviṭṭhaṃ satthāraṃ anubandhitvā “corosi bālosi mūḷhosi thenosi
atk-s0502a:4098_4: oṭṭhosi goṇosi gadrabhosi nerayikosi tiracchānagatosi, natthi tuyhaṃ sugati, duggatiyeva
atk-s0502a:4098_5: tuyhaṃ pāṭikaṅkhā”ti dasahi akkosavatthūhi akkosanti paribhāsanti. Taṃ sutvā āyasmā
atk-s0502a:4098_6: ānando satthāraṃ etadavoca – “bhante, ime nāgarā amhe akkosanti paribhāsanti, ito
atk-s0502a:4098_7: aññattha gacchāmā”ti. “Kuhiṃ, ānandā”ti? “Aññaṃ nagaraṃ, bhante”ti. “Tattha manussesu
atk-s0502a:4098_8: akkosantesu paribhāsantesu puna kattha gamissāmānandā”ti. “Tatopi aññaṃ nagaraṃ,
atk-s0502a:4098_9: bhante”ti. “Tattha manussesu akkosantesu paribhāsantesu kuhiṃ gamissāmānandā”ti.
atk-s0502a:4098_10: “Tatopi aññaṃ nagaraṃ, bhante”ti. “Ānanda, na evaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati, yattha adhikaraṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:4098_11: uppannaṃ, tattheva tasmiṃ vūpasante aññattha gantuṃ vaṭṭati, ke pana te, ānanda,
atk-s0502a:4098_12: akkosantī”ti. “Bhante, dāsakammakare upādāya sabbe akkosantī”ti. “Ahaṃ, ānanda, saṅgāmaṃ
atk-s0502a:4098_13: otiṇṇahatthisadiso. Saṅgāmaṃ otiṇṇahatthino hi catūhi disāhi āgate sare sahituṃ bhāro,
atk-s0502a:4098_14: tatheva bahūhi dussīlehi kathitakathānaṃ sahanaṃ nāma mayhaṃ bhāro”ti vatvā attānaṃ
atk-s0502a:4098_15: ārabbha dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:4107: Kuñjarā ca mahānāgā, attadanto tato vara”nti.
atk-s0502a:4108_0: Tattha nāgovāti hatthī viya. Cāpato patitanti dhanuto muttaṃ. Ativākyanti aṭṭhaanariyavohāravasena
atk-s0502a:4108_1: pavattaṃ vītikkamavacanaṃ. Titikkhissanti yathā saṅgāmāvacaro sudanto mahānāgo khamo
atk-s0502a:4108_2: sattipahārādīni cāpato muccitvā attani patite sare avihaññamāno titikkhati, evameva
atk-s0502a:4108_3: evarūpaṃ ativākyaṃ titikkhissaṃ, sahissāmīti attho. Dussīlo hīti ayañhi lokiyamahājano
atk-s0502a:4108_4: bahudussīlo attano attano rucivasena vācaṃ nicchāretvā ghaṭṭento carati, tattha adhivāsanaṃ
atk-s0502a:4108_5: ajjhupekkhanameva mama bhāro. Samitinti uyyānakīḷamaṇḍalādīsu mahājanamajjhaṃ gacchantā
atk-s0502a:4108_6: dantameva goṇajātiṃ vā assajātiṃ vā yāne yojetvā nayanti. Rājāti tathārūpeheva vāhanehi
atk-s0502a:4108_7: gacchanto rājāpi dantameva abhirūhati. Manussesūti manussesupi catūhi ariyamaggehi
atk-s0502a:4108_8: danto nibbisevanova seṭṭho. Yotivākyanti yo evarūpaṃ atikkamavacanaṃ punappunaṃ vuccamānampi
atk-s0502a:4108_9: titikkhati na paṭippharati na vihaññati, evarūpo danto seṭṭhoti attho.
atk-s0502a:4109_0: Assatarāti vaḷavāya gadrabhena jātā. Ājānīyāti yaṃ assadamasārathi kāraṇaṃ kāreti,
atk-s0502a:4109_1: tassa khippaṃ jānanasamatthā. Sindhavāti sindhavaraṭṭhe jātā assā. Mahānāgāti kuñjarasaṅkhātā
atk-s0502a:4109_2: mahāhatthino. Attadantoti ete assatarā ca sindhavā ca kuñjarā ca dantāva varaṃ, na
atk-s0502a:4109_3: adantā. Yo pana catūhi ariyamaggehi attano dantatāya attadanto nibbisevano, ayaṃ
atk-s0502a:4109_4: tatopi varaṃ, sabbehipi etehi uttaritaroti attho.
atk-s0502a:4110: Desanāvasāne lañjaṃ gahetvā vīthisiṅghāṭakādīsu ṭhatvā akkosanto paribhāsanto sabbopi so mahājano sotāpattiphalādīni pāpuṇīti.
atk-s0502a:4113: Na hi etehīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ hatthācariyapubbakaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4114_0: So kira ekadivasaṃ aciravatīnadītīre hatthidamakaṃ “ekaṃ hatthiṃ damessāmī”ti attanā
atk-s0502a:4114_1: icchitaṃ kāraṇaṃ sikkhāpetuṃ asakkontaṃ disvā samīpe ṭhite bhikkhū āmantetvā āha
atk-s0502a:4114_2: – “āvuso, sace ayaṃ hatthācariyo imaṃ hatthiṃ asukaṭṭhāne nāma vijjheyya, khippameva
atk-s0502a:4114_3: imaṃ kāraṇaṃ sikkhāpeyyā”ti. So tassa kathaṃ sutvā tathā katvā taṃ hatthiṃ sudantaṃ
atk-s0502a:4114_4: damesi. Te bhikkhū taṃ pavattiṃ satthu ārocesuṃ. Satthā taṃ bhikkhuṃ pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0502a:4114_5: “saccaṃ kira tayā evaṃ vutta”nti pucchitvā “saccaṃ, bhante”ti vutte vigarahitvā “kiṃ
atk-s0502a:4114_6: te, moghapurisa, hatthiyānena vā aññena vā dantena. Na hi etehi yānehi agatapubbaṃ
atk-s0502a:4114_7: ṭhānaṃ gantuṃ samatthā nāma atthi, attanā pana sudantena sakkā agatapubbaṃ ṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:4114_8: gantuṃ, tasmā attānameva damehi, kiṃ te etesaṃ damanenā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4116: “Na hi etehi yānehi, gaccheyya agataṃ disaṃ;
atk-s0502a:4118_0: Tassattho – yāni tāni hatthiyānādīni yānāni, na hi etehi yānehi koci puggalo supinantenapi
atk-s0502a:4118_1: agatapubbattā “agata”nti saṅkhātaṃ nibbānadisaṃ tathā gaccheyya, yathā pubbabhāge
atk-s0502a:4118_2: indriyadamena aparabhāge ariyamaggabhāvanāya sudantena danto nibbisevano sappañño
atk-s0502a:4118_3: puggalo taṃ agatapubbaṃ disaṃ gacchati, dantabhūmiṃ pāpuṇāti. Tasmā attadamanameva tato varanti attho.
atk-s0502a:4122: Dhanapāloti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā sāvatthiyaṃ viharanto aññatarassa parijiṇṇabrāhmaṇassa putte ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4123_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kireko brāhmaṇo aṭṭhasatasahassavibhavo vayappattānaṃ catunnaṃ puttānaṃ
atk-s0502a:4123_1: āvāhaṃ katvā cattāri satasahassāni adāsi. Athassa brāhmaṇiyā kālakatāya puttā sammantayiṃsu
atk-s0502a:4123_2: – “sace ayaṃ aññaṃ brāhmaṇiṃ ānessati, tassā kucchiyaṃ nibbattānaṃ vasena kulasantakaṃ
atk-s0502a:4123_3: bhijjissati, handa naṃ mayaṃ saṅgaṇhissāmā”ti te taṃ paṇītehi ghāsacchādanādīhi upaṭṭhahantā
atk-s0502a:4123_4: hatthapādasambāhanādīni karontā upaṭṭhahitvā ekadivasamassa divā niddāyitvā vuṭṭhitassa
atk-s0502a:4123_5: hatthapāde sambāhantā pāṭiyekkaṃ gharāvāse ādīnavaṃ vatvā “mayaṃ tumhe iminā nīhārena
atk-s0502a:4123_6: yāvajīvaṃ upaṭṭhahissāma, sesadhanampi no dethā”ti yāciṃsu. Brāhmaṇo puna ekekassa
atk-s0502a:4123_7: satasahassaṃ datvā attano nivatthapārupanamattaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbaṃ upabhogaparibhogaṃ
atk-s0502a:4123_8: cattāro koṭṭhāse katvā niyyādesi. Taṃ jeṭṭhaputto katipāhaṃ upaṭṭhahi. Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0502a:4123_9: nhatvā āgacchantaṃ dvārakoṭṭhake ṭhatvā suṇhā evamāha – “kiṃ tayā jeṭṭhaputtassa
atk-s0502a:4123_10: sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā atirekaṃ dinnaṃ atthi, nanu sabbesaṃ dve dve satasahassāni dinnāni,
atk-s0502a:4123_11: kiṃ sesaputtānaṃ gharassa maggaṃ na jānāsī”ti. Sopi “nassa vasalī”ti kujjhitvā aññassa
atk-s0502a:4123_12: gharaṃ agamāsi. Tatopi katipāhaccayena imināva upāyena palāpito aññassāti evaṃ ekagharampi
atk-s0502a:4123_13: pavesanaṃ alabhamāno paṇḍaraṅgapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā bhikkhāya caranto kālānamaccayena
atk-s0502a:4123_14: jarājiṇṇo dubbhojanadukkhaseyyāhi milātasarīro bhikkhāya caranto āgamma pīṭhikāya
atk-s0502a:4123_15: nipanno niddaṃ okkamitvā uṭṭhāya nisinno attānaṃ oloketvā puttesu attano patiṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0502a:4123_16: apassanto cintesi – “samaṇo kira gotamo abbhākuṭiko uttānamukho sukhasambhāso paṭisanthārakusalo,
atk-s0502a:4123_17: sakkā samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ upasaṅkamitvā paṭisanthāraṃ labhitu”nti. So nivāsanapārupanaṃ
atk-s0502a:4123_18: saṇṭhāpetvā bhikkhabhājanaṃ gahetvā daṇḍamādāya bhagavato santikaṃ agamāsi. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-s0502a:4124_0: Atha kho aññataro brāhmaṇamahāsālo lūkho lūkhapāvuraṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami,
atk-s0502a:4124_1: upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Satthā ekamantaṃ nisinnena tena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:4124_2: katvā etadavoca – “kinnu tvaṃ, brāhmaṇa, lūkho lūkhapāvuraṇo”ti. Idha me, bho gotama,
atk-s0502a:4124_3: cattāro puttā, te maṃ dārehi saṃpuccha gharā nikkhāmentīti. Tena hi tvaṃ, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0502a:4124_4: imā gāthāyo pariyāpuṇitvā sabhāyaṃ mahājanakāye sannipatite puttesu ca sannisinnesu bhāsassu –
atk-s0502a:4126: Te maṃ dārehi saṃpuccha, sāva vārenti sūkaraṃ.
atk-s0502a:4127: “Asantā kira maṃ jammā, tāta tātāti bhāsare;
atk-s0502a:4131: “Daṇḍova kira me seyyo, yañce puttā anassavā;
atk-s0502a:4132: Caṇḍampi goṇaṃ vāreti, atho caṇḍampi kukkuraṃ.
atk-s0502a:4135_0: So bhagavato santike tā gāthāyo uggaṇhitvā tathārūpe brāhmaṇānaṃ samāgamadivase sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitesu
atk-s0502a:4135_1: puttesu taṃ sabhaṃ ogāhitvā brāhmaṇānaṃ majjhe mahārahesu āsanesu nisinnesu “ayaṃ
atk-s0502a:4135_2: me kālo”ti sabhāya majjhe pavisitvā hatthaṃ ukkhipitvā “ahaṃ, bho, tumhākaṃ gāthāyo
atk-s0502a:4135_3: bhāsitukāmo, suṇissathā”ti vatvā “bhāsassu, brāhmaṇa, suṇomā”ti vutte ṭhitakova abhāsi.
atk-s0502a:4135_4: Tena ca samayena manussānaṃ vattaṃ hoti “yo mātāpitūnaṃ santakaṃ khādanto mātāpitaro
atk-s0502a:4135_5: na poseti, so māretabbo”ti. Tasmā te brāhmaṇaputtā pitu pādesu patitvā “jīvitaṃ no,
atk-s0502a:4135_6: tāta, dethā”ti yāciṃsu. So pitu hadayamudutāya “mā me, bho, puttake vināsayittha,
atk-s0502a:4135_7: posessanti ma”nti āha. Athassa putte manussā āhaṃsu – “sace, bho, ajja paṭṭhāya pitaraṃ
atk-s0502a:4135_8: na sammā paṭijaggissatha, ghātessāma vo”ti. Te bhītā pitaraṃ pīṭhe nisīdāpetvā sayaṃ
atk-s0502a:4135_9: ukkhipitvā gehaṃ netvā sarīraṃ telena abbhañjitvā ubbaṭṭetvā gandhacuṇṇādīhi nhāpetvā
atk-s0502a:4135_10: brāhmaṇiyo pakkosāpetvā “ajja paṭṭhāya amhākaṃ pitaraṃ sammā paṭijaggatha, sace tumhe
atk-s0502a:4135_11: pamādaṃ āpajjissatha, niggaṇhissāma vo”ti vatvā paṇītabhojanaṃ bhojesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:4136_0: Brāhmaṇo subhojanañca sukhaseyyañca āgamma katipāhaccayena sañjātabalo pīṇindriyo
atk-s0502a:4136_1: attabhāvaṃ oloketvā “ayaṃ me sampatti samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ nissāya laddhā”ti paṇṇākāratthāya
atk-s0502a:4136_2: ekaṃ dussayugaṃ ādāya bhagavato santikaṃ gantvā katapaṭisanthāro ekamantaṃ nisinno
atk-s0502a:4136_3: taṃ dussayugaṃ bhagavato pādamūle ṭhapetvā “mayaṃ, bho gotama, brāhmaṇā nāma ācariyassa
atk-s0502a:4136_4: ācariyadhanaṃ pariyesāma, paṭiggaṇhātu me bhavaṃ gotamo ācariyo ācariyadhana”nti
atk-s0502a:4136_5: āha. Bhagavā tassa anukampāya taṃ paṭiggahetvā dhammaṃ desesi. Desanāvasāne brāhmaṇo
atk-s0502a:4136_6: saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya evamāha – “bho gotama, mayhaṃ puttehi cattāri dhuvabhattāni dinnāni,
atk-s0502a:4136_7: tato ahaṃ dve tumhākaṃ dammī”ti. Atha naṃ satthā “kalyāṇaṃ, brāhmaṇa, mayaṃ pana
atk-s0502a:4136_8: ruccanaṭṭhānameva gamissāmā”ti vatvā uyyojesi. Brāhmaṇo gharaṃ gantvā putte āha –
atk-s0502a:4136_9: “tātā, samaṇo gotamo mayhaṃ sahāyo, tassa me dve dhuvabhattāni dinnāni, tumhe tasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:4137_0: Satthā punadivase piṇḍāya caranto jeṭṭhaputtassa gharadvāraṃ agamāsi. So satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:4137_1: disvā pattamādāya gharaṃ pavesetvā mahārahe pallaṅke nisīdāpetvā paṇītabhojanamadāsi.
atk-s0502a:4137_2: Satthā punadivase itarassa itarassāti paṭipāṭiyā sabbesaṃ gharāni agamāsi. Sabbe
atk-s0502a:4137_3: te tatheva sakkāraṃ akaṃsu. Ekadivasaṃ jeṭṭhaputto maṅgale paccupaṭṭhite pitaraṃ
atk-s0502a:4137_4: āha – “tāta, kassa maṅgalaṃ demā”ti? “Nāhaṃ aññe jānāmi, samaṇo gotamo mayhaṃ sahāyo”ti.
atk-s0502a:4137_5: “Tena hi taṃ svātanāya pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ nimantethā”ti. Brāhmaṇo tathā
atk-s0502a:4137_6: akāsi. Satthā punadivase saparivāro tassa gehaṃ agamāsi. So haritupalitte sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍite
atk-s0502a:4137_7: gehe buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nisīdāpetvā appodakamadhupāyasena ceva paṇītena
atk-s0502a:4137_8: khādanīyena ca parivisi. Antarābhattasmiṃyeva brāhmaṇassa cattāro puttā satthu santike
atk-s0502a:4137_9: nisīditvā āhaṃsu – “bho gotama, mayaṃ amhākaṃ pitaraṃ paṭijaggāma na pamajjāma, passathimassa attabhāva”nti.
atk-s0502a:4138_0: Satthā “kalyāṇaṃ vo kataṃ, mātāpituposanaṃ nāma porāṇakapaṇḍitānaṃ āciṇṇamevā”ti
atk-s0502a:4138_1: vatvā “tassa nāgassa vippavāsena, virūḷhā sallakī ca kuṭajā cā”ti imaṃ ekādasanipāte
atk-s0502a:4138_2: mātuposakanāgarājajātakaṃ vitthārena kathetvā imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:4144_0: Tattha dhanapālo nāmāti tadā kāsikaraññā hatthācariyaṃ pesetvā ramaṇīye nāgavane
atk-s0502a:4144_1: gāhāpitassa hatthino etaṃ nāmaṃ. Kaṭukabhedanoti tikhiṇamado. Hatthīnañhi madakāle
atk-s0502a:4144_2: kaṇṇacūḷikā pabhijjanti, pakatiyāpi hatthino tasmiṃ kāle aṅkuse vā kuntatomare vā
atk-s0502a:4144_3: na gaṇenti, caṇḍā bhavanti. So pana aticaṇḍoyeva. Tena vuttaṃ – kaṭukabhedano dunnivārayoti.
atk-s0502a:4144_4: Baddho kabaḷaṃ na bhuñjatīti so baddho hatthisālaṃ pana netvā vicitrasāṇiyā parikkhipāpetvā
atk-s0502a:4144_5: katagandhaparibhaṇḍāya upari baddhavicitravitānāya bhūmiyā ṭhapito raññā rājārahena
atk-s0502a:4144_6: nānaggarasena bhojanena upaṭṭhāpitopi kiñci bhuñjituṃ na icchi, tamatthaṃ sandhāya
atk-s0502a:4144_7: “baddho kabaḷaṃ na bhuñjatī”ti vuttaṃ. Sumarati nāgavanassāti so ramaṇīyaṃ me vasanaṭṭhānanti
atk-s0502a:4144_8: nāgavanaṃ sarati. “Mātā pana me araññe puttaviyogena dukkhappattā ahosi, mātāpituupaṭṭhānadhammo
atk-s0502a:4144_9: na me pūrati, kiṃ me iminā bhojanenā”ti dhammikaṃ mātāpituupaṭṭhānadhammameva sari.
atk-s0502a:4144_10: Taṃ pana yasmā tasmiṃ nāgavaneyeva ṭhito sakkā pūretuṃ, tena vuttaṃ – sumarati nāgavanassa
atk-s0502a:4144_11: kuñjaroti. Satthari imaṃ attano pubbacariyaṃ ānetvā kathente kathenteyeva sabbepi
atk-s0502a:4144_12: te assudhārā pavattetvā muduhadayā ohitasotā bhaviṃsu. Atha nesaṃ bhagavā sappāyaṃ
atk-s0502a:4145: Desanāvasāne saddhiṃ puttehi ceva suṇisāhi ca brāhmaṇo sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahīti.
atk-s0502a:4148: Middhī yadā hotīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto rājānaṃ pasenadikosalaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4149_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye rājā taṇḍuladoṇassa odanaṃ tadupiyena sūpabyañjanena bhuñjati. So
atk-s0502a:4149_1: ekadivasaṃ bhuttapātarāso bhattasammadaṃ avinodetvāva satthu santikaṃ gantvā kilantarūpo
atk-s0502a:4149_2: ito cito ca samparivattati, niddāya abhibhuyyamānopi ujukaṃ nipajjituṃ asakkonto
atk-s0502a:4149_3: ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Atha naṃ satthā āha – “kiṃ, mahārāja, avissamitvāva āgatosī”ti?
atk-s0502a:4149_4: “Āma, bhante, bhuttakālato paṭṭhāya me mahādukkhaṃ hotī”ti. Atha naṃ satthā, “mahārāja,
atk-s0502a:4149_5: atibahubhojanaṃ evaṃ dukkhaṃ hotī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4155_0: Tattha middhīti thinamiddhābhibhūto. Mahagghaso cāti mahābhojano āharahatthakaalaṃsāṭakatatravaṭṭakakākamāsakabhuttavamitakānaṃ
atk-s0502a:4155_1: aññataro viya. Nivāpapuṭṭhoti kuṇḍakādinā sūkarabhattena puṭṭho. Gharasūkaro hi daharakālato
atk-s0502a:4155_2: paṭṭhāya posiyamāno thūlasarīrakāle gehā bahi nikkhamituṃ alabhanto heṭṭhāmañcādīsu
atk-s0502a:4155_3: samparivattitvā assasanto passasanto sayateva. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yadā puriso middhī
atk-s0502a:4155_4: ca hoti mahagghaso ca, nivāpapuṭṭho mahāvarāho viya ca aññena iriyāpathena yāpetuṃ
atk-s0502a:4155_5: asakkonto niddāyanasīlo samparivattasāyī, tadā so “aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā”ti tīṇi
atk-s0502a:4155_6: lakkhaṇāni manasikātuṃ na sakkoti. Tesaṃ amanasikārā mandapañño punappunaṃ gabbhamupeti,
atk-s0502a:4155_7: gabbhavāsato na parimuccatīti. Desanāvasāne satthā rañño upakāravasena –
atk-s0502a:4157: Tanukassa bhavanti vedanā, saṇikaṃ jīrati āyu pālaya”nti. ;
atk-s0502a:4158_0: Imaṃ gāthaṃ vatvā uttaramāṇavaṃ uggaṇhāpetvā “imaṃ gāthaṃ rañño bhojanavelāya pavedeyyāsi,
atk-s0502a:4158_1: iminā upāyena bhojanaṃ parihāpeyyāsī”ti upāyaṃ ācikkhi, so tathā akāsi. Rājā aparena
atk-s0502a:4158_2: samayena nāḷikodanaparamatāya saṇṭhito susallahukasarīro sukhappatto satthari uppannavissāso
atk-s0502a:4158_3: sattāhaṃ asadisadānaṃ pavattesi. Dānānumodanāya mahājano mahantaṃ visesaṃ pāpuṇīti.
atk-s0502a:4161: Idaṃ pureti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sānuṃ nāma sāmaṇeraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4162_0: So kira ekissā upāsikāya ekaputtako ahosi. Atha naṃ sā daharakāleyeva pabbājesi.
atk-s0502a:4162_1: So pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya sīlavā ahosi vattasampanno, ācariyupajjhāyaāgantukānaṃ
atk-s0502a:4162_2: vattaṃ katameva hoti. Māsassa aṭṭhame divase pātova uṭṭhāya udakamāḷake udakaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0502a:4162_3: dhammassavanaggaṃ sammajjitvā āsanaṃ paññāpetvā dīpaṃ jāletvā madhurassarena dhammassavanaṃ
atk-s0502a:4162_4: ghoseti. Bhikkhū tassa thāmaṃ ñatvā “sarabhaññaṃ bhaṇa sāmaṇerā”ti ajjhesanti. So
atk-s0502a:4162_5: “mayhaṃ hadayavāto rujati, kāyo vā bādhatī”ti kiñci paccāhāraṃ akatvā dhammāsanaṃ
atk-s0502a:4162_6: abhirūhitvā ākāsagaṅgaṃ otārento viya sarabhaññaṃ vatvā otaranto “mayhaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ
atk-s0502a:4162_7: imasmiṃ sarabhaññe pattiṃ dammī”ti vadati. Tassa manussā mātāpitaro pattiyā dinnabhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:4162_8: na jānanti. Anantarattabhāve panassa mātā yakkhinī hutvā nibbattā, sā devatāhi saddhiṃ
atk-s0502a:4162_9: āgantvā dhammaṃ sutvā “sāmaṇerena dinnapattiṃ anumodāmi, tātā”ti vadati. “Sīlasampanno
atk-s0502a:4162_10: ca nāma bhikkhu sadevakassa lokassa piyo hotī”ti tasmiṃ sāmaṇere devatā salajjā sagāravā
atk-s0502a:4162_11: mahābrahmānaṃ viya aggikkhandhaṃ viya ca naṃ maññanti. Sāmaṇere gāravena tañca yakkhiniṃ
atk-s0502a:4162_12: garukaṃ katvā passanti. Tā dhammassavanayakkhasamāgamādīsu “sānumātā sānumātā”ti
atk-s0502a:4162_13: yakkhiniyā aggāsanaṃ aggodakaṃ aggapiṇḍaṃ denti. Mahesakkhāpi yakkhā taṃ disvā maggā
atk-s0502a:4163_0: Atha kho sāmaṇero vuḍḍhimanvāya paripakkindriyo anabhiratiyā pīḷito anabhiratiṃ vinodetuṃ
atk-s0502a:4163_1: asakkonto paruḷhakesanakho kiliṭṭhanivāsanapārupano kassaci anārocetvā pattacīvaramādāya
atk-s0502a:4163_2: ekakova mātugharaṃ agamāsi. Upāsikā puttaṃ disvā vanditvā āha – “kiṃ, tāta, tvaṃ
atk-s0502a:4163_3: pubbe ācariyupajjhāyehi vā daharasāmaṇerehi vā saddhiṃ idhāgacchasi, kasmā ekakova
atk-s0502a:4163_4: ajja āgatosī”ti? So ukkaṇṭhitabhāvaṃ ārocesi. Sā upāsikā nānappakārena gharāvāse
atk-s0502a:4163_5: ādīnavaṃ dassetvā puttaṃ ovadamānāpi saññāpetuṃ asakkontī “appeva nāma attano dhammatāyapi
atk-s0502a:4163_6: sallakkheyyā”ti anuyyojetvā “tiṭṭha, tāta, yāva te yāgubhattaṃ sampādemi, yāguṃ pivitvā
atk-s0502a:4163_7: katabhattakiccassa te manāpāni vatthāni nīharitvā dassāmī”ti vatvā āsanaṃ paññāpetvā
atk-s0502a:4163_8: adāsi. Nisīdi sāmaṇero. Upāsikā muhutteneva yāgukhajjakaṃ sampādetvā adāsi. Atha
atk-s0502a:4163_9: “bhattaṃ sampādessāmī”ti avidūre nisinnā taṇḍule dhovati. Tasmiṃ samaye sā yakkhinī
atk-s0502a:4163_10: “kahaṃ nu kho sāmaṇero, kacci bhikkhāhāraṃ labhati, no”ti āvajjamānā tassa vibbhamitukāmatāya
atk-s0502a:4163_11: nisinnabhāvaṃ ñatvā “sāmaṇero me mahesakkhānaṃ devatānaṃ antare lajjaṃ uppādeyya,
atk-s0502a:4163_12: gacchāmissa vibbhamane antarāyaṃ karissāmī”ti āgantvā tassa sarīre adhimuccitvā gīvaṃ
atk-s0502a:4163_13: parivattetvā kheḷena paggharantena bhūmiyaṃ nipati. Upāsikā puttassa taṃ vippakāraṃ
atk-s0502a:4163_14: disvā vegena gantvā puttaṃ āliṅgetvā ūrūsu nipajjāpesi. Sakalagāmavāsino āgantvā
atk-s0502a:4163_15: balikammādīni kariṃsu. Upāsikā pana paridevamānā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:4167: Na tehi yakkhā kīḷanti, iti me arahataṃ sutaṃ;
atk-s0502a:4168: Sā dāni ajja passāmi, yakkhā kīḷanti sānunā”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:4173: Na tehi yakkhā kīḷanti, sāhu te arahataṃ suta”nti. –
atk-s0502a:4176: Mākāsi pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, āvi vā yadi vā raho.
atk-s0502a:4177: “Sace ca pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, karissasi karosi vā;
atk-s0502a:4178: Na te dukkhā pamutyatthi, uppaccāpi palāyato”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:4179_0: Evaṃ pāpakaṃ kammaṃ katvā sakuṇassa viya uppatitvā palāyatopi te mokkho natthīti
atk-s0502a:4179_1: vatvā sā yakkhinī sāmaṇeraṃ muñci. So akkhīni ummīletvā mātaraṃ kese vikiriya assasantiṃ
atk-s0502a:4179_2: passasantiṃ rodamānaṃ sakalagāmavāsino ca sannipatite disvā attano yakkhena gahitabhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:4179_3: ajānanto “ahaṃ pubbe pīṭhe nisinno, mātā me avidūre nisīditvā taṇḍule dhovi, idāni
atk-s0502a:4179_4: panamhi bhūmiyaṃ nipanno, kiṃ nu kho eta”nti nipannakova mātaraṃ āha –
atk-s0502a:4180: “Mataṃ vā amma rodanti, yo vā jīvaṃ na dissati;
atk-s0502a:4181: Jīvantaṃ amma passantī, kasmā maṃ amma rodasī”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:4182: Athassa mātā vatthukāmakilesakāme pahāya pabbajitassa puna vibbhamanatthaṃ āgamane ādīnavaṃ dassentī āha –
atk-s0502a:4183: “Mataṃ vā putta rodanti, yo vā jīvaṃ na dissati;
atk-s0502a:4184: Yo ca kāme cajitvāna, punarāgacchate idha;
atk-s0502a:4185: Taṃ vāpi putta rodanti, puna jīvaṃ mato hi so”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:4186: Evañca pana vatvā gharāvāsaṃ kukkuḷasadisañceva narakasadisañca katvā gharāvāse ādīnavaṃ dassentī puna āha –
atk-s0502a:4189_0: Atha naṃ, “putta, bhaddaṃ tava hotu, mayā pana ‘ayaṃ no puttako ḍayhamāno’ti gehā
atk-s0502a:4189_1: bhaṇḍaṃ viya nīharitvā buddhasāsane pabbājito, gharāvāse puna ḍayhituṃ icchasi. Abhidhāvatha
atk-s0502a:4189_2: parittāyatha noti imamatthaṃ kassa ujjhāpayāma kaṃ nijjhāpayāmā”ti dīpetuṃ imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4192_0: So mātari kathentiyā kathentiyā sallakkhetvā “natthi mayhaṃ gihibhāvena attho”ti
atk-s0502a:4192_1: āha. Athassa mātā “sādhu, tātā”ti tuṭṭhā paṇītabhojanaṃ bhojetvā “kativassosi, tātā”ti
atk-s0502a:4192_2: pucchitvā paripuṇṇavassabhāvaṃ ñatvā ticīvaraṃ paṭiyādesi. So paripuṇṇapattacīvaro
atk-s0502a:4192_3: upasampadaṃ labhi. Athassa acirūpasampannassa satthā cittaniggahe ussāhaṃ janento
atk-s0502a:4192_4: “cittaṃ nāmetaṃ nānārammaṇesu dīgharattaṃ cārikaṃ carantaṃ aniggaṇhantassa sotthibhāvo
atk-s0502a:4192_5: nāma natthi, tasmā aṅkusena mattahatthino viya cittassa niggaṇhane yogo karaṇīyo”ti
atk-s0502a:4198_0: Tassattho – idaṃ cittaṃ nāma ito pubbe rūpādīsu ca ārammaṇesu rāgādīnaṃ yena kāraṇena
atk-s0502a:4198_1: icchati, yatthevassa kāmo uppajjati, tassa vasena yattha kāmaṃ yathāruci carantassa
atk-s0502a:4198_2: sukhaṃ hoti, tatheva vicaraṇato yathāsukhaṃ dīgharattaṃ cārikaṃ cari, taṃ ajja ahaṃ
atk-s0502a:4198_3: pabhinnaṃ mattahatthiṃ hatthācariyasaṅkhāto cheko aṅkusaggaho aṅkusena viya yonisomanasikārena
atk-s0502a:4199_0: Desanāvasāne sānunā saddhiṃ dhammassavanāya upasaṅkamantānaṃ bahūnaṃ devatānaṃ dhammābhisamayo
atk-s0502a:4199_1: ahosi. Sopāyasmā tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā mahādhammakathiko hutvā vīsavassasataṃ
atk-s0502a:4202: Appamādaratāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kosalarañño pāveyyakaṃ nāma hatthiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4203_0: So kira hatthī taruṇakāle mahābalo hutvā aparena samayena jarāvātavegabbhāhato hutvā
atk-s0502a:4203_1: ekaṃ mahantaṃ saraṃ oruyha kalale laggitvā uttarituṃ nāsakkhi. Mahājano taṃ disvā
atk-s0502a:4203_2: “evarūpopi nāma hatthī imaṃ dubbalabhāvaṃ patto”ti kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi. Rājā taṃ
atk-s0502a:4203_3: pavattiṃ sutvā hatthācariyaṃ āṇāpesi – “gaccha, ācariya, taṃ hatthiṃ kalalato uddharāhī”ti.
atk-s0502a:4203_4: So gantvā tasmiṃ ṭhāne saṅgāmasīsaṃ dassetvā saṅgāmabheriṃ ākoṭāpesi. Mānajātiko
atk-s0502a:4203_5: hatthī vegenuṭṭhāya thale patiṭṭhahi. Bhikkhū taṃ kāraṇaṃ disvā satthu ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:4203_6: Satthā “tena, bhikkhave, hatthinā pakatipaṅkaduggato attā uddhaṭo, tumhe pana kilesadugge
atk-s0502a:4203_7: pakkhandā. Tasmā yoniso padahitvā tumhepi tato attānaṃ uddharathā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4207_0: Tattha appamādaratāti satiyā avippavāse abhiratā hotha. Sacittanti rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu
atk-s0502a:4207_1: attano cittaṃ yathā vītikkamaṃ na karoti, evaṃ rakkhatha. Duggāti yathā so paṅke
atk-s0502a:4207_2: sanno kuñjaro hatthehi ca pādehi ca vāyāmaṃ katvā paṅkaduggato attānaṃ uddharitvā
atk-s0502a:4207_3: thale patiṭṭhito, evaṃ tumhepi kilesaduggato attānaṃ uddharatha, nibbānathale patiṭṭhāpethāti attho.
atk-s0502a:4211_0: Sace labhethāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā pālileyyakaṃ nissāya rakkhitavanasaṇḍe
atk-s0502a:4211_1: viharanto sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi. Vatthu yamakavagge “pare ca na vijānantī”ti
atk-s0502a:4212_0: Tathāgatassa tattha hatthināgena upaṭṭhiyamānassa vasanabhāvo sakalajambudīpe pākaṭo
atk-s0502a:4212_1: ahosi. Sāvatthinagarato “anāthapiṇḍiko visākhā mahāupāsikā”ti evamādīni mahākulāni
atk-s0502a:4212_2: ānandattherassa sāsanaṃ pahiṇiṃsu “satthāraṃ no, bhante, dassethā”ti. Disāvāsinopi
atk-s0502a:4212_3: pañcasatā bhikkhū vuṭṭhavassā ānandattheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā “cirassutā no, āvuso ānanda,
atk-s0502a:4212_4: bhagavato sammukhā dhammī kathā, sādhu mayaṃ, āvuso ānanda, labheyyāma bhagavato
atk-s0502a:4212_5: sammukhā dhammiṃ kathaṃ savanāyā”ti yāciṃsu. Thero te bhikkhū ādāya tattha gantvā
atk-s0502a:4212_6: “temāsaṃ ekavihārino tathāgatassa santikaṃ ettakehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ upasaṅkamanaṃ
atk-s0502a:4212_7: ayutta”nti cintetvā te bhikkhū bahi ṭhapetvā ekakova satthāraṃ upasaṅkami. Pālileyyako
atk-s0502a:4212_8: taṃ disvā daṇḍamādāya pakkhandi. Taṃ satthā oloketvā “apehi, apehi, pālileyyaka,
atk-s0502a:4212_9: mā vārayi, buddhupaṭṭhāko eso”ti āha. So tattheva daṇḍaṃ chaḍḍetvā pattacīvarapaṭiggahaṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:4212_10: āpucchi. Thero nādāsi. Nāgo “sace uggahitavatto bhavissati, satthu nisīdanapāsāṇaphalake
atk-s0502a:4212_11: attano parikkhāraṃ na ṭhapessatī”ti cintesi. Thero pattacīvaraṃ bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a:4212_12: Vattasampannā hi garūnaṃ āsane vā sayane vā attano parikkhāraṃ na ṭhapenti.
atk-s0502a:4213_0: Thero satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Satthā “ekakova āgatosī”ti pucchitvā pañcahi
atk-s0502a:4213_1: bhikkhusatehi āgatabhāvaṃ sutvā “kahaṃ pana te”ti pucchitvā “tumhākaṃ cittaṃ ajānanto
atk-s0502a:4213_2: bahi ṭhapetvā āgatomhī”ti vutte “pakkosāhi ne”ti āha. Thero tathā akāsi. Satthā tehi
atk-s0502a:4213_3: bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā tehi bhikkhūhi, “bhante, bhagavā buddhasukhumālo
atk-s0502a:4213_4: ceva khattiyasukhumālo ca, tumhehi temāsaṃ ekakehi tiṭṭhantehi nisīdantehi ca dukkaraṃ
atk-s0502a:4213_5: kataṃ, vattapaṭivattakārakopi mukhodakādidāyakopi nāhosi maññe”ti vutte, “bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a:4213_6: pālileyyakahatthinā mama sabbakiccāni katāni. Evarūpañhi sahāyaṃ labhantena ekakova
atk-s0502a:4213_7: vasituṃ yuttaṃ, alabhantassa ekacārikabhāvova seyyo”ti vatvā nāgavagge imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:4227: Eko care na ca pāpāni kayirā,
atk-s0502a:4229_0: Tattha nipakanti nepakkapaññāya samannāgataṃ. Sādhuvihāri dhīranti bhaddakavihāriṃ
atk-s0502a:4229_1: paṇḍitaṃ. Parissayānīti tādisaṃ mettāvihāriṃ sahāyaṃ labhanto sīhabyagghādayo pākaṭaparissaye
atk-s0502a:4229_2: ca rāgabhayadosabhayamohabhayādayo paṭicchannaparissaye cāti sabbeva parissaye abhibhavitvā
atk-s0502a:4229_3: tena saddhiṃ attamano upaṭṭhitasatī hutvā careyya, vihareyyāti attho.
atk-s0502a:4230_0: Rājāva raṭṭhanti raṭṭhaṃ hitvā gato mahājanakarājā viya. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā
atk-s0502a:4230_1: vijitabhūmipadeso rājā “idaṃ rajjaṃ nāma mahantaṃ pamādaṭṭhānaṃ, kiṃ me rajjena kāritenā”ti
atk-s0502a:4230_2: vijitaṃ raṭṭhaṃ pahāya ekakova mahāraññaṃ pavisitvā tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā catūsu
atk-s0502a:4230_3: iriyāpathesu ekakova carati, evaṃ ekakova careyyāti. Mātaṅgaraññeva nāgoti yathā
atk-s0502a:4230_4: ca “ahaṃ kho ākiṇṇo viharāmi hatthīhi hatthinīhi hatthikaḷabhehi hatthicchāpehi,
atk-s0502a:4230_5: chinnaggāni ceva tiṇāni khādāmi, obhaggobhaggañca me sākhābhaṅgaṃ khādanti, āvilāni
atk-s0502a:4230_6: ca pānīyāni pivāmi, ogāhā ca me uttiṇṇassa hatthiniyo kāyaṃ upanighaṃsantiyo gacchanti,
atk-s0502a:4230_7: yaṃnūnāhaṃ ekakova gaṇamhā vūpakaṭṭho vihareyya”nti evaṃ paṭisañcikkhitvā gamanato
atk-s0502a:4230_8: mātaṅgoti laddhanāmo imasmiṃ araññe ayaṃ hatthināgo yūthaṃ pahāya sabbiriyāpathesu
atk-s0502a:4230_9: ekakova sukhaṃ carati, evampi ekova careyyāti attho.
atk-s0502a:4231_0: Ekassāti pabbajitassa hi pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya ekībhāvābhiratassa ekakasseva caritaṃ
atk-s0502a:4231_1: seyyo. Natthi bāle sahāyatāti cūḷasīlaṃ majjhimasīlaṃ mahāsīlaṃ dasa kathāvatthūni
atk-s0502a:4231_2: terasa dhutaṅgaguṇāni vipassanāñāṇaṃ cattāro maggā cattāri phalāni tisso vijjā cha
atk-s0502a:4231_3: abhiññā amatamahānibbānanti ayañhi sahāyatā nāma. Sā bāle nissāya adhigantuṃ na sakkāti
atk-s0502a:4231_4: natthi bāle sahāyatā. Ekoti iminā kāraṇena sabbiriyāpathesu ekakova careyya, appamattakānipi
atk-s0502a:4231_5: na ca pāpāni kayirā. Yathā so appossukko nirālayo imasmiṃ araññe mātaṅganāgo icchiticchitaṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a:4231_6: sukhaṃ carati, evaṃ ekakova hutvā careyya, appamattakānipi na ca pāpāni kareyyāti
atk-s0502a:4231_7: attho. Tasmā tumhehi patirūpaṃ sahāyaṃ alabhantehi ekacārīheva bhavitabbanti imamatthaṃ
atk-s0502a:4231_8: dassento satthā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ desesi.
atk-s0502a:4232: Desanāvasāne pañcasatāpi te bhikkhū arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a:4235: Atthamhīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā himavantapadese araññakuṭikāyaṃ viharanto māraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4236_0: Tasmiṃ kira kāle rājāno manusse pīḷetvā rajjaṃ kārenti. Atha bhagavā adhammikarājūnaṃ
atk-s0502a:4236_1: rajje daṇḍakaraṇapīḷite manusse disvā kāruññena evaṃ cintesi – “sakkā nu kho rajjaṃ
atk-s0502a:4236_2: kāretuṃ ahanaṃ aghātayaṃ, ajinaṃ ajāpayaṃ, asocaṃ asocāpayaṃ dhammenā”ti, māro pāpimā
atk-s0502a:4236_3: taṃ bhagavato parivitakkaṃ ñatvā “samaṇo gotamo ‘sakkā nu kho rajjaṃ kāretu’nti cintesi,
atk-s0502a:4236_4: idāni rajjaṃ kāretukāmo bhavissati, rajjañca nāmetaṃ pamādaṭṭhānaṃ, taṃ kārente sakkā
atk-s0502a:4236_5: okāsaṃ labhituṃ, gacchāmi ussāhamassa janessāmī”ti cintetvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0502a:4236_6: āha – “kāretu, bhante, bhagavā rajjaṃ, kāretu sugato rajjaṃ ahanaṃ aghātayaṃ, ajinaṃ
atk-s0502a:4236_7: ajāpayaṃ, asocaṃ asocāpayaṃ dhammenā”ti. Atha naṃ satthā “kiṃ pana me tvaṃ, pāpima,
atk-s0502a:4236_8: passasi, yaṃ maṃ tvaṃ evaṃ vadesī”ti vatvā “bhagavatā kho, bhante, cattāro iddhipādā
atk-s0502a:4236_9: subhāvitā. Ākaṅkhamāno hi bhagavā himavantaṃ pabbatarājaṃ ‘suvaṇṇa’nti adhimucceyya,
atk-s0502a:4236_10: tañca suvaṇṇameva assa, ahampi kho dhanena dhanakaraṇīyaṃ karissāmi, tumhe dhammena
atk-s0502a:4243: Imāhi gāthāhi saṃvejetvā “añño eva kho, pāpima, tava ovādo, añño mama, tayā saddhiṃ dhammasaṃsandanā nāma natthi, ahañhi evaṃ ovadāmī”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:4256: Sukho paññāya paṭilābho, pāpānaṃ akaraṇaṃ sukha”nti.
atk-s0502a:4257_0: Tattha atthamhīti pabbajitassāpi hi cīvarakaraṇādike vā adhikaraṇavūpasamādike vā
atk-s0502a:4257_1: gihinopi kasikammādike vā balavapakkhasannissitehi abhibhavanādike vā kicce uppanne
atk-s0502a:4257_2: ye taṃ kiccaṃ nipphādetuṃ vā vūpasametuṃ vā sakkonti, evarūpā sukhā sahāyāti attho.
atk-s0502a:4257_3: Tuṭṭhī sukhāti yasmā pana gihinopi sakena asantuṭṭhā sandhicchedādīni ārabhanti,
atk-s0502a:4257_4: pabbajitāpi nānappakāraṃ anesanaṃ. Iti te sukhaṃ na vindantiyeva. Tasmā yā itarītarena
atk-s0502a:4257_5: parittena vā vipulena vā attano santakena santuṭṭhi, ayameva sukhāti attho. Puññanti
atk-s0502a:4257_6: maraṇakāle pana yathājjhāsayena pattharitvā katapuññakammameva sukhaṃ. Sabbassāti
atk-s0502a:4257_7: sakalassapi pana vaṭṭadukkhassa pahānasaṅkhātaṃ arahattameva imasmiṃ loke sukhaṃ nāma.
atk-s0502a:4258_0: Matteyyatāti mātari sammā paṭipatti. Petteyyatāti pitari sammā paṭipatti. Ubhayenapi
atk-s0502a:4258_1: mātāpitūnaṃ upaṭṭhānameva kathitaṃ. Mātāpitaro hi puttānaṃ anupaṭṭhahanabhāvaṃ ñatvā
atk-s0502a:4258_2: attano santakaṃ bhūmiyaṃ vā nidahanti, paresaṃ vā vissajjenti, “mātāpitaro na upaṭṭhahantī”ti
atk-s0502a:4258_3: nesaṃ nindāpi vaḍḍhati, kāyassa bhedā gūthanirayepi nibbattanti. Ye pana mātāpitaro
atk-s0502a:4258_4: sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahanti, te tesaṃ santakaṃ dhanampi pāpuṇanti, pasaṃsampi labhanti,
atk-s0502a:4258_5: kāyassa bhedā sagge nibbattanti. Tasmā ubhayampetaṃ sukhanti vuttaṃ. Sāmaññatāti
atk-s0502a:4258_6: pabbajitesu sammā paṭipatti. Brahmaññatāti bāhitapāpesu buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakesu
atk-s0502a:4258_7: sammā paṭipattiyeva. Ubhayenapi tesaṃ catūhi paccayehi paṭijagganabhāvo kathito,
atk-s0502a:4259_0: Sīlanti maṇikuṇḍalarattavatthādayo hi alaṅkārā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ vaye ṭhitānaṃyeva sobhanti.
atk-s0502a:4259_1: Na daharānaṃ alaṅkāro mahallakakāle, mahallakānaṃ vā alaṅkāro daharakāle sobhati,
atk-s0502a:4259_2: “ummattako esa maññe”ti garahuppādanena pana dosameva janeti. Pañcasīladasasīlādibhedaṃ
atk-s0502a:4259_3: pana sīlaṃ daharassāpi mahallakassāpi sabbavayesu sobhatiyeva, “aho vatāyaṃ sīlavā”ti
atk-s0502a:4259_4: pasaṃsuppādanena somanassameva āvahati. Tena vuttaṃ – sukhaṃ yāva jarā sīlanti. Saddhā
atk-s0502a:4259_5: patiṭṭhitāti lokiyalokuttarato duvidhāpi saddhā niccalā hutvā patiṭṭhitā. Sukho paññāya
atk-s0502a:4259_6: paṭilābhoti lokiyalokuttarapaññāya paṭilābho sukho. Pāpānaṃ akaraṇanti setughātavasena
atk-s0502a:4259_7: pana pāpānaṃ akaraṇaṃ imasmiṃ loke sukhanti attho.
atk-s0502a:4266: Manujassāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kapilamacchaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4267_0: Atīte kira kassapabhagavato parinibbutakāle dve kulabhātaro nikkhamitvā sāvakānaṃ
atk-s0502a:4267_1: santike pabbajiṃsu. Tesu jeṭṭho sāgato nāma ahosi, kaniṭṭho kapilo nāma. Mātā pana
atk-s0502a:4267_2: nesaṃ sādhinī nāma, kaniṭṭhabhaginī tāpanā nāma. Tāpi bhikkhunīsu pabbajiṃsu. Evaṃ
atk-s0502a:4267_3: tesu pabbajitesu ubho bhātaro ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ vattapaṭivattaṃ katvā viharantā
atk-s0502a:4267_4: ekadivasaṃ, “bhante, imasmiṃ sāsane kati dhurānī”ti pucchitvā “ganthadhuraṃ vipassanādhurañcāti
atk-s0502a:4267_5: dve dhurānī”ti sutvā jeṭṭho “vipassanādhuraṃ pūressāmī”ti pañca vassāni ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ
atk-s0502a:4267_6: santike vasitvā yāva arahattā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññaṃ pavisitvā vāyamanto arahattaṃ
atk-s0502a:4267_7: pāpuṇi. Kaniṭṭho “ahaṃ tāva taruṇo, vuḍḍhakāle vipassanādhuraṃ pūressāmī”ti ganthadhuraṃ
atk-s0502a:4267_8: paṭṭhapetvā tīṇi piṭakāni uggaṇhi. Tassa pariyattiṃ nissāya mahāparivāro, parivāraṃ
atk-s0502a:4267_9: nissāya lābho udapādi. So bāhusaccamadena matto lābhataṇhāya abhibhūto atipaṇḍitamānitāya
atk-s0502a:4267_10: parehi vuttaṃ kappiyampi “akappiya”nti vadeti, akappiyampi “kappiya”nti vadeti, sāvajjampi
atk-s0502a:4267_11: “anavajja”nti, anavajjampi “sāvajja”nti. So pesalehi bhikkhūhi “mā, āvuso kapila,
atk-s0502a:4267_12: evaṃ avacā”ti vatvā dhammañca vinayañca dassetvā ovadiyamānopi “tumhe kiṃ jānātha,
atk-s0502a:4267_13: rittamuṭṭhisadisā”tiādīni vatvā khuṃsento vambhento carati. Athassa bhātu sāgatattherassāpi
atk-s0502a:4267_14: bhikkhū tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Sopi naṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “āvuso kapila, tumhādisānañhi
atk-s0502a:4267_15: sammāpaṭipatti sāsanassa āyu nāma, tasmā paṭipattiṃ pahāya kappiyādīni paṭibāhanto
atk-s0502a:4267_16: mā evaṃ avacā”ti ovadi. So tassapi vacanaṃ nādiyi. Evaṃ santepi thero dvattikkhattuṃ
atk-s0502a:4267_17: ovaditvā ovādaṃ agaṇhantaṃ “nāyaṃ mama vacanaṃ karotī”ti ñatvā “tena, āvuso, paññāyissasi
atk-s0502a:4267_18: sakena kammenā”ti vatvā pakkāmi. Tato paṭṭhāya naṃ aññe pesalā bhikkhū chaḍḍayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4268_0: So durācāro hutvā durācāraparivuto viharanto ekadivasaṃ uposathagge “pātimokkhaṃ
atk-s0502a:4268_1: uddisissāmī”ti bījaniṃ ādāya dhammāsane nisīditvā “vattati, āvuso, ettha sannipatitānaṃ
atk-s0502a:4268_2: bhikkhūnaṃ pātimokkha”nti pucchitvā “ko attho imassa paṭivacanena dinnenā”ti tuṇhībhūte
atk-s0502a:4268_3: bhikkhū disvā, “āvuso, dhammo vā vinayo vā natthi, pātimokkhena sutena vā asutena
atk-s0502a:4268_4: vā ko attho”ti vatvā āsanā vuṭṭhahi. Evaṃ so kassapassa bhagavato pariyattisāsanaṃ
atk-s0502a:4268_5: osakkāpesi. Sāgatattheropi tadaheva parinibbāyi. Kapilo āyupariyosāne avīcimhi mahāniraye
atk-s0502a:4268_6: nibbatti. Sāpissa mātā ca bhaginī ca tasseva diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjitvā pesale bhikkhū
atk-s0502a:4269_0: Tasmiṃ pana kāle pañcasatā purisā gāmaghātakādīni katvā corikāya jīvantā janapadamanussehi
atk-s0502a:4269_1: anubaddhā palāyamānā araññaṃ pavisitvā tattha kiñci paṭisaraṇaṃ apassantā aññataraṃ
atk-s0502a:4269_2: āraññikaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā vanditvā “paṭisaraṇaṃ no, bhante, hothā”ti vadiṃsu. Thero
atk-s0502a:4269_3: “tumhākaṃ sīlasadisaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ nāma natthi, sabbepi pañcasīlāni samādiyathā”ti
atk-s0502a:4269_4: āha. Te “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā sīlāni samādiyiṃsu. Atha ne thero ovadi – “idāni
atk-s0502a:4269_5: tumhe sīlavantā, jīvitahetupi vo neva sīlaṃ atikkamitabbaṃ, na manopadoso kātabbo”ti.
atk-s0502a:4269_6: Te “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchiṃsu. Atha ne janapadamanussā taṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā ito cito ca
atk-s0502a:4269_7: pariyesamānā te core disvā sabbe te jīvitā voropesuṃ. Te kālaṃ katvā devaloke nibbattiṃsu,
atk-s0502a:4270_0: Te anulomapaṭilomavasena ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devaloke saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0502a:4270_1: sāvatthinagaradvāre pañcasatakulike kevaṭṭagāme nibbattiṃsu. Jeṭṭhakadevaputto kevaṭṭajeṭṭhakassa
atk-s0502a:4270_2: gehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi, itare itaresu. Evaṃ tesaṃ ekadivaseyeva paṭisandhigahaṇañca
atk-s0502a:4270_3: mātukucchito nikkhamanañca ahosi. Kevaṭṭajeṭṭhako “atthi nu kho imasmiṃ gāme aññepi
atk-s0502a:4270_4: dārakā ajja jātā”ti pariyesāpetvā tesaṃ jātabhāvaṃ ñatvā “ete mama puttassa sahāyakā
atk-s0502a:4270_5: bhavissantī”ti sabbesaṃ posāvanikaṃ dāpesi. Te sabbepi sahapaṃsukīḷakā sahāyakā hutvā
atk-s0502a:4270_6: anupubbena vayappattā ahesuṃ. Tesaṃ kevaṭṭajeṭṭhakaputtova yasato ca tejato ca aggapuriso ahosi.
atk-s0502a:4271_0: Kapilopi ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ niraye paccitvā vipākāvasesena tasmiṃ kāle aciravatiyā
atk-s0502a:4271_1: suvaṇṇavaṇṇo duggandhamukho maccho hutvā nibbatti. Athekadivasaṃ te sahāyakā “macche
atk-s0502a:4271_2: bandhissāmā”ti jālādīni gahetvā nadiyā khipiṃsu. Atha nesaṃ antojālaṃ so maccho pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:4271_3: Taṃ disvā sabbe kevaṭṭagāmavāsino uccāsaddamakaṃsu – “puttā no paṭhamaṃ macche bandhantā
atk-s0502a:4271_4: suvaṇṇamacchaṃ bandhiṃsu, idāni no rājā bahudhanaṃ dassatī”ti. Tepi kho sahāyakā
atk-s0502a:4271_5: macchaṃ nāvāya pakkhipitvā nāvaṃ ukkhipitvā rañño santikaṃ agamaṃsu. Raññāpi taṃ
atk-s0502a:4271_6: disvāva “kiṃ eta”nti vutte “maccho, devā”ti āhaṃsu. Rājā suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ macchaṃ disvā
atk-s0502a:4271_7: “satthā etassa suvaṇṇavaṇṇakāraṇaṃ jānissatī”ti macchaṃ gāhāpetvā bhagavato santikaṃ
atk-s0502a:4271_8: agamāsi. Macchena mukhe vivaṭamatteyeva sakalajetavanaṃ ativiya duggandhaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0502a:4271_9: Rājā satthāraṃ pucchi – “kasmā, bhante, maccho suvaṇṇavaṇṇo jāto, kasmā cassa mukhato
atk-s0502a:4272_0: Ayaṃ, mahārāja, kassapabhagavato pāvacane kapilo nāma bhikkhu ahosi bahussuto mahāparivāro
atk-s0502a:4272_1: lābhataṇhāya abhibhūto attano vacanaṃ agaṇhantānaṃ akkosakaparibhāsako, tassa ca
atk-s0502a:4272_2: bhagavato sāsanaṃ osakkāpesi, so tena kammena avīcimhi nibbattitvā vipākāvasesena
atk-s0502a:4272_3: idāni maccho hutvā jāto. Yaṃ pana so dīgharattaṃ buddhavacanaṃ vācesi, buddhassa
atk-s0502a:4272_4: ca guṇaṃ kathesi, tassa nissandena imaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ paṭilabhi. Yaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ akkosakaparibhāsako
atk-s0502a:4272_5: ahosi, tenassa mukhato duggandho vāyati. “Kathāpemi naṃ, mahārājā”ti? “Kathāpetha,
atk-s0502a:4272_6: bhante”ti. Atha naṃ satthā pucchi – “tvaṃsi kapilo”ti? “Āma, bhante, ahaṃ kapilo”ti.
atk-s0502a:4272_7: “Kuto āgatosī”ti? “Avīcimahānirayato, bhante”ti. “Jeṭṭhabhātiko te sāgato kuhiṃ gato”ti?
atk-s0502a:4272_8: “Parinibbuto, bhante”ti. “Mātā pana te sādhinī kaha”nti? “Mahāniraye nibbattā, bhante”ti.
atk-s0502a:4272_9: “Kaniṭṭhabhaginī ca te tāpanā kaha”nti? “Mahāniraye nibbattā, bhante”ti. “Idāni tvaṃ
atk-s0502a:4272_10: kahaṃ gamissasī”ti? “Avīcimahānirayameva, bhante”ti vatvā vippaṭisārābhibhūto nāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:4272_11: sīsena paharitvā tāvadeva kālaṃ katvā niraye nibbatti. Mahājano saṃviggo ahosi lomahaṭṭhajāto.
atk-s0502a:4273_0: Atha bhagavā tasmiṃ khaṇe sannipatitāya parisāya cittācāraṃ oloketvā taṅkhaṇānurūpaṃ
atk-s0502a:4273_1: dhammaṃ desetuṃ “dhammacariyaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, etadāhu vasuttama”nti suttanipāte kapilasuttaṃ
atk-s0502a:4276: So plavatī hurā huraṃ, phalamicchaṃva vanasmi vānaro.
atk-s0502a:4278: “Yaṃ esā sahate jammī, taṇhā loke visattikā;
atk-s0502a:4281: “Yo cetaṃ sahate jammiṃ, taṇhaṃ loke duraccayaṃ;
atk-s0502a:4284: “Taṃ vo vadāmi bhaddaṃ vo, yāvantettha samāgatā;
atk-s0502a:4286: Mā vo naḷaṃva sotova, māro bhañji punappuna”nti.
atk-s0502a:4287_0: Tattha pamattacārinoti sativossaggalakkhaṇena pamādena pamattacārissa puggalassa
atk-s0502a:4287_1: neva jhānaṃ na vipassanā na maggaphalāni vaḍḍhanti. Yathā pana rukkhaṃ saṃsibbantī
atk-s0502a:4287_2: pariyonandhantī tassa vināsāya māluvālatā vaḍḍhati, evamassa cha dvārāni nissāya
atk-s0502a:4287_3: punappunaṃ uppajjanato taṇhā vaḍḍhatīti attho. So plavatī hurā huranti so taṇhāvasiko
atk-s0502a:4287_4: puggalo bhave bhave uplavati dhāvati. Yathā kiṃ viyāti? Phalamicchaṃva vanasmi vānaro,
atk-s0502a:4287_5: yathā rukkhaphalaṃ icchanto vānaro vanasmiṃ dhāvati, tassa tassa rukkhassa sākhaṃ
atk-s0502a:4287_6: gaṇhāti, taṃ muñcitvā aññaṃ gaṇhāti, tampi muñcitvā aññaṃ gaṇhāti, “sākhaṃ alabhitvā
atk-s0502a:4287_7: sannisinno”ti vattabbataṃ nāpajjati, evameva taṇhāvasiko puggalo hurā huraṃ dhāvanto
atk-s0502a:4287_8: “ārammaṇaṃ alabhitvā taṇhāya apavattaṃ patto”ti vattabbataṃ nāpajjati.
atk-s0502a:4288_0: Yanti yaṃ puggalaṃ esā lāmakabhāvena jammī visāhāratāya visapupphatāya visaphalatāya
atk-s0502a:4288_1: visaparibhogatāya rūpādīsu visattatāya āsattatāya visattikāti saṅkhyaṃ gatā chadvārikataṇhā
atk-s0502a:4288_2: abhibhavati. Yathā nāma vassāne punappunaṃ vassantena devena abhivaṭṭhaṃ bīraṇatiṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:4288_3: vaḍḍhati, evaṃ tassa puggalassa anto vaṭṭamūlakā sokā abhivaḍḍhantīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4289_0: Duraccayanti yo pana puggalo evaṃ vuttappakāraṃ atikkamituṃ pajahituṃ dukkaratāya
atk-s0502a:4289_1: duraccayaṃ taṇhaṃ sahati abhibhavati, tamhā puggalā vaṭṭamūlakā sokā papatanti. Yathā
atk-s0502a:4289_2: nāma pokkhare padumapatte patitaṃ udakabindu na patiṭṭhāti, evaṃ na patiṭṭhahantīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4290_0: Taṃ vo vadāmīti tena kāraṇena ahaṃ tumhe vadāmi. Bhaddaṃ voti bhaddaṃ tumhākaṃ hotu,
atk-s0502a:4290_1: mā ahaṃ kapilo viya vināsaṃ pāpuṇathāti attho. Mūlanti imissā chadvārikataṇhāya arahattamaggañāṇena
atk-s0502a:4290_2: mūlaṃ khaṇatha. Kiṃ viyāti? Usīratthova bīraṇaṃ, yathā usīrena atthiko puriso mahantena
atk-s0502a:4290_3: kudālena bīraṇaṃ khaṇati, evamassā mūlaṃ khaṇathāti attho. Mā vo naḷaṃva sotova,
atk-s0502a:4290_4: māro bhañji punappunanti mā tumhe nadīsote jātaṃ naḷaṃ mahāvegena āgato nadīsoto
atk-s0502a:4290_5: viya kilesamāro maraṇamāro devaputtamāro ca punappunaṃ bhañjatūti attho.
atk-s0502a:4291_0: Desanāvasāne pañcasatāpi kevaṭṭaputtā saṃvegaṃ āpajjitvā dukkhassantakiriyaṃ patthayamānā
atk-s0502a:4291_1: satthu santike pabbajitvā na cirasseva dukkhassantaṃ katvā satthārā saddhiṃ āneñjavihārasamāpattidhammaparibhogena
atk-s0502a:4294: Yathāpi mūleti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto gūthasūkarapotikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4295_0: Ekasmiṃ kira samaye satthā rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya pavisanto ekaṃ sūkarapotikaṃ disvā sitaṃ
atk-s0502a:4295_1: pātvākāsi. Tassa sitaṃ karontassa mukhavivaraniggataṃ dantobhāsamaṇḍalaṃ disvā ānandatthero
atk-s0502a:4295_2: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu sitassa pātukammāyā”ti sitakāraṇaṃ pucchi. Atha naṃ satthā
atk-s0502a:4295_3: āha – “passasetaṃ, ānanda, sūkarapotika”nti? “Āma, bhante”ti. Esā kakusandhassa bhagavato
atk-s0502a:4295_4: sāsane ekāya āsanasālāya sāmantā kukkuṭī ahosi. Sā ekassa yogāvacarassa vipassanākammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:4295_5: sajjhāyantassa dhammaghosaṃ sutvā tato cutā rājakule nibbattitvā ubbarī nāma rājadhītā
atk-s0502a:4295_6: ahosi. Sā aparabhāge sarīravalañjaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhā puḷavakarāsiṃ disvā tattha puḷavakasaññaṃ
atk-s0502a:4295_7: uppādetvā paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ paṭilabhi. Sā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cutā brahmaloke
atk-s0502a:4295_8: nibbatti. Tato cavitvā puna gativasena ālulamānā idāni sūkarayoniyaṃ nibbatti, idaṃ
atk-s0502a:4295_9: kāraṇaṃ disvā mayā sitaṃ pātukatanti. Taṃ sutvā ānandattherappamukhā bhikkhū mahantaṃ
atk-s0502a:4295_10: saṃvegaṃ paṭilabhiṃsu. Satthā tesaṃ saṃvegaṃ uppādetvā bhavataṇhāya ādīnavaṃ pakāsento
atk-s0502a:4306: Tañca disvā lataṃ jātaṃ, mūlaṃ paññāya chindatha.
atk-s0502a:4322_0: Tattha mūleti yassa rukkhassa catūsu disāsu catudhā heṭṭhā ca ujukameva gate pañcavidhamūle
atk-s0502a:4322_1: chedanaphālanapācanavijjhanādīnaṃ kenaci upaddavena anupaddave thirapattatāya daḷhe
atk-s0502a:4322_2: so rukkho uparicchinnopi sākhānaṃ vasena punadeva rūhati, evameva chadvārikāya taṇhāya
atk-s0502a:4322_3: anusaye arahattamaggañāṇena anuhate asamucchinne tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhave jātiādibhedaṃ
atk-s0502a:4323_0: Yassāti yassa puggalassa “iti ajjhattikassūpādāya aṭṭhārasa taṇhāvicaritāni bāhirassūpādāya
atk-s0502a:4323_1: aṭṭhārasa taṇhāvicaritānī”ti imesaṃ taṇhāvicaritānaṃ vasena chattiṃsatiyā sotehi
atk-s0502a:4323_2: samannāgatā manāpesu rūpādīsu āsavati pavattatīti manāpasavanā taṇhā bhusā balavatī
atk-s0502a:4323_3: hoti, taṃ puggalaṃ vipannañāṇatāya duddiṭṭhiṃ punappunaṃ uppajjanato mahantabhāvena
atk-s0502a:4323_4: mahā hutvā jhānaṃ vā vipassanaṃ vā anissāya rāganissitā saṅkappā vahantīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4324_0: Savanti sabbadhi sotāti ime taṇhāsotā cakkhudvārādīnaṃ vasena sabbesu rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu
atk-s0502a:4324_1: savanato, sabbāpi rūpataṇhā…pe… dhammataṇhāti sabbabhavesu vā savanato sabbadhi savanti
atk-s0502a:4324_2: nāma. Latāti paliveṭhanaṭṭhena saṃsibbanaṭṭhena ca latā viyāti latā. Uppajja tiṭṭhatīti
atk-s0502a:4324_3: chahi dvārehi uppajjitvā rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu tiṭṭhati. Tañca disvāti taṃ pana taṇhālataṃ
atk-s0502a:4324_4: “etthesā taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjatī”ti jātaṭṭhānavasena disvā. Paññāyāti satthena
atk-s0502a:4324_5: vane jātaṃ lataṃ viya maggapaññāya mūle chindathāti attho.
atk-s0502a:4325_0: Saritānīti anusaṭāni payātāni. Sinehitānīti cīvarādīsu pavattasinehavasena sinehitāni
atk-s0502a:4325_1: ca, taṇhāsinehamakkhitānīti attho. Somanassānīti taṇhāvasikassa jantuno evarūpāni
atk-s0502a:4325_2: somanassāni bhavanti. Te sātasitāti te taṇhāvasikā puggalā sātanissitā sukhanissitā
atk-s0502a:4325_3: ca hutvā sukhesino sukhapariyesino bhavanti. Te veti ye evarūpā narā, te jātijarābyādhimaraṇāni
atk-s0502a:4325_4: upagacchantiyevāti jātijarūpagā nāma honti. Pajāti ime sattā tāsakaraṇena tasiṇāti
atk-s0502a:4325_5: saṅkhyaṃ gatāya taṇhāya purakkhatā parivāritā hutvā.
atk-s0502a:4326_0: Bandhitoti luddena araññe baddho saso viya parisappanti bhāyanti. Saṃyojanasaṅgasattakāti
atk-s0502a:4326_1: dasavidhena saṃyojanasaṅgena ceva sattavidhena rāgasaṅgādinā ca sattā baddhā tasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:4326_2: vā laggā hutvā. Cirāyāti ciraṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ punappunaṃ jātiādikaṃ dukkhaṃ upagacchantīti
atk-s0502a:4326_3: attho. Tasmāti yasmā tasiṇāya purakkhatā paliveṭhitā sattā, tasmā attano virāgaṃ
atk-s0502a:4326_4: rāgādivigamaṃ nibbānaṃ patthento ākaṅkamāno bhikkhu arahattamaggenetaṃ tasiṇaṃ vinodaye
atk-s0502a:4328_0: Sāpi kho sūkarapotikā tato cavitvā suvaṇṇabhūmiyaṃ rājakule nibbatti, tato cutā bārāṇasiyaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4328_1: tato cutā suppārakapaṭṭane assavāṇijagehe nibbatti, tato cutā kāvīrapaṭṭane nāvikassa
atk-s0502a:4328_2: gehe nibbatti, tato cutā anurādhapure issarakulagehe nibbatti, tato cutā tasseva
atk-s0502a:4328_3: dakkhiṇadisāya bhokkantagāme sumanassa nāma kuṭumbikassa dhītā nāmena sumanā eva
atk-s0502a:4328_4: hutvā nibbatti. Athassā pitā tasmiṃ gāme chaḍḍite dīghavāpiraṭṭhaṃ gantvā mahāmunigāme
atk-s0502a:4328_5: nāma vasi. Tattha naṃ duṭṭhagāmaṇirañño amacco lakuṇḍakaatimbaro nāma kenacideva
atk-s0502a:4328_6: karaṇīyena gato disvā mahantaṃ maṅgalaṃ katvā ādāya mahāpuṇṇagāmaṃ gato. Atha naṃ
atk-s0502a:4328_7: koṭipabbatamahāvihāravāsī mahāanuruddhatthero nāma tattha piṇḍāya caritvā tassā gehadvāre
atk-s0502a:4328_8: ṭhito disvā bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ kathesi, “āvuso, sūkarapotikā nāma lakuṇḍakaatimbaramahāmattassa
atk-s0502a:4328_9: bhariyabhāvaṃ pattā, aho acchariya”nti. Sā taṃ kathaṃ sutvā atītabhave ugghāṭetvā
atk-s0502a:4328_10: jātissarañāṇaṃ paṭilabhi. Taṅkhaṇaññeva uppannasaṃvegā sāmikaṃ yācitvā mahantena
atk-s0502a:4328_11: issariyena pañcabalakattherīnaṃ santike pabbajitvā tissamahāvihāre mahāsatipaṭṭhānasuttakathaṃ
atk-s0502a:4328_12: sutvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. Pacchā damiḷamaddane kate ñātīnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:4328_13: bhokkantagāmameva gantvā tattha vasantī kallamahāvihāre āsīvisopamasuttantaṃ sutvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:4329_0: Sā parinibbānadivase bhikkhubhikkhunīhi pucchitā bhikkhunisaṅghassa sabbaṃ imaṃ pavattiṃ
atk-s0502a:4329_1: nirantaraṃ kathetvā sannipatitassa bhikkhusaṅghassa majjhe maṇḍalārāmavāsinā dhammapadabhāṇakamahātissattherena
atk-s0502a:4329_2: saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā “ahaṃ pubbe manussayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā tato cutā kukkuṭī hutvā
atk-s0502a:4329_3: tattha senassa santikā sīsacchedaṃ patvā rājagahe nibbattā, paribbājikāsu pabbajitvā
atk-s0502a:4329_4: paṭhamajjhānabhūmiyaṃ nibbattitvā tato cutā seṭṭhikule nibbattā nacirasseva cavitvā
atk-s0502a:4329_5: sūkarayoniṃ gantvā tato cutā suvaṇṇabhūmiṃ, tato cutā bārāṇasiṃ, tato cutā suppārakapaṭṭanaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4329_6: tato cutā kāvīrapaṭṭanaṃ, tato cutā anurādhapuraṃ, tato cutā bhokkantagāma”nti evaṃ
atk-s0502a:4329_7: samavisame terasa attabhāve patvā “idāni ukkaṇṭhitvā pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pattā,
