atk-s0502a:4329_8: sabbepi appamādena sampādethā”ti vatvā catasso parisā saṃvejetvā parinibbāyīti.
atk-s0502a:4332: Yo nibbanathoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto ekaṃ vibbhantakaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4333_0: Eko kira mahākassapattherassa saddhivihāriko hutvā cattāri jhānāni uppādetvāpi attano
atk-s0502a:4333_1: mātulassa suvaṇṇakārassa gehe visabhāgārammaṇaṃ disvā tattha paṭibaddhacitto vibbhami.
atk-s0502a:4333_2: Atha naṃ manussā alasabhāvena kammaṃ kātuṃ anicchantaṃ gehā nīhariṃsu. So pāpamittasaṃsaggena
atk-s0502a:4333_3: corakammena jīvikaṃ kappento vicari. Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ gahetvā pacchābāhaṃ gāḷhabandhanaṃ
atk-s0502a:4333_4: bandhitvā catukke catukke kasāhi tāḷentā āghātanaṃ nayiṃsu. Thero piṇḍāya carituṃ
atk-s0502a:4333_5: pavisanto taṃ dakkhiṇena dvārena nīhariyamānaṃ disvā bandhanaṃ sithilaṃ kāretvā “pubbe
atk-s0502a:4333_6: tayā paricitakammaṭṭhānaṃ puna āvajjehī”ti āha. So tena ovādena satuppādaṃ labhitvā
atk-s0502a:4333_7: puna catutthajjhānaṃ nibbattesi. Atha naṃ “āghātanaṃ netvā ghātessāmā”ti sūle uttāsesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:4333_8: So na bhāyati na santasati. Athassa tasmiṃ tasmiṃ disābhāge ṭhitā manussā asisattitomarādīni
atk-s0502a:4333_9: āvudhāni ukkhipitvāpi taṃ asantasantameva disvā “passatha, bho, imaṃ purisaṃ, anekasatānañhi
atk-s0502a:4333_10: āvudhahatthānaṃ purisānaṃ majjhe neva chambhati na vedhati, aho acchariya”nti acchariyabbhutajātā
atk-s0502a:4333_11: mahānādaṃ naditvā rañño taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ. Rājā taṃ kāraṇaṃ sutvā “vissajjetha
atk-s0502a:4333_12: na”nti āha. Satthu santikampi gantvā tamatthaṃ ārocayiṃsu. Satthā obhāsaṃ pharitvā
atk-s0502a:4339_0: Tassattho – yo puggalo gihibhāve ālayasaṅkhātaṃ vanathaṃ chaḍḍetvā pabbajitatāya
atk-s0502a:4339_1: nibbanatho dibbavihārasaṅkhāte tapovane adhimutto gharāvāsabandhanasaṅkhātā taṇhāvanā
atk-s0502a:4339_2: mutto hutvā puna gharāvāsabandhanasaṅkhātaṃ taṇhāvanameva dhāvati, etha taṃ puggalaṃ
atk-s0502a:4339_3: passatha, eso gharāvāsabandhanato mutto gharāvāsabandhanameva dhāvatīti.
atk-s0502a:4340_0: Imaṃ pana desanaṃ sutvā so rājapurisānaṃ antare sūlagge nisinnova udayabbayaṃ paṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0502a:4340_1: tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā saṅkhāre sammasanto sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā samāpattisukhaṃ anubhavanto
atk-s0502a:4340_2: vehāsaṃ uppatitvā ākāseneva satthu santikaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā sarājikāya
atk-s0502a:4343: Na taṃ daḷhanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto bandhanāgāraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4344_0: Ekasmiṃ kira kāle bahū sandhicchedakapanthaghātakamanussaghātake core ānetvā kosalarañño
atk-s0502a:4344_2: kho jānapadā bhikkhū satthāraṃ daṭṭhukāmā āgantvā disvā vanditvā punadivase sāvatthiṃ
atk-s0502a:4344_3: piṇḍāya carantā bandhanāgāraṃ gantvā te core disvā piṇḍapātapaṭikkantā sāyanhasamaye
atk-s0502a:4344_4: tathāgataṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “bhante, ajja amhehi piṇḍāya carantehi bandhanāgāre bahū
atk-s0502a:4344_5: corā andubandhanādīhi baddhā mahādukkhaṃ anubhavantā diṭṭhā, te tāni bandhanāni chinditvā
atk-s0502a:4344_6: palāyituṃ na sakkonti, atthi nu kho, bhante, tehi bandhanehi thirataraṃ aññaṃ bandhanaṃ
atk-s0502a:4344_7: nāmā”ti pucchiṃsu. Satthā, “bhikkhave, kiṃ bandhanāni nāmetāni, yaṃ panetaṃ dhanadhaññaputtadārādīsu
atk-s0502a:4344_8: taṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ kilesabandhanaṃ, etaṃ etehi sataguṇena sahassaguṇena satasahassaguṇena
atk-s0502a:4344_9: thirataraṃ, evaṃ mahantampi panetaṃ ducchindaniyaṃ bandhanaṃ porāṇakapaṇḍitā chinditvā
atk-s0502a:4344_10: himavantaṃ pavisitvā pabbajiṃsū”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari –
atk-s0502a:4345_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto ekasmiṃ duggatagahapatikule
atk-s0502a:4345_1: nibbatti. Tassa vayappattassa pitā kālamakāsi. So bhatiṃ katvā mātaraṃ posesi. Athassa
atk-s0502a:4345_2: mātā anicchamānasseva ekaṃ kuladhītaraṃ gehe katvā aparabhāge kālamakāsi. Bhariyāyapissa
atk-s0502a:4345_3: kucchiyaṃ gabbho patiṭṭhahi. So gabbhassa patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ ajānantova, “bhadde, tvaṃ
atk-s0502a:4345_4: bhatiṃ katvā jīva, ahaṃ pabbajissāmī”ti āha. “Sāmi, nanu gabbho me patiṭṭhito, mayi
atk-s0502a:4345_5: vijātāya dārakaṃ disvā pabbajissasī”ti āha. So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā tassā vijātakāle,
atk-s0502a:4345_6: “bhadde, tvaṃ sotthinā vijātā, idāni ahaṃ pabbajissāmī”ti āpucchi. Atha naṃ sā “puttassa
atk-s0502a:4345_7: tāva thanapānato apagamanakālaṃ āgamehī”ti vatvā puna gabbhaṃ gaṇhi. So cintesi –
atk-s0502a:4345_8: “imaṃ sampaṭicchāpetvā gantuṃ na sakkā, imissā anācikkhitvāva palāyitvā pabbajissāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:4345_9: So tassā anācikkhitvāva rattibhāge uṭṭhāya palāyi. Atha naṃ nagaraguttikā aggahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:4345_10: So “ahaṃ, sāmi, mātuposako nāma, vissajjetha ma”nti attānaṃ vissajjāpetvā ekasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:4345_11: ṭhāne vasitvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā abhiññāsamāpattiyo labhitvā jhānakīḷāya kīḷanto
atk-s0502a:4345_12: vihāsi. So tattha vasantoyeva “evarūpampi nāma me ducchindaniyaṃ puttadārabandhanaṃ
atk-s0502a:4346: Satthā imaṃ atītaṃ āharitvā tena udānitaṃ udānaṃ pakāsento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:4357_0: Tattha dhīrāti buddhādayo paṇḍitapurisā yaṃ saṅkhalikasaṅkhātaṃ ayasā nibbattaṃ āyasaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4357_1: andubandhanasaṅkhātaṃ dārujaṃ, yañca pabbajatiṇehi vā aññehi vā vākādīhi rajjuṃ katvā
atk-s0502a:4357_2: kataṃ rajjubandhanaṃ, taṃ asiādīhi chindituṃ sakkuṇeyyabhāvena thiranti na vadantīti
atk-s0502a:4357_3: attho. Sārattarattāti sārattā hutvā rattā, bahalatararāgarattāti attho. Maṇikuṇḍalesūti
atk-s0502a:4357_4: maṇīsu ceva kuṇḍalesu ca, maṇivicittesu vā kuṇḍalesu. Etaṃ daḷhanti ye maṇikuṇḍalesu
atk-s0502a:4357_5: sārattarattā, tesaṃ so rāgo ca yā puttadāresu apekkhā taṇhā, etaṃ kilesamayaṃ bandhanañca
atk-s0502a:4357_6: paṇḍitapurisā daḷhanti vadanti. Ohārinanti ākaḍḍhitvā catūsu apāyesu pātanato avaharati
atk-s0502a:4357_7: heṭṭhā haratīti ohārinaṃ. Sithilanti bandhanaṭṭhāne chavicammamaṃsāni na chindati,
atk-s0502a:4357_8: lohitaṃ na nīharati, bandhanabhāvampi ajānāpetvā thalapathajalapathādīsu kammāni
atk-s0502a:4357_9: kātuṃ detīti sithilaṃ. Duppamuñcanti lobhavasena hi ekavārampi uppannaṃ kilesabandhanaṃ
atk-s0502a:4357_10: daṭṭhaṭṭhānato kacchapo viya dummociyaṃ hotīti duppamuñcaṃ. Etampi chetvānāti etaṃ
atk-s0502a:4357_11: daḷhampi kilesabandhanaṃ ñāṇakhaggena chinditvā anapekkhino hutvā kāmasukhaṃ pahāya
atk-s0502a:4361: Ye rāgarattāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto khemaṃ nāma rañño bimbisārassa aggamahesiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4362_0: Sā kira padumuttarapādamūle patthitapatthanā ativiya abhirūpā pāsādikā ahosi. “Satthā
atk-s0502a:4362_1: kira rūpassa dosaṃ kathetī”ti sutvā pana satthu santikaṃ gantuṃ na icchi. Rājā tassā
atk-s0502a:4362_2: rūpamadamattabhāvaṃ ñatvā veḷuvanavaṇṇanāpaṭisaṃyuttāni gītāni kāretvā naṭādīnaṃ
atk-s0502a:4362_3: dāpesi. Tesaṃ tāni gāyantānaṃ saddaṃ sutvā tassā veḷuvanaṃ adiṭṭhapubbaṃ viya asutapubbaṃ
atk-s0502a:4362_4: viya ca ahosi. Sā “kataraṃ uyyānaṃ sandhāya gāyathā”ti pucchitvā, “devī, tumhākaṃ
atk-s0502a:4362_5: veḷuvanuyyānamevā”ti vutte uyyānaṃ gantukāmā ahosi. Satthā tassā āgamanaṃ ñatvā parisamajjhe
atk-s0502a:4362_6: nisīditvā dhammaṃ desentova tālavaṇṭaṃ ādāya attano passe ṭhatvā bījamānaṃ abhirūpaṃ
atk-s0502a:4362_7: itthiṃ nimmini. Khemā, devīpi pavisamānāva taṃ itthiṃ disvā cintesi – “sammāsambuddho
atk-s0502a:4362_8: rūpassa dosaṃ kathetīti vadanti, ayañcassa santike itthī bījayamānā ṭhitā, nāhaṃ
atk-s0502a:4362_9: imissā kalabhāgampi upemi, na mayā īdisaṃ itthirūpaṃ diṭṭhapubbaṃ, satthāraṃ abhūtena
atk-s0502a:4362_10: abbhācikkhanti maññe”ti cintetvā tathāgatassa kathāsaddampi anisāmetvā tameva itthiṃ
atk-s0502a:4362_11: olokayamānā aṭṭhāsi. Satthā tassā tasmiṃ rūpe uppannabahumānataṃ ñatvā taṃ rūpaṃ
atk-s0502a:4362_12: paṭhamavayādivasena dassetvā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva pariyosāne aṭṭhimattāvasānaṃ katvā
atk-s0502a:4362_13: dassesi. Khemā taṃ disvā “evarūpampi nāmetaṃ rūpaṃ muhutteneva khayavayaṃ sampattaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4362_14: natthi vata imasmiṃ rūpe sāro”ti cintesi. Satthā tassā cittācāraṃ oloketvā, “kheme,
atk-s0502a:4362_15: tvaṃ ‘imasmiṃ rūpe sāro atthī’ti cintesi, passa dānissa asārabhāva”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4365_0: Sā gāthāpariyosāne sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. Atha naṃ satthā, “kheme, ime sattā
atk-s0502a:4365_1: rāgarattā dosapaduṭṭhā mohamūḷhā attano taṇhāsotaṃ samatikkamituṃ na sakkonti, tattheva
atk-s0502a:4365_2: laggantī”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4371_0: Tattha makkaṭakova jālanti yathā nāma makkaṭako suttajālaṃ katvā majjhe ṭhāne nābhimaṇḍale
atk-s0502a:4371_1: nipanno pariyante patitaṃ paṭaṅgaṃ vā makkhikaṃ vā vegena gantvā vijjhitvā tassa
atk-s0502a:4371_2: rasaṃ pivitvā puna gantvā tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne nipajjati, evameva ye sattā rāgarattā
atk-s0502a:4371_3: dosapaduṭṭhā mohamūḷhā sayaṃkataṃ taṇhāsotaṃ anupatanti, te taṃ samatikkamituṃ na
atk-s0502a:4371_4: sakkonti, evaṃ duratikkamaṃ. Etampi chetvāna vajanti dhīrāti paṇḍitā etaṃ bandhanaṃ
atk-s0502a:4371_5: chetvā anapekkhino nirālayā hutvā arahattamaggena sabbadukkhaṃ pahāya vajanti, gacchantīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4372_0: Desanāvasāne khemā arahatte patiṭṭhahi, mahājanassāpi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosi.
atk-s0502a:4372_1: Satthā rājānaṃ āha – “mahārāja, khemāya pabbajituṃ vā parinibbāyituṃ vā vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:4372_2: Bhante, pabbājetha naṃ, alaṃ parinibbānenāti. Sā pabbajitvā aggasāvikā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:4375: Muñca pureti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto uggasenaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4376_0: Pañcasatā kira naṭā saṃvacchare vā chamāse vā patte rājagahaṃ gantvā rañño sattāhaṃ
atk-s0502a:4376_1: samajjaṃ katvā bahuṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ labhanti, antarantare ukkhepadāyānaṃ pariyanto
atk-s0502a:4376_2: natthi. Mahājano mañcātimañcādīsu ṭhatvā samajjaṃ olokesi. Athekā laṅghikadhītā vaṃsaṃ
atk-s0502a:4376_3: abhiruyha tassa upari parivattitvā tassa pariyante ākāse caṅkamamānā naccati ceva
atk-s0502a:4376_4: gāyati ca. Tasmiṃ samaye uggaseno nāma seṭṭhiputto sahāyakena saddhiṃ mañcātimañce
atk-s0502a:4376_5: ṭhito taṃ oloketvā tassā hatthapādavikkhepādīsu uppannasineho gehaṃ gantvā “taṃ labhanto
atk-s0502a:4376_6: jīvissāmi, alabhantassa me idheva maraṇa”nti āhārūpacchedaṃ katvā mañcake nipajji.
atk-s0502a:4376_7: Mātāpitūhi, “tāta, kiṃ te rujjatī”ti pucchitopi “taṃ me naṭadhītaraṃ labhantassa
atk-s0502a:4376_8: jīvitaṃ atthi, alabhantassa me idheva maraṇa”nti vatvā, “tāta, mā evaṃ kari, aññaṃ
atk-s0502a:4376_9: te amhākaṃ kulassa ca bhogānañca anurūpaṃ kumārikaṃ ānessāmā”ti vuttepi tatheva vatvā
atk-s0502a:4376_10: nipajji. Athassa pitā bahuṃ yācitvāpi taṃ saññāpetuṃ asakkonto tassa sahāyaṃ pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0502a:4376_11: kahāpaṇasahassaṃ datvā “ime kahāpaṇe gahetvā attano dhītaraṃ mayhaṃ puttassa detū”ti
atk-s0502a:4376_12: pahiṇi. So “nāhaṃ kahāpaṇe gahetvā demi, sace pana so imaṃ alabhitvā jīvituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0502a:4376_13: tena hi amhehi saddhiṃyeva vicaratu, dassāmissa dhītara”nti āha. Mātāpitaro puttassa
atk-s0502a:4376_14: tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. So “ahaṃ tehi saddhiṃ vicarissāmī”ti vatvā yācantānampi tesaṃ
atk-s0502a:4376_15: kathaṃ anādiyitvā nikkhamitvā nāṭakassa santikaṃ agamāsi. So tassa dhītaraṃ datvā
atk-s0502a:4376_16: tena saddhiṃyeva gāmanigamarājadhānīsu sippaṃ dassento vicari.
atk-s0502a:4377_0: Sāpi tena saddhiṃ saṃvāsamanvāya nacirasseva puttaṃ labhitvā kīḷāpayamānā “sakaṭagopakassa
atk-s0502a:4377_1: putta, bhaṇḍahārakassa putta, kiñci ajānakassa puttā”ti vadati. Sopi nesaṃ sakaṭaparivattakaṃ
atk-s0502a:4377_2: katvā ṭhitaṭṭhāne goṇānaṃ tiṇaṃ āharati, sippadassanaṭṭhāne laddhabhaṇḍakaṃ ukkhipitvā
atk-s0502a:4377_3: harati. Tadeva kira sandhāya sā itthī puttaṃ kīḷāpayamānā tathā vadati. So attānaṃ
atk-s0502a:4377_4: ārabbha tassā gāyanabhāvaṃ ñatvā taṃ pucchi – “maṃ sandhāya kathesī”ti? “Āma, taṃ
atk-s0502a:4377_5: sandhāyā”ti. “Evaṃ sante ahaṃ palāyissāmī”ti. Sā “kiṃ pana mayhaṃ tayā palāyitena
atk-s0502a:4377_6: vā āgatena vā”ti punappunaṃ tadeva gītaṃ gāyati. Sā kira attano rūpasampattiñceva
atk-s0502a:4377_7: dhanalābhañca nissāya taṃ kismiñci na maññati. So “kiṃ nu kho nissāya imissā ayaṃ
atk-s0502a:4377_8: māno”ti cintento “sippaṃ nissāyā”ti ñatvā “hotu, sippaṃ uggaṇhissāmī”ti sasuraṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0502a:4377_9: tassa jānanakasippaṃ uggaṇhitvā gāmanigamādīsu sippaṃ dassento anupubbena rājagahaṃ
atk-s0502a:4377_10: āgantvā “ito sattame divase uggaseno seṭṭhiputto nagaravāsīnaṃ sippaṃ dassessatī”ti ārocāpesi.
atk-s0502a:4378_0: Nagaravāsino mañcātimañcādayo bandhāpetvā sattame divase sannipatiṃsu. Sopi saṭṭhihatthaṃ
atk-s0502a:4378_1: vaṃsaṃ abhiruyha tassa matthake aṭṭhāsi. Taṃ divasaṃ satthā paccūsakāle lokaṃ volokento
atk-s0502a:4378_2: taṃ attano ñāṇajālassa anto paviṭṭhaṃ disvā “kiṃ nu kho bhavissatī”ti āvajjento “sve
atk-s0502a:4378_3: seṭṭhiputto sippaṃ dassessāmīti vaṃsamatthake ṭhassati, tassa dassanatthaṃ mahājano
atk-s0502a:4378_4: sannipatissati. Tatra ahaṃ catuppadikaṃ gāthaṃ desessāmi, taṃ sutvā caturāsītiyā
atk-s0502a:4378_5: pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo bhavissati, uggasenopi arahatte patiṭṭhahissatī”ti
atk-s0502a:4378_6: aññāsi. Satthā punadivase kālaṃ sallakkhetvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya
atk-s0502a:4378_7: pāvisi. Uggasenopi satthari antonagaraṃ apaviṭṭheyeva unnādanatthāya mahājanassa
atk-s0502a:4378_8: aṅgulisaññaṃ datvā vaṃsamatthake patiṭṭhāya ākāseyeva satta vāre parivattitvā oruyha
atk-s0502a:4378_9: vaṃsamatthake aṭṭhāsi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe satthā nagaraṃ pavisanto yathā taṃ parisā na
atk-s0502a:4378_10: oloketi, evaṃ katvā attānameva olokāpesi. Uggaseno parisaṃ oloketvā “na maṃ parisā
atk-s0502a:4378_11: oloketī”ti domanassappatto “idaṃ mayā saṃvacchare kattabbaṃ sippaṃ, satthari nagaraṃ
atk-s0502a:4378_12: pavisante parisā maṃ anoloketvā satthārameva oloketi, moghaṃ vata me sippadassanaṃ jāta”nti cintesi.
atk-s0502a:4379_0: Satthā tassa cittaṃ ñatvā mahāmoggallānaṃ āmantetvā “gaccha, moggallāna, seṭṭhiputtaṃ
atk-s0502a:4379_1: vadehi ‘sippaṃ kira dassetū”’ti āha. Thero gantvā vaṃsassa heṭṭhā ṭhito seṭṭhiputtaṃ
atk-s0502a:4382: So therassa kathaṃ sutvā tuṭṭhamānaso hutvā “satthā maññe mama sippaṃ passitukāmo”ti vaṃsamatthake ṭhitakova imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4385_0: Evañca pana vatvā vaṃsamatthakato vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā ākāseva cuddasakkhattuṃ parivattitvā
atk-s0502a:4385_1: oruyha vaṃsamatthakeva aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ satthā, “uggasena, paṇḍitena nāma atītānāgatapaccuppannesu
atk-s0502a:4385_2: khandhesu ālayaṃ pahāya jātiādīhi muccituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4391_0: Tattha muñca pureti atītesu khandhesu ālayaṃ nikantiṃ ajjhosānaṃ patthanaṃ pariyuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:4391_1: gāhaṃ parāmāsaṃ taṇhaṃ muñca. Pacchatoti anāgatesupi khandhesu ālayādīni muñca. Majjheti
atk-s0502a:4391_2: paccuppannesupi tāni muñca. Bhavassa pāragūti evaṃ sante tividhassāpi bhavassa abhiññāpariññāpahānabhāvanāsacchikiriyavasena
atk-s0502a:4391_3: pāragū pāraṅgato hutvā khandhadhātuāyatanādibhede sabbasaṅkhate vimuttamānaso viharanto
atk-s0502a:4392_0: Desanāvasāne caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Seṭṭhiputtopi vaṃsamatthake
atk-s0502a:4392_1: ṭhitakova saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā vaṃsato oruyha satthu santikaṃ āgantvā
atk-s0502a:4392_2: pañcapatiṭṭhitena satthāraṃ vanditvā pabbajjaṃ yāci. Atha naṃ satthā dakkhiṇahatthaṃ
atk-s0502a:4392_3: pasāretvā “ehi bhikkhū”ti āha. So tāvadeva aṭṭhaparikkhāradharo saṭṭhivassikatthero
atk-s0502a:4392_4: viya ahosi. Atha naṃ bhikkhū, “āvuso uggasena, saṭṭhihatthassa te vaṃsassa matthakato
atk-s0502a:4392_5: otarantassa bhayaṃ nāma nāhosī”ti pucchitvā “natthi me, āvuso, bhaya”nti vutte satthu
atk-s0502a:4392_6: ārocesuṃ, “bhante, uggaseno ‘na bhāyāmī’ti vadati, abhūtaṃ vatvā aññaṃ byākarotī”ti.
atk-s0502a:4392_7: Satthā “na, bhikkhave, mama puttena uggasenena sadisā chinnasaṃyojanā bhikkhū bhāyanti,
atk-s0502a:4392_8: na tasantī”ti vatvā brāhmaṇavagge imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4395_0: Desanāvasāne bahūnaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Punekadivasaṃ bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ
atk-s0502a:4395_1: kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “kiṃ nu kho, āvuso, evaṃ arahattūpanissayasampannassa bhikkhuno
atk-s0502a:4395_2: naṭadhītaraṃ nissāya naṭehi saddhiṃ vicaraṇakāraṇaṃ, kiṃ arahattūpanissayakāraṇa”nti?
atk-s0502a:4395_3: Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya
atk-s0502a:4395_4: nāmā”ti vutte, “bhikkhave, ubhayampetaṃ iminā eva kata”nti vatvā tamatthaṃ pakāsetuṃ atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0502a:4396_0: Atīte kira kassapadasabalassa suvaṇṇacetiye kariyamāne bārāṇasivāsino kulaputtā bahuṃ
atk-s0502a:4396_1: khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ yānakesu āropetvā “hatthakammaṃ karissāmā”ti cetiyaṭṭhānaṃ gacchantā
atk-s0502a:4396_2: antarāmagge ekaṃ theraṃ piṇḍāya pavisantaṃ passiṃsu. Athekā kuladhītā theraṃ oloketvā
atk-s0502a:4396_3: sāmikaṃ āha – “sāmi, ayyo, piṇḍāya pavisati, yānake ca no bahuṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4396_4: pattamassa āhara, bhikkhaṃ dassāmā”ti. So taṃ pattaṃ āharitvā khādanīyabhojanīyassa
atk-s0502a:4396_5: pūretvā therassa hatthe patiṭṭhapetvā ubhopi patthanaṃ kariṃsu, “bhante, tumhehi
atk-s0502a:4396_6: diṭṭhadhammasseva bhāgino bhaveyyāmā”ti. Sopi thero khīṇāsavova, tasmā olokento tesaṃ
atk-s0502a:4396_7: patthanāya samijjhanabhāvaṃ ñatvā sitaṃ akāsi. Taṃ disvā sā itthī sāmikaṃ āha – “amhākaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4396_8: ayyo, sitaṃ karoti, eko naṭakārako bhavissatī”ti. Sāmikopissā “evaṃ bhavissati, bhadde”ti
atk-s0502a:4396_9: vatvā pakkāmi. Idaṃ tesaṃ pubbakammaṃ. Te tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā devaloke nibbattitvā
atk-s0502a:4396_10: tato cavitvā sā itthī naṭagehe nibbatti, puriso seṭṭhigehe. So “evaṃ, bhadde, bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0502a:4396_11: tassā paṭivacanassa dinnattā naṭehi saddhiṃ vicari. Khīṇāsavattherassa dinnapiṇḍapātaṃ
atk-s0502a:4396_12: nissāya arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Sāpi naṭadhītā “yā me sāmikassa gati, mayhampi sā eva gatī”ti
atk-s0502a:4399: Vitakkamathitassāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto cūḷadhanuggahapaṇḍitaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4400_0: Eko kira daharabhikkhu salākagge attano pattasalākaṃ gahetvā salākayāguṃ ādāya āsanasālaṃ
atk-s0502a:4400_1: gantvā pivi. Tattha udakaṃ alabhitvā udakatthāya ekaṃ gharaṃ agamāsi. Tattha taṃ
atk-s0502a:4400_2: ekā kumārikā disvāva uppannasinehā, “bhante, puna pānīyena atthe sati idheva āgaccheyyāthā”ti
atk-s0502a:4400_3: āha. So tato paṭṭhāya yadā pānīyaṃ na labhati, tadā tattheva gacchati. Sāpissa pattaṃ
atk-s0502a:4400_4: gahetvā pānīyaṃ deti. Evaṃ gacchante kāle yāgumpi datvā punekadivasaṃ tattheva nisīdāpetvā
atk-s0502a:4400_5: bhattaṃ adāsi. Santike cassa nisīditvā, “bhante, imasmiṃ gehe na kiñci natthi nāma,
atk-s0502a:4400_6: kevalaṃ mayaṃ vicaraṇakamanussameva na labhāmā”ti kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi. So kathipāheneva
atk-s0502a:4400_7: tassā kathaṃ sutvā ukkaṇṭhi. Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ āgantukā bhikkhū disvā “kasmā tvaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4400_8: āvuso, kiso uppaṇḍupaṇḍukajātosī”ti pucchitvā “ukkaṇṭhitomhi, āvuso”ti vutte ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ
atk-s0502a:4400_9: santikaṃ nayiṃsu. Tepi naṃ satthu santikaṃ netvā tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Satthā “saccaṃ
atk-s0502a:4400_10: kira tvaṃ, bhikkhu, ukkaṇṭhitosī”ti pucchitvā “sacca”nti vutte “kasmā tvaṃ mādisassa
atk-s0502a:4400_11: āraddhavīriyassa buddhassa sāsane pabbajitvā ‘sotāpanno’ti vā ‘sakadāgāmī’ti vā attānaṃ
atk-s0502a:4400_12: avadāpetvā ‘ukkaṇṭhito’ti vadāpesi, bhāriyaṃ te kammaṃ kata”nti vatvā “kiṃ kāraṇā
atk-s0502a:4400_13: ukkaṇṭhitosī”ti pucchi. “Bhante, ekā maṃ itthī evamāhā”ti vutte, “bhikkhu, anacchariyaṃ
atk-s0502a:4400_14: etaṃ tassā kiriyaṃ. Sā hi pubbe sakalajambudīpe aggadhanuggahapaṇḍitaṃ pahāya taṃmuhuttadiṭṭhake
atk-s0502a:4400_15: ekasmiṃ sinehaṃ uppādetvā taṃ jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpesī”ti vatvā tassatthassa pakāsanatthaṃ bhikkhūhi yācito –
atk-s0502a:4401_0: Atīte cūḷadhanuggahapaṇḍitakāle takkasilāyaṃ disāpāmokkhassa ācariyassa santike sippaṃ
atk-s0502a:4401_1: uggahetvā tena tuṭṭhena dinnaṃ dhītaraṃ ādāya bārāṇasiṃ gacchantassa ekasmiṃ aṭavimukhe
atk-s0502a:4401_2: ekūnapaññāsāya kaṇḍehi ekūnapaññāsacore māretvā kaṇḍesu khīṇesu corajeṭṭhakaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0502a:4401_3: bhūmiyaṃ pātetvā, “bhadde, asiṃ āharā”ti vutte tāya taṅkhaṇaṃ diṭṭhacore sinehaṃ
atk-s0502a:4401_4: katvā corassa hatthe asitharuṃ ṭhapetvā corena dhanuggahapaṇḍitassa māritabhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:4401_5: āvikatvā corena ca taṃ ādāya gacchantena “mampi esā aññaṃ disvā attano sāmikaṃ viya
atk-s0502a:4401_6: mārāpessati, kiṃ me imāyā”ti ekaṃ nadiṃ disvā orimatīre taṃ ṭhapetvā tassā bhaṇḍakaṃ
atk-s0502a:4401_7: ādāya “tvaṃ idheva hohi, yāvāhaṃ bhaṇḍikaṃ uttāremī”ti tattheva taṃ pahāya gamanabhāvañca āvikatvā –
atk-s0502a:4403: Paccāgaccha lahuṃ khippaṃ, mampi tārehi dānito.
atk-s0502a:4409: Nayīdha naccaṃ vā gītaṃ vā, tāḷaṃ vā susamāhitaṃ;
atk-s0502a:4410: Anamhikāle susoṇi, kiṃ nu jagghasi sobhane.
atk-s0502a:4412: Jīno macchañca pesiñca, kapaṇo viya jhāyasi.
atk-s0502a:4414: Jīnā patiñca jārañca, maññe tvaññeva jhāyasi.
atk-s0502a:4416: Sā nūnāhaṃ ito gantvā, bhattu hessaṃ vasānugā.
atk-s0502a:4417: “Yo hare mattikaṃ thālaṃ, kaṃsathālampi so hare;
atk-s0502a:4419_1: tvaṃ ahosi, sā itthī etarahi ayaṃ kumārikā, siṅgālarūpena āgantvā tassā niggahakārako
atk-s0502a:4419_2: sakko devarājā ahamevā”ti vatvā “evaṃ sā itthī taṃmuhuttadiṭṭhake ekasmiṃ sinehena
atk-s0502a:4419_3: sakalajambudīpe aggapaṇḍitaṃ jīvitā voropesi, taṃ itthiṃ ārabbha uppannaṃ tava taṇhaṃ
atk-s0502a:4419_4: chinditvā viharāhi bhikkhū”ti taṃ ovaditvā uttarimpi dhammaṃ desento imā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:4430_0: Tattha vitakkamathitassāti kāmavitakkādīhi vitakkehi nimmathitassa. Tibbarāgassāti
atk-s0502a:4430_2: subhanti anupassantassa. Taṇhāti evarūpassa jhānādīsu ekampi na vaḍḍhati, atha kho
atk-s0502a:4430_3: chadvārikā taṇhāyeva bhiyyo vaḍḍhati. Esa khoti eso puggalo taṇhābandhanaṃ daḷhaṃ
atk-s0502a:4430_4: suthiraṃ karoti. Vitakkūpasameti micchāvitakkādīnaṃ vūpasamasaṅkhāte dasasu asubhesu
atk-s0502a:4430_5: paṭhamajjhāne. Sadā satoti yo ettha abhirato hutvā niccaṃ upaṭṭhitasatitāya sato
atk-s0502a:4430_6: taṃ asubhajhānaṃ bhāveti. Byanti kāhitīti esa bhikkhu tīsu bhavesu uppajjanakaṃ taṇhaṃ
atk-s0502a:4430_7: vigatantaṃ karissati. Mārabandhananti eso tebhūmakavaṭṭasaṅkhātaṃ mārabandhanampi
atk-s0502a:4431: Desanāvasāne so bhikkhu sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:4434: Niṭṭhaṅgatoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto māraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4435_0: Ekadivasañhi vikāle sambahulā therā jetavanavihāraṃ pavisitvā rāhulattherassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:4435_1: gantvā taṃ uṭṭhāpesuṃ. So aññattha vasanaṭṭhānaṃ apassanto tathāgatassa gandhakuṭiyā
atk-s0502a:4435_2: pamukhe nipajji. Tadā so āyasmā arahattaṃ patto avassikova hoti. Māro vasavattibhavane
atk-s0502a:4435_3: ṭhitoyeva taṃ āyasmantaṃ gandhakuṭipamukhe nipannaṃ disvā cintesi – “samaṇassa gotamassa
atk-s0502a:4435_4: rujanakaaṅgulī bahi nipanno, sayaṃ antogandhakuṭiyaṃ nipanno, aṅguliyā pīḷiyamānāya
atk-s0502a:4435_5: sayampi pīḷito bhavissatī”ti. So mahantaṃ hatthirājavaṇṇaṃ abhinimminitvā āgamma
atk-s0502a:4435_6: soṇḍāya therassa matthakaṃ parikkhipitvā mahantena saddena koñcanādaṃ ravi. Satthā
atk-s0502a:4435_7: gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnova tassa mārabhāvaṃ ñatvā, “māra, tādisānaṃ satasahassenāpi
atk-s0502a:4435_8: mama puttassa bhayaṃ uppādetuṃ na sakkā. Putto hi me asantāsī vītataṇho mahāvīriyo
atk-s0502a:4444_0: Tattha niṭṭhaṅgatoti imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajitānaṃ arahattaṃ niṭṭhaṃ nāma, taṃ gato
atk-s0502a:4444_1: pattoti attho. Asantāsīti abbhantare rāgasantāsādīnaṃ abhāvena asantasanako. Acchindi
atk-s0502a:4444_2: bhavasallānīti sabbānipi bhavagāmīni sallāni acchindi. Samussayoti ayaṃ etassa antimo deho.
atk-s0502a:4445_0: Anādānoti khandhādīsu niggahaṇo. Niruttipadakovidoti niruttiyañca sesapadesu cāti
atk-s0502a:4445_1: catūsupi paṭisambhidāsu chekoti attho. Akkharānaṃ sannipātaṃ, jaññā pubbāparāni cāti
atk-s0502a:4445_2: akkharānaṃ sannipātasaṅkhātaṃ akkharapiṇḍañca jānāti, pubbakkharena aparakkharaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4445_3: aparakkharena pubbakkharañca jānāti. Pubbakkharena aparakkharaṃ jānāti nāma – ādimhi
atk-s0502a:4445_4: paññāyamāne majjhapariyosānesu apaññāyamānesupi “imesaṃ akkharānaṃ idaṃ majjhaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4445_5: idaṃ pariyosāna”nti jānāti. Aparakkharena pubbakkharaṃ jānāti nāma – ante paññāyamāne
atk-s0502a:4445_6: ādimajjhesu apaññāyamānesu “imesaṃ akkharānaṃ idaṃ majjhaṃ, ayaṃ ādī”ti jānāti. Majjhe
atk-s0502a:4445_7: paññāyamānepi “imesaṃ akkharānaṃ ayaṃ ādi, ayaṃ anto”ti jānāti. Evaṃ mahāpañño. Sa
atk-s0502a:4445_8: ve antimasārīroti esa koṭiyaṃ ṭhitasarīro, mahantānaṃ atthadhammaniruttipaṭibhānānaṃ
atk-s0502a:4445_10: khvāhaṃ, sāriputta, mahāpurisoti vadāmī”ti vacanato vimuttacittatāya ca mahāpurisoti vuccatīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4446: Desanāvasāne bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pāpuṇiṃsu. Māropi pāpimā “jānāti maṃ samaṇo gotamo”ti tatthevantaradhāyīti.
atk-s0502a:4449: Sabbābhibhūti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā antarāmagge upakaṃ ājīvakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4450_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye satthā pattasabbaññutaññāṇo bodhimaṇḍe sattasattāhaṃ vītināmetvā
atk-s0502a:4450_1: attano pattacīvaramādāya dhammacakkapavattanatthaṃ bārāṇasiṃ sandhāya aṭṭhārasayojanamaggaṃ
atk-s0502a:4450_2: paṭipanno antarāmagge upakaṃ ājīvakaṃ addasa. Sopi satthāraṃ disvā “vippasannāni
atk-s0502a:4450_3: kho te, āvuso, indriyāni, parisuddho chavivaṇṇo pariyodāto, kaṃsi tvaṃ, āvuso, uddissa
atk-s0502a:4450_4: pabbajito, ko vā te satthā, kassa vā tvaṃ dhammaṃ rocesī”ti pucchi. Athassa satthā
atk-s0502a:4450_5: “mayhaṃ upajjhāyo vā ācariyo vā natthī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4456_0: Tattha sabbābhibhūti sabbesaṃ tebhūmakadhammānaṃ abhibhavanato sabbābhibhū. Sabbavidūti
atk-s0502a:4456_1: viditasabbacatubhūmakadhammo. Sabbesu dhammesūti sabbesupi tebhūmakadhammesu taṇhādiṭṭhīhi
atk-s0502a:4456_2: anūpalitto. Sabbañjahoti sabbe tebhūmakadhamme jahitvā ṭhito. Taṇhakkhaye vimuttoti
atk-s0502a:4456_3: taṇhakkhayante uppādite taṇhakkhayasaṅkhāte arahatte asekhāya vimuttiyā vimutto.
atk-s0502a:4456_4: Sayaṃ abhiññāyāti abhiññeyyādibhede dhamme sayameva jānitvā. Kamuddiseyyanti “ayaṃ
atk-s0502a:4456_5: me upajjhāyo vā ācariyo vā”ti kaṃ nāma uddiseyyanti.
atk-s0502a:4457: Desanāvasāne upako ājīvako tathāgatassa vacanaṃ nevābhinandi, na paṭikkosi. Sīsaṃ pana cāletvā jivhaṃ nillāḷetvā ekapadikamaggaṃ gahetvā aññataraṃ luddakanivāsanaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsīti.
atk-s0502a:4460: Sabbadānanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4461_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye tāvatiṃsadevaloke devatā sannipatitvā cattāro pañhe samuṭṭhāpesuṃ
atk-s0502a:4461_1: “kataraṃ dānaṃ nu kho dānesu, kataro raso rasesu, katarā rati ratīsu jeṭṭhakā, taṇhakkhayova
atk-s0502a:4461_2: kasmā jeṭṭhakoti vuccatī”ti? Te pañhe ekā devatāpi vinicchituṃ nāsakkhi. Eko pana
atk-s0502a:4461_3: devo ekaṃ devaṃ, sopi aparanti evaṃ aññamaññaṃ pucchantā dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu
atk-s0502a:4461_4: dvādasa saṃvaccharāni vicariṃsu. Ettakenāpi kālena pañhānaṃ atthaṃ adisvā dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatā
atk-s0502a:4461_5: sannipatitvā catunnaṃ mahārājānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā “kiṃ, tātā, mahādevatāsannipāto”ti
atk-s0502a:4461_6: vutte “cattāro pañhe samuṭṭhāpetvā vinicchituṃ asakkontā tumhākaṃ santikaṃ āgatamhā”ti.
atk-s0502a:4461_7: “Kiṃ pañhaṃ nāmetaṃ, tātā”ti. “Dānarasaratīsu katamā dānarasaratī nu kho seṭṭhā,
atk-s0502a:4461_8: taṇhakkhayova kasmā seṭṭho”ti ime pañhe vinicchituṃ asakkontā āgatamhāti. Tātā, mayampi
atk-s0502a:4461_9: imesaṃ atthe na jānāma, amhākaṃ pana rājā janasahassena cintite atthe cintetvā taṅkhaṇeneva
atk-s0502a:4461_10: jānāti, so amhehi paññāya ca puññena ca visiṭṭho, etha, tassa santikaṃ gacchāmāti
atk-s0502a:4461_11: tameva devagaṇaṃ ādāya sakkassa devarañño santikaṃ gantvā tenāpi “kiṃ, tātā, mahanto
atk-s0502a:4461_12: devasannipāto”ti vutte tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. “Tātā, imesaṃ pañhānaṃ atthaṃ aññopi jānituṃ
atk-s0502a:4461_13: na sakkoti, buddhavisayā hete. Satthā panetarahi kahaṃ viharatī”ti pucchitvā “jetavane”ti
atk-s0502a:4461_14: sutvā “etha, tassa santikaṃ gamissāmā”ti devagaṇena saddhiṃ rattibhāge sakalaṃ jetavanaṃ
atk-s0502a:4461_15: obhāsetvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito “kiṃ, mahārāja, mahatā
atk-s0502a:4461_16: devasaṅghena āgatosī”ti vutte, “bhante, devagaṇena ime nāma pañhā samuṭṭhāpitā, añño
atk-s0502a:4461_17: imesaṃ atthaṃ jānituṃ samattho nāma natthi, imesaṃ no atthaṃ pakāsethā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:4462_0: Satthā “sādhu mahārāja, mayā hi pāramiyo pūretvā mahāpariccāge pariccajitvā tumhādisānaṃ
atk-s0502a:4462_1: kaṅkhacchedanatthameva sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭividdhaṃ, tayā pucchitapañhesu hi sabbadānānaṃ
atk-s0502a:4462_2: dhammadānaṃ seṭṭhaṃ, sabbarasānaṃ dhammaraso seṭṭho, sabbaratīnaṃ dhammarati seṭṭhā,
atk-s0502a:4462_3: taṇhakkhayo pana arahattaṃ sampāpakattā seṭṭhoyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4468_0: Tattha sabbadānaṃ dhammadānanti sacepi hi cakkavāḷagabbhe yāva brahmalokā nirantaraṃ
atk-s0502a:4468_2: dadeyya, tasmiṃ samāgame catuppadikāya gāthāya katānumodanāva seṭṭhā. Tañhi dānaṃ
atk-s0502a:4468_3: tassā gāthāya soḷasiṃ kalaṃ nāgghati. Evaṃ dhammassa desanāpi vācanampi savanampi
atk-s0502a:4468_4: mahantaṃ. Yena ca puggalena bahūnaṃ taṃ dhammassavanaṃ kāritaṃ, tasseva ānisaṃso
atk-s0502a:4468_5: mahā. Tathārūpāya eva parisāya paṇītapiṇḍapātassa patte pūretvā dinnadānatopi sappitelādīnaṃ
atk-s0502a:4468_6: patte pūretvā dinnabhesajjadānatopi mahāvihārasadisānaṃ vihārānañca lohapāsādasadisānañca
atk-s0502a:4468_7: pāsādānaṃ anekāni satasahassāni kāretvā dinnasenāsanadānatopi anāthapiṇḍikādīhi vihāre
atk-s0502a:4468_8: ārabbha katapariccāgatopi antamaso catuppadikāya gāthāya anumodanāvasenāpi pavattitaṃ
atk-s0502a:4468_9: dhammadānameva varaṃ seṭṭhaṃ. Kiṃ kāraṇā? Evarūpāni hi puññāni karontā dhammaṃ sutvāva
atk-s0502a:4468_10: karonti, no asutvā. Sace hi ime sattā dhammaṃ na suṇeyyuṃ, uḷuṅkamattaṃ yāgumpi kaṭacchumattaṃ
atk-s0502a:4468_11: bhattampi na dadeyyuṃ. Iminā kāraṇena sabbadānehi dhammadānameva seṭṭhaṃ. Apica ṭhapetvā
atk-s0502a:4468_12: buddhe ca paccekabuddhe ca sakalakappaṃ deve vassante udakabindūni gaṇetuṃ samatthāya
atk-s0502a:4468_13: paññāya samannāgatā sāriputtādayopi attano dhammatāya sotāpattiphalādīni adhigantuṃ
atk-s0502a:4468_14: nāsakkhiṃsu, assajittherādīhi kathitadhammaṃ sutvā sotāpattiphalaṃ sacchikariṃsu,
atk-s0502a:4468_15: satthu dhammadesanāya sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ sacchikariṃsu. Imināpi kāraṇena, mahārāja,
atk-s0502a:4468_16: dhammadānameva seṭṭhaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ – “sabbadānaṃ dhammadānaṃ jinātī”ti.
atk-s0502a:4469_0: Sabbe pana gandharasādayopi rasā ukkaṃsato devatānaṃ sudhābhojanarasopi saṃsāravaṭṭe
atk-s0502a:4469_1: pātetvā dukkhānubhavanasseva paccayo. Yo panesa sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammasaṅkhāto
atk-s0502a:4469_2: ca navalokuttaradhammasaṅkhāto ca dhammaraso, ayameva sabbarasānaṃ seṭṭho. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0502a:4469_4: ca anekappabhedā ratī, sāpi saṃsāravaṭṭe pātetvā dukkhānubhavanasseva paccayo. Yā
atk-s0502a:4469_5: panesā dhammaṃ kathentassa vā suṇantassa vā vācentassa vā anto uppajjamānā pīti udaggabhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:4469_6: janeti, assūni pavatteti, lomahaṃsaṃ janeti, sāyaṃ saṃsāravaṭṭassa antaṃ katvā arahattapariyosānā
atk-s0502a:4469_7: hoti. Tasmā sabbaratīnaṃ evarūpā dhammaratiyeva seṭṭhā. Tena vuttaṃ – “sabbaratiṃ
atk-s0502a:4469_8: dhammarati jinātī”ti taṇhakkhayo pana taṇhāya khayante uppannaṃ arahattaṃ sakalassapi
atk-s0502a:4469_9: vaṭṭadukkhassa abhibhavanato sabbaseṭṭhameva. Tena vuttaṃ – “taṇhakkhayo sabbadukkhaṃ jinātī”ti.
atk-s0502a:4470_0: Evaṃ satthari imissā gāthāya atthaṃ kathenteyeva caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo
atk-s0502a:4470_1: ahosi. Sakkopi satthu dhammakathaṃ sutvā satthāraṃ vanditvā evamāha – “bhante, evaṃjeṭṭhake
atk-s0502a:4470_2: nāma dhammadāne kimatthaṃ amhākaṃ pattiṃ na dāpetha, ito paṭṭhāya no bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0502a:4470_3: kathetvā pattiṃ dāpetha, bhante”ti. Satthā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātetvā,
atk-s0502a:4470_4: “bhikkhave, ajjādiṃ katvā mahādhammassavanaṃ vā pākatikadhammassavanaṃ vā upanisinnakathaṃ
atk-s0502a:4470_5: vā antamaso anumodanampi kathetvā sabbasattānaṃ pattiṃ dadeyyāthā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:4473: Hananti bhogāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aputtakaseṭṭhiṃ nāma ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4474_0: Tassa kira kālakiriyaṃ sutvā rājā pasenadi kosalo “aputtakaṃ sāpateyyaṃ kassa pāpuṇātī”ti
atk-s0502a:4474_1: pucchitvā “rañño”ti sutvā sattahi divasehi tassa gehato dhanaṃ rājakulaṃ abhiharāpetvā
atk-s0502a:4474_2: satthu santikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “handa kuto nu tvaṃ, mahārāja, āgacchasi divādivassā”ti
atk-s0502a:4474_3: vutte “idha, bhante, sāvatthiyaṃ seṭṭhi, gahapati, kālakato, tamahaṃ aputtakaṃ sāpateyyaṃ
atk-s0502a:4474_4: rājantepuraṃ abhiharitvā āgacchāmī”ti āha. Sabbaṃ sutte āgatanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0502a:4475_0: So kira suvaṇṇapātiyā nānaggarasabhojane upanīte “evarūpaṃ nāma manussā bhuñjanti,
atk-s0502a:4475_1: kiṃ tumhe mayā saddhiṃ imasmiṃ gehe keḷiṃ karothā”ti bhojane upaṭṭhite leḍḍudaṇḍādīhi
atk-s0502a:4475_2: paharitvā palāpetvā “idaṃ manussānaṃ bhojana”nti kaṇājakaṃ bhuñjati biḷaṅgadutiyaṃ.
atk-s0502a:4475_3: Vatthayānachattesupi manāpesu upaṭṭhāpitesu te manusse leḍḍudaṇḍādīhi paharanto palāpetvā
atk-s0502a:4475_4: sāṇāni dhāreti, jajjararathakena yāti paṇṇachattakena dhāriyamānenāti evaṃ raññā
atk-s0502a:4476_0: Bhūtapubbaṃ so, mahārāja, seṭṭhi, gahapati, tagarasikhiṃ nāma paccekabuddhaṃ piṇḍapātena
atk-s0502a:4476_1: paṭipādesi. “Detha samaṇassa piṇḍa”nti vatvā so uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi. Tasmiṃ kira
atk-s0502a:4476_2: assaddhe bāle evaṃ vatvā pakkante tassa bhariyā saddhā pasannā “cirassaṃ vata me
atk-s0502a:4476_3: imassa mukhato ‘dehī’ti vacanaṃ sutaṃ, ajja mama manorathaṃ pūrentī piṇḍapātaṃ dassāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:4476_4: paccekabuddhassa pattaṃ gahetvā paṇītabhojanassa pūretvā adāsi. Sopi nivattamāno
atk-s0502a:4476_5: taṃ disvā “kiṃ, samaṇa, kiñci te laddha”nti pattaṃ gahetvā paṇītapiṇḍapātaṃ disvā
atk-s0502a:4476_6: vippaṭisārī hutvā evaṃ cintesi – “varametaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ dāsā vā kammakarā vā bhuñjeyyuṃ.
atk-s0502a:4476_7: Te hi imaṃ bhuñjitvā mayhaṃ kammaṃ karissanti, ayaṃ pana gantvā bhuñjitvā niddāyissati,
atk-s0502a:4476_8: naṭṭho me so piṇḍapāto”ti. So bhātu ca pana ekaputtakaṃ sāpateyyassa kāraṇā jīvitā
atk-s0502a:4476_9: voropesi. So kirassa aṅguliṃ gahetvā vicaranto “idaṃ mayhaṃ pitusantakaṃ yānakaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4476_10: ayaṃ tassa goṇo”tiādīni āha. Atha naṃ so seṭṭhi “idāni tāvesa evaṃ vadeti, imassa
atk-s0502a:4476_11: pana vuḍḍhippattakāle imasmiṃ gehe bhoge ko rakkhissatī”ti taṃ araññaṃ netvā ekasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:4476_12: gacchamūle gīvāya gahetvā mūlakandaṃ viya gīvaṃ phāletvā māretvā tattheva chaḍḍesi.
atk-s0502a:4477_0: “Yaṃ kho so, mahārāja, seṭṭhi, gahapati, tagarasikhiṃ paccekabuddhaṃ piṇḍapātena
atk-s0502a:4477_1: paṭipādesi, tassa kammassa vipākena sattakkhattuṃ sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajji,
atk-s0502a:4477_2: tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesena imissāyeva sāvatthiyā sattakkhattuṃ seṭṭhittaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0502a:4477_3: Yaṃ kho so, mahārāja, seṭṭhi, gahapati, datvā pacchā vippaṭisārī ahosi ‘varametaṃ
atk-s0502a:4477_4: piṇḍapātaṃ dāsā vā kammakarā vā bhuñjeyyu’nti, tassa kammassa vipākena nāssuḷārāya
atk-s0502a:4477_5: bhattabhogāya cittaṃ namati, nāssuḷārāya vatthabhogāya, nāssuḷārāya yānabhogāya,
atk-s0502a:4477_6: nāssuḷārānaṃ pañcannaṃ kāmaguṇānaṃ bhogāya cittaṃ namati. Yaṃ kho so, mahārāja, seṭṭhi,
atk-s0502a:4477_7: gahapati, bhātu ca pana ekaputtaṃ sāpateyyassa kāraṇā jīvitā voropesi, tassa kammassa
atk-s0502a:4477_8: vipākena bahūni vassasatāni bahūni vassasahassāni bahūni vassasatasahassāni niraye
atk-s0502a:4477_9: paccittha, tasseva kammassa vipākāvasesena idaṃ sattamaṃ aputtakaṃ sāpateyyaṃ rājakosaṃ
atk-s0502a:4477_10: paveseti. Tassa kho pana, mahārāja, seṭṭhissa gahapatissa purāṇañca puññaṃ parikkhīṇaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4477_11: navañca puññaṃ anupacitaṃ. Ajja pana, mahārāja, seṭṭhi, gahapati, mahāroruve niraye paccatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:4478_0: Rājā satthu vacanaṃ sutvā “aho, bhante, bhāriyaṃ kammaṃ, ettake nāma bhoge vijjamāne
atk-s0502a:4478_1: neva attanā paribhuñji, na tumhādise buddhe dhuravihāre viharante puññakammaṃ akāsī”ti
atk-s0502a:4478_2: āha. Satthā “evametaṃ, mahārāja, dummedhapuggalā nāma bhoge labhitvā nibbānaṃ na
atk-s0502a:4478_3: gavesanti, bhoge nissāya uppannataṇhā panete dīgharattaṃ hanatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4482_0: Tattha no ca pāragavesinoti ye pana nibbānapāragavesino puggalā, na te bhogā hananti.
atk-s0502a:4482_1: Aññeva attananti bhoge nissāya uppannāya taṇhāya duppañño puggalo pare viya attānameva hanatīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4486_0: Tiṇadosānīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ viharanto aṅkuraṃ ārabbha
atk-s0502a:4486_1: kathesi. Vatthu “ye jhānappasutā dhīrā”ti gāthāya vitthāritameva. Vuttañhetaṃ tattha
atk-s0502a:4486_2: indakaṃ ārabbha. So kira anuruddhattherassa antogāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhassa attano
atk-s0502a:4486_3: ābhataṃ kaṭacchumattakaṃ bhikkhaṃ dāpesi. Tadassa puññaṃ aṅkurena dasavassasahassāni
atk-s0502a:4486_4: dvādasayojanikaṃ uddhanapantiṃ katvā dinnadānato mahapphalataraṃ jātaṃ. Tasmā evamāha.
atk-s0502a:4486_5: Evaṃ vutte satthā, “aṅkura, dānaṃ nāma viceyya dātuṃ vaṭṭati, evaṃ taṃ sukhette suvuttabījaṃ
atk-s0502a:4486_6: viya mahapphalaṃ hoti. Tvaṃ pana tathā nākāsi, tena te dānaṃ na mahapphalaṃ jāta”nti
atk-s0502a:4492: Vatvā uttarimpi dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:4495: Tasmā hi vītarāgesu, dinnaṃ hoti mahapphalaṃ.
atk-s0502a:4498: Tasmā hi vītadosesu, dinnaṃ hoti mahapphalaṃ.
atk-s0502a:4501: Tasmā hi vītamohesu, dinnaṃ hoti mahapphalaṃ.
atk-s0502a:4504: Tasmā hi vigaticchesu, dinnaṃ hoti mahapphala”nti.
atk-s0502a:4505_0: Tattha tiṇadosānīti sāmākādīni tiṇāni uṭṭhahantāni pubbaṇṇāparaṇṇāni khettāni dūsenti,
atk-s0502a:4505_1: tena tāni na bahuphalāni honti. Evaṃ sattānampi anto rāgo uppajjanto satte dūseti,
atk-s0502a:4505_2: tena tesu dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ na hoti. Khīṇāsavesu dinnaṃ pana mahapphalaṃ hoti. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0502a:4507: Tasmā hi vītarāgesu, dinnaṃ hoti mahapphala”nti. –
atk-s0502a:4509: Desanāvasāne aṅkuro ca indako ca sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:4515: Cakkhunā saṃvaroti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto pañca bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4516_0: Tesu kira ekeko cakkhudvārādīsu pañcasu dvāresu ekekameva rakkhi. Athekadivasaṃ sannipatitvā
atk-s0502a:4516_1: “ahaṃ durakkhaṃ rakkhāmi, ahaṃ durakkhaṃ rakkhāmī”ti vivaditvā “satthāraṃ pucchitvā
atk-s0502a:4516_2: imamatthaṃ jānissāmā”ti satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “bhante, mayaṃ cakkhudvārādīni rakkhantā
atk-s0502a:4516_3: attano attano rakkhanadvārameva durakkhanti maññāma, ko nu kho amhesu durakkhaṃ rakkhatī”ti
atk-s0502a:4516_4: pucchiṃsu. Satthā ekaṃ bhikkhumpi anosādetvā, “bhikkhave, sabbāni petāni durakkhāneva,
atk-s0502a:4516_5: api ca kho pana tumhe na idāneva pañcasu ṭhānesu asaṃvutā, pubbepi asaṃvutā, asaṃvutattāyeva
atk-s0502a:4516_6: ca paṇḍitānaṃ ovāde avattitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇitthā”ti vatvā “kadā, bhante”ti
atk-s0502a:4516_7: tehi yācito atīte takkasilajātakassa vatthuṃ vitthāretvā rakkhasīnaṃ vasena rājakule
atk-s0502a:4516_8: jīvitakkhayaṃ patte pattābhisekena mahāsattena setacchattassa heṭṭhā rājāsane nisinnena
atk-s0502a:4516_9: attano sirisampattiṃ oloketvā “vīriyaṃ nāmetaṃ sattehi kattabbamevā”ti udānavasena udānitaṃ –
atk-s0502a:4521_0: Imaṃ gāthaṃ dassetvā “tadāpi tumheva pañca janā takkasilāyaṃ rajjagahaṇatthāya nikkhantaṃ
atk-s0502a:4521_1: mahāsattaṃ āvudhahatthā parivāretvā maggaṃ gacchantā antarāmagge rakkhasīhi cakkhudvārādivasena
atk-s0502a:4521_2: upanītesu rūpārammaṇādīsu asaṃvutā paṇḍitassa ovāde avattitvā olīyantā rakkhasīhi
atk-s0502a:4521_3: khāditā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇittha. Tesu pana ārammaṇesu susaṃvuto piṭṭhito piṭṭhito
atk-s0502a:4521_4: anubandhantiṃ devavaṇṇiṃ yakkhiniṃ anādiyitvā sotthinā takkasilaṃ gantvā rajjaṃ patto
atk-s0502a:4521_5: rājā ahamevā”ti jātakaṃ samodhānetvā, “bhikkhave, bhikkhunā nāma sabbāni dvārāni
atk-s0502a:4521_6: saṃvaritabbāni. Etāni hi saṃvaranto eva sabbadukkhā pamuccatī”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:4524: Ghānena saṃvaro sādhu, sādhu jivhāya saṃvaro.
atk-s0502a:4527: Manasā saṃvaro sādhu, sādhu sabbattha saṃvaro;
atk-s0502a:4529_0: Tattha cakkhunāti yadā hi bhikkhuno cakkhudvāre rūpārammaṇaṃ āpāthamāgacchati, tadā
atk-s0502a:4529_1: iṭṭhārammaṇe arajjantassa aniṭṭhārammaṇe adussantassa asamapekkhanena mohaṃ anuppādentassa
atk-s0502a:4529_2: tasmiṃ dvāre saṃvaro thakanaṃ pidahanaṃ gutti katā nāma hoti. Tassa so evarūpo cakkhunā
atk-s0502a:4529_3: saṃvaro sādhu. Esa nayo sotadvārādīsupi. Cakkhudvārādīsuyeva pana saṃvaro vā asaṃvaro
atk-s0502a:4529_4: vā nuppajjati, parato pana javanavīthiyaṃ esa labbhati. Tadā hi asaṃvaro uppajjanto
atk-s0502a:4529_5: assaddhā akkhanti kosajjaṃ muṭṭhasaccaṃ aññāṇanti akusalavīthiyaṃ ayaṃ pañcavidho
atk-s0502a:4529_6: labbhati. Saṃvaro uppajjanto saddhā khanti vīriyaṃ sati ñāṇanti kusalavīthiyaṃ ayaṃ
atk-s0502a:4530_0: Kāyena saṃvaroti ettha pana pasādakāyopi copanakāyopi labbhati. Ubhayampi panetaṃ
atk-s0502a:4530_1: kāyadvārameva. Tattha pasādadvāre saṃvarāsaṃvaro kathitova. Copanadvārepi taṃvatthukā
atk-s0502a:4530_2: pāṇātipātaadinnādānakāmesumicchācārā. Tehi pana saddhiṃ akusalavīthiyaṃ uppajjantehi
atk-s0502a:4530_3: taṃ dvāraṃ asaṃvutaṃ hoti, kusalavīthiyaṃ uppajjantehi pāṇātipātāveramaṇiādīhi saṃvutaṃ.
atk-s0502a:4530_4: Sādhu vācāyāti etthāpi copanavācāpi vācā. Tāya saddhiṃ uppajjantehi musāvādādīhi
atk-s0502a:4530_5: taṃ dvāraṃ asaṃvutaṃ hoti, musāvādāveramaṇiādīhi saṃvutaṃ. Manasā saṃvaroti etthāpi
atk-s0502a:4530_6: javanamanato aññena manena saddhiṃ abhijjhādayo natthi. Manodvāre pana javanakkhaṇe
atk-s0502a:4530_7: uppajjamānehi abhijjhādīhi taṃ dvāraṃ asaṃvutaṃ hoti, anabhijjhādīhi saṃvutaṃ hoti.
atk-s0502a:4530_8: Sādhu sabbatthāti tesu cakkhudvārādīsu sabbesupi saṃvaro sādhu. Ettāvatā hi aṭṭha
atk-s0502a:4530_9: saṃvaradvārāni aṭṭha ca asaṃvaradvārāni kathitāni. Tesu aṭṭhasu asaṃvaradvāresu ṭhito
atk-s0502a:4530_10: bhikkhu sakalavaṭṭamūlakadukkhato na muccati, saṃvaradvāresu pana ṭhito sabbasmāpi
atk-s0502a:4530_11: vaṭṭamūlakadukkhā muccati. Tena vuttaṃ – “sabbattha saṃvuto bhikkhu, sabbadukkhā pamuccatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:4531: Desanāvasāne te pañca bhikkhū sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:4534: Hatthasaṃyatoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ haṃsaghātakaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4535_0: Sāvatthivāsino kira dve sahāyakā bhikkhūsu pabbajitvā laddhūpasampadā yebhuyyena
atk-s0502a:4535_1: ekato vicaranti. Te ekadivasaṃ aciravatiṃ gantvā nhatvā ātape tappamānā sāraṇīyakathaṃ
atk-s0502a:4535_2: kathentā aṭṭhaṃsu. Tasmiṃ khaṇe dve haṃsā ākāsena gacchanti. Atheko daharabhikkhu
atk-s0502a:4535_3: sakkharaṃ gahetvā “ekassa haṃsapotakassa akkhiṃ paharissāmī”ti āha, itaro “na sakkhissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:4535_4: āha. Tiṭṭhatu imasmiṃ passe akkhi, parapasse akkhiṃ paharissāmīti. Idampi na sakkhissasiyevāti.
atk-s0502a:4535_5: “Tena hi upadhārehī”ti dutiyaṃ sakkharaṃ gahetvā haṃsassa pacchābhāge khipi, haṃso
atk-s0502a:4535_6: sakkharasaddaṃ sutvā nivattitvā olokesi. Atha naṃ itaraṃ vaṭṭasakkharaṃ gahetvā parapasse
atk-s0502a:4535_7: akkhimhi paharitvā orimakkhinā nikkhāmesi. Haṃso viravanto parivattitvā tesaṃ pādamūleyeva
atk-s0502a:4535_8: pati. Tattha tattha ṭhitā bhikkhū disvā, “āvuso, buddhasāsane pabbajitvā ananucchavikaṃ
atk-s0502a:4535_9: vo kataṃ pāṇātipātaṃ karontehī”ti vatvā te ādāya gantvā tathāgatassa dassesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:4536_0: Satthā “saccaṃ kira tayā bhikkhu pāṇātipāto kato”ti pucchitvā “saccaṃ, bhante”ti
atk-s0502a:4536_1: vutte “bhikkhu kasmā evarūpe niyyānikasāsane pabbajitvā evamakāsi, porāṇakapaṇḍitā
atk-s0502a:4536_2: anuppanne buddhe agāramajjhe vasamānā appamattakesupi ṭhānesu kukkuccaṃ kariṃsu,
atk-s0502a:4536_3: tvaṃ pana evarūpe buddhasāsane pabbajitvā kukkuccamattampi na akāsī”ti vatvā tehi
atk-s0502a:4537_0: Atīte kururaṭṭhe indapattanagare dhanañcaye rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tassa aggamahesiyā
atk-s0502a:4537_1: kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā anupubbena viññutaṃ patto takkasilāyaṃ sippāni uggahetvā
atk-s0502a:4537_2: pitarā uparajje patiṭṭhāpito aparabhāge pitu accayena rajjaṃ patvā dasa rājadhamme
atk-s0502a:4537_3: akopento kurudhamme vattittha. Kurudhammo nāma pañcasīlāni, tāni bodhisatto parisuddhāni
atk-s0502a:4537_4: katvā rakkhi. Yathā ca bodhisatto, evamassa mātā aggamahesī kaniṭṭhabhātā uparājā
atk-s0502a:4537_5: purohito brāhmaṇo rajjugāhako amacco sārathi seṭṭhi doṇamāpako mahāmatto dovāriko
atk-s0502a:4537_6: nagarasobhinī vaṇṇadāsīti evametesu ekādasasu janesu kurudhammaṃ rakkhantesu kaliṅgaraṭṭhe
atk-s0502a:4537_7: dantapuranagare kaliṅge rajjaṃ kārente tasmiṃ raṭṭhe devo na vassi. Mahāsattassa
atk-s0502a:4537_8: pana añjanasannibho nāma maṅgalahatthī mahāpuñño hoti. Raṭṭhavāsino “tasmiṃ ānīte
atk-s0502a:4537_9: devo vassissatī”ti saññāya rañño ārocayiṃsu. Rājā tassa hatthissa ānayanatthāya brāhmaṇe
atk-s0502a:4537_10: pahiṇi. Te gantvā mahāsattaṃ hatthiṃ yāciṃsu. Satthā tesaṃ yācanakāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ āha –
atk-s0502a:4540_0: Imaṃ tikanipāte jātakaṃ kathesi. Hatthimhi pana ānītepi deve avassante “so rājā kurudhammaṃ
atk-s0502a:4540_1: rakkhati, tenassa raṭṭhe devo vassatī”ti saññāya “yaṃ so kurudhammaṃ rakkhati, taṃ
atk-s0502a:4540_2: suvaṇṇapaṭṭe likhitvā ānethā”ti puna kāliṅgo brāhmaṇe ca amacce ca pesesi. Tesu gantvā
atk-s0502a:4540_3: yācantesu rājānaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbepi te attano attano sīlesu kiñci kukkuccamattaṃ
atk-s0502a:4540_4: katvā “aparisuddhaṃ no sīla”nti paṭikkhipitvāpi “na ettāvatā sīlabhedo hotī”ti tehi
atk-s0502a:4540_5: punappunaṃ yācitā attano attano sīlāni kathayiṃsu. Kāliṅgo suvaṇṇapaṭṭe likhāpetvā
atk-s0502a:4540_6: ābhataṃ kurudhammaṃ disvāva samādāya sādhukaṃ pūresi. Tassa raṭṭhe devo pāvassi,
atk-s0502a:4540_7: raṭṭhaṃ khemaṃ subhikkhaṃ ahosi. Satthā imaṃ atītaṃ āharitvā –
atk-s0502a:4542: Rajjugāho ca kaccāno, doṇamāpako ca kolito.
atk-s0502a:4547_0: Jātakaṃ samodhānetvā “bhikkhu evaṃ pubbepi paṇḍitā appamattakepi kukkucce uppanne
atk-s0502a:4547_1: attano sīlabhede āsaṅkaṃ kariṃsu, tvaṃ pana mādisassa buddhassa sāsane pabbajitvā
atk-s0502a:4547_2: pāṇātipātaṃ karonto atibhāriyaṃ kammamakāsi, bhikkhunā nāma hatthehi pādehi vācāya
atk-s0502a:4547_3: ca saṃyatena bhavitabba”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4553_0: Tattha hatthasaṃyatoti hatthakīḷāpanādīnaṃ vā hatthena paresaṃ paharaṇādīnaṃ vā abhāvena
atk-s0502a:4553_1: hatthasaṃyato. Dutiyapadepi eseva nayo. Vācāya pana musāvādādīnaṃ akaraṇato vācāya
atk-s0502a:4553_3: akārakoti attho. Ajjhattaratoti gocarajjhattasaṅkhātāya kammaṭṭhānabhāvanāya rato.
atk-s0502a:4553_4: Samāhitoti suṭṭhu ṭhapito. Eko santusitoti ekavihārī hutvā suṭṭhu tusito vipassanācārato
atk-s0502a:4553_5: paṭṭhāya attano adhigamena tuṭṭhamānaso. Puthujjanakalyāṇakañhi ādiṃ katvā sabbepi
atk-s0502a:4553_6: sekhā attano adhigamena santussantīti santusitā, arahā pana ekantasantusitova. Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0502a:4557_0: Yo mukhasaṃyatoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kokālikaṃ ārabbha
atk-s0502a:4557_1: kathesi. Vatthu “atha kho kokāliko bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamī”ti sutte āgatameva.
atk-s0502a:4558_0: Kokālike pana padumaniraye uppanne dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “aho kokāliko
atk-s0502a:4558_1: bhikkhu attano mukhaṃ nissāya vināsaṃ patto, dve aggasāvake akkosantasseva hissa
atk-s0502a:4558_2: pathavī vivaraṃ adāsī”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya
atk-s0502a:4558_3: sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi kokāliko
atk-s0502a:4558_4: bhikkhu attano mukhameva nissāya naṭṭho”ti vatvā tamatthaṃ sotukāmehi bhikkhūhi yācito
atk-s0502a:4559_0: Atīte himavantapadese ekasmiṃ sare kacchapo vasati. Dve haṃsapotakā gocarāya carantā
atk-s0502a:4559_1: tena saddhiṃ vissāsaṃ katvā daḷhavissāsikā hutvā ekadivasaṃ kacchapaṃ pucchiṃsu –
atk-s0502a:4559_2: “samma, amhākaṃ himavante cittakūṭapabbatatale kañcanaguhāya vasanaṭṭhānaṃ, ramaṇiyo
atk-s0502a:4559_3: padeso, gacchissasi amhehi saddhi”nti. “Samma, ahaṃ kathaṃ gamissāmī”ti? “Mayaṃ taṃ
atk-s0502a:4559_4: nessāma, sace mukhaṃ rakkhituṃ sakkhissasī”ti. “Rakkhissāmi, sammā gahetvā maṃ gacchathā”ti.
atk-s0502a:4559_5: Te “sādhū”ti vatvā ekaṃ daṇḍakaṃ kacchapena ḍaṃsāpetvā sayaṃ tassa ubho koṭiyo ḍaṃsitvā
atk-s0502a:4559_6: ākāsaṃ pakkhandiṃsu. Taṃ tathā haṃsehi nīyamānaṃ gāmadārakā disvā “dve haṃsā kacchapaṃ
atk-s0502a:4559_7: daṇḍena harantī”ti āhaṃsu. Kacchapo “yadi maṃ sahāyakā nenti, tumhākaṃ ettha kiṃ
atk-s0502a:4559_8: hoti duṭṭhaceṭakā”ti vattukāmo haṃsānaṃ sīghavegatāya bārāṇasinagare rājanivesanassa
atk-s0502a:4559_9: uparibhāgaṃ sampattakāle daṭṭhaṭṭhānato daṇḍakaṃ vissajjetvā ākāsaṅgaṇe patitvā dvedhā
atk-s0502a:4565: Imaṃ dukanipāte bahubhāṇijātakaṃ vitthāretvā, “bhikkhave, bhikkhunā nāma mukhasaṃyatena samacārinā anuddhatena nibbutacittena bhavitabba”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4568: Atthaṃ dhammañca dīpeti, madhuraṃ tassa bhāsita”nti.
atk-s0502a:4569_0: Tattha mukhasaṃyatoti dāsacaṇḍālādayopi “tvaṃ dujjāto, tvaṃ dussīlo”tiādīnaṃ avacanatāya
atk-s0502a:4569_1: mukhena saṃyato. Mantabhāṇīti mantā vuccati paññā, tāya bhaṇanasīlo. Anuddhatoti
atk-s0502a:4569_2: nibbutacitto. Atthaṃ dhammañca dīpetīti bhāsitatthañceva desanādhammañca katheti.
atk-s0502a:4569_3: Madhuranti evarūpassa bhikkhuno bhāsitaṃ madhuraṃ nāma. Yo pana atthameva sampādeti,
atk-s0502a:4569_4: na pāḷiṃ, pāḷiṃyeva sampādeti, na atthaṃ, ubhayaṃ vā pana na sampādeti, tassa bhāsitaṃ
atk-s0502a:4573: Dhammārāmoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto dhammārāmattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4574_0: Satthārā kira “ito me catumāsaccayena parinibbānaṃ bhavissatī”ti ārocite anekasahassā
atk-s0502a:4574_1: bhikkhū satthāraṃ parivāretvā vicariṃsu. Tattha puthujjanā bhikkhū assūni sandhāretuṃ
atk-s0502a:4574_2: nāsakkhiṃsu, khīṇāsavānaṃ dhammasaṃvego uppajji. Sabbepi “kiṃ nu kho karissāmā”ti
atk-s0502a:4574_3: vaggabandhanena vicaranti. Eko pana dhammārāmo nāma bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṃ santikaṃ na
atk-s0502a:4574_4: upasaṅkamati. Bhikkhūhi “kiṃ, āvuso”ti vuccamāno paṭivacanampi adatvā “satthā kira
atk-s0502a:4574_5: catumāsaccayena parinibbāyissati, ahañcamhi avītarāgo, satthari dharamāneyeva vāyamitvā
atk-s0502a:4574_6: arahattaṃ pāpuṇissāmī”ti ekakova viharanto satthārā desitaṃ dhammaṃ āvajjeti cinteti
atk-s0502a:4574_7: anussarati. Bhikkhū tathāgatassa ārocesuṃ – “bhante, dhammārāmassa tumhesu sinehamattampi
atk-s0502a:4574_8: natthi, ‘satthā kira parinibbāyissati, kiṃ nu kho karissāmā’ti amhehi saddhiṃ sammantanamattampi
atk-s0502a:4574_9: na karotī”ti. Satthā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ evaṃ karosī”ti pucchi. “Saccaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4574_10: bhante”ti. “Kiṃ kāraṇā”ti? Tumhe kira catumāsaccayena parinibbāyissatha, ahañcamhi
atk-s0502a:4574_11: avītarāgo, tumhesu dharantesuyeva vāyamitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇissāmīti tumhehi desitaṃ
atk-s0502a:4575_0: Satthā “sādhu sādhū”ti tassa sādhukāraṃ datvā, “bhikkhave, aññenāpi mayi sinehavantena
atk-s0502a:4575_1: bhikkhunā nāma dhammārāmasadiseneva bhavitabbaṃ. Na hi mayhaṃ mālāgandhādīhi pūjaṃ
atk-s0502a:4575_2: karontā mama pūjaṃ karonti nāma, dhammānudhammaṃ paṭipajjantāyeva pana maṃ pūjenti
atk-s0502a:4578: Dhammaṃ anussaraṃ bhikkhu, saddhammā na parihāyatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:4579_0: Tattha nivāsanaṭṭhena samathavipassanādhammo ārāmo assāti dhammārāmo. Tasmiṃyeva
atk-s0502a:4579_1: dhamme ratoti dhammarato. Tasseva dhammassa punappunaṃ vicintanatāya dhammaṃ anuvicintayaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4579_2: taṃ dhammaṃ āvajjento manasikarontoti attho. Anussaranti tameva dhammaṃ anussaranto.
atk-s0502a:4579_3: Saddhammāti evarūpo bhikkhu sattatiṃsabhedā bodhipakkhiyadhammā navavidhalokuttaradhammā
atk-s0502a:4580: Desanāvasāne so bhikkhu arahatte patiṭṭhahi, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:4583: Salābhanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto aññataraṃ vipakkhasevakaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4584_0: Tassa kireko devadattapakkhiko bhikkhu sahāyo ahosi. So taṃ bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ piṇḍāya
atk-s0502a:4584_1: caritvā katabhattakiccaṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā “kuhiṃ gatosī”ti pucchi. “Asukaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:4584_2: nāma piṇḍāya caritu”nti. “Laddho te piṇḍapāto”ti? “Āma, laddho”ti. “Idha amhākaṃ
atk-s0502a:4584_3: mahālābhasakkāro, katipāhaṃ idheva hohī”ti. So tassa vacanena katipāhaṃ tattha vasitvā
atk-s0502a:4584_4: sakaṭṭhānameva agamāsi. Atha naṃ bhikkhū “ayaṃ, bhante, devadattassa uppannalābhasakkāraṃ
atk-s0502a:4584_5: paribhuñjati, devadattassa pakkhiko eso”ti tathāgatassa ārocesuṃ. Satthā taṃ pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0502a:4584_6: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ evamakāsī”ti pucchi. “Āma, bhante, ahaṃ tattha ekaṃ daharaṃ nissāya
atk-s0502a:4584_7: katipāhaṃ vasiṃ, na ca pana devadattassa laddhiṃ rocemī”ti. Atha naṃ bhagavā “kiñcāpi
atk-s0502a:4584_8: tvaṃ laddhiṃ na rocesi, diṭṭhadiṭṭhakānaṃyeva pana laddhiṃ rocento viya vicarasi.
atk-s0502a:4584_9: Na tvaṃ idāneva evaṃ karosi, pubbepi evarūpoyevā”ti vatvā “idāni tāva, bhante, amhehi
atk-s0502a:4584_10: sāmaṃ diṭṭho, pubbe panesa kesaṃ laddhiṃ rocento viya vicari, ācikkhatha no”ti bhikkhūhi
atk-s0502a:4589_0: Imaṃ mahiḷāmukhajātakaṃ vitthāretvā, “bhikkhave, bhikkhunā nāma sakalābheneva santuṭṭhena
atk-s0502a:4589_1: bhavitabbaṃ, paralābhaṃ patthetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Paralābhaṃ patthentassa hi jhānavipassanāmaggaphalesu
atk-s0502a:4589_2: ekadhammopi nuppajjati, sakalābhasantuṭṭhasseva pana jhānādīni uppajjantī”ti vatvā
atk-s0502a:4595: Taṃ ve devā pasaṃsanti, suddhājīviṃ atandita”nti.
atk-s0502a:4596_0: Tattha salābhanti attano uppajjanakalābhaṃ. Sapadānacārañhi parivajjetvā anesanāya
atk-s0502a:4596_1: jīvikaṃ kappento salābhaṃ atimaññati hīḷeti jigucchati nāma. Tasmā evaṃ akaraṇena
atk-s0502a:4596_2: salābhaṃ nātimaññeyya. Aññesaṃ pihayanti aññesaṃ lābhaṃ patthento na careyyāti attho.
atk-s0502a:4596_3: Samādhiṃ nādhigacchatīti aññesañhi lābhaṃ pihayanto tesaṃ cīvarādikaraṇe ussukkaṃ
atk-s0502a:4596_4: āpanno bhikkhu appanāsamādhiṃ vā upacārasamādhiṃ vā nādhigacchati. Salābhaṃ nātimaññatīti
atk-s0502a:4596_5: appalābhopi samāno uccanīcakule paṭipāṭiyā sapadānaṃ caranto bhikkhu salābhaṃ nātimaññati
atk-s0502a:4596_6: nāma. Taṃ veti taṃ evarūpaṃ bhikkhuṃ sārajīvitatāya suddhājīviṃ jaṅghabalaṃ nissāya
atk-s0502a:4596_7: jīvitakappanena akusītatāya atanditaṃ devā pasaṃsanti thomentīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4600: Sabbasoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto pañcaggadāyakaṃ nāma brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4601_0: So kira sasse khette ṭhitakāleyeva khettaggaṃ nāma deti, khalakāle khalaggaṃ nāma
atk-s0502a:4601_1: deti, khalabhaṇḍakāle khalabhaṇḍaggaṃ nāma deti, ukkhalikakāle kumbhaggaṃ nāma deti,
atk-s0502a:4601_2: pātiyaṃ vaḍḍhitakāle pātaggaṃ nāma detīti imāni pañca aggadānāni deti, sampattassa
atk-s0502a:4601_3: adatvā nāma na bhuñjati. Tenassa pañcaggadāyakotveva nāmaṃ ahosi. Satthā tassa ca
atk-s0502a:4601_4: brāhmaṇiyā cassa tiṇṇaṃ phalānaṃ upanissayaṃ disvā brāhmaṇassa bhojanavelāyaṃ gantvā
atk-s0502a:4601_5: dvāre aṭṭhāsi. Sopi dvārapamukhe antogehābhimukho nisīditvā bhuñjati, satthāraṃ dvāre
atk-s0502a:4601_6: ṭhitaṃ na passati. Brāhmaṇī pana taṃ parivisamānā satthāraṃ disvā cintesi – “ayaṃ
atk-s0502a:4601_7: brāhmaṇo pañcasu ṭhānesu aggaṃ datvā bhuñjati, idāni ca samaṇo gotamo āgantvā dvāre
atk-s0502a:4601_8: ṭhito. Sace brāhmaṇo etaṃ disvā attano bhattaṃ haritvā dassati, punapāhaṃ pacituṃ
atk-s0502a:4601_9: na sakkhissāmī”ti. Sā “evaṃ ayaṃ samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ na passissatī”ti satthu piṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0502a:4601_10: datvā tassa pacchato taṃ paṭicchādentī onamitvā puṇṇacandaṃ pāṇinā paṭicchādentī
atk-s0502a:4601_11: viya aṭṭhāsi. Tathā ṭhitā eva ca pana “gato nu kho no”ti satthāraṃ aḍḍhakkhikena
atk-s0502a:4601_12: olokesi. Satthā tattheva aṭṭhāsi. Brāhmaṇassa pana savanabhayena “aticchathā”ti na
atk-s0502a:4601_13: vadeti, osakkitvā pana saṇikameva “aticchathā”ti āha. Satthā “na gamissāmī”ti sīsaṃ
atk-s0502a:4601_14: cālesi. Lokagarunā buddhena “na gamissāmī”ti sīse cālite sā sandhāretuṃ asakkontī
atk-s0502a:4601_15: mahāhasitaṃ hasi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe satthā gehābhimukhaṃ obhāsaṃ muñci. Brāhmaṇopi piṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0502a:4601_16: datvā nisinnoyeva brāhmaṇiyā hasitasaddaṃ sutvā chabbaṇṇānañca rasmīnaṃ obhāsaṃ oloketvā
atk-s0502a:4601_17: satthāraṃ addasa. Buddhā hi nāma gāme vā araññe vā hetusampannānaṃ attānaṃ adassetvā
atk-s0502a:4601_18: na pakkamanti. Brāhmaṇopi satthāraṃ disvā, “bhoti nāsitomhi tayā, rājaputtaṃ āgantvā
atk-s0502a:4601_19: dvāre ṭhitaṃ mayhaṃ anācikkhantiyā bhāriyaṃ te kammaṃ kata”nti vatvā aḍḍhabhuttaṃ
atk-s0502a:4601_20: bhojanapātiṃ ādāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā, “bho gotama, ahaṃ pañcasu ṭhānesu aggaṃ
atk-s0502a:4601_21: datvāva bhuñjāmi, ito ca me majjhe bhinditvā ekova bhattakoṭṭhāso bhutto, eko koṭṭhāso
atk-s0502a:4601_22: avasiṭṭho, paṭiggaṇhissasi me idaṃ bhatta”nti. Satthā “na me tava ucchiṭṭhabhattena
atk-s0502a:4601_23: attho”ti avatvā, “brāhmaṇa, aggampi mayhameva anucchavikaṃ, majjhe bhinditvā aḍḍhabhuttabhattampi,
atk-s0502a:4601_24: carimakabhattapiṇḍopi mayhameva anucchaviko. Mayañhi, brāhmaṇa, paradattūpajīvipetasadisā”ti
atk-s0502a:4606_0: Brāhmaṇo taṃ sutvāva pasannacitto hutvā “aho acchariyaṃ, dīpasāmiko nāma rājaputto
atk-s0502a:4606_1: ‘na me tava ucchiṭṭhabhattena attho’ti avatvā evaṃ vakkhatī”ti dvāre ṭhitakova satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:4606_2: pañhaṃ pucchi – “bho gotama, tumhe attano sāvake bhikkhūti vadatha, kittāvatā bhikkhu
atk-s0502a:4606_3: nāma hotī”ti. Satthā “kathaṃrūpā nu kho imassa dhammadesanā sappāyā”ti upadhārento
atk-s0502a:4606_4: “ime dvepi janā kassapabuddhakāle ‘nāmarūpa’nti vadantānaṃ kathaṃ suṇiṃsu, nāmarūpaṃ
atk-s0502a:4606_5: avissajjitvāva nesaṃ dhammaṃ desetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti, “brāhmaṇa, nāme ca rūpe ca arajjanto
atk-s0502a:4606_6: asajjanto asocanto bhikkhu nāma hotī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4609: Asatā ca na socati, sa ve bhikkhūti vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:4610_0: Tattha sabbasoti sabbasmimpi vedanādīnaṃ catunnaṃ, rūpakkhandhassa cāti pañcannaṃ
atk-s0502a:4610_1: khandhānaṃ vasena pavatte nāmarūpe. Mamāyitanti yassa ahanti vā mamanti vā gāho natthi.
atk-s0502a:4610_2: Asatā ca na socatīti tasmiñca nāmarūpe khayavayaṃ patte “mama rūpaṃ khīṇaṃ…pe… mama
atk-s0502a:4610_3: viññāṇaṃ khīṇa”nti na socati na vihaññati, “khayavayadhammaṃ me khīṇa”nti passati.
atk-s0502a:4610_4: Sa veti so evarūpo vijjamānepi nāmarūpe mamāyitarahitopi asatāpi tena asocanto bhikkhūti vuccatīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4611: Desanāvasāne ubhopi jayampatikā anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:4614: Mettāvihārīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4615_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye āyasmante mahākaccāne avantijanapade kuraragharaṃ nissāya pavattapabbate
atk-s0502a:4615_1: viharante soṇo nāma koṭikaṇṇo upāsako therassa dhammakathāya pasīditvā therassa santike
atk-s0502a:4615_2: pabbajitukāmo therena “dukkaraṃ kho, soṇa, yāvajīvaṃ ekabhattaṃ ekaseyyaṃ brahmacariya”nti
atk-s0502a:4615_3: vatvā dve vāre paṭikkhittopi pabbajjāya ativiya ussāhajāto tatiyavāre theraṃ yācitvā
atk-s0502a:4615_4: pabbajitvā appabhikkhukattā dakkhiṇāpathe tiṇṇaṃ vassānaṃ accayena laddhūpasampado
atk-s0502a:4615_5: satthāraṃ sammukhā daṭṭhukāmo hutvā upajjhāyaṃ āpucchitvā tena dinnaṃ sāsanaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0502a:4615_6: anupubbena jetavanaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā katapaṭisanthāro satthārā ekagandhakuṭiyaṃyeva
atk-s0502a:4615_7: anuññātasenāsano bahudeva rattiṃ ajjhokāse vīthināmetvā rattibhāge gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0502a:4615_8: attano pattasenāsane taṃ rattibhāgaṃ vītināmetvā paccūsasamaye satthārā ajjhiṭṭho
atk-s0502a:4615_9: soḷasa aṭṭhakavaggikāni sabbāneva sarabhaññena abhaṇi. Athassa bhagavā sarabhaññapariyosāne
atk-s0502a:4615_10: abbhānumodento – “sādhu sādhu, bhikkhū”ti sādhukāraṃ adāsi. Satthārā dinnasādhukāraṃ
atk-s0502a:4615_11: sutvā bhūmaṭṭhakadevā nāgā supaṇṇāti evaṃ yāva brahmalokā ekasādhukārameva ahosi.
atk-s0502a:4616_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe jetavanato vīsayojanasatamatthake kuraragharanagare therassa mātu mahāupāsikāya
atk-s0502a:4616_1: gehe adhivatthā devatāpi mahantena saddena sādhukāramadāsi. Atha naṃ upāsikā āha
atk-s0502a:4616_2: – “ko esa sādhukāraṃ detī”ti? Ahaṃ, bhaginīti. Kosi tvanti? Tava gehe adhivatthā,
atk-s0502a:4616_3: devatāti. Tvaṃ ito pubbe mayhaṃ sādhukāraṃ adatvā ajja kasmā desīti? Nāhaṃ tuyhaṃ
atk-s0502a:4616_4: sādhukāraṃ dammīti. Atha kassa te sādhukāro dinnoti? Tava puttassa koṭikaṇṇassa soṇattherassāti.
atk-s0502a:4616_5: Kiṃ me puttena katanti? Putto te ajja satthārā saddhiṃ ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vasitvā dhammaṃ
atk-s0502a:4616_6: desesi, satthā tava puttassa dhammaṃ sutvā pasanno sādhukāramadāsi. Tenassa mayāpi
atk-s0502a:4616_7: sādhukāro dinno. Sammāsambuddhassa hi sādhukāraṃ sampaṭicchitvā bhūmaṭṭhakadeve ādiṃ
atk-s0502a:4616_8: katvā yāva brahmalokā ekasādhukārameva jātanti. Kiṃ pana, sāmi, mama puttena satthu
atk-s0502a:4616_9: dhammo kathito, satthārā mama puttassa kathitoti? Tava puttena satthu kathitoti.
atk-s0502a:4616_10: Evaṃ devatāya kathentiyāva upāsikāya pañcavaṇṇā pīti uppajjitvā sakalasarīraṃ phari.
atk-s0502a:4617_0: Athassā etadahosi – “sace me putto satthārā saddhiṃ ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vasitvā satthu
atk-s0502a:4617_1: dhammaṃ kathetuṃ sakkhi, mayhampi kathetuṃ sakkhissatiyeva. Puttassa āgatakāle dhammassavanaṃ
atk-s0502a:4617_2: kāretvā dhammakathaṃ suṇissāmī”ti. Soṇattheropi kho satthārā sādhukāre dinne “ayaṃ
atk-s0502a:4617_3: me upajjhāyena dinnasāsanaṃ ārocetuṃ kālo”ti bhagavantaṃ paccantimesu janapadesu
atk-s0502a:4617_4: vinayadharapañcamena gaṇena upasampadaṃ ādiṃ katvā pañca vare yācitvā katipāhaṃ satthu
atk-s0502a:4617_5: santikeyeva vasitvā “upajjhāyaṃ passissāmī”ti satthāraṃ āpucchitvā jetavanā nikkhamitvā
atk-s0502a:4618_0: Thero punadivase taṃ ādāya piṇḍāya caranto mātu upāsikāya gehadvāraṃ agamāsi. Sāpi
atk-s0502a:4618_1: puttaṃ disvā tuṭṭhamānasā vanditvā sakkaccaṃ parivisitvā pucchi – “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4618_2: tāta, satthārā saddhiṃ ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vasitvā satthu dhammakathaṃ kathesī”ti. “Upāsike,
atk-s0502a:4618_3: tuyhaṃ kena idaṃ kathita”nti? “Tāta, imasmiṃ gehe adhivatthā devatā mahantena saddena
atk-s0502a:4618_4: sādhukāraṃ datvā mayā ‘ko eso’ti vutte ‘aha’nti vatvā evañca evañca kathesi. Taṃ
atk-s0502a:4618_5: sutvā mayhaṃ etadahosi – ‘sace me putto satthu dhammakathaṃ kathesi, mayhampi kathetuṃ
atk-s0502a:4618_6: sakkhissatī’ti. Atha naṃ āha – ‘tāta, yato tayā satthu sammukhā dhammo kathito, mayhampi
atk-s0502a:4618_7: kathetuṃ sakkhissasi eva. Asukadivase nāma dhammassavanaṃ kāretvā tava dhammaṃ suṇissāmi,
atk-s0502a:4618_8: tātā”’ti. So adhivāsesi. Upāsikā bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ datvā pūjaṃ katvā “puttassa
atk-s0502a:4618_9: me dhammakathaṃ suṇissāmī”ti ekameva dāsiṃ geharakkhikaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbaṃ parijanaṃ
atk-s0502a:4618_10: ādāya antonagare dhammassavanatthāya kārite maṇḍape alaṅkatadhammāsanaṃ abhiruyha
atk-s0502a:4618_11: dhammaṃ desentassa puttassa dhammakathaṃ sotuṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:4619_0: Tasmiṃ pana kāle navasatā corā tassā upāsikāya gehe otāraṃ olokentā vicaranti. Tassā
atk-s0502a:4619_1: pana gehaṃ sattahi pākārehi parikkhittaṃ sattadvārakoṭṭhakayuttaṃ, tattha tesu tesu
atk-s0502a:4619_2: ṭhānesu caṇḍasunakhe bandhitvā ṭhapayiṃsu. Antogehe chadanassa udakapātaṭṭhāne pana
atk-s0502a:4619_3: parikhaṃ khaṇitvā tipunā pūrayiṃsu. Taṃ divā ātapena vilīnaṃ pakkuthitaṃ viya tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0502a:4619_4: rattiṃ kaṭhinaṃ kakkhaḷaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati. Tassānantarā mahantāni ayasaṅghāṭakāni
atk-s0502a:4619_5: nirantaraṃ bhūmiyaṃ odahiṃsu. Iti imañcārakkhaṃ upāsikāya ca antogehe ṭhitabhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:4619_6: paṭicca te corā okāsaṃ alabhantā taṃ divasaṃ tassā gatabhāvaṃ ñatvā umaṅgaṃ bhinditvā
atk-s0502a:4619_7: tipuparikhāya ca ayasaṅghāṭakānañca heṭṭhābhāgeneva gehaṃ pavisitvā corajeṭṭhakaṃ
atk-s0502a:4619_8: tassā santikaṃ pahiṇiṃsu “sace sā amhākaṃ idha paviṭṭhabhāvaṃ sutvā nivattitvā gehābhimukhī
atk-s0502a:4619_9: āgacchati, asinā naṃ paharitvā mārethā”ti. So gantvā tassā santike aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:4620_0: Corāpi antogehe dīpaṃ jāletvā kahāpaṇagabbhadvāraṃ vivariṃsu. Sā dāsī core disvā
atk-s0502a:4620_1: upāsikāya santikaṃ gantvā, “ayye, bahū corā gehaṃ pavisitvā kahāpaṇagabbhadvāraṃ
atk-s0502a:4620_2: vivariṃsū”ti ārocesi. “Corā attanā diṭṭhakahāpaṇe harantu, ahaṃ mama puttassa dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0502a:4620_3: suṇāmi, mā me dhammassa antarāyaṃ kari, gehaṃ gacchā”ti taṃ pahiṇi. Corāpi kahāpaṇagabbhaṃ
atk-s0502a:4620_4: tucchaṃ katvā rajatagabbhaṃ vivariṃsu. Sā punapi gantvā tamatthaṃ ārocesi. Upāsikāpi
atk-s0502a:4620_5: “corā attanā icchitaṃ harantu, mā me antarāyaṃ karī”ti puna taṃ pahiṇi. Corā rajatagabbhampi
atk-s0502a:4620_6: tucchaṃ katvā suvaṇṇagabbhaṃ vivariṃsu. Sā punapi gantvā upāsikāya tamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:4620_7: Atha naṃ upāsikā āmantetvā, “bhoti je tvaṃ anekavāraṃ mama santikaṃ āgatā, ‘corā
atk-s0502a:4620_8: yathārucitaṃ harantu, ahaṃ mama puttassa dhammakathaṃ suṇāmi, mā me antarāyaṃ karī’ti
atk-s0502a:4620_9: mayā vuttāpi mama kathaṃ anādiyitvā punappunaṃ āgacchasiyeva. Sace idāni tvaṃ āgacchissasi,
atk-s0502a:4620_10: jānissāmi te kattabbaṃ, gehameva gacchā”ti pahiṇi.
atk-s0502a:4621_0: Corajeṭṭhako tassā kathaṃ sutvā “evarūpāya itthiyā santakaṃ harantānaṃ asani patitvā
atk-s0502a:4621_1: matthakaṃ bhindeyyā”ti corānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā “sīghaṃ upāsikāya santakaṃ paṭipākatikaṃ
atk-s0502a:4621_2: karothā”ti āha. Te kahāpaṇehi kahāpaṇagabbhaṃ, rajatasuvaṇṇehi rajatasuvaṇṇagabbhe
atk-s0502a:4621_3: puna pūrayiṃsu. Dhammatā kiresā, yaṃ dhammo dhammacārinaṃ rakkhati. Tenevāha –
atk-s0502a:4626_0: Corāpi gantvā dhammassavanaṭṭhāne aṭṭhaṃsu. Theropi dhammaṃ kathetvā vibhātāya rattiyā
atk-s0502a:4626_1: āsanā otari. Tasmiṃ khaṇe corajeṭṭhako upāsikāya pādamūle nipajjitvā “khamāhi me,
atk-s0502a:4626_2: ayye”ti āha. “Kiṃ idaṃ, tātā”ti? “Ahañhi tumhesu āghātaṃ katvā tumhe māretukāmo aṭṭhāsi”nti.
atk-s0502a:4626_3: “Tena hi te, tāta, khamāmī”ti. Sesacorāpi tatheva vatvā, “tātā, khamāmī”ti vutte
atk-s0502a:4626_4: āhaṃsu – “ayye, sace no khamatha, puttassa vo santike amhākaṃ pabbajjaṃ dāpethā”ti.
atk-s0502a:4626_5: Sā puttaṃ vanditvā āha – “tāta, ime corā mama guṇesu tumhākañca dhammakathāya pasannā
atk-s0502a:4626_6: pabbajjaṃ yācanti, pabbājetha ne”ti. Thero “sādhū”ti vatvā tehi nivatthavatthānaṃ
atk-s0502a:4626_7: dasāni chindāpetvā tambamattikāya rajāpetvā te pabbājetvā sīlesu patiṭṭhāpesi. Upasampannakāle
atk-s0502a:4626_8: ca nesaṃ ekekassa visuṃ visuṃ kammaṭṭhānamadāsi. Te navasatā bhikkhū visuṃ visuṃ
atk-s0502a:4626_9: navasatakammaṭṭhānāni gahetvā ekaṃ pabbataṃ abhiruyha tassa tassa rukkhassa chāyāya
atk-s0502a:4627_0: Satthā vīsayojanasatamatthake jetavanamahāvihāre nisinnova te bhikkhū oloketvā tesaṃ
atk-s0502a:4627_1: cariyavasena dhammadesanaṃ vavatthāpetvā obhāsaṃ pharitvā sammukhe nisīditvā kathento
atk-s0502a:4632: “Siñca bhikkhu imaṃ nāvaṃ, sittā te lahumessati;
atk-s0502a:4635: “Pañca chinde pañca jahe, pañca cuttari bhāvaye;
atk-s0502a:4644: Yamhi jhānañca paññā ca, sa ve nibbānasantike.
atk-s0502a:4647: Amānusī ratī hoti, sammā dhammaṃ vipassato.
atk-s0502a:4658_0: Tattha mettāvihārīti mettākammaṭṭhāne kammaṃ karontopi mettāvasena tikacatukkajjhāne
atk-s0502a:4658_1: nibbattetvā ṭhitopi mettāvihārīyeva nāma. Pasannoti yo pana buddhasāsane pasanno
atk-s0502a:4658_2: hoti, pasādaṃ rocetiyevāti attho. Padaṃ santanti nibbānassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Evarūpo hi
atk-s0502a:4658_3: bhikkhu santaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ upasantatāya saṅkhārūpasamaṃ, paramasukhatāya
atk-s0502a:4658_4: sukhanti laddhanāmaṃ nibbānaṃ adhigacchati, vindatiyevāti attho.
atk-s0502a:4659_0: Siñca bhikkhu imaṃ nāvanti bhikkhu imaṃ attabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ nāvaṃ micchāvitakkodakaṃ
atk-s0502a:4659_1: chaḍḍento siñca. Sittā te lahumessatīti yathā hi mahāsamudde udakasseva bharitā nāvā
atk-s0502a:4659_2: chiddāni pidahitvā udakassa sittatāya sittā sallahukā hutvā mahāsamudde anosīditvā
atk-s0502a:4659_3: sīghaṃ supaṭṭanaṃ gacchati, evaṃ tavāpi ayaṃ micchāvitakkodakabharitā attabhāvanāvā
atk-s0502a:4659_4: cakkhudvārādichiddāni saṃvarena pidahitvā uppannassa micchāvitakkodakassa sittatāya
atk-s0502a:4659_5: sittā sallahukā saṃsāravaṭṭe anosīditvā sīghaṃ nibbānaṃ gamissati. Chetvāti rāgadosabandhanāni
atk-s0502a:4659_6: chinda. Etāni hi chinditvā arahattappatto tato aparabhāge anupādisesanibbānameva
atk-s0502a:4660_0: Pañca chindeti heṭṭhāapāyasampāpakāni pañcorambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni pāde baddharajjuṃ
atk-s0502a:4660_1: puriso satthena viya heṭṭhāmaggattayena chindeyya. Pañca jaheti uparidevalokasampāpakāni
atk-s0502a:4660_2: pañcuddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni puriso gīvāya baddharajjukaṃ viya arahattamaggena jaheyya
atk-s0502a:4660_3: pajaheyya, chindeyyāti attho. Pañca cuttari bhāvayeti uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanānaṃ pahānatthāya
atk-s0502a:4660_4: saddhādīni pañcindriyāni uttari bhāveyya. Pañcasaṅgātigoti evaṃ sante pañcannaṃ rāgadosamohamānadiṭṭhisaṅgānaṃ
atk-s0502a:4660_5: atikkamanena pañcasaṅgātigo bhikkhu oghatiṇṇoti vuccati, cattāro oghe tiṇṇoyevāti vuccatīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4661_0: Jhāya bhikkhūti bhikkhu tvaṃ dvinnaṃ jhānānaṃ vasena jhāya ceva, kāyakammādīsu ca
atk-s0502a:4661_1: appamattavihāritāya mā pamajji. Ramessūti pañcavidhe ca kāmaguṇe te cittaṃ mā ramessu.
atk-s0502a:4661_2: Mā lohaguḷanti sativossaggalakkhaṇena hi pamādena pamattā niraye tattaṃ lohaguḷaṃ
atk-s0502a:4661_3: gilanti, tena taṃ vadāmi “mā pamatto hutvā lohaguḷaṃ gili, mā niraye ḍayhamāno ‘dukkhamida’nti kandī”ti attho.
atk-s0502a:4662_0: Natthi jhānanti jhānuppādikāya vāyāmapaññāya apaññassa jhānaṃ nāma natthi. Paññā
atk-s0502a:4662_1: natthīti ajhāyantassa “samāhito bhikkhu yathābhūtaṃ jānāti passatī”ti vuttalakkhaṇā
atk-s0502a:4662_2: paññā natthi. Yamhi jhānañca paññā cāti yamhi puggale idaṃ ubhayampi atthi, so nibbānassa
atk-s0502a:4663_0: Suññāgāraṃ paviṭṭhassāti kismiñcideva vivittokāse kammaṭṭhānaṃ avijahitvā kammaṭṭhānamanasikārena
atk-s0502a:4663_1: nisinnassa. Santacittassāti nibbutacittassa. Sammāti hetunā kāraṇena dhammaṃ vipassantassa
atk-s0502a:4663_2: vipassanāsaṅkhātā amānusī rati aṭṭhasamāpattisaṅkhātā dibbāpi rati hoti uppajjatīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4664_0: Yato yato sammasatīti aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu kammaṃ karonto yena yenākārena, purebhattādīsu
atk-s0502a:4664_1: vā kālesu yasmiṃ yasmiṃ attanā abhirucite kāle, abhirucite vā kammaṭṭhāne kammaṃ
atk-s0502a:4664_2: karonto sammasati. Udayabbayanti pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ pañcavīsatiyā lakkhaṇehi udayaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4664_3: pañcavīsatiyā eva ca lakkhaṇehi vayaṃ. Pītipāmojjanti evaṃ khandhānaṃ udayabbayaṃ
atk-s0502a:4664_4: sammasanto dhammapītiṃ dhammapāmojjañca labhati. Amatanti taṃ sappaccaye nāmarūpe
atk-s0502a:4664_5: pākaṭe hutvā upaṭṭhahante uppannaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ amatanibbānasampāpakattā vijānataṃ
atk-s0502a:4665_0: Tatrāyamādi bhavatīti tatra ayaṃ ādi, idaṃ pubbaṭṭhānaṃ hoti. Idha paññassāti imasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:4665_1: sāsane paṇḍitabhikkhuno. Idāni “taṃ ādī”ti vuttaṃ pubbaṭṭhānaṃ dassento indriyaguttītiādimāha.
atk-s0502a:4665_2: Catupārisuddhisīlañhi pubbaṭṭhānaṃ nāma. Tattha indriyaguttīti indriyasaṃvaro. Santuṭṭhīti
atk-s0502a:4665_3: catupaccayasantoso. Tena ājīvapārisuddhi ceva paccayasannissitañca sīlaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0502a:4666_0: Mitte bhajassu kalyāṇeti vissaṭṭhakammante apatirūpasahāye vajjetvā sādhujīvitāya
atk-s0502a:4666_1: suddhājīve jaṅghabalaṃ nissāya jīvikakappanāya akusīte atandite kalyāṇamitte bhajassu,
atk-s0502a:4666_2: sevassūti attho. Paṭisanthāravutyassāti āmisapaṭisanthārena ca dhammapaṭisanthārena
atk-s0502a:4666_3: ca sampannavuttitāya paṭisanthāravutti assa, paṭisanthārassa kārakā bhaveyyāti attho.
atk-s0502a:4666_4: Ācārakusaloti sīlampi ācāro, vattapaṭivattampi ācāro. Tattha kusalo siyā, cheko bhaveyyāti
atk-s0502a:4666_5: attho. Tato pāmojjabahuloti tato paṭisanthāravuttito ca ācārakosallato ca uppannena
atk-s0502a:4666_6: dhammapāmojjena pāmojjabahulo hutvā taṃ sakalassāpi vaṭṭadukkhassa antaṃ karissatīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4667_0: Evaṃ satthārā desitāsu imāsu gāthāsu ekamekissāya gāthāya pariyosāne ekamekaṃ bhikkhusataṃ
atk-s0502a:4667_1: nisinnanisinnaṭṭhāneyeva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā
atk-s0502a:4667_2: sabbepi te bhikkhū ākāseneva vīsayojanasatikaṃ kantāraṃ atikkamitvā tathāgatassa
atk-s0502a:4667_3: suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ sarīraṃ vaṇṇentā thomentā pāde vandiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a:4670: Vassikā viya pupphānīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto pañcasate bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4671_0: Te kira satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññe samaṇadhammaṃ karontā pātova pupphitāni
atk-s0502a:4671_1: vassikapupphāni sāyaṃ vaṇṭato muccantāni disvā “pupphānaṃ vaṇṭehi muccanato mayaṃ
atk-s0502a:4671_2: paṭhamataraṃ rāgādīhi muccissāmā”ti vāyamiṃsu. Satthā te bhikkhū oloketvā, “bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a:4671_3: bhikkhunā nāma vaṇṭato muccanapupphena viya dukkhato muccituṃ vāyamitabbamevā”ti
atk-s0502a:4671_4: vatvā gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnova ālokaṃ pharitvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4675_0: Tattha vassikāti sumanā. Maddavānīti milātāni. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā vassikā hiyyo
atk-s0502a:4675_1: pupphitapupphāni punadivase purāṇabhūtāni muñcati, vaṇṭato vissajjeti, evaṃ tumhepi
atk-s0502a:4676: Desanāvasāne sabbepi te bhikkhū arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a:4679: Santakāyoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto santakāyattheraṃ nāma ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4680_0: Tassa kira hatthapādakukkuccaṃ nāma nāhosi, kāyavijambhanarahito santaattabhāvova
atk-s0502a:4680_1: ahosi. So kira sīhayonito āgato thero. Sīhā kira ekadivasaṃ gocaraṃ gahetvā rajatasuvaṇṇamaṇipavāḷaguhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:4680_2: aññataraṃ pavisitvā manosilātale haritālacuṇṇesu sattāhaṃ nipajjitvā sattame divase
atk-s0502a:4680_3: uṭṭhāya nipannaṭṭhānaṃ oloketvā sace naṅguṭṭhassa vā kaṇṇānaṃ vā hatthapādānaṃ vā
atk-s0502a:4680_4: calitattā manosilāharitālacuṇṇānaṃ vippakiṇṇataṃ passanti, “na te idaṃ jātiyā vā
atk-s0502a:4680_5: gottassa vā patirūpa”nti puna sattāhaṃ nirāhārā nipajjanti, cuṇṇānaṃ pana vippakiṇṇabhāve
atk-s0502a:4680_6: asati “idaṃ te jātigottānaṃ anucchavika”nti āsayā nikkhamitvā vijambhitvā disā anuviloketvā
atk-s0502a:4680_7: tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ naditvā gocarāya pakkamanti. Evarūpāya sīhayoniyā āgato ayaṃ
atk-s0502a:4680_8: bhikkhu. Tassa kāyasamācāraṃ disvā bhikkhū satthu ārocesuṃ – “na no, bhante, santakāyattherasadiso
atk-s0502a:4680_9: bhikkhu diṭṭhapubbo. Imassa hi nisinnaṭṭhāne hatthacalanaṃ vā pādacalanaṃ vā kāyavijambhitā
atk-s0502a:4680_10: vā natthī”ti. Taṃ sutvā satthā, “bhikkhave, bhikkhunā nāma santakāyattherena viya
atk-s0502a:4680_11: kāyādīhi upasanteneva bhavitabba”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4684_0: Tattha santakāyoti pāṇātipātādīnaṃ abhāvena santakāyo, musāvādādīnaṃ abhāvena santavāco,
atk-s0502a:4684_1: abhijjhādīnaṃ abhāvena santavā, kāyādīnaṃ tiṇṇampi suṭṭhu samāhitattā susamāhito,
atk-s0502a:4684_2: catūhi maggehi lokāmisassa vantatāya vantalokāmiso bhikkhu abbhantare rāgādīnaṃ upasantatāya
atk-s0502a:4685: Desanāvasāne so thero arahatte patiṭṭhahi, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:4688: Attanā codayattānanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto naṅgalakulattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4689_0: Eko kira duggatamanusso paresaṃ bhatiṃ katvā jīvati, taṃ eko bhikkhu pilotikakhaṇḍanivatthaṃ
atk-s0502a:4689_1: naṅgalaṃ ukkhipitvā gacchantaṃ disvā evamāha – “kiṃ pana te evaṃ jīvanato pabbajituṃ
atk-s0502a:4689_2: na vara”nti. Ko maṃ, bhante, evaṃ jīvantaṃ pabbājessatīti? Sace pabbajissasi, ahaṃ
atk-s0502a:4689_3: taṃ pabbājessāmīti. Sādhu bhante, sace maṃ pabbājessatha, pabbajissāmīti. Atha naṃ
atk-s0502a:4689_4: so thero jetavanaṃ netvā sahatthena, nhāpetvā māḷake ṭhapetvā pabbājetvā nivatthapilotikakhaṇḍena
atk-s0502a:4689_5: saddhiṃ naṅgalaṃ māḷakasīmāyameva rukkhasākhāyaṃ ṭhapāpesi. So upasampannakālepi
atk-s0502a:4689_6: naṅgalakulattherotveva paññāyi. So buddhānaṃ uppannalābhasakkāraṃ nissāya jīvanto
atk-s0502a:4689_7: ukkaṇṭhitvā ukkaṇṭhitaṃ vinodetuṃ asakkonto “na dāni saddhādeyyāni kāsāyāni paridahitvā
atk-s0502a:4689_8: gamissāmī”ti taṃ rukkhamūlaṃ gantvā attanāva attānaṃ ovadi – “ahirika, nillajja,
atk-s0502a:4689_9: idaṃ nivāsetvā vibbhamitvā bhatiṃ katvā jīvitukāmo jāto”ti. Tassevaṃ attānaṃ ovadantasseva
atk-s0502a:4689_10: cittaṃ tanukabhāvaṃ gataṃ. So nivattitvā puna katipāhaccayena ukkaṇṭhitvā tatheva
atk-s0502a:4689_11: attānaṃ ovadi, punassa cittaṃ nivatti. So imināva nīhārena ukkaṇṭhitaukkaṇṭhitakāle
atk-s0502a:4689_12: tattha gantvā attānaṃ ovadi. Atha naṃ bhikkhū tattha abhiṇhaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā, “āvuso,
atk-s0502a:4689_13: naṅgalatthera kasmā ettha gacchasī”ti pucchiṃsu. So “ācariyassa santikaṃ gacchāmi,
atk-s0502a:4690_0: Bhikkhū tena saddhiṃ keḷiṃ karontā āhaṃsu – “āvuso naṅgalatthera, tava vicaraṇamaggo
atk-s0502a:4690_1: avaḷañjo viya jāto, ācariyassa santikaṃ na gacchasi maññe”ti. Āma, bhante, mayaṃ
atk-s0502a:4690_2: saṃsagge sati agamimhā, idāni pana so saṃsaggo chinno, tena na gacchāmāti. Taṃ sutvā
atk-s0502a:4690_3: bhikkhū “esa abhūtaṃ vatvā aññaṃ byākarotī”ti satthu tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Satthā “āma,
atk-s0502a:4690_4: bhikkhave, mama putto attanāva attānaṃ codetvā pabbajitakiccassa matthakaṃ patto”ti
atk-s0502a:4690_5: vatvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:4693: So attagutto satimā, sukhaṃ bhikkhu vihāhisi.
atk-s0502a:4695: “Attā hi attano nātho, ko hi nātho paro siyā;
atk-s0502a:4698_0: Tattha codayattānanti attanāva attānaṃ codaya sāraya. Paṭimaṃsethāti attanāva attānaṃ
atk-s0502a:4698_1: parivīmaṃsatha. Soti so tvaṃ, bhikkhu, evaṃ sante attanāva guttatāya attagutto, upaṭṭhitasatitāya
atk-s0502a:4698_2: satimā hutvā sabbiriyāpathesu sukhaṃ viharissasīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4699_0: Nāthoti avassayo patiṭṭhā. Ko hi nātho paroti yasmā parassa attabhāve patiṭṭhāya
atk-s0502a:4699_1: kusalaṃ vā katvā saggaparāyaṇena maggaṃ vā bhāvetvā sacchikataphalena bhavituṃ na
atk-s0502a:4699_2: sakkā, tasmā ko hi nāma paro nātho bhaveyyāti attho. Tasmāti yasmā attāva attano
atk-s0502a:4699_3: gati patiṭṭhā saraṇaṃ, tasmā yathā bhadraṃ assājānīyaṃ nissāya lābhaṃ patthayanto
atk-s0502a:4699_4: vāṇijo tassa visamaṭṭhānacāraṃ pacchinditvā divasassa tikkhattuṃ nahāpento bhojento
atk-s0502a:4699_5: saṃyameti paṭijaggati, evaṃ tvampi anuppannassa akusalassa uppādaṃ nivārento satisammosena
atk-s0502a:4699_6: uppannaṃ akusalaṃ pajahanto attānaṃ saṃyama gopaya, evaṃ sante paṭhamajjhānaṃ ādiṃ
atk-s0502a:4703: Pāmojjabahuloti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto vakkalittheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4704_0: So kirāyasmā sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto piṇḍāya paviṭṭhaṃ tathāgataṃ
atk-s0502a:4704_1: disvā satthu sarīrasampattiṃ oloketvā sarīrasampattidassanena atitto “evāhaṃ niccakālaṃ
atk-s0502a:4704_2: tathāgataṃ daṭṭhuṃ labhissāmī”ti satthu santike pabbajitvā yattha ṭhitena sakkā dasabalaṃ
atk-s0502a:4704_3: passituṃ, tattha ṭhito sajjhāyakammaṭṭhānamanasikārādīni pahāya satthāraṃ olokentova
atk-s0502a:4704_4: vicarati. Satthā tassa ñāṇaparipākaṃ āgamento kiñci avatvā “idānissa ñāṇaṃ paripākaṃ
atk-s0502a:4704_5: gata”nti ñatvā “kiṃ te, vakkali, iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena, yo kho, vakkali, dhammaṃ
atk-s0502a:4704_6: passati, so maṃ passati. Yo maṃ passati, so dhammaṃ passatī”ti vatvā ovadi. So evaṃ
atk-s0502a:4704_7: ovaditopi satthu dassanaṃ pahāya neva aññattha gantuṃ sakkoti. Atha naṃ satthā “nāyaṃ
atk-s0502a:4704_8: bhikkhu saṃvegaṃ alabhitvā bujjhissatī”ti upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya rājagahaṃ gantvā
atk-s0502a:4704_9: vassūpanāyikadivase “apehi, vakkali, apehi, vakkalī”ti paṇāmesi. So “na maṃ satthā
atk-s0502a:4704_10: ālapatī”ti temāsaṃ satthu sammukhe ṭhātuṃ asakkonto “kiṃ mayhaṃ jīvitena, pabbatā
atk-s0502a:4705_0: Satthā tassa kilamanabhāvaṃ ñatvā “ayaṃ bhikkhu mama santikā assāsaṃ alabhanto maggaphalānaṃ
atk-s0502a:4705_1: upanissayaṃ nāseyyā”ti attānaṃ dassetuṃ obhāsaṃ muñci. Athassa satthu diṭṭhakālato
atk-s0502a:4705_2: paṭṭhāya tāvamahantopi soko pahīyi. Satthā sukkhataḷākaṃ oghena pūrento viya therassa
atk-s0502a:4709_0: Tassattho – pakatiyāpi pāmojjabahulo bhikkhu buddhasāsane pasādaṃ roceti, so evaṃ
atk-s0502a:4709_1: pasanno buddhasāsane santaṃ padaṃ saṅkhārūpasamaṃ sukhanti laddhanāmaṃ nibbānaṃ adhigaccheyyāti.
atk-s0502a:4709_2: Imañca pana gāthaṃ vatvā satthā vakkalittherassa hatthaṃ pasāretvā –
atk-s0502a:4711: Ahaṃ taṃ uddharissāmi, paṅke sannaṃva kuñjaraṃ.
atk-s0502a:4716_0: Imā gāthā abhāsi. So “dasabalo me diṭṭho, ehīti ca avhānampi laddha”nti balavapītiṃ
atk-s0502a:4716_1: uppādetvā “kuto nu kho gantabba”nti gamanamaggaṃ apassanto dasabalassa sammukhe ākāse
atk-s0502a:4716_2: uppatitvā paṭhamapāde pabbate ṭhiteyeva satthārā vuttagāthā āvajjento ākāseyeva pītiṃ
