atk-s0502a:4716_3: vikkhambhetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā tathāgataṃ vandamānova otaritvā
atk-s0502a:4716_4: satthu santike aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ satthā aparabhāge saddhādhimuttānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0502a:4719: Yo haveti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā pubbārāme viharanto sumanasāmaṇeraṃ ārabbha kathesi. Tatrāyaṃ anupubbī kathā –
atk-s0502a:4720_0: Padumuttarabuddhakālasmiñhi eko kulaputto satthārā catuparisamajjhe ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0502a:4720_1: dibbacakkhukānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā taṃ sampattiṃ patthayamāno satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:4720_2: nimantetvā sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:4720_3: ahampi anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāsane dibbacakkhukānaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ
atk-s0502a:4720_4: ṭhapesi. Satthā kappasatasahassaṃ olokento tassa patthanāya samijjhanabhāvaṃ viditvā
atk-s0502a:4720_6: nāma bhavissasī”ti byākāsi. So taṃ byākaraṇaṃ sutvā sve pattabbaṃ viya taṃ sampattiṃ
atk-s0502a:4720_7: maññamāno parinibbute satthari bhikkhū dibbacakkhuparikammaṃ pucchitvā sattayojanikaṃ
atk-s0502a:4720_8: kañcanathūpaṃ parikkhipitvā anekāni dīparukkhasahassāni kāretvā dīpapūjaṃ katvā tato
atk-s0502a:4720_9: cuto devaloke nibbattitvā devamanussesu kappasatasahassāni saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ kappe
atk-s0502a:4720_10: bārāṇasiyaṃ daliddakule nibbatto sumanaseṭṭhiṃ nissāya tassa tiṇahārako hutvā jīvikaṃ
atk-s0502a:4720_11: kappesi. Annabhārotissa nāmaṃ ahosi. Sumanaseṭṭhīpi tasmiṃ nagare niccakālaṃ mahādānaṃ deti.
atk-s0502a:4721_0: Athekadivasaṃ upariṭṭho nāma paccekabuddho gandhamādane nirodhasamāpattito vuṭṭhāya
atk-s0502a:4721_1: “kassa nu kho ajja anuggahaṃ karissāmī”ti cintetvā “ajja mayā annabhārassa anuggahaṃ
atk-s0502a:4721_2: kātuṃ vaṭṭati, idāni ca so aṭavito tiṇaṃ ādāya gehaṃ āgamissatī”ti ñatvā pattacīvaramādāya
atk-s0502a:4721_3: iddhiyā gantvā annabhārassa sammukhe paccuṭṭhāsi. Annabhāro taṃ tucchapattahatthaṃ
atk-s0502a:4721_4: disvā “api, bhante, bhikkhaṃ labhitthā”ti pucchitvā “labhissāma mahāpuññā”ti vutte
atk-s0502a:4721_5: “tena hi, bhante, thokaṃ āgamethā”ti tiṇakājaṃ chaḍḍetvā vegena gehaṃ gantvā, “bhadde,
atk-s0502a:4721_6: mayhaṃ ṭhapitabhāgabhattaṃ atthi, natthī”ti bhariyaṃ pucchitvā “atthi, sāmī”ti vutte
atk-s0502a:4721_7: vegena paccāgantvā paccekabuddhassa pattaṃ ādāya “mayhaṃ dātukāmatāya sati deyyadhammo
atk-s0502a:4721_8: na hoti, deyyadhamme sati paṭiggāhakaṃ na labhāmi. Ajja pana me paṭiggāhako ca diṭṭho,
atk-s0502a:4721_9: deyyadhammo ca atthi, lābhā vata me”ti gehaṃ gantvā bhattaṃ patte pakkhipāpetvā paccāharitvā
atk-s0502a:4722: “Iminā pana dānena, mā me dāliddiyaṃ ahu;
atk-s0502a:4723: Natthīti vacanaṃ nāma, mā ahosi bhavābhave. –
atk-s0502a:4724: Bhante evarūpā dujjīvitā mucceyyaṃ, natthīti padameva na suṇeyya”nti patthanaṃ ṭhapesi. Paccekabuddho “evaṃ hotu mahāpuññā”ti vatvā anumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:4725_0: Sumanaseṭṭhinopi chatte adhivatthā devatā “aho dānaṃ paramadānaṃ, upariṭṭhe supatiṭṭhita”nti
atk-s0502a:4725_1: vatvā tikkhattuṃ sādhukāramadāsi. Atha naṃ seṭṭhi “kiṃ maṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ dānaṃ dadamānaṃ
atk-s0502a:4725_2: na passasī”ti āha. Nāhaṃ tava dānaṃ ārabbha sādhukāraṃ demi, annabhārena pana upariṭṭhassa
atk-s0502a:4725_3: dinnapiṇḍapāte pasīditvā mayā esa sādhukāro pavattitoti. So “acchariyaṃ vata, bho,
atk-s0502a:4725_4: ahaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ dānaṃ dadanto devataṃ sādhukāraṃ dāpetuṃ nāsakkhiṃ, annabhāro
atk-s0502a:4725_5: maṃ nissāya jīvanto ekapiṇḍapāteneva sādhukāraṃ dāpesi, tassa dāne anucchavikaṃ katvā
atk-s0502a:4725_6: taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ mama santakaṃ karissāmī”ti cintetvā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “ajja tayā kassaci
atk-s0502a:4725_7: kiñci dinna”nti pucchi. “Āma, sāmi, upariṭṭhapaccekabuddhassa me ajja bhāgabhattaṃ
atk-s0502a:4725_8: dinna”nti. “Handa, bho, kahāpaṇaṃ gahetvā etaṃ mayhaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ dehī”ti? “Na demi,
atk-s0502a:4725_9: sāmī”ti. So yāva sahassaṃ vaḍḍhesi, itaro sahassenāpi nādāsi. Atha naṃ “hotu, bho,
atk-s0502a:4725_10: yadi piṇḍapātaṃ na desi, sahassaṃ gahetvā pattiṃ me dehī”ti āha. So “ayyena saddhiṃ
atk-s0502a:4725_11: mantetvā jānissāmī”ti vegena paccekabuddhaṃ sampāpuṇitvā, “bhante sumanaseṭṭhi, sahassaṃ
atk-s0502a:4725_12: datvā tumhākaṃ piṇḍapāte pattiṃ yācati, kiṃ karomī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a:4726_0: Athassa so upamaṃ āhari “seyyathāpi, paṇḍita, kulasatike gāme ekasmiṃ ghare dīpaṃ
atk-s0502a:4726_1: jāleyya, sesā attano telena vaṭṭiṃ temetvā jālāpetvā gaṇheyyuṃ, purimapadīpassa pabhā
atk-s0502a:4726_2: atthīti vattabbā natthī”ti. Atirekatarā, bhante, pabhā hotīti. Evamevaṃ paṇḍita uḷuṅkayāgu
atk-s0502a:4726_3: vā hotu, kaṭacchubhikkhā vā, attano piṇḍapāte paresaṃ pattiṃ dentassa yattakānaṃ
atk-s0502a:4726_4: deti, tattakaṃ vaḍḍhati. Tvañhi ekameva piṇḍapātaṃ adāsi, seṭṭhissa pana pattiyā
atk-s0502a:4726_5: dinnāya dve piṇḍapātā honti eko tava, eko tassāti.
atk-s0502a:4727_0: So “sādhu, bhante”ti taṃ abhivādetvā seṭṭhissa santikaṃ gantvā “gaṇha, sāmi, patti”nti
atk-s0502a:4727_1: āha. Tena hi ime kahāpaṇe gaṇhāti. Nāhaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ vikkiṇāmi, saddhāya te pattiṃ
atk-s0502a:4727_2: dammīti. “Tvaṃ saddhāya desi, ahampi tava guṇe pūjemi, gaṇha, tāta, ito paṭṭhāya
atk-s0502a:4727_3: ca pana mā sahatthā kammamakāsi, vīthiyaṃ gharaṃ māpetvā vasa. Yena ca te attho hoti,
atk-s0502a:4727_4: sabbaṃ mama santikā gaṇhāhī”ti āha. Nirodhā vuṭṭhitassa pana dinnapiṇḍapāto tadaheva
atk-s0502a:4727_5: vipākaṃ deti. Tasmā rājāpi taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā annabhāraṃ pakkosāpetvā pattiṃ gahetvā
atk-s0502a:4727_6: mahantaṃ bhogaṃ datvā tassa seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ dāpesi.
atk-s0502a:4728_0: So sumanaseṭṭhissa sahāyako hutvā yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā tato cuto devaloke nibbattitvā
atk-s0502a:4728_1: devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthunagare amitodanassa sakkassa
atk-s0502a:4728_2: gehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi, anuruddhotissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. So mahānāmasakkassa kaniṭṭhabhātā,
atk-s0502a:4728_3: satthu cūḷapitu putto paramasukhumālo mahāpuñño ahosi. Ekadivasaṃ kira chasu khattiyesu
atk-s0502a:4728_4: pūve lakkhaṃ katvā guḷehi kīḷantesu anuruddho parājito pūvānaṃ atthāya mātu santikaṃ
atk-s0502a:4728_5: pahiṇi. Sā mahantaṃ suvaṇṇathālaṃ pūretvā pūve pesesi. Pūve khāditvā puna kīḷanto
atk-s0502a:4728_6: parājito tatheva pahiṇi. Evaṃ tikkhattuṃ pūvesu āhaṭesu catutthe vāre mātā “idāni
atk-s0502a:4728_7: pūvā natthī”ti pahiṇi. Tassā vacanaṃ sutvā “natthī”ti padassa asutapubbatāya “natthipūvā
atk-s0502a:4728_8: nāma idāni bhavissantī”ti saññaṃ katvā “gaccha natthipūve āharā”ti pesesi. Athassa
atk-s0502a:4728_9: mātā “natthipūve kira, ayye, dethā”ti vutte “mama puttena natthīti padaṃ na sutapubbaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4728_10: kathaṃ nu kho natthibhāvaṃ jānāpeyya”nti suvaṇṇapātiṃ dhovitvā aparāya suvaṇṇapātiyā
atk-s0502a:4728_11: paṭikujjitvā “handa, tāta, imaṃ mama puttassa dehī”ti pahiṇi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe nagarapariggāhikā
atk-s0502a:4728_12: devatā “amhākaṃ sāminā annabhārakāle upariṭṭhassa paccekabuddhassa bhāgabhattaṃ datvā
atk-s0502a:4728_13: ‘natthīti padameva na suṇeyya’nti patthanā nāma ṭhapitā. Sace mayaṃ tamatthaṃ ñatvā
atk-s0502a:4728_14: ajjhupekkheyyāma, muddhāpi no sattadhā phaleyyā”ti cintetvā dibbapūvehi pātiṃ pūrayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4728_15: So puriso pātiṃ āharitvā tassa santike ṭhapetvā vivari. Tesaṃ gandho sakalanagaraṃ
atk-s0502a:4728_16: phari. Pūvo pana mukhe ṭhapitamattova sattarasaharaṇisahassāni pharitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:4729_0: Anuruddhopi cintesi – “na maṃ maññe ito pubbe mātā piyāyati. Na hi me aññadā tāya
atk-s0502a:4729_1: natthipūvā nāma pakkapubbā”ti. So gantvā mātaraṃ evamāha – “amma, nāhaṃ tava piyo”ti.
atk-s0502a:4729_2: Tāta, kiṃ vadesi, mama akkhīhipi hadayamaṃsatopi tvaṃ piyataroti. Sacāhaṃ, amma,
atk-s0502a:4729_3: tava piyo, kasmā mama pubbe evarūpe natthipūve nāma na adāsīti. Sā taṃ purisaṃ pucchi
atk-s0502a:4729_4: – “tāta, kiñci pātiyaṃ ahosī”ti. Āma, ayye, pūvānaṃ pāti paripuṇṇā ahosi, na me evarūpā
atk-s0502a:4729_5: diṭṭhapubbāti. Sā cintesi – “putto me katapuñño, devatāhissa dibbapūvā pahitā bhavissantī”ti.
atk-s0502a:4729_6: Sopi mātaraṃ āha – “amma, na mayā evarūpā pūvā khāditapubbā, ito paṭṭhāya me natthipūvameva
atk-s0502a:4729_7: paceyyāsī”ti. Sā tato paṭṭhāya tena “pūve khāditukāmomhī”ti vuttakāle suvaṇṇapātiṃ
atk-s0502a:4729_8: dhovitvā aññāya pātiyā paṭikujjitvā pahiṇati, devatā pātiṃ pūrenti. Evaṃ so agāramajjhe
atk-s0502a:4729_9: vasanto natthīti padassa atthaṃ ajānitvā dibbapūveyeva paribhuñji.
atk-s0502a:4730_0: Satthu pana parivāratthaṃ kulapaṭipāṭiyā sākiyakumāresu pabbajantesu mahānāmena sakkena,
atk-s0502a:4730_1: “tāta, amhākaṃ kulā koci pabbajito natthi, tayā vā pabbajitabbaṃ, mayā vā”ti vutte
atk-s0502a:4730_2: so āha – “ahaṃ atisukhumālo pabbajituṃ na sakkhissāmī”ti. Tena hi kammantaṃ uggaṇha,
atk-s0502a:4730_3: ahaṃ pabbajissāmīti. Ko esa kammanto nāmāti? So hi bhattassa uṭṭhānaṭṭhānampi na
atk-s0502a:4730_4: jānāti, kammantaṃ kimeva jānissati, tasmā evamāha. Ekadivasañhi anuruddho bhaddiyo
atk-s0502a:4730_5: kimiloti tayo janā “bhattaṃ nāma kahaṃ uṭṭhātī”ti mantayiṃsu. Tesu kimilo “koṭṭhesu
atk-s0502a:4730_6: uṭṭhātī”ti āha. So kirekadivasaṃ vīhī koṭṭhamhi pakkhipante addasa, tasmā “koṭṭhe
atk-s0502a:4730_7: bhattaṃ uppajjatī”ti saññāya evamāha. Atha naṃ bhaddiyo “tvaṃ na jānāsī”ti vatvā
atk-s0502a:4730_8: “bhattaṃ nāma ukkhaliyaṃ uṭṭhātī”ti āha. So kirekadivasaṃ ukkhalito bhattaṃ vaḍḍhente
atk-s0502a:4730_9: disvā “etthevetaṃ uppajjatī”ti saññamakāsi, tasmā evamāha. Anuruddho te ubhopi “tumhe
atk-s0502a:4730_10: na jānāthā”ti vatvā “bhattaṃ nāma ratanubbedhamakuḷāya mahāsuvaṇṇapātiyaṃ uṭṭhātī”ti
atk-s0502a:4730_11: āha. Tena kira neva vīhiṃ koṭṭentā, na bhattaṃ pacantā diṭṭhapubbā, suvaṇṇapātiyaṃ
atk-s0502a:4730_12: vaḍḍhetvā purato ṭhapitabhattameva passati, tasmā “pātiyaṃyevetaṃ uppajjatī”ti saññamakāsi,
atk-s0502a:4730_13: tasmā evamāha. Evaṃ bhattuṭṭhānaṭṭhānampi ajānanto mahāpuñño kulaputto kammante kiṃ jānissati.
atk-s0502a:4731_0: So “ehi kho te, anuruddha, gharāvāsatthaṃ anusāsissāmi, paṭhamaṃ khettaṃ kasāpetabba”ntiādinā
atk-s0502a:4731_1: nayena bhātarā vuttānaṃ kammantānaṃ apariyantabhāvaṃ sutvā “na me gharāvāsena attho”ti
atk-s0502a:4731_2: mātaraṃ āpucchitvā bhaddiyapamukhehi pañcahi sākiyakumārehi saddhiṃ nikkhamitvā anupiyambavane
atk-s0502a:4731_3: satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā pabbaji. Pabbajitvā ca pana sammāpaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno anupubbena
atk-s0502a:4731_4: tisso vijjā sacchikatvā dibbena cakkhunā ekāsane nisinnova hatthatale ṭhapitaāmalakāni
atk-s0502a:4734_0: Udānaṃ udānetvā “kiṃ nu kho me katvā ayaṃ sampatti laddhā”ti olokento “padumuttarapādamūle
atk-s0502a:4734_1: patthanaṃ ṭhapesi”nti ñatvā puna “saṃsāre saṃsaranto asukasmiṃ nāma kāle bārāṇasiyaṃ
atk-s0502a:4734_2: sumanaseṭṭhiṃ nissāya jīvanto annabhāro nāma ahosi”ntipi ñatvā –
atk-s0502a:4737_0: Āha. Athassa etadahosi – “yo so tadā mayā upariṭṭhassa dinnapiṇḍapātato kahāpaṇe
atk-s0502a:4737_1: datvā pattiṃ aggahesi, mama sahāyako sumanaseṭṭhi kahaṃ nu kho so etarahi nibbatto”ti.
atk-s0502a:4737_2: Atha naṃ “viñjhāṭaviyaṃ pabbatapāde muṇḍanigamo nāma atthi, tattha mahāmuṇḍassa nāma
atk-s0502a:4737_3: upāsakassa mahāsumano cūḷasumanoti dve puttā, tesu so cūḷasumano hutvā nibbatto”ti
atk-s0502a:4737_4: addasa. Disvā ca pana cintesi – “atthi nu kho tattha mayi gate upakāro, natthī”ti.
atk-s0502a:4737_5: So upadhārento idaṃ addasa “so tattha mayi gate sattavassikova nikkhamitvā pabbajissati,
atk-s0502a:4737_6: khuraggeyeva ca arahattaṃ pāpuṇissatī”ti. Disvā ca pana upakaṭṭhe antovasse ākāsena
atk-s0502a:4737_7: gantvā gāmadvāre otari. Mahāmuṇḍo pana upāsako therassa pubbepi vissāsiko eva. So
atk-s0502a:4737_8: theraṃ piṇḍapātakāle cīvaraṃ pārupantaṃ disvā puttaṃ mahāsumanaṃ āha – “tāta, ayyo,
atk-s0502a:4737_9: me anuruddhatthero āgato, yāvassa añño koci pattaṃ na gaṇhāti, tāvassa gantvā pattaṃ
atk-s0502a:4737_10: gaṇha, ahaṃ āsanaṃ paññāpessāmī”ti. So tathā akāsi. Upāsako theraṃ antonivesane sakkaccaṃ
atk-s0502a:4737_11: parivisitvā temāsaṃ vasanatthāya paṭiññaṃ gaṇhi, theropi adhivāsesi.
atk-s0502a:4738_0: Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ paṭijagganto viya temāsaṃ paṭijaggitvā mahāpavāraṇāya ticīvarañceva
atk-s0502a:4738_1: guḷatelataṇḍulādīni ca āharitvā therassa pādamūle ṭhapetvā “gaṇhatha, bhante”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:4738_2: “Alaṃ, upāsaka, na me iminā attho”ti. “Tena hi, bhante, vassāvāsikalābho nāmesa,
atk-s0502a:4738_3: gaṇhatha na”nti? “Na gaṇhāmi, upāsakā”ti. “Kimatthaṃ na gaṇhatha, bhante”ti? “Mayhaṃ
atk-s0502a:4738_4: santike kappiyakārako sāmaṇeropi natthī”ti. “Tena hi, bhante, mama putto mahāsumano
atk-s0502a:4738_5: sāmaṇero bhavissatī”ti. “Na me, upāsaka, mahāsumanenattho”ti. “Tena hi, bhante, cūḷasumanaṃ
atk-s0502a:4738_6: pabbājethā”ti. Thero “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā cūḷasumanaṃ pabbājesi. So khuraggeyeva
atk-s0502a:4738_7: arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Thero tena saddhiṃ aḍḍhamāsamattaṃ tattheva vasitvā “satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:4738_8: passissāmī”ti tassa ñātake āpucchitvā ākāseneva gantvā himavantapadese araññakuṭikāya otari.
atk-s0502a:4739_0: Thero pana pakatiyāpi āraddhavīriyo, tassa tattha pubbarattāpararattaṃ caṅkamantassa
atk-s0502a:4739_1: udaravāto samuṭṭhahi. Atha naṃ kilantarūpaṃ disvā sāmaṇero pucchi – “bhante, kiṃ
atk-s0502a:4739_2: vo rujjatī”ti? “Udaravāto me samuṭṭhito”ti. “Aññadāpi samuṭṭhitapubbo, bhante”ti?
atk-s0502a:4739_3: “Āmāvuso”ti. “Kena phāsukaṃ hoti, bhante”ti? “Anotattato pānīye laddhe phāsukaṃ hoti,
atk-s0502a:4739_4: āvuso”ti. “Tena hi, bhante, āharāmī”ti. “Sakkhissasi sāmaṇerā”ti? “Āma, bhante”ti.
atk-s0502a:4739_5: Tena hi anotatte pannago nāma nāgarājā maṃ jānāti, tassa ācikkhitvā bhesajjatthāya
atk-s0502a:4739_6: ekaṃ pānīyavārakaṃ āharāti. So sādhūti upajjhāyaṃ vanditvā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā pañcayojanasataṃ
atk-s0502a:4739_7: ṭhānaṃ agamāsi. Taṃ divasaṃ pana nāgarājā nāganāṭakaparivuto udakakīḷaṃ kīḷitukāmo
atk-s0502a:4739_8: hoti. So sāmaṇeraṃ āgacchantaṃ disvāva kujjhi, “ayaṃ muṇḍakasamaṇo attano pādapaṃsuṃ
atk-s0502a:4739_9: mama matthake okiranto vicarati, anotatte pānīyatthāya āgato bhavissati, na dānissa
atk-s0502a:4739_10: pānīyaṃ dassāmī”ti paṇṇāsayojanikaṃ anotattadahaṃ mahāpātiyā ukkhaliṃ pidahanto viya
atk-s0502a:4739_11: phaṇena pidahitvā nipajji. Sāmaṇero nāgarājassa ākāraṃ oloketvāva “kuddho aya”nti
atk-s0502a:4745_0: Taṃ sutvā sāmaṇero “ayaṃ nāgarājā attano icchāya na dassati, ahaṃ balakkāraṃ katvā
atk-s0502a:4745_1: ānubhāvaṃ jānāpetvā imaṃ abhibhavitvāva pānīyaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti cintetvā, “mahārāja,
atk-s0502a:4745_2: upajjhāyo maṃ anotattatova pānīyaṃ āharāpeti, tenāhaṃ idameva harissāmi, apehi, mā
atk-s0502a:4747: Yadi te thāmabalaṃ atthi, nāgarāja nivārayā”ti.
atk-s0502a:4750: Abhinandāmi te vācaṃ, harassu pānīyaṃ mamā”ti.
atk-s0502a:4751_0: Atha naṃ sāmaṇero “evaṃ, mahārāja, harāmī”ti vatvā “yadi sakkonto harāhī”ti vutte
atk-s0502a:4751_1: – “tena hi suṭṭhu jānassū”ti tikkhattuṃ paṭiññaṃ gahetvā “buddhasāsanassa ānubhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:4751_2: dassetvā mayā pānīyaṃ harituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā ākāsaṭṭhadevatānaṃ tāva santikaṃ
atk-s0502a:4751_3: agamāsi. Tā āgantvā vanditvā “kiṃ, bhante”ti vatvā aṭṭhaṃsu. “Etasmiṃ anotattadahapiṭṭhe
atk-s0502a:4751_4: pannaganāgarājena saddhiṃ mama saṅgāmo bhavissati, tattha gantvā jayaparājayaṃ olokethā”ti
atk-s0502a:4751_5: āha. So eteneva nīhārena cattāro lokapāle sakkasuyāmasantusitaparanimmitavasavattī
atk-s0502a:4751_6: ca upasaṅkamitvā tamatthaṃ ārocesi. Tato paraṃ paṭipāṭiyā yāva brahmalokaṃ gantvā
atk-s0502a:4751_7: tattha tattha brahmehi āgantvā vanditvā ṭhitehi “kiṃ, bhante”ti puṭṭho tamatthaṃ
atk-s0502a:4751_8: ārocesi. Evaṃ so asaññe ca arūpibrahmāno ca ṭhapetvā sabbattha muhutteneva āhiṇḍitvā
atk-s0502a:4751_9: ārocesi. Tassa vacanaṃ sutvā sabbāpi devatā anotattadahapiṭṭhe nāḷiyaṃ pakkhittāni
atk-s0502a:4751_10: piṭṭhacuṇṇāni viya ākāsaṃ nirantaraṃ pūretvā sannipatiṃsu. Sannipatite devasaṅghe
atk-s0502a:4756: Abhinandāmi te vācaṃ, harassu pānīyaṃ mamā”ti.
atk-s0502a:4757_0: So tikkhattuṃ nāgarājassa paṭiññaṃ gahetvā ākāse ṭhitakova dvādasayojanikaṃ brahmattabhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:4757_1: māpetvā ākāsato oruyha nāgarājassa phaṇe akkamitvā adhomukhaṃ nippīḷesi, tāvadeva
atk-s0502a:4757_2: balavatā purisena akkantaallacammaṃ viya nāgarājassa phaṇe akkantamatte ogalitvā
atk-s0502a:4757_3: dabbimattā phaṇapuṭakā ahesuṃ. Nāgarājassa phaṇehi muttamuttaṭṭhānato tālakkhandhapamāṇā
atk-s0502a:4757_4: udakavaṭṭiyo uggañchiṃsu. Sāmaṇero ākāseyeva pānīyavārakaṃ pūresi. Devasaṅgho sādhukāramadāsi.
atk-s0502a:4757_5: Atha nāgarājā lajjitvā sāmaṇerassa kujjhi, jayakusumavaṇṇānissa akkhīni ahesuṃ. So
atk-s0502a:4757_6: “ayaṃ maṃ devasaṅghaṃ sannipātetvā pānīyaṃ gahetvā lajjāpesi, etaṃ gahetvā mukhe
atk-s0502a:4757_7: hatthaṃ pakkhipitvā hadayamaṃsaṃ vāssa maddāmi, pāde vā naṃ gahetvā pāragaṅgāyaṃ
atk-s0502a:4757_8: khipāmī”ti vegena anubandhi. Anubandhantopi naṃ pāpuṇituṃ nāsakkhiyeva. Sāmaṇero
atk-s0502a:4757_9: gantvā upajjhāyassa hatthe pānīyaṃ ṭhapetvā “pivatha, bhante”ti āha. Nāgarājāpi pacchato
atk-s0502a:4757_10: āgantvā, “bhante anuruddha, sāmaṇero mayā adinnameva pānīyaṃ gahetvā āgato, mā pivitthā”ti
atk-s0502a:4757_11: āha. Evaṃ kira sāmaṇerāti. “Pivatha, bhante, iminā me dinnaṃ pānīyaṃ āhaṭa”nti āha.
atk-s0502a:4757_12: Thero “khīṇāsavasāmaṇerassa musākathanaṃ nāma natthī”ti ñatvā pānīyaṃ pivi. Taṅkhaṇaññevassa
atk-s0502a:4757_13: ābādho paṭipassambhi. Puna nāgo theraṃ āha – “bhante, sāmaṇerenamhi sabbaṃ devagaṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:4757_14: sannipātetvā lajjāpito, ahamassa hadayaṃ vā phālessāmi, pāde vā naṃ gahetvā pāragaṅgāya
atk-s0502a:4757_15: khipissāmī”ti. Mahārāja, sāmaṇero mahānubhāvo, tumhe sāmaṇerena saddhiṃ saṅgāmetuṃ
atk-s0502a:4757_16: na sakkhissatha, khamāpetvā naṃ gacchathāti. So sayampi sāmaṇerassa ānubhāvaṃ jānātiyeva,
atk-s0502a:4757_17: lajjāya pana anubandhitvā āgato. Atha naṃ therassa vacanena khamāpetvā tena saddhiṃ
atk-s0502a:4757_18: mittasanthavaṃ katvā “ito paṭṭhāya anotattaudakena atthe sati tumhākaṃ āgamanakiccaṃ
atk-s0502a:4757_19: natthi, mayhaṃ pahiṇeyyātha, ahameva āharitvā dassāmī”ti vatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:4758_0: Theropi sāmaṇeraṃ ādāya pāyāsi. Satthā therassa āgamanabhāvaṃ ñatvā migāramātupāsāde
atk-s0502a:4758_1: therassa āgamanaṃ olokento nisīdi. Bhikkhūpi theraṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā paccuggantvā
atk-s0502a:4758_2: pattacīvaraṃ paṭiggahesuṃ. Athekacce sāmaṇeraṃ sīsepi kaṇṇesupi bāhāyampi gahetvā
atk-s0502a:4758_3: sañcāletvā “kiṃ, sāmaṇera cūḷakaniṭṭha, na ukkaṇṭhitosī”ti āhaṃsu. Satthā tesaṃ kiriyaṃ
atk-s0502a:4758_4: disvā cintesi – “bhāriyaṃ vatimesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kammaṃ āsīvisaṃ gīvāya gaṇhantā viya
atk-s0502a:4758_5: sāmaṇeraṃ gaṇhanti, nāssa ānubhāvaṃ jānanti, ajja mayā sumanasāmaṇerassa guṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ
atk-s0502a:4758_6: kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. Theropi āgantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā nisīdi. Satthā tena saddhiṃ
atk-s0502a:4758_7: paṭisanthāraṃ katvā ānandattheraṃ āmantesi – “ānanda, anotattaudakenamhi pāde dhovitukāmo,
atk-s0502a:4758_8: sāmaṇerānaṃ ghaṭaṃ datvā pānīyaṃ āharāpehī”ti. Thero vihāre pañcamattāni sāmaṇerasatāni
atk-s0502a:4758_9: sannipātesi. Tesu sumanasāmaṇero sabbanavako ahosi. Thero sabbamahallakaṃ sāmaṇeraṃ
atk-s0502a:4758_10: āha – “sāmaṇera, satthā anokattadahaudakena pāde dhovitukāmo, ghaṭaṃ ādāya gantvā
atk-s0502a:4758_11: pānīyaṃ āharā”ti. So “na sakkomi, bhante”ti na icchi. Thero sesepi paṭipāṭiyā pucchi,
atk-s0502a:4758_12: tepi tatheva vatvā paṭikkhipiṃsu. “Kiṃ panettha khīṇāsavasāmaṇerā natthī”ti? Atthi,
atk-s0502a:4758_13: te pana “nāyaṃ amhākaṃ baddho mālāpuṭo, sumanasāmaṇerasseva baddho”ti na icchiṃsu,
atk-s0502a:4758_14: puthujjanā pana attano asamatthatāyeva na icchiṃsu. Pariyosāne pana sumanassa vāre
atk-s0502a:4758_15: sampatte, “sāmaṇera, satthā anotattadahaudakena pāde dhovitukāmo, kuṭaṃ ādāya kira
atk-s0502a:4758_16: udakaṃ āharā”ti āha. So “satthari āharāpente āharissāmī”ti satthāraṃ vanditvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:4758_17: anotattato kira maṃ udakaṃ āhārāpethā”ti āha. “Āma, sumanā”ti. So visākhāya kāritesu
atk-s0502a:4758_18: ghanasuvaṇṇakoṭṭimesu senāsanakuṭesu ekaṃ saṭṭhikuṭaudakagaṇhanakaṃ mahāghaṭaṃ hatthena
atk-s0502a:4758_19: gahetvā “iminā me ukkhipitvā aṃsakūṭe ṭhapitena attho natthī”ti olambakaṃ katvā vehāsaṃ
atk-s0502a:4759_0: Nāgarājā sāmaṇeraṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā paccuggantvā kuṭaṃ aṃsakūṭena ādāya,
atk-s0502a:4759_1: “bhante, tumhe mādise dāse vijjamāne kasmā sayaṃ āgatā, udakenatthe sati kasmā sāsanamattampi
atk-s0502a:4759_2: na pahiṇathā”ti kuṭena udakaṃ ādāya sayaṃ ukkhipitvā “purato hotha, bhante, ahameva
atk-s0502a:4759_3: āharissāmī”ti āha. “Tiṭṭhatha tumhe, mahārāja, ahameva sammāsambuddhena āṇatto”ti
atk-s0502a:4759_4: nāgarājānaṃ nivattāpetvā kuṭaṃ mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ hatthena gahetvā ākāsenāgañchi. Atha
atk-s0502a:4759_5: naṃ satthā āgacchantaṃ oloketvā bhikkhū āmantesi – “passatha, bhikkhave, sāmaṇerassa
atk-s0502a:4759_6: līlaṃ, ākāse haṃsarājā viya sobhatī”ti āha. Sopi pānīyaghaṭaṃ ṭhapetvā satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:4759_7: vanditvā aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ satthā āha – “kativassosi tvaṃ, sumanā”ti? “Sattavassomhi,
atk-s0502a:4759_8: bhanteti. “Tena hi, sumana, ajja paṭṭhāya bhikkhu hohī”ti vatvā dāyajjaupasampadaṃ
atk-s0502a:4759_9: adāsi. Dveyeva kira sāmaṇerā sattavassikā upasampadaṃ labhiṃsu – ayañca sumano sopāko cāti.
atk-s0502a:4760_0: Evaṃ tasmiṃ upasampanne dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ, “acchariyaṃ āvuso, evarūpo
atk-s0502a:4760_1: hi nāma daharasāmaṇerassa ānubhāvo hoti, na no ito pubbe evarūpo ānubhāvo diṭṭhapubbo”ti.
atk-s0502a:4760_2: Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya
atk-s0502a:4760_3: nāmā”ti vutte, “bhikkhave, mama sāsane daharopi sammā paṭipanno evarūpaṃ sampattiṃ
atk-s0502a:4760_4: labhatiyevā”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4763: Somaṃ lokaṃ pabhāseti, abbhā muttova candimā”ti.
atk-s0502a:4764: Tattha yuñjatīti ghaṭati vāyamati. Pabhāsetīti so bhikkhu attano arahattamaggañāṇena abbhādīhi mutto candimā viya lokaṃ khandhādibhedaṃ lokaṃ obhāseti, ekālokaṃ karotīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4771: Chinda sotanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto pasādabahulaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4772_0: So kira brāhmaṇo bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasannacitto attano gehe soḷasamattānaṃ
atk-s0502a:4772_1: bhikkhūnaṃ niccabhattaṃ paṭṭhapetvā bhikkhūnaṃ āgatavelāya pattaṃ gahetvā “āgacchantu
atk-s0502a:4772_2: bhonto arahanto, nisīdantu bhonto arahanto”ti yaṃkiñci vadanto arahantavādapaṭisaṃyuttameva
atk-s0502a:4772_3: vadati. Tesu puthujjanā “ayaṃ amhesu arahantasaññī”ti cintayiṃsu, khīṇāsavā “ayaṃ
atk-s0502a:4772_4: no khīṇāsavabhāvaṃ jānātī”ti. Evaṃ te sabbepi kukkuccāyantā tassa gehaṃ nāgamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4772_5: So dukkhī dummano “kinnu kho, ayyā, nāgacchantī”ti vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā
atk-s0502a:4772_6: tamatthaṃ ārocesi. Satthā bhikkhū āmantetvā “kiṃ etaṃ, bhikkhave”ti pucchitvā tehi
atk-s0502a:4772_7: tasmiṃ atthe ārocite “sādiyatha pana tumhe, bhikkhave, arahantavāda”nti āha. “Na
atk-s0502a:4772_8: sādiyāma mayaṃ, bhante”ti. “Evaṃ sante manussānaṃ etaṃ pasādabhaññaṃ, anāpatti, bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a:4772_9: pasādabhaññe, api ca kho pana brāhmaṇassa arahantesu adhimattaṃ pemaṃ, tasmā tumhehipi
atk-s0502a:4772_10: taṇhāsotaṃ chetvā arahattameva pattuṃ yutta”nti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4776_0: Tattha parakkammāti taṇhāsotaṃ nāma na appamattakena vāyāmena chindituṃ sakkā, tasmā
atk-s0502a:4776_1: ñāṇasampayuttena mahantena parakkamena parakkamitvā taṃ sotaṃ chinda. Ubhopi kāme
atk-s0502a:4776_2: panuda nīhara. Brāhmaṇāti khīṇāsavānaṃ ālapanametaṃ. Saṅkhārānanti pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:4776_3: khayaṃ jānitvā. Akataññūti evaṃ sante tvaṃ suvaṇṇādīsu kenaci akatassa nibbānassa
atk-s0502a:4780: Yadā dvayesūti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4781_0: Ekadivasañhi tiṃsamattā disāvāsikā bhikkhū āgantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4781_1: Sāriputtatthero tesaṃ arahattassa upanissayaṃ disvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā ṭhitakova
atk-s0502a:4781_2: imaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi – “bhante, dve dhammāti vuccanti, katame nu kho dve dhammā”ti?
atk-s0502a:4781_3: Atha naṃ satthā “dve dhammāti kho, sāriputta, samathavipassanā vuccantī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4784: Athassa sabbe saṃyogā, atthaṃ gacchanti jānato”ti.
atk-s0502a:4785_0: Tattha yadāti yasmiṃ kāle dvidhā ṭhitesu samathavipassanādhammesu abhiññāpāragādivasena
atk-s0502a:4785_1: ayaṃ khīṇāsavo pāragū hoti, athassa vaṭṭasmiṃ saṃyojanasamatthā sabbe kāmayogādayo
atk-s0502a:4785_2: saṃyogā evaṃ jānantassa atthaṃ parikkhayaṃ gacchantīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4786: Desanāvasāne sabbepi te bhikkhū arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a:4789: Yassa pāranti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto māraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4790_0: So kirekasmiṃ divase aññataro puriso viya hutvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchi –
atk-s0502a:4790_1: “bhante, pāraṃ pāranti vuccati, kinnu kho etaṃ pāraṃ nāmā”ti. Satthā “māro aya”nti
atk-s0502a:4790_2: viditvā, “pāpima, kiṃ tava pārena, tañhi vītarāgehi pattabba”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4792: “Yassa pāraṃ apāraṃ vā, pārāpāraṃ na vijjati;
atk-s0502a:4794_0: Tattha pāranti ajjhattikāni cha āyatanāni. Apāranti bāhirāni cha āyatanāni. Pārāpāranti
atk-s0502a:4794_1: tadubhayaṃ. Na vijjatīti yassa sabbampetaṃ “aha”nti vā “mama”nti vā gahaṇābhāvena
atk-s0502a:4794_2: natthi, taṃ kilesadarathānaṃ vigamena vītaddaraṃ sabbakilesehi visaṃyuttaṃ ahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4798: Jhāyinti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4799_0: So kira cintesi – “satthā attano sāvake, ‘brāhmaṇā’ti vadati, ahañcamhi jātigottena
atk-s0502a:4799_1: brāhmaṇo, mampi nu kho evaṃ vattuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. So satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā tamatthaṃ
atk-s0502a:4799_2: pucchi. Satthā “nāhaṃ jātigottamattena brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmi, uttamatthaṃ arahattaṃ anuppattameva
atk-s0502a:4803_0: Tattha jhāyinti duvidhena jhānena jhāyantaṃ kāmarajena virajaṃ vane ekakamāsīnaṃ
atk-s0502a:4803_1: catūhi maggehi soḷasannaṃ kiccānaṃ katattā katakiccaṃ āsavānaṃ abhāvena anāsavaṃ
atk-s0502a:4803_2: uttamatthaṃ arahattaṃ anuppattaṃ ahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4804: Desanāvasāne so brāhmaṇo sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:4807: Divā tapatīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā migāramātupāsāde viharanto ānandattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4808_0: Pasenadi kosalo kira mahāpavāraṇāya sabbābharaṇapaṭimaṇḍito gandhamālādīni ādāya
atk-s0502a:4808_1: vihāraṃ agamāsi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe kāḷudāyitthero jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā parisapariyante
atk-s0502a:4808_2: nisinno hoti, nāmameva panassetaṃ, sarīraṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ. Tasmiṃ pana khaṇe cando
atk-s0502a:4808_3: uggacchati, sūriyo atthameti. Ānandatthero atthamentassa ca sūriyassa uggacchantassa
atk-s0502a:4808_4: ca candassa obhāsaṃ olokento rañño sarīrobhāsaṃ therassa sarīrobhāsaṃ tathāgatassa
atk-s0502a:4808_5: ca sarīrobhāsaṃ olokesi. Tattha sabbobhāse atikkamitvā satthāva virocati. Thero satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:4808_6: vanditvā, “bhante, ajja mama ime obhāse olokentassa tumhākameva obhāso ruccati. Tumhākañhi
atk-s0502a:4808_7: sarīraṃ sabbobhāse atikkamitvā virocatī”ti āha. Atha naṃ satthā, “ānanda, sūriyo
atk-s0502a:4808_8: nāma divā virocati, cando rattiṃ, rājā alaṅkatakāleyeva, khīṇāsave gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ
atk-s0502a:4808_9: pahāya antosamāpattiyaṃyeva virocati, buddhā pana rattimpi divāpi pañcavidhena tejena
atk-s0502a:4811: Sannaddho khattiyo tapati, jhāyī tapati brāhmaṇo;
atk-s0502a:4813_0: Tattha divā tapatīti divā virocati, rattiṃ panassa gatamaggopi na paññāyati. Candimāti
atk-s0502a:4813_1: candopi abbhādīhi vimutto rattimeva virocati, no divā. Sannaddhoti suvaṇṇamaṇivicittehi
atk-s0502a:4813_2: sabbābharaṇehi paṭimaṇḍito caturaṅginiyā senāya parikkhittova rājā virocati, na aññātakavesena
atk-s0502a:4813_3: ṭhito. Jhāyīti khīṇāsavo pana gaṇaṃ vinodetvā jhāyantova virocati. Tejasāti sammāsambuddho
atk-s0502a:4813_4: pana sīlatejena dussīlyatejaṃ, guṇatejena nigguṇatejaṃ, paññātejena duppaññatejaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4813_5: puññatejena apuññatejaṃ, dhammatejena adhammatejaṃ pariyādiyitvā iminā pañcavidhena
atk-s0502a:4817: Bāhitapāpoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ brāhmaṇapabbajitaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4818_0: Eko kira brāhmaṇo bāhirakapabbajjāya pabbajitvā “samaṇo gotamo attano sāvake ‘pabbajitā’ti
atk-s0502a:4818_1: vadati, ahañcamhi pabbajito, mampi kho evaṃ vattuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:4818_2: upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṃ pucchi. Satthā “nāhaṃ ettakena ‘pabbajito’ti vadāmi, kilesamalānaṃ
atk-s0502a:4818_3: pana pabbājitattā pabbajito nāma hotī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4822_0: Tattha samacariyāti sabbākusalāni sametvā caraṇena. Tasmāti yasmā bāhitapāpatāya
atk-s0502a:4822_1: brāhmaṇo, akusalāni sametvā caraṇena samaṇoti vuccati, tasmā yo attano rāgādimalaṃ
atk-s0502a:4822_2: pabbājayanto vinodento carati, sopi tena pabbājanena pabbajitoti vuccatīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4823: Desanāvasāne so brāhmaṇapabbajito sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:4826: Na brāhmaṇassāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sāriputtattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4827_0: Ekasmiṃ kira ṭhāne sambahulā manussā “aho amhākaṃ, ayyo, khantibalena samannāgato,
atk-s0502a:4827_1: aññesu akkosantesu vā paharantesu vā kopamattampi natthī”ti therassa guṇe kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4827_2: Atheko micchādiṭṭhiko brāhmaṇo “ko esa na kujjhatī”ti pucchi. “Amhākaṃ thero”ti.
atk-s0502a:4827_3: “Naṃ kujjhāpento na bhavissatī”ti? “Natthetaṃ, brāhmaṇā”ti. “Tena hi ahaṃ naṃ kujjhāpessāmī”ti?
atk-s0502a:4827_4: “Sace sakkosi, kujjhāpehī”ti. So “hotu, jānissāmissa kattabba”nti theraṃ bhikkhāya
atk-s0502a:4827_5: paviṭṭhaṃ disvā pacchābhāgena gantvā piṭṭhimajjhe mahantaṃ pāṇippahāramadāsi. Thero
atk-s0502a:4827_6: “kiṃ nāmeta”nti anoloketvāva gato. Brāhmaṇassa sakalasarīre ḍāho uppajji. So “aho
atk-s0502a:4827_7: guṇasampanno, ayyo”ti therassa pādamūle nipajjitvā “khamatha me, bhante”ti vatvā
atk-s0502a:4827_8: “kiṃ eta”nti ca vutte “ahaṃ vīmaṃsanatthāya tumhe pahari”nti āha. “Hotu khamāmi te”ti.
atk-s0502a:4827_9: “Sace me, bhante, khamatha, mama geheyeva nisīditvā bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti therassa
atk-s0502a:4827_10: pattaṃ gaṇhi, theropi pattaṃ adāsi. Brāhmaṇo theraṃ gehaṃ netvā parivisi.
atk-s0502a:4828_0: Manussā kujjhitvā “iminā amhākaṃ niraparādho ayyo pahaṭo, daṇḍenapissa mokkho natthi,
atk-s0502a:4828_1: ettheva naṃ māressāmā”ti leḍḍudaṇḍādihatthā brāhmaṇassa gehadvāre aṭṭhaṃsu. Thero
atk-s0502a:4828_2: uṭṭhāya gacchanto brāhmaṇassa hatthe pattaṃ adāsi. Manussā taṃ therena saddhiṃ gacchantaṃ
atk-s0502a:4828_3: disvā, “bhante, tumhākaṃ pattaṃ gahetvā brāhmaṇaṃ nivattethā”ti āhaṃsu. Kiṃ etaṃ
atk-s0502a:4828_4: upāsakāti? Brāhmaṇena tumhe pahaṭā, mayamassa kattabbaṃ jānissāmāti. Kiṃ pana tumhe
atk-s0502a:4828_5: iminā pahaṭā, udāhu ahanti? Tumhe, bhanteti. “Maṃ esa paharitvā khamāpesi, gacchatha
atk-s0502a:4828_6: tumhe”ti manusse uyyojetvā brāhmaṇaṃ nivattāpetvā thero vihārameva gato. Bhikkhū
atk-s0502a:4828_7: ujjhāyiṃsu “kiṃ nāmetaṃ sāriputtatthero yena brāhmaṇena pahaṭo, tasseva gehe nisīditvā
atk-s0502a:4828_8: bhikkhaṃ gahetvā āgato. Therassa pahaṭakālato paṭṭhāya idāni so kassa lajjissati,
atk-s0502a:4828_9: avasese pothento vicarissatī”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi
atk-s0502a:4828_10: kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte, “bhikkhave, brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:4828_11: paharanto nāma natthi, gihibrāhmaṇena pana samaṇabrāhmaṇo pahaṭo bhavissati, kodho
atk-s0502a:4828_12: nāmesa anāgāmimaggena samugghātaṃ gacchatī”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:4831: Dhī brāhmaṇassa hantāraṃ, tato dhī yassa muñcati.
atk-s0502a:4833: “Na brāhmaṇassetadakiñci seyyo, yadā nisedho manaso piyehi;
atk-s0502a:4834: Yato yato hiṃsamano nivattati, tato tato sammatimeva dukkha”nti.
atk-s0502a:4835_0: Tattha pahareyyāti “khīṇāsavabrāhmaṇohamasmī”ti jānanto khīṇāsavassa vā aññatarassa
atk-s0502a:4835_1: vā jātibrāhmaṇassa na pahareyya. Nāssa muñcethāti sopi pahaṭo khīṇāsavabrāhmaṇo assa
atk-s0502a:4835_2: paharitvā ṭhitassa veraṃ na muñcetha, tasmiṃ kopaṃ na kareyyāti attho. Dhī brāhmaṇassāti
atk-s0502a:4835_3: khīṇāsavabrāhmaṇassa hantāraṃ garahāmi. Tato dhīti yo pana taṃ paharantaṃ paṭipaharanto
atk-s0502a:4835_4: tassa upari veraṃ muñcati, taṃ tatopi garahāmiyeva.
atk-s0502a:4836_0: Etadakiñci seyyoti yaṃ khīṇāsavassa akkosantaṃ vā apaccakkosanaṃ, paharantaṃ vā appaṭipaharaṇaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4836_1: etaṃ tassa khīṇāsavabrāhmaṇassa na kiñci seyyo, appamattakaṃ seyyo na hoti, adhimattameva
atk-s0502a:4836_2: seyyoti attho. Yadā nisedho manaso piyehīti kodhanassa hi kodhuppādova manaso piyo
atk-s0502a:4836_3: nāma. Kodho hi panesa mātāpitūsupi buddhādīsupi aparajjhati. Tasmā yo assa tehi manaso
atk-s0502a:4836_4: nisedho kodhavasena uppajjamānassa cittassa niggaho, etaṃ na kiñci seyyoti attho.
atk-s0502a:4836_5: Hiṃsamanoti kodhamano. So tassa yato yato vatthuto anāgāmimaggena samugghātaṃ gacchanto
atk-s0502a:4836_6: nivattati. Tato tatoti tato tato vatthuto sakalampi vaṭṭadukkhaṃ nivattatiyevāti attho.
atk-s0502a:4840: Yassa kāyena vācāyāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto mahāpajāpatiṃ gotamiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4841_0: Bhagavatā hi anuppanne vatthusmiṃ paññatte aṭṭha garudhamme maṇḍanakajātiyo puriso
atk-s0502a:4841_1: surabhipupphadāmaṃ viya sirasā sampaṭicchitvā saparivārā mahāpajāpati gotamī upasampadaṃ
atk-s0502a:4841_2: labhi, añño tassā upajjhāyo vā ācariyo vā natthi. Evaṃ laddhūpasampadaṃ theriṃ ārabbha
atk-s0502a:4841_3: aparena samayena kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “mahāpajāpatiyā gotamiyā ācariyupajjhāyā na
atk-s0502a:4841_4: paññāyanti, sahattheneva kāsāyāni gaṇhī”ti. Evañca pana vatvā bhikkhuniyo kukkuccāyantiyo
atk-s0502a:4841_5: tāya saddhiṃ neva uposathaṃ na pavāraṇaṃ karonti, tā gantvā tathāgatassapi tamatthaṃ
atk-s0502a:4841_6: ārocesuṃ. Satthā tāsaṃ kathaṃ sutvā “mayā mahāpajāpatiyā gotamiyā aṭṭha garudhammā
atk-s0502a:4841_7: dinnā, ahamevassācariyo, ahameva upajjhāyo. Kāyaduccaritādivirahitesu khīṇāsavesu
atk-s0502a:4841_8: kukkuccaṃ nāma na kātabba”nti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4844: Saṃvutaṃ tīhi ṭhānehi, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇa”nti.
atk-s0502a:4845_0: Tattha dukkaṭanti sāvajjaṃ dukkhudrayaṃ apāyasaṃvattanikaṃ kammaṃ. Tīhi ṭhānehīti
atk-s0502a:4845_1: etehi kāyādīhi tīhi kāraṇehi kāyaduccaritādipavesanivāraṇatthāya dvāraṃ pihitaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4849: Yamhāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sāriputtattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4850_0: So kirāyasmā assajittherassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā sotāpattiphalaṃ pattakālato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0502a:4850_1: “yassaṃ disāyaṃ thero vasatī”ti suṇāti, tato añjaliṃ paggayha tatova sīsaṃ katvā
atk-s0502a:4850_2: nipajjati. Bhikkhū “micchādiṭṭhiko sāriputto, ajjāpi disā namassamāno vicaratī”ti
atk-s0502a:4850_3: tamatthaṃ tathāgatassa ārocesuṃ. Satthā theraṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, sāriputta,
atk-s0502a:4850_4: disā namassanto vicarasī”ti pucchitvā, “bhante, mama disā namassanabhāvaṃ vā anamassanabhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:4850_5: vā tumheva jānāthā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, sāriputto disā namassati, assajittherassa
atk-s0502a:4850_6: pana santikā dhammaṃ sutvā sotāpattiphalaṃ pattatāya attano ācariyaṃ namassati. Yañhi
atk-s0502a:4850_7: ācariyaṃ nissāya bhikkhu dhammaṃ vijānāti, tena so brāhmaṇena aggi viya sakkaccaṃ
atk-s0502a:4850_8: namassitabboyevā”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4854_0: Tattha aggihuttaṃvāti yathā brāhmaṇo aggihuttaṃ sammā paricaraṇena ceva añjalikammādīhi
atk-s0502a:4854_1: ca sakkaccaṃ namassati, evaṃ yamhā ācariyā tathāgatapaveditaṃ dhammaṃ vijāneyya,
atk-s0502a:4858: Na jaṭāhīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ jaṭilabrāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4859_0: So kira “ahaṃ mātito ca pitito ca sujāto brāhmaṇakule nibbatto. Sace samaṇo gotamo
atk-s0502a:4859_1: attano sāvake brāhmaṇāti vadati, mampi nu kho tathā vattuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti satthu santikaṃ
atk-s0502a:4859_2: gantvā tamatthaṃ pucchi. Atha naṃ satthā “nāhaṃ, brāhmaṇa, jaṭāmattena, na jātigottamattena
atk-s0502a:4859_3: brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmi, paṭividdhasaccameva panāhaṃ brāhmaṇoti vadāmī”ti vatvā dhammaṃ
atk-s0502a:4861: “Na jaṭāhi na gottena, na jaccā hoti brāhmaṇo;
atk-s0502a:4862: Yamhi saccañca dhammo ca, so sucī so ca brāhmaṇo”ti.
atk-s0502a:4863: Tattha saccanti yasmiṃ puggale cattāri saccāni soḷasahākārehi paṭivijjhitvā ṭhitaṃ saccañāṇañceva navavidho ca lokuttaradhammo atthi, so suci, so brāhmaṇo cāti attho.
atk-s0502a:4867: Kiṃ teti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ viharanto ekaṃ vaggulivataṃ kuhakabrāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4868_0: So kira vesālinagaradvāre ekaṃ kakudharukkhaṃ āruyha dvīhi pādehi rukkhasākhaṃ gaṇhitvā
atk-s0502a:4868_1: adhosiro olambanto “kapilānaṃ me sataṃ detha, kahāpaṇe detha, paricārikaṃ detha,
atk-s0502a:4868_2: no ce dassatha, ito patitvā maranto nagaraṃ anagaraṃ karissāmī”ti vadati. Tathāgatassa
atk-s0502a:4868_3: bhikkhusaṅghaparivutassa nagaraṃ pavisanakāle bhikkhū taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ disvā nikkhamanakālepi
atk-s0502a:4868_4: naṃ tatheva olambantaṃ passiṃsu. Nāgarāpi “ayaṃ pātova paṭṭhāya evaṃ olambanto patitvā
atk-s0502a:4868_5: maranto nagaraṃ anagaraṃ kareyyā”ti cintetvā nagaravināsabhītā “yaṃ so yācati, sabbaṃ
atk-s0502a:4868_6: demā”ti paṭissuṇitvā adaṃsu. So otaritvā sabbaṃ gahetvā agamāsi. Bhikkhū vihārūpacāre
atk-s0502a:4868_7: taṃ gāviṃ viya viravitvā gacchantaṃ disvā sañjānitvā “laddhaṃ te, brāhmaṇa, yathāpatthita”nti
atk-s0502a:4868_8: pucchitvā “āma, laddhaṃ me”ti sutvā antovihāraṃ gantvā tathāgatassa tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:4868_9: Satthā “na, bhikkhave, idāneva so kuhakacoro, pubbepi kuhakacoroyeva ahosi. Idāni
atk-s0502a:4868_10: panesa bālajanaṃ vañceti, tadā pana paṇḍite vañcetuṃ nāsakkhī”ti vatvā tehi yācito atītamāhari.
atk-s0502a:4869_0: Atīte ekaṃ kāsikagāmaṃ nissāya eko kuhakatāpaso vāsaṃ kappesi. Taṃ ekaṃ kulaṃ paṭijaggi.
atk-s0502a:4869_1: Divā uppannakhādanīyabhojanīyato attano puttānaṃ viya tassapi ekaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ deti,
atk-s0502a:4869_2: sāyaṃ uppannakoṭṭhāsaṃ ṭhapetvā dutiyadivase deti. Athekadivasaṃ sāyaṃ godhamaṃsaṃ
atk-s0502a:4869_3: labhitvā sādhukaṃ pacitvā tato koṭṭhāsaṃ ṭhapetvā dutiyadivase tassa adaṃsu. Tāpaso
atk-s0502a:4869_4: maṃsaṃ khāditvāva rasataṇhāya baddho “kiṃ maṃsaṃ nāmeta”nti pucchitvā “godhamaṃsa”nti
atk-s0502a:4869_5: sutvā bhikkhāya caritvā sappidadhikaṭukabhaṇḍādīni gahetvā paṇṇasālaṃ gantvā ekamantaṃ
atk-s0502a:4869_6: ṭhapesi. Paṇṇasālāya pana avidūre ekasmiṃ vammike godharājā viharati. So kālena kālaṃ
atk-s0502a:4869_7: tāpasaṃ vandituṃ āgacchati. Taṃdivasaṃ panesa “taṃ vadhissāmī”ti daṇḍaṃ paṭicchādetvā
atk-s0502a:4869_8: tassa vammikassa avidūre ṭhāne niddāyanto viya nisīdi. Godharājā vammikato nikkhamitvā
atk-s0502a:4869_9: tassa santikaṃ āgacchantova ākāraṃ sallakkhetvā “na me ajja ācariyassa ākāro ruccatī”ti
atk-s0502a:4869_10: tatova nivatti. Tāpaso tassa nivattanabhāvaṃ ñatvā tassa māraṇatthāya daṇḍaṃ khipi,
atk-s0502a:4869_11: daṇḍo virajjhitvā gato. Godharājāpi dhammikaṃ pavisitvā tato sīsaṃ nīharitvā āgatamaggaṃ
atk-s0502a:4871: So maṃ daṇḍena pāhāsi, yathā asamaṇo tathā.
atk-s0502a:4872: “Kiṃ te jaṭāhi dummedha, kiṃ te ajinasāṭiyā;
atk-s0502a:4874: Atha naṃ tāpaso attano santakena palobhetuṃ evamāha –
atk-s0502a:4876: Telaṃ loṇañca me atthi, pahūtaṃ mayha pipphalī”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:4877: Taṃ sutvā godharājā “yathā yathā tvaṃ kathesi, tathā tathā me palāyitukāmatāva hotī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4879: Telaṃ loṇañca kittesi, ahitaṃ mayha pipphalī”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:4880_0: Evañca pana vatvā “ahaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ tayi samaṇasaññaṃ akāsiṃ, idāni pana te maṃ
atk-s0502a:4880_1: paharitukāmatāya daṇḍo khitto, tassa khittakāleyeva asamaṇo jāto. Kiṃ tādisassa duppaññassa
atk-s0502a:4880_2: puggalassa jaṭāhi, kiṃ sakhurena ajinacammena. Abbhantarañhi te gahanaṃ, kevalaṃ
atk-s0502a:4880_3: bāhirameva parimajjasī”ti āha. Satthā imaṃ atītaṃ āharitvā “tadā esa kuhako tāpaso
atk-s0502a:4880_4: ahosi, godharājā pana ahamevā”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānetvā tadā godhapaṇḍitena tassa
atk-s0502a:4882: “Kiṃ te jaṭāhi dummedha, kiṃ te ajinasāṭiyā;
atk-s0502a:4884_0: Tattha kiṃ te jaṭāhīti ambho duppañña tava baddhāhipi imāhi jaṭāhi sakhurāya nivatthāyapi
atk-s0502a:4884_1: imāya ajinacammasāṭikāya ca kimatthoti. Abbhantaranti abbhantarañhi te rāgādikilesagahanaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4884_2: kevalaṃ hatthilaṇḍaṃ assalaṇḍaṃ viya maṭṭhaṃ bāhiraṃ parimajjasīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4888: Paṃsukūladharanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā gijjhakūṭe pabbate viharanto kisāgotamiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4889_0: Tadā kira sakko paṭhamayāmāvasāne devaparisāya saddhiṃ satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā
atk-s0502a:4889_1: ekamante sāraṇīyadhammakathaṃ suṇanto nisīdi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe kisāgotamī “satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:4889_2: passissāmī”ti ākāsenāgantvā sakkaṃ disvā nivatti. So taṃ vanditvā nivattantiṃ disvā
atk-s0502a:4889_3: satthāraṃ pucchi – “kā nāmesā, bhante, āgacchamānāva tumhe disvā nivattatī”ti? Satthā
atk-s0502a:4889_4: “kisāgotamī nāmesā, mahārāja, mama dhītā paṃsukūlikattherīnaṃ aggā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4892: Ekaṃ vanasmiṃ jhāyantaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇa”nti.
atk-s0502a:4893_0: Tattha kisanti paṃsukūlikā hi attano anurūpaṃ paṭipadaṃ pūrentā appamaṃsalohitā ceva
atk-s0502a:4893_1: honti dhamanisanthatagattā ca, tasmā evamāha. Ekaṃ vanasminti vivittaṭṭhāne ekakaṃ
atk-s0502a:4893_2: vanasmiṃ jhāyantaṃ tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4897: Na cāhanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4898_0: So kira “samaṇo gotamo attano sāvake brāhmaṇāti vadati ahañcamhi brāhmaṇayoniyaṃ
atk-s0502a:4898_1: nibbatto, mampi nu kho evaṃ vattuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā tamatthaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0502a:4898_2: Atha naṃ satthā “nāhaṃ, brāhmaṇa, brāhmaṇayoniyaṃ nibbattamattenevaṃ vadāmi, yo pana
atk-s0502a:4898_3: akiñcano agahaṇo, tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4901: Bhovādi nāma so hoti, sace hoti sakiñcano;
atk-s0502a:4903_0: Tattha yonijanti yoniyaṃ jātaṃ. Mattisambhavanti brāhmaṇiyā mātu santake udarasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:4903_1: sambhūtaṃ. Bhovādīti so pana āmantanādīsu “bho, bho”ti vatvā vicaranto bhovādi nāma
atk-s0502a:4903_2: hoti, sace rāgādīhi kiñcanehi sakiñcano. Ahaṃ pana rāgādīhi akiñcanaṃ catūhi upādānehi
atk-s0502a:4904: Desanāvasāne so brāhmaṇo sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:4907: Sabbasaṃyojananti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto uggasenaṃ nāma seṭṭhiputtaṃ ārabbha kathesi. Vatthu “muñca pure muñca pacchato”ti gāthāvaṇṇanāya vitthāritameva.
atk-s0502a:4908_0: Tadā hi satthā, “bhante, uggaseno ‘na bhāyāmī’ti vadati, abhūtena maññe aññaṃ byākarotī”ti
atk-s0502a:4908_1: bhikkhūhi vutte, “bhikkhave, mama puttasadisā chinnasaṃyojanā na bhāyantiyevā”ti
atk-s0502a:4912_0: Tattha sabbasaṃyojananti dasavidhasaṃyojanaṃ. Na paritassatīti taṇhāya na bhāyati.
atk-s0502a:4912_1: Tamahanti taṃ ahaṃ rāgādīnaṃ saṅgānaṃ atītattā saṅgātigaṃ, catunnampi yogānaṃ abhāvena
atk-s0502a:4916: Chetvā naddhinti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto dve brāhmaṇe ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4917_0: Tesu kirekassa cūḷarohito nāma goṇo ahosi, ekassa mahārohito nāma. Te ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0502a:4917_1: “tava goṇo balavā, mama goṇo balavā”ti vivaditvā “kiṃ no vivādena, pājetvā jānissāmā”ti
atk-s0502a:4917_2: aciravatītīre sakaṭaṃ vālukāya pūretvā goṇe yojayiṃsu. Tasmiṃ khaṇe bhikkhūpi nhāyituṃ
atk-s0502a:4917_3: tattha gatā honti. Brāhmaṇā goṇe pājesuṃ. Sakaṭaṃ niccalaṃ aṭṭhāsi, naddhivarattā
atk-s0502a:4917_4: pana chijjiṃsu. Bhikkhū disvā vihāraṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ satthu ārocayiṃsu. Satthā,
atk-s0502a:4917_5: “bhikkhave, bāhirā etā naddhivarattā, yo koci etā chindateva, bhikkhunā pana ajjhattikaṃ
atk-s0502a:4917_6: kodhanaddhiñceva taṇhāvarattañca chindituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4921_0: Tattha naddhinti nayhanabhāvena pavattaṃ kodhaṃ. Varattanti bandhanabhāvena pavattaṃ
atk-s0502a:4921_1: taṇhaṃ. Sandānaṃ sahanukkamanti anusayānukkamasahitaṃ dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhisandānaṃ, idaṃ
atk-s0502a:4921_2: sabbampi chinditvā ṭhitaṃ avijjāpalighassa ukkhittattā ukkhittapalighaṃ, catunnaṃ
atk-s0502a:4921_3: saccānaṃ buddhattā buddhaṃ taṃ ahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4922: Desanāvasāne pañcasatā bhikkhū arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:4925: Akkosanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto akkosakabhāradvājaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4926_0: Tassa hi bhātu bhāradvājassa dhanañjānī nāma brāhmaṇī sotāpannā ahosi. Sā khīpitvāpi
atk-s0502a:4926_1: kāsitvāpi pakkhalitvāpi “namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassā”ti imaṃ udānaṃ
atk-s0502a:4926_2: udānesi. Sā ekadivasaṃ brāhmaṇaparivesanāya pavattamānāya pakkhalitvā tatheva mahāsaddena
atk-s0502a:4926_3: udānaṃ udānesi. Brāhmaṇo kujjhitvā “evamevāyaṃ vasalī yattha vā tattha vā pakkhalitvā
atk-s0502a:4926_4: tassa muṇḍakassa samaṇakassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatī”ti vatvā “idāni te, vasali, gantvā tassa
atk-s0502a:4926_5: satthuno vādaṃ āropessāmī”ti āha. Atha naṃ sā “gaccha, brāhmaṇa, nāhaṃ taṃ passāmi,
atk-s0502a:4926_6: yo tassa bhagavato vādaṃ āropeyya, api ca gantvā taṃ bhagavantaṃ pañhaṃ pucchassū”ti
atk-s0502a:4926_7: āha. So satthu santikaṃ gantvā avanditvāva ekamantaṃ ṭhito pañhaṃ pucchanto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4927: “Kiṃsu chetvā sukhaṃ seti, kiṃsu chetvā na socati;
atk-s0502a:4929: Athassa pañhaṃ byākaronto satthā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4930: “Kodhaṃ chetvā sukhaṃ seti, kodhaṃ chetvā na socati;
atk-s0502a:4932: Vadhaṃ ariyā pasaṃsanti, tañhi chetvā na socatī”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:4933_0: So satthari pasīditvā pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Athassa kaniṭṭho akkosakabhāradvājo
atk-s0502a:4933_1: “bhātā kira me pabbajito”ti sutvā kuddho āgantvā satthāraṃ asabbhāhi pharusāhi vācāhi
atk-s0502a:4933_2: akkosi. Sopi satthārā atithīnaṃ khādanīyādidānaopammena saññatto satthari pasanno
atk-s0502a:4933_3: pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Aparepissa sundarikabhāradvājo biliṅgakabhāradvājoti
atk-s0502a:4933_4: dve kaniṭṭhabhātaro satthāraṃ akkosantāva satthārā vinītā pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4934_0: Athekadivasaṃ dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ, “āvuso, acchariyā vata buddhaguṇā,
atk-s0502a:4934_1: catūsu nāma bhātikesu akkosantesu satthā kiñci avatvā tesaṃyeva patiṭṭhā jāto”ti.
atk-s0502a:4934_2: Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya
atk-s0502a:4934_3: nāmā”ti vutte, “bhikkhave, ahaṃ mama khantibalena samannāgatattā duṭṭhesu adussanto
atk-s0502a:4934_4: mahājanassa patiṭṭhā homiyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4938_0: Tattha aduṭṭhoti etaṃ dasahi akkosavatthūhi akkosañca pāṇiādīhi pothanañca andubandhanādīhi
atk-s0502a:4938_1: bandhanañca yo akuddhamānaso hutvā adhivāseti, khantibalena samannāgatattā khantibalaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4938_2: punappunaṃ uppattiyā anīkabhūtena teneva khantibalena samannāgatattā balānīkaṃ taṃ
atk-s0502a:4942: Akkodhananti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto sāriputtattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4943_0: Tadā kira thero pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ piṇḍāya caranto nālakagāme mātu gharadvāraṃ
atk-s0502a:4943_1: agamāsi. Atha naṃ sā nisīdāpetvā parivisamānā akkosi – “ambho, ucchiṭṭhakhādaka ucchiṭṭhakañjiyaṃ
atk-s0502a:4943_2: alabhitvā paragharesu uḷuṅkapiṭṭhena ghaṭṭitakañjiyaṃ paribhuñjituṃ asītikoṭidhanaṃ
atk-s0502a:4943_3: pahāya pabbajitosi, nāsitamhā tayā, bhuñjāhi dānī”ti. Bhikkhūnampi bhattaṃ dadamānā
atk-s0502a:4943_4: “tumhehi mama putto attano cūḷupaṭṭhāko kato, idāni bhuñjathā”ti vadeti. Thero bhikkhaṃ
atk-s0502a:4943_5: gahetvā vihārameva agamāsi. Athāyasmā rāhulo satthāraṃ piṇḍapātena āpucchi. Atha
atk-s0502a:4943_6: naṃ satthā āha – “rāhula, kahaṃ gamitthā”ti? “Ayyikāya gāmaṃ, bhante”ti. “Kiṃ pana
atk-s0502a:4943_7: te ayyikāya upajjhāyo vutto”ti? “Ayyikāya me, bhante, upajjhāyo akkuṭṭho”ti. “Kinti
atk-s0502a:4943_8: vatvā”ti? “Idaṃ nāma, bhante”ti. “Upajjhāyena pana te kiṃ vutta”nti? “Na kiñci, bhante”ti.
atk-s0502a:4943_9: Taṃ sutvā bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ, “āvuso, acchariyā vata sāriputtattherassa
atk-s0502a:4943_10: guṇā, evaṃnāmassa mātari akkosantiyā kodhamattampi nāhosī”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya
atk-s0502a:4943_11: nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a:4943_12: “bhikkhave, khīṇāsavā nāma akkodhanāva hontī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4947_0: Tattha vatavantanti dhutavatena, samannāgataṃ catupārisuddhisīlena sīlavantaṃ, taṇhāussadābhāvena
atk-s0502a:4947_1: anussadaṃ, chaḷindriyadamanena dantaṃ, koṭiyaṃ ṭhitena attabhāvena antimasarīraṃ
atk-s0502a:4951_0: Vāri pokkharapattevāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto uppalavaṇṇatheriṃ
atk-s0502a:4951_1: ārabbha kathesi. Vatthu “madhuvā maññati bālo”ti gāthāvaṇṇanāya vitthāritameva. Vuttañhi tattha –
atk-s0502a:4952_0: Aparena samayena mahājano dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi “khīṇāsavāpi maññe kāmasukhaṃ
atk-s0502a:4952_1: sādiyanti, kāmaṃ sevanti, kiṃ na sevissanti. Na hete koḷāparukkhā, na ca vammikā,
atk-s0502a:4952_2: allamaṃsasarīrāva, tasmā etepi kāmasukhaṃ sādiyantī”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha,
atk-s0502a:4952_3: bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a:4952_4: khīṇāsavā kāmasukhaṃ sādiyanti, na kāmaṃ sevanti. Yathā hi padumapatte patitaṃ udakabindu
atk-s0502a:4952_5: na limpati na saṇṭhāti, vinivattitvā pana patateva. Yathā ca āragge sāsapo na upalimpati
atk-s0502a:4952_6: na saṇṭhāti, vinivattitvā patateva, evaṃ khīṇāsavassa citte duvidhopi kāmo na limpati
atk-s0502a:4952_7: na saṇṭhātī”ti anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4955: Yo na limpati kāmesu, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇa”nti.
atk-s0502a:4956: Tattha yo na limpatīti evamevaṃ yo abbhantare duvidhepi kāme na upalimpati, tasmiṃ kāme na saṇṭhāti, tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4960: Yo dukkhassāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4961_0: Tassa kireko dāso apaññatte sikkhāpade palāyitvā pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Brāhmaṇo
atk-s0502a:4961_1: taṃ olokento adisvā ekadivasaṃ satthārā saddhiṃ piṇḍāya pavisantaṃ dvārantare disvā
atk-s0502a:4961_2: cīvaraṃ daḷhaṃ aggahesi. Satthā nivattitvā “kiṃ idaṃ, brāhmaṇā”ti pucchi. Dāso me,
atk-s0502a:4961_3: bho gotamāti. Pannabhāro esa, brāhmaṇāti. “Pannabhāro”ti ca vutte brāhmaṇo “arahā”ti
atk-s0502a:4961_4: sallakkhesi. Tasmā punapi tena “evaṃ, bho gotamā”ti vutte satthā “āma, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0502a:4965_0: Tattha dukkhassāti khandhadukkhassa. Pannabhāranti ohitakhandhabhāraṃ catūhi yogehi
atk-s0502a:4965_1: sabbakilesehi vā visaṃyuttaṃ tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho. Desanāvasāne so brāhmaṇo
atk-s0502a:4965_2: sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:4968: Gambhīrapaññanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā gijjhakūṭe viharanto khemaṃ nāma bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4969_0: Ekadivasañhi paṭhamayāmasamanantare sakko devarājā parisāya saddhiṃ āgantvā satthu
atk-s0502a:4969_1: santike sāraṇīyadhammakathaṃ suṇanto nisīdi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe khemā bhikkhunī “satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:4969_2: passissāmī”ti āgantvā sakkaṃ disvā ākāse ṭhitāva satthāraṃ vanditvā nivatti. Sakko
atk-s0502a:4969_3: taṃ disvā “ko esā, bhante, āgacchamānā ākāse ṭhitāva satthāraṃ vanditvā nivattī”ti
atk-s0502a:4969_4: pucchi. Satthā “esā, mahārāja, mama dhītā khemā nāma mahāpaññā maggāmaggakovidā”ti
atk-s0502a:4973_0: Tattha gabbhīrapaññanti gambhīresu khandhādīsu pavattāya paññāya samannāgataṃ dhammojapaññāya
atk-s0502a:4973_1: samannāgataṃ medhāviṃ “ayaṃ duggatiyā maggo, ayaṃ sugatiyā maggo, ayaṃ nibbānassa
atk-s0502a:4973_2: maggo, ayaṃ amaggo”ti evaṃ magge ca amagge ca chekatāya maggāmaggassa kovidaṃ arahattasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0502a:4973_3: uttamatthaṃ anuppattaṃ tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4977: Asaṃsaṭṭhanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto pabbhāravāsītissattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4978_0: So kira satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññaṃ pavisitvā sappāyaṃ senāsanaṃ
atk-s0502a:4978_1: olokento ekaṃ leṇapabbhāraṃ pāpuṇi, sampattakkhaṇeyevassa cittaṃ ekaggataṃ labhi.
atk-s0502a:4978_2: So “ahaṃ idha vasanto pabbajitakiccaṃ nipphādetuṃ sakkhissāmī”ti cintesi. Leṇepi
atk-s0502a:4978_3: adhivatthā devatā “sīlavā bhikkhu āgato, iminā saddhiṃ ekaṭṭhāne vasituṃ dukkhaṃ.
atk-s0502a:4978_4: Ayaṃ pana idha ekarattimeva vasitvā pakkamissatī”ti cintetvā putte ādāya nikkhami.
atk-s0502a:4978_5: Thero punadivase pātova gocaragāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi. Atha naṃ ekā upāsikā disvāva
atk-s0502a:4978_6: puttasinehaṃ paṭilabhitvā gehe nisīdāpetvā bhojetvā attānaṃ nissāya temāsaṃ vasanatthāya
atk-s0502a:4978_7: yāci. Sopi “sakkā mayā imaṃ nissāya bhavanissaraṇaṃ kātu”nti adhivāsetvā tameva leṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:4978_8: agamāsi. Devatā taṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā “addhā kenaci nimantito bhavissati, sve vā
atk-s0502a:4979_0: Evaṃ aḍḍhamāsamatte atikkante “ayaṃ idheva maññe antovassaṃ vasissati, sīlavatā pana
atk-s0502a:4979_1: saddhiṃ ekaṭṭhāne puttakehi saddhiṃ vasituṃ dukkaraṃ, imañca ‘nikkhamā’ti vattuṃ
atk-s0502a:4979_2: na sakkā, atthi nu kho imassa sīle khalita”nti dibbena cakkhunā olokentī upasampadamāḷakato
atk-s0502a:4979_3: paṭṭhāya tassa sīle khalitaṃ adisvā “parisuddhamassa sīlaṃ, kiñcidevassa katvā ayasaṃ
atk-s0502a:4979_4: uppādessāmī”ti tassa upaṭṭhākakule upāsikāya jeṭṭhaputtassa sarīre adhimuccitvā gīvaṃ
atk-s0502a:4979_5: parivattesi. Tassa akkhīni nikkhamiṃsu, mukhato kheḷo pagghari. Upāsikā taṃ disvā
atk-s0502a:4979_6: “kiṃ ida”nti viravi. Atha naṃ devatā adissamānarūpā evamāha – “mayā esa gahito, balikammenapi
atk-s0502a:4979_7: me attho natthi, tumhākaṃ pana kulūpakaṃ theraṃ laṭṭhimadhukaṃ yācitvā tena telaṃ
atk-s0502a:4979_8: pacitvā imassa natthukammaṃ detha, evāhaṃ imaṃ muñcissāmī”ti. Nassatu vā esa maratu
atk-s0502a:4979_9: vā, na sakkhissāmahaṃ ayyaṃ laṭṭhimadhukaṃ yācitunti. Sace laṭṭhimadhukaṃ yācituṃ
atk-s0502a:4979_10: na sakkotha, nāsikāyassa hiṅgucuṇṇaṃ pakkhipituṃ vadethāti. Idampi vattuṃ na sakkomāti.
atk-s0502a:4979_11: Tena hissa pādadhovanaudakaṃ ādāya sīse āsiñcathāti. Upāsikā “sakkā idaṃ kātu”nti
atk-s0502a:4979_12: velāya āgataṃ theraṃ nisīdāpetvā yāgukhajjakaṃ datvā antarabhatte nisinnassa pāde
atk-s0502a:4979_13: dhovitvā udakaṃ gahetvā, “bhante, idaṃ udakaṃ dārakassa sīse āsiñcāmā”ti āpucchitvā
atk-s0502a:4979_14: “tena hi āsiñcathā”ti vutte tathā akāsi. Sā devatā tāvadeva taṃ muñcitvā gantvā leṇadvāre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:4980_0: Theropi bhattakiccāvasāne uṭṭhāyāsanā avissaṭṭhakammaṭṭhānatāya dvattiṃsākāraṃ sajjhāyantova
atk-s0502a:4980_1: pakkāmi. Atha naṃ leṇadvāraṃ pattakāle sā devatā “mahāvejja mā idha pavisā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:4980_2: So tattheva ṭhatvā “kāsi tva”nti āha. Ahaṃ idha adhivatthā devatāti. Thero “atthi
atk-s0502a:4980_3: nu kho mayā vejjakammassa kataṭṭhāna”nti upasampadamāḷakato paṭṭhāya olokento attano
atk-s0502a:4980_4: sīle tilakaṃ vā kāḷakaṃ vā adisvā “ahaṃ mayā vejjakammassa kataṭṭhānaṃ na passāmi,
atk-s0502a:4980_5: kasmā evaṃ vadesī”ti āha. Na passasīti. Āma, na passāmīti? Ācikkhāmi teti. Āma, ācikkhāhīti.
atk-s0502a:4980_6: Tiṭṭhatu tāva dūre kataṃ, ajjeva tayā amanussagahitassa upaṭṭhākaputtassa pādadhovanaudakaṃ
atk-s0502a:4980_7: sīse āsittaṃ, nāsittanti? Āma, āsittanti. Kiṃ etaṃ na passasīti? Etaṃ sandhāya tvaṃ
atk-s0502a:4980_8: vadesīti? Āma, etaṃ sandhāya vadāmīti. Thero cintesi – “aho vata me sammā paṇihito
atk-s0502a:4980_9: attā, sāsanassa anurūpaṃ vata me caritaṃ, devatāpi mama catupārisuddhisīle tilakaṃ
atk-s0502a:4980_10: vā kāḷakaṃ vā adisvā dārakassa sīse āsittapādadhovanamattaṃ addasā”ti tassa sīlaṃ
atk-s0502a:4980_11: ārabbha balavapīti uppajji. So taṃ vikkhambhetvā pāduddhārampi akatvā tattheva arahattaṃ
atk-s0502a:4980_12: patvā “mādisaṃ parisuddhaṃ samaṇaṃ dūsetvā mā idha vanasaṇḍe vasi, tvameva nikkhamāhī”ti
atk-s0502a:4981: “Visuddho vata me vāso, nimmalaṃ maṃ tapassinaṃ;
atk-s0502a:4982: Mā tvaṃ visuddhaṃ dūsesi, nikkhama pavanā tuva”nti.
atk-s0502a:4983_0: So tattheva temāsaṃ vasitvā vutthavasso satthu santikaṃ gantvā bhikkhūhi “kiṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0502a:4983_1: pabbajitakiccaṃ te matthakaṃ pāpita”nti puṭṭho tasmiṃ leṇe vassūpagamanato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0502a:4983_2: sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ārocetvā, “āvuso, tvaṃ devatāya evaṃ vuccamāno na
atk-s0502a:4983_3: kujjhī”ti vutte “na kujjhi”nti āha. Bhikkhū tathāgatassa ārocesuṃ, “bhante, ayaṃ
atk-s0502a:4983_4: bhikkhu aññaṃ byākaroti, devatāya idaṃ nāma vuccamānopi na kujjhinti vadatī”ti. Satthā
atk-s0502a:4983_5: tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā “neva, bhikkhave, mama putto kujjhati, etassa gihīhi vā pabbajitehi
atk-s0502a:4983_6: vā saṃsaggo nāma natthi, asaṃsaṭṭho esa appiccho santuṭṭho”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4987_1: Ubhayanti gihīhi ca anāgārehi cāti ubhayehipi asaṃsaṭṭhaṃ. Anokasārinti anālayacāriṃ
atk-s0502a:4987_2: taṃ evarūpaṃ ahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4991: Nidhāya daṇḍanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4992_0: So kira satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññe vāyamanto arahattaṃ patvā “paṭiladdhaguṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:4992_1: satthu ārocessāmī”ti tato nikkhami. Atha naṃ ekasmiṃ gāme ekā itthī sāmikena saddhiṃ
atk-s0502a:4992_2: kalahaṃ katvā tasmiṃ bahi nikkhante “kulagharaṃ gamissāmī”ti maggaṃ paṭipannā antarāmagge
atk-s0502a:4992_3: disvā “imaṃ theraṃ nissāya gamissāmī”ti piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhi. Thero pana taṃ
atk-s0502a:4992_4: na passati. Athassā sāmiko gehaṃ āgato taṃ adisvā “kulagāmaṃ gatā bhavissatī”ti anubandhanto
atk-s0502a:4992_5: taṃ disvā “na sakkā imāya ekikāya imaṃ aṭaviṃ paṭipajjituṃ, kaṃ nu kho nissāya gacchatī”ti
atk-s0502a:4992_6: olokento theraṃ disvā “ayaṃ imaṃ gaṇhitvā nikkhanto bhavissatī”ti cintetvā theraṃ
atk-s0502a:4992_7: santajjesi. Atha naṃ sā itthī “neva maṃ esa bhadanto passati, na ālapati, mā naṃ
atk-s0502a:4992_8: kiñci avacā”ti āha. So “kiṃ pana tvaṃ attānaṃ gahetvā gacchantaṃ mama ācikkhissasi,
atk-s0502a:4992_9: tuyhameva anucchavikaṃ imassa karissāmī”ti uppannakodho itthiyā āghātena theraṃ pothetvā
atk-s0502a:4992_10: taṃ ādāya nivatti. Therassa sakalasarīraṃ sañjātagaṇḍaṃ ahosi. Athassa vihāraṃ gatakāle
atk-s0502a:4992_11: bhikkhū sarīraṃ sambāhantā gaṇḍe disvā “kiṃ ida”nti pucchiṃsu. So tesaṃ tamatthaṃ
atk-s0502a:4992_12: ārocesi. Atha naṃ bhikkhū, “āvuso, tasmiṃ purise evaṃ paharante tvaṃ kiṃ avaca, kiṃ
atk-s0502a:4992_13: vā te kodho uppanno”ti. “Na me, āvuso, kodho uppajjī”ti vutte satthu santikaṃ gantvā
atk-s0502a:4992_14: tamatthaṃ ārocetvā, “bhante, esa bhikkhu ‘kodho te uppajjatī’ti vuccamāno ‘na me,
atk-s0502a:4992_15: āvuso, kodho uppajjatī’ti abhūtaṃ vatvā aññaṃ byākarotī”ti ārocesuṃ. Satthā tesaṃ
atk-s0502a:4992_16: kathaṃ sutvā, “bhikkhave, khīṇāsavā nāma nihitadaṇḍā, te paharantesupi kodhaṃ na
atk-s0502a:4995: Yo na hanti na ghāteti, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇa”nti.
atk-s0502a:4996_0: Tattha nidhāyāti nikkhipitvā oropetvā. Tasesu thāvaresu cāti taṇhātāsena tasesu,
atk-s0502a:4996_1: taṇhāabhāvena thiratāya thāvaresu ca. Yo na hantīti yo evaṃ sabbasattesu vigatapaṭighatāya
atk-s0502a:4996_2: nikkhittadaṇḍo neva kañci sayaṃ hanati, na aññe ghāteti, tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a:5000: Aviruddhanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto cattāro sāmaṇere ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:5001_0: Ekā kira brāhmaṇī catunnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ uddesabhattaṃ sajjetvā brāhmaṇaṃ āha – “vihāraṃ
atk-s0502a:5001_1: gantvā cattāro mahallakabrāhmaṇe uddisāpetvā ānehī”ti. So vihāraṃ gantvā “cattāro
atk-s0502a:5001_2: me brāhmaṇe uddisitvā dethā”ti āha. Tassa saṃkicco paṇḍito sopāko revatoti sattavassikā
atk-s0502a:5001_3: cattāro khīṇāsavasāmaṇerā pāpuṇiṃsu. Brāhmaṇī mahārahāni āsanāni paññāpetvā ṭhitā
atk-s0502a:5001_4: sāmaṇere disvāva kupitā uddhane pakkhittaloṇaṃ viya taṭataṭāyamānā “tvaṃ vihāraṃ
atk-s0502a:5001_5: gantvā attano nattumattepi appahonte cattāro kumārake gahetvā āgatosī”ti vatvā tesaṃ
atk-s0502a:5001_6: tesu āsanesu nisīdituṃ adatvā nīcapīṭhakāni attharitvā “etesu nisīdathā”ti vatvā
atk-s0502a:5001_7: “gaccha, brāhmaṇa, mahallake oloketvā ānehī”ti āha. Brāhmaṇo vihāraṃ gantvā sāriputtattheraṃ
atk-s0502a:5001_8: disvā “etha, amhākaṃ gehaṃ gamissāmā”ti ānesi. Thero āgantvā sāmaṇere disvā “imehi
atk-s0502a:5001_9: brāhmaṇehi bhattaṃ laddha”nti pucchitvā “na laddha”nti vutte catunnameva bhattassa
atk-s0502a:5001_10: paṭiyattabhāvaṃ ñatvā “āhara me patta”nti pattaṃ gahetvā pakkāmi. Brāhmaṇīpi “kiṃ
atk-s0502a:5001_11: iminā vutta”nti pucchitvā “etesaṃ nisinnānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭati, āhara me
atk-s0502a:5001_12: patta”nti attano pattaṃ gahetvā gato, na bhuñjitukāmo bhavissati, sīghaṃ gantvā aññaṃ
atk-s0502a:5001_13: oloketvā ānehīti. Brāhmaṇo gantvā mahāmoggallānattheraṃ disvā tatheva vatvā ānesi.
atk-s0502a:5001_14: Sopi sāmaṇere disvā tatheva vatvā pattaṃ gahetvā pakkāmi. Atha naṃ brāhmaṇī āha –
atk-s0502a:5001_15: “ete na bhuñjitukāmā, brāhmaṇavādakaṃ gantvā ekaṃ mahallakabrāhmaṇaṃ ānehī”ti.
atk-s0502a:5002_0: Sāmaṇerāpi pātova paṭṭhāya kiñci alabhamānā jighacchāya pīḷitā nisīdiṃsu. Atha nesaṃ
atk-s0502a:5002_1: guṇatejena sakkassa āsanaṃ uṇhākāraṃ dassesi. So āvajjento tesaṃ pātova paṭṭhāya
atk-s0502a:5002_2: nisinnānaṃ kilantabhāvaṃ ñatvā “mayā tattha gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti jarājiṇṇo mahallakabrāhmaṇo
atk-s0502a:5002_3: hutvā tasmiṃ brāhmaṇavādake brāhmaṇānaṃ aggāsane nisīdi. Brāhmaṇo taṃ disvā “idāni
atk-s0502a:5002_4: me brāhmaṇī attamanā bhavissatī”ti ehi gehaṃ gamissāmā”ti taṃ ādāya gehaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:5002_5: Brāhmaṇī taṃ disvāva tuṭṭhacittā dvīsu āsanesu attharaṇaṃ ekasmiṃyeva attharitvā,
atk-s0502a:5002_6: “ayya, idha nisīdāhī”ti āha. Sakko gehaṃ pavisitvā cattāro sāmaṇere pañcapatiṭṭhitena
atk-s0502a:5002_7: vanditvā tesaṃ āsanapariyante bhūmiyaṃ pallaṅkena nisīdi. Atha naṃ disvā brāhmaṇī
atk-s0502a:5002_8: brāhmaṇaṃ āha – “aho te ānīto brāhmaṇo, etampi ummattakaṃ gahetvā āgatosi, attano
atk-s0502a:5002_9: nattumatte vandanto vicarati, kiṃ iminā, nīharāhi na”nti. So khandhepi hatthepi kacchāyapi
atk-s0502a:5002_10: gahetvā nikkaḍḍhiyamāno uṭṭhātumpi na icchati. Atha naṃ brāhmaṇī “ehi, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0502a:5002_11: tvaṃ ekasmiṃ hatthe gaṇha, ahaṃ ekasmiṃ hatthe gaṇhissāmī”ti ubhopi dvīsu hatthesu
atk-s0502a:5002_12: gahetvā piṭṭhiyaṃ pothentā gehadvārato bahi akaṃsu. Sakkopi nisinnaṭṭhāneyeva nisinno
atk-s0502a:5002_13: hatthaṃ parivattesi. Te nivattitvā taṃ nisinnameva disvā bhītaravaṃ ravantā vissajjesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:5002_14: Tasmiṃ khaṇe sakko attano sakkabhāvaṃ jānāpesi. Atha nesaṃ āhāraṃ adaṃsu. Pañcapi
atk-s0502a:5002_15: janā āhāraṃ gahetvā eko kaṇṇikāmaṇḍalaṃ vinivijjhitvā, eko chadanassa purimabhāgaṃ,
atk-s0502a:5002_16: eko pacchimabhāgaṃ, eko pathaviyaṃ nimujjitvā, sakkopi ekena ṭhānena nikkhamīti evaṃ
atk-s0502a:5002_17: pañcadhā agamaṃsu. Tato paṭṭhāya ca pana taṃ gehaṃ pañcachiddagehaṃ kira nāma jātaṃ.
atk-s0502a:5003_0: Sāmaṇerepi vihāraṃ gatakāle bhikkhū, “āvuso, kīdisa”nti pucchiṃsu. Mā no pucchittha,
atk-s0502a:5003_1: amhākaṃ diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya brāhmaṇī kodhābhibhūtā paññattāsanesu no nisīditumpi
atk-s0502a:5003_2: adatvā “sīghaṃ sīghaṃ mahallakabrāhmaṇaṃ ānehī”ti āha. Amhākaṃ upajjhāyo āgantvā
atk-s0502a:5003_3: amhe disvā “imesaṃ nisinnabrāhmaṇānaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti pattaṃ āharāpetvā nikkhami.
atk-s0502a:5003_4: “Aññaṃ mahallakaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ānesī”ti vutte brāhmaṇo mahāmoggallānattheraṃ ānesi,
atk-s0502a:5003_5: sopi amhe disvā tatheva vatvā pakkāmi. Atha brāhmaṇī “na ete bhuñjitukāmā, gaccha
atk-s0502a:5003_6: brāhmaṇavādakato ekaṃ mahallakabrāhmaṇaṃ ānehī”ti brāhmaṇaṃ pahiṇi. So tattha gantvā
atk-s0502a:5003_7: brāhmaṇavesena āgataṃ sakkaṃ ānesi, tassa āgatakāle amhākaṃ āhāraṃ adaṃsūti. Evaṃ
atk-s0502a:5003_8: karontānaṃ pana tesaṃ tumhe na kujjhitthāti? Na kujjhimhāti. Bhikkhū taṃ sutvā satthu
atk-s0502a:5003_9: ārocesuṃ – “bhante, ime ‘na kujjhimhā’ti abhūtaṃ vatvā aññaṃ byākarontī”ti. Satthā,
atk-s0502a:5003_10: “bhikkhave, khīṇāsavā nāma viruddhesupi na virujjhantiyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:5007_0: Tattha aviruddhanti āghātavasena viruddhesupi lokiyamahājanesu āghātābhāvena aviruddhaṃ.
atk-s0502a:5007_1: Hatthagate daṇḍe vā satthe vā avijjamānepi paresaṃ pahāradānato aviratattā attadaṇḍesu
atk-s0502a:5007_2: janesu nibbutaṃ nikkhittadaṇḍaṃ, pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ ahaṃ mamanti gahitattā sādānesu
atk-s0502a:5007_3: tassa gahaṇassa abhāvena anādānaṃ taṃ evarūpaṃ ahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a:5011: Yassa rāgo cāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto mahāpanthakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:5012_0: So hāyasmā cūḷapanthakaṃ catūhi māsehi ekaṃ gāthaṃ paguṇaṃ kātuṃ asakkontaṃ “tvaṃ
atk-s0502a:5012_1: sāsane abhabbo, gihibhogāpi parihīno, kiṃ te idha vāsena, ito nikkhamā”ti vihārā
atk-s0502a:5012_2: nikkaḍḍhitvā dvāraṃ thakesi. Bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ, “āvuso, mahāpanthakattherena
atk-s0502a:5012_3: idaṃ nāma kataṃ, khīṇāsavānampi maññe kodho uppajjatī”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha,
atk-s0502a:5012_4: bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a:5012_5: khīṇāsavānaṃ rāgādayo kilesā atthi, mama puttena atthapurekkhāratāya ceva dhammapurekkhāratāya
atk-s0502a:5014: “Yassa rāgo ca doso ca, māno makkho ca pātito;
atk-s0502a:5016_0: Tattha āraggāti yassete rāgādayo kilesā, ayañca paraguṇamakkhanalakkhaṇo makkho āraggā
atk-s0502a:5016_1: sāsapo viya pātito, yathā sāsapo āragge na santiṭṭhati, evaṃ citte na santiṭṭhati,
atk-s0502a:5020: Akakkasanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto pilindavacchattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:5021_0: So kirāyasmā “ehi, vasali, yāhi, vasalī”tiādīni vadanto gihīpi pabbajitepi vasalivādeneva
atk-s0502a:5021_1: samudācarati. Athekadivasaṃ sambahulā bhikkhū satthu ārocesuṃ – “āyasmā, bhante,
atk-s0502a:5021_2: pilindavaccho bhikkhū vasalivādena samudācaratī”ti. Satthā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ
atk-s0502a:5021_3: kira tvaṃ pilindavaccha bhikkhū vasalivādena samudācarasī”ti pucchitvā “evaṃ, bhante”ti
atk-s0502a:5021_4: vutte tassāyasmato pubbenivāsaṃ manasikaritvā “mā kho tumhe, bhikkhave, vacchassa
atk-s0502a:5021_5: bhikkhuno ujjhāyittha, na, bhikkhave, vaccho dosantaro bhikkhū vasalivādena samudācarati,
atk-s0502a:5021_6: vacchassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pañca jātisatāni abbokiṇṇāni sabbāni tāni brāhmaṇakule
atk-s0502a:5021_7: paccājātāni, so tassa dīgharattaṃ vasalivādo samudāciṇṇo, khīṇāsavassa nāma kakkasaṃ
atk-s0502a:5021_8: pharusaṃ paresaṃ mammaghaṭṭanavacanameva natthi. Āciṇṇavasena hi mama putto evaṃ
atk-s0502a:5024: Yāya nābhisaje kañci, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇa”nti.
atk-s0502a:5025_0: Tattha akakkasanti apharusaṃ. Viññāpaninti atthaviññāpaniṃ. Saccanti bhūtatthaṃ.
atk-s0502a:5025_1: Nābhisajeti yāya girāya aññaṃ kujjhāpanavasena na laggāpeyya, khīṇāsavo nāma evarūpameva
atk-s0502a:5025_2: giraṃ bhāseyya, tasmā tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a:5029: Yodha dīghanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññatarattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:5030_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kireko micchādiṭṭhiko brāhmaṇo sarīragandhagahaṇabhayena uttarasāṭakaṃ
atk-s0502a:5030_1: apanetvā ekamante ṭhapetvā gehadvārābhimukho nisīdi. Atheko khīṇāsavo bhattakiccaṃ
atk-s0502a:5030_2: katvā vihāraṃ gacchanto taṃ sāṭakaṃ disvā ito cito ca oloketvā kañci apassanto “nissāmiko
atk-s0502a:5030_3: aya”nti paṃsukūlaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā gaṇhi. Atha naṃ brāhmaṇo disvā akkosanto upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0502a:5030_4: “muṇḍaka, samaṇa, mama sāṭakaṃ gaṇhasī”ti āha. Taveso, brāhmaṇāti. Āma, samaṇāti.
atk-s0502a:5030_5: “Mayā kañci apassantena paṃsukūlasaññāya gahito, gaṇha na”nti tassa datvā vihāraṃ
atk-s0502a:5030_6: gantvā bhikkhūnaṃ tamatthaṃ ārocesi. Athassa vacanaṃ sutvā bhikkhū tena saddhiṃ keḷiṃ
atk-s0502a:5030_7: karontā “kiṃ nu kho, āvuso, sāṭako dīgho rasso thūlo saṇho”ti. Āvuso, dīgho vā hotu
atk-s0502a:5030_8: rasso vā thūlo vā saṇho vā, natthi mayhaṃ tasmiṃ ālayo, paṃsukūlasaññāya naṃ gaṇhinti.
atk-s0502a:5030_9: Taṃ sutvā bhikkhū tathāgatassa ārocesuṃ – “esa, bhante, bhikkhu abhūtaṃ vatvā aññaṃ
atk-s0502a:5030_10: byākarotī”ti. Satthā “bhūtaṃ, bhikkhave, esa katheti, khīṇāsavā nāma paresaṃ santakaṃ
atk-s0502a:5032: “Yodha dīghaṃ va rassaṃ vā, aṇuṃ thūlaṃ subhāsubhaṃ;
atk-s0502a:5033: Loke adinnaṃ nādiyati, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇa”nti.
atk-s0502a:5034_0: Tassattho – sāṭakābharaṇādīsu dīghaṃ vā rassaṃ vā maṇimuttādīsu aṇuṃ vā thūlaṃ vā
atk-s0502a:5034_1: mahagghaappagghavasena subhaṃ vā asubhaṃ vā yo puggalo imasmiṃ loke parapariggahitaṃ
atk-s0502a:5038: Āsā yassāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sāriputtattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:5039_0: Thero kira pañcabhikkhusataparivāro janapade ekaṃ vihāraṃ gantvā vassaṃ upagañchi.
atk-s0502a:5039_1: Manussā theraṃ disvā bahuṃ vassāvāsikaṃ paṭissuṇiṃsu. Thero pavāretvā sabbasmiṃ vassāvāsike
atk-s0502a:5039_2: asampatteyeva satthu santikaṃ gacchanto bhikkhū āha – “daharānañceva sāmaṇerānañca
atk-s0502a:5039_3: manussehi vassāvāsike āhaṭe gahetvā peseyyātha, ṭhapetvā vā sāsanaṃ pahiṇeyyāthā”ti.
atk-s0502a:5039_4: Evaṃ vatvā ca pana satthu santikaṃ agamāsi. Bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “ajjāpi
atk-s0502a:5039_5: maññe sāriputtattherassa taṇhā atthiyeva. Tathā hi manussehi vassāvāsike dinne attano
atk-s0502a:5039_6: saddhivihārikānaṃ ‘vassāvāsikaṃ peseyyātha, ṭhapetvā vā sāsanaṃ pahiṇeyyāthā’ti bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0502a:5039_7: vatvā āgato”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti
atk-s0502a:5039_8: pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na, bhikkhave, mama puttassa taṇhā atthi, manussānaṃ
atk-s0502a:5039_9: pana puññato daharasāmaṇerānañca dhammikalābhato parihāni mā ahosīti tenevaṃ kathita”nti
atk-s0502a:5041: “Āsā yassa na vijjanti, asmiṃ loke paramhi ca;
atk-s0502a:5043: Tattha āsāti taṇhā. Nirāsāsanti nittaṇhaṃ. Visaṃyuttanti sabbakilesehi visaṃyuttaṃ tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a:5047_0: Yassālayāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto mahāmoggallānattheraṃ ārabbha
atk-s0502a:5047_1: kathesi. Vatthu purimasadisameva. Idha pana satthā moggallānattherassa nittaṇhabhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:5051_0: Tattha ālayāti taṇhā. Aññāya akathaṃkathīti aṭṭha vatthūni yathābhūtaṃ jānitvā aṭṭhavatthukāya
atk-s0502a:5051_1: vicikicchāya nibbicikiccho. Amatogadhamanuppattanti amataṃ nibbānaṃ ogāhetvā anuppattaṃ
atk-s0502a:5055: Yodha puññañcāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā pubbārāme viharanto revatattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi. Vatthu “gāme vā yadi vāraññe”ti gāthāvaṇṇanāya vitthāritameva. Vuttañhi tattha –
atk-s0502a:5056_0: Puna ekadivasaṃ bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “aho sāmaṇerassa lābho, aho puññaṃ,
atk-s0502a:5056_1: yena ekakena pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ pañcakūṭāgārasatāni katānī”ti. Satthā āgantvā
atk-s0502a:5056_2: “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a:5056_3: “bhikkhave, mayhaṃ puttassa neva puññaṃ atthi, na pāpaṃ, ubhayamassa pahīna”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:5059: Asokaṃ virajaṃ suddhaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇa”nti.
atk-s0502a:5060_0: Tattha ubhoti dvepi puññāni ca pāpāni ca chaḍḍetvāti attho. Saṅganti rāgādibhedaṃ
atk-s0502a:5060_1: saṅgaṃ. Upaccagāti atikkanto. Vaṭṭamūlakasokābhāvena asokaṃ abbhantare rāgarajādīnaṃ
atk-s0502a:5060_2: abhāvena virajaṃ nirupakkilesatāya suddhaṃ tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a:5064: Candaṃ vāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto candābhattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:5065_0: Tatrāyaṃ anupubbī kathā – atīte eko bārāṇasivāsī vāṇijo “paccantaṃ gantvā candanaṃ
atk-s0502a:5065_1: āharissāmī”ti bahūni vatthābharaṇādīni gahetvā pañcahi sakaṭasatehi paccantaṃ gantvā
atk-s0502a:5065_2: gāmadvāre nivāsaṃ gahetvā aṭaviyaṃ gopāladārake pucchi – “imasmiṃ gāme pabbatapādakammiko
atk-s0502a:5065_3: koci manusso atthī”ti? “Āma, atthī”ti. “Ko nāmeso”ti? “Asuko nāmā”ti. “Bhariyāya
atk-s0502a:5065_4: panassa puttānaṃ vā kiṃnāma”nti? “Idañcidañcā”ti. “Kahaṃ panassa ṭhāne geha”nti?
atk-s0502a:5065_5: “Asukaṭṭhāne nāmā”ti. So tehi dinnasaññāya sukhayānake nisīditvā tassa gehadvāraṃ
atk-s0502a:5065_6: gantvā yānā oruyha gehaṃ pavisitvā “asukanāme”ti taṃ itthiṃ pakkosi. Sā “eko no ñātako
atk-s0502a:5065_7: bhavissatī”ti vegenāgantvā āsanaṃ paññāpesi. So tattha nisīditvā nāmaṃ vatvā “mama
atk-s0502a:5065_8: sahāyo kaha”nti pucchi. “Araññaṃ gato, sāmī”ti. “Mama putto asuko nāma, mama dhītā
atk-s0502a:5065_9: asukā nāma kaha”nti sabbesaṃ nāmaṃ kittentova pucchitvā “imāni nesaṃ vatthābharaṇāni
atk-s0502a:5065_10: dadeyyāsi, sahāyassāpi me aṭavito āgatakāle idaṃ vatthābharaṇaṃ dadeyyāsī”ti adāsi.
atk-s0502a:5065_11: Sā tassa uḷāraṃ sakkāraṃ katvā sāmikassa āgatakāle “sāmi, iminā āgatakālato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0502a:5065_12: sabbesaṃ nāmaṃ vatvā idañcidañca dinna”nti āha. Sopissa kattabbayuttakaṃ kari.
atk-s0502a:5066_0: Atha naṃ sāyaṃ sayane nisinno pucchi – “samma, pabbatapāde carantena te kiṃ bahuṃ
atk-s0502a:5066_1: diṭṭhapubba”nti? “Aññaṃ na passāmi, rattasākhā pana me bahū rukkhā diṭṭhā”ti. “Bahū
atk-s0502a:5066_2: rukkhā”ti? “Āma, bahū”ti. Tena hi te amhākaṃ dassehīti tena saddhiṃ gantvā rattacandanarukkhe
atk-s0502a:5066_3: chinditvā pañca sakaṭasatāni pūretvā āgacchanto taṃ āha – “samma, bārāṇasiyaṃ asukaṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a:5066_4: nāma mama gehaṃ, kālena kālaṃ mama santikaṃ āgaccheyyāsi, aññena ca me paṇṇākārena
atk-s0502a:5066_5: attho natthi, rattasākharukkhe eva āhareyyāsī”ti. So “sādhū”ti vatvā kālena kālaṃ
atk-s0502a:5066_6: tassa santikaṃ āgacchanto rattacandanameva āharati, sopissa bahudhanaṃ deti.
atk-s0502a:5067_0: Tato aparena samayena parinibbute kassapadasabale patiṭṭhite kañcanathūpe so puriso
atk-s0502a:5067_1: bahuṃ candanaṃ ādāya bārāṇasiṃ agamāsi. Athassa so sahāyako vāṇijo bahuṃ candanaṃ
atk-s0502a:5067_2: pisāpetvā pātiṃ pūretvā “ehi, samma, yāva bhattaṃ pacati, tāva cetiyakaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:5067_3: gantvā āgamissāmā”ti taṃ ādāya tattha gantvā candanapūjaṃ akāsi. Sopissa paccantavāsī
atk-s0502a:5067_4: sahāyako cetiyakucchiyaṃ candanena candamaṇḍalaṃ akāsi. Ettakamevassa pubbakammaṃ.
atk-s0502a:5068_0: So tato cuto devaloke nibbattitvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ tattha khepetvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0502a:5068_1: rājagahanagare brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbatti. Tassa nābhimaṇḍalato candamaṇḍalasadisā
atk-s0502a:5068_2: pabhā uṭṭhahi, tenassa candābhotveva nāmaṃ kariṃsu. Cetiye kirassa candamaṇḍalakaraṇanissando
atk-s0502a:5068_3: esa. Brāhmaṇā cintayiṃsu – “sakkā amhehi imaṃ gahetvā lokaṃ khāditu”nti. Taṃ yāne
atk-s0502a:5068_4: nisīdāpetvā “yo imassa sarīraṃ hatthena parāmasati, so evarūpaṃ nāma issariyasampattiṃ
atk-s0502a:5068_5: labhatī”ti vatvā vicariṃsu. Sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā dadamānā eva tassa sarīraṃ hatthena
atk-s0502a:5068_6: phusituṃ labhanti. Te evaṃ anuvicarantā sāvatthiṃ anuppattā nagarassa ca vihārassa
atk-s0502a:5068_7: ca antarā nivāsaṃ gaṇhiṃsu. Sāvatthiyampi pañcakoṭimattā ariyasāvakā purebhattaṃ
atk-s0502a:5068_8: dānaṃ datvā pacchābhattaṃ gandhamālavatthabhesajjādihatthā dhammassavanāya gacchanti.
atk-s0502a:5068_9: Brāhmaṇā te disvā “kahaṃ gacchathā”ti pucchiṃsu. Satthu santikaṃ dhammassavanāyāti.
atk-s0502a:5068_10: Etha tattha gantvā kiṃ karissatha, amhākaṃ candābhassa brāhmaṇassa ānubhāvasadiso
atk-s0502a:5068_11: ānubhāvo natthi. Etassa hi sarīraṃ phusantā idaṃ nāma labhanti, etha passatha nanti.
atk-s0502a:5068_12: Tumhākaṃ candābhassa brāhmaṇassa ko ānubhāvo nāma, amhākaṃ satthāyeva mahānubhāvoti.
atk-s0502a:5068_13: Te aññamaññaṃ saññāpetuṃ asakkontā “vihāraṃ gantvā candābhassa vā amhākaṃ vā satthu
atk-s0502a:5068_14: ānubhāvaṃ jānissāmā”ti taṃ gahetvā vihāraṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:5069_0: Satthā tasmiṃ attano santikaṃ upasaṅkamanteyeva candābhāya antaradhānaṃ akāsi. So
atk-s0502a:5069_1: satthu santike aṅgārapacchiyaṃ kāko viya ahosi. Atha naṃ ekamantaṃ nayiṃsu, ābhā
atk-s0502a:5069_2: paṭipākatikā ahosi. Puna satthu santikaṃ ānayiṃsu, ābhā tatheva antaradhāyi. Evaṃ
atk-s0502a:5069_3: tikkhattuṃ gantvā antaradhāyamānaṃ ābhaṃ disvā candābho cintesi – “ayaṃ ābhāya antaradhānamantaṃ
atk-s0502a:5069_4: jānāti maññe”ti. So satthāraṃ pucchi – “kiṃ nu kho ābhāya antaradhānamantaṃ jānāthā”ti?
atk-s0502a:5069_5: Āma, jānāmīti. Tena hi me dethāti. Na sakkā apabbajitassa dātunti. So brāhmaṇe āha
atk-s0502a:5069_6: – “etasmiṃ mante gahite ahaṃ sakalajambudīpe jeṭṭhako bhavissāmi, tumhe ettheva hotha,
atk-s0502a:5069_7: ahaṃ pabbajitvā katipāheneva mantaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti. So satthāraṃ pabbajjaṃ yācitvā
atk-s0502a:5069_8: upasampajji. Athassa dvattiṃsākāraṃ ācikkhi. So “kiṃ ida”nti pucchi. Idaṃ mantassa
atk-s0502a:5069_9: parikammaṃ sajjhāyituṃ vaṭṭatīti. Brāhmaṇāpi antarantarā āgantvā “gahito te manto”ti
atk-s0502a:5069_10: pucchanti. Na tāva gaṇhāmīti. So katipāheneva arahattaṃ patvā brāhmaṇehi āgantvā
atk-s0502a:5069_11: pucchitakāle “yātha tumhe, idānāhaṃ anāgamanadhammo jāto”ti āha. Bhikkhū tathāgatassa
atk-s0502a:5069_12: ārocesuṃ – “ayaṃ, bhante, abhūtaṃ vatvā aññaṃ byākarotī”ti. Satthā “khīṇāsavo idāni,
atk-s0502a:5069_13: bhikkhave, mama putto candābho, bhūtamevesa kathetī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:5073_0: Tattha vimalanti abbhādimalarahitaṃ. Suddhanti nirupakkilesaṃ. Vippasannanti pasannacittaṃ.
atk-s0502a:5073_1: Anāvilanti kilesāvilattarahitaṃ. Nandībhavaparikkhīṇanti tīsu bhavesu parikkhīṇataṇhaṃ
atk-s0502a:5077: Yo imanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā kuṇḍakoliyaṃ nissāya kuṇḍadhānavane viharanto sīvalittheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:5078_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye suppavāsā nāma koliyadhītā sattavassāni gabbhaṃ dhāretvā sattāhaṃ
atk-s0502a:5078_1: mūḷhagabbhā dukkhāhi tibbāhi kaṭukāhi vedanāhi phuṭṭhā “sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā,
atk-s0502a:5078_2: yo imassa evarūpassa dukkhassa pahānāya dhammaṃ deseti. Suppaṭipanno vata tassa bhagavato
atk-s0502a:5078_3: sāvakasaṅgho, yo imassa evarūpassa dukkhassa pahānāya paṭipanno. Susukhaṃ vata taṃ
atk-s0502a:5078_4: nibbānaṃ, yathidaṃ evarūpaṃ dukkhaṃ na saṃvijjatī”ti imehi tīhi vitakkehi taṃ dukkhaṃ
atk-s0502a:5078_5: adhivāsentī sāmikaṃ satthu santikaṃ pesetvā tena tassā vacanena satthu vandanāya
atk-s0502a:5078_6: ārocitāya “sukhinī hotu suppavāsā koliyadhītā, arogā arogaṃ puttaṃ vijāyatū”ti satthārā
atk-s0502a:5078_7: vuttakkhaṇeyeva sukhinī arogā arogaṃ puttaṃ vijāyitvā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ
atk-s0502a:5078_8: nimantetvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ adāsi. Puttopissā jātadivasato paṭṭhāya dhammakaraṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:5078_9: ādāya saṅghassa udakaṃ parissāvesi. So aparabhāge nikkhamitvā pabbajito arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:5079_0: Athekadivasaṃ bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “passathāvuso, evarūpo
atk-s0502a:5079_1: nāma arahattassa upanissayasampanno bhikkhu ettakaṃ kālaṃ mātukucchismiṃ dukkhaṃ
atk-s0502a:5079_2: anubhosi, kimaṅgaṃ pana aññe, bahuṃ vata iminā dukkhaṃ nitthiṇṇa”nti. Satthā āgantvā
atk-s0502a:5079_3: “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte
atk-s0502a:5079_4: “āma, bhikkhave, mama putto ettakā dukkhā muccitvā idāni nibbānaṃ sacchikatvā viharatī”ti
atk-s0502a:5084_0: Tassattho – yo bhikkhu imaṃ rāgapalipathañceva kilesaduggañca saṃsāravaṭṭañca catunnaṃ
atk-s0502a:5084_1: ariyasaccānaṃ appaṭivijjhanakamohañca atīto, cattāro oghe tiṇṇo hutvā pāraṃ anuppatto,
atk-s0502a:5084_2: duvidhena jhānena jhāyī, taṇhāya abhāvena anejo, kathaṃkathāya abhāvena akathaṃkathī,
atk-s0502a:5084_3: upādānānaṃ abhāvena anupādiyitvā kilesanibbānena nibbuto, tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a:5088: Yodha kāmeti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sundarasamuddattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:5089_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kireko kulaputto sundarasamuddakumāro nāma cattālīsakoṭivibhave mahākule
atk-s0502a:5089_1: nibbatto. So ekadivasaṃ pacchābhattaṃ gandhamālādihatthaṃ mahājanaṃ dhammassavanatthāya
atk-s0502a:5089_2: jetavanaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā “kahaṃ gacchathā”ti pucchitvā “satthu santikaṃ dhammassavanatthāyā”ti
atk-s0502a:5089_3: vutte “ahampi gamissāmī”ti vatvā tena saddhiṃ gantvā parisapariyante nisīdi. Satthā
atk-s0502a:5089_4: tassa āsayaṃ viditvā anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathesi. So “na sakkā agāraṃ ajjhāvasantena
atk-s0502a:5089_5: saṅkhalikhitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ caritu”nti satthu dhammakathaṃ nissāya pabbajjāya jātussāho
atk-s0502a:5089_6: parisāya pakkantāya satthāraṃ pabbajjaṃ yācitvā “mātāpitūhi ananuññātaṃ tathāgatā
atk-s0502a:5089_7: na pabbājentī”ti sutvā gehaṃ gantvā raṭṭhapālakulaputtādayo viya mahantena vāyāmena
atk-s0502a:5089_8: mātāpitaro anujānāpetvā satthu santike pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado “kiṃ me idha vāsenā”ti
atk-s0502a:5089_9: tato nikkhamitvā rājagahaṃ gantvā piṇḍāya caranto vītināmesi.
