atk-s0502a:5090_0: Athekadivasaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ tassa mātāpitaro ekasmiṃ chaṇadivase mahantena sirisobhaggena
atk-s0502a:5090_1: tassa sahāyakakumārake kīḷamāne disvā “amhākaṃ puttassa idaṃ dullabhaṃ jāta”nti parideviṃsu.
atk-s0502a:5090_2: Tasmiṃ khaṇe ekā gaṇikā taṃ kulaṃ gantvā tassa mātaraṃ rodamānaṃ nisinnaṃ disvā “amma,
atk-s0502a:5090_3: kiṃ kāraṇā rodasī”ti pucchi. “Puttaṃ anussaritvā rodāmī”ti. “Kahaṃ pana so, ammā”ti?
atk-s0502a:5090_4: “Bhikkhūsu pabbajito”ti. “Kiṃ uppabbājetuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti? “Vaṭṭati, na pana icchati,
atk-s0502a:5090_5: ito nikkhamitvā rājagahaṃ gato”ti. “Sacāhaṃ taṃ uppabbājeyyaṃ, kiṃ me kareyyāthā”ti?
atk-s0502a:5090_6: “Imassa te kulassa kuṭumbasāminiṃ kareyyāmā”ti. Tena hi me paribbayaṃ dethāti paribbayaṃ
atk-s0502a:5090_7: gahetvā mahantena parivārena rājagahaṃ gantvā tassa piṇḍāya caraṇavīthiṃ sallakkhetvā
atk-s0502a:5090_8: tatthekaṃ nivāsagehaṃ gahetvā pātova paṇītaṃ āhāraṃ paṭiyādetvā therassa piṇḍāya
atk-s0502a:5090_9: paviṭṭhakāle bhikkhaṃ datvā katipāhaccayena, “bhante, idheva nisīditvā bhattakiccaṃ
atk-s0502a:5091_0: Atha naṃ paṇītena āhārena parivisitvā, “bhante, idheva piṇḍāya carituṃ phāsuka”nti
atk-s0502a:5091_1: vatvā katipāhaṃ ālinde nisīdāpetvā bhojetvā dārake pūvehi saṅgaṇhitvā “etha tumhe
atk-s0502a:5091_2: therassa āgatakāle mayi vārentiyāpi idhāgantvā rajaṃ uṭṭhāpeyyāthā”ti āha. Te punadivase
atk-s0502a:5091_3: therassa bhojanavelāya tāya vāriyamānāpi rajaṃ uṭṭhāpesuṃ. Sā punadivase, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:5091_4: dārakā vāriyamānāpi mama vacanaṃ asuṇitvā idha rajaṃ uṭṭhāpenti, antogehe nisīdathā”ti
atk-s0502a:5091_5: anto nisīdāpetvā katipāhaṃ bhojesi. Puna dārake saṅgaṇhitvā “tumhe mayā vāriyamānāpi
atk-s0502a:5091_6: therassa bhojanakāle mahāsaddaṃ kareyyāthā”ti āha. Te tathā kariṃsu. Sā punadivase,
atk-s0502a:5091_7: “bhante, imasmiṃ ṭhāne ativiya mahāsaddo hoti, dārakā mayā vāriyamānāpi vacanaṃ na
atk-s0502a:5091_8: gaṇhanti, uparipāsādeyeva nisīdathā”ti vatvā therena adhivāsite theraṃ purato katvā
atk-s0502a:5091_9: pāsādaṃ abhiruhantī dvārāni pidahamānāva pāsādaṃ abhiruhi. Thero ukkaṭṭhasapadānacāriko
atk-s0502a:5091_10: samānopi rasataṇhāya baddho tassā vacanena sattabhūmikaṃ pāsādaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0502a:5092_0: Sā theraṃ nisīdāpetvā “cattālīsāya khalu, samma, puṇṇamukha ṭhānehi itthī purisaṃ
atk-s0502a:5092_1: accāvadati vijambhati vinamati gilasati vilajjati nakhena nakhaṃ ghaṭṭeti, pādena
atk-s0502a:5092_2: pādaṃ akkamati, kaṭṭhena pathaviṃ vilikhati, dārakaṃ ullaṅgheti olaṅgheti, kīḷati
atk-s0502a:5092_3: kīḷāpeti, cumbati cumbāpeti, bhuñjati bhuñjāpeti, dadāti āyācati, katamanukaroti,
atk-s0502a:5092_4: uccaṃ bhāsati, nīcaṃ bhāsati, aviccaṃ bhāsati, viviccaṃ bhāsati, naccena gītena vāditena
atk-s0502a:5092_5: roditena vilasitena vibhūsitena jagghati, pekkhati, kaṭiṃ cāleti, guyhabhaṇḍakaṃ
atk-s0502a:5092_6: cāleti, ūruṃ vivarati, ūruṃ pidahati, thanaṃ dasseti, kacchaṃ dasseti, nābhiṃ dasseti,
atk-s0502a:5092_7: akkhiṃ nikhaṇati, bhamukaṃ ukkhipati, oṭṭhaṃ palikhati, jivhaṃ nillāleti, dussaṃ
atk-s0502a:5092_8: muñcati, dussaṃ bandhati, sirasaṃ muñcati, sirasaṃ bandhatī”ti evaṃ āgataṃ itthikuttaṃ
atk-s0502a:5092_9: itthilīlaṃ dassetvā tassa purato ṭhitā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:5094: Tuvampi daharo mama, ahampi daharā tava;
atk-s0502a:5096_0: Therassa “aho vata me bhāriyaṃ anupadhāretvā katakamma”nti mahāsaṃvego udapādi. Tasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:5096_1: khaṇe satthā pañcacattālīsayojanamatthake jetavane nisinnova taṃ kāraṇaṃ disvā sitaṃ
atk-s0502a:5096_2: pātvākāsi. Atha naṃ ānandatthero pucchi – “bhante, ko nu kho hetu, ko paccayo sitassa
atk-s0502a:5096_3: pātukammāyā”ti. Ānanda, rājagahanagare sattabhūmikapāsādatale sundarasamuddassa ca
atk-s0502a:5096_4: bhikkhuno gaṇikāya ca saṅgāmo vattatīti. Kassa nu kho, bhante, jayo bhavissati, kassa
atk-s0502a:5096_5: parājayoti? Satthā, “ānanda, sundarasamuddassa jayo bhavissati, gaṇikāya parājayo”ti
atk-s0502a:5096_6: therassa jayaṃ pakāsetvā tattha nisinnakova obhāsaṃ pharitvā “bhikkhu ubhopi kāme
atk-s0502a:5100: Tassattho – yo puggalo idha loke ubhopi kāme hitvā anāgāro hutvā paribbajati, taṃ parikkhīṇakāmañceva parikkhīṇabhavañca ahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a:5101_0: Desanāvasāne so thero arahattaṃ patvā iddhibalena vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā kaṇṇikāmaṇḍalaṃ
atk-s0502a:5101_1: vinivijjhitvā satthu sarīraṃ thomentoyeva āgantvā satthāraṃ vandi. Dhammasabhāyampi
atk-s0502a:5101_2: kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ, “āvuso, jivhāviññeyyaṃ rasaṃ nissāya manaṃ naṭṭho sundarasamuddatthero,
atk-s0502a:5101_3: satthā panassa avassayo jāto”ti. Satthā taṃ kathaṃ sutvā “na, bhikkhave, idāneva,
atk-s0502a:5101_4: pubbepāhaṃ etassa rasataṇhāya baddhamanassa avassayo jātoyevā”ti vatvā tehi yācito
atk-s0502a:5106: Ekakanipāte imaṃ vātamigajātakaṃ vitthāretvā “tadā sundarasamuddo vātamigo ahosi, imaṃ pana gāthaṃ vatvā tassa vissajjāpetā rañño mahāmacco ahamevā”ti jātakaṃ samodhānesīti.
atk-s0502a:5109: Yodha taṇhanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto jaṭilattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:5110_0: Tatrāyaṃ anupubbī kathā – atīte kira bārāṇasiyaṃ dve bhātaro kuṭumbikā mahantaṃ ucchukhettaṃ
atk-s0502a:5110_1: kāresuṃ. Athekadivasaṃ kaniṭṭhabhātā ucchukhettaṃ gantvā “ekaṃ jeṭṭhabhātikassa dassāmi,
atk-s0502a:5110_2: ekaṃ mayhaṃ bhavissatī”ti dve ucchuyaṭṭhiyo rasassa anikkhamanatthāya chinnaṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a:5110_3: bandhitvā gaṇhi. Tadā kira ucchūnaṃ yantena pīḷanakiccaṃ natthi, agge vā mūle vā
atk-s0502a:5110_4: chinditvā ukkhittakāle dhammakaraṇato udakaṃ viya sayameva raso nikkhamati. Tassa
atk-s0502a:5110_5: pana khettato ucchuyaṭṭhiyo gahetvā āgamanakāle gandhamādane paccekabuddho samāpattito
atk-s0502a:5110_6: vuṭṭhāya “kassa nu kho ajja anuggahaṃ karissāmī”ti upadhārento taṃ attano ñāṇajāle
atk-s0502a:5110_7: paviṭṭhaṃ disvā saṅgahaṃ kātuṃ samatthabhāvañca ñatvā pattacīvaraṃ ādāya iddhiyā
atk-s0502a:5110_8: āgantvā tassa purato aṭṭhāsi. So taṃ disvāva pasannacitto uttarasāṭakaṃ uccatare
atk-s0502a:5110_9: bhūmipadese attharitvā, “bhante, idha nisīdathā”ti paccekabuddhaṃ nisīdāpetvā “pattaṃ
atk-s0502a:5110_10: upanāmethā”ti ucchuyaṭṭhiyā bandhanaṭṭhānaṃ mocetvā pattassa upari akāsi, raso otaritvā
atk-s0502a:5110_11: pattaṃ pūresi. Paccekabuddhena tasmiṃ rase pīte “sādhukaṃ vata me ayyena raso pīto.
atk-s0502a:5110_12: Sace me jeṭṭhabhātiko mūlaṃ āharāpessati, mūlaṃ dassāmi. Sace pattiṃ āharāpessati,
atk-s0502a:5110_13: pattiṃ dassāmī”ti cintetvā, “bhante, pattaṃ me upanāmethā”ti dutiyampi ucchuyaṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0502a:5110_14: mocetvā rasaṃ adāsi. “Bhātā me ucchukhettato aññaṃ ucchuṃ āharitvā khādissatī”ti
atk-s0502a:5110_15: ettakampi kirassa vañcanacittaṃ nāhosi. Paccekabuddho pana paṭhamaṃ ucchurasassa
atk-s0502a:5110_16: pītattā taṃ ucchurasaṃ aññehipi saddhiṃ saṃvibhajitukāmo hutvā gahetvāva nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:5110_17: So tassa ākāraṃ ñatvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā, “bhante, yo ayaṃ mayā dinno aggaraso,
atk-s0502a:5110_18: imassa nissandena devamanussesu sampattiṃ anubhavitvā pariyosāne tumhehi pattadhammameva
atk-s0502a:5110_19: pāpuṇeyya”nti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi. Paccekabuddhopissa “evaṃ hotū”ti vatvā “icchitaṃ
atk-s0502a:5110_20: patthitaṃ tuyha”nti dvīhi gāthāhi anumodanaṃ katvā yathā so passati, evaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0502a:5110_21: ākāsena gandhamādanaṃ gantvā pañcannaṃ paccekabuddhasatānaṃ taṃ rasaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a:5111_0: So taṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā bhātu santikaṃ gantvā “kahaṃ gatosī”ti vutte “ucchukhettaṃ
atk-s0502a:5111_1: oloketuṃ gatomhī”ti. “Kiṃ tādisena ucchukhettaṃ gatena, nanu nāma ekaṃ vā dve vā
atk-s0502a:5111_2: ucchuyaṭṭhiyo ādāya āgantabbaṃ bhaveyyā”ti bhātarā vutto – “āma, bhātika, dve me
atk-s0502a:5111_3: ucchuyaṭṭhiyo gahitā, ekaṃ pana paccekabuddhaṃ disvā mama ucchuyaṭṭhito rasaṃ datvā
atk-s0502a:5111_4: ‘mūlaṃ vā pattiṃ vā dassāmī’ti tumhākampi me ucchuyaṭṭhito raso dinno, kiṃ nu kho
atk-s0502a:5111_5: tassa mūlaṃ gaṇhissatha, udāhu patti”nti āha. “Kiṃ pana paccekabuddhena kata”nti?
atk-s0502a:5111_6: “Mama ucchuyaṭṭhito rasaṃ pivitvā tumhākaṃ ucchuyaṭṭhito rasaṃ ādāya ākāsena gandhamādanaṃ
atk-s0502a:5111_7: gantvā pañcasatānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ adāsī”ti. So tasmiṃ kathenteyeva nirantaraṃ
atk-s0502a:5111_8: pītiyā phuṭṭhasarīro hutvā “tena me paccekabuddhena diṭṭhadhammasseva adhigamo bhaveyyā”ti
atk-s0502a:5111_9: patthanaṃ akāsi. Evaṃ kaniṭṭhena tisso sampattiyo patthitā, jeṭṭhena pana ekapadeneva
atk-s0502a:5112_0: Te yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cutā devaloke nibbattitvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ khepayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:5112_1: Tesaṃ devaloke ṭhitakāleyeva vipassī sammāsambuddho loke uppajji. Tepi devalokato
atk-s0502a:5112_2: cavitvā bandhumatiyā ekasmiṃ kulagehe jeṭṭho jeṭṭhova, kaniṭṭho kaniṭṭhova hutvā
atk-s0502a:5112_3: paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhiṃsu. Tesu jeṭṭhassa senoti nāmaṃ akaṃsu, kaniṭṭhassa aparājitoti.
atk-s0502a:5112_4: Tesu vayappattakāle kuṭumbaṃ saṇṭhāpetvā viharantesu “buddharatanaṃ loke uppannaṃ,
atk-s0502a:5112_5: dhammaratanaṃ, saṅgharatanaṃ, dānāni detha, puññāni karotha, ajja aṭṭhamī, ajja cātuddasī,
atk-s0502a:5112_6: ajja pannarasī, uposathaṃ karotha, dhammaṃ suṇāthā”ti dhammaghosakassa bandhumatīnagare
atk-s0502a:5112_7: ghosanaṃ sutvā mahājanaṃ purebhattaṃ dānaṃ datvā pacchābhattaṃ dhammassavanāya gacchantaṃ
atk-s0502a:5112_8: disvā senakuṭumbiko “kahaṃ gacchathā”ti pucchitvā “satthu santikaṃ dhammassavanāyā”ti
atk-s0502a:5112_9: vutte “ahampi gamissāmī”ti tehi saddhiṃyeva gantvā parisapariyante nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:5113_0: Satthā tassa ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathesi. So satthu dhammaṃ sutvā
atk-s0502a:5113_1: pabbajjāya ussāhajāto satthāraṃ pabbajjaṃ yāci. Atha naṃ satthā “atthi pana te apaloketabbā
atk-s0502a:5113_2: ñātakā”ti pucchi. Atthi, bhanteti. Tena hi apaloketvā ehīti. So kaniṭṭhassa santikaṃ
atk-s0502a:5113_3: gantvā “yaṃ imasmiṃ kule sāpateyyaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ tava hotū”ti āha. Tumhe pana, sāmīti.
atk-s0502a:5113_4: Ahaṃ satthu santike pabbajissāmīti. Sāmi kiṃ vadetha, ahaṃ mātari matāya mātaraṃ
atk-s0502a:5113_5: viya, pitari mate pitaraṃ viya tumhe alatthaṃ, idaṃ kulaṃ mahābhogaṃ, gehe ṭhiteneva
atk-s0502a:5113_6: sakkā puññāni kātuṃ, mā evaṃ karitthāti. Mayā satthu santike dhammo suto, na sakkā
atk-s0502a:5113_7: taṃ agāramajjhe ṭhitena pūretuṃ, pabbajissāmevāhaṃ, tvaṃ nivattāhīti. Evaṃ so kaniṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0502a:5113_8: nivattāpetvā satthu santike pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado na cirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:5113_9: Kaniṭṭhopi “bhātu pabbajitasakkāraṃ karissāmī”ti sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0502a:5113_10: dānaṃ datvā bhātaraṃ vanditvā āha – “bhante, tumhehi attano bhavanissaraṇaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0502a:5113_11: ahaṃ pana pañcahi kāmaguṇehi baddho nikkhamitvā pabbajituṃ na sakkomi, mayhaṃ gehe
atk-s0502a:5113_12: ṭhitasseva anucchavikaṃ mahantaṃ puññakammaṃ ācikkhathā”ti. Atha naṃ thero “sādhu
atk-s0502a:5113_13: sādhu, paṇḍita, satthu gandhakuṭiṃ karohī”ti āha. So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā nānādārūni
atk-s0502a:5113_14: āharāpetvā thambhādīnaṃ atthāya tacchāpetvā ekaṃ suvaṇṇakhacitaṃ, ekaṃ rajatakhacitaṃ,
atk-s0502a:5113_15: ekaṃ maṇikhacitanti sabbāni sattaratanakhacitāni kāretvā tehi gandhakuṭiṃ kāretvā
atk-s0502a:5113_16: sattaratanakhacitāheva chadaniṭṭhakāhi chādāpesi. Gandhakuṭiyā karaṇakāleyeva pana
atk-s0502a:5113_17: taṃ attanā samānanāmako aparājitoyeva nāma bhāgineyyo upasaṅkamitvā “ahampi karissāmi,
atk-s0502a:5113_18: mayhampi pattiṃ detha mātulā”ti āha. Na demi, tāta, aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ karissāmīti.
atk-s0502a:5113_19: So bahumpi yācitvā pattiṃ alabhamāno “gandhakuṭiyā purato kuñjarasālaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0502a:5113_20: sattaratanamayaṃ kuñjarasālaṃ kāresi. So imasmiṃ buddhuppāde meṇḍakaseṭṭhi hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:5114_0: Gandhakuṭiyaṃ pana sattaratanamayāni tīṇi mahāvātapānāni ahesuṃ. Tesaṃ abhimukhe
atk-s0502a:5114_1: heṭṭhā sudhāparikammakatā tisso pokkharaṇiyo kāretvā catujjātikagandhodakassa pūretvā
atk-s0502a:5114_2: aparājito, gahapati, pañcavaṇṇāni kusumāni ropāpesi tathāgatassa anto nisinnakāle
atk-s0502a:5114_3: vātavegena samuṭṭhitāhi reṇuvaṭṭīhi sarīrassa okiraṇatthaṃ. Gandhakuṭithūpikāya kapallaṃ
atk-s0502a:5114_4: rattasuvaṇṇamayaṃ ahosi, pavāḷamayā sikharā, heṭṭhā maṇimayā chadaniṭṭhakā. Iti sā
atk-s0502a:5114_5: naccanto viya moro sobhamānā aṭṭhāsi. Sattasu pana ratanesu koṭṭetabbayuttakaṃ koṭṭetvā
atk-s0502a:5114_6: itaraṃ sakalameva gahetvā jaṇṇumattena odhinā gandhakuṭiṃ parikkhipitvā pariveṇaṃ pūresi.
atk-s0502a:5115_0: Evaṃ gandhakuṭiṃ niṭṭhāpetvā aparājito, gahapati, bhātikattheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā āha
atk-s0502a:5115_1: – “bhante, niṭṭhitā gandhakuṭi, paribhogamassā paccāsīsāmi, paribhogena kira mahantaṃ
atk-s0502a:5115_2: puññaṃ hotī”ti. So satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “bhante, iminā kira vo kuṭumbikena gandhakuṭi
atk-s0502a:5115_3: kāritā, idāni pana paribhogaṃ paccāsīsatī”ti āha. Satthā uṭṭhāyāsanā gandhakuṭiabhimukhaṃ
atk-s0502a:5115_4: gantvā gandhakuṭiṃ parikkhipitvā parikkhittaratanarāsiṃ olokento dvārakoṭṭhake aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:5115_5: Atha naṃ kuṭumbiko “pavisatha, bhante”ti āha. Satthā tattheva ṭhatvā tatiyavāre tassa
atk-s0502a:5115_6: bhātikattheraṃ olokesi. So olokitākāreneva ñatvā kaniṭṭhabhātaraṃ āha – “ehi, tāta,
atk-s0502a:5115_7: ‘mameva rakkhā bhavissati, tumhe yathāsukhaṃ vasathā’ti satthāraṃ vadehī”ti. So tassa
atk-s0502a:5115_8: vacanaṃ sutvā satthāraṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā, “bhante, yathā manussā rukkhamūle
atk-s0502a:5115_9: pavisitvā anapekkhā pakkamanti, yathā vā nadiṃ taritvā uḷumpaṃ anapekkhā pariccajanti,
atk-s0502a:5115_10: evaṃ anapekkhā hutvā tumhe vasathā”ti āha. Kimatthaṃ pana satthā aṭṭhāsi? Evaṃ kirassa
atk-s0502a:5115_11: ahosi – “buddhānaṃ santikaṃ purebhattampi pacchābhattampi bahū āgacchanti, tesu ratanāni
atk-s0502a:5115_12: ādāya pakkamantesu na sakkā amhehi vāretuṃ, pariveṇamhi ettake ratane vokiṇṇe attano
atk-s0502a:5115_13: upaṭṭhāke harantepi na vāretīti kuṭumbiko mayi āghātaṃ katvā apāyūpago bhaveyyā”ti
atk-s0502a:5115_14: iminā kāraṇena aṭṭhāsi. Tena pana, “bhante, mameva rakkhā bhavissati, tumhe vasathā”ti vutte pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:5116_0: Kuṭumbiko samantā rakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā manusse āha – “tātā, ucchaṅgena vā pacchipasibbakehi
atk-s0502a:5116_1: vā ādāya gacchante vāreyyātha, hatthena gahetvā gacchante pana mā vārayitthā”ti.
atk-s0502a:5116_2: Antonagarepi ārocāpesi “mayā gandhakuṭipariveṇe satta ratanāni okiṇṇāni, satthu santike
atk-s0502a:5116_3: dhammaṃ sutvā gacchantā duggatamanussā ubho hatthe pūretvā gaṇhantu, sukhitāpi ekena
atk-s0502a:5116_4: gaṇhantū”ti. Evaṃ kirassa ahosi “saddhā tāva dhammaṃ sotukāmā gamissantiyeva, assaddhāpi
atk-s0502a:5116_5: pana dhanalobhena gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā dukkhato muccissantī”ti. Tasmā janasaṅgahatthāya
atk-s0502a:5116_6: evaṃ ārocāpesi. Mahājano tena vuttaniyāmeneva ratanāni gaṇhi. Sakiṃ okiṇṇaratanesu
atk-s0502a:5116_7: khīṇesu yāvatatiyaṃ jaṇṇumattena odhinā okirāpesiyeva. Satthu pana pādamūle tipusamattaṃ
atk-s0502a:5116_8: anagghaṃ maṇiratanaṃ ṭhapesi. Evaṃ kirassa ahosi – “satthu sarīrato suvaṇṇavaṇṇāya
atk-s0502a:5116_9: pabhāya saddhiṃ maṇipabhaṃ olokentānaṃ titti nāma na bhavissatī”ti. Tasmā evamakāsi.
atk-s0502a:5117_0: Athekadivasaṃ eko micchādiṭṭhikabrāhmaṇo “satthu kira pādamūle mahagghaṃ maṇiratanaṃ
atk-s0502a:5117_1: nikkhittaṃ, harissāmi na”nti vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vandituṃ āgatassa mahājanassa
atk-s0502a:5117_2: antarena pāvisi. Kuṭumbiko tassa pavisanākāreneva “maṇiṃ gaṇhitukāmo”ti sallakkhetvā
atk-s0502a:5117_3: “aho vata na gaṇheyyā”ti cintesi. Sopi satthāraṃ vandanto viya pādamūle hatthaṃ upanāmetvā
atk-s0502a:5117_4: maṇiṃ gahetvā ovaṭṭikāya katvā pakkāmi. Kuṭumbiko tasmiṃ cittaṃ pasādetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0502a:5117_5: So dhammakathāvasāne satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā āha – “bhante, mayā tikkhattuṃ gandhakuṭiṃ
atk-s0502a:5117_6: parikkhipitvā jaṇṇumattena odhinā satta ratanāni okiṇṇāni, tāni me gaṇhantesu āghāto
atk-s0502a:5117_7: nāma nāhosi, cittaṃ bhiyyo bhiyyo pasīdiyeva. Ajja pana ‘aho vatāyaṃ brāhmaṇo maṇiṃ
atk-s0502a:5117_8: na gaṇheyyā’ti cintetvā tasmiṃ maṇiṃ ādāya gate cittaṃ pasādetuṃ nāsakkhi”nti. Satthā
atk-s0502a:5117_9: tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “nanu, upāsaka, attano santakaṃ parehi anāharaṇīyaṃ kātuṃ sakkosī”ti
atk-s0502a:5117_10: nayaṃ adāsi. So satthārā dinnanaye ṭhatvā satthāraṃ vanditvā “ajja ādiṃ katvā mama
atk-s0502a:5117_11: santakaṃ dasikasuttamattampi maṃ abhibhavitvā anekasatāpi rājāno vā corā vā gaṇhituṃ
atk-s0502a:5117_12: samatthā nāma mā hontu, aggināpi mama santakaṃ mā ḍayhatu, udakenapi mā vuyhatū”ti
atk-s0502a:5117_13: patthanaṃ akāsi. Satthāpissa “evaṃ hotū”ti anumodanaṃ akāsi. So gandhakuṭimahaṃ karonto
atk-s0502a:5117_14: aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyā bhikkhusatasahassānaṃ antovihāreyeva nava māse mahādānaṃ datvā dānapariyosāne
atk-s0502a:5117_15: sabbesaṃ ticīvaraṃ adāsi. Saṅghanavakassa cīvarasāṭakā sahassagghanakā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:5118_0: So evaṃ yāvatāyukaṃ puññāni karitvā tato cuto devaloke nibbattitvā ettakaṃ kālaṃ
atk-s0502a:5118_1: devamanussesu saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe ekasmiṃ seṭṭhikule paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0502a:5118_2: gahetvā aḍḍhamāsādhike nava māse mātukucchiyaṃ vasi. Jātadivase panassa sakalanagare
atk-s0502a:5118_3: sabbāvudhāni pajjaliṃsu, sabbesaṃ kāyarūḷhāni ābharaṇānipi pajjalitāni viya obhāsaṃ
atk-s0502a:5118_4: muñciṃsu, nagaraṃ ekapajjotaṃ ahosi. Seṭṭhipi pātova rājūpaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi. Atha
atk-s0502a:5118_5: naṃ rājā pucchi – “ajja sabbāvudhāni pajjaliṃsu, nagaraṃ ekapajjotaṃ jātaṃ, jānāsi
atk-s0502a:5118_6: nu kho ettha kāraṇa”nti? “Jānāmi, devā”ti. “Kiṃ, seṭṭhī”ti? “Mama gehe tumhākaṃ dāso
atk-s0502a:5118_7: jāto, tassa puññatejenevaṃ ahosī”ti. “Kiṃ nu kho coro bhavissatī”ti? “Natthetaṃ,
atk-s0502a:5118_8: deva, puññavā satto katābhinīhāro”ti. “Tena hi naṃ sammā posetuṃ vaṭṭati, idamassa
atk-s0502a:5118_9: khīramūlaṃ hotū”ti devasikaṃ sahassaṃ paṭṭhapesi. Athassa nāmagahaṇadivase sakalanagarassa
atk-s0502a:5119_0: Athassa vayappattakāle gehakaraṇatthāya bhūmitale sodhiyamāne sakkassa bhavanaṃ uṇhākāraṃ
atk-s0502a:5119_1: dassesi. Sakko “kiṃ nu kho ida”nti upadhārayamāno “jotikassa gehaṭṭhānaṃ gaṇhantī”ti
atk-s0502a:5119_2: ñatvā “nāyaṃ etehi katagehe vasissati, mayāpettha gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vaḍḍhakīvesena
atk-s0502a:5119_3: tattha gantvā “kiṃ karothā”ti āha. “Jotikassa gehaṭṭhānaṃ gaṇhāmā”ti. “Apetha, nāyaṃ
atk-s0502a:5119_4: tumhehi katagehe vasissatī”ti vatvā soḷasakarīsamattaṃ bhūmipadesaṃ olokesi, so tāvadeva
atk-s0502a:5119_5: kasiṇamaṇḍalaṃ viya samo ahosi. Puna “imasmiṃ ṭhāne pathaviṃ bhinditvā sattaratanamayo
atk-s0502a:5119_6: sattabhūmikapāsādo uṭṭhahatū”ti cintetvā olokesi, tāvadeva tathārūpo pāsādo uṭṭhahi.
atk-s0502a:5119_7: Puna “imaṃ parikkhipitvā sattaratanamayā satta pākārā uṭṭhahantū”ti cintetvā olokesi,
atk-s0502a:5119_8: tathārūpā pākārā uṭṭhahiṃsu. Atha “nesaṃ pariyante kapparukkhā uṭṭhahantū”ti cintetvā
atk-s0502a:5119_9: olokesi, tathārūpā kapparukkhā uṭṭhahiṃsu. “Pāsādassa catūsu kaṇṇesu catasso nidhikumbhiyo
atk-s0502a:5119_10: uṭṭhahantū”ti cintetvā olokesi, sabbaṃ tatheva ahosi. Nidhikumbhīsu pana ekā yojanikā
atk-s0502a:5119_11: ahosi, ekā tigāvutikā, ekā aḍḍhayojanikā, ekā gāvutappamāṇā. Bodhisattassa nibbattanidhikumbhīnaṃ
atk-s0502a:5119_12: pana ekamukhappamāṇaṃ ahosi, heṭṭhā pathavīpariyantāva ahesuṃ. Jotikassa nibbattanidhikumbhīnaṃ
atk-s0502a:5119_13: mukhaparimāṇaṃ na kathitaṃ, sabbā mukhachinnatālaphalaṃ viya paripuṇṇāva uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:5119_14: Pāsādassa catūsu kaṇṇesu taruṇatālakkhandhappamāṇā catasso suvaṇṇamayā ucchuyaṭṭhiyo
atk-s0502a:5119_15: nibbattiṃsu. Tāsaṃ maṇimayāni pattāni, sovaṇṇamayāni khandhāni ahesuṃ. Pubbakammassa
atk-s0502a:5120_0: Sattasu dvārakoṭṭhakesu satta yakkhā ārakkhaṃ gaṇhiṃsu. Paṭhame dvārakoṭṭhake yamakoḷī
atk-s0502a:5120_1: nāma yakkho attano parivārena yakkhasahassena saddhiṃ ārakkhaṃ gaṇhi, dutiye uppalo
atk-s0502a:5120_2: nāma attano parivārayakkhānaṃ dvīhi sahassehi saddhiṃ, tatiye vajiro nāma tīhi sahassehi
atk-s0502a:5120_3: saddhiṃ, catutthe vajirabāhu nāma catūhi sahassehi saddhiṃ, pañcame kasakando nāma
atk-s0502a:5120_4: pañcahi sahassehi saddhiṃ, chaṭṭhe kaṭattho nāma chahi sahassehi saddhiṃ, sattame
atk-s0502a:5120_5: disāmukho nāma sattahi sahassehi saddhiṃ ārakkhaṃ gaṇhi. Evaṃ pāsādassa anto ca bahi
atk-s0502a:5120_6: ca gāḷharakkhā ahosi. “Jotikassa kira sattaratanamayo sattabhūmikapāsādo uṭṭhito,
atk-s0502a:5120_7: satta pākārā sattadvārakoṭṭhakā catasso nidhikumbhiyo uṭṭhitā”ti sutvā bimbisāro
atk-s0502a:5120_8: rājā seṭṭhicchattaṃ pahiṇi. So jotikaseṭṭhi nāma ahosi.
atk-s0502a:5121_0: Tena pana saddhiṃ katapuññakammā itthī uttarakurūsu nibbatti. Atha naṃ devatā tato
atk-s0502a:5121_1: ānetvā sirigabbhe nisīdāpesuṃ. Sā āgacchamānā ekaṃ taṇḍulanāḷiṃ tayo ca jotipāsāṇe
atk-s0502a:5121_2: gaṇhi. Tesaṃ yāvajīvaṃ tāyeva taṇḍulanāḷiyā bhattaṃ ahosi. Sace kira te sakaṭasatampi
atk-s0502a:5121_3: taṇḍulānaṃ pūretukāmā honti, sā taṇḍulanāḷi nāḷiyeva hutvā tiṭṭhati. Bhattapacanakāle
atk-s0502a:5121_4: taṇḍule ukkhaliyaṃ pakkhipitvā tesaṃ pāsāṇānaṃ upari ṭhapeti, pāsāṇā tāvadeva pajjalitvā
atk-s0502a:5121_5: bhatte pakkamatte nibbāyanti. Teneva saññāṇena bhattassa pakkabhāvaṃ jānanti. Sūpeyyādipacanakālepi
atk-s0502a:5121_6: eseva nayo. Evaṃ tesaṃ jotipāsāṇehi āhāro paccati. Maṇiālokena ca vasanti, aggissa
atk-s0502a:5121_7: vā dīpassa vā obhāsaṃ neva jāniṃsu. “Jotikassa kira evarūpā sampattī”ti sakalajambudīpe
atk-s0502a:5121_8: pākaṭo ahosi. Mahājano yānādīni yojetvā dassanatthāya āgacchati. Jotikaseṭṭhi āgatāgatānaṃ
atk-s0502a:5121_9: uttarakurutaṇḍulānaṃ bhattaṃ pacāpetvā dāpesi. “Kapparukkhehi vatthāni gaṇhantu,
atk-s0502a:5121_10: ābharaṇāni gaṇhantū”ti āṇāpesi. “Gāvutikanidhikumbhiyā mukhaṃ vivarāpetvā yāpanamattaṃ
atk-s0502a:5121_11: dhanaṃ gaṇhantū”ti āṇāpesi. Sakalajambudīpavāsikesu dhanaṃ gahetvā gacchantesu nidhikumbhiyā
atk-s0502a:5121_12: aṅgulimattampi ūnaṃ nāhosi. Gandhakuṭipariveṇe vālukaṃ katvā okiṇṇaratanānaṃ kirassa eso nissando.
atk-s0502a:5122_0: Evaṃ mahājane vatthābharaṇāni ceva dhanañca yadicchakaṃ ādāya gacchante bimbisāro
atk-s0502a:5122_1: tassa pāsādaṃ daṭṭhukāmopi mahājane āgacchante okāsaṃ nālattha. Aparabhāge yadicchakaṃ
atk-s0502a:5122_2: ādāya gatattā manussesu mandībhūtesu rājā jotikassa pitaraṃ āha – “tava puttassa
atk-s0502a:5122_3: pāsādaṃ daṭṭhukāmamhā”ti. So “sādhu, devā”ti vatvā gantvā puttassa kathesi – “tāta,
atk-s0502a:5122_4: rājā te pāsādaṃ daṭṭhukāmo”ti. “Sādhu, tāta, āgacchatū”ti. Rājā mahantena parivārena
atk-s0502a:5122_5: tattha agamāsi. Paṭhamadvārakoṭṭhake sammajjitvā kacavarachaḍḍikā dāsī rañño hatthaṃ
atk-s0502a:5122_6: adāsi, rājā “seṭṭhijāyā”ti saññāya lajjamāno tassā bāhāya hatthaṃ na ṭhapesi. Evaṃ
atk-s0502a:5122_7: sesadvārakoṭṭhakesupi dāsiyo “seṭṭhibhariyāyo”ti maññamāno tāsaṃ bāhāya hatthaṃ na
atk-s0502a:5122_8: ṭhapesi. Jotiko āgantvā rājānaṃ paccuggantvā vanditvā pacchato hutvā “purato yātha,
atk-s0502a:5122_9: devā”ti āha. Rañño maṇipathavī sataporisapapāto viya hutvā upaṭṭhahi. So “iminā mama
atk-s0502a:5122_10: gahaṇatthāya opāto khaṇito”ti maññamāno pādaṃ nikkhipituṃ na visahi. Jotiko “nāyaṃ,
atk-s0502a:5122_11: deva, opāto, mama pacchato āgacchathā”ti purato ahosi. Rājā tena akkantakāle bhūmiṃ
atk-s0502a:5122_12: akkamitvā heṭṭhimatalato paṭṭhāya pāsādaṃ olokento vicari. Tadā ajātasattukumāropi
atk-s0502a:5122_13: pitu aṅguliṃ gahetvā vicaranto cintesi – “aho andhabālo mama pitā, gahapatike nāma
atk-s0502a:5122_14: sattaratanamaye pāsāde vasante esa rājā hutvā dārumaye gehe vasati, ahaṃ dāni rājā
atk-s0502a:5122_15: hutvā imassa imasmiṃ pāsāde vasituṃ na dassāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:5123_0: Raññopi uparimatalāni abhiruhantasseva pātarāsavelā jātā. So seṭṭhiṃ āmantetvā, “mahāseṭṭhi,
atk-s0502a:5123_1: idheva pātarāsaṃ bhuñjissāmā”ti. Jānāmi, deva, sajjito devassāhāroti. So soḷasahi
atk-s0502a:5123_2: gandhodakaghaṭehi nhatvā ratanamaye seṭṭhissa nisīdanamaṇḍape paññatte tasseva nisīdanapallaṅke
atk-s0502a:5123_3: nisīdi. Athassa hatthadhovanūdakaṃ datvā satasahassagghanikāya suvaṇṇapātiyā kilinnapāyāsaṃ
atk-s0502a:5123_4: vaḍḍhetvā purato ṭhapayiṃsu. Rājā “bhojana”nti saññāya bhuñjituṃ ārabhi. Seṭṭhi “nayidaṃ,
atk-s0502a:5123_5: deva, bhojanaṃ, kilinnapāyāso eso”ti aññissā suvaṇṇapātiyā bhojanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā purimapātiyaṃ
atk-s0502a:5123_6: ṭhapayiṃsu. Tato uṭṭhitautunā kira taṃ bhuñjituṃ sukhaṃ hoti. Rājā madhurabhojanaṃ
atk-s0502a:5123_7: bhuñjanto pamāṇaṃ na aññāsi. Atha naṃ seṭṭhi vanditvā añjaliṃ paggayha “alaṃ, deva,
atk-s0502a:5123_8: ettakameva hotu, ito uttariṃ jirāpetuṃ na sakkā”ti āha. Atha naṃ rājā āha – “kiṃ,
atk-s0502a:5123_9: gahapati, garukaṃ katvā kathesi attano bhatta”nti? Deva, natthetaṃ, tumhākaṃ sabbassāpi
atk-s0502a:5123_10: hi balakāyassa idameva bhattaṃ idaṃ supeyyaṃ. Api ca kho ahaṃ ayasassa bhāyāmīti.
atk-s0502a:5123_11: Kiṃ kāraṇāti? Sace devassa kāyālasiyamattaṃ bhaveyya, “hiyyo raññā seṭṭhissa gehe
atk-s0502a:5123_12: bhattaṃ bhuttaṃ, seṭṭhinā kiñci kataṃ bhavissatī”ti vacanassa bhāyāmi, devāti. Tena
atk-s0502a:5123_13: hi bhattaṃ hara, udakaṃ āharāti. Rañño bhattakiccāvasāne sabbo rājaparivāro tadeva bhattaṃ paribhuñji.
atk-s0502a:5124_0: Rājā sukhakathāya nisinno seṭṭhiṃ āmantetvā, “kiṃ imasmiṃ gehe seṭṭhibhariyā natthī”ti
atk-s0502a:5124_1: āha? “Āma atthi, devā”ti. “Kahaṃ sā”ti? “Sirigabbhe nisinnā, devassa āgatabhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:5124_2: na jānātī”ti. Kiñcāpi hi pātova rājā saparivāro āgato, sā panassa āgatabhāvaṃ na
atk-s0502a:5124_3: jānāteva. Tato seṭṭhi “rājā me bhariyaṃ daṭṭhukāmo”ti tassā santikaṃ gantvā “rājā
atk-s0502a:5124_4: āgato, kiṃ tava rājānaṃ daṭṭhuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti āha. Sā nipannakāva “ko esa, sāmi,
atk-s0502a:5124_5: rājā nāmā”ti vatvā “rājā nāma amhākaṃ issaro”ti vutte anattamanataṃ pavedentī “dukkaṭāni
atk-s0502a:5124_6: vata no puññakammāni, yesaṃ no issaropi atthi. Assaddhāya nāma puññakammāni katvā
atk-s0502a:5124_7: mayaṃ sampattiṃ pāpuṇitvā aññassa issariyaṭṭhāne nibbattamhā. Addhā amhehi asaddahitvā
atk-s0502a:5124_8: dānaṃ dinnaṃ bhavissati, tassetaṃ phala”nti vatvā “kiṃ dāni karomi, sāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:5124_9: Tālavaṇṭaṃ ādāya āgantvā rājānaṃ bījāhīti. Tassā tālavaṇṭaṃ ādāya āgantvā rājānaṃ
atk-s0502a:5124_10: bījentiyā rañño veṭhanassa gandhavāto akkhīni pahari, athassā akkhīhi assudhārā pavattiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:5124_11: Taṃ disvā rājā seṭṭhiṃ āha – “mahāseṭṭhi, mātugāmo nāma appabuddhiko, ‘rājā me sāmikassa
atk-s0502a:5124_12: sampattiṃ gaṇheyyā’ti bhayena rodati maññe, assāsehi naṃ ‘na me tava sampattiyā attho”’ti.
atk-s0502a:5124_13: Na esā, deva, rodatīti. Atha kiṃ etanti? Tumhākaṃ veṭhanagandhenassā assūni pavattiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:5124_14: Ayañhi dīpobhāsaṃ vā aggiobhāsaṃ vā adisvā maṇiālokeneva bhuñjati ca nisīdati ca
atk-s0502a:5124_15: nipajjati ca, devo pana dīpālokena nisinno bhavissatīti? Āma, seṭṭhīti. Tena hi,
atk-s0502a:5124_16: deva, ajja paṭṭhāya maṇiālokena nisīdathāti mahantaṃ tipusamattaṃ anagghaṃ maṇiratanaṃ
atk-s0502a:5124_17: adāsi. Rājā gehaṃ oloketvā “mahatī vata jotikassa sampattī”ti vatvā agamāsi. Ayaṃ
atk-s0502a:5125_0: Idāni jaṭilassa uppatti veditabbā – bārāṇasiyañhi ekā seṭṭhidhītā abhirūpā ahosi,
atk-s0502a:5125_1: taṃ pannarasasoḷasavassuddesikakāle rakkhaṇatthāya ekaṃ dāsiṃ datvā sattabhūmikassa
atk-s0502a:5125_2: pāsādassa uparimatale sirigabbhe vāsayiṃsu. Taṃ ekadivasaṃ vātapānaṃ vivaritvā bahi
atk-s0502a:5125_3: olokayamānaṃ ākāsena gacchanto eko vijjādharo disvā uppannasineho vātapānena pavisitvā
atk-s0502a:5125_4: tāya saddhiṃ santhavamakāsi. Sā tena saddhiṃ saṃvāsamanvāya na cirasseva gabbhaṃ
atk-s0502a:5125_5: paṭilabhi. Atha naṃ sā dāsī disvā, “amma, kiṃ ida”nti vatvā “hotu mā kassaci ācikkhī”ti
atk-s0502a:5125_6: tāya vuttā bhayena tuṇhī ahosi. Sāpi dasamāsaccayena puttaṃ vijāyitvā navabhājanaṃ
atk-s0502a:5125_7: āharāpetvā tattha taṃ dārakaṃ nipajjāpetvā taṃ bhājanaṃ pidahitvā upari pupphadāmāni
atk-s0502a:5125_8: ṭhapetvā “imaṃ sīsena ukkhipitvā gaṅgāya vissajjehi, ‘kiṃ ida’nti ca puṭṭhā ‘ayyāya
atk-s0502a:5125_9: me balikamma’nti vadeyyāsī”ti dāsiṃ āṇāpesi. Sā tathā akāsi.
atk-s0502a:5126_0: Heṭṭhāgaṅgāyampi dve itthiyo nhāyamānā taṃ bhājanaṃ udakenāhariyamānaṃ disvā ekā
atk-s0502a:5126_1: “mayhetaṃ bhājana”nti āha. Ekā “yaṃ etassa anto, taṃ mayha”nti vatvā bhājane sampatte
atk-s0502a:5126_2: taṃ ādāya thale ṭhapetvā vivaritvā dārakaṃ disvā ekā “mama bhājananti vuttatāya dārako
atk-s0502a:5126_3: mameva hotī”ti āha. Ekā “yaṃ bhājanassa anto, taṃ mameva hotūti vuttatāya mama dārako”ti
atk-s0502a:5126_4: āha. Tā vivadamānā vinicchayaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ ārocetvā amaccesu vinicchituṃ
atk-s0502a:5126_5: asakkontesu rañño santikaṃ agamaṃsu. Rājā tāsaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā “tvaṃ dārakaṃ gaṇha,
atk-s0502a:5126_6: tvaṃ bhājanaṃ gaṇhā”ti āha. Yāya pana dārako laddho, sā mahākaccānattherassa upaṭṭhāyikā
atk-s0502a:5126_7: ahosi. Tasmā sā dārakaṃ “imaṃ therassa santike pabbājessāmī”ti posesi. Tassa jātadivase
atk-s0502a:5126_8: gabbhamalassa dhovitvā anapanītatāya kesā jaṭitā hutvā aṭṭhaṃsu, tenassa jaṭilotveva
atk-s0502a:5126_9: nāmaṃ kariṃsu. Tassa padasā vicaraṇakāle thero taṃ gehaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi. Upāsikā
atk-s0502a:5126_10: theraṃ nisīdāpetvā āhāramadāsi. Thero dārakaṃ disvā “kiṃ upāsike dārako laddho”ti
atk-s0502a:5126_11: pucchi. “Āma, bhante, imāhaṃ dārakaṃ tumhākaṃ santike pabbājessāmīti posesiṃ, pabbājetha
atk-s0502a:5126_12: na”nti adāsi. Thero “sādhū”ti ādāya taṃ gacchanto “atthi nu kho imassa gihisampattiṃ
atk-s0502a:5126_13: anubhavituṃ puññakamma”nti olokento “mahāpuñño satto mahāsampattiṃ anubhavissati,
atk-s0502a:5126_14: daharo esa tāva, ñāṇampissa paripākaṃ na gacchatī”ti cintetvā taṃ ādāya takkasilāyaṃ
atk-s0502a:5127_0: So theraṃ vanditvā ṭhito taṃ dārakaṃ disvā “dārako vo, bhante, laddho”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a:5127_1: Āma, upāsaka, pabbajissati, daharo tāva, taveva santike hotūti. So “sādhu, bhante”ti
atk-s0502a:5127_2: taṃ puttaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā paṭijaggi. Tassa pana gehe dvādasa vassāni bhaṇḍakaṃ ussannaṃ
atk-s0502a:5127_3: hoti. So gāmantaraṃ gacchanto sabbampi taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ āpaṇaṃ haritvā dārakaṃ āpaṇe nisīdāpetvā
atk-s0502a:5127_4: tassa tassa bhaṇḍakassa mūlaṃ ācikkhitvā “idañca idañca ettakaṃ nāma dhanaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0502a:5127_5: dadeyyāsī”ti vatvā pakkāmi. Taṃdivasaṃ nagarapariggāhikā devatā antamaso maricajīrakamattenāpi
atk-s0502a:5127_6: atthike tasseva āpaṇābhimukhe kariṃsu. So dvādasa vassāni ussannaṃ bhaṇḍakaṃ ekadivaseneva
atk-s0502a:5127_7: vikkiṇi. Kuṭumbiko āgantvā āpaṇe kiñci adisvā “sabbaṃ te, tāta, bhaṇḍakaṃ nāsita”nti
atk-s0502a:5127_8: āha. Na nāsemi, sabbaṃ tumhehi vuttanayeneva vikkiṇiṃ, idaṃ asukassa mūlaṃ, idaṃ
atk-s0502a:5127_9: asukassāti. Kuṭumbiko pasīditvā “anaggho puriso, yattha katthaci jīvituṃ samattho”ti
atk-s0502a:5127_10: attano gehe vayappattaṃ dhītaraṃ tassa datvā “gehamassa karothā”ti purise āṇāpetvā
atk-s0502a:5127_11: niṭṭhite gehe “gacchatha, tumhe attano gehe vasathā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:5128_0: Athassa gehapavisanakāle ekena pādena ummāre akkantamatte gehassa pacchimabhāge bhūmiṃ
atk-s0502a:5128_1: bhinditvā asītihattho suvaṇṇapabbato uṭṭhahi. Rājā “jaṭilakumārassa kira gehe bhūmiṃ
atk-s0502a:5128_2: bhinditvā suvaṇṇapabbato uṭṭhito”ti sutvāva tassa seṭṭhicchattaṃ pesesi. So jaṭilaseṭṭhi
atk-s0502a:5128_3: nāma ahosi. Tassa tayo puttā ahesuṃ. So tesaṃ vayappattakāle pabbajjāya cittaṃ uppādetvā
atk-s0502a:5128_4: “sace amhehi samānabhogaṃ seṭṭhikulaṃ bhavissati, pabbajituṃ dassanti. No ce, na
atk-s0502a:5128_5: dassanti. Atthi nu kho jambudīpe amhehi samānabhogaṃ kula”nti vīmaṃsanatthāya suvaṇṇamayaṃ
atk-s0502a:5128_6: iṭṭhakaṃ suvaṇṇamayaṃ patodalaṭṭhiṃ suvaṇṇamayaṃ pādukañca kārāpetvā purisānaṃ hatthe
atk-s0502a:5128_7: datvā “gacchatha, imāni ādāya kiñcideva olokayamānā viya jambudīpatale vicaritvā
atk-s0502a:5128_8: amhehi samānabhogassa seṭṭhikulassa atthibhāvaṃ vā natthibhāvaṃ vā ñatvā āgacchathā”ti pahiṇi.
atk-s0502a:5129_0: Te cārikaṃ carantā bhaddiyanagaraṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Atha ne meṇḍakaseṭṭhi disvā, “tātā,
atk-s0502a:5129_1: kiṃ karontā vicarathā”ti pucchitvā “ekaṃ olokentā vicarāmā”ti vutte “imesaṃ imāni
atk-s0502a:5129_2: gahetvā kiñcideva oloketuṃ vicaraṇakiccaṃ natthi, raṭṭhaṃ pariggaṇhamānā vicarantī”ti
atk-s0502a:5129_3: ñatvā, “tātā, amhākaṃ pacchimagehaṃ pavisitvā olokethā”ti āha. Te tattha aṭṭhakarīsamatte
atk-s0502a:5129_4: ṭhāne hatthiassausabhappamāṇe piṭṭhiyā piṭṭhiṃ āhacca pathaviṃ bhinditvā uṭṭhite
atk-s0502a:5129_5: heṭṭhā vuttappakāre suvaṇṇameṇḍake disvā tesaṃ antarantarā vicaritvā nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:5129_6: Atha ne seṭṭhi, “tātā, yaṃ olokentā vicaratha, diṭṭho vo so”ti pucchitvā “passāma,
atk-s0502a:5129_7: sāmī”ti vutte “tena hi gacchathā”ti uyyojesi. Te tatova gantvā attano seṭṭhinā “kiṃ,
atk-s0502a:5129_8: tātā, diṭṭhaṃ vo amhākaṃ samānabhogaṃ seṭṭhikula”nti vutte, “sāmi, tumhākaṃ kiṃ atthi,
atk-s0502a:5129_9: bhaddiyanagare meṇḍakaseṭṭhino evarūpo nāma vibhavo”ti sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:5129_10: Taṃ sutvā seṭṭhi attamano hutvā “ekaṃ tāva seṭṭhikulaṃ laddhaṃ, aparampi nu kho atthī”ti
atk-s0502a:5129_11: satasahassagghanikaṃ kambalaṃ datvā “gacchatha, tātā, aññampi. Seṭṭhikulaṃ vicinathā”ti pahiṇi.
atk-s0502a:5130_0: Te rājagahaṃ gantvā jotikaseṭṭhissa gehato avidūre dārurāsiṃ katvā aggiṃ datvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:5130_1: “Kiṃ ida”nti puṭṭhakāle ca “ekaṃ no mahagghakambalaṃ vikkiṇantānaṃ kayiko natthi,
atk-s0502a:5130_2: gahetvā vicarantāpi corānaṃ bhāyāma, tena taṃ jhāpetvā gamissāmā”ti vadiṃsu. Atha
atk-s0502a:5130_3: ne jotikaseṭṭhi disvā “ime kiṃ karontī”ti pucchitvā tamatthaṃ sutvā pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0502a:5130_4: “kiṃ agghanako kambalo”ti pucchi. “Satasahassagghanako”ti vutte satasahassaṃ dāpetvā
atk-s0502a:5130_5: “dvārakoṭṭhakaṃ sammajjitvā kacavarachaḍḍikāya dāsiyā dethā”ti tesaṃyeva hatthe pahiṇi.
atk-s0502a:5130_6: Sā kambalaṃ gahetvā rodamānā sāmikassa santikaṃ āgantvā “kiṃ maṃ, sāmi, aparādhe
atk-s0502a:5130_7: sati paharituṃ na vaṭṭati, kasmā me evarūpaṃ thūlakambalaṃ pahiṇittha, kathāhaṃ imaṃ
atk-s0502a:5130_8: nivāsessāmi vā pārupissāmi vā”ti. Nāhaṃ tava etadatthāya pahiṇiṃ, etaṃ pana paliveṭhetvā
atk-s0502a:5130_9: tava sayanapādamūle ṭhapetvā nipajjanakāle gandhodakena dhotānaṃ pādānaṃ puñchanatthāya
atk-s0502a:5130_10: te pahiṇiṃ, kiṃ etampi kātuṃ na sakkosīti. Sā “etaṃ pana kātuṃ sakkhissāmī”ti gahetvā
atk-s0502a:5130_11: agamāsi. Te ca purisā taṃ kāraṇaṃ disvā attano seṭṭhissa santikaṃ gantvā “kiṃ, tātā,
atk-s0502a:5130_12: diṭṭhaṃ vo seṭṭhikula”nti vutte, “sāmi, kiṃ tumhākaṃ atthi, rājagahanagare jotikaseṭṭhissa
atk-s0502a:5130_13: evarūpā nāma sampattī”ti sabbaṃ gehasampattiṃ ārocetvā taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhiṃsu. Seṭṭhi
atk-s0502a:5130_14: tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā tuṭṭhamānaso “idāni pabbajituṃ labhissāmī”ti rañño santikaṃ gantvā
atk-s0502a:5130_15: “pabbajitukāmomhi, devā”ti āha. Sādhu, mahāseṭṭhi, pabbajāhīti. So gehaṃ gantvā putte
atk-s0502a:5130_16: pakkosāpetvā suvaṇṇadaṇḍaṃ vajirakuddālaṃ jeṭṭhaputtassa hatthe ṭhapetvā, “tāta,
atk-s0502a:5130_17: pacchimagehe suvaṇṇapabbatato suvaṇṇapiṇḍaṃ uddharāhī”ti āha. So kuddālaṃ ādāya gantvā
atk-s0502a:5130_18: suvaṇṇapabbataṃ pahari, piṭṭhipāsāṇe pahaṭakālo viya ahosi. Tassa hatthato kuddālaṃ
atk-s0502a:5130_19: gahetvā majjhimaputtassa hatthe datvā pahiṇi, tassapi suvaṇṇapabbataṃ paharantassa
atk-s0502a:5130_20: piṭṭhipāsāṇe pahaṭakālo viya ahosi. Atha naṃ kaniṭṭhaputtassa hatthe datvā pahiṇi,
atk-s0502a:5130_21: tassa taṃ gahetvā paharantassa koṭṭetvā rāsikatāya mattikāya pahaṭakālo viya ahosi.
atk-s0502a:5130_22: Atha naṃ seṭṭhi “ehi, tāta, alaṃ ettakenā”ti vatvā itare dve jeṭṭhabhātike pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0502a:5130_23: “ayaṃ suvaṇṇapabbato na tumhākaṃ nibbatto, mayhañca kaniṭṭhassa ca nibbatto, iminā
atk-s0502a:5130_24: saddhiṃ ekato hutvā paribhuñjathā”ti āha. Kasmā pana so tesameva nibbattati, kasmā
atk-s0502a:5130_25: ca jaṭilo jātakāle udake pātitoti? Attano katakammeneva.
atk-s0502a:5131_0: Kassapasammāsambuddhassa hi cetiye kariyamāne eko khīṇāsavo cetiyaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā
atk-s0502a:5131_1: oloketvā, “tātā, kasmā cetiyassa uttarena mukhaṃ na uṭṭhahatī”ti pucchi. “Suvaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:5131_2: nappahotī”ti āhaṃsu. Ahaṃ antogāmaṃ pavisitvā samādapessāmi, tumhe ādarena kammaṃ
atk-s0502a:5131_3: karothāti. So evaṃ vatvā nagaraṃ pavisitvā, “ammā, tātā, tumhākaṃ cetiyassa ekasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:5131_4: mukhe suvaṇṇaṃ nappahoti, suvaṇṇaṃ jānāthā”ti mahājanaṃ samādapento suvaṇṇakārakulaṃ
atk-s0502a:5131_5: agamāsi. Suvaṇṇakāropi taṅkhaṇeyeva bhariyāya saddhiṃ kalahaṃ karonto nisinno hoti.
atk-s0502a:5131_6: Atha naṃ thero “cetiye tumhehi gahitamukhassa suvaṇṇaṃ nappahoti, taṃ jānituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0502a:5131_7: āha. So bhariyāya kopena “tava satthāraṃ udake khipitvā gacchā”ti āha. Atha naṃ sā
atk-s0502a:5131_8: “atisāhasikakammaṃ te kataṃ, mama kuddhena te ahameva akkositabbā vā paharitabbā
atk-s0502a:5131_9: vā, kasmā atītānāgatapaccuppannesu buddhesu veramakāsī”ti āha. Suvaṇṇakāro tāvadeva
atk-s0502a:5131_10: saṃvegappatto hutvā “khamatha me, bhante”ti vatvā therassa pādamūle nipajji. Tāta,
atk-s0502a:5131_11: ahaṃ tayā na kiñci vutto, satthāraṃ khamāpehīti. Kinti katvā khamāpemi, bhanteti.
atk-s0502a:5131_12: Suvaṇṇapupphānaṃ tayo kumbhe katvā antodhātunidhāne pakkhipitvā allavattho allakeso
atk-s0502a:5132_0: So “sādhu, bhante”ti vatvā suvaṇṇapupphāni karonto tīsu puttesu jeṭṭhaputtaṃ pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0502a:5132_1: “ehi, tāta, ahaṃ satthāraṃ veravacanena avacaṃ, tasmā imāni pupphāni katvā dhātunidhāne
atk-s0502a:5132_2: pakkhipitvā khamāpessāmi, tvampi kho me sahāyo hohī”ti āha. So “na tvaṃ mayā veravacanaṃ
atk-s0502a:5132_3: vadāpito, tvaṃyeva karohī”ti kātuṃ na icchi. Majjhimaputtaṃ pakkositvā tathevāha,
atk-s0502a:5132_4: sopi tatheva vatvā kātuṃ na icchi. Kaniṭṭhaṃ pakkositvā tathevāha, so “pitu uppannakiccaṃ
atk-s0502a:5132_5: nāma puttassa bhāro”ti vatvā pitusahāyo hutvā pupphāni akāsi. Suvaṇṇakāro vidatthippamāṇānaṃ
atk-s0502a:5132_6: pupphānaṃ tayo kumbhe niṭṭhāpetvā dhātunidhāne pakkhipitvā allavattho allakeso satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:5132_7: khamāpesi. Iti so sattakkhattuṃ jātakāle udake pātanaṃ labhi. Ayaṃ panassa koṭiyaṃ
atk-s0502a:5132_8: ṭhito attabhāvo. Idhāpi tasseva nissandena udake pātito. Ye panassa dve jeṭṭhabhātikā
atk-s0502a:5132_9: puttā suvaṇṇapupphānaṃ karaṇakāle sahāyā bhavituṃ na icchiṃsu, tesaṃ tena kāraṇena
atk-s0502a:5132_10: suvaṇṇapabbato na nibbatti, jaṭilassa ceva kaniṭṭhaputtassa ca ekato katabhāvena
atk-s0502a:5132_11: nibbatti. Iti so putte anusāsitvā satthu santike pabbajitvā katipāheneva arahattaṃ
atk-s0502a:5132_12: pāpuṇi. Satthā aparena samayena pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ piṇḍāya caranto tassa
atk-s0502a:5132_13: puttānaṃ gehadvāraṃ agamāsi, te buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa aḍḍhamāsaṃ bhikkhādānaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:5133_0: Bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “ajjāpi te, āvuso jaṭila, asītihatthe
atk-s0502a:5133_1: suvaṇṇapabbate ca puttesu ca taṇhā atthī”ti. “Na me, āvuso, etesu taṇhā vā māno vā
atk-s0502a:5133_2: atthī”ti. Te “ayaṃ jaṭilatthero abhūtaṃ vatvā aññaṃ byākarotī”ti vadiṃsu. Satthā
atk-s0502a:5133_3: tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā “na, bhikkhave, mama puttassa tesu taṇhā vā māno vā atthī”ti vatvā
atk-s0502a:5137_0: Tassattho – yo idha loke chadvārikaṃ taṇhaṃ vā mānaṃ vā jahitvā gharāvāsena anatthiko
atk-s0502a:5137_1: anāgāro hutvā paribbajati, taṇhāya ceva bhavassa ca parikkhīṇattā taṇhābhavaparikkhīṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:5141: Yodha taṇhanti puna imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto jotikattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:5142_0: Ajātasattukumāro hi devadattena saddhiṃ ekato hutvā pitaraṃ ghātetvā rajje patiṭṭhito
atk-s0502a:5142_1: “jotikaseṭṭhissa mahāpāsādaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti yuddhasajjo nikkhamitvā maṇipākāre saparivārassa
atk-s0502a:5142_2: attano chāyaṃ disvā “gahapatiko yuddhasajjo hutvā balaṃ ādāya nikkhanto”ti sallakkhetvā
atk-s0502a:5142_3: upagantuṃ na visahi. Seṭṭhipi taṃ divasaṃ uposathiko hutvā pātova bhuttapātarāso
atk-s0502a:5142_4: vihāraṃ gantvā satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇanto nisinno hoti. Paṭhame dvārakoṭṭhake
atk-s0502a:5142_5: ārakkhaṃ gahetvā ṭhito pana yamakoḷi nāma yakkho taṃ disvā “kahaṃ gacchasī”ti saparivāraṃ
atk-s0502a:5142_6: viddhaṃsetvā disāvidisāsu anubandhi. Rājā vihārameva agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:5143_0: Atha naṃ seṭṭhi disvāva “kiṃ, devā”ti vatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā aṭṭhāsi. Gahapati, kiṃ tvaṃ
atk-s0502a:5143_1: tava purise “mayā saddhiṃ yujjhathā”ti āṇāpetvā idhāgamma dhammaṃ suṇanto viya nisinnoti.
atk-s0502a:5143_2: Kiṃ pana devo mama gehaṃ gaṇhituṃ gatoti? Āma, gatomhīti. Mama anicchāya mama gehaṃ
atk-s0502a:5143_3: gaṇhituṃ rājasahassampi na sakkoti, devāti. So “kiṃ pana tvaṃ rājā bhavissasī”ti
atk-s0502a:5143_4: kujjhi. Nāhaṃ rājā, mama santakaṃ pana dasikasuttampi mama anicchāya rājūhi vā corehi
atk-s0502a:5143_5: vā gahetuṃ na sakkāti. Kiṃ panāhaṃ tava ruciyā gaṇhissāmīti? Tena hi, deva, imā me
atk-s0502a:5143_6: dasasu aṅgulīsu vīsati muddikā, imāhaṃ tumhākaṃ na demi. Sace sakkotha, gaṇhathāti.
atk-s0502a:5143_7: So pana rājā bhūmiyaṃ ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā ullaṅghanto aṭṭhārasahatthaṃ ṭhānaṃ abhiruhati,
atk-s0502a:5143_8: ṭhatvā ullaṅghanto asītihatthaṃ ṭhānaṃ abhiruhati. Evaṃmahābalo samānopi ito cito
atk-s0502a:5143_9: ca parivattento ekaṃ muddikampi kaḍḍhituṃ nāsakkhi. Atha naṃ seṭṭhi “sāṭakaṃ patthara,
atk-s0502a:5143_10: devā”ti vatvā aṅguliyo ujukā akāsi, vīsatipi muddikā nikkhamiṃsu. Atha naṃ seṭṭhi
atk-s0502a:5143_11: “evaṃ, deva, mama santakaṃ mama anicchāya na sakkā gaṇhitu”nti vatvā rañño kiriyāya
atk-s0502a:5143_12: uppannasaṃvego “pabbajituṃ me anujāna, devā”ti āha. So “imasmiṃ pabbajite sukhaṃ
atk-s0502a:5143_13: pāsādaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti cintetvā ekavacaneneva “tvaṃ pabbajāhī”ti āha. So satthu santike
atk-s0502a:5143_14: pabbajitvā na cirasseva arahattaṃ patvā jotikatthero nāma ahosi. Tassa arahattaṃ
atk-s0502a:5143_15: pattakkhaṇeyeva sabbāpi sā sampatti antaradhāyi, tampissa satulakāyiṃ nāma bhariyaṃ
atk-s0502a:5144_0: Athekadivasaṃ bhikkhū taṃ āmantetvā, “āvuso jotika, tasmiṃ pana te pāsāde vā itthiyā
atk-s0502a:5144_1: vā taṇhā atthī”ti pucchitvā “natthāvuso”ti vutte satthu ārocesuṃ – “ayaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a:5144_2: abhūtaṃ vatvā aññaṃ byākarotī”ti. Satthā “nattheva, bhikkhave, mama puttassa tasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:5148: Imissā gāthāyattho heṭṭhā jaṭilattheravatthumhi vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0502a:5152: Hitvāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto ekaṃ naṭaputtakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:5153_0: So kira ekaṃ naṭakīḷaṃ kīḷayamāno vicaranto satthu dhammakathaṃ sutvā pabbajitvā
atk-s0502a:5153_1: arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tasmiṃ buddhappamukhena bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ piṇḍāya pavisante
atk-s0502a:5153_2: bhikkhū ekaṃ naṭaputtaṃ kīḷantaṃ disvā, “āvuso, esa tayā kīḷitakīḷitaṃ kīḷati, atthi
atk-s0502a:5153_3: nu kho te ettha sineho”ti pucchitvā “natthī”ti vutte “ayaṃ, bhante, abhūtaṃ vatvā
atk-s0502a:5153_4: aññaṃ byākarotī”ti āhaṃsu. Satthā tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā, “bhikkhave, mama putto sabbayoge
atk-s0502a:5157_0: Tattha mānusakaṃ yoganti mānusakaṃ āyuñceva pañca kāmaguṇe ca. Dibbayogepi eseva
atk-s0502a:5157_1: nayo. Upaccagāti yo mānusakaṃ yogaṃ hitvā dibbaṃ yogaṃ atikkanto, taṃ sabbehi catūhipi
atk-s0502a:5157_2: yogehi visaṃyuttaṃ ahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a:5161_0: Hitvā ratiñcāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto ekaṃ naṭaputtakaṃyeva
atk-s0502a:5161_1: ārabbha kathesi. Vatthu purimasadisameva. Idha pana satthā, “bhikkhave, mama putto
atk-s0502a:5161_2: ratiñca aratiñca pahāya ṭhito”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:5165_0: Tattha ratinti pañcakāmaguṇaratiṃ. Aratinti araññavāse ukkaṇṭhitattaṃ. Sītibhūtanti
atk-s0502a:5165_1: nibbutaṃ. Nirūpadhinti nirupakkilesaṃ. Vīranti taṃ evarūpaṃ sabbaṃ khandhalokaṃ abhibhavitvā
atk-s0502a:5165_2: ṭhitaṃ vīriyavantaṃ ahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a:5169: Cutiṃ yo vedīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto vaṅgīsattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:5170_0: Rājagahe kireko brāhmaṇo vaṅgīso nāma matamanussānaṃ sīsaṃ ākoṭetvā “idaṃ niraye
atk-s0502a:5170_1: nibbattassa sīsaṃ, idaṃ tiracchānayoniyaṃ, idaṃ pettivisaye, idaṃ manussaloke, idaṃ
atk-s0502a:5170_2: devaloke nibbattassa sīsa”nti jānāti. Brāhmaṇā “sakkā imaṃ nissāya lokaṃ khāditu”nti
atk-s0502a:5170_3: cintetvā taṃ dve rattavatthāni paridahāpetvā ādāya janapadaṃ carantā manusse vadanti
atk-s0502a:5170_4: “eso vaṅgīso nāma brāhmaṇo matamanussānaṃ sīsaṃ ākoṭetvā nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ jānāti,
atk-s0502a:5170_5: attano ñātakānaṃ nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ pucchathā”ti. Manussā yathābalaṃ dasapi kahāpaṇe
atk-s0502a:5170_6: vīsatipi satampi datvā ñātakānaṃ nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ pucchanti. Te anupubbena sāvatthiṃ
atk-s0502a:5170_7: patvā jetavanassa avidūre nivāsaṃ gaṇhiṃsu. Te bhuttapātarāsā mahājanaṃ gandhamālādihatthaṃ
atk-s0502a:5170_8: dhammassavanāya gacchantaṃ disvā “kahaṃ gacchathā”ti pucchitvā “vihāraṃ dhammassavanāyā”ti
atk-s0502a:5170_9: vutte “tattha gantvā kiṃ karissatha, amhākaṃ vaṅgīsabrāhmaṇena sadiso nāma natthi,
atk-s0502a:5170_10: matamanussānaṃ sīsaṃ ākoṭetvā nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ jānāti, ñātakānaṃ nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ pucchathā”ti
atk-s0502a:5170_11: āhaṃsu. Te “vaṅgīso kiṃ jānāti, amhākaṃ satthārā sadiso nāma natthī”ti vatvā itarehipi
atk-s0502a:5170_12: “vaṅgīsasadiso natthī”ti vutte kathaṃ vaḍḍhetvā “etha, dāni vo vaṅgīsassa vā amhākaṃ
atk-s0502a:5170_13: vā satthu jānanabhāvaṃ jānissāmā”ti te ādāya vihāraṃ agamaṃsu. Satthā tesaṃ āgamanabhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:5170_14: ñatvā niraye tiracchānayoniyaṃ manussaloke devaloketi catūsu ṭhānesu nibbattānaṃ
atk-s0502a:5170_15: cattāri sīsāni, khīṇāsavasīsañcāti pañca sīsāni āharāpetvā paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapetvā āgatakāle
atk-s0502a:5170_16: vaṅgīsaṃ pucchi – “tvaṃ kira sīsaṃ ākoṭetvā matakānaṃ nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ jānāsī”ti?
atk-s0502a:5170_17: “Āma, jānāmī”ti. “Idaṃ kassa sīsa”nti? So taṃ ākoṭetvā “niraye nibbattassā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:5170_18: Athassa satthā “sādhu sādhū”ti sādhukāraṃ datvā itarānipi tīṇi sīsāni pucchitvā tena
atk-s0502a:5170_19: avirajjhitvā vuttavuttakkhaṇe tatheva tassa sādhukāraṃ datvā pañcamaṃ sīsaṃ dassetvā
atk-s0502a:5170_20: “idaṃ kassa sīsa”nti pucchi, so tampi ākoṭetvā nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ na jānāti.
atk-s0502a:5171_0: Atha naṃ satthā “kiṃ, vaṅgīsa, na jānāsī”ti vatvā, “āma, na jānāmī”ti vutte “ahaṃ
atk-s0502a:5171_1: jānāmī”ti āha. Atha naṃ vaṅgīso yāci “detha me imaṃ manta”nti. Na sakkā apabbajitassa
atk-s0502a:5171_2: dātunti. So “imasmiṃ mante gahite sakalajambudīpe ahaṃ jeṭṭhako bhavissāmī”ti cintetvā
atk-s0502a:5171_3: te brāhmaṇe “tumhe tattheva katipāhaṃ vasatha, ahaṃ pabbajissāmī”ti uyyojetvā satthu
atk-s0502a:5171_4: santike pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado vaṅgīsatthero nāma ahosi. Athassa satthā dvattiṃsākārakammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:5171_5: datvā “mantassa parikammaṃ sajjhāyāhī”ti āha. So taṃ sajjhāyanto antarantarā brāhmaṇehi
atk-s0502a:5171_6: “gahito te manto”ti pucchiyamāno “āgametha tāva, gaṇhāmī”ti vatvā katipāheneva arahattaṃ
atk-s0502a:5171_7: patvā puna brāhmaṇehi puṭṭho “abhabbo dānāhaṃ, āvuso, gantu”nti āha. Taṃ sutvā bhikkhū
atk-s0502a:5171_8: “ayaṃ, bhante, abhūtena aññaṃ byākarotī”ti satthu ārocesuṃ. Satthā “mā, bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a:5171_9: evaṃ avacuttha, idāni, bhikkhave, mama putto cutipaṭisandhikusalo jāto”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:5174: Asattaṃ sugataṃ buddhaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ.
atk-s0502a:5178_0: Tattha yo vedīti yo sattānaṃ sabbākārena cutiñca paṭisandhiñca pākaṭaṃ katvā jānāti,
atk-s0502a:5178_1: tamahaṃ alaggatāya asattaṃ, paṭipattiyā suṭṭhu gatattā sugataṃ, catunnaṃ saccānaṃ
atk-s0502a:5178_2: buddhatāya buddhaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho. Yassāti yassete devādayo gatiṃ na jānanti,
atk-s0502a:5178_3: tamahaṃ āsavānaṃ khīṇatāya khīṇāsavaṃ, kilesehi ārakattā arahantaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a:5182: Yassāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto dhammadinnaṃ nāma bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:5183_0: Ekadivasañhi tassā gihikāle sāmiko visākho upāsako satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā anāgāmiphalaṃ
atk-s0502a:5183_1: patvā cintesi – “mayā sabbaṃ sāpateyyaṃ dhammadinnaṃ paṭicchāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti. So
atk-s0502a:5183_2: tato pubbe āgacchanto dhammadinnaṃ vātapānena olokentiṃ disvā sitaṃ karoti. Taṃ divasaṃ
atk-s0502a:5183_3: pana vātapānena ṭhitaṃ anolokentova agamāsi. Sā “kiṃ nu kho ida”nti cintetvā “hotu,
atk-s0502a:5183_4: bhojanakāle jānissāmī”ti bhojanavelāya bhattaṃ upanāmesi. So aññesu divasesu “ehi,
atk-s0502a:5183_5: ekato bhuñjāmā”ti vadati, taṃ divasaṃ pana tuṇhībhūtova bhuñji. Sā “kenacideva kāraṇena
atk-s0502a:5183_6: kupito bhavissatī”ti cintesi. Atha naṃ visākho sukhanisinnavelāya taṃ pakkositvā
atk-s0502a:5183_7: “dhammadinne imasmiṃ gehe sabbaṃ sāpateyyaṃ paṭicchāhī”ti āha. Sā “kuddhā nāma sāpateyyaṃ
atk-s0502a:5183_8: na paṭicchāpenti, kiṃ nu kho eta”nti cintetvā “tumhe pana, sāmī”ti āha. Ahaṃ ito
atk-s0502a:5183_9: paṭṭhāya na kiñci vicāremīti. Tumhehi chaḍḍitaṃ kheḷaṃ ko paṭicchissati, evaṃ sante
atk-s0502a:5183_10: mama pabbajjaṃ anujānāthāti. So “sādhu, bhadde”ti sampaṭicchitvā mahantena sakkārena
atk-s0502a:5183_11: taṃ bhikkhunīupassayaṃ netvā pabbājesi. Sā laddhūpasampadā dhammadinnattherī nāma ahosi.
atk-s0502a:5184_0: Sā pavivekakāmatāya bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ janapadaṃ gantvā tattha viharantī na cirasseva
atk-s0502a:5184_1: saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā “idāni maṃ nissāya ñātijanā puññāni karissantī”ti
atk-s0502a:5184_2: punadeva rājagahaṃ paccāgañchi. Upāsako tassā āgatabhāvaṃ sutvā “kena nu kho kāraṇena
atk-s0502a:5184_3: āgatā”ti bhikkhunīupassayaṃ gantvā theriṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno “ukkaṇṭhitā
atk-s0502a:5184_4: nu khosi, ayyeti vattuṃ appatirūpaṃ, pañhamekaṃ naṃ pucchissāmī”ti cintetvā sotāpattimagge
atk-s0502a:5184_5: pañhaṃ pucchi, sā taṃ vissajjesi. Upāsako teneva upāyena sesamaggesupi pañhaṃ pucchitvā
atk-s0502a:5184_6: atikkamma pañhassa puṭṭhakāle tāya “accayāsi, āvuso, visākhā”ti vatvā “ākaṅkhamāno
atk-s0502a:5184_7: satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā imaṃ pañhaṃ puccheyyāsī”ti vutte theriṃ vanditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā
atk-s0502a:5184_8: satthu santikaṃ gantvā taṃ kathāsallāpaṃ sabbaṃ bhagavato ārocesi. Satthā “sukathitaṃ
atk-s0502a:5184_9: mama dhītāya dhammadinnāya, ahampetaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjento evameva vissajjeyya”nti
atk-s0502a:5186: “Yassa pure ca pacchā ca, majjhe ca natthi kiñcanaṃ;
atk-s0502a:5188_0: Tattha pureti atītesu khandhesu. Pacchāti anāgatesu khandhesu. Majjheti paccuppannesu
atk-s0502a:5188_1: khandhesu. Natthi kiñcananti yassetesu ṭhānesu taṇhāgāhasaṅkhātaṃ kiñcanaṃ natthi,
atk-s0502a:5188_2: tamahaṃ rāgakiñcanādīhi akiñcanaṃ kassaci gahaṇassa abhāvena anādānaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a:5192: Usabhanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aṅgulimālattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi. Vatthu “na ve kadariyā devalokaṃ vajantī”ti gāthāvaṇṇanāya vuttameva. Vuttañhi tattha –
atk-s0502a:5193_0: Bhikkhū aṅgulimālaṃ pucchiṃsu – “kiṃ nu kho, āvuso aṅgulimāla, duṭṭhahatthiṃ chattaṃ
atk-s0502a:5193_1: dhāretvā ṭhitaṃ disvā bhāyī”ti? “Na bhāyiṃ, āvuso”ti. Te satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0502a:5193_2: āhaṃsu – “aṅgulimālo, bhante, aññaṃ byākarotī”ti. Satthā “na, bhikkhave, mama putto
atk-s0502a:5193_3: aṅgulimālo bhāyati. Khīṇāsavausabhānañhi antare jeṭṭhakausabhā mama puttasadisā bhikkhū
atk-s0502a:5196: Anejaṃ nhātakaṃ buddhaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇa”nti.
atk-s0502a:5197_0: Tassattho – acchambhitaṭṭhena usabhasadisatāya usabhaṃ uttamaṭṭhena pavaraṃ vīriyasampattiyā
atk-s0502a:5197_1: vīraṃ mahantānaṃ sīlakkhandhādīnaṃ esitattā mahesiṃ tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ vijitattā vijitāvinaṃ
atk-s0502a:5197_2: nhātakilesatāya nhātakaṃ catusaccabuddhatāya buddhaṃ taṃ evarūpaṃ ahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a:5201: Pubbenivāsanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto devahitabrāhmaṇassa pañhaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:5202_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye bhagavā vātarogena ābādhiko hutvā upavāṇattheraṃ uṇhodakatthāya
atk-s0502a:5202_1: devahitabrāhmaṇassa santikaṃ pahiṇi. So gantvā satthu ābādhikabhāvaṃ ācikkhitvā uṇhodakaṃ
atk-s0502a:5202_2: yāci, taṃ sutvā brāhmaṇo tuṭṭhamānaso hutvā “lābhā vata me, yaṃ mama santikaṃ sammāsambuddho
atk-s0502a:5202_3: uṇhodakassatthāya sāvakaṃ pahiṇī”ti uṇhodakassa kājaṃ purisena gāhāpetvā phāṇitassa
atk-s0502a:5202_4: ca puṭaṃ upavāṇattherassa pādāsi. Thero taṃ gāhāpetvā vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ uṇhodakena
atk-s0502a:5202_5: nhāpetvā uṇhodakena phāṇitaṃ āloḷetvā bhagavato pādāsi, tassa taṅkhaṇeyeva so ābādho
atk-s0502a:5202_6: paṭipassambhi. Brāhmaṇo cintesi – “kassa nu kho deyyadhammo dinno mahapphalo hoti,
atk-s0502a:5202_7: satthāraṃ pucchissāmī”ti so satthu santikaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ pucchanto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:5205: Athassa satthā “evarūpassa brāhmaṇassa dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ hotī”ti vatvā brāhmaṇaṃ pakāsento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:5210_0: Tassattho – yo pubbenivāsaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā jānāti, chabbīsatidevalokabhedaṃ saggañca
atk-s0502a:5210_1: catubbidhaṃ apāyañca dibbacakkhunā passati, atho jātikkhayasaṅkhātaṃ arahattaṃ patto,
atk-s0502a:5210_2: abhiññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ abhijānitvā pariññeyyaṃ parijānitvā pahātabbaṃ pahāya sacchikātabbaṃ
atk-s0502a:5210_3: sacchikatvā vosiko niṭṭhānaṃ patto, vusitavosānaṃ vā patto, āsavakkhayapaññāya monabhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:5210_4: pattattā muni, tamahaṃ sabbesaṃ kilesānaṃ vosānaṃ arahattamaggañāṇaṃ brahmacariyavāsaṃ
atk-s0502a:5211: Desanāvasāne bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pāpuṇiṃsu. Brāhmaṇopi pasannamānaso saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya upāsakattaṃ pavedesīti.
atk-s0502a:5216_0: Ettāvatā sabbapaṭhame yamakavagge cuddasa vatthūni, appamādavagge nava, cittavagge
atk-s0502a:5216_1: nava, pupphavagge dvādasa, bālavagge pannarasa, paṇḍitavagge ekādasa, arahantavagge
atk-s0502a:5216_2: dasa, sahassavagge cuddasa, pāpavagge dvādasa, daṇḍavagge ekādasa, jarāvagge nava,
atk-s0502a:5216_3: attavagge dasa, lokavagge ekādasa, buddhavagge nava, sukhavagge aṭṭha, piyavagge
atk-s0502a:5216_4: nava, kodhavagge aṭṭha, malavagge dvādasa, dhammaṭṭhavagge dasa, maggavagge dvādasa,
atk-s0502a:5216_5: pakiṇṇakavagge nava, nirayavagge nava, nāgavagge aṭṭha, taṇhāvagge dvādasa, bhikkhuvagge
atk-s0502a:5216_6: dvādasa, brāhmaṇavagge cattālīsāti pañcādhikāni tīṇi vatthusatāni pakāsetvā nātisaṅkhepanātivitthāravasena
atk-s0502a:5218: Gāthā dhammapade tena, bhāsitā yā mahesinā.
atk-s0502a:5227: Yaṃ pattaṃ kusalaṃ tena, kusalā sabbapāṇinaṃ;
atk-s0502a:5228: Sabbe ijjhantu saṅkappā, labhantu madhuraṃ phalanti.
